verse_text: Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk he Thai-v'i ke heu-thoi, Thai-v'i he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke heu-thoi. Y^a-s^u ke k^a-ph'u he 'an-ngi`ong:
^A-pak-l^a-h'on kiung Y^i-sat, Y^i-sat kiung Ng^a-kok, Ng^a-kok kiung Y`u-thai l^au k`i ke hi^ung-thi.
Y`u-thai th`ung Thap-m^a kiung Fap-l+et-s^u" l^au Chhia-l^a, Fap-l+et-s^u" kiung H^i-s^u"-l`un, H^i-s^u"-l`un kiung ^A-l`an,
^A-l`an kiung ^A-m'i-n^a-th+at, ^A-m'i-n^a-th+at kiung N^a-sun, N^a-sun kiung Sat-m`un,
Sat-m`un th`ung L^a-h+ap kiung P^o-^a-s^u", P^o-^a-s^u" th`ung Lu-tet kiung Ng`o-phi-tet, Ng`o-phi-tet kiung Y^a-s^i,
Y^a-s^i kiung Thai-v'i-v`ong. Thai-v'i th`ung V^u-li-^a ke p^u-ngi`ong kiung S'o-l`o-m`un,
S'o-l`o-m`un kiung L`o-p^o-^on, L`o-p^o-^on kiung ^A-p'i-ng^a, ^A-p'i-ng^a kiung ^A-sat,
^A-sat kiung Yok-s^a-fap, Yok-s^a-fap kiung Yok-h`o-l`an, Yok-h`o-l`an kiung V^u-s^i-ng^a,
V^u-s^i-ng^a kiung Yok-th'an, Yok-th'an kiung ^A-h+ap-s^u", ^A-h+ap-s^u" kiung H^i-s^i-k^a,
H^i-s^i-k^a kiung M^a-n^a-s^i, M^a-n^a-s^i kiung ^A-m`un, ^A-m`un kiung Yok-s^i-^a.
Y^i-set-li+et-chh+uk p^un-ng`in chok-hi P^a-p'i-l`un ke kh`i-ki^en, Yok-s^i-^a kiung Yok-ng^a-k^in l^au k`i ke hi^ung-thi.
P^un-ng`in chok-to P^a-p'i-l`un heu, Yok-ng^a-k^in kiung Sat-l^a-thiet, Sat-l^a-thiet kiung S'o-l`o-p^a-pak,
S'o-l`o-p^a-pak kiung ^A-p'i-ngi+uk, ^A-p'i-ngi+uk kiung Y^i-li-^a-kin, Y^i-li-^a-kin kiung ^A-s'o,
^A-s'o kiung Sat-tuk, Sat-tuk kiung ^A-k^im, ^A-k^im kiung Y^i-l+it,
Y^i-l+it kiung Y^i-li-^a-sat, Y^i-li-^a-sat kiung M^a-tan, M^a-tan kiung Ng^a-kok,
Ng^a-kok kiung Yok-sit, chhiu-he M^a-li-^a ke l'o-k^ung. Ke chh^u"n-cho K^i-tuk ke Y^a-s^u he tui M^a-li-^a chhut-se ke.

'An-ngi`ong son h'i-l`oi, tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on to Thai-v'i yit-khiung y^u s+u"p-si thoi, tui Thai-v'i to Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in p^un-ng`in chok-to P^a-p'i-l`un ya he s+u"p-si thoi, tui p^un-ng`in chok ke s`u" to K^i-tuk ke chhut-se ya he s+u"p-si thoi.
Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chhut-se ke k^in-ko he 'an-ngi`ong: K`i ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a y'i-k^in l^au Yok-sit thin-chh^in, ch'ung-he chhai kiet-f^un y^i-chhi`en, M^a-li-^a chhiu tui Su"n-L`in f`ai-th^oi.
K`i ke vi-f^un-f^u Yok-sit cho-ng`in chu"n-chh+u"t, ch'ung-he yu m`o-oi k^ung-kh^oi si^u-y+uk k`i, si'ong-oi pi-m+et ki'e-chh`u f^un-yok.

K`i t^ong kh'au-li li'a-su" ke s`u"-chiet, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" chhai mung-ch^ung tui k`i hi'en-hien, k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke heu-thoi Yok-sit, `m-s'u" ki^ang, cho-ng`i th'o M^a-li-^a cho p^u-ngi`ong, y^in-vi k`i he tui Su"n-L`in f`ai-th^oi ke.
K`i voi kiung yit-ke lai-'e, ng`i oi chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u, y^in-vi k`i oi ch'u"n-kiu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-m`in thot-l`i k`i-t^eu ke chhui."
Li'a yit-chhiet su" ke fat-s^en he oi yin-ngiam Ch'u th^ung-ko si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa:
Y^u th`ung-ch^u"n-'ng voi f`ai-th^oi kiung lai-'e, k`i ke mi`ang oi ham-cho Y^i-m^a-nui-li. ("Y^i-m^a-nui-li" ke yi-su" chhiu-he "Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu th`ung-chhai.")
Yok-sit si'ang ko-l`oi, chhiu cheu Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" s'o f^un-fu ke hi cho, l^au M^a-li-^a kiet-f^un;
ch'ung-he chhai k`i kiung lai-'e y^i-chhi`en, m`o l^au k`i th`ung-f`ong. Se-ng`in-`e chhut-se, Yok-sit chhiu chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u.
H^i-l+it cho v`ong ke s`u", Y^a-s^u chhut-se chhai Y`u-thai ke Pak-li-h`en-s`ang. Y^u k'i-ke s^en-siong-k^a tui t^ung-f^ong l`oi-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang;
k`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "Ke chhut-se cho Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong ke chhai nai-vi? Ng`ai-t^eu chhai t^ung-f^ong khon-t'o k`i ke s^en-'e, th+it-ph+et l`oi pai k`i."
H^i-l+it-v`ong th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, s^im-k^on chhin chh+ok-kip; chhi`on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang-s`ang ke ng`in ya he khiung-yong.
H^i-l+it chhiu seu-s+ip s'o-y^u ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au m`in-ki^en ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l`oi, mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^i-tuk oi chhai m'a-ke s'o-chhai chhut-se?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Chhai Y`u-thai ke Pak-li-h`en, y^in-vi si^en-t^i y^u 'an-ngi`ong si'a-t'en, k'ong:

Y`u-thai thi-kh^i ke Pak-li-h`en-s`ang ^a, ng`i chhai Y`u-thai li'a-t^eu s`ang-ch^ung pin `m-he chui-se ke; y^in-vi y^u yit-ke li^ang-chhiu voi tui ng`i ke-vi chhut-l`oi, k`i oi m+uk-y^ong Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in Y^i-set-li+et."
S'o-y^i, H^i-l+it am-ch^ung seu-kien li'a k'i-ke tui t^ung-f^ong l`oi ke s^en-siong-k^a, tui k`i-t^eu chh`a-mun ke-li+ap s^en-'e chhut-hien ke khok-s+u"t ngit-kh`i.
Y`en-heu k`i f^un-fu k`i-t^eu hi Pak-li-h`en, k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi, si`ong-se chh`im ke se-ng`in-`e, chh`im-t'o y^i-heu chhiu l`oi po-p^un ng`ai t^i, 'an-ngi`ong ng`ai ya h'o hi-pai k`i."

Th^ang-li'au v`ong ke fa, k`i-t^eu chhiu l`i-kh^oi. Ke-s`u", k`i-t^eu chhai t^ung-f^ong khon-t'o ke ke-li+ap s^en-'e yu chhut-hien, chhai k`i-t^eu ke th`eu-chhi`en h`ang, yit-chh+u"t to se-ng`in-`e h+et ke s'o-chhai, chhiu chhai t'ang-k^o th`in h^a-l`oi.
K`i-t^eu khon-t'o ke-li+ap s^en-'e, f^on-h'i to k'ong `m-tet.

K`i-t^eu ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u, khon-t'o se-ng`in-`e l^au ki^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, chhiu ph+uk l+ok-hi pai se-ng`in-`e, y`en-heu t'a-kh^oi p'o-h+ap, n^a-chhut v`ong-k^im, nen-hi^ong, m+ut-y+ok cho l^i-v+ut l`oi hien-p^un k`i.
Chhai mung-ch^ung, Song-ti ch'u"-su" k`i-t^eu m+ok ch'on-hi kien H^i-l+it; k`i-t^eu chhiu tui nang-ngoi yit-thi`au lu ch'on-hi k`i-t^eu ke k^a-hi^ong.

K`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi y^i-heu, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" chhai Yok-sit ke mung-ch^ung hi'en-hien, k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi! Tai-t'en se-ng`in-`e l^au ki^a-m^e th`o-nan hi ^Ai-kh+ip, h+et chhai ke-vi, chh+u"t-to ng`ai chai ch'u"-su" ng`i; y^in-vi H^i-l+it oi s^eu-chh`a li'a se-ng`in-`e l`oi sat-hoi k`i."
S'o-y^i, Yok-sit chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, theu-ya tai-t'en se-ng`in-`e l^au ki^a-m^e th`o-ch'eu hi ^Ai-kh+ip,
h+et chhai ke-vi, chh+u"t-to H^i-l+it s'i-thet. Li'a-ke su" yin-ngiam Ch'u th^ung-ko si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa: "Ng`ai ham ng`ai ke Lai-'e tui ^Ai-kh+ip chhut-l`oi."

H^i-l+it fat-hien chhu"-k^a su s^en-siong-k^a ke chok-nung, f^i-s`ong khi'en, chhiu cheu k`i tui s^en-siong-k^a s'o tham-t'o ke-li+ap s^en-'e chhut-hien ke s`u"-kh`i, phai-ng`in chi^ong Pak-li-h`en l^au fu-khiun thi-kh^i li'ong-se y^i-nui ke se-lai-'e chhi`on-phu chh`u"-thet.
Li'a-ke su" yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^a-li-m'i s'o-k'ong ke:
Chhai L^a-m^a y^u th^ang-t'o yit-ke s^ang, he ve-thi^en ve-thi ke thai-kieu s^ang; he L`ui-kiet vi k`i ke ch'u"-'ng thai-kieu, `m-h'en chiap-su ^on-v'i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu m`o-thet-hi l'e.
H^i-l+it s'i-heu, chhai ^Ai-kh+ip, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" chhai Yok-sit ke mung-ch^ung hi'en-hien,
k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi! Tai-t'en se-ng`in-`e l^au ki^a-m^e ch'on-hi Y^i-set-li+et, y^in-vi ke-t^eu si'ong-oi sat-hoi li'a se-ng`in-`e ke y'i-k^in s'i-thet l'e."
Yok-sit chhiu chhut-fat, tai-t'en se-ng`in-`e l^au ki^a-m^e ch'on-hi Y^i-set-li+et.

Yok-sit y^in-vi th^ang-k'ong ^A-k^i-l'o ki-s`u"n ki^a-p^a H^i-l+it cho Y`u-thai-v`ong, chhiu `m-k'am hi ke-vi. Heu-l`oi, Ch'u yu chhai Yok-sit ke mung-ch^ung ch'u"-su" k`i, k`i chhiu s'am-to K^a-li-li-s'en hi,
h+et chhai ^on-to N^a-sat-l+et ke s`ang-t'u. Li'a chhiu yin-ngiam si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa: "K`i oi chh^u"n-cho N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in."
Ke-s`u", S^u"-s'e Yok-hon l`oi-to Y`u-thai ke kh'ong-y^a chh`on-tho.
K`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et chhui-ok, y^in-vi thi^en-koet voi s+u"t-hien l'e!"
Yok-hon chhiu-he si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a s'o-k'ong ke ng`in; k`i k'ong: Chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u-ng`in h^em-k'ong: "Oi ch'un-phi h'o-se Ch'u ke tho-lu, si^u-chh+u"t K`i s'o-oi h`ang ke se-lu!"
Yok-hon chok-t'en l+ok-th`o-m^o cho ke s^am, y^eu-khi^en thak-t'en ph`i-tai; s+u"t chh'o-m'ang l^au y^a-ph^ung-th`ong ko ngit-`e.
Chung-ng`in tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, Y`u-thai chhi`on-thi, l^au Yok-tan-h`o yit-tai thi-f^ong l`oi-to k`i mien-chhi`en.
K`i-t^eu s`u"n-ngin chhu"-k^a ke chhui; Yok-hon chhiu chhai Yok-tan-h`o vi k`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i.

Yok-hon khon-t'o chhin-t^o Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in ya l`oi y^eu-khi`u li^ang s'e-l^i, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-t^eu th+uk-s`a ^a! Song-ti ke s'u"m-phan voi to l'e, ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o s'am tet-kh^oi m^a?
Oi yung h`ang-v`i l`oi chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in hi-chhi+et chhui-ok.

`M-h'o l'au-t'o ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhiu cho-tet mi^en-su s'u"m-phan. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Song-ti n`en tui li'a-t^eu s+ak-th`eu vi ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chho-chhut ch'u"-s^un l`oi!
P'u-th`eu y'i-k^in piong chhai su-k^in t'ang l^o, f`am m`o kiet h'o k'o-ch'u" ke su-'e chhi`on-phu oi ch'am-thet, fit-l+ok f'o t^i-poi.

Ng`ai yung s'ui vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i, p'eu-su" ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in f'i-k'oi; ch'ung-he, ke p'i ng`ai kha-man l`oi ke, oi yung Su"n-L`in l^au f'o vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i. K`i p'i ng`ai v'i-thai chhin-t^o, ng`ai chhiu-he thoi k`i khoan h`ai ya he m`o ch^u"-kiet.
K`i ke s'u n^a-t'en poi-k^i, oi chi^ong t'a-m+ak-chh`ong piang-chhiang, chi^ong m+ak-'e s^u-ng+ip chh^ong-khu, chi^ong phang-'e yung y'un-y'en put-m+et ke f'o s^eu-thet!"
Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u tui K^a-li-li hi Yok-tan-h`o kien Yok-hon, oi tui k`i li^ang s'e-l^i.
Yok-hon si'ong-oi k'oi-pien k`i ke ch'u-yi, chhiu k'ong: "Ng`ai yin-t^ong chiap-su ng`i ke s'e-l^i, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an f'an-ch'on l`oi-chhiu ng`ai!"
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a-ha oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho he s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi." S'o-y^i, Yok-hon chhiu sun k`i ke yi-su".

Y^a-s^u li^ang s'e-l^i y^i-heu, chit-s`u" tui s'ui-ch^ung s^ong-l`oi, thi^en chhiu vi k`i kh^oi; k`i khon-t'o Song-ti ke L`in chhiong ngi+et-kap-`e 'an-ngi`ong kong h^a-l`oi, l+ok chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song.
Th`ung-s`u", tui thi^en-t'ang y^u s^ang-y^im k'ong: "Li'a he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, Ng`ai s'o f^on-h'i ke."
Heu-l`oi, Y^a-s^u p^un Su"n-L`in tai-hi kh'ong-y^a, su M^o-k'ui ke su"-tham.
Kim-s+u"t si-s+u"p ngit-ya y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u chhiu t'u-k^i.
Ke su"-tham ng`in ke chin-chhi`en l`oi, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i na-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, min-lin li'a-t^eu s+ak-th`eu pien-cho mien-p^au ^a!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Ng`in ke s^en-chh`un `m-he t^an-chhiang kho s+u"t-v+ut, he kho Song-ti s'o-k'ong ke tak-ki fa.' "
M^o-k'ui yu tai Y^a-s^u hi Su"n-s`ang, ham k`i kh^i chhai su"n-thien chui-k^o ke s'o-chhai,

tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i na-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, thiau h^a-hi; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in y^u k'ong: Song-ti voi vi ng`i f^un-fu K`i ke thi^en-s'u", yung k`i-t^eu ke s'u f`u-t'en ng`i, p^un ng`i ke kiok `m-voi chhong-t'o s+ak-th`eu."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ch'ung-he Su"n-k^in ya k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet su"-tham Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti.' "
Chui-heu, M^o-k'ui tai Y^a-s^u s^ong yit-chho chhin-k^o ke s^an, p^un k`i khon su"-ki^en van-koet l^au k`i-t^eu ke y`ung-f`a fu-kui.
M^o-k'ui k'ong: "Ng`i na-he kh'ui h^a-l`oi pai ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu p^un ng`i."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Sat-tan, s'am-kh^oi! Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Oi pai Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti, t^an-t^an su"-fung K`i.' "
'An-ngi`ong, M^o-k'ui chhiu l`i-kh^oi Y^a-s^u, y^u thi^en-s'u" l`oi f+uk-su" k`i.
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o Yok-hon p^un-ng`in ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u, chhiu s'am-to K^a-li-li hi.
K`i `m h+et chhai N^a-sat-l+et, f'an-ch'on hi h+et chhai K^a-pak-n`ung. Ke s`ang chhai S^i-pu-l`un l^au N^a-fut-th^a-li ke thi-kh^i, chiap-khiun K^a-li-li-f`u.
Li'a chhiu yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke fa:
S^i-pu-l`un l^au N^a-fut-th^a-li ke thi-f^ong, chhai y`en-h'oi ke thai-lu song, chhai Yok-tan-h`o tui-mien ke-phi'en, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke K^a-li-li!
H+et chhai v^u-am ch^ung ke ng`in y'i-k^in khon-t'o thai k^ong; h+et chhai s'i-y^im ch^u" thi ke ng`in y^u k^ong cheu k`i-t^eu.
Tui ke-s`u" kh^oi-s'u", Y^a-s^u chh`on tho-l^i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et chhui-ok, y^in-vi thi^en-koet voi s+u"t-hien l'e!"
Y^a-s^u sun K^a-li-li f`u-pi^en h`ang, khon-t'o li'ong-ke t'a-`ng ke hi^ung-thi, S^i-m`un (phi^en-mi`ang P'i-tet) l^au ki^a l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et, t^ong-chhai f`u-ch^ung ve-mi'ong t'a-`ng.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai! Ng`ai oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ng`in chhiong t'a-t'o `ng yit-yong."
K`i-t^eu chit-s`u" piong-h^a mi'ong-`e, th`en Y^a-s^u hi.

Y^a-s^u yu hiong-chhi`en h`ang, khon-t'o nang-ngoi li'ong-ke hi^ung-thi, chhiu-he S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon; k`i-t^eu th`ung ^a-p^a khiung-ha chhai s`on-t'ang ch'u"n-l^i `ng-mi'ong. Y^a-s^u f^u-seu k`i li'ong-s`a,
k`i-t^eu chit-s`u" l`i-kh^oi s`on l^au ^a-p^a, th`en Y^a-s^u hi.
Y^a-s^u h`ang-phien K^a-li-li chhi`on-thi, chhai kok thi-f^ong ke fi-th`ong kau-hiun ng`in, si^en-chh`on thi^en-koet ke fuk-y^im, y^i-h'o m`in-ki^en tak-yong ke phiang.

K`i ke mi`ang-s^ang chh`on-phien Si-li-^a, s'o-y^i ke-vi ke ng`in-m`in chi^ong kok-ch'ung ke phiang-ng`in, k^in-l+it kok-yong thung-kh'u ke ng`in, chhiong p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke, ch^u-m`a-chh'ai ke, th^an-f^ung ke, chhi`on-phu tai-l`oi k`i mien-chhi`en; k`i l^ung-ch'ung y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
K^ui-khi`un ke ng`in tui K^a-li-li, S+u"p-yip, Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, Y`u-thai l^au Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en l`oi th`en k`i.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o yit thai-khi`un ng`in, chhiu s^ong-s^an, chh^o h^a-l`oi; ki^a h+ok-s^ang v`i chhai k`i ke ph`ong-pi^en.
K`i chhiu kau-hiun k`i-t^eu, k'ong:
"S`u"n-ngin chhu"-k^a l`in-sin khi`ung-kh'u ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; k`i-t^eu he thi^en-koet ke ch'u"-m`in!
"Vi-t'o chhui l`oi p^i-s^ong ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; Song-ti oi ^on-v'i k`i-t^eu!
"Khi^am-p^i ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; k`i-t^eu voi tet-t'o Song-ti yin-h'i ke th'u-thi!
"K^i-hot hi^un-mu Song-ti ch'u"-yi ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; Song-ti oi p^un k`i-t^eu tet-t'o m^an-chiuk!
"Yung chh`u"-p^i kho'an-thai ng`in ke s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; Song-ti ya oi yung chh`u"-p^i kho'an-thai k`i-t^eu!
"Nui-s^im s`un-kiet ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; k`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Song-ti!
"Vi-t'o f`o-ph`in chhin-s^im chhin-l+it ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; Song-ti oi chh^u"n k`i-t^eu cho ch'u"-'ng!
"Y^in-vi s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi l`oi su pet-hoi ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi; k`i-t^eu chhiu-he thi^en-koet ke ch'u"-m`in!
"Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu th`en ng`ai, ph+et-ng`in chhiu v'u-y+uk ng`i-t^eu, pet-hoi ng`i-t^eu, k'ong kok-yong f'ai-fa f'i-pong ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi ^o!
Yin-t^ong oi f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok, y^in-vi chhai thi^en-t'ang y^u vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi f^ung-fu ke chi'ong-s'ong; th`eu-p'ai ke si^en-t^i ya he 'an-ngi`ong p^un-ng`in pet-hoi.
"Ng`i-t^eu he ng`in-ki^en ke y`am; ch'ung-he y`am na su"t-thet h`am-mi, oi ngi'ong-p^an s'u" k`i chai h`am n`e? Ki-y`en s`ang-cho fi-v+ut, ch'u"-y^u fit-thet, y`u-chhai ng`in chien-th+ap.
"Ng`i-t^eu he su"-ki^en ke k^ong. H'i chhai s^an-t'ang ke s`ang he m`o fap-thu ch^a h'i-l`oi ke.
M`o ng`in ti'am-t^en piong chhai t'eu t'ai-h^a, yit-thin he piong chhai t^en-th`oi-t'ang, chang voi cheu-k^ong chhi`on-k^a ke ng`in.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu ke k^ong ya yin-k^oi cheu chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en, p^un k`i-t^eu khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke h'o h`ang-v`i, l`oi siung-chan ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a.
"M+ok si'ong ng`ai l`oi he oi fi-chh`u M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i ke kau-hiun. Ng`ai `m-he l`oi fi-chh`u, he l`oi s`u"n-chhi`on k`i-t^eu ke yi-ngi.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, thi^en-thi h`an-chh^oi, fap-l+it ke yit-pit yit-v+ak chhiu cho-`m-tet fi-thet, chh+u"t-to van-su" ke kiet-m^i.

S'o-y^i, chhiu-son v`i-fam chui-se ke yit-thi`au kie-min, yu k^au ph+et-ng`in ya 'an-ngi`ong cho ke, chhai thi^en-koet oi s`ang-cho chui-m^i ke ng`in. Ch^un-s'u fap-l+it, yu k^au ph+et-ng`in ya khiung-yong ch^un-s'u ke, chhai thi^en-koet oi s`ang-cho chui-thai ke ng`in.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu na-he m`o p'i k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in h`an-kha ch^ung-s^im l`oi s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, yit-thin `m-voi ng+ip thi^en-koet.
"Ng`i-t^eu su"t th^ang-k'ong, y^u kim-ch'u" k'u-ng`in ke fa, k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet chh`u"-ng`in; chh`u"-ng`in ke oi su s'u"m-phan.'

Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, tui hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi fat-khi'en ke, ya oi su s'u"m-phan; ma hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi 'Fi-ng`in' ke, chhiu-oi s^ong fap-yen; ma hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi 'Thai-ngong-f^an' ke, mi^en-put-li'au oi su thi-ngi+uk ke f'o-s^eu.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i chhai chi-th`an chhi`en oi hien l^i-v+ut p^un Song-ti ke s`u"-chiet, na-he si'ong-h'i y^u hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi tui ng`i put-m^an,
ng`i chhiu oi chi^ong l^i-v+ut li`u chhai chi-th`an chhi`en, ngi`am-s`u" hi th`ung k`i k'ong-f`o, y`en-heu chang to-ch'on-l`oi hien l^i-v+ut p^un Song-ti.

"Na-he y^u-ng`in oi ko ng`i, l^ai ng`i s^ong fap-yen, ng`i chhiu oi p'a-ak s`u"-ki^en, chhai m`ang-to fap-yen y^i-chhi`en th`ung k`i f`o-ki'e. Na-he m`o, ng+ip-hi fap-yen y^i-heu, k`i chhiu voi chi^ong ng`i k^au-p^un fap-k^on, fap-k^on k^au-p^un fap-k'in, ko^an ng`i ng+ip k^am-ngi+uk.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`i oi chh^o-k^am, to ng`i n+ap-chh^in f+at-k^im ke chui-heu yit-f^un chhi`en.
"Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-ko k'u-s`u"-thoi y^u 'an-ngi`ong ke kau-hiun k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im.'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, khon-t'o fu-'ng chhiu s^ang-chhut si`a-ngiam ke, chhai k`i ke s^im-ch^ung y'i-k^in th`ung k`i fam ki^en-y`im.
Na-he ng`i ke yu-ngi'en hoi ng`i fam-chhui, chi^ong k`i yet chhut-l`oi, fit-thet k`i! S'un-su"t s^u"n-th'i ke yit-phu-fun p'i k^ui-s^u"n l+ok thi-ngi+uk h'o k^a chhin-t^o.
Na-he ng`i ke yu-s'u hoi ng`i fam-chhui, chi^ong k`i ch'am h^a-l`oi, fit-thet k`i! S'un-su"t yit-ke k^i-th'i p'i k^ui-s^u"n l+ok thi-ngi+uk h'o k^a chhin-t^o.
"Yu y^u 'an-ngi`ong ke kau-hiun k'ong: 'F`am-he oi l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong ke, yit-thin oi si'a l`i-f^un s^u p^un k`i.'

Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chh`u-li'au k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong m`o s'u ch^u"n-chiet, l'o-k^ung chhiu cho-`m-tet l`i-thet k`i. Y^in-vi, na-he k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong chai ka-ng`in, k`i chhiu-he hoi k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong fam ki^en-y`im; th'o k`i ke n`am-ng`in ya he son fam ki^en-y`im.
"Ng`i-t^eu me th^ang-ko y^u kau-hiun k'u-ng`in ke fa, k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet v`i-poi s'o-fat ke su"; chhai Ch'u ke mien-chhi`en s'o-fat ke su" yit-thin oi s+u"t-h`ang.'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k^in-p'un cho-`m-tet fat-su". Cho-`m-tet tui thi^en fat-su", y^in-vi thi^en he Song-ti ke p'o-chho;
cho-`m-tet ch'u" thi fat-su", y^in-vi thi he Song-ti ke kiok-th+ap; ya cho-`m-tet tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang fat-su", y^in-vi ke he thai Ki^un-v`ong ke s`ang;
li`en ch'u" chhu"-k^a ke th`eu-n`a fat-su" ya cho-`m-tet, y^in-vi ng`i m`o phan-fap s'u" chhu"-k^a ke yit-thi`au th`eu-n`a-m^o pien-v^u ya-he pien-ph+ak.
Ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, he, chhiu k'ong 'He', `m-he, chhiu k'ong '`M-he'; k^a-k'ong ke chhiu-he tui ke si`a-ok-ch'a l`oi ke.
"Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-ko li'a-ch'ung ke kau-hiun k'ong: 'Muk-ch^u ph`oi muk-ch^u, ng`a-chh'u" ph`oi ng`a-chh'u".'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, cho-`m-tet po-f+uk kh^i-fu ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in. Y^u-ng`in t'a ng`i choi-kok ke yu-phi'en, li`en ch'o-phi'en ya p^un k`i t'a!
Y^u-ng`in l^ai ng`i s^ong fap-yen, oi n^a ng`i ke nui-s^am, li`en ngoi-s^am ya p^un k`i!
Na-he y^u-ng`in khi`ong-pet ng`i thoi k`i p`a t^ung-s^i h`ang yit-l^i lu, ng`i chhiu vi k`i k^a-h`ang yit-l^i.
Y^u-ng`in tui ng`i khi`u m'a-ke, chhiu oi p^un k`i; y^u-ng`in tui ng`i chia m'a-ke, chhiu oi chia-p^un k`i.
"Ng`i-t^eu yu th^ang-ko 'an-ngi`ong ke kau-hiun k'ong: 'Siak ng`i ke ph`en-y^u, yen-hen ng`i ke s`u-th+it.'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, oi siak ng`i-t^eu ke s`u-th+it, vi pet-hoi ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in kh`i-t'o.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chang kh'o-y^i cho Thi^en-fu ke ch'u"-'ng. Y^in-vi Thi^en-fu yung ngit-th`eu cheu h'o-ng`in, ya cheu f'ai-ng`in; l+ok-y'i p^un h`ang-san ke, ya p^un chok-ok ke.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u siak ke-t^eu siak ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in, Song-ti ngi'ong oi-s'u" chi'ong-s'ong ng`i-t^eu n`o? Li`en soi-kun me 'an-ngi`ong h`ang.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u tui ph`en-y^u chhi'ang-^on, y^u m'a-ke li'au-put-h'i n`o? Yi-kau-th`u k'am `m-he 'an-ngi`ong h`ang?
Ng`i-t^eu oi v`an-chhi`on, chhiu-chhiong ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu he v`an-chhi`on ke yit-yong."

"Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o chhai ph+et-ng`in mien-chhi`en ti'en chhu"-k^a ke khi`en-s`u"n, thi^au-thi^au cho p^un ng`in khon. 'An-ngi`ong cho, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" si'ong-oi tui Thi^en-fu ke-vi tet-t'o m'a-ke chi'ong-s'ong.

"S'o-y^i, ng`i kiu-chi ng`in ke s`u", `m-h'o ph`un l+ap-p'a si^en-chh`on, chhiong ke-t^eu k'a-h'o ke ng`in chhai fi-th`ong ya-he ki^e-hong s'o-cho ke, oi tet-t'o ph+et-ng`in ke kho^a-chi'ong. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, y'i-k^in tet-t'o k`i-t^eu ke po-tap l'e.
Ng`i kiu-chi ng`in ke s`u", yu-s'u s'o-cho ke, m+ok p^un ch'o-s'u t^i,
oi chhai am-ch^ung h`ang-san. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i ke Thi^en-fu, chhiu-he khon-tet-t'o ng`i chhai am-ch^ung cho-su" ke, K`i tit-khok voi chi'ong-s'ong ng`i.

"Ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o ke s`u"-chiet, `m-h'o chhiong k'a-h'o ke ng`in 'an-ngi`ong, hau kh^i chhai fi-th`ong ya-he s+u"p-su"-lu-h'eu kh`i-t'o, thi^au-thi^au cho p^un ng`in khon. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, y'i-k^in tet-t'o k`i-t^eu ke po-tap l'e.

Ng`i kh`i-t'o ke s`u", oi ng+ip chhu"-k^a ke ki^en-t'u, ko^an-t'en m`un, hiong am-ch^ung ke Thi^en-fu kh`i-t'o. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i ke Thi^en-fu, chhiu-he khon-tet-t'o ng`i chhai am-ch^ung cho-su" ke, K`i tit-khok voi chi'ong-s'ong ng`i.
"Ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o ke s`u", `m-h'o chhiong yi-kau-th`u 'an-ngi`ong yung chhin-t^o chh`ung-f+uk m`o yi-su" ke fa. K`i-t^eu l'au-t'o yung chh`ong-phi^en thai-lun, Song-ti chang voi th^ang.
`M-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong; ng`i-t^eu m`ang khi`u, ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu y'i-k^in t^i ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi 'an-ngi`ong kh`i-t'o: Ng`ai-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a: Ngien Ng`i ke su"n-mi`ang su ch^un-chhung;
ngien Ng`i chhai su"-ki^en ch'ong-khi`en; ngien Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi s+u"t-hien chhai thi-song, chhiu-chhiong chhai thi^en-t'ang yit-yong.
Su ng`ai-t^eu k^im-p^u-ngit s'o s^i-yeu ke y'im-s+u"t.
Ngi`eu-sa ng`ai-t^eu ke kh^ui-khiam, chhiu-chhiong ng`ai-t^eu ngi`eu-sa kh^ui-khiam ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in.
`M-h'o p^un ng`ai-t^eu t`u-t'o thet-chh^ung ke kh'au-ngiam; kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i ke si`a-ok-ch'a ke s'u.
"Ng`i-t^eu sa-mi^en ph+et-ng`in ke ko-fam, ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu ya voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu;
ng`i-t^eu `m sa-mi^en ph+et-ng`in ke ko-fam, ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu ya `m-voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke ko-fam.

"Ng`i-t^eu kim-s+u"t ke s`u"-chiet, `m-h'o chhiong k'a-h'o ke ng`in; k`i-t^eu cha-yi y`u-s`eu, mien ch^ong-to chhin ch'e, thi^au-thi^au p^un ng`in khon-chhut k`i-t^eu t^ong chhai kim-s+u"t. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, y'i-k^in tet-t'o k`i-t^eu ke po-tap l'e.
Ng`i kim-s+u"t ke s`u", oi s^u"-th`eu s'e-mien,

m+ok p^un ph+et-ng`in khon-chhut ng`i chhai kim-s+u"t; chhai am-ch^ung ke Thi^en-fu khon-t'o chhiu la l'e! 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i ke Thi^en-fu, chhiu-he khon-tet-t'o ng`i chhai am-ch^ung cho-su" ke, K`i tit-khok voi chi'ong-s'ong ng`i.
"`M-h'o vi chhu"-k^a chit-chh`un chh`oi-p'o chhai thi-song; y^in-vi y^u chh`ung-`e l`oi chu, ya voi s^ang-l^u, yu y^u chh+et-'e t'a-f'ai m`un ng+ip-l`oi th^eu.
Oi vi chhu"-k^a chit-chh`un chh`oi-p'o chhai thi^en-t'ang; ke-vi m`o chh`ung-`e l`oi chu, `m-voi s^ang-l^u, ya m`o chh+et-'e t'a-f'ai m`un ng+ip-l`oi th^eu.
Y^in-vi ng`i ke chh`oi-p'o chhai nai-vi, ng`i ke s^im ya chhai ke-vi.
"Muk-ch^u kh'o-p'i s^u"n-th'i ke t^en. Muk-ch^u na-he h'o, ng`i chhi`on-s^u"n chhiu voi y^u k^ong-m`in;
muk-ch^u na f'ai-thet, ng`i chhi`on-s^u"n chhiu voi v^u-am. Khiung-yong, ng`i t^i-poi ke k^ong na-he pien-cho v^u-am, ke-ch'ung ke v^u-am he ngi'ong-p^an tet-ng`in-ki^ang ^a!

"M`o ng`in n`en f+uk-su" li'ong-ke ch'u-ng`in. `M-he n^au li'a-ke, oi ke-ke, chhiu-he khon-chhung li'a-ke, khon-khi^ang ke-ke. Ng`i-t^eu m`o kh'o-n`en th`ung-s`u" cho Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, yu cho k^im-chhi`en ke n`ung-chh`oi.

"S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, `m-h'o vi-t'o s^en-f+at s'o s^i-yeu ke y'im-s+u"t, ya-he s^u"n-th'i s'o-oi chok ke s^am-fu l`oi chh^au-s^im. S^ang-miang k'am m`o p'i y'im-s+u"t kha chhung-yeu? S^u"n-th'i k'am m`o p'i s^am-fu kha yeu-k'in?

Ng`i-t^eu khon thi^en-t'ang ke ti^au-'e: K`i-t^eu m`o chung, m`o s^u, ya m`o chi^ong li`ong-s+u"t t'un chhai kuk-chh^ong; ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a h`an-he hiuk k`i-t^eu! Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-he p'i ti^au-'e kha kui-chhung m^a?
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m'a-ng`in n`en yung y`u-s`eu s+u"t k^a k'i-ngit n`e?
"Ngi'ong-oi vi-t'o s^am-fu l`oi chh^au-s^im? Ng`i-t^eu khon y^a-s^ang ke pak-h+ap-f^a ngi'ong-p^an chi^ang h'i-l`oi! K`i-t^eu m`o cho-se, ya m`o cho-s^am;
ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiu-he S'o-l`o-m`un kh+it y`ung-f`a fu-kui ke s`u", k`i ke t'a-pan ya m`o yit-l`ui y^a-f^a 'an-chi^ang.

Y^a-s^ang ke f^a-chh'o k^im-p^u-ngit s^ang chhut-l`oi, thi^en-k^ong-ngit chhiu ch^au-thet, p^un-ng`in fit-l+ok f'o-l`u hi s^eu, Song-ti h`an 'an-ngi`ong vi k`i-t^eu t'a-pan, K`i k'am `m-voi chi^ong s^am-fu su-p^un ng`i-t^eu? Ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im s+u"t-chhai thet-se!
S'o-y^i, `m-h'o y`u-s`eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu oi s+u"t m'a-ke? Oi l^im m'a-ke? Oi chok m'a-ke?'
Li'a-t^eu su" he `m-sin ke ng`in s'o ch^ui-khi`u ke. Ng`i-t^eu thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a t^i li'a-t^eu chhi`on-phu he ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke.
Ng`i-t^eu oi si^en ch^ui-khi`u Song-ti koet ke s+u"t-hien, pin ch^un-h`ang K`i ke ch'u"-yi, K`i chhiu voi chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o vi-t'o thi^en-k^ong-ngit l`oi y`u-s`eu, y^in-vi thi^en-k^ong-ngit y^u thi^en-k^ong-ngit ke y`u-s`eu; yit-ngit t^am-t^ong yit-ngit ke k^an-kh'u chhiu la l'e."
"`M-h'o lun-ton ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti chhiu `m-voi s'u"m-phan ng`i-t^eu.

Y^in-vi Song-ti oi yung ng`i-t^eu lun-ton ph+et-ng`in ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi s'u"m-phan ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu yung m'a-ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti ya oi yung khiung-yong ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`i cho-m'a-ke t^an-chhiang khon-t'o ngi^a hi^ung-thi muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e, ch'ung-he m`o si'ong-t'o chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke thai-li`ong n`e?
Ng`i chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi y^u thai-li`ong, ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet tui ngi^a hi^ung-thi k'ong: 'Ng`i muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e, ng`ai thoi ng`i thi^au chhut-l`oi' n`o?
K'a-h'o ke ng`in ^a, si^en chi^ong ng`i chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke thai-li`ong s'ai-ch'eu, chang khon-tet chh^in-chh'u l`oi thi^au ngi^a hi^ung-thi muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e.
"`M-h'o chi^ong s`u"n-su"n ke t^ung-s^i fit-p^un ki'eu-`e, k`i-t^eu voi ch'on ko-l`oi ng^au ng`i-t^eu; `m-h'o chi^ong ch^u"n-ch^u fit-p^un ch^u-'e, k`i-t^eu voi chien-th+ap ch^u"n-ch^u.
"Ng`i-t^eu khi`u, chhiu voi tet-t'o; chh`im, chhiu voi chh`im-t'o; ph^ong-m`un, m`un chhiu voi vi ng`i-t^eu kh^oi.
Y^in-vi m^i-yit-ke khi`u ke, chhiu tet-t'o; chh`im ke, chhiu chh`im-t'o; ph^ong-m`un ke, m`un chhiu vi k`i kh^oi.
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u m'a-ng`in, lai-'e th'o mien-p^au, f'an-ch'on n^a s+ak-th`eu p^un k`i?
Th'o `ng-`e, f'an-ch'on n^a s`a-k^o p^un k`i?

Ng`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en f'ai, h`an t^i n^a h'o t^ung-s^i p^un chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-'ng; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a k'am `m-he h`an-kha oi chi^ong h'o t^ung-s^i su-p^un khi`u K`i ke ng`in m^a?
"Ng`i-t^eu oi ph+et-ng`in ngi'ong-p^an tui-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiu oi ngi'ong-p^an tui-thai k`i-t^eu; li'a chhiu-he M^o-s^i fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i kau-hiun ke ch^u"n yi-ngi.
"Ng`i-t^eu oi tui h+ap-m`un ng+ip-hi; y^in-vi ke theu-to m+et-m`ong ke m`un he fat ke, lu he h'o-h`ang ke, h`ang ke-thi`au lu ke ng`in ya chhin-t^o.
Ke theu-to y'un-s^en ke m`un he h+ap ke, lu he n`an-h`ang ke, chh`im-t'o ke ng`in ya chhin-s'eu.
"Ng`i-t^eu oi th`i-f`ong k'a si^en-t^i. K`i-t^eu chhut-hien chhai ng`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en, ngoi-p'eu khon h'i-l`oi chhiong mi`en-y`ong, ch'ung-he t^i-poi he hi^ung-ok ke s`ai-l`ong.
Ng`i-t^eu khon k`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i chhiu voi ngin-chhut k`i-t^eu. Net-su `m-voi kiet ph`u-th`o, chh+it-l`i ya `m-voi kiet v`u-f^a-k'o.
H'o-su kiet h'o k'o-ch'u"; f'ai-su kiet f'ai k'o-ch'u".
H'o-su `m-voi kiet f'ai k'o-ch'u"; f'ai-su ya `m-voi kiet h'o k'o-ch'u".
M`o kiet h'o k'o-ch'u" ke su-'e chhiu ch'am-thet, fit-l+ok f'o t^i-poi.
S'o-y^i, khon k`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi ngin-chhut k'a si^en-t^i.
"Ke-t^eu ham ng`ai 'Ch'u ^a, Ch'u ^a!' ke ng`in pin `m-he l^ung-ch'ung voi ng+ip thi^en-koet; ch'u"-y^u s+u"t-h`ang ng`ai Thi^en-fu ch'u"-yi ke ng`in chang cho-tet ng+ip-hi.

M+at-ngit l`oi ke s`u", chhin-t^o ng`in voi tui ng`ai k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, Ch'u ^a! Ng`ai-t^eu su"t fung ng`i ke mi`ang chh`on Song-ti ke fuk-y^im, ya su"t fung ng`i ke mi`ang kiuk-k'ui, h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak!'
Ke-s`u", ng`ai oi m`in-m`in tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t ng`i-t^eu; ng`i li'a-t^eu chok-ok ke, s'am-kh^oi!'
"S'o-y^i, th^ang ng`ai li'a-t^eu fa chhiu hi h`ang ke ng`in, chhiu-chhiong chh^ung-m`in-ng`in h'i-vuk chhai ph`an-s+ak-t'ang;
chhiu-son su-t'o f^ung-chh^oi, y'i-l`im, s'ui-chh^ung, ke-vuk ya `m-voi vang-thet, y^in-vi thi-k^i chhai ph`an-s+ak-t'ang.
Ch'ung-he, th^ang ng`ai li'a-t^eu fa `m hi h`ang ke, chhiu-chhiong ngong-'e h'i-vuk chhai n`ai-s^a-t'ang,
su-t'o f^ung-chh^oi, y'i-l`im, s'ui-chh^ung, vuk chhiu vang-thet, yu vang-to tap-tap!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, chung-ng`in tui k`i ke kau-hiun k'am-kok f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai;
y^in-vi k`i kau-hiun k`i-t^eu ke s`u" chhin-y^u khi`en-piang, l^au k`i-t^eu ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" m`o khiung-yong.
Y^a-s^u tui s^an-t'ang h^a-l`oi ke s`u", y^e-k^ong t'a-chhu"n ke ng`in th`en-t'en k`i.
Y^u yit-ke pot th'ai-k^o ke ng`in l`oi pai k`i, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i na-he h'en, chhiu voi s'u" ng`ai chhiang-li."
Y^a-s^u chh^un-s'u mi^a k`i, k'ong: "Ng`ai h'en, ng`i chhiang-li l'e!" K`i ke th'ai-k^o chit-s`u" m`o-thet hi, k`i chhiu tet-t'o chhiang-li.

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "`M-h'o l^au ph+et-ng`in k'ong; chh+u"t-chiap hi kien chi-s^u", p^un k`i ki'am-chh`a, y`en-heu cheu M^o-s^i s'o-thin ke k^ui-k'i hien chi-v+ut, l`oi tui ng`in chu"n-m`in ng`i y'i-k^in chhiang-li l'e."
Y^a-s^u l`oi-to K^a-pak-n`ung, y^u yit-ke L`o-m^a ki^un-k^on l`oi khi`u k`i, k'ong:
"Ch'u ^a, ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in pot th^an-f^ung, soi chhai vuk-t'u, f^i-s`ong thung-kh'u."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai l`oi-hi y^i-h'o k`i."
Ke ki^un-k^on k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i hi ng^a vuk-h^a, ng`ai t^ong `m-h'i; ch'u"-oi ng`i k'ong yit-ki fa, ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in chhiu voi h'o.

Chhiu-chhiong ng`ai t'ang-k^o y^u ch'u"-f^i-k^on, h^a-poi ya y^u su ng`ai ch'u"-f^i ke p^in-'e. Ng`ai min-lin li'a-ke p^in-'e hi, k`i chhiu hi; min-lin ke-ke l`oi, k`i chhiu l`oi; tui ng`ai ke n`u-ph+uk k'ong 'Cho li'a-ke su"', k`i chhiu hi cho."

Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i, tui th`en k`i ke ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiong 'an-ngi`ong ke sin-s^im, chhiu-he chhai Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`ai ya chhi`ung-l`oi m`ang-su"t khon-ko!
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chi^ong-l`oi voi y^u f^i-s`ong t^o ke ng`in tui t^ung, tui s^i l`oi, th`ung ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, Y^i-sat, Ng^a-kok khiung-ha chhai thi^en-koet chh^o-s+it.
Ke-t^eu p'un-l`oi oi cho thi^en-koet ch'u"-m`in ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi p^un-ng`in kiuk-to ngoi-poi ke v^u-am t'u; chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u"."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui ke ki^un-k^on k'ong: "Ch'on-hi, cheu ng`i ke sin-s^im s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i!" Ki^a ph+uk-ng`in ke phiang chhiu chhai ke-s`u" v`an-chhi`on h'o l'e.
Y^a-s^u l`oi-to P'i-tet ke vuk-h^a, khon-t'o k`i ke chh^ong-m^in-^oi fat-s^eu, soi chhai m`in-chh`ong-t'ang.
Y^a-s^u mi^a k`i ke s'u, s^eu chhiu thui-thet, k`i chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi chiap-thai Y^a-s^u.
L`im-am-'e ke s`u", y^u-ng`in tai chhin-t^o p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u. Y^a-s^u k'ong yit-ki fa chhiu chi^ong k'ui kiuk-ch'eu; k`i ya y^i-h'o s'o-y^u ke phiang-ng`in.
K`i 'an-ngi`ong cho, he yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a s'o-k'ong ke: "K`i s`u"n-su ng`ai-t^eu ke ngi^on-ngi+ok, t^am-t^ong ng`ai-t^eu ke phiang-thung."
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o chhin-t^o ng`in v`i-t'en k`i, chhiu f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang thu-to f`u ke tui-mien hi.
Y^u yit-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l`oi-kien k`i, tui k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i m`o-lun hi-to nai-vi, ng`ai yit-thin oi th`en ng`i."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "F`u-l`i y^u l`ung, ti^au-'e y^u teu, ch'ung-he Ng`in-ch'u" li`en thiap-th`eu ke s'o-chhai ya m`o."
Nang-ngoi y^u yit-ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ch'un ng`ai si^en ch'on-hi m`ai-chong ng^a-p^a."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Cho-ng`i th`en ng`ai, p^un s'i-ng`in hi m`ai-chong k`i-t^eu ke s'i-ng`in!"
Y^a-s^u s^ong-s`on, ki^a h+ok-s^ang th`en-t'en k`i hi.
Fut-y`en, y^u yit-chhu"n phau-f^ung chhai f`u-mien chh^oi-t'en l`oi, s`on p^un long ki+ep-t'o, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u chhai ke-vi soi-muk.
H+ok-s^ang l`oi h^em-si'ang k`i, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, kiu-miang! Ng`ai-t^eu voi m`o-miang l^o!"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ngi'ong oi-s'u" 'an-ki^ang? Ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im ngi'ong voi 'an-se!" Y`en-heu k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, chit-phi f^ung l^au long, f^ung-long chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, f`u-mien thai-thai ph`in-chhin.
Thai-k^a f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "Li'a he ngi'ong-`e ke ng`in? Li`en f^ung l^au long ya th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"

Y^a-s^u l`oi-to f`u tui-mien ke K^a-thai-l^a thi-f^ong; y^u li'ong-ke tui chh'ung-p^u chhut-l`oi ke ng`in t`u-t'o k`i. Y^in-vi li'a li'ong-ke ng`in p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n, chhin-ok, chu"-to m`o-ng`in k'am h`ang li'a-thi`au lu.
K`i-t^eu khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu h^em-k'ong: "Song-ti ke Lai-'e, ng`i cho-m'a-ke oi k^on-s+ap ng`ai-t^eu? Ng`i oi th`i-ch'o l`oi ch^au-th+ap ng`ai-t^eu he-m`o?"
L`i h'o-y'en y^u yit thai-khi`un ch^u-'e chhai ke-vi s+u"t t^ung-s^i.
K'ui chhiu khi`u Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "Ng`i na-he oi kiuk ng`ai-t^eu chhut-hi, chhiu ch'un ng`ai-t^eu ng+ip-hi li'a-khi`un ch^u-'e t^i-poi."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Hi ^a!" K'ui chhiu chhut-l`oi, ng+ip-hi ke-khi`un ch^u-'e t^i-poi; k^ui-khi`un ch^u-'e ch^ung-h^a p^en-k^ong, tiet-l+ok f`u t^i-poi, chhi`on-phu chim-s'i.
Ch'ong ch^u-'e ke ng`in chhiu ch'eu-thet, ng+ip-hi s`ang-t'u, chi^ong li'a-khien su" ke k^in-ko l^au p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in s'o t`u-t'o ke chhi`on-phu tui thai-k^a po-ko.
Chhi`on-s`ang ke ng`in chhiu chhut-l`oi kien Y^a-s^u; k`i-t^eu khon-t'o k`i, chhiu y^eu-khi`u k`i l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu ke thi-f^ong.
Y^a-s^u s^ong-s`on, thu-ko f`u, ch'on-to chhu"-k^a ke s`ang.

Ngi`am-s`u" y^u-ng`in yung m`un-pi^ong k^ong-t'en yit-ke th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in l`oi k`i ke mien-chhi`en. Y^a-s^u khon-chhut k`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im, chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: "Se-ch'u" ^a, ^on-s^im, ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en l'e!"
Y^u k'i-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" s^im-ch^ung si'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in k'ong v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke fa!"
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu si'ong m'a-ke, chhiu mun k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an s^im-f`ai ok-ngiam n`e?
Tui li'a-ke ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en' y`ung-yi n`e? Ya-he k'ong: 'Hong-h'i-l`oi h`ang' kha y`ung-yi n`e?

Li'a-ha ng`ai oi tui ng`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai thi-song y^u sa-chhui ke khi`en-piang." Chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, khi`a ng`i ke m`un-pi^ong ch'on-hi vuk-h^a!"
Ke-ng`in chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, ch'on-hi ki^a vuk-h^a.
Chung-ng`in yit khon-t'o chhiu chh+ok-ki^ang; k`i-t^eu yu siung-chan Song-ti, y^in-vi K`i su p^un ng`in li'a-ch'ung ke khi`en-piang.

Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke-vi hiong-chhi`en h`ang, khon-t'o yit-ke soi-vu-y`en, mi`ang ^on-to M^a-thai, chh^o chhai soi-ko^an. Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai!" M^a-thai chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi th`en k`i.
Y^a-s^u chhai M^a-thai vuk-h^a s+u"t-fan ke s`u", chhin-t^o soi-vu-y`en l^au m`o s'u kau-k^ui ke ng`in ya l`oi; k`i-t^eu th`ung Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha s+u"t-fan.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in khon-t'o, chhiu tui Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke s^in-s^ang ngi'ong-p^an th`ung soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in khiung-ha s+u"t-fan n`e?"
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu k'ong: "Khien-kh^ong ke ng`in `m-s'u" y^i-s^en, y^u phiang ke ng`in chang oi.

Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Ng`ai s'o oi ke he chh`u"-p^i, `m-he hien-chi.' Ng`i-t^eu hi ngi^en-kiu khon li'a-ki fa ke yi-su"! Y^in-vi ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit `m-he oi f^u-seu ngi-ng`in, he oi f^u-seu chhui-ng`in."
Y^u yit-p'ai, S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in s`ong-s`ong kim-s+u"t, ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang m`o kim-s+u"t, he vi-t'o m'a-ke n`e?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "S^in-l`ong h`an chhai f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it ch^ung, ng`in-hak k'am oi-s'u" s^ong-s^im m^a? T^ong-y`en `m-s'u". Ch'ung-he s`u"-ki^en voi to, s^in-l`ong voi p^un-ng`in tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung tai-ch'eu, ke-s`u" k`i-t^eu chhiu oi kim-s+u"t.
"M`o ng`in yung s^in-pu p'u khiu-s^am, y^in-vi s^in p'u ke pu voi chh'a-li+et s^am, s'u" lan-kh^ung h`an-kha thai.

Ya m`o ng`in chi^ong s^in-chi'u ch^ong chhai khiu ph`i-thoi t'u; na-he 'an-ngi`ong, ph`i-thoi voi li+et-kh^oi, chi'u voi leu chhut-l`oi, li`en ph`i-thoi ya f'ai-thet hi. Oi chi^ong s^in-chi'u ch^ong chhai s^in ph`i-thoi t'u; 'an-ngi`ong, li'ong-yong chhiu tet-t'o p'o-chhi`on."

Y^a-s^u chang tui k`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu fa ke s`u", y^u yit-ke fi-th`ong ke k'on-l^i-y`en l`oi-kien k`i, chhai k`i mien-chhi`en kh'ui l+ok-hi, k'ong: "Ng^a moi-'e t'u-t'u ko-s^u"n, khi`u ng`i l`oi-hi vi k`i on-s'u, k`i chhiu voi f'an-s^ang ko-l`oi."
Y^a-s^u chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, th`en k`i hi; Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang ya khiung-ha hi.
Y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, pot hiet-leu-phiang s+u"p-ngi ngi`en; k`i h`ang-to Y^a-s^u ke heu-poi, mi^a k`i ke s^am-m^i.
K`i s^im-k^on si'ong: "Ng`ai ch'u"-y^u mi^a-t'o k`i ke s^am, yit-thin voi tet-t'o y^i-h'o."
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n, khon-t'o k`i, chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Moi-'e ^a, ^on-s^im, ng`i ke sin-s^im kiu-t'o ng`i l'e!" Tui ke-s`u", li'a fu-ng`in-k^a ke phiang chhiu h'o l'e.
Y^a-s^u l`oi-to ke k'on-l^i-y`en ke vuk-h^a, khon-t'o chh^oi th+ak-'e ke l^au lon chh`au-chh`au ke ng`in-khi`un,
chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhut-hi, li'a se-^a-moi-'e pin m`o s'i, he soi-thet thin-thin!" Thai-k^a chhiu seu k`i.
Chi^ong ke-t^eu ng`in kiuk chhut-hi y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u ng+ip se-^a-moi-'e ke ki^en-t'u, khi^en-t'en k`i ke s'u, k`i chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi.
Li'a s^eu-sit chhiu chh`on-phien ke s'o-chhai.
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, yu hiong-chhi`en h`ang. Y^u li'ong-ke m^o-muk ke ng`in th`en-t'en k`i, h^em-k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai-t^eu!"

Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u, li'ong-ke m^o-muk-ke l`oi-to k`i mien-chhi`en, k`i chhiu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu si^ong-sin ng`ai y^u n`en-l+it cho li'a-khien su" m^a?" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu sin."
S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u mi^a k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u, k'ong: "Cheu ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i-t^eu!"
K`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u chhiu h'o l'e. Y^a-s^u ngi`am-ngi`am f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M-h'o tui ph+et-ng`in k'ong-h'i li'a-khien su"!"
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu yit chhut-hi, chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-s^ang chh`on-phien ke thi-f^ong.
K`i-t^eu chhut-hi ke s`u", y^u-ng`in tai yit-ke p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n ke 'a-`e l`oi Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en.
K'ui yit kiuk chhut-hi, ke-ng`in chhiu chhut-s^ang k'ong-fa. Thai-k^a chhin chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "Chhai Y^i-set-li+et, ng`ai-t^eu m`ang-su"t khon-ko 'an-ngi`ong ke su"."
Ch'ung-he, Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'ong: "K`i he kho k'ui-v`ong l`oi kiuk-k'ui ke."
Y^a-s^u h`ang-phien kok hi^ong-ch'u"n, chhai tak-ke fi-th`ong kau-hiun ng`in, si^en-chh`on thi^en-koet ke fuk-y^im, yu y^i-h'o kok-ch'ung ke phiang.
K`i khon-t'o yit-khi`un yit-khi`un ke ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhin k^an-kh'u, m`o-ng`in cheu-ku, chhiong m`o m+uk-ng`in ke y`ong-khi`un khiung-yong.
S'o-y^i, k`i tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Oi s^u-s`u"n ke chhin-t^o, ch'ung-he s^u-kot ke ng`in thet-s'eu.
Ng`i-t^eu oi kh`i-khi`u thi`en-ch'u k^a-phai k^ung-ng`in l`oi s^u-kot."
Y^a-s^u ham s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi, su k`i-t^eu kiuk si`a-l`in l^au y^i kok-ch'ung phiang ke khi`en-piang.

Li'a s+u"p-ngi-ke s'u"-th`u ke mi`ang: Th`eu-yit-ke ^on-to S^i-m`un (phi^en-mi`ang P'i-tet), h`an-y^u ki^a l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et, S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok, l^au Ng^a-kok ke l'o-th^ai Yok-hon;
yu y^u F^i-l+it l^au P^a-t^o-l`o-m^ai; T^o-m^a l^au soi-vu-y`en M^a-thai; ^A-l+et-f^i ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Th+at-thai;
Kit-chin-t'ong ke S^i-m`un l^au chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai.
Y^a-s^u phai li'a s+u"p-ngi-ke s'u"-th`u chhut-hi, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "M+ok hi Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke thi-f^ong, m+ok ng+ip Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in ke s`ang-su".
Ng`i-t^eu oi hi Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in su"t-l+ok ke y`ong-khi`un ke-vi.
Hi-to tak s'o-chhai, oi si^en-chh`on k'ong: 'Thi^en-koet voi s+u"t-hien l'e!'
Ng`i-t^eu oi y^i-h'o phiang-ng`in, ham s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at, s'u" pot th'ai-k^o ke ng`in chhiang-li, pin kiuk-k'ui. Ng`i-t^eu he ph+ak-ph+ak tet-t'o ke, ya oi ph+ak-ph+ak p^un ng`in.
Chhi`en-thoi-'e `m-h'o tai k^im, ngi`un, th`ung-chhi`en;
chhut-hi `m-h'o tai l^i-h`ang-thoi ya-he k^a tai yit-li^ang nui-s^am, ya `m-h'o tai h`ai l^au ko'ai-kun-'e. Y^in-vi k^ung-ng`in tet-t'o ki^ung-kip he yin-t^ong ke.

"Ng`i-t^eu hi-to yit-ke s`ang-su" ya-he chh^un-ch^ong ke s`u", oi si^en t'a-tham chhai ke-vi y^u m'a-ng`in kh^am-tet chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiu hi h+et chhai ki^a vuk-h^a, chh+u"t-to ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong.
Ng`i-t^eu ng+ip-hi ng`in vuk-h^a ke s`u", oi k'ong: 'Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on.'

Na-he ke-k^a ng`in kh^am-tet chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu vi k`i-t^eu khi`u ke ph`in-^on chhiu voi l`im-to ke k^a-th`in. Na-he k`i-t^eu kh^am-`m-tet, ng`i-t^eu chhiu s^u-ch'on ng`i-t^eu ke chuk-fuk.
Ke `m f^on-ngi`ang ng`i-t^eu, `m th^ang ng`i-t^eu fa ke k^a-th`in ya-he s`ang-su", ng`i-t^eu chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, chi^ong kiok-hong ke n`ai-f'un t'em-thet.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, S'o-t^o-m^a l^au Ng`o-m^o-l^a s'o-su ke chit-f+at, voi p'i ke s`ang-su" s'o-su ke khi^ang chhin-t^o!"
"Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-h'o! Ng`ai phai ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi, chhiong sung y`ong ng+ip l`ong-khi`un yit-yong. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi chhiong s`a 'an ch^in-l`in, chhiong ngi+et-kap-`e 'an v^un-y`u.
Oi se-ngi, y^in-vi y^u-ng`in voi chok ng`i-t^eu, sung ng`i-t^eu s^ong fap-yen, ya voi chhai k`i-t^eu ke fi-th`ong pi^en-t'a ng`i-t^eu.
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu voi p^un-ng`in sung-to th'ung-chhu"-ch'a l^au ki^un-v`ong ke mien-chhi`en hi su s'u"m-phan, l`oi tui k`i-t^eu l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in cho kien-chu"n.
Ng`i-t^eu su s'u"m-mun ke s`u", `m-s'u" s`eu oi k'ong m'a-ke fa, ya-he oi ngi'ong-p^an f`i-tap; to ke-s`u", Song-ti voi ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong k'ong ke fa.
Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi k'ong ke, `m-he chhu"-k^a ke fa, he ng`i-t^eu Thi^en-fu ke L`in oi th^ung-ko ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke.
"Hi^ung-thi voi chhut-mai hi^ung-thi l`oi hoi-s'i k`i-t^eu; ^a-p^a ya voi 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai ch'u"-'ng; ch'u"-'ng ya voi th`ung y`a-^oi chok-tui l`oi hoi-s'i k`i-t^eu.
Vi-t'o ng`ai, thai-k^a voi yen-hen ng`i-t^eu; ch'ung-he ngi^un-nai to-t'ai ke ng`in thin-chh+ok voi tet-kiu.

K`i-t^eu na-he chhai li'a-s`ang t'u pet-hoi ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu chhiu th`o-ch'eu hi ph+et ke s`ang. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Y^i-set-li+et ke s`ang-su" ng`i-t^eu h`an-m`ang h`ang-theu, Ng`in-ch'u" chhiu voi to.
"H+ok-s^ang m`o p'i s^in-s^ang kha-thai, n`u-ph+uk ya m`o p'i ch'u-ng`in kha-thai.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, h+ok-s^ang s'o t`u-t'o ke l^au s^in-s^ang khiung-yong, n`u-ph+uk s'o t`u-t'o ke l^au ch'u-ng`in khiung-yong, chhiu oi t^i-chiuk. Na-he yit-k^a ch^u"-ch'u p^un-ng`in khon-cho k'ui-v`ong Ph+et-s^i-puk, vuk-h^a kh`i-th^a ke ng`in k'am `m-he oi su h`an-kha thai ke v'u-y+uk m^a?
"S'o-y^i, `m-s'u" ki^ang m'a-ng`in; yit-chhiet ch^a-t'en ke su" y^u yit-ngit voi pien-cho k^ung-kh^oi, pi-m+et ke su" ya voi p^un-ng`in t^i-t'o.
Ng`ai chhai am-ch^ung l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke, ng`i-t^eu oi chhai k^ong-thi^en ph+ak-ngit ch^u"-ha k'ong chhut-l`oi; ng`i-t^eu s^u"-ha th^ang-t'o ke, oi chhai vuk-t'ang si^en-pu chhut-l`oi.

Ch'u"-y^u chh`u"-s'i ngiuk-th'i, m`o-fap m+et l`in-f`un ke, `m-s'u" ki^ang k`i-t^eu; s'o-oi ki^ang ke he Song-ti, ch'u"-y^u K`i chang n`en chi^ong ng`in ke ngiuk-th'i l^au l`in-f`un chhi`on-phu fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk hi.
Li'ong-chak vuk-y`am-ti^au-'e s^ui-y`en chang mai yit-kok ngi`un, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu na `m-h'en, yit-chak ya `m-voi tiet-h^a thi-n`ai l`oi.
Li`en ng`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n`a-m^o tak-thi`au K`i me son-ko l^o!
S'o-y^i, `m-s'u" ki^ang, ng`i-t^eu p'i yit thai-khi`un ke vuk-y`am-ti^au-'e k^a chhin kui-chhung!
"Chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en ngin ng`ai ke, chhai ng`ai Thi^en-fu ke mien-chhi`en ng`ai ya oi ngin k`i;
chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en `m ngin ng`ai ke, chhai ng`ai Thi^en-fu ke mien-chhi`en ng`ai ya `m ngin k`i.
"`M-h'o l'au-t'o ng`ai l`oi he tai-p^un su"-ki^en f`o-ph`in; ng`ai s'o tai-l`oi ke pin `m-he f`o-ph`in, f'an-ch'on he t^o-kiam.
Ng`ai l`oi he oi s'u" lai-'e f'an-tui ki^a-p^a, moi-'e f'an-tui ki^a-m^e, s^im-khi^u f'an-tui k^a-ngi`ong.
Ng`in ke tui-th+it chhiu-he k`i vuk-h^a ke ng`in.
"Kin-oi y`a-^oi y`ang-ko kin-oi ng`ai ke, kh^am-`m-tet cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang; siak ch'u"-'ng y`ang-ko kin-oi ng`ai ke, kh^am-`m-tet cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang;
`m-h'en khi`a chhu"-k^a ke s+u"p-su"-ka l`oi th`en ng`ai ke, ya kh^am-`m-tet cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang.
Si'ong-oi p'o-chhi`on chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang; vi-t'o ng`ai s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang ke, f'an-ch'on voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
"Chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ng`ai; chiap-thai ng`ai, chhiu-he chiap-thai ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke.

Y^in-vi m^eu-ng`in he Song-ti ke s'u"-ch'a chhiu chiap-thai k`i ke, thin-chh+ok voi tet-t'o oi s'ong-p^un s'u"-ch'a khiung-yong ke chi'ong-s'ong; y^in-vi m^eu-ng`in he ngi-ng`in chhiu chiap-thai k`i ke, yit-thin voi tet-t'o oi s'ong-p^un ngi-ng`in khiung-yong ke chi'ong-s'ong.

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o-lun he m'a-ng`in, chhiu-son n^a yit-p^i l^ang-s'ui p^un chui m`i-se ke yit-s`a l^im, ch'u"-he y^in-vi li'a-s`a he ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang, chhiu yit-thin voi tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong."
Y^a-s^u ch'u"-su" s+u"p-ngi h+ok-s^ang ke fa k'ong-li'au heu, chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, ki-si+uk hi fu-khiun ke kok hi^ong-ch'u"n kau-hiun ng`in pin chh`on fuk-y^im.
S^u"-s'e Yok-hon chhai k^am-ngi+uk th^ang-t'o ko^an-he K^i-tuk ke k^ung-chok, chhiu phai ki^a h+ok-s^ang hi kien Y^a-s^u,
mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i chhiu-he Yok-hon s'o-k'ong, ke m`o k'i-ki'u oi l`oi ke, ya-he ng`ai-t^eu h`an oi t'en ph+et-ng`in ^a?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ch'on-hi, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o, s'o khon-t'o ke, po-ko Yok-hon,
chhiu-he: M^o-muk-ke khon-t'o, p`ai-kiok-ke h`ang-lu, pot th'ai-k^o ke tet-t'o chhiang-li, ng'i-l^ung-ke th^ang-t'o, s'i-ng`in f'an-s^ang, khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in th^ang-t'o fuk-y^im.
M`o ng`i-f`u ng`ai ke ng`in chhiu y^u fuk-hi!"

Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang l`i-kh^oi heu, Y^a-s^u tui chung-ng`in k'ong-h'i Yok-hon, k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai hi kh'ong-y^a chh`im Yok-hon ke s`u", si'ong-oi khon m'a-ke? Khon p^un-f^ung chh^oi th^in-th^ung ke l`u-chuk he-m`o?
Ng`i-t^eu to-t'ai chhut-hi cho m'a-ke n`o? Hi khon chok chi^ang-s^am ke ng`in he-m`o? Ch'ung-he, chok chi^ang-s^am ke ng`in h+et chhai v`ong-ki^ung.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi khon m'a-ke n`o? He khon si^en-t^i m`o? Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o `m-chh+ok, ch'ung-he k`i p'i si^en-t^i h`an-kha thai.
K`i chhiu-he Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke ng`in. Song-ti k'ong: 'Khon ^a, Ng`ai oi chh^ai-phai Ng`ai ke s'u"-ch'a cho ng`i ke si^en-f^ung; k`i oi vi ng`i kh^oi-lu.' "
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, su"-ki^en m`o-ng`in p'i S^u"-s'e Yok-hon kha v'i-thai, ch'ung-he chhai thi^en-koet, chui m`i-se ke ya p'i k`i kha thai!
Tui S^u"-s'e Yok-hon chh`on-tho to k^im-p^u-ngit, thi^en-koet y^u su-t'o phau-l+it ke k^ung-kit, khi`ong-phau ke ng`in si'ong-oi chhi'ong k`i.
Y^in-vi s'o-y^u si^en-t^i-s^u l^au M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it k'ong yi-ngi`en to Yok-hon v`i-ch'u";
s'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu na-he h'en li^ang-su k`i-t^eu ke yi-ngi`en, Yok-hon chhiu-he ke oi l`oi ke Y^i-li-^a.
Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!
"Ng`ai oi yung m'a-ke l`oi p'i-yi li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in n`e? K`i-t^eu chhiong chh^o chhai su"-chh`ong ke se-ng`in-`e tui th`ung-ph^an h^em-k'ong:
'Ng`ai-t^eu vi ng`i-t^eu ph`un f^un-l^i ke k^o-khiuk, ng`i-t^eu `m thiau-v'u! Ng`ai-t^eu chhong s^ong-l^i ke ^oi-k^o, ng`i-t^eu ya `m kieu!'
Yok-hon l`oi, `m s+u"t ya `m l^im, thai-k^a chhiu k'ong: 'K`i p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n l^e!'

Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi, ya s+u"t ya l^im, thai-k^a yu k'ong: 'K`i he th^am-s+u"t hau-chi'u ke ng`in, ch^on-m`un th`ung soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in cho ph`en-y^u!' Ch'ung-he, ch^u"n-s+u"t ke chu"-fi he yung k`i ke kiet-k'o l`oi hi'en-m`in ke."
Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u chit-phi ke-t^eu khon-ko k`i h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak ke s`ang-su", y^in-vi ke-t^eu ng`in m`o l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu ke chhui-ok.

K`i k'ong: " K^o-l^a-sin ^a, ng`i f'ai l'e! Pak-soi-thai ^a, ng`i chh'am l'e! Ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, na-he h`ang chhai Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun, ke-vi ke ng`in ch'o chhiu chok m`a-s^am, ve f'o-f^oi chhai th`eu-n`a-t'ang l`oi p'eu-su" f'i-k'oi l^o!
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun s'o-su ke chit-f+at voi p'i ng`i-t^eu s'o-su ke h`an-kha khi^ang!

Na-he ng`i, K^a-pak-n`ung ^a, ng`i si'ong-oi k^o-k^o chhai-song m^a? Ch'ung-he, ng`i chi^ong-l`oi voi tiet-l+ok thi-ngi+uk hi! Y^in-vi, ng`ai chhai ng`i ke-vi h`ang-ko ke s`u"n-chiak na-he h`ang chhai S'o-t^o-m^a, k`i k^im-p^u-ngit yit-thin h`an-chh^oi!
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, S'o-t^o-m^a s'o-su ke chit-f+at voi p'i ng`i s'o-su ke h`an-kha khi^ang!"

Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u k'ong: "^A-p^a, thi^en-thi ke Ch'u ^a, ng`ai k'am-chhia Ng`i, y^in-vi Ng`i chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" khong-t'en `m p^un chh^ung-m`in y^u h+ok-mun ke ng`in t^i, f'an-ch'on hi'en-m`in p^un se-ng`in-`e.
^A-p^a ^a, m`o `m-chh+ok, li'a-ch'ung ^on-ph`ai he Ng`i s'o f^on-h'i ke ch'u"-yi.
"Ng^a P^a y'i-k^in chi^ong yit-chhiet su-p^un ng`ai l'e! Chh`u-li'au ^A-p^a, m`o-ng`in su"t Lai-'e; chh`u-li'au Lai-'e l^au Lai-'e s'o-oi kh'i-su" ke ng`in, ya m`o-ng`in voi su"t ^A-p^a.
"L`oi ^a, l`o-kh'u p`a chh^ung-t^am ke ng`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu l`oi chhiu-khiun ng`ai, ng`ai oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o hi^u-sit.
Ng`i-t^eu oi p`a ng`ai ke ak l`oi h+ok ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai ke s^im he v^un-y`u yu khi^am-p^i ke; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-s`u"n chhiu voi tet-t'o hi^u-sit.
Y^in-vi ng`ai ke ak he h'o-p`a ke; ng`ai ke t^am he khi^ang-kh'o ke."
M`o k'i-ki'u y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u chhai yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit k^in-ko m+ak-thi`en. Ki^a h+ok-s^ang t'u-k^i, chhiu l+ot t^eu m+ak-chhon l`oi s+u"t.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in khon-t'o chhiu tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang cho ^On-sit-ngit kim-ch'u" cho ke su"!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: " Thai-v'i l^au th`en k`i ke ng`in t'u-k^i ke s`u" cho m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko he-m`o?
K`i ng+ip-hi Song-ti ke su"n-thien, s+u"t hien-p^un Song-ti ke pi'ang; k`i l^au th`en k`i ke ng`in s+u"t ke-ch'ung pi'ang-`e he v`i-fap ke, y^in-vi ch'u"-y^u chi-s^u" chang cho-tet s+u"t.
K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it s'o ki-chai ke? Tak-ke ^On-sit-ngit, chi-s^u" chhai su"n-thien l^ung-ch'ung v`i-fam ^On-sit-ngit ke k^ui-k'i, ch'ung-he `m son fam-chhui.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai li'a-vi y^u p'i su"n-thien h`an-kha chhung-yeu ke.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Ng`ai s'o oi ke he chh`u"-p^i, `m-he hien-chi.' Ng`i-t^eu na-he chu"n-k^in m`in-ph+ak li'a-ki fa ke yi-su", chhiu `m-voi thin m`o-chhui ke ng`in cho y^u-chhui.
Y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" he ^On-sit-ngit ke Ch'u."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, hi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fi-th`ong.
Chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in, k`i ke yit-k^i s'u khi`o-thet. Y^u-t^eu ng`in si'ong-oi chh`im Y^a-s^u ke p'a-piang l`oi ko k`i, chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "Chhai ^On-sit-ngit y^i-phiang h+ap-fap m`o?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, na-he y^u-ng`in y^u yit-chak y`ong, ke-chak y`ong chhai ^On-sit-ngit tiet-l+ok fut-t'u hi, oi ngi'ong-p^an n`e? K`i k'am `m-he chi^ong y`ong-`e l^ai s^ong-l`oi?
Ng`in p'i y`ong-`e kui-chhung k^a chhin-t^o n`e! S'o-y^i, chhai ^On-sit-ngit cho h'o-su" he h+ap-fap ke."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tui ke-ng`in k'ong: "S'u chh^un chhut-l`oi!" Ke-ng`in yit chh^un-s'u, s'u chhiu f+uk-ngi`en to chhiong nang-ngoi ke-k^i s'u yit-yong.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhut-hi, chhiu chh^am-si`ong oi ngi'ong-p^an tui-fu Y^a-s^u l`oi sat-hoi k`i.
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a-ke s^eu-sit, chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, chhin-t^o ng`in th`en-t'en k`i. K`i y^i-h'o ke-t^eu y^u-phiang ke ng`in,
ch'ung-he f^un-fu k`i-t^eu, cho-`m-tet chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang chh`on chhut-hi.
Li'a he yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a s'o-k'ong ke fa: Song-ti k'ong:

"Khon n^a, li'a he Ng`ai s'o ki'en-si'en ke ph+uk-ng`in; Ng`ai siak k`i, k`i he Ng`ai s^im s'o f^on-h'i ke. Ng`ai oi chi^ong Ng`ai ke L`in su-p^un k`i; k`i oi tui van-m`in si^en-ko Ng`ai ke chu"n-ngi.
K`i `m-voi si^ong-ch^ang, `m-voi thai-s^ang h^em, ki^e-hong ya m`o-ng`in th^ang-t'o k`i ke s^ang-y^im.
Chak-f'ai ke l`u-chuk, k`i `m-voi chi^ong k`i 'au-th^on, voi v^u ke t^en-f'o, k`i `m-voi chi^ong k`i ph`un-thet. K`i voi ki^en-chh`u" h`ang chu"n-ngi, yit-chh+u"t to chu"n-ngi tet-su"n.
Chhi`on su"-kie s'o-y^u ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung oi ngi'ong-mong k`i!"
Ke-s`u", y^u-ng`in tai yit-ke p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n yu m^o-muk ke 'a-`e l`oi Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en. Y^a-s^u y^i-h'o k`i, p^un k`i voi k'ong-fa ya khon-tet-t'o.
Chung-ng`in chhin chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "Li'a k'am `m-he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un m^a?"
Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa chhiu k'ong: "K`i he kho k'ui-v`ong Ph+et-s^i-puk kiuk-k'ui, na m`o, k`i chhiu m`o phan-fap!"

Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu ke yi-su", chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Yit-ke koet-k^a chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, ke koet-k^a yit-thin voi phai-thet; s`ang-su" ya-he k^a-th`in chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, thin-chh+ok voi kh^i-`m-h+et.
K'a-s'u" Sat-tan kiuk Sat-tan, chhiu-he chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, k`i ke koet ngi'ong-p^an voi kh^i tet-h+et n`o?
Ng`ai kiuk-k'ui na-he kho Ph+et-s^i-puk, 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-thi kiuk-k'ui yu he kho m'a-s`a n`o? Ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-thi voi chu"n-m`in he ng`i-t^eu `m-chh+ok!
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai kiuk-k'ui na-he kho Song-ti ke L`in, chhiu-he chu"n-m`in Song-ti y'i-k^in chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ch'ong-khi`en l'e.
"K'am y^u-ng`in n`en chin-ng+ip y'ung-su" ke vuk-h^a hi chhi'ong k`i ke chh`oi-s'an? Chh`u-li'au si^en chi^ong y'ung-su" kh'un h'i-l`oi, chang y^u fap-thu chhi'ong k`i ke t^ung-s^i.
"`M th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha ke, chhiu-he f'an-tui ng`ai ke; `m th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha s^u-s+ip ke, chhiu-he t'a-san ke.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`in s'o-fam yit-chhiet ke chhui l^au s'o-k'ong yit-chhiet f'i-pong ke fa, chhi`on-phu kh'o-y^i tet-t'o sa-mi^en; ch'ung-he siet-th+uk Su"n-L`in ke ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
K'ong-fa f^am-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" ke, h`an-y^u kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en; ch'ung-he siet-th+uk Su"n-L`in ke, m`o-lun chhai k^im-s^en ya-he l`oi-su", m`o kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
"H'o ke k'o-ch'u"-su chang voi kiet h'o k'o-ch'u"; f'ai ke k'o-ch'u"-su yit-thin kiet f'ai k'o-ch'u". Khon s'o-kiet ke k'o-ch'u" chhiu cho-tet ngin-chhut k'o-ch'u"-su ke h'o-f'ai.
Ng`i li'a-t^eu th+uk-s`a ^a! Ng`i-t^eu p'un-l`oi he ok-th+uk ke, ngi'ong-p^an voi k'ong h'o-fa n`e? Y^in-vi s^im-k^on s'o ch^ong-m^an ke, choi chhiu k'ong chhut-l`oi.
H'o-ng`in s^im-k^on chit san chhiu fat-chhut san; f'ai-ng`in chit ok chhiu fat-chhut ok.
"Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, ng`in s'o-k'ong ke h`an-fa, tak-ki l^ung-ch'ung oi p`ai chhut-l`oi.
Y^in-vi, Song-ti oi yung ng`i chhu"-k^a ke fa l`oi si^en-pu ng`i m`o-chhui, ya oi yung ng`i ke fa l`oi thin ng`i y^u-chhui."
Ke-s`u", y^u k'i-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu h^i-mong khon ng`i h`ang s`u"n-chiak."

Y^a-s^u chhiu en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Yit-ke si`a-ok `m-sin ke su"-thoi chang y^eu-khi`u s`u"n-chiak; ch'ung-he, chh`u-li'au si^en-t^i Yok-n^a ke s`u"n-chiak y^i-ngoi, m`o ph+et ke s`u"n-chiak h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu khon.
Yok-n^a su"t chhai thai-`ng ke t'u-s'u" s^am-ngit s^am-ya, Ng`in-ch'u" ya oi chhai thi chui-chh^u"m ke s'o-chhai s^am-ngit s^am-ya.

Chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, N`i-n`i-m`i-ng`in voi kh^i-h'i-l`oi ko ng`i-t^eu li'a-thoi ke ng`in, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o Yok-n^a s'o-chh`on ke chhiu hi-si`a k^ui-chu"n. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai li'a-vi y^u p'i Yok-n^a h`an-kha v'i-thai ke.

Chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, n`am-f^ong ke 'ng-v`ong voi kh^i-h'i-l`oi ko ng`i-t^eu li'a-thoi ke ng`in, y^in-vi k`i tui 'an-y'en l`oi th^ang S'o-l`o-m`un-v`ong chu"-fi ke fa. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai li'a-vi y^u p'i S'o-l`o-m`un-v`ong h`an-kha v'i-thai ke.
"Si`a-l`in l`i-kh^oi s'o fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, chhai ch^au-s'ong ke thi-f^ong h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi, chh`im hi^u-sit ke s'o-chhai, ch'ung-he chh`im m`o,
chhiu k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi ch'on ngi`en-l`oi ke vuk-t'u hi.' K`i chhiu to-ch'on hi, khon-t'o ke vuk h`an-t'en, piang-to chhiang-li chhiang-li, yu ch'u"n-l^i to chhin h'o-se.

K`i chhiu chhut-hi, tai chhit-ke p'i k`i h`an-kha ok ke si`a-l`in to-ch'on-l`oi, th`ung k`i khiung-ha ng+ip-hi h+et. 'An-ngi`ong, ke-ng`in heu-l`oi ke chh`in-h`in chhiu p'i si^en-chhi`en h`an-kha chh'am. Li'a si`a-ok ke su"-thoi ya voi 'an-ngi`ong."
Y^a-s^u h`an tui chung-ng`in k'ong-fa ke s`u", ki^a m^e l^au ki^a l'o-th^ai l`oi. K`i-t^eu kh^i chhai ngoi-poi, oi l^au k`i k'ong-fa.
Y^u ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Khon ^a, ngi^a m^e l^au ngi^a l'o-th^ai kh^i chhai ngoi-poi, oi l^au ng`i k'ong-fa."
Y^a-s^u f`i-tap ke-ng`in k'ong: "M'a-ng`in he ng`ai ke ^a-m^e? M'a-ng`in he ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi?"
K`i yu ch'u"-t'en k`i ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`ai ke ^a-m^e, ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi chhai li'a-vi!
F`am s+u"t-h`ang ng`ai Thi^en-fu ch'u"-yi ke chhiu-he ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, l^au ^a-m^e."
Ke-ngit, Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi vuk-h^a hi-to f`u-s`un, chh^o chhai ke-vi.
Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in chhi-s+ip to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, s'o-y^i k`i s^ong-s`on hi chh^o-t'en; chung-ng`in kh^i chhai f`u-s`un.
K`i chhiu yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong chhin-t^o tho-l^i. K`i k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke ve-ch'ung-ke chhut-hi ve-ch'ung.
K`i ve ke s`u", y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai lu-s`un, ti^au-'e p^i-l`oi chi^ong k`i-t^eu s+u"t-thet.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai n`ai chhin-chhi'en ke s+ak-th`eu thi-song; y^in-vi n`ai chhin-chhi'en, ch'ung-ch'u" chhin-kiak chhiu pau-ng`a chhut-l`oi;
ngit-th`eu chhut-l`oi yit sai, nun-ng`a chhiu kh^u-ch^au thet-hi, y^in-vi k^in m`o la chh^u"m.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai net-`e t^i-poi, net-`e thai h'i-l`oi, chi^ong y^ong-'e kh+it-t'en.
Nang-ngoi y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi, ch'ong-thai kiet-ch'u", y^u-t^eu s^u-s`u"n yit-pak-phi, y^u-t^eu liuk-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu s^am-s+u"p-phi."
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!"
H+ok-s^ang l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i tui thai-chung k'ong-fa ngi'ong-p^an oi yung p'i-yi n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ko^an-he thi^en-koet ke o-pi ch'u"-y^u p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i, ch'ung-he m`o p^un k`i-t^eu t^i.
Y^in-vi y'i-k^in y^u ke, oi p^un k`i h`an-kha t^o, p^un k`i y^u-h'o chh^un; m`o ke, li`en k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-s+it-s+it-'e ya oi chhi'ong-ch'eu.
Vi-t'o li'a-ke y`en-ku, ng`ai yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu khon ya khon `m-su"t, th^ang ya th^ang `m ng+ip-ng'i, s^im ya `m-voi m`in-ph+ak.
Li'a he yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke yi-ngi`en; k`i chh`on Song-ti ke fa k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-li'au yu th^ang, ch'ung-he `m-voi ng+ip-ng'i; khon-li'au yu khon, ch'ung-he `m-voi li'au-ki'e.

Y^in-vi li'a ch'u"-m`in ke s^im chhin-thun; k`i-t^eu yu ng'i-k^ung poi-poi, muk-ch^u sap-sap. Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u voi khon-tet-t'o, ng'i-k^ung voi th^ang-tet ng+ip-ng'i, s^im ya voi m`in-ph+ak, k`i-t^eu chhiu voi f`i-s^im ch'on-yi, Ng`ai chhiu voi y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
"Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu he y^u fuk-hi ke ng`in! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u khon tet-t'o, ng'i-k^ung ya th^ang tet-t'o.

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, th`eu-p'ai y^u chhin-t^o si^en-t^i l^au ngi-ng`in si'ong-oi khon ng`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o ke, ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o; si'ong-oi th^ang ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o ke, ya m`o th^ang-t'o.
"S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi m`in-ph+ak li'a ve-ch'ung ke p'i-yi he m'a-ke yi-su".

Ke th^ang-li'au thi^en-koet ke ch^u"n-tho ch'ung-he m`o m`in-ph+ak ke ng`in, chhiu-chhiong ve chhai lu-s`un ke ch'ung-ch'u"; ke si`a-ok-ch'a l`oi-to, chhiu chi^ong ve chhai k`i s^im-ch^ung ke ch^u"n-tho chhi'ong-ch'eu.
Ke ve chhai s+ak-th`eu thi-song ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in th^ang-li'au ch^u"n-tho, ngi`am-s`u" f^on-h'i chiap-su,
ch'ung-he ch^u"n-tho chhai k`i s^im-ch^ung tang-k^in m`o chh^u"m, chh`un m`o k'i-ki'u, yit-ha vi-t'o ch^u"n-tho t`u-t'o khun-n`an ya-he pet-hoi, chhin-kiak chhiu tiet-t'o.

Ke ve chhai net-`e t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in th^ang-li'au ch^u"n-tho y^i-heu, s^en-f+at ke chh^au-s^im l^au chhi`en-chh`oi ke y'u-f+et chi^ong ch^u"n-tho hip-t'en, m`o fap-thu kiet k'o-ch'u".

Ke ve chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in th^ang-li'au ch^u"n-tho, y^u li'au-ki'e, chhiu kiet k'o-ch'u"; y^u-t^eu s^u-s`u"n yit-pak-phi, y^u-t^eu liuk-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu s^am-s+u"p-phi."
Y^a-s^u nang-ngoi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi. K`i k'ong: "Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i y^u-ng`in chi^ong h'o m+ak-ch'ung ve chhai thi`en-hong.
Y^u yit am-p^u, thai-k^a soi-muk ke s`u", tui-th+it l`oi, ve phai-'e chhai m+ak-'e ch^ung-ki^en, chhiu ch'eu-thet.
To m+ak-'e t'a-chhon ke s`u", phai-'e ya thai h'i-l`oi.
Thi`en-ch'u ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi tui k`i k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, ng`i ve chhai thi`en-hong ke k'am `m-he h'o m+ak-ch'ung m^a? Li'a-t^eu phai-'e to-t'ai he tui nai-vi l`oi ke?'
K`i en-k'ong: 'Li'a he th+it-ng`in cho ke.' Ph+uk-ng`in chhiu mun-k'ong: 'Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu hi chi^ong phai-'e p^ang-thet m`o?'
K`i k'ong: '`M-s'u"! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu p^ang phai-'e ke s`u", ki^ang-pha voi li`en m+ak-'e ya p^ang-t'o.

Y`u-chhai m+ak-'e th`ung phai-'e khiung-ha thai; t'en s^u-kot ke s`u", ng`ai voi f^un-fu s^u-kot ke k^ung-ng`in si^en chi^ong phai-'e p^ang chhut-l`oi, kh'un-t'en, fit chhai f'o-ch^ung hi s^eu, y`en-heu chang kot m+ak-'e, s^u-ng+ip ng`ai ke chh^ong-khu.' "
Y^a-s^u nang-ngoi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi. K`i k'ong: "Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i yit-li+ap kie-chhoi-ch'u", y^u-ng`in chi^ong k`i chung chhai thi`en-t'u.

Li'a ch'ung-ch'u" p'i kh`i-th^a yit-chhiet ke ch'ung-ch'u" kha-se, ch'ung-he thai h'i-l`oi heu chhiu p'i ph+et-yong chhoi kha k^o-thai; k`i s`ang-cho yit-th`eu su, li`en f^i-ni^au ya chhai k`i ke su-k^i t'ang-k^o cho-teu."

Y^a-s^u yung nang-ngoi yit-ke p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i fat-kau, y^u fu-ng`in-k^a n^a-l`oi piong chhai si-s+u"p k^ung-s^u"n ke mien-t'u, s'u" k^ui-th`on mien chhi`on-phu fat-h'i-l`oi."
Li'a-t^eu tho-l^i Y^a-s^u l^ung-ch'ung he yung p'i-yi tui chung-ng`in k'ong ke; m`o yit-p'ai k`i `m-he yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong.
K`i 'an-ngi`ong cho, he oi yin-ngiam si^en-t^i s'o k'ong-ko ke fa: "Ng`ai oi yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong, chi^ong chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi khong-t'en ke su" k'ong p^un k`i-t^eu th^ang."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi chung-ng`in, ng+ip vuk-t'u hi. H+ok-s^ang yu l`oi mun k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, thi`en-t'u ke phai-'e li'a-ke p'i-yi he m'a-ke yi-su"?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ke ve h'o-ch'ung ke he Ng`in-ch'u";
thi`en he li'a-ke su"-kie; h'o-ch'ung he s+uk thi^en-koet ke ng`in; phai-'e he s+uk ke si`a-ok-ch'a ke ng`in;
ve phai-'e ke tui-th+it chhiu-he M^o-k'ui; s^u-kot ke s`u"-chiet he su"-kie ke m+at-ngit; s^u-kot ke k^ung-ng`in he thi^en-s'u".
To m+at-ngit, chok-ok ke ng`in oi chhiong phai-'e khiung-yong p^un-ng`in p^ang chhut-l`oi, fit-l+ok f'o-ch^ung hi s^eu.
Ng`in-ch'u" oi phai k`i ke thi^en-s'u", chi^ong k`i ke koet t^i-poi ke-t^eu hoi ng`in fam-chhui l^au yit-chhiet chok-ok ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chok h'i-l`oi,
fit-l+ok f'o-l`u. Chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u".
Ke-s`u", ngi-ng`in chhai k`i-t^eu Thi^en-fu ke koet t^i-poi, voi fat-k^ong chhiong ngit-th`eu yit-yong. Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!

"Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i chh`oi-p'o khong chhai thi`en-t'u. Y^u-ng`in fat-hien, chhiu chi^ong k`i khi`em h'i-l`oi, y`en-heu f^on-f^on h'i-h'i chi^ong chhu"-k^a s'o-y^u ke chhi`on-phu mai-thet, hi m^ai ke-thi`en.
"Thi^en-koet yu kh'o-p'i yit-ke s^en-l^i-ng`in chh`im kui-chhung ke ch^u"n-ch^u.
K`i chh`im-t'o yit-li+ap f^i-s`ong kui-chhung ke ch^u"n-ch^u, chhiu hi mai k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet, l`oi m^ai ke-li+ap ch^u"n-ch^u.
"Thi^en-koet yu kh'o-p'i `ng-mi'ong ve chhai f`u-nui l`oi t'a kok-ch'ung ke `ng.
Mi'ong-`e yit m^an, t'a-`ng-ke chi^ong k`i l^ai s^ong-l`oi, chh^o chhai ngan-song, chi^ong `ng-`e f^un-lui, th+ok h'o-ke piong-l+ok th'ung-t'u, chi^ong f'ai-ke fit-thet.
Su"-kie ke m+at-ngit ya he chhiong 'an-ngi`ong: Thi^en-s'u" oi chhut-hi, chi^ong f'ai-ng`in tui h'o-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung f^un-ph+et chhut-l`oi,
fit-l+ok f'o-l`u t^i-poi. Chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u"."
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu fa ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu li'au-ki'e m`o?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Li'au-ki'e."

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, m^i-yit-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" s`ang-cho thi^en-koet ke h+ok-s^ang, chhiu-chhiong yit-k^a ch^u" ch'u tui k`i ke chh^ong-khu chi^ong s^in l^au khiu ke t^ung-s^i chhi`on-phu p^an chhut-l`oi."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu p'i-yi, chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong,

ch'on-to chhu"-k^a ke k^a-hi^ong, chhai fi-th`ong kau-hiun ng`in; th^ang-t'o ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chhin kh`i-koai, k'ong: "Li'a-s`a ng`in tui nai-vi tet-t'o li'a-yong ke chu"-fi, yu voi h`ang s`u"n-chiak n`o?
Li'a k'am `m-he ke muk-siong ke lai-'e m^a? Ki^a-m^e `m-he ^on-to M^a-li-^a m^a? Ng^a-kok, Yok-sit, S^i-m`un l^au Y`u-thai `m-he ki^a l'o-th^ai m^a?
K`i ke-t^eu l'o-moi k'am `m-he h+et chhai ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi m^a? Li'a-ng`in to-t'ai he tui nai-vi tet-t'o li'a yit-chhiet n`e?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu kh^i-chhi+et k`i. Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chh`u-li'au chhai chhu"-k^a ke p'un-hi^ong, p'un-k^a y^i-ngoi, si^en-t^i chhi`on-phu su ng`in ch^un-kin."
Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-h'en sin, Y^a-s^u chhai ke-vi chhiu m`o h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak.
Ke-s`u", K^a-li-li ke H^i-l+it-v`ong th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u ke su",
chhiu tui thai-s`u"n k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in thin-chh+ok he S^u"-s'e Yok-hon f'an-s^ang, chang voi y^u h`ang li'a-t^eu s`u"n-chiak ke n`en-l+it."
Ngi`en-l`oi, H^i-l+it vi-t'o ki^a hi^ung-thi F^i-l+it ke p^u-ngi`ong H^i-l`o-t'i ke y`en-ku, su"t ha-lin chok Yok-hon, chi^ong k`i thak-t'en ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.
Y^in-vi Yok-hon chai-s^am chit-phi H^i-l+it k'ong: "Ng`i chiam H^i-l`o-t'i cho p^u-ngi`ong he v`i-fap ke."
H^i-l+it si'ong-oi chh`u" k`i, ch'ung-he ki^ang ng`in-m`in, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu si^ong-sin Yok-hon he si^en-t^i.
H^i-l+it cho s^ang-ngit ke-ngit, H^i-l`o-t'i ke moi-'e chhai ng`in-hak mien-chhi`en thiau-v'u, p^un H^i-l+it chhin f^on-h'i.
H^i-l+it chhiu tui k`i fat-su", yin-h'i cheu k`i s'o y^eu-khi`u ke s'ong-p^un k`i.
Su-t'o ki^a-m^e ke k^au-s^o, k`i y^eu-khi`u k'ong: "Khi`u ng`i chit-s`u" chi^ong S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a piong chhai ph`an-t'u p^un ng`ai!"
V`ong k'am-kok f^i-s`ong v`i-n`an, ch'ung-he k`i y'i-k^in chhai ng`in-hak mien-chhi`en fat-su", ch'u"-y^u ha-lin cheu k`i s'o y^eu-khi`u ke p^un k`i.
S'o-y^i, H^i-l+it phai-ng`in hi k^am-ngi+uk, ch'am Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a,
piong chhai ph`an-t'u, t^eu-p^un se-^a-moi-'e; k`i chhiu k^au-p^un ki^a-m^e.
Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi, chi^ong s^u"n-s^u" li^ang-hi m`ai-chong; y`en-heu hi chi^ong li'a-khien su" l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong.
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a s^eu-sit, chhiu s^ong-s`on l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, chhu"-k^a yit-s`a hi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai. Chung-ng`in th^ang-k'ong, chhiu tui tak-ke s`ang-su" h`ang-lu th`en-t'en k`i hi.
Y^a-s^u yit s^ong-ngan, khon-t'o li'a yit thai-khi`un ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i-t^eu, y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke phiang-ng`in.

L`im-am-'e ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, tui k`i k'ong: "Thi^en am l^o, li'a-vi yu he phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai, chhi'ang ham thai-k^a l`i-kh^oi, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu hi fu-khiun ke chh^un-ch^ong m^ai t^ung-s^i s+u"t."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "`M-s'u" ham thai-k^a l`i-kh^oi; ng`i-t^eu p^un k`i-t^eu s+u"t!"
H+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi ch'u"-y^u 'ng-chak pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "N^a-l`oi p^un ng`ai."

K`i f^un-fu chung-ng`in chh^o chhai chh'o-phi`ang-t'ang, y`en-heu chi^ong 'ng-chak pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng n^a h'i-l`oi, ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, k'am-chhia Song-ti, y`en-heu pak-kh^oi pi'ang-`e, k^au-p^un h+ok-s^ang; h+ok-s^ang chhiu p^un-p^un chung-ng`in.
Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu s+u"t-to p'au; h+ok-s^ang chi^ong s'o chh^un ke sui-'e ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, ch^ong-m^an s+u"p-ngi-chak l`am-`e.
S+u"t ke ng`in, fu-ng`in-k^a l^au se-ng`in-`e y^i-ngoi, yok-y^u 'ng-chhi^en s`a.
Su"-heu, Y^a-s^u ngi`am-s`u" chh^ui h+ok-s^ang s^ong-s`on, si^en to tui-mien ke-phi'en hi, t'en k`i h^em chung-ng`in ch'on-hi.
Chung-ng`in l`i-kh^oi y^i-heu, k`i chhu"-k^a yit-s`a s^ong-s^an hi kh`i-t'o; to am-p^u-th`eu k`i yit-s`a h`an li`u chhai ke-vi.
Ke-s`u", s`on l`i ngan y'i-k^in chhin-y'en, p^un long t'a-to v`ang-l`oi v`ang-hi, y^in-vi s`on he ngi+ak-f^ung h`ang.
Thi^en-m`ung-k^ong ke s`u", Y^a-s^u chhai f`u-mien h`ang-t'en hi h+ok-s^ang ke-vi.
H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o k`i chhai f`u-mien h`ang, f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "He k'ui!" K`i-t^eu chhiu ki^ang-to h^em h'i-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u chit-s`u" tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "^On-s^im, he ng`ai, `m-s'u" ki^ang!"
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, na chu"n-k^in he ng`i, chhi'ang ham ng`ai h`ang s'ui-mien hi ng`i ke-vi!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "L`oi!" P'i-tet chhiu tui s`on-t'ang h^a-hi, chhai s'ui-mien h`ang-t'en hi Y^a-s^u ke-vi.
Ch'ung-he, y^in-vi khon-t'o f^ung chhin-thai, s^im-k^on chh+ok-ki^ang, chhiu kh^oi-s'u" chh`u"m-t'en l+ok-hi; k`i thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, kiu ng`ai!"
Y^a-s^u ngi`am-s`u" chh^un-s'u l^ai-t'en k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i ke sin-s^im thet-se l'e, cho-m'a-ke ng`i-f`u n`o?"
K`i-t^eu s^ong-li'au s`on, f^ung chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi.
S`on-t'ang ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu kh'ui-pai k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i s+u"t-chhai he Song-ti ke Lai-'e."
K`i-t^eu ko-li'au f`u, chhai Kiet-n`i-sat-l+et s^ong-ngan.
Ke-vi ke ng`in yit ngin-chhut Y^a-s^u, chhiu phai-ng`in hi fu-khiun ke thi-f^ong, tai s'o-y^u ke phiang-ng`in l`oi Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en.
K`i-t^eu khi`u Y^a-s^u ch'un phiang-ng`in t^an-chhiang mi^a k`i ke s^am-m^i; s'o-y^u mi^a-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Y^u k'i-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, mun k`i k'ong:
"Ngi'ong-p^an ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang v`i-poi ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke chh`on-th'ung? K`i-t^eu s+u"t-fan chhi`en m`o cheu k^ui-k'i s'e-s'u!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an vi-t'o ch^un-s'u chh`on-th'ung l`oi v`i-poi Song-ti ke min-lin n`e?
Song-ti k'ong: 'Oi hau-kin y`a-^oi'; yu k'ong: 'Chu-ma y`a-^oi ke, oi phan k`i s'i-h`in.'
Ng`i-t^eu phi^en-phi^en k'ong, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in tui y`a-^oi k'ong: 'Ng`ai chi^ong fung-y^ong ng`i-t^eu ke t^ung-s^i ch'un-cho l^i-v+ut hien-p^un Song-ti',
k`i chhiu `m-s'u" hau-kin y`a-^oi. Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu n^a chh`on-th'ung l`oi fi-thet Song-ti ke fa.
K'a-mo v`i-san ke ng`in ^a, Y^i-soi-^a ch'u" ng`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke yi-ngi`en s+u"t-chhai m`o `m-chh+ok! K`i k'ong:
Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: 'Li'a-t^eu ng`in yung choi-s`un-ph`i ch^un-kin Ng`ai, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ke s^im y'en-y'en l`i-kh^oi Ng`ai.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong ng`in ke k^ui-thin ch'un-cho Ng`ai ke min-lin l`oi k^au ng`in; k`i-t^eu kin-pai Ng`ai ya he kh^ung-kh^ung.' "
Y^a-s^u seu-s+ip chung-ng`in to k`i mien-chhi`en, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang ng`ai ke fa, ya oi m`in-ph+ak!
Tui choi ng+ip-hi ke t^ung-s^i `m-voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li; tui choi chhut-l`oi ke chang voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li."
Heu-l`oi, h+ok-s^ang chin-chhi`en tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-li'au ng`i ke fa chhin `m-f+uk, ng`i t^i m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "`M-he ng`ai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a s'o-chung ke chh+u"t-v+ut, l^ung-ch'ung oi li`en k^in p^ang-thet.
M+ok tap k`i-t^eu! K`i-t^eu he m^o-muk-ke, oi ngi'ong-p^an vi ng`in tai-lu; m^o-muk-ke tai m^o-muk-ke, li'ong-s`a l^ung-ch'ung voi tiet-l+ok fut-t'u hi."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu ki'e-su"t li'a p'i-yi ke yi-su"."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "To li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu h`an-he th`ung ph+et-ng`in khiung-yong m`o m`in-ph+ak m^a?
K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m t^i? Yit-chhiet tui choi ng+ip-hi ke t^ung-s^i, he to t'u-s'u" t^i-poi hi, y`en-heu yu ^o chhut-l`oi.
Ch'ung-he tui choi chhut-l`oi ke he tui s^im chhut-l`oi; ke-t^eu chang voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li.

Y^in-vi tui ng`in s^im-ch^ung chhut-l`oi ke, y^u ch'ung-ch'ung ke ok-ngiam; li'a-t^eu ok-ngiam voi s'u" k`i fam hi^ung-sat, ki^en-y`im, th^ung-ki^en, th^eu-n^a, k'ong f^a-li^au, f'i-pong t'en chhui-ok.
Li'a-t^eu chang chu"n-k^in voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li. Chhiong m`o si^en cheu k^ui-k'i s'e-s'u chhiu s+u"t-fan li'a-t^eu su", `m-voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, s'am-to Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun fu-khiun ke thi-f^ong hi.
Ke-vi y^u yit-ke K^a-n`am ke fu-ng`in-k^a l`oi kien k`i, h^em-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un, kh'o-li`en ng`ai! Ng^a moi-'e p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n, f^i-s`ong k^an-kh'u!"
Y^a-s^u yit-ki fa ya `m en k`i. H+ok-s^ang chhi`en-l`oi khi`u k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ham k`i ch'eu! K`i th`en-t'en ng`ai-t^eu, k^ui-lu k'in h^em!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai ch'u"-y^u su chh^ai-phai hi Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung chh`im m`i-lu ke y`ong."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu l`oi kh'ui-pai k`i, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, khi`u ng`i p^ong-chhu ng`ai!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "N^a ch'u"-'ng s+u"t ke pi'ang-`e fit p^un ki'eu-`e s+u"t he `m-chh+ok ke."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, m`o `m-chh+ok, ch'ung-he ki'eu-`e me s+u"t ch'u-ng`in chok-t'ang tiet h^a-l`oi ke pi'ang-sui-'e ^a!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu en k`i k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`i ke sin-s^im ch^u"n-thai! Cheu ng`i s'o-oi ke s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i!" Ki^a moi-'e chhai ke-s`u" chhiu h'o l'e.
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, l`oi-to K^a-li-li-f`u fu-khiun; k`i s^ong-s^an, chh^o chhai ke-vi.

Chung-ng`in yu l`oi chh`im k`i, ya tai-l`oi p`ai-kiok-ke, m^o-muk-ke, chh`an-chong ke, 'a-`e, l^au h'o-t^o ph+et-yong ke phiang-ng`in, p`ai chhai Y^a-s^u ke kiok-chhi`en; Y^a-s^u yit-yit y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
Ke-khi`un ng`in khon-t'o 'a-`e k'ong-fa, chh`an-chong ke f+uk-ngi`en, p`ai-kiok-ke h`ang-lu, m^o-muk-ke khon-tet-t'o, k'am-kok f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai, chhiu siung-chan Y^i-set-li+et ke Song-ti.

Y^a-s^u ham h+ok-s^ang l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai thoi li'a-khi`un ng`in chhin t^am-s^im, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha y'i-k^in s^am-ngit, li'a-ha m`o t^ung-s^i h'o s+u"t l^o. Ng`ai m`o-oi k`i-t^eu ngo t'u-s'u" ch'on-hi, ki^ang-pha k`i-t^eu chhai lu-song voi ngo-to pan-s^ang-s'i."
H+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Chhai li'a phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai, ng`ai-t^eu oi hi nai-vi chh`im 'an-t^o ke s+u"t-v+ut p^un li'a yit thai-khi`un ng`in s+u"t-p'au n`e?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu y^u k'i-t^o pi'ang?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Chhit-chak, h`an-y^u k'i-m^i se `ng-`e."
Y^a-s^u f^un-fu chung-ng`in chh^o chhai thi-song,
n^a-h'i ke chhit-chak pi'ang-`e l^au k'i-m^i `ng-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, k^au-p^un h+ok-s^ang; h+ok-s^ang chhiu p^un-p^un chung-ng`in.
Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu s+u"t-to p'au. H+ok-s^ang ngi^am s+u"t-chh^un ke sui-'e, ch^ong-m^an chhit-chak l`am-`e.
S+u"t ke ng`in, fu-ng`in-k^a l^au se-ng`in-`e y^i-ngoi, y^u si-chhi^en s`a.
Y^a-s^u chhiu ham chung-ng`in san-kh^oi, y`en-heu s^ong-s`on, hi M^a-k^a-t^an ke thi-f^ong.
Y^u k'i-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in l`oi kien Y^a-s^u, si'ong-oi hoi k`i, chhiu y^eu-khi`u k`i h`ang yit-ke s`u"n-chiak, l`oi chu"n-m`in k`i s'o-cho ke he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "L`im-am-'e, ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Thi^en-k^ong-ngit thin-chh+ok h'o-thi^en, y^in-vi thi^en-pi^en khi^en f`ung-h`a.'
Ch^eu-s`u"n-th`eu, ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'K^im-p^u-ngit voi y^u f^ung-y'i, y^in-vi thi^en v^u-v^u.' Ng`i-t^eu chhin voi khon thi^en-set, ch'ung-he khon `m-chhut li'a s`u"-thoi ke seu-th`eu!

Yit-ke si`a-ok `m-sin ke su"-thoi chang y^eu-khi`u s`u"n-chiak; ch'ung-he, chh`u-li'au Yok-n^a ke s`u"n-chiak y^i-ngoi, m`o ph+et ke s`u"n-chiak h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu khon." Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au, chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu.
H+ok-s^ang thu-to f`u tui-mien hi, `m ki-tet tai pi'ang-`e.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, oi th`i-f`ong Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in ke fat-kau!"
K`i-t^eu p'i-chh'u" am-ch^ung ngi-lun k'ong: "K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa, pha-he y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu m`o tai pi'ang-`e."
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke, chhiu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an ngi-lun m`o pi'ang-`e li'a-khien su" n`e? Ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im thet-se l'e!
Ngi'ong-p^an to li'a-ha h`an m`o m`in-ph+ak! K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m ki-tet yung 'ng-chak pi'ang p^un 'ng-chhi^en ng`in s+u"t-p'au ke su" m^a? Ke-s`u" ng`i-t^eu ngi^am k'i-t^o l`am ke sui-'e?
H`an-y^u, yung chhit-chak pi'ang p^un si-chhi^en s`a s+u"t-p'au ke-p'ai, ng`i-t^eu yu ngi^am k'i-t^o l`am ke sui-'e?
Ngi'ong-p^an h`an `m m`in-ph+ak ng`ai `m-he th`ung ng`i-t^eu k'ong pi'ang-`e ke su"? Ng`i-t^eu oi th`i-f`ong Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in ke fat-kau!"
H+ok-s^ang li'a-s`u" chang t^i Y^a-s^u pin `m-he ham k`i-t^eu th`i-f`ong pi'ang-`e t^i-poi ke fat-kau, he oi k`i-t^eu th`i-f`ong Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in ke kau-hiun.
Y^a-s^u to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a-F^i-l+ip-p'i ke thi-f^ong; chhai ke-vi, k`i mun h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Yit-p^an ng`in k'ong Ng`in-ch'u" he m'a-s`a?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Y^u-t^eu k'ong he S^u"-s'e Yok-hon; y^u-t^eu k'ong he Y^i-li-^a; ya y^u-t^eu k'ong he Y^a-li-m'i ya-he kh`i-th^a si^en-t^i ke yit-ke."
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu n`e? Ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in?"
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet en-k'ong: "Ng`i he K^i-tuk, he y'un-s^en Song-ti ke Lai-'e."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: " Yok-n^a ke lai-'e S^i-m`un, ng`i ch^u"n y^u fuk-hi; y^in-vi li'a `m-he ng`in ch'u"-su" ng`i ke, he ng`ai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a kh'i-su" ng`i ke.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`i he P'i-tet, he ph`an-s+ak; chhai li'a ph`an-s+ak t'ang, ng`ai oi kien-l+ip ng`ai ke kau-fi, li`en s'i ke khi`en-su" ya m`o kh'o-n`en y`ang-ko k`i.

Ng`ai oi chi^ong thi^en-koet ke s'o-s`u" k^au-p^un ng`i, ng`i chhai thi-song s'o kim-ch'u" ke, chhai thi^en-t'ang ya oi kim-ch'u"; ng`i chhai thi-song s'o ph^i-ch'un ke, chhai thi^en-t'ang ya oi ph^i-ch'un."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang, chhi+et-tui `m-h'o l^au m'a-s`a k'ong k`i chhiu-he K^i-tuk.

Tui ke-s`u" kh^oi-s'u", Y^a-s^u m`in-m`in ch'u"-su" h+ok-s^ang, k`i yit-thin oi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi, tui ke-t^eu ch'ong-l'o, chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" su chhin-t^o ke kh'u-nan, ya voi p^un-ng`in sat-hoi, ch'ung-he thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at.
P'i-tet l^ai-t'en Y^a-s^u, kh^oi-s'u" khien k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, cho-`m-tet! Li'a-khien su" chhi^en-van cho-`m-tet l`im-to ng`i s^u"n-song!"
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Sat-tan, s'am-kh^oi! Ng`i he ng`ai ke pan-kiok-s+ak; y^in-vi ng`i ke si'ong-fap `m-he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, he ng`in ke si'ong-fap."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Si'ong-oi th`en ng`ai ke ng`in, chhiu oi piong-thet chhu"-k^a, khi`a-h'i k`i ke s+u"p-su"-ka l`oi th`en ng`ai.
Y^in-vi si'ong-oi kiu chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang; vi-t'o ng`ai s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Ng`in na-he chhon-t'o chhi`on su"-kie, ch'ung-he s'ong-su"t chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang, y^u m'a-ke lu-yung n`e? T^ong-y`en m`o! K`i oi n^a m'a-ke l`oi von chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang n`e?
Ng`in-ch'u" oi chhai ki^a P^a ke y`ung-k^ong ch^ung, th`ung k`i ke thi^en-s'u" khiung-ha l`oi. Ke-s`u", k`i oi cheu kok-ng`in ke h`ang-v`i s^u"-h`ang po-yin.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, kh^i chhai li'a-vi ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu chhai s'i y^i-chhi`en voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" l`im-to k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung l`oi ch'ong-khi`en."
Liuk-ngit y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u tai-t'en P'i-tet, l^au Ng^a-kok, Yok-hon li'ong hi^ung-thi, ti^am-ti^am-'e s^ong yit-chho k^o-s^an.
Chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en, Y^a-s^u ke h`in-siong k'oi-pien: K`i ke mien fat-k^ong chhiong ngit-th`eu, s^am ya chhiong k^ong 'an ph+ak.
Fut-y`en, s^am-ke h+ok-s^ang khon-t'o M^o-s^i l^au Y^i-li-^a chhai ke-vi th`ung Y^a-s^u k'ong-fa.

P'i-tet tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chhin h'o! Ng`i na-he oi, ng`ai chhai li'a-vi tap s^am-ki^en li`au-`e, yit-ki^en p^un ng`i, yit-ki^en p^un M^o-s^i, yit-ki^en p^un Y^i-li-^a."

P'i-tet ke fa h`an-m`ang k'ong-s+ot, y^u yit-te chhan-lan ke y`un chhut-hien, ch^a-t'en k`i-t^eu. Fut-y`en y^u s^ang tui y`un-ch^ung chh`on chhut-l`oi k'ong: "Li'a he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, Ng`ai s'o f^on-h'i ke. Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"
H+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-ke s^ang, chhiu ph+uk l+ok-hi, f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang.
Y^a-s^u h`ang ko-l`oi, phok k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, `m-s'u" ki^ang!"
K`i-t^eu ngo-th`eu yit khon, m`o khon-t'o ph+et-ng`in, ch'u"-y^u Y^a-s^u chhai ke-vi.
