K`i-t^eu h^a-s^an ke s`u", Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" m`ang tui s'i f+uk-f+at y^i-chhi`en, chhi^en-van `m-h'o chi^ong s'o khon-t'o ke yi-siong k'ong-p^un ng`in th^ang."
H+ok-s^ang mun k`i k'ong: "K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ngi'ong-voi k'ong, Y^i-li-^a thin-chh+ok oi si^en l`oi n`e?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^u-y'ang, Y^i-li-^a oi si^en l`oi s'u" van-su" f+uk-ngi`en.

Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Y^i-li-^a y'i-k^in l`oi l'e, kh'o-sit ng`in `m ngin-su"t k`i, f'an-ch'on s`ui-s^im s'o-oi l`oi tui-thai k`i. Khiung-yong, Ng`in-ch'u" ya voi su k`i-t^eu ke kh'u-th+uk."
Li'a-s`u", h+ok-s^ang chang t^i Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke, he ch'u" S^u"-s'e Yok-hon.
K`i-t^eu ch'on-to chung-ng`in ke-vi ke s`u", y^u yit-ke ng`in chin-chhi`en l`oi, kh'ui chhai Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en,
k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, khi`u ng`i kh'o-li`en ng^a lai-'e! K`i pot ch^u-m`a-chh'ai, f^i-s`ong thung-kh'u, s`ong-s`ong tiet-l+ok f'o t^i-poi ya-he s'ui-ch^ung hi.
Ng`ai tai k`i l`oi-kien ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu m`o phan-fap y^i-h'o k`i."

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an 'an m`o sin-s^im, 'an f'u-phai! Ng`ai h`an oi chhai ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi k'i-ki'u n`e? H`an oi ngi^un-nai ng`i-t^eu k'i-ki'u n`e? Chi^ong se-ng`in-`e tai-l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi!"
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u chit-phi ke k'ui; k'ui yit chhut-l`oi, se-ng`in-`e ke phiang chit-s`u" chhiu h'o l'e.
Su"-heu, h+ok-s^ang am-ch^ung l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an m`o fap-thu chi^ong ke k'ui kiuk chhut-hi n`e?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im thet-se. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im na-he y^u yit-li+ap kie-chhoi-ch'u" 'an-thai, chhiu-he tui li'a-chho s^an k'ong: 'Tui li'a-vi s'ai-to ke-vi hi!' k`i ya voi s'ai ko-hi. M`o m'a-ke su" he ng`i-t^eu cho `m-t'o ke."
H+ok-s^ang l^ung-ch'ung chhi-s+ip chhai K^a-li-li ke s`u", Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung;
k`i-t^eu voi sat-hoi k`i, ch'ung-he thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at." H+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o, f^i-s`ong y`u-s`eu.
Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang l`oi-to K^a-pak-n`ung ke s`u", y^u k'i-ke s^u su"n-thien-soi ke ng`in l`oi kien P'i-tet, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke s^in-s^ang `m-he oi n+ap su"n-thien-soi m^a?"

P'i-tet k'ong: "T^ong-y`en oi n+ap." P'i-tet ng+ip vuk-t'u hi ke s`u", Y^a-s^u si^en mun k`i k'ong: " S^i-m`un, n+ap ko^an-soi ya-he ng`in-th`eu-soi p^un li'a su"-ki^en ke ki^un-v`ong ke, he p'un-koet ke k^ung-m`in ya-he ngoi-koet-ng`in? Ng`i si'ong ngi'ong-p^an?"
P'i-tet k'ong: "He ngoi-koet-ng`in!" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, p'un-koet ke k^ung-m`in chhiu `m-s'u" n+ap-soi.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu m+ok f^am-t'o li'a-t^eu ng`in. Ng`i hi f`u-pi^en tiau-`ng, chi^ong tiau-t'o ke th`eu-yit-m^i `ng-`e chok-l`oi, t'a-kh^oi `ng-choi, ng`i voi khon-t'o yit-ke ngi`un-pi; ke chhi`en chhiu-he ng`i l^au ng`ai li'ong-s`a oi n+ap ke su"n-thien-soi, ng`i chhiu n^a-hi p^un k`i-t^eu."
Ke-s`u", h+ok-s^ang l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Chhai thi^en-koet t^i-poi m'a-ng`in chui v'i-thai?"
Y^a-s^u ham yit-ke se-ng`in-`e l`oi, p^un k`i kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu ke ch^ung-ki^en,
k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chh`u-li'au ng`i-t^eu pien-to chhiong se-ng`in-`e 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui m`o kh'o-n`en s`ang-cho thi^en-koet ke ch'u"-m`in.
Chhiong li'a-ke se-ng`in-`e 'an khi^am-p^i ke, chhai thi^en-koet t^i-poi chhiu-he chui v'i-thai ke.
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang chiap-thai yit-ke chhiong li'a se-ng`in-`e ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ng`ai.
"M`o-lun m'a-ng`in hoi sin-th`u ch^ung ngim-h`o yit-ke m`i-se ke ng`in l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, k`i chui-h'o p^un-ng`in yung thai mo-s+ak th`o-t'en ki'ang-k^in, fit-l+ok chh^u"m-h'oi chim-s'i.
Li'a su"-ki^en chh'am l'e, y^in-vi y^u hoi-ng`in l`i-kh^oi ng`ai ke su"! Fat-s^en 'an-ngi`ong ke su" he n`an-mi^en ke, ch'ung-he s'u" li'a-ke su" fat-s^en ke ng`in chh'am l'e!

"Na-he ng`i ke yit-k^i s'u ya-he yit-k^i kiok hoi ng`i fam-chhui, chi^ong k`i ch'am h^a-l`oi, fit-thet k`i. S'eu yit-k^i s'u ya-he yit-k^i kiok l`oi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, kha-y`ang s^ung-s'u s^ung-kiok h'o-h'o sa fit-l+ok y'un-y'en put-m+et ke li+et-f'o ch^ung.

Na-he ng`i ke yit-chak muk-ch^u hoi ng`i fam-chhui, chi^ong k`i yet chhut-l`oi, fit-thet k`i. S'eu yit-chak muk-ch^u l`oi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, kha-y`ang s^ung-muk h'o-h'o sa fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk ke f'o t^i-poi.

"Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o khon-khi^ang ngim-h`o yit-ke m`i-se ke ng`in. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai thi^en-t'ang, k`i-t^eu ke thi^en-s'u" s`ong-s`ong kh^i chhai ng`ai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a mien-chhi`en.

"Ng`i-t^eu si'ong khon-'e, na-he yit-ke ng`in y^u yit-pak-chak y`ong, kh`i-ch^ung yit-chak h`ang m`i-lu, k`i k'am `m-voi chi^ong ki'u-s+u"p-ki'u-chak piong chhai s^an-ph`ai-t'ang, hi chh`im ke-chak m`i-lu ke y`ong m^a?
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k`i na-he chh`im-t'o ke-chak m`i-lu ke y`ong yit-thin f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i, p'i ki'u-s+u"p-ki'u-chak m`o m`i-lu ke y`ong f^on-h'i h`an-kha thai!
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a ya m`o-oi ngim-h`o yit-ke m`i-se ke ng`in s'ong-su"t-thet.

"Na-he ng`i ke hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi tet-chhui ng`i, ng`i chhiu hi kien k`i, ch'u"-chhut k`i ke `m-chh+ok; ch'ung-he oi chhai t^an-chhiang k`i yit-s`a th`ung ng`i khiung-ha ke s`u" chang-h'o 'an-ngi`ong cho. Na-he k`i th^ang ng`i ke khien-va, ng`i chhiu-he chh`ung-s^in tet-t'o ng`i ke hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi.
Na-he k`i `m-th^ang, ng`i chhiu nang-ngoi chhi'ang yit-li'ong s`a khiung-ha hi; 'an-ngi`ong, m^i-yit-ki chit-phi ke fa chhiu y^u li'ong-s^am s`a h'o cho-chu"n.
Na-he k`i h`an-he `m-th^ang, chhiu chi^ong li'a-khien su" ke th`eu-m^i po-ko kau-fi. Kau-fi k`i ya `m-th^ang, ng`i chhiu khon k`i cho Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya-he soi-kun.

"Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi-song s'o kim-ch'u" ke, chhai thi^en-t'ang ya oi kim-ch'u"; ng`i-t^eu chhai thi-song s'o ph^i-ch'un ke, chhai thi^en-t'ang ya oi ph^i-ch'un.

"Ng`ai chai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi-song, na-he y^u li'ong-ke ng`in th`ung-s^im h+ap-yi kh`i-t'o, m`o-lun khi`u m'a-ke, ng`ai chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a tit-khok voi s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i-t^eu.
Y^in-vi, m`o-lun chhai nai-vi, y^u li'ong-s^am s`a fung ng`ai ke mi`ang l`oi chhi-s+ip, ng`ai chhiu chhai k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en."
Ke-s`u", P'i-tet l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi tet-chhui ng`ai, ng`ai oi ngi`eu k`i k'i-t^o p'ai? Chhit-p'ai la m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "`M-he chhit-p'ai. Ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, he chhit-s+u"p-ke chhit-p'ai.
Y^in-vi thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i li'a-ke ku-su": Y^u yit-ke v`ong oi l^au k`i ke ph+uk-ng`in son-su".
K`i kh^oi-s'u" son-su" ke s`u"-chiet, y^u-ng`in chi^ong yit-ke khiam k`i k'i-h^a chhi^en-van ngi`un-`e ke ph+uk-ng`in tai-to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi.

Y^in-vi li'a-ke ng`in m`o-chhi`en h'o-v`an, ch'u-ng`in chhiu ha-lin chi^ong k`i l^au k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong ch'u"-'ng chhi`on-phu mai-p^un ng`in cho n`ung-chh`oi, li`en k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet ya l^ung-ch'ung mai-thet l`oi v`an-chai.
Ke ph+uk-ng`in chhai v`ong mien-chhi`en kh'ui h^a-l`oi, khi`u k'ong: 'Kh^on-y`ung ng`ai yit-p'ai n^a! Ng`ai thin-chh+ok voi chi^ong yit-chhiet chai-vu v`an-chh^in.'
Ke ph+uk-ng`in ke ch'u-ng`in chhiu kh'o-li`en k`i, piong k`i ch'eu, yu mi^en-thet k`i ke chai.

"Ke ph+uk-ng`in chhut-l`oi heu, t`u-t'o yit-ke th`ung k`i khiung-ha cho-se ke ph^an. Li'a th`ung-ph^an khiam k`i k'i-ke ngi`un-`e, k`i chhiu khi'u-t'en k`i, kh+ak k`i ke h`eu-li`en, k'ong: 'Khiam ng`ai ke chhi`en v`an ng`ai!'
K`i ke th`ung-ph^an kh'ui h^a-l`oi, khi`u k`i k'ong: 'Kh^on-y`ung ng`ai yit-p'ai n^a! Ng`ai thin-chh+ok voi v`an-chh^in!'
Ch'ung-he k`i `m-h'en, f'an-ch'on chi^ong th`ung-ph^an ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk, t'en k`i v`an-chh^in chai-vu.
Kh`i-th^a ke th`ung-ph^an khon-t'o li'a-ke su", s^im chhin k^an-kh'u; k`i-t^eu hi kien ch'u-ng`in, chi^ong li'a-su" ke th`eu-m^i tui k`i po-ko.
Ch'u-ng`in chhiu h^em ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi, tui k`i k'ong: 'Ng`i li'a f'ai-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in! Ng`i khi`u ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu mi^en ng`i s'o-y^u ke chai,
ng`i k'am m`o yin-k^oi l`in-m'en ng`i ke th`ung-ph^an, chhiong ng`ai l`in-m'en ng`i khiung-yong m^a?'
Ch'u-ng`in f^i-s`ong khi'en, chi^ong k`i ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk su h`in-f+at, t'en k`i v`an-chh^in chhi`on-phu ke chai."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Na-he ng`i-t^eu tak-s`a `m-h'en tui nui-s^im ngi`eu-sa hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi, ng`ai chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a ya oi 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai ng`i-t^eu."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu l`i-kh^oi K^a-li-li, l`oi-to Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en ke Y`u-thai thi-kh^i.
Yit thai-khi`un ng`in th`en-t'en k`i; chhai ke-vi, k`i y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke phiang-ng`in.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, si'ong-oi hoi k`i, mun k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang-kau ng`i, m`o-lun l^i-y`u he m'a-ke, ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it ch'un l'o-k^ung l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong, he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko li'a-chham k^in-v`un he-m`o? Thai-chh^u, chh'ong-chho Ch'u s'o-chho ke ng`in, 'y^u n`am ya y^u 'ng'.
Song-ti k'ong: 'Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, n`am-ng`in oi l`i-kh^oi y`a-^oi, l^au p^u-ngi`ong kiet-h+ap, li'ong-s`a s`ang-cho yit-th'i.'
Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, f^u-chh^i chhiu `m-he li'ong-ke ng`in, he yit-th'i. S'o-y^i, Song-ti s'o phi-h+ap ke, ng`in cho-`m-tet chhak-kh^oi."

Fap-li-soi-ng`in yu mun-k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, M^o-s^i cho-m'a-ke p^un ng`ai-t^eu yit-thi`au kie-min k'ong, cho l'o-k^ung ke si'a yit-ch^ong l`i-f^un s^u p^un p^u-ngi`ong chhiu cho-tet l`i-thet k`i n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: " M^o-s^i ch'un ng`i-t^eu l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong, he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke s^im chhin-ngang; ch'ung-he chhai su"-kie chh'ong-chho ke h'i-th`eu pin `m-he 'an-ngi`ong.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chh`u-li'au cho p^u-ngi`ong ke v`i-fam ch^u"n-chiet, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong, chh`ung-s^in l^au ph+et ke fu-ng`in-k^a kiet-f^un, chhiu-he fam ki^en-y`im."
H+ok-s^ang tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "L'o-k^ung l^au p^u-ngi`ong ke ko^an-he na-he 'an-ngi`ong, m`o kiet-f^un f'an-ch'on kha-h'o."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a-ch'ung k'ong-fap `m-he tak-ke ng`in voi chiap-su, ch'u"-y^u tet-t'o Song-ti th+it-ph+et ^en-su ke ng`in chang voi.

Y^in-vi ng`in m`o kiet-f^un ke l^i-y`u chhin-t^o: Y^u-t^eu he chhut-se chhiu kiet-f^un `m-tet; y^u-t^eu he ng`in-v`i ke ngi`en-y^in m`o kiet-f^un ke; nang-ngoi y^u-t^eu he vi-t'o thi^en-koet ke y`en-ku m`o-oi kiet-f^un. Y^u fap-thu chiap-su ke ng`in chhiu chiap-su."
Y^u ng`in tai se-ng`in-`e l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, h^i-mong Y^a-s^u vi k`i-t^eu on-s'u kh`i-t'o; ch'ung-he h+ok-s^ang chit-phi ke-t^eu ng`in.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "P^un se-ng`in-`e l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi, `m-h'o kim-ch'u" k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi thi^en-koet ke ch'u"-m`in chhiu-chhiong li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in."
Y^a-s^u chhiu vi k`i-t^eu on-s'u chuk-fuk, y`en-heu l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai.
Y^u yit-p'ai, y^u-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke san-su" chang cho-tet s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang ^a?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i ngi'ong-p^an mun ng`ai ko^an-he 'san' ke su" n`e? Ch'u"-y^u yit-vi he san ke. Ng`i na-he si'ong-oi s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, chhiu-oi ch^un-s'u kie-min."
K`i chhiu mun-k'ong: "M'a-ke kie-min?" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Cho-`m-tet chh`u"-ng`in; cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im; cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a; cho-`m-tet cho k'a kien-chu"n;
oi hau-kin y`a-^oi; oi siak l`in-sa, chhiu-chhiong siak chhu"-k^a yit-yong."
Ke heu-s^ang-ng`in en-k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu kie-min, ng`ai chhi`on-phu y'i-k^in ch^un-s'u l'e, h`an-oi cho m'a-ke n`e?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i na-he oi cho v`an-chhi`on ke ng`in, hi mai ng`i s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap, chi^ong chhi`en sung-p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, ng`i chhiu voi y^u chh`oi-s'an chit-chh`un chhai thi^en-t'ang; y`en-heu ng`i l`oi th`en ng`ai."
Ke heu-s^ang-ng`in yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu s^im-chh`in chh`u"m-chhung l`oi l`i-kh^oi, y^in-vi k`i ke s'an-ngi+ap chhin-t^o.
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho thi^en-koet ke ch'u"-m`in, ch^u"n n`an ^o!
Ng`ai chai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in, p'i l+ok-th`o chh^on-ko ch^u"m-phi h`an-kha n`an!"
H+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, s+u"p-f^un kh`i-koai, chhiu mun: "'An-ngi`ong, m'a-ng`in y^u kh'o-n`en tet-kiu n`e?"
Y^a-s^u chu-muk khon k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Chhai ng`in li'a he m`o kh'o-n`en, ch'ung-he chhai Song-ti van-su" t^u n`en."
Ke-s`u", P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in piong-thet yit-chhiet l`oi th`en ng`i, ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong-l`oi voi tet-t'o m'a-ke n`e?"

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai chi^ong-l`oi ke s^in s`u"-thoi, Ng`in-ch'u" chh^o chhai k`i y`ung-yeu ke p'o-chho song ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu th`en ng`ai ke ng`in voi chh^o chhai s+u"p-ngi-chak p'o-chho song, l`oi s'u"m-phan Y^i-set-li+et ke s+u"p-ngi k^i-chh+uk.

M`o-lun m'a-ng`in, vi-t'o ng`ai ke y`en-ku l`oi piong-thet f`ong-vuk, hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, y`a-^oi, ch'u"-'ng, ya-he thi`en-thi, l^ung-ch'ung voi tet-t'o pak-phi ke chi'ong-s'ong, yu voi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.
Ch'ung-he, chhin-t^o chhai chui th`eu-chhi`en ke voi cho poi-m^i; chhin-t^o chhai chui poi-m^i ke voi cho th`eu-chhi`en."
"Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i li'a-ke ku-su": Y^u yit-ke ph`u-th`o-y`en ke ch'u-ng`in t'a-ch'o chhut-hi, chhi'ang k^ung-ng`in hi k`i ke ph`u-th`o-y`en cho-se.
K`i th`ung k`i-t^eu k'ong-h'o, yit-ngit ke k^ung-chhi`en he yit-chak ngi`un-chhi`en, chhiu ham k`i-t^eu ng+ip ph`u-th`o-y`en hi cho-se.
Ch^eu-s`u"n-th`eu ki'u-ti'am-ch^ung ch'o-yu, k`i yu hi su"-chh`ong, khon-t'o y^u-t^eu ng`in chhai ke-vi h`an-h`an kh^i-t'en,
chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`i-t^eu ya ng+ip-hi ph`u-th`o-y`en cho-se; ng`ai voi p^un ng`i-t^eu k^ung-tong ke k^ung-chhi`en.'
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi. Heu-l`oi, t^ong-chu s+u"p-ngi-ti'am, l^au h^a-chu-th`eu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung, k`i yu chhut-hi, cheu-yong yu chhi'ang t^eu k^ung-ng`in l`oi.
H^a-chu-th`eu voi 'ng-ti'am-ch^ung, k`i yu chhut-hi, khon-t'o h`an y^u-ng`in h`an-h`an kh^i chhai ke-vi, chhiu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke k^ui-ngit h`an-h`an kh^i chhai li'a-vi?'
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: 'Y^in-vi m`o-ng`in chhi'ang ng`ai-t^eu.' K`i chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: ''An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ya ng+ip-hi ph`u-th`o-y`en cho-se.'
"To l`im-am-'e, y`en-ch'u tui k^ung-th`eu k'ong: 'Ham k^ung-ng`in chhi`on-phu l`oi, fat k^ung-chhi`en p^un k`i-t^eu, tui chui-m^i ng+ip-l`oi ke si^en p^un, to chui-si^en ng+ip-l`oi ke.'
Ke-t^eu 'ng-ti'am-ch^ung chang l`oi cho-se ke, m^i-yit-ke ng`in li^ang-t'o yit-chak ngi`un-chhi`en.
L`un-to ke-t^eu chui-si^en l`oi cho-se ke ng`in li^ang k^ung-chhi`en, k`i-t^eu l'au-t'o yit-thin voi tet-t'o kha-t^o, ch'ung-he tak-s`a ya he li^ang-t'o yit-chak ngi`un-chhi`en.
K`i-t^eu li^ang-chhi`en heu, chhiu m`ai-yen ch'u-ng`in,

k'ong: 'Ke-t^eu chui-m^i ng+ip-l`oi ke chang cho yit-ti'am-ch^ung ke se, ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu k^ui-ngit chhai lat-lat ke ngit-th`eu h^a cho-to voi s'i, ng`i p^un k`i-t^eu ke sa th`ung p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke phi`ang-t^o!'
Y`en-ch'u en k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke yit-s`a k'ong: 'Ph`en-y^u, ng`ai pin m`o kh^ui-khiam ng`i. Ng`i l^au ng`ai k'am `m-he k'ong-h'o, m^i-ngit ke k^ung-chhi`en he yit-chak ngi`un-chhi`en?
N^a ng`i ke k^ung-chhi`en ch'on-hi! Ng`ai oi p^un ke chui-m^i l`oi ke, th`ung p^un ng`i ke phi`ang-t^o;
k'am-k'ong ng`ai m`o khi`en h'o yung ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke chhi`en m^a? Y^in-vi ng`ai tui ng`in thai-f^ong, ng`i chhiu muk chhak-chhak he-m`o?' "
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ke-t^eu chhai chui poi-m^i ke voi cho th`eu-chhi`en; chhai chui th`eu-chhi`en ke voi cho poi-m^i."
Y^a-s^u hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s`u", tai s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang to lu-s`un, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Khon ^a, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha oi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi; Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ke s'u-ch^ung. K`i-t^eu voi phan k`i s'i-h`in,
y`en-heu chi^ong k`i k^au-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in. K`i-t^eu voi met-sa k`i, pi^en-t'a k`i, chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka; ch'ung-he, thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
Ke-s`u", S^i-p'i-thai ke p^u-ngi`ong tai-t'en li'ong-ke lai-'e l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, kh'ui h^a-l`oi, khi`u k`i yit-khien su".

Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi m'a-ke?" K`i k'ong: "Khi`u ng`i tap-yin, chhai ng`i cho v`ong ke s`u", p^un ng`ai li'a li'ong-ke lai-'e yit-ke chh^o chhai ng`i ke yu-phi'en, yit-ke chh^o chhai ng`i ke ch'o-phi'en."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i chhu"-k^a s'o khi`u ke he m'a-ke. Ng`ai yit-thin oi l^im ke kh'u-p^i, ng`i-t^eu y^u fap-thu l^im m`o?" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y^u fap-thu!"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t oi l^im ng`ai ke kh'u-p^i; ch'ung-he m'a-ng`in chh^o chhai ng`ai ke ch'o-yu, chhiu `m-he ng`ai cho-tet kiet-thin ke. Li'a-t^eu chho-vi, ng^a P^a vi m'a-ng`in ch'un-phi, chhiu oi su-p^un m'a-ng`in."
Kh`i-th^a s+u"p-ke h+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-ke su", chhiu t^ong-at k`i li'ong hi^ung-thi.

Y^a-s^u ham k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^i, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a y^u khi`en k'on-hot k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu ya y^u khi`en ch'u"-f^i k`i-t^eu;
ch'ung-he, chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung cho-`m-tet 'an-ngi`ong. Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en si'ong-oi cho thai-ng`in-v+ut ke, chhiu oi cho ng`i-t^eu ke ph+uk-ng`in;
si'ong-oi cho th`eu ke, chhiu oi cho ng`i-t^eu ke n`u-ph+uk;
chhiu-chhiong Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi, `m-he oi p^un-ng`in f+uk-su", he l`oi f+uk-su" ng`in, ya oi vi-t'o kiu-s+uk chung-ng`in l`oi h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang."
K`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi Y^a-li-k^o ke s`u", yit thai-khi`un ng`in th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u.
Y^u li'ong-ke m^o-muk-ke chh^o chhai lu-s`un, yit th^ang-k'ong he Y^a-s^u k^in-ko, chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai-t^eu!"
Thai-k^a chit-phi k`i-t^eu, ham k`i-t^eu `m-h'o chh`au; ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai-t^eu!"
Y^a-s^u th`in h^a-l`oi, ham k`i-t^eu ko-l`oi, mun-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu cho m'a-ke?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, khi`u ng`i p^un ng`ai-t^eu muk-ch^u khon-tet-t'o!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu l`in-m'en k`i-t^eu, mi^a k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u; k`i-t^eu ngi`am-s`u" khon-tet-t'o, chhiu th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u.
K`i-t^eu h`ang voi to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, to Pak-fap-kh`i, chhai K'am-l'am-s^an, Y^a-s^u ham li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang si^en h`ang,

f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi th`eu-chhi`en ke chh^un-ch^ong. Ng`i-t^eu ngi`am-s`u" voi khon-t'o yit-chak l`i-`e l^au yit-chak se l`i-`e th`o khiung-ha; chi^ong k`i-t^eu ki'e-kh^oi, khi^en-l`oi p^un ng`ai.
Na-he y^u-ng`in tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong m'a-ke, chhiu l^au k`i k'ong: 'Ch'u oi yung k`i-t^eu'; ke-ng`in ngi`am-s`u" voi ch'un ng`i-t^eu khi^en-l`oi."
Li'a-khien su" he oi s+u"t-hien si^en-t^i s'o k'ong ke:
Hi l^au Siak-^on-s`ang ke ch'u"-'ng k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke ki^un-v`ong l`oi l'e! K`i chhin khi^am-p^i kh`i-t'en l`i-`e l`oi, kh`i-t'en yit-thi`au se l`i-`e."
Li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu cheu Y^a-s^u ke fa hi cho.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong l`i-`e l^au se l`i-`e khi^en-l`oi, chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke s^am tap chhai k`i-t^eu ke poi-n`ong-t'ang, Y^a-s^u chhiu kh`i s^ong-hi.
Yit thai-khi`un ng`in chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke s^am ph^u chhai lu-song, ya y^u-t^eu ng`in ch'am-h^a su-k^i, n^a-l`oi ph^u chhai lu-song.

Th`eu-chhi`en h`ang l^au heu-poi th`en ke ng`in-khi`un thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan k^ui-p^un Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un! Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke! H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan k^ui-p^un Chu"-k^o ke Song-ti!"
Y^a-s^u ng+ip Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s`u", chhi`on s`ang chhiu chh`ai h'i-l`oi. Y^u ng`in mun-k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in?"
Chung-ng`in en-k'ong: "K`i he K^a-li-li-s'en N^a-sat-l+et ke si^en-t^i Y^a-s^u."
Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi su"n-thien, chi^ong s'o-y^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u cho s^en-l^i ke ng`in kiuk chhut-hi. K`i s'ung-vang von-chhi`en ke ng`in ke chok-`e l^au mai ngi+et-kap-`e ke ng`in ke ten-'e,
tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Su"n-k^in ki-chai Song-ti ke fa k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke su"n-thien oi cho kh`i-t'o ke thien', ng`i-t^eu sa chi^ong k`i pien-cho chh+et-teu!"
Y^u m^o-muk-ke l^au p`ai-kiok-ke l`oi su"n-thien-t'u chh`im Y^a-s^u; k`i chhiu y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.

Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" khon-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, yu th^ang-t'o se-ng`in-`e chhai su"n-thien-t'u h^em-k'ong: "H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan k^ui-p^un Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un!" chhiu chhin khi'en.

K`i-t^eu mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu h^em m'a-ke m`o?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai t^ong-y`en y^u th^ang-t'o. Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Ng`i s'u" se-ng`in-`e l^au ^o-nga-'e fat-chhut m^i-meu ke siung-chan' li'a-ki fa, k'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko he-m`o?"
K`i chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, chhut-s`ang hi Pak-thai-n`i, chhai ke-vi ko-ya.
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, chhai ch'on-s`ang ke lu-song, Y^a-s^u t'u-k^i.

K`i khon-t'o lu-s`un y^u yit-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su, chhiu h`ang-chhi`en hi, ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o m'a-ke, ch'u"-y^u y+ap-'e. K`i chhiu tui ke-th`eu su-'e k'ong: "Ng`i y'un-y'en `m-voi chai kiet k'o-ch'u" l'e!" Ke-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su ngi`am-s`u" chhiu ch^au-thet.
H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai. K`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "Li'a-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su ngi'ong-p^an voi ngi`am-s`u" ch^au-thet ^a?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu na-he y^u sin-s^im, m`o ng`i-f`u, ng`ai tui li'a-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su s'o cho ke, ng`i-t^eu ya cho-tet-t'o. `M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he tui li'a-chho s^an k'ong: 'S'ai-kh^oi, l+ok h'oi-t'u hi!' ya yit-thin voi s+u"t-hien.
Ch'u"-oi y^u sin-s^im, ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o s'o khi`u ke yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu voi tet-t'o."

Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi su"n-thien, t^ong kau-su" ng`in ke s`u", chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au m`in-ki^en ke ch'ong-l'o l`oi-kien k`i, mun-k'ong: "Ng`i kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"? M'a-ng`in p^un ng`i li'a khi`en-piang n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai si^en mun ng`i-t^eu yit-ki fa, na-he ng`i-t^eu f`i-tap ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su".

Yok-hon h`ang s'e-l^i ke khi`en-piang he tui nai-vi l`oi ke? He tui Song-ti ya-he tui ng`in l`oi ke?" K`i-t^eu chhiu p'i-chh'u" ch^en-lun, k'ong: "Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui Song-ti l`oi ke', k`i voi k'ong: ''An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke `m sin Yok-hon n`e?'
Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui ng`in l`oi ke', ki^ang-pha chung-ng`in voi tui-fu ng`ai-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung si^ong-sin Yok-hon he si^en-t^i."
Tui 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu en Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m t^i." Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai ya `m l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in."
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke yi-kien ngi'ong-p^an? M^eu-ng`in y^u li'ong-ke lai-'e. K`i tui thai ke lai-'e k'ong: 'Lai-'e ^a, ng`i k^im-p^u-ngit hi ph`u-th`o-y`en cho-se.'
K`i en-k'ong: 'Ng`ai `m hi.' Ch'ung-he heu-l`oi k`i k'oi-pien ch'u-yi, chhiu hi.
Ke ^a-p^a ya tui thi-ngi-ke lai-'e k'ong khiung-yong ke fa. Thi-ngi-ke lai-'e en-k'ong: 'H'o, ^a-p^a, ng`ai hi.' Ch'ung-he k`i m`o hi.

Li'a li'ong-ke lai-'e to-t'ai nai-ke ch^un-h`ang ^a-p^a ke yi-su" n`e?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He thai ke lai-'e." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, soi-kun l^au k^i-'ng voi p'i ng`i-t^eu si^en cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in.

Y^in-vi S^u"-s'e Yok-hon l`oi, k`i ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong h`ang ke chu"n-lu, ng`i-t^eu `m si^ong-sin k`i; ch'ung-he soi-kun l^au k^i-'ng f'an-ch'on sin k`i. Ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o heu, h`an-he m`o k'oi-pien s^im-yi, h`an-he `m si^ong-sin k`i."

Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chai th^ang nang-ngoi yit-ke p'i-yi! Y^u yit-ke y`en-ch'u, kh^oi yit-te ph`u-th`o-y`en, ch^u-v`i yung l`i-p^a v`i-t'en, yu chhai y`en-ch^ung yet yit-chak cha-chi'u-chh`u", h'i yit-chho s'u-mong-th`oi, y`en-heu chi^ong ph`u-th`o-y`en ch^u p^un thien-n`ung, chhu"-k^a chhut-ngoi hi l^i-h`ang.
S^u k'o-ch'u" ke s`u"-chiet voi to l'e, k`i phai ph+uk-ng`in hi tui ke-t^eu thien-n`ung s^u k`i yin-tet ke k'o-ch'u".
Ke-t^eu thien-n`ung khi'u-t'en k`i ke-t^eu ph+uk-ng`in, t'a-s^ong yit-ke, chh`u"-s'i yit-ke, yu yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep nang-ngoi yit-ke.
Y`en-ch'u yu phai kh`i-th^a ke ph+uk-ng`in hi, ng`in-su p'i si^en-chhi`en kha-t^o; ke-t^eu thien-n`ung cheu-yong tui-fu k`i-t^eu.
Chui-heu, y`en-ch'u phai chhu"-k^a ke lai-'e hi. K`i s^im-k^on si'ong: 'Chui-s'eu, k`i-t^eu me voi ch^un-chhung ng`ai ke lai-'e.'
Ch'ung-he ke-t^eu thien-n`ung khon-t'o ki^a lai-'e ke s`u", p'i-chh'u" k'ong: 'Li'a ng`in he y`en-ch'u ke ki-s`u"n-ng`in; l`oi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu chh`u"-s'i k`i, l`oi chiam k`i ke s'an-ngi+ap!'
K`i-t^eu chhiu khi'u-t'en k`i, chi^ong k`i s'ung-chhut y`en-ngoi, chh`u"-s'i k`i.
"'An-ngi`ong, ph`u-th`o-y`en ke ch'u-ng`in l`oi ke s`u", k`i voi ngi'ong-p^an tui-fu ke-t^eu thien-n`ung n`e?"
K`i-t^eu en Y^a-s^u k'ong: "K`i yit-thin voi chhut-s'u m+et-thet ke-t^eu f'ai-ng`in, chi^ong ph`u-th`o-y`en nang-ngoi ch^u p^un ke-t^eu cheu-s`u" k^au k'o-ch'u" ke thien-n`ung."

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Su"n-k^in ke fa ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko he-m`o? N`ai-s'ui s^u"-fu s'o fit-thet ke li'a-te s+ak-th`eu, y'i-k^in s`ang-cho thi-k^i ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke. Li'a he Ch'u ke chok-v`i, he ngi'ong-p^an kh`i-meu ke su" ^a!"
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Song-ti oi chi^ong K`i ke koet tui ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en chhi'ong-ch'eu, su p^un ke-t^eu voi kiet k'o-ch'u" ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.
M'a-ng`in tiet chhai li'a s+ak-th`eu-t'ang, k`i chhiu voi f'un-s^u"n sui-kut; li'a s+ak-th`eu tiet-l+ok m'a-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, ya voi chi^ong k`i chak-to mi`en-mi`en."
Ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-t^eu p'i-yi, t^i k`i he ch'u" k`i-t^eu k'ong ke,
chhiu si'ong-oi chok k`i. Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ki^ang chung-ng`in, y^in-vi chung-ng`in khon Y^a-s^u he si^en-t^i.
Y^a-s^u yu yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i yit-ke koet-v`ong vi chhu"-k^a ke lai-'e ch'un-phi f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it.
K`i phai ph+uk-ng`in hi chh^ui k`i s'o chhi'ang ke ng`in-hak l`oi chh^am-k^a y`en-s+it, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu `m-h'en l`oi.

K`i nang-ngoi yu phai yit-t^eu ph+uk-ng`in hi, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu l^au ng`in-hak k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke chok-s+it y'i-k^in p`ai-h'o l'e, ngi`u-k'u l^au ph`i ke th`eu-s^ang ya chh`u"-h'o, yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu ch'un-phi h'o-se l'e, chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu l`oi chh^am-k^a f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it.'
Ch'ung-he, ke-t^eu su y^eu-chhi'ang ke ng`in-hak h`an-he `m-tap k`i, tak-s`a m`o-h`an chhu"-k^a ke su"-chh`in: Yit-ke hi thi`en-hong, yit-ke hi cho s^en-l^i,
kh`i-th^a ke chhiu chok ke-t^eu ph+uk-ng`in, v'u-y+uk k`i-t^eu, chi^ong k`i-t^eu t'a-s'i.
Koet-v`ong f^i-s`ong fat-khi'en, chhiu phai p^in hi chh`u-m+et ke-t^eu hi^ung-s'u, piong-f'o s^eu k`i-t^eu ke s`ang-su".
Y`en-heu, k`i tui ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: 'F^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it y'i-k^in p`ai-h'o, ch'ung-he si^en-chhi`en s'o chhi'ang ke ng`in m`o ch^u"-kiet l'e.
Li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu hi thai-ki^e, chi^ong s'o t`u-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu chhi'ang-l`oi chh^am-k^a f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it.'
S'o-y^i ph+uk-ng`in chhiu hi ki^e-lu, chi^ong s'o khon-t'o ke ng`in, m`o-lun h'o-f'ai l^ung-ch'ung chhi'ang-l`oi, s'u" f^un-y^in ke chok-s+it chh^o-to m^an-m^an.
"Koet-v`ong chhut-l`oi khon ng`in-hak ke s`u", khon-t'o yit-ke m`o chok l^i-f+uk ke ng`in,
chhiu tui k`i k'ong: 'Ph`en-y^u, ng`i l`oi li'a-vi, ngi'ong-p^an m`o chok l^i-f+uk ^a?' Ke ng`in ti^am-ti^am m`o chhut-s^ang.
Koet-v`ong chhiu f^un-fu ph+uk-ng`in: 'Chi^ong k`i ke s'u-kiok thak-h'i-l`oi, fit-to ngoi-poi ke v^u-am-ch^ung. Chhai ke-vi, k`i voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u".' "
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Su y^eu-chhi'ang ke ng`in t^o, ch'ung-he tet-t'o ki'en-si'en ke ng`in s'eu!"
Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhut-hi, p'i-chh'u" chh^am-si`ong oi ngi'ong-p^an tui Y^a-s^u ke fa chh`im p'a-piang l`oi hoi k`i.

K`i-t^eu phai chhu"-k^a ke h+ok-s^ang, th`ung H^i-l+it-t'ong ke ng`in khiung-ha hi kien Y^a-s^u, mun-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu t^i ng`i he s`u"n-s+u"t ke ng`in; ng`i ch^ung-s+u"t chi^ong Song-ti ke tho-l^i kau-su" ng`in, `m-k'on ng`in ngi'ong-p^an si'ong, y^in-vi ng`i `m-voi khon ng`in ke chh`in-mien.
Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong ng`i ke yi-kien: N+ap-soi p^un L`o-m^a F`ong-ti he v`i-poi ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it m`o?"
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu ke f'ai s^im-s+ut, chhiu k'ong: "K'a-h'o ke ng`in ^a, ngi'ong-p^an si'ong-oi hoi ng`ai?
N^a yit-chak n+ap-soi ke ngi`un-pi p^un ng`ai khon!" K`i-t^eu chhiu n^a yit-chak ngi`un-pi p^un k`i.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-ke siong l^au mi`ang-ho he m'a-ng`in ke?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He F`ong-ti ke." Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, chi^ong F`ong-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un F`ong-ti, chi^ong Song-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un Song-ti."
K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i, chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i.
Chhai ke-ngit, y^u-t^eu `m si^ong-sin f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su" ke Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, mun k`i k'ong:
"S^in-s^ang, M^o-s^i k'ong: 'Na-he y^u yit-ke ng`in ko-s^u"n, ch'ung-he m`o ch'u"-'ng, ki^a l'o-th^ai yit-thin oi th'o s'u-ko'a ke ^a-s'o cho p^u-ngi`ong, thoi ^a-k^o chh`on-ch^ung chiap-thoi.'
Th`eu-p'ai, chhai ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi su"t y^u chhit-ke hi^ung-thi: Thai-k^o kiet-f^un heu, m`ang y^u ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n, li`u-h^a p^u-ngi`ong p^un ki^a l'o-th^ai;
thi-ngi-ke l^au thi-s^am-ke ya he 'an-ngi`ong, yit-chh+u"t to thi-chhit-ke, chh`in-h`in chhi`on-phu khiung-yong.
Chui-m^i, ke fu-ng`in-k^a ya ko-s^u"n.
Chhi'ang-mun, chhai f+uk-f+at ke s`u"-chiet, chhit-ke ng`in ch^ung k`i oi son he nai yit-s`a ke p^u-ngi`ong n`e? Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu su"t l^au k`i kiet-f^un."
Y^a-s^u en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-chh+ok l'e! Ng`i-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak Su"n-k^in, ya m`o chh^in-chh'u Song-ti ke khi`en-n`en.
K`i-t^eu tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke s`u", he l^au thi^en-t'ang ke thi^en-s'u" khiung-yong, m`o th'o ya m`o ka.
Ko^an-he s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke su", ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko Song-ti l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa he-m`o?
Song-ti k'ong: 'Ng`ai he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke Song-ti, Y^i-sat ke Song-ti, Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti.' Li'a yi-su" he k'ong, Song-ti `m-he s'i-ng`in ke Song-ti, he s^ang-ng`in ke Song-ti."
Chung-ng`in th^ang-t'o 'an-ngi`ong ke kau-hiun, k'am-kok chhin h^i-kh`i.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u chi^ong Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in t`u-to ti^am-ti^am, chhiu chhi-s+ip khiung-ha.
Kh`i-ch^ung y^u yit-ke Fap-l+it kau-s^u" si'ong-oi yung yit-ke mun-th`i l`oi-hoi Y^a-s^u, chhiu mun k`i k'ong:
"S^in-s^ang, M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it t^ong-ch^ung, nai-thi`au kie-min he chui chhung-yeu ke?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: " 'Ng`i oi yung chhi`on-phu ke s^im-chu", chh`in-k'am l^au l^i-chu" kin-oi Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti.'
Li'a he kie-min ch^ung chui-thai l^au thi-yit chhung-yeu ke.
Thi-ngi-thi`au ya he khiung-yong chhung-yeu: 'Ng`i oi siak l`in-sa, chhiu-chhiong siak chhu"-k^a yit-yong.'
Chhi`on-phu M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i ke kau-hiun, chhiu-he yung li'a li'ong-thi`au kie-min cho k^in-k'i."
Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhi-s+ip khiung-ha ke s`u", Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu:
"Ng`i-t^eu tui K^i-tuk ke khon-fap he ngi'ong-p^an? K`i he m'a-ng`in ke ch'u"-s^un?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "K`i he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, Thai-v'i su Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung, ngi'ong-p^an h`an chh^u"n k`i cho 'Ch'u' n`e? Thai-v'i k'ong:
Ch'u tui ng`ai ke Ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`i chh^o chhai Ng`ai ke yu-phi'en, t'en Ng`ai s'u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it ph+uk chhai ng`i ke kiok-h^a.'
Ki-y`en Thai-v'i chh^u"n k`i cho 'Ch'u', K^i-tuk ngi'ong-voi yu he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un n`e?"
M`o ng`in n`en k'ong pan-ki fa l`oi en Y^a-s^u. Tui ke-ngit y^i-heu, ya m`o ng`in k'am chai mun k`i m'a-ke n`an-th`i.
Y^a-s^u tui chung-ng`in l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong:
"K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh^o chhai ki'e-su"t M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke vi-'e t'ang-k^o,
s'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-chhi`ung pin ch^un-h`ang k`i-t^eu ke kau-hiun; ch'ung-he `m-h'o h+ok k`i-t^eu ke s'o-cho, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu voi k'ong, `m-voi h`ang.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong n`an kh^ai ke chh^ung-t^am kh'un h'i-l`oi, piong chhai ph+et-ng`in ke ki^en-th`eu-t'ang, ch'ung-he chhu"-k^a li`en chh^un yit-k^i s'u-ch'u" then-s'u ya `m-h'en.

K`i-t^eu s'o-cho yit-chhiet ke su"-chh`in, l^ung-ch'ung he cho p^un ph+et-ng`in khon ke. K`i-t^eu chi^ong tai chhai ngiak-th`eu l^au s'u-hong ke k^in-v`un-thoi cho kha-thai t^eu, ya chi^ong s^am-chhui-'e cho kha-chh`ong t^eu;
k`i-t^eu chhin oi chh^o y`en-s+it ch^ung ke thai-vi l^au fi-th`ong-t'u ke th+it-ph+et chho-vi;
k`i-t^eu chhin oi ph+et-ng`in chhai k^ung-khiung chh`ong-s'o tui k`i-t^eu chu"-kin chhi'ang-^on, ham k`i-t^eu 'S^in-s^ang'.
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`i-t^eu m`o yin-k^oi p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-cho 'S^in-s^ang', y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u yit-vi S^in-s^ang; ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu he hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chh^u"n su"-ki^en ke ng`in cho '^A-p^a', y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u yit-vi ^A-p^a, chhiu-he chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a.
"Ng`i-t^eu ya m`o yin-k^oi p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-cho 'S^u"-fu', y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u yit-vi S^u"-fu, chhiu-he K^i-tuk.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en m'a-ng`in he chui v'i-thai ke, chhiu oi cho ng`i-t^eu ke ph+uk-ng`in.
Song-ti oi chi^ong chhu"-k^o ke ng`in kong-cho p^i-m`i, ya oi k^o-s^u"n k^am-s^im khi^am-p^i ke ng`in.

"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu t^ong ng`in ke mien chi^ong thi^en-koet ke m`un ko^an h'i-l`oi, chhu"-k^a `m ng+ip-hi, ya `m p^un si'ong-oi ng+ip ke ng`in ng+ip-hi!

"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu h`ang-phien thi^en-ng`ai h'oi-kok, khien yit-ke ng`in ng+ip-kau, t'en-to k`i ng+ip-kau y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu sa s'u" k`i pien-cho p'i ng`i-t^eu k^a-phi f'ai, p'i ng`i-t^eu kien-k^a t^ong su thi-ngi+uk ke h`in-f+at.

"Ng`i li'a-t^eu chhi^ang-mi^ang ke tai-lu-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`in na-he ch'u"-t'en su"n-thien fat-su", li'a m`o m'a-ke yeu-k'in; ch'ung-he ch'u"-t'en su"n-thien-t'u ke k^im-'e fat-su" ke, k`i chhiu oi ch^un-s'u.'
Ng`i li'a-t^eu chhi^ang-mi^ang ke ngong-'e ^a! Chia-mun, k^im-'e kha chhung-yeu? Ya-he s'u" k^im-'e s`ang-cho su"n-v+ut ke su"n-thien kha chhung-yeu ^a?
Ng`i-t^eu yu k'ong: 'Ng`in na-he ch'u"-t'en chi-th`an fat-su", li'a m`o m'a-ke yeu-k'in; ch'ung-he ch'u"-t'en chi-th`an-t'ang ke chi-v+ut fat-su" ke, k`i chhiu oi ch^un-s'u.'
Ng`i li'a-t^eu chhi^ang-mi^ang-'e ^a! To-t'ai he chi-v+ut kha chhung-yeu? Ya-he s'u" chi-v+ut s`ang-cho su"n ke chi-th`an kha chhung-yeu ^a?
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`in ch'u"-t'en chi-th`an fat-su", chhiu-he ch'u"-t'en chi-th`an l^au chi-th`an-t'ang s'o-y^u ke chi-v+ut fat-su";
ch'u"-t'en su"n-thien fat-su", chhiu-he ch'u"-t'en su"n-thien l^au h+et chhai t^i-poi ke Song-ti fat-su";
ch'u"-t'en thi^en fat-su", chhiu-he ch'u"-t'en Song-ti ke p'o-chho l^au chh^o chhai t'ang-k^o ke Song-ti fat-su".

"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu li`en ph+ok-h`o, pat-kok, f`i-hi^ong li'a-t^eu hi^ong-liau ya hien s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit p^un Song-ti; ch'ung-he fap-l+it-ch^ung kha chhung-yeu ke, chhiong k^ung-ngi, chh`u"-p^i, sin-s+u"t, ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on fut-li+ok. Kh`i-s+u"t, li'a-t^eu chang he ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong chhin-l+it hi-h`ang ke; kh`i-th^a ke, ya cho-`m-tet fut-li+ok.
Ng`i li'a-t^eu chhi^ang-mi^ang ke tai-lu-ng`in ^a! Ng`i-t^eu tui y'im-liau-ch^ung chi^ong m^un-sut-'e li-chhut-l`oi, ch'ung-he l+ok-th`o ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on th^un-l+ok-hi!

"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong p^i-'e l^au ph`an-`e ke ngoi-poi s'e-to chhiang-chhiang, t^i-poi f'an-ch'on ch^ong-m^an th^am-s^im l^au fong-thong.
Chhi^ang-mi^ang ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in ^a! P^i-'e ke t^i-poi si^en s'e p^un k`i chhiang, 'an-ngi`ong, ngoi-poi chhiu voi chhiang-li.

"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu chhiong f'un-ph+ak ke f`un-mu, ngoi-poi chhin chi^ang, ch'ung-he t^i-poi he s'i-ng`in kut-th`eu l^au kok-ch'ung ^o-ch^o t^ung-s^i.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu p'eu-mien khon h'i-l`oi s+u"p-f^un k^ung-chu"n, ch'ung-he nui-s^im ch^ong-m^an h^i-k'a l^au si`a-ok.
"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an k'a-h'o ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu chh`ung-kien si^en-t^i ke f`un-mu, ch'u"n-l^i ngi-ng`in ke p^i-s+ak,
yu k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu na-he s^ang chhai ch'u-si^en ke s`u"-thoi, chhi+et-tui `m-voi chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong sat-hoi si^en-t^i!'
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in s`u"n-ngin chhu"-k^a chhiu-he ke-t^eu sat-hoi si^en-t^i ke ng`in ke ch'u"-s^un!
Y`u-chhai ng`i-t^eu ki-si+uk hi cho, hi p'u-m^an ng`i-t^eu ch'u-si^en chit-ok ke fun-ngiak!
Ng`i li'a-t^eu th+uk-s`a, th+uk-s`a ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an s'am-kh^oi thi-ngi+uk ke h`in-f+at ^a?

Khon ^a! Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai voi phai si^en-t^i, chu"-fi-ng`in l^au kau-s^u" l`oi ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi; t^ong-ch^ung, y^u-t^eu voi p^un ng`i-t^eu chh`u"-s'i ya-he t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka, y^u-t^eu voi chhai ng`i-t^eu ke fi-th`ong p^un ng`i-t^eu pi^en-t'a, tui li'a-s`ang pet-to ph+et s`ang hi.

'An-ngi`ong, su"-ki^en s'o-y^u sat-hoi v`u-k^u ke hiet-chai, chhiu-he tui sat-hoi v`u-k^u ke ^A-pak to Sat-k^a-li-^a v`i-ch'u" yit-chhiet ke hiet-chai, l^ung-ch'ung voi l`im chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-song. Sat-k^a-li-^a chhiu-he P^a-l^a-k^a ke lai-'e, p^un ng`i-t^eu chh`u"-s'i chhai su"n-thien l^au chi-th`an ch^ung-ki^en ke.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in l^ung-ch'ung voi l`im chhai li'a-thoi ng`in ke s^u"n-song.

" Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ^a! Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ^a! Ng`i sat-hoi si^en-t^i, yu yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i Song-ti s'o chh^ai-phai l`oi ng`i li'a-vi ke s'u"-ch'a! Ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an t^o-p'ai oi p'o-fu ng`i ke ch'u"-'ng, chhiong ki^e-m`a chhi-s+ip ki^e-ch'u" chhai y+it-kap h^a yit-yong; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu m`o-oi!
Khon ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke k^a-y`en voi pien-cho f^ong-li`ong ke s'o-chhai.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu voi khon ng`ai `m-t'o, chh+u"t-to ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke!' "
Y^a-s^u tui su"n-thien chhut-l`oi, h`ang-t'en l`i-kh^oi ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang l`oi-to k`i ke mien-chhi`en, ch'u"-t'en su"n-thien ke kien-chuk ham k`i khon.

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-he khon-t'o li'a-t^eu kien-chuk m^a? Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a s'o-chhai ke m^i yit-te s+ak-th`eu chhi`on-phu voi p^un-ng`in chhak-h^a-l`oi, m`o yit-te s+ak-th`eu voi thi+ap chhai nang-ngoi yit-te ke t'ang-k^o."

Y^a-s^u chh^o chhai K'am-l'am-s^an t'ang, h+ok-s^ang am-ch^ung l`oi mun k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, li'a-ke su" k'i-s`u" voi fat-s^en n`e? Ng`i ke chai-l`im l^au su"-kie ke kiet-m^i voi y^u m'a-ke seu-th`eu?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o p^un-ng`in m`i-f+et.
Y^in-vi y^u chhin-t^o ng`in voi k'a-mo ng`ai ke mi`ang l`oi, k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhiu-he K^i-tuk!' tui 'an-ngi`ong m`i-f+et chhin-t^o ng`in.

Ng`i-t^eu voi th^ang-t'o fu-khiun si^ong-chh`u" ke f^ung-s^ang l^au y'en-f^ong chan-ch^en ke s^eu-sit. Ng`i-t^eu `m-s'u" ki^ang, li'a-t^eu su" thin-chh+ok voi fat-s^en; ch'ung-he li'a `m-he k'ong m+at-ngit y'i-k^in to l'e.
M`in-chh+uk voi l^au m`in-chh+uk si^ong-chh`u"; koet-k^a voi l^au koet-k^a chan-ch^en; tak s'o-chhai voi y^u k^i-f^ong l^au thi-th^ung.
Li'a yit-chhiet su"-chh`in ke fat-s^en chhiu-chhiong s'an-fu s^en-s'an-chhi`en ke chhu"n-thung yit-yong.
"Ke-s`u", ng`i-t^eu voi p^un-ng`in chok-hi, su kh'u-h`in, p^un-ng`in sat-hoi. Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang, thi^en-ha van-m`in l^ung-ch'ung voi yen-hen ng`i-t^eu.
Ke-s`u", chhin-t^o ng`in voi piong-thet k`i-t^eu ke sin-ngi'ong, p'i-chh'u" chhut-mai, fu-si^ong yen-hen.
Chhin-t^o k'a si^en-t^i voi chhut-hien, l`oi m`i-f+et chhin-t^o ng`in.
Y^in-vi si`a-ok fam-lam, chhin-t^o ng`in ke oi-s^im voi chhiam-chhiam l^ang-thet-hi.
Ch'ung-he, ngi^un-nai to-t'ai ke ng`in thin-chh+ok voi tet-kiu.
Thi^en-koet ke fuk-y^im oi si^en chh`on-phien thi^en-ha, tui chhi`on ng`in-lui cho kien-chu"n, y`en-heu m+at-ngit chang voi to.
"Ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o si^en-t^i Tan-y^i-l^i s'o k'ong ke ke 'F'i-m+et-sin, si`a-ok ke t^ung-s^i' kh^i chhai s`u"n-su"n ke s'o-chhai ke s`u" (th+uk ke ng`in oi li'au-ki'e li'a-ki fa ke yi-su"),
h+et chhai Y`u-thai thi-kh^i ke, oi ch'eu-hi s^an-t'ang phit-nan;
chhai vuk-t'ang ke, `m-h'o h^a-l`oi ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u n^a t^ung-s^i;
chhai thi`en-hong ke, `m-h'o ch'on-hi n^a ngoi-s^am.
Chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e, f`ai-th^oi ke fu-ng`in-k^a l^au p^un ^o-nga-'e s+u"t-nen ke ^a-m^e chhiu chh'am l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu oi kh`i-khi`u Song-ti, `m-h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai h`on-thi^en ya-he ^On-sit-ngit phit-nan.
Y^in-vi ke-t^eu ngit-`e ke thai ch^ai-nan he chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi `m-su"t y^u ke, chi^ong-l`oi ya `m-voi chai y^u.
Na-he Song-ti m`o k'am-s'eu ke-t^eu ch^ai-nan ke ngit-`e, m`o ng`in n`en s^en-chh`un h^a-hi. Ch'ung-he, vi-t'o K`i s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in, Song-ti voi k'am-s'eu ke-t^eu ngit-`e.
"Na-he y^u-ng`in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`i khon, K^i-tuk chhai li'a-vi!' ya-he 'K^i-tuk chhai ke-vi!' `m-h'o si^ong-sin.
Y^in-vi k'a K^i-tuk l^au k'a si^en-t^i voi chhut-hien, k`i-t^eu voi h`ang thai s`u"n-chiak l^au thai kh`i-su", chhin k`i s'o-n`en l`oi m`i-f+et Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in.
Khon ^a, ng`ai y'i-k^in si^en l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko l'e.
"Na-he y^u-ng`in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Khon ^a, K^i-tuk chhai kh'ong-y^a!' ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chhut-hi; ya-he k'ong: 'Khon ^a, k`i chhai vuk-t'u!' ng`i-t^eu ya `m-h'o si^ong-sin.
Y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" ke chai-l`im voi chhiong ngiap-lang yit-yong, yit-ha-'e chhiu tui thi^en ke t^ung-phi'en cheu-to s^i-phi'en hi.
"S^u"n-s^u" chhai nai-vi, y^in-ti^au ya voi chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi.
"Ke-t^eu ch^ai-nan ke ngit-`e yit ko-hi, ngit-th`eu voi pien v^u, ngi+et-k^ong `m-voi chai k^ong, s^en-'e voi tui thi^en-t'ang tiet-h^a-l`oi, thai-kh^ung ke ne-th'ung ya voi y`eu-thung.

Ke-s`u", Ng`in-ch'u" chai-l`im ke seu-th`eu voi chhai thi^en-pi^en chhut-hien. Thi-song ke van-chh+uk van-m`in l^ung-ch'ung voi thai-kieu; k`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" thai-y^u n`en-l+it l^au y`ung-yeu chh^o-t'en thi^en-t'ang ke y`un kong-l`im.
Ho-th`ung ke s^ang voi thai-hi'ong, k`i oi chh^ai thi^en-s'u" to thi^en-ng`ai h'oi-kok hi, tui su"-kie li'a-phi'en to su"-kie ke-phi'en, seu-s+ip k`i s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in.
"Ng`i-t^eu oi tui v`u-f^a-k'o-su h+ok kau-hiun. T^ong su-k^i ch'on-chhi^ang, s^ang-chhut s^in y+ap ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu t^i ngi+et-thi^en voi to l'e.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o li'a yit-chhiet ke hien-siong, chhiu oi t^i s`u"-ki^en voi to, y'i-k^in chhai m`un-h'eu l'e.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a-thoi ng`in h`an-m`ang l^ung-ch'ung ko-s^u"n y^i-chhi`en, li'a yit-chhiet ke su" chhiu voi fat-s^en.
Thi^en l^au thi voi m`o-thet, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke fa y'un-y'en `m-voi m`o-thet.
"Ch'ung-he ke oi l`oi ke ngit-`e l^au s`u"-ki^en, m`o ng`in t^i; thi^en-t'ang ke thi^en-s'u" ya `m-t^i, Lai-'e ya `m-t^i, ch'u"-y^u ^A-p^a t^i.
Ng`in-ch'u" ke chai-l`im voi chhiong N`o-^a s`u"-thoi s'o fat-s^en ke su" yit-yong.
Thai-s'ui m`ang l`oi y^i-chhi`en, ng`in-ng`in cheu-s`ong s+u"t-l^im ka-chh'i, chh+u"t-to N`o-^a ng+ip thai-s`on ke-ngit;
k`i-t^eu m'a-ke t^u `m-t^i, chh+u"t-to thai-s'ui l`oi-to, chi^ong k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu t'a-ch'eu. Ng`in-ch'u" ke chai-l`im ya voi 'an-ngi`ong.
Ke-s`u", li'ong-ke ng`in chhai thi`en-hong cho-se, yit-ke voi su chiap-ch'eu, yit-ke voi li`u-h^a-l`oi;
li'ong-ke fu-ng`in-k^a ^ai mo-s+ak, yit-ke voi su chiap-ch'eu, yit-ke voi li`u-h^a-l`oi.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang, y^in-vi `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu ke Ch'u oi chhai nai-ngit chai-l`im.
Ng`i-t^eu oi t^i: Yit-k^a ke ch'u-ng`in na-he t^i chh+et-'e am-p^u-th`eu k'i-s`u" voi l`oi, k`i yit-thin voi k'in-si'ang, `m p^un chh+et-'e yet kh^ung-'e ng+ip-l`oi.
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ya yin-t^ong s`ui-s`u" ch'un-phi h'o-se, y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" voi chhai ng`i-t^eu m`o si'ong-t'o ke s`u" fut-y`en kong-l`im.
"'An-ngi`ong, m'a-ng`in he ch^ung-s^im yu ch^in-m`in ke ph+uk-ng`in ^a? Chhiu-he ch'u-ng`in ch'u"-phai k`i k'on-l^i kh`i-th^a ph+uk-ng`in ke s`u", k`i chhiu cheu-s`u" f^un-phi li`ong-s+u"t ke ng`in.
Ch'u-ng`in ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", khon-t'o k`i 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, li'a ph+uk-ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an y^u fuk-hi ^a!
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch'u-ng`in voi phai k`i k'on-l^i s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap.
Ch'ung-he, k`i na-he f'ai ph+uk-ng`in, s^im-ch^ung si'ong: 'Ng`ai ke ch'u-ng`in voi kha-man chang ch'on-l`oi',
chhiu chhut-s'u t'a k`i ke th`ung-ph^an, yu hi th`ung chi'u-chui ke ng`in khiung-ha s+u"t-l^im,
chhai k`i m`o si'ong-t'o ke ngit-`e, chhai k`i `m-t^i ke s`u"-ki^en, ke ph+uk-ng`in ke ch'u-ng`in voi ch'on-l`oi,
chi^ong k`i t'a-to pan-s^ang-s'i, s'u" k`i l^au k'a-h'o ke ng`in khiung-ha su h`in-f+at; chhai ke-vi k`i voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u"."
"Chhai ke-ngit, thi^en-koet kh'o-p'i li'a-ke ku-su": Y^u s+u"p-ke se-^a-moi-'e khoan-t'en y`u-t^en, chhut-hi ngi`ang-chiap s^in-l`ong.
Kh`i-ch^ung 'ng-ke he ngong-ke, 'ng-ke he chh^ung-m`in-ke.
Ngong-ke khoan-t'en t^en, ch'ung-he m`o nang-ngoi tai y`u;
chh^ung-m`in-ke khoan-t'en t^en, nang-ngoi yu tai k'i-kon y`u.
S^in-l`ong th`in-th`o ke s`u", se-^a-moi-'e chhi`on-phu tuk-muk-soi to soi-thet-hi.
"To pan-ya, y^u-ng`in h^em-k'ong: 'S^in-l`ong l`oi l^o, ng`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi ngi`ang-chiap k`i!'
S+u"p-ke se-^a-moi-'e l^ung-ch'ung hong-h'i-l`oi, chi^ong y`u-t^en thi^au kha k^ong t^eu.
Ke-s`u", ngong-ke tui chh^ung-m`in-ke k'ong: 'Pai-thok, p^un yit-s+it y`u p^un ng`ai-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ke y`u-t^en voi v^u-thet l'e!'
Ke-t^eu chh^ung-m`in-ke en-k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet ^o, ng`ai-t^eu ke y`u p^un-p^un ng`i-t^eu, ki^ang-pha thai-k^a voi `m-la yung; ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a hi tiam-hong m^ai.'

Ngong-ke se-^a-moi-'e hi m^ai y`u ke s`u"-chiet, s^in-l`ong chhiu to l'e. Ke 'ng-ke y^u ch'un-phi ke se-^a-moi-'e chhiu th`en-t'en s^in-l`ong ng+ip-hi, khiung-ha chh^am-k^a y`en-s+it; m`un chhiu ko^an h'i-l`oi.
"Kh`i-th^a ke se-^a-moi-'e m`o k'i-ki'u ya to; k`i-t^eu h^em-k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, Ch'u ^a! Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu kh^oi-m`un!'
S^in-l`ong en-k'ong: 'Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai k^in-p'un `m su"t ng`i-t^eu.' "
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ke ngit-`e, ke s`u"-ki^en k'i-s`u" voi to.
"Thi^en-koet yu kh'o-p'i li'a-ke ku-su": Y^u yit-ke ng`in oi chhut-hi l^i-h`ang, k`i ham ph+uk-ng`in l`oi, chi^ong s'an-ngi+ap k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
K`i cheu k`i-t^eu tak-s`a ke chh`oi-thiau, yit-ke p^un 'ng-chhi^en chak ngi`un-pi, yit-ke p^un li'ong-chhi^en, yit-ke p^un yit-chhi^en, y`en-heu chhiu chhut-fat.
Ke li^ang 'ng-chhi^en ke, ngi`am-s`u" hi cho s^en-l^i, chhon-t'o 'ng-chhi^en chak ngi`un-pi.
Ke li^ang li'ong-chhi^en ke, ya khiung-yong 'an-ngi`ong chhon-t'o li'ong-chhi^en chak ngi`un-pi.
Ch'ung-he ke li^ang yit-chhi^en ke chhut-hi, chhai thi-n`ai-h^a yet yit-ke kh^ung-'e, chi^ong ch'u-ng`in ke chhi`en m`ai-h'i-l`oi.
"Ko chhin ki'u, ke k'i-ke ph+uk-ng`in ke ch'u-ng`in ch'on-l`oi, th`ung k`i-t^eu son-su".
Ke li^ang 'ng-chhi^en ke, tai-t'en nang-ngoi ke 'ng-chhi^en ng+ip-l`oi, k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, ng`i p^un ng`ai 'ng-chhi^en chak ngi`un-pi; ng`i khon, ng`ai yu chhon-t'o 'ng-chhi^en.'

Ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Chhin h'o, ng`i li'a h'o yu ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in! Ng`i chhai se-se ke su" t'ang-k^o y^u ch^ung-s^im, ng`ai oi v^i-thok ng`i k^in-y`in thai su". Ng+ip-l`oi th`ung ng`i ke ch'u-ng`in khiung-ha hi'ong-su khoai-l+ok ^o!'
"Ke li^ang li'ong-chhi^en ke, ya ng+ip-l`oi, k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, ng`i p^un ng`ai li'ong-chhi^en chak ngi`un-pi; ng`i khon, ng`ai yu chhon-t'o li'ong-chhi^en.'

Ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Chhin h'o, ng`i li'a h'o yu ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in! Ng`i chhai se-se ke su" t'ang-k^o y^u ch^ung-s^im, ng`ai oi v^i-thok ng`i k^in-y`in thai su". Ng+ip-l`oi th`ung ng`i ke ch'u-ng`in khiung-ha hi'ong-su khoai-l+ok ^o!'
"Ke-s`u", ke li^ang yit-chhi^en ke ya ng+ip-l`oi, k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, ng`ai t^i ng`i he li-hoi ke ng`in; ng`i m`o chung ke thi-f^ong ya oi s^u-kot, m`o ve-ch'ung ke s'o-chhai ya oi s^u-s`u"n.
Ng`ai chhin ki^ang, chhiu chi^ong ng`i ke chhi`en m`ai chhai thi-n`ai-h^a. Chhi'ang khon, ng`i ke chhi`en chhai li'a-vi.'
"K`i ke ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i li'a f'ai yu l^an-s^u" ke ph+uk-ng`in! Ki-y`en ng`i t^i ng`ai m`o chung ke thi-f^ong ya oi s^u-kot, m`o ve-ch'ung ke s'o-chhai ya oi s^u-s`u"n,
ng`i chhiu yin-k^oi chi^ong ng`ai ke chhi`en chh`un-ng+ip ngi`un-h`ong, t'en ng`ai ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", h'o li`en-p'un-tai-li khiung-ha li^ang-ch'on-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i ke chhi`en n^a p^un ke y^u yit-van chak ngi`un-pi ke.
Y^in-vi y'i-k^in y^u ke, oi p^un k`i h`an-kha t^o, p^un k`i y^u-h'o chh^un; m`o ke, li`en k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-s+it-s+it-'e ya oi chhi'ong-ch'eu.
Li'a-ke m`o yung ke ph+uk-ng`in, ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i kiuk-to ngoi-poi ke v^u-am t'u hi; p^un k`i chhai ke-vi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u".'
"T^ong Ng`in-ch'u" chhai k`i ke y`ung-k^ong ch^ung kong-l`im ke s`u", chung thi^en-s'u" th`ung k`i khiung-ha, k`i oi chh^o chhai y`ung-yeu ke p'o-chho-t'ang;

van-m`in chhi`on-phu oi chhi-s+ip chhai k`i ke mien-chhi`en. K`i oi chi^ong k`i-t^eu p^un-cho li'ong-khi`un, chhiong ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in chi^ong mi`en-y`ong tui s^an-y`ong ch^ung p^un-kh^oi-l`oi yit-yong.
K`i oi chi^ong mi`en-y`ong piong chhai yu-phi'en, s^an-y`ong piong chhai ch'o-phi'en.
Y`en-heu, v`ong voi tui chhai k`i yu-phi'en ke ng`in k'ong: 'Tet-t'o ng^a P^a su-fuk ke ng`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu l`oi! L`oi s`u"n-su tui chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi chhiu vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi ke koet.
Y^in-vi ng`ai t'u-k^i, ng`i-t^eu p^un ng`ai s+u"t; ng`ai choi-ch^au, ng`i-t^eu p^un ng`ai l^im; ng`ai chhut-ngoi li`u-long, ng`i-t^eu chiap-thai ng`ai hi ng`i-t^eu vuk-h^a;
ng`ai t'a-chhak-pok, ng`i-t^eu p^un ng`ai chok; ng`ai pot-phiang, ng`i-t^eu cheu-ku ng`ai; ng`ai chh^o-k^am, ng`i-t^eu l`oi khon ng`ai.'
"Ke-s`u", ke-t^eu ngi-ng`in voi en-k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu k'i-s`u" khon-t'o ng`i t'u-k^i, p^un ng`i s+u"t; ya-he choi-ch^au, p^un ng`i l^im?
K'i-s`u" khon-t'o ng`i chhut-ngoi li`u-long, chiap-thai ng`i hi ng`ai-t^eu vuk-h^a; ya-he khon-t'o ng`i t'a-chhak-pok, p^un ng`i chok?
K'i-s`u" khon-t'o ng`i pot-phiang ya-he chh^o-k^am, ng`ai-t^eu hi khon-ku ng`i ^a?'
V`ong voi en-k'ong: 'Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an tui-thai ng`ai li'a hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ch^ung chui m`i-se ke yit-s`a, chhiu-he tui-thai ng`ai yit-yong!'

"Y`en-heu, v`ong voi tui chhai k`i ch'o-phi'en ke ng`in k'ong: 'Su-t'o Song-ti chu-ch'u ke ng`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ng`ai! Ng+ip-hi vi M^o-k'ui l^au k`i ke ch'au-ng`a s'o ch'un-phi y'un-y'en put-m+et ke f'o t^i-poi!
Y^in-vi ng`ai t'u-k^i, ng`i-t^eu m`o p^un ng`ai s+u"t; choi-ch^au, ng`i-t^eu m`o p^un ng`ai l^im;
ng`ai chhut-ngoi li`u-long, ng`i-t^eu m`o chiap-thai ng`ai hi ng`i-t^eu vuk-h^a; ng`ai t'a-chhak-pok, ng`i-t^eu m`o p^un ng`ai chok; ng`ai pot-phiang ya-he chh^o-k^am, ng`i-t^eu m`o khon-ku ng`ai.'

"Li'a-s`u", k`i-t^eu voi k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu k'i-s`u" khon-t'o ng`i t'u-k^i ya-he choi-ch^au, ya-he chhut-ngoi li`u-long, ya-he t'a-chhak-pok, ya-he pot-phiang ya-he chh^o-k^am, m`o f+uk-su" ng`i ^a?'
V`ong voi en k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu `m p^ong-chhu li'a-t^eu ng`in ch^ung-ki^en chui m`i-se ke yit-s`a, chhiu-he `m p^ong-chhu ng`ai.'
Li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in oi su y'un-y'en ke h`in-f+at; ch'ung-he ke-t^eu ngi-ng`in, k`i-t^eu yit-thin voi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong:
"Ng`i-t^eu t^i, k^a li'ong-ngit chhiu-he Ph`an-ko-chiet, Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in chhut-mai, hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka."
Ke-s`u", chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au m`in-ki^en ke ch'ong-l'o chhai thai-chi-s^u" K^ai-^a-fap ke k^on-th^ang chhi-fi,
khiung-ha y^im-m`eu oi pi-m+et chok Y^a-s^u, chi^ong k`i chh`u"-s'i.
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chhai chiet-kh`i-ch^ung ha-s'u, mi^en-tet ngi^a-h'i m`in-chung ke phau-thung."
Y^a-s^u chhai Pak-thai-n`i pot th'ai-k^o ke S^i-m`un vuk-h^a;

y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a tai yit-chak ngi+uk-kon-'e l`oi, t^i-poi ch^ong chhin ch^u"n-kui ke hi^ong-y`u. Y^a-s^u s+u"t-fan ke s`u", ke fu-ng`in-k^a chi^ong hi^ong-y`u t'o chhai Y^a-s^u ke th`eu-n`a-t'ang.
H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o, chhin m`o f^on-h'i, k'ong: "Ngi'ong-p^an 'an t'a-s'ong n`e?
Li'a hi^ong-y`u cho-tet mai chhin-t^o chhi`en l`oi kiu-chi khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in ^a!"
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Cho-m'a-ke v`i-n`an li'a fu-ng`in-k^a n`o? K`i vi ng`ai cho ke he yit-khien chhin-chi^ang ke su".
Y^in-vi s`ong-s`ong y^u khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, ch'ung-he ng`ai `m-he s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha.
K`i chi^ong li'a hi^ong-y`u t'o chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song he vi ng`ai ke m`ai-chong cho ch'un-phi.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ph^u-thi^en-ha, m`o-lun li'a fuk-y^im chh`on-to m'a-ke s'o-chhai, tak-s`a t^u oi k'ong-h'i k`i s'o-cho ke su", l`oi ki-ngiam k`i."
Y^a-s^u s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang t^ong-ch^ung, y^u yit-ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai; k`i hi kien chi-s^u"-ch'ong,
k'ong: "Na-he ng`ai chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu oi p^un ng`ai m'a-ke?" K`i-t^eu chhiu n^a s^am-s+u"p-chak ngi`un-chhi`en p^un k`i.
Tui ke-s`u" h'i, Y`u-thai chhiu chh`im k^i-fi oi chhut-mai Y^a-s^u.
Chh`u-kau-chiet ke thi-yit-ngit, h+ok-s^ang l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu chhai nai-vi vi ng`i ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ng+ip-s`ang hi kien m^eu-ng`in, tui k`i k'ong: 'S^in-s^ang k'ong: Ng`ai ke s`u"-k^i y'i-k^in khi^un l'e; ng`ai oi l^au ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang chhai ngi^a vuk-h^a s'u Ph`an-ko-chiet.' "
H+ok-s^ang chhiu cheu Y^a-s^u s'o f^un-fu ke hi ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on.
L`im-am-'e, Y^a-s^u l^au s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang v`i-t'en chok-`e chh^o-t'en.
S+u"t ke s`u"-chiet, Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke ng`in oi chhut-mai ng`ai."
H+ok-s^ang chhiu chhin y`u-s`eu, yit-ke yit-ke mun k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, k'am he ng`ai?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "L^au ng`ai yung khiung-chak ph`an-`e vun-pi'ang ke, chhiu-he oi chhut-mai ng`ai ke ng`in.
Cheu Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, Ng`in-ch'u" voi su-hoi; ch'ung-he chhut-mai Ng`in-ch'u" ke ng`in y^u ch^ai-fo l'e! K`i m+ok chhut-se h`an-kha h'o!"
Chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke Y`u-thai ya kh^oi-khi'eu k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, k'am he ng`ai?" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i y'i-k^in k'ong l'e!"
K`i-t^eu s+u"t ke s`u"-chiet, Y^a-s^u n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, p^un-p^un h+ok-s^ang, k'ong: "N^a-l`oi s+u"t; li'a he ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i."
K`i yu n^a-h'i p^i-'e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu oi l^im;
li'a he ng`ai ke hiet, he chu"n-m`in Song-ti l^au ng`in l+ip-yok ke hiet, vi-t'o s'u" chhin-t^o ng`in ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en l`oi li`u-chhut ke.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi chai l^im li'a ph`u-th`o-chi'u, chh+u"t-to ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu chhai ng^a P^a ke koet l^im s^in-chi'u ke-ngit."
K`i-t^eu chhong yit-s'u s^u", chhiu chhut-l`oi, to K'am-l'am-s^an hi.

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^im-am-p^u, ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung voi vi ng`ai ke y`en-ku l`i-kh^oi ng`ai; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in ki-chai: Song-ti k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi k^ung-kit m+uk-ng`in, y`ong-khi`un chhiu f^un-san thet-hi.'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai f+uk-f+at y^i-heu, oi p'i ng`i-t^eu si^en hi K^a-li-li."
P'i-tet tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Chhiu-son ph+et-ng`in y^in-vi ng`i ke y`en-ku chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi ng`i, ng`ai y'un-y'en `m-voi l`i-kh^oi ng`i!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, k^im-am-p^u, ki^e-'e th`ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai."
P'i-tet en-k'ong: "Chhiu-son ng`ai yit-thin oi th`ung ng`i khiung-ha s'i, ng`ai ya chhi+et-tui `m-voi `m ngin ng`i!" Kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang ya chhi`on-phu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong.
Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang l`oi-to yit-ke s'o-chhai, mi`ang ^on-to Khiet-s^i-m^a-n`i; k`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chh^o, ng`ai oi hi ke-phi'en kh`i-t'o."
Y`en-heu k`i tai-t'en P'i-tet l^au S^i-p'i-thai ke li'ong-ke lai-'e khiung-ha hi. K`i kh^oi-s'u" k'am-kok chhin y`u-s^ong thung-kh'u,
tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai ke s^im k^an-kh'u to voi s'i. Ng`i-t^eu li`u chhai li'a-vi, oi th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha k'in-si'ang ^o!"

K`i h`ang-chhi`en t^eu-'e, chhiu ph+uk chhai thi-song, kh`i-t'o k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, na-he cho-tet, khi`u Ng`i `m-h'o p^un ng`ai l^im li'a-ke kh'u-p^i! Ch'ung-he, `m-h'o cheu ng`ai ke yi-su", oi cheu Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi."
K`i to-ch'on s^am-ke h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, fat-hien k`i-t^eu soi-thet, chhiu l^au P'i-tet k'ong: "S+u"t-chhai ^o, ng`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha k'in-si'ang yit-ti'am-ch^ung ki'u m^a?
Oi k'in-si'ang kh`i-t'o, mi^en-tet ham-l+ok m`i-f+et. Ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t s^im-l`in k^am-ngien, ch'ung-he ngiuk-th'i ngi^on-ngi+ok."
Y^a-s^u thi-ngi-p'ai yu hi kh`i-t'o, k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, na-he li'a kh'u-p^i cho-`m-tet l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, thin-chh+ok oi ng`ai l^im, ngien Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi s`u"n-chhi`on!"
K`i yu to-ch'on h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, khon-t'o k`i-t^eu yu soi-thet, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u pak-`m-kh^oi.
Y^a-s^u yu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, thi-s^am-p'ai hi kh`i-t'o, h`an-he k'ong khiung-yong ke fa.

Y`en-heu k`i yu to-ch'on h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu h`an soi-muk, h`an chhai ke-vi hi^u-sit m^a? Khon ^a, s`u"-ki^en to l'e, Ng`in-ch'u" y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in chhut-mai to chhui-ng`in s'u-ch^ung l^o.
Hong-h'i-l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi! Khon ^a, chhut-mai ng`ai ke ng`in to l'e!"

Y^a-s^u h`an k'ong-t'en fa ke s`u", s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ch^ung ke Y`u-thai l`oi-to. Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in tai-t'en t^o-'e, kun-'e th`ung k`i khiung-ha l`oi; k`i-t^eu he chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au m`in-ki^en ke ch'ong-l'o phai-l`oi ke.
Chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke ng`in su"-chhi`en p^un k`i-t^eu yit-chak am-ho, k'ong: "Ng`ai ch^im m'a-ng`in, k`i chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu s'o si'ong-oi ke ng`in; ng`i-t^eu chhiu chok k`i."
Y`u-thai chit-s`u" h`ang-to Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, ham k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ph`in-^on!" yu ch^im k`i.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ph`en-y^u, ng`i s'o-oi cho ke, chhiu cho!" S'o-y^i, ke-t^eu ng`in chhiu chin-chhi`en l`oi, ha-s'u chok Y^a-s^u.
Th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u yit-s`a p^ang-chhut t^o-'e, tui thai-chi-s^u" ke ph+uk-ng`in phiak-ko-hi, chi^ong k`i ke ng'i-k^ung siok-thet yit-chak.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "T^o-'e s^u-h'i-l`oi; y^in-vi f`am th^ung-t^o ke, yit-thin voi s'i chhai t^o-ha.
K'am-k'ong ng`i `m-t^i ng`ai cho-tet khi`u ng^a P^a, K`i voi ngi`am-s`u" chh^ai chh^eu-ko s+u"p-ngi-y`ang ke thi^en-s'u" l`oi m^a?
Ng`ai na 'an-ngi`ong cho, Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, su"-chh`in yit-thin voi 'an-ngi`ong fat-s^en ke fa oi ngi'ong-p^an l`oi s+u"t-hien n`o?"

T^ong-s`u", Y^a-s^u tui ke-khi`un ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu tai-t'en t^o-'e l^au kun-'e chhut-l`oi chok ng`ai, khon ng`ai cho khi`ong-tho he-m`o? Ng`ai tak-ngit chh^o chhai su"n-thien-t'u k^au ng`in, ng`i-t^eu pin m`o chok ng`ai.
Ch'ung-he, li'a yit-chhiet su"-chh`in ke fat-s^en, l^ung-ch'ung he oi s+u"t-hien si^en-t^i chhai Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke fa." Li'a-s`u", s'o-y^u ke h+ok-s^ang chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi k`i th`o-ch'eu.
Ke-t^eu chok Y^a-s^u ke ng`in tai Y^a-s^u to thai-chi-s^u" K^ai-^a-fap ke-vi hi; k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au ch'ong-l'o y'i-k^in chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi.

P'i-tet y'en-y'en th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u, chh+u"t-to thai-chi-s^u" ke th`in-yen. P'i-tet ng+ip th`in-yen-t'u hi, th`ung k'in-v'i chh^o khiung-ha, oi khon li'a su"-chh`in ke kiet-khi+uk to-t'ai voi ngi'ong-p^an.
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au chhi`on ngi-fi si'ong-chhin phan-fap chh`im k'a chu"n-k'i oi ko Y^a-s^u, l`oi thin k`i s'i-h`in;
s^ui-y`en y^u h'o-t^o k'a ke kien-chu"n-ng`in chhut-l`oi ko Y^a-s^u, ch'ung-he n^a-`m-chhut m'a-ke chu"n-k'i l`oi. Chui-m^i, y^u li'ong-ke ng`in chin-chhi`en l`oi ko k`i, k'ong:
"Li'a-ke ng`in su"t k'ong: 'Ng`ai y^u phan-fap chhak-thet Song-ti ke su"n-thien, s^am-ngit-nui yu chi^ong k`i chh`ung-kien h'i-l`oi.' "
Thai-chi-s^u" kh^i-h'i-l`oi, mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu ng`in ko ng`i ke, ng`i m`o m'a-ke fa h'o en he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u ti^am-ti^am `m chhut-s^ang. Thai-chi-s^u" yu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai ch'u"-t'en y'un-s^en Song-ti ke mi`ang min-lin ng`i fat-su" l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, ng`i he K^i-tuk, Song-ti ke Lai-'e m`o?"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i k'ong ke. Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ngit-heu, ng`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" chh^o chhai Chhi`on-n`en-ch'a ke yu-phi'en, chh^o-t'en thi^en-t'ang ke y`un kong-l`im!"
Thai-chi-s^u" chhiu chh'a-li+et chhu"-k^a ke s^am, k'ong: "K`i v'u-y+uk Song-ti! Ng`ai-t^eu `m-s'u" ph+et ke chu"n-ng`in l'e! Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in th^ang-t'o k`i v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke fa;
ng`i-t^eu k'ong oi ngi'ong-p^an phan k`i?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "K`i k^oi s'i!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu phi h'eu-l^an chhai k`i ke mien-hong, yu yung khi`en-th`eu-m`a t'a k`i. Y^u-t^eu ng`in yung p^a-ch'ong-m`a s^an k`i,
k'ong: "K^i-tuk ^a, ng`i he si^en-t^i, chhu"-th`on-khon, he m'a-ng`in t'a ng`i?"
P'i-tet chh^o chhai ngoi-poi ke th`in-yen-t'u; y^u yit-ke s'u"-'ng h`ang ko-l`oi, k'ong: "Ng`i me he th`ung K^a-li-li ke Y^a-s^u khiung-ha ke."
P'i-tet t^ong thai-k^a ke mien f'eu-ngin, k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-t^i ng`i k'ong m'a-ke."
Heu-l`oi, k`i chhut-hi, h`ang-to th`in-yen m`un-h'eu, yu y^u yit-ke s'u"-'ng khon-t'o k`i, tui kh^i chhai ke-vi ke ng`in k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in th`ung N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u he khiung-ha ke."
P'i-tet yu f'eu-ngin yit-p'ai, fat-su" k'ong: "Ng`ai k^in-p'un `m-su"t ke-ng`in!"
Ko yit-ha-'e, s`un-th`eu kh^i-t'en ke ng`in yu l`oi tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i khok-s+u"t he k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-ke, th^ang ng`i ke khi^ong chhiu t^i!"
P'i-tet chhiu fat-su" chu-ch'u k'ong: "Ng`ai `m su"t ke-s`a ng`in!" Chit-s`u", ki^e-'e chhiu th`ai.
P'i-tet chang si'ong-h'i Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke fa: "Ki^e-'e th`ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai." K`i chhiu ch'eu-chhut-hi, kieu-to f^i-s`ong s^ong-s^im.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", s'o-y^u ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au m`in-ki^en ke ch'ong-l'o chh^am-si`ong, oi hoi-s'i Y^a-s^u.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u thak-h'i-l`oi, ki'e-sung, k^au-p^un L`o-m^a ch'ung-tuk P'i-l^a-t^o.
Chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke Y`u-thai khon-t'o Y^a-s^u su thin-chhui, chhiu heu-f'i, chi^ong s^am-s+u"p-chak ngi`un-chhi`en n^a-hi v`an chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o,
k'ong: "Ng`ai chhut-mai m`o-chhui ke ng`in, hoi k`i s'i; ng`ai y^u chhui l'e!" K`i-t^eu en k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i chhu"-k^a ke su"-chh`in, l^au ng`ai-t^eu y^u m'a-ke ko^an-he?"
Y`u-thai chhiu chi^ong ngi`un-chhi`en fit chhai su"n-thien-t'u, chhut-hi tiau-ki'ang chhu"-sat.
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong chi^ong chhi`en ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, k'ong: "Li'a he hiet-chhi`en, n^a-l`oi piong-l+ok fung-hien-si^ong he v`i-fap ke."
Chh^am-si`ong ke kiet-k'o, k`i-t^eu th`ung-yi n^a li'a chhi`en hi m^ai s^eu-f`i s^u"-fu ke thi, cho m`ai-chong ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in ke mu-thi.
'An-ngi`ong, to k^im-p^u-ngit thai-k^a h`an ham ke-thi cho "Hiet-thi`en".
Li'a-khien su" ke k^in-ko, yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^a-li-m'i s'o-k'ong ke fa: "K`i-t^eu n^a s^am-s+u"p-chak ngi`un-chhi`en, chhiu-he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in s'o th`ung-yi vi k`i fu-chhut ke ka-chhi`en,
hi m^ai s^eu-f`i s^u"-fu ke thi; li'a he cheu Ch'u s'o min-lin ng`ai ke."
Y^a-s^u kh^i chhai ch'ung-tuk mien-chhi`en, ch'ung-tuk mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong m`o?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i k'ong ke."
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o ko k`i ke s`u", k`i chhi`on-phu `m en.
S'o-y^i P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i k'ong: "K`i-t^eu ko ng`i 'an-t^o su", ng`i m`o th^ang-t'o he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u h`an-he `m en, li`en yit-ki fa ya m`o k'ong; ch'ung-tuk k'am-kok f^i-s`ong ke kh`i-koai.
Tak-ngi`en Ph`an-ko-chiet, ch'ung-tuk voi cheu koan-li vi thai-chung piong yit-ke k`i-t^eu s'o oi ke si`u-fam.
Ke-s`u", t'u-h'o y^u yit-ke chhut-mi`ang ke si`u-fam, ^on-to Y^a-s^u-P^a-l^a-p^a.
S'o-y^i, thai-chung chhi-s+ip ke s`u", P'i-l^a-t^o mun k`i-t^eu: "Ng`i-t^eu oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu piong nai-ke n`e? Y^a-s^u-P^a-l^a-p^a n`e? Ya-he ke chh^u"n-cho K^i-tuk ke Y^a-s^u n`e?"
P'i-l^a-t^o m`in-m`in t^i k`i-t^eu he y^in-vi chhit-tu chang chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i ke.

P'i-l^a-t^o kh^oi-th`in ke s`u", k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong phai-ng`in l`oi-kien k`i k'ong: "Ng`i chhi^en-van m+ok chhap ke ngi-ng`in ke su"; ng`ai chh^o-am-p^u chhai mung-ch^ung y^in-vi k`i su chhin-t^o kh'u."
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o k^au-s^o thai-chung l`oi y^eu-khi`u su"t-fong P^a-l^a-p^a, chh'u-s'i Y^a-s^u.
S'o-y^i, ch'ung-tuk mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a li'ong-ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu piong nai-ke n`e?" K`i-t^eu chhiu en-k'ong: " P^a-l^a-p^a!"
P'i-l^a-t^o yu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ke chh^u"n-cho K^i-tuk ke Y^a-s^u, ng`ai oi ngi'ong-p^an chh'u-l^i k`i n`o?" K`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!"
P'i-l^a-t^o mun k'ong: "K`i to-t'ai cho m'a-ke f'ai-su"?" K`i-t^eu h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!"

P'i-l^a-t^o khon-t'o li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, t^i k^a k'ong ya m`o yung, f'an-ch'on voi ngi^a-h'i phau-thung, chhiu n^a s'ui chhai chung-ng`in mien-chhi`en s'e-s'u, k'ong: "Li`u li'a ng`in ke hiet, `m-he ng`ai ke chhui, ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a fu-chit!"
Chung-ng`in chh`e-s^ang k'ong: "Li'a ng`in ke hiet-chai, son chhai ng`ai-t^eu l^au ng`ai-t^eu ch'u"-s^un ke s^u"n-song!"
P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu piong P^a-l^a-p^a p^un k`i-t^eu, yu min-lin chi^ong Y^a-s^u pi^en-t'a, y`en-heu k^au-p^un ng`in hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka.
Ch'ung-tuk ke p^in-'e chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-ng+ip ch'ung-tuk-f'u; chhi`on-chhui s+ip-h+ap chhai Y^a-s^u ch^u-v`i.
K`i-t^eu thot-h^a Y^a-s^u ke s^am, l^au k`i chok yit-li^ang ch^u-f`ung-set ke chh`ong-ph`au,
yung net-`e phi^en yit-t'ang mi^en-li`u, l^au k`i tai-t'en, n^a yit-k^i th`en-thi`au piong chhai k`i ke yu-s'u, kh'ui chhai k`i mien-chhi`en met-sa k`i, k'ong: " Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong van-soi!"
K`i-t^eu yu yung h'eu-l^an phi k`i, n^a th`en-thi`au k'in t'a k`i ke th`eu-n`a.
Met-sa s+ot, k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i s^u"n-song ke chh`ong-ph`au thot-h^a-l`oi, l^au k`i chok chhu"-k^a ke s^am, y`en-heu tai k`i chhut-hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka.
K`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi ke s`u", t`u-t'o yit-ke K'u-li-nai-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S^i-m`un, chhiu khi`ong-pet k`i thoi Y^a-s^u khi`a s+u"p-su"-ka.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to yit-ke thi-f^ong, ^on-to Kok-kok-th^a, yi-su" chhiu-he "Th`eu-n`a-hok ke S^an-th`eu".
K`i-t^eu n^a chh^am f'u-t'am ke chi'u p^un Y^a-s^u l^im; Y^a-s^u t^am yit-ha, chhiu `m l^im.
K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, yu chh^u-chhi^am-'e l`oi p^un k`i ke s^am,
y`en-heu chh^o chhai ke-vi ch'ong-t'en k`i.
K`i-t^eu chhai k`i th`eu-n`a ke t'ang-k^o ^on yit-te ph`ai-`e si'a-t'en k`i ke chhui-mi`ang: "Li'a he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong Y^a-s^u."
K`i-t^eu yu chi^ong li'ong-ke khi`ong-tho th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka, yit-ke chhai k`i ke yu-phi'en, yit-ke chhai k`i ke ch'o-phi'en.
Tui ke-vi k^in-ko ke ng`in v'u-y+uk Y^a-s^u, y`eu-th`eu,
k'ong: "Ng`i li'a oi chhak su"n-thien, s^am-ngit-nui chi^ong k`i chh`ung-kien h'i-l`oi ke! Ng`i na-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, kiu ng`i chhu"-k^a, tui s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang h^a-l`oi ^a!"
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au ch'ong-l'o ya khiung-yong chh'u"-seu k`i, k'ong:
"K`i kiu-li'au ph+et-ng`in, sa m`o fap-thu kiu chhu"-k^a! K`i he Y^i-set-li+et ke v`ong ^o! Na-he k`i li'a-ha tui s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang h^a-l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu sin k`i!
K`i y'i-kho Song-ti; na-he Song-ti kak-yi k`i, li'a-ha chhiu kh'o-y^i kiu k`i; y^in-vi k`i su"t k'ong: 'Ng`ai he Song-ti ke Lai-'e.' "
Th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke khi`ong-tho ya 'an-ngi`ong s^au-nat k`i.
T^ong-chu ke s`u", thai-thi v^u-am, yok-y^u s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ki'u.

To h^a-chu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ke s`u", Y^a-s^u thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Y^i-li! Y^i-li! L^a-m^a sat-p^a-kok-thai-n`i?" Yi-su" he k'ong: "Ng`ai ke Song-ti, ng`ai ke Song-ti, Ng`i cho-m'a-ke piong-thet ng`ai?"
S`un-th`eu kh^i-t'en ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu th^ang-t'o chhiu k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in h^em Y^i-li-^a!"
Kh`i-ch^ung y^u yit-s`a ngi`am-s`u" ch'eu-ko-hi, n^a yit-te h'oi-mi`en chim s^on ph`u-th`o-chi'u, y`en-heu thak chhai th`en-thi`au-t'ang, oi n^a p^un k`i l^im.
Kh`i-th^a ke ng`in k'ong: "T'en yit-ha-'e, ng`ai-t^eu khon Y^i-li-^a voi l`oi kiu k`i m`o!"
Y^a-s^u yu thai-h^em yit-s^ang, chhiu th^on-hi s'i-thet.
Li'a-s`u", koa chhai su"n-thien-t'u ke pu-li`am, tui t'ang-k^o to t'ai-h^a li+et-cho li'ong-sak. Thai-thi ch'u"n-thung, ph`an-s+ak li+et-kh^oi,
f`un-mu ya kh^oi l'e, chhin-t^o ko-s^u"n ke su"n-th`u f'an-s^ang ko-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u f+uk-f+at y^i-heu, k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi f`un-mu, ng+ip-hi Su"n-s`ang; chhin t^o-ng`in khon-t'o k`i-t^eu.
Ch'ong Y^a-s^u ke ki^un-k^on l^au p^in-'e khon-t'o thi-th^ung pin s'o fat-s^en ke su", chhiu thai chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "K`i s+u"t-chhai he Song-ti ke Lai-'e!"
Chhai ke-vi, h`an-y^u h'o-t^o fu-ng`in-k^a y'en-y'en kh^i-t'en khon; k`i-t^eu he tui K^a-li-li th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u l`oi f+uk-su" k`i ke.
Kh`i-ch^ung y^u Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a, Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-sit ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, pin S^i-p'i-thai li'ong-ke lai-'e ke ^a-m^e.
L`im-am-'e, y^u yit-ke ^A-li-m^a-thai ke y^u-chhi`en-ng`in l`oi; k`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Yok-sit, ya he Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang.
K`i hi kien P'i-l^a-t^o, y^eu-khi`u s^u-liam Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i; P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu f^un-fu chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i k^au-p^un k`i.
Yok-sit li^ang-t'o v`i-th'i heu, yung chhiang-li ke m`a-s^a p^au-h'o,
piong chhai k`i s^in cho ke f`un-mu t^i-poi; li'a f`un-mu he k`i tui s+ak-piak chh+ok-s`ang ke. K`i yu chi^ong yit-te thai s+ak-th`eu chan-ko-l`oi, set-t'en mu-m`un, y`en-heu chang l`i-kh^oi.
Ke-s`u", Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a l^au nang-ngoi yit-ke M^a-li-^a chh^o chhai f`un-mu tui-mien.
Thi-ngi-ngit, chhiu-he l^i-pai-liuk ke ch^eu-s`u"n, chi-s^u"-ch'ong th`ung Fap-li-soi-ng`in khiung-ha hi kien P'i-l^a-t^o,
k'ong: "Thai-ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu ki-tet ke-chak phien-ng`in ke lau-'e h`an s^ang ke s`u"-chiet su"t k'ong: 'S^am-ngit-heu ng`ai oi f+uk-f+at.'

S'o-y^i, chhi'ang ng`i ha-lin ngi`am-ngi`am ch'ong-h'o f`un-mu, chh+u"t-to thi-s^am-ngit, ki^ang-pha k`i ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi chi^ong k`i th^eu-ch'eu, y`en-heu hi tui ng`in k'ong: 'K`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at l'e.' Na-he 'an-ngi`ong, heu-l`oi ke kh^i-phien voi p'i si^en-chhi`en ke h`an-kha li-hoi."
P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Tai yit-chhui v'i-p^in hi, cheu ng`i-t^eu s'o t^i th'o-tong ke phan-fap hi ch'ong!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi, yung-chhin phan-fap ngi`am s'u f`un-mu, chhai s+ak-th`eu-t'ang k^a f^ung-thi`au, yu min-lin v'i-p^in ch'ong-t'en.
^On-sit-ngit ko-hi, l^i-pai-ngit thi^en-m`ung-k^ong ke s`u", Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a th`ung nang-ngoi yit-ke M^a-li-^a khiung-ha hi khon f`un-mu.
Fut-y`en, fat-s^en thai thi-th^ung, y^in-vi y^u Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, chi^ong s+ak-th`eu s'ai-kh^oi, chh^o chhai ke t'ang-k^o.
K`i ke mien-mau chhiong ngiap-lang, s^am chhiong siet 'an ph+ak.
Ke-t^eu v'i-p^in ki^ang-to p+it-p+it-chhat, chhiong hak-to voi s'i ke ng`in yit-yong.
Thi^en-s'u" tui ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang; ng`ai t^i ng`i-t^eu he chh`im ke p^un-ng`in t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke Y^a-s^u.
K`i m`o chhai li'a-vi, cheu k`i s'o-k'ong ke, k`i y'i-k^in f+uk-f+at l'e. Ng`i-t^eu ko-l`oi, khon ^on-chong k`i ke s'o-chhai.

Ng`i-t^eu kiak-kiak hi l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: 'K`i y'i-k^in tui s'i f+uk-f+at l'e; k`i oi p'i ng`i-t^eu si^en hi K^a-li-li; chhai ke-vi, ng`i-t^eu voi kien-t'o k`i.' Oi ki-tet ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa."
Ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a chhiu k'on-k'in l`i-kh^oi f`un-mu, yu ki^ang yu chhin f^on-h'i, ch'eu-t'en hi oi l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong.
Fut-y`en, Y^a-s^u t`u-t'o k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on!" K`i-t^eu chhiu chin-chhi`en, n'am-t'en k`i ke kiok, pai k`i.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang; hi l^au ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi k'ong, ham k`i-t^eu hi K^a-li-li; chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu voi kien-t'o ng`ai."
Ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a hi ke s`u"-chiet, y^u-t^eu ch'ong f`un-mu ke p^in-'e ch'on s`ang-t'u hi, tui chi-s^u"-ch'ong po-ko s'o fat-s^en ke yit-chhiet su".
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o chh^am-si`ong heu, n^a yit thai-thoi-chhi`en p^un p^in-'e,
tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: 'K`i ke-t^eu h+ok-s^ang am-p^u-s`u" l`oi, chhai ng`ai-t^eu soi-thet ke s`u" chi^ong k`i ke s^u"n-s^u" th^eu-ch'eu.'
Na-he ch'ung-tuk th^ang-t'o li'a-khien su", ng`ai-t^eu voi thoi ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, p'o-chu"n ng`i-t^eu m`o su"."
S'o-y^i, p^in-'e chhiu n^a ke-t^eu chhi`en, cheu s'o f^un-fu k`i-t^eu ke hi cho. Li'a y`eu-ngi`en chhiu li`u-chh`on chhai Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ch^ung-ki^en, chh+u"t-to k^im-p^u-ngit.
S+u"p-yit-ke h+ok-s^ang hi K^a-li-li, to Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i-t^eu hi ke s^an-t'ang.
K`i-t^eu yit kien-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu pai k`i; ch'ung-he h`an y^u-ng`in ng`i-f`u.
Y^a-s^u h`ang ko-l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Song-ti y'i-k^in chi^ong thi^en-t'ang l^au thi-song s'o-y^u ke khi`en-piang su-p^un ng`ai.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi hi chhi`on su"-kie, s'u" van-m`in chhi`on-phu cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang, fung Fu, Ch'u", Su"n-L`in ke mi`ang l^au k`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i,
k^au k`i-t^eu ch^un-s'u yit-chhiet ng`ai s'o min-lin ng`i-t^eu ke. Oi ki-tet! Ng`ai voi s`ong-s`ong l^au ng`i-t^eu th`ung-chhai, chh+u"t-to su"-kie ke m+at-ngit."
Song-ti ke Lai-'e, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im he 'an-ngi`ong kh^oi-s'u" ke.
Chhiong si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a chhai k`i ke s^u t^i-poi s'o-si'a ke: Song-ti k'ong: "Khon ^a, Ng`ai oi chh^ai-phai Ng`ai ke s'u"-ch'a cho ng`i ke si^en-f^ung; k`i oi vi ng`i kh^oi-lu."
Chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u ng`in h^em-k'ong: "Oi ch'un-phi h'o-se Ch'u ke tho-lu, si^u-chh+u"t K`i s'o-oi h`ang ke se-lu!"

Yok-hon chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong chhai kh'ong-y^a chhut-hien, vi ng`in h`ang s'e-l^i. K`i si^en-pu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et chhui-ok, chiap-su s'e-l^i, Song-ti chhiu voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke chhui."

F^i-s`ong t^o ke ng`in tui Y`u-thai ke tak s'o-chhai l^au chhi`on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi-to Yok-hon ke mien-chhi`en. K`i-t^eu s`u"n-ngin chhu"-k^a ke chhui; Yok-hon chhiu chhai Yok-tan-h`o vi k`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i.
Yok-hon chok-t'en l+ok-th`o-m^o cho ke s^am, y^eu-khi^en thak-t'en ph`i-tai; s+u"t chh'o-m'ang l^au y^a-ph^ung-th`ong ko ngit-`e.
K`i si^en-pu k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke ng`in, p'i ng`ai kha-man l`oi ke, k`i p'i ng`ai v'i-thai chhin-t^o. Ng`ai chhiu-he kh`u-h^a-l`oi l^au k`i thot-h`ai ya m`o ch^u"-kiet.
Ng`ai he yung s'ui vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i, ch'ung-he k`i oi yung Su"n-L`in vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i."
M`o k'i-ki'u y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u tui K^a-li-li-s'en ke N^a-sat-l+et l`oi, Yok-hon chhiu chhai Yok-tan-h`o vi k`i h`ang s'e-l^i.
Y^a-s^u tui s'ui-ch^ung yit s^ong-l`oi, chhiu khon-t'o thi^en-kh^oi, Su"n-L`in chhiong ngi+et-kap-`e yit-yong, kong chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song;
tui thi^en-t'ang y^u s^ang-y^im chh`on h^a-l`oi, k'ong: "Ng`i he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, Ng`ai s'o f^on-h'i ke."
Su"n-L`in chit-s`u" chh^ui-pet Y^a-s^u hi-to kh'ong-y^a.
K`i chhai kh'ong-y^a si-s+u"p ngit, su Sat-tan ke su"-tham; k`i l^au y^a-chhu khiung-ha, pin y^u thi^en-s'u" l`oi f+uk-su" k`i.
Yok-hon p^un-ng`in ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u hi-to K^a-li-li, si^en-chh`on Song-ti ke fuk-y^im.
K`i k'ong: "S`u"-ki^en y'i-k^in to l'e, Song-ti ke koet voi s+u"t-hien l'e! Ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et chhui-ok, sin-chhi`ung li'a-ke fuk-y^im."
Y^a-s^u chhai K^a-li-li f`u-pi^en h`ang ke s`u", khon-t'o li'ong-ke t'a-`ng ke ng`in --- S^i-m`un l^au ki^a l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et --- chhai f`u-ch^ung ve-mi'ong t'a-`ng.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai! Ng`ai oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ng`in chhiong t'a-t'o `ng yit-yong."
K`i-t^eu chit-s`u" piong-h^a mi'ong-`e, th`en Y^a-s^u hi.
Hiong-chhi`en h`ang m`o k'i-y'en, Y^a-s^u yu khon-t'o S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon; k`i li'ong hi^ung-thi chhai s`on-t'ang ch'u"n-l^i `ng-mi'ong.
Y^a-s^u chit-s`u" f^u-seu k`i li'ong-s`a, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong ^a-p^a S^i-p'i-thai l^au k^ung-ng`in li`u chhai s`on-t'ang, th`en Y^a-s^u hi.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to K^a-pak-n`ung-s`ang, Y^a-s^u chhiu chhai ^On-sit-ngit ng+ip-hi fi-th`ong, chhai ke-vi k^au ng`in.
Th^ang-t'o k`i kau-hiun ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung k'am-kok f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai, y^in-vi k`i kau-hiun k`i-t^eu ke s`u" chhin-y^u khi`en-piang, l^au yit-p^an ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" m`o khiung-yong.
T'u-h'o, chhai k`i-t^eu ke fi-th`ong-t'u y^u yit-ke si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in h^em-k'ong:
" N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an l`oi k^on-s+ap ng`ai-t^eu? Ng`i l`oi s^eu-m+et ng`ai-t^eu he-m`o? Ng`ai t^i ng`i he m'a-ng`in; ng`i he Song-ti ke Su"n-ch'a!"
Y^a-s^u min-lin ke-chak si`a-l`in k'ong: "Ti^am-ti^am, tui li'a ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi!"
Si`a-l`in s'u" ke-ng`in chhi`on-s^u"n p+it-p+it-chhat, y`en-heu thai-kieu yit s^ang, chhiu tui ki^a s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi.

Chung-ng`in f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, th^eu-th^eu ngi-lun k'ong: "Li'a to-t'ai he m'a-ke su"-chh`in! S+u"t-chhai he s^in ke kau-hiun! K`i kin-y`en y^u khi`en-piang ch'u"-f^i si`a-l`in, si`a-l`in ya chu"n-k^in f+uk-chhi`ung k`i ke min-lin!"
'An-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-s^ang chhin kiak chhiu chh`on-phien K^a-li-li ke s'o-chhai.
K`i-t^eu yit l`i-kh^oi fi-th`ong, chhiu to S^i-m`un l^au ^On-tet-li+et ke vuk-h^a hi; Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon ya khiung-ha hi.
S^i-m`un ke chh^ong-m^in-^oi t'u-t'u fat-s^eu, soi chhai m`in-chh`ong-t'ang; Y^a-s^u yit to, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong k`i ke phiang l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong.
Y^a-s^u hi khon k`i, khi^en k`i ke s'u, f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi. K`i ke s^eu chhiu thui-thet; k`i hong-h'i-l`oi ch^eu-thai k`i-t^eu.
To l`im-am-'e, ngit-th`eu l+ok-s^an ke s`u", y^u chhin-t^o ng`in tai kok-ch'ung ke phiang-ng`in l^au p^un-k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en;
s`ang-nui ke ng`in chhi`on-phu chhi-s+ip to m`un-chhi`en l`oi.
Y^a-s^u y^i-h'o kok-ch'ung phiang-chu"n ke ng`in, ya kiuk-ch'eu chhin-t^o k'ui. K`i put-ch'un k'ui k'ong-fa, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu t^i k`i he m'a-ng`in.
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, thi^en h`an-m`ang k^ong, Y^a-s^u chhiu hong-chh`ong, chhut-hi ngoi-poi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai, chhai ke-vi kh`i-t'o.
S^i-m`un l^au k`i ke th`ung-ph^an chhut-hi chh`im k`i;
chh`im-t'o y^i-heu, chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu chhai ke-vi chh`im ng`i!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi fu-khiun ke chh^un-ch^ong, ng`ai ya yin-t^ong oi chhai ke-t^eu s'o-chhai chh`on-tho, y^in-vi li'a he ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit."
'An-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u h`ang-phien K^a-li-li chhi`on-thi, chhai kok thi-f^ong ke fi-th`ong chh`on-tho, yu kiuk-k'ui.
Y^u yit-ke pot th'ai-k^o ke ng`in l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en, kh'ui l+ok-hi khi`u k`i k'ong: "Ng`i na-he h'en, chhiu voi s'u" ng`ai chhiang-li."
Y^a-s^u s^im-ch^ung chh^ung-m^an l`in-m'en, chh^un-s'u mi^a k`i, en k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai h'en, ng`i chhiang-li l'e!"
K`i s^u"n-song ke th'ai-k^o chit-s`u" m`o-thet hi, k`i chhiu tet-t'o chhiang-li.
Y^a-s^u ngi`am-s`u" ham k`i l`i-kh^oi, ya chai-s^am f^un-fu k`i k'ong:

"`M-h'o chi^ong li'a-khien su" l^au ph+et-ng`in k'ong; chh+u"t-chiap hi kien chi-s^u", p^un k`i ki'am-chh`a, y`en-heu cheu M^o-s^i s'o-thin ke k^ui-k'i hien chi-v+ut, l`oi tui ng`in chu"n-m`in ng`i y'i-k^in chhiang-li l'e."

Ch'ung-he li'a-ke ng`in yit chhut-hi, f'an-ch'on si-chhu si^en-chh`on li'a-hong su"-chh`in, hoi Y^a-s^u m`o fap-thu chai k^ung-kh^oi ng+ip-s`ang, ch'u"-y^u h+et chhai s`ang-ngoi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai. Chung-ng`in h`an-he tui si-v`i l`oi chh`im k`i.
Ko m`o k'i-ngit, Y^a-s^u yu ch'on-to K^a-pak-n`ung-s`ang; thai-k^a th^ang-k'ong k`i chhai vuk-h^a ke s^eu-sit.
Chhin-t^o ng`in chhiu chhi-s+ip l`oi, li`en m`un-chhi`en ya m`o kh^ung-vi. Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-tho ke s`u"-chiet,
y^u si-ke ng`in k^ong yit-ke th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u.

Ch'ung-he y^in-vi ng`in chhin-t^o, k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu chi^ong k`i k^ong-to Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en. S'o-y^i k`i-t^eu chhiu chhai Y^a-s^u th`in-li`u ke s'o-chhai, tui vuk-t'ang chhak yit-chak kh^ung-'e; y`en-heu, chi^ong phiang-ng`in li`en k`i s'o soi ke chh'o-chhi+ak, chhui-h^a-hi.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o li'a-t^eu ng`in ke sin-s^im, chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: "Se-ch'u" ^a, ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en l'e."
Y^u k'i-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chh^o chhai ke-vi, s^im-ch^ung ngi-lun k'ong:
"Li'a-ke ng`in k'ong-fa ngi'ong-k'am 'an ko-fun! K`i k'ong v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke fa! Chh`u-li'au Song-ti y^i-ngoi, m'a-ng`in y^u sa-chhui ke khi`en-piang n`e?"
Y^a-s^u chit-s`u" t^i k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung si'ong m'a-ke, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an 'an-ngi`ong si'ong n`e?
Tui li'a-ke th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en' y`ung-yi n`e? Ya-he k'ong: 'Hong-h'i-l`oi, n^a ng`i ke chh'o-chhi+ak h`ang-ch'on-hi' kha y`ung-yi n`e?
Li'a-ha ng`ai oi tui ng`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai thi-song y^u sa-chhui ke khi`en-piang." Chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong:
"Ng`ai f^un-fu ng`i hong-h'i-l`oi, n^a ng`i ke chh'o-chhi+ak ch'on-hi vuk-h^a!"
