Ke-ng`in chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, n^a-h'i chh'o-chhi+ak, chhai thai-k^a mien-chhi`en h`ang chhut-hi. Chung-ng`in chhiu f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, siung-chan Song-ti k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi m`ang-su"t khon-t'o 'an-ngi`ong ke su"!"
Y^a-s^u yu to-ch'on K^a-li-li f`u-pi^en, yit thai-khi`un ng`in hi-to k`i ke-vi, k`i chhiu kau-hiun k`i-t^eu.
K`i chai hiong-chhi`en h`ang, khon-t'o yit-ke soi-vu-y`en, chhiu he ^A-l+et-f^i ke lai-'e Li-vi, chh^o chhai soi-ko^an. Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai!" Li-vi chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi th`en k`i.

Heu-l`oi Y^a-s^u chhai Li-vi ke vuk-h^a s+u"t-fan, chhin-t^o soi-vu-y`en l^au m`o s'u kau-k^ui ke ng`in ya th`en-t'en k`i l`oi, t^ong-ch^ung ya y^u chhin-t^o th`ung Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha s+u"t-fan.

Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in ch^ung ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" khon-t'o Y^a-s^u th`ung f'ai-ng`in l^au soi-kun khiung-ha s+u"t-fan, chhiu chu"t-mun ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "K`i ngi'ong-p^an th`ung soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in khiung-ha s+u"t-fan n`e?"
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o, chhiu en-k'ong: "Khien-kh^ong ke ng`in `m-s'u" y^i-s^en, y^u phiang ke ng`in chang oi. Ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit `m-he oi f^u-seu ngi-ng`in, he oi f^u-seu chhui-ng`in."

Y^u yit-p'ai, S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in t^ong chhai ke-vi kim-s+u"t, y^u ng`in l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in ke h+ok-s^ang kim-s+u"t, ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang m`o kim-s+u"t, he vi-t'o m'a-ke n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "S^in-l`ong h`an chhai f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it ch^ung, ng`in-hak k'am oi-s'u" kim-s+u"t? S^in-l`ong th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" kim-s+u"t.
Ch'ung-he s`u"-ki^en voi to, s^in-l`ong voi p^un-ng`in tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung tai-ch'eu, ke-s`u" k`i-t^eu chhiu oi kim-s+u"t.
"M`o ng`in yung s^in-pu p'u khiu-s^am; na-he 'an-ngi`ong, s^in p'u ke pu voi chh'a-li+et khiu-s^am, lan-kh^ung chhiu h`an-kha thai.

Ya m`o ng`in chi^ong s^in-chi'u ch^ong chhai khiu ph`i-thoi t'u; na-he 'an-ngi`ong, s^in-chi'u voi chong-li+et ph`i-thoi, chi'u l^au ph`i-thoi chhi`on-phu voi t'a-s'ong thet. S^in-chi'u oi ch^ong chhai s^in ph`i-thoi t'u chang chh+ok!"
Y^u yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, Y^a-s^u k^in-ko m+ak-thi`en, ki^a h+ok-s^ang ya th`ung k`i khiung-ha h`ang; k`i-t^eu yit-phi'en h`ang yit-phi'en l+ot t^eu m+ak-chhon.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang ngi'ong-p^an cho ^On-sit-ngit kim-ch'u" cho ke su"?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: " Thai-v'i l^au th`en k`i ke ng`in khiam-khiet yu t'u-k^i ke s`u" cho m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko he-m`o?

K`i ng+ip-hi Song-ti ke su"n-thien, s+u"t hien-p^un Song-ti ke pi'ang. Li'a-ke su" fat-s^en chhai ^A-p'i-^a-th^a cho thai-chi-s^u" ke s`u"-chiet. Cheu ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it, ch'u"-y^u chi-s^u" chang cho-tet s+u"t li'a-ke pi'ang-`e; ch'ung-he Thai-v'i n^a-l`oi s+u"t, yu p^un-p^un th`en k`i ke ng`in s+u"t."
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "^On-sit-ngit he vi-t'o ng`in sat ke; ng`in `m-he vi-t'o ^On-sit-ngit l`oi chh`un-chhai ke.
S'o-y^i Ng`in-ch'u" ya he ^On-sit-ngit ke Ch'u."
Y^a-s^u yu ng+ip-hi fi-th`ong; chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in, k`i ke yit-k^i s'u khi`o-thet.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in si'ong-oi chh`im Y^a-s^u ke p'a-piang l`oi ko k`i, chhiu chhai s`un-th`eu ch'ong-t'en, oi khon k`i chhai ^On-sit-ngit voi vi ng`in y^i-phiang m`o.
Y^a-s^u l^au ke s'u khi`o-thet ke ng`in k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, to th`eu-chhi`en l`oi."

Y`en-heu, mun thai-k^a k'ong: "Ko^an-he ^On-sit-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it he ngi'ong-p^an k^ui-thin? Oi cho h'o-su", ya-he cho f'ai-su"? Oi kiu ng`in, ya-he chh`u" ng`in?" Thai-k^a ti^am-ti^am `m chhut-s^ang.

Y^a-s^u chhiu fat-khi'en, yung muk-ch^u h`im k`i-t^eu, th`ung-s`u" s^im-ch^ung vi-t'o li'a-t^eu ng`in p^i-s^ong, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke s^im-k^on 'an ngang. K`i l^au ke-ng`in k'ong: "S'u chh^un chhut-l`oi!" Ke-ng`in chi^ong s'u yit chh^un chhut-l`oi, k`i ke s'u chhiu h'o l'e.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhut-hi, chhiu l^au H^i-l+it-t'ong ke ng`in chh^am-si`ong oi ngi'ong-p^an tui-fu Y^a-s^u l`oi sat-hoi k`i.
Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang l`i-kh^oi ke-vi to K^a-li-li-f`u ke-phi'en hi, y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in th`en-t'en k`i. Li'a-t^eu ng`in he tui K^a-li-li, Y`u-thai,

Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, Y^i-th'u-m^ai, Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en, pin Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun fu-khiun ke s`ang-su" l`oi ke. K`i-t^eu l`oi chh`im Y^a-s^u he y^in-vi th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-cho ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in.
Y^in-vi ng`in chhin thai-khi`un, Y^a-s^u chhiu f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang ch'un-phi yit-chak s`on, mi^en-tet thai-k^a chi^am-t'en k`i.
Y^in-vi k`i y^i-h'o chhin-t^o phiang-ng`in, s'o-y^u pot-phiang ke ng`in chhi`on-phu si'ong-oi chi^am-to th`eu-chhi`en l`oi mi^a k`i.
Ke-t^eu p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in yit khon-t'o k`i, chhiu ph+uk chhai k`i ke mien-chhi`en, h^em-k'ong: "Ng`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e!"
Y^a-s^u ngi`am-ngi`am min-lin si`a-l`in, cho-`m-tet chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang chh`on chhut-hi.
Y^a-s^u s^ong yit-chho s^an-t'ang, seu-s+ip k`i s'o kak-yi ke ng`in l`oi th`en k`i. K`i-t^eu l`oi-to k`i ke mien-chhi`en,
Y^a-s^u chhiu si'en-chhut s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in, ham k`i-t^eu cho s'u"-th`u, oi k`i-t^eu s`ong-s`ong th`ung k`i khiung-ha, ya oi phai k`i-t^eu hi chh`on-tho,
yu p^un k`i-t^eu kiuk-k'ui ke khi`en-piang.
Y^a-s^u s'o ki'en-si'en ke s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in he: S^i-m`un (Y^a-s^u yu th`ung k`i ^on-mi`ang P'i-tet),
S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Ng^a-kok ke l'o-th^ai Yok-hon (Y^a-s^u yu th`ung k`i-t^eu ^on-mi`ang Pan-n`i-kh`i, yi-su" he "sin-chh`in phau-li+et, chhiong l`ui-k^ung ke ng`in"),
yu y^u ^On-tet-li+et, F^i-l+it, P^a-t^o-l`o-m^ai, M^a-thai, T^o-m^a, ^A-l+et-f^i ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok, Th+at-thai, Kit-chin-t'ong ke S^i-m`un,
l^au chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai.
Y^a-s^u to-ch'on-hi vuk-t'u; yu y^u yit thai-khi`un ke ng`in l`oi chhi-s+ip, hoi k`i l^au h+ok-s^ang li`en s+u"t-fan ke s`u"-ki^en ya m`o.
Y^a-s^u vuk-h^a ke ng`in th^ang-k'ong li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, chhut-l`oi oi ch'u-t'ong k`i, y^in-vi y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K`i pot-ti^en l'e!"
Y^u-t^eu tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" k'ong: "K`i he p^un Ph+et-s^i-puk fu-s^u"n! K`i he kho k'ui-v`ong kiuk-k'ui!"
Y^a-s^u ham li'a-t^eu ng`in l`oi, yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Sat-tan ngi'ong-voi kiuk Sat-tan n`e?
Yit-ke koet-k^a chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, ke koet-k^a yit-thin voi kh^i-`m-h+et.
Yit-ke k^a-th`in chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, ke k^a-th`in thin-chh+ok voi kh^i-`m-h+et.
'An-ngi`ong, k'a-s'u" Sat-tan chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, k`i ke koet kiet-thin kh^i-`m-h+et, voi m+et-m`ong thet-hi.
"M`o ng`in n`en chin-ng+ip y'ung-su" ke vuk-h^a hi chhi'ong k`i ke chh`oi-s'an; chh`u-li'au si^en chi^ong y'ung-su" kh'un h'i-l`oi, chang y^u fap-thu chhi'ong k`i ke t^ung-s^i.
"Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`in s'o fam yit-chhiet ke chhui, l^au s'o-k'ong yit-chhiet f'i-pong ke fa, chhi`on-phu kh'o-y^i tet-t'o sa-mi^en;
ch'ung-he siet-th+uk Su"n-L`in ke ng`in y'un-y'en m`o kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en, y^in-vi k`i s'o fam ke he y'un-y'en ke chhui."
(Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-ke fa he y^in-vi y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K`i he p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n.")
Li'a-s`u", Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e l^au l'o-th^ai l`oi-to; k`i-t^eu kh^i chhai ngoi-poi, ham ng`in chh`on-fa p^un Y^a-s^u, k'ong k`i-t^eu oi kien k`i.
Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in v`i-t'en, chh^o chhai Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-pi^en; k`i-t^eu l^au k`i k'ong: "Khon ^a, ngi^a m^e l^au ngi^a l'o-th^ai chhai ngoi-poi, oi kien ng`i!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "M'a-ng`in he ng`ai ke ^a-m^e? M'a-ng`in he ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi?"
K`i khon-t'en chh^o chhai ch^u-v`i ke ng`in, k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`ai ke ^a-m^e, ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi chhai li'a-vi!
F`am s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ch'u"-yi ke chhiu-he ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, l^au ^a-m^e."

Y^a-s^u yu chhai K^a-li-li f`u-s`un kau-hiun chung-ng`in. Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in chhi-s+ip to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, s'o-y^i k`i s^ong s`on hi chh^o-t'en. S`on th`in chhai f`u-ch^ung, chung-ng`in kh^i chhai f`u ke s`un-th`eu.
Y^a-s^u chhiu yung p'i-yi k^au k`i-t^eu chhin-t^o tho-l^i; kh`i-ch^ung, k`i y^u k'ong:
"Ng`i-t^eu chu-yi th^ang ^a! Y^u yit-ke ve-ch'ung-ke chhut-hi ve-ch'ung.
K`i ve ke s`u", y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai lu-s`un, ti^au-'e p^i-l`oi chi^ong k`i-t^eu s+u"t-thet.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai n`ai chhin-chhi'en ke s+ak-th`eu thi-song; y^in-vi n`ai chhin-chhi'en, ch'ung-ch'u" chhin-kiak chhiu pau-ng`a chhut-l`oi;
ngit-th`eu chhut-l`oi yit sai, nun-ng`a chhiu kh^u-ch^au thet-hi, y^in-vi k^in m`o la chh^u"m.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai net-`e t^i-poi, net-`e thai h'i-l`oi, chi^ong y^ong-'e kh+it-t'en, chhiu m`o fap-thu kiet-ch'u".
Nang-ngoi y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi, ch'ong-thai s`u"n-s+uk, chhiu kiet chhin-t^o ch'u", y^u-t^eu s^u-s`u"n s^am-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu liuk-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu yit-pak-phi."
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!"
Y^a-s^u t^an-chhiang yit-s`a ke s`u"-chiet, y^u-t^eu th^ang-ko k`i k'ong-tho ke ng`in l^au s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha l`oi-kien k`i, chhi'ang-kau k`i li'a-t^eu p'i-yi ke yi-su".
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Tui ng`i-t^eu, Song-ti koet ke o-pi he yung m`in-k'ong ke; na-he tui ngoi-ng`in, yit-chhiet chhiu oi yung p'i-yi.

Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: K`i-t^eu khon-li'au yu khon, ch'ung-he `m-voi li'au-ki'e, th^ang-li'au yu th^ang, ch'ung-he `m-voi ng+ip-ng'i; na-`m-he 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu f`i-s^im ch'on-yi, Song-ti chhiu voi sa-mi^en k`i-t^eu."
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak li'a-ke p'i-yi he-m`o? 'An-ngi`ong, ngi'ong-voi m`in-ph+ak kh`i-th^a ke p'i-yi?
Ve-ch'ung ke ng`in s'o ve ke chhiu-he Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiong l+ok chhai lu-s`un ke ch'ung-ch'u"; k`i-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho, Sat-tan chit-s`u" chhiu l`oi, chi^ong ve chhai k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung ke ch^u"n-tho chhi'ong-ch'eu.
Yu y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiong l+ok chhai s+ak-th`eu thi-song ke ch'ung-ch'u"; k`i-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho chit-s`u" f^on-h'i chiap-su,
ch'ung-he ch^u"n-tho chhai k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung tang-k^in m`o chh^u"m, chh`un m`o k'i-ki'u, yit-ha vi-t'o ch^u"n-tho t`u-t'o khun-n`an ya-he pet-hoi, chhin-kiak chhiu tiet-t'o.
H`an y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiong ve chhai net-`e t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u"; k`i-t^eu y^u th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho,
ch'ung-he s^en-f+at ke chh^au-s^im, chhi`en-chh`oi ke y'u-f+et, l^au kok-ch'ung ke y+uk-mong ng+ip-l`oi chi^ong ch^u"n-tho hip-t'en, m`o fap-thu kiet k'o-ch'u".

Ch'ung-he, y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiong ve chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u"; k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho chhiu chiap-su, pin kiet k'o-ch'u", y^u-t^eu s^u-s`u"n s^am-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu liuk-s+u"p-phi, y^u-t^eu yit-pak-phi."
Y^a-s^u yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Y^u m'a-ng`in ti'am-t^en, n^a-l`oi piong chhai t'eu t'ai-h^a ya-he m`in-chh`ong-h^a? K'am-`m-he oi piong chhai t^en-th`oi-t'ang m^a?
Tak-hong y'un-chh`ong ke su" chui-heu voi hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi; khong-t'en ke su" chui-heu ya voi p^un-ng`in yet chhut-l`oi.
Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!"

K`i yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang ke oi li`u-s^im! Ng`i-t^eu yung m'a-ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti ya oi yung khiung-yong ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ng`i-t^eu, su"m-chu" oi h`an-kha t^o.
Y^u ke, oi p^un k`i h`an-kha t^o; m`o ke, li`en k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-s+it-s+it-'e ya oi chhi'ong-ch'eu."
Y^a-s^u ki-si+uk k'ong: "Song-ti ke koet chhiong yit-ke ng`in ve-ch'ung chhai thi-song.
K`i am-p^u-th`eu soi-muk, ngit-s`u"-th`eu hong-chh`ong, ke-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" pau-ng`a ch'ong-thai, ngi'ong-p^an voi 'an-ngi`ong, k`i `m t^i.
N`ai chhu"-y`en voi s'u" chh+u"t-v+ut s^en-ch'ong kiet-ch'u": si^en pau-ng`a, y`en-heu t'a-chhon, chui-heu kiet chhin-t^o ch'u".
'Ng-kuk siuk l'e, k`i chhiu yung v`o-li`am s^u-kot, y^in-vi s^u-s`u"n ke s`u"-chiet to l'e."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu k'ong Song-ti ke koet chhiong m'a-ke n`e? Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet yung m'a-ke p'i-yi l`oi sot-m`in n`e?
Song-ti ke koet kh'o-p'i yit-li+ap kie-chhoi-ch'u", he su"-ki^en chui-se ke ch'ung-ch'u". Y^u-ng`in chi^ong k`i chung chhai n`ai-t'u,
ko m`o k'i-ki'u, k`i chhiu thai h'i-l`oi, p'i ph+et-yong chhoi kha k^o-thai; k`i s^ang-chhut chh^u-k^i, f^i-ni^au chhai k`i y^im-li`ong ke s'o-chhai cho-teu."
Y^a-s^u yung chhin-t^o chhiong 'an-ngi`ong ke p'i-yi tui chung-ng`in k'ong-tho, cheu k`i-t^eu s'o n`en m`in-ph+ak ke l`oi k^au k`i-t^eu.
K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-tho chhin-oi yung p'i-yi; ch'ung-he t^an-chhiang th`ung h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha ke s`u", k`i chhiu chhi`on-phu ki'e-su"t p^un k`i-t^eu th^ang.
Ke-ngit am-p^u, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu chh^o-s`on l`oi-hi f`u tui-mien ke-phi'en."
K`i-t^eu chhiu l`i-kh^oi chung-ng`in. Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in chhai s`on-t'ang chh^o-h'o-se, h+ok-s^ang chhiu kh^oi-s`on; nang-ngoi ya y^u ph+et ke s`on khiung-ha hi.
Fut-y`en, y^u yit-chhu"n phau-f^ung chh^oi-t'en l`oi, p^o-long chhin thai, t'a-ng+ip s`on-t'u, s`on-t'u ke s'ui chh^a-`m-t^o voi n^em-h'i-l`oi.
Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u h`an chhai s`on-m^i, thiap-t'en ch'u"m-th`eu soi-muk. K`i-t^eu h^em-si'ang k`i, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu voi m`o miang l^o, ng`i m`o-oi tap ng`ai-t^eu he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u si'ang ko-l`oi, chit-phi f^ung k'ong: "Th`in h^a-l`oi!" Yu f^un-fu long k'ong: "Ti^am-ti^am!" F^ung chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, f`u-mien chhiu thai-thai ph`in-chhin.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Cho-m'a-ke 'an ki^ang? Ng`i-t^eu h`an m`o sin-s^im he-m`o?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu chhin ki^ang, p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in, li`en f^ung l^au long ya th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to K^a-li-li-f`u tui-mien ke-phi'en, s+uk Kiet-l^a-s^em-ng`in ke thi-kh^i.
Y^a-s^u yit h^a-s`on, chhiu t`u-t'o yit-ke tui chh'ung-p^u chhut-l`oi ke ng`in; li'a ng`in p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n,
yit-chh+u"t h+et chhai chh'ung-p^u, m`o-ng`in n`en kh'ung-chu" k`i, yung thiet-lien ya kh'un k`i `m-h+et.
Chhin-t^o p'ai y^u-ng`in yung kiok-li`au s'u-khau s'o-t'en k`i, ch'ung-he kiok-li`au sa p^un k`i t'a-sui thet-hi, s'u-khau sa p^un k`i ngi'u-th^on thet-hi. M`o-ng`in y^u la l+it l`oi chu"-f+uk k`i!
K`i ngit-ya chhai chh'ung-p^u l^au s^an-t'u chhin h^em, yu n^a s+ak-th`eu khau chhu"-k^a.
K`i y'en-y'en khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu ch'eu-ko-l`oi, kh'ui chhai k`i ke mien-chhi`en,
thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke Lai-'e Y^a-s^u, ng`i cho-m'a-ke oi k^on-s+ap ng`ai n`e? Ng`ai fung Song-ti ke mi`ang khi`u ng`i, m+ok ch^au-th+ap ng`ai!"
(K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa he y^in-vi Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in f^un-fu k`i k'ong: "Si`a-l`in ^a, tui li'a-ke ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi!")
Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ^on-to m'a-ke mi`ang?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ng`ai ^on-to 'Thai-khi`un', y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu chhin-t^o!"
K`i chai-s^am khi`u Y^a-s^u m+ok kiuk k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong.
Chhai fu-khiun s^an-ph`ai-t'ang, t'u-h'o y^u yit thai-khi`un ch^u-'e chhai ke-vi s+u"t t^ung-s^i;
si`a-l`in chhiu khi`u Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'un ng`ai-t^eu ng+ip ch^u-khi`un, p^un ng`ai-t^eu fu chhai ch^u-'e t^i-poi."

Y^a-s^u ch'un k`i-t^eu; si`a-l`in chhiu tui ke-ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, ng+ip-hi ch^u-khi`un; k^ui-khi`un ch^u-'e (yok li'ong-chhi^en-chak) ch^ung-h^a p^en-k^ong, tiet-l+ok f`u t^i-poi, chhi`on-phu chim-s'i.
Ch'ong ch^u-'e ke ng`in chhiu ch'eu-thet; k`i-t^eu hi s`ang-t'u l^au ch^u-v`i ke hi^ong-chh^un k'ong-h'i li'a-ke su". Chung-ng`in chhiu chhut-l`oi khon, to-t'ai fat-s^en m'a-ke su"-chh`in.

K`i-t^eu l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, khon-t'o ke p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, chhiu-he th`eu-p'ai p^un thai-khi`un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke, chh^o-t'en, chok-h'o s^am-fu, th`eu-n'o chh^in-si'ang; k`i-t^eu chhiu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang.
Khon-t'o li'a su"-chh`in k^in-ko ke ng`in, chi^ong fat-s^en chhai p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in s^u"n-song l^au ch^u-khi`un ke su" l^au thai-k^a k'ong.
K`i-t^eu chhiu y^eu-khi`u Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu ke thi-f^ong.
Y^a-s^u s^ong-s`on ke s`u", ke su"t p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in l`oi khi`u Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai th`en ng`i hi h'o-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u `m-h'en, ch'ung-he l^au k`i k'ong: "Ch'on-hi ngi^a vuk-h^a, l^au chh^in-chh+uk k'ong, Ch'u ngi'ong-p^an yung chh`u"-oi tui-thai ng`i, pin K`i vi ng`i s'o-cho ke su" he ngi'ong-p^an ke thai."

Ke ng`in chhiu l`i-kh^oi, chit-s`u" chhai S+u"p-yip ke thi-f^ong si^en-chh`on Y^a-s^u vi k`i s'o-cho ke su"-chh`in he ngi'ong-p^an ke thai; s'o-y^u th^ang-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai.
Y^a-s^u yu chh^o-s`on ch'on-to f`u ke-phi'en hi; chhai f`u-pi^en y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in l`oi-to k`i ke mien-chhi`en chhi-s+ip.
Ke s'o-chhai y^u yit-ke fi-th`ong ke k'on-l^i-y`en, mi`ang ^on-to Y+ap-l^u, ya l`oi. K`i yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu ph+uk chhai k`i ke kiok-chhi`en,
khi`u k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai ke m^an-'ng phiang-to voi s'i, khi`u ng`i l`oi-hi vi k`i on-s'u, y^i-h'o k`i, kiu k`i yit miang!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu th`ung k`i hi. Chhin-t^o ng`in ya chi^am-t'en th`en k`i hi.
Ke s'o-chhai y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, pot hiet-leu-phiang s+u"p-ngi ngi`en,

khon-ko chhin-t^o ke y^i-s^en, chhai k`i-t^eu ke s'u-h^a su chhin-t^o ke kh'u, s'o-y^u ke chhi`en-chh`oi ya yung-thet-hi; ch'ung-he k`i ke phiang `m t^an-chhiang m`o h'o, f'an-ch'on h`an-kha ngi`am-chhung.
K`i su"t th^ang-ko Y^a-s^u ke su", s'o-y^i chi^am chhai ng`in-khi`un ch^ung, h`ang-to Y^a-s^u ke heu-poi, mi^a k`i ke s^am,
s^im-k^on si'ong: "Ng`ai ch'u"-y^u mi^a-t'o k`i ke s^am, yit-thin voi tet-t'o y^i-h'o."
K`i ke hiet-leu ngi`am-s`u" chhiu th`in-ch'u", k'am-kok s^u"n-song ke phiang y'i-k^in h'o l'e.
Y^a-s^u chit-s`u" k'am-kok y^u n`en-l+it chhi`ung chhu"-k^a s^u"n-song chhut-hi, chhiu chhai ng`in-khi`un ch^ung ch'on-ko s^u"n l`oi, k'ong: "M'a-ng`in mi^a ng`ai ke s^am?"
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang en k`i k'ong: "Ng`i khon, 'an t^o ng`in chi^am-t'en ng`i, ng`i h`an mun: 'M'a-ng`in mi^a ng`ai' m^a?"
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u si-mien k'in chh`im, oi khon m'a-ng`in mi^a k`i.
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a t^i chhu"-k^a s^u"n-song s'o fat-s^en ke su", chhiu p+it-p+it-chhat, l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en kh'ui l+ok-hi, cheu-s+u"t l^au k`i k'ong.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Moi-'e ^a, ng`i ke sin-s^im kiu-t'o ng`i! ^On-s^im ch'on-hi, ng`i ke phiang y'i-k^in h'o l'e."

Y^a-s^u h`an k'ong-t'en li'a-ki fa ke s`u", y^u ng`in tui fi-th`ong k'on-l^i-y`en ke vuk-h^a k'on-l`oi, l^au Y+ap-l^u k'ong: "Ngi^a moi-'e y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ngi'ong-p^an h`an l`o-thung s^in-s^ang n`e?"
Y^a-s^u `m-tap k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke fa, tui fi-th`ong ke k'on-l^i-y`en k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang, ch'u"-oi sin!"
Y`en-heu k`i tai-t'en P'i-tet, Ng^a-kok, l^au Ng^a-kok ke l'o-th^ai Yok-hon khiung-ha hi, `m-h'en p^un ph+et-ng`in th`en-t'en k`i.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to fi-th`ong k'on-l^i-y`en ke vuk-h^a, Y^a-s^u khon-t'o thai-k^a lon chh`au-chh`au, thai-s^ang kieu.
Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke lon chh`au-chh`au thai-s^ang kieu n`e? Se-ng`in-`e pin m`o s'i, he soi-thet thin-thin."
K`i-t^eu chhiu seu k`i. Y^a-s^u chi^ong k`i-t^eu kiuk chhut-hi, chhiu tai-t'en se-ng`in-`e ke y`a-^oi l^au k`i s^am-ke h+ok-s^ang ng+ip-hi se-^a-moi-'e ke f`ong-ki^en.
K`i khi^en-t'en se-^a-moi-'e ke s'u, tui k`i k'ong: "Thai-li-s^a, k'u-m'i!" Yi-su" chhiu-he: "Se-^a-moi-'e, ng`ai f^un-fu ng`i, hong-h'i-l`oi!"
Se-^a-moi-'e ngi`am-s`u" chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi h`ang. (K`i y'i-k^in s+u"p-ngi-se). Li'a-ke su", s'u" thai-k^a f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i!
Y^a-s^u ngi`am-ngi`am f^un-fu k`i-t^eu, `m-h'o si^en-chh`on li'a-ke su"-chh`in, yu k^au-tai n^a t^eu t^ung-s^i p^un se-^a-moi-'e s+u"t.
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, to-ch'on-hi chhu"-k^a ke k^a-hi^ong; ki^a h+ok-s^ang ya th`en-t'en k`i.

To ^On-sit-ngit, k`i chhai fi-th`ong kau-hiun ng`in. T^ong-t^o ng`in th^ang-t'o k`i ke fa chhiu chhin kh`i-koai, k'ong: "Li'a-s`a ng`in tui nai-vi tet-t'o li'a-ke p'un-su" n`e? M'a-ng`in p^un k`i li'a-ke chu"-fi n`e? M`o si'ong-t'o k`i h`an-voi h`ang s`u"n-chiak ^o!

K`i k'am `m-he muk-siong? K`i `m-he M^a-li-^a ke lai-'e, Ng^a-kok, Yok-sit, Y`u-thai l^au S^i-m`un ke ^a-k^o m^a? K`i ke-t^eu l'o-moi `m-he h+et chhai ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi m^a?" K`i-t^eu chhiu kh^i-chhi+et k`i.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chh`u-li'au chhai chhu"-k^a ke p'un-hi^ong, p'un-chh+uk, p'un-k^a y^i-ngoi, si^en-t^i chhi`on-phu su ng`in ch^un-kin."
'An-ngi`ong, k`i chhai ke-vi chhiu m`o fap-thu h`ang m'a-ke s`u"n-chiak, ch'u"-y^u on-s'u chhai yit-t^eu phiang-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, l`oi y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
Y^in-vi ke-t^eu ng`in `m-h'en sin, k`i k'am-kok f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai. Y^a-s^u ki-si+uk chhai fu-khiun tak-ke chh^un-ch^ong kau-hiun ng`in.
K`i ham s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi, phai k`i-t^eu li'ong-s`a li'ong-s`a khiung-ha chhut-hi. K`i su k`i-t^eu kiuk si`a-l`in ke khi`en-piang,
yu f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chhut-ngoi ke s`u", chh`u-li'au yit-k^i ko'ai-kun-'e, `m-h'o tai m'a-ke t^ung-s^i; `m-h'o tai s+u"t-v+ut l^au l^i-h`ang-thoi, s^am-thoi-t'u ya `m-h'o tai chhi`en;
oi chok-h`ai, ch'ung-he `m-h'o k^a-tai yit-li^ang nui-s^am."
K`i yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi-to yit-ke s'o-chhai, nai k^a-ng`in h'en chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiu h+et chhai ke-vi, chh+u"t-to ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai.

M`o-lun to m'a-ke s'o-chhai, na-he ke-vi ke ng`in `m chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, ya `m-th^ang ng`i-t^eu ke fa, ng`i-t^eu chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, ya oi chi^ong kiok-hong ke n`ai-f'un t'em-thet, l`oi p'eu-su" tui k`i-t^eu ke k'in-ko."
H+ok-s^ang chhiu chhut-hi chh`on-tho, khien ng`in hi-si`a k^ui-chu"n.
K`i-t^eu ya kiuk-ch'eu chhin-t^o k'ui, yung y`u k`o chhin-t^o phiang-ng`in, y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.

Ko^an-he Y^a-s^u ke yit-chhiet su", H^i-l+it-v`ong chhi`on-phu y^u th^ang-t'o, y^in-vi Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-s^ang y'i-k^in chh`on-to tak s'o-chhai. Y^u ng`in k'ong: "K`i he h`ang s'e-l^i ke Yok-hon f'an-s^ang, chang voi y^u h`ang li'a-t^eu s`u"n-chiak ke n`en-l+it."
Y^u ng`in k'ong: "K`i he Y^i-li-^a." Ya y^u ng`in k'ong: "K`i he si^en-t^i, chhiong k'u-s`u"-thoi ke si^en-t^i."
Ch'ung-he H^i-l+it th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu k'ong: "K`i chhiu-he p^un ng`ai ch'am-th`eu ke Yok-hon f'an-s^ang l'e!"

Ngi`en-l`oi, H^i-l+it su"t ham ng`in hi chok Yok-hon, chi^ong k`i thak-t'en, ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u. H^i-l+it cho li'a-ke su" he oi p^un H^i-l`o-t'i f^on-h'i; H^i-l`o-t'i he H^i-l+it ke hi^ung-thi F^i-l+it ke p^u-ngi`ong, ch'ung-he p^un k`i chiam-l`oi cho p^u-ngi`ong.
Yok-hon chai-s^am chit-phi H^i-l+it k'ong: "Ng`i chiam hi^ung-thi ke p^u-ngi`ong he v`i-fap ke!"
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, H^i-l`o-t'i s^im-ch^ung yen-hen k`i, si'ong-oi hoi-s'i k`i, ch'ung-he m`o k^i-fi;

y^in-vi H^i-l+it t^i Yok-hon he chu"n-chh+u"t su"n-kiet ke ng`in, s'o-y^i chhiu kin-chhung p'o-fu k`i. H^i-l+it tak-p'ai th^ang-t'o Yok-hon s'o-k'ong ke fa, s^im-ch^ung chhiu m`o ph`in-^on, ch'ung-he yu chhin f^on-h'i th^ang k`i k'ong-lun.
H^i-l`o-t'i s'o t'en ke k^i-fi to l'e. H^i-l+it s^ang-ngit ke s`u", k'i-h`ang su"n-thai ke yen-fi, phan-chok ch^eu-thai v`un-v'u pak-k^on l^au K^a-li-li m`in-ki^en ke li^ang-chhiu.

Y`en-s+it ch^ung, H^i-l`o-t'i ke moi-'e ng+ip-l`oi thiau-v'u; H^i-l+it l^au ng`in-hak chhi`on-phu chhin f^on-h'i. S'o-y^i v`ong tui se-^a-moi-'e k'ong: "Y`u-chhai ng`i tui ng`ai y^eu-khi`u m'a-ke, ng`ai yit-thin voi s'ong ng`i."
K`i yu fat-su" k'ong: "M`o-lun ng`i khi`u m'a-ke, chhiu-he ng`ai ke yit-pan k^ong-s^an, ng`ai ya voi p^un ng`i!"
Ke se-^a-moi-'e chhut-hi mun ki^a-m^e, k'ong: "Ng`ai oi khi`u m'a-ke chang h'o n`e?" Ki^a-m^e k'ong: "S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a."
Se-^a-moi-'e ngi`am-s`u" to-ch'on-l`oi kien v`ong, khi`u k'ong: "Khi`u v`ong chit-s`u" chi^ong S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a piong chhai ph`an-t'u p^un ng`ai!"
V`ong th^ang-t'o li'a-ke chhi'ang-khi`u, f^i-s`ong v`i-n`an; ch'ung-he k`i y'i-k^in chhai ng`in-hak mien-chhi`en fat-su", chhiu m`o si'ong-oi kh^i-chhi+et se-^a-moi-'e ke chhi'ang-khi`u.
S'o-y^i, k`i chit-s`u" min-lin v'i-p^in hi n^a Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a l`oi. V'i-p^in chhiu hi-to k^am-ngi+uk, ch'am Yok-hon ke th`eu-n`a,
piong chhai ph`an-t'u, t^eu-p^un se-^a-moi-'e; k`i chhiu k^au-p^un ki^a-m^e.
Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-ke s^eu-sit, chhiu l`oi chi^ong Yok-hon ke s^u"n-s^u" li^ang-ch'eu, chong chhai f`un-mu t^i-poi.
S'u"-th`u to-ch'on-l`oi kien Y^a-s^u, chi^ong k`i-t^eu s'o-cho s'o-chh`on ke yit-chhiet, chhi`on-phu tui k`i po-ko.

Y^in-vi l`oi-l`oi hi-hi ke ng`in chhin t^o, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang m`o-h`an to m`o s`u"-ki^en h'o s+u"t-fan, s'o-y^i k`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu th`en ng`ai l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai hi^u-sit yit-ha."
K`i-t^eu chhiu chh^o-s`on chhut-fat, ti^am-ti^am-'e hi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai.

Ch'ung-he, y^u chhin-t^o ng`in khon-t'o k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi, ngi`am-s`u" ngin-t'o he k`i-t^eu. Chung-ng`in chhiu tui tak-ke s`ang chhut-l`oi, si^ong-ch^ang pi-poi k'on hi, p'i Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang si^en to ke s'o-chhai.
Y^a-s^u yit s^ong-ngan, khon-t'o li'a yit thai-khi`un ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhiong m`o m+uk-ng`in ke y`ong-khi`un khiung-yong; k`i chhiu k^au k`i-t^eu chhin-t^o tho-l^i.
L`im-am-'e ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, tui k`i k'ong: "Thi^en am l^o, li'a-vi yu he phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai,
chhi'ang ham thai-k^a l`i-kh^oi, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu hi fu-khiun ke chh^un-ch^ong m^ai t^ung-s^i s+u"t."
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu p^un k`i-t^eu s+u"t!" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu yung li'ong-pak-chak ngi`un-chhi`en hi m^ai pi'ang-`e p^un k`i-t^eu s+u"t he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi chh`im-khon-n'a, ch'ung-khiung y^u k'i-t^o pi'ang-`e?" K`i-t^eu chh`im to-ch'on-l`oi k'ong: "Ch'u"-y^u 'ng-chak pi'ang, li'ong-m^i `ng."
Y^a-s^u f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang h^em chung-ng`in f^un-kh^oi chh^o chhai chh'o-phi`ang-t'ang.
Chung-ng`in chhiu chh^o-h^a-l`oi, y^u-t^eu yit-ph`ai yit-pak s`a, y^u-t^eu 'ng-s+u"p s`a.

Y^a-s^u chi^ong 'ng-chak pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng n^a-h'i-l`oi, ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, k'am-chhia Song-ti, y`en-heu pak-kh^oi pi'ang-`e, k^au-p^un h+ok-s^ang; h+ok-s^ang chhiu p^un-p^un chung-ng`in. Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, k`i ya chi^ong li'ong-m^i `ng-`e p^un-p^un thai-k^a.
Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu s+u"t-to p'au;
h+ok-s^ang chi^ong s'o chh^un ke pi'ang-sui-'e l^au `ng-sui-'e ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, ch^ong-m^an s+u"p-ngi-chak l`am-`e.
S+u"t pi'ang-`e ke n`am-ng`in khiung-y^u 'ng-chhi^en s`a.
Su"-heu, Y^a-s^u ngi`am-s`u" chh^ui ki^a h+ok-s^ang s^ong-s`on, si^en hi tui-mien ke Pak-soi-thai, t'en k`i h^em chung-ng`in ch'on-hi.
L`i-kh^oi thai-k^a heu, k`i chhiu s^ong-s^an hi kh`i-t'o.
To am-p^u-th`eu ke s`u", s`on y'i-k^in chhang-to f`u-ch^ung, Y^a-s^u yit-s`a h`an li`u chhai ngan-song.

K`i khon-t'o h+ok-s^ang chhang-s`on chhin s^in-kh'u, y^in-vi s`on ngi+ak-f^ung h`ang. Thi^en-m`ung-k^ong ke s`u", Y^a-s^u chhai f`u-mien h`ang-t'en hi h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, si'ong-oi tui k`i-t^eu ph`ong-pi^en ko-hi.
H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o k`i chhai f`u-mien h`ang, l'au-t'o he k'ui, chhiu h^em h'i-l`oi;
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu thai-k^a khon-t'o k`i, ya ki^ang-to voi s'i. Y^a-s^u chit-s`u" tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "^On-s^im, he ng`ai, `m-s'u" ki^ang!"
K`i s^ong-hi th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha chh^o-s`on, f^ung chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi. H+ok-s^ang hak-to ngong-ngong,
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu m`o li'au-ki'e p^un pi'ang li'a-khien su" ke yi-su"; k`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n'o chhin thun.
K`i-t^eu ko-li'au f`u, chhai Kiet-n`i-sat-l+et kho ngan, chi^ong s`on thak-h'o.
K`i-t^eu yit h^a-s`on, chung-ng`in chhiu ngin-chhut Y^a-s^u.
Chung-ng`in h`ang-phien ke s'o-chhai, th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u chhai nai-vi, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong phiang-ng`in yung chh'o-chhi+ak k^ong-to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi.

M`o-lun Y^a-s^u hi-to hi^ong-ha, s`ang-t'u, ya-he chh^un-ch^ong, chung-ng`in chhiu chi^ong phiang-ng`in piong chhai ki^e-lu, khi`u Y^a-s^u ch'un phiang-ng`in t^an-chhiang mi^a k`i ke s^am-m^i; s'o-y^u mi^a-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au k'i-ke tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" khiung-ha l`oi kien Y^a-s^u.
K`i-t^eu khon-t'o Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang ch^ung y^u-ng`in yung m`o chhiang-li ke s'u s+u"t-fan, m`o chhiong Fap-li-soi-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong si^en s'e-s'u.
(Ngi`en-l`oi Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au yit-p^an ke Y`u-thai-ng`in chhi`on-phu ch^un-s'u ch'u-si^en ke chh`on-th'ung, na-he m`o cheu k^ui-thin ke f^ong-fap si^en s'e-s'u chhiu `m s+u"t-fan;

tui ki^e-lu m^ai-l`oi ke t^ung-s^i, na m`o si^en s'e-ko ya `m s+u"t. K`i-t^eu h`an ch^un-s'u chhin-t^o kh`i-th^a chh`on-th'ung ke k^ui-thin, chhiong oi ngi'ong-p^an s'e p^i-'e, v+ok-'e, th`ung-hi l^au m`in-chh`ong t'en-t'en.)

S'o-y^i Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ngi'ong-p^an ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang m`o ch^un-s'u ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke chh`on-th'ung, f'an-ch'on yung m`o chhiang-li ke s'u s+u"t-fan n`e?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: " Y^i-soi-^a ch'u" ng`i-t^eu li'a-ch'ung k'a-mo v`i-san ke ng`in s'o-k'ong ke yi-ngi`en s+u"t-chhai m`o `m-chh+ok! Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o ki: Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: 'Li'a-t^eu ng`in yung choi-s`un-ph`i ch^un-kin Ng`ai, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ke s^im y'en-y'en l`i-kh^oi Ng`ai.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong ng`in ke k^ui-thin ch'un-cho Ng`ai ke min-lin l`oi k^au ng`in; k`i-t^eu kin-pai Ng`ai ya he kh^ung-kh^ung.' "
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ch^un-s'u k'u-ch'o ng`in ke chh`on-th'ung, ch'ung-he v`i-f'an Song-ti ke min-lin."
K`i yu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu yung chhin k^o-m`in ke chia-khi'eu l`oi kh^i-chhi+et Song-ti ke min-lin, muk-tit chhiu-he oi p'o-s'u chhu"-k^a ke chh`on-th'ung.
M^o-s^i k'ong: 'Oi hau-kin y`a-^oi'; yu k'ong: 'Chu-ma y`a-^oi ke, oi phan k`i s'i-h`in.'
Ng`i-t^eu phi^en-phi^en k'ong, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in tui y`a-^oi k'ong: 'Ng`ai chi^ong fung-y^ong ng`i-t^eu ke t^ung-s^i ch'un-cho Kh'o-p'an' (yi-su" he hien-p^un Song-ti ke t^ung-s^i),
k`i chhiu `m-s'u" fung-y^ong y`a-^oi.
Ng`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, chhiu-he n^a ng`i-t^eu k^au ng`in ke chh`on-th'ung l`oi fi-thet Song-ti ke fa. Ng`i-t^eu h`an cho chhin-t^o chhiong li'a-ch'ung ke su"."
Y^a-s^u yu seu-s+ip chung-ng`in to k`i mien-chhi`en, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a oi th^ang ng`ai ke fa, ya oi m`in-ph+ak.
Tui ngoi-poi ng+ip-to ng`in t^i-poi ke, `m-voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li; f'an-ch'on, tui t^i-poi chhut-l`oi ke chang voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi chung-ng`in ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u ke s`u", ki^a h+ok-s^ang mun k`i li'a p'i-yi ke yi-su".
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-yong m`o m`in-ph+ak m^a? K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m t^i? Tui ngoi-poi ng+ip-hi ke `m-voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li;

y^in-vi tui ngoi-poi ng+ip-hi ke `m-he to k`i ke s^im-ch^ung, he to k`i ke chh`ong-t'u t^i-poi, y`en-heu chhiu ^o chhut-l`oi." (Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-ke fa, yi-su" he k'ong yit-chhiet s+u"t-v+ut chhi`on-phu he chhiang-li ke.)
K`i ki-si+uk k'ong: "S'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li ke he tui ng`in t^i-poi chhut-l`oi ke.
Y^in-vi tui ng`in s^im-ch^ung chhut-l`oi ke, y^u ch'ung-ch'ung ke ok-ngiam; li'a-t^eu ok-ngiam voi s'u" k`i fam th^ung-ki^en, th^eu-n^a, hi^ung-sat, ki^en-y`im,
th^am-s^im, si`a-ok, k'ui-cha, fong-thong, chhit-tu, f'i-pong, ki^eu-ngau, ti^en-kh`ong t'en chhui-ok.
Li'a yit-chhiet ke si`a-ok chhi`on-phu he tui ng`in t^i-poi chhut-l`oi, ya chu"n-k^in voi s'u" ng`in m`o chhiang-li ke."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, to Thai-ng`i-s`ang fu-khiun ke thi-f^ong hi. K`i h+et chhai yit-ke ng`in-k^a, m`o-oi p^un ng`in t^i, ch'ung-he khong `m-h+et.
Y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, k`i ke moi-'e p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n. K`i th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u ke su", chit-s`u" l`oi-kien k`i, kh'ui chhai k`i ke kiok-chhi`en.
Li'a fu-ng`in-k^a he yit-ke ngoi-koet-ng`in, chhai Si-li-^a ke F^i-n`i-k^i chhut-se ke. K`i khi`u Y^a-s^u chi^ong ki^a moi-'e s^u"n-song ke k'ui kiuk chhut-hi.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Oi p^un ch'u"-'ng si^en s+u"t-p'au; n^a ch'u"-'ng s+u"t ke pi'ang-`e fit p^un ki'eu-`e s+u"t he `m-chh+ok ke."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, m`o `m-chh+ok, ch'ung-he chok-t'ai-h^a ke ki'eu-`e me s+u"t ch'u"-'ng s'o chh^un ke pi'ang-sui-'e ^a!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ph`in li'a-ki fa, ng`i h'o ch'on-hi l'e; k'ui y'i-k^in tui ngi^a moi-'e s^u"n-song chhut-hi l'e!"
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a chhiu ch'on vuk-h^a, khon-t'o moi-'e soi chhai m`in-chh`ong-t'ang; k'ui y'i-k^in l`i-kh^oi k`i.
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi Thai-ng`i fu-khiun ke thi-f^ong, k^in-ko S^i-tun, tui S+u"p-yip ch'on-to K^a-li-li-f`u.
Y^u ng`in chi^ong yit-ke yu l^ung yu 'a ke ng`in tai-to Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en l`oi, khi`u Y^a-s^u vi k`i on-s'u.
Y^a-s^u tai k`i l`i-kh^oi ng`in-khi`un, to s`un-th`eu hi, yung chhu"-k^a ke s'u-ch'u" tham k`i ke ng'i-k^ung, yu yung h'eu-l^an k`o k`i ke s+at-m`a.
Y^a-s^u ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, chh^u"m-chh^u"m th'eu yit-h'eu thai-hi, tui ke-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-fat-thai!" yi-su" chhiu-he "T'a kh^oi-l`oi!"
Ke-ng`in ke ng'i-k^ung chhiu t'a kh^oi-l`oi, s+at-m`a-k^in ya ngiung-h^a-l`oi, k`i chhiu kh^oi-khi'eu k'ong-fa, chhi`on m`o khun-n`an.
Y^a-s^u f^un-fu thai-k^a chhi^en-van `m-h'o tui ng`in k'ong-h'i li'a-hong su"; ch'ung-he k`i y+et f^un-fu, k`i-t^eu chhiu y+et si^en-chh`on.
S'o-y^u th^ang-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu s+u"p-f^un kh`i-koai; k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K`i tak-yong su"-chh`in chhi`on-phu cho-to 'an h'o! K`i su"m-chu" p^un ng'i-l^ung ke th^ang-t'o, p^un 'a-`e k'ong-fa!"
Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, nang-ngoi yit thai-khi`un ng`in chhi-s+ip khiung-ha. K`i-t^eu m`o m'a-ke h'o s+u"t; Y^a-s^u ham h+ok-s^ang l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Ng`ai thoi li'a-khi`un ng`in chhin t^am-s^im, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha y'i-k^in s^am-ngit, li'a-ha m`o t^ung-s^i h'o s+u"t l^o.
Na-he ng`ai h^em k`i-t^eu ngo-t'u-s'u" ch'on-hi, k`i-t^eu chhai lu-song voi ngo-to pan-s^ang-s'i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu y^u-t^eu he tui chhin-y'en l`oi ke."
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "Chhai li'a phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai, ng`ai-t^eu oi hi nai-vi chh`im 'an-t^o ke s+u"t-v+ut p^un li'a-t^eu ng`in s+u"t-p'au n`e?"
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu y^u k'i-t^o pi'ang?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Chhit-chak."

Y^a-s^u f^un-fu chung-ng`in chh^o chhai thi-song, y`en-heu n^a-h'i ke chhit-chak pi'ang-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, k^au-p^un h+ok-s^ang, ham k`i-t^eu chh`on-p^un thai-k^a; h+ok-s^ang chhiu p^un-p^un chung-ng`in.
K`i-t^eu ya y^u k'i-m^i se `ng-`e; Y^a-s^u hien-song k'am-chhia, f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang ya p^un-p^un thai-k^a.
Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu s+u"t-to p'au. H+ok-s^ang ngi^am s+u"t-chh^un ke sui-'e, ch^ong-m^an chhit-chak l`am-`e.
Ke-t^eu ng`in thai-yok y^u si-chhi^en s`a. Y^a-s^u chhiu ham chung-ng`in san-kh^oi,
ngi`am-s`u" l^au h+ok-s^ang s^ong-s`on, hi Thai-m^a-n'u-th^a ke thi-f^ong.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi kien Y^a-s^u, l^au k`i phien-lun. K`i-t^eu si'ong-oi hoi k`i, chhiu y^eu-khi`u k`i h`ang yit-ke s`u"n-chiak, l`oi chu"n-m`in k`i s'o-cho ke he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.

Y^a-s^u chh^u"m-chh^u"m th'eu yit-h'eu thai-hi k'ong: "Li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an oi y^eu-khi`u s`u"n-chiak n`e? Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o m'a-ke s`u"n-chiak h'o p^un li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in khon!"
K`i chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, yu s^ong-s`on ko-hi f`u ke tui-mien.
H+ok-s^ang `m ki-tet tai k^a-t^eu pi'ang-`e, s`on-t'ang ch'u"-y^u chh^un yit-chak pi'ang-`e, m`o ph+et ke s+u"t-v+ut.
Y^a-s^u k'in-ko k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, oi th`i-f`ong Fap-li-soi-ng`in ke fat-kau l^au H^i-l+it ke fat-kau."
K`i-t^eu p'i-chh'u" am-ch^ung ngi-lun k'ong: "K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa, pha-he y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu m`o k^a-tai pi'ang-`e."

Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an th'o-lun m`o pi'ang-`e li'a-khien su" n`e? K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu h`an-m`ang li'au-ki'e, h`an m`o m`in-ph+ak he-m`o? Ng`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n'o k'am 'an thun?
Ng`i-t^eu y^u muk-ch^u, k'am khon-`m-t'o? Y^u ng'i-k^ung, k'am th^ang-`m-t'o? Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m ki-tet-hi l'e?
Ng`ai pak-kh^oi 'ng-chak pi'ang-`e p^un-p^un 'ng-chhi^en ng`in s+u"t ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chi^ong s+u"t-chh^un ke sui-'e ch^ong-m^an k'i-t^o l`am-`e?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "S+u"p-ngi l`am."
Y^a-s^u yu mun-k'ong: "Ng`ai pak-kh^oi chhit-chak pi'ang-`e p^un-p^un si-chhi^en ng`in s+u"t ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu yu ch^ong-m^an k'i-t^o l`am-`e?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Chhit l`am."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu h`an `m-voi m`in-ph+ak he-m`o?"
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to Pak-soi-thai, y^u-ng`in tai yit-ke m^o-muk-ke to Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en l`oi, y^eu-khi`u Y^a-s^u mi^a k`i.

Y^a-s^u khi^en m^o-muk ke s'u, tai k`i to chh^un-ch^ong ngoi-poi hi, phi h'eu-l^an chhai k`i ke muk-ch^u hong, y`en-heu on-s'u chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i y^u khon-t'o t^ung-s^i m`o?"
K`i ngo-th`eu l`oi khon, k'ong: "Ng`ai y^u khon-t'o ng`in; k`i-t^eu chhiong su-'e, h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi."
Y^a-s^u yu yung s'u mi^a k`i ke muk-ch^u. Ke m^o-muk-ke pak-kh^oi muk-ch^u l`oi khon, chhiu v`an-chhi`on f^i-f+uk, tak-yong t^ung-s^i khon-to chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u.
Y^a-s^u ham k`i ch'on-hi, yu f^un-fu k`i k'ong: "Li`en li'a chh^un-ch^ong ya `m-h'o chai ng+ip-hi."
Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang hi Kh'ai-sat-li-^a-F^i-l+ip-p'i fu-khiun ke chh^un-ch^ong. Chhai lu-song, k`i mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Yit-p^an ng`in k'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he S^u"-s'e Yok-hon; y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he Y^i-li-^a; ya y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he si^en-t^i ch^ung ke yit-ke."
Y^a-s^u yu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu n`e? Ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in?" P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i chhiu-he K^i-tuk."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, yit-thin `m-h'o tui ph+et-ng`in k'ong k`i ke s^u"n-fun.

Y^a-s^u chhiu kh^oi-s'u" kau-su" h+ok-s^ang, Ng`in-ch'u" yit-thin oi su chhin-t^o ke kh'u-nan; k`i voi p^un ch'ong-l'o, chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" hi-chhi+et, ya voi p^un-ng`in sat-hoi, ch'ung-he thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at.
K`i chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" k'ong-to chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u. P'i-tet chhiu l^ai-t'en Y^a-s^u, kh^oi-s'u" khien k`i.
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n, khon-t'en h+ok-s^ang, chit-phi P'i-tet k'ong: "Sat-tan, s'am-kh^oi! Ng`i ke si'ong-fap `m-he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, he ng`in ke si'ong-fap."

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u ham chung-ng`in l^au h+ok-s^ang to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Si'ong-oi th`en ng`ai ke ng`in, chhiu oi piong-thet chhu"-k^a, khi`a-h'i k`i ke s+u"p-su"-ka l`oi th`en ng`ai.
Y^in-vi si'ong-oi kiu chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang; vi-t'o ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke fuk-y^im s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Ng`in na-he chhon-t'o chhi`on su"-kie, ch'ung-he s'ong-su"t chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang, y^u m'a-ke lu-yung n`e? T^ong-y`en m`o!
K`i oi n^a m'a-ke l`oi von chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang n`e?

Tui li'a y`im-lon l^au si`a-ok ke su"-thoi, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, y^in-vi ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke kau-hiun k'am-kok kien-seu, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai ki^a P^a ke y`ung-k^ong ch^ung, th`ung k`i ke su"n thi^en-s'u" khiung-ha kong-l`im ke-s`u", ya oi khon k`i cho kien-seu ke ng`in."

Y^a-s^u yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, kh^i chhai li'a-vi ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu chhai s'i y^i-chhi`en voi khon-t'o Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en thai-y^u n`en-l+it l`oi s+u"t-hien."
Liuk-ngit y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u tai-t'en P'i-tet, Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon, ti^am-ti^am-'e s^ong yit-chho k^o-s^an. Chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en, Y^a-s^u ke h`in-siong k'oi-pien:
K`i ke s^am fat-k^ong, f^i-s`ong ke ph+ak, su"-ki^en m`o-ng`in n`en chi^ong pu-'e ngiam-to 'an ph+ak.
S^am-ke h+ok-s^ang fut-y`en khon-t'o Y^i-li-^a l^au M^o-s^i chhai ke-vi th`ung Y^a-s^u k'ong-fa.
P'i-tet tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chhin h'o! Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi tap s^am-ki^en li`au-`e, yit-ki^en p^un ng`i, yit-ki^en p^un M^o-s^i, yit-ki^en p^un Y^i-li-^a."
Y^in-vi s^am-ke h+ok-s^ang chhin ki^ang, P'i-tet `m-t^i oi k'ong m'a-ke chang h'o.
Li'a-s`u" y^u y`un chhut-hien, ch^a-t'en k`i-t^eu. Fut-y`en y^u s^ang tui y`un-ch^ung chh`on chhut-l`oi k'ong: "Li'a he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e. Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"
K`i-t^eu k'on-k'in si-mien k'in-chh`im, ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o ph+et-ng`in, ch'u"-y^u Y^a-s^u th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha.
K`i-t^eu h^a-s^an ke s`u", Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" m`ang tui s'i f+uk-f+at y^i-chhi`en, chhi^en-van `m-h'o chi^ong s'o khon-t'o ke su" l^au ph+et-ng`in k'ong."
K`i-t^eu ch^un-s'u Y^a-s^u ke fa, ch'ung-he p'i-chh'u" th'o-lun k'ong: "Tui s'i f+uk-f+at to-t'ai he m'a-ke yi-su"?"
K`i-t^eu yu mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ngi'ong-voi k'ong, Y^i-li-^a thin-chh+ok oi si^en l`oi n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Y^u-y'ang, Y^i-li-^a oi si^en l`oi s'u" van-su" f+uk-ngi`en; ch'ung-he Su"n-k^in ngi'ong-p^an yu k'ong, Ng`in-ch'u" pit-thin voi su chhin-t^o kh'u pin p^un-ng`in hi-chhi+et n`e?
Ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Y^i-li-^a y'i-k^in l`oi l'e; k`i-t^eu ya s`ui-s^im s'o-oi l`oi tui-thai k`i, chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong ko^an-he k`i ke fa yit-yong."
K`i-t^eu to-ch'on-hi kh`i-th^a h+ok-s^ang ke-vi ke s`u", khon-t'o yit thai-khi`un ng`in v`i-t'en k`i-t^eu. Y^u-t^eu k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chhai ke-vi th`ung h+ok-s^ang phien-lun.
Chung-ng`in yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhi`on-phu f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai, chhiu ch'eu-t'en hi ngi`ang-chiap k`i.
Y^a-s^u mun h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu th`ung k`i-t^eu phien-lun m'a-ke?"
Ng`in-khi`un ch^ung y^u yit-ke ng`in en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai tai-t'en ng`ai ke lai-'e l`oi chh`im ng`i; y^in-vi k`i p^un 'a-`e-k'ui fu-s^u"n, m`o fap-thu k'ong-fa.

Tak-p'ai k'ui k^ung-kit k`i ke s`u", chhiu chi^ong k`i phi^ang-l+ok thi-n`ai-h^a, s'u" k`i choi k'in p+ut-ph^o, ng^au-h`en ng`a-kau, k^ui-s^u"n ngang-ngang. Ng`ai y^eu-khi`u ngi^a h+ok-s^ang kiuk li'a-ke k'ui ch'eu, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu m`o phan-fap."

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an 'an m`o sin-s^im! Ng`ai h`an oi chhai ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi k'i-ki'u n`e? H`an oi ngi^un-nai ng`i-t^eu k'i-ki'u n`e? Chi^ong se-ng`in-`e tai-l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong se-ng`in-`e tai-ko-l`oi. Ke k'ui yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu s'u" se-ng`in-`e thai chh^u-k^in, vang chhai thi-song k'un-l`oi k'un-hi, choi k'in p+ut-ph^o.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i ke ^a-p^a k'ong: "K`i pot li'a-ke phiang y^u k'i-ki'u l'e?" K`i en-k'ong: "Chhi`ung se chhiu y^u l^o.
K'ui chhin-t^o p'ai si'ong-oi hoi-s'i k`i, chi^ong k`i phi^ang-to f'o t^i-poi, s'ung-l+ok s'ui-ch^ung. Ng`i na y^u phan-fap, khi`u ng`i l`in-m'en ng`ai-t^eu, p^ong-chhu ng`ai-t^eu!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "He ^o, ng`i na y^u phan-fap! Y^u sin-s^im ke ng`in, m'a-ke su"-chh`in t^u y^u kh'o-n`en."
Se-ng`in-`e ke ^a-p^a ngi`am-s`u" thai-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai sin, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke sin-s^im `m-la, khi`u ng`i p^ong-chhu ng`ai!"

Y^a-s^u khon-t'o chung-ng`in v`i-t'en l`oi, chhiu ngi`am-ngi`am chit-phi ke si`a-l`in k'ong: "Ng`i li'a l^ung-'a-k'ui, ng`ai min-lin ng`i tui li'a se-ng`in-`e s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, put-ch'un ng`i chai ng+ip-hi!"
Ke k'ui thai-h^em yit-s^ang, s'u" se-ng`in-`e thai chh^u-k^in yit-chhu"n-'e, chhiu chhut-l`oi. Se-ng`in-`e sa chhiong s'i-thet yit-yong; thai-k^a k'ong: "K`i s'i-thet l^o!"
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u khi^en-t'en k`i ke s'u, f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, k`i chhiu kh^i-h'i-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u yit ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u, h+ok-s^ang chhiu am-ch^ung mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an m`o fap-thu chi^ong ke k'ui kiuk chhut-hi n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ch'u"-y^u kho kh`i-t'o chang kiuk tet-ch'eu li'a-ch'ung ke k'ui, y^i-ngoi m`o ph+et ke phan-fap."
K`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, k^in-ko K^a-li-li. Y^a-s^u m`o-oi p^un ng`in t^i k`i hi nai,
y^in-vi k`i chhai ke-vi k^au h+ok-s^ang. K`i k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung; k`i-t^eu voi sat-hoi k`i; s'i-heu thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu `m-voi li'au-ki'e li'a fa ke yi-su", yu `m-k'am mun k`i.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to K^a-pak-n`ung, ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u heu, Y^a-s^u mun ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhai lu-song ch^en-lun m'a-ke n`o?"
K`i-t^eu `m-k'am chhut-s^ang, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu k^ui-lu ch^ang m`o-th`in: M'a-ng`in chui v'i-thai.
Y^a-s^u chh^o-h^a-l`oi, ham s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Si'ong-oi cho th`eu ke, k`i chhiu oi cho chui-se ke, cho chung-ng`in ke ph+uk-ng`in."
Y`en-heu k`i ham yit-ke se-ng`in-`e l`oi-to k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, n'am-t'en k`i, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang chiap-thai yit-ke chhiong li'a se-ng`in-`e ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ng`ai. Chiap-thai ng`ai ke, `m-he t^an-chhiang chiap-thai ng`ai, ya he chiap-thai ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke."
Yok-hon tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu khon-t'o y^u-ng`in fung ng`i ke mi`ang kiuk-k'ui, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu kim-ch'u" k`i, y^in-vi k`i `m-he th`en ng`ai-t^eu ke."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "`M-h'o kim-ch'u" k`i; y^in-vi m`o ng`in voi fung ng`ai ke mi`ang h`ang s`u"n-chiak, ngi`am-s`u" yu f'an-ko-l`oi k'ong f'ai-fa k^ung-kit ng`ai.
`M-he f'an-tui ng`ai-t^eu ke, chhiu-he chan-s`u"n ng`ai-t^eu ke.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s+uk K^i-tuk, n^a yit-p^i s'ui p^un ng`i-t^eu l^im, k`i yit-thin voi tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "M`o-lun m'a-ng`in hoi sin-th`u ch^ung ngim-h`o yit-ke m`i-se ke ng`in l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, k`i chui-h'o p^un-ng`in yung thai mo-s+ak th`o-t'en ki'ang-k^in, fit-l+ok h'oi-t'u hi.

Na-he ng`i ke yit-k^i s'u hoi ng`i fam-chhui, ch'am-thet k`i! S'eu yit-k^i s'u l`oi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, kha-y`ang s^ung-s'u h'o-h'o l+ok thi-ngi+uk, l+ok chhai y'un-y'en put-m+et ke li+et-f'o ch^ung.
Na-he ng`i ke yit-k^i kiok hoi ng`i fam-chhui, ch'am-thet k`i! S'eu yit-k^i kiok l`oi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, kha-y`ang s^ung-kiok h'o-h'o sa fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk.
Na-he ng`i ke yit-chak muk-ch^u hoi ng`i fam-chhui, chi^ong k`i yet-chhut-l`oi! S'eu yit-chak muk-ch^u ng+ip Song-ti ke koet, kha-y`ang s^ung-muk h'o-h'o sa fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk.
Chhai ke-vi, chh`ung-`e `m-voi s'i, li+et-f'o y'un-y'en put-m+et.
"M^i-yit-ke ng`in voi p^un f'o su"-lien, chhiong p^un y`am l^u yit-yong.
Y`am he h'o ke, ch'ung-he y`am na su"t-thet h`am-mi, oi ngi'ong-p^an s'u" k`i chai h`am n`e? Ng`i-t^eu oi y^u y`am ke chok-yung, yu oi p'i-chh'u" f`o-m+uk."
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, l`oi-to Y`u-thai thi-kh^i l^au Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en. Chung-ng`in yu chhi-s+ip to k`i ke-vi hi, k`i chhiu cheu-s`ong kau-hiun k`i-t^eu.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, si'ong-oi hoi k`i, chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang-kau ng`i, ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it ch'un l'o-k^ung l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong m`o?"
Y^a-s^u f'an-mun k'ong: " M^o-s^i ke min-lin he ngi'ong-p^an k'ong?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: " M^o-s^i ch'un l'o-k^ung si'a yit-ch^ong l`i-f^un s^u p^un p^u-ngi`ong, chhiu cho-tet l`i-thet k`i."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: " M^o-s^i si'a li'a-thi`au kie-min p^un ng`i-t^eu he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke s^im chhin-ngang.
Ch'ung-he chhai thai-chh^u, Song-ti chh'ong-chho su"-kie ke s`u", s'o-chho ke ng`in 'y^u n`am ya y^u 'ng';
'y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, n`am-ng`in oi l`i-kh^oi k`i ke y`a-^oi, l^au p^u-ngi`ong kiet-h+ap,
li'ong-s`a s`ang-cho yit-th'i.' Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, f^u-chh^i chhiu `m-he li'ong-ke ng`in, he yit-th'i.
S'o-y^i, Song-ti s'o phi-h+ap ke, ng`in cho-`m-tet chhak-kh^oi."
K`i-t^eu to-ch'on-hi vuk-t'u ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang yu mun-h'i li'a-khien su".
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "M`o-lun m'a-ng`in l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong, chh`ung-s^in l^au ph+et ke fu-ng`in-k^a kiet-f^un, chhiu-he fam ki^en-y`im, kh^ui-khiam k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong;
p^u-ngi`ong na l`i-thet l'o-k^ung, chai hi l^au ph+et-ng`in kiet-f^un, ya he fam ki^en-y`im."
Y^u-t^eu ng`in tai se-ng`in-`e l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, h^i-mong k`i mi^a k`i-t^eu; ch'ung-he h+ok-s^ang chit-phi ke-t^eu ng`in.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o chhiu fat-khi'en, tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "P^un se-ng`in-`e l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi, `m-h'o kim-ch'u" k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in chhiu-chhiong li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in.

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na `m-he chhiong se-ng`in-`e 'an-ngi`ong l`oi chiap-su Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en, k`i chhi+et-tui m`o kh'o-n`en s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in."
K'ong-li'au, k`i chhiu n'am-t'en se-ng`in-`e, yit-ke yit-ke on-s'u, vi k`i-t^eu chuk-fuk.

Y^a-s^u t'u-t'u chang chhut-hi, y^u yit-ke ng`in ch'eu-ko-l`oi, kh'ui chhai k`i ke mien-chhi`en, mun k`i k'ong: "Li`ong-san ke s^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang cho-tet s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang ^a?"
Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ngi'ong-p^an ham ng`ai cho li`ong-san ke n`e? Song-ti y^i-ngoi, m`o chai y^u li`ong-san ke.
Ng`i t^i ke-t^eu kie-min: 'Cho-`m-tet chh`u"-ng`in; cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im; cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a; cho-`m-tet cho k'a kien-chu"n; cho-`m-tet cha-kh^i; oi hau-kin y`a-^oi.' "
Ke ng`in en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, li'a-t^eu kie-min ng`ai chhi`on-phu chhi`ung-se chhiu y'i-k^in ch^un-s'u l'e."

Y^a-s^u chu-muk khon-t'en k`i, chhin siak k`i, chhiu k'ong: "Ng`i h`an khiam yit-yong. Hi mai ng`i s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap, chi^ong chhi`en sung-p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, ng`i chhiu voi y^u chh`oi-s'an chit-chh`un chhai thi^en-t'ang; y`en-heu ng`i l`oi th`en ng`ai."
Ke ng`in yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu mien-set l+ak-chhi^ang, s^im-chh`in chh`u"m-chhung l`oi l`i-kh^oi, y^in-vi k`i ke s'an-ngi+ap chhin-t^o.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'en h+ok-s^ang, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in, s+u"t-chhai ch^u"n n`an ^o!"
H+ok-s^ang y^in-vi k`i ke fa k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai; ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Se-ch'u" ^a, oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in chhiu chhin n`an!
Y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in, p'i l+ok-th`o chh^on-ko ch^u"m-phi h`an-kha n`an!"
Li'a-s`u", h+ok-s^ang s+u"p-f^un kh`i-koai, p'i-chh'u" mun-k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, m'a-ng`in y^u kh'o-n`en tet-kiu n`e?"
Y^a-s^u chu-muk khon k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Chhai ng`in he m`o kh'o-n`en, ch'ung-he chhai Song-ti chhiu `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, y^in-vi Song-ti van-su" t^u n`en."
P'i-tet chiap-choi k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in piong-thet yit-chhiet l`oi th`en ng`i."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, vi-t'o ng`ai ya-he fuk-y^im l`oi piong-thet f`ong-vuk, hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, y`a-^oi, ch'u"-'ng, ya-he thi`en-thi ke ng`in,

chhai k^im-su" s^ui-y`en voi t`u-t'o pet-hoi, ch'ung-he voi tet-t'o pak-phi ke f`ong-vuk, hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, y`a-^oi, ch'u"-'ng, ya-he thi`en-thi; chhai l`oi-s^en voi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.
Ch'ung-he, chhin-t^o chhai chui th`eu-chhi`en ke voi cho poi-m^i; chhin-t^o chhai chui poi-m^i ke voi cho th`eu-chhi`en."

Chhai k`i-t^eu hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke lu-song, Y^a-s^u chhai th`eu-chhi`en h`ang. H+ok-s^ang s^im-ch^ung chh^ung-m^an ng`i-f`u; kh`i-th^a th`en-t'en ke ng`in ya chhin ki^ang. Y^a-s^u ham s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, chai yit-p'ai l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong-h'i m`o k'i-ki'u y^i-heu oi fat-s^en chhai k`i s^u"n-song ke su".

K`i k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha oi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi; Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ke s'u-ch^ung. K`i-t^eu voi phan k`i s'i-h`in, y`en-heu chi^ong k`i k^au-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.
K`i-t^eu voi met-sa k`i, phi k`i h'eu-l^an, pi^en-t'a k`i, chui-heu sat-hoi k`i; ch'ung-he, thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu y^u yit-ke y^eu-khi`u, h^i-mong ng`i tap-yin."
Y^a-s^u mun-k'ong: "Oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu cho m'a-ke?"
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i chh^o y`ung-yeu p'o-chho ke s`u", h^i-mong ng`i p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung ng`i khiung-ha chh^o, yit-ke chhai ng`i ke yu-phi'en, yit-ke chhai ng`i ke ch'o-phi'en."

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i chhu"-k^a s'o khi`u ke he m'a-ke. Ng`ai s'o l^im ke kh'u-p^i, ng`i-t^eu y^u fap-thu l^im m`o? Ng`ai s'o su ke s'e-l^i, ng`i-t^eu y^u fap-thu s`u"n-su m`o?"
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y^u fap-thu!" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s'o l^im ke kh'u-p^i, ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t oi l^im, ng`ai s'o su ke s'e-l^i, ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t oi s`u"n-su;
ch'ung-he m'a-ng`in chh^o chhai ng`ai ke ch'o-yu, chhiu `m-he ng`ai cho-tet kiet-thin ke. Li'a-t^eu chho-vi, Song-ti vi m'a-ng`in ch'un-phi, chhiu oi su-p^un m'a-ng`in."
Kh`i-th^a s+u"p-ke h+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-ke su", chhiu t^ong-at Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon.

Y^a-s^u ham k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^i, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in s'o ngin-v`i ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a y^u khi`en k'on-hot k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu ya y^u khi`en ch'u"-f^i k`i-t^eu;
ch'ung-he, chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung chhiu `m-he 'an-ngi`ong. Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en si'ong-oi cho thai-ng`in-v+ut ke, chhiu oi cho ng`i-t^eu ke ph+uk-ng`in;
si'ong-oi cho th`eu ke, chhiu oi cho thai-k^a ke n`u-ph+uk.
Y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi, `m-he oi p^un-ng`in f+uk-su", he l`oi f+uk-su" ng`in, ya oi vi-t'o kiu-s+uk chung-ng`in l`oi h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang."

K`i-t^eu l`oi-to Y^a-li-k^o-s`ang. Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang th`ung yit thai-khi`un ng`in l`i-kh^oi Y^a-li-k^o ke s`u", y^u yit-ke m^o-muk ke khiet-s+u"t-'e --- T'i-m^ai ke lai-'e P^a-t'i-m^ai, chh^o chhai lu-s`un.
K`i yit th^ang-k'ong he N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u, chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un Y^a-s^u ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai!"
Chhin-t^o ng`in chit-phi k`i, ham k`i `m-h'o chh`au. Ch'ung-he k`i h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, k'ong: "Ham k`i ko-l`oi." K`i-t^eu chhiu tui m^o-muk-ke k'ong: "`M-s'u" k'in-ch^ong, hong-h'i-l`oi, k`i ham ng`i ko-hi!"
M^o-muk-ke chit-s`u" thot-h^a ngoi-s^am, thiau-h'i-l`oi, h`ang-to Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai vi ng`i cho m'a-ke?" M^o-muk-ke en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi khon-tet-t'o!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i cho-tet l`i-kh^oi l'e! Ng`i ke sin-s^im y'i-k^in y^i-h'o ng`i l'e." M^o-muk-ke ngi`am-s`u" khon-tet-t'o, chhiu th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u khiung-ha h`ang.
Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang h`ang voi to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, chi^ong-khiun Pak-fap-kh`i l^au Pak-thai-n`i, chhai K'am-l'am-s^an, Y^a-s^u ham li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang si^en h`ang,

f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi th`eu-chhi`en ke chh^un-ch^ong. Ng`i-t^eu yit ng+ip-hi, chhiu voi khon-t'o yit-chak h`an-m`ang y^u-ng`in kh`i-ko ke se l`i-`e th`o chhai ke-vi. Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i ki'e-kh^oi, khi^en-l`oi li'a-vi.
Na-he y^u-ng`in mun ng`i-t^eu: 'Ngi'ong-p^an cho li'a-ke su"?' ng`i-t^eu chhiu l^au k`i k'ong: 'Ch'u oi yung k`i; k`i ngi`am-s`u" voi sung-ch'on-l`oi.' "
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi, khon-t'o lu-s`un y^u yit-chak se l`i-`e th`o chhai m`un-h'eu, chhiu chi^ong k`i ki'e-kh^oi.
Kh^i chhai ke-vi ke ng`in mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke ki'e-kh^oi se l`i-`e?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu cheu Y^a-s^u s'o f^un-fu ke f`i-tap; ke-t^eu ng`in chhiu ch'un k`i-t^eu chi^ong se l`i-`e khi^en-ch'eu.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong se l`i-`e khi^en-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke s^am tap chhai l`i-`e ke poi-n`ong-t'ang, Y^a-s^u chhiu kh`i s^ong-hi.
Y^u chhin-t^o ng`in yung chhu"-k^a ke s^am ph^u chhai lu-song, ya y^u-ng`in n^a y^a-thi ch'am-l`oi ke su-k^i ph^u chhai lu-song.
Th`eu-chhi`en h`ang l^au heu-poi th`en ke ng`in thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan Song-ti! Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke!
Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en Thai-v'i ke koet, chhiu-he m`o k'i-ki'u voi l`im-to ke! H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan k^ui-p^un Chu"-k^o ke Song-ti!"
Y^a-s^u to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, ng+ip-hi su"n-thien, si ch^u-v`i khon yit-ha. Y^in-vi thi^en y'i-k^in am, k`i chhiu l^au s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang chhut-s`ang to Pak-thai-n`i hi.
Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i-t^eu tui Pak-thai-n`i to-ch'on s`ang-t'u hi; chhai lu-song, Y^a-s^u t'u-k^i.

K`i khon-t'o th`eu-chhi`en m`o k'i-y'en ke s'o-chhai y^u yit-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su, y+ap-'e ch+at-ch+at, chhiu h`ang-ko-hi, si'ong-oi khon y^u k'o-ch'u" m`o. K`i h`ang-to su-chhi`en, khon-t'o ch'u"-y^u y+ap-'e, y^in-vi ke-s`u" `m-he v`u-f^a-k'o ke s`u"-chiet.
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui ke-th`eu su-'e k'ong: "Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, `m-voi chai y^u-ng`in s+u"t ng`i ke k'o-ch'u"!" Ki^a h+ok-s^ang l^ung-ch'ung th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa.

K`i-t^eu l`oi-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, Y^a-s^u yit ng+ip su"n-thien chhiu chi^ong s'o-y^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u cho s^en-l^i ke ng`in kiuk chhut-hi. K`i s'ung-vang von-chhi`en ke ng`in ke chok-`e l^au mai ngi+et-kap-`e ke ng`in ke ten-'e,
ya `m-ch'un y^u-ng`in k^ong t^ung-s^i chhai su"n-thien h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi.
K`i kau-hiun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'am `m-he ki-chai Song-ti ke fa k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke su"n-thien oi cho van-m`in kh`i-t'o ke thien', ng`i-t^eu sa chi^ong k`i pien-cho chh+et-teu!"
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu si'ong phan-fap oi sat-hoi Y^a-s^u. Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ki^ang k`i, y^in-vi chung-ng`in t^u kh^im-f+uk k`i ke kau-hiun.
L`im-am-'e, Y^a-s^u chhiu l^au h+ok-s^ang hi s`ang-ngoi.
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang yu tui ke-thi`au lu k^in-ko, khon-t'o ke-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su li`en k^in chhi`on-phu ch^au-thet.
P'i-tet si'ong-h'i li'a-khien su" ke k^in-ko, chhiu tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i khon, ng`i s'o chu-ch'u ke v`u-f^a-k'o-su ch^au-thet l^o."
Y^a-s^u f`i-tap k'ong: "Tui Song-ti oi y^u sin-s^im!

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu na-he tui li'a-chho s^an k'ong: 'S'ai-kh^oi, l+ok h'oi-t'u hi!' s^im-ch^ung m`o ng`i-f`u, khok-sin s'o k'ong ke yit-thin voi s+u"t-hien, li'a-ke su" chhiu voi vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu l`oi s+u"t-hien.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o ke s`u", si^ong-sin ng`i-t^eu s'o khi`u ke he y'i-k^in tet-t'o, chhiu voi tet-t'o.
Ng`i-t^eu kh^i-t'en kh`i-t'o ke s`u", oi si^en sa-mi^en tet-chhui ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a chang voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke ko-fam."
K`i-t^eu yu l`oi-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang. Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u h`ang ke s`u", chi-s^u"-ch'ong, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au ch'ong-l'o l`oi-kien k`i,
mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"? M'a-ng`in p^un ng`i li'a khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su" n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai si^en mun ng`i-t^eu yit-ki fa, na-he ng`i-t^eu f`i-tap ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su".
L^au ng`ai k'ong, Yok-hon h`ang s'e-l^i ke khi`en-piang, he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, ya-he tui ng`in l`oi ke?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu p'i-chh'u" ch^en-lun, k'ong: "Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui Song-ti l`oi ke', k`i voi k'ong: ''An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke `m sin Yok-hon n`e?'

Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui ng`in l`oi ke', ng`ai-t^eu ke mun-th`i chhiu t^ong-thai l'e." (K`i-t^eu ki^ang ng`in-m`in voi tui-fu k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi chung-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung si^ong-sin Yok-hon he si^en-t^i.)
Tui 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu en Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m t^i." Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai ya `m l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in."

Y^a-s^u yu yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke ng`in kh^oi yit-te ph`u-th`o-y`en, ch^u-v`i yung l`i-p^a v`i-t'en, yu chhai y`en-ch^ung yet yit-chak cha-chi'u-chh`u", h'i yit-chho s'u-mong-th`oi, y`en-heu chi^ong ph`u-th`o-y`en ch^u p^un thien-n`ung, chhu"-k^a chhut-ngoi hi l^i-h`ang.
To s^u ph`u-th`o ke s`u"-chiet, k`i phai yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi tui ke-t^eu thien-n`ung s^u k`i yin-tet ke k'o-ch'u".
Ke-t^eu thien-n`ung chi^ong ke ph+uk-ng`in chok-l`oi t'a, kiuk k`i kh^ung-s'u ch'on-hi.
Y`en-ch'u yu phai nang-ngoi yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi; k`i-t^eu sa chi^ong k`i ke th`eu-n`a t'a lan-kh^ung, yu v'u-y+uk k`i.

Y`en-ch'u chai-ko phai yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong k`i chh`u"-s'i. K`i-t^eu yu chhiong 'an-ngi`ong tui-fu chhin-t^o ng`in, y^u-t^eu p^un k`i-t^eu t'a, y^u-t^eu p^un k`i-t^eu chh`u"-s'i.
Y`en-ch'u ch'u"-y^u chh^un k`i s'o siak ke lai-'e h'o phai. Chui-heu, k`i chhiu phai k`i hi, s^im-k^on si'ong: 'Chui-s'eu, k`i-t^eu me voi ch^un-chhung ng`ai ke lai-'e.'

Ch'ung-he ke-t^eu thien-n`ung p'i-chh'u" chh^am-si`ong k'ong: 'Li'a ng`in he y`en-ch'u ke ki-s`u"n-ng`in; l`oi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi chh`u"-s'i k`i, k`i ke s'an-ngi+ap chhiu pien-cho ng`ai-t^eu ke l'e!'
K`i-t^eu chhiu khi'u-t'en k`i, chh`u"-s'i k`i, chi^ong k`i ke s^u"n-s^u" fit-to y`en-ngoi."
Y^a-s^u mun-k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ph`u-th`o-y`en ke ch'u-ng`in voi ngi'ong-p^an cho n`e? K`i yit-thin voi l`oi chh`u"-s'i ke-t^eu thien-n`ung, chi^ong ph`u-th`o-y`en ch^u p^un ph+et-ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko li'a-chham Su"n-k^in he-m`o? N`ai-s'ui s^u"-fu s'o fit-thet ke li'a-te s+ak-th`eu, y'i-k^in s`ang-cho thi-k^i ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke.
Li'a he Ch'u ke chok-v`i, he ngi'ong-p^an kh`i-meu ke su" ^a!"
Y^in-vi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu t^i Y^a-s^u s'o k'ong ke p'i-yi he chit-phi k`i-t^eu, chhiu si'ong-oi chok k`i. Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ki^ang chung-ng`in, k^o-put-chi^ong chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au H^i-l+it-t'ong ke ng`in fung-min l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, si'ong-oi tui k`i ke fa chh`im p'a-piang l`oi hoi k`i.

K`i-t^eu tui k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu t^i ng`i he s`u"n-s+u"t ke ng`in; `m-k'on ng`in ngi'ong-p^an si'ong, ng`i ya `m-voi khon ng`in ke chh`in-mien, ch'ung-he ch^ung-s+u"t chi^ong Song-ti ke tho-l^i kau-su" ng`in. N+ap-soi p^un L`o-m^a F`ong-ti he v`i-poi ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it m`o?
Ng`ai-t^eu oi n+ap ya-he `m-s'u" n+ap?" Y^a-s^u khon-chhut k`i-t^eu ke k'ui-kie, chhiu en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an si'ong-oi hoi ng`ai n`e? N^a yit-chak ngi`un-pi p^un ng`ai khon!"
K`i-t^eu n^a yit-chak ngi`un-pi p^un k`i. Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-ke siong l^au mi`ang-ho he m'a-ng`in ke?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He F`ong-ti ke."

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, chi^ong F`ong-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un F`ong-ti, chi^ong Song-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un Song-ti." K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu tui k`i chhin h^i-kh`i.
Y^u-t^eu `m si^ong-sin f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su" ke Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, mun k`i k'ong:

"S^in-s^ang, M^o-s^i vi ng`ai-t^eu l+ip-fap k'ong: 'Na-he y^u yit-ke ng`in ko-s^u"n, li`u-h^a k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong, ch'ung-he m`o ch'u"-'ng, k`i ke l'o-th^ai yit-thin oi th'o s'u-ko'a ke ^a-s'o cho p^u-ngi`ong, thoi ^a-k^o chh`on-ch^ung chiap-thoi.'
Su"t y^u chhit-ke hi^ung-thi: Thai-k^o th'o p^u-ngi`ong heu, m`o li`u-h^a ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n;
ngi-k^o th'o s'u-ko'a ke ^a-s'o heu, ya m`o li`u-h^a ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n; thi-s^am-ke ya he 'an-ngi`ong.
Chhit-ke hi^ung-thi chhi`on-phu th'o-ko ke fu-ng`in-k^a, l^ung-ch'ung m`o li`u-h^a ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n. Chui-m^i, ke fu-ng`in-k^a ya ko-s^u"n.
'An-ngi`ong, chhai f+uk-f+at ke s`u"-chiet, li'a-ke fu-ng`in-k^a oi son he m'a-ng`in ke p^u-ngi`ong n`e? Y^in-vi chhit-ke hi^ung-thi chhi`on-phu su"t l^au k`i kiet-f^un."
Y^a-s^u en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-chh+ok l'e, ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak Su"n-k^in, ya m`o chh^in-chh'u Song-ti ke khi`en-n`en.
K`i-t^eu tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke s`u", he l^au thi^en-t'ang ke thi^en-s'u" khiung-yong, m`o th'o ya m`o ka.

Ko^an-he s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke su", ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko M^o-s^i ke s^u s'o-si'a net-su chh+ok-f'o ke ku-su" he-m`o? Song-ti l^au M^o-s^i k'ong: 'Ng`ai he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke Song-ti, Y^i-sat ke Song-ti, Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti.'
Li'a yi-su" he k'ong, Song-ti `m-he s'i-ng`in ke Song-ti, he s^ang-ng`in ke Song-ti. Ng`i-t^eu v`an-chhi`on `m-chh+ok l'e!"

Y^u yit-ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu ke phien-lun, k'am-kok Y^a-s^u chhin voi f`i-tap mun-th`i, chhiu chin-chhi`en l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Kie-min ch^ung nai-thi`au he thi-yit chhung-yeu ke?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Thi-yit chhung-yeu ke chhiu-he: ' Y^i-set-li+et ^a, ng`i oi chu-yi th^ang! Ch'u --- ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti he v`i-yit ke Ch'u.
Ng`i oi yung chhi`on-phu ke s^im-chu", chh`in-k'am, l^i-chu" l^au l+it-liong kin-oi Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti.'
Thi-ngi he: 'Ng`i oi siak l`in-sa, chhiu-chhiong siak chhu"-k^a yit-yong.' M`o p'i li'a li'ong-thi`au h`an-kha chhung-yeu ke kie-min l'e."
Ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i s'o k'ong ke chhin chh+ok! Chhiu-chhiong ng`i s'o k'ong, Song-ti he v`i-yit ke Ch'u, chh`u-li'au K`i y^i-ngoi m`o ph+et ke Song-ti.

Oi yung chhi`on-phu ke s^im-chu", l^i-chu" l^au l+it-liong kin-oi Song-ti; ya oi siak l`in-sa, chhiu-chhiong siak chhu"-k^a yit-yong. Ch^un-s'u li'a li'ong-thi`au kie-min, p'i hien s^eu-fa-chi l^au kh`i-th^a ke chi-v+ut p^un Song-ti h`an-kha chhung-yeu."
Y^a-s^u khon-chhut k`i ke f`i-tap m^an-y^u chu"-fi, chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i l`i Song-ti ke koet m`o k'i-y'en l'e." Tui ke-s`u" y^i-heu, m`o ng`in k'am chai mun Y^a-s^u m'a-ke n`an-th`i.
Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u kau-su" ng`in ke s`u", th`i-chhut yit-ke mun-th`i, k'ong: "K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ngi'ong-p^an k'ong K^i-tuk he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un n`e?
Thai-v'i chhu"-k^a su"t su Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung k'ong: Ch'u tui ng`ai ke Ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`i chh^o chhai Ng`ai ke yu-phi'en, t'en Ng`ai s'u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it ph+uk chhai ng`i ke kiok-h^a.'
Thai-v'i chhu"-k^a chh^u"n k`i cho 'Ch'u', K^i-tuk ngi'ong-voi yu he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un n`e?" Chung-ng`in chhi`on-phu chhin f^on-h'i th^ang Y^a-s^u k'ong-lun.

Chhai kau-su" k`i-t^eu ke s`u", k`i k'ong: "Oi th`i-f`ong k^in-h+ok kau-s^u"; k`i-t^eu hau chok chh`ong-ph`au, ch^eu-y`eu ko-ki^e, oi ph+et-ng`in chhai k^ung-khiung chh`ong-s'o tui k`i-t^eu chu"-kin chhi'ang-^on,
yu chhin oi chh^o fi-th`ong-t'u ke th+it-ph+et chho-vi l^au y`en-s+it ch^ung ke thai-vi.
K`i-t^eu th^un-s+u"t ko'a-fu ke s'an-ngi+ap, y`en-heu chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en p'eu-y^en chh`ong-phi^en ke kh`i-t'o. K`i-t^eu yit-thin voi su-t'o kha-chh^ung ke chit-f+at!"
Y^a-s^u chh^o chhai su"n-thien ngi`un-khu ke tui-mien, khon thai-k^a ngi'ong-p^an piong chhi`en l+ok fung-hien-si^ong. T^ong-t^o y^u-chhi`en-ng`in piong chhin-t^o chhi`en l+ok-hi;
heu-l`oi y^u yit-ke khi`ung-kh'u ke ko'a-fu h`ang ko-l`oi, piong li'ong-chak se th`ung-chhi`en l+ok-hi, chh^a-`m-t^o he yit-v`un-chhi`en thin-thin.
Y^a-s^u ham ki^a h+ok-s^ang ko-l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a khi`ung-kh'u ke ko'a-fu piong-l+ok fung-hien-si^ong ke p'i chung-ng`in s'o-hien ke kha-t^o.
Y^in-vi ph+et-ng`in he fung-hien k`i-t^eu yung chh^un ke yit-phu-fun; ch'ung-he k`i he chhai m`o la-yung ke t^ong-ch^ung, chi^ong chhi`on-phu ke s^en-f+at-fi hien-chhut-l`oi."
Y^a-s^u tui su"n-thien chhut-l`oi ke s`u", k`i yit-ke h+ok-s^ang tui k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i khon, li'a-t^eu s+ak-th`eu s+u"t-chhai chhin thai, li'a-t^eu kien-chuk ngi'ong-voi 'an chi^ang!"

Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i k'in-khon li'a-t^eu v'i-thai ke kien-chuk he-m`o? Li'a s'o-chhai ke m^i yit-te s+ak-th`eu chhi`on-phu voi p^un-ng`in chhak-h^a-l`oi, m`o yit-te s+ak-th`eu voi thi+ap chhai nang-ngoi yit-te ke t'ang-k^o."
Y^a-s^u chhai K'am-l'am-s^an t'ang, mien-tui su"n-thien chh^o-t'en. P'i-tet, Ng^a-kok, Yok-hon l^au ^On-tet-li+et am-ch^ung l`oi mun k`i k'ong:
"Chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, li'a-ke su" k'i-s`u" voi fat-s^en n`e? Li'a yit-chhiet fat-s^en ke s`u"-chiet voi y^u m'a-ke seu-th`eu?"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o p^un-ng`in m`i-f+et.
Y^u chhin-t^o ng`in voi k'a-mo ng`ai ke mi`ang l`oi, k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhiu-he K^i-tuk!' tui 'an-ngi`ong m`i-f+et chhin-t^o ng`in.

Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o fu-khiun si^ong-chh`u" ke f^ung-s^ang l^au y'en-f^ong chan-ch^en ke s^eu-sit, ke-s`u", `m-s'u" ki^ang. Li'a-t^eu su" thin-chh+ok voi fat-s^en; ch'ung-he li'a `m-he k'ong m+at-ngit y'i-k^in to l'e.

M`in-chh+uk voi l^au m`in-chh+uk si^ong-chh`u"; koet-k^a voi l^au koet-k^a chan-ch^en; tak s'o-chhai voi y^u thi-th^ung l^au k^i-f^ong. Li'a-t^eu su" ke fat-s^en chhiu-chhiong s'an-fu s^en-s'an-chhi`en ke chhu"n-thung yit-yong.

"Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a oi se-ngi, y^in-vi y^u-ng`in voi chok ng`i-t^eu, sung ng`i-t^eu s^ong fap-yen; ng`i-t^eu ya voi chhai fi-th`ong-t'u p^un-ng`in pi^en-t'a. Vi-t'o ng`ai ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu voi kh^i chhai th'ung-chhu"-ch'a l^au ki^un-v`ong ke mien-chhi`en su s'u"m-phan, l`oi tui k`i-t^eu cho kien-chu"n.
Ch'ung-k'ong, fuk-y^im yit-thin oi si^en chh`on-p^un van-m`in.

Ng`i-t^eu p^un-ng`in chok-t'o, sung-hi fap-yen ke s`u", `m-s'u" si^en s`eu oi k'ong m'a-ke fa; to ke-s`u" Song-ti ch'u"-su" m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong m'a-ke; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi k'ong ke, `m-he chhu"-k^a ke fa, he Su"n-L`in oi th^ung-ko ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke.
Ke-s`u", hi^ung-thi voi chhut-mai hi^ung-thi l`oi hoi-s'i k`i-t^eu; ^a-p^a ya voi 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai ch'u"-'ng; ch'u"-'ng ya voi th`ung y`a-^oi chok-tui l`oi hoi-s'i k`i-t^eu.
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang, thai-k^a voi yen-hen ng`i-t^eu; ch'ung-he ngi^un-nai to-t'ai ke ng`in thin-chh+ok voi tet-kiu.

"Ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o ke 'F'i-m+et-sin, si`a-ok ke t^ung-s^i' kh^i chhai k`i m`o yin-k^oi kh^i ke s'o-chhai ke s`u" (th+uk ke ng`in oi li'au-ki'e li'a-ki fa ke yi-su"), h+et chhai Y`u-thai thi-kh^i ke, oi ch'eu-hi s^an-t'ang phit-nan;
chhai vuk-t'ang ke, `m-h'o h^a-l`oi, ya `m-h'o ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u n^a m'a-ke t^ung-s^i;
chhai thi`en-hong ke, `m-h'o ch'on-hi n^a ngoi-s^am.
Chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e, f`ai-th^oi ke fu-ng`in-k^a l^au p^un ^o-nga-'e s+u"t-nen ke ^a-m^e chhiu chh'am l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu oi kh`i-khi`u Song-ti, `m-h'o p^un li'a-t^eu su" chhai h`on-thi^en fat-s^en!
Y^in-vi ke-t^eu ngit-`e ke ch^ai-nan he tui Song-ti chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi `m-su"t y^u ke, chi^ong-l`oi ya `m-voi chai y^u.
Na-he Ch'u m`o k'am-s'eu ke-t^eu ch^ai-nan ke ngit-`e, m`o ng`in n`en s^en-chh`un h^a-hi. Ch'ung-he, vi-t'o K`i s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in, Ch'u y'i-k^in k'am-s'eu ke-t^eu ngit-`e.
"Na-he y^u-ng`in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`i khon, K^i-tuk chhai li'a-vi!' ya-he 'K^i-tuk chhai ke-vi!' `m-h'o si^ong-sin.
Y^in-vi k'a K^i-tuk l^au k'a si^en-t^i voi chhut-hien; k`i-t^eu voi h`ang s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su", chhin k`i s'o-n`en l`oi m`i-f+et Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in.
Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi! Ng`ai y'i-k^in si^en chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet ke su" l^ung-ch'ung l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko l'e.
"Ke-t^eu ch^ai-nan ke ngit-`e ko-thet y^i-heu, ngit-th`eu voi pien v^u, ngi+et-k^ong `m-voi chai k^ong,
s^en-'e voi tui thi^en-t'ang tiet-h^a-l`oi, thai-kh^ung ke ne-th'ung ya voi y`eu-thung.
Ke-s`u", k`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" thai-y^u n`en-l+it l^au y`ung-yeu chh^o y`un kong-l`im.
K`i oi chh^ai thi^en-s'u" to thi^en-ng`ai h'oi-kok hi, tui su"-kie li'a-phi'en to su"-kie ke-phi'en, seu-s+ip k`i s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in.
"Ng`i-t^eu oi tui v`u-f^a-k'o-su h+ok kau-hiun. T^ong su-k^i ch'on-chhi^ang, s^ang-chhut s^in y+ap ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu t^i ngi+et-thi^en voi to l'e.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o li'a yit-chhiet ke hien-siong, chhiu oi t^i s`u"-ki^en voi to, y'i-k^in chhai m`un-h'eu l'e.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a-thoi ng`in h`an-m`ang l^ung-ch'ung ko-s^u"n y^i-chhi`en, li'a yit-chhiet ke su" chhiu voi fat-s^en.
Thi^en l^au thi voi m`o-thet, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke fa y'un-y'en `m-voi m`o-thet.
"Ch'ung-he ke oi l`oi ke ngit-`e l^au s`u"-ki^en, m`o ng`in t^i; thi^en-t'ang ke thi^en-s'u" ya `m-t^i, Lai-'e ya `m-t^i, ch'u"-y^u ^A-p^a t^i.
Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, oi k'in-si'ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ke s`u"-ki^en k'i-s`u" voi to.
Li'a-ke su" chh^in-chhiong yit-ke ng`in chhut-ngoi l^i-h`ang, chi^ong k^a-vu k^au-p^un ph+uk-ng`in k'on-l^i, f^un-phi m^i-yit-ke ng`in ke k^ung-chok, yu f^un-fu ch'ong-m`un-ke oi chu-yi.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ch'u-ng`in k'i-s`u" voi ch'on-l`oi, he l`im-am-'e ya-he pan-ya, he thi^en-m`ung-k^ong ya-he ngit-th`eu chhut-l`oi y^i-heu.
Na-he k`i fut-y`en ch'on-l`oi, `m-h'o p^un k`i khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu chhai soi-muk!
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa, ya he l^au thai-k^a k'ong ke: Ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang!"
Ph`an-ko-chiet l^au Chh`u-kau-chiet ke chhi`en li'ong-ngit, chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" y^im-m`eu oi pi-m+et chok Y^a-s^u, chi^ong k`i chh`u"-s'i.
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chhai chiet-kh`i-ch^ung ha-s'u, mi^en-tet ngi^a-h'i m`in-chung ke phau-thung."

Y^a-s^u chhai Pak-thai-n`i pot th'ai-k^o ke S^i-m`un vuk-h^a; s+u"t-fan ke s`u", y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a tai yit-chak ngi+uk-kon-'e l`oi, t^i-poi ch^ong chhin ch^u"n-kui ke s`un n^a-th+at hi^ong-y`u. K`i t'a-pho ngi+uk-kon, chi^ong hi^ong-y`u t'o chhai Y^a-s^u ke th`eu-n`a-t'ang.
Y`en-s+it ch^ung ke ng`in y^u-t^eu chhin m`o f^on-h'i, p'i-chh'u" ngi-lun k'ong: "Ngi'ong-p^an 'an t'a-s'ong n`e?
Li'a hi^ong-y`u cho-tet mai s^am-pak-l`ang-chak ngi`un-chhi`en, n^a-l`oi kiu-chi khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in ^a!" K`i-t^eu chhiu chit-phi ke fu-ng`in-k^a.
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y`u-chhai k`i! Cho-m'a-ke v`i-n`an k`i n`o? K`i vi ng`ai cho ke he yit-khien chhin-chi^ang ke su".
Y^in-vi s`ong-s`ong y^u khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, na-he oi, ng`i-t^eu s`ui-s`u" cho-tet kiu-chi k`i-t^eu; ch'ung-he ng`ai `m-he s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha.
K`i y'i-k^in chhin s'o-n`en ke cho l'e; k`i chi^ong li'a hi^ong-y`u t'o chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song he vi ng`ai ke m`ai-chong si^en cho ch'un-phi.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ph^u-thi^en-ha, m`o-lun fuk-y^im chh`on-to m'a-ke s'o-chhai, tak-s`a t^u oi k'ong-h'i k`i s'o-cho ke su", l`oi ki-ngiam k`i."
Y^a-s^u s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang t^ong-ch^ung, y^u yit-ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai; k`i hi kien chi-s^u"-ch'ong, oi chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o Y`u-thai s'o-k'ong ke, chhiu f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i, yu tap-yin n^a chhi`en p^un k`i. Tui ke-s`u" h'i, Y`u-thai chhiu chh`im k^i-fi oi chhut-mai Y^a-s^u.

Chh`u-kau-chiet ke thi-yit-ngit, chhiu-he chh`u" Ph`an-ko-chiet k^au-y`ong ke-ngit, h+ok-s^ang l`oi mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu hi nai-vi vi ng`i ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on n`e?"
Y^a-s^u chhiu phai li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ng+ip-s`ang hi, voi t`u-t'o yit-ke ng`in tai-t'en yit-kon s'ui, ng`i-t^eu chhiu th`en-t'en k`i;
k`i hi-to nai k^a, ng`i-t^eu chhiu mun ke k^a ke ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'S^in-s^ang k'ong: Ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang s+u"t Ph`an-ko-chiet v^an-chh^on ke hak-th^ang chhai nai-vi?'
K`i voi tai ng`i-t^eu hi khon l`eu-t'ang yit-ki^en pu-chu"-h'o ke thai f`ong-ki^en; ng`i-t^eu chhiu chhai ke-vi thoi ng`ai-t^eu ch'un-phi."
Li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang chhut-hi, ng+ip-hi s`ang-t'u; s'o t`u-t'o ke chhi`on-phu l^au Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong ke khiung-yong; k`i-t^eu chhiu chhai ke-vi ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on.
L`im-am-'e, Y^a-s^u l^au s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang chhi`on-phu to-chh`e.
K`i-t^eu chh^o-h^a-l`oi s+u"t ke s`u"-chiet, Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha s+u"t ke, y^u yit-ke ng`in oi chhut-mai ng`ai."
H+ok-s^ang chhiu chhin y`u-s`eu, yit-ke yit-ke mun k`i k'ong: "K'am he ng`ai?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "He ng`i-t^eu s+u"p-ngi-s`a t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-s`a; l^au ng`ai yung khiung-chak ph`an-`e vun-pi'ang ke, k`i chhiu-he.
Cheu Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, Ng`in-ch'u" voi su-hoi; ch'ung-he chhut-mai Ng`in-ch'u" ke ng`in y^u ch^ai-fo l'e! K`i m+ok chhut-se h`an-kha h'o!"
K`i-t^eu s+u"t ke s`u"-chiet, Y^a-s^u n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, p^un-p^un k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "N^a-l`oi s+u"t; li'a he ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i."
K`i yu n^a-h'i p^i-'e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu; k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhiu l^im.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a he ng`ai ke hiet, he chu"n-m`in Song-ti l^au ng`in l+ip-yok ke hiet, vi chhin-t^o ng`in l`oi li`u-chhut ke.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi chai l^im li'a ph`u-th`o-chi'u, chh+u"t-to chhai Song-ti ke koet l^im s^in-chi'u ke-ngit."
K`i-t^eu chhong yit-s'u s^u", chhiu chhut-l`oi, to K'am-l'am-s^an hi.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung voi l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, y^in-vi Su"n-k^in ki-chai: Song-ti k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi k^ung-kit m+uk-ng`in, y`ong-khi`un chhiu f^un-san thet-hi.'
Ch'ung-he ng`ai f+uk-f+at y^i-heu, oi p'i ng`i-t^eu si^en hi K^a-li-li."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Chhiu-son ph+et-ng`in chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi ng`i, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi l`i-kh^oi ng`i!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, k^im-am-p^u, ki^e-'e th`ai thi-ngi-p'ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai."

P'i-tet yung h`an-kha ki^en-thin ke khi'eu-hi k'ong: "Chhiu-son ng`ai yit-thin oi th`ung ng`i khiung-ha s'i, ng`ai ya chhi+et-tui `m-voi `m ngin ng`i!" Kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang ya chhi`on-phu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to yit-ke s'o-chhai, mi`ang ^on-to Khiet-s^i-m^a-n`i; Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chh^o, t'en ng`ai hi kh`i-t'o."
Y`en-heu k`i tai P'i-tet, Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon khiung-ha hi. K`i kh^oi-s'u" k'am-kok chhin y`u-s^ong thung-kh'u,
tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai ke s^im k^an-kh'u to voi s'i. Ng`i-t^eu li`u chhai li'a-vi, oi k'in-si'ang ^o!"
K`i h`ang-chhi`en t^eu-'e, chhiu ph+uk chhai thi-song, khi'en-khi`u Song-ti, na-he cho-tet, `m-s'u" p^un k`i k^in-l+it li'a-ke thung-kh'u.
K`i k'ong: "^A-p^a, ng`ai ke Y`a ^a, chhai Ng`i f`am-su" t^u n`en. Khi`u Ng`i chi^ong li'a-ke kh'u-p^i s'ai-ch'eu; ch'ung-he, `m-h'o cheu ng`ai ke yi-su", oi cheu Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi."
K`i to-ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", fat-hien s^am-ke h+ok-s^ang soi-thet, chhiu l^au P'i-tet k'ong: " S^i-m`un, ng`i chhai li'a soi-muk he-m`o? M`o fap-thu k'in-si'ang yit-ti'am-ch^ung ki'u m^a?
Ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang kh`i-t'o, mi^en-tet ham-l+ok m`i-f+et. Ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t s^im-l`in k^am-ngien, ch'ung-he ngiuk-th'i ngi^on-ngi+ok."
K`i yu h`ang-ko-hi, h`an-he yung khiung-yong ke fa kh`i-t'o.
Y`en-heu k`i yu to-ch'on h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, khon-t'o k`i-t^eu yu soi-thet, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u pak-`m-kh^oi; k`i-t^eu ya `m-t^i oi l^au k`i k'ong m'a-ke chang h'o.

Y^a-s^u thi-s^am-p'ai to-ch'on-l`oi, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu h`an soi-muk, h`an chhai ke-vi hi^u-sit m^a? La-p'ai l'e, s`u"-ki^en to l'e, khon ^a, Ng`in-ch'u" y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in chhut-mai to chhui-ng`in s'u-ch^ung l^o.
Hong-h'i-l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi! Khon ^a, chhut-mai ng`ai ke ng`in to l'e!"

Y^a-s^u h`an k'ong-t'en fa ke s`u", s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ch^ung ke Y`u-thai l`oi-to. Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in tai-t'en t^o-'e, kun-'e th`ung k`i khiung-ha l`oi; k`i-t^eu he chi-s^u"-ch'ong, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au ch'ong-l'o phai-l`oi ke.

Chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke ng`in su"-chhi`en p^un k`i-t^eu yit-chak am-ho, k'ong: "Ng`ai ch^im m'a-ng`in, k`i chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu s'o si'ong-oi ke ng`in. Ng`i-t^eu oi chok-t'o k`i, ngi`am-ngi`am khon-s'u, chi^ong k`i tai-ch'eu."
Y`u-thai yit to, chit-s`u" h`ang-to Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, ham k'ong: "S^in-s^ang!" yu ch^im k`i.
S'o-y^i k`i-t^eu chhiu ha-s'u chok Y^a-s^u.
Kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u yit-s`a p^ang-chhut t^o-'e, tui thai-chi-s^u" ke ph+uk-ng`in phiak-ko-hi, chi^ong k`i ke ng'i-k^ung siok-thet yit-chak.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu tai-t'en t^o-'e l^au kun-'e chhut-l`oi chok ng`ai, khon ng`ai cho khi`ong-tho he-m`o?
Ng`ai tak-ngit chhai su"n-thien-t'u k^au ng`in, s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, ng`i-t^eu pin m`o chok ng`ai. Ch'ung-he, li'a-ke su" he oi yin-ngiam Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke fa."
Li'a-s`u", s'o-y^u ke h+ok-s^ang chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi k`i th`o-ch'eu.
Y^u yit-ke heu-s^ang-ng`in, s^u"n-song t^an-chhiang ph^i-t'en yit-te m`a-pu, th`en chhai Y^a-s^u ke heu-poi; k`i-t^eu chhiu si'ong-oi chok k`i,
ch'ung-he k`i fit-thet ke-te pu-'e, t'a-chhak-pok ch'eu-thet.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-to thai-chi-s^u" ke-vi hi; s'o-y^u ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong, ch'ong-l'o, l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chhi`on-phu chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi.
P'i-tet y'en-y'en th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u, chh+u"t-to thai-chi-s^u" ke th`in-yen-t'u, chh^o chhai k'in-v'i ke t^ong-ch^ung phoi-f'o.
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au chhi`on ngi-fi si'ong-chhin phan-fap chh`im chu"n-k'i ko Y^a-s^u, l`oi thin k`i s'i-h`in, ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o m'a-ke chu"n-k'i.
H'o-t^o ng`in chhut-mien cho k'a kien-chu"n ko k`i, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke teu-`m-t'o.
Heu-l`oi y^u k'i-ke ng`in kh^i-h'i-l`oi, cho k'a kien-chu"n ko Y^a-s^u k'ong:
"Ng`ai-t^eu th^ang-t'o k`i k'ong-ko: 'Ng`ai oi chi^ong li'a-chho ng`in-s'u s'o h'i ke su"n-thien chhak-thet, s^am-ngit-nui h'i yit-chho `m-he ng`in-s'u s'o-cho ke su"n-thien.' "
Li`en li'a-ke kh'ung-ko, k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke ya teu-`m-t'o.
S'o-y^i thai-chi-s^u" chhai thai-k^a mien-chhi`en kh^i-h'i-l`oi, mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu ng`in ko ng`i ke, ng`i m`o m'a-ke fa h'o en he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u ti^am-ti^am, yit-ki fa ya `m k'ong. Thai-chi-s^u" yu mun k`i: "Ng`i he `m-he K^i-tuk, he ke yin-t^ong su chh^u"n-siung ke Song-ti ke Lai-'e m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai he! Ng`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" chh^o chhai Chhi`on-n`en-ch'a ke yu-phi'en, chh^o-t'en thi^en-t'ang ke y`un kong-l`im!"
Thai-chi-s^u" chhiu chh'a-li+et chhu"-k^a ke s^am, k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m-s'u" ph+et ke chu"n-ng`in l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu y^u th^ang-t'o k`i v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke fa. Ng`i-t^eu k'ong oi ngi'ong-p^an phan k`i?" K`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu phan k`i y^u-chhui, yin-t^ong chh'u s'i-h`in.

Y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiu tui k`i phi h'eu-l^an, yu ^em-t'en k`i ke muk-ch^u, yung khi`en-th`eu-m`a t'a k`i, mun k`i k'ong: "Si^en-t^i ^a, chhu"-th`on-khon, he m'a-ng`in t'a ng`i?" Ke-t^eu k'in-v'i ya l^ai-t'en k`i, yung p^a-ch'ong-m`a s^an k`i.
Ke-s`u", P'i-tet h`an li`u chhai h^a-poi ke th`in-yen-t'u. Y^u thai-chi-s^u" ke yit-ke s'u"-'ng h`ang ko-l`oi,
khon-t'o P'i-tet chhai ke-vi phoi-f'o, chhiu khon-t'en k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i me he th`ung N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u khiung-ha ke."
