P'i-tet f'eu-ngin k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-t^i, ya m`o li'au-ki'e ng`i k'ong m'a-ke." Y`en-heu, k`i chhut-hi chhi`en-yen. Li'a-s`u", ki^e-'e chhiu th`ai.
Ko yit-ha-'e, ke s'u"-'ng yu khon-t'o k`i, chhiu l^au kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu ke ng`in k'ong: "Li'a-s`a he k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-ke!"

P'i-tet yu f'eu-ngin yit-p'ai. Yu ko yit-ha-'e, s`un-th`eu kh^i-t'en ke ng`in chai yit-p'ai tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i khok-s+u"t he k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-ke, y^in-vi ng`i ya he K^a-li-li-ng`in!"
P'i-tet chhiu fat-su" chu-ch'u k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-su"t ng`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke ng`in!"

Chit-s`u", ki^e-'e chhiu th`ai thi-ngi-p'ai; P'i-tet chang si'ong-h'i Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong-ko ke fa: "Ki^e-'e th`ai li'ong-p'ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai." P'i-tet chhiu ngi^un-`m-h+et, kieu chhut-l`oi.

Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, chi-s^u"-ch'ong k'on-k'in th`ung ch'ong-l'o, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au ngi-fi chhi`on-th'i chh^am-si`ong, ngi-thin kie-v+ak. K`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u thak-h'i-l`oi, ki'e-sung, k^au-p^un P'i-l^a-t^o.
P'i-l^a-t^o mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong m`o?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i k'ong ke."
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong ko Y^a-s^u chhin-t^o su"-chh`in,
s'o-y^i P'i-l^a-t^o yu mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i khon, k`i-t^eu ko ng`i 'an-t^o chhui-mi`ang, ng`i m`o-oi f`i-tap m^a?"
Y^a-s^u h`an-he `m k'ong yit-ki fa; P'i-l^a-t^o k'am-kok kh`i-koai.
Tak-ngi`en Ph`an-ko-chiet, P'i-l^a-t^o cheu chung-ng`in ke y^eu-khi`u piong yit-ke si`u-fam.
T'u-h'o y^u yit-ke ng`in mi`ang ^on-to P^a-l^a-p^a, k`i th`ung ke-t^eu chhai phau-lon-ch^ung chh`u"-ng`in ke phan-th`u ko^an khiung-ha.
Thai-chung chhi-s+ip, y^eu-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o cheu koan-li vi k`i-t^eu phan li'a-khien su" ke s`u"-chiet,
P'i-l^a-t^o mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu piong Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong he-m`o?"
Kh`i-s+u"t P'i-l^a-t^o m`in-m`in t^i, chi-s^u"-ch'ong he y^in-vi chhit-tu chang chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i ke.
Ch'ung-he chi-s^u"-ch'ong san-thung chung-ng`in, y^eu-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o vi k`i-t^eu piong P^a-l^a-p^a.
P'i-l^a-t^o yu mun chung-ng`in k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chh^u"n-cho Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong ke, ng`ai oi ngi'ong-p^an chh'u-l^i k`i n`o?"
K`i-t^eu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!"
P'i-l^a-t^o mun-k'ong: "K`i to-t'ai cho m'a-ke f'ai-su"?" K`i-t^eu h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!"
P'i-l^a-t^o vi-t'o oi tet-t'o chung-ng`in ke f^on-h'i, chhiu piong P^a-l^a-p^a p^un k`i-t^eu, yu min-lin chi^ong Y^a-s^u pi^en-t'a, y`en-heu k^au-p^un ng`in hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka.
P^in-'e chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-ng+ip ch'ung-tuk-f'u ke th`in-yen-t'u, yu h^em chhi`on-chhui s+ip-h+ap.
K`i-t^eu l^au Y^a-s^u chok yit-li^ang ch'u"-set ke chh`ong-ph`au, yu yung net-`e phi^en yit-t'ang mi^en-li`u, l^au k`i tai-t'en,
y`en-heu tui k`i h`ang-l^i k'ong: " Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong van-soi!"
K`i-t^eu yu yung th`en-thi`au k'in t'a k`i ke th`eu-n`a, yung h'eu-l^an phi k`i, kh'ui l+ok-hi pai k`i.
Met-sa s+ot, k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i ke ch'u"-set chh`ong-ph`au thot-h^a-l`oi, l^au k`i chok chhu"-k^a ke s^am, y`en-heu tai k`i chhut-hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka.

Chhai lu-song, k`i-t^eu t`u-t'o yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S^i-m`un, t'u-h'o tui hi^ong-ha ng+ip-s`ang l`oi, k`i-t^eu khi`ong-pet k`i thoi Y^a-s^u khi`a s+u"p-su"-ka. ( S^i-m`un he K'u-li-nai-ng`in, he ^A-l+it-s^an-thai l^au L^u-f`u ke ^a-p^a.)
K`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-to yit-ke thi-f^ong, ^on-to Kok-kok-th^a, yi-su" chhiu-he "Th`eu-n`a-hok ke S^an-th`eu".
Chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu n^a chh^am m+ut-y+ok ke chi'u p^un Y^a-s^u l^im, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u `m l^im.
Y`en-heu k`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, yu chh^u-chhi^am-'e l`oi p^un k`i ke s^am.
Ch^eu-s`u"n-th`eu ki'u-ti'am-ch^ung ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka.
Y^u yit-te ph`ai-`e si'a-t'en k`i ke chhui-mi`ang k'ong: " Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong."
K`i-t^eu yu chi^ong li'ong-ke khi`ong-tho th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka, yit-ke chhai k`i ke yu-phi'en, yit-ke chhai k`i ke ch'o-phi'en.
Tui ke-vi k^in-ko ke ng`in v'u-y+uk Y^a-s^u, y`eu-th`eu k'ong: "H'ai, ng`i li'a oi chhak su"n-thien, s^am-ngit-nui chi^ong k`i chh`ung-kien h'i-l`oi ke!
Li'a-ha, kiu ng`i chhu"-k^a, tui s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang h^a-l`oi ^a!"
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ya khiung-yong chh'u"-seu k`i, p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "K`i kiu-li'au ph+et-ng`in, sa m`o fap-thu kiu chhu"-k^a!

K^i-tuk, Y^i-set-li+et ke v`ong ^a, li'a-ha tui s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang h^a-l`oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu khon, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu si^ong-sin!" Th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke ng`in ya 'an-ngi`ong s^au-nat k`i.
T^ong-chu ke s`u", thai-thi v^u-am, yok-y^u s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ki'u.

To h^a-chu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ke s`u", Y^a-s^u thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Y^i-l`o-y^i! Y^i-l`o-y^i! L^a-m^a sat-p^a-kok-thai-n`i?" Yi-su" he k'ong: "Ng`ai ke Song-ti, ng`ai ke Song-ti, Ng`i cho-m'a-ke piong-thet ng`ai?"
S`un-th`eu kh^i-t'en ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu th^ang-t'o chhiu k'ong: "Th^ang ^a, k`i h^em Y^i-li-^a!"

Y^u yit-ke ng`in ch'eu-ko-hi, n^a yit-te h'oi-mi`en chim s^on ph`u-th`o-chi'u, y`en-heu thak chhai th`en-thi`au-t'ang, n^a p^un k`i l^im, k'ong: "T'en yit-ha-'e, ng`ai-t^eu khon Y^i-li-^a voi l`oi kiu k`i h^a-l`oi m`o!"
Y^a-s^u thai-h^em yit-s^ang, chhiu th^on-hi s'i-thet.
Koa chhai su"n-thien-t'u ke pu-li`am, tui t'ang-k^o to t'ai-h^a li+et-cho li'ong-sak.
Kh^i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka chhi`en ke yit-ke ki^un-k^on, khon-t'o Y^a-s^u thai-s^ang h^em l^au s'i ke chh`in-h`in, chhiu k'ong: "Li'a ng`in s+u"t-chhai he Song-ti ke Lai-'e!"
H`an y^u-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a y'en-y'en kh^i-t'en khon; kh`i-ch^ung y^u Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a, yu y^u se Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-sit ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, th`ung Sat-l`o-m'i.
Y^a-s^u chhai K^a-li-li ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chhiu th`en-t'en k`i, ya f+uk-su" k`i. H`an-y^u kh`i-th^a h'o-t^o fu-ng`in-k^a he th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha l`oi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke.

L`im-am-'e, ^A-li-m^a-thai-ng`in Yok-sit l`oi-to; k`i he yit-ke su-ng`in ch^un-chhung ke ngi-y`en, ya yit-chh+u"t phan-mong Song-ti koet ke s+u"t-hien. Ke-ngit he Yi-phi-ngit, chhiu-he ^On-sit-ngit ke chhi`en yit-ngit. Yok-sit thai-t'am hi kien P'i-l^a-t^o, y^eu-khi`u s^u-liam Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i.
P'i-l^a-t^o th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in s'i-thet, k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai. K`i ham ki^un-k^on l`oi, mun k`i Y^a-s^u he `m-he s'i-thet chhin ki'u.
Tui ki^un-k^on li'au-ki'e s+u"t-chh`in heu, P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i k^au-p^un Yok-sit.

Yok-sit m^ai-li'au m`a-s^a, chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i chh'i-h^a-l`oi, yung m`a-s^a p^au-h'o, piong chhai s+ak-piak chh+ok-s`ang ke f`un-mu t^i-poi, yu chi^ong yit-te thai s+ak-th`eu chan-ko-l`oi, set-t'en m`un-h'eu.
Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a l^au Yok-sit ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a y^u khon-t'o ^on-chong Y^a-s^u ke s'o-chhai.
^On-sit-ngit yit ko, Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a, Ng^a-kok ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, l^au Sat-l`o-m'i m^ai t^eu hi^ong-liau, oi hi k`o Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i.
L^i-pai-ngit t'a-ch'o, ngit-th`eu chang chhut-l`oi, k`i-t^eu chhiu hi mu-thi.

Chhai lu-song, k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung si'ong: "Y^u m'a-ng`in h'o then-s'u chi^ong mu m`un-h'eu ke s+ak-th`eu s'ai-kh^oi n`o?" (Y^in-vi ke he yit-chak thai s+ak-th`eu.) Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu khi`a-th`eu yit-khon, s+ak-th`eu y'i-k^in s'ai-kh^oi l'e.
K`i-t^eu h`ang-ng+ip f`un-mu, khon-t'o yit-ke heu-s^ang-ng`in chh^o chhai yu-phi'en, s^u"n-song chok-t'en ph+ak-set ke chh`ong-ph`au; k`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang.

Ke heu-s^ang-ng`in k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang, ng`ai t^i ng`i-t^eu he chh`im p^un-ng`in t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u. K`i m`o chhai li'a-vi, y'i-k^in f+uk-f+at l'e! Ng`i-t^eu khon, li'a he k`i-t^eu ^on-chong k`i ke s'o-chhai.

Ng`i-t^eu hi l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang, th+it-ph+et he P'i-tet, k'ong: 'K`i oi p'i ng`i-t^eu si^en hi K^a-li-li; chhai ke-vi ng`i-t^eu voi kien-t'o k`i, chhiu-chhiong k`i y^i-chhi`en l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke.' "

K`i-t^eu p+it-p+it-chhat yu k'am-kok kh`i-koai, ngi`am-s`u" l`i-kh^oi f`un-mu, chhong-t'en ch'eu. K`i-t^eu m`o chi^ong li'a-ke su" l^au m'a-ng`in k'ong, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhin ki^ang. Ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a hi kien P'i-tet l^au k`i ke ph`en-y^u, chi^ong s'o th^ang-t'o ke chhi`on-phu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong. Su"-heu, Y^a-s^u chh^in-s^u"n chh^ai-phai ki^a h+ok-s^ang, chhi`ung-t^ung to-s^i, chh`on li'a s`u"n-su"n, put-m+et, p^un ng`in tet-t'o y'un-y'en ch'u"n-kiu ke tho-l^i. ^A-m'en!
L^i-pai-ngit t'a-ch'o, Y^a-s^u f+uk-f+at heu, chui-si^en tui Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a hi'en-hien. (Y^a-s^u su"t tui k`i s^u"n-song kiuk-chhut chhit-ke k'ui.)
K`i hi l^au ke-t^eu th`en Y^a-s^u ke ng`in k'ong; k`i-t^eu t^ong chhai ke-vi s^ong-s^im li`u muk-chu"p.
K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u f+uk-f+at l^au M^a-li-^a y'i-k^in khon-t'o k`i ke s^eu-sit, ch'ung-he m`o ng`in si^ong-sin.
Li'a su" y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u yung nang-ngoi yit-ch'ung f^ong-su"t tui li'ong-ke oi hi hi^ong-ha ke h+ok-s^ang hi'en-hien.
Li'a li'ong-s`a to-ch'on-l`oi l^au kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong, k`i-t^eu h`an-he `m sin.

Chui-heu, s+u"p-yit-ke h+ok-s^ang chh^o-t'en s+u"t-fan ke s`u", Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu hi'en-hien. K`i chit-phi k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang m`o sin-s^im, yu ngang-ki'ang, `m sin k`i f+uk-f+at heu khon-t'o k`i ke ng`in s'o kien-chu"n ke.
K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi hi ph^u-thi^en-ha, tui chhi`on ng`in-lui chh`on fuk-y^im.
Sin yu chiap-su s'e-l^i ke, thin-chh+ok tet-kiu; `m sin ke, voi su thin-chhui.
Sin ke ng`in voi y^u h`ang li'a-t^eu s`u"n-chiak ke n`en-l+it: K`i-t^eu voi fung ng`ai ke mi`ang kiuk-k'ui; k'ong s^in ke l`in-ng^i;
yung s'u chok s`a; l^im-t'o y^u th+uk ke t^ung-s^i ya `m-voi su s^ong-hoi; on-s'u chhai phiang-ng`in s^u"n-song, phiang-ng`in chhiu voi tet-t'o y^i-chhu"."
Ch'u Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu fa y^i-heu, su-chiap to thi^en-t'ang hi, chh^o chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en.
H+ok-s^ang chhut-hi, tak s'o-chhai chh`on fuk-y^im; Ch'u l^au k`i-t^eu th`ung-k^ung, yung k`i-t^eu s'o h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak l`oi chu"n-m`in k`i-t^eu s'o chh`on ke tho he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke.
Th`i-^a-f^i-l`o thai-ng`in: Y'i-k^in y^u h'o-t^o ng`in th`i-pit si'a-s^u, k'ong-h'i chhai ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung s'o fat-s^en ke su"-chh`in.
K`i-t^eu s'o-si'a ke, he cheu ke-t^eu yit kh^oi-s'u" chhiu chh^in-muk khon-t'o yu chh`on-ko li'a tho-l^i ke ng`in s'o-k'ong ke.
Li'a yit-chhiet, ng`ai tui-th`eu-to-m^i chhi`on-phu si`ong-se chh`a-ko, s'o-y^i ng`ai si'ong-oi cheu sun-si l`oi tui ng`i po-ko,
muk-tit he oi p^un ng`i t^i ng`i s'o-h+ok ke tho-l^i he khok-s+u"t ke.

H^i-l+it-v`ong th'ung-chhu" Y`u-thai ke s`u", y^u yit-ke chi-s^u", mi`ang ^on-to Sat-k^a-li-^a, he s+uk ^A-p'i-ng^a chi-s^u" ke-p^an ke; ki^a p^u-ngi`ong ^on-to Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak, ya he chi-s^u" ^A-l`un k^a-chh+uk ke heu-thoi.
Chhai Song-ti khon-l`oi, k`i li'ong k^ung-ph`o he chu"n-chh+u"t ke ng`in, ngi`am-kiet ch^un-s'u Ch'u ke yit-chhiet kie-min l^au k^ui-thin.
K`i-t^eu m`o se-ng`in-`e, y^in-vi Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak `m-voi kiung; k`i li'ong-s`a ya y'i-k^in l'o l'e.
Y^u yit-ngit, Sat-k^a-li-^a t^ong-p^an, chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en chu"p-h`ang chi-s^u" ke chu"t-vu.
Cheu chi-s^u" ke koan-li, chh^u-chhi^am-'e ke kiet-k'o, k`i ng+ip-hi Ch'u ke su"n-thien s^eu-hi^ong.
K`i s^eu-hi^ong ke s`u", chung-ng`in chhai ngoi-poi kh`i-t'o.
Fut-y`en, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" kh^i chhai hi^ong-th`an ke yu-phi'en tui k`i hi'en-hien;
Sat-k^a-li-^a khon-t'o, hak yit-ha, ya chhin chh+ok-ki^ang.

Ch'ung-he ke thi^en-s'u" tui k`i k'ong: " Sat-k^a-li-^a, `m-s'u" ki^ang! Song-ti th^ang-t'o ng`i ke kh`i-t'o l'e; ngi^a p^u-ngi`ong Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak voi vi ng`i kiung yit-ke lai-'e, ng`i oi chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Yok-hon.
Ng`i voi f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok; chhin-t^o ng`in ya voi vi-t'o k`i ke chhut-se l`oi f^on-h'i.

Chi^ong-l`oi, k`i chhai Ch'u ke mien-chhi`en voi cho v'i-thai ke ng`in-v+ut. Th^am-chi'u l^au li+et-chi'u, k`i l^ung-ch'ung cho-`m-tet l^im; chhai ^a-m^e ke th^oi-t'u, k`i chhiu voi p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an.
K`i chi^ong-l`oi oi tai-li^ang chhin-t^o Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in k^ui Ch'u --- k`i-t^eu ke Song-ti.

K`i oi cho Ch'u ke si^en-f^ung, ki^en-khi`ong y^u thai n`en-l+it, chhiong si^en-t^i Y^i-li-^a yit-yong. K`i oi s'u" y`a-^oi l^au ch'u"-'ng chh`ung-s^in f`o-h'o, s'u" phoi-ngi+ak ke ng`in f`i-th`eu, h`ang ngi-ng`in chu"-fi ke lu; k`i oi p^ong-chhu ng`in-m`in l`oi ngi`ang-chiap Ch'u."
Sat-k^a-li-^a tui thi^en-s'u" k'ong: "Ng`ai oi ngi'ong-p^an chang voi t^i li'a he su"-s+u"t? Ng`ai he yit-ke l'o-ng`in-k^a, ng`ai p^u-ngi`ong ya 'an l'o l'e."
Thi^en-s'u" en-k'ong: "Ng`ai he kh^i chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en ke K^a-pak-li+et; ng`ai su-phai chh`on-fa p^un ng`i, po ng`i li'a h'o s^eu-sit.
Ch'ung-he, y^in-vi ng`i `m sin ng`ai s'o k'ong, s`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u" voi s+u"t-hien ke li'a-t^eu fa, ng`i voi pien-cho 'a-`e; t'en-to yin-h'i s+u"t-hien ke-ngit, ng`i chang voi k'ong-fa."
Thai-k^a k'in t'en Sat-k^a-li-^a, `m-t^i k`i chhai su"n-thien-t'u cho-m'a-ke y`en-chh`an 'an ki'u.
To k`i chhut-l`oi, `m-voi l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, k`i-t^eu chang t^i k`i chhai su"n-thien-t'u khon-t'o yi-siong. K`i p'i-s'u v+ak-kiok tui thai-k^a p'eu-su" yi-su", yit-chh+u"t `m-voi k'ong-fa.
Chhai su"n-thien su"-fung ke ngit-kh`i yit m^an, Sat-k^a-li-^a chhiu ch'on vuk-h^a hi.
Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ki^a p^u-ngi`ong Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak chu"n-k^in y^u s^u"n-hong, chhai vuk-t'u khong 'ng-ke ngi+et.
K`i k'ong: "'An-ki'u h'i-l`oi, chui-heu Ch'u h`an-he h'o kho'an-thai ng`ai, chh`u-thet ng`ai chhai ng`in mien-chhi`en ke kien-seu."
Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak f`ai-th^oi liuk-ke ngi+et ke s`u", Song-ti chh^ai thi^en-s'u" K^a-pak-li+et hi K^a-li-li-s'en ke yit-chho ^on-to N^a-sat-l+et ke s`ang,
chh`on-fa p^un yit-ke th`ung-ch^u"n-'ng, mi`ang ^on-to M^a-li-^a; li'a th`ung-ch^u"n-'ng y'i-k^in l^au Thai-v'i k^a-chh+uk yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Yok-sit ke n`am-ng`in thin-chh^in.
Thi^en-s'u" to k`i ke mien-chhi`en, k'ong: "Ngien ng`i ph`in-^on! Ch'u l^au ng`i th`ung-chhai, thai-thai su-fuk p^un ng`i!"
M^a-li-^a y^in-vi thi^en-s'u" ke fa, s+u"p-f^un chh+ok-ki^ang, f'an-f+uk s^u"-si'ong li'a fa he m'a-ke yi-su".
Thi^en-s'u" tui k`i k'ong: " M^a-li-^a, `m-s'u" ki^ang, y^in-vi Song-ti y'i-k^in su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i.
Ng`i voi f`ai-th^oi, kiung yit-ke lai-'e; ng`i oi chi^ong k`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u.
K`i voi s`ang-cho v'i-thai ke ng`in-v+ut, chh^u"n-cho Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke Lai-'e. Ch'u --- Song-ti oi chi^ong k`i ke ch'u-si^en Thai-v'i ke v`ong-vi su-p^un k`i.
K`i oi y'un-y'en cho Ng^a-kok ke ch'u"-s^un ke v`ong; k`i ke v`ong-khi`en v`u-khi`ung v`u-chhin."
M^a-li-^a tui thi^en-s'u" k'ong: "Ng`ai h`an-m`ang ka-ng`in, ngi'ong-p^an voi y^u 'an-ngi`ong ke su" ^a?"
Thi^en-s'u" en-k'ong: "Su"n-L`in voi kong chhai ng`i ke s^u"n-song; Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke khi`en-n`en voi p'i-yim ng`i. S'o-y^i, tui ng`i l`oi chhut-se ke ^o-nga-'e he su"n ke, he Song-ti ke Lai-'e.
Ng`i khon, ng`i ke chh^in-chhit Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak, k`i s^ui-y`en 'an l'o, ph+et-ng`in k'ong k`i `m-voi kiung l'e, ch'ung-he k`i li'a-ha y'i-k^in y^u liuk-ke ngi+et ke s^u"n-hong.
Y^in-vi chhai Song-ti m`o yit-khien su" he cho `m-t'o ke."
M^a-li-^a k'ong: "Ng`ai he Ch'u ke s'u"-'ng; ngien cheu ng`i ke fa s`u"n-chhiu chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song." 'An-ngi`ong, thi^en-s'u" chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i.
M`o k'i-ki'u heu, M^a-li-^a chhut-fat, k'on-k'in hi Y`u-thai s^an-t'u ke yit-chho s`ang.
K`i ng+ip-hi Sat-k^a-li-^a ke vuk-h^a, tui Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak chhi'ang-^on.
Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak yit th^ang-t'o M^a-li-^a ke chhi'ang-^on, k`i s'o f`ai ke th^oi chhiu k'in thi`au. Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an,
thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Ng`i he fu-'ng t^ong-ch^ung chui y^u fuk-hi ke! Ng`i f`ai ke th^oi ya he y^u fuk-hi ke!
Ng`ai ke Ch'u ke ^a-m^e l`oi-khon ng`ai, ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an kh^am-tet n`o?
Y^in-vi ng`i chhi'ang-^on ke s^ang yit ng+ip ng`ai ke ng'i-k^ung, ng`ai s'o f`ai ke th^oi chhiu f^on-h'i to k'in thi`au.
Ng`i khok-sin Ch'u tui ng`i k'ong ke fa yit-thin voi s+u"t-hien; ng`i s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi ^a!"
M^a-li-^a k'ong: "Ng`ai ke s^im ch^un Ch'u v`i-thai;
ng`ai ke l`in y^in-vi Song-ti --- ng`ai ke kiu-ch'u l`oi f^on-h'i;
y^in-vi K`i ku-ngiam K`i p^i-m`i ke s'u"-'ng. Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, van-m`in voi chh^u"n ng`ai he y^u fuk-hi ke,
y^in-vi Chhi`on-n`en ke Song-ti vi ng`ai s`ang thai-su". K`i ke mi`ang he s`u"n-su"n ke;
K`i tui kin-vi K`i ke ng`in hi'en-chhut chh`u"-p^i, chh+u"t-to su"-su" thoi-thoi.
K`i chh^un-chhut thai-y^u khi`en-n`en ke s'u, kiuk-ch'eu s^im-ch^ung ki^eu-ngau ke ng`in.
K`i chi^ong y^u su"-l+it ke v`ong s'ung-h^a p'o-chho, k^o-s^u"n p^i-m`i ke ng`in.
K`i su h'o-s+u"t ke p^un t'u-k^i ke s+u"t-to p'au, h^em fu-chiuk ke kh^ung-s'u ch'on-hi.

Cheu K`i tui ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s'o-k'ong ke, K`i p^ong-chhu K`i ke ph+uk-ng`in Y^i-set-li+et, l`oi ki-ngiam K`i tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on l^au ki^a ch'u"-s^un ke yin-h'i, chhiu-he oi yung chh`u"-p^i kho'an-thai k`i-t^eu, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'en!"
M^a-li-^a th`ung Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak khiung-ha h+et chh^a-`m-t^o s^am-ke ngi+et, y`en-heu chhiu ch'on vuk-h^a hi.
Y^i-li-s^a-ph+ak ke s'an-kh`i to, chhiu kiung yit-ke lai-'e.
L`in-sa l^au chh^in-chhit th^ang-t'o Ch'u su-p^un k`i 'an thai ke chh`u"-p^i, chhiu th`ung k`i khiung-ha f^on-h'i.
^O-nga-'e chhut-se m^an yit l^i-pai, k`i-t^eu chhiu l`oi vi k`i h`ang kot-l^i, si'ong-oi yung ki^a-p^a ke mi`ang ham k`i Sat-k^a-li-^a.
Ch'ung-he ki^a-m^e k'ong: "Cho-`m-tet! K`i oi ham-cho Yok-hon."
Chh^in-y^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ke chh^in-chh+uk t^ong-ch^ung m`o-ng`in ^on 'an-ngi`ong ke mi`ang."
K`i-t^eu chhiu yung s'u p'i mun ki^a-p^a, oi l^au ^o-nga-'e ^on m'a-ke mi`ang.
Sat-k^a-li-^a chhiu th'o yit-te si'a-su" ke pi^ong-'e, si'a-k'ong: "K`i ke mi`ang ^on-to Yok-hon." Thai-k^a chhiu chhin kh`i-koai.
Sat-k^a-li-^a ngi`am-s`u" chhiu voi k'ong-fa, kh^oi-choi siung-chan Song-ti.
L`in-sa chhi`on-phu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang. Li'a s^eu-sit chh`on-phien chhi`on Y`u-thai ke s^an-kh^i;
th^ang-t'o ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung si'ong: "Li'a-ke ^o-nga-'e chi^ong-l`oi voi s`ang-cho ngi'ong-p^an ke ng`in n`e?" Y^in-vi su"-s+u"t chhin m`in, y^u Ch'u ke khi`en-n`en l^au k`i th`ung-chhai.
Yok-hon ke ^a-p^a Sat-k^a-li-^a p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, chhiu chh`on Song-ti ke fa, k'ong:
"Oi siung-chan Ch'u --- Y^i-set-li+et ke Song-ti! Y^in-vi K`i khon-ku K`i ke ch'u"-m`in, ya kiu-s+uk k`i-t^eu.
K`i tui K`i ph+uk-ng`in Thai-v'i ke k^a-ch^ung, vi ng`ai-t^eu h^in-h'i yit-ke chhi`on-n`en ke Kiu-ch'u.
Th`eu-p'ai, K`i su"t th^ung-ko su"n si^en-t^i yi-ngi`en:
K`i oi ch'u"n-kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i s`u-th+it, l`i-kh^oi yit-chhiet yen-hen ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in ke khi`en-su".
K`i tui ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en hi'en-chhut chh`u"-p^i, l`oi ki-ngiam K`i su"n ke khie-yok.

K`i yin-h'i ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, fat-su" oi ch'u"n-kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i s`u-th+it, p^un ng`ai-t^eu yit-s^en-ng`in chhai K`i ke mien-chhi`en, yung su"n-kiet l^au chu"n-chh+u"t l`oi f+uk-su" K`i, chhi`on m`o ki^ang m'a-ke."
Sat-k^a-li-^a yu yi-ngi`en k'ong: "Ng`ai ke se-ch'u" ^a, ng`i voi p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-cho Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke si^en-t^i. Ng`i oi cho Ch'u ke si^en-f^ung, vi k`i ch'un-phi tho-lu;
oi hi l^au K`i ke ch'u"-m`in k'ong: Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en, k`i-t^eu voi tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti y^u chh`u"-p^i l^au l`in-m'en; K`i oi s'u" ch'u"n-kiu ke k^ong tui k^o-thi^en l`im-to ng`ai-t^eu,
k^ong-cheu yit-chhiet chhai s'i ke y^im-y'ang t'ai-h^a ke ng`in, tai ng`ai-t^eu h`ang ph`in-^on ke lu."
^O-nga-'e chhiam-chhiam thai, s^u"n-s^im y'ung-khien. K`i h+et chhai kh'ong-y^a, chh+u"t-to k`i chhai Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in mien-chhi`en k^ung-kh^oi f+at-thung ke s`u".
Ke-s`u", L`o-m^a F`ong-ti O-k'u-s^u"-t^u ha-lin, ham L`o-m^a ti-koet ke chhi`on-th'i ng`in-m`in t^en-ki fu-khi'eu.
Li'a he th`eu-yit-p'ai ke fu-khi'eu t^en-ki, he chhai K^i-l^i-ngi'u cho Si-li-^a ch'ung-tuk ke s`u".
Thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung ch'on p'un-hi^ong hi phan-l^i t^en-ki.
Yok-sit ya tui K^a-li-li-s'en ke N^a-sat-l+et-s`ang hi Y`u-thai, to Thai-v'i ke s`ang, mi`ang ^on-to Pak-li-h`en; y^in-vi Yok-sit he s+uk Thai-v'i ke ch^ung-chh+uk.
K`i oi th`ung k`i ke vi-f^un-chh^i M^a-li-^a khiung-ha hi t^en-ki. M^a-li-^a y'i-k^in y^u s^u"n-hong;
k`i-t^eu chhai Pak-li-h`en ke s`u", k`i ke s'an-kh`i chhiu to.
K`i kiung th`eu-th^oi ke lai-'e, yung pu p^au-h'i-l`oi, piong chhai m^a-chh`o t^i-poi, y^in-vi l^i-sa m`o s'o-chhai h'o p^un k`i-t^eu h+et.
Chhai Pak-li-h`en ke y^a-ngoi, y^u-t^eu ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in am-p^u-th`eu h+et chhai ke-vi, l`un-li`u ch'ong-y`ong.
Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" tui k`i-t^eu hi'en-hien, Ch'u ke y`ung-k^ong si-mien cheu-t'en k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu chhiu f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang.
Thi^en-s'u" tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang! Ng`ai oi po ng`i-t^eu h'o s^eu-sit; li'a s^eu-sit voi tai p^un van-m`in kh+it-thai ke f^on-h'i.
K^im-p^u-ngit, chhai Thai-v'i ke s`ang-t'u, y^u yit-vi Kiu-ch'u vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu chhut-se, chhiu-he Ch'u K^i-tuk.
Ng`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o yit-ke ^o-nga-'e, yung pu p^au-t'en, soi chhai m^a-chh`o t^i-poi; ke chhiu-he ki-ho."
Fut-y`en, y^u yit thai-chhui ke thi^en-ki^un chhut-hien, th`ung ke thi^en-s'u" khiung-ha, siung-chan Song-ti k'ong:
Ngien y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un chhai thi^en-t'ang Chu"-k^o ke Song-ti; ngien ph`in-^on su-p^un thi-song K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke ng`in.
Thi^en-s'u" l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, ch'on-hi thi^en-t'ang ke s`u", ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi Pak-li-h`en, khon Ch'u s'o ch'u"-su" ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in fat-s^en ke su"."
S'o-y^i, k`i-t^eu chhiu k'on-k'in hi, chh`im-t'o M^a-li-^a, Yok-sit, l^au soi chhai m^a-chh`o t^i-poi ke ^o-nga-'e.
Ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in khon-t'o heu, chhiu chi^ong thi^en-s'u" s'o-k'ong ko^an-he ^o-nga-'e ke su" l^au thai-k^a k'ong.
S'o-y^u th^ang-t'o ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chhin kh`i-koai ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in tui k`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa.
Ch'ung-he M^a-li-^a chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet ke su" ki chhai s^im-ch^ung, f'an-f+uk s^u"-si'ong.
Ch'ong-y`ong ke ng`in ch'on-hi, chhiu y`ung-k^ong Song-ti, siung-chan K`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o ke su", l^au tui thi^en-s'u" th^ang-t'o ke v`an-chhi`on khiung-yong.
Pat-ngit heu, ^o-nga-'e h`ang kot-l^i ke ngit-`e to l'e, chhiu vi k`i ^on-mi`ang ham Y^a-s^u; li'a-ke mi`ang he k`i m`ang s`ang-th^oi y^i-chhi`en thi^en-s'u" thoi k`i ^on ke.
Cheu M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke k^ui-thin, kiet-chhiang ke ngit-kh`i m^an heu, Yok-sit l^au M^a-li-^a tai ^o-nga-'e hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, oi chi^ong k`i fung-hien p^un Ch'u.
(Li'a he cheu Ch'u ke fap-l+it s'o si'a: "F`am he th`eu-th^oi ke lai-'e, yit-thin oi fung-hien p^un Ch'u.")
K`i-t^eu ya oi cheu Ch'u ke fap-l+it s'o k^ui-thin ke, hien yit-tui ke p^an-ki^eu ya-he li'ong-chak se ngi+et-kap-`e cho chi-v+ut.

T^ong-s`u", chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang y^u yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S^i-mien. K`i he kin-vi Song-ti ke ngi-ng`in, s`u"-khiet phan-mong Y^i-set-li+et ke ^on-v'i-ch'a l`oi-to. Su"n-L`in l^au k`i th`ung-chhai;
k`i y'i-k^in tet-t'o Su"n-L`in ke kh'i-su", t^i chhu"-k^a chhai l`i-kh^oi su"-ki^en y^i-chhi`en voi khon-t'o Ch'u s'o yin-h'i ke K^i-tuk.
Su"n-L`in k'am-thung k`i, k`i chhiu ng+ip-hi su"n-thien. Li'a-s`u", Y^a-s^u ke y`a-^oi t'u-h'o n'am-t'en ^o-nga-'e Y^a-s^u ng+ip-l`oi, oi h`ang fap-l+it s'o k^ui-thin ke su".
S^i-mien chi^ong ^o-nga-'e n'am chhai hi^ung-chhi`en, siung-chan Song-ti k'ong:
Ch'u ^a, Ng`i s'o yin-h'i ke y'i-k^in s+u"t-hien; li'a-ha, h'o p^un Ng`i ke ph+uk-ng`in ph`in-^on l`i-kh^oi su"-ki^en.
Ng`ai chh^in-ngi'en khon-t'o Ng`i ke ch'u"n-kiu,
chhiu-he Ng`i vi van-m`in ch'un-phi ke:
K`i oi s`ang-cho kh'i-su" Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke k^ong, cho Ng`i ke ch'u"-m`in Y^i-set-li+et ke k^ong-y`ung.
^O-nga-'e ke y`a-^oi tui S^i-mien s'o k'ong ko^an-he k`i ke su" k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai.

S^i-mien vi k`i-t^eu chuk-fuk, yu tui ^o-nga-'e ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a k'ong: "Li'a ^o-nga-'e p^un Song-ti ki'en-si'en, he vi-t'o Y^i-set-li+et ch^ung chhin-t^o ng`in ke m+et-m`ong, l^au chhin-t^o ng`in ke tet-kiu. K`i voi s`ang-cho chhin-t^o ng`in f'i-pong ke tui-siong,
yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi hi'en-chhut li'a-t^eu ng`in s^im-ch^ung ke yi-ngiam. Y`u-s^ong voi chhiong li-kiam chhiuk-chh^on ng`i ke s^im."

Yu y^u yit-ke 'ng si^en-t^i, mi`ang ^on-to ^On-n^a, he ^A-sat k^i-chh+uk Fap-nui-l+it ke moi-'e. K`i y'i-k^in chhin l'o. K`i kiet-ko-f^un, th`ung k`i ke l'o-k^ung khiung-ha s^en-f+at chhit-ngi`en ki'u,
heu-l`oi chhiu s'u-ko'a, li'a-ha he pat-s+u"p-si se. K`i `m-h'en l`i-kh^oi su"n-thien, ngit-ya kin-pai Song-ti, kim-s+u"t kh`i-t'o.
Li'a-s`u", k`i t'u-h'o ya l`oi k'am-chhia Song-ti. K`i tui s'o-y^u t'en-heu Song-ti kiu-s+uk Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in k'ong-h'i li'a ^o-nga-'e ke su".
Yok-sit l^au M^a-li-^a cheu Ch'u ke fap-l+it h`ang yit-chhiet s'o k^ui-thin ke su" heu, chhiu ch'on K^a-li-li, to k`i-t^eu ke p'un-hi^ong N^a-sat-l+et hi.
Se-ng`in-`e chhiam-chhiam thai, y'ung-khien yu m^an-y^u chu"-fi; Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en l^au k`i th`ung-chhai.
Y^a-s^u ke y`a-^oi tak-ngi`en hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang s'u Ph`an-ko-chiet.
Y^a-s^u s+u"p-ngi-se ke s`u"-chiet, k`i-t^eu cheu-s`ong hi s'u-chiet.
Chiet-kh`i ko-thet, k`i-t^eu chhiu h'i-s^u"n ch'on-hi, ch'ung-he seu-ngi`en Y^a-s^u li`u chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang; k`i ke y`a-^oi `m t^i li'a-khien su",
l'au-t'o k`i chhai th`ung-h`ang ke ng`in-khi`un ch^ung-ki^en; h`ang yit-ngit ke lu-chh`ang heu, chang chhai chh^in-y^u ke ch^ung-ki^en chh`im k`i.
K`i-t^eu chh`im k`i `m-t'o, chhiu to-ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi chh`im.
To thi-s^am-ngit, k`i-t^eu chang chhai su"n-thien-t'u chh`im-t'o k`i. Ke-s`u" k`i chh^o chhai Y`u-thai kau-s^u" ke ch^ung-ki^en, yit-mien th^ang, yit-mien mun;
s'o-y^u th^ang-t'o k`i ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chhin h^i-kh`i k`i ke chh^ung-m`in l^au f`i-tap.

K`i ke y`a-^oi khon-t'o k`i, k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai. Ki^a-m^e tui k`i k'ong: "Lai-'e ^a, ng`i cho-m'a-ke 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai ng`ai-t^eu n`e? Ng`i khon, ngi^a p^a l^au ng`ai tak s'o-chhai chh`im ng`i, s`eu to voi s'i!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Cho-m'a-ke chh`im ng`ai? K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ng`ai yin-t^ong oi chhai ng^a P^a ke vuk-h^a?"
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu `m li'au-ki'e k`i li'a-ki fa ke yi-su".
Y^a-s^u chhiu th`en k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ch'on-hi N^a-sat-l+et-s`ang, f`am-su" sun-chhi`ung y`a-^oi. Ki^a-m^e chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet ke su" chhi`on-phu ki chhai s^im-ch^ung.
Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-th'i k'in-l`oi k'in k^o-thai, chu"-fi ya th`en-t'en k'in chen-k^a, Song-ti l^au ng`in ya y+et l`oi y+et siak k`i.

L`o-m^a F`ong-ti Th`i-p'i-li`u chhai-vi thi-s+u"p-'ng ngi`en, Ph`ang-si^u-P'i-l^a-t^o cho Y`u-thai ke ch'ung-tuk, H^i-l+it cho K^a-li-li f^un-f^ung ke v`ong, k`i ke hi^ung-thi F^i-l+it cho Y^i-th'u-li-^a l^au Th+it-l^a-kh'o-n`i f^un-f^ung ke v`ong, L^i-sat-ngiap cho ^A-p'i-li-n`i f^un-f^ung ke v`ong,
^A-n^a l^au K^ai-^a-fap cho thai-chi-s^u". Ke-s`u", Sat-k^a-li-^a ke lai-'e Yok-hon chhai kh'ong-y^a, Song-ti ke fa l`im-to k`i.
Yok-hon chhiu h`ang-phien Yok-tan-h`o yit-tai thi-kh^i, si^en-pu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et chhui-ok, chiap-su s'e-l^i, Song-ti chhiu voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke chhui."
Chhiong si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke s^u s'o ki-chai ke: Chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u-ng`in h^em-k'ong: "Oi ch'un-phi h'o-se Ch'u ke tho-lu, si^u-chh+u"t K`i s'o-oi h`ang ke se-lu!
Yit-chhiet s^an-lak chhi`on-phu oi th`un-m^an, thai-se s^an-k^ong chhi`on-phu oi siok-t^ai! V^an-v^an ke se-lu oi si^u p^un k`i chh+u"t; k^o-t^ai ke tho-lu oi ch'ang p^un k`i phi`ang!
Chhi`on ng`in-lui l^ung-ch'ung voi khon-t'o Song-ti ke kiu-^en!"
Ng`in-khi`un chi^am-t'en chhut-l`oi, oi chiap-su Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i. Yok-hon tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-t^eu th+uk-s`a ^a! Song-ti ke s'u"m-phan voi to l'e, ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o s'am tet-kh^oi m^a?

Oi yung h`ang-v`i l`oi chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in hi-chhi+et chhui-ok. `M-h'o l'au-t'o ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhiu cho-tet mi^en-su s'u"m-phan. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Song-ti n`en tui li'a-t^eu s+ak-th`eu vi ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chho-chhut ch'u"-s^un l`oi!
P'u-th`eu y'i-k^in piong chhai su-k^in t'ang l^o, f`am m`o kiet h'o k'o-ch'u" ke su-'e chhi`on-phu oi ch'am-thet, fit-l+ok f'o t^i-poi."
Chung-ng`in mun k`i k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu oi cho m'a-ke n`e?"
Yok-hon en-k'ong: "Y^u li'ong-li^ang nui-s^am ke, oi p^un yit-li^ang p^un m`o ke; y^u s+u"t-v+ut ke, ya oi 'an-ngi`ong."
Y^u-t^eu soi-vu-y`en ya l`oi oi chiap-su s'e-l^i; k`i-t^eu mun Yok-hon k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu oi cho m'a-ke n`e?"
K`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^ui-thin ke soi-k^im y^i-ngoi, `m-h'o k^a-s^u."

Y^u-t^eu t^ong-p^in ke ya l`oi mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu n`e? Oi cho m'a-ke?" K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M-h'o yung khi'ung-hak n^a ng`in ke chhi`en, ya `m-h'o khau ng`in ke y`u; oi m^an-chiuk s'o li^ang ke chhi`en-li`ong."
Ng`in-m`in k'in-l`oi k'in kh`i-thai, thai-k^a s^im-k^on si'ong, m`o yit-thin Yok-hon chhiu-he K^i-tuk.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Yok-hon l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai he yung s'ui vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i; ch'ung-he, y^u yit-ke n`en-l+it p'i ng`ai h`an-kha thai ke oi l`oi, ng`ai chhiu-he l^au k`i thot-h`ai ya m`o ch^u"-kiet. K`i oi yung Su"n-L`in l^au f'o vi ng`i-t^eu h`ang s'e-l^i.
K`i ke s'u n^a-t'en poi-k^i, oi chi^ong t'a-m+ak-chh`ong piang-chhiang, chi^ong m+ak-'e s^u-ng+ip chh^ong-khu, chi^ong phang-'e yung y'un-y'en put-m+et ke f'o s^eu-thet."
Yok-hon tui ng`in-m`in chh`on fuk-y^im, yung chhin-t^o m`o khiung-yong ke f^ong-fap khien-va k`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-he Yok-hon chit-phi f^un-f^ung ke v`ong H^i-l+it, y^in-vi H^i-l+it th'o ki^a l'o-th^ai s^im-khi^u H^i-l`o-t'i, yu cho chhin-t^o f'ai-su".
Heu-l`oi k`i cho yit-khien h`an-kha ngi`am-chhung ke f'ai-su", chhiu-he chi^ong Yok-hon ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.
Yit-p^an ng`in-m`in l^ung-ch'ung li^ang s'e-l^i, Y^a-s^u ya l`oi li^ang s'e-l^i. K`i chhai kh`i-t'o ke s`u", thi^en chhiu kh^oi,

Su"n-L`in y^u h`in-chhong chhiong ngi+et-kap-`e yit-yong, kong chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song. Tui thi^en-t'ang y^u s^ang-y^im chh`on h^a-l`oi, k'ong: "Ng`i he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, Ng`ai s'o f^on-h'i ke."
Y^a-s^u kh^oi-s'u" chh`on-tho ke s`u", yok s^am-s+u"p se. Chhai ng`in khon-l`oi, k`i he Yok-sit ke lai-'e, Yok-sit he H^i-l^i ke lai-'e,
H^i-l^i he M^a-thap ke lai-'e, M^a-thap he Li-vi ke lai-'e, Li-vi he M+ak-k^i ke lai-'e, M+ak-k^i he Ng^a-n^a ke lai-'e, Ng^a-n^a he Yok-sit ke lai-'e,
Yok-sit he M^a-th^a-th`i-^a ke lai-'e, M^a-th^a-th`i-^a he ^A-m^o-s^u" ke lai-'e, ^A-m^o-s^u" he N^a-f`ung ke lai-'e, N^a-f`ung he Y^i-s^u"-li ke lai-'e, Y^i-s^u"-li he N^a-k^ai ke lai-'e,
N^a-k^ai he M^a-ap ke lai-'e, M^a-ap he M^a-th^a-th`i-^a ke lai-'e, M^a-th^a-th`i-^a he S^i-m^i ke lai-'e, S^i-m^i he Yok-set-khiet ke lai-'e, Yok-set-khiet he Yok-thai ke lai-'e,
Yok-thai he Yok-^a-n^a ke lai-'e, Yok-^a-n^a he Li-sat ke lai-'e, Li-sat he S'o-l`o-p^a-pak ke lai-'e, S'o-l`o-p^a-pak he Sat-l^a-thiet ke lai-'e, Sat-l^a-thiet he N`i-li ke lai-'e,
N`i-li he M+ak-k^i ke lai-'e, M+ak-k^i he ^A-t'i ke lai-'e, ^A-t'i he K^o-s^ong ke lai-'e, K^o-s^ong he Y^i-m^o-t^ong ke lai-'e, Y^i-m^o-t^ong he Ng'i ke lai-'e,
Ng'i he Yok-se ke lai-'e, Yok-se he Y^i-li-y^i-chhia ke lai-'e, Y^i-li-y^i-chhia he Yok-lin ke lai-'e, Yok-lin he M^a-thap ke lai-'e, M^a-thap he Li-vi ke lai-'e,
Li-vi he S^i-mi'en ke lai-'e, S^i-mi'en he Y`u-thai ke lai-'e, Y`u-thai he Yok-sit ke lai-'e, Yok-sit he Yok-n`am ke lai-'e, Yok-n`am he Y^i-li-^a-kin ke lai-'e,
Y^i-li-^a-kin he M'i-li-^a ke lai-'e, M'i-li-^a he M^ai-n`am ke lai-'e, M^ai-n`am he M^a-th+at-th^a ke lai-'e, M^a-th+at-th^a he N^a-t^an ke lai-'e, N^a-t^an he Thai-v'i ke lai-'e,
Thai-v'i he Y^a-s^i ke lai-'e, Y^a-s^i he Ng`o-phi-tet ke lai-'e, Ng`o-phi-tet he P^o-^a-s^u" ke lai-'e, P^o-^a-s^u" he Sat-m`un ke lai-'e, Sat-m`un he N^a-sun ke lai-'e,

N^a-sun he ^A-m'i-n^a-th+at ke lai-'e, ^A-m'i-n^a-th+at he ^A-m`in ke lai-'e, ^A-m`in he ^A-n`i ke lai-'e, ^A-n`i he H^i-s^u"-l`un ke lai-'e, H^i-s^u"-l`un he Fap-l+et-s^u" ke lai-'e, Fap-l+et-s^u" he Y`u-thai ke lai-'e,
Y`u-thai he Ng^a-kok ke lai-'e, Ng^a-kok he Y^i-sat ke lai-'e, Y^i-sat he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke lai-'e, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he Th^a-l^a ke lai-'e, Th^a-l^a he N^a-h+ok ke lai-'e,
N^a-h+ok he S^i-l+uk ke lai-'e, S^i-l+uk he L^a-`ng ke lai-'e, L^a-`ng he Fap-l+et ke lai-'e, Fap-l+et he H^i-pak ke lai-'e, H^i-pak he S^a-l^a ke lai-'e,
S^a-l^a he K^ai-n`am ke lai-'e, K^ai-n`am he ^A-fap-sat ke lai-'e, ^A-fap-sat he S'am ke lai-'e, S'am he N`o-^a ke lai-'e, N`o-^a he L^a-m+ak ke lai-'e,
L^a-m+ak he M^a-th'u-sat-l^a ke lai-'e, M^a-th'u-sat-l^a he Y^i-nok ke lai-'e, Y^i-nok he Ng^a-li+et ke lai-'e, Ng^a-li+et he M^a-l+et-li+et ke lai-'e, M^a-l+et-li+et he K^ai-n`am ke lai-'e,
K^ai-n`am he Y^i-n`o-su" ke lai-'e, Y^i-n`o-su" he Sai-th+it ke lai-'e, Sai-th+it he ^A-t^ong ke lai-'e, ^A-t^ong he Song-ti ke lai-'e.
Y^a-s^u p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, tui Yok-tan-h`o ch'on-l`oi. Su"n-L`in tai k`i to kh'ong-y^a,
chhai ke-vi si-s+u"p-ngit, su M^o-k'ui ke su"-tham. Ke-t^eu ngit-`e, k`i m'a-ke ya m`o s+u"t, ngit-kh`i yit-ko, k`i chhiu t'u-k^i.
M^o-k'ui tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i na-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, min-lin li'a s+ak-th`eu pien-cho mien-p^au ^a!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Ng`in ke s^en-chh`un `m-he t^an-chhiang kho s+u"t-v+ut.' "
M^o-k'ui yu tai k`i to yit-ke chhin-k^o ke s'o-chhai, ngiap-muk ch^u" ki^en chi^ong thi^en-ha van-koet ch'u" p^un k`i khon, tui k`i k'ong:

"Na-he ng`i pai ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet khi`en-piang l^au y`ung-f`a chhi`on-phu p^un ng`i; y^in-vi li'a yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung y'i-k^in k^au-p^un ng`ai, ng`ai oi p^un m'a-ng`in chhiu p^un m'a-ng`in."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Oi pai Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti, t^an-t^an su"-fung K`i.' "
M^o-k'ui yu tai Y^a-s^u hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, ham k`i kh^i chhai su"n-thien chui-k^o ke s'o-chhai, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i na-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, tui li'a-vi thiau h^a-hi;
y^in-vi Su"n-k^in y^u k'ong: 'Song-ti voi f^un-fu K`i ke thi^en-s'u" p'o-fu ng`i';
yu k'ong: 'K`i-t^eu voi yung s'u f`u-t'en ng`i, p^un ng`i ke kiok `m-voi chhong-t'o s+ak-th`eu.' "
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'ong: 'Cho-`m-tet su"-tham Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti.' "
M^o-k'ui yung-chhin kok-ch'ung ke su"-tham, chhiu chhiam-s`u" l`i-kh^oi Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u ch'on-to K^a-li-li; Su"n-L`in ke n`en-l+it l^au k`i th`ung-chhai. K`i ke mi`ang-s^ang chh`on-phien ch^u-v`i ke s'o-chhai.
K`i chhai tak-ke fi-th`ong k^au ng`in, thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung chh^u"n-chan k`i.
Y^a-s^u l`oi-to N^a-sat-l+et, chhiu-he k`i ch'ong-thai ke thi-f^ong, chhai ^On-sit-ngit cheu k`i ph`in-s`ong ke k^ui-k'i ng+ip fi-th`ong hi. K`i kh^i-h'i-l`oi, oi th+uk Su"n-k^in,
y^u ng`in n^a si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke s^u p^un k`i. K`i t'a-kh^oi s^u-ki'en, chh`im-t'o yit-ke s'o-chhai si'a-t'en:

Ch'u ke L`in l`im-to ng`ai, y^in-vi K`i yung y`u k`o ng`ai, l`oi ki'en-si'en ng`ai, ham ng`ai hiong khi`ung-kh'u ke ng`in chh`on fuk-y^im. K`i phai ng`ai l`oi si^en-pu: P^un-ng`in chok ke, tet-t'o su"t-fong; m^o-muk ke ng`in, tet-t'o k^ong-m`in; oi ng`ai s'u" su ap-chu" ke tet-t'o chhu"-y`u;
pin si^en-pu k'ong: Ch'u su-fuk ke h'i-ngi`en l`oi l'e.
Y^a-s^u chi^ong s^u-ki'en ki'en-h'i-l`oi, k^au-v`an fi-th`ong ke chhu-l^i, y`en-heu chh^o-h^a-l`oi. Chhi`on fi-th`ong ke ng`in chu-muk khon-t'en k`i,
k`i chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^im-p^u-ngit, ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o ke li'a-chham k^in-v`un y'i-k^in yin-ngiam l'e."
Thai-k^a chhin h^im-s'ong k`i, ya kh`i-koai k`i 'an voi k'ong-fa. K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in k'am `m-he Yok-sit ke lai-'e m^a?"

Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu yit-thin si'ong-oi yung li'a-ki si+uk-ng^i tui ng`ai k'ong: 'Y^i-s^en ^a, y^i ng`i chhu"-k^a n^a!' Ng`i-t^eu h`an si'ong-oi tui ng`ai k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu th^ang-k'ong ng`i chhai K^a-pak-n`ung s'o-cho ke su", ya yin-k^oi h`ang chhai ng`i chhu"-k^a ke k^a-hi^ong ^a!' "
Y^a-s^u chiap-t'en k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, si^en-t^i chhai chhu"-k^a ke k^a-hi^ong chhi`ung-l`oi he m`o su f^on-ngi`ang ke.

"Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, su"-s+u"t-song, chhai si^en-t^i Y^i-li-^a ke s`u"-thoi, Y^i-set-li+et ch^ung y^u chhin-t^o ko'a-fu. Ke-s`u", li`en-si+uk s^am-ngi`en-pan ki'u thi^en-h^on m`o l+ok-y'i, tak-vi thai k^i-f^ong.
Ch'ung-he, Y^i-li-^a pin-m`o fung chh^ai-phai hi chh`im k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke ngim-h`o ng`in, f'an-ch'on hi S^i-tun thi-kh^i ke Sat-l+et-fap, to yit-ke ko'a-fu vuk-h^a.
Chhai si^en-t^i Y^i-li-s^a ke s`u"-thoi, Y^i-set-li+et ch^ung y^u chhin-t^o pot th'ai-k^o ke, ch'ung-he, chh`u-li'au Si-li-^a ke N^ai-man, ya m`o yit-ke ng`in tet-t'o chhiang-li."
Th^ang-li'au li'a-ke fa, chhi`on fi-th`ong ke ng`in chhiu thai fat-khi'en.
K`i-t^eu hong-h'i-l`oi, l^ai k`i hi s`ang-ngoi, tai k`i to p^en-k^ong-s`un (k`i-t^eu ke s`ang h'i chhai s^an-t'ang), oi s'ung k`i h^a-hi.
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung chh^on ko-hi, cho k`i ch'eu l'e.
Y^a-s^u hi-to K^a-li-li-s'en ke K^a-pak-n`ung-s`ang. Chhai ^On-sit-ngit, k`i chhai ke-vi k^au ng`in.
Th^ang-t'o k`i kau-hiun ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung k'am-kok f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai, y^in-vi k`i ke fa chhin y^u khi`en-piang.
Chhai fi-th`ong-t'u, y^u yit-ke si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong:
" N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u ^a, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an l`oi k^on-s+ap ng`ai-t^eu? Ng`i l`oi s^eu-m+et ng`ai-t^eu he-m`o? Ng`ai t^i ng`i he m'a-ng`in; ng`i he Song-ti ke Su"n-ch'a!"

Y^a-s^u min-lin ke-chak si`a-l`in k'ong: "Ti^am-ti^am, tui li'a ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi!" K'ui s'u" ke-ng`in chhai chung-ng`in mien-chhi`en phi^ang-h^a-hi, chhiu tui k`i ke s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, yit-s+it-'e ya m`o s^ong-t'o k`i.
Chung-ng`in f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, p'i-chh'u" ngi-lun k'ong: "Li'a to-t'ai he m'a-ke fa n`e! K`i kin-y`en y^u khi`en-piang l^au n`en-l+it ch'u"-f^i si`a-l`in, si`a-l`in ya chu"n-k^in chhut-l`oi!"
'An-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-s^ang chhiu chh`on-phien ch^u-v`i ke s'o-chhai.
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi fi-th`ong, hi-to S^i-m`un vuk-h^a. S^i-m`un ke chh^ong-m^in-^oi chh+ok-t'o ngi+et-phiang, fat-s^eu chhin li-hoi; k`i-t^eu khi`u Y^a-s^u y^i k`i.
Y^a-s^u hi khon k`i, kh^i chhai k`i ke s`un-th`eu, chit-phi ngi+et-phiang, s^eu chhiu thui-thet. K`i ngi`am-s`u" hong-h'i-l`oi, ch^eu-thai k`i-t^eu.
Ngit-th`eu l+ok-s^an ke s`u", chhin-t^o pot kok-ch'ung phiang ke ng`in p^un chh^in-y^u tai-l`oi kien Y^a-s^u; Y^a-s^u yit-yit vi k`i-t^eu on-s'u, y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
Ya y^u k'ui tui h'o-t^o ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, h^em-k'ong: "Ng`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e!" Y^a-s^u chit-phi ke-t^eu k'ui, put-ch'un k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu t^i k`i chhiu-he K^i-tuk.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", Y^a-s^u chhut-s`ang hi phi^en-phit ke s'o-chhai. Chung-ng`in si-chhu chh`im k`i, chh`im-t'o heu, si'ong-oi li`u k`i, m`o-oi p^un k`i l`i-kh^oi.
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai ya yin-t^ong hi ph+et ke s`ang chh`on Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im, y^in-vi li'a he ng`ai su chh^ai-phai ke muk-tit."
S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u ki-si+uk chhai Y`u-thai tak-ke fi-th`ong chh`on-tho.
Y^u yit-p'ai, Y^a-s^u kh^i chhai Kiet-n`i-sat-l+et-f`u s`un-th`eu, ng`in-khi`un chi^am-t'en l`oi, oi th^ang k`i k'ong Song-ti ke fa.
K`i khon-t'o li'ong-chak s`on th`in chhai f`u-s`un, t'a-`ng ke ng`in l`i-kh^oi s`on, chhai ke-vi s'e `ng mi'ong-`e.
Kh`i-ch^ung yit-chak s`on he S^i-m`un ke; Y^a-s^u chhiu s^ong-hi, ham k`i chi^ong s`on chhang-kh^oi, l`i ngan kha y'en t^eu. Y^a-s^u chh^o-h^a-l`oi, tui s`on-t'ang kau-th^o chung-ng`in.
K'ong-li'au heu, k`i tui S^i-m`un k'ong: "Chi^ong s`on s'u"-to s'ui-chh^u"m ke s'o-chhai hi, y`en-heu ng`i l^au ng`i ke th`ung-ph^an piong mi'ong-`e t'a-`ng."
S^i-m`un k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu k^ui-ya s^in-kh'u, m`o t'a-t'o pan-m^i; ki-y`en ng`i 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, ng`ai chhiu piong mi'ong-`e l+ok-hi!"
K`i-t^eu piong-l+ok-hi heu, mi'ong-t'o yit thai-khi`un ke `ng, mi'ong-`e hi'am-hi'am li+et-thet.
K`i-t^eu chhiu y+ak-s'u h^em ph+et-chak s`on ke th`ung-ph^an l`oi then-s'u. K`i-t^eu l`oi-to, chi^ong li'ong-chak s`on ch^ong-to m^an-m^an, chh^a-`m-t^o voi chh`u"m-h^a-hi.
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet khon-t'o li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, chhiu kh'ui chhai Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chhi'ang ng`i l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, ng`ai he chhui-ng`in!"
S^i-m`un th`ung ke-t^eu khiung-ha ke ng`in, y^in-vi t'a-t'o 'an-t^o ke `ng, f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang.

K`i ke th`ung-ph^an S^i-p'i-thai ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon ya chhin chh+ok-ki^ang. Y^a-s^u tui S^i-m`un k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i voi tet-t'o ng`in chhiong t'a-t'o `ng yit-yong."
K`i-t^eu chi^ong s`on s'u"-ch'on ngan-pi^en, chhiu piong-thet s'o-y^u ke, th`en Y^a-s^u hi.

Y^u yit-p'ai, Y^a-s^u chhai yit-ke s`ang-t'u, chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in chhi`on-s^u"n pot th'ai-k^o. K`i yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu ph+uk chhai k`i mien-chhi`en, khi`u k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i na-he h'en, chhiu voi s'u" ng`ai chhiang-li."
Y^a-s^u chh^un-s'u mi^a k`i, k'ong: "Ng`ai h'en, ng`i chhiang-li l'e!" K`i s^u"n-song ke th'ai-k^o chit-s`u" chhiu m`o-thet hi.

Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i k'ong: "`M-h'o l^au ph+et-ng`in k'ong; chh+u"t-chiap hi kien chi-s^u", p^un k`i ki'am-chh`a, y`en-heu cheu M^o-s^i s'o-thin ke k^ui-k'i hien chi-v+ut, l`oi tui ng`in chu"n-m`in ng`i y'i-k^in chhiang-li l'e."
Ch'ung-he, Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-s^ang k'in chh`on k'in y'en. Y^u chhin thai-khi`un ke ng`in s`ong-s`ong chhi-s+ip, oi th^ang k`i k'ong-tho, ya h^i-mong k`i y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke phiang-ng`in.
Y^a-s^u sa cheu-s`ong thui-to phi^en-phit ke thi-f^ong hi kh`i-t'o.

Y^u yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u chhai kau-th^o ng`in ke s`u", y^u-t^eu tui K^a-li-li ke kok hi^ong-ch'u"n l^au Y`u-thai, Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in th`ung k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" ya chh^o chhai s`un-th`eu. Ch'u ke n`en-l+it th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha, p^un k`i voi y^i-h'o phiang-ng`in.
Y^u k'i-ke ng`in, k^ong yit-ke soi chhai m`un-pi^ong-t'ang ke th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in l`oi, si'ong-oi chi^ong k`i k^ong to vuk-t'u hi, piong chhai Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en.

Ch'ung-he, y^in-vi ng`in t^ong t^o, k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu k^ong k`i ng+ip-hi, chhiu chi^ong k`i k^ong to vuk-t'ang hi, chhak-kh^oi ng'a-`e, chi^ong k`i li`en m`un-pi^ong chhui-to ng`in-khi`un ch^ung, piong chhai Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o k`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im, chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: "Ph`en-y^u, ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en l'e."

Ke-t^eu k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in ngi-lun k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in he m'a-ng`in? Ngi'ong-p^an k'am-k'ong v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke fa! Chh`u-li'au Song-ti y^i-ngoi, m'a-ng`in y^u sa-chhui ke khi`en-piang n`e?"
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu si'ong m'a-ke, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an 'an-ngi`ong si'ong n`e?
Tui li'a-ke ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en' y`ung-yi n`e? Ya-he k'ong: 'Hong-h'i-l`oi h`ang' kha y`ung-yi n`e?

Li'a-ha ng`ai oi tui ng`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai thi-song y^u sa-chhui ke khi`en-piang." Chhiu tui th^an-f^ung phiang-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai f^un-fu ng`i hong-h'i-l`oi, khi`a ng`i ke m`un-pi^ong ch'on-hi vuk-h^a!"
Ke-ng`in chit-s`u" chhai thai-k^a mien-chhi`en hong-h'i-l`oi, khi`a chhu"-k^a s'o soi ke m`un-pi^ong ch'on-hi, k^ui-lu siung-chan Song-ti.
Thai-k^a f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, m^an-s^im kin-vi, siung-chan Song-ti k'ong: "K^im-p^u-ngit ng`ai-t^eu khon-t'o ch^u"n kh`i-meu ke su" l'e!"
Li'a-ke su" y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u chhut-hi, khon-t'o yit-ke soi-vu-y`en, mi`ang ^on-to Li-vi, chh^o chhai soi-ko^an. Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai!"
Li-vi chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, piong-thet yit-chhiet, hi th`en Y^a-s^u.
Li-vi chhai chhu"-k^a vuk-h^a vi Y^a-s^u thai p`ai y`en-s+it; chhin-t^o soi-vu-y`en l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in ya l`oi khiung-ha s+u"t-fan.

Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au k`i-t^eu khiung-phai ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" tui Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang fat yen-ngi`en k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an th`ung soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in khiung-ha y'im-s+u"t n`e?"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Khien-kh^ong ke ng`in `m-s'u" y^i-s^en, y^u phiang ke ng`in chang oi.
Ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit `m-he oi f^u-seu ngi-ng`in, he oi f^u-seu chhui-ng`in f'i-k'oi."
Y^u ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang s`ong-s`ong kim-s+u"t kh`i-t'o, Fap-li-soi-ng`in ke h+ok-s^ang ya he 'an-ngi`ong, ch'u"-y^u ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang yu s+u"t yu l^im."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "S^in-l`ong h`an chhai f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu k'am cho-tet ham ng`in-hak kim-s+u"t? T^ong-y`en cho-`m-tet!
Ch'ung-he s`u"-ki^en voi to, s^in-l`ong voi p^un-ng`in tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung tai-ch'eu, ke-s`u" k`i-t^eu chhiu oi kim-s+u"t."

Y^a-s^u yu sat p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "M`o ng`in chi^ong s^in-s^am chh'a yit-te h^a-l`oi, n^a-hi p'u khiu-s^am; na-he 'an-ngi`ong, s^in-s^am chh'a-lan-thet, chh'a-h^a-l`oi ke s^in-pu th`ung khiu-s^am ya h+ap-`m-t'o.
Ya m`o ng`in chi^ong s^in-chi'u ch^ong chhai khiu ph`i-thoi t'u; na-he 'an-ngi`ong, s^in-chi'u voi chong-li+et ph`i-thoi, chi'u voi leu chhut-l`oi, li`en ph`i-thoi ya f'ai-thet hi.
S^in-chi'u oi ch^ong chhai s^in ph`i-thoi t'u chang chh+ok.
Ng`i-t^eu l^im l'o-chi'u y^i-heu, m`o si'ong-oi l^im s^in-chi'u; ng`i-t^eu ch'ung-k'ong: 'H`an-he l'o-chi'u kha h'o.' "
Y^u yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, Y^a-s^u k^in-ko m+ak-thi`en; ki^a h+ok-s^ang l+ot t^eu m+ak-chhon, yung s'u n`o l`oi s+u"t.
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an cho ^On-sit-ngit kim-ch'u" cho ke su"?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: " Thai-v'i l^au th`en k`i ke ng`in t'u-k^i ke s`u" cho m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu m`o th+uk-ko he-m`o?

K`i ng+ip-hi Song-ti ke su"n-thien, n^a hien-p^un Song-ti ke pi'ang l`oi s+u"t, yu p^un-p^un th`en k`i ke ng`in s+u"t; s+u"t li'a-ke pi'ang-`e he v`i-fap ke, y^in-vi ch'u"-y^u chi-s^u" chang cho-tet s+u"t."
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" chhiu-he ^On-sit-ngit ke Ch'u."
Yu y^u yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, Y^a-s^u hi fi-th`ong kau-su" ng`in; chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in, k`i ke yu-s'u khi`o-thet.
Y^u-t^eu k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in si'ong-oi chh`im Y^a-s^u ke p'a-piang l`oi ko k`i, chhiu chhai s`un-h'eu ch'ong-t'en, oi khon k`i chhai ^On-sit-ngit voi vi ng`in y^i-phiang m`o.
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu ke s^im-s^u", chhiu tui ke s'u khi`o-thet ke ng`in k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, kh^i-to th`eu-chhi`en l`oi!" Ke-ng`in chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi kh^i-t'en.

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai mun ng`i-t^eu, ko^an-he ^On-sit-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it he ngi'ong-p^an k^ui-thin? Oi cho h'o-su", ya-he cho f'ai-su"? Oi kiu ng`in, ya-he chh`u" ng`in?"
K`i yung muk-ch^u h`im ch^u-v`i s'o-y^u ke ng`in, y`en-heu tui ke-ng`in, k'ong: "S'u chh^un chhut-l`oi!" Ke-ng`in chi^ong s'u yit chh^un chhut-l`oi, k`i ke s'u chhiu h'o l'e.
K`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong khi'en, p'i-chh'u" chh^am-si`ong oi ngi'ong-p^an l`oi tui-fu Y^a-s^u.
Y^u yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u s^ong-s^an hi kh`i-t'o, chhai ke-vi k^ui-ya kh`i-t'o Song-ti.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", k`i seu-s+ip h+ok-s^ang to k`i ke mien-chhi`en l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung si'en-chhut s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in, ham k`i-t^eu cho s'u"-th`u.
K`i-t^eu he: S^i-m`un (Y^a-s^u yu th`ung k`i ^on-mi`ang P'i-tet) h`an-y^u ki^a l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et, yu y^u Ng^a-kok, Yok-hon, F^i-l+it, P^a-t^o-l`o-m^ai,
M^a-thai, T^o-m^a, ^A-l+et-f^i ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok, p^un-ng`in ham-cho Kit-chin-t'ong ke S^i-m`un,
Ng^a-kok ke lai-'e Y`u-thai, l^au heu-l`oi chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai.

Y^a-s^u l^au s'u"-th`u h^a-s^an heu, th`ung chhin t^o h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha kh^i chhai yit-ke phi`ang ke s'o-chhai. Y^u yit thai-khi`un ke ng`in tui Y`u-thai chhi`on-thi, Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l^au h'oi-s`un ke s`ang-su" Thai-ng`i, S^i-tun t'en thi-f^ong l`oi-to ke-vi,
oi th^ang k`i k'ong-tho, ya h^i-mong k`i y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke phiang-ng`in; li`en ke-t^eu p^un si`a-l`in met-sa ke ya l`oi, pin tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung si'ong-oi mi^a k`i, y^in-vi y^u n`en-l+it tui k`i s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'en h+ok-s^ang, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-t^eu khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in!
"Li'a-ha t'u-k^i ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu voi y^u h'o s+u"t-p'au! "Li'a-ha ^oi-s^ong li`u muk-chu"p ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu voi y^u thai f^on-h'i!
"Vi-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" ke y`en-ku, y^u-ng`in yen-hen ng`i-t^eu, kh^i-chhi+et ng`i-t^eu, v'u-y+uk ng`i-t^eu, khon ng`i-t^eu cho f'ai-ng`in, ng`i-t^eu s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi!
Th`eu-p'ai, k`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ya he 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai si^en-t^i. Ke-ngit, ng`i-t^eu oi f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok, y^in-vi chhai thi^en-t'ang y^u vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi f^ung-fu ke chi'ong-s'ong.
"Ch'ung-he, y^u-chhi`en ke ng`in chh'am l'e! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in hi'ong-su ^on-l+ok!
"Li'a-ha p'au-chiuk ke ng`in chh'am l'e! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chi^ong-l`oi voi ngo-t'u-s'u"! "Li'a-ha thai f^on-h'i ke ng`in chh'am l'e! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chi^ong-l`oi voi ^oi-s^ong li`u muk-chu"p!
"Thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu chh'am l'e! Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en tui k'a si^en-t^i ya su"t k'ong khiung-yong ke fa.
"Ch'ung-he, ng`i li'a-t^eu th^ang ke ng`in ^a, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: Oi siak ng`i-t^eu ke s`u-th+it, h'o kho'an-thai yen-hen ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in;
oi vi chu-ch'u ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in chuk-fuk, vi v'u-y+uk ng`i-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o.
Y^u-ng`in t'a ng`i li'a-phi'en ke choi-kok, li`en ke-phi'en ya p^un k`i t'a! Y^u-ng`in n^a ng`i ke ngoi-s^am, li`en nui-s^am ya p^un k`i!
F`am khi`u ng`i ke, chhiu oi p^un k`i; n^a ng`i t^ung-s^i ke, m+ok hi n^a-ch'on-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ph+et-ng`in ngi'ong-p^an tui-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiu oi ngi'ong-p^an tui-thai k`i-t^eu.
"Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u siak ke-t^eu siak ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in, y^u m'a-ke k^ung-tet n`e? Li`en f'ai-ng`in me siak ke-t^eu siak k`i-t^eu ke ng`in!
Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u h'o kho'an-thai ke-t^eu h'o kho'an-thai ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in, y^u m'a-ke k^ung-tet n`e? Li`en f'ai-ng`in me 'an-ngi`ong h`ang!

Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u chia-chhi`en p^un y^u kh'o-n`en v`an-chhi`en ke ng`in, y^u m'a-ke k^ung-tet n`e? Li`en f'ai-ng`in me chia-chhi`en p^un f'ai-ng`in, heu-l`oi chang ham k`i-t^eu v`an-chh^in s'o chia ke chai!

Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu oi siak s`u-th+it, h'o kho'an-thai k`i-t^eu; chia-chhi`en p^un ng`in, `m-h'o h^i-mong s^u-ch'on-l`oi. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu voi tet-t'o f^ung-fu ke chi'ong-s'ong, th`ung-s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu chu"n-k^in he Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, y^in-vi K`i ya yung chh`u"-p^i kho'an-thai ke-t^eu m`ong-^en poi-ngi l^au si`a-ok ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chh`u"-p^i, chhiu-chhiong ng`i-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu he chh`u"-p^i ke.

"`M-h'o lun-ton ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti chhiu `m-voi s'u"m-phan ng`i-t^eu; `m-h'o thin ng`in ke chhui, Song-ti chhiu `m-voi thin ng`i-t^eu ke chhui; oi sa-mi^en ng`in, Song-ti chhiu voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu.

Ng`i-t^eu p^un ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti chhiu voi p^un ng`i-t^eu, pin yung thai ke t'eu, li`en-y`eu-tai-khim, ph`un-li`u pat-sien l`oi t'o p^un ng`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu yung m'a-ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ph+et-ng`in, Song-ti ya oi yung khiung-yong ke t^ung-s^i li`ong p^un ng`i-t^eu."
Y^a-s^u yu yung p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "M^o-muk-ke k'am cho-tet vi m^o-muk-ke tai-lu m^a? Na-he 'an-ngi`ong, li'ong-s`a l^ung-ch'ung voi tiet-l+ok fut-t'u hi.
H+ok-s^ang m`o p'i s^in-s^ang kha thai, ch'ung-he chhut-s^u" y^i-heu, chhiu voi chhiong ki^a s^in-s^ang.
"Ng`i cho-m'a-ke t^an-chhiang khon-t'o ngi^a hi^ung-thi muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e, ch'ung-he m`o si'ong-t'o chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke thai-li`ong n`e?

Ng`i m`o khon-t'o chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi y^u thai-li`ong, ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet tui ngi^a hi^ung-thi k'ong: 'Hi^ung-thi, ng`i muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e, ng`ai thoi ng`i thi^au chhut-l`oi' n`o? K'a-h'o ke ng`in ^a, si^en chi^ong ng`i chhu"-k^a muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke thai-li`ong s'ai-ch'eu, chang khon-tet chh^in-chh'u l`oi thi^au ngi^a hi^ung-thi muk-ch^u t^i-poi ke chh'o-set-'e.
"H'o su `m-voi kiet f'ai k'o-ch'u", f'ai su ya `m-voi kiet h'o k'o-ch'u".
Tak-ch'ung ke su-'e, tui k`i ke k'o-ch'u" chhiu cho-tet ngin-su"t k`i. Ng`i-t^eu `m-voi chhai net-chh`ung-ch^ung chak v`u-f^a-k'o, ya `m-voi chhai chh+it-l`i t^i-poi chak ph`u-th`o.
H'o-ng`in s^im-k^on chit san chhiu fat-chhut san; f'ai-ng`in chit ok chhiu fat-chhut ok. Y^in-vi s^im-k^on s'o ch^ong-m^an ke, choi chhiu k'ong chhut-l`oi.
"Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke ham ng`ai 'Ch'u ^a, Ch'u ^a', ch'ung-he `m cheu ng`ai ke fa hi h`ang n`e?
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, tak-ke chhiu-khiun ng`ai, th^ang ng`ai ke fa hi-h`ang ke, he chhiong nai-ch'ung ke ng`in n`e?

K`i chhiong yit-ke h'i-vuk ke ng`in, chi^ong thi-n`ai yet chh^u"m, chi^ong k^in-k^i piong chhai ph`an-s+ak-t'ang. Pot thai-s'ui ke s`u", vuk p^un s'ui chh^ung-t'o, ch'ung-he `m-voi th^in-th^ung, y^in-vi vuk h'i-to chhin chap.
Ch'ung-he, th^ang ng`ai ke fa `m hi-h`ang ke ng`in, he chhiong yit-ke ng`in h'i-vuk chhai thi-song, m`o t'a thi-k^i, p^un s'ui yit chh^ung, chhiu vang-thet, yu vang-to tap-tap!"
Y^a-s^u tui chung-ng`in k'ong li'a-t^eu fa heu, chhiu hi-to K^a-pak-n`ung.
Chhai ke-vi, y^u yit-ke L`o-m^a ki^un-k^on, k`i y^u yit-ke s'o khon-chhung ke ph+uk-ng`in pot thai phiang, chh^a-`m-t^o voi s'i l'e.
Ki^un-k^on th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u ke su", chhiu thok k'i-ke Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ch'ong-l'o hi chhi'ang Y^a-s^u l`oi y^i k`i ke ph+uk-ng`in.
K`i-t^eu hi-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, pet-chhiet khi`u k`i k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in khok-s+u"t kh^am-tet ng`i ke p^ong-chhu;
k`i siak ng`ai-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in, su"t thoi ng`ai-t^eu h'i fi-th`ong."
Y^a-s^u chhiu th`en k`i-t^eu hi. Voi to ke s`u", ki^un-k^on thok k'i-ke ph`en-y^u hi l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, `m-s'u" 'an l`o-f`an ng`i! Ng`i l`oi ng^a vuk-h^a, ng`ai t^ong `m-h'i;
ng`ai chhiu-he chh^in-s^u"n hi kien ng`i ya m`o ch^u"-kiet. Ng`i k'ong yit-ki fa, ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in chhiu voi h'o.

Chhiu-chhiong ng`ai t'ang-k^o y^u ch'u"-f^i-k^on, h^a-poi ya y^u su ng`ai ch'u"-f^i ke p^in-'e. Ng`ai min-lin li'a-ke p^in-'e hi, k`i chhiu hi; min-lin ke-ke l`oi, k`i chhiu l`oi; tui ng`ai ke n`u-ph+uk k'ong 'Cho li'a-ke su"', k`i chhiu hi cho."

Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i, ch'on-s^u"n tui th`en k`i ke thai-chung k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiong 'an-ngi`ong ke sin-s^im, chhiu-he chhai Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`ai ya chhi`ung-l`oi m`ang-su"t khon-ko!"
Ke-t^eu su-thok ke ng`in to-ch'on-hi ki^un-k^on vuk-h^a, khon-t'o k`i ke ph+uk-ng`in y'i-k^in h'o l'e.
Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, Y^a-s^u hi N^a-y^in-s`ang; ki^a h+ok-s^ang l^au k^ui thai-chhu"n ke ng`in ya th`en-t'en k`i hi.

K`i hi-to s`ang m`un-h'eu, khon-t'o yit-chhui sung-chong ke ng`in-khi`un. S'i-thet-ke he yit-ke ko'a-fu ke t^an-t^en-ch'u"; s`ang-nui chhin-t^o ng`in th`ung ke ko'a-fu khiung-ha chhut-l`oi sung-chong.
Ch'u khon-t'o ke ko'a-fu, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i, tui k`i k'ong: "`M-h'o kieu!"
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u chin-chhi`en hon-t'en k^on-muk, th`oi-chh^ung ke ng`in chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi. Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Heu-s^ang-ng`in, ng`ai f^un-fu ng`i, hong-h'i-l`oi!"
Ke s'i-ng`in chhiu chh^o-h'i-l`oi, ya kh^oi-choi k'ong-fa. Y^a-s^u chi^ong k`i k^au-v`an ki^a-m^e.

Thai-k^a f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang; k`i-t^eu siung-chan Song-ti k'ong: "Y^u v'i-thai ke si^en-t^i chhut-hien chhai ng`ai-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en l^o!" Yu k'ong: "Song-ti l`oi ch'u"n-kiu K`i ke ch'u"-m`in l^o!"
Y^a-s^u li'a-khien su" ke f^ung-s^ang chhiu chh`on-phien Y`u-thai l^au fu-khiun ke thi-kh^i.
S^u"-s'e Yok-hon ke h+ok-s^ang chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet ke su" l^ung-ch'ung l^au Yok-hon k'ong. Yok-hon chhiu ham li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi,
phai k`i-t^eu hi kien Ch'u, ham k`i-t^eu mun k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i chhiu-he Yok-hon s'o k'ong, ke m`o k'i-ki'u oi l`oi ke, ya-he ng`ai-t^eu h`an oi t'en ph+et-ng`in ^a?"
K`i-t^eu hi-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, chhiu k'ong: "S^u"-s'e Yok-hon phai ng`ai-t^eu l`oi mun ng`i: 'Ng`i chhiu-he k`i s'o k'ong, ke m`o k'i-ki'u oi l`oi ke, ya-he ng`ai-t^eu h`an oi t'en ph+et-ng`in ^a?' "
Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u t'u-t'u y^i-h'o chhin-t^o pot-phiang, chh`an-chong, l^au p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, ya s'u" chhin-t^o m^o-muk-ke khon-tet-t'o.

S'o-y^i, k`i en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ch'on-hi, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o, s'o th^ang-t'o ke, po-ko Yok-hon, chhiu-he: M^o-muk-ke khon-t'o, p`ai-kiok-ke h`ang-lu, pot th'ai-k^o ke tet-t'o chhiang-li, ng'i-l^ung-ke th^ang-t'o, s'i-ng`in f'an-s^ang, khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in th^ang-t'o fuk-y^im.
M`o ng`i-f`u ng`ai ke ng`in chhiu y^u fuk-hi!"

Yok-hon phai-l`oi ke ng`in l`i-kh^oi heu, Y^a-s^u tui chung-ng`in k'ong-h'i Yok-hon, k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai hi kh'ong-y^a chh`im Yok-hon ke s`u", si'ong-oi khon m'a-ke? Khon p^un-f^ung chh^oi th^in-th^ung ke l`u-chuk he-m`o?
Ng`i-t^eu to-t'ai chhut-hi cho m'a-ke n`o? Hi khon chok chi^ang-s^am ke ng`in he-m`o? Ch'ung-he y^i-s`ong k'ong-kiu, chh^a-f`a yen-l+ok ke ng`in he h+et chhai v`ong-ki^ung ^a!
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi khon m'a-ke n`o? He khon si^en-t^i m`o? Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o `m-chh+ok, ch'ung-he k`i p'i si^en-t^i h`an-kha thai.
K`i chhiu-he Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke ng`in. Song-ti k'ong: 'Khon ^a, Ng`ai oi chh^ai-phai Ng`ai ke s'u"-ch'a cho ng`i ke si^en-f^ung; k`i oi vi ng`i kh^oi-lu.' "
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, su"-ki^en m`o-ng`in p'i Yok-hon kha v'i-thai; ch'ung-he chhai Song-ti koet, chui m`i-se ke ya p'i k`i kha thai!"
Yit-p^an ng`in-m`in, p^au-h`am soi-vu-y`en, th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke fa, chhiu k'ong Song-ti chhin k^ung-ngi, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu su"t li^ang Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i.
Ch'ung-he Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Fap-l+it kau-s^u" chhiu kh^i-chhi+et Song-ti vi k`i-t^eu ^on-ph`ai ke kie-v+ak, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu m`o li^ang-ko Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i.
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai oi yung m'a-ke l`oi p'i-yi li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in n`e? K`i-t^eu to-t'ai chhiong m'a-ke n`e?

K`i-t^eu chhiong chh^o chhai su"-chh`ong ke se-ng`in-`e, li'a-khi`un tui ke-khi`un h^em-k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu vi ng`i-t^eu ph`un f^un-l^i ke k^o-khiuk, ng`i-t^eu `m thiau-v'u! Ng`ai-t^eu chhong s^ong-l^i ke ^oi-k^o, ng`i-t^eu ya `m kieu!'
S^u"-s'e Yok-hon l`oi, `m s+u"t-pi'ang ya `m l^im-chi'u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong: 'K`i p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n l'e!'
Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi, ya s+u"t ya l^im, ng`i-t^eu yu k'ong: 'K`i he th^am-s+u"t hau-chi'u ke ng`in, ch^on-m`un th`ung soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in cho ph`en-y^u!'
Ch'ung-he, ch^u"n-s+u"t ke chu"-fi he tui s'o-y^u chiap-su chu"-fi ke ng`in s^u"n-song l`oi hi'en-m`in ke."
Y^u yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhi'ang Y^a-s^u th`ung k`i khiung-ha s+u"t-fan; Y^a-s^u chhiu hi ki^a vuk-h^a chh^o-chok.

S`ang-nui y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, yit-chh+u"t ko-t'en chhui-ok ke s^en-f+at. K`i th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u chhai ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in vuk-h^a s+u"t-fan, chhiu tai yit-chak ch^ong-m^an hi^ong-y`u ke ngi+uk-kon-'e l`oi.

K`i pen-t'en Y^a-s^u chh^un-to heu-poi ke kiok, kh^i-t'en kieu. K`i ke muk-chu"p t'a-su"p Y^a-s^u ke kiok, chhiu yung chhu"-k^a ke th`eu-n`a-m^o chh+ut-ch^au, yu yung choi hi ch^im, y`en-heu yung hi^ong-y`u hi k`o.

Chhi'ang Y^a-s^u s+u"t-fan ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in khon-t'o, s^im-k^on si'ong: "Li'a ng`in na chu"n-k^in he si^en-t^i, k`i yin-t^ong t^i mi^a k`i ke he ngi'ong-p^an ke fu-ng`in-k^a; k`i he y^u-chhui ke ng`in!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i k'ong: " S^i-m`un, ng`ai y^u k'i-ki fa oi l^au ng`i k'ong." S^i-m`un en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang ng`i k'ong."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^u li'ong-ke ng`in, khiam khiung yit-ke chai-ch'u ke chhi`en, yit-ke khiam k`i 'ng-pak-chak ngi`un-chhi`en, nang-ngoi yit-ke khiam k`i 'ng-s+u"p-chak.
Li'ong-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung m`o phan-fap h'o v`an, chai-ch'u chhiu mi^en k`i li'ong-s`a ke chai. Ng`i si'ong, k`i li'ong-s`a nai-ke voi kha oi k`i n`e?"
S^i-m`un en-k'ong: "Ng`ai si'ong he tet-t'o kha t^o sa-mi^en ke ng`in." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i k'ong ke chhin chh+ok."

Y`en-heu Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n hiong ke fu-ng`in-k^a, tui S^i-m`un k'ong: "Ng`i khon-t'o li'a-ke fu-ng`in-k^a m`o? Ng`ai ng+ip ngi^a vuk-h^a, ng`i m`o n^a s'ui p^un ng`ai s'e-kiok; ch'ung-he k`i yung muk-chu"p s'e ng`ai ke kiok, yu yung k`i ke th`eu-n`a-m^o chh+ut-ch^au.
Ng`i m`o ch^im ng`ai l`oi f^on-ngi`ang ng`ai; ch'ung-he ng`ai yit ng+ip-l`oi, k`i chhiu yit-chh+u"t ch^im ng`ai ke kiok.
Ng`i m`o yung y`u k`o ng`ai ke th`eu-n`a; ch'ung-he, k`i yung hi^ong-y`u k`o ng`ai ke kiok.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, k`i hi'en-chhut 'an-chh^u"m ke oi, chu"n-m`in k`i t^o-t^o ke chhui y'i-k^in tet-t'o sa-mi^en l'e! Tet-t'o kha s'eu sa-mi^en ke ng`in, hi'en-chhut ke oi chhiu kha chhi'en."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tui ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "Ng`i s'o-y^u ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en l'e."
Khiung-chok ke ng`in s^im-ch^ung ngi-lun k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in he m'a-s`a? K'am sa-mi^en ng`in ke chhui!"
Y^a-s^u tui ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "Ng`i ke sin-s^im y'i-k^in kiu-t'o ng`i; ^on-s^im ch'on-hi!"
Ko yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, Y^a-s^u h`ang-phien tak-ke s`ang-su" l^au hi^ong-chh^un, chh`on Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im; s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ya th`en-t'en k`i.

Nang-ngoi h`an y^u-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a, chhi`on-phu he su"t y^in-vi si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ya-he pot-phiang p^un Y^a-s^u y^i-h'o ke; kh`i-ch^ung y^u Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a, k`i s^u"n-song su"t y^u chhit-ke k'ui p^un Y^a-s^u kiuk chhut-hi;

h`an-y^u H^i-l+it k^on-th^ang ke k^on-y`en Kh'u-sat ke p^u-ngi`ong Yok-^a-n^a, l^au S^u-sat-n^a, pin kh`i-th^a h'o-t^o fu-ng`in-k^a. K`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung n^a chhu"-k^a ke t^ung-s^i ki^ung-kip Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang.
K^ui thai-chhu"n ke ng`in tui tak-vi s`ang-su" chhut-l`oi chhiu-khiun Y^a-s^u ke s`u", Y^a-s^u yung li'a-ke p'i-yi tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Y^u yit-ke ve-ch'ung-ke chhut-hi ve-ch'ung. K`i ve ke s`u", y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai lu-s`un, p^un-ng`in chien-th+ap, ti^au-'e p^i-l`oi chi^ong k`i-t^eu s+u"t-thet.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai s+ak-th`eu thi-song, ch'ung-ch'u" pau-ng`a heu chhiu kh^u-ch^au thet-hi, y^in-vi m`o s'ui-fun ke ch^u"-yun.
Y^u-t^eu l+ok chhai net-`e t^i-poi, net-`e th`en-t'en thai h'i-l`oi, chi^ong y^ong-'e kh+it-t'en.

Nang-ngoi y^u-t^eu ch'ung-ch'u" l+ok chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi, pau-ng`a, thai h'i-l`oi, kiet-ch'u" pak-phi." Y^a-s^u k'ong-s+ot li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu thai-s^ang k'ong: "Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!"
Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi mun k`i li'a p'i-yi ke yi-su".
K`i k'ong: "Tui ng`i-t^eu, Song-ti koet ke o-pi he yung m`in-k'ong ke; na-he tui ph+et-ng`in, chhiu oi yung p'i-yi, p^un k`i-t^eu khon ya khon `m-su"t, th^ang ya `m-voi m`in-ph+ak.
"Li'a p'i-yi ke yi-su" he 'an-ngi`ong: Ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho.

L+ok chhai lu-s`un ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in yit th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho, M^o-k'ui chit-s`u" chhiu l`oi, chi^ong k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung ke ch^u"n-tho chhi'ong-ch'eu, p^un k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu y^in sin l`oi tet-kiu.

L+ok chhai s+ak-th`eu thi-song ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in yit th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-tho chit-s`u" f^on-h'i chiap-su, ch'ung-he ch^u"n-tho chhai k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung tang-k^in m`o chh^u"m; k`i-t^eu chhiam-s`u" si^ong-sin, ch'ung-he yit t`u-t'o kh'au-ngiam chhiu tiet-t'o.

L+ok chhai net-`e t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in th^ang-li'au ch^u"n-tho heu, s^en-f+at ke chh^au-s^im, chhi`en-chh`oi l^au hi'ong-l+ok ke y'u-f+et, chi^ong k`i-t^eu hip-t'en, m`o fap-thu kiet siuk ke k'o-ch'u".

L+ok chhai h'o-n`ai t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u" he ch'u" ng`in th^ang-li'au ch^u"n-tho y^i-heu, yung li`ong-san l^au s`u"n-s+u"t ke s^im l`oi p'o-s'u, nai-s^im t'en-h^a-hi, chh+u"t-to k`i kiet-chhut k'o-ch'u".

"M`o ng`in ti'am-t^en, y`en-heu yung t'eu chi^ong k`i khi`em-h'i-l`oi, ya-he piong chhai m`in-chh`ong-h^a. K`i yit-thin he chi^ong t^en piong chhai t^en-th`oi-t'ang, p^un ng+ip-l`oi ke ng`in khon-tet-t'o k^ong.
Tak-hong y'un-chh`ong ke su" chui-heu voi hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi; khong-t'en ke su" chui-heu ya voi p^un-ng`in yet chhut-l`oi, k^ung-kh^oi p^un ng`in t^i.
"S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi ngi'ong-p^an l`oi th^ang; y^in-vi y^u ke, oi p^un k`i h`an-kha t^o; m`o ke, li`en k`i chhu"-k^a l'au-t'o y^u ke yit-s+it-s+it-'e, ya oi chhi'ong-ch'eu."
Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e l^au l'o-th^ai l`oi khon k`i, ch'ung-he y^in-vi ng`in chhin t^o, m`o fap-thu chiap-khiun k`i.
Y^u ng`in l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Khon ^a, ngi^a m^e l^au ngi^a l'o-th^ai kh^i chhai ngoi-poi, oi kien ng`i!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ke-t^eu th^ang Song-ti ke tho-l^i chhiu s+u"t-h`ang ke ng`in, chhiu-he ng`ai ke ^a-m^e l^au hi^ung-thi!"
Y^u yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang s^ong-s`on; k`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi f`u tui-mien ke-phi'en!" K`i-t^eu chhiu chhut-fat.
S`on h`ang ke s`u", Y^a-s^u soi-thet. Fut-y`en, y^u yit-chhu"n phau-f^ung chhai f`u-mien chh^oi-t'en l`oi, k`i-t^eu p^un long ki+ep-to k^ui-s^u"n, f^i-s`ong ng`ui-hi'am.

H+ok-s^ang l`oi h^em-si'ang k`i, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, s^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu voi m`o miang l^o!" Y^a-s^u si'ang ko-l`oi, chit-phi f^ung l^au thai-long, f^ung-long chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, f`u-mien ph`in-chhin.

Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im nai-vi hi?" K`i-t^eu chhin h^i-kh`i yu chh+ok-ki^ang, p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in? K`i min-lin f^ung l^au long, f^ung-long ya th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"
K`i-t^eu ko-li'au K^a-li-li-f`u, hi-to tui-mien Kiet-l^a-s^em-ng`in ke thi-kh^i.

Y^a-s^u yit s^ong-ngan, chhiu t`u-t'o yit-ke p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke s`ang-nui-ng`in, tui-mien h`ang-t'en-l`oi. Li'a ng`in chhin-ki'u y^i-l`oi chhiu `m chok-s^am, `m h+et ng`in-vuk, f'an-ch'on h+et chhai chh'ung-p^u.

K`i yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu h^em h'i-l`oi, ph+uk chhai Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, thai-s^ang k'ong: "Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke Lai-'e Y^a-s^u, ng`i cho-m'a-ke oi k^on-s+ap ng`ai n`e? Ng`ai khi`u ng`i m+ok ch^au-th+ap ng`ai!"

K`i 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he y^in-vi Y^a-s^u y^u f^un-fu si`a-l`in tui ke-ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi. Ngi`en-l`oi ke-ng`in p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n chhin-t^o p'ai, p^un-ng`in chok-hi ko^an, yung s'u-khau kiok-li`au s'o-t'en; ch'ung-he si`a-l`in s^ong-s^u"n ke s`u"-chiet, s'u-khau kiok-li`au sa p^un k`i ngi'u-th^on, k'ui chhiu tai k`i ch'eu-hi kh'ong-y^a.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ^on-to m'a-ke mi`ang?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ng`ai ^on-to 'Thai-khi`un' ", y^in-vi y^u chhin-t^o k'ui fu chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song.
K'ui khi`u Y^a-s^u, m+ok kiuk k`i-t^eu ng+ip-hi m`o-t'ai-h^ang.
Chhai fu-khiun s^an-ph`ai-t'ang, t'u-h'o y^u yit thai-khi`un ch^u-'e chhai ke-vi s+u"t t^ung-s^i. K'ui khi`u Y^a-s^u ch'un k`i-t^eu ng+ip-hi ch^u-khi`un; Y^a-s^u ch'un k`i-t^eu.
K'ui chhiu tui ke-ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi, ng+ip-hi ch^u-khi`un; k^ui-khi`un ch^u-'e ch^ung-h^a p^en-k^ong, tiet-l+ok f`u t^i-poi, chhi`on-phu chim-s'i.
Ch'ong ch^u-'e ke ng`in khon-t'o li'a-ke su" chhiu ch'eu-thet; k`i-t^eu hi s`ang-t'u l^au ch^u-v`i ke hi^ong-chh^un k'ong-h'i li'a-ke su".

Chung-ng`in chhiu chhut-l`oi khon, to-t'ai fat-s^en m'a-ke su"-chh`in. K`i-t^eu l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, khon-t'o k'ui s'o l`i-kh^oi ke ke-ng`in chh^o chhai Y^a-s^u ke kiok-chhi`en, chok-h'o s^am-fu, th`eu-n'o chh^in-si'ang; k`i-t^eu chhiu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang.
Khon-t'o li'a su"-chh`in ke ng`in, chi^ong ke ngi`en-l`oi p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke k^in-ko tui thai-k^a k'ong.
Kiet-l^a-s^em thi-kh^i ke ng`in chhi`on-phu y^eu-khi`u Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong ki^ang; Y^a-s^u chhiu s^ong-s`on to-ch'on-hi.
Ke k'ui y'i-k^in tui k`i s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi ke ng`in khi`u Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai th`en ng`i hi h'o m`o?" Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u ham k`i ch'on-hi, k'ong:

"Ch'on-hi ngi^a vuk-h^a, hi l^au ng`in k'ong, Song-ti vi ng`i s'o-cho ke su" he ngi'ong-p^an ke thai." K`i chhiu l`i-kh^oi, h`ang-phien chhi`on s`ang, si^en-chh`on Y^a-s^u vi k`i s'o-cho ke su"-chh`in he ngi'ong-p^an ke thai.
Y^a-s^u ch'on-to f`u tui-mien ke s`u", chung-ng`in f^on-f^on h'i-h'i ngi`ang-chiap k`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhai ke-vi t'en-t'en k`i.
Y^u yit-ke fi-th`ong ke k'on-l^i-y`en, mi`ang ^on-to Y+ap-l^u, ya l`oi. K`i ph+uk chhai Y^a-s^u ke kiok-chhi`en, khi`u Y^a-s^u hi ki^a vuk-h^a,
y^in-vi k`i y^u yit-ke chh^a-`m-t^o s+u"p-ngi-se ke th+uk-s^en-'ng, voi th^on-hi l'e. Y^a-s^u hi ke s`u", chung-ng`in chi^am-t'en k`i.
Y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, pot hiet-leu-phiang s+u"p-ngi ngi`en, p^un chhin-t^o y^i-s^en khon-ko, yung-chhin k`i s'o-y^u ke chhi`en-chh`oi, m`o ng`in y^i-tet-h'o k`i.
K`i h`ang-to Y^a-s^u ke heu-poi, mi^a Y^a-s^u ke s^am-m^i; k`i ke hiet-leu ngi`am-s`u" chhiu th`in-ch'u".
Y^a-s^u mun-k'ong: "M'a-ng`in mi^a ng`ai?" Chung-ng`in m`o yit-ke s`u"n-ngin. P'i-tet k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, thai-k^a v`i-v`i chh+ip-chh+ip, chi^am-t'en ng`i ^a!"
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^u ng`in mi^a ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai k'am-kok y^u n`en-l+it tui ng`ai ke s^u"n-song chhut-hi!"

Ke fu-ng`in-k^a t^i chhu"-k^a y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in fat-kok, chhiu p+it-p+it-chhat, l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke mien-chhi`en kh'ui l+ok-hi, chhai thai-k^a mien-chhi`en l^au k`i k'ong, cho-m'a-ke mi^a k`i, yu ngi'ong-p^an ngi`am-s`u" tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Moi-'e ^a, ng`i ke sin-s^im kiu-t'o ng`i! ^On-s^im ch'on-hi!"
Y^a-s^u h`an k'ong-t'en li'a-ki fa ke s`u", y^u ng`in tui fi-th`ong k'on-l^i-y`en ke vuk-h^a k'on-l`oi, l^au Y+ap-l^u k'ong: "Ngi^a moi-'e y'i-k^in s'i-thet, `m-s'u" l`o-thung s^in-s^ang l'e!"
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o, chhiu tui Y+ap-l^u k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang, ch'u"-oi sin! Ngi^a moi-'e chhiu voi tet-t'o kiu."
Y^a-s^u to Y+ap-l^u vuk-h^a ke s`u", chh`u-li'au P'i-tet, Yok-hon, Ng^a-kok pin se-^a-moi-'e ke y`a-^oi, `m-h'en ph+et-ng`in th`en k`i khiung-ha ng+ip-hi.
Chung-ng`in vi-t'o se-^a-moi-'e ke y`en-ku, l^ung-ch'ung chhai ke-vi lon chh`au-chh`au thai-s^ang kieu. Y^a-s^u k'ong: "`M-h'o kieu! K`i pin m`o s'i, he soi-thet thin-thin."
Thai-k^a chhiu seu k`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu t^i se-^a-moi-'e y'i-k^in s'i-thet l'e.
Y^a-s^u khi^en-t'en k`i ke s'u, ham k'ong: "Se-^a-moi-'e, hong-h'i-l`oi!"
Se-^a-moi-'e chhiu f'an-s^ang, ngi`am-s`u" hong-h'i-l`oi. Y^a-s^u k^au-tai k`i-t^eu n^a t^eu t^ung-s^i p^un k`i s+u"t.
Se-^a-moi-'e ke y`a-^oi f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i; Y^a-s^u ngi`am-ngi`am f^un-fu k`i-t^eu, `m-h'o tui ph+et-ng`in k'ong-h'i li'a-ke su"-chh`in.
Y^a-s^u seu-s+ip s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi, su-p^un k`i-t^eu n`en-l+it l^au khi`en-piang, kiuk-k'ui pin y^i-h'o kok-ch'ung ke phiang,
y`en-heu phai k`i-t^eu chhut-hi chh`on Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im, ya y^i-chhu" phiang-ng`in.

K`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhut-ngoi ke s`u", `m-h'o tai m'a-ke t^ung-s^i: `M-h'o tai ko'ai-kun-'e, `m-h'o tai l^i-h`ang-thoi, `m-h'o tai s+u"t-v+ut ya-he chhi`en, ya `m-h'o k^a-tai yit-li^ang nui-s^am.
M`o-lun nai-k^a ng`in h'en chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiu h+et chhai ke-vi, chh+u"t-to ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai.
Na-he ke-vi ke ng`in `m chiap-thai ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu chhiu l`i-kh^oi ke s`ang-su", ya oi chi^ong kiok-hong ke n`ai-f'un t'em-thet, l`oi p'eu-su" tui k`i-t^eu ke k'in-ko."
H+ok-s^ang chhiu chhut-hi, h`ang-phien kok hi^ong-chh^un, tak s'o-chhai si^en-chh`on fuk-y^im pin y^i-phiang.
K^a-li-li ke H^i-l+it-v`ong th^ang-t'o s'o fat-s^en ke yit-chhiet su", chhiu chhin chh^au-f`an; y^in-vi y^u-ng`in k'ong, he S^u"-s'e Yok-hon f'an-s^ang;
y^u-ng`in k'ong, he Y^i-li-^a hi'en-hien; ya y^u-ng`in k'ong, he k'u-s`u"-thoi ke yit-ke si^en-t^i f'an-s^ang l'e.

H^i-l+it k'ong: " Yok-hon y'i-k^in p^un ng`ai ch'am-th`eu, li'a-ke ng`in yu he m'a-ng`in n`o? Ngi'ong-p^an ng`ai th^ang-t'o 'an-t^o ko^an-he k`i ke su"-chh`in?" S'o-y^i k`i yit-chh+u"t si'ong-oi kien Y^a-s^u.
S'u"-th`u to-ch'on-l`oi, chi^ong k`i-t^eu s'o cho ke yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu po-ko Y^a-s^u. Y^a-s^u chhiu tai-t'en k`i-t^eu, ti^am-ti^am-'e hi-to mi`ang ^on-to Pak-soi-thai ke s`ang-su".
Chung-ng`in yit t^i, chhiu th`en-t'en k`i hi. Y^a-s^u chhiu f^on-ngi`ang k`i-t^eu, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-lun ko^an-he Song-ti koet ke su", yu y^i-h'o ke-t^eu s^i-yeu y^i ke ng`in.

Ngit-th`eu l+ok-s^an ke s`u", s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi kien Y^a-s^u, tui k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ham thai-k^a l`i-kh^oi, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu hi fu-khiun ke chh^un-ch^ong chh`im s+u"t ke t^ung-s^i l^au h+et ke s'o-chhai, y^in-vi li'a-vi chhin phi^en-phit."

Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu p^un k`i-t^eu s+u"t!" H+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ch'u"-y^u 'ng-chak pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng. K'am-k'ong ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu hi m^ai p^un li'a 'an thai-khi`un ke ng`in s+u"t m^a?"
(Ke-t^eu ng`in, t^an-chhiang n`am-ng`in chhiu yok-y^u 'ng-chhi^en s`a.) Y^a-s^u tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "H^em chung-ng`in yit-ph`ai yit-ph`ai chh^o-t'en, tak-ph`ai yok 'ng-s+u"p-s`a."
H+ok-s^ang cheu k`i ke fa hi cho, h^em chung-ng`in chh^o-h^a-hi.
Y^a-s^u chi^ong 'ng-chak pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng n^a-h'i-l`oi, ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, k'am-chhia Song-ti, y`en-heu pak-kh^oi, k^au-p^un h+ok-s^ang; h+ok-s^ang chhiu p^un-p^un chung-ng`in.
Thai-k^a chhi`on-phu s+u"t-to p'au; h+ok-s^ang chi^ong s'o chh^un ke sui-'e ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, ch^ong-m^an s+u"p-ngi-chak l`am-`e.
Y^u yit-p'ai, Y^a-s^u t^an-chhiang yit-s`a kh`i-t'o ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang ya th`ung k`i chhai ke-vi. K`i mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chung-ng`in k'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he S^u"-s'e Yok-hon; y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he Y^i-li-^a; ya y^u-t^eu k'ong ng`i he k'u-s`u"-thoi ke yit-ke si^en-t^i f'an-s^ang l'e."
Y^a-s^u yu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu n`e? Ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in?" P'i-tet k'ong: "Song-ti sat-l+ip ke K^i-tuk!"
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u ngi`am-ngi`am k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, `m-h'o chi^ong li'a-khien su" tui ph+et-ng`in k'ong.

Chiap-t'en, k`i yu k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" yit-thin oi su chhin-t^o ke kh'u-nan; k`i voi p^un ch'ong-l'o, chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" hi-chhi+et, ya voi p^un-ng`in sat-hoi, ch'ung-he thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
Y^a-s^u yu tui thai-k^a k'ong: "Si'ong-oi th`en ng`ai ke ng`in, chhiu oi piong-thet chhu"-k^a, tak-ngit khi`a-h'i k`i ke s+u"p-su"-ka l`oi th`en ng`ai.
Y^in-vi si'ong-oi kiu chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang; vi-t'o ng`ai s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Ng`in na-he chhon-t'o chhi`on su"-kie, ch'ung-he s'ong-su"t ya-he s'un-hoi chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang, y^u m'a-ke lu-yung n`e? T^ong-y`en m`o!

M`o-lun m'a-ng`in, y^in-vi ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke kau-hiun k'am-kok kien-seu, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai k`i l^au ki^a P^a pin su"n thi^en-s'u" ke y`ung-k^ong ch^ung kong-l`im ke-s`u", ya oi khon k`i cho kien-seu ke ng`in.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, kh^i chhai li'a-vi ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu chhai s'i y^i-chhi`en voi khon-t'o Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en s+u"t-hien!"
K'ong li'a-t^eu fa yok pat-ngit heu, Y^a-s^u tai-t'en P'i-tet, Yok-hon l^au Ng^a-kok hi s^an-t'ang kh`i-t'o.
Y^a-s^u kh`i-t'o ke s`u", k`i ke mien-mau k'oi-pien, s^am ph+ak-to fat-k^ong.
Fut-y`en, y^u li'ong-ke ng`in chhut-hien th`ung k`i k'ong-fa, chhiu-he M^o-s^i l^au Y^i-li-^a.
K`i li'ong-s`a chhai y`ung-k^ong ch^ung chhut-hien, th`ung Y^a-s^u k'ong-lun k`i oi chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang yung s'i l`oi v`an-s`u"n ke su".
P'i-tet l^au li'ong-ke th`ung-ph^an y'i-k^in soi-thet-hi; k`i-t^eu chh^in-si'ang heu, chhiu khon-t'o Y^a-s^u ke y`ung-yeu l^au th`ung k`i khiung-ha kh^i-t'en ke li'ong-ke ng`in.

Ke li'ong-ke ng`in oi l`i-kh^oi Y^a-s^u ke s`u", P'i-tet tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chhin h'o! Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi tap s^am-ki^en li`au-`e, yit-ki^en p^un ng`i, yit-ki^en p^un M^o-s^i, yit-ki^en p^un Y^i-li-^a." (K`i chu"n-k^in `m-t^i chhu"-k^a he k'ong m'a-ke.)
K`i h`an k'ong-t'en fa ke s`u", y^u y`un chhut-hien, ch^a-t'en k`i-t^eu. K`i-t^eu p^un y`un p^au-t'en ke s`u", h+ok-s^ang chhiu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang.
Fut-y`en y^u s^ang tui y`un-ch^ung chh`on chhut-l`oi, k'ong: "Li'a he Ng`ai ke Lai-'e, he Ng`ai s'o ki'en-si'en ke. Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-chhi`ung k`i!"
Ke s^ang-y^im th`in-thet y^i-heu, ch'u"-y^u Y^a-s^u yit-s`a chhai ke-vi. Chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e ch^ung, h+ok-s^ang ti^am-ti^am `m su"t tui m'a-ng`in k'ong-h'i k`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o ke su".
Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i-t^eu tui s^an-t'ang h^a-l`oi ke s`u", y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in l`oi ngi`ang-chiap Y^a-s^u.
Ng`in-khi`un ch^ung, y^u yit-ke ng`in h^em-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, khi`u ng`i kiu ng^a lai-'e, y^in-vi ng`ai ch'u"-y^u k`i yit-ke lai-'e!
Si`a-l`in k^ung-kit k`i ke s`u"-chiet, s'u" k`i fut-y`en-ki^en chhin h^em, hoi k`i k^ui-s^u"n chh^u-k^in, choi k'in p+ut-ph^o. Si`a-l`in s`ong-s`ong 'an-ngi`ong s^ong-hoi k`i, `m-h'en piong k`i s+ot!
Ng`ai khi`u ngi^a h+ok-s^ang kiuk li'a-ke si`a-l`in ch'eu, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu m`o phan-fap."

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an 'an m`o sin-s^im, 'an f'u-phai! Ng`ai h`an oi chhai ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi k'i-ki'u n`e? H`an oi ngi^un-nai ng`i-t^eu k'i-ki'u n`e?" Chiap-t'en, k`i tui ke-ng`in k'ong: "Chi^ong ngi^a lai-'e tai-l`oi li'a-vi!"
Se-ng`in-`e h`ang-t'en l`oi ke s`u", k'ui chi^ong k`i phi^ang-l+ok thi-song, s'u" k`i k'in chh^u-k^in. Y^a-s^u chhiu chit-phi ke si`a-l`in, y^i-h'o se-ng`in-`e, chi^ong k`i k^au-v`an ki^a-p^a.
Thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung chhin h^i-kh`i Song-ti ke thai-n`en. Thai-k^a tui Y^a-s^u s'o-cho ke yit-chhiet h`an chhai h^i-kh`i ke s`u", Y^a-s^u yu tui ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong:
"`M-h'o `m ki-tet ng`ai oi l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa: Ng`in-ch'u" voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung."
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu `m-voi li'au-ki'e li'a fa ke yi-su"; y^in-vi h`am-yi put-m`in, k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu si'ong-siong. K`i-t^eu yu `m-k'am mun k`i to-t'ai k'ong m'a-ke.
H+ok-s^ang fu-si^ong ngi-lun, k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung to-t'ai m'a-ng`in chui v'i-thai.
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung s'o-si'ong ke, chhiu ham yit-ke se-ng`in-`e l`oi, p^un k`i kh^i chhai chhu"-k^a ke s`un-th`eu,

y`en-heu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang chiap-thai li'a se-ng`in-`e ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ng`ai; chiap-thai ng`ai ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke. Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, m'a-ng`in he chui m`i-se ke, m'a-ng`in chhiu-he chui v'i-thai ke."
Yok-hon tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu khon-t'o y^u-ng`in fung ng`i ke mi`ang kiuk-k'ui, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu kim-ch'u" k`i, y^in-vi k`i `m-he th`en ng`ai-t^eu ke."
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "`M-h'o kim-ch'u" k`i, y^in-vi `m-he f'an-tui ng`i-t^eu ke, chhiu-he chan-s`u"n ng`i-t^eu ke."
Y^a-s^u su-chiap s^u"n-thi^en ke ngit-`e voi to l'e, k`i kiet-s^im oi hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang,
chhiu phai s'u"-ch'a si^en h`ang. K`i-t^eu hi-to Sat-m^a-li-^a ke yit-chak chh^un-ch^ong, oi vi Y^a-s^u ch'un-phi.
Ch'ung-he ke thi-f^ong ke ng`in `m f^on-ngi`ang Y^a-s^u, y^in-vi k`i oi hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang Ng^a-kok l^au Yok-hon khon-t'o li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, chhiu k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu h^em thi^en-t'ang ke f'o h^a-l`oi s^eu-m+et k`i-t^eu m`o?"
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n chit-phi k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi ph+et ke chh^un-ch^ong.
Chhai k`i-t^eu s'o-h`ang ke lu-song, y^u yit-ke ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i m`o-lun hi-to nai-vi, ng`ai yit-thin oi th`en ng`i."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "F`u-l`i y^u l`ung, ti^au-'e y^u teu, ch'ung-he Ng`in-ch'u" li`en thiap-th`eu ke s'o-chhai ya m`o."
Y^a-s^u yu tui nang-ngoi yit-ke ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i l`oi th`en ng`ai." Ch'ung-he ke-ng`in k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ch'un ng`ai si^en ch'on-hi m`ai-chong ng^a-p^a."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "P^un s'i-ng`in hi m`ai-chong k`i-t^eu ke s'i-ng`in! Na-he ng`i, ng`i oi hi chh`on Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im."
Yu y^u yit-ke ng`in k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai oi th`en ng`i, ch'ung-he ch'un ng`ai si^en ch'on-hi th`ung vuk-h^a-ng`in chh`u"-ph+et."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "S'u hon-t'en l`ai-`e k^ang-thi`en yu k'in-khon heu-poi ke ng`in, kh^am-`m-tet cho Song-ti koet ke ng`in."
Ko yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, Ch'u nang-ngoi ki'en-si'en chhit-s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in, phai k`i-t^eu chhut-hi, yit-ch^u li'ong-ke ng`in, si^en hi k`i oi f'ong-mun ke s`ang-su" l^au chh^un-ch^ong.
K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Oi s^u-s`u"n ke chhin-t^o, ch'ung-he s^u-kot ke ng`in thet-s'eu. Ng`i-t^eu oi kh`i-khi`u thi`en-ch'u k^a-phai k^ung-ng`in l`oi s^u-kot.
Ng`i-t^eu hi! Ng`ai phai ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi, chhiong sung se y`ong-`e ng+ip l`ong-khi`un yit-yong.
`M-h'o tai chhi`en-p^au, `m-h'o tai l^i-h`ang-thoi, `m-h'o tai h`ai-`e, ya `m-h'o li'au s`u"-ki^en chhai lu-song th`ung ng`in chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun to nai-k^a, oi si^en k'ong: 'Ngien ng`i chhi`on-k^a ph`in-^on!'
Ke-vi na y^u f^on-h'i ph`in-^on ke ng`in, ng`i-t^eu s'o khi`u ke ph`in-^on chhiu voi l`im-to k`i; na m`o, ke chuk-fuk chhiu k^ui-ch'on ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`i-t^eu oi h+et chhai ke k^a, s+u"t-l^im k`i-t^eu s'o ki^ung-kip ke, y^in-vi k^ung-ng`in tet k^ung-chhi`en he h+ap-l^i ke; `m-h'o tui li'a k^a s'ai-to ph+et k^a hi.
Ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun hi-to nai-chho s`ang-su", na y^u-ng`in f^on-ngi`ang ng`i-t^eu, vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi m'a-ke s+u"t ke, ng`i-t^eu chhiu s+u"t m'a-ke;
ya oi y^i-h'o ke thi-f^ong ke phiang-ng`in, pin tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Song-ti ke koet voi chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s+u"t-hien l'e!'
Ch'ung-he, na-he ng`i-t^eu hi-to yit-chho s`ang-su", ke-vi ke ng`in `m f^on-ngi`ang ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu chhiu hi thai-ki^e si^en-pu k'ong:

'Li`en ng`i-t^eu li'a s`ang-t'u ke n`ai-f'un, ngi`am chhai ng`ai-t^eu kiok-hong ke, ng`ai-t^eu ya oi t'em-thet, p'eu-su" tui ng`i-t^eu ke k'in-ko. Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu oi ki-tet, Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en voi s+u"t-hien l'e!'
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, S'o-t^o-m^a s'o-su ke chit-f+at voi p'i ke s`ang-su" s'o-su ke khi^ang chhin-t^o!
