" K^o-l^a-sin ^a, ng`i f'ai l'e! Pak-soi-thai ^a, ng`i chh'am l'e! Ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s'o h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, na-he h`ang chhai Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun, ke-vi ke ng`in ch'o chhiu chh^o chhai thi-song, chok m`a-s^am, ve f'o-f^oi chhai th`eu-n`a-t'ang l`oi p'eu-su" f'i-k'oi l^o!
Chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun s'o-su ke chit-f+at voi p'i ng`i-t^eu s'o-su ke h`an-kha khi^ang!
Na-he ng`i, K^a-pak-n`ung ^a, ng`i si'ong-oi k^o-k^o chhai-song m^a? Ch'ung-he, ng`i chi^ong-l`oi voi tiet-l+ok thi-ngi+uk hi!"

Y^a-s^u yu tui ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Th^ang-chhi`ung ng`i-t^eu ke, chhiu-he th^ang-chhi`ung ng`ai; kh^i-chhi+et ng`i-t^eu ke, chhiu-he kh^i-chhi+et ng`ai; kh^i-chhi+et ng`ai ke, ya chhiu-he kh^i-chhi+et ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke."
Ke chhit-s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in f^on-f^on h'i-h'i ch'on-l`oi, po-ko k'ong: "Ch'u ^a! Ng`ai-t^eu yung ng`i ke mi`ang min-lin, li`en k'ui ya f+uk-chhi`ung ng`ai-t^eu!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai khon-t'o Sat-tan chhiong ngiap-lang 'an-ngi`ong tui thi^en-t'ang phi^ang-h^a-l`oi.
Th^ang-h'o ^o! Ng`ai y'i-k^in su ng`i-t^eu khi`en-piang, h'o chien-th+ap s`a l^au hiet-`e, ya n`en y`ang-ko s`u-th+it yit-chhiet ke l+it-liong; m`o m'a-ke n`en hoi ng`i-t^eu l'e.
Ch'ung-he, `m-h'o y^in-vi si`a-l`in h`ong-f+uk ng`i-t^eu l`oi f^on-h'i; oi y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke mi`ang ki-li+uk chhai thi^en-t'ang l`oi f^on-h'i."

Chhiu chhai ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u y^in-vi Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung, chh^ung-m^an f^on-h'i, chhiu k'ong: "^A-p^a, thi^en-thi ke Ch'u ^a, ng`ai k'am-chhia Ng`i, y^in-vi Ng`i chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" khong-t'en `m p^un chh^ung-m`in y^u h+ok-mun ke ng`in t^i, f'an-ch'on hi'en-m`in p^un se-ng`in-`e. ^A-p^a ^a, m`o `m-chh+ok, li'a-ch'ung ^on-ph`ai he Ng`i s'o f^on-h'i ke ch'u"-yi.
"Ng^a P^a y'i-k^in chi^ong yit-chhiet su-p^un ng`ai l'e! Chh`u-li'au ^A-p^a, m`o-ng`in su"t Lai-'e; chh`u-li'au Lai-'e l^au Lai-'e s'o oi kh'i-su" ke ng`in, ya m`o-ng`in voi su"t ^A-p^a."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n hiong h+ok-s^ang, s^u"-ha tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u khon-t'o li'a yit-chhiet su"-chh`in, s+u"t-chhai ch^u"n-y^u fuk-hi ^a!

Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, th`eu-p'ai y^u chhin-t^o si^en-t^i l^au ki^un-v`ong si'ong-oi khon ng`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o ke, ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o; si'ong-oi th^ang ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o ke, ya m`o th^ang-t'o."
Y^u yit-ke Fap-l+it kau-s^u" hong-h'i-l`oi su"-tham Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang cho-tet s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Fap-l+it-s^u ngi'ong-p^an k'ong? Ng`i s'o ngi^en-kiu ke kiet-lun he m'a-ke?"
Ke-ng`in en-k'ong: "Ng`i oi yung chhi`on-phu ke s^im-chu", chh`in-k'am, l+it-liong l^au l^i-chu" kin-oi Ch'u --- ng`i ke Song-ti; ya oi siak l`in-sa, chhiu-chhiong siak chhu"-k^a yit-yong."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ke f`i-tap chhin chh+ok, cheu 'an-ngi`ong cho, ng`i chhiu voi s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang."
Ke Fap-l+it kau-s^u" si'ong-oi hi'en-m`in chhu"-k^a y^u l^i, chhiu mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "M'a-ng`in he ng`ai ke l`in-sa ^a?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke ng`in tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang h^a-hi Y^a-li-k^o, lu-song t`u-t'o khi`ong-tho. K`i-t^eu pok-thet k`i ke s^am, chi^ong k`i t'a-to pan-s^ang-s'i, fit chhai ke-vi.
T'u-h'o, y^u yit-ke chi-s^u" ya tui ke-thi`au lu h^a-hi; k`i yit khon-t'o ke-ng`in, chhiu s'am-kh^oi, tui nang-ngoi yit-phi'en ko-hi.
Khiung-yong, y^u yit-ke Li-vi-ng`in ya k^in-ko ke-vi, khon yit-ha, ya s'am-kh^oi, tui nang-ngoi yit-phi'en ko-hi.
Ch'ung-he, y^u yit-ke Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in lu-ko ke-vi; k`i yit khon-t'o ke-ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i.
K`i chin-chhi`en, yung y`u l^au chi'u t'o chhai ke-ng`in ke s^ong-h'eu, thoi k`i p^au-h'o, y`en-heu f`u k`i s^ong chhu"-k^a ke l`i-`e, tai k`i hi-to yit-ki^en l^i-sa, chhai ke-vi cheu-ku k`i.

Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i n^a li'ong-chak ngi`un-chhi`en k^au-p^un l^i-sa ke ch'u-ng`in, k'ong: 'Chhi'ang ng`i cheu-ku k`i, t'en ng`ai to-ch'on-l`oi k^in-ko li'a-vi ke s`u", ng`ai voi n+ap-chh^in chhi`on-phu ke s'o-fi.' "
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u mun-k'ong: "Cheu ng`i ke khon-fap, li'a s^am-ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, nai-ke he t`u-t'o khi`ong-tho ke ng`in ke l`in-sa n`e?"
Fap-l+it kau-s^u" en-k'ong: "He ke yung chh`u"-p^i tui-thai k`i ke ng`in." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i hi, cheu 'an-ngi`ong hi cho!"
Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang ki-si+uk hiong-chhi`en h`ang, l`oi-to yit-chak chh^un-ch^ong. Chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to M^a-thai ke fu-ng`in-k^a, chiap-thai Y^a-s^u hi ki^a vuk-h^a.
M^a-thai y^u yit-ke l'o-moi, ^on-to M^a-li-^a. M^a-li-^a l`oi chh^o chhai Ch'u ke kiok-chhi`en, k'in th^ang k`i k'ong tho-l^i.

M^a-thai y^in-vi chiap-thai ke su" chhin m`o-h`an, s^im-k^on t^ong lon, chhiu chin-chhi`en l`oi k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai l'o-moi piong ng`ai yit-s`a 'an m`o-h`an, ng`i khon cho-tet m^a? Ham k`i l`oi th`ung ng`ai then-s'u ^a!"
Ch'u en-k'ong: " M^a-thai, M^a-thai, ng`i vi-t'o 'an-t^o su"-chh`in chh^au-s^im f`an-l`o,
ch'ung-he ch'u"-y^u yit-khien su" he cho-`m-tet m`o ke. M^a-li-^a s'o-si'en ke he chui-h'o ke phu-fun, he `m-voi p^un-ng`in chhi'ong-ch'eu ke."

Y^u yit-p'ai, Y^a-s^u chhai yit-ke s'o-chhai kh`i-t'o. Kh`i-t'o heu, y^u yit-ke h+ok-s^ang tui k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chhi'ang k^au ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o, chhiong Yok-hon k^au k`i ke h+ok-s^ang yit-yong."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi 'an-ngi`ong kh`i-t'o: ^A-p^a ^a: Ngien Ng`i ke su"n-mi`ang su ch^un-chhung; ngien Ng`i chhai su"-ki^en ch'ong-khi`en.
Su ng`ai-t^eu tak-ngit s'o s^i-yeu ke y'im-s+u"t.
Sa-mi^en ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui-ko, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ya sa-mi^en s'o-y^u tet-chhui ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in. `M-h'o p^un ng`ai-t^eu t`u-t'o thet-chh^ung ke kh'au-ngiam."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in pan-ya hi-to ph`en-y^u vuk-h^a, tui k`i k'ong: 'Ph`en-y^u, chhi'ang chia ng`ai s^am-chak pi'ang-`e;
y^in-vi y^u yit-ke ph`en-y^u l^i-h`ang l`oi ng^a vuk-h^a, ng`ai m`o m'a-ke s+u"t ke h'o ch^eu-thai k`i.'
Na-he ng`i ke ph`en-y^u tui vuk-t'u en-k'ong: 'M+ok chh`au ng`ai! M`un y'i-k^in ko^an-h'o, ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke ch'u"-'ng ya y'i-k^in s^ong-chh`ong l'e, ng`ai m`o fap-thu hong-h'i-l`oi n^a p^un ng`i.'

Oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e? Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiu-son k`i m`o y^in-vi ke-ng`in he ki^a ph`en-y^u, hong-h'i-l`oi n^a pi'ang-`e p^un k`i, ya voi y^in-vi ke-ng`in pet-chhiet k'in khi`u, hong-h'i-l`oi n^a k`i s'o s^i-yeu ke t^ung-s^i p^un k`i.
"S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu khi`u, chhiu voi tet-t'o; chh`im, chhiu voi chh`im-t'o; ph^ong-m`un, m`un chhiu voi vi ng`i-t^eu kh^oi.
Y^in-vi m^i-yit-ke khi`u ke, chhiu tet-t'o; chh`im ke, chhiu chh`im-t'o; ph^ong-m`un ke, m`un chhiu vi k`i kh^oi.
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung cho ^a-p^a ke, lai-'e th'o `ng-`e ke s`u", y^u m'a-ng`in f'an-ch'on n^a s`a-k^o p^un k`i?
Th'o ki^e-l'on ke s`u", f'an-ch'on n^a hiet-`e p^un k`i n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en f'ai, h`an t^i n^a h'o t^ung-s^i p^un chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-'ng; 'an-ngi`ong, chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a k'am `m-he h`an-kha oi chi^ong Su"n-L`in su-p^un khi`u K`i ke ng`in m^a?"
Y^a-s^u kiuk-ch'eu yit-ke 'a-`e-k'ui, k'ui chhut-hi heu, ke-ng`in chhiu k'ong-fa. Chung-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chhin chh+ok-ki^ang,
ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K`i he kho k'ui-v`ong Ph+et-s^i-puk kiuk-k'ui."
Ya y^u-t^eu ng`in si'ong-oi hoi Y^a-s^u, y^eu-khi`u k`i h`ang yit-ke s`u"n-chiak, l`oi chu"n-m`in k`i s'o cho ke he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.

Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu ke yi-su", chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Yit-ke koet-k^a chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, ke koet-k^a yit-thin voi phai-thet. Yit-ke k^a-th`in chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, ke k^a-th`in thin-chh+ok voi pho-sui thet-hi.
K'a-s'u" Sat-tan chhu"-si^ong f^un-ch^en, k`i ke koet ngi'ong-p^an voi kh^i tet-h+et n`o? Ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai kiuk-k'ui he kho Ph+et-s^i-puk.
Na-he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-thi kiuk-k'ui yu he kho m'a-s`a n`o? Ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-thi voi chu"n-m`in he ng`i-t^eu `m-chh+ok!
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai kiuk-k'ui na-he kho Song-ti ke n`en-l+it, chhiu-he chu"n-m`in Song-ti y'i-k^in chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ch'ong-khi`en l'e.
"S'u n^a v'u-hi ke y'ung-su" ch'ong-t'en k`i chhu"-k^a ke vuk, ke-s`u" k`i ke t^ung-s^i chhiu chhin ^on-chhi`on.
Ch'ung-he, p'i k`i h`an-kha y^u-l+it ke y'ung-su" l`oi-to, chu"-f+uk k`i, chhiu chi^ong k`i s'o-kho ke v'u-hi chhi'ong-ch'eu, yu chi^ong k`i s'o chhi'ong-l`oi ke t^ung-s^i p^un-thet.
"`M th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha ke, chhiu-he f'an-tui ng`ai ke; `m th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha s^u-s+ip ke, chhiu-he t'a-san ke.

"Si`a-l`in l`i-kh^oi s'o fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, chhai ch^au-s'ong ke thi-f^ong h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi, chh`im hi^u-sit ke s'o-chhai, ch'ung-he chh`im m`o, chhiu k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi ch'on ngi`en-l`oi ke vuk-t'u hi.'
K`i chhiu to-ch'on hi, khon-t'o ke vuk piang-to chhiang-li chhiang-li, yu ch'u"n-l^i to chhin h'o-se.

K`i chhiu chhut-hi, tai chhit-ke p'i k`i h`an-kha ok ke si`a-l`in to-ch'on-l`oi, th`ung k`i khiung-ha ng+ip-hi h+et. 'An-ngi`ong, ke-ng`in heu-l`oi ke chh`in-h`in chhiu p'i si^en-chhi`en h`an-kha chh'am."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-t'en li'a-ke fa, ng`in-khi`un ch^ung y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a thai-s^ang tui k`i k'ong: "Kiung ng`i, p^un ng`i s+u"t-nen ke ng`in, s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi ^o!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Th^ang Song-ti ke fa chhiu ch^un-h`ang ke ng`in, h`an-kha y^u fuk-hi ^o!"

Chung-ng`in chhi-s+ip y+et-l`oi y+et-t^o, Y^a-s^u chhiu k'ong: "Li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in 'an si`a-ok ^o! Ng`i-t^eu si'ong-oi khon s`u"n-chiak, ch'ung-he, chh`u-li'au Yok-n^a ke s`u"n-chiak y^i-ngoi, m`o ph+et ke s`u"n-chiak h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu khon.
Yok-n^a ngi'ong-p^an s`ang-cho N`i-n`i-m`i-ng`in ngi'en-ch^ung ke s`u"n-chiak, Ng`in-ch'u" ya oi s`ang-cho li'a su"-thoi ng`in ngi'en-ch^ung ke s`u"n-chiak.

Chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, n`am-f^ong ke 'ng-v`ong voi kh^i-h'i-l`oi ko ng`i-t^eu li'a-thoi ke ng`in, y^in-vi k`i tui 'an-y'en l`oi th^ang S'o-l`o-m`un-v`ong chu"-fi ke fa. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai li'a-vi y^u p'i S'o-l`o-m`un-v`ong h`an-kha v'i-thai ke.

Chhai s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, N`i-n`i-m`i-ng`in voi kh^i-h'i-l`oi ko ng`i-t^eu li'a-thoi ke ng`in, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o Yok-n^a s'o-chh`on ke chhiu hi-si`a k^ui-chu"n. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai li'a-vi y^u p'i Yok-n^a h`an-kha v'i-thai ke.
"M`o ng`in ti'am-t^en khong chhai m`o ng`in khon-t'o ke s'o-chhai, ya-he piong chhai t'eu t'ai-h^a; k`i yit-thin he piong chhai t^en-th`oi-t'ang, p^un ng+ip-l`oi ke ng`in khon-tet-t'o k^ong.
Muk-ch^u kh'o-p'i s^u"n-th'i ke t^en. Muk-ch^u na-he h'o, ng`i chhi`on-s^u"n chhiu voi y^u k^ong-m`in; muk-ch^u na f'ai-thet, ng`i ke s^u"n-th'i chhiu voi v^u-am.
S'o-y^i, oi se-ngi, ki^ang-pha ng`i t^i-poi ke k^ong pien-cho v^u-am.
Na-he ng`i chhi`on-s^u"n chh^ung-m^an k^ong-m`in, m`o pan-ti'am v^u-am, chhiu voi k^ong-m`in chhan-lan, chhiong p^un t^en ke k^ong cheu-t'en yit-yong."
Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-t^eu fa heu, y^u yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhi'ang k`i s+u"t-fan; k`i chhiu ng+ip-hi chh^o-chok.
Li'a Fap-li-soi-ng`in khon-t'o Y^a-s^u s+u"t-fan chhi`en m`o si^en cheu k^ui-k'i s'e-s'u, chhiu f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai.
Ch'u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in chi^ong p^i-'e l^au ph`an-`e ke ngoi-poi s'e-to chhiang-chhiang, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu ke t^i-poi f'an-ch'on ch^ong-m^an th^am-s^im l^au si`a-ok.
Ng`i li'a-t^eu ngong-'e ^a, chho ngoi-poi ke Song-ti k'am `m-he ya chho t^i-poi m^a?
Ch'u"-oi chi^ong p^i-ph`an t^i-poi ke t^ung-s^i sung p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, 'an-ngi`ong, yit-chhiet tui ng`i-t^eu l`oi-k'ong chhiu son chhiang-li l'e.

"Ng`i-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu li`en ph+ok-h`o, y`un-hi^ong, l^au kh`i-th^a ke hi^ong-liau ya hien s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit p^un Song-ti, ch'ung-he fut-li+ok k^ung-ngi l^au kin-oi Song-ti ke su". Kh`i-s+u"t, li'a-t^eu chang he ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong chhin-l+it hi-h`ang ke; kh`i-th^a ke, ya cho-`m-tet fut-li+ok.
"Ng`i-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu oi chh^o fi-th`ong-t'u ke th+it-ph+et chho-vi, oi ph+et-ng`in chhai k^ung-khiung chh`ong-s'o tui ng`i-t^eu chu"-kin chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`i-t^eu chh'am l'e! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhiong m`o cho ki-ho ke f`un-mu, tui ke t'ang-k^o h`ang-ko-hi, m`o-ng`in t^i he f`un-mu."
Y^u yit-ke Fap-l+it kau-s^u" tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, li`en ng`ai-t^eu ya p^un ng`i v'u-y+uk-t'o l'e!"

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an Fap-l+it kau-s^u" me chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong n`an kh^ai ke chh^ung-t^am piong chhai ph+et-ng`in ke ki^en-th`eu-t'ang, ch'ung-he chhu"-k^a li`en chh^un yit-k^i s'u-ch'u" then-s'u ya `m h'en.
Ng`i-t^eu chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu ch'u"n-l^i si^en-t^i ke f`un-mu, ke-t^eu si^en-t^i chang he ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s'o sat-hoi ke.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in yu chan-s`u"n ng`i-t^eu ch'u-si^en s'o-cho ke su"; k`i-t^eu sat-hoi si^en-t^i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu ch'u"n-l^i si^en-t^i ke f`un-mu.
S'o-y^i, Song-ti ke Chu"-fi su"t k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi phai si^en-t^i l^au s'u"-th`u to k`i-t^eu ke-vi hi; y^u-t^eu voi p^un k`i-t^eu chh`u"-s'i, y^u-t^eu voi p^un k`i-t^eu pet-hoi.'
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, tui chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi, s'o-y^u sat-hoi si^en-t^i ke chhui,

tui sat-hoi ^A-pak, chh+u"t-to chhai chi-th`an l^au su"n-s'o ch^ung-ki^en sat-hoi Sat-k^a-li-^a v`i-ch'u" s'o-y^u ke hiet-chai, li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in yit-thin oi v`an. Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in yit-thin oi vi-t'o li'a yit-chhiet su chit-f+at!
"Ng`i-t^eu li'a-p^an Fap-l+it kau-s^u" chh'am l'e! Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong t'a-kh^oi chu"-su"t p'o-khu ke s'o-s`u" chhi'ong-ch'eu, chhu"-k^a `m ng+ip-hi, ya ch'u-t'ong si'ong-oi ng+ip ke ng`in ng+ip-hi!"
Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi ke-vi y^i-heu, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in kh^oi-s'u" kit-li+et ph^i-ph`in k`i, n^a chhin-t^o n`an-th`i l`oi mun k`i,
si'ong-oi tui k`i ke fa chh`im p'a-piang l`oi hoi k`i.

Ke-s`u", y^u k'i-van ng`in chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi, yit h`ang chhiu voi th+ap-t'o ng`in. Y^a-s^u si^en tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi th`i-f`ong Fap-li-soi-ng`in ke fat-kau, chhiu-he k`i-t^eu ke k'a-mo v`i-san.
Yit-chhiet ch^a-t'en ke su" y^u yit-ngit voi pien-cho k^ung-kh^oi, pi-m+et ke su" ya voi p^un-ng`in t^i-t'o.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu chhai am-ch^ung s'o-k'ong ke fa, voi chhai k^ong-thi^en ph+ak-ngit ch^u"-ha p^un-ng`in th^ang-t'o; ng`i-t^eu chhai ki^en-t'u, chhai ng`in ke ng'i-k^ung s`un k'ong ke, ya voi p^un-ng`in chhai vuk-t'ang si^en-pu chhut-l`oi.
"Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch'u"-y^u chh`u"-s'i ngiuk-th'i, m`o-fap chin yit-phu hoi ng`i-t^eu ke, `m-s'u" ki^ang k`i-t^eu.

Ng`ai oi ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi ki^ang ke he m'a-s`a: Ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi ki^ang ke he Song-ti; K`i chhu"-s'i ng`in y^i-heu, yu y^u khi`en h'o chi^ong ng`in fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk hi. Ng`ai chai k'ong, ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi ki^ang ke chhiu-he K`i!
"'Ng-chak vuk-y`am-ti^au-'e s^ui-y`en chang mai li'ong-kok ngi`un, ch'ung-he Song-ti m`o yit-chak voi `m ki-tet;
li`en ng`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n`a-m^o tak-thi`au K`i me son-ko l^o! S'o-y^i, `m-s'u" ki^ang, ng`i-t^eu p'i yit thai-khi`un ke vuk-y`am-ti^au-'e k^a chhin kui-chhung!
"Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en ngin ng`ai ke, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai Song-ti ke thi^en-s'u" mien-chhi`en ya oi ngin k`i;
chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en `m ngin ng`ai ke, Ng`in-ch'u" chhai Song-ti ke thi^en-s'u" mien-chhi`en ya `m ngin k`i.
"K'ong-fa f^am-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" ke, h`an-y^u kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en; ch'ung-he siet-th+uk Su"n-L`in ke, m`o kh'o-n`en tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
"Ng`in tai ng`i-t^eu hi fi-th`ong, su"m-chu" tai-hi k^on-ch'ong ya-he th'ung-chhu"-ch'a mien-chhi`en su s'u"m-mun ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu `m-s'u" s`eu oi ngi'ong-p^an phien-fu, ya-he oi k'ong m'a-ke fa;
to ke-s`u", Su"n-L`in voi ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong k'ong ke fa."
Chung-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u yit-ke ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang ham ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi th`ung ng`ai p^un ng^a-p^a ke v`i-s'an."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ph`en-y^u, m'a-ng`in sat-l+ip ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu ton su"-chh`in ya-he p^un v`i-s'an n`o?"
Y`en-heu, k`i ki-si+uk tui chung-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi ki'un-s'u"m! Oi yok-suk chhu"-k^a, `m-h'o th^am-s^im; y^in-vi ng`in ke s^ang-miang put-chhai k^a-s'an f^ung-fu."
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi. K`i k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke chh`oi-ch'u, k`i ke thi`en-y`en chhut-s'an f^ung-fu;
k`i si'ong-l`oi si'ong-hi, k'ong: 'Ng`ai m`o la thai ke s'o-chhai h'o s^u-chh`ong s'o-y^u ke 'ng-kuk, oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e?'
K`i en chhu"-k^a k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi 'an-ngi`ong cho: Ng`ai oi chi^ong ngi`en-l`oi ke chh^ong-khu chhak-thet, h'i h`an-kha thai ke, l`oi khong 'ng-kuk l^au kh`i-th^a ke fo-v+ut;

y`en-heu, ng`ai oi tui chhu"-k^a k'ong: H'o-miang ng`in ^a! Ng`i y^u 'an-t^o h'o t^ung-s^i, cho chhin-t^o ngi`en ke lu-yung. Cho ng`i ^on-s^im hi^u-sit, y`u-chhai ng`i oi s+u"t, oi l^im, khoai-l+ok hi'ong-su ng`in-s^en ^o!'
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti tui k`i k'ong: 'Ng`i li'a-chak ngong-'e ^a, k^im-am-p^u chhiu oi s^u ng`i ke miang; ng`i s'o ch'un-phi ke oi k^ui-p^un m'a-ng`in n`e?' "
Y^a-s^u kiet-lun k'ong: "Vi-t'o chhu"-k^a chit-chh`un chh`oi-s'an, ch'ung-he chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en `m-he fu-chiuk ke ng`in, ya he 'an-ngi`ong."
Y^a-s^u yu tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "S'o-y^i, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, `m-h'o vi-t'o s^en-f+at s'o s^i-yeu ke s+u"t-v+ut, ya-he s^u"n-th'i s'o-oi chok ke s^am-fu l`oi chh^au-s^im.
S^ang-miang p'i s+u"t-v+ut kha chhung-yeu; s^u"n-th'i p'i s^am-fu kha yeu-k'in.
Ng`i-t^eu khon ke-t^eu v^u-^a: K`i-t^eu m`o chung, m`o s^u, ya m`o kuk-chh^ong ya-he chh^ong-khu, Song-ti h`an-he hiuk k`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu p'i ti^au-'e kui-chhung k^a chhin-t^o!
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m'a-ng`in n`en yung y`u-s`eu s+u"t k^a k'i-ngit n`e?
Li`en li'a-ch'ung se su"-chh`in ng`i-t^eu ya cho `m-t'o, cho-m'a-ke h`an-oi vi kh`i-th^a ke su" chh^au-s^im n`e?

Ng`i-t^eu khon pak-h+ap-f^a ngi'ong-p^an chi^ang h'i-l`oi! K`i-t^eu m`o cho-se, ya m`o cho-s^am; ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiu-he S'o-l`o-m`un kh+it y`ung-f`a fu-kui ke s`u", k`i ke t'a-pan ya m`o yit-l`ui y^a-f^a 'an-chi^ang.

Y^a-s^ang ke f^a-chh'o k^im-p^u-ngit s^ang chhut-l`oi, thi^en-k^ong-ngit chhiu ch^au-thet, p^un-ng`in fit-l+ok f'o-l`u hi s^eu, Song-ti h`an 'an-ngi`ong vi k`i-t^eu t'a-pan, K`i k'am `m-voi chi^ong s^am-fu su-p^un ng`i-t^eu? Ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im s+u"t-chhai thet-se!
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chh^au-s^im oi s+u"t m'a-ke, l^im m'a-ke, vi li'a-t^eu su" l`oi y`u-s`eu.
Li'a-t^eu su" he su"-ki^en `m-sin ke ng`in s'o ch^ui-khi`u ke. Ng`i-t^eu ke ^A-p^a t^i li'a-t^eu chhi`on-phu he ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ch^ui-khi`u Song-ti koet ke s+u"t-hien, K`i chhiu voi chi^ong li'a yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
"Ng`i-t^eu se-khi`un ^a, `m-s'u" ki^ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke ^A-p^a chhin f^on-h'i chi^ong K`i ke koet su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.

Oi mai ng`i-t^eu s'o y^u ke, chi^ong chhi`en n^a-hi kiu-chi khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in; oi vi chhu"-k^a ch'un-phi `m-voi lan ke chhi`en-thoi-'e, chi^ong chh`oi-p'o chit-chh`un chhai thi^en-t'ang. Chhai ke-vi, chh`oi-p'o `m-voi m`o-thet; y^in-vi chh+et-'e m`o fap-thu hi ke-vi, ya m`o chh`ung-`e l`oi chu.
Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke chh`oi-p'o chhai nai-vi, ng`i-t^eu ke s^im ya chhai ke-vi.
"Ng`i-t^eu oi s`ui-s`u" ch'un-phi h'o-se, thak-t'en y^eu-tai, ti'am-t'en t^en,
chhiu-chhiong ph+uk-ng`in t'en ch'u-ng`in tui f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it ch'on-l`oi. Ch'u-ng`in ch'on-l`oi ph^ong-m`un ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chit-s`u" chhiu vi k`i kh^oi-m`un.

Ch'u-ng`in ch'on-l`oi, khon-t'o li'a-t^eu ph+uk-ng`in 'an k'in-si'ang, k`i-t^eu chhiu y^u fuk-hi l'e! Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch'u-ng`in voi thak-t'en y^eu-tai, ham k`i-t^eu chh^o-h^a-l`oi s+u"t-fan, chh^in-s^u"n f+uk-su" k`i-t^eu.
Na-he ch'u-ng`in y`en-chh`an to pan-ya ya-he thi^en-m`ung-k^ong chang ch'on-l`oi, khon-t'o ph+uk-ng`in h`an-he k'in-si'ang, k`i-t^eu chhiu y^u fuk-hi l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu oi t^i: Yit-k^a ke ch'u-ng`in na-he t^i chh+et-'e k'i-s`u" voi l`oi, k`i yit-thin `m-voi p^un chh+et-'e yet kh^ung-'e ng+ip-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu ya yin-t^ong s`ui-s`u" ch'un-phi h'o-se, y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" voi chhai ng`i-t^eu m`o si'ong-t'o ke s`u" fut-y`en kong-l`im."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i li'a p'i-yi he tui ng`ai-t^eu k'ong ke, ya-he tui thai-chung k'ong ke?"

Ch'u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu si'ong, m'a-ng`in he ch^ung-s^im yu ch^in-m`in ke ph+uk-ng`in ^a? Chhiu-he ch'u-ng`in ch'u"-phai k`i k'on-l^i kh`i-th^a ph+uk-ng`in ke s`u", k`i chhiu cheu-s`u" f^un-phi li`ong-s+u"t ke ng`in.
Ch'u-ng`in ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", khon-t'o k`i 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, li'a ph+uk-ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an y^u fuk-hi ^a!
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch'u-ng`in voi phai k`i k'on-l^i s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap.

Ch'ung-he, ke ph+uk-ng`in na-he s^im-ch^ung si'ong: 'Ng`ai ke ch'u-ng`in voi kha-man chang ch'on-l`oi', chhiu chhut-s'u t'a kh`i-th^a ke ph+uk-ng`in ya-he s'u"-'ng, yu chhin-s+u"t chhin-l^im to chi'u-chui,

chhai k`i m`o si'ong-t'o ke ngit-`e, chhai k`i `m-t^i ke s`u"-ki^en, ke ph+uk-ng`in ke ch'u-ng`in voi ch'on-l`oi, chi^ong k`i t'a-to pan-s^ang-s'i, s'u" k`i l^au m`o ch^ung-s^im ke ng`in khiung-ha su h`in-f+at.
"Ph+uk-ng`in t^i ch'u-ng`in oi k`i cho m'a-ke, ch'ung-he m`o ch'un-phi, ya-he `m cheu ch'u-ng`in ke yi-su" cho; 'an-ngi`ong, k`i voi su-t'o chhin chh^ung ke pi^en-t'a.

Na-he `m-t^i ch'u-ng`in ke yi-su", ch'ung-he cho yin-t^ong oi su pi^en-t'a ke su", ke ph+uk-ng`in s'o-su ke pi^en-t'a voi kha khi^ang. P^un m'a-ng`in kha-t^o, chhiu oi tui k`i s^u kha-t^o; k^au-thok m'a-ng`in kha-t^o, tui k`i ke y^eu-khi`u ya kha-thai.
"Ng`ai to su"-ki^en l`oi he oi ti'am-f'o; ng`ai he ngi'ong-p^an phan-mong f'o y'i-k^in chh+ok-h'i-l`oi!
Ng`ai y^u yin-t^ong oi su ke s'e-l^i; v`an-s`u"n li'a kh'u-nan ke s'e-l^i y^i-chhi`en, ng`ai he ngi'ong-p^an chh+ok-kip ^a!
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o l'au-t'o ng`ai l`oi he tai-p^un su"-ki^en f`o-ph`in; ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai s'o tai-l`oi ke pin `m-he f`o-ph`in, f'an-ch'on he f^un-li+et.
Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, yit-k^a 'ng-ke ng`in voi f^un-li+et, s^am-ke l^au li'ong-ke si^ong-ch^ang, li'ong-ke l^au s^am-ke chok-tui.
^A-p^a l^au lai-'e si^ong-ch^ang, lai-'e f'an-tui ^a-p^a; ^a-m^e l^au moi-'e si^ong-ch^ang, moi-'e f'an-tui ^a-m^e; k^a-ngi`ong l^au s^im-khi^u si^ong-ch^ang, s^im-khi^u f'an-tui k^a-ngi`ong."
Y^a-s^u yu tui chung-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o s^i-phi'en y^u y`un chhut-hien, chhiu k'ong: 'Voi l+ok-y'i l^o', chu"n-k^in chhiu l+ok-y'i.
N`am-f^ung yit chh^oi, ng`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong: 'Voi hip-ngi+et l^o', chu"n-k^in chhiu hip-ngi+et.
K'a-mo v`i-san ke ng`in ^a! Ng`i-t^eu chhin voi khon thi^en-set, ngi'ong-p^an `m-su"t li'a-ke s`u"-thoi n`e?
"Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an chhu"-k^a `m phan-ton m'a-ke he h+ap-l^i ke su" n`e?

Na-he y^u-ng`in oi ko ng`i, l^ai ng`i s^ong fap-yen, ng`i oi chhin-liong chhai m`ang to fap-yen y^i-chhi`en th`ung k`i f`o-ki'e, mi^en-tet k`i chi^ong ng`i k^au-p^un fap-k^on, fap-k^on k^au-p^un fap-k'in, fap-k'in chhiu ko^an ng`i ng+ip k^am-ngi+uk.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`i oi chh^o-k^am, to ng`i n+ap-chh^in f+at-k^im ke chui-heu yit-f^un chhi`en."
T^ong-s`u", chhai ke-vi y^u-ng`in l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong, y^u-t^eu K^a-li-li-ng`in hiong Song-ti hien-chi ke s`u" p^un P'i-l^a-t^o sat-hoi.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^in-vi li'a-t^eu K^a-li-li-ng`in chh'am-s'i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu l'au-t'o k`i-t^eu p'i kh`i-th^a ke K^a-li-li-ng`in chhui kha chh^ung he-m`o?
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, `m-he 'an-ngi`ong; chh`u-li'au ng`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi, ng`i-t^eu ke kiet-khi+uk khiung-yong ya he m+et-m`ong.
S^i-l`o-^a-thap vang-thet ke s`u", s'o chak-s'i ke s+u"p-pat-s`a, ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o k`i-t^eu p'i kh`i-th^a h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in kha f'ai he-m`o?
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, `m-he 'an-ngi`ong; chh`u-li'au ng`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi, ng`i-t^eu ke kiet-khi+uk khiung-yong ya he m+et-m`ong."

Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi: "Y^u yit-ke ng`in chhai chhu"-k^a ke ph`u-th`o-y`en chung yit-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su. K`i si'ong-oi chhai su-t'ang chh`im k'o-ch'u", ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o.

S'o-y^i, k`i tui ch'ong-y`en-ke k'ong: 'Ng`i khon, s^am-ngi`en l`oi, ng`ai chhai li'a-th`eu v`u-f^a-k'o-su t'ang-k^o chh`im k'o-ch'u", m'a-ke ya chh`im m`o. Ch'am-thet k`i! Ngi'ong oi-s'u" p^un k`i chiam-t'en th'u-thi n`o?'
Ch'ong-y`en-ke k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, k^im-ngi`en chhiam-s`u" li`u-t'en, t'en ng`ai yet-s^ung k`i s`un-th`eu ke n`ai, k^a t^eu ph`i.
M`ang-ngi`en na-he kiet k'o-ch'u" chhiu h'o l'e; na-he m`o, chang ch'am-thet k`i.' "
Y^u yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, Y^a-s^u chhai yit-ke fi-th`ong k^au ng`in.
Y^u yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n, phiang s+u"p-pat-ngi`en, y^eu-kut v^an-v^an, m`o fap-thu kh^i-chh+u"t h'i-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o k`i, chhiu ham k`i, tui k`i k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`i ke phiang l`i-kh^oi ng`i l'e!"
Y^a-s^u yung s'u hon-t'en k`i, k`i ke y^eu-kut chit-s`u" chh+u"t-h'i-l`oi; k`i chhiu siung-chan Song-ti.

Fi-th`ong ke k'on-l^i-y`en khon-t'o Y^a-s^u chhai ^On-sit-ngit y^i-phiang, chhin khi'en, chhiu tui thai-k^a k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y^u liuk-ngit h'o cho-se; ng`i-t^eu y^u phiang oi y^i ke, yin-k^oi chhai li'a liuk-ngit t^ong-ch^ung l`oi, m`o yin-t^ong chhai ^On-sit-ngit!"
Ch'u en k`i k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-t^eu k'a-mo v`i-san ke ng`in ^a! K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu tak-s`a chhai ^On-sit-ngit chhiu m`o ki'e-kh^oi chh`o-pi^en ke ngi`u ya-he l`i-`e, khi^en-hi l^im-s'ui m^a?
Li'a fu-ng`in-k^a he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke heu-thoi, k`i p^un Sat-tan kh'un-t'en s+u"p-pat-ngi`en; k'am-k'ong chhai ^On-sit-ngit chhiu m`o yin-k^oi ki'e-kh^oi k`i ke s'o-lien m^a?"
Y^a-s^u li'a-ke fa p^un s'o-y^u l^au k`i chok-tui ke ng`in k'am-kok chhin kien-seu; th`ung-s`u", chung-ng`in tui k`i s'o-cho yit-chhiet ke kh`i-su" f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Song-ti ke koet chhiong m'a-ke n`e? Ng`ai cho-tet yung m'a-ke l`oi p'i n`e?

Song-ti ke koet kh'o-p'i yit-li+ap kie-chhoi-ch'u", y^u-ng`in chi^ong k`i chung chhai chhu"-k^a ke y`en-t'u. Kie-chhoi thai h'i-l`oi, s`ang-cho yit-th`eu su, li`en f^i-ni^au ya chhai k`i ke su-k^i t'ang-k^o cho-teu."
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai oi n^a m'a-ke l`oi p'i Song-ti ke koet n`e?
K`i chhiong fat-kau, y^u fu-ng`in-k^a n^a-l`oi piong chhai si-s+u"p k^ung-s^u"n ke mien-t'u, s'u" k^ui-th`on mien chhi`on-phu fat-h'i-l`oi."
Y^a-s^u v^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi ke s`u", k^in-ko chhin-t^o s`ang-su" l^au chh^un-ch^ong, k^ui-lu kau-hiun ng`in.
Y^u ng`in mun k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, tet-kiu ke ng`in chhin s'eu he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi chhin-l+it tui h+ap-m`un ng+ip-hi. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, y^u chhin-t^o ng`in si'ong-oi ng+ip, ch'ung-he m`o fap-thu ng+ip-hi.

T'en-to k^a-ch'u hong-h'i-l`oi ko^an-h'o m`un, ng`i-t^eu chang kh^i chhai m`un-ngoi ph^ong-m`un, k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, chhi'ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu kh^oi-m`un!' K`i voi en-k'ong: 'Ng`ai `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu he tui nai-vi l`oi ke!'
Ng`i-t^eu voi k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu su"t th`ung ng`i khiung-ha s+u"t-l^im; ng`i ya su"t chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke thai ki^e-hong k^au-ko ng`ai-t^eu.'
Ch'ung-he, k`i voi k'ong: 'Ng`ai `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu he tui nai-vi l`oi ke. Ng`i li'a-t^eu chok-ok ke ng`in, s'am-kh^oi!'

Ng`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, Y^i-sat, Ng^a-kok, l^au s'o-y^u ke si^en-t^i chhai Song-ti ke koet, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on su kh^i-chhi+et chhai ngoi-poi; chhai ke-vi, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi thai-kieu, ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u" l'e!
Tui t^ung, s^i, n`am, pet, tak s'o-chhai voi y^u ng`in l`oi chh^am-k^a Song-ti koet ke y`en-s+it.
Su"-s+u"t-song, ke-t^eu chhai chui poi-m^i ke voi cho th`eu-chhi`en; ke-t^eu chhai chui th`eu-chhi`en ke voi cho poi-m^i."
Chhiu chhai ke-s`u", y^u k'i-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi kien Y^a-s^u, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi l`i-kh^oi li'a-vi hi ph+et ke s'o-chhai, y^in-vi H^i-l+it si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`i."

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi l^au ke-chak f`u-l`i k'ong: 'Ng`i khon! K^im-p^u-ngit l^au thi^en-k^ong-ngit ng`ai oi kiuk-k'ui l^au y^i-phiang, thi-s^am-ngit ng`ai chhiu oi v`an-s`u"n ng`ai ke k^ung-chok.'

S^ui-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, k^im-p^u-ngit, thi^en-k^ong-ngit, l^au heu-ngit, ng`ai thin-chh+ok oi hiong-chhi`en h`ang, y^in-vi si^en-t^i chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang y^i-ngoi ke s'o-chhai p^un-ng`in chh`u"-s'i he `m-chh+ok ke.

" Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ^a! Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ^a! Ng`i sat-hoi si^en-t^i, yu yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i Song-ti s'o chh^ai-phai l`oi ng`i li'a-vi ke s'u"-ch'a! Ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an t^o-p'ai oi p'o-fu ng`i ke ch'u"-'ng, chhiong ki^e-m`a chhi-s+ip ki^e-ch'u" chhai y+it-kap h^a yit-yong; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu m`o-oi!

Khon ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke k^a-y`en voi pien-cho yit-phi'en f^ong-li`ong. Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu voi khon ng`ai `m-t'o, chh+u"t-to ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke!' "
Y^u yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, Y^a-s^u hi-to yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in li^ang-chhiu ke vuk-h^a s+u"t-fan; y^u-t^eu ng`in chhai s`un-th`eu khon-t'en k`i.
T'u-h'o, chhai k`i mien-chhi`en y^u yit-ke pot s'ui-ch'ung-phiang ke ng`in.
Y^a-s^u chhiu mun ke-t^eu Fap-l+it kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it ch'un ng`in chhai ^On-sit-ngit y^i-phiang m`o?"
K`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung ti^am-ti^am `m chhut-s^ang. Y^a-s^u chhiu f`u-t'en ke-ng`in, y^i-h'o k`i, ham k`i ch'eu.
Y`en-heu, k`i tui thai-k^a k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u m'a-ng`in, lai-'e ya-he ngi`u chhai ^On-sit-ngit tiet-l+ok chi'ang-t'u hi, `m-he ngi`am-s`u" chi^ong k`i l^ai s^ong-l`oi n`e?"
K`i-t^eu tui Y^a-s^u s'o mun ke fa chhi`on-phu m`o fa h'o en.
Y^a-s^u chu-yi t'o y^u-t^eu ng`in-hak vi chhu"-k^a si'en y`en-s+it ch^ung ke thai-vi, chhiu yung p'i-yi tui thai-k^a k'ong:
"Ng`i p^un-ng`in chhi'ang-hi chh^am-k^a f^un-y^in y`en-s+it ke s`u", `m-h'o chh^o thai-vi, ki^ang-pha s'o chhi'ang ke ng`in-hak y^u p'i ng`i kha su ch^un-chhung ke.
Chhi'ang ng`i li'ong-s`a ke ch'u-ng`in voi h`ang-chhi`en l`oi tui ng`i k'ong: 'Pai-thok ngiong-vi p^un li'a-ke ng`in!' Ke-s`u", ng`i voi k'am-kok chhin m`o mien-ch'u", thui-to piak-kok hi chh^o.

Ng`i p^un-ng`in chhi'ang ke s`u", oi chh^o se-vi, 'an-ngi`ong, ch'u-ng`in l`oi tui ng`i k'ong: 'Ph`en-y^u, chhi'ang chh^o thai-vi.' Ke-s`u", ng`i chhai ng`in-hak mien-chhi`en chhiu chhin y^u th'i-mien.
Y^in-vi Song-ti oi chi^ong chhu"-k^o ke ng`in kong-cho p^i-m`i, ya oi k^o-s^u"n k^am-s^im khi^am-p^i ke ng`in."

Y^a-s^u yu tui chhi'ang k`i ke ch'u-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i chhi'ang ng`in s+u"t-chu ya-he s+u"t-ya ke s`u", `m-h'o chhi'ang ng`i ke ph`en-y^u, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, chh^in-chhit, ya-he y^u-chhi`en ke l`in-sa, ki^ang-pha k`i-t^eu heu-l`oi ya chhi'ang ng`i, ng`i ke ng`in-chh`in chhiu tet-t'o po-tap l'e.
Ng`i oi chhi'ang ng`in-hak, chhiu oi chhi'ang ke-t^eu khi`ung-kh'u-ke, chh`an-chong ke, p`ai-kiok-ke, m^o-muk-ke;
'an-ngi`ong, ng`i chhiu y^u fuk-hi l'e, y^in-vi ke-t^eu ng`in m`o m'a-ke h'o po-tap ng`i. Chhai ngi-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke s`u", Song-ti voi chh^in-chhu" po-tap ng`i."
Khiung-chok y^u yit-ke ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^u-h'o chhai Song-ti ke koet hi'ong-su y`en-s+it ke ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an y^u fuk-hi ^a!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Y^u ng`in thai p`ai y`en-s+it, chhi'ang chhin-t^o ng`in-hak.
Voi to kh^oi-chok ke s`u", k`i phai ph+uk-ng`in hi tui s'o chhi'ang ke ng`in-hak k'ong: 'Chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu l`oi, tak-hong ch'un-phi h'o-se l^o!'
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu kh^oi-s'u" yit-ke yit-ke th^oi-chh`u". Th`eu-yit-ke k'ong: 'Ng`ai y^u m^ai yit-khi^u thi`en, m`o hi khon cho-`m-tet. Chhi'ang ngi`en-liong, ng`ai hi-`m-tet.'
Nang-ngoi yit-ke k'ong: 'Ng`ai y^u m^ai 'ng-tui ngi`u, oi hi chhu" khon-'e; chhi'ang ngi`en-liong ng`ai, su"t-l^i.'
Yu y^u yit-ke k'ong: 'Ng`ai chang kiet-f^un, s+u"t-chhai m`o fap-thu hi.'

Ke ph+uk-ng`in to-ch'on-hi, chi^ong li'a chh`in-h`in po-ko ch'u-ng`in. Li'a-k^a ke ch'u-ng`in thai fat-khi'en, chhiu tui ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: 'Kiak-kiak chhut-hi, to s`ang-nui ke thai-ki^e s'eu-hong, tai ke-t^eu khi`ung-kh'u-ke, chh`an-chong ke, m^o-muk-ke, p`ai-kiok-ke chhi`on-phu l`oi.'
M`o k'i-ki'u, ph+uk-ng`in to-ch'on-l`oi, k'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a, ng`i s'o f^un-fu ke y'i-k^in phan-h'o l'e, ch'ung-he h`an-he y^u chhin-t^o kh^ung-vi!'
Ch'u-ng`in chhiu tui ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i to ki^e-lu l^au l`i-p^a-s`un ke hong-t'u hi, mi^en-ki'ong chhi'ang ng`in ng+ip-l`oi, chh^o-m^an ng`ai ke vuk.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ke-t^eu si^en-chhi`en s'o chhi'ang ke ng`in, yit-ke ya `m-s'u" si'ong-oi s+u"t ng`ai ke y`en-s+it!' "
F^i-s`ong t^o ke ng`in th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u khiung-ha h`ang. Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:

"To ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi ke ng`in, na `m-he kin-oi ng`ai y`ang-ko chhu"-k^a ke y`a-^oi, ya-he y`ang-ko siak p^u-ngi`ong, ch'u"-'ng, hi^ung-thi, ch'i-moi, su"m-chu" chhu"-k^a, k`i chhiu m`o fap-thu cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang.
`M-h'en khi`a chhu"-k^a ke s+u"p-su"-ka l`oi th`en ng`ai ke ng`in, ya m`o fap-thu cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u m'a-ng`in si'ong-oi h'i thai-l`eu, k'am `m-he si^en chh^o-h^a-l`oi h'o-h'o kie-son yit-ha, khon y^u v`an-s`u"n chhi`on-phu k^ung-chh`ang ke fi-yung m`o?
Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, ki^ang-pha thi-k^i t'a-h'o, thai-l`eu sa m`o fap-thu v`an-k^ung, khon-t'o ke ng`in chhi`on-phu voi seu k`i,
k'ong: 'Li'a-ke ng`in kh^oi-k^ung, ch'ung-he m`o fap-thu v`an-k^ung!'

K'a-s'u" y^u yit-ke koet-v`ong, tai yit-van ng`in ke ki^un-chhui, oi hi l^au nang-ngoi yit-ke tai li'ong-van ng`in ki^un-chhui ke koet-v`ong si^ong-chh`u", k`i k'am `m-he si^en chh^o-h^a-l`oi m'en-khon-'e, y^u kh'o-n`en t'a-y`ang m`o?
Na-he m`o kh'o-n`en, k`i chhiu voi k'on-k'in chhai th+it-ng`in h`an chhin-y'en ke s`u", phai s'u"-ch'a hi th`am f`o-ph`in ke thi`au-khien.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na m`o piong-thet chhu"-k^a s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet, chhiu m`o fap-thu cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang.
"Y`am he h'o ke, ch'ung-he y`am na su"t-thet h`am-mi, oi ngi'ong-p^an s'u" k`i chai h`am n`e?
Ve-l+ok y`en-t'u ya-he chh^am chhai ph`i-liau-ch^ung, l^ung-ch'ung m`o-h+ap, ch'u"-y^u fit-thet. Y^u ng'i-k^ung h'o-th^ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi th^ang!"
Y^u yit-p'ai, h'o-t^o soi-kun l^au f'ai-ng`in l`oi th^ang Y^a-s^u k'ong-tho.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" fat yen-ngi`en k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in ngi'ong-voi chiap-thai f'ai-ng`in, yu th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha s+u"t-fan!"
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi p^un k`i-t^eu th^ang; k`i k'ong:

"Na-he ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en m^eu-ng`in y^u yit-pak-chak y`ong, su"t-l+ok kh`i-ch^ung yit-chak, k`i k'am `m-voi chi^ong kh`i-th^a ke ki'u-s+u"p-ki'u-chak piong chhai chh'o-ph^u, hi chh`im ke-chak su"t-l+ok ke, chh+u"t-to chh`im-t'o m^a?
Chh`im-t'o y^i-heu, k`i chhin f^on-h'i, chhiu chi^ong y`ong-`e piong chhai ki^en-th`eu-t'ang,
ch'on vuk-h^a hi, y`en-heu chhi'ang ph`en-y^u l^au l`in-sa l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai h`an f^on-h'i ^o! Ng`ai su"t-l+ok ke y`ong-`e chh`im-t'o l'e! Ng`i-t^eu l`oi th`ung ng`ai then f^on-h'i!'

Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, yit-ke chhui-ng`in f'i-k'oi, chhai thi^en-t'ang ya oi vi-t'o k`i f^on-h'i; ke-ch'ung ke f^on-h'i, y`ang-ko ki'u-s+u"p-ki'u-ke `m-s'u" f'i-k'oi ke ngi-ng`in!
"Na-he yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a y^u s+u"p-chak ngi`un-chhi`en, su"t-l+ok yit-chak, k`i k'am `m-voi ti'am-t^en l`oi piang-vuk, tak s'o-chhai si`ong-se chh`im, chh+u"t-to chh`im-t'o m^a?

Chh`im-t'o y^i-heu, k`i chhiu voi chhi'ang ph`en-y^u l^au l`in-sa l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai h`an f^on-h'i ^o! Ng`ai su"t-l+ok ke ngi`un-chhi`en chh`im-t'o l'e! Ng`i-t^eu l`oi th`ung ng`ai then f^on-h'i!'
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Song-ti ke thi^en-s'u" ya oi vi-t'o yit-ke chhui-ng`in ke f'i-k'oi l`oi f^on-h'i."
Y^a-s^u ki-si+uk k'ong: "M^eu-ng`in y^u li'ong-ke lai-'e.
Se ke lai-'e tui ^a-p^a k'ong: '^A-p^a, khi`u ng`i li'a-ha chhiu chi^ong ng`ai yin-tet ke s'an-ngi+ap p^un-p^un ng`ai.' ^A-p^a chhiu chi^ong s'an-ngi+ap p^un-p^un k`i li'ong-ke lai-'e.

Ko k'i-ngit, se ke lai-'e chhiu chi^ong s'o p^un-t'o ke s'an-ngi+ap mai-thet, tai-t'en chhi`en l`i-kh^oi vuk-h^a. K`i hi-to chhin-y'en ke thi-f^ong, chhai ke-vi long-fi chhi`en-chh`oi, ko fong-thong ke s^en-f+at.
K`i chi^ong s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet f^a chhiang-chhiang heu, yu t`u-t'o ke-vi thai k^i-f^ong, k`i chhiu kh'u-to k'ong-`m-tet.
S'o-y^i, k`i hi khi`u t^ong-thi yit-ke ng`in p^un k`i se cho; ke-ng`in ham k`i hi n`ung-chh`ong hiuk ch^u-'e.
K`i ngo-to li`en ch^u-'e s+u"t ke theu-kap ya si'ong-oi n^a-l`oi s+u"t; h`an-he m`o-ng`in n^a m'a-ke t^ung-s^i p^un k`i s+u"t.
Chui-heu, k`i f^un-si'ang ko-l`oi, k'ong: 'Ng^a p^a y^u chhi'ang 'an-t^o k^ung-ng`in, k`i-t^eu li`ong-s+u"t chh^ung-chiuk yu y^u-chh^un, ng`ai f'an-ch'on chhai li'a-vi ngo-s'i!
Ng`ai oi hong-h'i-l`oi, ch'on-hi ng^a-p^a ke-vi, tui k`i k'ong: ^A-p^a, ng`ai tet-chhui thi^en, ya tet-chhui ng`i.
Ng`ai y'i-k^in m`o ch^u"-kiet chh^u"n-cho ngi^a lai-'e; khi`u ng`i khon ng`ai cho ng`i chhi'ang-l`oi ke k^ung-ng`in.'
K`i chhiu h'i-s^u"n ch'on ki^a-p^a ke-vi hi. "L`i vuk-h^a h`an chhin-y'en, ki^a-p^a khon-t'o k`i, chhiu l`in-m'en k`i, ch'eu-t'en ko-hi, n'am-t'en k`i ke ki'ang-k^in, k'in ch^im k`i.
Lai-'e k'ong: '^A-p^a, ng`ai tet-chhui thi^en, ya tet-chhui ng`i; y'i-k^in m`o ch^u"-kiet cho ngi^a lai-'e!'
Ch'ung-he ke ^a-p^a h^em ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: 'Kiak-kiak n^a chui-h'o ke chh`ong-ph`au l`oi p^un k`i chok, n^a kim-ch'u" p^un k`i tai, n^a h`ai p^un k`i chok,
y`en-heu chi^ong ke-chak ph`i ke se ngi`u-k'u khi^en-l`oi chh`u". Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi phan-chok, f^on-f^on h'i-h'i l`oi khin-chuk!
Y^in-vi ng`ai li'a-ke lai-'e he s'i-thet yu f+uk-f+at, su"t-l+ok yu chh`im-t'o ke.' Thai-k^a chhiu kh^oi-s'u" khin-chuk.
"Ke-s`u", thai ke lai-'e h`an chhai thi`en-hong cho-se; to k`i ch'on-l`oi, l`i vuk-h^a m`o k'i-y'en ke s`u", th^ang-t'o y^im-ng+ok l^au thiau-v'u ke s^ang,
chhiu ham yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in ko-l`oi, mun k`i fat-s^en m'a-ke su"-chh`in.
Ph+uk-ng`in en-k'ong: 'Ngi^a l'o-th^ai ch'on-l`oi l'e! Ngi^a p^a y^in-vi k`i ph`in-^on y'ung-khien ch'on-l`oi, chhiu chh`u" ke-chak ph`i ke se ngi`u-k'u.'
"M`o si'ong-t'o, thai lai-'e sa fat-khi'en, `m-h'en ng+ip-hi; ki^a-p^a chhiu chhut-l`oi khien k`i.

Ch'ung-he k`i tui ki^a-p^a k'ong: 'Ng`i khon, 'an-t^o ngi`en l`oi, ng`ai chhiong n`u-chh`oi 'an-ngi`ong f+uk-su" ng`i, `m-su"t v`i-poi ng`i ke min-lin, ng`i su"t p^un ng`ai m'a-ke n`o? Li`en yit-chak se s^an-y`ong ya `m-su"t p^un ng`ai th`ung ph`en-y^u khiung-ha f^on-h'i.
Ch'ung-he ng`i li'a-chak lai-'e, k`i chi^ong ng`i ke chh`oi-s'an lon-yung chhai k^i-'ng ke s^u"n-song; li'a-ha k`i ch'on-l`oi, ng`i chhiu vi k`i chh`u" ke-chak ph`i ke se ngi`u-k'u!'
Ki^a-p^a chhiu tui k`i k'ong: 'Se-ch'u" ^a, ng`i s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha, ng`ai yit-chhiet s'o-y^u ke, chhi`on he ng`i ke.
Ch'ung-he ng`i li'a-ke l'o-th^ai he s'i-thet yu f+uk-f+at, su"t-l+ok yu chh`im-t'o ke; s'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu yin-t^ong f^on-h'i khin-chuk.' "
Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke chh`oi-ch'u, k`i y^u yit-ke k'on-k^a; ph+et-ng`in tui k`i po-ko k'ong, ki^a k'on-k^a long-fi k`i ke chh`oi-s'an.

Ch'u-ng`in chhiu ham k'on-k^a l`oi, tui k`i k'ong: 'Ng`ai y^u th^ang-t'o ko^an-he ng`i ke su"-chh`in, to-t'ai he ngi'ong-p^an n`e? Chi^ong ng`i s'o k'on ke ti'am chh^in-chh'u, y^in-vi ng`i cho-`m-tet chai cho ng`ai ke k'on-k^a l'e!'
Ke k'on-k^a s^im-k^on si'ong: 'Th`eu-k^a oi chh`u" ng`ai ke th`eu-lu! Ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang h'o n`e? Khi`a kiok-th`eu, ng`ai m`o l+it; cho khiet-s+u"t, yu ki^ang kien-seu.
He n^a! Ng`ai t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an cho, t'en-to ng`ai su"t-ngi+ap ke s`u", ph`en-y^u chang voi chiap ng`ai to k`i-t^eu ke vuk-h^a hi h+et.'
"S'o-y^i, k`i chi^ong ki^a th`eu-k^a ke chai-ch'u yit-ke yit-ke h^em l`oi. K`i tui th`eu-yit-ke k'ong: 'Ng`i khiam ng`ai th`eu-k^a k'i-t^o?'
Ke-ng`in en-k'ong: 'Yit-pak th'ung k'am-l'am-y`u.' K'on-k^a k'ong: 'Li'a he ng`i ke chia-thi`au, n^a-hi, chh^o-h^a-l`oi, kiak-kiak si'a-cho 'ng-s+u"p th'ung.'
K`i yu mun nang-ngoi yit-ke k'ong: 'Ng`i n`e, ng`i khiam k'i-t^o?' Ke-ng`in en-k'ong: 'Yit-pak s+ak m+ak-'e.' K'on-k^a k'ong: 'Li'a he ng`i ke chia-thi`au, n^a-hi, si'a-cho pat-s+u"p s+ak.'
"Ch'u-ng`in chhiu kho^a-chi'ong li'a put-ngi ke k'on-k^a cho-se ch^in-m`in. Y^in-vi chh'u-l^i su"-ki^en ke su", su"-si+uk ke ng`in p'i k^ong-m`in ke ng`in kha ch^in-m`in."

Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, oi yung hien-su" ke k^im-chhi`en k^au ph`en-y^u, 'an-ngi`ong, k^im-chhi`en m`o yung ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi su-chiap to y'un-y'en ke k^a-hi^ong hi.
"Yit-ke ng`in tui se-su" ch^ung-s+u"t, tui thai-su" ya voi ch^ung-s+u"t; yit-ke ng`in tui se-su" m`o l'o-s+u"t, tui thai-su" ya `m-voi l'o-s+u"t.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu chh'u-l^i su"-ki^en ke chhi`en-chh`oi chhiu m`o ch^ung-s+u"t, m'a-ng`in voi chi^ong ke ch^u"n-s+u"t ke chh`oi-p'o k^au-thok ng`i-t^eu n`e?
Na-he ng`i-t^eu tui s+uk ph+et-ng`in ke t^ung-s^i m`o ch^ung-s+u"t, m'a-ng`in voi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke t^ung-s^i k^au-p^un ng`i-t^eu n`e?

"M`o yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in n`en f+uk-su" li'ong-ke ch'u-ng`in. `M-he n^au li'a-ke, oi ke-ke, chhiu-he khon-chhung li'a-ke, khon-khi^ang ke-ke. Ng`i-t^eu m`o kh'o-n`en th`ung-s`u" cho Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, yu cho k^im-chhi`en ke n`ung-chh`oi."
Ke-t^eu oi chhi`en ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu seu Y^a-s^u.

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en chhu"-chh^u"n he chu"n-ng`in ki^un-ch'u", ch'ung-he Song-ti chh^in-chh'u t^i ng`i-t^eu ke nui-s^im; y^in-vi ng`in khon-cho chhin k^o-kui ke, chhai Song-ti l`oi khon f'an-ch'on he si`a-ok ke.

" M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i ke s^u, k`i-t^eu ke h'au-l+it he to S^u"-s'e Yok-hon v`i-ch'u"; tui ke-s`u" kh^oi-s'u", Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im chhiu chh`on chhut-l`oi, tak-s`a chhi`on-phu ch^ang-t'en ng+ip-hi.
Ch'ung-he thi^en-thi m`o-thet-hi, p'i fap-l+it ke yit-pit yit-v+ak su"t-h'au h`an-kha y`ung-yi n`e!
"M`o-lun m'a-ng`in l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong, chh`ung-s^in l^au ph+et ke fu-ng`in-k^a kiet-f^un, chhiu-he fam ki^en-y`im; th'o p^un-ng`in l`i-thet ke fu-ng`in-k^a ya he fam ki^en-y`im.
"Th`eu-p'ai y^u yit-ke chh`oi-ch'u, tak-ngit chok-t'en ch'u"-set k^o-kui ke chi^ang-s^am, ko chh^a-f`a yen-l+ok ke ngit-`e.
Yu y^u yit-ke khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to L^a-sat-lu, k^ui-s^u"n pot-chh^ong, s`ong-s`ong p^un-ng`in tai-to chh`oi-ch'u ke m`un-h'eu,
h^i-mong ngi^am t^eu chh`oi-ch'u chok-t'ang tiet-h^a-l`oi ke t^ung-s^i l`oi ch'u"-k^i; li`en ki'eu ya l`oi s^e k`i ke chh^ong.
"Heu-l`oi, li'a khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in s'i-thet, thi^en-s'u" tai k`i hi chh^o chhai ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke s`un-th`eu, hi'ong-su thi^en-t'ang ke y`en-s+it; ke chh`oi-ch'u ya s'i-thet, pin m`ai-chong.
Chh`oi-ch'u chhai y^im-ki^en f^i-s`ong thung-kh'u; k`i ngo-th`eu khon-t'o ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chhai chhin-y'en ke s'o-chhai, yu khon-t'o L^a-sat-lu chh^o chhai s`un-th`eu,

chhiu h^em-k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke ch'u-k^ung ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai ^a! Khi`u ng`i ham L^a-sat-lu yung s'u-ch'u"-th`eu chi'am t^eu s'ui l`oi li`ong ng`ai ke s+at-m`a, y^in-vi ng`ai chhai li'a f'o-yam-ch^ung f^i-s`ong thung-kh'u!'

"Ch'ung-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on en k`i k'ong: 'Se-ch'u" ^a, ng`i yin-t^ong h`an ki-tet, ng`i h`an s^ang ke s`u"-chiet hi'ong-chhin fuk-l+ok, ch'ung-he L^a-sat-lu ko chhin k^an-kh'u ke ngit-`e; li'a-ha k`i chhai li'a-vi tet-t'o ^on-v'i, ng`i sa l+ok chhai thung-kh'u-ch^ung.

`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, chhai ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`ai-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u chh^u"m-y^en kak-t'en, ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en tui li'a-phi'en hi ng`i-t^eu ke-phi'en; oi tui ke-phi'en l`oi ng`ai-t^eu li'a-phi'en ya m`o kh'o-n`en.'
Chh`oi-ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke ch'u-k^ung ^a, ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai khi`u ng`i ham L^a-sat-lu hi ng^a-p^a ke vuk-h^a;
y^in-vi ng`ai h`an-y^u 'ng-ke hi^ung-thi, k`i cho-tet k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, mi^en-tet k`i-t^eu ya l`oi-to li'a 'an thung-kh'u ke s'o-chhai.'
" ^A-pak-l^a-h'on k'ong: 'Ng`i ke hi^ung-thi y^u M^o-s^i l^au si^en-t^i ke fa h'o th^ang, k`i-t^eu cho-tet th^ang ^a!'
Chh`oi-ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke ch'u-k^ung ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ^a, 'an-ngi`ong `m-la! Na-he y^u ng`in tui s'i f+uk-f+at, to k`i-t^eu ke-vi hi, k`i-t^eu chhiu voi f'i-k'oi.'
Ch'ung-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on k'ong: 'Na-he k`i-t^eu `m th^ang M^o-s^i l^au si^en-t^i ke fa, chhiu-son y^u ng`in tui s'i f+uk-f+at, ya m`o fap-thu sot-f+uk k`i-t^eu!' "
Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Hoi ng`in fam-chhui ke su" he n`an-mi^en ke, ch'ung-he s'u" li'a-ke su" fat-s^en ke ng`in f'ai l'e!
K`i p^un-ng`in yung thai mo-s+ak th`o-t'en ki'ang-k^in fit-l+ok h'oi-t'u hi, kha-y`ang k`i hoi ngim-h`o yit-ke chui m`i-se ke ng`in fam-chhui.
Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a oi se-ngi! "K'a-s'u" ng`i ke hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi fam-chhui, oi khien-va k`i; k`i na-he f'i-k'oi, chhiu oi sa-mi^en k`i.
Na-he k`i chhai yit-ngit t^ong-ch^ung tet-chhui ng`i chhit-p'ai, tak-p'ai to-ch'on-l`oi tui ng`i k'ong: 'Ng`ai f'i-k'oi l'e', ng`i ya oi sa-mi^en k`i."
Ke-t^eu s'u"-th`u tui Ch'u k'ong: "Khi`u ng`i p^un ng`ai-t^eu y^u kha thai ke sin-s^im!"

Ch'u k'ong: "Na-he ng`i-t^eu y^u chhiong yit-li+ap kie-chhoi-ch'u" 'an-thai ke sin-s^im, chhiu-he tui li'a-th`eu s^ong-su k'ong: 'Li`en k^in p^ang-h'i-l`oi, hi chung chhai h'oi-ch^ung!' k`i ya voi th^ang-chhi`ung ng`i-t^eu.

"K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m^eu-ng`in y^u yit-ke k^ang-thi`en ya-he ch'ong-y`ong ke ph+uk-ng`in, k`i tui thi`en-y`en ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", ng`i k'am voi tui k`i k'ong: 'Kiak-kiak chh^o-h^a-l`oi s+u"t-fan!'
T^ong-y`en `m-voi! Ng`i k'am `m-he tui k`i k'ong: 'Vi ng`ai ch'un-phi s+u"t ke, y`en-heu ki^e-t'en v`i-khi`un l`oi f+uk-su" ng`ai, t'en ng`ai s+u"t-p'au, ng`i chang hi s+u"t!'
Ph+uk-ng`in cheu ch'u-ng`in ke f^un-fu cho-se, k'am-k'ong ch'u-ng`in h`an-oi k'am-chhia k`i m^a?

Ng`i-t^eu ya he khiung-yong; t^ong ng`i-t^eu cho-h'o Song-ti s'o f^un-fu ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in, chhiu oi k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu he m`o lu-yung ke ph+uk-ng`in; ng`ai-t^eu s'o-cho ke he chhin p'un-fun thin-thin.' "
Y^a-s^u chhai oi hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke lu-song, k^in-ko Sat-m^a-li-^a l^au K^a-li-li t^ong-ch^ung ke s'o-chhai.
K`i ng+ip yit-ke chh^un-ch^ong ke s`u", y^u s+u"p-ke pot th'ai-k^o ke ng`in tui-mien h`ang-t'en l`oi. K`i-t^eu y'en-y'en kh^i-t'en,
thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Y^a-s^u, s^in-s^ang ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai-t^eu!"
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi p^un chi-s^u" ki'am-chh`a s^u"n-th'i!" K`i-t^eu chhai hi ke lu-song, chhiu tet-t'o chhiang-li.
Kh`i-ch^ung yit-s`a khon-t'o chhu"-k^a y'i-k^in h'o l'e, kiak-kiak chhiu to-ch'on-l`oi, thai-s^ang siung-chan Song-ti,
yu ph+uk chhai Y^a-s^u ke kiok-chhi`en k'am-chhia k`i. Li'a-ke ng`in he Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke ng`in k'am `m-he y^u s+u"p-s`a? Nang-ngoi ki'u-ke chhai nai-vi n`e?
Ngi'ong-p^an ch'u"-y^u li'a ph+et-chh+uk ke ng`in to-ch'on-l`oi k'am-chhia Song-ti n`e?"
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, h'o hi l'e! Ng`i ke sin-s^im y^i-h'o ng`i l'e!"
Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in l`oi mun Y^a-s^u, oi t^i Song-ti ke koet k'i-s`u" voi kong-l`im. Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Song-ti koet ke kong-l`im pin `m-he muk-ch^u s'o khon-tet-t'o ke.
M`o ng`in n`en k'ong: 'Khon ^a, chhai li'a-vi!' ya-he 'Chhai ke-vi!' Y^in-vi Song-ti ke koet chhiu chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-ch^ung!"
Chiap-t'en, k`i yu tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "S`u"-ki^en voi to, ng`i-t^eu voi chhin si'ong-oi khon Ng`in-ch'u" ch'ong-khi`en ke s`u"-chiet, ch'ung-he li`en yit-ngit ya khon-`m-t'o.
Y^u ng`in voi tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Khon ^a, chhai li'a-vi!' ya-he 'Khon ^a, chhai ke-vi!' Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chhut-hi khon, ya `m-h'o th`en k`i-t^eu hi.
Chhiong ngiap-lang yit-ha-'e tui thi^en ke li'a-phi'en cheu-to thi^en ke ke-phi'en hi, Ng`in-ch'u" chai-l`im ke-ngit ya voi 'an-ngi`ong.
Ch'ung-he k`i yit-thin voi si^en su chhin-t^o kh'u-nan, p^un li'a su"-thoi ke ng`in hi-chhi+et.
Chhiong N`o-^a s`u"-thoi ke chh`in-h`in, Ng`in-ch'u" chai-l`im ke s`u"-chiet ya voi 'an-ngi`ong.
Ke s`u"-thoi ke ng`in cheu-s`ong s+u"t-l^im ka-chh'i, chh+u"t-to N`o-^a ng+ip thai-s`on ke-ngit, thai-s'ui l`oi-to, chi^ong k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu m+et-thet.
Ng`in-ch'u" chai-l`im ke s`u"-chiet, yu voi chhiong L`o-tet s`u"-thoi ke chh`in-h`in; ke s`u"-thoi ke ng`in cheu-s`ong s+u"t-l^im, m^ai-mai, cheu-s`ong k^ang-chung, h'i-vuk.
To L`o-tet l`i-kh^oi S'o-t^o-m^a ke-ngit, f'o l^au li`u-v`ong chhiu tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi, chi^ong k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu m+et-thet.
Ng`in-ch'u" hi'en-hien ke-ngit ya voi 'an-ngi`ong.
"Ke-ngit, chhai vuk-t'ang ke, `m-h'o h^a-l`oi ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u n^a k`i ke t^ung-s^i; khiung-yong, chhai thi`en-hong ke, ya `m-h'o ch'on-hi.
Oi ki-tet L`o-tet ke p^u-ngi`ong l`oi cho k'in-kie!
Si'ong-oi p'o-chhi`on chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke, f'an-ch'on voi s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang; s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang ke, f'an-ch'on voi p'o-chhi`on s^ang-miang.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ke-ngit am-p^u, li'ong-ke ng`in soi khiung-t'ang m`in-chh`ong, yit-ke voi su chiap-ch'eu, yit-ke voi li`u-h^a-l`oi;
li'ong-ke fu-ng`in-k^a khiung-ha ^ai mo-s+ak, yit-ke voi su chiap-ch'eu, nang-ngoi yit-ke voi li`u-h^a-l`oi."
H+ok-s^ang mun-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in voi fat-s^en chhai nai-vi n`e?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "S^u"n-s^u" chhai nai-vi, y^in-ti^au ya voi chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi."
Y^a-s^u tui h+ok-s^ang k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi, k^au k`i-t^eu oi s`ong-s`ong kh`i-t'o, `m-h'o f^oi-s^im.
K`i k'ong: "M^eu-s`ang y^u yit-ke fap-k^on, k`i `m ki^ang Song-ti, ya m`o ch^un-chhung ng`in.
Ke s`ang-nui y^u yit-ke ko'a-fu, s`ong-s`ong hi chh`im k`i, k'ong: 'Ng`ai y^u yit-ke tui-th+it, khi`u ng`i ch'u-chh`u" k^ung-tho, thoi ng`ai s^u"n-y^en.'
Li'a fap-k^on yit-chh+u"t `m-tap k`i, ch'ung-he heu-l`oi chhiu si'ong: 'Ng`ai s^ui-y`en `m ki^ang Song-ti, ya m`o ch^un-chhung ng`in,
ch'ung-he li'a-ke ko'a-fu k'in-l`oi chh`au ng`ai, ng`ai h`an-he thoi k`i chhut-th`eu kha-y`ang, mi^en-tet k`i s`ong-s`ong l`oi chh`an ng`ai!' "
Ch'u ki-si+uk k'ong: "Li'a put-ngi ke fap-k^on s'o-k'ong ke fa, ng`i-t^eu th^ang khon-'e!
Song-ti ke si'en-m`in ngit-ya tui K`i kh`i-khi`u, K`i k'am voi `m thoi k`i-t^eu s^u"n-y^en m^a? K`i k'am voi ngi^un-t'en `m-tap k`i-t^eu m^a?
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, K`i yit-thin voi chhin-kiak thoi k`i-t^eu s^u"n-y^en. Mun-th`i he Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi ke s`u", chhai su"-ki^en k'am chh`im tet-t'o 'an-ngi`ong ke sin-s^im m^a?"
Y^a-s^u yu sat nang-ngoi yit-ke p'i-yi, l`oi kau-hiun ke-t^eu khok-sin chhu"-k^a he ngi-ng`in yu khon-khi^ang ph+et-s`a ke ng`in. K`i k'ong:
"Y^u li'ong-ke ng`in hi su"n-thien kh`i-t'o: Yit-ke he Fap-li-soi-ng`in, yit-ke he soi-vu-y`en.

Ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in ngo-th`eu kh^i-t'en, kh`i-t'o k'ong: 'Song-ti ^a, ng`ai k'am-chhia Ng`i, y^in-vi ng`ai m`o chhiong ph+et-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong th^am-v^u, put-ngi, y`im-lon, ya m`o chhiong li'a-chak soi-kun.
Ng`ai tak l^i-pai kim-s+u"t li'ong-p'ai, yu fung-hien chhi`on-phu s^u-ng+ip ke s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit.'
Ch'ung-he ke soi-vu-y`en y'en-y'en kh^i-t'en, li`en th`eu-n`a ya `m-k'am khi`a-h'i-l`oi mong-thi^en, ch'u"-y^u chh`ui s^im-k^on k'ong: 'Song-ti ^a, kh^oi-^en l`in-m'en ng`ai li'a-ke chhui-ng`in!'

Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a li'ong-ke ng`in ch'on-hi ke s`u", Song-ti oi chh^u"n soi-vu-y`en cho ngi-ng`in, Fap-li-soi-ng`in f'an-ch'on sa `m-he. Y^in-vi Song-ti oi chi^ong chhu"-k^o ke ng`in kong-cho p^i-m`i, ya oi k^o-s^u"n k^am-s^im khi^am-p^i ke ng`in."
Y^u-t^eu ng`in tai se-ng`in-`e li`en ^o-nga-'e l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, h^i-mong k`i mi^a k`i-t^eu. H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o chhiu chit-phi ke-t^eu ng`in.
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u ham k`i-t^eu l`oi k`i ke mien-chhi`en, k'ong: "P^un se-ng`in-`e l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi, `m-h'o kim-ch'u" k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in chhiu-chhiong li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in.

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na `m-he chhiong se-ng`in-`e 'an-ngi`ong l`oi chiap-su Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en, k`i chhi+et-tui m`o kh'o-n`en s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in."
Y^u yit-ke Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu l`oi chhi'ang-kau Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "Li`ong-san ke s^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang cho-tet s`u"n-su y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang ^a?"
Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ngi'ong-p^an ham ng`ai cho li`ong-san ke n`e? Song-ti y^i-ngoi, m`o chai y^u li`ong-san ke.
Ng`i t^i ke-t^eu kie-min: 'Cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im; cho-`m-tet chh`u"-ng`in; cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a; cho-`m-tet cho k'a kien-chu"n; oi hau-kin y`a-^oi.' "
Ke ng`in en-k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu kie-min ng`ai chhi`on-phu chhi`ung-se chhiu y'i-k^in ch^un-s'u l'e."

Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a-ki fa, chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i h`an khiam yit-yong. Hi mai ng`i s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap, chi^ong chhi`en p^un-p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, ng`i chhiu voi y^u chh`oi-s'an chit-chh`un chhai thi^en-t'ang; y`en-heu ng`i l`oi th`en ng`ai."
Ke ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu chhin s^ong-s^im, y^in-vi k`i chhin y^u-chhi`en.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o k`i 'an-ngi`ong, chhiu k'ong: "Y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in, s+u"t-chhai ch^u"n n`an ^o!
Y^u-chhi`en-ng`in oi cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in, p'i l+ok-th`o chh^on-ko ch^u"m-phi h`an-kha n`an!"
Th^ang-t'o li'a-ki fa ke ng`in chhiu mun-k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, m'a-ng`in y^u kh'o-n`en tet-kiu n`e?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Chhai ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en ke su", chhai Song-ti t^u n`en."
Li'a-s`u", P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in piong-thet chhu"-k^a s'o-y^u ke l`oi th`en ng`i."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, vi-t'o Song-ti ke koet l`oi piong-thet chhu"-k^a ke f`ong-vuk, p^u-ngi`ong, hi^ung-thi, y`a-^oi, ya-he ch'u"-'ng ke ng`in,
yit-thin voi chhai k^im-su" tet-t'o k^a chhin-t^o phi, chhai l`oi-s^en ya voi tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang."

Y^a-s^u tai-t'en s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha oi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi; si^en-t^i-s^u s'o si'a ko^an-he Ng`in-ch'u" ke m^i-yit-khien su" chhi`on-phu voi s+u"t-hien.
K`i voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung; k`i-t^eu voi met-sa k`i, v'u-y+uk k`i, phi k`i h'eu-l^an,
h`an-oi pi^en-t'a k`i, sat-hoi k`i; ch'ung-he, thi-s^am-ngit k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
H+ok-s^ang tui li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in chhi`on m`o li'au-ki'e, y^in-vi li'a kau-hiun ke yi-su" he y'un-chh`ong-t'en ke; s'o-y^i Y^a-s^u s'o k'ong ke fa k`i-t^eu ya th^ang-`m-su"t.
Y^a-s^u l`oi-to khi^un Y^a-li-k^o ke s'o-chhai, y^u yit-ke m^o-muk ke ng`in chh^o chhai lu-s`un th'o-s+u"t.
K`i th^ang-t'o yit thai-khi`un ng`in k^in-ko, chhiu mun he m'a-ke su"-chh`in.
Y^u ng`in l^au k`i k'ong: "He N^a-sat-l+et ke Y^a-s^u tui li'a-vi k^in-ko."
K`i chhiu h^em-k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un Y^a-s^u ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai!"
H`ang chhai Y^a-s^u th`eu-chhi`en ke ng`in chit-phi k`i, ham k`i `m-h'o chh`au. Ch'ung-he k`i h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un ^a, kh'o-li`en ng`ai!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, f^un-fu ng`in chi^ong m^o-muk-ke tai-to k`i mien-chhi`en l`oi. K`i h`ang-khi^un ke s`u", Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong:
"Ng`i oi ng`ai vi ng`i cho m'a-ke?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai oi khon-tet-t'o!"
Y^a-s^u chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i khon-tet-t'o l'e! Ng`i ke sin-s^im y'i-k^in y^i-h'o ng`i l'e."
M^o-muk-ke ngi`am-s`u" khon-tet-t'o, chhiu th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u, k^ui-lu siung-chan Song-ti. Chung-ng`in khon-t'o li'a-ke su", ya l^ung-ch'ung chan-m^i Song-ti.
Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi Y^a-li-k^o-s`ang, oi tui ke-vi k^in-ko.
Ke-vi y^u yit-ke soi-vu-ch'ong, mi`ang ^on-to Sat-k^ai, he yit-ke chhin y^u-chhi`en ke ng`in.
Sat-k^ai chhin si'ong-oi khon Y^a-s^u he ngi'ong-p^an ke ng`in, ch'ung-he k`i s^u"n-chh`oi 'ai-se, chhai ng`in-khi`un ch^ung khon-`m-t'o Y^a-s^u.
Vi-t'o oi khon Y^a-s^u, k`i chhiu ch'eu-to thai-k^a ke th`eu-chhi`en hi, ph`a-s^ong yit-th`eu s^ong-su; y^in-vi Y^a-s^u voi tui ke-thi`au lu k^in-ko.
Y^a-s^u h`ang-to ke-vi, ngo-th`eu khon Sat-k^ai, tui k`i k'ong: " Sat-k^ai, kiak-kiak h^a-l`oi! K^im-p^u-ngit ng`ai yit-thin oi h+et chhai ngi^a vuk-h^a."
Sat-k^ai chhiu kiak-kiak h^a-l`oi, f^on-f^on h'i-h'i chiap-thai Y^a-s^u.
Chung-ng`in khon-t'o, chhiu k'in ngiam k'ong: "K`i ngi'ong cho-tet ng+ip chhui-ng`in ke vuk-h^a cho ng`in-hak!"
Sat-k^ai kh^i-t'en tui Ch'u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai chi^ong ng`ai ke chh`oi-s'an p^un yit-pan p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in; ng`ai na su"t khau m'a-ng`in ke y`u, ng`ai chhiu ph`oi k`i si-phi."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "K^im-p^u-ngit kiu-^en l`im-to li'a k^a l'e, y^in-vi li'a-ke ng`in khiung-yong ya he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un.
Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi, he oi chh`im m`i-su"t ke ng`in, l`oi kiu k`i."

Thai-k^a k'in th^ang li'a-t^eu fa, Y^a-s^u yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong nang-ngoi yit-ke p'i-yi. Li'a-s`u", Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in voi to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, thai-k^a l'au-t'o Song-ti ke koet ngi`am-s`u" chhiu voi chhut-hien l'e.
S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke kui-chh+uk oi hi y'en-f^ong, chiap-su f^ung-l+ip cho v`ong, y`en-heu chang to-ch'on-l`oi.
Chhut-ngoi y^i-chhi`en, k`i ham s+u"p-ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi, tak-s`a p^un yit-chak ngi`un-pi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai m`o-chh^oi ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu n^a li'a-ke chhi`en hi cho s^en-l^i.'
K`i p'un-koet ke ng`in yit-chh+u"t yen-hen k`i, chhiu phai s'u"-ch'a th`en chhai k`i ke heu-m^i, k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu m`o-oi li'a-ke ng`in cho ng`ai-t^eu ke v`ong.'

"Ke kui-chh+uk chiap-su f^ung-l+ip cho v`ong ch'on-l`oi y^i-heu, chit-s`u" f^un-fu ng`in ham ke-t^eu li^ang ngi`un-pi ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi k`i ke mien-chhi`en, oi t^i k`i-t^eu tak-s`a cho s^en-l^i chhon k'i-t^o.
Th`eu-yit-ke l`oi k'ong: 'Ch'u-ng`in, ng`ai yung ng`i p^un ng`ai ke ngi`un-pi chhon-t'o s+u"p-chak ngi`un-pi.'
Ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Chhin h'o! Ng`i he yit-ke h'o ph+uk-ng`in; ng`i ki-y`en chhai se-se ke su"-hong ch^ung-s^im, ng`ai oi v^i-phai ng`i k'on-l^i s+u"p-chho s`ang.'
Thi-ngi-ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi k'ong: 'Ch'u-ng`in, ng`ai yung ng`i p^un ng`ai ke ngi`un-pi chhon-t'o 'ng-chak ngi`un-pi.'
Ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i ya oi k'on 'ng-chho s`ang.'
"Yu y^u yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in l`oi k'ong: 'Ch'u-ng`in, ng`i ke ngi`un-pi chhai li'a-vi; ng`ai yung s'u-pha chi^ong k`i p^au-to h'o-h'o.
Ng`ai yit-chh+u"t ki^ang ng`i, y^in-vi ng`i he yit-ke li-hoi ke ng`in: M`o piong ke, ng`i ya oi s^u; m`o chung ke, ng`i ya oi kot.'

Ch'u-ng`in tui k`i k'ong: 'Ng`i li'a-ke f'ai ph+uk-ng`in ^a! Ng`ai oi yung ng`i chhu"-k^a ke fa l`oi thin ng`i ke chhui! Ng`i ki-y`en t^i ng`ai he yit-ke li-hoi ke ng`in: M`o piong ke, ng`ai ya oi s^u; m`o chung ke, ng`ai ya oi kot.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i cho-m'a-ke `m chi^ong ng`ai ke chhi`en piong chhai ngi`un-h`ong, t'en ng`ai ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", cho-tet li`en-p'un-tai-li s^u-ch'on-l`oi n`e?'
"K`i chhiu tui kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu ke ng`in k'ong: 'Chi^ong k`i ke ngi`un-pi n^a p^un ke y^u s+u"p-chak ngi`un-pi ke ph+uk-ng`in!'
K`i-t^eu tui k`i k'ong: 'Ch'u-ng`in, k`i y'i-k^in y^u s+u"p-chak ngi`un-pi l'e!'
Ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, y'i-k^in y^u ke, oi p^un k`i h`an-kha t^o; m`o ke, li`en k`i s'o-y^u ke yit-s+it-s+it-'e ya oi chhi'ong-ch'eu.
H`an-y^u, ke-t^eu tui-th+it m`o-oi ng`ai cho v`ong l`oi k'on k`i-t^eu, chi^ong k`i-t^eu tai-l`oi, chhai ng`ai ke mien-chhi`en chh'u-s'i!' "
K'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, Y^a-s^u chhiu tai-th`eu h`ang, hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
Voi to Pak-fap-kh`i l^au Pak-thai-n`i, chhai K'am-l'am-s^an ke s`u", Y^a-s^u ham li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang si^en h`ang,

f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi th`eu-chhi`en ke chh^un-ch^ong. Ng`i-t^eu yit ng+ip-hi, chhiu voi khon-t'o yit-chak h`an-m`ang y^u-ng`in kh`i-ko ke se l`i-`e th`o chhai ke-vi. Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i ki'e-kh^oi, khi^en-l`oi li'a-vi.
Na-he y^u-ng`in mun ng`i-t^eu: 'Cho-m'a-ke ki'e-kh^oi se l`i-`e?' ng`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong: 'Ch'u oi yung k`i.' "
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi, s'o t`u-t'o ke chh`in-h`in l^au Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong ke v`an-chhi`on khiung-yong.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong se l`i-`e ki'e-kh^oi ke s`u", l`i-`e ke ch'u-ng`in mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke ki'e-kh^oi se l`i-`e?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu en-k'ong: "Ch'u oi yung k`i."
Y`en-heu, k`i-t^eu chi^ong se l`i-`e khi^en-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke s^am tap chhai l`i-`e ke poi-n`ong-t'ang, f`u Y^a-s^u kh`i s^ong-hi.
Y^a-s^u hiong-chhi`en h`ang ke s`u", thai-k^a yung chhu"-k^a ke s^am ph^u chhai lu-song.

K`i h`ang voi to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, oi tui K'am-l'am-s^an ke s^an-ph`ai h^a-hi ke s`u", k^ui-chhu"n h+ok-s^ang y^in-vi s'o khon-ko ke yit-chhiet kh`i-su" chhiu f^on-h'i k'am-chhia Song-ti, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong:
Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke v`ong! Thi^en-t'ang y^u ph`in-^on, y`ung-k^ong k^ui p^un Chu"-k^o ke Song-ti!
Ng`in-khi`un ch^ung y^u k'i-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i oi chit-phi ng`i ke h+ok-s^ang, ham k`i-t^eu ti^am-ti^am!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, k`i-t^eu na-he `m chhut-s^ang, li'a-t^eu s+ak-th`eu chhiu voi h^em h'i-l`oi."
Khi^un Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s`u", Y^a-s^u khon-t'o ke-s`ang, chhiu vi-t'o k`i kieu,
k'ong: "Ng`i k^im-p^u-ngit na-he t^i ke-t^eu y^u-ko^an ng`i f`o-ph`in ke su" chhiu h'o l'e! Kh'o-sit, ng`i li'a-ha khon `m-chhut ke-t^eu su".
Ngit-`e voi to, ke-s`u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it voi h'i n`ai-chhi`ong p^au-v`i ng`i, tui si-mien v`i-khi^un l`oi, chi^ong ng`i khun-to s'i-s'i.

K`i-t^eu voi chh+at-t'ai s^eu-m+et ng`i l^au ng`i s`ang-chhi`ong-t'u ke ng`in-m`in, yit-te s+ak-th`eu ya `m-voi thi+ap chhai nang-ngoi yit-te s+ak-th`eu ke t'ang-k^o, y^in-vi ng`i m`o ngin-chhut Song-ti l`oi ch'u"n-kiu ke s`u"-k^i."
Y^a-s^u yit ng+ip su"n-thien, chhiu chi^ong cho s^en-l^i ke ng`in kiuk chhut-hi,
tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Su"n-k^in ki-chai Song-ti ke fa k'ong: 'Ng`ai ke su"n-thien oi cho kh`i-t'o ke thien', ng`i-t^eu sa chi^ong k`i pien-cho chh+et-teu!"
Y^a-s^u tak-ngit chhai su"n-thien-t'u kau-su" ng`in. Chi-s^u"-ch'ong, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au m`in-ki^en ke li^ang-chhiu si'ong-oi sat-hoi k`i,
ch'ung-he `m-t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an ha-s'u; y^in-vi chung-ng`in chhin-oi th^ang k`i k'ong-fa, th^ang-to ng'i-chet-chet.
Y^u yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u kau-su" ng`in, si^en-chh`on fuk-y^im. Chi-s^u"-ch'ong, k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", l^au ch'ong-l'o l`oi-kien k`i,
mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"? M'a-ng`in p^un ng`i li'a khi`en-piang n`e? Ng`i l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong!"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai si^en mun ng`i-t^eu yit-ki fa; l^au ng`ai k'ong,
Yok-hon h`ang s'e-l^i ke khi`en-piang he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, ya-he tui ng`in l`oi ke?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu p'i-chh'u" s^ong-li`ong, k'ong: "Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui Song-ti l`oi ke', k`i voi k'ong: ''An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke `m sin Yok-hon n`e?'
Na-he ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: 'Tui ng`in l`oi ke', chung-ng`in voi n^a s+ak-th`eu t+ep ng`ai-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung si^ong-sin Yok-hon he si^en-t^i."
Tui 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m t^i he tui nai-vi l`oi ke."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai ya `m l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ng`ai kho m'a-ke khi`en-piang cho li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tui chung-ng`in k'ong li'a-ke p'i-yi: "Y^u yit-ke ng`in kh^oi yit-te ph`u-th`o-y`en, chi^ong k`i ch^u p^un thien-n`ung, chhu"-k^a chhut-ngoi hi l^i-h`ang yit-chham s`u"-ki^en.

To s^u ph`u-th`o ke s`u"-chiet, k`i phai yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi tui ke-t^eu thien-n`ung s^u k`i yin-tet ke k'o-ch'u". Ch'ung-he ke-t^eu thien-n`ung chi^ong ke ph+uk-ng`in chok-l`oi t'a, kiuk k`i kh^ung-s'u ch'on-hi.
Y`en-ch'u yu phai nang-ngoi yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi; k`i-t^eu cheu-yong chok k`i l`oi t'a, yu v'u-y+uk k`i, kiuk k`i kh^ung-s'u ch'on-hi.
Y`en-ch'u thi-s^am-p'ai yu phai yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in hi; k`i-t^eu h`an-he t'a-s^ong k`i, chi^ong k`i s'ung-chhut y`en-ngoi.
Ph`u-th`o-y`en ke ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e? Ng`ai oi phai ng`ai s'o-siak ke lai-'e hi, f+et-ch'a k`i-t^eu voi ch^un-chhung k`i.'

Ch'ung-he ke-t^eu thien-n`ung yit khon-t'o y`en-ch'u ke lai-'e, chhiu p'i-chh'u" k'ong: 'Li'a ng`in he y`en-ch'u ke ki-s`u"n-ng`in; ng`ai-t^eu l`oi chh`u"-s'i k`i, k`i ke s'an-ngi+ap chhiu pien-cho ng`ai-t^eu ke l'e!'
K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong k`i s'ung-chhut y`en-ngoi, chh`u"-s'i k`i. "'An-ngi`ong, ph`u-th`o-y`en ke ch'u-ng`in voi ngi'ong-p^an tui-fu ke-t^eu thien-n`ung n`e?
K`i yit-thin voi l`oi chh`u"-s'i ke-t^eu thien-n`ung, chi^ong ph`u-th`o-y`en ch^u p^un ph+et-ng`in." Chung-ng`in th^ang-li'au, chhiu k'ong: "Chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet y^u 'an-ngi`ong ke su"!"
Y^a-s^u chu-muk khon k`i-t^eu, mun-k'ong: "Su"n-k^in k'ong: N`ai-s'ui s^u"-fu s'o fit-thet ke li'a-te s+ak-th`eu, y'i-k^in s`ang-cho thi-k^i ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke. Li'a he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e?
M'a-ng`in tiet chhai ke s+ak-th`eu-t'ang, k`i chhiu voi f'un-s^u"n sui-kut; ke s+ak-th`eu tiet-l+ok m'a-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, ya voi chi^ong k`i chak-to mi`en-mi`en."
K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au chi-s^u"-ch'ong t^i Y^a-s^u li'a p'i-yi he chit-phi k`i-t^eu, t^ong-chh`ong chhiu si'ong-oi chok Y^a-s^u; ch'ung-he yu ki^ang chung-ng`in.

K`i-t^eu chhiu yit f^ong-mien ch'ong-t'en k`i; yit f^ong-mien s^u-m^ai yit-t^eu ng`in, k'a chu"n-k^in l`oi chhi'ang-kau Y^a-s^u mun-th`i, si'ong-oi tui k`i ke fa l`oi chok p'a-piang, h'o chi^ong k`i k^au-p^un ch'ung-tuk l`oi phan.

Li'a-t^eu ki^en-se tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu t^i ng`i s'o-k'ong s'o-k^au ke fa chhin h+ap chh`in-l^i, ya t^i ng`i `m-voi khon ng`in ke chh`in-mien, ch'ung-he ch^ung-s+u"t chi^ong Song-ti ke tho-l^i kau-su" ng`in.
N+ap-soi p^un L`o-m^a F`ong-ti he v`i-poi ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it m`o?"
Y^a-s^u khon-chhut k`i-t^eu ke k'ui-kie, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"N^a yit-chak ngi`un-pi p^un ng`ai khon! Li'a-ke siong l^au mi`ang-ho he m'a-ng`in ke?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He F`ong-ti ke."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, chi^ong F`ong-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un F`ong-ti, chi^ong Song-ti ke t^ung-s^i k^ui-p^un Song-ti."
K`i-t^eu chhai chung-ng`in ke mien-chhi`en m`o fap-thu tui Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke fa chok-t'o m'a-ke p'a-piang; th`ung-s`u", k`i-t^eu tui Y^a-s^u ke f`i-tap k'am-kok chhin h^i-kh`i, chhiu sok-ti^am.
Y^u-t^eu f'eu-ngin y^u f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su" ke Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, mun k`i k'ong:

"S^in-s^ang, M^o-s^i vi ng`ai-t^eu l+ip-fap k'ong: 'Na-he y^u yit-ke ng`in ko-s^u"n, li`u-h^a k`i ke p^u-ngi`ong, ch'ung-he m`o ch'u"-'ng, ki^a l'o-th^ai yit-thin oi th'o s'u-ko'a ke ^a-s'o cho p^u-ngi`ong, thoi ^a-k^o chh`on-ch^ung chiap-thoi.'
Th`eu-p'ai, su"t y^u chhit-ke hi^ung-thi: Thai-k^o th'o p^u-ngi`ong heu, m`o li`u-h^a ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n;
ngi-k^o chhiu th'o s'u-ko'a ke ^a-s'o;
heu-l`oi, thi-s^am-ke ya th'o k`i; chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, yit-chh+u"t to thi-chhit-ke, chhi`on-phu th'o-ko k`i, l^ung-ch'ung m`o li`u-h^a ch'u"-'ng chhiu ko-s^u"n.
Chui-m^i, ke fu-ng`in-k^a ya ko-s^u"n.
Chhi'ang-mun, chhai f+uk-f+at ke s`u"-chiet, li'a-ke fu-ng`in-k^a oi son he m'a-ng`in ke p^u-ngi`ong n`e? Y^in-vi chhit-ke hi^ung-thi chhi`on-phu su"t l^au k`i kiet-f^un."
Y^a-s^u en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^im-s^en ke ng`in y^u th'o ya y^u ka;
ch'ung-he ke-t^eu y^u ch^u"-kiet tui s'i f+uk-f+at, pin s^ang chhai l`oi-s^en ke ng`in, m`o th'o ya m`o ka;
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-voi chai s'i, l^au thi^en-s'u" khiung-yong. K`i-t^eu he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu y'i-k^in tui s'i f+uk-f+at.

Li`en M^o-s^i me chu"n-m`in y^u s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su"; chhai net-su chh+ok-f'o ke ku-su" t^i-poi, k`i su"t k'ong: Ch'u he ' ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke Song-ti, Y^i-sat ke Song-ti, Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti.'
Li'a yi-su" he k'ong, Song-ti `m-he s'i-ng`in ke Song-ti, he s^ang-ng`in ke Song-ti; y^in-vi tui Song-ti l`oi khon, k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung he s^ang-ng`in."
Y^u-t^eu k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i k'ong ke chhin chh+ok!"
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu m`o yit-ke k'am chai mun Y^a-s^u m'a-ke n`an-th`i.
Ch'ung-he, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ngi'ong-p^an y^u-ng`in k'ong K^i-tuk he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un n`e?
Thai-v'i chhu"-k^a su"t chhai S^u"-phi^en k'ong: Ch'u tui ng`ai ke Ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`i chh^o chhai Ng`ai ke yu-phi'en,
t'en Ng`ai s'u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it ph+uk chhai ng`i ke kiok-h^a.'
Thai-v'i ki-y`en chh^u"n k`i cho 'Ch'u', K^i-tuk ngi'ong-voi yu he Thai-v'i ke ch'u"-s^un n`e?"
Chung-ng`in chhi`on-phu th^ang-to chhin ng+ip-s`u"n ke s`u"-chiet, Y^a-s^u tui ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong:

"Oi th`i-f`ong k^in-h+ok kau-s^u"; k`i-t^eu hau chok chh`ong-ph`au, ch^eu-y`eu ko-ki^e, chhin oi ph+et-ng`in chhai k^ung-khiung chh`ong-s'o tui k`i-t^eu chu"-kin chhi'ang-^on, yu chhin oi chh^o fi-th`ong-t'u ke th+it-ph+et chho-vi l^au y`en-s+it ch^ung ke thai-vi.
K`i-t^eu th^un-s+u"t ko'a-fu ke s'an-ngi+ap, y`en-heu chhai ng`in ke mien-chhi`en p'eu-y^en chh`ong-phi^en ke kh`i-t'o. K`i-t^eu yit-thin voi su-t'o kha-chh^ung ke chit-f+at!"
Y^a-s^u ngo-th`eu, khon-t'o yit-t^eu y^u-chhi`en-ng`in chi^ong k`i-t^eu ke hien-k^im piong-l+ok su"n-thien ke fung-hien-si^ong.
K`i ya khon-t'o yit-ke khi`ung-kh'u ke ko'a-fu piong li'ong-chak se th`ung-chhi`en l+ok-hi.
Y`en-heu, k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a khi`ung-kh'u ke ko'a-fu s'o piong-l+ok fung-hien-si^ong ke p'i kh`i-th^a ke ng`in kha-t^o.
Y^in-vi ph+et-ng`in he fung-hien k`i-t^eu yung chh^un ke yit-phu-fun; ch'ung-he k`i he chhai m`o la-yung ke t^ong-ch^ung, chi^ong chhi`on-phu ke s^en-f+at-fi hien-chhut-l`oi."
Y^u-t^eu ng`in chhai th`am-lun su"n-thien he yung chhin-chi^ang ke s+ak-th`eu l^au v`an-ngien ke l^i-v+ut s'o ch^ong-su"t ke; Y^a-s^u chhiu k'ong:

"Lun-t'o ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha s'o khon ke li'a-t^eu t^ung-s^i: Ngit-`e voi to, ke-s`u", li'a s'o-chhai ke m^i yit-te s+ak-th`eu chhi`on-phu voi p^un-ng`in chhak-h^a-l`oi, m`o yit-te s+ak-th`eu voi thi+ap chhai nang-ngoi yit-te ke t'ang-k^o."
K`i-t^eu chhiu mun-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, li'a-ke su" k'i-s`u" voi fat-s^en n`e? Li'a yit-chhiet fat-s^en ke s`u"-chiet voi y^u m'a-ke seu-th`eu?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o p^un-ng`in m`i-f+et; y^in-vi y^u chhin-t^o ng`in voi k'a-mo ng`ai ke mi`ang l`oi, k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhiu-he K^i-tuk!' yu k'ong: 'S`u"-k^i khiun l'e!' Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o th`en k`i-t^eu hi.

Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o chan-ch^en l^au phau-thung ke f^ung-s^ang, ke s`u"-chiet `m-s'u" ki^ang. Li'a-t^eu su" thin-chh+ok voi si^en fat-s^en; ch'ung-he li'a `m-he k'ong m+at-ngit ngi`am-s`u" voi to l'e."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "M`in-chh+uk voi l^au m`in-chh+uk si^ong-chh`u", koet-k^a voi l^au koet-k^a chan-ch^en;
tak s'o-chhai voi y^u thai thi-th^ung, k^i-f^ong l^au pot-v^un; thi^en-t'ang ya voi y^u tet-ng`in-ki^ang ke kh`i-su" l^au yi-siong chhut-hien.

Ch'ung-he, chhai li'a yit-chhiet su"-chh`in fat-s^en y^i-chhi`en, ng`i-t^eu voi p^un-ng`in chok-hi, ya su pet-hoi; ng`in voi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu sung-hi fi-th`ong su s'u"m-mun, hoi ng`i-t^eu chh^o k^am-l`o. Vi-t'o ng`ai ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu voi p^un-ng`in tai-to ki^un-v`ong l^au th'ung-chhu"-ch'a ke mien-chhi`en su s'u"m-phan.
Li'a chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu cho kien-chu"n ke k^i-fi.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu ke s^im oi ki^en-thin, `m-s'u" si^en si'ong oi ngi'ong-p^an vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu;
y^in-vi ng`ai voi su ng`i-t^eu khi'eu-chh`oi l^au chu"-fi, s'u" ng`i-t^eu ke th+it-ng`in m`o yit-ke y^u fap-thu h'o f'an-tui ya-he phien-pok.
Li`en ng`i-t^eu ke y`a-^oi, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, chh^in-chhit, ph`en-y^u, ya voi chhut-mai ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in h`an voi p^un k`i-t^eu hoi-s'i.
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke mi`ang, thai-k^a voi yen-hen ng`i-t^eu;
ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n`a-m^o li`en yit-thi`au ya `m-voi m`o-thet hi.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ngi^un-nai, chhiu voi kiu-t'o chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang.
"Ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang p^un th+it-ng`in ke ki^un-chhui v`i-khun ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu t^i k`i p^un-ng`in f'i-m+et ke s`u"-chiet to l'e.
Ke-s`u", h+et chhai Y`u-thai thi-kh^i ke, oi ch'eu-hi s^an-t'ang phit-nan; h+et chhai s`ang-t'u ke, oi chhut-l`oi; h+et chhai hi^ong-ha ke, `m-h'o ng+ip-s`ang.
Y^in-vi li'a he 'Po-yin ke Ngit-`e', oi p^un Su"n-k^in s'o-y^u ke fa tet-t'o yin-ngiam.

Chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e, f`ai-th^oi ke fu-ng`in-k^a l^au p^un ^o-nga-'e s+u"t-nen ke ^a-m^e chhiu chh'am l'e! Thai ch^ai-nan voi l`im-to li'a thi-f^ong, Song-ti ke nu-hi voi l`im-to li'a ng`in-m`in ke s^u"n-song.
K`i-t^eu voi s'i chhai t^o-kiam ch^u"-ha, ya-he p^un-ng`in chok-hi t^o-t^o ke koet-k^a. Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang voi p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in chien-th+ap, chh+u"t-to Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke kh`i-han m^an l'e.

"Ke-s`u", ngit-th`eu, ngi+et-k^ong, l^au s^en-'e l^ung-ch'ung voi chhut-hien kh`i-koai ke seu-th`eu. Thi-song ke van-koet chhi`on-phu voi y^in-vi thai-h'oi ke ho-s^ang l^au p^o-long ke f^an-th`en, ki^ang-to m`o-kat m`o-sat.
Thai-kh^ung ke ne-th'ung ya voi y`eu-thung, ng`in-lui chhiu ki^ang-to voi s'i, yu y^in-vi t'en-heu s'o-oi fat-s^en chhai su"-ki^en ke su" f^un-f^un thet-hi.
Ke-s`u", k`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" thai-y^u n`en-l+it l^au y`ung-yeu chh^o y`un kong-l`im.
Li'a-t^eu su" fat-s^en ke s`u"-chiet, ng`i-t^eu oi th'en-hi^ung, th`eu-n`a khi`a-h'i-l`oi, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tet-kiu ke s`u"-chiet k'in-l`oi k'in-khi^un l'e!"
Y^a-s^u yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong yit-ke p'i-yi: "Ng`i-t^eu khon v`u-f^a-k'o-su l^au kh`i-th^a kok-ch'ung ke su-'e.
K`i-t^eu yit s^ang-chhut s^in y+ap, ng`i-t^eu khon chhiu t^i ngi+et-thi^en voi to l'e.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o li'a yit-chhiet ke hien-siong, chhiu oi t^i Song-ti ke koet voi s+u"t-hien l'e.
"Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, li'a-thoi ng`in h`an-m`ang l^ung-ch'ung ko-s^u"n y^i-chhi`en, li'a yit-chhiet ke su" chhiu voi fat-s^en.
Thi^en l^au thi voi m`o-thet, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke fa y'un-y'en `m-voi m`o-thet.
"Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a oi ki'un-s'u"m! Ng`i-t^eu ke s^im `m-h'o p^un chi'u-ngiuk l^au s^en-f+at ke chh^au-s^im t'a-lon thet-hi, ki^ang-pha ke ngit-`e fut-y`en l`im-to ng`i-t^eu;
y^in-vi ke ngit-`e voi chhiong mi'ong-`e yit-yong, l+ok chhai chhi`on su"-kie s'o-y^u ke ng`in s^u"n-song.
Ng`i-t^eu oi s`ui-s`u" k'in-si'ang, s`ong-s`ong kh`i-t'o, s'u" ng`i-t^eu y^u n`en-l+it h'o thu-ko li'a yit-chhiet oi fat-s^en ke su", y^u-h'o kh^i chhai Ng`in-ch'u" ke mien-chhi`en."
Ngit-s`u"-th`eu, Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien kau-su" ng`in; am-p^u-s`u", k`i chhiu chhut-s`ang, hi K'am-l'am-s^an ko-ya.
Chung-ng`in t'a-ch'o chhiu hi su"n-thien chh`im Y^a-s^u, oi th^ang k`i k'ong-tho.
Chh`u-kau-chiet (yu ^on-to Ph`an-ko-chiet) voi to l'e.
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" y^in-vi ki^ang m`in-chung, chhiu y^im-m`eu oi ngi'ong-p^an sat-hoi Y^a-s^u.
Ke-s`u", Sat-tan chin-ng+ip K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai ke s^im. ( Y`u-thai he Y^a-s^u s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ke yit-ke.)
Y`u-thai hi th`ung chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au su"n-thien ke k'in-v'i-ch'ong chh^am-si`ong, oi ngi'ong-p^an chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i, yu tap-yin n^a chhi`en p^un k`i.
Y`u-thai chhiu th`ung-yi, kh^oi-s'u" chh`im k^i-fi, oi chhai m`o chung-ng`in chhai-chh`ong ke s`u"-chiet chhut-mai Y^a-s^u.
Chh`u-kau-chiet kh`i-ki^en, chh`u" Ph`an-ko-chiet k^au-y`ong ke-ngit to l'e.
Y^a-s^u phai P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon chhut-hi, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu hi thoi ng`ai-t^eu ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on."
K`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu chhai nai-vi ch'un-phi?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ng+ip-s`ang hi, voi t`u-t'o yit-ke ng`in tai-t'en yit-kon s'ui; ng`i-t^eu chhiu th`en-t'en k`i, to k`i ng+ip-hi ke vuk-t'u,
mun ke k^a ke ch'u-ng`in k'ong: 'S^in-s^ang k'ong: Ng`ai l^au ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang s+u"t Ph`an-ko-chiet v^an-chh^on ke hak-th^ang chhai nai-vi?'
K`i voi tai ng`i-t^eu hi khon l`eu-t'ang yit-ki^en pu-chu"-h'o ke thai f`ong-ki^en; ng`i-t^eu chhiu chhai ke-vi ch'un-phi."
K`i-t^eu chhiu hi; s'o t`u-t'o ke chhi`on-phu l^au Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong ke khiung-yong; k`i-t^eu chhiu chhai ke-vi ch'un-phi Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on.
S+u"t-ya ke s`u"-ki^en to l'e, Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi, s'u"-th`u ya th`ung k`i khiung-ha chh^o-chok.
K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai yit-chh+u"t h^i-mong chhai su-nan y^i-chhi`en th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha s+u"t li'a Ph`an-ko-chiet ke v^an-chh^on.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m`o t'en-to li'a v^an-chh^on ke yi-ngi s+u"t-hien chhai Song-ti koet, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi chai s+u"t li'a-ke v^an-chh^on."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u chiap-ko p^i-'e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu n^a-hi, thai-k^a p^un-t'en l^im.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, m`o t'en-to Song-ti ke koet l`im-to, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi chai l^im li'a ph`u-th`o-chi'u."

Chiap-t'en, k`i n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, p^un-p^un k`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Li'a he ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i, he vi ng`i-t^eu h^i-s^en ke; ng`i-t^eu oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, l`oi ki-ngiam ng`ai."
S+u"t-p'au heu, k`i cheu-yong n^a-h'i p^i-'e, k'ong: "Li'a p^i he Song-ti ke s^in-yok, he yung ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu li`u-chhut ke hiet s'o sat-l+ip ke.
"Ng`i-t^eu khon, chhut-mai ng`ai ke ng`in th`ung ng`ai khiung-chok!
Ng`in-ch'u" khok-s+u"t oi cheu Song-ti ke ^on-ph`ai l`oi su-hoi, ch'ung-he chhut-mai k`i ke ng`in y^u ch^ai-fo l'e!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu p'i-chh'u" k'in-mun, to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in oi cho li'a-khien su".
H+ok-s^ang ch^ung-ki^en fat-s^en ch^en-lun, to-t'ai m'a-ng`in chui-thai.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke ki^un-v`ong y^u khi`en k'on-hot k`i-t^eu; k`i-t^eu ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a yu p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-cho kiu-s^en;
ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m-he 'an-ngi`ong. Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung chui-thai ke, f'an-ch'on oi chhiong chui-se ke; cho li^ang-chhiu ke, yin-k^oi chhiong ph+uk-ng`in.
He chh^o-chok ke kha thai, ya-he f+uk-su" k`i ke kha thai n`e? K'am `m-he chh^o-chok ke kha thai m^a? Ch'ung-he, ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en he f+uk-su" ng`in ke.
"Ng`ai su m`o-lien ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha.
Ng^a P^a y^u su ng`ai yit-ke koet, li'a-ha, ng`ai khiung-yong ya oi chi^ong li'a-koet ke th'ung-chhu"-khi`en su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chhai ng`ai ke koet t^i-poi th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha l^im-s+u"t, ya oi chh^o chhai p'o-chho t'ang-k^o s'u"m-phan Y^i-set-li+et ke s+u"p-ngi k^i-chh+uk."
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: " S^i-m`un, S^i-m`un! Sat-tan y'i-k^in y^eu-khi`u su"-tham ng`i-t^eu, chhiong k^ang-chung-ng`in chh^i m+ak-'e 'an-ngi`ong l`oi chh^i ng`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai y'i-k^in vi ng`i kh`i-t'o, p^un ng`i ke sin-s^im `m-voi m`o-thet hi. Ng`i to-ch'on-l`oi k^ui ng`ai y^i-heu, chhiu oi ki^en-ku ng`i ke-t^eu hi^ung-thi."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai k^am-ngien th`en ng`i hi chh^o-k^am, th`ung ng`i khiung-ha s'i!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: " P'i-tet, ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, k^im-p^u-ngit ki^e-'e th`ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai k'ong ng`i `m-su"t ng`ai."

Y^a-s^u yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Th`eu-p'ai, ng`ai phai ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi, ham ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o tai chhi`en-p^au, `m-h'o tai l^i-h`ang-thoi ya-he h`ai-`e, ng`i-t^eu su"t khiam m'a-ke m`o?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "`M-su"t."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'ung-he li'a-ha, y^u chhi`en-p^au ya-he l^i-h`ang-thoi ke, oi tai-t'en; m`o t^o-'e ke, oi mai s^am hi m^ai yit-k^i.

Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: 'K`i s`u"n-t^am chhui-ng`in ke miang-yun' ke-ki fa, yit-thin oi s+u"t-hien chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song. Su"-s+u"t-song, s'o-y^u ko^an-he ng`ai ke ki-chai y'i-k^in yin-ngiam-t'en l'e."
H+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i khon, li'a-vi y^u li'ong-k^i t^o-'e." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "La l'e!"
Y^a-s^u chhut-s`ang, cheu-s`ong hi K'am-l'am-s^an; h+ok-s^ang ya th`en-t'en k`i hi.
To ke s'o-chhai, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi kh`i-t'o, mi^en-tet ham-l+ok m`i-f+et."
Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, yok y^u t+ep yit-chak s+ak-th`eu 'an y'en, kh'ui h^a-hi kh`i-t'o,
k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, Ng`i na-he h'en, chhi'ang chi^ong li'a-ke kh'u-p^i s'ai-ch'eu; ch'ung-he, `m-h'o cheu ng`ai ke yi-su", oi s`u"n-chhi`on Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi."
Y^u yit-ke thi^en-s'u" tui thi^en-t'ang hiong k`i hi'en-hien, l`oi k^a-thi^am k`i ke l+it-liong.
Chhai kh+it thung-kh'u ch^u" ch^ung, Y^a-s^u h`an-kha pet-chhiet kh`i-t'o; k`i ke hon-s'ui chhiong thai-ti'am ke hiet tit-t'en l+ok thi-n`ai.
Kh`i-t'o heu, Y^a-s^u hong-h'i-l`oi, ch'on-to h+ok-s^ang ke-vi, fat-hien k`i-t^eu y`u-s^ong ko-thu chhiu soi-thet-hi.
K`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke soi-thet-hi n`e? Hong-h'i-l`oi, oi kh`i-t'o, mi^en-tet ham-l+ok m`i-f+et."
Y^a-s^u h`an k'ong-t'en fa ke s`u", y^u yit-khi`un ng`in l`oi-to. S+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ch^ung ke Y`u-thai chhai th`eu-chhi`en tai-lu, k`i chin-chhi`en oi ch^im Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: " Y`u-thai, ng`i yung ch^im ng`ai l`oi chhut-mai Ng`in-ch'u" he-m`o?"
Th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha ke h+ok-s^ang khon-t'o li'a-ke chh`in-h`in, chhiu k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet s'u" t^o-'e m`o?"
Kh`i-ch^ung yit-ke p^ang-chhut t^o-'e, tui thai-chi-s^u" ke ph+uk-ng`in phiak-ko-hi, siok-thet k`i yu-phi'en ke ng'i-k^ung.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "M+ok chai th^ung-s'u!" Th`en-t'en, k`i chh^un-s'u mi^a ke-ng`in ke ng'i-k^ung, y^i-h'o k`i.

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui ke-t^eu l`oi chok k`i ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong, su"n-thien ke k'in-v'i-ch'ong, l^au ch'ong-l'o k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu tai-t'en t^o-'e l^au kun-'e chhut-l`oi chok ng`ai, khon ng`ai cho khi`ong-tho he-m`o?
Ng`ai tak-ngit th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha chhai su"n-thien-t'u, ng`i-t^eu pin m`o ha-s'u chok ng`ai; ch'ung-he, li'a-ha he ng`i-t^eu v`ang-h`ang ke s`u"-chiet, v^u-am ch'ong-khi`en l'e."
K`i-t^eu chok-t'en Y^a-s^u, tai k`i hi thai-chi-s^u" ke vuk-t'u; P'i-tet y'en-y'en th`en-t'en hi.
K`i-t^eu chhai th`in-yen-t'u h'i yit-t^oi f'o, thai-k^a v`i-t'en f'o chh^o-t'en, P'i-tet ya chh^o chhai k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en.
Y^u yit-ke s'u"-'ng khon-t'o P'i-tet chh^o chhai ke-vi phoi-f'o, chhiu chu-muk khon-t'en k`i, k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in ya he th`ung k`i khiung-ha ke."
P'i-tet f'eu-ngin k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`ai `m su"t k`i!"
