Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, yu y^u-ng`in chu-yi-t'o k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i me he k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-ke." P'i-tet k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai `m-he!"
Chh^a-`m-t^o yit-ti'am-ch^ung heu, nang-ngoi y^u yit-ke ng`in yung ki^en-thin ke khi'eu-hi k'ong: "Chhi+et-tui `m-voi chh^a, k`i me he th`ung ke-ng`in khiung-ha ke, y^in-vi k`i he K^a-li-li-ng`in!"
Ch'ung-he P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-ke ng`in ^a, ng`ai `m-t^i ng`i k'ong m'a-ke!" K`i ke fa h`an-m`ang k'ong-s+ot, ki^e-'e chhiu th`ai.
Ch'u ch'on-s^u"n, chu-muk khon P'i-tet; P'i-tet chang si'ong-h'i Ch'u tui k`i s'o-k'ong ke fa: "K^im-p^u-ngit ki^e-'e th`ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai."
P'i-tet chhiu ch'eu-chhut-hi, kieu-to f^i-s`ong s^ong-s^im.
Ch'ong Y^a-s^u ke ng`in met-sa k`i, t'a k`i;
^em-t'en k`i ke muk-ch^u, mun k`i k'ong: "Si^en-t^i ^a, chhu"-th`on-khon, he m'a-ng`in t'a ng`i?"
K`i-t^eu yu k'ong chhin-t^o fa l`oi v'u-y+uk k`i.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ch'ong-l'o, chi-s^u"-ch'ong, l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chhi`on-phu chhi-s+ip khiung-ha, y`en-heu tai Y^a-s^u to k`i-t^eu ke ngi-fi hi.
K`i-t^eu mun k`i k'ong: "L^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, ng`i he `m-he K^i-tuk?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu ya `m-voi si^ong-sin;
na-he ng`ai mun ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu me voi `m f`i-tap.
Ch'ung-he, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, Ng`in-ch'u" oi chh^o chhai chhi`on-n`en Song-ti ke yu-phi'en."
Thai-k^a k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e l^o?" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai he, li'a he ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu k'am h`an oi-s'u" kh`i-th^a ke chu"n-k'i n`e? Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in th^ang-t'o k`i chh^in-khi'eu k'ong ke fa l'e!"
Ngi-fi chhi`on-th'i hong-h'i-l`oi, chi^ong Y^a-s^u ki'e-sung to P'i-l^a-t^o ke mien-chhi`en hi,
ko k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu fat-hien li'a-ke ng`in san-thung ng`ai-t^eu ke th`ung-p^au, ham ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o n+ap-soi p^un F`ong-ti, yu chhu"-chh^u"n he K^i-tuk, he v`ong."
P'i-l^a-t^o mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong m`o?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i k'ong ke."
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu tui chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au chung-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut li'a-ke ng`in y^u m'a-ke chhui."
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu y+et fat ki^en-chh`u" k'ong: "K`i chia chh`on-kau ke mi`ang, chhai Y`u-thai chhi`on-thi san-thung m`in-chung, tui K^a-li-li kh^oi-s'u", li'a-ha l`oi-to li'a-vi."
P'i-l^a-t^o yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu mun-k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in he K^a-li-li-ng`in m^a?"
K`i yit t^i Y^a-s^u he tui H^i-l+it k'on-hot ke thi-kh^i l`oi ke, chhiu chi^ong k`i sung-to H^i-l+it ke-vi hi. (Ke-s`u", H^i-l+it ya chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.)
H^i-l+it khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i; y^in-vi k`i th^ang-ko ko^an-he Y^a-s^u ke su"-chh`in, ch'o chhiu si'ong-oi kien k`i, h^i-mong khon Y^a-s^u h`ang s`u"n-chiak.
S'o-y^i, k`i mun Y^a-s^u h'o-t^o mun-th`i, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u yit-ki fa ya `m en k`i.
Ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chin-chhi`en l`oi, chhin-l+it ko k`i.
H^i-l+it l^au k`i ke p^in-'e chhiu met-sa k`i, pin v'u-y+uk k`i. Y`en-heu, k`i-t^eu n^a yit-li^ang chhin chi^ang ke chh`ong-ph`au chok chhai k`i s^u"n-song, sung k`i to-ch'on P'i-l^a-t^o ke-vi hi.
Chhai ke-ngit, H^i-l+it l^au P'i-l^a-t^o s`ang-cho ph`en-y^u; k`i li'ong-s`a p'un-l`oi he y^en-k^a.
P'i-l^a-t^o seu-s+ip chi-s^u"-ch'ong, m`in-ki^en ke li^ang-chhiu, l^au chung-ng`in l`oi,

tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong li'a-ke ng`in ki'e-sung to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi, ko k`i san-thung m`in-chung; ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ke mien-chhi`en s'u"m-mun k`i, ch'ung-he chh`a-`m-chhut k`i y^u fam ng`i-t^eu s'o ko k`i ke ngim-h`o chhui-mi`ang.
Li`en H^i-l+it ya chh`a-`m-chhut k`i y^u m'a-ke chhui, s'o-y^i chi^ong k`i sung-to-ch'on li'a-vi l`oi. 'An-ngi`ong khon-l`oi, k`i pin m`o cho m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ke su"-chh`in.
Ng`ai oi ham ng`in pi^en-t'a k`i, y`en-heu piong k`i ch'eu."
M`o si'ong-t'o, chung-ng`in sa chh`e-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chh`u-thet k`i! Piong P^a-l^a-p^a p^un ng`ai-t^eu!"
( P^a-l^a-p^a su"t chhai s`ang-t'u chok-lon, ya chh`u"-ko ng`in, s'o-y^i p^un-ng`in ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.)
P'i-l^a-t^o si'ong-oi piong Y^a-s^u, chhiu chai yit-p'ai khien chung-ng`in.
Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu h`an-kha thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka! Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!"
P'i-l^a-t^o thi-s^am-p'ai yu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K`i to-t'ai cho m'a-ke f'ai-su"? Ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut k`i y^u m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ke chhui. Ng`ai oi ham ng`in pi^en-t'a k`i, y`en-heu piong k`i ch'eu."
Chung-ng`in ki-si+uk thai-s^ang h^em, ki^en-chh`u" oi chi^ong Y^a-s^u t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka; chui-m^i, k`i-t^eu ke thai-s^ang chhiu tet-t'o su"n-li.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, P'i-l^a-t^o cheu k`i-t^eu ke y^eu-khi`u si^en-phan,
chi^ong k`i-t^eu s'o-khi`u ke, ke chok-lon chh`u"-ng`in, ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk ke hi^ung-s'u, piong chhut-l`oi, chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu, y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu chh'u-l^i.

P^in-'e chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-ch'eu, chhai lu-song t`u-t'o yit-ke tui hi^ong-ha ng+ip-s`ang ke K'u-li-nai-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S^i-m`un ke; k`i-t^eu chok-t'o k`i, mi^en-ki'ong k`i khi`a s+u"p-su"-ka, th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u h`ang.
Y^u yit thai-khi`un ke ng`in th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u, kh`i-ch^ung y^u-t^eu fu-'ng vi k`i s^ong-s^im thai-kieu.
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: " Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke fu-'ng ^a, `m-s'u" vi ng`ai kieu, oi vi ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a l^au ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng kieu!
Y^in-vi ngit-`e voi to, ng`in voi k'ong: 'M`o kiung, m`o f`ai-th^oi, m`o p^un ^o-nga-'e s+u"t-nen ke, ch^u"n-y^u fuk-hi ^o!'
Ke-s`u", ng`in voi tui thai-s^an k'ong: 'Chak chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^u"n-song ^a!' yu tui se-s^an k'ong: 'Chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu khi`em-t'en!'
Su-'e chhi^ang-chhi^ang ke s`u"-chiet, k`i-t^eu h`an 'an-ngi`ong ch^au-th+ap k`i, su-'e kh^u-ch^au ke s`u", k`i-t^eu ke kiet-khi+uk voi ngi'ong-p^an n`e?"
K`i-t^eu ya tai li'ong-ke si`u-fam l`oi, oi th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha chh'u s'i-h`in.

K`i-t^eu to yit-ke thi-f^ong, ^on-to "Th`eu-n`a-hok ke S^an-th`eu", chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, th`ung-s`u" ya t^ang ke li'ong-ke si`u-fam, yit-ke chhai k`i ke yu-phi'en, yit-ke chhai k`i ke ch'o-phi'en.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, sa-mi^en k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-t^i chhu"-k^a cho m'a-ke." K`i-t^eu chh^u-chhi^am-'e l`oi p^un Y^a-s^u ke s^am.

Chung-ng`in kh^i chhai ke-vi khon. Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu ya chh'u"-seu k`i, k'ong: "K`i kiu-li'au ph+et-ng`in! K`i na chu"n-k^in he Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke K^i-tuk, kiu k`i chhu"-k^a m`a!"
Ke-t^eu p^in-'e ya met-sa k`i. K`i-t^eu chin-chhi`en n^a s^on ph`u-th`o-chi'u p^un k`i l^im,
k'ong: "Ng`i na-he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong, kiu ng`i chhu"-k^a m`a!"
Chhai k`i th`eu-n`a ke t'ang-k^o y^u ph`ai-`e si'a-k'ong: "Li'a he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong."
Li'ong-ke th`ung k`i khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke si`u-fam, y^u yit-ke ya kh^oi-choi v'u-y+uk k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i `m-he K^i-tuk m^a? Kiu ng`i chhu"-k^a, ya kiu ng`ai-t^eu m`a!"
Nang-ngoi yit-ke chhiu chit-phi ke si`u-fam, k'ong: "Ng`i ki-y`en he khiung-ha su h`in-f+at ke, k'am `m ki^ang Song-ti m^a?
Ng`ai-t^eu su h`in-f+at he yin-k^oi ke, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu s'o-su ke he ng`ai-t^eu ke po-yin; ch'ung-he li'a-ke ng`in `m-su"t h`ang yit-khien f'ai-su"."
Y`en-heu k`i chhiu tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^a-s^u ^a, ng`i cho v`ong kong-l`im ke s`u", khi`u ng`i `m-h'o `m ki-tet ng`ai!"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, k^im-p^u-ngit ng`i voi th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chhai l+ok-y`en!"
Thai-yok he t^ong-chu ke s`u", thi^en-v^u thi-am, chh+u"t-to h^a-chu-th`eu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung. Koa chhai su"n-thien-t'u ke pu-li`am li+et-cho li'ong-sak.
Y^a-s^u thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, ng`ai ke l`in-f`un k^au chhai Ng`i ke s'u-ch^ung!" K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, k`i chhiu th^on-hi s'i-thet.
Ke ki^un-k^on khon-t'o li'a-su" ke k^in-ko, chhiu siung-chan Song-ti k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in s+u"t-chhai he ngi-ng`in!"
V`i-t'en khon ke chung-ng`in khon-t'o li'a yit-chhiet, chhi`on-phu chh`ui-t'en s^im-k^on ch'on-hi.
S'o-y^u th`ung Y^a-s^u s+uk-su" ke ng`in, l^au tui K^a-li-li th`en-t'en k`i l`oi ke fu-ng`in-k^a, chhi`on-phu y'en-y'en kh^i-t'en khon li'a-t^eu su" ke k^in-ko.
Y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Yok-sit ke ng`in, he ngi-fi ke ngi-y`en, cho-ng`in li`ong-san yu chu"n-chh+u"t;
ngi-fi ke kie-m`eu l^au s'o-cho ke, k`i pin m`o chan-s`u"n. K`i p'un-l`oi he Y`u-thai thi-f^ong ^A-li-m^a-thai-s`ang ke ng`in, yit-chh+u"t phan-mong Song-ti koet ke s+u"t-hien.
K`i hi kien P'i-l^a-t^o, y^eu-khi`u s^u-liam Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i,
y`en-heu hi chi^ong v`i-th'i chh'i-h^a-l`oi, yung m`a-s^a p^au-h'o, piong chhai s+ak-piak chh+ok-s`ang ke f`un-mu t^i-poi; li'a f`un-mu m`ang-su"t chong-ko ng`in.
Ke-ngit he Yi-phi-ngit, ^On-sit-ngit chhiu voi kh^oi-s'u" l'e.
Ke-t^eu tui K^a-li-li th`en Y^a-s^u l`oi ke fu-ng`in-k^a th`ung Yok-sit khiung-ha hi, y^u khon-t'o ke f`un-mu, ya chh^in-chh'u Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i he ngi'ong-p^an ^on-chong ke.
K`i-t^eu chhiu ch'on-hi, vi k`i ke v`i-th'i ch'un-phi hi^ong-liau l^au hi^ong-y`u. Cheu fap-l+it ke k^ui-thin, k`i-t^eu chhai ^On-sit-ngit ke-ngit chhiu hi^u-sit.
L^i-pai-ngit t'a-ch'o, ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a tai-t'en s'o ch'un-phi ke hi^ong-liau hi mu-thi.
K`i-t^eu fat-hien s+ak-th`eu y'i-k^in tui mu-m`un s'ai-kh^oi,
chhiu h`ang-ng+ip-hi, ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke v`i-th'i.
K`i-t^eu pot-tok-ngok ke s`u", fut-y`en y^u li'ong-ke s^am fat-k^ong ke ng`in kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu s`un-th`eu;
k`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, chhiu ph+uk chhai thi-song. Ke li'ong-ke ng`in tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke chhai s'i-ng`in ch^ung chh`im s^ang-ng`in n`o?
K`i m`o chhai li'a-vi, y'i-k^in f+uk-f+at l'e! Oi ki-tet k`i h`an chhai K^a-li-li ke s`u"-chiet su"t tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong:
'Ng`in-ch'u" yit-thin voi p^un-ng`in k^au chhai chhui-ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung, t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, thi-s^am-ngit oi f+uk-f+at.' "
K`i-t^eu li'a-s`u" chang si'ong-h'i Y^a-s^u ke fa,
chhiu tui f`un-mu ch'on-hi, chi^ong s'o t`u-t'o ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in po p^un s+u"p-yit-ke s'u"-th`u l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in t^i.
Tui s'u"-th`u po-ko li'a yit-chhiet ke fu-ng`in-k^a he: Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a, Yok-^a-n^a, Ng^a-kok ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, l^au ph+et ke fu-ng`in-k^a.
Ke-t^eu s'u"-th`u l'au-t'o li'a-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a lon-k'ong, chhiu `m sin k`i-t^eu s'o k'ong ke fa.
Ch'ung-he P'i-tet hong-h'i-l`oi, ch'eu-to mu-thi hi, tham-s^u"n khon f`un-mu t^i-poi, khon-t'o ch'u"-y^u chh^un m`a-s^a. K`i chhiu to-ch'on-hi, f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i s'o fat-s^en ke su".
Khiung-ngit, h+ok-s^ang ch^ung y^u li'ong-ke ng`in oi hi yit-ke chh^un-ch^ong. Li'a chh^un-ch^ong mi`ang ^on-to Y^i-m^a-'ng-s^u", l`i Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang yok s+u"p-yit k^ung-l^i.
K`i li'ong-s`a theu-lu th'o-lun s'o fat-s^en ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in.
K'in k'ong k'in lun ke s`u", Y^a-s^u chh^in-s^u"n h`ang-khi^un k`i-t^eu, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h`ang;
k`i-t^eu mien-tui k`i, ch'ung-he muk-ch^u m`ung-m`ung `m-su"t k`i.
Y^a-s^u mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu k'in h`ang k'in k'ong ke he m'a-ke su"-chh`in?" K`i-t^eu chhiu th`in h^a-l`oi, mien tai y`u-s`eu.
Kh`i-ch^ung yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Kiet-li`u-p^a ke, mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a k'i-ngit chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang fat-s^en ke su"-chh`in, k'am k'ong ch'u"-y^u ng`i yit-ke cho ng`in-hak ke `m-t^i he-m`o?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "M'a-ke su"-chh`in?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u ke su" ^a! K`i he yit-ke si^en-t^i, chhai Song-ti l^au chung-ng`in ke mien-chhi`en, m`o-lun k'ong-fa ya-he cho-su" l^ung-ch'ung chhin-y^u n`en-l+it;
ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu sa ki'e-sung k`i hi phan s'i-h`in, t^ang k`i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang.
Ng`ai-t^eu ngi`en-l`oi h^i-mong k`i chhiu-he ke oi l`oi ch'u"n-kiu Y^i-set-li+et ke! `M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, li'a su"-chh`in ke fat-s^en y'i-k^in k^in-ko s^am-ngit.
H`an-y^u, ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u k'i-ke fu-ng`in-k^a, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang. K`i-t^eu t'a-ch'o hi f`un-mu ke-vi,
ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o k`i ke v`i-th'i. K`i-t^eu to-ch'on-l`oi po-ko k'ong, k`i-t^eu khon-t'o thi^en-s'u" chhut-hien, thi^en-s'u" l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong, Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in f+uk-f+at l'e.
Ng`ai-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in hi f`un-mu khon, s'o khon-t'o ke th`ung ke-t^eu fu-ng`in-k^a s'o k'ong ke khiung-yong, ch'u"-he m`o khon-t'o k`i."
Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an 'an thun! Si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa, ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an 'an n`an si^ong-sin n`e?
K^i-tuk `m-he thin-chh+ok oi k^in-l+it li'a yit-chhiet kh'u-nan, y`en-heu chang chin-ng+ip k`i ke y`ung-yeu m^a?"
Chiap-h^a-hi, k`i cheu M^o-s^i l^au chung si^en-t^i s'o si'a ke kh^oi-s'u", tui k`i-t^eu ki'e-su"t Su"n-k^in s'o ki ko^an-he k`i chhu"-k^a ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in.
K`i-t^eu h`ang-khi^un s'o-oi hi ke chh^un-ch^ong, Y^a-s^u chhiong h`an-oi ki-si+uk hiong-chhi`en h`ang,
k`i-t^eu chhiu khi`ong-khi`ong li`u k`i, k'ong: "Ngit-th`eu y'i-k^in l+ok-s^an, thi^en voi am l'e, th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha h+et n^a!" Y^a-s^u chhiu ng+ip-hi, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et.
K`i-t^eu chh^o-h^a-l`oi s+u"t-ya ke s`u", Y^a-s^u n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u fut-y`en k^im-h'i-l`oi, chang ngin-t'o k`i; ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u yit-ha chhiu `m kien thet-hi.
K`i-t^eu p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "K`i chhai lu-song l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong-fa, vi ng`ai-t^eu ki'e-su"t Su"n-k^in ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im `m-he chhiong f'o 'an-ngi`ong chh+ok-h'i-l`oi m^a?"
K`i-t^eu ngi`am-s`u" chhiu chhut-fat, ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi. Chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu khon-t'o s+u"p-yit-ke s'u"-th`u l^au nang-ngoi yit-t^eu ng`in chhi-s+ip khiung-ha,
t'u-h'o chhai ke-vi k'ong: "Ch'u ton-ch^u"n f+uk-f+at l'e; k`i y'i-k^in hi'en-hien p^un S^i-m`un khon l'e!"
Ke li'ong-s`a ya chi^ong lu-song s'o t`u-t'o ke, pin k`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an chhai Ch'u pak-kh^oi pi'ang-`e ke s`u" ngin-t'o k`i ke k^in-ko, l^au thai-k^a k'ong.
K`i-t^eu k'ong-t'en li'a-t^eu su", Y^a-s^u chh^in-s^u"n kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on!"
K`i-t^eu ki^ang-to p+it-p+it-chhat, l'au-t'o he khon-t'o f`un-phak.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke 'an s`eu n`e? Ngi'ong-p^an s^im-k^on ng`i-f`u n`e?
Khon ng`ai ke s'u, ng`ai ke kiok! Khok-s+u"t he ng`ai! Mi^a ng`ai khon-'e, ng`i-t^eu chhiu t^i; f`un-phak m`o ngiuk ya m`o kut, ng`i-t^eu khon, ng`ai li'ong-yong t^u y^u."
K'ong-li'au, k`i chhiu chi^ong s'u l^au kiok p^un k`i-t^eu khon.
K`i-t^eu thet f^on-h'i yu si'ong-`m-th^ung, h`an-he `m-k'am si^ong-sin. K`i mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi y^u m'a-ke h'o s+u"t ke m`o?"
K`i-t^eu n^a yit-te phoi-h'o ke `ng p^un k`i.
K`i chhiu chiap-ko-l`oi, chhai k`i-t^eu ke mien-chhi`en s+u"t.

Y`en-heu, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a yit-chhiet chhiu-he th`eu-p'ai ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke: M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, si^en-t^i ke s^u, l^au S^u"-phi^en s'o si'a ke, ko^an-he ng`ai ke tak-khien su"-chh`in yit-thin oi s+u"t-hien."
Y^a-s^u chhiu kh^oi k`i-t^eu ke s^im-khieu, p^un k`i-t^eu li'au-ki'e Su"n-k^in ke fa,
yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Cheu Su"n-k^in s'o si'a ke, K^i-tuk thin-chh+ok voi su-hoi, thi-s^am-ngit tui s'i f+uk-f+at,
ng`in ya oi fung k`i ke mi`ang chh`on f'i-k'oi l^au sa-chhui ke tho-l^i, tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang kh^oi-s'u", chh+u"t-to van-koet.
Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he li'a-t^eu su" ke kien-chu"n-ng`in.
Ng`ai oi chi^ong ng^a P^a s'o yin-h'i ke, chh^in-chhu" su-p^un ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu oi chhai s`ang-nui t'en-heu, chh+u"t-to ke tui t'ang-k^o l`oi ke n`en-l+it l`im-to ng`i-t^eu."
Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tai k`i-t^eu chhut-s`ang, hi-to Pak-thai-n`i. Chhai ke-vi, k`i khi`a-s'u vi k`i-t^eu chuk-fuk.
Chuk-fuk ke s`u"-chiet, k`i chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, su-chiap s^ong thi^en-t'ang hi.
K`i-t^eu chhiu kin-pai k`i, m^an-s^im f^on-h'i ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi,
s`ong-s`ong chhai su"n-thien-t'u siung-chan Song-ti.
Thai-chh^u y^u Tho, Tho l^au Song-ti th`ung-chhai, Tho chhiu-he Song-ti.
K`i chhai thai-chh^u l^au Song-ti th`ung-chhai.
Song-ti th^ung-ko k`i chh'ong-chho van-y^u; s'o-y^u su chh'ong-chho ke, m`o yit-yong `m-he th^ung-ko k`i chho ke.
Tho chhiu-he s^ang-miang ke ngi`en-th`eu, li'a s^ang-miang chi^ong k^ong su-p^un ng`in-lui.
K^ong cheu chhai v^u-am ch^ung, v^u-am chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t y`ang-ko k^ong.
Y^u yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to Yok-hon, he Song-ti s'o chh^ai-phai ke s'u"-ch'a.
K`i l`oi vi ke k^ong cho-chu"n, oi p^un thai-k^a th^ang-t'o k`i ke tho-l^i l`oi sin.
K`i p'un-s^u"n `m-he ke k^ong, he oi vi k^ong cho-chu"n.
Ke k^ong he ch^u"n k^ong, l`oi-to su"-ki^en k^ong-cheu chhi`on ng`in-lui.
Tho chhai su"-ki^en, Song-ti he th^ung-ko k`i chh'ong-chho su"-kie, ch'ung-he su"-ki^en-ng`in `m-su"t k`i.
K`i l`oi-to chhu"-k^a ke thi-f^ong, chhu"-k^a ke ng`in sa `m chiap-su k`i.
Ch'ung-he f`am chiap-su k`i ke, chhiu-he sin k`i ke ng`in, k`i chhiu su k`i-t^eu cho Song-ti ch'u"-'ng ke khi`en-li.
Li'a-t^eu ng`in cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng `m-he y^in-vi hiet-th'ung ko^an-he, chhiong tui ng`in ke sin-y+uk ya-he tui n`am-ng`in ke yi-su" l`oi kiung ke, he tui Song-ti kiung ke.

Tho s`ang-cho ngiuk-s^u"n, h+et chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke t^ong-ch^ung, chh^ung-m^an ^en-ti'en l^au ch^u"n-l^i. Ng`ai-t^eu y^u khon-t'o k`i ke y`ung-k^ong, li'a he ^A-p^a Th+uk-yit ke Lai-'e chang y^u ke y`ung-k^ong.
Yok-hon vi k`i cho-chu"n, h^em-k'ong: "Ko^an-he k`i, ng`ai su"t k'ong: 'K`i p'i ng`ai kha-man l`oi, ch'ung-he p'i ng`ai kha v'i-thai; y^in-vi ng`ai m`ang chhut-se, k`i y'i-k^in chh`un-chhai.' "
Tui k`i ke f^ung-su"n, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu y^u li^ang-su-t'o ^en-ti'en, pin ^en-song k^a-^en.
Song-ti th^ung-ko M^o-s^i p^an-pu fap-l+it, ch'ung-he ^en-ti'en l^au ch^u"n-l^i he th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l`oi ke.
Chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t y^u-ng`in khon-t'o Song-ti, ch'u"-y^u Th+uk-yit ke Lai-'e Song-ti chhiu-he chhai ^A-p^a f`ai-ch^ung ke, chi^ong K`i kh'i-su" chhut-l`oi.
Y^i-ha he Yok-hon ke kien-chu"n. T^ong-s`u", Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang phai t^eu chi-s^u" l^au Li-vi-ng`in hi kien Yok-hon, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i he m'a-ng`in?"
Yok-hon m`o kh^i-chhi+et f`i-tap, f'an-ch'on th'an-ph+ak l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai pin `m-he K^i-tuk."
K`i-t^eu chhiu mun: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i he m'a-ng`in? He Y^i-li-^a m^a?" Yok-hon en-k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he." K`i-t^eu yu mun: "He ke si^en-t^i m^a?" K`i yu en-k'ong: "`M-he."
K`i-t^eu chiap-t'en k'ong: "Chhi'ang ng`i l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, ng`i to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu h'o f`i-f+uk phai ng`ai-t^eu l`oi ke ng`in. Ng`i chhu"-k^a k'ong, ng`i he m'a-ng`in?"
Yok-hon yung si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke fa f`i-tap, k'ong: "Chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u ng`in h^em-k'ong: 'Vi Ch'u si^u-chh+u"t K`i s'o-oi h`ang ke tho-lu!' Ng`ai chhiu-he li'a-ke ng`in."
Fap-li-soi-ng`in s'o phai-l`oi ke ke-t^eu ng`in
chu"t-mun Yok-hon k'ong: "Ng`i ki-y`en `m-he K^i-tuk, `m-he Y^i-li-^a, ya `m-he ke si^en-t^i, 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i cho-m'a-ke h`ang s'e-l^i n`o?"
Yok-hon en-k'ong: "Ng`ai he yung s'ui h`ang s'e-l^i; ch'ung-he y^u yit-ke kh^i chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu `m-su"t ke,
k`i p'i ng`ai kha-man l`oi, ng`ai chhiu-he l^au k`i thot-h`ai ya m`o ch^u"-kiet."
Li'a-t^eu su" fat-s^en chhai Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en ke Pak-thai-n`i, chhiu-he Yok-hon h`ang s'e-l^i ke s'o-chhai.
Thi-ngi-ngit, Yok-hon khon-t'o Y^a-s^u tui k`i h`ang-t'en ko-l`oi, chhiu k'ong: "Khon ^a, Song-ti ke K^au-y`ong, chh`u-thet su"-ki^en-ng`in ke chhui ke!
Li'a-ke ng`in chhiu-he ng`ai su"t k'ong ke: 'K`i p'i ng`ai kha-man l`oi, ch'ung-he p'i ng`ai kha v'i-thai; y^in-vi ng`ai h`an-m`ang chhut-se, k`i y'i-k^in chh`un-chhai.'
Ng`ai pin `m-su"t k`i; ch'ung-he ng`ai l`oi, yung s'ui h`ang s'e-l^i, vi-t'o oi p^un Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ngin-su"t k`i."
Yok-hon yu cho-chu"n k'ong: "Ng`ai khon-t'o Su"n-L`in chhiong ngi+et-kap-`e tui thi^en-t'ang kong-l`im, l+ok chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song.

Ng`ai h`an-he `m-su"t k`i, ch'ung-he chh^ai ng`ai yung s'ui h`ang s'e-l^i ke Song-ti l^au ng`ai k'ong: 'Ng`i khon-t'o Su"n-L`in kong-l`im, l+ok chhai m'a-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, li'a-s`a chhiu-he yung Su"n-L`in h`ang s'e-l^i ke.'
Ng`ai y'i-k^in khon-t'o l'e, s'o-y^i tui ng`i-t^eu cho-chu"n, k`i chhiu-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e."
Yu ko yit-ngit, Yok-hon l^au ki^a li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang yu kh^i chhai ke-vi;
k`i khon-t'o Y^a-s^u k^in-ko, chhiu k'ong: "Khon ^a, Song-ti ke K^au-y`ong!"
Ke li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu hi th`en Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u ch'on-s^u"n, khon-t'o k`i-t^eu th`en-t'en k`i, chhiu mun-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chh`im m'a-ke?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "L^a-p'i, ng`i h+et chhai nai-vi?" ("L^a-p'i" ke yi-su" chhiu-he "S^in-s^ang".)
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu l`oi khon!" K`i-t^eu th`en k`i hi, khon-t'o k`i h+et ke s'o-chhai, ke-ngit chhiu th`ung k`i khiung-ha h+et. (Ke-s`u" thai-yok he h^a-chu si-ti'am-ch^ung.)
Th^ang-t'o Yok-hon ke fa chhiu th`en Y^a-s^u ke li'ong-s`a ch^ung, y^u yit-ke he S^i-m`un-P'i-tet ke l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et.
K`i si^en chh`im-t'o k`i ke ^a-k^o S^i-m`un, l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in chh`im-t'o M`i-soi-^a l'e." ("M`i-soi-^a" ke yi-su" chhiu-he "K^i-tuk".)

Y`en-heu k`i chhiu tai S^i-m`un hi kien Y^a-s^u. Y^a-s^u chu-muk khon k`i, k'ong: "Ng`i he Yok-hon ke lai-'e S^i-m`un, ch'ung-he ng`i voi p^un-ng`in ham-cho K^i-fap." ( K^i-fap l^au P'i-tet yi-su" khiung-yong, chhiu-he "Ph`an-s+ak".)
Yu ko yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u kiet-thin hi K^a-li-li-s'en. K`i chh`im-t'o F^i-l+it, tui k`i k'ong: "L`oi th`en ng`ai!"
( F^i-l+it he Pak-soi-thai-ng`in, l^au ^On-tet-li+et pin P'i-tet th`ung-hi^ong.)

F^i-l+it chh`im-t'o N^a-tan-ngi+ap, l^au k`i k'ong: " M^o-s^i chhai Fap-l+it-s^u ch^ung s'o si'a l^au chung si^en-t^i s'o ki-chai ke ke-s`a, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in chh`im-t'o l'e. K`i chhiu-he Yok-sit ke lai-'e, N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u."
N^a-tan-ngi+ap chhiu tui k`i k'ong: " N^a-sat-l+et k'am voi chhut m'a-ke h'o ke m^a?" F^i-l+it k'ong: "Ng`i l`oi khon!"
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o N^a-tan-ngi+ap tui k`i h`ang-t'en ko-l`oi, chhiu k'ong: "Khon ^a, k`i he yit-ke ch^u"n-s+u"t ke Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in; k`i ke s^im-ch^ung m`o k'ui-cha!"
N^a-tan-ngi+ap mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ngi'ong-voi su"t ng`ai?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i chhai v`u-f^a-k'o su-h^a, F^i-l+it m`ang ham ng`i, ng`ai y'i-k^in khon-t'o ng`i."
N^a-tan-ngi+ap k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e; ng`i he Y^i-set-li+et ke ki^un-v`ong!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^in-vi ng`ai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`ai khon-t'o ng`i chhai v`u-f^a-k'o su-h^a, ng`i chhiu sin he-m`o? Ng`i voi khon-t'o p'i li'a h`an-kha thai ke su"-chh`in!"
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o thi^en kh^oi, Song-ti ke thi^en-s'u" chhai Ng`in-ch'u" s^u"n-hong s^ong-hi h^a-l`oi."
Li'ong-ngit heu, chhai K^a-li-li ke K^a-n^a-s`ang, y^u-ng`in kiet-f^un. Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e chhai ke-vi;
Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang ya p^un k`i-t^eu chhi'ang-hi chh^am-k^a f^un-y^in ke y`en-s+it.
Chi'u l^im chhiang-chhiang, Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e l^au k`i k'ong: "K`i-t^eu m`o chi'u l^o."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "^A-m^e, li'a l^au ng`ai li'ong-s`a y^u m'a-ke ko^an-he, ng`ai ke s`u"-chiet h`an-m`ang to."
Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e chhiu f^un-fu ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: "K`i ham ng`i-t^eu cho m'a-ke, chhiu cheu k`i ke fa hi cho."
Chhai ke-vi y^u liuk-chak s+ak ^am-k^ong, he Y`u-thai-ng`in h`ang kiet-chhiang-l^i ke s`u" yung ke, m^i-chak kh'o-y^i ch^ong thai-yok yit-pak k^ung-s^u"n ke s'ui.
Y^a-s^u l^au ph+uk-ng`in k'ong: "Chi^ong li'a-t^eu ^am-k^ong ch^ong-m^an s'ui." K`i-t^eu chhiu t'o s'ui ng+ip-hi, chh+u"t-to n^em-h'i-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Li'a-ha, y'eu t^eu chhut-l`oi, sung p^un k'on y`en-s+it ke." K`i-t^eu chhiu sung ko-hi.
K'on y`en-s+it ke chhu"-l^im ke y'i-k^in pien-cho chi'u ke s'ui, `m-t^i li'a chi'u he tui nai-vi l`oi ke (ch'u"-y^u y'eu-s'ui ke ph+uk-ng`in t^i), chhiu ham s^in-l`ong l`oi,
l^au k`i k'ong: "Ph+et-ng`in chhi`on-phu he si^en s^ong h'o chi'u, t'en ng`in-hak l^im-to chh^a-`m-t^o chang s^ong ph^u-th^ung ke chi'u; ng`i f'an-ch'on chi^ong chui-h'o ke chi'u li`u-to li'a-ha!"
Li'a he Y^a-s^u s'o-h`ang ke thi-yit-ke s`u"n-chiak, he chhai K^a-li-li ke K^a-n^a-s`ang h`ang ke. Li'a-ke su" hi'en-chhut k`i ke y`ung-k^ong; ki^a h+ok-s^ang chhiu sin k`i.
Li'a su" y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a-m^e, l'o-th^ai, pin h+ok-s^ang h^a-hi K^a-pak-n`ung, chhai ke-vi h+et k'i-ngit.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Ph`an-ko-chiet voi to l'e, Y^a-s^u s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi.
Chhai su"n-thien t^i-poi, k`i khon-t'o y^u ng`in chhai ke-vi mai ngi`u, y`ong, ngi+et-kap-`e, ya y^u tui-von ngi`un-chhi`en ke ng`in chh^o chhai ke-vi.
K`i chhiu n^a sok-`e cho pi^en-'e, chi^ong ngi`u y`ong kiuk-to su"n-thien ngoi-poi hi, yu to von-chhi`en ke ng`in ke-vi, t'o-chhut k`i-t^eu ke ngi`un-chhi`en, s'ung-vang k`i-t^eu ke chok-`e.
Y`en-heu k`i tui mai ngi+et-kap-`e ke ng`in k'ong: "Chi^ong li'a-t^eu t^ung-s^i p^an-ch'eu, m+ok chi^ong ng^a P^a ke su"n-thien pien-cho su"-chh`ong!"
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang si'ong-h'i Su"n-k^in y^u fa k'ong: "Song-ti ^a, ng`ai vi Ng`i ke su"n-thien thai-fat ngi+et-s^im, chhiu-chhiong f'o-s^eu!"
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu chhiu chu"t-mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i n`en hi'en m'a-ke s`u"n-chiak p^un ng`ai-t^eu khon, l`oi chu"n-m`in ng`i y^u khi`en h'o cho li'a-t^eu su" n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhak-thet li'a su"n-thien, s^am-ngit-nui, ng`ai voi chi^ong k`i chh`ung-kien h'i-l`oi."
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a su"n-thien y'i-k^in h'i l'e si-s+u"p-liuk ngi`en, ng`i s^am-ngit-nui chhiu voi chh`ung-kien h'i-l`oi he-m`o?"
Kh`i-s+u"t, Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke su"n-thien he ch'u" k`i chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i.
S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u tui s'i f+uk-f+at y^i-heu, ki^a h+ok-s^ang si'ong-h'i k`i s'o k'ong-ko ke li'a-ki fa, chhiu sin Su"n-k^in l^au Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke.
Y^a-s^u chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ko Ph`an-ko-chiet ke s`u", chhin-t^o ng`in khon-t'o k`i s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, chhiu sin k`i.
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu `m fong-s^im, y^in-vi k`i tui s'o-y^u ke ng`in y^u chhin chh^u"m ke ngin-su"t.
K`i m`o s^i-yeu m'a-ng`in l^au k`i k'ong ko^an-he ng`in ke su", y^in-vi k`i chh^u"m-chh^u"m li'au-ki'e ng`in ke nui-s^im.
Y^u yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to N`i-k^o-tet-mu, he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu.

K`i chhai am-p^u-s`u" l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu t^i ng`i he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke kau-s^u". Ng`i s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, na-`m-he y^u Song-ti th`ung-chhai, m`o ng`in n`en h`ang."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`in na-he m`o chh`ung-s^en, chhiu khon-`m-t'o Song-ti ke koet s+u"t-hien."
N`i-k^o-tet-mu mun-k'ong: "Ng`in ch'u"-y^u k'in l`oi k'in l'o, ngi'ong-voi chh`ung-s^en n`e? K`i n`en to-ch'on m^u-th^oi chai kiung-chhut-l`oi he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`in na-`m-he tui s'ui l^au Su"n-L`in l`oi chh`ung-s^en, chhiu m`o kh'o-n`en s`ang-cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in.
Ng`in ke ngiuk-s^u"n he tui y`a-^oi kiung ke, k`i ke l`in-sin he tui Su"n-L`in kiung ke.
`M-h'o y^in-vi ng`ai k'ong 'Ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi chh`ung-s^en' k'am-kok kh`i-koai.
F^ung cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" chh^oi, ng`i th^ang-t'o k`i ke s^ang, ch'ung-he `m t^i k`i tui nai-vi l`oi, oi hi nai-vi. M^i-yit-ke tui Su"n-L`in kiung ke, ya he 'an-ngi`ong."
N`i-k^o-tet-mu mun k`i k'ong: "Ngi'ong-voi y^u 'an-ngi`ong ke su" n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i he Y^i-set-li+et ke kau-s^u", li`en li'a-t^eu su" ya `m-voi m`in-ph+ak m^a?

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu k'ong-lun ng`ai-t^eu s'o t^i ke, ng`ai-t^eu kien-chu"n ng`ai-t^eu s'o khon-t'o ke; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu phi^en-phi^en `m-h'en li^ang-su ng`ai-t^eu ke kien-chu"n.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong li'a su"-ki^en ke su", ng`i-t^eu t^u `m sin; ng`ai na-he l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong thi^en-t'ang ke su", ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi sin n`o?
Chh`u-li'au tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke Ng`in-ch'u", chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t y^u ng`in s^ong-ko thi^en.
Chhiu-chhiong M^o-s^i chhai kh'ong-y^a khi`a-h'i th`ung-s`a, Ng`in-ch'u" ya yit-thin oi p^un-ng`in khi`a-h'i-l`oi,
p^un s'o-y^u sin k`i ke ng`in tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.

"Y^in-vi Song-ti thung-siak su"-ki^en-ng`in, s'o-y^i chi^ong K`i Th+uk-yit ke Lai-'e su-p^un k`i-t^eu, oi p^un yit-chhiet sin k`i ke ng`in `m-voi m+et-m`ong, f'an-ch'on tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.
"Y^in-vi Song-ti chh^ai K`i ke Lai-'e to su"-ki^en l`oi, `m-he oi thin su"-ki^en-ng`in ke chhui, he oi th^ung-ko k`i l`oi ch'u"n-kiu su"-ki^en-ng`in.
Sin Lai-'e ke ng`in `m-voi su thin-chhui; `m sin ke ng`in y'i-k^in su thin-chhui, y^in-vi k`i `m sin Song-ti Th+uk-yit ke Lai-'e.
K^ong l`oi-to su"-kie, su"-ki^en-ng`in y^in-vi chhu"-k^a ke f'ai h`ang-v`i, `m oi k^ong, f'an-ch'on oi v^u-am; k`i-t^eu su thin-chhui ke ngi`en-y^in chhiu chhai li'a-vi.
Cho f'ai-su" ke, chhi`on-phu hen k^ong, `m oi chiap-khiun k^ong, y^in-vi ki^ang k`i ke f'ai h`ang-v`i hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.
Ch'ung-he, cheu ch^u"n-l^i cho-su" ke, chhiu chiap-khiun k^ong, oi p^un k^ong hi'en-m`in k`i s'o-cho ke yit-chhiet he cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cho ke."
Li'a su" y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang to Y`u-thai thi-kh^i hi. K`i chhai ke-vi l^au k`i-t^eu h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, yu h`ang s'e-l^i.
Yok-hon chhai l`i-kh^oi Sat-l^ang m`o k'i-y'en ke ^Oi-nun ya h`ang s'e-l^i, y^in-vi ke-vi s'ui chhin t^o; thai-k^a chiap-t'en hi li^ang s'e-l^i.
(Ke-s`u" Yok-hon h`an-m`ang p^un-ng`in ko^an h'i-l`oi.)
Yok-hon ke k'i-ke h+ok-s^ang l^au yit-ke Y`u-thai-ng`in vi kiet-chhiang-l^i kh^oi-s'u" phien-lun.

K`i-t^eu hi kien Yok-hon, tui k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i khon, y^i-chhi`en l^au ng`i chhai Yok-tan-h`o t^ung-phi'en, ng`i vi k`i cho kien-chu"n ke, li'a-ha ya h`ang s'e-l^i, thai-k^a chhi`on-phu hi chhiu k`i l^o!"
Yok-hon k'ong: "Na-`m-he Thi^en su-h^a ke, ng`in chhiu m`o fap-thu tet-t'o m'a-ke.
Ng`ai su"t k'ong-ko: 'Ng`ai `m-he K^i-tuk; ng`ai put-ko he fung chh^ai-phai cho k`i ke si^en-f^ung.' Li'a fa ng`i-t^eu kh'o-y^i vi ng`ai cho-chu"n.

Th'o s^in-ngi`ong ke he s^in-l`ong; s^in-l`ong ke ph`en-y^u kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu, yit th^ang-t'o s^in-l`ong ke s^ang chhiu f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok. Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai y'i-k^in tet-t'o v`an-chhi`on ke h'i-l+ok.
K`i yit-thin voi yit-ngit yit-ngit h^in-vong, ch'ung-he ng`ai voi yit-ngit yit-ngit s^oi-m`i."
Chhi`ung thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke, chh^eu-ko van-y^u. Chhi`ung thi-song l`oi ke, he s+uk-y`i thi, k`i s'o-k'ong ke ya he thi-song ke su"; ch'ung-he chhi`ung thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke, chh^eu-ko van-y^u.
K`i vi s'o khon-t'o l^au s'o th^ang-t'o ke cho-chu"n, ch'ung-he m`o-ng`in chiap-su k`i ke kien-chu"n.
Ke chiap-su ki^a kien-chu"n ke, chhiu-he chu"n-m`in Song-ti he sin-s+u"t ke.
Song-ti s'o chh^ai-phai ke, chh`on Song-ti ke fa, y^in-vi Song-ti f^ung-f^ung fu-fu chi^ong Su"n-L`in su-p^un k`i.
^A-p^a siak K`i ke Lai-'e, y'i-k^in chi^ong van-y^u k^au chhai ki^a s'u-ch^ung.
Sin Lai-'e ke, chhiu y^u y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang; `m sin-chhi`ung Lai-'e ke, `m-voi y^u s^ang-miang, voi ki-si+uk li`u chhai Song-ti ke fun-nu ch^u"-ha.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u s^u h+ok-s^ang l^au h`ang s'e-l^i p'i Yok-hon kha t^o.
(Kh`i-s+u"t, Y^a-s^u `m-su"t chh^in-s^u"n vi m'a-ng`in h`ang s'e-l^i, he ki^a h+ok-s^ang h`ang s'e-l^i.)
Y^a-s^u t^i y^u li'a-ke chh`on-sot, chhiu l`i-kh^oi Y`u-thai, to-ch'on hi K^a-li-li;
k`i s'o-h`ang ke lu yit-thin oi k^in-ko Sat-m^a-li-^a.
K`i l`oi-to Sat-m^a-li-^a ke Si-k^a s`ang, l`i Ng^a-kok p^un ki^a lai-'e Yok-sit ke th'u-thi m`o k'i-y'en;
Ng^a-kok-chi'ang chhiu-he chhai ke-vi. Y^a-s^u y^in-vi h`ang-lu chhin khioi, chhiu chh^o chhai chi'ang-s`un; ke-s`u" chh^a-`m-t^o he t^ong-chu.
Y^u yit-ke Sat-m^a-li-^a ke fu-ng`in-k^a l`oi t'a-s'ui; Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ng`i p^un t^eu s'ui ng`ai l^im."
(Ki^a h+ok-s^ang y'i-k^in hi ki^e-lu m^ai s+u"t-v+ut.)

Sat-m^a-li-^a ke fu-ng`in-k^a en Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in, ng`ai he Sat-m^a-li-^a ke fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`i ngi'ong-voi l^au ng`ai th'o-s'ui l^im n`o?" (Ngi`en-l`oi Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in m`o l`oi-v^ong.)

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Na-he ng`i t^i Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en l^au li'a-ha tui ng`i th'o-s'ui l^im ke he m'a-ng`in, ng`i ch'o chhiu voi khi`u k`i, k`i ya ch'o chhiu voi chi^ong s^ang-miang ke s'ui p^un ng`i."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i m`o t'a-s'ui ke t^ung-s^i, chi'ang yu 'an chh^u"m, ng`i oi hi nai-vi n^a s^ang-miang ke s'ui n`e?

Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en Ng^a-kok li`u li'a-h'eu chi'ang p^un ng`ai-t^eu; k`i chhu"-k^a, ki^a ch'u"-'ng, l^au k`i ke th`eu-s^ang chhi`on-phu l^im li'a-h'eu chi'ang ke s'ui; k'am-k'ong ng`i l'au-t'o ng`i p'i k`i h`an-kha thai he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "L^im li'a s'ui ke ng`in chhi`on-phu h`an voi chai choi-ch^au;

ch'ung-he l^im ng`ai s'o p^un k`i ke s'ui, ke ng`in chhiu y'un-y'en `m-voi chai hot. Ng`ai s'o su ke s'ui voi chhai k`i t^i-poi s`ang-cho chhi`en-ngi`en, yit-chh+u"t y'ung-chhut s^ang-miang ke s'ui, p^un k`i tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang ng`i chi^ong li'a-ke s'ui p^un ng`ai, s'u" ng`ai y'un-y'en `m-voi hot, ya `m-s'u" chai l`oi li'a-vi t'a-s'ui."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Hi ham ngi^a l'o-k^ung, chang to-ch'on-l`oi."
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a en-k'ong: "Ng`ai m`o l'o-k^ung." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i k'ong ng`i m`o l'o-k^ung, m`o `m-chh+ok.
Ng`i su"t y^u 'ng-ke l'o-k^ung, li'a-ha th`ung ng`i khiung-ha ke me `m-he ngi^a l'o-k^ung. Ng`i k'ong ke chhin chh+ok."
Fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai khon-chhut ng`i he yit-ke si^en-t^i.
Ng`ai-t^eu Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in ke ch'u-si^en chhai li'a s^an-t'ang kin-pai Song-ti, ng`i-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in chhiu k'ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang chang he kin-pai Song-ti ke s'o-chhai."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, oi sin ng`ai! S`u"-ki^en voi to l'e, ng`i-t^eu `m-voi chai l`oi li'a s^an-t'ang ya-he hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang kin-pai Thi^en-fu.
Ng`i-t^eu Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu s'o pai ke he m'a-ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in t^i ng`ai-t^eu s'o pai ke he m'a-ng`in, y^in-vi kiu-^en he tui Y`u-thai-ng`in l`oi ke.
Ch'ung-he s`u"-ki^en voi to l'e, li'a-ha chhiu-he, ch^u"n-s+u"t kin-pai Thi^en-fu ke, oi yung s^im-l`in l^au s`u"n-s+u"t kin-pai, y^in-vi Thi^en-fu oi li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in kin-pai K`i.
Song-ti he L`in, kin-pai K`i ke ng`in yit-thin oi yung s^im-l`in l^au s`u"n-s+u"t l`oi kin-pai."
Fu-ng`in-k^a l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai t^i ke chh^u"n-cho K^i-tuk ke M`i-soi-^a oi l`oi, k`i l`oi chhiu voi chi^ong yit-chhiet ke su" l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai, li'a-ha l^au ng`i k'ong-fa ke, chhiu-he k`i!"

Li'a-s`u", Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang to-ch'on-l`oi. K`i-t^eu khon-t'o k`i l^au yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong-fa, k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, ch'ung-he m`o ng`in mun ke fu-ng`in-k^a: "Ng`i oi m'a-ke?" ya-he mun Y^a-s^u: "Ng`i cho-m'a-ke l^au k`i k'ong-fa?"
Ke fu-ng`in-k^a piong-h^a k`i ke s'ui-kon-'e, ch'on-hi s`ang-nui, tui thai-k^a k'ong:
"Ng`i-t^eu l`oi khon! Y^u yit-ke ng`in chi^ong ng`ai yit-s^en s'o-cho ke su" chhi`on-phu l^au ng`ai k'ong chhut-l`oi; k`i k'am he K^i-tuk m^a?"
Thai-k^a chhiu chhut-s`ang hi khon Y^a-s^u.
Li'a-s`u", h+ok-s^ang ham Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang s+u"t-t^eu t^ung-s^i."
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai y^u t^ung-s^i h'o s+u"t, he ng`i-t^eu s'o `m-t^i ke."
H+ok-s^ang chhiu p'i-chh'u" ngi-lun k'ong: "K'am-k'ong y^u-ng`in n^a t^ung-s^i p^un k`i s+u"t he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai ke s+u"t-v+ut chhiu-he ch^un-h`ang 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke ch'u"-yi, yu v`an-s`u"n K`i k^au-p^un ng`ai ke k^ung-chok.
Ng`i-t^eu k'ong: 'K^a si-ke ngi+et chang he s^u-s`u"n ke s`u"-chiet.' Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ngo-th`eu khon ke-t^eu thi`en; 'ng-kuk y'i-k^in siuk l'e, cho-tet s^u-kot l'e!
S^u-kot ke ng`in tet-t'o k^ung-chhi`en, vi y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang chit-chh`un 'ng-kuk, s'u" ve-ch'ung-ke l^au s^u-kot-ke yit-th`ung khoai-l+ok.
'Chhi`en-ng`in ch^ai-chung, heu-ng`in s^u-s`u"n' li'a-ki fa he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke.
Ng`ai chh^ai ng`i-t^eu hi s^u-kot `m-he ng`i-t^eu k^ang ke thi`en; ph+et-ng`in s^in-kh'u, ng`i-t^eu hi'ong-su k`i-t^eu s^in-kh'u ke s`u"n-k'o."
Ke-s`ang y^u chhin-t^o Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in sin Y^a-s^u, y^in-vi ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "K`i chi^ong ng`ai yit-s^en s'o-cho ke su" chhi`on-phu l^au ng`ai k'ong chhut-l`oi."
Ke-t^eu Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu y^eu-khi`u k`i th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et; s'o-y^i Y^a-s^u chhai ke-vi h+et li'ong-ngit.
Y^in-vi Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke tho-l^i, sin k`i ke ng`in chhiu h`an-kha t^o.
K`i-t^eu l^au ke fu-ng`in-k^a k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha sin, `m-he y^in-vi ng`i s'o-k'ong ke fa, he y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu chh^in-s^u"n th^ang-t'o k`i ke fa, t^i k`i s+u"t-chhai he su"-kie ke Kiu-ch'u."
Y^a-s^u chhai ke-vi h+et li'ong-ngit y^i-heu, chhiu hi K^a-li-li.
K`i chhu"-k^a su"t k'ong: "Si^en-t^i chhai chhu"-k^a ke k^a-hi^ong he `m-voi su ng`in ch^un-chhung ke."
Y^a-s^u yit to K^a-li-li, ke-vi ke ng`in chhi`on-phu chhin f^on-ngi`ang k`i; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ko Ph`an-ko-chiet ke s`u", y^u khon-t'o k`i s'o-cho yit-chhiet ke su".
Y^a-s^u yu to-ch'on-hi K^a-li-li ke K^a-n^a, chhiu-he th`eu-p'ai k`i pien s'ui cho chi'u ke s'o-chhai. Ke thi-f^ong y^u yit-ke thai-k^on, ki^a lai-'e chhai K^a-pak-n`ung pot-phiang.
K`i yit th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u tui Y`u-thai l`oi-to K^a-li-li, chhiu hi kien k`i, khi`u k`i hi K^a-pak-n`ung y^i-h'o ki^a phiang-to voi s'i ke lai-'e.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu na-`m-he khon-t'o s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su", ch'ung-he `m sin."
Ke thai-k^on en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, khi`u ng`i chhai ng^a lai-'e m`ang s'i y^i-chhi`en th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha l`oi-hi."
Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ch'on-hi, ngi^a lai-'e h'o l'e!" Ke ng`in sin Y^a-s^u ke fa chhiu ch'on-hi.
Chhai lu-song, ki^a ph+uk-ng`in t`u-t'o k`i, l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ke lai-'e h'o l'e!"
K`i mun k`i-t^eu, ki^a lai-'e he k'i-s`u" h'o h'i-l`oi ke. K`i-t^eu f`i-tap k'ong: "Chh^o-p^u-ngit h^a-chu yit-ti'am-ch^ung ke s`u", s^eu chhiu thui."
Cho ^a-p^a ke si'ong-h'i, t'u-h'o he Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ngi^a lai-'e h'o l'e" ke s`u"-chiet. S'o-y^i, k`i l^au k`i yit-k^a-ng`in chhi`on-phu chhiu sin.
Li'a he Y^a-s^u tui Y`u-thai to-ch'on K^a-li-li heu s'o-h`ang ke thi-ngi-ke s`u"n-chiak.
Li'a su" y^i-heu, t'u-h'o he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke yit-ke chiet-kh`i, Y^a-s^u chhiu s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi.
Chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, y^u yit-h'eu s'ui-chh`u" chhai Y`ong-m`un ke fu-khiun, H^i-pak-l`oi-fa ^on-to Pit-su"-thai, s`un-th`eu y^u 'ng-chak l`ong-'e.
Chhai l`ong-'e t^i-poi y^u yit-khi`un phiang-ng`in soi chhai ke-vi, y^u m^o-muk ke, p^ai-kiok ke, pot th^an-f^ung ke.
Chhai ke-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in y'i-k^in pot-phiang s^am-s+u"p-pat-ngi`en ki'u.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o k`i soi chhai ke-vi, t^i k`i pot-phiang chhin-t^o ngi`en, chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi tet-t'o y^i-h'o m`o?"

Ke phiang-ng`in f`i-tap k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, s'ui th^in-th^ung ke s`u"-chiet m`o ng`in p^ong-chhu ng`ai, chi^ong ng`ai piong-l+ok s'ui-chh`u" hi; t'en ng`ai si'ong-oi l+ok-hi, ph+et-ng`in y'i-k^in si^en l+ok-hi."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, chi^ong ngi^a chh'o-chhi+ak n^a-h'i-l`oi h`ang!"
Ke ng`in ke phiang chit-s`u" h'o l'e, k`i chi^ong ki^a chh'o-chhi+ak n^a-h'i-l`oi, h`ang-t'en ch'eu. Ke-ngit t'u-h'o he ^On-sit-ngit,
s'o-y^i Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu tui ke tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke ng`in k'ong: "K^im-p^u-ngit he ^On-sit-ngit, ng`i n^a-t'en chh'o-chhi+ak he v`i-poi fap-l+it ke."
K`i k'ong: "Ke y^i-h'o ng`ai ke ng`in f^un-fu ng`ai k'ong: 'Chi^ong ngi^a chh'o-chhi+ak n^a-h'i-l`oi h`ang!' "
K`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "Ke f^un-fu ng`i chi^ong chh'o-chhi+ak n^a-h'i-l`oi h`ang ke he m'a-ng`in?"
Ch'ung-he ke tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke ng`in `m-t^i Y^a-s^u he m'a-ng`in; y^in-vi ke thi-f^ong ng`in chhin-t^o, Y^a-s^u yu y'i-k^in s'am-kh^oi.
Su" heu, Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien-t'u chh`im-t'o k`i, l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i y'i-k^in v`an-chhi`on h'o l'e, `m-h'o chai fam-chhui, mi^en-tet ngi^a-t'o h`an-kha thai ke ch^ai-fo."
Ke ng`in l`i-kh^oi Y^a-s^u y^i-heu, hi l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu k'ong, y^i-h'o k`i ke he Y^a-s^u.
S'o-y^i Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu kh^oi-s'u" pet-hoi Y^a-s^u, y^in-vi k`i chhai ^On-sit-ngit y^i-phiang.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng^a P^a yit-chh+u"t k^ung-chok, ng`ai ya cheu-yong k^ung-chok."

Li'a-ke fa kien-k^a s'u" Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu kiet-s^im oi sat-hoi k`i; y^in-vi k`i `m t^an-chhiang pho-fai ^On-sit-ngit ke kie-min, yu k'ong Song-ti he k`i chhu"-k^a ke ^A-p^a, chi^ong chhu"-k^a khon-cho l^au Song-ti ph`in-t'en.

Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, Lai-'e kho chhu"-k^a put-n`en cho m'a-ke; k`i khon ^A-p^a cho m'a-ke, chang n`en cho m'a-ke. ^A-p^a s'o cho ke, Lai-'e ya cho.
^A-p^a siak Lai-'e, chi^ong chhu"-k^a s'o-cho ke ch'u"-su" Lai-'e. K`i oi chi^ong p'i li'a h`an-kha thai ke su" ch'u"-su" Lai-'e, p^un ng`i-t^eu k'am-kok h^i-kh`i.
^A-p^a ngi'ong-p^an s'u" s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at, su s^ang-miang p^un k`i-t^eu; khiung-yong, Lai-'e ya oi cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" su s^ang-miang p^un ng`in.
^A-p^a chhu"-k^a `m s'u"m-phan ng`in; K`i chi^ong s'u"m-phan ke khi`en-piang k^au-p^un Lai-'e,
vi-t'o oi s'u" ng`in l^ung-ch'ung ch^un-kin Lai-'e, chhiong ch^un-kin ^A-p^a yit-yong. `M ch^un-kin Lai-'e ke, chhiu-he `m ch^un-kin chh^ai k`i l`oi ke ^A-p^a.
"Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, th^ang ng`ai ke fa, yu sin ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke', chhiu y^u y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang. K`i `m-voi su thin-chhui, he y'i-k^in chhut-s'i ng+ip-s^en l'e.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, s`u"-ki^en voi to l'e, li'a-ha chhiu he, s'i-ng`in voi th^ang-t'o Song-ti Lai-'e ke s^ang; ke-t^eu th^ang-chhi`ung ke, voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Chhiong ^A-p^a p'un-s^u"n he s^ang-miang ke ngi`en-th`eu, K`i ya s'u" Lai-'e s`ang-cho s^ang-miang ke ngi`en-th`eu.
K`i yu chi^ong s'u"m-phan ke khi`en-piang su-p^un Lai-'e, y^in-vi k`i chhiu-he Ng`in-ch'u".
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o vi-t'o li'a-ke l`oi h^i-kh`i; y^in-vi s`u"-ki^en voi to, s'o-y^u chhai f`un-mu t^i-poi ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung voi th^ang-t'o k`i ke s^ang-y^im,
ya voi tui f`un-mu t^i-poi chhut-l`oi: H`ang-san ke, voi f+uk-f+at l`oi tet-t'o s^ang-miang; chok-ok ke, voi f+uk-f+at l`oi su thin-chhui.

"Ng`ai kho chhu"-k^a put-n`en cho m'a-ke; ng`ai cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi l`oi s'u"m-phan; ng`ai ke s'u"m-phan ya he k^ung-tong ke, y^in-vi ng`ai `m-he ch^ui-khi`u chhu"-k^a s'o-oi ke, ch'u"-y^u h`ang 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke ch'u"-yi.
"K'a-s'u" ng`ai vi chhu"-k^a cho-chu"n, ng`ai ke fa chhiu `m-la s'u" ng`in si^ong-sin.
Ch'ung-he, y^u nang-ngoi yit-ke ya vi ng`ai cho-chu"n ke, ng`ai t^i K`i vi ng`ai s'o-cho ke kien-chu"n he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke.
Ng`i-t^eu su"t phai-ng`in hi kien Yok-hon, k`i chhiu vi ch^u"n-l^i l`oi cho-chu"n.
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai pin m`o s^i-yeu ng`in ke kien-chu"n; ng`ai k'ong-h'i li'a-ke su", he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-kiu.
Yok-hon kh'o-p'i yit-ch'an chh+ok-t'en yu cheu-m`in ke t^en, ng`i-t^eu ngien-yi chhiam-s`u" hi'ong-su k`i ke k^ong-m`in.

Ch'ung-he ng`ai y^u p'i Yok-hon h`an-kha y^u-l+it ke chu"n-k'i, chhiu-he ng`ai s'o-cho ke k^ung-chok, he ng^a P^a k^au-p^un ng`ai oi v`an-s`u"n ke. Li'a-t^eu k^ung-chok kh'o-y^i chu"n-m`in ^A-p^a y^u chh^ai-phai ng`ai.
Chh^ai-phai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a ya vi ng`ai cho-chu"n. Ng`i-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t th^ang-ko K`i ke s^ang, `m-su"t kien-ko K`i ke h`in-siong,
ya m`o chi^ong K`i ke fa piong chhai s^im-ch^ung, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m sin K`i s'o chh^ai-l`oi ke.
Ng`i-t^eu ngi^en-kiu Su"n-k^in, ngin-v`i chhai ke t^i-poi kh'o-y^i chh`im-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang; kh`i-s+u"t Su"n-k^in ke fa chhiu-he vi ng`ai cho kien-chu"n ke!
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu h`an `m-h'en chhiu-khiun ng`ai l`oi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
"Ng`ai `m-he ch^ui-khi`u ng`in ke chh^u"n-chan.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu chhin li'au-ki'e, ng`i-t^eu pin `m-he chu"n-k^in kin-oi Song-ti.
Ng`ai fung ng^a P^a ke mi`ang l`oi, ng`i-t^eu `m chiap-n+ap ng`ai; na y^u-ng`in fung chhu"-k^a ke mi`ang l`oi, ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on chiap-n+ap k`i.
Ng`i-t^eu chhin-oi p'i-chh'u" chiap-su chan-m^i, ch'ung-he `m khi`u tui th+uk-yit v`u-ngi ke Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke chh^u"n-chan; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi sin ng`ai n`e?
`M-h'o ngin-v`i ng`ai voi chhai ng^a P^a ke mien-chhi`en ko ng`i-t^eu; oi ko ng`i-t^eu ke chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu s'o ngi'ong-mong ke M^o-s^i.
K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu ch^u"n-s+u"t si^ong-sin M^o-s^i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi sin ng`ai, y^in-vi k`i ke s^u y^u ki-chai ng`ai ke su".
Ng`i-t^eu ki-y`en `m sin k`i s'o-si'a ke, ngi'ong-voi sin ng`ai ke fa n`e?"
Heu-l`oi, Y^a-s^u thu-ko K^a-li-li-f`u (yu ^on-to Th`i-p'i-l^i-^a-f`u).
Y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in th`en-t'en k`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu khon-ko k`i y^i-phiang ke s`u"n-chiak.
Y^a-s^u s^ong-s^an, th`ung ki^a h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha chh^o-t'en.
Ke-s`u" Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Ph`an-ko-chiet voi to l'e.
Y^a-s^u ngo-th`eu, khon-t'o yit thai-khi`un ng`in l`oi-to k`i ke mien-chhi`en, chhiu tui F^i-l+it k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu oi hi nai-vi m^ai s+u"t-v+ut, p^un li'a-t^eu ng`in s+u"t-p'au n`e?"
(K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa he oi su"-ngiam F^i-l+it; k`i chhu"-k^a y'i-k^in t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an phan-l^i.)
F^i-l+it f`i-tap: "Chhiu-he yung li'ong-pak-chak ngi`un-chhi`en hi m^ai pi'ang-`e, m^i-yit-ke ng`in p^un yit-s+it-s+it-'e, ya he `m-la!"
Nang-ngoi yit-ke h+ok-s^ang, chhiu-he S^i-m`un-P'i-tet ke l'o-th^ai ^On-tet-li+et, l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong:
"Li'a-vi y^u yit-ke se-^a-k^o-'e tai 'ng-chak thai m+ak-pi'ang l^au li'ong-m^i `ng-`e, ch'ung-he ngi'ong-voi la p^un-p^un 'an-t^o ng`in n`e?"
Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "H^em thai-k^a chh^o-l+ok-hi." (Ke thi-f^ong y^u chhin-t^o chh'o.) Thai-k^a chhiu chh^o-l+ok-hi, t^an-chhiang n`am-ng`in yok-y^u 'ng-chhi^en s`a.
Y^a-s^u n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e l`oi, k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu p^un-p^un chh^o-t'en ke ng`in; `ng-`e ya he 'an-ngi`ong p^un; thai-k^a chhi`on-phu tet-t'o s'o s^i-yeu ke.
K`i-t^eu s+u"t-p'au y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u f^un-fu h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Chi^ong s'o chh^un ke pi'ang-sui-'e chhi`on-phu ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, `m-h'o t'a-s'ong."
K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong 'ng-chak thai m+ak-pi'ang ke sui-'e, chhiu-he thai-k^a s+u"t-chh^un ke, ngi^am-h'i-l`oi, ch'ung-khiung ch^ong-m^an s+u"p-ngi-chak l`am-`e.
Thai-k^a khon-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, chhiu k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in yit-thin he ke oi l`oi su"-ki^en ke si^en-t^i!"
Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu oi l^ai k`i, khi`ong-pet k`i cho v`ong, k`i chhu"-k^a yit-ke ng`in yu s'am-to s^an-t'ang hi.
L`im-am-'e, Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang l`oi-to f`u-s`un,
s^ong-s`on, hiong f`u tui-mien ke K^a-pak-n`ung chhut-fat. Ke-s`u" thi^en y'i-k^in am, Y^a-s^u h`an-m`ang l`oi-to k`i-t^eu ke-vi.
Fut-y`en h'i kh`ong-f^ung, p^o-long chhin-ki+ep.
H+ok-s^ang y`eu-chi'ong, thai-yok h`ang 'ng-liuk k^ung-l^i, khon-t'o Y^a-s^u chhai f`u-mien hiong s`on h`ang-t'en ko-l`oi, chhiu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "He ng`ai, `m-s'u" ki^ang!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu f^on-f^on h'i-h'i chiap k`i s^ong-s`on; s`on chit-s`u" chhiu to muk-tit-thi.

Thi-ngi-ngit, li`u chhai f`u tui-mien ke yit thai-khi`un ng`in si'ong-t'o ngi`en-l`oi ke-vi ch'u"-y^u yit-chak se s`on-`e; k`i-t^eu t^i Y^a-s^u pin m`o th`ung h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha s^ong-s`on, ke-t^eu h+ok-s^ang he chhu"-k^a l`i-kh^oi ke.
Y^u k'i-chak tui Th`i-p'i-l^i-^a l`oi ke se s`on-`e th`in chhai f`u-pi^en, chhiu-he Ch'u k'am-chhia heu p^un pi'ang-`e p^un thai-k^a s+u"t ke thi-f^ong ke fu-khiun.
Li'a-khi`un ng`in fat-hien Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang m`o chhai ke-vi, chhiu s^ong-s`on hi K^a-pak-n`ung chh`im k`i.
K`i-t^eu chhai f`u ke tui-mien chh`im-t'o Y^a-s^u, mun k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`i k'i-s`u" l`oi-to li'a-vi n`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu chh`im ng`ai, `m-he y^in-vi khon-t'o s`u"n-chiak, he y^in-vi y^u s+u"t-t'o pi'ang-`e, yu tet-t'o p'au-chiuk.

`M-h'o vi-t'o voi f'u-lan ke s+u"t-v+ut chh^au-l`o, oi vi ke chh`un-to y'un-s^en ke s+u"t-v+ut t'a-piang. Li'a s+u"t-v+ut chhiu-he Ng`in-ch'u" oi su-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke, y^in-vi Ng`in-ch'u" he ^A-p^a Song-ti s'o yin-chu"n ke."
K`i-t^eu chhiu mun-k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu oi cho m'a-ke chang son he cho Song-ti ke k^ung-chok n`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Sin Song-ti s'o chh^ai-l`oi ke, li'a chhiu-he Song-ti oi ng`i-t^eu cho ke k^ung-chok."
K`i-t^eu yu mun-k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i oi h`ang m'a-ke s`u"n-chiak p^un ng`ai-t^eu khon l`oi sin ng`i n`o? Ng`i ke k^ung-chok to-t'ai he m'a-ke n`o?
Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u s+u"t-ko m^a-n^a, chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o ki-chai ke: 'K`i chi^ong tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke li`ong-s+u"t su-p^un k`i-t^eu s+u"t.' "

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, `m-he M^o-s^i su-p^un ng`i-t^eu tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke li`ong-s+u"t; ch'u"-y^u ng^a P^a chang su-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke ch^u"n li`ong-s+u"t.
Y^in-vi Song-ti s'o-su ke li`ong-s+u"t chhiu-he ke tui thi^en-t'ang kong-l`im, chi^ong s^ang-miang su-p^un su"-kie ke."
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang s`ong-s`ong chi^ong li'a li`ong-s+u"t su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu!"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he s^ang-miang ke li`ong-s+u"t. To ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi ke, y'un-y'en `m-voi k^i; sin ng`ai ke, y'un-y'en `m-voi hot.
Ch'ung-he ng`ai su"t l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in khon-t'o ng`ai, h`an-he `m sin.
F`am he ^A-p^a s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung voi to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi. To ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi ke, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi kh^i-chhi+et k`i;
y^in-vi ng`ai tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, `m-he oi cheu ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" h`ang-su", he oi s+u"t-h`ang ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke ch'u"-yi.
Ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke ch'u"-yi, chhiu-he oi ng`ai p'o-s'u K`i s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke ng`in, li`en yit-ke ya `m-voi su"t-l+ok, f'an-ch'on, ng`ai chhai m+at-ngit oi s'u" k`i-t^eu f+uk-f+at.
Y^in-vi ^A-p^a ke ch'u"-yi he oi p^un s'o-y^u khon-t'o Lai-'e pin sin k`i ke ng`in tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang; chhai m+at-ngit, ng`ai oi s'u" k`i-t^eu f+uk-f+at."
Y`u-thai-ng`in y^in-vi Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai he tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke li`ong-s+u"t", chhiu am-ch^ung ngi-lun k'ong:
"Li'a-ke ng`in k'am `m-he Yok-sit ke lai-'e Y^a-s^u m^a? Ng`ai-t^eu ngin-su"t k`i ke y`a-^oi. Li'a-ha, k`i ngi'ong k'am-k'ong k`i he tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu m+ok am-ch^ung ngi-lun.
Na-`m-he ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a khip-y^in ng`in, m`o-ng`in voi to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi; to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi ke, chhai m+at-ngit ng`ai oi s'u" k`i f+uk-f+at.
Si^en-t^i ke s^u ki-chai k'ong: 'Tak-ke ng`in voi tet-t'o Song-ti ke kau-su".' S'o-y^u th^ang-chhi`ung ^A-p^a yu chiap-su Ki^a kau-su" ke, l^ung-ch'ung oi to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi.
Li'a `m-he k'ong y^u m'a-ng`in khon-ko ^A-p^a; ch'u"-y^u tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke chang khon-ko ^A-p^a.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, sin ke ng`in chhiu y^u y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.
Ng`ai chhiu-he s^ang-miang ke li`ong-s+u"t.
Ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhai kh'ong-y^a s+u"t-ko m^a-n^a, h`an-he s'i-thet;
ch'ung-he ke tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke li`ong-s+u"t he oi p^un s+u"t ke ng`in `m-voi s'i.

Ng`ai chhiu-he tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi, ke su s^ang-miang ke li`ong-s+u"t; s+u"t li'a li`ong-s+u"t ke ng`in y'un-y'en `m-voi s'i. Ng`ai s'o-oi su-p^un ng`in ke li`ong-s+u"t chhiu-he ng`ai ke ngiuk, he oi p^un su"-ki^en-ng`in tet-t'o s^ang-miang ke."
Li'a-ke fa chhai Y`u-thai-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung y^in-h'i kit-li+et ke ch^en-lun. K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet yung chhu"-k^a ke ngiuk p^un ng`ai-t^eu s+u"t n`e?"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu na `m s+u"t Ng`in-ch'u" ke ngiuk, l^im k`i ke hiet, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi y^u ch^u"n ke s^ang-miang.
S+u"t ng`ai ke ngiuk, l^im ng`ai ke hiet ke, chhiu y^u y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang; chhai m+at-ngit ng`ai oi s'u" k`i f+uk-f+at.
Ng`ai ke ngiuk he chu"n-k^in cho-tet s+u"t ke, ng`ai ke hiet he chu"n-k^in cho-tet l^im ke.
Ke s+u"t ng`ai ke ngiuk, l^im ng`ai ke hiet ke, k`i chhiu chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai ya chhai k`i t^i-poi, li'ong-s`a s`ang-cho yit-th'i.
Y'un-s^en ke ^A-p^a y^u chh^ai-phai ng`ai, ng`ai ya y^in-vi K`i l`oi s^ang; khiung-yong, s+u"t ng^a ngiuk ke ng`in ya oi y^in-vi ng`ai l`oi s^ang.

Li'a chhiu-he tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke li`ong-s+u"t. Li'a li`ong-s+u"t `m-he chhiong ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s+u"t-ko ke, k`i-t^eu s+u"t m^a-n^a, h`an-he s'i-thet; ch'ung-he s+u"t li'a li`ong-s+u"t ke ng`in voi s^ang-to y'un-y'en."
Li'a-t^eu fa he Y^a-s^u chhai K^a-pak-n`ung fi-th`ong kau-su" ng`in k'ong ke.
H'o-t^o h+ok-s^ang th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu k'ong: "Li'a kau-hiun 'an ngang, m'a-ng`in th^ang-tet ng+ip-ng'i?"
Y^a-s^u t^i ki^a h+ok-s^ang am-ch^ung ngi-lun li'a-khien su", chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a fa hoi ng`i-t^eu sin-s^im y`eu-thung he-m`o?
Na-he ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o Ng`in-ch'u" s^u"n-s^ong-hi k`i ngi`en-l`oi ke s'o-chhai, yu ngi'ong-p^an n`e?
P^un ng`in s^ang-miang ke he Su"n-L`in, ngiuk-th'i he m`o m'a-ke lu-yung ke; ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa voi s'u" ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o su s^ang-miang ke L`in.
Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u ng`in `m sin." (Y^a-s^u ch'o chhiu t^i nai-t^eu ng`in `m sin, m'a-ng`in voi chhut-mai k`i.)
K`i k'ong: "S'o-y^i, ng`ai su"t l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, na-`m-he ng^a P^a ke ^en-su, m`o-ng`in voi to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi."
Tui ke-s`u" h'i, th`en k`i ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung y^u h'o-t^o ng`in thui-chhut-hi, m`o-oi chai th`en k`i khiung-ha hi.
Y^a-s^u chhiu mun ki^a s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu n`o? Ng`i-t^eu ya oi thui-chhut m^a?"
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i y^u y'un-s^en ke fa, ng`ai-t^eu h`an oi th`en m'a-ng`in n`e?
Ng`ai-t^eu sin, ya t^i ng`i chhiu-he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke Su"n-ch'a."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai k'am `m-he ki'en-si'en ng`i-t^eu s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in m^a? Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke he M^o-k'ui!"
Y^a-s^u li'a-ki fa he ch'u" K^a-li+ok-ng`in S^i-m`un ke lai-'e Y`u-thai k'ong ke. Y`u-thai he s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang ke yit-ke, chhiu-he heu-l`oi chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke ng`in.
Su"-heu, Y^a-s^u chhai K^a-li-li-s'en l`oi-l`oi hi-hi, m`o-oi hi Y`u-thai thi-kh^i, y^in-vi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu si'ong-oi sat-hoi k`i.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Tap Li`au-`e Chiet voi to l'e,
s'o-y^i Y^a-s^u ke l'o-th^ai l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi l`i-kh^oi li'a-vi, hi Y`u-thai, h'o p^un ngi^a h+ok-s^ang khon ng`i s'o h`ang ke kh`i-su".
Ng`in oi chhut-mi`ang, chhiu `m-h'o chhai am-ch^ung cho-su". Ng`i ki-y`en n`en h`ang li'a-t^eu kh`i-su", chhiu yin-k^oi chhai su"-ng`in mien-chhi`en p'eu-hien chhut-l`oi!"
(Ngi`en-l`oi li`en ki^a l'o-th^ai ya m`o sin k`i.)
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu s`ui-s`u" chhin f^ong-phien; ch'ung-he ng`ai ke s`u"-k^i h`an-m`ang s`u"n-s+uk.
Su"-ng`in `m-voi yen-hen ng`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he voi yen-hen ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai s`ong-s`ong ch'u"-chu"n k`i-t^eu ke chok-v`i he si`a-ok ke.
Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a hi ko-chiet, ng`ai li'a-ha `m hi, y^in-vi ng`ai ke s`u"-k^i h`an-m`ang s`u"n-s+uk."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu fa y^i-heu, h`an-he li`u chhai K^a-li-li.
Y^a-s^u ke l'o-th^ai hi ko-chiet y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u ya th`en-t'en hi. K`i `m-he k^ung-kh^oi hi, he am-ch^ung hi ke.
Chiet-kh`i-ch^ung, Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu tak s'o-chhai chh`im Y^a-s^u, k'in mun: "K`i chhai nai-vi?"
Chung-ng`in vi-t'o k`i ngi-lun f^un-f^un; y^u-t^eu k'ong: "K`i he yit-ke h'o ng`in!" y^u-t^eu k'ong: "`M-he! K`i chhai san-thung chung-ng`in."
Ch'ung-he thai-k^a `m-k'am k^ung-kh^oi th`am-lun k`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ki^ang Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu.
Chiet-kh`i ko-thet yit-pan, Y^a-s^u chhiu s^ong-hi su"n-thien kau-hiun ng`in.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in m`o su m'a-ke kau-yuk, ngi'ong-voi 'an y^u h+ok-mun ^a?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai ke kau-su" `m-he ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke, he tui ke chh^ai ng`ai ke Song-ti l`oi ke.
Ng`in na-he kiet-s^im oi h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, chhiu voi t^i ng`ai ke kau-su" he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, ya-he cheu ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" k'ong ke.
Cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" k'ong-fa ke, he si'ong-oi y`ung-k^ong chhu"-k^a; v`i-y^u si'ong-oi y`ung-k^ong ke chh^ai k`i l`oi ke, chang-he ch^u"n-s+u"t m`o h^i-k'a ke ng`in.
M^o-s^i `m-he chi^ong fap-l+it k^au-p^un ng`i-t^eu m^a? Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu m`o yit-s`a ch^un-s'u fap-l+it. Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`ai n`e?"
Chung-ng`in f`i-tap k'ong: "Ng`i p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n l'e! M'a-ng`in si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`i n`o?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai chhai ^On-sit-ngit h`ang yit-ke s`u"n-chiak, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu khon-cho koai-su".
M^o-s^i f^un-fu ng`i-t^eu h`ang kot-l^i (kh`i-s+u"t kot-l^i `m-he tui M^o-s^i, he tui si^en-ch'u kh^oi-s'u" ke), ng`i-t^eu chhiu chhai ^On-sit-ngit vi ng`in h`ang kot-l^i.

Na-he ng`in chhai ^On-sit-ngit h`ang kot-l^i, muk-tit he v`i-fu M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhai ^On-sit-ngit p^un yit-ke ng`in v`an-chhi`on f^i-f+uk khien-kh^ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke chit-phi ng`ai n`e?
`M-h'o cheu ngoi-p'eu ton su"-f^i, oi cheu k^ung-tong ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi phan-ton chang chh+ok."
Y^u-t^eu Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang-ng`in k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in k'am `m-he k`i-t^eu si'ong-oi chh`u" ke m^a?
Ng`i khon, k`i k^ung-kh^oi k'ong-fa, sa m`o ng`in chhut-l`oi f'an-pok k`i! K'am-k'ong ng`ai-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu khok-ngin k`i chhiu-he K^i-tuk m^a?
Su"-s+u"t-song, K^i-tuk chhut-hien ke s`u", m`o-ng`in voi t^i k`i he tui nai-vi l`oi ke, ch'ung-he li'a-ke ng`in ke l`oi-l+it ng`ai-t^eu f^i-s`ong chh^in-chh'u."

T^ong-s`u", Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien t^i-poi kau-hiun ng`in, k`i thai-s^ang si^en-ko k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chu"n-k^in ngin-su"t ng`ai, t^i ng`ai tui nai-vi l`oi m^a? Ng`ai l`oi, pin `m-he cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su". Ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke. Ng`i-t^eu `m ngin-su"t K`i,
ch'ung-he ng`ai ngin-su"t K`i; y^in-vi ng`ai tui K`i ke-vi l`oi, he K`i chh^ai-phai ng`ai."
K`i-t^eu chhiu si'ong-oi chok k`i, ch'ung-he m`o ng`in ha-s'u, y^in-vi k`i ke s`u"-k^i h`an-m`ang to.
Chung-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung ya y^u h'o-t^o ng`in sin k`i; k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K^i-tuk l`oi ke s`u", voi p'i li'a-ke ng`in h`ang h`an-kha t^o ke s`u"n-chiak m^a?"
Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-t'o chung-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong f^un-f^un ngi-lun Y^a-s^u ke su", k`i-t^eu l^au chi-s^u"-ch'ong chhiu phai k'in-v'i hi chok Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai h`an-y^u t^o-s'eu-`e s`u"-ki^en th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, y`en-heu oi to-ch'on 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke-vi hi.
Ng`i-t^eu voi chh`im ng`ai, ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o; y^in-vi ng`ai oi hi ke s'o-chhai, ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet hi."

Ke-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu p'i-chh'u" mun-k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in si'ong-oi hi nai-vi, p^un ng`ai-t^eu chh`im k`i `m-t'o n`e? K'am-k'ong k`i oi to f^un-san chhai H^i-li+ap-ng`in ch^ung ke Y`u-thai khi`eu-m`in ke-vi hi, k^au H^i-li+ap-ng`in he-m`o?
K`i k'ong 'Ng`i-t^eu voi chh`im ng`ai, ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o' yu k'ong 'Ng`ai oi hi ke s'o-chhai, ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet hi', li'a-ke fa he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e?"
Chiet-kh`i ke chui-m^i yit-ngit, chhiu-he chui ch^ong-ngi`am ke yit-ngit, Y^a-s^u kh^i-h'i-l`oi, thai-s^ang si^en-ko k'ong: "Ng`in na-he choi-ch^au, chhiu yin-k^oi to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi l^im.
Sin ng`ai ke ng`in, cheu Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: 'Tui ki^a nui-t'u voi y^u k^ong-h`o li`u-chhut s^ang-miang ke s'ui.' "
Y^a-s^u li'a-ke fa he ch'u" sin k`i ke ng`in s'o oi chiap-su ke Su"n-L`in k'ong ke. Ke-s`u" Su"n-L`in m`ang-y^u kong-l`im, y^in-vi Y^a-s^u h`an-m`ang tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong.
Chung-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung y^u chhin-t^o ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in khok-s+u"t he ke si^en-t^i!"
Ya y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K`i he K^i-tuk!" Ch'ung-he y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K^i-tuk ngi'ong-voi tui K^a-li-li l`oi?
Su"n-k^in k'am `m-he ki-chai, K^i-tuk he Thai-v'i ke heu-thoi, oi kong-s^en chhai Thai-v'i ke p'un-hi^ong Pak-li-h`en m^a?"
Chung-ng`in chhiu vi-t'o Y^a-s^u f^un-ch^en.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in si'ong-oi chok k`i, ch'ung-he m`o ng`in ha-s'u.
Ke-t^eu k'in-v'i to-ch'on-hi kien chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in; k`i-t^eu mun: "Cho-m'a-ke m`o chi^ong k`i tai-ch'on-l`oi n`e?"
Ke-t^eu k'in-v'i en-k'ong: "Chhi`ung-l`oi m`ang-su"t y^u-ng`in chhiong k`i 'an-ngi`ong k'ong-fa ke!"
Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ya p^un k`i phien-ch'eu he-m`o?
Ng`ai-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu ya-he Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'am y^u sin k`i ke m^a?
Li'a-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke pak-siang he su chu-ch'u ke!"
K`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u N`i-k^o-tet-mu, k`i y^i-chhi`en su"t hi kien Y^a-s^u. K`i th`i-si'ang k`i-t^eu, k'ong:
"Cheu ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it, m`ang s'u"m-mun ya-he chh`a-m`in ng`in s'o-cho ke su", k'am cho-tet thin k`i ke chhui m^a?"
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "K'am-k'ong ng`i ya he K^a-li-li-ng`in m^a? Ng`i hi chh`a Su"n-k^in khon, chhiu t^i K^a-li-li `m-voi chhut si^en-t^i." [
Thai-k^a ch'on vuk-h^a hi;
ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u hi K'am-l'am-s^an.
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, k`i to-ch'on hi su"n-thien; chung-ng`in chhi`on-phu l`oi chhiu-khiun k`i, k`i chhiu chh^o-h^a-l`oi, kh^oi-s'u" k^au k`i-t^eu.
K^in-h+ok kau-s^u" l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in tai yit-ke fu-ng`in-k^a l`oi; k`i he chhai h`ang ki^en-y`im ke s`u"-chiet p^un-ng`in chok-t'o ke. K`i-t^eu pet k`i kh^i chhai t^ong-ch^ung,
chhiu tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, li'a-ke fu-ng`in-k^a h`ang ki^en-y`im ke s`u" p^un-ng`in chok-t'o.
M^o-s^i chhai fap-l+it-ch^ung min-lin ng`ai-t^eu, li'a-ch'ung ke fu-ng`in-k^a yin-k^oi yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i. Ng`i k'ong oi ngi'ong-p^an?"
K`i-t^eu si'ong-oi yung li'a-ke fa hoi Y^a-s^u, chh`im p'a-piang ko k`i. Y^a-s^u v^an-y^eu yung s'u-ch'u" chhai thi-song si'a su".
K`i-t^eu ki-si+uk mun m`o-th`in, Y^a-s^u chhiu kh^i-chh+u"t h'i-l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m'a-ng`in `m su"t fam-chhui ke, chhiu cho-tet si^en yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep k`i."
K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, k`i yu v^an-y^eu chhai thi-song si'a su".
K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu tui l'o-ke kh^oi-s'u", yit-ke yit-ke thui-ch'eu, ch'u"-y^u chh^un Y^a-s^u l^au kh^i chhai k`i mien-chhi`en ke fu-ng`in-k^a.
Y^a-s^u kh^i-chh+u"t h'i-l`oi, mun k`i k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, k`i-t^eu ch'eu-hi nai-vi? M`o ng`in li`u-h^a-l`oi thin ng`i ke chhui he-m`o?"
K`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, m`o." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "H'o, ng`ai ya `m thin ng`i ke chhui. Ch'on-hi, `m-h'o chai fam-chhui!" ]
Y^a-s^u yu tui thai-k^a k'ong: "Ng`ai he su"-ki^en ke k^ong; th`en ng`ai ke voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang ke k^ong, chhi+et-tui `m-voi chhai v^u-am-ch^ung h`ang."
Fap-li-soi-ng`in tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i vi ng`i chhu"-k^a cho-chu"n; ng`i ke kien-chu"n chhiu m`o-h'au."

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Chhiu-son ng`ai vi chhu"-k^a cho-chu"n, ng`ai ke kien-chu"n ya he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke; y^in-vi ng`ai t^i ng`ai tui nai-vi l`oi, oi hi nai-vi. Ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ng`ai tui nai-vi l`oi, oi hi nai-vi.
Ng`i-t^eu he yung ng`in ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi phan-ton ng`in; ch'ung-he ng`ai `m phan-ton ng`in.
K'a-s'u" ng`ai phan-ton ng`in, ng`ai ke phan-ton ya he chu"n-khok ke; y^in-vi ng`ai `m-he chhu"-k^a phan-ton, he ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha phan-ton.
Ng`i-t^eu ke Fap-l+it-s^u ki-chai k'ong, y^u li'ong-ke ng`in cho-chu"n, k`i-t^eu ke kien-chu"n f`u-h+ap, chhiu son y^u-h'au.
Ng`ai vi chhu"-k^a cho kien-chu"n; ke chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a ya vi ng`ai cho-chu"n."
K`i-t^eu chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "Ngi^a p^a chhai nai-vi?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-su"t ng`ai, ya `m-su"t ng^a P^a; k'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu su"t ng`ai, chhiu voi ngin-su"t ng^a P^a."
Li'a-t^eu fa he Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien ke ngi`un-khu ke-vi kau-hiun ng`in ke s`u" k'ong ke. T^ong-s`u" m`o-ng`in chok k`i, y^in-vi k`i ke s`u"-k^i h`an-m`ang to.
Y^a-s^u yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai oi l`i-kh^oi, ng`i-t^eu ya voi chh`im ng`ai, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu voi s'i chhai chhu"-k^a ke chhui-ch^ung. Ng`ai hi ke thi-f^ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet hi."
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu chhiu k'ong: "K`i k'ong 'Ng`ai hi ke thi-f^ong, ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet hi', k'am-k'ong k`i oi chhu"-sat he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu he tui thi-song l`oi ke, ng`ai he tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke; ng`i-t^eu s+uk li'a su"-kie, ng`ai `m-he s+uk li'a su"-kie.
S'o-y^i ng`ai k'ong, ng`i-t^eu voi s'i chhai chhu"-k^a ke chhui-ch^ung. K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu `m sin ng`ai chhiu-he ke 'Chhu"-y^u Y'un-y^u' ke, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi s'i chhai chhu"-k^a ke chhui-ch^ung."
K`i-t^eu chhiu mun: "Ng`i to-t'ai he m'a-ng`in?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai yit kh^oi-s'u" chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.

Ko^an-he ng`i-t^eu, y^u chhin-t^o su" ng`ai yin-t^ong oi k'ong, yin-t^ong oi ton. Ch'ung-he, ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' he ch^u"n-s+u"t kh'o-kho ke; ng`ai ch'u"-y^u chi^ong tui K`i ke-vi th^ang-t'o ke l^au su"-ki^en-ng`in k'ong."
K`i-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak Y^a-s^u s'o-k'ong ke he ko^an-he ^A-p^a ke su".

S'o-y^i Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong Ng`in-ch'u" khi`a-h'i-l`oi y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu chang voi t^i ng`ai chhiu-he ke 'Chhu"-y^u Y'un-y^u' ke, pin t^i ng`ai m`o kho chhu"-k^a cho m'a-ke, ng`ai ch'u"-y^u k'ong ^A-p^a s'o k^au ng`ai ke.
Ke chh^ai-phai ng`ai l`oi ke l^au ng`ai th`ung-chhai; K`i m`o piong ng`ai k^u-t^an, y^in-vi ng`ai yit-chh+u"t h`ang K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke su"."
Chhin-t^o ng`in th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u li'a-t^eu fa chhiu sin k`i.
Y^a-s^u tui sin k`i ke Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu na s`ong-s`ong ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke kau-hiun, chhiu chu"n-k^in he ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang;
ng`i-t^eu voi ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i, ch^u"n-l^i voi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o chhu"-y`u."

K`i-t^eu f`i-tap k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un; ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t cho-ko m'a-ng`in ke n`u-ph+uk. Ng`i k'ong 'Ng`i-t^eu voi tet-t'o chhu"-y`u', li'a-ki fa he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e?"
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m^i-yit-ke fam-chhui ke ng`in chhiu-he chhui ke n`u-ph+uk.
N`u-ph+uk chhai k^a-th`in ch^ung m`o yit-thin chhiong lai-'e yit-chh+u"t s+uk-y`i k^a-th`in.
K'a-s'u" Song-ti ke Lai-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o chhu"-y`u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu chu"n-k^in he chhu"-y`u-ng`in.
Ng`ai t^i ng`i-t^eu he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu h`an si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m chiap-su ng`ai ke kau-hiun.
Ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke he ng^a P^a ch'u"-su" ng`ai ke, ng`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke he ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke."

K`i-t^eu f`i-tap k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhiu-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu chu"n-k^in he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un, ng`i-t^eu ke h`ang-su" yit-thin voi l^au ^A-pak-l^a-h'on khiung-yong.
Ng`ai ch'u"-y^u chi^ong ng`ai tui Song-ti ke-vi th^ang-t'o ke ch^u"n-l^i l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu sa si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`ai. ^A-pak-l^a-h'on `m-su"t cho-ko li'a-ch'ung ke su" ^a!
Ng`i-t^eu he cho ng`i-t^eu ke ^a-p^a s'o cho ke su"." K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "Song-ti he ng`ai-t^eu v`i-yit ke ^A-p^a; ng`ai-t^eu pin `m-he s^u"-s^en-ch'u" ^a!"

Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Song-ti na ch^u"n-s+u"t he ng`i-t^eu ke ^A-p^a, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin voi siak ng`ai; y^in-vi ng`ai he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi-to li'a-vi ke. Ng`ai `m-he chhu"-k^a l`oi ke, he K`i chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke.
Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong `m-voi m`in-ph+ak ng`ai ke fa n`e? Y^in-vi ng`ai ke fa, ng`i-t^eu th^ang `m ng+ip-ng'i.

Ng`i-t^eu he M^o-k'ui ke ch'u"-'ng, phi^en-phi^en oi cheu ng`i-t^eu ^a-p^a ke s^u"-y+uk h`ang-su". Tui k'u-ch'o y^i-l`oi, k`i yit-chh+u"t he m`eu-hoi ng`in ke, `m-su"t kh^i chhai ch^u"n-l^i li'a-phi'en, y^in-vi k`i k^in-p'un m`o ch^u"n-l^i. K`i k'ong f^a-li^au he k`i ke p'un-sin; y^in-vi k`i p'un-l`oi chhiu-he f^a-li^au-k'u, ya he yit-chhiet h^i-k'a ke ngi`en-th`eu.
Chhiu-he y^in-vi ng`ai k'ong ch^u"n-l^i, s'o-y^i ng`i-t^eu chang `m sin ng`ai.
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m'a-ng`in n`en ch'u"-chu"n ng`ai y^u chhui n`e? Ki-y`en ng`ai he k'ong ch^u"n-l^i, ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an `m sin ng`ai n`e?
S'o-y^u s+uk Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, thin-chh+ok voi th^ang Song-ti ke fa. Ng`i-t^eu `m th^ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-he s+uk Song-ti ke."
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu mun Y^a-s^u: "Ng`ai-t^eu k'ong ng`i he Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in, yu p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n, k'am-k'ong `m-chh+ok m^a?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai pin m`o p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n; ng`ai ch^un-kin ng^a P^a, ng`i-t^eu sa v'u-y+uk ng`ai.
Ng`ai m`o ch^ui-khi`u chhu"-k^a ke y`ung-k^ong, ch'ung-he y^u yit-vi thoi ng`ai chh`im-khi`u, vi ng`ai ch'u-chh`u" k^ung-tho ke.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch^un-s'u ng^a kau-hiun ke ng`in yit-thin y'un-y'en `m-voi s'i."

Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Li'a-ha ng`ai-t^eu khok-s+u"t t^i ng`i he p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke! ^A-pak-l^a-h'on y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ke-t^eu si^en-t^i ya s'i-thet, ch'ung-he ng`i k'ong: 'Ch^un-s'u ng^a kau-hiun ke ng`in yit-thin y'un-y'en `m-voi s'i.'
K'am-k'ong ng`i p'i ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on h`an-kha v'i-thai m^a? ^A-pak-l^a-h'on y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ke-t^eu si^en-t^i ya y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ng`i khon chhu"-k^a son m'a-ke?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "K'a-s'u" ng`ai y`ung-k^ong chhu"-k^a, ng`ai ke k^ong-y`ung chhiu m`o m'a-ke ka-chh+u"t. Y`ung-k^ong ng`ai ke he ng^a P^a, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu s'o k'ong he ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti.

Ng`i-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t K`i, ch'ung-he ng`ai ngin-su"t K`i. K'a-s'u" ng`ai k'ong ng`ai `m su"t K`i, ng`ai chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu khiung-yong he k'ong f^a-li^au ke. Su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai ngin-su"t K`i, ya ch^un-s'u K`i ke kau-hiun.
Ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on su"t f^on-f^on h'i-h'i ngi'ong-mong ng`ai l`oi ke ngit-`e; k`i y^u khon-t'o, ya f^i-s`ong khoai-l+ok."
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i h`an-m`ang 'ng-s+u"p se, ng`i kien-ko ^A-pak-l^a-h'on m^a?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chhut-se y^i-chhi`en, ng`ai chhiu-he ke 'Chhu"-y^u Y'un-y^u' ke."
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu n^a s+ak-th`eu oi t+ep k`i; ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u s'am-ch'eu, l`i-kh^oi su"n-thien.
Y^a-s^u chhai lu-song khon-t'o yit-ke chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk ke ng`in.
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang mun k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, li'a-ke ng`in chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk, he m'a-ng`in ke chhui chho-s`u"n ke? He k`i chhu"-k^a ke chhui, ya-he ki^a y`a-^oi ke chhui n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "K`i ke m^o-muk l^au chhu"-k^a ya-he y`a-^oi ke chhui l^ung-ch'ung m`o ko^an-he, he oi chhai ki^a s^u"n-song ch^ong-hi'en Song-ti ke chok-v`i.
Ngit-s`u"-th`eu, ng`ai-t^eu yin-t^ong oi cho ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke k^ung-chok; am-p^u-s`u" yit-to, chhiu m`o-ng`in n`en k^ung-chok.
Ng`ai chhai su"-ki^en ke s`u", chhiu-he su"-ki^en ke k^ong."
K'ong li'a-ke fa y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u phi h'eu-l^an chhai thi-song, yung h'eu-l^an ki^au-n`ai, k`o m^o-muk ke muk-ch^u,
l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i hi S^i-l`o-^a ke s'ui-chh`u" s'e." ( S^i-l`o-^a ke yi-su" he "Fung chh^ai-phai".) K`i chhiu hi s'e, to-ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", y'i-k^in khon-tet-t'o l'e.
K`i ke l`in-sa l^au ke-t^eu s`ong-s`ong khon-t'o k`i th'o-s+u"t ke ng`in k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in `m-he ph`in-s`ong chh^o chhai li'a-vi th'o-s+u"t ke m^a?"
Y^u-t^eu k'ong: "Chhiu-he k`i!" Ya y^u-t^eu k'ong: "`M-he k`i, l^au k`i si^ong-chhiong thin-thin." Ke ng`in chhu"-k^a k'ong: "He ng`ai."
K`i-t^eu mun k`i k'ong: "Ngi^a muk-ch^u ngi'ong-p^an khon-tet-t'o n`e?"
K`i en-k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u ke, yung nam-n`ai k`o ng`ai ke muk-ch^u, l^au ng`ai k'ong: 'Ng`i hi S^i-l`o-^a ke s'ui-chh`u" s'e.' Ng`ai chhiu hi, yit s'e chhiu khon-tet-t'o."
K`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "Ke ng`in chhai nai-vi?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ng`ai `m t^i."
K`i-t^eu tai ke th`eu-p'ai m^o-muk ke ng`in hi kien Fap-li-soi-ng`in.
Y^a-s^u ki^au-n`ai y^i-h'o ki^a muk-ch^u, ke-ngit he ^On-sit-ngit.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in yu chh`a-mun ke ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an khon-tet-t'o ke. K`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "K`i yung nam-n`ai k`o ng`ai ke muk-ch^u, ng`ai yit s'e chhiu khon-tet-t'o."

Y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in k'ong: "Cho li'a-ke su" ke ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke, y^in-vi k`i m`o ch^un-s'u ^On-sit-ngit ke k^ui-thin." Nang-ngoi y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "Y^u chhui ke ng`in ngi'ong-voi h`ang 'an-ngi`ong ke s`u"n-chiak n`e?" K`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en chhiu fat-s^en f^un-ch^en.
S'o-y^i, ke-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in yu mun m^o-muk ke ng`in k'ong: "Ki-y`en k`i y^i-h'o ngi^a muk-ch^u, ng`i k'ong k`i he ngi'ong-p^an ke ng`in?" K`i en-k'ong: "K`i he yit-ke si^en-t^i."
Ke-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu `m-h'en sin k`i th`eu-p'ai he m^o-muk-ke, li'a-ha y'i-k^in khon-tet-t'o; t'en-to chi^ong k`i ke y`a-^oi chh`im-l`oi,
k`i-t^eu chhiu mun-k'ong: "Li'a he ngi^a lai-'e m`o? Ng`i-t^eu `m-he k'ong k`i yit chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk m^a? 'An-ngi`ong, li'a-ha ngi'ong-voi khon-tet-t'o n`e?"
K`i ke y`a-^oi en-k'ong: "K`i he ng`ai-t^eu ke lai-'e, ng`ai-t^eu ya t^i k`i yit chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk.
K`i li'a-ha ngi'ong-p^an khon-tet-t'o, he m'a-ng`in y^i-h'o ki^a muk-ch^u, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu `m t^i. K`i y'i-k^in thai l'e, ng`i-t^eu hi mun k`i, k`i chhu"-k^a voi k'ong!"

K`i ke y`a-^oi 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he y^in-vi ki^ang Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu; t^ong-s`u" Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu y'i-k^in k'ong-h'o, k'a-s'u" y^u-ng`in s`u"n-ngin Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk, chhiu oi chi^ong k`i kiuk-chhut fi-th`ong.
S'o-y^i k`i ke y`a-^oi en-k'ong: "K`i y'i-k^in thai l'e, ng`i-t^eu hi mun k`i!"

K`i-t^eu chai yit-p'ai chi^ong ke chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk ke ng`in h^em-l`oi, tui k`i k'ong: "Chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, ng`i yit-thin oi k'ong s+u"t-fa! Ng`ai-t^eu t^i ke-chak ng`in he yit-ke chhui-ng`in."
K`i en-k'ong: "K`i he `m-he chhui-ng`in, ng`ai `m t^i; ch'ung-he ng`ai t^i yit-hong su": Ng`ai p'un-l`oi he m^o-muk ke, li'a-ha khon tet-t'o!"
K`i-t^eu mun-k'ong: "K`i tui ng`i cho m'a-ke? K`i ngi'ong-p^an y^i-h'o ngi^a muk-ch^u?"
K`i en-k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko, ng`i-t^eu `m-oi th^ang. Cho-m'a-ke li'a-ha yu oi th^ang n`e? K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu ya si'ong-oi cho ki^a h+ok-s^ang he-m`o?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu ma k`i k'ong: "Ng`i chang he ke-chak ng`in ke h+ok-s^ang! Ng`ai-t^eu he M^o-s^i ke h+ok-s^ang!
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i Song-ti su"t l^au M^o-s^i k'ong-ko fa; ch'ung-he ke-chak ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu k^in-p'un `m t^i k`i he tui nai-vi l`oi ke!"
K`i en-k'ong: "Li'a chhiu kh`i-koai l'e! K`i y^i-h'o ng`ai ke muk-ch^u, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m t^i k`i he tui nai-vi l`oi ke!
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i Song-ti `m-oi th^ang chhui-ng`in ke kh`i-khi`u; K`i ch'u"-y^u th^ang ke kin-pai K`i, pin s+u"t-h`ang K`i ch'u"-yi ke ng`in.
Chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi, chhut-se chhiu m^o-muk ke, m`ang-su"t th^ang-ko y^u ng`in y^i-h'o ki^a muk-ch^u.
Li'a-ke ng`in na-`m-he tui Song-ti l`oi ke, k`i m'a-ke t^u m`o fap-thu cho."
K`i-t^eu chit-phi k`i k'ong: "Ng`i li'a chhut-se chhai chhui-ok ch^ung ke t^ung-s^i, ngi'ong-p^an k'am kau-hiun ng`ai-t^eu!" K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong k`i kiuk-chhut fi-th`ong.
Y^a-s^u th^ang-k'ong k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i kiuk-chhut fi-th`ong ke su", chhiu chh`im-t'o k`i, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i sin Ng`in-ch'u" m`o?"
K`i en-k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi'ang l^au ng`ai k'ong m'a-ng`in he Ng`in-ch'u", ng`ai chhiu sin k`i!"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i y'i-k^in khon-t'o k`i, li'a-ha l^au ng`i k'ong-fa ke chhiu-he k`i."
K`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai sin!" chhiu pai Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai l`oi su"-ki^en ke muk-tit he oi s'u"m-phan, p^un m^o-muk-ke khon-tet-t'o, khon-tet-t'o ke f'an-ch'on pien-cho m^o-muk."
Chhai ki^a s^u"n-pi^en, y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu mun k`i k'ong: "K'am-k'ong ng`i chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu ya khon-cho m^o-muk-ke he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu na-he m^o-muk ke, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m`o chhui; li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu k'ong 'Ng`ai-t^eu khon-tet-t'o', 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu h`an-he chhai chhui-ch^ung."
Y^a-s^u yu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng+ip y`ong-l`an, m`o tui m`un, f'an-ch'on tui ph+et-vi ph`an-ko-hi ke, chhiu-he chh+et-'e, he khi`ong-tho.
Tui m`un ng+ip-hi ke, chang he y`ong ke m+uk-ch'a.
Ch'ong-m`un-ke vi k`i kh^oi-m`un; k`i ke y`ong ngin-su"t k`i ke s^ang. K`i cheu mi`ang-`e h^em chhu"-k^a ke y`ong, tai k`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi.
K`i chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke y`ong chhi`on-phu tai-chhut-l`oi, chhiu chhai k`i-t^eu ke th`eu-chhi`en h`ang; k`i ke y`ong-`e th`en-t'en k`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ngin-su"t k`i ke s^ang.
K`i-t^eu `m-oi th`en s^ang-fun-ng`in, f'an-ch'on voi s'am-ch'eu, y^in-vi `m su"t s^ang-fun-ng`in ke s^ang."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-ke p'i-yi, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu `m-voi m`in-ph+ak k`i s'o k'ong ke he m'a-ke yi-su".
S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai chhiu-he y`ong ke m`un.
P'i ng`ai si^en l`oi ke, chhi`on-phu he chh+et-'e, he khi`ong-tho; ch'ung-he y`ong-`e `m th^ang-chhi`ung k`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai chhiu-he m`un; tui ng`ai ng+ip-l`oi ke, yit-thin voi tet-kiu, chhu"-y`u chhut-ng+ip, chh`im-t'o chh'o-ph^u.
Chh+et-'e ng+ip-l`oi, chhiu-he oi th^eu, oi chh`u", oi f'i-m+et. Ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit he oi p^un ng`ai ke y`ong-`e tet-t'o s^ang-miang, chhiu-he f^ung-f^ung fu-fu ke s^ang-miang.
"Ng`ai he h'o m+uk-ch'a; h'o m+uk-ch'a vi-t'o y`ong h^i-s^en s^ang-miang.

Na-he chhi'ang-l`oi ke k^ung-ng`in, `m-he m+uk-ch'a, y`ong-`e ya `m-he k`i ke, k`i yit khon-t'o s`ai-l`ong l`oi, chhiu piong-thet y`ong-`e th`o-ch'eu; s`ai-l`ong k^ung-kit y`ong-khi`un, k'on-san k`i-t^eu.
K^ung-ng`in th`o-ch'eu, y^in-vi k`i he chhi'ang-l`oi ke, m`o ko^an-s^im y`ong-khi`un.

"Ng`ai he h'o m+uk-ch'a. Chhiong ^A-p^a ngin-su"t ng`ai, ng`ai ya ngin-su"t ^A-p^a; khiung-yong, ng`ai ngin-su"t ng`ai ke y`ong, ng`ai ke y`ong ya ngin-su"t ng`ai. Ng`ai vi-t'o k`i-t^eu h^i-s^en s^ang-miang.

Ng`ai h`an-y^u kh`i-th^a ke y`ong, m`o chhai li'a y`ong-l`an ch^ung; ng`ai yit-thin oi chi^ong k`i-t^eu chh`im-ch'on-l`oi, k`i-t^eu ya voi th^ang ng`ai ke s^ang; li'ong-khi`un oi kap-cho yit-khi`un, th`ung s+uk yit-ke m+uk-ch'a.
"^A-p^a siak ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai k^am-ngien h^i-s^en ng`ai ke s^ang-miang, vi-t'o oi chai tet-t'o s^ang-miang.

M`o ng`in n`en chi^ong ng`ai ke s^ang-miang chhi'ong-ch'eu, he ng`ai chhu"-ngien h^i-s^en ke; ng`ai y^u khi`en h^i-s^en, ya y^u-khi`en chai tet-t'o k`i. Li'a he ng`ai tui ng^a P^a li^ang-su ke min-lin."
Y`u-thai-ng`in yu vi-t'o li'a-t^eu fa y^in-h'i f^un-ch^en.
K`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u h'o-t^o ng`in k'ong: "K`i p^un k'ui fu-s^u"n! K`i pot-ti^en l'e! Ngi'ong oi-s'u" th^ang k`i?"
Ya y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "P^un k'ui fu-s^u"n ke ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en k'ong-chhut li'a-ch'ung ke fa! K'ui voi y^i-h'o m^o-muk ke muk-ch^u m^a?"
Chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, khin-chuk Hien-thien-chiet ke s`u" to l'e; ke-s`u" he t^ung-thi^en.
Y^a-s^u chhai su"n-thien ke S'o-l`o-m`un l`ong-h^a h`ang;
Y`u-thai-ng`in v`i-t'en k`i, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi ng`ai-t^eu ng`i-f`u to k'i-s`u" n`e? Th'an-ph+ak l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, ng`i he K^i-tuk m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai ch'o chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m-h'en sin. Ng`ai fung ng^a P^a ke mi`ang s'o-cho ke su" chhiu-he ng`ai ke chu"n-k'i;
ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m sin, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-he ng`ai ke y`ong.
Ng`ai ke y`ong th^ang ng`ai ke s^ang; ng`ai ngin-su"t k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu ya th`en-t'en ng`ai.
Ng`ai su k`i-t^eu y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang, k`i-t^eu `m-voi m+et-m`ong; m`o-ng`in n`en chi^ong k`i-t^eu tui ng`ai ke s'u-ch^ung chhi'ong-ch'eu.
Ng^a P^a chi^ong k`i-t^eu su-p^un ng`ai, K`i p'i m'a-ke t^u h`an-kha thai, m`o ng`in n`en chi^ong k`i-t^eu tui ^A-p^a ke s'u-ch^ung chhi'ong-ch'eu.
^A-p^a l^au ng`ai he yit-th'i."
Li'a-s`u", Y`u-thai-ng`in yu n^a s+ak-th`eu oi t+ep k`i.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai su"t hi'en-m`in ^A-p^a oi ng`ai cho ke t^o-t^o san-su" p^un ng`i-t^eu khon; ng`i-t^eu to-t'ai vi nai-hong su" oi n^a s+ak-th`eu t+ep ng`ai?"
Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he vi-t'o san-su" l`oi t+ep ng`i, he y^in-vi ng`i v'u-y+uk Song-ti! Ng`i put-ko he ng`in, h`an k'am chhu"-k^a t^ong-cho Song-ti!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ke Fap-l+it-s^u k'am `m-he y^u si'a, Song-ti su"t k'ong: 'Ng`i-t^eu he s`u"n'?
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i Su"n-k^in ke fa he y'un-y'en `m-voi k'oi-pien ke. Li`en ke-t^eu chiap-su Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke ng`in, Song-ti ya chh^u"n k`i-t^eu cho s`u"n;
ng`ai he ^A-p^a s'o ki'en-si'en yu chh^ai-phai l`oi su"-ki^en ke; ng`ai k'ong ng`ai he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an yu k'ong ng`ai v'u-y+uk Song-ti n`e?
Na-he ng`ai m`o h`ang ng^a P^a ke su", ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" sin ng`ai;
na-he ng`ai y^u h`ang, ng`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en `m sin ng`ai, ya yin-t^ong sin ng`ai s'o-cho ke, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t t^i: ^A-p^a chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai ya chhai ^A-p^a t^i-poi."
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu yu si'ong-oi chok k`i, ch'ung-he k`i tui k`i-t^eu ke s'u-ch^ung s'am-ch'eu.
Y^a-s^u yu ch'on-to Yok-tan-h`o ke tui-mien, to Yok-hon th`eu-p'ai h`ang s'e-l^i ke s'o-chhai, h+et chhai ke-vi.
Y^u chhin-t^o ng`in l`oi chhiu-khiun k`i. K`i-t^eu k'ong: " Yok-hon `m-su"t h`ang-ko s`u"n-chiak, ch'ung-he k`i s'o-k'ong ko^an-he li'a ng`in ke fa chhi`on-phu he khok-s+u"t ke."
Chhai ke-vi, y^u chhin-t^o ng`in chhiu sin Y^a-s^u.
Y^u yit-ke phiang-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to L^a-sat-lu, h+et chhai Pak-thai-n`i; M^a-li-^a l^au k`i ke ^a-ch'i M^a-thai ya h+et chhai li'a chh^un-ch^ong.
(Li'a M^a-li-^a chhiu-he yung hi^ong-y`u k`o Ch'u ke kiok, yu yung chhu"-k^a ke th`eu-n`a-m^o chh+ut-ch^au ke. Pot-phiang ke L^a-sat-lu chhiu-he ki^a l'o-th^ai.)
Ke li'ong ch'i-moi ham ng`in hi kien Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i s'o-siak ke ph`en-y^u pot-phiang l'e."
Y^a-s^u th^ang-t'o li'a s^eu-sit chhiu k'ong: " L^a-sat-lu `m voi y^in-vi li'a-ke phiang l`oi s'i; li'a-khien su" fat-s^en he oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti, s'u" Song-ti ke Lai-'e tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong."
Y^a-s^u chhin-siak M^a-thai l^au ki^a l'o-moi, pin L^a-sat-lu.
