K`i th^ang-t'o L^a-sat-lu pot-phiang ke s^eu-sit heu, yu chhai s'o-h+et ke thi-f^ong th`in li'ong-ngit.
Y`en-heu k`i chang l^au h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu to-ch'on-hi Y`u-thai."
Ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, chhi`en m`o k'i-ki'u, Y`u-thai-ng`in oi n^a s+ak-th`eu t+ep ng`i, ng`i h`an si'ong-oi chai hi ke-vi m^a?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ngit-s`u"-th`eu `m-he y^u s+u"p-ngi ti'am-ch^ung m^a? Ng`in chhai ngit-s`u"-th`eu h`ang-lu chhiu `m-voi tiet-t'o, y^in-vi k`i khon-tet-t'o li'a su"-ki^en ke k^ong.
Ng`in chhai am-p^u-th`eu h`ang-lu chhiu voi tiet-t'o, y^in-vi k`i m`o k^ong."
Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-t^eu fa y^i-heu, yu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ke ph`en-y^u L^a-sat-lu soi-thet l'e; ng`ai oi hi h^em k`i hong-h'i-l`oi."
H+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, k`i na-he soi-thet, chhiu voi h'o h'i-l`oi."
Kh`i-s+u"t, Y^a-s^u ke yi-su" he k'ong L^a-sat-lu y'i-k^in s'i-thet; k`i-t^eu l'au-t'o k`i he k'ong ph`in-s`ong ke soi-muk.
S'o-y^i Y^a-s^u m`in-m`in l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: " L^a-sat-lu y'i-k^in s'i-thet;
vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku, h'o-chhai ng`ai m`o-chh^oi ke-vi, 'an-ngi`ong ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi sin. Li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi k`i ke-vi."
T^o-m^a (phi^en-mi`ang S^ung-s^ang-'e) tui kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha l`oi-hi, h'o th`ung s^in-s^ang khiung-ha s'i!"
Y^a-s^u to Pak-thai-n`i, chhiu t^i L^a-sat-lu y'i-k^in chhai si-ngit-chhi`en m`ai-thet.
Pak-thai-n`i l`i-kh^oi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang chi^ong-khiun s^am k^ung-l^i y'en;
y^u h'o-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in l`oi-khon M^a-thai l^au M^a-li-^a, vi-t'o k`i-t^eu l'o-th^ai ke s'i l`oi ^on-v'i k`i-t^eu.
M^a-thai th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u voi to l'e, chhiu chhut-hi ngi`ang-chiap k`i; ch'ung-he M^a-li-^a li`u chhai vuk-t'u chh^o-t'en.
M^a-thai tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i na-he chhai li'a-vi, ng^a l'o-th^ai chhiu `m voi s'i!
Ch'ung-he ng`ai t^i, chhiu-he li'a-ha, m`o-lun ng`i tui Song-ti khi`u m'a-ke, K`i ya voi su-p^un ng`i."
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Ngi^a l'o-th^ai yit-thin voi f+uk-f+at."
M^a-thai k'ong: "Ng`ai t^i, chhai m+at-ngit f+uk-f+at ke s`u"-chiet, k`i voi f+uk-f+at."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he f+uk-f+at, chhiu-he s^ang-miang. Sin ng`ai ke ng`in, s^ui-y`en s'i-thet, yit-thin voi s^ang ko-l`oi;
s^en-chhi`en sin ng`ai ke ng`in yit-thin y'un-y'en `m-voi s'i. Ng`i si^ong-sin li'a-t^eu fa m`o?"
M^a-thai k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai sin! Ng`ai sin ng`i chhiu-he ke oi l`oi su"-ki^en ke K^i-tuk, Song-ti ke Lai-'e."
M^a-thai k'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, chhiu ch'on-hi vuk-h^a, se-s^ang l^au ki^a l'o-moi M^a-li-^a k'ong: "S^in-s^ang l`oi l'e, k`i ham ng`i."
M^a-li-^a th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chit-s`u" chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi, hi kien Y^a-s^u.
(Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u h`an-m`ang ng+ip chh^un-ch^ong, h`an chhai M^a-thai ngi`ang-chiap k`i ke thi-f^ong.)
Ke-t^eu to vuk-h^a l`oi ^on-v'i M^a-li-^a ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, khon-t'o k`i k'on-k'in hong-h'i-l`oi chhut-hi, chhiu th`en-t'en k`i, l'au-t'o k`i oi hi f`un-mu ke-vi kieu.
M^a-li-^a l`oi-to Y^a-s^u ke-vi, yit khon-t'o k`i, chhiu ph+uk chhai ki^a kiok-chhi`en, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i na-he chhai li'a-vi, ng^a l'o-th^ai chhiu `m-voi s'i!"
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o M^a-li-^a kieu, yu khon-t'o th`en k`i khiung-ha l`oi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in ya kieu, s^im-ch^ung f^i-s`ong p^i-s^ong, khi`ong-khi`ong voi ngi^un-`m-h+et,
chhiu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i chong chhai nai-vi?" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chhi'ang ng`i l`oi khon."
Y^a-s^u kieu chhut-l`oi.
S'o-y^i Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i khon, k`i h`an siak li'a-ke ng`in ^o!"
Ch'ung-he y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "K`i ki-y`en y^i-h'o m^o-muk ke muk-ch^u, k'am m`o fap-thu s'u" L^a-sat-lu m+ok s'i m^a?"
Y^a-s^u s^im-ch^ung yu f^i-s`ong p^i-s^ong. K`i l`oi-to f`un-mu-chhi`en; ke mu he yit-chak s^an-l`ung, ng+ip-h'eu y^u yit-te thai s+ak-th`eu set-t'en.
Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k'ong: "Chi^ong s+ak-th`eu s'ai-kh^oi!" S'i-ng`in ke ^a-ch'i M^a-thai k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, k`i y'i-k^in m`ai-thet si-ngit, s^u"n-s^u" t^u chhu-thet l^e!"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he su"t l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`i na-he sin, chhiu voi khon-t'o Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong m^a?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong s+ak-th`eu s'ai-kh^oi. Y^a-s^u ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, ng`ai k'am-chhia Ng`i, y^in-vi Ng`i y'i-k^in th^ang ng`ai.
Ng`ai t^i Ng`i s`u"-s`ong th^ang ng`ai; ch'ung-he ng`ai k'ong li'a-ke fa he vi-t'o s`un-th`eu li'a-t^eu ng`in, oi p^un k`i-t^eu sin he Ng`i chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke."
K'ong-li'au, Y^a-s^u chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " L^a-sat-lu, chhut-l`oi!"
Ke s'i-ng`in chhiu chhut-l`oi; ki^a s'u-kiok chh`an-t'en pu-thi`au, mien p^au-t'en pu-'e. Y^a-s^u f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ki'e-kh^oi, p^un k`i h`ang!"
Chhin-t^o l`oi khon M^a-li-^a ke Y`u-thai-ng`in khon-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-cho ke su", chhiu sin k`i.
Ch'ung-he ya y^u-t^eu ng`in hi kien Fap-li-soi-ng`in, chi^ong Y^a-s^u s'o-cho ke su" tui k`i-t^eu po-ko.
S'o-y^i, Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong seu-kh^oi ngi-fi, chhai fi-ch^ung k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in h`ang 'an-t^o s`u"n-chiak, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e?
K'a-s'u" ng`ai-t^eu y`u-chhai k`i met-h^a-hi, thai-k^a t^u voi sin k`i, L`o-m^a-ng`in chhiu voi l`oi f'i-m+et ng`ai-t^eu ke su"n-thien l^au m`in-chh+uk!"
K`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to K^ai-^a-fap, he ke-ngi`en cho thai-chi-s^u" ke. K`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi 'an ngong!
Yit-ke ng`in thoi chhi`on-koet ke ng`in s'i, mi^en-tet chhi`on m`in-chh+uk su s^eu-m+et, li'a k'am `m-he tui ng`i-t^eu chui y^u li-yit ke su" m^a?"
Kh`i-s+u"t, li'a-ke fa `m-he k`i chhu"-k^a ke yi-su"; ch'ung-he, s^u"n-v`i t^ong-ngi`en ke thai-chi-s^u", k`i he chhai yi-ngi`en Y^a-s^u oi thoi Y`u-thai-ng`in s'i,
`m t^an-chhiang thoi k`i-t^eu s'i, ya oi chi^ong san chhai kok thi-f^ong Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng seu-s+ip khiung-ha, kap-cho yit-khi`un.
Tui ke-s`u" kh^oi-s'u", Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu chhiu kie-v+ak oi sat-hoi Y^a-s^u.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u m`o-oi chhai Y`u-thai thi-kh^i k^ung-kh^oi h`ang-thung. K`i to kh'ong-y^a fu-khiun yit-ke ^on-to Y^i-fap-li`en ke chh^un-ch^ong hi, chhai ke-vi th`ung h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha h+et.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Ph`an-ko-chiet voi to l'e. Chiet-kh`i y^i-chhi`en, chhin-t^o ng`in tui hi^ong-ha s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi, oi chhai ke-vi s'u kiet-chhiang-l^i.
K`i-t^eu chhiu k'in chh`im Y^a-s^u; k`i-t^eu chhi-s+ip chhai su"n-thien ke s`u", p'i-chh'u" mun k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ngin-v`i ngi'ong-p^an, k`i k'am `m-voi l`oi ko-chiet m^a?"
Ke-s`u", chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in ch'o y'i-k^in ha min-lin k'ong: K'a-s'u" y^u-ng`in t^i Y^a-s^u chhai nai-vi, yit-thin oi po-ko, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu hi chok k`i.
Ph`an-ko-chiet chhi`en liuk-ngit, Y^a-s^u to Pak-thai-n`i, chhiu-he L^a-sat-lu h+et ke thi-f^ong (Y^a-s^u su"t chhai li'a-vi ham L^a-sat-lu f+uk-f+at).
Chhai ke-vi y^u-ng`in chhi'ang Y^a-s^u s+u"t-ya; M^a-thai then-s'u ch^eu-thai, L^a-sat-lu l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in-hak th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha chh^o-s+it.

Li'a-s`u", M^a-li-^a n^a yit-kon pan-k^in-chh^ung kh+it p'o-kui ke s`un n^a-th+at hi^ong-y`u, l`oi k`o Y^a-s^u ke kiok, yu yung chhu"-k^a ke th`eu-n`a-m^o chh+ut; vuk-t'u chhiu chh^ung-m^an hi^ong-mi.
Y^a-s^u ke yit-ke h+ok-s^ang, chhiu-he oi chhut-mai k`i ke K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai, k'ong:
"Ngi'ong-p^an `m n^a li'a hi^ong-y`u hi mai s^am-pak-chak ngi`un-chhi`en l`oi p^un-p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in n`e?"
(K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa, pin `m-he chu"n-k^in ko^an-s^im khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, he y^in-vi k`i he chh+et-'e; k`i k'on-chhi`en, s`ong-s`ong th^eu-n^a k^ung-kho'an.)
Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y`u-chhai k`i! Li'a he k`i li`u-h^a-l`oi vi-t'o ng`ai ^on-chong ke-ngit yung ke.
Khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, ch'ung-he ng`ai `m-he s`ong-s`ong th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha!"

Yit thai-khi`un Y`u-thai-ng`in th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u chhai Pak-thai-n`i, chhiu to k`i ke-vi hi. K`i-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang he vi-t'o Y^a-s^u hi, ya he si'ong-oi khon Y^a-s^u ham k`i tui s'i f'an-s^ang ke L^a-sat-lu.
S'o-y^i, ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong chhiu kie-m`eu oi li`en L^a-sat-lu ya khiung-ha chh`u"-thet,
y^in-vi chhin-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in vi-t'o k`i ke y`en-ku l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, hi sin Y^a-s^u.
Thi-ngi-ngit, k^ui thai-chhu"n to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ko-chiet ke ng`in th^ang-k'ong Y^a-s^u oi ng+ip-s`ang.

K`i-t^eu chhiu n^a-t'en ch^ung-su-k^i chhut-hi ngi`ang-chiap k`i, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: H`o-san-n^a! Siung-chan Song-ti! Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke fung Ch'u mi`ang l`oi ke! Ngien Song-ti su-fuk p^un Y^i-set-li+et ke v`ong!
Y^a-s^u chh`im-t'o yit-chak se l`i-`e, kh`i s^ong-hi, chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o ki-chai ke:
Siak-^on-s`ang ke ch'u"-'ng ^a, `m-s'u" ki^ang! Khon ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke ki^un-v`ong kh`i-t'en se l`i-`e l`oi l'e!

Ke-s`u", ki^a h+ok-s^ang m`o li'au-ki'e li'a su"-chh`in ke yi-su"; to Y^a-s^u tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong y^i-heu, k`i-t^eu chang si'ong-t'o Su"n-k^in ke fa chhiu-he ch'u" k`i k'ong ke, k`i-t^eu ya chu"n-k^in cheu s'o yi-ngi`en ke h`ang.
Y^a-s^u ham L^a-sat-lu tui s'i f'an-s^ang, tui f`un-mu chhut-l`oi ke s`u", ke-t^eu chhai-chh`ong ke ng`in ki-si+uk chi^ong s'o khon-t'o ke su" chh`on kh^oi-l`oi.
Li'a chhiu-he y^u 'an-t^o ng`in hi ngi`ang-chiap Y^a-s^u ke ngi`en-y^in, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o k`i s'o-h`ang ke li'a s`u"n-chiak.
Fap-li-soi-ng`in chhiu p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu s'o-cho ke chhi`on m`o-h'au; khon ^a, chhi`on su"-kie l^ung-ch'ung th`en k`i hi l^o!"
Chiet-kh`i-ch^ung, to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang cho l^i-pai ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u-t^eu H^i-li+ap-ng`in.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-kien K^a-li-li ke Pak-soi-thai-ng`in F^i-l+it, y^eu-khi`u k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, ng`ai-t^eu si'ong-oi kien Y^a-s^u."
F^i-l+it hi l^au ^On-tet-li+et k'ong, li'ong-ke ng`in chhiu khiung-ha hi l^au Y^a-s^u k'ong.
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`in-ch'u" tet y`ung-yeu ke s`u"-chiet to l'e!
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, yit-li+ap m+ak-'e m`o l+ok chhai n`ai-t'u l`oi s'i, h`an-he yit-li+ap; na-he s'i-thet, chhiu voi kiet-ch'u" t^o-t^o.
Siak chhu"-k^a s^ang-miang ke ng`in, voi su"t-l+ok s^ang-miang; k^am-ngien h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a chhai li'a su"-ki^en ke s^ang-miang ke, k`i ke s^ang-miang f'an-ch'on voi p'o-chh`un to y'un-s^en.
Oi f+uk-su" ng`ai ke ng`in, chhiu oi th`en ng`ai; ng`ai chhai nai-vi, ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in ya oi chhai nai-vi. F+uk-su" ng`ai ke ng`in, ng^a P^a yit-thin voi chhung-yung k`i.

"Li'a-ha, ng`ai ke s^im chhin s`eu, ng`ai oi k'ong m'a-ke n`e? Ng`ai k'am oi khi`u ^A-p^a kiu ng`ai thot-l`i li'a-ke s`u"-chiet m`o? Ch'ung-he, ng`ai chhiu-he vi li'a l`oi ke, yit-thin oi k^in-l+it li'a kh'u-nan ke s`u"-chiet.
^A-p^a ^a, ngien Ng`i y`ung-k^ong Ng`i ke mi`ang!" T^ong-s`u", y^u s^ang-y^im tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, k'ong: "Ng`ai y'i-k^in y`ung-k^ong Ng`ai ke mi`ang, h`an-oi chai y`ung-k^ong!"
Kh^i chhai ke-vi ke chung-ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke s^ang, chhiu k'ong: "T'a l`ui-k^ung l^o!" Ya y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "He thi^en-s'u" l^au k`i k'ong-fa!"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a s^ang-y^im `m-he vi-t'o ng`ai, he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu l`oi ke.
Li'a-ha, li'a su"-kie oi su s'u"m-phan; li'a-ha, su"-ki^en ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a voi p^un Song-ti kiuk-ch'eu l'e.
Ng`ai chhu"-k^a p^un-ng`in tui thi-song khi`a-h'i-l`oi ke s`u", voi khip-y^in van-ng`in l`oi k^ui ng`ai."
(K`i k'ong li'a-ke fa he ch'u" k`i chhu"-k^a voi ngi'ong-p^an s'i k'ong ke.)

Chung-ng`in en-k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, K^i-tuk he y'un-y'en chh`ong-chh`un ke; ng`i ngi'ong-p^an k'ong Ng`in-ch'u" yit-thin oi p^un-ng`in khi`a-h'i-l`oi? Li'a Ng`in-ch'u" he m'a-ng`in n`e?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "K^ong chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke s`u"-ki^en m`o k'i-ki'u l'e; ng`i-t^eu oi k'on h`an-y^u k^ong ke s`u" ki-si+uk h`ang, mi^en-tet v^u-am kiuk-t'o ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi chhai v^u-am-ch^ung h`ang ke ng`in `m-t^i k`i voi hi-to nai-vi.
K'on ng`i-t^eu h`an-y^u k^ong ke s`u" oi sin li'a k^ong, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho k^ong-m`in ke ng`in." K'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, Y^a-s^u chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, khong-h'i-l`oi.
K`i s^ui-y`en chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en su"t h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak, k`i-t^eu h`an-he `m sin k`i.
Li'a he oi yin-ngiam si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a su"t k'ong ke fa: Ch'u ^a, y^u m'a-ng`in sin ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on ke tho-l^i n`e? Ch'u ke khi`en-n`en tui m'a-ng`in hi'en-m`in n`e?
S'o-y^i k`i-t^eu m`o-fap sin; y^in-vi Y^i-soi-^a ya su"t k'ong:

Song-ti s'u" k`i-t^eu chhi^ang-mi^ang, s'u" k`i-t^eu ngang-s^im, mi^en-tet k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u khon-tet-t'o, k`i-t^eu ke s^im m`in-ph+ak. S'o-y^i Song-ti k'ong: K`i-t^eu `m-voi ch'on-hiong Ng`ai, l`oi p^un Ng`ai y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu.
Y^i-soi-^a k'ong li'a-t^eu fa he y^in-vi k`i khon-t'o Y^a-s^u ke y`ung-k^ong, ch'u" k`i l`oi k'ong ke.

S^ui-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu ch^ung ya y^u h'o-t^o sin Y^a-s^u ke, ch'ung-he y^in-vi ki^ang Fap-li-soi-ng`in, `m-k'am k^ung-kh^oi s`u"n-ngin, mi^en-tet p^un-ng`in kiuk-chhut fi-th`ong.
K`i-t^eu oi tet-t'o ng`in ke chh^u"n-chan, y`ang-ko oi tet-t'o Song-ti ke chh^u"n-chan.
Y^a-s^u thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Sin ng`ai ke, `m t^an-chhiang he sin ng`ai, ya he sin ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke'.
Khon-t'o ng`ai, ya he khon-t'o ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke'.
Ng`ai cho k^ong, l`oi-to su"-ki^en, he oi p^un s'o-y^u sin ng`ai ke ng`in `m-voi h+et chhai v^u-am-ch^ung.
Ke th^ang ng`ai ke fa, `m ch^un-s'u ke ng`in, ng`ai `m-voi s'u"m-phan k`i. Ng`ai l`oi ke muk-tit `m-he oi s'u"m-phan su"-ki^en-ng`in, he oi ch'u"n-kiu k`i-t^eu.
Kh^i-chhi+et ng`ai, `m chiap-su ng^a fa ke ng`in, chhu"-y^u s'u"m-phan k`i ke; chhai m+at-ngit, ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke tho-l^i voi s'u"m-phan k`i!
Y^in-vi ng`ai `m-he kho chhu"-k^a ke khi`en-piang l`oi k'ong, f'an-ch'on he chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a min-lin ng`ai k'ong m'a-ke, chh`on m'a-ke.
Ng`ai t^i K`i ke min-lin voi tai-l`oi y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang. S'o-y^i, ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke chhiu-he cheu ^A-p^a l^au ng`ai k'ong ke."

Ph`an-ko-chiet chhi`en, Y^a-s^u t^i k`i l`i-kh^oi li'a su"-kie ch'on ^A-p^a ke-vi hi ke s`u"-chiet to l'e. K`i yit-chh+u"t siak chhai su"-ki^en s+uk k`i chhu"-k^a ke ng`in, k`i chhiu siak k`i-t^eu to-t'ai.
Y^a-s^u l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang s+u"t-ya ke s`u", M^o-k'ui y'i-k^in kh'ung-chu" K^a-li+ok-ng`in S^i-m`un ke lai-'e Y`u-thai ke s^im, s'u" k`i kiet-s^im chhut-mai Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u t^i ^A-p^a y'i-k^in chi^ong yit-chhiet ke khi`en-piang k^au-p^un k`i; k`i t^i chhu"-k^a he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke, oi to-ch'on Song-ti ke-vi hi.
K`i hong-h'i-l`oi, l`i-kh^oi chho-vi, thot-h^a ngoi-s^am, n^a yit-thi`au s'u-pha v`i chhai y^eu-khi^en,
y`en-heu t'o s'ui l+ok kiok-ph`un, kh^oi-s'u" s'e h+ok-s^ang ke kiok, yu yung ke s'u-pha chh+ut-ch^au.
K`i l`oi-to S^i-m`un-P'i-tet ke mien-chhi`en, P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i oi s'e ng`ai ke kiok he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai s'o-cho ke, ng`i li'a-ha m`o li'au-ki'e, chi^ong-l`oi ng`i chhiu voi m`in-ph+ak."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m p^un ng`i s'e ng`ai ke kiok!" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "K'a-s'u" ng`ai m`o s'e ng`i ke kiok, ng`i l^au ng`ai chhiu m`o m'a-ke ko^an-he."
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, `m t^an-chhiang ng`ai ke kiok, li`en s'u l^au th`eu-n`a ya oi s'e!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "S^u"n s'e-h'o ke ng`in, chhi`on-s^u"n chhiu chhiang-li, s'e kiok chhiu la. Ng`i-t^eu he chhiang-li ke, ch'ung-he `m-he tak-ke ng`in chhiang-li."
(Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in t^i m'a-ng`in oi chhut-mai k`i, s'o-y^i k`i k'ong: "`M-he tak-ke ng`in chhiang-li.")
Y^a-s^u s'e-h'o k`i-t^eu ke kiok, chhiu chi^ong ngoi-s^am chok-h'i-l`oi, chh^o to-ch'on hi. K`i mun ki^a h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Th`eu-ha, ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu s'o cho ke, ng`i-t^eu li'au-ki'e m`o?
Ng`i-t^eu ham ng`ai cho s^in-s^ang, cho Ch'u, chhin chh+ok, ng`ai p'un-l`oi chhiu-he.
Ng`ai he ng`i-t^eu ke Ch'u, ng`i-t^eu ke s^in-s^ang, h`an s'e ng`i-t^eu ke kiok, ng`i-t^eu ya yin-t^ong p'i-chh'u" s'e kiok.
Ng`ai cho ng`i-t^eu ke p'ong-yong, he oi ng`i-t^eu cheu ng`ai s'o-cho ke hi h`ang.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, n`u-ph+uk m`o p'i ch'u-ng`in kha thai, su-phai ke ng`in ya m`o p'i phai k`i ke ng`in kha thai.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i li'a-ke tho-l^i, na-he hi s+u"t-h`ang chhiu chhin-y^u fuk-hi!

"Ng`ai li'a-ke fa `m-he ch'u" ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-th'i k'ong ke; ng`ai ngin-su"t ng`ai s'o ki'en-si'en ke ng`in. Ch'ung-he Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong 'Ke th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha s+u"t-fan ke ng`in, sa yung kiok thet ng`ai', li'a-ki fa pit-thin voi s+u"t-hien.
Ng`ai chhai su"-chh`in h`an-m`ang fat-s^en y^i-chhi`en chhiu l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-chh`in fat-s^en ke s`u", sin ng`ai chhiu-he ke 'Chhu"-y^u Y'un-y^u' ke.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chiap-thai ng`ai s'o phai ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ng`ai; chiap-thai ng`ai ke, chhiu-he chiap-thai ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke'. "
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, s^im-ch^ung f^i-s`ong thung-kh'u, chhiu si^en-pu k'ong: "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke ng`in oi chhut-mai ng`ai."
H+ok-s^ang p'i-chh'u" si^ong-khon, `m-t^i k`i he ch'u" m'a-ng`in k'ong ke.
Y^u yit-ke Y^a-s^u s'o-siak ke h+ok-s^ang, chet-s^u"n kho chhai Y^a-s^u ke f`ai-ch^ung.
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet am-su" k`i k'ong: "Mun k`i khon, k`i he k'ong m'a-ng`in."
Ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu tham-s^u"n mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, he m'a-ng`in?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai vun yit-te pi'ang-`e p^un m'a-ng`in, k`i chhiu-he." K'ong-li'au, k`i chhiu vun yit-te pi'ang-`e, n^a p^un K^a-li+ok-ng`in S^i-m`un ke lai-'e Y`u-thai.
Y`u-thai yit chiap-ko pi'ang-`e, M^o-k'ui chhiu ng+ip k`i ke s^im. Y^a-s^u tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi cho ke, k'on-k'in hi cho!"
Chhai-chho ke ng`in, m`o ng`in t^i Y^a-s^u cho-m'a-ke tui k`i k'ong li'a-ke fa.
Y^in-vi Y`u-thai he k'on-chhi`en ke, y^u-t^eu h+ok-s^ang si'ong Y^a-s^u he f^un-fu k`i hi m^ai ko-chiet yung ke t^ung-s^i, ya-he ham k`i tai t^eu t^ung-s^i hi p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in.
Y`u-thai s+u"t ke-te pi'ang-`e heu, chit-s`u" chhiu chhut-hi. Ke-s`u" he am-p^u-th`eu.
Y`u-thai chhut-hi y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a-ha Ng`in-ch'u" y'i-k^in tet-t'o y`ung-yeu l'e; Song-ti ke y`ung-yeu ya hi'en-m`in chhai Ng`in-ch'u" ke s^u"n-song.
Ki-y`en Song-ti ke y`ung-yeu th^ung-ko Ng`in-ch'u" l`oi hi'en-m`in, K`i ya oi chh^in-chhu" y`ung-k^ong Ng`in-ch'u", chit-s`u" chhiu oi y`ung-k^ong k`i.

Se-ch'u" ^a, ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u"-ki^en m`o k'i-ki'u l'e. Ng`i-t^eu voi chh`im ng`ai, ch'ung-he ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, chhiu-chhiong ng`ai l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu k'ong-ko ke: 'Ng`ai oi hi ke s'o-chhai, ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet hi.'
Ng`ai p^un ng`i-t^eu yit-thi`au s^in min-lin: Ng`i-t^eu oi p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak; ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an siak ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu ya oi ngi'ong-p^an p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak, su"-ki^en-ng`in chhiu voi ngin-chhut ng`i-t^eu he ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang."

S^i-m`un-P'i-tet mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i oi hi nai-vi?" Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai s'o-oi hi ke s'o-chhai, ng`i li'a-ha cho-`m-tet th`en ng`ai hi, ch'ung-he kha-man t^eu-'e ng`i chhiu voi th`en ng`ai hi."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, cho-m'a-ke li'a-ha ng`ai cho-`m-tet th`en ng`i hi n`e? Ng`ai h'en vi ng`i piang-miang to s'i!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i h'en vi ng`ai piang-miang to s'i m^a? Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ki^e-'e th`ai y^i-chhi`en, ng`i voi s^am-p'ai `m ngin ng`ai."
Y^a-s^u yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu `m-s'u" s`eu; ng`i-t^eu oi sin Song-ti, ya oi sin ng`ai.
Chhai ng^a P^a ke vuk-h^a y^u chhin-t^o f`ong-ki^en, ng`ai hi he oi vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi s'o-chhai; na-`m-he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhiu `m-voi 'an-ngi`ong k'ong.
Ng`ai hi vi ng`i-t^eu ch'un-phi s'o-chhai y^i-heu, oi to-ch'on-l`oi, chiap ng`i-t^eu to ng`ai ke-vi hi; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhai nai-vi, ng`i-t^eu ya voi chhai ke-vi.
Ng`ai oi hi ke s'o-chhai, ke-thi`au lu ng`i-t^eu t^i."
T^o-m^a tui k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu `m t^i ng`i oi hi nai-vi, ngi'ong voi t^i ke-thi`au lu n`e?"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he tho-lu, ch^u"n-l^i, s^ang-miang; na-`m-he th^ung-ko ng`ai, m`o ng`in n`en to ^A-p^a ke-vi hi.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu su"t ng`ai, ng`i-t^eu ya voi su"t ng^a P^a. Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu su"t K`i, ya y'i-k^in khon-t'o K`i."
F^i-l+it tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chi^ong ^A-p^a hi'en p^un ng`ai-t^eu khon, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu m^an-chiuk."

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: " F^i-l+it, ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha 'an ki'u, ng`i h`an `m-su"t ng`ai m^a? Khon-t'o ng`ai ke ng`in, chhiu-he khon-t'o ^A-p^a. Ng`i ngi'ong voi k'ong 'Chi^ong ^A-p^a hi'en p^un ng`ai-t^eu khon' n`e?

Ng`ai chhai ^A-p^a t^i-poi, ^A-p^a chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`i `m sin m^a? Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke fa `m-he ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke yi-su", he h+et chhai ng`ai t^i-poi ke ^A-p^a cho K`i chhu"-k^a ke su".
Ng`i-t^eu oi sin ng`ai, ng`ai chhai ^A-p^a t^i-poi, ^A-p^a chhai ng`ai t^i-poi; na-he `m sin li'a-ke fa, ya oi y^in-vi ng`ai s'o-cho ke su" l`oi sin.
Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, sin ng`ai ke ng`in ya voi cho ng`ai s'o-cho ke su", su"m-chu" oi cho h`an-kha thai ke su"; y^in-vi ng`ai oi hi ^A-p^a ke-vi.
Ng`i-t^eu fung ng`ai ke mi`ang, m`o-lun khi`u m'a-ke, ng`ai yit-thin voi s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i-t^eu, p^un ^A-p^a ke y`ung-k^ong th^ung-ko Lai-'e hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu fung ng`ai ke mi`ang, m`o-lun tui ng`ai khi`u m'a-ke, ng`ai yit-thin voi s`u"n-chhi`on.
"Ng`i-t^eu na-he kin-oi ng`ai, chhiu oi ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke min-lin.
Ng`ai oi khi`u ^A-p^a, K`i chhiu voi nang-ngoi su ng`i-t^eu yit-vi P'o-fi-s^u", y'un-y'en th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha.

K`i chhiu-he ch^u"n-l^i ke L`in. Su"-ki^en-ng`in `m chiap-su K`i, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu khon-`m-t'o K`i, ya `m-su"t K`i. Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu su"t K`i, y^in-vi K`i s`ong-s`ong l^au ng`i-t^eu th`ung-chhai, ya oi chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang-ch^ung.
"Ng`ai `m-voi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu fit-h^a cho k^u-y`i, ng`ai voi to-ch'on-l`oi ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi.
K^a m`o k'i-ki'u, su"-ki^en-ng`in chhiu khon ng`ai `m-t'o, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu voi khon-tet-t'o ng`ai, yu y^in-vi ng`ai ki-si+uk s^ang-t'en, ng`i-t^eu ya voi s^ang-t'en.
Ke-ngit l`oi-to ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi t^i ng`ai chhai ng^a P^a t^i-poi, ng`i-t^eu ya chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, chhiong ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang-ch^ung yit-yong.
"Chiap-su ng^a min-lin yu ch^un-s'u ke ng`in, chhiu-he kin-oi ng`ai ke ng`in. Kin-oi ng`ai ke ng`in, ng^a P^a pit-thin voi siak k`i; ng`ai ya voi siak k`i, yu chh^in-chhu" tui k`i hi'en-hien."
Y`u-thai (`m-he K^a-li+ok-ng`in Y`u-thai) mun-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ngi'ong-p^an t^an-chhiang tui ng`ai-t^eu hi'en-hien, `m tui su"-ki^en-ng`in hi'en-hien n`e?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Kin-oi ng`ai ke ng`in chang voi ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke fa. Ng^a P^a pit-thin voi siak k`i; ng^a P^a l^au ng`ai ya voi hi k`i ke-vi, th`ung k`i khiung-ha h+et.
`M kin-oi ng`ai ke ng`in chhiu `m-voi ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke fa. Ng`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o ke fa `m-he ng`ai chhu"-k^a ke yi-su", he chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke ^A-p^a ke yi-su".
"Ng`ai h`an th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", y'i-k^in chi^ong li'a-t^eu fa l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.

Ch'ung-he ke P'o-fi-s^u", chhiu-he ^A-p^a y^in-vi ng`ai ke mi`ang oi chh^ai-l`oi ke Su"n-L`in, K`i voi chi^ong s'o-y^u ke su" kau-th^o ng`i-t^eu, yu p^un ng`i-t^eu ki-tet ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko ke yit-chhiet fa.

"Ng`ai li`u-h^a ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu; ng`ai chi^ong ng`ai ke ph`in-^on su-p^un ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai s'o p^un ng`i-t^eu ke, l^au su"-ki^en-ng`in s'o p^un ke m`o khiung-yong. Ng`i-t^eu `m-s'u" s`eu, ya `m-s'u" ki^ang.

Ng`i-t^eu th^ang ng`ai k'ong-ko: 'Ng`ai hi, ch'ung-he h`an-oi to-ch'on-l`oi ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi.' K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu kin-oi ng`ai, ng`i-t^eu voi y^in-vi ng`ai ch'on-hi ^A-p^a ke-vi l`oi f^on-h'i, y^in-vi ^A-p^a p'i ng`ai kha thai.
Ng`ai chhai li'a-t^eu su" h`an-m`ang fat-s^en y^i-chhi`en si^en l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-chh`in fat-s^en ke s`u" voi sin.
Ng`ai li'a-ha `m-oi l^au ng`i-t^eu k^a-k'ong, y^in-vi li'a su"-ki^en ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a voi to l'e. Tui ng`ai l`oi k'ong, k`i `m son m'a-ke;
ch'ung-he su"-ki^en-ng`in yin-t^ong t^i ng`ai kin-oi ng^a P^a, s'o-y^i ^A-p^a f^un-fu ng`ai m'a-ke, ng`ai chhiu cho m'a-ke. "Hong-h'i-l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi!"
"Ng`ai he ch^u"n ke ph`u-th`o-su; ng^a P^a he ch^ai-chung ke ng`in.
S'o-y^u s+uk ng`ai yu m`o kiet k'o-ch'u" ke su-k^i, K`i chhiu chi'en-thet; ch'ung-he kiet k'o-ch'u" ke su-k^i, K`i chhiu si^u-chi'en to chh^in-chhiang, p^un k`i kiet k'o-ch'u" h`an-kha t^o.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ke tho-l^i y'i-k^in s'u" ng`i-t^eu chhiang-li.

Ng`i-t^eu oi yit-chh+u"t s^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai chhiu s^ang chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi. Na-he m`o l^au ng`ai kiet-li`en, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi kiet k'o-ch'u", chhiong su-k^i m`o l^au ph`u-th`o-su chiap-t'en chhiu `m-voi kiet k'o-ch'u" yit-yong.

"Ng`ai he ph`u-th`o-su; ng`i-t^eu he su-k^i. S^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai ya s^ang chhai k`i t^i-poi ke ng`in, chang voi kiet k'o-ch'u" t^o-t^o; y^in-vi l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m`o fap-thu cho m'a-ke.
M`o s^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi ke ng`in, k`i voi chhiong su-k^i p^un-ng`in fit-thet yit-yong, y`en-heu ch^au-thet, p^un-ng`in fit-l+ok f'o t^i-poi s^eu-thet.
K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t s^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai ke fa ya s`u"-s`ong ki chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun si'ong-oi m'a-ke, khi`u, chhiu voi tet-t'o.
Ng`i-t^eu kiet k'o-ch'u" t^o-t^o, yu ki-si+uk cho ng`ai ke h+ok-s^ang, ng^a P^a chhiu voi y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong.
Chhiu-chhiong ^A-p^a siak ng`ai, ng`ai ya siak ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu oi s^ang chhai ng`ai ke thung-siak ch^ung.
Ng`i-t^eu na-he ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke min-lin, chhiu voi s^ang chhai ng`ai ke thung-siak ch^ung, chhiong ng`ai ch^un-s'u ng^a P^a ke min-lin, chhiu s^ang chhai K`i ke thung-siak ch^ung yit-yong.
"Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu fa, he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ng`ai ke khoai-l+ok, s'u" ng`i-t^eu ke khoai-l+ok n^em-chhut-l`oi.
Li'a he ng`ai ke min-lin: Ng`i-t^eu oi p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak, chhiong ng`ai siak ng`i-t^eu yit-yong.
Vi-t'o ph`en-y^u h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang, ng`in-ki^en ke oi-siak m`o p'i li'a kha v'i-thai ke.
Ng`i-t^eu na ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke min-lin, chhiu-he ng`ai ke ph`en-y^u.

Ng`ai m`o chai khon ng`i-t^eu cho n`u-ph+uk, y^in-vi n`u-ph+uk `m-t^i ch'u-ng`in s'o cho ke su". Ng`ai chi^ong ng`i-t^eu khon-cho ph`en-y^u, y^in-vi ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong ng`ai tui ng^a P^a ke-vi th^ang-t'o ke yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i.

`M-he ng`i-t^eu si'en ng`ai, he ng`ai si'en ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai sat-l+ip ng`i-t^eu, he oi ng`i-t^eu chhut-hi kiet y'un-chh`un ke k'o-ch'u". 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu fung ng`ai ke mi`ang, m`o-lun tui ^A-p^a khi`u m'a-ke, K`i yit-thin voi su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai min-lin ng`i-t^eu ke li'a-t^eu fa, he oi ng`i-t^eu p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak.
"K'a-s'u" su"-ki^en-ng`in yen-hen ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu oi t^i, k`i-t^eu y'i-k^in si^en yen-hen ng`ai.

K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu s+uk li'a su"-kie, su"-ki^en-ng`in yit-thin voi siak ng`i-t^eu, chhiong siak k`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke ng`in. Ch'ung-he ng`ai chi^ong ng`i-t^eu tui li'a su"-ki^en si'en chhut-l`oi, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-he s+uk su"-kie; s'o-y^i su"-ki^en-ng`in yen-hen ng`i-t^eu.

Ng`i-t^eu oi ki-tet ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko ke fa: 'N`u-ph+uk m`o p'i ch'u-ng`in kha thai.' Na-he k`i-t^eu pet-hoi ng`ai, k`i-t^eu ya voi pet-hoi ng`i-t^eu; na-he k`i-t^eu ch^un-s'u ng`ai ke fa, k`i-t^eu ya voi ch^un-s'u ng`i-t^eu ke fa.
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke y`en-ku, k`i-t^eu voi tui ng`i-t^eu cho li'a yit-chhiet ke su", y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-su"t ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke.'
Na-he ng`ai `m-su"t l`oi-ko, `m-su"t k^au k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu chhiu m`o chhui; ch'ung-he, li'a-ha k`i-t^eu ke chhui he th^oi-`m-thet ke.
Yen-hen ng`ai ke, ya yen-hen ng^a P^a.

K'a-s'u" ng`ai chhai k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m`o cho ke-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t y^u-ng`in cho-ko ke su", k`i-t^eu chhiu m`o chhui. Su"-s+u"t-song, k`i-t^eu y^u khon-t'o ng`ai s'o-cho ke, h`an-he yen-hen ng`ai, ya yen-hen ng^a P^a.
Li'a he oi yin-ngiam k`i-t^eu ke Fap-l+it-s^u s'o si'a ke: 'K`i-t^eu m`o-y`en m`o-ku yen-hen ng`ai!'
"Ch'ung-he, ke tui ^A-p^a l`oi ke P'o-fi-s^u" voi to; K`i chhiu-he ch^u"n-l^i ke L`in. Ng`ai phai K`i tui ^A-p^a ke-vi l`oi ke s`u", K`i oi vi ng`ai cho kien-chu"n.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu ya oi vi ng`ai cho kien-chu"n, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tui kh^oi-s'u" chhiu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha.
"Ng`ai chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im `m-voi y`eu-thung.
K`i-t^eu voi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu kiuk-chhut fi-th`ong. Li'a s`u"-chiet chhiu voi to l'e, ke-t^eu sat-hoi ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in voi ngin-v`i k`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke su"-chh`in he ch^ung-s^im su"-fung Song-ti.
Kh`i-s+u"t, k`i-t^eu voi 'an-ngi`ong cho he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-su"t ^A-p^a, ya `m-su"t ng`ai.

Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu su", he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai li'a s`u"-chiet l`oi-to ke s`u" si'ong-t'o ng`ai su"t l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko. "Ng`ai t^ong-chh^u m`o l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu su", y^in-vi ng`ai yit-chh+u"t th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha.
Li'a-ha ng`ai oi to-ch'on ke 'Chh^ai ng`ai l`oi ke' ke-vi hi; ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung pin m`o-ng`in mun ng`ai: 'Ng`i oi hi nai-vi?'
F'an-ch'on y^in-vi ng`ai su"t chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m^an-s^im y`u-s`eu.
Su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai ch'on-hi, tui ng`i-t^eu kha h'o; ng`ai m`o ch'on-hi, ke P'o-fi-s^u" chhiu `m-voi l`oi ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi; ng`ai ch'on-hi, chhiu chh^ai K`i l`oi.
K`i l`oi ke s`u", K`i oi tui su"-ki^en-ng`in chu"n-m`in: K`i-t^eu tui chhui, tui ngi, tui Song-ti s'u"m-phan ke khon-fap chhi`on-phu `m-chh+ok chhiang-chhiang.
K`i-t^eu tui chhui ke khon-fap `m-chh+ok, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m sin ng`ai;
k`i-t^eu tui ngi ke khon-fap `m-chh+ok, y^in-vi ng`ai ch'on-hi ^A-p^a ke-vi, ng`i-t^eu `m-voi chai khon-t'o ng`ai;
k`i-t^eu tui Song-ti s'u"m-phan ke khon-fap `m-chh+ok, y^in-vi li'a su"-kie ke v`ong y'i-k^in su s'u"m-phan.
"Ng`ai h`an-y^u chhin-t^o su" oi l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha p`a-`m-y`ang.

T'en-to su ch^u"n-l^i ke Su"n-L`in l`oi-to, K`i voi tai ng`i-t^eu chin-ng+ip s'o-y^u ke ch^u"n-l^i. K`i `m-voi cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" k'ong-fa, ch'u"-y^u chi^ong K`i s'o th^ang-t'o ke l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ya voi tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong chi^ong-l`oi ke su".
K`i voi y`ung-yeu ng`ai, y^in-vi K`i voi chi^ong K`i tui ng`ai s'o li^ang-su ke l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.
Ng^a P^a s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu he ng`ai ke; s'o-y^i ng`ai k'ong, Su"n-L`in voi chi^ong K`i tui ng`ai s'o li^ang-su ke l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.
"Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu khon ng`ai `m-t'o; chai ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu yu voi khon-t'o ng`ai."

H+ok-s^ang t^ong-ch^ung y^u k'i-ke ng`in p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "K`i l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong 'Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu khon ng`ai `m-t'o; chai ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu yu voi khon-t'o ng`ai' yu k'ong 'y^in-vi ng`ai ch'on-hi ^A-p^a ke-vi'; li'a-t^eu fa to-t'ai he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e?"
K`i-t^eu yu mun: "K`i s'o k'ong ke 'Ko m`o k'i-ki'u' he ch'u" m'a-ke n`e? Ng`ai-t^eu `m-t^i k`i k'ong m'a-ke!"

Y^a-s^u t^i k`i-t^eu si'ong-oi mun k`i, chhiu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai k'ong 'Ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu khon ng`ai `m-t'o; chai ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`i-t^eu yu voi khon-t'o ng`ai'; ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi li'a-ki fa mun-l`oi mun-hi he-m`o?

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu voi s^ong-s^im thai-kieu, ch'ung-he su"-ki^en-ng`in voi f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok; ng`i-t^eu voi y`u-s`eu, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu ke y`u-s`eu voi pien-cho khoai-l+ok.

Fu-ng`in-k^a s^en-s'an y^i-chhi`en voi y`u-s`eu, y^in-vi su-kh'u ke s`u"-ki^en to l'e; ch'ung-he ^o-nga-'e kiung-chhut-l`oi y^i-heu, chhiu `m ki-tet thung-kh'u, y^in-vi k`i f^on-h'i ^o-nga-'e y'i-k^in chhut-se.

Ng`i-t^eu ya he 'an-ngi`ong: Li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu y^u y`u-s`eu, ch'ung-he ng`ai chai kien-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi m^an-s^im khoai-l+ok; ng`i-t^eu ke khoai-l+ok he m`o ng`in chhi'ong-tet-ch'eu ke.
To ke-ngit, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi chai mun ng`ai m'a-ke. "Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu fung ng`ai ke mi`ang, m`o-lun tui ^A-p^a khi`u m'a-ke, K`i yit-thin voi su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
To li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu `m-su"t fung ng`ai ke mi`ang khi`u-ko m'a-ke; chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu khi`u, chhiu voi tet-t'o, p^un ng`i-t^eu ke khoai-l+ok m^an-m^an.
"Ng`ai yung p'i-yi l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong li'a-t^eu su". Ch'ung-he s`u"-ki^en voi to l'e, ng`ai m`o chai yung p'i-yi, he oi m`in-m`in chi^ong ^A-p^a ke su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.
To ke-ngit, ng`i-t^eu oi fung ng`ai ke mi`ang khi`u; ng`ai `m-he k'ong ng`ai oi thoi ng`i-t^eu tui ^A-p^a khi`u,
y^in-vi ^A-p^a chhu"-k^a siak ng`i-t^eu. K`i siak ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu kin-oi ng`ai, yu sin ng`ai he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke.
Ng`ai tui ^A-p^a ke-vi l`oi-to li'a su"-kie; li'a-ha ng`ai oi l`i-kh^oi li'a su"-kie, ch'on ^A-p^a ke-vi hi."
H+ok-s^ang tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i khon, li'a-ha ng`i he m`in-m`in k'ong, pin m`o yung m'a-ke p'i-yi.
Li'a-ha ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ng`i v`u-s'o-put-t^i, m`o s^i-yeu ng`in tui ng`i k'ong-chhut k`i ke mun-th`i. Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu sin ng`i he tui Song-ti ke-vi l`oi ke."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu chang sin m^a?

Khon ^a, s`u"-chiet voi to l'e, li'a-ha chhiu-he, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu voi f^un-san, tak-s`a ch'on-hi chhu"-k^a ke thi-f^ong, li`u-h^a ng`ai chhu"-k^a yit-s`a. Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai `m-he chhu"-k^a yit-s`a, y^in-vi y^u ^A-p^a th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha.

Ng`ai chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, he oi ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi s^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi y^u ph`in-^on. Chhai li'a su"-ki^en ng`i-t^eu y^u kh'u-nan; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu oi y'ung-k'am, ng`ai y'i-k^in y`ang-ko li'a su"-ki^en."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, k'ong: "^A-p^a ^a, s`u"-chiet y'i-k^in to l'e, khi`u Ng`i y`ung-k^ong Ng`i ke Lai-'e, p^un Lai-'e ya h'o y`ung-k^ong Ng`i.
Ng`i y^u chi^ong k'on-l^i chhi`on ng`in-lui ke khi`en-piang su-p^un k`i, s'u" k`i chi^ong y'un-s^en su-p^un Ng`i s'o k^au-thok k`i ke ng`in.
Y'un-s^en chhiu-he ngin-su"t Ng`i --- v`i-yit ke ch^u"n S`u"n, yu ngin-su"t Ng`i s'o chh^ai-l`oi ke Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk.
Ng`ai y'i-k^in chhai thi-song y`ung-k^ong Ng`i; ng`ai y'i-k^in v`an-s`u"n Ng`i s'o k^au-thok ke s'u"-min.
^A-p^a ^a, li'a-ha khi`u Ng`i chhai Ng`i chhu"-k^a ke mien-chhi`en y`ung-k^ong ng`ai, chi^ong ke m`ang-y^u su"-kie y^i-chhi`en, ng`ai th`ung Ng`i khiung-y^u ke y`ung-k^ong su-p^un ng`ai!

"Ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong Ng`i hi'en-m`in p^un ke-t^eu Ng`i tui su"-ki^en th+ok-chhut-l`oi k^au-p^un ng`ai ke ng`in. K`i-t^eu p'un-l`oi he s+uk Ng`i ke, Ng`i chi^ong k`i-t^eu su-p^un ng`ai; k`i-t^eu ya y^u ch^un-s'u Ng`i ke fa.
Li'a-ha k`i-t^eu t^i, Ng`i s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke yit-chhiet, chhi`on-phu he tui Ng`i ke-vi l`oi ke;
y^in-vi Ng`i s'o k^au-p^un ng`ai ke tho-l^i, ng`ai y'i-k^in su-p^un k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu ya y^u chiap-su. K`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t t^i ng`ai he tui Ng`i ke-vi l`oi ke, ya sin he Ng`i chh^ai ng`ai l`oi.
"Ng`ai vi-t'o k`i-t^eu khi`u Ng`i. Ng`ai `m-he vi su"-ki^en-ng`in khi`u, f'an-ch'on he vi Ng`i s'o su ng`ai ke ng`in khi`u, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu he s+uk Ng`i ke.
Ng`ai s'o-y^u ke chhi`on-phu he Ng`i ke, Ng`i s'o-y^u ke ya he ng`ai ke; ng`ai ke y`ung-k^ong he th^ung-ko k`i-t^eu hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.

Ng`ai li'a-ha oi hi Ng`i ke-vi, m`o chai li`u chhai su"-ki^en, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu oi li`u chhai su"-ki^en. Su"n-kiet ke ^A-p^a ^a! Khi`u Ng`i yung Ng`i ke mi`ang, chhiu-he Ng`i su-p^un ng`ai ke mi`ang, p'o-s'u k`i-t^eu, s'u" k`i-t^eu h+ap-cho yit-th'i, chhiong Ng`i l^au ng`ai khiung-yong.

Ng`ai th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", ng`ai yung Ng`i ke mi`ang, chhiu-he Ng`i s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke mi`ang, p'o-s'u k`i-t^eu. Ng`ai ya p'o-fu k`i-t^eu; chh`u-li'au ke chu-thin oi m+et-m`ong ke yit-s`a y^i-ngoi, m`o yit-ke su"t-thet, 'an-ngi`ong l`oi yin-ngiam Su"n-k^in ke fa.
Li'a-ha, ng`ai oi hi Ng`i ke-vi; ng`ai h`an chhai li'a su"-ki^en ke s`u" k'ong li'a-t^eu fa, he oi p^un k`i-t^eu ke s^im chh^ung-m^an ng`ai ke khoai-l+ok.
Ng`ai chi^ong Ng`i ke fa su-p^un k`i-t^eu; su"-ki^en-ng`in chhiu yen-hen k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-he s+uk li'a su"-ki^en, chhiong ng`ai `m-he s+uk li'a su"-ki^en yit-yong.
Ng`ai `m-he khi`u Ng`i chi^ong k`i-t^eu tui li'a su"-ki^en tai-ch'eu, ng`ai he khi`u Ng`i p'o-s'u k`i-t^eu thot-l`i ke si`a-ok-ch'a.
Chhiu-chhiong ng`ai `m-he s+uk li'a su"-ki^en, k`i-t^eu ya `m-he s+uk li'a su"-ki^en.
Khi`u Ng`i yung ch^u"n-l^i s'u" k`i-t^eu chi^ong chhu"-k^a fung-hien p^un Ng`i; Ng`i ke fa chhiu-he ch^u"n-l^i.
Chhiong Ng`i chh^ai ng`ai ng+ip su"-ki^en, ng`ai ya phai k`i-t^eu ng+ip su"-ki^en.
Vi-t'o k`i-t^eu, ng`ai chi^ong chhu"-k^a fung-hien p^un Ng`i, s'u" k`i-t^eu ya voi s`u"n-s^im fung-hien p^un Ng`i.
"Ng`ai `m t^an-chhiang vi k`i-t^eu khi`u, ya vi ke-t^eu chiap-su k`i-t^eu ke fa l`oi sin ng`ai ke ng`in khi`u.

Ngien k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu h+ap-cho yit-th'i. ^A-p^a ^a, ngien k`i-t^eu s^ang chhai ng`ai-t^eu t^i-poi, chhiong Ng`i chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, ng`ai chhai Ng`i t^i-poi yit-yong. Ngien k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu h+ap-cho yit-th'i, p^un su"-ki^en-ng`in sin ng`ai he Ng`i s'o chh^ai-l`oi ke.
Ng`i su-p^un ng`ai ke y`ung-k^ong, ng`ai ya su-p^un k`i-t^eu, s'u" k`i-t^eu h+ap-cho yit-th'i, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu h+ap-cho yit-th'i khiung-yong.

Ng`ai chhai k`i-t^eu t^i-poi, Ng`i chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, s'u" k`i-t^eu v`an-chhi`on h+ap-cho yit-th'i, p^un su"-ki^en-ng`in t^i he Ng`i chh^ai ng`ai l`oi, ya t^i Ng`i siak k`i-t^eu, chhiong Ng`i siak ng`ai yit-yong.

"^A-p^a ^a, Ng`i s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke ng`in, ng`ai chhai nai-vi, ng`ai oi k`i-t^eu ya th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chhai ke-vi, p^un k`i-t^eu khon-t'o Ng`i su ng`ai ke y`ung-k^ong; y^in-vi chhai chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-chhi`en, Ng`i chhiu siak ng`ai.
K^ung-ngi ke ^A-p^a ^a, su"-ki^en-ng`in `m su"t Ng`i, ch'ung-he ng`ai su"t Ng`i; li'a-t^eu ng`in ya t^i he Ng`i chh^ai ng`ai l`oi.

Ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong Ng`i hi'en-m`in p^un k`i-t^eu; ng`ai h`an oi ki-si+uk 'an-ngi`ong cho, vi-t'o p^un Ng`i tui ng`ai ke thung-siak chh^ung-m^an k`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang, ng`ai ya s^ang chhai k`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang ch^ung."
Y^a-s^u 'an-ngi`ong kh`i-t'o y^i-heu, chhiu th`ung h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha chhut-hi, ko Kh+ip-l`un-h^ai. Ke thi-f^ong y^u yit-ke k'am-l'am-y`en, Y^a-s^u l^au h+ok-s^ang l^ung-ch'ung ng+ip-hi.
Chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke Y`u-thai ya t^i ke s'o-chhai, y^in-vi Y^a-s^u s`ong-s`ong l^au ki^a h+ok-s^ang chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi.

Y`u-thai tai yit-chhui L`o-m^a ke p^in-'e, chheu-t'en chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au Fap-li-soi-ng`in s'o phai su"n-thien ke v'i-p^in, khiung-ha ng+ip-y`en hi. K`i-t^eu tai-t'en v'u-hi, ya n^a-t'en t^en-l`ung l^au f'o-p'a.
Y^a-s^u t^i voi fat-s^en chhai ki^a s^u"n-song ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in, chhiu chin-chhi`en mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chh`im m'a-ng`in?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: " N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he." Ke-s`u", chhut-mai Y^a-s^u ke Y`u-thai ya th`ung k`i-t^eu kh^i khiung-ha.
Y^a-s^u yit k'ong "Ng`ai chhiu-he", k`i-t^eu chhiu t'a-lon-thui, vang chhai thi-song.
Y^a-s^u yu mun-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chh`im m'a-ng`in?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: " N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko, ng`ai chhiu-he. K'a-s'u" ng`i-t^eu he chh`im ng`ai, chhiu p^un li'a-t^eu ng`in ch'eu."
Y^a-s^u 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he oi yin-ngiam k`i y^i-chhi`en k'ong-ko ke fa: "^A-p^a ^a, Ng`i s'o k^au-p^un ng`ai ke ng`in, ng`ai li`en yit-ke ya m`o su"t-l+ok."
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet tai-t'en yit-k^i t^o-'e; k`i chi^ong t^o-'e p^ang-chhut-l`oi, tui thai-chi-s^u" ke ph+uk-ng`in M^a-l+et-k'u phiak-ko-hi, chi^ong k`i yu-phi'en ke ng'i-k^ung siok-h^a-l`oi.
Y^a-s^u tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Chi^ong t^o-'e s^u-h'i-l`oi! Ng^a P^a k^au-p^un ng`ai ke kh'u-p^i, ng`i l'au-t'o ng`ai `m ngien-yi l^im m^a?"
Ke-chhui L`o-m^a-p^in l^au chhui-ch'ong, li`en Y`u-thai-ng`in su"n-thien ke v'i-p^in chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u chok-h'i-l`oi, thak-t'en,
si^en chi^ong k`i ki'e-sung to ^A-n^a ke mien-chhi`en hi; ^A-n^a he ke-ngi`en ke thai-chi-s^u" K^ai-^a-fap ke chh^ong-m^in-l'o.
Li'a K^ai-^a-fap su"t tui Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu kien-ngi k'ong, yit-ke ng`in thoi chhi`on-koet ke ng`in s'i he chui y^u li-yit ke su".
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet l^au nang-ngoi yit-ke h+ok-s^ang th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u; ke h+ok-s^ang l^au thai-chi-s^u" si^ong-su"t, k`i chhiu th`en-t'en Y^a-s^u ng+ip-hi thai-chi-s^u" ke th`in-yen-t'u.
P'i-tet li`u chhai m`un-ngoi. Ke l^au thai-chi-s^u" si^ong-su"t ke h+ok-s^ang yu chhut-l`oi, l^au ch'ong-m`un ke s'u"-'ng k'ong, chhiu tai P'i-tet ng+ip-hi.
Ke ch'ong-m`un ke s'u"-'ng tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i ya he ke-ng`in ke h+ok-s^ang, k'am `m-he?" P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he!"
Ke-s`u" thi^en-hi chhin h`on, ke-t^eu ph+uk-ng`in l^au v'i-p^in yung f'o-than h'i f'o, thai-k^a kh^i-t'en phoi-f'o; P'i-tet ya h`ang-chhi`en, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha kh^i-t'en phoi-f'o.
Thai-chi-s^u" ph`an-mun Y^a-s^u ko^an-he ki^a h+ok-s^ang l^au k`i ke kau-hiun.

Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai l^au ng`in k'ong-fa chhi`ung-l`oi t^u he k^ung-kh^oi ke. Ng`ai s`ong-s`ong chhai fi-th`ong l^au su"n-thien, chhiu-he Y`u-thai-ng`in chhi-fi ke s'o-chhai kau-hiun ng`in, `m-su"t chhai am-ch^ung k'ong m'a-ke.
Ng`i cho-m'a-ke ph`an-mun ng`ai n`e? Hi mun ke-t^eu th^ang-ko ng`ai k'ong-fa ke ng`in, k`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai su"t k'ong m'a-ke."
Y^a-s^u k'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, s`un-th`eu yit-ke v'i-p^in chhiu s^an k`i ke choi-kok, k'ong: "Ng`i 'an-ngi`ong en thai-chi-s^u" m^a!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai na-he k'ong-`m-chh+ok, ng`i ch'u"-chu"n, `m-chh+ok chhai nai-vi! Na-he m`o `m-chh+ok, ng`i t'a ng`ai cho m'a-ke?"
Li'a-s`u", Y^a-s^u h`an p^un k`i-t^eu thak-t'en; ^A-n^a chhiu chi^ong k`i ki'e-sung to thai-chi-s^u" K^ai-^a-fap ke-vi hi.
Li'a-s`u", S^i-m`un-P'i-tet h`an kh^i-t'en phoi-f'o. Y^u ng`in tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i ya he ke-ng`in ke h+ok-s^ang, k'am `m-he?" P'i-tet f'eu-ngin k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he!"

Thai-chi-s^u" ke yit-ke ph+uk-ng`in, chhiu-he p^un P'i-tet siok-thet ng'i-k^ung ke-s`a ke chh^in-chhit, k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai khon-t'o ng`i th`ung ke-ng`in khiung-ha chhai k'am-l'am-y`en t^i-poi, k'am `m-he?"
P'i-tet yu f'eu-ngin. Ke-s`u", ki^e-'e chhiu th`ai.

K`i-t^eu tui K^ai-^a-fap ke-vi chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-to ch'ung-tuk-f'u. Ke-s`u" thi^en-m`ung-k^ong. Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu `m ng+ip ch'ung-tuk-f'u hi, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu oi chhai chiet-kh`i-ch^ung p'o-chh`u" chhiang-li, chang cho-tet s+u"t Ph`an-ko-chiet ke y`en-s+it.
S'o-y^i P'i-l^a-t^o chhut-l`oi kien k`i-t^eu, mun-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu yung m'a-ke chhui-mi`ang ko li'a ng`in?"
K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "K`i na-he m`o cho f'ai-su", ng`ai-t^eu chhiu `m-voi chi^ong k`i k^au-p^un ng`i."

P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i tai-ch'on-hi, cheu ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke fap-l+it s'u"m-phan k`i chhiu h'o l'e." Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu en-k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu m`o khi`en h'o phan ng`in s'i-h`in."
(Li'a yin-ngiam Y^a-s^u s'o k'ong-ko, k`i voi ngi'ong-p^an s'i ke fa.)
P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu ng+ip ch'ung-tuk-f'u hi, h^em Y^a-s^u l`oi, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong m`o?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Li'a he ng`i chhu"-k^a oi mun ke, ya-he y^in-vi y^u-ng`in tui ng`i k'ong-ko, ng`i chang 'an-ngi`ong mun n`e?"
P'i-l^a-t^o k'ong: "Ng`i l'au-t'o ng`ai he Y`u-thai-ng`in m^a? He ng`i p'un-koet ke ng`in l^au ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong chi^ong ng`i k^au-p^un ng`ai. Ng`i to-t'ai cho m'a-ke su" ^a?"

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`ai ke koet `m-he li'a su"-ki^en ke koet; k'a-s'u" ng`ai ke koet he li'a su"-ki^en ke koet, ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in yit-thin voi vi ng`ai si^ong-chh`u", ng`ai chhiu `m-voi l+ok chhai ke-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung. Ch'ung-he, ng`ai ke koet `m-he li'a su"-ki^en ke koet!"

P'i-l^a-t^o k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong k'ong, ng`i he v`ong l^o?" Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "He ng`i k'ong ng`ai he v`ong. Ng`ai vi-t'o li'a-ke chhut-se, ya vi-t'o li'a-ke l`oi-to su"-ki^en, he oi vi ch^u"n-l^i cho kien-chu"n. F`am he s+uk ch^u"n-l^i ke ng`in yit-thin voi th^ang ng`ai ke fa."
P'i-l^a-t^o k'ong: "Ch^u"n-l^i he m'a-ke?" P'i-l^a-t^o chhiu chhut-l`oi, tui Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut li'a ng`in y^u m'a-ke chhui.
Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu y^u yit-ke koan-li, oi ng`ai chhai Ph`an-ko-chiet vi ng`i-t^eu piong yit-ke si`u-fam. Ng`i-t^eu oi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu piong Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong m^a?"
K`i-t^eu chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "`M-oi k`i! Ng`ai-t^eu oi P^a-l^a-p^a!" ( P^a-l^a-p^a he yit-ke khi`ong-tho.)
S'o-y^i, P'i-l^a-t^o ha-lin pi^en-t'a Y^a-s^u.
P^in-'e yung net-`e phi^en yit-t'ang mi^en-li`u, tai chhai k`i ke th`eu-n`a-t'ang, yu l^au k`i chok ch'u"-set ke chh`ong-ph`au.
K`i-t^eu chin-chhi`en tui k`i k'ong: " Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong van-soi!" Y`en-heu yung p^a-ch'ong-m`a s^an k`i.
P'i-l^a-t^o yu chhut-l`oi tui chung-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu khon, ng`ai tai k`i chhut-l`oi to ng`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en, p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut k`i y^u m'a-ke chhui."
Y^a-s^u chhiu chhut-l`oi, tai-t'en net-`e ke mi^en-li`u, chok-t'en ch'u"-set ke chh`ong-ph`au. P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Khon ^a, li'a-ke ng`in!"

Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au su"n-thien ke v'i-p^in yit khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka! Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!" P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a tai k`i hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka. Ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut k`i y^u m'a-ke chhui."
Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y^u yit-thi`au fap-l+it, cheu ke-thi`au fap-l+it, k`i he k^oi-s'i ke, y^in-vi k`i chhu"-chh^u"n he Song-ti ke Lai-'e."
P'i-l^a-t^o th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, chhiu y+et ki^ang;
chai to-ch'on-hi ch'ung-tuk-f'u. K`i mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i to-t'ai he tui nai-vi l`oi ke?" Ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u m`o en k`i.
P'i-l^a-t^o tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i `m en ng`ai m^a? Ng`i oi t^i ^o, ng`ai y^u khi`en h'o piong ng`i, ya y^u khi`en h'o chi^ong ng`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Na `m-he Song-ti chi^ong li'a khi`en-piang k^au-p^un ng`i, ng`i chhiu m`o khi`en h'o phan ng`ai. S'o-y^i, chi^ong ng`ai k^au-p^un ng`i ke ng`in, k`i ke chhui h`an-kha chh^ung."

P'i-l^a-t^o th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, y+et si'ong-oi piong Y^a-s^u. Ch'ung-he Y`u-thai-ng`in chhin-h^em k'ong: "Ng`i na-he piong k`i, chhiu `m-he F`ong-ti ke ph`en-y^u! M'a-ng`in chhu"-chh^u"n he v`ong, m'a-ng`in chhiu-he F`ong-ti ke th+it-ng`in."
P'i-l^a-t^o th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, chhiu tai-t'en Y^a-s^u chhut-l`oi, chhai " S+ak-k^ai" ( H^i-pak-l`oi-fa ^on-to " K^a-p^a-th^a") ke s'o-chhai kh^oi-th`in s'u"m-mun.
Ke-ngit he Ph`an-ko-chiet ke Yi-phi-ngit, l`im t^ong-chu, P'i-l^a-t^o tui Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke v`ong!"

K`i-t^eu chhiu chhin-h^em k'ong: "Chh`u-thet k`i! Chh`u"-s'i k`i! Chi^ong k`i t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka!" P'i-l^a-t^o mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Oi ng`ai chi^ong ng`i-t^eu ke v`ong t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka m^a?" Chi-s^u"-ch'ong en-k'ong: "F`ong-ti chang he ng`ai-t^eu ke v`ong!"
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, P'i-l^a-t^o chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu hi t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka. K`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u tai-ch'eu.
Y^a-s^u chhut-l`oi, khi`a-t'en chhu"-k^a ke s+u"p-su"-ka, l`oi-to mi`ang ^on-to "Th`eu-n`a-hok ke S^an-th`eu" ( H^i-pak-l`oi-fa ^on-to " Kok-kok-th^a").
Chhai ke-vi, k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang; nang-ngoi h`an t^ang li'ong-ke ng`in, yit-phi'en yit-ke, Y^a-s^u chhai t^ung-^ong.
P'i-l^a-t^o yu si'a yit-te ph`ai-`e, ham ng`in t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka t'ang-k^o. Ke ph`ai-`e si'a-t'en: " N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u, Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong."

Y^u chhin-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in khon-t'o li'a ph`ai-`e s'o si'a ke, y^in-vi Y^a-s^u t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke s'o-chhai l`i-kh^oi s`ang m`o k'i-y'en; li'a ph`ai-`e he yung H^i-pak-l`oi, L^a-t^en, l^au H^i-li+ap s^am-ch'ung su" si'a ke.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong tui P'i-l^a-t^o k'ong: "M+ok si'a ' Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong', oi si'a 'Li'a ng`in chhu"-chh^u"n he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke v`ong'. "
P'i-l^a-t^o k'ong: "Ng`ai s'o si'a ke, cho-`m-tet k'oi!"

P^in-'e t^ang Y^a-s^u chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang y^i-heu, chhiu chi^ong k`i ke ngoi-s^am p^un-cho si-te, yit-s`a yit-te. K`i-t^eu yu n^a k`i ke nui-s^am; li'a nui-s^am `m-he yung sien kap-h'i-l`oi ke, he k^ui-te pu-'e chhiak-s`u"n ke.

S'o-y^i, p^in-'e p'i-chh'u" s^ong-li`ong k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chi^ong k`i chh'a-kh^oi; l`oi chh^u-chhi^am-'e, khon m'a-ng`in tet-t'o." Li'a yin-ngiam Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke: K`i-t^eu p^un ng`ai ke ngoi-s^am, vi ng`ai ke nui-s^am chh^u-chhi^am. Ke-t^eu p^in-'e chu"n-k^in chhiu 'an-ngi`ong cho.
Kh^i chhai Y^a-s^u ke s+u"p-su"-ka s`un-th`eu ke, y^u Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e l^au ki^a-m^e ke l'o-moi, h`an-y^u Kiet-l`o-pha ke p^u-ngi`ong M^a-li-^a, l^au Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a.
Y^a-s^u khon-t'o ki^a-m^e l^au k`i s'o-siak ke h+ok-s^ang kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu, chhiu tui ki^a-m^e k'ong: "^A-m^e, ng`i khon, ngi^a lai-'e."
K`i yu tui ke h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i khon, ngi^a m^e." Tui ke-s`u" kh^oi-s'u", ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu chiap Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e to chhu"-k^a ke vuk-h^a hi h+et.
Y^a-s^u t^i yit-chhiet ke su" y'i-k^in s`u"n-chhiu, vi-t'o oi yin-ngiam Su"n-k^in ke fa, chhiu k'ong: "Ng`ai choi-ch^au l'e."
Chhai ke-vi, y^u yit-chak kon-'e, ch^ong-t'en s^on ph`u-th`o-chi'u; k`i-t^eu chhiu n^a h'oi-mi`en chim s^on ph`u-th`o-chi'u, thak chhai ngi`u-chhit-chh'o ke k'ang t'ang-k^o, sung-to ki^a choi-s`un.
Y^a-s^u t^am yit-ha, chhiu k'ong: "V`an-s`u"n l'e!" Th`en-t'en, k`i ke th`eu-n`a l`ai-h^a-l`oi, chhiu th^on-hi s'i-thet.

Ke-ngit he Ph`an-ko-chiet ke Yi-phi-ngit, thi-ngi-ngit ke ^On-sit-ngit he s`u"n-su"n ke thai ngit-`e. Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu `m-oi ^On-sit-ngit y^u s^u"n-s^u" li`u chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, chhiu y^eu-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o ham ng`in t'a-th^on su-h`in ng`in ke kiok, chi^ong s^u"n-s^u" ki'e h^a-l`oi.
P^in-'e fung-min chhiu hi, chi^ong ke th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke th`eu-yit-s`a l^au nang-ngoi yit-s`a ke kiok t'a-th^on.
K`i-t^eu h`ang-khi^un Y^a-s^u, khon-t'o k`i y'i-k^in s'i-thet, chhiu m`o t'a-th^on k`i ke kiok.
Ch'ung-he, y^u yit-ke p^in-'e yung chhi^ong chhiuk k`i ke hi+ap-h^a, ngi`am-s`u" hiet l^au s'ui chhiu li`u chhut-l`oi.
(Khon-t'o ke ng`in chhiu cho kien-chu"n, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu ya sin. K`i t^i k`i s'o kien-chu"n ke he khok-s+u"t ke, y^in-vi he k`i chh^in-ngi'en khon-t'o ke.)
Y^in-vi li'a-t^eu su" oi yin-ngiam Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong ke fa: "K`i ke kut-th`eu li`en yit-k^i ya `m-voi p^un-ng`in t'a-th^on."
Su"n-k^in yu y^u yit-ki fa k'ong: "K`i-t^eu oi ngi'ong-mong chhu"-k^a yung chhi^ong s'o chhiuk ke ng`in."

Li'a-t^eu su" y^i-heu, y^u yit-ke ^A-li-m^a-thai-ng`in Yok-sit chhi'ang-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o, ch'un k`i chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-s^u" li^ang-hi. ( Yok-sit he Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang; k`i y^in-vi ki^ang Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu, `m-k'am k^ung-kh^oi.) P'i-l^a-t^o tap-yin k`i ke chhi'ang-khi`u, Yok-sit chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-s^u" li^ang-hi.
Ke su"t chhai am-p^u-s`u" l`oi-kien Y^a-s^u ke N`i-k^o-tet-mu th`ung Yok-sit khiung-ha hi. K`i tai-t'en m+ut-y+ok l^au chh`u"m-hi^ong kap ke hi^ong-liau, yok-y^u s^am-s+u"p k^ung-k^in.
K`i li'ong-s`a yung mat-t'en hi^ong-liau ke m`a-s^a chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-th'i chh`an-h'o; li'a he Y`u-thai-ng`in chong-l^i ke k^ui-k'i.
Chhai Y^a-s^u t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka ke thi-f^ong y^u yit-te y`en-`e, t^i-poi y^u yit-chak `m-su"t chong-ko ng`in ke s^in f`un-mu.
Y^in-vi ke-ngit he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Yi-phi-ngit, ke f`un-mu yu chhin khi^un, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^u chong chhai ke-vi.
L^i-pai-ngit t'a-ch'o, thi^en h`an-m`ang k^ong, Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a chhiu hi f`un-mu, khon-t'o f^ung-t'en mu-m`un ke s+ak-th`eu y'i-k^in s'ai-kh^oi.

K`i chhiu ch'eu-hi chh`im S^i-m`un-P'i-tet l^au Y^a-s^u s'o-siak ke ke h+ok-s^ang, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Y^u ng`in chi^ong Ch'u tui f`un-mu s'ai-ch'eu, ng`ai-t^eu `m-t^i k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i piong chhai nai-vi!"
P'i-tet l^au ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu hi mu-thi.
Li'ong-s`a khiung-ha ch'eu, ch'ung-he ke h+ok-s^ang p'i P'i-tet ch'eu kha kiak, si^en to f`un-mu.
K`i tham-s^u"n khon-ng+ip-hi, khon-t'o m`a-s^a h`an li`u chhai ke-vi, ch'ung-he k`i m`o ng+ip-hi.
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet th`en-t'en ya k'on-to; k`i chh+u"t-chiap ng+ip-hi f`un-mu t^i-poi, khon-t'o m`a-s^a h`an li`u chhai ke-vi,
yu khon-t'o Y^a-s^u ke th`eu-k^in ya li`u chhai ke-vi, ch'ung-he m`o th`ung m`a-s^a khiung-ha, he ki'en-t'en chhai ph+et-vi.
Ke si^en to ke h+ok-s^ang ya th`en-t'en ng+ip f`un-mu; k`i yit khon-t'o chhiu sin.
(K`i-t^eu h`an-he m`o m`in-ph+ak Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, k`i tit-khok oi tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke yi-su".)
Y`en-heu, li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu ch'on-hi vuk-h^a.
M^a-li-^a h`an kh^i chhai f`un-mu-ngoi kieu. K`i k'in kieu k'in tham-th`eu khon f`un-mu t^i-poi.
K`i khon-t'o li'ong-ke chok ph+ak s^am ke thi^en-s'u", chh^o chhai p'un-l`oi piong Y^a-s^u s^u"n-s^u" ke s'o-chhai, yit-ke chhai th`eu li'a-phi'en, yit-ke chhai kiok ke-phi'en.
K`i-t^eu mun M^a-li-^a k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`i kieu m'a-ke?" K`i en-k'ong: "K`i-t^eu chi^ong ng`ai ke Ch'u s'ai-ch'eu, `m-t^i k`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i piong chhai nai-vi!"
K'ong-li'au, M^a-li-^a ch'on-s^u"n, khon-t'o Y^a-s^u kh^i chhai ke-vi, ch'ung-he h`an `m t^i k`i chhiu-he Y^a-s^u.

Y^a-s^u mun k`i k'ong: "Fu-ng`in-k^a, ng`i kieu m'a-ke? Ng`i chh`im m'a-ng`in?" M^a-li-^a l'au-t'o k`i he k'on y`en-`e ke ng`in, s'o-y^i tui k`i k'ong: "S^in-s^ang, na-he ng`i chi^ong k`i s'ai-ch'eu, chhi'ang l^au ng`ai k'ong, ng`i chi^ong k`i piong chhai nai-vi, ng`ai h'o chi^ong k`i s'ai-ch'on-l`oi."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: " M^a-li-^a!" M^a-li-^a ch'on-s^u"n, yung H^i-pak-l`oi-fa tui k`i k'ong: "L^a-p^o-n`i!" (Yi-su" chhiu-he "S^in-s^ang".)

Y^a-s^u k'ong: "`M-h'o l^ai-t'en ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai h`an-m`ang s^ong-hi kien ng^a P^a. Ng`i hi ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ke-vi, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`ai oi s^ong-hi kien ng^a P^a, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu ke ^A-p^a, kien ng`ai ke Song-ti, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti.' "
S'o-y^i, Mat-thai-l^a ke M^a-li-^a chhiu hi l^au h+ok-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`ai y'i-k^in khon-t'o Ch'u l'e!" K`i yu chi^ong Ch'u tui k`i k'ong ke fa po-p^un k`i-t^eu t^i.

Ke l^i-pai-ngit am-p^u, Y^a-s^u ke h+ok-s^ang chhi-s+ip khiung-ha, m`un ko^an-to h`en-h`en, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ki^ang Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu. Ke-s`u", Y^a-s^u hi'en-hien, kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, k'ong: "Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on!"
K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, k`i chi^ong s'u l^au hi+ap-h^a p^un k`i-t^eu khon. H+ok-s^ang khon-t'o Ch'u, chhiu f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i.
Y^a-s^u yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on! Chhiong ^A-p^a chh^ai-phai ng`ai, ng`ai ya cheu-yong chh^ai-phai ng`i-t^eu."
K'ong-li'au, k`i hiong k`i-t^eu ph`un yit-h'eu hi, k'ong: "Li^ang-su Su"n-L`in!
Ng`i-t^eu sa-mi^en m'a-ng`in ke chhui, k`i-t^eu ke chhui chhiu voi tet-t'o sa-mi^en; ng`i-t^eu `m sa-mi^en m'a-ng`in ke chhui, k`i-t^eu ke chhui chhiu `m-voi tet-t'o sa-mi^en."
Y^a-s^u hi'en-hien ke s`u"-chiet, s+u"p-ngi-ke h+ok-s^ang t^ong-ch^ung ke T^o-m^a (phi^en-mi`ang S^ung-s^ang-'e) m`o th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha.

S'o-y^i kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu l^au T^o-m^a k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in khon-t'o Ch'u l'e!" T^o-m^a tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chh`u-li'au ng`ai chh^in-ngi'en khon-t'o ki^a s'u-hong ke t^ang-chiak, yung ng`ai ke s'u-ch'u" mi^a ke t^ang-chiak, yu yung ng`ai ke s'u tham k`i ke hi+ap-h^a, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m sin."

Yit l^i-pai y^i-heu, h+ok-s^ang yu chhai vuk-t'u chhi-s+ip; T^o-m^a ya th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha. M`un ko^an-t'en, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u fut-y`en hi'en-hien, kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu ke t^ong-ch^ung, k'ong: "Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on!"
Y`en-heu k`i tui T^o-m^a k'ong: "Chh^un ngi^a s'u-ch'u" l`oi, mi^a khon ng`ai ke s'u; chh^un ngi^a s'u l`oi, tham ng`ai ke hi+ap-h^a. `M-h'o ng`i-f`u, oi sin!"
T^o-m^a k'ong: "Ng`ai ke Ch'u, ng`ai ke Song-ti!"
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Y^in-vi khon-t'o ng`ai, ng`i chang sin he-m`o? Ke-t^eu m`o khon-t'o chhiu sin ke ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an y^u fuk-hi ^a!"
Y^a-s^u chhai ki^a h+ok-s^ang mien-chhi`en h`an h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak, ch'ung-he m`o ki-li+uk chhai li'a-p'un s^u t^i-poi.
Si'a li'a-p'un s^u ke muk-tit he oi ng`i-t^eu sin Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk, he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, ya oi ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi sin k`i l`oi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Li'a-t^eu su" y^i-heu, chhai Th`i-p'i-l^i-^a f`u-pi^en, Y^a-s^u yu tui h+ok-s^ang hi'en-hien. Li'a-p'ai hi'en-hien ke k^in-ko he 'an-ngi`ong ke:

Ke-s`u", S^i-m`un-P'i-tet, phi^en-mi`ang S^ung-s^ang-'e ke T^o-m^a, K^a-li-li ke K^a-n^a-ng`in N^a-tan-ngi+ap, S^i-p'i-thai ke li'ong-ke lai-'e, l^au nang-ngoi li'ong-ke h+ok-s^ang khiung-ha chhai ke-vi.
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai oi hi t'a `ng-`e." K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu ya th`en ng`i hi." S'o-y^i k`i-t^eu chhut-hi, s^ong-s`on; ch'ung-he k^ui am-p^u m`o t'a-t'o pan-m^i.
Thi^en yit k^ong, Y^a-s^u kh^i chhai f`u-s`un, ch'ung-he h+ok-s^ang `m-t^i k`i he Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ph`en-y^u, ng`i-t^eu y^u t'a-t'o `ng-`e m`o?" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "M`o."
Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Chi^ong mi'ong-`e ve chhai s`on ke yu-phi'en, chhiu voi t'a-t'o." K`i-t^eu chhiu cheu k`i ke fa ve mi'ong-`e h^a-hi, kiet-k'o l^ai `m s^ong-l`oi, y^in-vi mi'ong-t'o thet t^o `ng-`e.

Y^a-s^u s'o-siak ke ke h+ok-s^ang tui P'i-tet k'ong: "He Ch'u!" S^i-m`un-P'i-tet yit th^ang-k'ong he Ch'u, ngi`am-s`u" n^a yit-li^ang s^am v`i-t'en (ke-s`u" k`i t'a-chhak-pok), thiau-l+ok s'ui t^i-poi.
Kh`i-th^a ke h+ok-s^ang chi^ong s`on-`e chhang-khi^un f`u-s`un, chi^ong k^ui mi'ong `ng-`e th^o-ko-l`oi. T^ong-s`u" k`i-t^eu l`i f`u-s`un m`o k'i-y'en, chh^a-`m-t^o yit-pak k^ung-chhak.
K`i-t^eu s^ong-ngan, khon-t'o yit-t^oi f'o-than-f'o, t'ang-k^o y^u `ng-`e, yu y^u pi'ang-`e.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "N^a k'i-m^i ng`i-t^eu chang t'a-t'o ke `ng-`e l`oi."
S^i-m`un-P'i-tet s^ong-s`on hi, chi^ong mi'ong-`e th^o-s^ong li+uk-thi; mi'ong-t'u y^u yit-pak 'ng-s+u"p-s^am-m^i thai-`ng. S^ui-y`en y^u 'an t^o `ng-`e, ch'ung-he mi'ong m`o lan-thet.
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu l`oi s+u"t-ch^eu." M`o yit-ke h+ok-s^ang k'am mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i he m'a-ng`in?" y^in-vi k`i-t^eu t^i k`i chhiu-he Ch'u.
Y^a-s^u chhiu h`ang ko-hi, n^a pi'ang-`e p^un-p^un k`i-t^eu, y`en-heu yu n^a `ng-`e p^un-p^un k`i-t^eu.
Li'a he Y^a-s^u tui s'i f+uk-f+at heu, thi-s^am-p'ai tui h+ok-s^ang hi'en-hien.

K`i-t^eu s+u"t-p'au y^i-heu, Y^a-s^u mun S^i-m`un-P'i-tet k'ong: " Yok-hon ke lai-'e S^i-m`un, ng`i oi ng`ai p'i li'a-t^eu kha-t^o m`o?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, he, ng`i t^i ng`ai oi ng`i." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i oi chhu" ng`ai ke se y`ong-`e."
Y^a-s^u thi-ngi-p'ai mun: " Yok-hon ke lai-'e S^i-m`un, ng`i oi ng`ai m`o?" K`i en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, he, ng`i t^i ng`ai oi ng`i." Y^a-s^u l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi ch'ong ng`ai ke y`ong-`e."

Y^a-s^u thi-s^am-p'ai yu mun k`i: " Yok-hon ke lai-'e S^i-m`un, ng`i oi ng`ai m`o?" P'i-tet y^in-vi Y^a-s^u li`en-li`en s^am-p'ai mun k`i, "Ng`i oi ng`ai m`o?" chhiu y`u-s`eu; k`i tui Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i v`u-s'o-put-t^i, ng`i t^i ng`ai oi ng`i." Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ng`i oi chhu" ng`ai ke y`ong-`e.

Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`i heu-s^ang ke s`u", chhu"-k^a ki^e y^eu-tai, chhu"-y`u l`oi-hi; ch'ung-he ngi`en-l'o ke s`u", ng`i voi chh^un-chhut s'u l`oi, ph+et-ng`in voi chi^ong ng`i thak-t'en, tai ng`i to ng`i m`o-oi hi ke s'o-chhai."
(Y^a-s^u k'ong li'a-ke fa he ch'u" P'i-tet voi ngi'ong-p^an s'i, l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.) Chiap-t'en, Y^a-s^u yu l^au k`i k'ong: "Ng`i l`oi th`en ng`ai!"

P'i-tet ch'on-s^u"n, khon-t'o Y^a-s^u s'o-siak ke ke h+ok-s^ang th`en-t'en l`oi. (Ke h+ok-s^ang su"t chhai s+u"t-ya ke s`u" tham-s^u"n mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, oi chhut-mai ng`i ke he m'a-ng`in?")
P'i-tet khon-t'en k`i, mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, li'a ng`in chi^ong-l`oi ngi'ong-p^an?"
Y^a-s^u en-k'ong: "Ng`ai na oi li`u k`i ke miang to ng`ai chai l`oi, k^on ng`i m'a-ke su"? Ng`i th`en ng`ai chhiu chh+ok!"

S'o-y^i, li'a-ke fa li`u-chh`on chhai th`en Y^a-s^u ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, k'ong ke h+ok-s^ang `m-voi s'i. Kh`i-s+u"t, Y^a-s^u pin m`o k'ong k`i `m-voi s'i, ch'u"-y^u k'ong: "Ng`ai na oi li`u k`i ke miang to ng`ai chai l`oi, k^on ng`i m'a-ke su"?"
Li'a-ke h+ok-s^ang chhiu-he vi li'a-t^eu su" cho kien-chu"n ke ng`in; k`i chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" ki h^a-l`oi. Ng`ai-t^eu t^i k`i ke kien-chu"n he ch^u"n ke.
Y^a-s^u h`an cho chhin-t^o ph+et ke su", na-he yit-yit ki h^a-l`oi, ng`ai si'ong su"-kie ya m`o fap-thu y`ung-n+ap 'an-t^o s^u.
Th`i-^a-f^i-l`o S^in-s^ang: Chhai ng`ai s'o-si'a ke thi-yit-p'un s^u t^i-poi, ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong Y^a-s^u ke yit-chhiet su"-chh`in l^au kau-hiun, tui k`i kh^oi-s'u" k^ung-chok,
to k`i su-chiap s^u"n-thi^en ke-ngit, chhi`on-phu k'ong-ko. Chhai s^u"n-thi^en y^i-chhi`en, k`i th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in ch'u"-su" chhu"-k^a s'o ki'en-si'en ke s'u"-th`u chhin-t^o su"-chh`in.

P^un-ng`in hoi-s'i y^i-heu si-s+u"p-ngit-ch^ung, k`i su"t tui k`i-t^eu hi'en-hien h'o-t^o p'ai, yung kok-ch'ung ke f^ong-fap chu"n-m`in chhu"-k^a h`an s^ang-s^ang; k`i chh^in-s^u"n p^un k`i-t^eu khon-t'o, yu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-lun Song-ti koet ke su"-chh`in.
K`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", k`i f^un-fu k`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M-h'o l`i-kh^oi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang. Cheu ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko ke, oi t'en ng^a P^a s'o yin-h'i ke.
Yok-hon yung s'ui h`ang s'e-l^i, ch'ung-he k'i-ngit y^i-heu ng`i-t^eu voi li^ang Su"n-L`in ke s'e-l^i."
S'u"-th`u l^au Y^a-s^u chhi-s+ip ke s`u", mun Y^a-s^u k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, li'a-ha ng`i oi f^i-f+uk Y^i-set-li+et-koet ke ch'u-khi`en he-m`o?"
Y^a-s^u l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "S`u"-ki^en l^au ngit-kh`i he ng^a P^a cheu chhu"-k^a ke khi`en-piang s'o-thin ke, `m-he ng`i-t^eu ke su".

Ch'ung-he Su"n-L`in l`im-to ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu voi m^an-y^u n`en-l+it, pin oi chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, Y`u-thai l^au Sat-m^a-li-^a chhi`on-thi, chh+u"t-to thi^en-ng`ai h'oi-kok, vi ng`ai cho kien-chu"n."
K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, Y^a-s^u chhai k`i-t^eu ke chu-muk-ch^ung su-chiap s^u"n-thi^en; k`i s^u"n-to y`un t'ang-k^o hi, k`i-t^eu chhiu khon k`i `m-t'o.
K`i l`i-kh^oi ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chu-muk mong thi^en. Fut-y`en, y^u li'ong-ke chok ph+ak-s^am ke ng`in kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu s`un-th`eu,

k'ong: " K^a-li-li-ng`in ^a, cho-m'a-ke kh^i chhai li'a-vi mong thi^en n`e? Li'a-ke l`i-kh^oi ng`i-t^eu, su-chiap s^u"n-thi^en ke Y^a-s^u, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o k`i ngi'ong-p^an s^u"n-thi^en, k`i ya voi 'an-ngi`ong to-ch'on-l`oi."
S'u"-th`u chhiu tui K'am-l'am-s^an ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi; K'am-l'am-s^an l`i s`ang m`o k'i-y'en, yok-y^u yit k^ung-l^i.

Yit ng+ip s`ang, k`i-t^eu chhiu s^ong s'o h+et ke l`eu-t'ang; chhai ke-vi y^u P'i-tet, Yok-hon, Ng^a-kok l^au ^On-tet-li+et, F^i-l+it l^au T^o-m^a, P^a-t^o-l`o-m^ai l^au M^a-thai, ^A-l+et-f^i ke lai-'e Ng^a-kok, Kit-chin-t'ong ke S^i-m`un, l^au Ng^a-kok ke lai-'e Y`u-thai.
K`i-t^eu s`ong-s`ong khiung-ha th`ung-s^im kh`i-t'o; t^ong-ch^ung ya y^u k'i-ke fu-ng`in-k^a l^au Y^a-s^u ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a, pin Y^a-s^u ke-t^eu l'o-th^ai.
Ko-li'au k'i-ngit, y^u sin-th`u ke chhi-fi, yok-y^u yit-pak ngi-s+u"p s`a chh^am-k^a. P'i-tet kh^i-h'i-l`oi, k'ong:
"Kok-vi hi^ung-thi! Su"n-L`in th^ung-ko Thai-v'i ke choi chhai Su"n-k^in s'o yi-ngi`en, ko^an-he Y`u-thai tai ng`in chok Y^a-s^u ke su", yit-thin oi s+u"t-hien.
Li'a Y`u-thai p'un-l`oi su ki'en-si'en l`oi f^un-t^am ng`ai-t^eu ke k^ung-chok, he ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke yit-ke."
( Y`u-thai yung k`i chok-ok s'o tet ke chhi`en m^ai yit-te thi`en; chhai ke-vi, k`i ti^en-to-th`eu phuk h^a-l`oi, t'u-li+et chh`ong-li`u, hien-s'i.
H+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in chhi`on-phu y^u th^ang-t'o li'a-khien su", s'o-y^i yung k`i-t^eu ke fa ham ke-te thi cho ^A-kiet-thai-m^a, yi-su" chhiu-he "Hiet-thi`en".)
"Chhiu-chhiong S^u"-phi^en s'o-si'a ke: Ngien k`i ke chhu-s'o f^ong-li`ong thet, m`o ng`in h+et chhai ke t^i-poi. Yu y^u yit-ki si'a-t'en k'ong: Ngien ph+et-ng`in tet k`i ke chu"t-fun."

P'i-tet ki-si+uk k'ong: "S'o-y^i, yit-thin oi nang-ngoi ki'en-si'en yit-ke ng`in k^a-ng+ip ng`ai-t^eu, khiung-ha cho Ch'u Y^a-s^u f+uk-f+at ke kien-chu"n-ng`in. Li'a ng`in yit-thin oi he Ch'u Y^a-s^u chhai ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung chhut-ng+ip ke s`u", tui Yok-hon h`ang s'e-l^i kh^oi-s'u" to Y^a-s^u su-chiap s^u"n-thi^en li'a-chham s`u"-ki^en, th`eu-m^i l^au ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha ke ng`in."
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, thai-k^a th^ui-si'en li'ong-ke ng`in, chhiu-he Yok-sit (phi^en-mi`ang P^a-sat-p^a, yu ^on-to Y`u-su"-t^u) l^au M^a-th`i-^a.
K`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, Ng`i t^i m^i-yit-ke ng`in ke s^im; khi`u Ng`i ch'u"-su" ng`ai-t^eu, li'a li'ong-s`a t^ong-ch^ung m'a-ng`in he Ng`i s'o ki'en-si'en,
oi k`i chiap li'a s'u"-th`u chu"t-fun ke. Li'a chu"t-fun Y`u-thai y'i-k^in piong-thet, to k`i yin-k^oi hi ke s'o-chhai l'e."
K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, k`i-t^eu chhiu chh^u-chhi^am-'e, chhai li'ong-s`a t^ong-ch^ung chh^u-chhut M^a-th`i-^a l`oi; k`i chhiu l^au kh`i-th^a s+u"p-yit-s`a khiung-ha son-cho s'u"-th`u.
'Ng-s`un-chiet ke-ngit, sin-th`u chhi`on-phu chhi-s+ip chhai khiung yit-ke thi-f^ong.
Fut-y`en y^u s^ang tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, chhiong yit-chhu"n thai-f^ung chh^oi-ko ke s^ang, chh^ung-m^an k`i-t^eu s'o chh^o ke k^ui-ki^en vuk.
K`i-t^eu yu khon-t'o chhiong f'o-s+at ke h`in-`e, f^un-kh^oi, l+ok chhai m^i-yit-ke ng`in s^u"n-song.
K`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhiu p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, cheu Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke chh`oi-n`en k'ong-chhut ph+et-ch'ung ke fa.
Ke-s`u", y^u khi`en-s`u"n ke Y`u-thai-ng`in tui su"-kie kok-koet ch'on-l`oi, h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.

K`i-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o li'a hi'ong-s^ang, kh`i-ch^ung yit thai-khi`un ng`in chhiu l`oi chhi-s+ip. Thai-k^a k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, y^in-vi m^i-yit-ke ng`in th^ang-t'o sin-th`u yung k`i chhai ngoi-koet ke khi^ong-khi'eu k'ong-fa.
K`i-t^eu k'am-kok f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i, p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Ng`i khon, li'a-t^eu k'ong-fa ke ng`in k'am `m-he K^a-li-li-ng`in m^a?
Ng`ai-t^eu tak-s`a ngi'ong-p^an th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu k'ong ^en chhu"-k^a ke ^a-m^e fa n`e?
Ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u Pha-th`i-^a-ng`in, M'i-t'i-^a-ng`in, Y^i-l`an-ng`in; h`an-y^u tui M^i-sok-put-th+at-m'i-^a, Y`u-thai, K^a-pha-t^o-k^a, P'un-t^u, ^A-se-^a,
Fut-l^i-k^a, Ph`ong-f^i-li-^a, ^Ai-kh+ip, l^au K'u-li-nai fu-khiun ke Li-p'i-^a yit-tai thi-f^ong l`oi ke ng`in; ya y^u tui L`o-m^a l`oi ke,

p^au-h`am Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au sin Y`u-thai-kau ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in; nang-ngoi y^u Khiet-l^i-th+it-ng`in l^au ^A-l^a-pak-ng`in. M`o si'ong-t'o, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu yung ^en chhai ngoi-koet k'ong ke fa, l`oi chh`on Song-ti v'i-thai ke chok-v`i!"
K`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung k'am-kok yu h^i-kh`i yu m`i-f+et, p'i-chh'u" mun-k'ong: "Li'a to-t'ai he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e?"
Ch'ung-he, y^u-t^eu ng`in seu sin-th`u k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu ng`in he chi'u s+u"t thet t^o l'e!"

Li'a-s`u", P'i-tet l^au kh`i-th^a s+u"p-yit-ke s'u"-th`u kh^i-h'i-l`oi. K`i thai-s^ang tui thai-k^a k'ong: " Y`u-thai th`ung-p^au l^au s'o-y^u h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi t^i, chu-yi th^ang ng`ai k'ong.
Ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o li'a-t^eu ng`in he s+u"t chi'u-chui m^a? `M-he, y^in-vi li'a-ha chang ch^eu-s`u"n-th`eu ki'u-ti'am-ch^ung.
Li'a-ke hien-siong chhiu-he si^en-t^i Yok-ng'i s'o-k'ong ke:

Song-ti k'ong: Li'a he Ng`ai chhai su"-kie m+at-kh`i s'o oi cho ke: Ng`ai oi chi^ong Ng`ai ke L`in t'o-p^un s'o-y^u ke ng`in. Ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng voi si^en-ko Ng`ai ke sin-sit; ng`i-t^eu ke heu-s^ang-ng`in voi khon-t'o yi-siong; ng`i-t^eu ke l'o-ng`in-k^a voi pot kh`i-meu ke mung.
Chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e t^ong-ch^ung, Ng`ai oi chi^ong Ng`ai ke L`in t'o-chhut-l`oi, su"m-chu" p^un Ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in l^au s'u"-'ng; k`i-t^eu voi si^en-ko Ng`ai ke sin-sit.
Ng`ai oi chhai thi^en-t'ang hi'en s`u"n-chiak, chhai thi-song h`ang kh`i-su"; y^u hiet, y^u f'o, y^u thai m`ung-y^en;
ngit-th`eu sa `m-voi fat-k^ong; ngi+et-k^ong voi chhiong hiet 'an-f`ung; chhai Ch'u v'i-thai k^ong-y`ung ke ngit-`e l`oi-to y^i-chhi`en, li'a yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu voi fat-s^en.
To ke-s`u", f`am khi`u-ham Ch'u mi`ang ke ng`in yit-thin tet-kiu.

" Y^i-set-li+et th`ung-p^au ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang ng`ai ke fa. N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u ke s`u"n-su"n s'u"-min, y^in-vi Song-ti th^ung-ko k`i s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak, thai-n`en, kh`i-su", y'i-k^in chhin chh^in-chh'u tui ng`i-t^eu hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi. Li'a-su" ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a t^i, y^in-vi he fat-s^en chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke.

Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi l^au si^en-kien, ch'o chhiu kiet-thin chi^ong Y^a-s^u k^au-p^un ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu chhiu th^ung-ko put-fap ke ng`in chi^ong k`i t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, hoi-s'i k`i.
Ch'ung-he Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, chh`u-thet s'i ke thung-kh'u, y^in-vi s'i put-n`en kh'ung-chu" k`i.
Thai-v'i su"t k'ong-t'o k`i: Ng`ai khon-t'o Ch'u s`ong-s`ong chhai ng`ai mien-chhi`en; y^in-vi K`i chhai ng`ai ke s`un-th`eu, ng`ai chhiu `m-voi y`eu-thung.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai ke s^im-k^on f^on-h'i, ng`ai ke fa m^an-y^u khoai-l+ok. S^ui-y`en ng`ai ke ngiuk-th'i voi s'i, ng`ai h`an-voi s^ang chhai h^i-mong ch^ung.
Y^in-vi Ng`i `m-voi p^un ng`ai l+ok y^im-ki^en, ya `m-voi p^un Ng`i ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in mi`en-thet.
Ng`i y'i-k^in ch'u"-su" ng`ai s^ang-miang ke lu; Ng`i ke th`ung-chhai voi p^un ng`ai chh^ung-m^an f^on-h'i.

"Kok-vi hi^ung-thi, ko^an-he si^en-ch'u Thai-v'i ke su", ng`ai l'o-s+u"t l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong. K`i `m t^an-chhiang s'i-thet, ya m`ai-thet-hi; k`i ke f`un-mu to k^im-p^u-ngit h`an p'o-chh`un chhai ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi.
K`i ki-y`en he si^en-t^i, chhiu t^i Song-ti tui k`i ke yin-h'i: Song-ti su"t fat-su" oi tui k`i ke ch'u"-s^un ch^ung sat-l+ip yit-ke v`ong l`oi chh^o k`i ke p'o-chho.
Thai-v'i yi-si^en t^i Song-ti ke kie-v+ak, s'o-y^i lun-t'o ko^an-he K^i-tuk ke f+uk-f+at, k`i k'ong: K`i m`o p^un-ng`in fit-l+ok y^im-ki^en; k`i ke ngiuk-th'i ya m`o mi`en-thet.
Li'a-ke Y^a-s^u, Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" k`i f+uk-f+at; ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu he li'a-khien su" ke kien-chu"n-ng`in.
K`i y'i-k^in k^o-s^u"n to Song-ti ke yu-phi'en, pin tui ki^a P^a chiap-su s'o yin-h'i ke Su"n-L`in. Ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha s'o khon-t'o s'o th^ang-t'o ke, chhiu-he k`i s'o t'o-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke ^en-su.
Thai-v'i chhu"-k^a pin m`o s^ong-to thi^en-t'ang hi, ch'ung-he k`i k'ong: Ch'u tui ng`ai ke Ch'u k'ong: Ng`i chh^o chhai Ng`ai ke yu-phi'en,
t'en Ng`ai s'u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it ph+uk chhai ng`i ke kiok-h^a.
"S'o-y^i, Y^i-set-li+et ke chhi`on-th'i th`ung-p^au ^a, ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t oi t^i, ng`i-t^eu t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang li'a-ke Y^a-s^u, Song-ti y'i-k^in sat-l+ip k`i cho Ch'u, cho K^i-tuk!"
Thai-k^a th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, k'am-kok chhin chhiuk-s^im, chhiu tui P'i-tet l^au kh`i-th^a ke s'u"-th`u k'ong: "Hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e?"

P'i-tet l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in oi l`i-kh^oi chhui-ok, yu oi fung Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang li^ang s'e-l^i, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi tet-t'o Song-ti s'o-su ke Su"n-L`in.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ke yin-h'i he oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Song-ti s'o f^u-seu ke ng`in, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng, l^au yit-chhiet chhai y'en-f^ong ke ng`in."
P'i-tet yu yung chhin-t^o fa tui k`i-t^eu cho kien-chu"n, khien k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi kiu chhu"-k^a thot-l`i li'a f'u-phai ke su"-thoi!"
Chhin-t^o ng`in chiap-su k`i ke fa, pin li^ang s'e-l^i; ke-ngit, sin-th`u yok chen-k^a s^am-chhi^en ng`in.
K`i-t^eu ch^on-s^im tui s'u"-th`u li^ang-su kau-hiun, chh^am-k^a th`on-khe s^en-f+at, f^un-hi'ong oi ke y`en-s+it, khiung-ha kh`i-t'o.
S'u"-th`u h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su"; chung-ng`in chhiu f^i-s`ong kh^im-f+uk.
Chhi`on-th'i sin-th`u ki-si+uk khiung-ha ko th`on-khe ke s^en-f+at, s'o-y^u ke t^ung-s^i thai-k^a k^ung-yung.
K`i-t^eu yu mai thi`en-s'an k^a-ngi+ap, cheu tak-s`a ke s^i-yeu chi^ong chhi`en p^un-p^un thai-k^a.
K`i-t^eu th`ung-s^im h+ap-yi, tak-ngit chhai su"n-thien chhi-fi, yu chhai tak-s`a ke vuk-h^a f^un-hi'ong oi ke y`en-s+it, yung f^on-h'i s`un-kiet ke s^im khiung-ha s+u"t-fan,
siung-chan Song-ti, l^au m^i-yit-ke ng`in p'o-chh`u" f`o-m+uk ke ko^an-he. Ch'u s'u" tet-kiu ke ng`in-su tak-ngit chen-k^a.
Y^u yit-ngit, h^a-chu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung kh`i-t'o ke s`u", P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon s^ong su"n-thien hi.
Chhai ke ^on-to M^i-m`un ke s'o-chhai, y^u yit-ke chhut-se chhiu khi`o-kiok ke ng`in, tak-ngit p^un-ng`in k^ong-l`oi piong chhai m`un-h'eu, tui ng+ip su"n-thien ke ng`in th'o-s+u"t.
K`i khon-t'o P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon oi ng+ip su"n-thien hi, chhiu khi`u k`i-t^eu kiu-chi k`i.
K`i-t^eu chu-s`u"n khon k`i; P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i khon ng`ai-t^eu!"
K`i chhiu chu-yi khon k`i-t^eu, h^i-mong voi tet-t'o m'a-ke t^ung-s^i.

P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: "K^im-ngi`un ng`ai chhi`on-phu m`o, ch'ung-he ng`ai oi chi^ong ng`ai s'o y^u ke p^un ng`i: Ng`ai fung N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang f^un-fu ng`i, hong-h'i-l`oi h`ang!"
Y`en-heu P'i-tet khi^en-t'en k`i ke yu-s'u, f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi. Ke ng`in ke kiok l^au kiok-ch^ang-kut ngi`am-s`u" tet-t'o hi-l+it,
chhiu thiau-h'i-l`oi, kh^i-t'en, kh^oi-s'u" h`ang-lu. K`i th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ng+ip-hi su"n-thien; k`i k'in h`ang k'in thiau, siung-chan Song-ti.
Chung-ng`in chhi`on-phu khon-t'o k`i yit-phi'en h`ang, yit-phi'en siung-chan Song-ti;
k`i-t^eu yit ngin-chhut k`i chhiu-he ke chh^o chhai su"n-thien ke M^i-m`un-h'eu ke khiet-s+u"t-'e, chhiu y^in-vi s'o fat-s^en ke su" k'am-kok f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i.
Chhai S'o-l`o-m`un l`ong-h^a, ke ng`in khi^en-t'en P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon; chhai-chh`ong ke ng`in k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, chhi`on-phu ch'eu-hi khon.

P'i-tet khon-t'o, chhiu tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: " Y^i-set-li+et th`ung-p^au ^a, cho-m'a-ke khon li'a-khien su" cho kh`i-koai n`e? Cho-m'a-ke k'in chu-muk khon ng`ai-t^eu n`e? Ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o ng`ai-t^eu he kho chhu"-k^a ke n`en-l+it ya-he khi`en-s`u"n s'u" li'a-ke ng`in h`ang-lu m^a?

^A-pak-l^a-h'on, Y^i-sat, Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti, chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke Song-ti, y'i-k^in y`ung-yeu K`i ke ph+uk-ng`in Y^a-s^u; li'a Y^a-s^u, ng`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i k^au p^un k^on-f'u; P'i-l^a-t^o kiet-thin oi piong k`i, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu chhai P'i-l^a-t^o ke mien-chhi`en sa hi-chhi+et k`i.
K`i he su"n-kiet k^ung-ngi ke, ng`i-t^eu sa hi-chhi+et k`i, y^eu-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o th'eu-piong yit-ke chh`u"-ng`in ke hi^ung-s'u p^un ng`i-t^eu.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chi^ong s^ang-miang ke Ch'u hoi-s'i; ch'ung-he Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at. Ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he li'a-khien su" ke kien-chu"n-ng`in.

Li'a khi`o-kiok ke ng`in tet-t'o y'ung-khien, chhiu-he y^in-vi Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang s'o fat-chhut ke n`en-l+it. Li'a-ke ng`in, ng`i-t^eu su"t k`i. Ng`i-t^eu s'o khon-t'o fat-s^en chhai k`i s^u"n-song ke su", he y^in-vi k`i sin Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang. Y^in-vi sin Y^a-s^u, k`i chang voi v`an-chhi`on h'o h'i-l`oi; li'a he ng`i-t^eu chh^in-ngi'en khon-t'o ke.
"Li'a-ha, hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`ai t^i ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`i-t^eu ke k^on-ch'ong 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai Y^a-s^u, he y^in-vi m`o li'au-ki'e.
Song-ti ch'o chhiu th^ung-ko chung si^en-t^i yi-ngi`en K^i-tuk tit-khok voi su-kh'u; li'a yi-ngi`en y'i-k^in s+u"t-hien.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi f'i-k'oi, ch'on-hiong Song-ti, K`i chhiu voi sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke chhui.
'An-ngi`ong, Ch'u voi s'ong-su ng`i-t^eu l`in-l+it von-s^in ke ngit-`e; ke-s`u", K`i oi chh^ai-khi'en Y^a-s^u kong-l`im, chhiu-he K`i vi ng`i-t^eu s'o-si'en ke K^i-tuk.
K^i-tuk yit-thin oi li`u chhai thi^en-t'ang, chh+u"t-to van-v+ut f+uk-h^in ke s`u"-chiet; li'a he Song-ti chhai k'u-ch'o th^ung-ko K`i ke su"n si^en-t^i ke choi s'o si^en-pu ke.

M^o-s^i k'ong-ko: 'Ch'u --- ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti oi tui ng`i-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi ch^ung vi ng`i-t^eu h^in-h'i yit-ke si^en-t^i, chhiong K`i h^in-h'i ng`ai yit-yong. K`i tui ng`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke fa, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu oi th^ang.
`M th^ang-chhi`ung li'a si^en-t^i ke ng`in, chhiu oi tui Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in ch^ung chh`u-thet.'
S'o-y^u k'ong yi-ngi`en ke si^en-t^i, li`en Sat-m^u-ng'i l^au chhai k`i heu-poi l`oi ke, chhi`on-phu y^u si^en-pu li'a-t^eu ngit-`e s'o oi fat-s^en ke su"-chh`in.

Ng`i-t^eu he si^en-t^i ke ki-s`u"n-ng`in; ng`i-t^eu s`u"n-chiap Song-ti l^au ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s'o-l+ip ke khie-yok. Song-ti tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on k'ong-ko: 'Ng`ai oi th^ung-ko ng`i ke heu-thoi su-fuk p^un thi-song ke van-m`in.'
S'o-y^i, Song-ti h^in-h'i K`i ke ph+uk-ng`in, si^en chh^ai k`i to ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi l`oi, su-fuk p^un ng`i-t^eu, s'u" ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in f`i-th`eu, l`i-kh^oi si`a-ok ke tho-lu."
P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon h`an tui chung-ng`in k'ong-fa ke s`u", y^u-t^eu chi-s^u", su"n-thien ke k'in-v'i-ch'ong, l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in fut-y`en l`oi-to.
Y^in-vi li'ong-ke s'u"-th`u kau-hiun ng`in, k'ong Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in f+uk-f+at, yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi chu"n-m`in s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke su", li'a-t^eu ng`in f^i-s`ong khi'en,
s'o-y^i chhiu chok k`i-t^eu, chi^ong k`i-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk to thi^en-k^ong, y^in-vi ke-s`u" thi^en y'i-k^in am.
Ch'ung-he, ke-t^eu th^ang tho-l^i ke ng`in y^u chhin-t^o si^ong-sin; sin-th`u ke ch'ung-su t^an-chhiang n`am-'e-ng`in chhiu chi^ong-khiun 'ng-chhi^en ng`in.
Thi-ngi-ngit, Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu, ch'ong-l'o, l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang chhi-s+ip kh^oi-fi.
Thai-chi-s^u" ^A-n^a l^au K^ai-^a-fap, pin Yok-hon l^au ^A-l+it-s^an-thai, h`an-y^u thai-chi-s^u" ke chh^in-chhit chhi`on-phu chhai ke-vi.
K`i-t^eu h^em s'u"-th`u kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu ke mien-chhi`en, mun-k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu kho m'a-ke n`en-l+it, fung m'a-ng`in ke mi`ang cho li'a-su" n`e?"
P'i-tet p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, en-k'ong: "M`in-ki^en ke li^ang-chhiu l^au ch'ong-l'o ^a,
na-he ng`ai-t^eu k^im-p^u-ngit su s'u"m-mun he ko^an-he li'a khi`o-kiok ke ng`in ngi'ong-p^an tet-t'o y^i-h'o li'a-khien h'o su",

ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a l^au s'o-y^u ke Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in yin-t^ong t^i: Li'a kh^i chhai ng`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en ke ng`in, k`i v`an-chhi`on tet-t'o y^i-h'o, he y^in-vi N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang s'o fat-chhut ke n`en-l+it. Y^a-s^u p^un ng`i-t^eu t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, ch'ung-he Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at.
Ko^an-he li'a-vi Y^a-s^u, Su"n-k^in k'ong-ko: Ng`i-t^eu ke n`ai-s'ui s^u"-fu s'o fit-thet ke li'a-te s+ak-th`eu, y'i-k^in s`ang-cho thi-k^i ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke.
Ch'u"-y^u th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u, chang y^u ch'u"n-kiu; y^in-vi chhai thi^en-ha ng`in-ki^en, Song-ti m`o su ph+et ke mi`ang, p^un ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet kho k`i l`oi tet-kiu."

Ke-t^eu ngi-y`en khon-t'o P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon 'an y'ung-k'am, yu t^i k`i-t^eu he m`o su m'a-ke kau-yuk ke ph^u-th^ung-ng`in, chhiu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai. K`i-t^eu t^i k`i li'ong-s`a su"t th`en-ko Y^a-s^u;
ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu m`o fa h'o k'ong, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu khon-t'o ke tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke ng`in kh^i chhai P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon ke s`un-th`eu.
Ke-t^eu ngi-y`en chhiu min-lin k`i li'ong-s`a chhut-hi ngi-fi ke ngoi-poi, y`en-heu chh^am-si`ong,

k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an tui-fu k`i-t^eu n`e? K`i-t^eu m`in-m`in h`ang yit-ke thai s`u"n-chiak, h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in chhi`on-phu t^i li'a-khien su", ng`ai-t^eu ya m`o fap-thu f'eu-ngin.
Ch'ung-he, vi-t'o oi phit-mi^en li'a-ke su" chhai m`in-ki^en y+et-chh`on y+et-fat, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, cho-`m-tet chai yung ke-s`a ke mi`ang tui ng`in k'ong m'a-ke."
K`i-t^eu chhiu h^em k`i li'ong-s`a to-ch'on-l`oi, k'in-ko k`i-t^eu m`o-lun ngi'ong-p^an cho-`m-tet chai yung Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang k'ong-tho ya-he kau-hiun ng`in.
Ch'ung-he P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en, th^ang-chhi`ung ng`i-t^eu kha chh+ok, ya-he th^ang-chhi`ung Song-ti kha chh+ok n`e? Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a si'ong khon-'e!
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o khon-t'o, s'o th^ang-t'o ke, cho-`m-tet m`o k'ong."

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ngi-fi chhiu chai yit-p'ai ngi`am-ngi`am k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, y`en-heu piong k`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi. Ngi-fi si'ong-`m-chhut oi ngi'ong-p^an h`in-f+at k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi chung-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung vi s'o fat-s^en ke su" siung-chan Song-ti.
Th`ung-s`u", chhai li'a-ke s`u"n-chiak ch^ung tet-t'o y^i-h'o ke ng`in y'i-k^in si-s+u"p-l`ang se.
P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon yit-ha tet-t'o su"t-fong, ngi`am-s`u" ch'on sin-th`u ke-vi hi, chi^ong chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o s'o-k'ong ke fa tui thai-k^a po-ko.
K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o, chhiu th`ung-s^im thai-s^ang kh`i-t'o Song-ti, k'ong: "Chh'ong-chho thi^en, thi, h'oi, l^au kh`i-ch^ung van-v+ut ke Ch'u-ch'ai ^a!
Ng`i su"t th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in, yung Ng`i ke ph+uk-ng`in --- ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en Thai-v'i ke choi k'ong: Li+et-koet cho-m'a-ke nong-si'ong f'an-phan? Van-m`in cho-m'a-ke kh^ung-kh^ung kie-m`eu?
Su"-song ke v`ong hong-h'i-l`oi ch'un-phi; ch'ong-khi`en ke k^on ya chhi-s+ip khiung-ha, si'ong-oi k^ung-kit Ch'u l^au K`i ke Su-k^au-ch'a K^i-tuk.

Su"-s+u"t chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong, H^i-l+it l^au Ph`ang-si^u-P'i-l^a-t^o chhai p'un-s`ang l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in pin Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ki^eu-kiet, oi k^ung-kit Ng`i s`u"n-su"n ke ph+uk-ng`in Y^a-s^u, chhiu-he Ng`i s'o si'en-l+ip ke K^i-tuk.
K`i-t^eu th`ung-m`eu, cheu Ng`i ke thai-n`en l^au ch'u"-yi s'o yi-thin oi s+u"t-hien ke yit-chhiet hi cho.
Ch'u ^a, k`i-t^eu khi'ung-hak ng`ai-t^eu, li'a-ha khi`u Ng`i kam-chhat, pin s'u" ng`ai-t^eu, chhiu-he Ng`i ke ph+uk-ng`in, voi y'ung-k'am chh`on Ng`i ke tho-l^i.
Khi`u Ng`i chh^un-s'u y^i-chhu" phiang-thung, ya s'u" ng`ai-t^eu voi th^ung-ko Ng`i s`u"n-su"n ke ph+uk-ng`in Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang h`ang s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su"."
K`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o heu, chhi-fi ke thi-f^ong chhiu y`eu-thung; k`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, y'ung-k'am chh`on Song-ti ke tho-l^i.
