Li'a-khi`un sin-th`u chhi`on-phu th`ung-s^im h+ap-yi, m`o yit-ke ng`in k'ong k`i s'o-y^u ke chh`oi-s'an he s+uk chhu"-k^a ke; s'o-y^u ke t^ung-s^i thai-k^a k^ung-yung.
Ke-t^eu s'u"-th`u yung thai n`en-l+it kien-chu"n Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke f+uk-f+at; Song-ti thai-thai su-fuk p^un m^i-yit-ke ng`in.
Chhai k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, m`o-ng`in khiam m'a-ke. Ke-t^eu y^u thi`en y^u vuk ke, chhiu chi^ong mai thi`en-s'an k^a-ngi+ap ke chhi`en tai-l`oi,
piong chhai s'u"-th`u ke mien-chhi`en, p^un-p^un m^i-yit-ke s^i-yeu ke ng`in.
Y^u yit-ke chhai Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u" chhut-se ke Li-vi-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to Yok-sit, s'u"-th`u ham k`i P^a-n^a-p^a (yi-su" chhiu-he "K'u-li-ch'a");
k`i mai-thet k`i ke yit-te thi`en-thi, chi^ong chhi`en tai-l`oi, k^au-p^un s'u"-th`u.
Nang-ngoi y^u yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to ^A-n^a-n`i-^a; k`i l^au ki^a p^u-ngi`ong Sat-f^i-l^a mai-thet yit-t^eu thi`en-s'an.
K`i am-ch^ung li`u-h^a yit-t^eu chhi`en, chi^ong chh^un ke k^au-p^un s'u"-th`u; li'a-khien su" ki^a p^u-ngi`ong ya t^i.
P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: " ^A-n^a-n`i-^a, ng`i cho-m'a-ke p^un Sat-tan kh'ung-chu" ng`i ke s^im, l`oi phien Su"n-L`in, chi^ong mai thi`en-s'an ke chhi`en am-ch^ung li`u-h^a yit-t^eu n`e?
Thi`en-s'an m`ang mai, he ng`i ke; mai-thet y^i-heu, chhi`en h`an-he ng`i k'on ke. Ng`i ngi'ong-p^an chh`un-s^im 'an-ngi`ong cho n`e? Ng`i `m-he phien ng`in, he phien Song-ti!"
^A-n^a-n`i-^a yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu vang-l+ok-hi, s'i-thet. S'o-y^u th^ang-t'o li'a-khien su" ke ng`in chhi`on-phu thai chh+ok-ki^ang.
Y^u k'i-ke heu-s^ang-ng`in ng+ip-l`oi, chi^ong k`i ke s^u"-th'i p^au-h'i-l`oi, k^ong-chhut-hi m`ai.
Thai-yok ko s^am-ti'am-ch^ung, ki^a p^u-ngi`ong ya ng+ip-l`oi; k`i h`an `m-t^i s'o fat-s^en ke su".
P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i l^au ng`ai k'ong, ng`i-t^eu mai thi`en-s'an ke chhi`en chhiu-he li'a-t^eu m^a?" K`i en-k'ong: "He, chhi`on-phu chhai li'a-vi."
P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke th`ung-s^im su"-tham Ch'u ke L`in n`e? Ng`i khon, m`ai ngi^a l'o-k^ung ke ng`in y'i-k^in to m`un-h'eu, k`i-t^eu ya oi chi^ong ng`i k^ong-chhut-hi!"

K`i ngi`am-s`u" ya vang chhai P'i-tet ke kiok-chhi`en, s'i-thet. Ke-t^eu heu-s^ang-ng`in ng+ip-l`oi, khon-t'o k`i y'i-k^in s'i-thet, chhiu chi^ong k`i k^ong-chhut-hi, m`ai chhai ki^a l'o-k^ung ke s`un-th`eu.
Chhi`on kau-fi l^au s'o-y^u th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu su" ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang.
Y^u chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su" th^ung-ko s'u"-th`u ke s'u, chhai m`in-ki^en fat-s^en; s'o-y^u ke sin-th`u th`ung-s^im h+ap-yi chhai S'o-l`o-m`un l`ong-h^a chhi-s+ip.
S^ui-y`en yit-p^an m`in-chung ch^un-chhung k`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he chh`u-li'au sin-th`u y^i-ngoi, m`o ng`in k'am chiap-khiun k`i-t^eu.
Ke-s`u", sin Ch'u ke ng`in k'in-l`oi k'in-t^o, n`am-'ng t^u y^u.

Y^in-vi s'u"-th`u h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak, y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiu chi^ong phiang-ng`in k^ong-to ki^e-lu, piong chhai m`in-chh`ong-t'ang ya-he chh'o-chhi+ak-t'ang, h^i-mong P'i-tet h`ang-ko-hi ke s`u", k`i ke y'ang-`e voi ch^a-t'o yit-t^eu ng`in ke s^u"n-song.
H`an-y^u yit thai-khi`un ng`in tai-t'en phiang-ng`in l^au si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in, tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang fu-khiun ke hi^ong-ch'u"n l`oi; li'a-t^eu phiang-ng`in chhi`on-phu tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Thai-chi-s^u" l^au ke-t^eu th`ung k`i khiung-t'ong ke ng`in, chhiu-he t^ong-thi ke Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in, tui s'u"-th`u f^i-s`ong chhit-tu; s'o-y^i k`i-t^eu chhiu kiet-s^im oi chh'ai-chh'i h`ang-thung.
K`i-t^eu ha-s'u chok s'u"-th`u, chi^ong k`i-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk.
Ch'ung-he ke am-p^u, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" t'a-kh^oi k^am-m`un, tai s'u"-th`u chhut-l`oi, l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong:
"Ng`i-t^eu hi, kh^i chhai su"n-thien-t'u, tui m`in-chung chh`on ko^an-he li'a s^in s^ang-miang ke tho-l^i."

S'u"-th`u th^ang-chhi`ung li'a-ke fa, thi^en m`ung-k^ong ke s`u", k`i-t^eu chhiu ng+ip-hi su"n-thien kau-hiun ng`in. Thai-chi-s^u" l^au k`i ke th`ung-t'ong seu-s+ip ngi-fi s'o-y^u Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke ch'ong-l'o l`oi k'i-h`ang thai-fi, y`en-heu h^em ng`in hi k^am-ngi+uk chi^ong s'u"-th`u tai-l`oi.
Ch'ung-he, k'in-v'i hi-to ke s`u", fat-hien ke-t^eu s'u"-th`u m`o chh^oi k^am-ngi+uk t'u, chhiu to-ch'on-hi ngi-fi po-ko, k'ong:

"Ng`ai-t^eu hi-to k^am-ngi+uk, khon-t'o k^am-m`un s'o-to h'o-h'o, khon-s'u ke ng`in ya chhai m`un-ngoi ch'ong-t'en; ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu t'a-kh^oi k^am-m`un, fat-hien t^i-poi li`en yit-ke ng`in ya m`o!"
Su"n-thien ke k'in-v'i-ch'ong l^au ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong th^ang-t'o li'a-ke po-ko, m`o-kat m`o-sat, `m t^i li'a-khien su" voi ngi'ong-p^an.
Li'a-s`u", y^u yit-ke ng`in ng+ip-l`oi po-ko k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u ke ng`in, li'a-ha kh^i chhai su"n-thien-t'u kau-hiun m`in-chung!"
S'o-y^i ke k'in-v'i-ch'ong tai-t'en phu-ha hi, chi^ong s'u"-th`u tai-ch'on-l`oi. K`i-t^eu m`o yung phau-l+it, y^in-vi ki^ang m`in-chung yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong s'u"-th`u tai-l`oi, ham k`i-t^eu kh^i chhai ngi-fi-chhi`en. Thai-chi-s^u" s'u"m-mun k`i-t^eu,

k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu su"t ngi`am-ngi`am kim-ch'u" ng`i-t^eu, cho-`m-tet yung li'a ng`in ke mi`ang kau-hiun ng`in, ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on chi^ong ng`i-t^eu li'a-ke tho-l^i chh`on-phien Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, si'ong-oi chi^ong sat-hoi li'a ng`in ke hiet-chai k^ui chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-song!"
P'i-tet l^au kh`i-th^a ke s'u"-th`u en-k'ong: "Sun-f+uk Song-ti, `m sun-f+uk ng`in, li'a he yin-t^ong ke!
Ng`i-t^eu s'o t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke Y^a-s^u, ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" k`i f+uk-f+at.
Song-ti k^o-s^u"n k`i, s'u" k`i chhai chhu"-k^a ke yu-phi'en cho Li^ang-chhiu, cho Kiu-ch'u, oi p^un Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in y^u f'i-k'oi ke k^i-fi, s'u" k`i-t^eu ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he li'a-t^eu su" ke kien-chu"n-ng`in; Song-ti su-p^un sun-f+uk K`i ke ng`in ke Su"n-L`in ya l^au ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha cho-chu"n."
Ngi-fi ke ngi-y`en th^ang-li'au li'a-ke fa, f^i-s`ong khi'en, si'ong-oi sat-hoi ke-t^eu s'u"-th`u.

Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to K^a-m^a-li+et, he chung-ng`in f^i-s`ong kin-chhung ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u"; k`i chhai ngi-fi ch^ung kh^i-h'i-l`oi, f^un-fu ng`in tai s'u"-th`u chhut-hi yit-ha,
y`en-heu tui ngi-y`en k'ong: " Y^i-set-li+et th`ung-p^au ^a, ng`i-t^eu chh'u-l^i li'a-t^eu ng`in ke su", yit-thin oi se-ngi!
Y^i-chhi`en, Thu-th+at h^in-h'i-l`oi, chhu"-chh^u"n cho thai, yok-y^u si-pak-s`a th`en k`i. Chui-m^i, k`i p^un-ng`in chh`u"-s'i, th`en k`i ke ng`in ya san-thet-hi, phau-lon chhiu ph`in-chhin h^a-hi.
Y^i-heu yu y^u K^a-li-li ke Y`u-thai chhai fu-khi'eu thi`au-chh`a ke s`u" h^in-h'i-l`oi, y'in-yu h'o-t^o ng`in th`en k`i; k`i ya p^un-ng`in chh`u"-s'i, th`en k`i ke ng`in ya san-thet-hi.
Tui ngi'en-chhi`en li'a-khien su", ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m+ok l^au k`i-t^eu chok-tui, y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu! Na-he k`i-t^eu s'o kie-v+ak, s'o cho ke, he ng`in ke yi-su", yit-thin voi su"t-phai;
k'a-s'u" he Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m`o fap-thu t'a-vang k`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu s'o cho ke, ki^ang-pha f'an-ch'on he k^ung-kit Song-ti!" Ngi-fi chiap-n+ap K^a-m^a-li+et ke yi-kien,
chhiu h^em s'u"-th`u ng+ip-l`oi, pi^en-t'a k`i-t^eu, yu min-lin k`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet chai yung Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang k'ong tho-l^i, y`en-heu th'eu-piong k`i-t^eu.
S'u"-th`u l`i-kh^oi ngi-fi, y^in-vi kh^am-tet vi Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang su v'u-y+uk, s^im-k^on f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i.
K`i-t^eu h`an-he tak-ngit chhai su"n-thien-t'u l^au ng`in vuk-h^a ki-si+uk kau-hiun ng`in, chh`on-y`ong y^u-ko^an Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im.

Li'a-s`u", sin-th`u ke su-muk ngit-ngit chen-k^a; ke-t^eu k'ong H^i-li+ap-fa ke Y`u-thai-ng`in tui k'ong H^i-pak-l`oi-fa ke Y`u-thai-ng`in fat yen-ngi`en, k'ong: Chhai ki^ung-kip tak-ngit ke s^en-f+at li'a-khien su" t'ang-k^o, k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke ko'a-fu su fut-li+ok.
S+u"p-ngi s'u"-th`u chhiu seu-s+ip chhi`on-th'i sin-th`u, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ham ng`ai-t^eu piong-h^a chh`on Song-ti tho-l^i ke k^ung-chok, hi liau-l^i s^en-f+at ke su"-vu, he `m-chh+ok ke.

S'o-y^i, kok-vi hi^ung-thi, chhi'ang tui ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung si'en-chhut chhit-ke y^u mi`ang-mong, p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, yu y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu h'o ham k`i-t^eu k'on li'a-t^eu su".
Lun-t'o ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu oi ch^on-s^im kh`i-t'o l^au chh`on-tho."

S'u"-th`u ke kien-ngi tet-t'o chhi`on-th'i ke chan-s`u"n. S'o-y^i thai-k^a si'en S^u"-th`i-f'an, yit-ke sin-s^im ki^en-thin, p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an ke ng`in; yu si'en-chhut F^i-li, Pak-l`o-k^o-l`o, N`i-k^a-n`o, Th`i-m`un, P^a-m'i-n^a, l^au ng+ip-ko Y`u-thai-kau ke ^On-th`i-^a-ng`in N`i-k^o-l^a,
chhi'ang k`i-t^eu kh^i chhai s'u"-th`u ke mien-chhi`en; s'u"-th`u kh`i-t'o y^i-heu, chhiu l^au k`i-t^eu h`ang on-s'u-l^i.
Song-ti ke tho-l^i y+et-chh`on y+et-fat; chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke sin-th`u, su-muk chen-k^a chhin-t^o, h'o-t^o chi-s^u" ya chiap-su li'a-ke sin-ngi'ong.
S^u"-th`i-f'an m^an-y^u Song-ti ke ^en-su l^au n`en-l+it, chhai m`in-ki^en h`ang thai kh`i-su" l^au s`u"n-chiak.

Ch'ung-he y^u-t^eu ng`in f'an-tui k`i; li'a-t^eu ng`in he s'o-vi "Chhu"-y`u-ng`in" fi-th`ong ke fi-y`en, p^au-h`am tui K'u-li-nai l^au ^A-l+it-s^an-thai l`oi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in. K`i-t^eu l^au kh`i-th^a tui K^i-li-k^a pin ^A-se-^a l`oi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, chhi`on-phu th`ung S^u"-th`i-f'an phien-lun.
Su"n-L`in su chu"-fi p^un S^u"-th`i-f'an, s'o-y^i k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu f'an-pok k`i s'o k'ong ke fa.
K`i-t^eu chhiu k^au-s^o yit-t^eu ng`in chhut-l`oi ko k`i k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu su"t th^ang li'a-ke ng`in k'ong-ko f'i-pong M^o-s^i l^au siet-th+uk Song-ti ke fa!"
K`i-t^eu yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi san-thung chung-ng`in, ch'ong-l'o l^au k^in-h+ok kau-s^u", chhiu l`oi chok S^u"-th`i-f'an, tai k`i to ngi-fi hi.
K`i-t^eu s'o k^au-s^o ke k'a chu"n-ng`in chhut-l`oi k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in s`ong-s`ong k'ong-fa k^ung-kit ng`ai-t^eu ke su"n-thien l^au M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it.
Ng`ai-t^eu su"t th^ang k`i k'ong-ko: Li'a-ke N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u oi chhak-thet su"n-thien, oi k'oi-pien M^o-s^i chh`on p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke f^ung-si+uk s+ip-koan!"
S'o-y^u chhai ngi-fi-ch^ung chh^o-t'en ke ng`in chhiu chu-muk khon S^u"-th`i-f'an, khon-t'o k`i ke mien-mau chhiong thi^en-s'u" ke mien-mau yit-yong.
Thai-chi-s^u" mun S^u"-th`i-f'an k'ong: "Chu"n-k^in y^u li'a-ke su" m^a?"

S^u"-th`i-f'an en-k'ong: "Kok-vi fu-l'o hi^ung-thi, chhi'ang th^ang ng`ai k'ong! Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on h+et chhai M^i-sok-put-th+at-m'i-^a, h`an-m`ang s'ai-hi H+ap-l`an h+et ke s`u", y`ung-k^ong ke Song-ti tui k`i hi'en-hien,
l^au k`i k'ong: 'Ng`i oi l`i-kh^oi ng`i ke ku-hi^ong l^au chh^in-chh+uk, to Ng`ai s'o oi ch'u"-su" ng`i hi ke thi-f^ong.'

'An-ngi`ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chhiu l`i-kh^oi K^a-l+et-t'i-ng`in ke s'o-chhai, hi h+et chhai H+ap-l`an. Ki^a-p^a s'i-thet y^i-heu, Song-ti ham k`i s'ai-to li'a-vi l`oi, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha s'o-h+et ke s'o-chhai.

Ke-s`u", Song-ti h`an-m`ang su k`i m'a-ke s'an-ngi+ap, li`en kh^i-kiok ke s'o-chhai me m`o; ch'ung-he Song-ti yin-h'i oi su li'a-te th'u-thi p^un k`i, cho k`i l^au heu-thoi ke s'an-ngi+ap, s^ui-y`en ke-s`u" k`i h`an-m`ang y^u lai-'e.
Song-ti l^au k`i 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: 'Ng`i ke heu-thoi voi h+et chhai ngoi-koet, chhai ke-vi cho n`u-chh`oi, su ch^au-th+ap si-pak-ngi`en.
Ch'ung-he, s'u" k`i-t^eu cho n`u-chh`oi ke koet-k^a voi p^un Ng`ai chit-f+at. Y^i-heu k`i-t^eu voi l`i-kh^oi ke s'o-chhai, l`oi li'a-vi f+uk-su" Ng`ai.'

Song-ti chhiu l^au ^A-pak-l^a-h'on l+ip-yok, yung kot-l^i cho ki-ho. Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on kiung Y^i-sat y^i-heu, thi-pat-ngit chhiu l^au k`i h`ang kot-l^i; cheu-yong, Y^i-sat l^au Ng^a-kok h`ang kot-l^i, Ng^a-kok l^au s+u"p-ngi-ke chh+uk-ch'ong h`ang kot-l^i.
"Ke-t^eu chh+uk-ch'ong chhit-tu Yok-sit, chi^ong k`i mai-to ^Ai-kh+ip hi; ch'ung-he Song-ti th`ung k`i khiung-ha,

kiu k`i thot-l`i yit-chhiet ke ch^ai-nan. K`i kh^i chhai ^Ai-kh+ip-v`ong Fap-l'o mien-chhi`en ke s`u", Song-ti su k`i ^en-ti'en l^au chu"-fi. Fap-l'o sat-l+ip k`i cho koet-k^a ke ch'ai-siong l^au v`ong-ki^ung ke ch'ung-k'on.
M`o k'i-ki'u heu, ^Ai-kh+ip l^au K^a-n`am chhi`on-thi t`u-t'o ngi`am-chhung ke thi^en-h^on, s^en-f+at f^i-s`ong ki^en-n`an; ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ya m`o m'a-ke li`ong-s+u"t.
Ng^a-kok th^ang-k'ong ^Ai-kh+ip y^u li`ong-s+u"t, chhiu ham k`i ke-t^eu lai-'e, chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en, hi ke-vi; li'a he thi-yit-p'ai.
Thi-ngi-p'ai k`i-t^eu hi ke s`u", Yok-sit l^au k`i ke-t^eu hi^ung-thi si^ong-ngin; Fap-l'o chang ngin-su"t Yok-sit ke vuk-h^a-ng`in.
Yok-sit phai-ng`in hi kien ki^a-p^a Ng^a-kok, chhi'ang k`i tai-t'en chhi`on-k^a to ^Ai-kh+ip l`oi; l^ung-ch'ung y^u chhit-s+u"p-'ng s`a.
Ng^a-kok chhiu n`am-h^a to ^Ai-kh+ip; k`i l^au kh`i-th^a ke ch'u-si^en s'i chhai ke-vi.
K`i-t^eu ke v`i-th'i p^un-ng`in sung-to Su"-kiam, chong chhai ^A-pak-l^a-h'on yung chhi`en tui H+ap-mat ke ch'u"-s^un m^ai-l`oi ke f`un-mu t^i-poi.
"Song-ti hiong ^A-pak-l^a-h'on s'o yin-h'i ke s`u"-ki^en l`oi-to y^i-chhi`en, Y^i-set-li+et-chh+uk chhai ^Ai-kh+ip ke ng`in-su y'i-k^in chen-k^a chhin t^o,
chh+u"t-to y^u yit-ke v`an-chhi`on `m su"t Yok-sit ke v`ong kh^oi-s'u" th'ung-chhu" ^Ai-kh+ip.
Ke v`ong yung k'ui-kie tui-fu ng`ai-t^eu ke th`ung-p^au, kh'u-th+uk ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en, khi`ong-pet k`i-t^eu fit-thet k`i-t^eu ke ^o-nga-'e, `m p^un ^o-nga-'e s^en-chh`un.
Chhiu chhai ke-s`u", M^o-s^i chhut-se; k`i s^ang-to chhin tet-ng`in-siak, chhai ki^a-p^a ke vuk-h^a y^ong-yuk s^am-ke ngi+et.
K`i p^un-ng`in fit-thet ke s`u", Fap-l'o ke moi-'e ngi^am-l`oi, n'am ch'on-hi cho chhu"-k^a ke lai-'e.
M^o-s^i chhiu chiap-su ^Ai-kh+ip yit-chhiet ke kau-yuk, chhin y^u khi'eu-chh`oi l^au phan-su" ke n`en-l+it.
" M^o-s^i si-s+u"p se ke s`u"-chiet, si'ong-oi hi khon Y^i-set-li+et th`ung-p^au ke chh`in-h`in.
K`i khon-t'o yit-ke th`ung-p^au p^un ^Ai-kh+ip-ng`in kh^i-fu, chhiu chin-chhi`en p'o-fu k`i, vi k`i s^u"n-y^en, chi^ong ke ^Ai-kh+ip-ng`in chh`u"-s'i.
K`i ngin-v`i th`ung-p^au voi m`in-ph+ak Song-ti oi yung k`i l`oi-kiu k`i-t^eu, m`o si'ong-t'o k`i-t^eu chhi`on `m-voi li'au-ki'e.
Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i khon-t'o li'ong-ke Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in si^ong-t'a. K`i si'ong-oi thi`au-ki'e, chhiu khien k`i-t^eu k'ong: 'Ng`i-t^eu he chhu"-k^a-ng`in, cho-m'a-ke p'i-chh'u" kh^i-fu n`e?'
Ke kh^i-fu th`ung-p^au ke chi^ong M^o-s^i s'ung-ch'eu, k'ong: 'M'a-ng`in sat-l+ip ng`i cho ng`ai-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu l^au phan-k^on n`e?
Ng`i ya oi chh`u" ng`ai, chhiong chh^o-p^u-ngit chh`u" ke ^Ai-kh+ip-ng`in khiung-yong he-m`o?'
M^o-s^i th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa chhiu th^eu-ch'eu, l`i-kh^oi ^Ai-kh+ip, hi chhiam-s`u" h+et chhai M'i-thien. Chhai ke-vi, k`i kiung li'ong-ke lai-'e.
"Si-s+u"p-ngi`en heu, chhai S^i-nai-s^an fu-khiun ke kh'ong-y^a, y^u yit-ke thi^en-s'u" chhai net-su ke f'o-yam-ch^ung tui M^o-s^i hi'en-hien.
M^o-s^i khon-t'o li'a yi-siong, s^im-ch^ung f^i-s`ong kh`i-koai, chhiu h`ang-chhi`en hi, si'ong-oi khon to-t'ai fat-s^en m'a-ke su"-chh`in. Ke-s`u", k`i th^ang-t'o Ch'u ke s^ang k'ong:
'Ng`ai he ngi^a ch'u-si^en ke Song-ti, chhiu-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, Y^i-sat, Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti.' M^o-s^i ki^ang-to p+it-p+it-chhat, `m-k'am khon.
Ch'u yu l^au k`i k'ong: 'Thot-h^a ng`i ke h`ai-`e! Y^in-vi ng`i s'o kh^i ke s'o-chhai he su"n-thi.

Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in chhai ^Ai-kh+ip s'o su ke kh'u-nan, Ng`ai y^u khon-t'o chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u; Ng`ai ya y^u th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu ke than-sit. Ng`ai h^a-l`oi, chhiu-he oi kiu k`i-t^eu. L`oi! Ng`ai phai ng`i hi ^Ai-kh+ip.'

"Li'a M^o-s^i chhiu-he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in s'o hi-chhi+et, p^un-ng`in k'ong: 'M'a-ng`in sat-l+ip ng`i cho ng`ai-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu l^au phan-k^on n`e?' Th^ung-ko chhai net-su-ch^ung hi'en-hien ke thi^en-s'u", Song-ti phai k`i cho li^ang-chhiu, cho ch'u"n-kiu-ch'a.
K`i tai-li^ang ng`in-m`in chhut ^Ai-kh+ip; k`i chhai ^Ai-kh+ip, chhai F`ung-h'oi, l^au chhai kh'ong-y^a ke si-s+u"p-ngi`en-ki^en, h`ang chhin-t^o s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su".
Chhiu-he li'a-ke M^o-s^i l^au Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in k'ong: 'Song-ti oi tui ng`i-t^eu ke th`ung-p^au ch^ung-ki^en vi ng`i-t^eu h^in-h'i yit-ke si^en-t^i, chhiong K`i h^in-h'i ng`ai yit-yong.'

Chhiu-he k`i chhai kh'ong-y^a th`ung Y^i-set-li+et fi-chung khiung-ha s^en-f+at; k`i th`ung chhai S^i-nai-s^an l^au k`i k'ong-fa ke thi^en-s'u" pin ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en khiung-ha; k`i li^ang-su Song-ti y'un-s^en ke tho-l^i, chi^ong li'a tho-l^i chh`on-p^un ng`ai-t^eu.
"Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en `m-h'en th^ang-chhi`ung k`i, f'an-ch'on hi-chhi+et k`i, s^im-k^on si'ong-ngiam ^Ai-kh+ip.

K`i-t^eu tui ^A-l`un k'ong: 'Vi ng`ai-t^eu chho t^eu s`u"n-m`in l`oi tai-li^ang ng`ai-t^eu. Y^in-vi tai ng`ai-t^eu chhut ^Ai-kh+ip ke ke-chak M^o-s^i, ng`ai-t^eu `m-t^i k`i t`u-t'o m'a-ke su"-chh`in.'
Ke-s`u", k`i-t^eu chhiu chu-chho yit-chak se-ngi`u-`e, tui li'a ngi'eu-siong hien-chi, vi chhu"-k^a ke s'u s'o cho ke t^ung-s^i f^on-h'i khin-chuk.

Song-ti chhiu ch'on-s^u"n `m-tap k`i-t^eu, y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu hi-pai thi^en-t'ang ke s^en-s`u"n, chhiong si^en-t^i-s^u s'o k'ong: Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ^a, chhai kh'ong-y^a ke si-s+u"p ngi`en, ng`i-t^eu pin m`o hien m'a-ke s^en-ng`i ya-he l^i-v+ut p^un Ng`ai!

Ng`i-t^eu k^ong-t'en M^o-l+ok-s`u"n ke chong-ph`ung, yu k^ong-t'en L^i-f^an-s`u"n ke s^en-s`u"n-siong, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu cho-l`oi pai ke ngi'eu-siong. S'o-y^i, Ng`ai oi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'ai-to P^a-p'i-l`un ngoi-poi hi!
"Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en chhai kh'ong-y^a y^u p'eu-su" Song-ti l`im-chhai ke su"n-chong-ph`ung (t^i-poi piong yok-khui), he Song-ti f^un-fu M^o-s^i cheu K`i s'o ch'u"-su" ke m`u-h`in chho ke.

Heu-l`oi, ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ki-s`u"n li'a su"n-chong-ph`ung. Song-ti chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en kiuk-ch'eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, cham-li^ang ke th'u-thi ke s`u", Yok-s^u-^a l^au k`i-t^eu chi^ong li'a su"n-chong-ph`ung s'ai-hi ke-vi, chh+u"t-to Thai-v'i ke s`u"-thoi.
Thai-v'i tet-t'o Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en. K`i chhiu khi`u Song-ti ch'un k`i vi K`i, chhiu-he Ng^a-kok ke Song-ti, h'i yit-chho su"n-thien;
ch'ung-he, heu-l`oi vi Song-ti h'i su"n-thien ke he S'o-l`o-m`un.
"Kh`i-s+u"t, Chu"-k^o ke Song-ti pin `m-he h+et chhai ng`in s'u s'o h'i ke su"n-thien, chhiong si^en-t^i s'o k'ong:
Ch'u k'ong: Thi^en he Ng`ai ke p'o-chho; thi he Ng`ai ke th+ap-ten. Ng`i-t^eu oi vi Ng`ai h'i nai-ch'ung ke su"n-thien n`e? Nai-vi oi cho Ng`ai hi^u-sit ke s'o-chhai n`e?
Li'a yit-chhiet k'am `m-he Ng`ai chh^in-s'u chh'ong-chho ke m^a?
"Ng`i li'a-t^eu ngang-ki'ang ke ng`in ^a, s^im-k^on ngang, ng'i-k^ung set-t'en `m-h'en th^ang Song-ti ke fa! Ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en khiung-yong, yit-chh+u"t th`ung Su"n-L`in chok-tui!

Nai-ke si^en-t^i `m su"t su-t'o ng`i-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke pet-hoi n`e? Ke-t^eu si^en-t^i si^en-pu k'ong, ke K^ung-ngi ke Ph+uk-ng`in oi l`oi, ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en sa chi^ong k`i-t^eu chh`u"-thet; li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu yu chhut-mai li'a Ph+uk-ng`in, sat-hoi k`i.
Ng`i-t^eu he s`u"n-chiap Song-ti fap-l+it ke ng`in; li'a fap-l+it he thi^en-s'u" chh`on h^a-l`oi ke, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m-h'en ch^un-s'u fap-l+it!"
Chung ngi-y`en th^ang-li'au S^u"-th`i-f'an li'a-t^eu fa, khi'en-to ng^au-ng`a chhiet-chh'u".
Ch'ung-he, S^u"-th`i-f'an p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, ngo-th`eu mong-thi^en, khon-t'o Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong, yu khon-t'o Y^a-s^u kh^i chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en,
chhiu k'ong: "Ng`ai khon-t'o thi^en kh^oi l'e, Ng`in-ch'u" kh^i chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu thai-s^ang h^em, yung s'u ^em ng'i-k^ung, k^ui-ha v`i-s^ong-hi, chok S^u"-th`i-f'an,
chi^ong k`i s'ung-to s`ang-ngoi, yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep k`i. Ke-t^eu chu"n-ng`in chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke ngoi-s^am k^au-p^un yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to S'o-l`o ke chhi^ang-ngi`en ch'ong-t'en.
K`i-t^eu t+ep-t'en s+ak-th`eu ke s`u", S^u"-th`i-f'an thai-s^ang tui Ch'u khi`u k'ong: "Ch'u Y^a-s^u ^a, khi`u ng`i chiap-n+ap ng`ai ke l`in-f`un!"
K`i yu kh'ui h^a-l`oi, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, `m-h'o chi^ong li'a-ke chhui k^ui-p^un k`i-t^eu!" K`i k'ong-s+ot, chhiu s'i-thet.

Sat-hoi S^u"-th`i-f'an li'a-khien su", S'o-l`o chhin chan-s`u"n. Tui ke-ngit kh^oi-s'u", Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke kau-fi su-t'o f^i-s`ong li-hoi ke pet-hoi. S'u"-th`u y^i-ngoi, s'o-y^u ke sin-th`u f^un-san to Y`u-thai l^au Sat-m^a-li-^a ke kok s'o-chhai hi.
Y^u-t^eu khi`en-s`u"n ke ng`in chi^ong S^u"-th`i-f'an m`ai-h'i-l`oi, vi k`i s^ong-s^im thai-kieu.
Li'a-s`u", S'o-l`o chhiu chin-h`ang pet-hoi kau-fi ke k^ung-chok; k`i yit-k^a yit-k^a hi s^eu-chh`a, chok n`am-'ng sin-th`u, l^ai-hi chh^o-k^am.
Ke-t^eu f^un-san ke sin-th`u hi-to tak s'o-chhai chh`on fuk-y^im.
F^i-li to Sat-m^a-li-^a ke yit-chho s`ang hi, hiong ke-vi ke ng`in chh`on K^i-tuk ke su".
Chung-ng`in chhi`on-phu ngin-ch^u"n th^ang F^i-li s'o-k'ong ke fa. K`i-t^eu yit-phi'en th^ang, yit-phi'en khon k`i s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak.
Chhin-t^o si`a-l`in thai-s^ang h^em, tui s'o fu-s^u"n ke ng`in t^i-poi chhut-l`oi; chhin-t^o th^an-f^ung ke, khi`o-kiok ke, ya chhi`on-phu tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
Ke-s`ang chhiu chh^ung-m^an f^on-h'i.
Y^u yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S^i-m`un, k`i chhai ke-s`ang h`ang si`a-s+ut, s'u" Sat-m^a-li-^a ke ng`in-m`in chhin h^i-kh`i. K`i l'au-t'o chhu"-k^a chhin voi;
s'o-y^u ke ng`in, m`o-lun thai-thai se-se, chhi`on-phu th^ang-chhi`ung k`i, k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in y^u Song-ti ke n`en-l+it, he 'Thai-n`en-ch'a'. "
Y^in-vi k`i h`ang si`a-s+ut m`i-f+et k`i-t^eu y^u chhin-ki'u ke s`u"-ki^en, s'o-y^i k`i-t^eu th^ang-chhi`ung k`i.
Ch'ung-he, to k`i-t^eu si^ong-sin F^i-li s'o chh`on ko^an-he Song-ti koet ke fuk-y^im l^au Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang, k`i-t^eu m`o-lun n`am-'ng chhiu l^ung-ch'ung li^ang s'e-l^i.
S^i-m`un chhu"-k^a ya si^ong-sin; k`i li^ang s'e-l^i heu, s`ong-s`ong th`ung F^i-li khiung-ha. K`i khon-t'o F^i-li s'o-h`ang ke s`u"n-chiak l^au thai kh`i-su", chhiu chhin h^i-kh`i.
Chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s'u"-th`u th^ang-t'o Sat-m^a-li-^a-ng`in chiap-su Song-ti ke tho-l^i, chhiu phai P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon to k`i-t^eu ke-vi hi.
Li'ong-ke ng`in yit to, chhiu vi sin-th`u kh`i-t'o, oi p^un k`i-t^eu li^ang-su Su"n-L`in,
y^in-vi ke-s`u" Su"n-L`in h`an-m`ang l`im-to k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ngim-h`o yit-ke ng`in; k`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang chiap-su s'e-l^i thin-thin.
S'o-y^i P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon vi k`i-t^eu on-s'u, k`i-t^eu chhiu li^ang-su Su"n-L`in.
S^i-m`un khon-t'o s'u"-th`u yit on-s'u, ng`in chhiu li^ang-su-t'o Su"n-L`in, k`i chhiu n^a-chhi`en p^un s'u"-th`u,
k'ong: "Chhi'ang chi^ong li'a n`en-l+it ya p^un ng`ai, s'u" ng`ai vi m'a-ng`in on-s'u, m'a-ng`in chhiu voi li^ang-su Su"n-L`in."
Ch'ung-he P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i th`ung ng`i ke chhi`en khiung-ha f'i-m+et l^e! Ng`i ngi'ong-voi nong-si'ong Song-ti ke ^en-su cho-tet yung chhi`en l`oi m^ai ^a!
Ng`ai-t^eu ke k^ung-chok ng`i m`o fun; y^in-vi chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, ng`i ke s^im m`o chang.
S'o-y^i ng`i oi f'i-k'oi, l`i-kh^oi li'a-ke chhui-ok, pin khi'en-khi`u Ch'u; f+et-ch'a ng`i s^im-ch^ung ke yi-ngiam voi tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
Ng`ai khon tet-chhut, ng`i chh^ung-m^an chhit-tu ke k^an-kh'u, p^un chhui-ok kh'un-p'ong."
S^i-m`un tui P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon k'ong: "Khi`u ng`i-t^eu vi ng`ai hiong Ch'u kh`i-t'o, s'u" ng`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke su", `m-voi fat-s^en chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song."
P'i-tet l^au Yok-hon chhai ke-vi cho kien-chu"n, chh`on Ch'u ke tho-l^i, y`en-heu to-ch'on hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang. Lu-song, k`i-t^eu ya chhai Sat-m^a-li-^a ke t^o-t^o chh^un-ch^ong chh`on fuk-y^im.
Y^u Ch'u ke yit-ke thi^en-s'u" l^au F^i-li k'ong: "Hong-h'i-l`oi, hiong n`am-phi'en h`ang, to ke-thi`au tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang theu-to K^a-sat ke lu-song hi." (Li'a-thi`au lu y'i-k^in m`o-ng`in h`ang.)

F^i-li chhiu chhut-fat hi. Chhai ke-thi`au lu-song, k`i t`u-t'o yit-ke thai-kam, he Y^i-sok-phit-^a ke thai-k^on, chhai Y^i-sok-phit-^a 'ng-v`ong K^am-thai-k^i ke s'u-ha k'on-chhi`en; k`i y'i-k^in s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi kin-pai Song-ti,
ke-s`u" oi ch'on-hi, chh^o chhai m^a-chh^a-t'ang th+uk si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke s^u.
Su"n-L`in l^au F^i-li k'ong: "Ng`i ko-hi, chhai chh^a-'e s`un-th`eu h`ang."
F^i-li chhiu ch'eu-ko-hi, th^ang-t'o thai-kam th+uk si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a ke s^u, chhiu mun k`i: "Ng`i s'o th+uk ke, y^u m`in-ph+ak m`o?"
K`i en-k'ong: "M`o ng`in k^au ng`ai, ngi'ong-voi m`in-ph+ak?" K`i chhiu chhi'ang F^i-li s^ong-chh^a, th`ung k`i khiung-ha chh^o.
K`i s'o th+uk ke-thon Su"n-k^in he: K`i chhiong p^un-ng`in khi^en-hi chh`u" ke y`ong-`e, yu chhiong p^un-ng`in chi'en-m^o ke se y`ong-`e ti^am-ti^am; k`i ya he 'an-ngi`ong, yit-ki fa `m k'ong.
K`i p^un-ng`in kh^i-fu; m`o ng`in thoi k`i ch'u-chh`u" k^ung-ngi. M`o ng`in k'ong-tet-chhut k`i ke heu-thoi, y^in-vi k`i ke s^ang-miang y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in tui su"-ki^en chh`u-thet.
Thai-kam mun F^i-li k'ong: "Chhi'ang mun, si^en-t^i li'a-fa he ch'u" m'a-ng`in k'ong ke? He k'ong k`i chhu"-k^a, ya-he ph+et-ng`in?"
F^i-li chhiu kh^oi-khi'eu, tui li'a-thon Su"n-k^in kh^oi-s'u", l^au k`i k'ong ko^an-he Y^a-s^u ke fuk-y^im.
K`i-t^eu k^in-ko yit-ke thi-f^ong, lu-s`un y^u s'ui, thai-kam k'ong: "Li'a-vi y^u s'ui, ng`ai li^ang s'e-l^i k'am cho-`m-tet?"
Thai-kam chhiu f^un-fu th`in-chh^a; F^i-li th`ung k`i khiung-ha l+ok-hi s'ui-ch^ung, vi k`i h`ang s'e-l^i.
K`i-t^eu tui s'ui-ch^ung s^ong-l`oi y^i-heu, Ch'u ke L`in chi^ong F^i-li fut-y`en tai-ch'eu; thai-kam m`o chai khon-t'o k`i, chhiu f^on-f^on h'i-h'i ki-si+uk k'on-lu.
Heu-l`oi, y^u-ng`in chhai ^A-s'o-t^u t`u-t'o F^i-li; k`i h`ang-phien ke yit-tai thi-f^ong, chhai tak-ke hi^ong-ch'u"n chh`on fuk-y^im, chh+u"t-to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a.
Th`ung-s`u", S'o-l`o ki-si+uk yung hi^ung-ok ke khi'eu-hi khi'ung-hak sin Ch'u ke ng`in. K`i hi kien thai-chi-s^u",
y^eu-khi`u fat p^un Thai-m^a-su"-kiet kok Y`u-thai fi-th`ong ke v`un-s^u, ch'un k`i s^eu-chh`a sin-fung li'a Tho ke ng`in, m`o-lun n`am-'ng, chi^ong k`i-t^eu chok-h'i-l`oi, sung-hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
K`i hi Thai-m^a-su"-kiet ke lu-song, voi to s`ang ke s`u"-chiet, fut-y`en y^u thai k^ong tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, si-mien cheu-t'en k`i.
K`i vang chhai thi-song, th^ang-t'o y^u s^ang tui k`i k'ong: " S'o-l`o, S'o-l`o! Ng`i cho-m'a-ke pet-hoi ng`ai?"
K`i mun-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`i he m'a-ng`in?" Ke s^ang en-k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he ng`i s'o pet-hoi ke Y^a-s^u.
Hong-h'i-l`oi, ng+ip s`ang hi, y^u-ng`in voi chi^ong ng`i yin-t^ong cho ke su" l^au ng`i k'ong."
Th`en S'o-l`o khiung-ha h`ang ke ng`in kh^i chhai ke-vi, k'ong `m-chhut fa; k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o s^ang, ch'ung-he m`o khon-t'o ng`in.
S'o-l`o tui thi-song hong-h'i-l`oi, pak-kh^oi muk-ch^u, m'a-ke t^u khon-`m-t'o. K`i-t^eu chhiu khi^en-t'en k`i ke s'u, tai k`i ng+ip Thai-m^a-su"-kiet-s`ang.
S^am-ngit ch^ung-ki^en, k`i khon-`m-t'o; m`o s+u"t, ya m`o l^im.
Chhai Thai-m^a-su"-kiet y^u yit-ke sin-th`u, mi`ang ^on-to ^A-n^a-n`i-^a. Ch'u chhai yi-siong ch^ung ham k`i k'ong: " ^A-n^a-n`i-^a!" K`i en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai chhai li'a-vi."
Ch'u k'ong: "Ng`i ngi`am-s`u" hi Chh+u"t-ki^e, chhai Y`u-thai vuk-h^a chh`im yit-ke Thai-su-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to S'o-l`o. K`i chhai ke-vi kh`i-t'o;
S'o-l`o chhai yi-siong ch^ung y'i-k^in khon-t'o yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to ^A-n^a-n`i-^a ke ng`in, ng+ip-l`oi vi k`i on-s'u, p^un k`i khon tet-t'o."
^A-n^a-n`i-^a en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chhin-t^o ng`in l^au ng`ai k'ong-ko, li'a-ke ng`in chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang he ngi'ong-p^an ok-th+uk l`oi pet-hoi Ng`i ke su"n-th`u.
Li'a-p'ai k`i l`oi Thai-m^a-su"-kiet, tai-t'en chi-s^u"-ch'ong p^un k`i ke khi`en-piang, oi chok s'o-y^u kin-pai Ng`i ke ng`in."

Ch'u l^au k`i k'ong: "Cho ng`i hi! Y^in-vi Ng`ai y'i-k^in ki'en-si'en k`i l`oi su"-fung Ng`ai. K`i oi chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, ki^un-v`ong, l^au Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke mien-chhi`en si^en-chh`on Ng`ai ke mi`ang.
Ng`ai oi ch'u"-su" k`i, vi-t'o Ng`ai ke y`en-ku, k`i yit-thin voi t`u-t'o ch'ung-ch'ung ke kh'u-nan."

S'o-y^i ^A-n^a-n`i-^a chhiu hi. K`i ng+ip-hi ke-ng`in vuk-h^a, on-s'u chhai S'o-l`o ke s^u"n-song, k'ong: " S'o-l`o hi^ung-thi ^a, chhai ng`i l`oi li'a-vi ke lu-song tui ng`i hi'en-hien ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u chh^in-chhu" phai ng`ai l`oi, oi p^un ng`i chai-ko khon tet-t'o, pin p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an."
Chit-s`u", y^u chhiong `ng-l`in ke t^ung-s^i tui S'o-l`o ke muk-ch^u tiet-h^a-l`oi, k`i chhiu chai khon-tet-t'o. S'o-y^i k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, chiap-su s'e-l^i;
s+u"t-ko t^ung-s^i y^i-heu, k`i ke hi-l+it chhiu f`i-f+uk. S'o-l`o chhai Thai-m^a-su"-kiet th`ung sin-th`u khiung-ha h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en.
K`i ngi`am-s`u" hi kok fi-th`ong si^en-chh`on Y^a-s^u, k'ong: "K`i chhiu-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e."

S'o-y^u th^ang-t'o ke ng`in chhiu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, k'ong: "Li'a ng`in `m-he chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang sat-hoi ke-t^eu kh`i-khi`u ke-chak mi`ang ke ng`in m^a? K`i l`oi li'a-vi, k'am `m-he oi chok sin-th`u, chi^ong k`i-t^eu sung p^un ke-t^eu chi-s^u"-ch'ong m^a?"

Ch'ung-he S'o-l`o ke k'ong-tho f'an-ch'on kien-k^a y^u l+it; k`i yung chhin khi`ong ke lun-chu"n l`oi chu"n-m`in Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk, s'u" Thai-m^a-su"-kiet ke Y`u-thai-ng`in m`o fap-thu l^au k`i phien-lun.
Ko yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, Y`u-thai-ng`in y^im-m`eu oi chi^ong S'o-l`o chh`u"-thet.
Y^u ng`in chi^ong k`i-t^eu ke kie-v+ak l^au S'o-l`o k'ong. Ke-s`u", k`i-t^eu ngit-ya chhai s`ang-m`un-h'eu ch'ong-t'en, si'ong-oi chh`u" k`i.
Ch'ung-he, y^u yit am-p^u, ki^a h+ok-s^ang yung thai l`am-`e chi^ong k`i tui s`ang-chhi`ong-t'ang chhui-l+ok-hi.
S'o-l`o l`oi-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, si'ong-oi th`ung sin-th`u l`oi-v^ong; ch'ung-he thai-k^a chhi`on-phu ki^ang k`i, `m si^ong-sin k`i he sin-th`u.

V`i-y^u P^a-n^a-p^a chiap-n+ap k`i, tai k`i hi kien s'u"-th`u, tui k`i-t^eu sot-m`in S'o-l`o ngi'ong-p^an chhai lu-song t`u-t'o Ch'u, Ch'u he ngi'ong-p^an l^au k`i k'ong-fa, yu l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong-h'i S'o-l`o chhai Thai-m^a-su"-kiet fung Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang chh`on-tho ke s`u" he ngi'ong-p^an ke y'ung-k'am.
'An-ngi`ong, S'o-l`o chhiu th`ung s'u"-th`u khiung-ha chhut-ng+ip, chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang fung Ch'u ke mi`ang thai-t'am chh`on-tho.
K`i ya tui k'ong H^i-li+ap-fa ke Y`u-thai-ng`in chh`on-tho, th`ung k`i-t^eu phien-lun; k`i-t^eu sa si'ong-oi chh`u" k`i.
Hi^ung-thi t^i li'a-ke su", k`i-t^eu chhiu tai k`i to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, sung k`i hi Thai-su.

Ke-s`u", chhai Y`u-thai, K^a-li-li, l^au Sat-m^a-li-^a tak-vi ke kau-fi, chhi`on-phu y^u ph`in-^on. Y^in-vi kin-vi Ch'u, ya tet-t'o Su"n-L`in ke p^ong-chhu, kau-fi chhiu kien-l+ip h'i-l`oi, ng`in-su ngit-ngit chen-k^a.
P'i-tet h`ang-phien tak s'o-chhai. Y^u yit-p'ai, k`i f'ong-mun h+et chhai L^i-thai ke su"n-th`u;
chhai ke-vi, k`i t`u-t'o yit-ke ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to Y^i-n`i-ng^a. Li'a-ke ng`in pot th^an-f^ung, soi chh'o-chhi+ak pat-ngi`en, m`o fap-thu hong-h'i-l`oi.
P'i-tet tui k`i k'ong: " Y^i-n`i-ng^a, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk y^i-h'o ng`i l'e. Hong-h'i-l`oi, chi^ong ng`i ke ph^i-kut s^u-h'o!" Y^i-n`i-ng^a ngi`am-s`u" chhiu hong-h'i-l`oi.
S'o-y^u h+et chhai L^i-thai l^au S^a-l`un ke ng`in t^u khon-t'o k`i, k`i-t^eu chhiu si^ong-sin Ch'u.

Chhai Yok-pha y^u yit-ke 'ng sin-th`u, mi`ang ^on-to Thai-p'i-thai ( H^i-li+ap-v`un ke fat-y^im he T^o-k^a, yi-su" he "L`in-y`ong"). K`i h`ang-ko chhin-t^o h'o-su", s`ong-s`ong p^ong-chhu khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in.
Y^u yit-ngit, k`i pot phiang, s'i-thet. Ng`in chi^ong k`i ke s^u"-th'i s'e-chhiang, th`in chhai l`eu-t'ang ke ki^en-t'u.

Yok-pha l`i L^i-thai m`o k'i-y'en. Chhai Yok-pha ke sin-th`u th^ang-t'o P'i-tet chhai L^i-thai, chhiu phai li'ong-ke ng`in hi kien k`i, y^eu-khi`u k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ng`i k'on-k'in l`oi ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi!"

P'i-tet chit-s`u" chhut-fat, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi. P'i-tet yit to, ng`in chhiu tai k`i s^ong l`eu-t'ang ke ki^en-t'u hi. S'o-y^u ke ko'a-fu v`i-t'en P'i-tet k'in kieu, yu chi^ong T^o-k^a s^en-chhi`en s'o-cho ke nui-s^am l^au ngoi-s^am n^a p^un k`i khon.
P'i-tet f^un-fu thai-k^a chhut-hi, chhiu kh'ui h^a-hi kh`i-t'o, y`en-heu mien-tui s^u"-th'i, k'ong: " Thai-p'i-thai, hong-h'i-l`oi!" K`i pak-kh^oi muk-ch^u, khon-t'o P'i-tet, chhiu chh^o-h'i-l`oi.
P'i-tet chh^un-s'u f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, yu ham ke-t^eu su"n-th`u l^au ko'a-fu ng+ip-l`oi, chi^ong T^o-k^a s^ang-s^ang k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
Li'a s^eu-sit chh`on-phien Yok-pha, y^u chhin-t^o ng`in chhiu sin Ch'u.
P'i-tet chhai Yok-pha yit-ke chu"-ph`i s^u"-fu S^i-m`un ke vuk-h^a h+et h'o-t^o ngit.
Chhai Kh'ai-sat-li-^a y^u yit-ke ng`in ^on-to K^o-n`i-li`u, he L`o-m^a ki^un-chhui " Yi-thai-li-y`ang" ke ki^un-k^on.
K`i he yit-ke khi`en-s`u"n-ng`in; k`i l^au k`i chhi`on k^a-ng`in t^u kin-vi Song-ti; k`i chhin thai-f^ong kiu-chi khi`ung-kh'u ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, s`ong-s`ong ngi+et-s^im tui Song-ti kh`i-t'o.

Y^u yit-ngit h^a-chu, s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ch'o-yu, k`i tet-t'o yit-ke yi-siong; chhai yi-siong ch^ung, k`i chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u khon-t'o Song-ti ke yit-ke s'u"-ch'a ng+ip-l`oi, ham k`i: " K^o-n`i-li`u!"

K`i chu-muk khon-t'en thi^en-s'u", f^i-s`ong chh+ok-ki^ang, k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, m'a-ke su"?" Thi^en-s'u" k'ong: "Song-ti y'i-k^in th^ang ng`i ke kh`i-t'o, ya ki-ngiam ng`i s'o-cho kiu-chi ng`in ke h'o-su".
Li'a-ha ng`i oi phai-ng`in hi Yok-pha, chhi'ang ke ham-cho P'i-tet ke S^i-m`un l`oi.
K`i h+et chhai yit-ke chu"-ph`i s^u"-fu S^i-m`un ke vuk-h^a; S^i-m`un ke vuk chhiu chhai h'oi-s`un."
Ke l^au k`i k'ong-fa ke thi^en-s'u" l`i-kh^oi y^i-heu, K^o-n`i-li`u ham li'ong-ke ph+uk-ng`in l^au ph`in-s`ong f+uk-su" k`i ke yit-ke khi`en-s`u"n ke su"-v'i l`oi,
chi^ong s'o t`u-t'o ke su" l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong, y`en-heu phai k`i-t^eu hi Yok-pha.
Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i-t^eu h`ang-lu chi^ong-khiun Yok-pha. Chh^a-`m-t^o t^ong-chu ke s`u", P'i-tet hi vuk-t'ang kh`i-t'o.
K`i t'u-k^i, si'ong-oi s+u"t t^ung-s^i; ke k^a-ng`in ch'un-phi s+u"t-chu ke s`u", P'i-tet ng+ip-s`u"n khon-t'o yit-ke yi-siong.
K`i khon-t'o thi^en-kh^oi, y^u t^ung-s^i kong h^a-l`oi, chhiong yit-te thai pu-'e, si-chak kok thak-t'en, chhui-to thi-song,
t^i-poi y^u thi-song kok-ch'ung si-kiok ke ch'eu-chhu, ph`a-chh`ung, ya y^u thi^en-t'ang ke f^i-ni^au.
Y^u s^ang tui k`i k'ong: " P'i-tet, hong-h'i-l`oi, chh`u" l`oi s+u"t!"
Ch'ung-he P'i-tet en-k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet! Ng`ai chhi`ung-l`oi m`o s+u"t-ko l^i-ng`i song m'a-ke v^u-ve m`o chhiang-li ke t^ung-s^i."
Ke s^ang thi-ngi-p'ai tui k`i k'ong: "Song-ti s'o kiet-chhiang ke, ng`i cho-`m-tet khon-cho m`o chhiang-li."
'An-ngi`ong yit-li`en s^am-p'ai, ke t^ung-s^i chhiu s^u-ch'on thi^en-t'ang hi.
P'i-tet t^ong ng`i-f`u s'o khon-t'o ke yi-siong he m'a-ke yi-su" ke s`u", K^o-n`i-li`u s'o phai-l`oi ke ng`in y'i-k^in chh`im-t'o S^i-m`un ke vuk-h^a l`oi, kh^i chhai m`un-h'eu,
thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Y^u yit-ke ham-cho P'i-tet ke S^i-m`un h+et chhai li'a-vi m`o?"
P'i-tet h`an chhai ke-vi si'ong, ke yi-siong to-t'ai he m'a-ke yi-su", Su"n-L`in l^au k`i k'ong: "Y^u s^am-ke ng`in l`oi chh`im ng`i!
Ng`i h^a-hi, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi, `m-s'u" f`ai-ng`i, y^in-vi he Ng`ai chh^ai k`i-t^eu l`oi ke."
S'o-y^i P'i-tet h^a-hi, l^au ke-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi chh`im ke ng`in. Ng`i-t^eu he vi-t'o m'a-ke l`oi n`e?"

K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "He ki^un-k^on K^o-n`i-li`u phai ng`ai-t^eu l`oi ke; k`i he kin-vi Song-ti ke ngi-ng`in, Y`u-thai ke ng`in-m`in chhi`on-phu chhin ch^un-kin k`i. Y^u yit-ke su"n thi^en-s'u" ch'u"-su" k`i, chhi'ang ng`i hi ki^a vuk-h^a, oi th^ang ng`i ke kau-hiun."
P'i-tet chhiu chhi'ang k`i-t^eu ng+ip-hi, li`u k`i-t^eu ko-ya. Thi-ngi-ngit, P'i-tet hong-s^u"n th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi; y^u k'i-ke Yok-pha ke hi^ung-thi ya th`ung k`i-t^eu hi.
Yu ko yit-ngit, k`i-t^eu chhiu to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a. K^o-n`i-li`u y'i-k^in chhi'ang k`i ke chh^in-chhit l^au h'o ph`en-y^u l`oi-to, chhai ki^a vuk-h^a t'en-t'en.
P'i-tet yit ng+ip-m`un, K^o-n`i-li`u chhiu chin-chhi`en, ph+uk chhai k`i ke kiok-chhi`en pai k`i.
P'i-tet kiak-kiak f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, k'ong: "Chhi'ang hong-h'i-l`oi, ng`ai chhu"-k^a ya he ng`in."
P'i-tet yit-phi'en l^au K^o-n`i-li`u k'ong-fa, yit-phi'en h`ang-t'en ng+ip-hi vuk-t'u; k`i khon-t'o y^u chhin-t^o ng`in chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi.

K`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^i, cheu ng`ai-t^eu ke k^ui-k'i, Y`u-thai-ng`in he cho-`m-tet th`ung Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in chh^in-khiun ya-he l`oi-v^ong ke; ch'ung-he Song-ti y'i-k^in ch'u"-su" ng`ai, `m-h'o chi^ong ngim-h`o ng`in khon-cho chh^u-si+uk ya-he m`o chhiang-li ke.
S'o-y^i ng`i-t^eu chh^ai ng`in hi chhi'ang ng`ai ke s`u", ng`ai m`o th^oi-chh`u" chhiu l`oi. Li'a-ha, chhi'ang mun, ng`i-t^eu he vi-t'o m'a-ke ngi`en-y^in ham ng`ai l`oi?"
K^o-n`i-li`u k'ong: "Si-ngit-chhi`en, khiung-yong he h^a-chu s^am-ti'am-ch^ung ke s`u", ng`ai chhai vuk-h^a kh`i-t'o. Fut-y`en y^u yit-ke ng`in, s^am-fu h^au-k^ong, kh^i chhai ng`ai mien-chhi`en,
k'ong: ' K^o-n`i-li`u! Song-ti y'i-k^in th^ang ng`i ke kh`i-t'o, ya ki-ngiam ng`i s'o cho kiu-chi ng`in ke h'o-su".
Ng`i oi phai-ng`in hi Yok-pha, chhi'ang ke ham-cho P'i-tet ke S^i-m`un l`oi. K`i h+et chhai chu"-ph`i s^u"-fu S^i-m`un ke vuk-h^a; S^i-m`un ke vuk chhiu chhai h'oi-s`un.'

S'o-y^i, ng`ai ngi`am-s`u" phai-ng`in hi chhi'ang ng`i; ng`i h'en k^ong-l`im, s+u"t-chhai chhin h'o. Li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, oi th^ang Ch'u s'o f^un-fu ng`i k'ong yit-chhiet ke fa."
P'i-tet kh^oi-khi'eu k'ong: "Ng`ai li'a-ha khok-s+u"t t^i: Song-ti tui-thai s'o-y^u ke ng`in chhi`on-phu ph`in-t'en.
Yit-chhiet kin-vi K`i, h`ang-v`i chu"n-chh+u"t ke ng`in, m`o-lun he m'a-ke ch'ung-chh+uk, chhi`on-phu he K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, K`i th^ung-ko van-m`in ke Ch'u --- Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, chh`on-p^un Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke ch^u"n-tho he f`o-ph`in ke fuk-y^im.
Yok-hon si^en-chh`on s'e-l^i y^i-l`oi, ke tui K^a-li-li kh^oi-s'u" chh`on-phien Y`u-thai chhi`on-thi ke tho-l^i, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu t^i.

Ng`i-t^eu ya th^ang-ko: Song-ti he ngi'ong-p^an yung Su"n-L`in l^au n`en-l+it chh^ung-m^an N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u. K`i hi-to tak s'o-chhai h`ang h'o-su", y^i-h'o s'o-y^u p^un M^o-k'ui kh'ung-chu" ke ng`in, y^in-vi Song-ti l^au k`i th`ung-chhai.
K`i chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l^au kh`i-th^a Y`u-thai-ng`in ke thi-f^ong s'o cho ke yit-chhiet su", y^u ng`ai-t^eu cho kien-chu"n-ng`in. K`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang;
ch'ung-he, thi-s^am-ngit, Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, pin tui ng`in hi'en-hien.

K`i `m-he hi'en-hien p^un s'o-y^u ke ng`in khon, ch'u"-y^u p^un ng`ai li'a-t^eu Song-ti si^en ki'en-si'en l`oi cho kien-chu"n ke ng`in khon. K`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at y^i-heu, ng`ai-t^eu su"t th`ung k`i khiung-ha s+u"t khiung-ha l^im.
K`i min-lin ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong fuk-y^im chh`on p^un chung-ng`in, chu"n-m`in k`i chhiu-he Song-ti s'o sat-l+ip, oi cho s^ang-ng`in l^au s'i-ng`in ke s'u"m-phan-ch'a.
S'o-y^u ke si^en-t^i ya vi k`i cho kien-chu"n; k`i-t^eu k'ong: F`am sin k`i ke, chhiu cho-tet th^ung-ko k`i ke mi`ang tet-t'o sa-chhui."
P'i-tet h`an k'ong-t'en tho-l^i ke s`u", Su"n-L`in kong chhai s'o-y^u li^ang-su tho-l^i ke ng`in s^u"n-song.
Ke-t^eu th`en P'i-tet tui Yok-pha l`oi ke Y`u-thai sin-th`u, khon-t'o Song-ti chi^ong Su"n-L`in ke ^en-su ya t'o chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, chhiu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai;
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu ng`in yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en k'ong-fa, ya siung-chan Song-ti v`i-thai. S'o-y^i P'i-tet chhiu k'ong:
"Li'a-t^eu ng`in y'i-k^in li^ang-su Su"n-L`in, th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-yong; m'a-ng`in cho-tet kim-ch'u" k`i-t^eu li^ang-su s'ui ke s'e-l^i n`e?"
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, k`i f^un-fu k`i-t^eu fung Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang li^ang s'e-l^i. K`i-t^eu yu y^eu-khi`u P'i-tet th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et k'i-ngit.
S'u"-th`u l^au chhai Y`u-thai chhi`on-thi ke sin-th`u th^ang-t'o y^u-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya chiap-su Song-ti ke tho li'a-khien su".
S'o-y^i, P'i-tet to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s`u", ke-t^eu ch'u-ch^ong Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya oi li^ang-su kot-l^i ke ng`in chhiu ph^i-ph`in k`i k'ong:
"Ng`i ngi'ong-p^an hi m`o su kot-l^i ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in vuk-h^a cho ng`in-hak, yu th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha s+u"t-fan ^a!"
P'i-tet chhiu chi^ong su"-chh`in ke k^in-ko yit-yit l^au k`i-t^eu sot-m`in.

K`i k'ong: "Chhai Yok-pha s`ang-t'u kh`i-t'o ke s`u", ng`ai ng+ip-s`u"n khon-t'o yit-ke yi-siong. Y^u t^ung-s^i tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi, chhiong yit-te thai pu-'e, si-chak kok thak-t'en, chhui-l+ok chhai ng`ai ke mien-chhi`en.
Ng`ai chu-yi khon, t^i-poi y^u thi-song si-kiok ke th`eu-s^ang, y^a-chhu, ph`a-chh`ung, ya y^u thi^en-t'ang ke f^i-ni^au.
Ng`ai yu th^ang-t'o y^u s^ang tui ng`ai k'ong: ' P'i-tet, hong-h'i-l`oi, chh`u" l`oi s+u"t!'
Ng`ai k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet! Ng`ai chhi`ung-l`oi m`o s+u"t-ko l^i-ng`i song m'a-ke v^u-ve m`o chhiang-li ke t^ung-s^i.'
Tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke s^ang yu k'ong: 'Song-ti s'o kiet-chhiang ke, ng`i cho-`m-tet khon-cho m`o chhiang-li.'
'An-ngi`ong yit-li`en s^am-p'ai; chui-heu, ke t^ung-s^i chhiu s^u-ch'on thi^en-t'ang hi.
T'u-t'u chhai ke-s`u", su phai tui Kh'ai-sat-li-^a l`oi chh`im ng`ai ke s^am-ke ng`in, to ng`ai s'o-h+et ke k^a-ng`in ke vuk-h^a.
Su"n-L`in ch'u"-su" ng`ai th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi, `m-s'u" f`ai-ng`i. Li'a liuk-ke Yok-pha ke hi^ung-thi ya th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi; ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung ng+ip-hi K^o-n`i-li`u ke vuk-t'u.

K^o-n`i-li`u l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, k`i ngi'ong-p^an khon-t'o yit-ke thi^en-s'u" kh^i chhai k`i ke vuk-t'u, tui k`i k'ong: 'Ng`i oi phai ng`in hi Yok-pha, chhi'ang ke ham-cho P'i-tet ke S^i-m`un l`oi.
K`i y^u fa oi tui ng`i k'ong, p^un ng`i l^au ng`i ke chhi`on-k^a tet-kiu.'
Ng`ai yit kh^oi-s'u" k'ong-tho, Su"n-L`in chhiu kong-l`im chhai k`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-song, chhiong th`eu-yit-p'ai kong-l`im chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^u"n-song khiung-yong.
Ng`ai chhiu si'ong-h'i Ch'u su"t k'ong-ko: ' Yok-hon yung s'ui h`ang s'e-l^i, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu voi li^ang-su Su"n-L`in ke s'e-l^i.'

Ki-y`en Song-ti chi^ong li'a-ke ^en-su ya su-p^un ke-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu sin Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke s`u" K`i su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke khiung-yong; ng`ai he m'a-ng`in, k'am cho-tet ch'u-t'ong Song-ti m^a?"

K`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa, chhiu m`o chai-ko ph^i-ph`in, ch'u"-y^u siung-chan Song-ti k'ong: "'An-ngi`ong khon h'i-l`oi, Song-ti ya su ^en-ti'en p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, p^un k`i-t^eu y^in f'i-k'oi tet-t'o s^ang-miang!"
Li'a-s`u", ke-t^eu sin-th`u y^in-vi S^u"-th`i-f'an s`un-tho s'o y^in-h'i ke pet-hoi, f^un-san to F^i-n`i-k^i, Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u", l^au ^On-th`i-^a; k`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u tui Y`u-thai-ng`in chh`on-tho.
Ch'ung-he, y^u-t^eu h+et chhai Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u" l^au K'u-li-nai ke sin-th`u l`oi-to ^On-th`i-^a; k`i-t^eu ya hiong H^i-li+ap-ng`in chh`on Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke fuk-y^im.
Ch'u ke n`en-l+it th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha, chhiu y^u chhin-t^o ng`in si^ong-sin l`oi k^ui Ch'u.
Li'a s^eu-sit chh`on-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke kau-fi, k`i-t^eu chhiu phai P^a-n^a-p^a hi ^On-th`i-^a.
P^a-n^a-p^a hi-to ke s`u", khon-t'o Song-ti su-fuk p^un ke-t^eu ng`in, chhiu chhin f^on-h'i; k`i khien k`i-t^eu thai-k^a oi ch^on-s^im yit-yi sin-kho Ch'u.
P^a-n^a-p^a he yit-ke h'o ng`in, p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, y^u ki^en-khi`ong ke sin-s^im. Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, chhiu y^u chhin-t^o ke ng`in k^ui-s+uk Ch'u.
Heu-l`oi, P^a-n^a-p^a hi Thai-su chh`im S'o-l`o;

chh`im-t'o y^i-heu, chhiu tai k`i ch'on ^On-th`i-^a. Chiuk-chiuk y^u yit-ngi`en ke s`u"-ki^en, k`i li'ong-s`a th`ung kau-fi ke fi-y^u khiung-ha chhi-fi, ya kau-hiun t^o-t^o ke ng`in. Sin-th`u p^un-ng`in ham-cho "K^i-tuk-th`u" chhiu-he tui ^On-th`i-^a kh^oi-s'u" ke.
Ke-s`u", y^u k'i-ke si^en-t^i tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi-to ^On-th`i-^a.

Kh`i-ch^ung y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to ^A-k^a-pu; k`i tet-t'o Su"n-L`in ke ch'u"-su", hong-h'i-l`oi yi-ngi`en thi^en-ha voi y^u ngi`am-chhung ke k^i-f^ong. (Li'a-ke su" to Khiet-l`o-thi ch'ong-khi`en ke s`u" chu"n-k^in fat-s^en.)
S'o-y^i sin-th`u kiet-thin, cheu tak-s`a ke l+it-liong, chhut chhi`en p^ong-chhu h+et chhai Y`u-thai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi.
K`i-t^eu chhiu cheu 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, thok P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o chi^ong chhi`en tai-hi k^au-p^un kau-fi ke chung ch'ong-l'o.
Ke-s`u", H^i-l+it-v`ong ha-s'u pet-hoi kau-fi ke yit-t^eu ng`in.
K`i yung t^o-'e chh`u"-s'i Yok-hon ke ^a-k^o Ng^a-kok.
K`i khon Y`u-thai-ng`in chhin f^on-h'i li'a-ke su", yu hi chok P'i-tet. (Li'a-ke su" fat-s^en chhai Chh`u-kau-chiet ke kh`i-ki^en.)

K`i chok-t'o P'i-tet heu, chi^ong k`i ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u, k^au-p^un si-p^an ke k'in-v'i khon-s'u, m^i-p^an y^u si-ke ng`in. H^i-l+it kie-v+ak chhai Ph`an-ko-chiet heu chi^ong k`i tai-chhut-l`oi, t^ong-chung s'u"m-phan k`i.
S'o-y^i, P'i-tet chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u p^un-ng`in ch'ong-to s'i-s'i; ch'ung-he, kau-fi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi vi k`i tui Song-ti pet-chhiet kh`i-t'o.

H^i-l+it oi chi^ong P'i-tet tai-chhut-l`oi s'u"m-phan ke chhi`en yit am-p^u, P'i-tet soi chhai li'ong-ke k'in-v'i ke t^ong-ch^ung, y^u li'ong-thi`au thiet-lien-'e s'o-t'en k`i, m`un-ngoi yu y^u k'in-v'i ch'ong-t'en.

Fut-y`en, Ch'u ke yit-ke thi^en-s'u" kh^i chhai k`i s`un-th`eu, y^u k^ong cheu chhai k^am-l`o-t'u. Thi^en-s'u" phok P'i-tet ke ki^en-th`eu, ham-si'ang k`i, k'ong: "Kiak-kiak hong-h'i-l`oi!" Ke thiet-lien-'e chhiu tui P'i-tet ke s'u lut-h^a-l`oi.
Thi^en-s'u" l^au k`i k'ong: "Y^eu-tai ki^e-h'o, h`ai-`e chok-h'i-l`oi." P'i-tet chhiu cheu 'an-ngi`ong cho. Thi^en-s'u" yu k'ong: "Ngoi-s^am k^a-t'en, th`en ng`ai l`oi."
P'i-tet th`en-t'en k`i h`ang-chhut k^am-ngi+uk, h`an `m-t^i thi^en-s'u" s'o-cho ke he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke su", l'au-t'o he khon-t'o yi-siong.

K`i-t^eu th^ung-ko thi-yit-ko^an ke k'in-v'i, yu ko thi-ngi-ko^an, chui-heu, l`oi-to chh+u"t-chiap theu-to s`ang-t'u ke thiet-m`un; ke m`un chhu"-k^a t'a kh^oi-l`oi. K`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi, h`ang-ko yit-thi`au ki^e-lu; thi^en-s'u" fut-y`en-ki^en chhiu l`i-kh^oi P'i-tet.

Li'a-s`u", P'i-tet chang chh^in-si'ang ko-l`oi; k`i k'ong: "Li'a-ha ng`ai chang t^i li'a he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke; Ch'u chh^ai K`i ke thi^en-s'u" l`oi, kiu ng`ai thot-l`i H^i-l+it ke s'u l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in s'o kh`i-thai yit-chhiet ke ham-hoi."
Li'au-ki'e li'a-ke chh`in-h`in y^i-heu, k`i chhiu hi Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o ke ^a-m^e M^a-li-^a ke vuk-h^a; y^u h'o-t^o ng`in chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi kh`i-t'o.
P'i-tet ph^ong ngoi-m`un, y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to L`o-thai ke s'u"-'ng chhut-l`oi th^ang khon-'e.
K`i ngin-chhut he P'i-tet ke s^ang-y^im, f^on-h'i to `m ki-tet kh^oi-m`un, chhiu ch'eu-hi l^au thai-k^a k'ong P'i-tet kh^i chhai m`un-ngoi.
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i pot-ti^en he-m`o!" Ke s'u"-'ng ki^en-chh`u" k'ong chu"n-k^in y^u li'a-ke su". K`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong: "Pha he k`i ke thi^en-s'u"!"
P'i-tet ki-si+uk k'in ph^ong-m`un. K`i-t^eu t'a-kh^oi m`un, khon-t'o chu"n-k^in he P'i-tet, chhiu chh+ok-ki^ang yu f^on-h'i.

P'i-tet yung s'u cho ki-ho, ham k`i-t^eu m+ok chhut-s^ang, y`en-heu l^au k`i-t^eu sot-m`in: Ch'u he ngi'ong-p^an tai k`i chhut k^am-ngi+uk ke. P'i-tet yu f^un-fu k`i-t^eu: "Chi^ong s^eu-sit th`ung Ng^a-kok l^au chung hi^ung-thi k'ong"; k`i chhiu l`i-kh^oi, hi ph+et ke s'o-chhai.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", k'in-v'i lon-to m`o-kat m`o-sat, `m t^i P'i-tet to-t'ai fat-s^en m'a-ke su"-chh`in.

H^i-l+it ha-lin s^eu-chh`a, ch'ung-he m`o P'i-tet ke y'ang-chiak; k`i chhiu s'u"m-mun k'in-v'i, f^un-fu chi^ong k`i-t^eu l^ai-hi chh`u"-s'i. Li'a-ke su" y^i-heu, H^i-l+it l`i-kh^oi Y`u-thai, hi Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, h+et chhai ke-vi.

H^i-l+it tui Thai-ng`i l^au S^i-tun ke ng`in-m`in thai fat-khi'en; s'o-y^i, k`i-t^eu chh^ui-phai thoi-p'eu-th`on hi kien H^i-l+it. K`i-t^eu si^en tet-t'o ki^ung-th`in ke ch'ung-k'on Pak-l^a-s^u"-t^u ke th`ung-chh`in, y`en-heu tui H^i-l+it khi`u-f`o, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke li`ong-s+u"t he tui v`ong s'o k'on ke s'o-chhai l`oi tet-t'o ki^ung-kip.
Chhai s'o-thin ke ngit-`e, H^i-l+it chok-t'en v`ong-f+uk, chh^o chhai v`ong-vi, tui ng`in-m`in y^en-k'ong.
K`i-t^eu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Li'a he s`u"n-m`in ke s^ang, `m-he ng`in ke s^ang!"
Y^in-vi H^i-l+it m`o chi^ong y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un Song-ti, Ch'u ke thi^en-s'u" chit-s`u" chhiu chit-f+at k`i. K`i chhiu p^un chh`ung-`e ng^au-s'i.
Song-ti ke tho ki-si+uk fat-ch'an, ngit-ngit h^in-vong.
P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o phan-h'o su k^au-thok ke su" y^i-heu, chhiu tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang to-ch'on hi; k`i-t^eu ya tai Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o khiung-ha hi.

Chhai ^On-th`i-^a kau-fi ch^ung, y^u k'i-ke si^en-t^i l^au kau-s^u", chhiu-he P^a-n^a-p^a, S^i-mien (phi^en-mi`ang "V^u-hon"), K'u-li-nai-ng`in Lu-khi`u, th`ung f^un-f^ung ke v`ong H^i-l+it khiung-ha ch'ong-thai ke M^a-ngiam, h`an-y^u S'o-l`o.
K`i-t^eu kin-pai Ch'u, kim-s+u"t ke s`u", Su"n-L`in l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi vi Ng`ai phai P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o, hi cho Ng`ai f^u-seu k`i-t^eu t^am-ngim ke k^ung-chok."
S'o-y^i, k`i-t^eu kim-s+u"t kh`i-t'o heu, chhiu vi P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o on-s'u, phai k`i-t^eu chhut-hi.
P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o ki-y`en su Su"n-L`in chh^ai-phai, chhiu h^a S^i-li`u-k^i hi, tui ke-vi chh^o-s`on hi Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u".
K`i-t^eu yit-to Sat-l^a-m'i, chhiu chhai Y`u-thai-ng`in ke kok fi-th`ong chh`on Song-ti ke tho. Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o chhai ke-vi hi+ap-chhu k`i-t^eu k^ung-chok.
K`i-t^eu h`ang-phien chhi`on-t'o, yit-chh+u"t to Pha-fut, chhai ke-vi t`u-t'o yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to P^a-Y^a-s^u ke s+ut-su"; k`i he yit-ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, ya he k'a si^en-t^i.
K`i l^au t'o-song ke ch'ung-tuk Su"-khi`u-P'o-l`o chhin y^u k^au-chh`in. Ch'ung-tuk he chh^ung-m`in-ng`in; k`i chhi'ang P^a-n^a-p^a l^au S'o-l`o l`oi, oi th^ang Song-ti ke tho.
Ch'ung-he, s+ut-su" Y^i-l^i-m^a ( Y^i-l^i-m^a he k`i H^i-li+ap ke mi`ang) f'an-tui k`i-t^eu; k`i si'ong-oi ch'u-ch'u" ch'ung-tuk chiap-su li'a-ke sin-ngi'ong.
Li'a-s`u", S'o-l`o --- yu ^on-to P'o-l`o, p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an, chhiu h`im ke s+ut-su",
k'ong: "Ng`i li'a M^o-k'ui ke lai-'e, yit-chhiet chu"n-ngi ke s`u-th+it, chh^ung-m^an kok-ch'ung si`a-ok l^au k'ui-cha ke ng`in! Ng`i v^ai-khiuk Ch'u ke ch^u"n-tho, h`an `m-h'en th`in m^a!
Li'a-ha Ch'u oi chit-f+at ng`i; ng`i voi chhi^ang-mi^ang, chhiam-s`u" khon-`m-t'o ngit-k^ong." Y^i-l^i-m^a ke muk-ch^u chit-s`u" m`ung-m`ung v^u-am; k`i si-chhu k'in mi^a, khi`u ng`in khi^en k`i.
Ch'ung-tuk khon-t'o s'o fat-s^en ke su", tui Ch'u ke tho-l^i k'am-kok chhin h^i-kh`i, chhiu si^ong-sin.
P'o-l`o l^au k`i ke th`ung-ph^an tui Pha-fut kh^oi-s`on, l`oi-to Ph`ong-f^i-li-^a ke Ph+et-k^a; Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o chhai ke-vi l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi.
K`i-t^eu tui Ph+et-k^a ki-si+uk hiong-chhi`en h`ang, to P'i-s^i-t'i ke ^On-th`i-^a. Chhai ^On-sit-ngit, k`i-t^eu hi-to Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fi-th`ong chh^am-k^a l^i-pai.

Th+uk-li'au M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i ke s^u y^i-heu, k'on fi-th`ong ke ham ng`in hi l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'ong-vi hi^ung-thi, na-he ng`i-t^eu y^u mi^en-li chung-ng`in ke fa, chhi'ang k'ong!"
P'o-l`o chhiu kh^i-h'i-l`oi, p'i s'u-se, k'ong: " Y^i-set-li+et th`ung-p^au l^au s'o-y^u kin-vi Song-ti ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ^a, chhi'ang th^ang ng`ai k'ong!

Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke Song-ti ki'en-si'en ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en. K`i-t^eu h+et chhai ^Ai-kh+ip cho ngoi-koet-ng`in ke s`u", Song-ti s'u" k`i-t^eu s`ang-cho thai ke m`in-chh+uk, yung thai khi`en-n`en ke s'u tai k`i-t^eu chhut ^Ai-kh+ip.
Chhai kh'ong-y^a, K`i ngi^un-nai k`i-t^eu si-s+u"p-ngi`en.
K`i s^eu-m+et K^a-n`am-thi chhit-ke m`in-chh+uk, chi^ong ke th'u-thi k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu cho s'an-ngi+ap.
Li'a-t^eu su" ke k^in-ko thai-yok y^u si-pak 'ng-s+u"p ngi`en. "Y^i-heu, Song-ti yu vi k`i-t^eu sat-l+ip su"-s^u", chh+u"t-to si^en-t^i Sat-m^u-ng'i ke s`u".
Heu-l`oi, k`i-t^eu th'o oi y^u yit-ke v`ong, Song-ti chhiu tui Phien-ng^a-m'en k^i-chh+uk si'en-chhut K^i-su" ke lai-'e S'o-l`o, l+ip k`i cho k`i-t^eu ke v`ong, khiung si-s+u"p-ngi`en ki'u.

Fi-thet S'o-l`o heu, Song-ti yu si'en-l+ip Thai-v'i cho k`i-t^eu ke v`ong. Ko^an-he Thai-v'i, Song-ti k'ong: 'Ng`ai y'i-k^in chh`im-t'o Y^a-s^i ke lai-'e Thai-v'i; k`i he h+ap Ng`ai s^im-yi ke ng`in, k`i voi ch^un-h`ang Ng`ai yit-chhiet ke ch'u"-yi.'
Tui k`i ke heu-thoi, Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke yin-h'i vi Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in sat-l+ip yit-ke Kiu-ch'u, chhiu-he Y^a-s^u.
Y^a-s^u kh^oi-s'u" k^ung-chok y^i-chhi`en, Yok-hon tui chhi`on-th'i Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in chh`on-tho, ham k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi chhui-ok, chiap-su s'e-l^i.

Yok-hon ke s'u"-min voi v`an-s`u"n y^i-chhi`en, k`i tui Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`i-t^eu si'ong ng`ai he m'a-ng`in? Ng`ai pin `m-he ng`i-t^eu s'o kh`i-thai ke; ch'ung-he, k`i chhiu voi to l'e, ng`ai li`en l^au k`i thot-h`ai ya m`o ch^u"-kiet.'
"Kok-vi th`ung-p^au --- ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un, l^au s'o-y^u kin-vi Song-ti ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ^a! Li'a ch'u"n-kiu ke ch^u"n-tho chhiu-he oi chh`on-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke!

Ch'ung-he, h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke ng`in l^au k`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu `m-t^i k`i he Kiu-ch'u, ya m`o m`in-ph+ak m^i-yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit s'o th+uk ke si^en-t^i-s^u. K`i-t^eu chi^ong Y^a-s^u thin-chhui, t'u-t'u-h'o yin-ngiam si^en-t^i ke yi-ngi`en.
S^ui-y`en k`i-t^eu chh`im `m-t'o phan k`i s'i-h`in ke l^i-y`u, h`an-he y^eu-khi`u P'i-l^a-t^o chhu"-s'i k`i.
K`i-t^eu cho-li'au si^en-t^i-s^u s'o si'a ko^an-he Y^a-s^u yit-chhiet ke su" y^i-heu, chhiu chi^ong k`i tui s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang chh'i-h^a-l`oi, piong chhai f`un-mu-t'u.
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at;

chhai yit-chham s`u"-ki^en t^ong-ch^ung, k`i h'o-t^o p'ai hi'en-hien p^un ke-t^eu su"t th`ung k`i khiung-ha tui K^a-li-li to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi ke ng`in khon. Li'a-t^eu ng`in muk-chhi`en chhai m`in-ki^en he k`i ke kien-chu"n-ng`in.

Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha po ng`i-t^eu h'o s^eu-sit: Th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u ke f+uk-f+at, Song-ti th`eu-p'ai tui ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s'o yin-h'i ke, li'a-ha y'i-k^in tui ng`ai-t^eu cho ch'u"-s^un ke s+u"t-hien l'e. Chhiong S^u"-phi^en thi-ngi-phi^en s'o k'ong: Ng`i he Ng`ai ke Lai-'e; k^im-p^u-ngit kh^oi-s'u", Ng`ai cho ng`i ke ^A-p^a.

Lun-t'o s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, y'un-y'en `m-voi chai s'i ke su", Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong k'ong-ko: Ng`ai oi chi^ong s`u"n-su"n khok-s+u"t ke ^en-ti'en su-p^un ng`i-t^eu, chhiu-he Ng`ai s'o yin-h'i oi p^un Thai-v'i ke.
Chhai nang-ngoi yit-phi^en, S^u"-phi^en ke chok-ch'a ya k'ong: Ng`i `m-voi p^un Ng`i ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in mi`en-thet.
Thai-v'i chhai su"-ki^en ke s`u", s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi; k`i s'i heu, p^un-ng`in m`ai chhai ch'u-si^en ke s`un-th`eu, y'i-k^in mi`en-thet.
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke ke yit-vi, chhiu m`o mi`en-thet.
S'o-y^i hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi t^i: Li'a sa-chhui ke fuk-y^im chhiu-he Y^a-s^u chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke.
Ng`i-t^eu kho M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it chhai m`o fap-thu tet-t'o chh^u"n-ngi ke yit-chhiet su"-song, m^i-yit-ke sin-kho Y^a-s^u ke ng`in chhi`on-phu voi tet-t'o chh^u"n-ngi.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, ki^ang-pha si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa fat-s^en chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-song:

Khon ^a, siet-th+uk Song-ti ke ng`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu voi thai chh+ok-ki^ang, voi s'i-thet! Y^in-vi Ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s`u"-thoi s'o cho ke su", s^ui-y`en y^u-ng`in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-h'i, ng`i-t^eu ch'ung-he `m sin!"
P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a oi l`i-kh^oi fi-th`ong ke s`u", thai-k^a chhi'ang k`i-t^eu ha yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit chai l`oi, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-ki'e li'a-t^eu su".

San-fi heu, chhin-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au ng+ip Y`u-thai-kau ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in th`en-t'en P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a hi. K`i li'ong-s`a chhiu k'u-li k`i-t^eu oi chhai s^en-f+at-song ki-si+uk y'i-kho Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en.
Ha yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, chh^a-`m-t^o chhi`on-s`ang ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung l`oi-to, oi th^ang Ch'u ke tho-l^i.
Y`u-thai-ng`in khon-t'o 'an thai-khi`un ke ng`in, chhiu chhin chhit-tu; k`i-t^eu ngang l^au P'o-l`o au, yu f'i-pong k`i.

Ch'ung-he, P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a h`an-kha y'ung-k'am l`oi si^en-chh`on k'ong: "Song-ti ke tho si^en chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu he yin-t^ong ke; ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu `m chiap-su, ton-thin chhu"-k^a m`o ch^u"-kiet tet y'un-s^en. S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu oi l`i-kh^oi ng`i-t^eu, hi Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke-vi;
y^in-vi Ch'u su"t f^un-fu ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: Ng`ai y'i-k^in sat-l+ip ng`i cho Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke k^ong, ham ng`i chi^ong kiu-^en tai-to thi^en-ng`ai h'oi-kok hi."
Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in th^ang-li'au li'a-ke fa, chhiu chhin f^on-h'i, siung-chan Ch'u ke tho-l^i; ke-t^eu Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en l`oi chiap-su y'un-s^en ke ng`in, l^ung-ch'ung s`ang-cho sin-th`u.
Ch'u ke tho-l^i chhiu chh`on-phien ke yit-tai ke s'o-chhai.

Ch'ung-he, Y`u-thai-ng`in san-thung song-li`u sa-fi-ch^ung khi`en-s`u"n ke fu-ng`in-k^a, l^au t^ong-thi y^u thi-vi ke ng`in-su", th`ung-s^im pet P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a, kiuk k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke-vi.
K`i li'ong-s`a chi^ong kiok-hong ke n`ai-f'un t'em-thet l`oi k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, y`en-heu chhiu hi Y^i-k^o-ngiam.
Chhai P'i-s^i-t'i ke ^On-th`i-^a, ke-t^eu sin-th`u m^an-s^im f^on-h'i, yu p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an.

Chhai Y^i-k^o-ngiam ya fat-s^en khiung-yong ke su". P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a hi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fi-th`ong; k`i-t^eu ke k'ong-tho s'u" chhin-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in s`ang-cho sin-th`u.
Ch'ung-he ke-t^eu `m sin ke Y`u-thai-ng`in san-thung Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, s'u" k`i-t^eu n^au sin-th`u.

K`i li'ong-s`a chhai ke-vi h+et h'o-ki'u, thai-t'am th`am-lun Ch'u ke su". Ch'u su p^un k`i-t^eu h`ang s`u"n-chiak l^au kh`i-su" ke n`en-l+it, yung 'an-ngi`ong chu"n-m`in k`i-t^eu s'o chh`on ko^an-he Ch'u ^en-ti'en ke sin-sit he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke.
S`ang-t'u ke chung-ng`in chhiu f^un-phai, y^u-t^eu f`u Y`u-thai-ng`in, y^u-t^eu f`u s'u"-th`u.
Ke-s`u", Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in pin k`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu kiet-s^im oi s^ong-hoi s'u"-th`u, yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i k`i-t^eu.
S'u"-th`u t^i li'a-ke su" chhiu s'am-ch'eu, hi L^i-k^o-n`i ke Lu-s^u"-tet-s`ang l^au Th+it-p'i-s`ang, pin fu-khiun ke thi-kh^i,
chhai ke-t^eu thi-f^ong ki-si+uk chh`on fuk-y^im.
Chhai Lu-s^u"-tet s`ang-t'u y^u yit-ke ng`in, chhut-se chhiu khi`o-kiok, chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t h`ang-ko lu.
K`i chh^o chhai ke-vi th^ang P'o-l`o k'ong-tho. P'o-l`o chu-muk khon k`i, khon-chhut k`i y^u sin-s^im, voi tet-t'o y^i-h'o,
chhiu thai-s^ang k'ong: "Ng`i hong-h'i-l`oi, kh^i-chh+u"t!" Ke ng`in chhiu thiau-h'i-l`oi, kh^oi-s'u" h`ang-lu.
Chung-ng`in khon-t'o P'o-l`o s'o-cho ke su", chhiu yung L^i-k^o-n`i-fa thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "S`u"n-m`in fa-s^u"n pien-cho ng`in, kong-l`im chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke ch^ung-ki^en l^o!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu h^em P^a-n^a-p^a "Chhiu-s^u"", h^em P'o-l`o "H^i-ng'i-m'i", y^in-vi k`i tai-th`eu k'ong-fa.
S`ang-ngoi Chhiu-s^u"-meu ke chi-s^u" khi^en-t'en ngi`u, tai-t'en f^a, l`oi-to s`ang m`un-h'eu, oi th`ung chung-ng`in khiung-ha hien-chi p^un s'u"-th`u.
P^a-n^a-p^a l^au P'o-l`o th^ang-t'o k`i-t^eu si'ong-oi cho ke su", chhiu chh'a-lan s^am, thiau-ng+ip ng`in-khi`un, thai-s^ang k'ong:

"Kok-vi, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke cho li'a-t^eu su" n`e? Ng`ai-t^eu l^au ng`i-t^eu khiung-yong, ya he ng`in! Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi li'a-vi chh`on fuk-y^im, he oi ham ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi pai ngi'eu-siong li'a-t^eu h^i-kh^ung ke su", l`oi sin ke chh'ong-chho thi^en, thi, h'oi, l^au kh`i-ch^ung van-v+ut ke y'un-s^en Song-ti.
Chhai ko-hi ke su"-thoi, K`i y`u-chhai van-m`in h`ang chhu"-k^a ke lu;

ch'ung-he, K`i yit-chh+u"t h`ang kok-yong ke h'o-su" l`oi chu"n-m`in chhu"-k^a ke chh`un-chhai, chhiu-chhiong: S'u" f^ung-thi`au y'i-sun, 'ng-kuk f^ung-t^en, p^un ng`i-t^eu f^ung-y^i chiuk-s+u"t, s^im-m^an yi-chiuk."
S^ui-y`en s'u"-th`u 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, ya hi'am-hi'am m`o fap-thu ch'u-ch'u" chung-ng`in hiong k`i-t^eu hien-chi.

Ke-s`u", y^u-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in tui P'i-s^i-t'i ke ^On-th`i-^a l^au Y^i-k^o-ngiam l`oi-to; k`i-t^eu k^au-s^o chung-ng`in yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep P'o-l`o, l'au-t'o k`i s'i-thet, chhiu chi^ong k`i th^o-to s`ang-ngoi hi.
Ke-t^eu sin-th`u v`i-t'en k`i ke s`u", m`o si'ong-t'o, k`i yu hong-h'i-l`oi, h`ang-ch'on s`ang-nui hi. Thi-ngi-ngit, k`i th`ung P^a-n^a-p^a khiung-ha hi Th+it-p'i.

P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a chhai Th+it-p'i chh`on fuk-y^im, s'u" chhin-t^o ng`in s`ang-cho sin-th`u. Heu-l`oi, k`i-t^eu chhiu ch'on-th`eu, k^in-ko Lu-s^u"-tet l^au Y^i-k^o-ngiam, hi-to P'i-s^i-t'i ke ^On-th`i-^a.
K`i-t^eu y`en-lu ki^en-ku sin-th`u ke s^im, k'u-li k`i-t^eu ki-si+uk sin-kho Y^a-s^u. K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Oi ng+ip Song-ti ke koet, ng`ai-t^eu yit-thin oi k^in-l+it t^o-t^o ke kh'u-nan."
K`i li'ong-s`a ya vi kok kau-fi sat-l+ip ch'ong-l'o, kim-s+u"t kh`i-t'o heu, chi^ong k`i-t^eu k^au-thok p^un k`i-t^eu s'o sin-kho ke Ch'u.
K`i li'ong-s`a k^in-ko P'i-s^i-t'i ke thi-kh^i, hi-to Ph`ong-f^i-li-^a.
K`i-t^eu ya chhai Ph+et-k^a chh`on fuk-y^im, y^i-heu chhiu hi ^A-thai-li,

tui ke-vi chh^o-s`on ch'on ^On-th`i-^a. T^ong-chh^u, chhiu-he chhai li'a-ke s'o-chhai, k`i-t^eu p^un-ng`in k^au-thok chhai Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en ch^ung hi k^ung-chok; li'a-ke k^ung-chok li'a-ha y'i-k^in v`an-s`u"n l'e.

K`i-t^eu ch'on-to ^On-th`i-^a, chhiu chhi-s+ip kau-fi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, tui k`i-t^eu po-ko, k'ong-h'i Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha k^ung-chok, Song-ti yu ngi'ong-p^an kh^oi-m`un s'u" Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in si^ong-sin.
K`i-t^eu chhai ke-vi th`ung sin-th`u khiung-ha h+et h'o-ki'u.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in tui Y`u-thai l`oi-to ^On-th`i-^a, kau-hiun hi^ung-thi k'ong: "Chh`u-li'au ng`i-t^eu cheu M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it chiap-su kot-l^i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi tet-kiu."

Vi-t'o li'a-ke mun-th`i, P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a li'ong-s`a th`ung k`i-t^eu fat-s^en kit-li+et ke phien-lun. S'o-y^i, thai-k^a kiet-thin phai P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a, th`ung t^ong-thi kau-fi k'i-ke ng`in s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi, chhi'ang-kau s'u"-th`u l^au ch'ong-l'o li'a-khien su".

Kau-fi chhiu sung k`i-t^eu chhut-fat. Chhai lu-song, k`i-t^eu k^in-ko F^i-n`i-k^i l^au Sat-m^a-li-^a, tak s'o-chhai po-ko Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in k^ui Ch'u ke su"-chh`in. Th^ang-t'o li'a-ke s^eu-sit, s'o-y^u ke sin-th`u chhi`on-phu chhin f^on-h'i.
K`i-t^eu to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke s`u", tet-t'o kau-fi, s'u"-th`u l^au ch'ong-l'o ke chiap-thai. K`i-t^eu chhiu hiong thai-k^a po-ko Song-ti th^ung-ko k`i-t^eu s'o-cho yit-chhiet ke su".
Ch'ung-he y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-phai ke sin-th`u kh^i-h'i-l`oi k'ong: "Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in yit-thin oi chiap-su kot-l^i, ya yit-thin oi ch^un-s'u M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it."
S'o-y^i, s'u"-th`u l^au ch'ong-l'o chhiu kh^oi-fi th'o-lun li'a-ke mun-th`i.

Phien-lun chhin-ki'u y^i-heu, P'i-tet kh^i-h'i-l`oi k'ong: "Kok-vi hi^ung-thi, ng`i-t^eu t^i, Song-ti ch'o chhiu tui ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ki'en-si'en ng`ai, ham ng`ai chi^ong li'a fuk-y^im ke tho-l^i chh`on p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, p^un k`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o l`oi si^ong-sin.
Kam-chhat ng`in-s^im ke Song-ti chi^ong Su"n-L`in su-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, chhiong su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu khiung-yong, yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi chu"n-m`in K`i ya chiap-n+ap Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.
Song-ti pin m`o f^un-ph+et ng`ai-t^eu l^au k`i-t^eu; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu sin, K`i chhiu kiet-chhiang k`i-t^eu ke s^im.

Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke su"-tham Song-ti, chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en l^au ng`ai-t^eu chhu"-k^a kh^ai-`m-y`ang ke t^am-'e, piong chhai Ngoi-p^ang sin-th`u ke ki^en-th`eu-t'ang n`e?
Li'a he `m-chh+ok ke! Ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-sin, ng`ai-t^eu tet-kiu he th^ung-ko Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke ^en-ti'en, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-yong."
Thai-k^a chhiu ti^am-ti^am, th^ang P^a-n^a-p^a l^au P'o-l`o po-ko Song-ti th^ung-ko k`i-t^eu chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung s'o h`ang yit-chhiet ke s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su".
K`i-t^eu k'ong-s+ot, Ng^a-kok ya k'ong: "Kok-vi hi^ung-thi, chhi'ang-th^ang ng`ai k'ong!
Th`eu-ha S^i-m`un sot-m`in Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an ko^an-s^im Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ki'en-si'en ng`in l`oi k^ui K`i chhu"-k^a.
Si^en-t^i s'o-k'ong ke fa, yi-su" ya he khiung-yong. Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o ki-chai:
Ch'u k'ong: Su"-heu Ng`ai oi to-ch'on-l`oi, chh`ung-kien Thai-v'i vang-thet ke v`ong-chh`eu; Ng`ai oi chh`ung-kien ke p^un-ng`in pho-fai ke, Ng`ai oi p^un k`i chh`ung-s^in kh^i-h'i-l`oi.
'An-ngi`ong, kh`i-th^a s'o-y^u ke ng`in-lui, Ng`ai ki'en-si'en k^ui Ng`ai ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, chhi`on-phu chhiu voi chh`im-khi`u Ng`ai.
Li'a he chhai song-k'u chhiu hi'en-m`in li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in ke Ch'u s'o-k'ong ke."
Ng^a-kok ki-si+uk k'ong: "Cheu ng`ai ke khon-fap, ng`ai-t^eu m`o yin-k^oi v`i-n`an ke-t^eu k^ui-hiong Song-ti ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.

Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet si'a sin-'e, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu: `M-h'o s+u"t pai-ko ngi'eu-siong m`o chhiang-li ke s+u"t-v+ut, `m-h'o h`ang y`im-lon ke su", `m-h'o s+u"t kh+ak-s'i ke th`eu-s^ang, `m-h'o s+u"t hiet.
Y^in-vi chhu"-k'u y^i-l`oi, m^i-yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, chhai tak-ke fi-th`ong y^u ng`in th+uk M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, chhai tak-ke s`ang-t'u ya y^u-ng`in si^en-y`ong k`i ke kau-hiun."

S'o-y^i, chung s'u"-th`u l^au ch'ong-l'o, pin chhi`on kau-fi chhiu kiet-thin chh^ui-phai thoi-p'eu, phai k`i-t^eu th`ung P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a khiung-ha hi ^On-th`i-^a. K`i-t^eu si'en phi^en-mi`ang P^a-sat-p^a ke Y`u-thai l^au S^i-l^a. K`i li'ong-s`a he chung hi^ung-thi ph`in-s`ong s'o ch^un-chhung ke ng`in.
K`i-t^eu tai-hi ke sin-'e he 'an-ngi`ong si'a ke: "S'u"-th`u l^au cho ch'ong-l'o ke chung hi^ung-thi, tui h+et chhai ^On-th`i-^a, Si-li-^a l^au K^i-li-k^a s'o-y^u ke Ngoi-p^ang sin-th`u chhi'ang-^on!

Ng`ai-t^eu th^ang-k'ong y^u-t^eu ng`in tui ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi chhut-hi; k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke fa hoi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o. Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai-t^eu pin m`o ham k`i-t^eu hi k'ong ke-t^eu fa.
S'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha chh^am-si`ong, thai-k^a th`ung-yi si'en-phai thoi-p'eu hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi. K`i-t^eu oi th`ung ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u P^a-n^a-p^a l^au P'o-l`o khiung-ha hi;
li'a li'ong-s`a su"t vi-t'o su"-fung ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk mo s^ang-miang ke ng`ui-hi'am.
S'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu si'en-phai Y`u-thai l^au S^i-l^a hi; k`i-t^eu voi t^ong-mien l^au ng`i-t^eu sot-m`in li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in.
Y^in-vi Su"n-L`in l^au ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung th`ung-yi, chh`u-li'au yit-t^eu pit-yeu ke li-k^ui y^i-ngoi, `m-oi chi^ong kh`i-th^a ke chh^ung-t^am k^a p^un ng`i-t^eu.

Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o s+u"t pai-ko ngi'eu-siong ke s+u"t-v+ut; `m-h'o s+u"t hiet ya-he kh+ak-s'i ke th`eu-s^ang; ya `m-h'o h`ang y`im-lon ke su". Li'a k'i-khien, ng`i-t^eu m+ok fam chhiu h'o. Ngien ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on!"
Ke-t^eu thoi-p'eu fung-min chhut-fat, hi-to ^On-th`i-^a, chhai ke-vi chhi-s+ip chhi`on-th'i sin-th`u, chi^ong sin-'e k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu.
K`i-t^eu th+uk sin-'e ke s`u", y^in-vi s'o k'u-li ke fa chhiu f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i.
Y`u-thai l^au S^i-l^a ya he si^en-t^i; k`i-t^eu tui sin-th`u k'ong chhin-t^o k'u-li ke fa, l`oi ki^en-ku k`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im.
Chhai ke-vi h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en y^i-heu, sin-th`u chhiu f^on-sung k`i li'ong-s`a, chuk-fuk k`i-t^eu ph`in-ph`in ^on-^on ch'on-hi chh^ai-phai k`i-t^eu ke chung-ng`in ke-vi hi.
Ch'ung-he P'o-l`o l^au P^a-n^a-p^a ki-si+uk li`u chhai ^On-th`i-^a; k`i-t^eu th`ung kh`i-th^a h'o-t^o ng`in khiung-ha kau-hiun ng`in, pin chh`on Ch'u ke tho.
Yit-chham s`u"-ki^en y^i-heu, P'o-l`o tui P^a-n^a-p^a k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu to-ch'on th`eu-p'ai chh`on Ch'u tho-l^i ke tak chh^un-ch^ong hi, khon sin-th`u ke chh`in-h`in."
P^a-n^a-p^a si'ong-oi tai Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o khiung-ha hi,
ch'ung-he P'o-l`o `m chan-s`u"n; y^in-vi song-p'ai k`i `m-h'en li`u h^a-l`oi th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha k^ung-chok, chhai Ph`ong-f^i-li-^a l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu.
K`i li'ong-s`a vi li'a-khien su" kit-li+et ch^en-lun, chui-heu f^un-kh^oi. P^a-n^a-p^a tai-t'en Yok-hon-M^a-kh'o chh^o-s`on hi Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u",
ch'ung-he P'o-l`o ki'en-si'en S^i-l^a; sin-th`u chi^ong k`i-t^eu k^au chhai Ch'u ke ^en-ti'en ch^ung, k`i-t^eu chhiu chhut-fat.
K`i h`ang-phien Si-li-^a l^au K^i-li-k^a, ki^en-ku kok kau-fi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke sin-s^im.
P'o-l`o l`oi-to Th+it-p'i l^au Lu-s^u"-tet. Chhai Lu-s^u"-tet y^u yit-ke sin-th`u, mi`ang ^on-to Th`i-m^o-thai. Ki^a-m^e he Y`u-thai-ng`in, ya he sin-th`u, ch'ung-he ki^a-p^a he H^i-li+ap-ng`in.
Chhai Lu-s^u"-tet l^au Y^i-k^o-ngiam ke chung sin-th`u chhin chh^u"n-chan Th`i-m^o-thai.
P'o-l`o si'ong-oi tai Th`i-m^o-thai khiung-ha hi, chhiu l^au k`i h`ang kot-l^i, y^in-vi ke s'o-chhai ke Y`u-thai-ng`in chhi`on-phu t^i ki^a-p^a he H^i-li+ap-ng`in.
K`i-t^eu k^in-ko tak-ke s`ang, chhiu chi^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke chung s'u"-th`u l^au ch'ong-l'o s'o-thin ke li-k^ui k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu, f^un-fu k`i-t^eu ch^un-s'u.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, kok kau-fi ke sin-s^im y+et-fat ki^en-ku, sin-th`u ngit-ngit chen-k^a.
K`i-t^eu k^in-ko Fut-l^i-k^a l^au K^a-l^a-thai thi-kh^i, y^in-vi Su"n-L`in `m-h'en k`i-t^eu chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en chh`on fuk-y^im.
K`i-t^eu to M^i-s^i-^a pi^en-kie ke s`u", si'ong-oi ng+ip-hi P'i-th^ui-n`i-s'en, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u ke L`in kim-ch'u" k`i-t^eu,
s'o-y^i k`i-t^eu t^in-ko M^i-s^i-^a, hi Th+it-l`o-^a.
Ke am-p^u, P'o-l`o khon-t'o yit-ke yi-siong: Y^u yit-ke M^a-kh`i-tun-ng`in kh^i chhai ke-vi, khi`u k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ng`i l`oi M^a-kh`i-tun p^ong-chhu ng`ai-t^eu!"
P'o-l`o yit khon-t'o li'a-ke yi-siong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu ngi`am-s`u" ch'un-phi hi M^a-kh`i-tun, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu khok-sin he Song-ti f^u-seu ng`ai-t^eu hi chh`on fuk-y^im p^un ke s'o-chhai ke ng`in.
Ng`ai-t^eu chh^o-s`on tui Th+it-l`o-^a chhut-fat, chh+u"t-chiap s'u"-to Sat-m^o-th+it-l^a, thi-ngi-ngit to N`i-^a-p^o-l^i.
Ng`ai-t^eu tui ke-vi h`ang-to M^a-kh`i-tun th`eu-yit-kh^i ke yit-ke s`ang-su" F^i-l+ip-p'i; li'a s`ang-su" ya he L`o-m^a ke chh+u"t-m`in-kh^i. Ng`ai-t^eu chhai ke-vi h+et k'i-ngit.

^On-sit-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu chhut-s`ang hi h`o-pa-s`un, s^im-nui si'ong, Y`u-thai-ng`in kh'o-n`en voi l`oi li'a thi-f^ong kh`i-t'o. Ng`ai-t^eu chh^o-h^a-l`oi, tui chhi-s+ip chhai ke-vi ke fu-'ng chh`on tho-l^i.

T^ong-ch^ung y^u yit-ke tui Th^ui-ng^a-th^ui-l^a-s`ang l`oi ke fu-'ng, mi`ang ^on-to L^i-t'i-^a, he mai ch'u"-set pu ke. K`i he kin-pai Song-ti ke ng`in; Ch'u kh^oi k`i ke s^im, p^un k`i li`u-s^im th^ang P'o-l`o s'o k'ong ke fa.

K`i l^au k`i chhi`on k^a-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung li^ang s'e-l^i. Su"-heu, k`i chhi'ang-khi`u ng`ai-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu na-he ngin-v`i ng`ai he s`u"n-s^im sin Ch'u, chhi'ang l`oi ng^a vuk-h^a h+et." K`i chhiu khi`ong-khi`ong li`u ng`ai-t^eu.

Y^u yit-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu hi ke kh`i-t'o ke s'o-chhai, y^u yit-ke s'u"-'ng tui-mien h`ang-t'en l`oi. Li'a s'u"-'ng y^u si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n, voi puk-koa son-miang, s'o-y^i thoi ki^a ch'u-ng`in chhon chhin-t^o chhi`en.
K`i k^ui-lu th`en-t'en P'o-l`o l^au ng`ai-t^eu, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu ng`in he Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, oi tui ng`i-t^eu si^en-pu tet-kiu ke tho-lu!"

K`i li`en-li`en h'o-t^o ngit 'an-ngi`ong k'in h^em; chui-heu P'o-l`o k'am-kok chhin n^au, chhiu ch'on-s^u"n, tui ke si`a-l`in k'ong: "Ng`ai fung Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang, min-lin ng`i tui ki^a s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi!" Ke si`a-l`in ngi`am-s`u" chhiu chhut-l`oi.
S'u"-'ng ke ch'u-ng`in t^i k`i-t^eu ke chh`oi-ngi`en th^on-thet-hi l'e, chhiu khi'u-t'en P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a, l^ai k`i-t^eu hi k'ong-chh`ong kien k^on-f'u ke ng`in.
K`i-t^eu tai k`i-t^eu to L`o-m^a k^on-ch'ong ke mien-chhi`en, ko k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu ng`in he Y`u-thai-ng`in, l`oi y'eu-lon ng`ai-t^eu ke s`ang-su".
K`i-t^eu th`i-chhong v`i-fap ke k^ui-k'i, he ng`ai-t^eu L`o-m^a-ng`in cho-`m-tet chiap-su, cho-`m-tet s+u"t-h`ang ke!"
Chung-ng`in ya si^ong-ch^ang k^ung-kit k`i-t^eu; ke-t^eu k^on-ch'ong chhiu f^un-fu thot k`i-t^eu ke s^am, pi^en-t'a k`i-t^eu.
P^in-'e chi^ong P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a t'a-to chhin li-hoi, y`en-heu chi^ong k`i-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u, min-lin khon-s'u ke ng`in ngi`am-ngi`am ch'ong-h'o.
Khon-s'u-ke chiap-t'o min-lin, chi^ong k`i-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk nui-chh`en, li'ong-kiok yung k^a s'o-t'en.
Thai-yok chhai pan-ya, P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a chhai ke-vi kh`i-t'o, ng`im-s^u" siung-chan Song-ti, kh`i-th^a ke si`u-fam th^ang-to ng'i-chet-chet.
Fut-y`en, y^u thai thi-th^ung, li`en k^am-ngi+uk ke thi-k^i ya y`eu-thung; yit-ha-'e, s'o-y^u ke k^am-m`un chhi`on-phu t'a kh^oi-l`oi, si`u-fam ke s'o-lien ya lut-h^a-l`oi.
Khon-s'u-ke si'ang ko-l`oi, khon-t'o k^am-ngi+uk ke m`un chhi`on-phu thai kh^oi, l'au-t'o s'o-y^u ke si`u-fam y'i-k^in th`o-ch'eu, chhiu p^ang-chhut t^o-'e l`oi, si'ong-oi chhu"-sat.
P'o-l`o khon-t'o, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "`M-h'o s^ong-hoi chhu"-k^a, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu h`an chhai li'a-vi!"
Khon-s'u-ke ham ng`in khi`a f'o-p'a l`oi, chhiu chhong-ng+ip-hi, ph+uk chhai P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a ke kiok-chhi`en, p+it-p+it-chhat.
Y`en-heu, k`i tai k`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi, mun k'ong: "Li'ong-vi s^in-s^ang, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang voi tet-kiu?"
K`i-t^eu k'ong: "Sin Ch'u Y^a-s^u, ng`i l^au ng`i chhi`on k^a-ng`in chhiu voi tet-kiu."
Li'ong-s`a yu tui k`i l^au k`i chhi`on vuk-h^a ng`in k'ong-ki'e Ch'u ke tho-l^i.
Ke am-p^u, t^ong-s`u", khon-s'u-ke tai k`i-t^eu hi s'e s^ong-h'eu; k`i l^au k`i chhi`on k^a-ng`in ngi`am-s`u" li^ang s'e-l^i.
K`i chhi'ang P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a hi ki^a vuk-h^a, p`ai-chok chhi'ang k`i-t^eu s+u"t. K`i l^au chhi`on k^a-ng`in y^in-vi sin Song-ti, chhiu chh^ung-m^an f^on-h'i.
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, L`o-m^a ke k^on-ch'ong phai k'in-k^on hi k'ong: "Chi^ong ke li'ong-s`a piong-chhut-hi!"
Khon-s'u-ke l^au P'o-l`o k'ong: "K^on-ch'ong phai ng`in l`oi, oi piong ng`i l^au S^i-l^a, ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha cho-tet chhut-hi, ^on-s^im l`i-kh^oi."

Ch'ung-he, P'o-l`o tui k'in-k^on k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu he L`o-m^a ke k^ung-m`in, pin m`o thin-chhui, k`i-t^eu chhiu t^ong-chung pi^en-t'a ng`ai-t^eu, yu chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u; li'a-ha k`i-t^eu si'ong-oi chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu th^eu-th^eu sung-ch'eu m^a? Li'a he cho-`m-tet ke! Ham L`o-m^a k^on-ch'ong chhu"-k^a l`oi tai ng`ai-t^eu chhut-hi!"
K'in-k^on chi^ong li'a-t^eu fa po-ko k^on-ch'ong. K`i-t^eu yit th^ang-k'ong P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a he L`o-m^a ke k^ung-m`in, chhiu chhin ki^ang,
l`oi-to k^am-ngi+uk, l^au k`i-t^eu fi-su"t-l^i, tai k`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi, chhi'ang k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke s`ang-su".
P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a l`i-kh^oi k^am-ngi+uk, chhiu hi L^i-t'i-^a ke vuk-h^a, chhai ke-vi kien-t'o chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, pin khien-mi^en k`i-t^eu, y`en-heu chhiu l`i-kh^oi.
P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a ki-si+uk hiong-chhi`en h`ang, k^in-ko Am-f^i-p^o-l^i, ^A-p^o-l`o-n`i-^a, l`oi-to Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a, chhai ke-vi y^u Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fi-th`ong.
P'o-l`o cheu k`i ph`in-s`ong ke s+ip-koan ng+ip-hi fi-th`ong, li`en-si+uk s^am-ke ^On-sit-ngit, k^in-k'i Su"n-k^in l^au ng`in phien-lun,
k'ong-ki'e pin chu"n-m`in K^i-tuk tit-khok oi su-hoi, y`en-heu tui s'i f+uk-f+at. K`i k'ong: "Ng`ai chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke li'a-ke Y^a-s^u, chhiu-he K^i-tuk."
Kh`i-ch^ung y^u-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in si^ong-sin, chhiu sun-chhi`ung P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a; ya y^u h'o-t^o kin-pai Song-ti ke H^i-li+ap-ng`in si^ong-sin, fu-'ng-kie ke li^ang-chhiu ya `m-voi s'eu.

Ch'ung-he, ke-t^eu `m-sin ke Y`u-thai-ng`in s^im-nui chhit-tu, chhi-s+ip yit-t^eu l`u-m`an, y^e-k^ong t'a-chhu"n, chhai s`ang-t'u y^in-h'i phau-thung. K`i-t^eu chhong-ng+ip Y^a-s^un ke vuk-h^a, oi chh`im P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a, chi^ong k`i-t^eu l^ai-hi k^au-p^un phau-m`in;
ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o, chhiu chi^ong Y^a-s^un l^au kh`i-th^a k'i-ke sin-th`u l^ai-hi kien thi-f^ong-k^on, ko k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ke-t^eu y'eu-lon thi^en-ha ke ng`in, li'a-ha l`oi-to p'un-s`ang,
Y^a-s^un chhai ki^a vuk-h^a chiap-thai k`i-t^eu! K`i-t^eu v`i-phoi F`ong-ti ke su"n-ch'u", k'ong y^u nang-ngoi yit-ke v`ong, mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u."
Li'a-t^eu fa hoi chung-ng`in l^au thi-f^ong-k^on m`o-kat m`o-sat.
Thi-f^ong-k^on min-lin Y^a-s^un l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in si'a chhiet-kiet-s^u, y`en-heu chang piong k`i-t^eu.
Thi^en yit-am, sin-th`u chhiu sung P'o-l`o l^au S^i-l^a hi P'i-l^i-^a. K`i-t^eu hi-to ke-vi, chhiu ng+ip-hi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fi-th`ong.
Li'a-vi ke ng`in p'i Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a-ng`in kha kh^oi-m`in. K`i-t^eu ngi+et-s^im th^ang fuk-y^im, tak-ngit ngi^en-kiu Su"n-k^in, oi t^i P'o-l`o s'o-k'ong ke y^u-y'ang m`o.
K`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u chhin-t^o Y`u-thai-ng`in si^ong-sin; H^i-li+ap song-li`u sa-fi ke fu-'ng l^au H^i-li+ap ke n`am-ng`in ya `m-voi s'eu.
Ch'ung-he, Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a ke Y`u-thai-ng`in yit th^ang-k'ong P'o-l`o yu chhai P'i-l^i-^a chh`on Song-ti ke tho-l^i, chhiu hi-to ke-vi chh`au-nau, san-thung chung-ng`in.
Sin-th`u chit-s`u" chhiu sung P'o-l`o hi h'oi-s`un; ch'ung-he S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai li`u chhai P'i-l^i-^a.

Sung P'o-l`o ke ng`in chh+u"t-chh+u"t sung k`i to Ng^a-ti'en, y`en-heu chang to-ch'on P'i-l^i-^a; k`i-t^eu tai-ch'on P'o-l`o ke f^un-fu, ham S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai k'on-k'in hi k`i ke-vi, th`ung k`i kien-mien.
P'o-l`o chhai Ng^a-ti'en t'en S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai ke s`u", khon-t'o m^an s`ang ke ngi'eu-siong, s^im-k^on f^i-s`ong k^an-kh'u.
S'o-y^i, k`i chhai fi-th`ong th`ung Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au kin-pai Song-ti ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in phien-lun, tak-ngit ya chhai ki^e-hong ke k'ong-chh`ong th`ung s'o t`u-t'o ke ng`in phien-lun.

Y^u-t^eu Y^i-piak-ki^eu-l^u-phai l^au S^u"-t^o-^a-phai ke chat-h+ok-k^a ya l`oi th`ung k`i phien-lun. Y^u-t^eu k'ong: "Li'a h^am-chh^e-k'u to-t'ai chhot m'a-ke p'a-hi?" Ya y^u-t^eu k'ong: "K`i chhiong-he chh`on ngoi-koet ke s`u"n-m`in." K`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he y^in-vi P'o-l`o chh`on Y^a-s^u l^au k`i f+uk-f+at ke fuk-y^im.
K`i-t^eu chhiu tai P'o-l`o to ^A-li+ok-p^a-k'u ke ngi-fi hi, k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet t^i ng`i s'o k'ong ke s^in tho-l^i m`o?
Y^u-t^eu su"-chh`in ng`ai-t^eu th^ang-h'i-l`oi k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, si'ong-oi t^i to-t'ai he m'a-ke yi-su"."
(Ngi`en-l`oi Ng^a-ti'en-ng`in l^au s'o-y^u l`oi h+et chhai ke-vi ke ngoi-koet-ng`in, chhi`on-phu chhin-hau k^ui-ngit k'ong s^in-v`un th^ang s^eu-sit.)
P'o-l`o kh^i chhai ^A-li+ok-p^a-k'u ngi-fi ch^ung k'ong: " Ng^a-ti'en-ng`in ^a! Ng`ai khon ng`i-t^eu tak-yong su" t^u hi'en-chhut tui ch^ung-kau ke ngi+et-s`u"n.

Ng`ai chhai s`ang-t'u si-vi h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi, khon ng`i-t^eu pai-s`u"n ke s'o-chhai, fat-hien y^u yit-chho chi-th`an, t'ang-k^o khat-t'en 'Hien p^un `m-su"t ke S`u"n'. Ng`i-t^eu s'o kin-pai `m-su"t ke S`u"n, ng`ai li'a-ha oi k'ong p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i.
K`i he chh'ong-chho y'i-chhiu l^au kh`i-ch^ung van-v+ut ke Song-ti; K`i ki-y`en he thi^en-thi ke Ch'u, chhiu `m h+et chhai ng`in s'u s'o h'i ke meu,
ya m`o s^i-yeu ng`in yung m'a-ke l`oi su"-fung K`i; f'an-ch'on he K`i chhu"-k^a chi^ong s^ang-miang, kh^ung-hi, l^au van-v+ut su-p^un ng`in-lui.
K`i tui yit-ke ng`in chho-chhut van-chh+uk, s'u" k`i-t^eu f^un-san h+et chhai chhi`on-thi, yu yi-thin k`i-t^eu ke ngi`en-han l^au s'o h+et ke thi-kie.
K`i 'an-ngi`ong cho he oi k`i-t^eu chh`im Song-ti, f+et-ch'a chhiu voi tui 'an-ngi`ong l`oi th'i-ngiam-t'o K`i. Kh`i-s+u"t, Song-ti th`ung ng`ai-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in l`i m`o k'i-y'en.

Y^u ng`in k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu ke s^en-f+at, h`ang-thung, s^en-chh`un chhi`on-phu chhai K`i ke s'u-ch^ung.' Yu chhiong ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m^eu-yit-ke s^u"-ng`in k'ong ke: 'Ng`ai-t^eu ya he K`i ke ch'u"-'ng.'

Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu m`o yin-k^oi l'au-t'o Song-ti ke s`u"n-sin chhiong ng`in yung s'u-ngi l^au s^im-s^u" s'o khat ke k^im-ngi`un ya-he s+ak-th`eu ngi'eu-siong.
T^ong ng`in-lui m'ung-t'ung m`o chu"-su"t ke s`u", Song-ti pin `m-oi ch^ui-kiu; ch'ung-he li'a-ha K`i min-lin chhi`on ng`in-lui oi l`i-kh^oi si`a-ok ke lu, k^ui-hiong K`i.

Y^in-vi K`i y'i-k^in thin ngit-`e, oi th^ung-ko K`i s'o sat-l+ip ke yit-ke ng`in, yung k^ung-ngi l`oi s'u"m-phan chhi`on su"-kie. K`i s'u" li'a-ke ng`in tui s'i f+uk-f+at, chhiu-he chi^ong chu"n-k'i p^un chhi`on ng`in-lui khon."
Th^ang-t'o P'o-l`o k'ong-h'i s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke su", y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiu seu k`i; ya y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu h^i-mong chai th^ang ng`i k'ong li'a-khien su"."
S'o-y^i, P'o-l`o l`i-kh^oi ngi-fi.

Y^u-t^eu ng`in sun-chhi`ung k`i, s`ang-cho sin-th`u; kh`i-ch^ung y^u ^A-li+ok-p^a-k'u ke ngi-y`en Ti^u-n`i-si^u, yu y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Thai-m^a-l^i ke fu-ng`in-k^a, nang-ngoi h`an-y^u yit-t^eu ng`in.
Li'a su" y^i-heu, P'o-l`o l`i-kh^oi Ng^a-ti'en, l`oi-to K^o-l`im-t^o.

K`i chhai ke-vi t`u-t'o yit-ke chhai P'un-t^u chhut-se ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to ^A-k^i-l^a, th`ung ki^a p^u-ngi`ong Pak-k^i-l^a chui-khiun chang tui Yi-thai-li l`oi, y^in-vi F`ong-ti Khiet-l`o-thi min-lin s'o-y^u Y`u-thai-ng`in l`i-kh^oi L`o-m^a. P'o-l`o chhiu hi khon k`i-t^eu.
K`i li`u-h^a-l`oi th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha cho-se, y^in-vi P'o-l`o he kho chu"-chho chong-ph`ung s^en-f+at ke, l^au k`i-t^eu he th`ung-ngi+ap.
M^i-yit-ke ^On-sit-ngit, P'o-l`o chhiu hi fi-th`ong, l^au ng`in phien-lun, khien Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au H^i-li+ap-ng`in sin Ch'u.
S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai tui M^a-kh`i-tun l`oi-to ke s`u", P'o-l`o chhiu yung chhi`on-phu ke s`u"-ki^en chh`on-tho, tui Y`u-thai-ng`in kien-chu"n Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk.

Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu f'an-tui k`i, f'i-pong k`i ke s`u", k`i chhiu ph+at-thet s^am t'ang-k^o ke n`ai-f'un, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu na-he m+et-m`ong, l^au ng`ai m`o k^on-s+ap, ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a oi fu-chit! Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`ai oi hi Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke-vi."
P'o-l`o chhiu l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, hi h+et chhai yit-ke kin-vi Song-ti, mi`ang ^on-to Th`i-t^o-Y`u-su"-t^u ke ng`in vuk-h^a, ki^a vuk-h^a chhai fi-th`ong kak-piak.
Fi-th`ong ke ch'u-k'on K^i-li-s^u"-pu l^au k`i chhi`on k^a-ng`in sin-li'au Ch'u; h`an-y^u chhin-t^o K^o-l`im-t^o-ng`in th^ang-t'o fuk-y^im heu ya sin, pin chiap-su s'e-l^i.
Y^u yit am-p^u, P'o-l`o tet-t'o yit-ke yi-siong. Ch'u chhai yi-siong ch^ung tui k`i k'ong: "`M-s'u" ki^ang, cho ng`i k'ong, `m-h'o ti^am-ti^am,
y^u Ng`ai l^au ng`i th`ung-chhai, m`o-ng`in n`en hoi ng`i, y^in-vi chhai li'a s`ang-t'u Ng`ai h`an-y^u chhin-t^o ke ch'u"-m`in."
P'o-l`o chhiu chhai ke-vi h+et yit-ngi`en-pan, yung Song-ti ke tho k^au k`i-t^eu.
T^ong K^a-li`u chiap-ngim cho ^A-k^ai-^a ch'ung-tuk ke s`u", Y`u-thai-ng`in li`en-h+ap h'i-l`oi k^ung-kit P'o-l`o, l^ai k`i s^ong fap-yen,
