ko k`i k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in k^au-s^o ph+et-ng`in yung m`o h+ap-fap ke f^ong-su"t kin-pai Song-ti!"

P'o-l`o chang si'ong-oi kh^oi-khi'eu, K^a-li`u chhiu tui Y`u-thai-ng`in k'ong: "Li'a na-he yit-khien y^en-v'ong ya-he fam-fap ke su", ng`i li'a-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in ^a, ng`ai t^ong-y`en oi nai-s^im th^ang ng`i-t^eu;
ki-y`en s'o ch^en-lun ke he y^u-ko^an yung-su", mi`ang-muk l^au ng`i-t^eu ke fap-l+it, oi khang su"-ngi'en ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a hi ki'e-kiet. Ng`ai `m-oi s'u"m-phan li'a-ch'ung ke su"!"
K`i chhiu chi^ong k`i-t^eu kiuk-chhut fap-yen.
Chung-ng`in chhiu khi'u-t'en fi-th`ong ke ch'u-k'on S'o-th`i-n`i, chhai fap-yen chhi`en t'a k`i. Li'a-ke su", K^a-li`u ya `m k'on.

P'o-l`o chhai K^o-l`im-t^o th`ung sin-th`u yu khiung-ha h+et h'o-t^o ngit-`e, y`en-heu chang l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, th`ung Pak-k^i-l^a l^au ^A-k^i-l^a khiung-ha chh^o-s`on hiong Si-li-^a hi. Chhut-fat y^i-chhi`en, k`i chhai Ki^en-kiet-l^i chi^ong th`eu-n`a-m^o chi'en-thet, y^in-vi k`i su"t h'i-ngien.
To Y^i-fut-s'o, P'o-l`o chhiu chi^ong Pak-k^i-l^a l^au ^A-k^i-l^a li`u chhai ke-vi. K`i chhu"-k^a ng+ip-hi fi-th`ong l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in phien-lun.
Thai-k^a chhi'ang k`i li`u-h^a-l`oi h+et k^a k'i-ngit, ch'ung-he P'o-l`o `m h'en.
L`i-ph+et ke s`u", k`i l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Na-he Song-ti ke yi-su", ng`ai voi to-ch'on-l`oi ng`i-t^eu li'a-vi." S'o-y^i, P'o-l`o yu chh^o-s`on l`i-kh^oi Y^i-fut-s'o.
P'o-l`o yit-to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, chhiu s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi l^au kau-fi chhi'ang-^on, y`en-heu hi ^On-th`i-^a,
chhai ke-vi h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en chang l`i-kh^oi. K`i h`ang-phien K^a-l^a-thai l^au Fut-l^i-k^a, tak s'o-chhai ki^en-ku sin-th`u ke sin-s^im.
Y^u yit-ke Y`u-thai-ng`in mi`ang ^on-to ^A-p^o-l`o, l`oi-to Y^i-fut-s'o. K`i chhai ^A-l+it-s^an-thai chhut-se, he yit-ke y^u h+ok-mun ke ng`in, tui Su"n-k^in y^u f^i-s`ong chh^u"m ke li'au-ki'e.

Y^u-ko^an Ch'u ke Tho, k`i su"t su si^ong-t^ong t^o ke hiun-lien. K`i chhin ngi+et-s^im, s`ong-s`ong k^au-ng`in ko^an-he Y^a-s^u ke su", k'ong-to chhin si`ong-se. Ch'ung-he, k`i t^an-chhiang t^i Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i thin-thin.

K`i kh^oi-s'u" hi fi-th`ong h'o-t'am k'ong-tho; Pak-k^i-l^a l^au ^A-k^i-l^a th^ang-t'o, chhiu chhi'ang k`i hi k`i-t^eu vuk-h^a, chi^ong Song-ti ke Tho kien-k^a chu"n-khok l`oi k'ong-ki'e p^un k`i th^ang.

Heu-l`oi, ^A-p^o-l`o kiet-thin oi hi ^A-k^ai-^a, Y^i-fut-s'o ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi chhiu k'u-li k`i, yu si'a sin-'e p^un ^A-k^ai-^a ke sin-th`u, chhi'ang k`i-t^eu chiap-thai k`i. K`i hi-to ke-vi, tui ke-t^eu m`ung-^en sin Ch'u ke ng`in p^ong-chhu chhin thai.
K`i s`ong-s`ong chhai k^ung-kh^oi ke phien-lun ch^ung chhin-y^u n`en-l+it l`oi pok-t'o Y`u-thai-ng`in, k^in-k'i Su"n-k^in chu"n-m`in Y^a-s^u he K^i-tuk.
^A-p^o-l`o chhai K^o-l`im-t^o ke s`u", P'o-l`o l^i-h`ang k^in-ko nui-thi l`oi-to Y^i-fut-s'o. Chhai ke-vi, k`i t`u-t'o yit-t^eu sin-th`u,
chhiu mun k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu sin Ch'u ke s`u", y^u li^ang-su Su"n-L`in m`o?" K`i-t^eu en-k'ong: "M`o, li`en m'a-ke he Su"n-L`in ng`ai-t^eu ya `m su"t th^ang-ko."
P'o-l`o yu mun: "'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu s'o li^ang ke he m'a-ke s'e-l^i?" K`i-t^eu k'ong: "He Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i."
P'o-l`o k'ong: " Yok-hon ke s'e-l^i he vi ke-t^eu f'i-k'oi ke ng`in h`ang ke; k`i l^au Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in k'ong, oi sin ke chhai k`i y^i-heu oi l`oi ke, chhiu-he Y^a-s^u."
K`i-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang li^ang s'e-l^i.
P'o-l`o vi k`i-t^eu on-s'u, Su"n-L`in kong chhai k`i-t^eu s^u"n-song; k`i-t^eu chhiu k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, yu si^en-pu Song-ti ke fa.
K`i-t^eu yit-khiung yok-y^u s+u"p-ngi-ke ng`in.
Li`en-t'en s^am-chak ngi+et, P'o-l`o cheu-s`ong hi-to fi-th`ong, thai-t'am k'ong-tho, l^au ng`in phien-lun Song-ti koet ke su", khien ng`in si^ong-sin.

K`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in ngang-ki'ang `m h'en sin, chhai fi-chung mien-chhi`en f'i-pong Ch'u ke Tho. S'o-y^i P'o-l`o tai-t'en sin-th`u l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, tak-ngit chhai Th^ui-l^a-n`u k'ong-th`ong l^au ng`in th'o-lun.
'An-ngi`ong ki-si+uk k^ung-chok li'ong-ngi`en ki'u, s'o-y^i h+et chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en ke ng`in, m`o-lun Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, chhi`on-phu th^ang-ko Ch'u ke tho-l^i.
Song-ti th^ung-ko P'o-l`o h`ang yit-t^eu f^i-s`ong h^i-kh`i ke s`u"n-chiak;

su"m-chu" y^u-ng`in n^a k`i yung-ko ke s'u-k^in ya-he v`i-s^u"n-khi`un hi piong chhai phiang-ng`in ke s^u"n-song, ya voi s'u" phiang-thung s^eu-chh`u, s'u" si`a-l`in tui s'o fu-s^u"n ke ng`in s^u"n-song chhut-l`oi.

Y^u-t^eu tak s'o-chhai hi chok-fap kiuk-k'ui ke Y`u-thai-ng`in ya si'ong-oi chia Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang l`oi h`ang li'a-ke su". K`i-t^eu tui si`a-l`in k'ong: "Ng`ai fung P'o-l`o s'o chh`on ke Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang, min-lin ng`i-t^eu chhut-l`oi."
H`ang li'a-su" ke ng`in he Y`u-thai chi-s^u"-ch'ong Su"-k^i-ng'a ke chhit-ke lai-'e.
Ch'ung-he, si`a-l`in en k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`ai su"t Y^a-s^u, P'o-l`o ng`ai ya t^i; ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu he m'a-ng`in?"
Ke p^un si`a-l`in fu-s^u"n ke ng`in chhiu thiau-to k`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-song l`oi chu"-f+uk k`i-t^eu. K`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung su-s^ong, chhak-s^u"n lu-th'i, tui ke vuk-t'u th`o-ch'eu chhut-hi.
S'o-y^u h+et chhai Y^i-fut-s'o ke Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in th^ang-t'o li'a-khien su", chhi`on-phu chhin chh+ok-ki^ang; Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang tui ke-s`u" kien-k^a su-ng`in ch^un-chhung.
Y^u chhin-t^o sin-th`u chhiu chi^ong k`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai cho-ko ke su" k^ung-kh^oi s`u"n-ngin chhut-l`oi.

Chhin-t^o h`ang si`a-s+ut ke ng`in tai k`i-t^eu ke s^u l`oi, t^oi-cho yit-t^oi, t^ong-chung piong-f'o s^eu. K`i-t^eu son li'a-t^eu s^u ke ka-chhi`en, ch'ung-khiung thai-yok 'ng-van chak ngi`un-chhi`en.
Y^in-vi li'a-t^eu su", Ch'u ke tho-l^i m^an-phien chh`on-kh^oi, ngit-ngit h^in-vong.
Li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in ko-thet, P'o-l`o kiet-thin oi k^in-ko M^a-kh`i-tun l^au ^A-k^ai-^a hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang. K`i k'ong: "To ke-vi y^i-heu, ng`ai ya yit-thin oi hi L`o-m^a f'ong-mun."
S'o-y^i k`i phai k`i li'ong-ke chhu-s'u Th`i-m^o-thai l^au Y^i-l^a-t^u hi M^a-kh`i-tun; k`i chhu"-k^a chhiam-s`u" li`u chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en.
Chhiu chhai ke-s`u", y^in-vi Ch'u ke Tho, Y^i-fut-s'o fat-s^en yit-khien ngi`am-chhung ke thung-lon.
Y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to T'i-m'i-ti^u ke ngi`un-siong, k`i he yung ngi`un chu"-chho ^A-t'i-m'i 'ng-s`u"n-meu m`u-h`in ke ng`in; li'a-ch'ung th`eu-lu s'u" chhin-t^o s^u"-fu thai chhon-chhi`en.
T'i-m'i-ti^u seu-s+ip li'a-t^eu k^ung-ng`in l^au s'o-y^u ke th`ung-ngi+ap, tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Kok-vi, ng`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai-t^eu he kho li'a th`eu-lu chhon-chhi`en ke.

Li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o ya th^ang-t'o li'a-chak P'o-l`o chhai ke-vi cho m'a-ke. K`i k'ong: 'Ng`in-s'u s'o-cho ke s`u"n-siong `m-he s`u"n-m`in!' K`i y'i-k^in hoi chhin-t^o chhai Y^i-fut-s'o l^au chh^a-`m-t^o chhi`on ^A-se-^a-s'en ke ng`in su m`i-f+et.

Cheu 'an-ngi`ong khon, ng`ai-t^eu ke th`eu-lu voi y^u p^un-ng`in khon-khi^ang ke ng`ui-hi'am. `M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, li`en thai 'ng-s`u"n ^A-t'i-m'i ke meu ya voi p^un-ng`in m'eu-su", chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en l^au ph^u-thi^en-ha su ng`in kin-pai ke 'ng-s`u"n ke ch^un-y`ung ya voi su-t'o pho-fai!"
Chung-ng`in yit th^ang-t'o li'a-t^eu fa chhiu f^i-s`ong khi'en, thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " Y^i-fut-s'o-ng`in ke ^A-t'i-m'i he chui v'i-thai ke!"

Tui 'an-ngi`ong, phau-thung chhe-to chhi`on-s`ang. Phau-m`in chok-t'o th`en P'o-l`o khiung-ha l`oi ke M^a-kh`i-tun-ng`in K^ai-y`u l^au ^A-l^i-th+at-k'u, l^ai-t'en k`i li'ong-s`a chhong-ng+ip hi-yen-t'u.
P'o-l`o si'ong-oi hi chung-ng`in ke th`eu-chhi`en, ch'ung-he ke-t^eu sin-th`u `m p^un k`i ng+ip-hi.
H`an-y^u ^A-se-^a-s'en ke k'i-ke li^ang-chhiu, he P'o-l`o ke ph`en-y^u, ya ham ng`in hi khien P'o-l`o, `m-h'o mo-hi'am ng+ip-hi hi-yen-t'u.
Li'a-s`u", chhi`on-chh`ong lon chh`au-chh`au, y^u-t^eu h^em t^ung, y^u-t^eu h^em s^i, thai-phu-fun `m-t^i k`i-t^eu he vi m'a-ke l`oi ke-vi chhi-s+ip.

Y`u-thai-ng`in chi^ong ^A-l+it-s^an-thai s'ung-to th`eu-chhi`en hi, y^u-t^eu ng`in chhiu ngin-v`i k`i yin-k^oi vi li'a-khien su" fu chit-ngim. ^A-l+it-s^an-thai p'i s'u-se, oi tui chung-ng`in k'ong-fa l`oi s^u"n-su.

Ch'ung-he, thai-k^a yit ngin-chhut k`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in, chhiu th`ung-s^ang chhin h^em k'ong: " Y^i-fut-s'o-ng`in ke ^A-t'i-m'i he chui v'i-thai ke!" 'An-ngi`ong k'in h^em thai-yok y^u li'ong-ti'am-ch^ung ki'u.

Chui-heu, ke s`ang-t'u ke s^u-ki-k^on chang s'u" chung-ng`in ti^am-h^a-l`oi. K`i k'ong: " Y^i-fut-s'o-ng`in ^a! M'a-ng`in `m-t^i Y^i-fut-s'o-s`ang he khon-s'u thai ^A-t'i-m'i 'ng-s`u"n-meu l^au ke-chak tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi ke su"n-s+ak n`e!
Ki-y`en m`o-ng`in n`en f'eu-ngin li'a-t^eu su", ng`i-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi ti^am-ti^am, `m-h'o lon-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong li'a-t^eu ng`in tai-to li'a-vi l`oi, ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu pin m`o th^eu meu t^i-poi ke t^ung-s^i, ya m`o siet-th+uk ng`ai-t^eu ke 'ng-s`u"n.
Na-he T'i-m'i-ti^u l^au k`i ke th`ung-ngi+ap oi ko m'a-ng`in, chhu"-y^u k^ui-thin kh^oi-th`in ke ngit-`e l^au th^ang-siung ke k^on-ch'ong, k`i-t^eu cho-tet hi tui-chu"t.
Na-he y^u kh`i-th^a ke su", ya cho-tet chhai h+ap-fap ke fi-ngi ch^ung ki'e-kiet.
Chhiong k^im-p^u-ngit ke phau-thung, ng`ai-t^eu n`an-mi^en voi p^un-ng`in ch^ui-kiu chit-ngim. Li'a yit-chhiet ke y'eu-lon he `m-chh+ok ke, ng`ai-t^eu chhu"-k^a ya k'ong `m-chhut m'a-ke l^i-y`u."
K'ong li'a-t^eu fa y^i-heu, k`i chhiu ham chung-ng`in san-fi.
Phau-thung th`in h^a-l`oi heu, P'o-l`o seu-s+ip sin-th`u, k'u-li k`i-t^eu, ya th`ung k`i-t^eu chh`u"-ph+et. Y`en-heu, k`i l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, hi M^a-kh`i-tun.
K`i h`ang-phien ke-t^eu s'o-chhai, tui sin-th`u k'ong chhin-t^o k'u-li ke fa, y`en-heu hi-to H^i-li+ap,
chhai ke-vi h+et s^am-chak ngi+et. P'o-l`o ch'un-phi chh^o-s`on hi Si-li-^a ke s`u", fat-hien Y`u-thai-ng`in oi m`eu-hoi k`i, s'o-y^i kiet-thin tui M^a-kh`i-tun ke-thi`au lu ch'on-hi.

Th`ung k`i khiung-ha h`ang ke ng`in y^u P'i-l^i-^a-ng`in Pit-l`o-s^u" ke lai-'e S'o-p^a-th+it, Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a-ng`in ^A-l^i-th+at-k'u l^au S^i-k^ung-t^u, Th+it-p'i-ng`in K^ai-y`u, h`an-y^u Th`i-m^o-thai, pin ^A-se-^a-ng`in Th^ui-k^i-k'u l^au Th+it-l`o-f^i-m^o.
K`i-t^eu k^ui-chhu"n si^en h`ang, chhai Th+it-l`o-^a t'en ng`ai-t^eu.
Ko-li'au Chh`u-kau-chiet, ng`ai-t^eu tui F^i-l+ip-p'i kh^oi-s`on, 'ng-ngit heu to Th+it-l`o-^a, th`ung k`i-t^eu fi-h+ap, chhai ke-vi h+et yit l^i-pai.
Pai-liuk am-p^u, ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha chhi-fi, f^un-hi'ong oi ke y`en-s+it. P'o-l`o y^in-vi thi-ngi-ngit oi chhut-fat, chhiu tui thai-k^a k'ong-tho, yit-chh+u"t k'ong-to pan-ya.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai l`eu-t'ang ke f`ong-ki^en chhi-fi, y^u ti'am h'o-t^o ke t^en-f'o.

Y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Y`u-th^ui-k'u ke heu-s^ang-ng`in chh^o chhai chh^ung-m`un-hong, P'o-l`o k'ong-tho k'ong chhin ki'u, k`i k'in-l`oi k'in si'ong-oi soi, heu-l`oi chhiu soi-l+ok-kau, tui s^am-chh`en l`eu-t'ang tiet-h^a-hi. Thai-k^a f`u k`i hong-h'i-l`oi, khon-t'o k`i y'i-k^in s'i-thet.
P'o-l`o h^a-l`eu, ph+uk chhai k`i ke s^u"n-song, n'am-t'en k`i, k'ong: "`M-s'u" k'in-ch^ong, k`i h`an-y^u sin-miang!"
K`i yu s^ong l`eu-t'ang hi, pak-pi'ang l`oi s+u"t. K`i ki-si+uk th`am-lun chhin ki'u, to thi^en-k^ong chang l`i-kh^oi.
K`i-t^eu chi^ong ke heu-s^ang-ng`in s^ang-s^ang sung-ch'on ki^a vuk-h^a, thai-k^a chhiu thai su ^on-v'i.
Ng`ai-t^eu si^en s^ong-s`on, s'u"-hi ^A-sok, ch'un-phi chhai ke-vi chiap P'o-l`o. Li'a he k`i s'o ^on-ph`ai ke, y^in-vi k`i chhu"-k^a oi h`ang-lu hi.
K`i chhai ^A-sok th`ung ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-fi, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu chiap k`i s^ong-s`on, y`en-heu hiong M'i-th^ui-li-n`i chhut-fat.
Ng`ai-t^eu yu tui ke-vi kh^oi-s`on, thi-ngi-ngit to K^i-^a ke tui-ngan; yu ko yit-ngit, chhai Sat-m^o th`in-s`on, chai ko yit-ngit to M'i-li-t^u.

P'o-l`o ch'o chhiu kiet-thin `m th`in chhai Y^i-fut-s'o, mi^en-tet chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en y`en-chh`an s`u"-ki^en. K`i k'on-k'in oi hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, h^i-mong chhin-liong chhai 'Ng-s`un-chiet chhi`en k'on-to.
P'o-l`o tui M'i-li-t^u phai-ng`in hi-chh`im Y^i-fut-s'o kau-fi ke ch'ong-l'o, chhi'ang k`i-t^eu l`oi-kien k`i.
K`i-t^eu l`oi-to, P'o-l`o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai to ^A-se-^a-s'en ke thi-yit-ngit kh^oi-s'u", yit-chh+u"t ngi'ong-p^an th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha,
ng`ai su"-fung Ch'u ke s`u"-chiet, f`am-su" khi^am-p^i, s`ong-s`ong li`u muk-chu"p, yu y^in-vi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ham-hoi, k^in-l+it chhin-t^o m`o-lien.
Ng`i-t^eu ya t^i, m`o-lun chhai chung-ng`in mien-chhi`en, ya-he chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-ng`in vuk-h^a, ng`ai chh`on, ng`ai k^au ke s`u", f`am he tui ng`i-t^eu y^u li-yit ke, ng`ai chhiu m`o p'o-li`u.
M`o-lun tui Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, ng`ai l^ung-ch'ung ngin-ch^u"n khien k`i-t^eu, oi l`i-kh^oi chhui-ok, ch'on-hiong Song-ti, sin ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u.
Li'a-ha, vi-t'o sun-f+uk Su"n-L`in, ng`ai oi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi. Ng`ai `m-t^i chhai ke-vi voi t`u-t'o m'a-ke su";
ng`ai ch'u"-y^u t^i, Su"n-L`in chhai tak-ke s`ang-su" ch'u"-su" ng`ai, y^u k^am-ngi+uk l^au ch^ai-nan t'en-t'en ng`ai.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai s'o ko^an-s^im ke, pin `m-he chhu"-k^a ke s^ang-miang, ch'u"-y^u chhi`on-s^im v`an-s`u"n ng`ai ke s'u"-min, s`u"n-chhiu Ch'u Y^a-s^u s'o k^au-p^un ng`ai ke k^ung-chok, chhiu-he vi Song-ti ^en-ti'en ke fuk-y^im cho kien-chu"n.
"Ng`ai chhai kok-vi t^ong-ch^ung th`ung thai-k^a khiung-ha chhut-ng+ip l`oi-v^ong, si^en-chh`on Song-ti ke koet. Li'a-ha ng`ai t^i, ng`i-t^eu y^i-heu m`o fap-thu chai kien-t'o ng`ai.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai k^im-p^u-ngit chu"n-su"t l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, na-he ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u ng`in chh`u"m-l`un, `m-he ng`ai ke chhui;
y^in-vi ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu, v`an-chhi`on m`o p'o-li`u.

Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a oi se-ngi, ya oi vi Su"n-L`in s'o k^au-thok ng`i-t^eu cheu-ku ke chhi`on-khi`un l`oi se-ngi. Oi m+uk-y^ong Song-ti ke kau-fi, chhiu-he K`i th^ung-ko chhu"-k^a Lai-'e ke s'i s'o kiu-s+uk ke.
Ng`ai t^i, ng`ai l`i-kh^oi y^i-heu, voi y^u hi^ung-ok ke s`ai-l`ong fun-ng+ip ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en l`oi s^ong-hoi y`ong-khi`un.
Chhiu-he chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en, ya y^u ng`in voi k'ong f^a-li^au, oi m`i-f+et sin-th`u hi th`en k`i-t^eu.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang! Oi ki-tet chhai ko-hi ke s^am-ngi`en ch^ung, ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an ngit-ya yung muk-chu"p khien-va, kau-th^o ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in.

"Li'a-ha, ng`ai chi^ong ng`i-t^eu k^au chhai Song-ti ke s'u l^au K`i ^en-ti'en ke tho-l^i t^i-poi. Li'a tho-l^i voi ki^en-thin ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im, yu s'u" ng`i-t^eu s`u"n-chiap Song-ti vi K`i s'o-y^u ke su"n-th`u s'o ch'un-phi ke fuk-hi.
Ng`ai chhi`ung-l`oi `m su"t th^am m'a-ng`in ke k^im-ngi`un ya-he s^am-fu.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai yung li'a-s^ung s'u cho-se l`oi ki^ung-kip ng`ai l^au th`ung-k^ung ke s^i-yeu.

Ng`ai f`am-su" cho ng`i-t^eu ke m`u-fam, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i, yin-t^ong 'an-ngi`ong ngin-ch^u"n cho-se l`oi p^ong-chhu ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in. Oi ki-tet Ch'u Y^a-s^u chh^in-s^u"n k'ong-ko ke fa: 'P^un-ng`in p'i li^ang-su kha y^u fuk-hi.' "
K'ong li'a-t^eu fa y^i-heu, P'o-l`o chhiu l^au k`i-t^eu chhi`on-th'i kh'ui h^a-l`oi kh`i-t'o.
Chung-ng`in thai-kieu, n'am-t'en k`i, ch^im k`i l`oi chh`u"-ph+et.
K`i-t^eu f^i-s`ong s^ong-s^im, y^in-vi P'o-l`o k'ong, y^i-heu m`o fap-thu chai kien-t'o k`i. K`i-t^eu chhiu sung k`i s^ong-s`on.
Ng`ai-t^eu l`i-kh^oi chung-ng`in, chhiu kh^oi-s`on chh+u"t-chh+u"t hi K^o-su"-t'o. Thi-ngi-ngit to L`o-t'i, yu tui ke-vi hi-to Pha-thai-l^a.
Chhai Pha-thai-l^a t`u-t'o yit-chak oi hi F^i-n`i-k^i ke s`on, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu s^ong-s`on chhut-fat.
S'u"-to y^u khon-t'o Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u", s`on chhiu tui n`am-phi'en h`ang-ko, hiong Si-li-^a hi. Ng`ai-t^eu chhai Thai-ng`i s^ong-li+uk, y^in-vi s`on oi chhai li'a-vi h^a-fo.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-vi chh`im-t'o yit-t^eu sin-th`u, chhiu th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et chhit-ngit. K`i-t^eu tet-t'o Su"n-L`in ke ch'u"-su", khien P'o-l`o `m-h'o s^ong-hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.

Ch'ung-he, th`in-th`o k'i-ngit heu, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he ki-si+uk ngi`en-l`oi ke l^i-chh`ang. Ke-t^eu sin-th`u l^au k`i-t^eu ke p^u-ngi`ong ch'u"-'ng chhi`on-phu sung ng`ai-t^eu to s`ang-ngoi. Thai-k^a chhai s^a-th^an kh'ui h^a-l`oi kh`i-t'o.
P'i-chh'u" chh`u"-ph+et y^i-heu, ng`ai-t^eu s^ong-s`on, k`i-t^eu chhiu ch'on-hi vuk-h^a.
Ng`ai-t^eu ki-si+uk hiong chhi`en, tui Thai-ng`i to T^o-li-m^ai, hiong ke-vi ke sin-th`u chhi'ang-^on, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et yit-ngit.

Thi-ngi-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ke-vi, hi-to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, chhiu hi chh`on-tho-ng`in F^i-li ke vuk-h^a, h+et chhai ke-vi. K`i he chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang p^un-ng`in si'en-chhut chhit-ke chu"p-su" ch^ung ke yit-ke.
K`i y^u si-ke m`ang chhut-ka ke moi-'e, chhi`on-phu y^u k'ong yi-ngi`en ke ^en-su.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai ke-vi h+et k'i-ngit heu, y^u yit-ke si^en-t^i mi`ang ^on-to ^A-k^a-pu, tui Y`u-thai-s'en l`oi.

K`i l`oi khon ng`ai-t^eu, n^a P'o-l`o ke y^eu-tai, thak-t'en chhu"-k^a ke s'u-kiok, k'ong: "Su"n-L`in 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: 'Li'a y^eu-tai ke ch'u-ng`in voi chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in chhiong 'an-ngi`ong thak-h'i-l`oi, k^au-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.' "
Ng`ai-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu l^au t^ong-thi ke ng`in khiung-ha khien P'o-l`o m+ok hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.

Ch'ung-he, k`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke kieu-to 'an-ngi`ong, hoi ng`ai s^ong-s^im? Ng`ai vi-t'o Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang, m+ok k'ong chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang p^un-ng`in thak-h'i-l`oi, chhiu-he s'i chhai ke-vi, ng`ai ya k^am-ngien."
Ng`ai-t^eu m`o fap-thu khien-f+uk k`i, chhiu ti^am-h^a-l`oi, ch'u"-y^u k'ong: "Ngien Ch'u ke ch'u"-yi tet-t'o s`u"n-chhiu."
Chhai ke-vi h+et k'i-ngit heu, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu t'a p^au-f+uk, s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi.
Y^u-t^eu tui Kh'ai-sat-li-^a l`oi ke sin-th`u th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha hi, tai ng`ai-t^eu hi yit-ke Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u"-ng`in N^a-s^un ke vuk-h^a h+et; k`i s`ang-cho sin-th`u y'i-k^in chhin ki'u.
Ng`ai-t^eu to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, sin-th`u f^on-f^on h'i-h'i chiap-thai ng`ai-t^eu.
Thi-ngi-ngit, P'o-l`o th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha hi kien Ng^a-kok; kau-fi s'o-y^u ke ch'ong-l'o ya chhai-chh`ong.
P'o-l`o tui k`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on, y`en-heu chi^ong Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an yung k`i chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en s'o-cho yit-chhiet ke su" chhi`on-phu tui k`i-t^eu po-ko.

K`i-t^eu th^ang-li'au chhiu siung-chan Song-ti, y`en-heu tui P'o-l`o k'ong: "Hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`i khon, chh`in-h`in he 'an-ngi`ong: Y`u-thai-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en y^u k'i-h^a-van ng`in sin Ch'u, l^ung-ch'ung ya ngi+et-s^im ch^un-s'u M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it.

K`i-t^eu th^ang-k'ong, ng`i kau-hiun s'o-y^u h+et chhai ngoi-p^ang ke Y`u-thai-ng`in piong-thet M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, ham k`i-t^eu m+ok l^au se-ng`in-`e h`ang kot-l^i, ya `m-s'u" ch^un-s'u Y`u-thai-ng`in ke k^ui-k'i.
K`i-t^eu yit-thin voi th^ang-t'o ng`i y'i-k^in l`oi li'a-vi ke s^eu-sit; ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`o?
Li'a-ha, chhi'ang ng`i cheu ng`ai-t^eu ke fa hi cho! Li'a-vi y^u si-ke ng`in su"t h'i-ngien.

Ng`i oi tai-t'en k`i-t^eu, th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi chiap-su kiet-chhiang-l^i, thoi k`i-t^eu n+ap kiet-chhiang-l^i ke s'o-fi; 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu chhiu cho-tet chi^ong th`eu-n`a-m^o chi'en-thet. Ng`i 'an-ngi`ong cho, thai-k^a chhiu voi t^i k`i-t^eu s'o th^ang-t'o ko^an-he ng`i ke su" `m-he su"-s+u"t, ya voi t^i ng`i chhu"-k^a ya he ch^un-s'u M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke ng`in.

Ko^an-he sin Ch'u ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in si'a sin-'e f^un-fu k`i-t^eu, `m-h'o s+u"t pai-ko ngi'eu-siong ke s+u"t-v+ut, `m-h'o s+u"t hiet ya-he kh+ak-s'i ke th`eu-s^ang, ya `m-h'o h`ang y`im-lon ke su"."

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, thi-ngi-ngit P'o-l`o chhiu tai-t'en ke-t^eu ng`in, khiung-ha hi h`ang kiet-chhiang-l^i. K`i to su"n-thien hi po-ko kiet-chhiang kh`i-m^an ke ngit-`e, chhiu-he chi-s^u" oi vi k`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in hien-chi ke-ngit.
Chhit-ngit ke kh`i-ki^en voi m^an y^i-chhi`en, y^u-t^eu tui ^A-se-^a-s'en l`oi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in khon-t'o P'o-l`o chhai su"n-thien-t'u, chhiu san-thung thai-chung hi chok P'o-l`o.

K`i-t^eu h^em-k'ong: " Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ^a, thai-k^a l`oi then-s'u! Li'a ng`in tak s'o-chhai k^au ng`in f'an-tui Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, l^au li'a su"n-thien. K`i yu tai H^i-li+ap-ng`in ng+ip su"n-thien l`oi, siet-th+uk li'a su"n ke s'o-chhai!"
(K`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he y^in-vi khon-t'o Y^i-fut-s'o-ng`in Th+it-l`o-f^i-m^o l^au P'o-l`o khiung-ha chhai s`ang-t'u, l'au-t'o P'o-l`o su"t tai k`i ng+ip-hi su"n-thien.)
Li'a-s`u", chhi`on-s`ang s^au-thung, chung-ng`in k^ui-ha ch'eu-ko-l`oi, chok-t'en P'o-l`o, chi^ong k`i tui su"n-thien-t'u l^ai chhut-hi; su"n-thien ke m`un chit-s`u" chhiu ko^an h'i-l`oi.
Phau-m`in t'u-t'u si'ong-oi chh`u" P'o-l`o ke s`u", y^u-ng`in po-ko L`o-m^a chu-ki^un ke ch'u"-f^i-k^on, k'ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang chhi`on-s`ang chhai phau-thung ch^ung.
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on ngi`am-s`u" tai-li^ang ki^un-chhui l^au k'i-ke ki^un-k^on, ch'eu-t'en hi chung-ng`in ke-vi. Phau-m`in yit khon-t'o ch'u"-f^i-k^on l^au ki^un-chhui, chhiu m`o chai-ko t'a P'o-l`o.
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on chin-chhi`en khi'u-t'en P'o-l`o, f^un-fu yung li'ong-thi`au thiet-lien-'e s'o-t'en k`i. K`i mun-k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in he m'a-ng`in? K`i cho-li'au m'a-ke su" n`o?"
Ng`in-khi`un ch^ung, y^u-ng`in h^em t^ung, y^u-ng`in h^em s^i, lon-cho yit-th`on; ch'u"-f^i-k^on m`o fap-thu chh`a-chhut ch^u"n-siong, chhiu min-lin phu-ha tai P'o-l`o ng+ip y`ang-f`ong.
P'o-l`o h`ang-t'en s^ong s+ak-kham ke s`u", y^in-vi chung-ng`in chi^am-to chhin hi^ung, p^in-'e ch'u"-y^u chi^ong P'o-l`o khi`a-t'en ko-hi.
Chung-ng`in th`en chhai heu-poi, thai-s^ang h^em: "Chh`u-thet k`i!"
Voi to y`ang-f`ong ke s`u", P'o-l`o tui ch'u"-f^i-k^on k'ong: "Ng`ai cho-tet l^au ng`i k'ong yit-ki fa m`o?" Ch'u"-f^i-k^on k'ong: "Ng`i ya voi k'ong H^i-li+ap-fa?
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i chhiu `m-he chhi`en m`o k'i-ki'u chok-lon, tai si-chhi^en-ke phau-th`u th`o-ch'eu hi kh'ong-y^a ke ^Ai-kh+ip-ng`in l^o?"
P'o-l`o en-k'ong: "Ng`ai he Y`u-thai-ng`in, chhut-se chhai K^i-li-k^a ke Thai-su, pin `m-he m`o mi`ang s'eu-s`ang ke k^ung-m`in. Chhi'ang ng`i ch'un ng`ai tui thai-chung k'ong-fa."
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on ch'un k`i. P'o-l`o chhiu kh^i chhai s+ak-kham-t'ang, tui chung-ng`in y+ak-s'u; thai-k^a ti^am-h^a-l`oi heu, P'o-l`o chhiu yung H^i-pak-l`oi-fa tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa.
P'o-l`o k'ong: "Kok-vi fu-l'o hi^ung-thi, chhi'ang th^ang ng`ai ke phien-fu."
K`i-t^eu yit th^ang-t'o P'o-l`o yung H^i-pak-l`oi-fa tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, chhiu h`an-kha ti^am. P'o-l`o ki-si+uk k'ong:

"Ng`ai he Y`u-thai-ng`in, chhut-se chhai K^i-li-k^a ke Thai-su, ch'ung-he chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ch'ong-thai ke, he K^a-m^a-li+et ke h+ok-s^ang, chiap-su ch'u-si^en yit-chhiet fap-l+it ke ngi`am-kiet hiun-lien, ngi+et-s^im su"-fung Song-ti, th`ung ng`i-t^eu k^im-p^u-ngit chhai-chh`ong ke m^i-yit-ke ng`in khiung-yong.
Ng`ai su"t chi^ong ch^un-h`ang li'a Tho ke ng`in pet to s'i, ya s^eu-chh`a n`am-'ng sin-th`u, chok k`i-t^eu, ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.

Thai-chi-s^u" l^au chhi`on ngi-fi ke ch'ong-l'o cho-tet chu"n-m`in ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke fa he s+u"t-chhai ke. Ng`ai tui k`i-t^eu n^a-t'o p^un Thai-m^a-su"-kiet ke Y`u-thai th`ung-p^au ke sin-'e, s'o-y^i ng`ai hi ke-vi, oi chok ke-t^eu ng`in, chi^ong k`i-t^eu thak-t'en, tai-ch'on Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi chiap-su h`in-f+at.
"Ng`ai voi to Thai-m^a-su"-kiet ke s`u", yok chhai t^ong-chu-th`eu, fut-y`en y^u thai k^ong tui thi^en-t'ang h^a-l`oi, cheu chhai ng`ai ke ch^u-v`i.
Ng`ai vang chhai thi-song, th^ang-t'o y^u s^ang tui ng`ai k'ong: ' S'o-l`o, S'o-l`o! Ng`i cho-m'a-ke pet-hoi ng`ai?'
Ng`ai mun-k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, ng`i he m'a-ng`in?' K`i k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhiu-he ng`i s'o pet-hoi ke N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u.'
Ke-t^eu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi ke ng`in khon-t'o ke k^ong, ch'ung-he m`o th^ang-m`in ke tui ng`ai k'ong-fa ke s^ang.

Ng`ai yu mun: 'Ch'u ^a, ng`ai oi cho m'a-ke chang h'o?' Ch'u tui ng`ai k'ong: 'Hong-h'i-l`oi, ng+ip Thai-m^a-su"-kiet-s`ang hi, chhai ke-vi y^u-ng`in voi l^au ng`i k'ong Song-ti oi ng`i cho ke yit-chhiet su".'
Y^in-vi ke k^ong chhin khi`ong, hoi ng`ai ke muk-ch^u khon-`m-t'o, th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi ke ng`in chhiu khi^en-t'en ng`ai ke s'u, tai ng`ai ng+ip Thai-m^a-su"-kiet-s`ang.
"Chhai ke-vi, y^u yit-ke ng`in mi`ang ^on-to ^A-n^a-n`i-^a. K`i he khi`en-s`u"n, ngi`am-s'u fap-l+it ke ng`in, chhin su Thai-m^a-su"-kiet s'o-y^u Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ch^un-chhung.
K`i l`oi khon ng`ai, kh^i chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-pi^en, k'ong: ' S'o-l`o hi^ung-thi ^a, ngien ng`i khon-tet-t'o!' Ke-s`u", ng`ai ke muk-ch^u h'o l'e, ng`ai chhiu khon-t'o k`i.

K`i k'ong: 'Ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke Song-ti y'i-k^in ki'en-si'en ng`i, oi p^un ng`i m`in-ph+ak K`i ke ch'u"-yi, kh'o-y^i khon-t'o K`i k^ung-ngi ke Ph+uk-ng`in, ya th^ang-t'o K`i chh^in-khi'eu s'o-k'ong ke s^ang-y^im.
Y^in-vi ng`i oi vi K`i cho kien-chu"n, chi^ong ng`i s'o khon-t'o s'o th^ang-t'o ke l^au van-m`in k'ong.
Li'a-ha, ng`i h`an y`en-chh`an m'a-ke? Hong-h'i-l`oi, khi`u-ham K`i ke mi`ang, l`oi li^ang s'e-l^i, s'u" ng`i ke chhui tet-t'o s'e-chhiang!'
"Heu-l`oi, ng`ai ch'on-to Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang; chhai su"n-thien-t'u kh`i-t'o ke s`u", ng`ai ng+ip-s`u"n tet-t'o yit-ke yi-siong,
chhai yi-siong ch^ung, ng`ai khon-t'o Ch'u. K`i tui ng`ai k'ong: 'Kiak-kiak l`i-kh^oi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, y^in-vi li'a thi-f^ong ke ng`in `m-voi chiap-su ng`i vi Ng`ai s'o-cho ke kien-chu"n.'
Ng`ai k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung t^i ng`ai su"t ng+ip kok fi-th`ong, chok sin Ng`i ke ng`in hi ko^an, pin pi^en-t'a k`i-t^eu.
Ng`i ke kien-chu"n-ng`in S^u"-th`i-f'an su-hoi li`u-hiet to s'i ke s`u", ng`ai ya chhai-chh`ong, chan-s`u"n ke-khien su", h`an thoi ke-t^eu hoi-s'i k`i ke ng`in ch'ong-s^am.'
Ch'u l^au ng`ai k'ong: 'Ng`i hi! Ng`ai oi phai ng`i hi y'en-f^ong, to Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke-vi.' "
Chung-ng`in p'un-l`oi ti^am-ti^am th^ang P'o-l`o k'ong-fa; ch'ung-he yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ki fa, chhiu thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: "Chh`u-thet k`i! Chh`u"-s'i k`i! Li'a-ch'ung ng`in he k^oi-s'i ke!"
K`i-t^eu chhiu yit-phi'en chh`au, yit-phi'en chi^ong s^am phi^ang-thet, yu hiong thi^en ve n`ai-f'un.
L`o-m^a ke ch'u"-f^i-k^on chhiu min-lin chi^ong P'o-l`o tai-ng+ip y`ang-f`ong, yu f^un-fu p^in-'e pi^en-t'a kh'au-mun k`i, oi chh`a-chhut chung-ng`in vi m'a-ke tui k`i 'an-ngi`ong chhin h^em.

K`i-t^eu chi^ong k`i kh'un h'i-l`oi oi t'a ke s`u", P'o-l`o tui kh^i chhai s^u"n-pi^en ke yit-ke ki^un-k^on k'ong: "Tui yit-ke L`o-m^a k^ung-m`in, m`o k^in-ko s'u"m-phan, ng`i-t^eu chhiu pi^en-t'a k`i, li'a he h+ap-fap ke m^a?"
Ke ki^un-k^on yit th^ang-t'o li'a-ki fa, chhiu hi kien ch'u"-f^i-k^on, tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i si'ong ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o? Ke ng`in he L`o-m^a ke k^ung-m`in!"
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on hi kien P'o-l`o, mun k`i k'ong: "L^au ng`ai k'ong, ng`i he L`o-m^a k^ung-m`in m`o?" P'o-l`o en-k'ong: "He."
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on k'ong: "Ng`ai yung yit thai-pit ke chhi`en, chang tet-t'o k^ung-m`in ke s^u"n-fun." P'o-l`o k'ong: "Ng`ai chhut-se chhiu-he."
S'o-y^i, ke-t^eu oi kh'au-mun P'o-l`o ke ng`in kiak-kiak s'am-kh^oi; ch'u"-f^i-k^on yit t^i P'o-l`o he L`o-m^a k^ung-m`in, yu y^in-vi su"t kh'un-ko P'o-l`o, chhiu chh+ok-ki^ang h'i-l`oi.

Ke ch'u"-f^i-k^on si'ong-oi t^i Y`u-thai-ng`in ko P'o-l`o s+u"t-chhai ke ngi`en-y^in, s'o-y^i, thi-ngi-ngit, k`i ki'e-kh^oi P'o-l`o ke s'o-lien, seu-s+ip chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au chhi`on ngi-fi, y`en-heu chi^ong P'o-l`o tai-chhut-l`oi, ham k`i kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en.
P'o-l`o chu-muk khon ngi-fi ke ng`in, k'ong: "Kok-vi hi^ung-thi, ng`ai h`ang-su" v`i-ng`in he chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en cheu li`ong-s^im l`oi cho, chh+u"t-to k^im-p^u-ngit."
Thai-chi-s^u" ^A-n^a-n`i-^a f^un-fu kh^i chhai s^u"n-pi^en ke ng`in s^an P'o-l`o ke choi-kok.

P'o-l`o tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i li'a-chak f'un-ph+ak ke piak ^a, Song-ti voi si^u-l^i ng`i! Ng`i chh^o chhai ke-vi he oi cheu fap-l+it s'u"m-phan ng`ai, ng`i ngi'ong cho-tet v`i-poi fap-l+it, ham k`i-t^eu t'a ng`ai ^a!"
Kh^i chhai s`un-th`eu ke ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i ngi'ong cho-tet v'u-y+uk Song-ti ke thai-chi-s^u" ^a!"
P'o-l`o k'ong: "Kok-vi hi^ung-thi, ng`ai `m-t^i k`i he thai-chi-s^u"; Su"n-k^in k'ong-ko: '`M-h'o f'i-pong chhu"-l^i ng`in-m`in ke k^on-ch'ong.' "

P'o-l`o khon-chhut li'a-khi`un ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u-t^eu he Sat-t^u-k^ai-t'ong ke ng`in, y^u-t^eu he Fap-li-soi-phai ke ng`in; k`i chhiu chhai ngi-fi-ch^ung thai-s^ang k'ong: "Hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`ai he yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in, he Fap-li-soi-ng`in ke ch'u"-s^un. Ng`ai k^im-p^u-ngit chhai li'a-vi su s'u"m-mun he y^in-vi ng`ai phan-mong s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at!"
K`i yit k'ong li'a-ki fa, Fap-li-soi-ng`in l^au Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in chhiu si^ong-ch^ang, ngi-fi f^un-cho li'ong-phai.
Y^in-vi Sat-t^u-k^ai-ng`in `m si^ong-sin f+uk-f+at, ya `m sin y^u thi^en-s'u" l^au k'ui-f`un, ch'ung-he Fap-li-soi-ng`in s^am-yong l^ung-ch'ung sin.

Chh`au-nau ke s^ang y+et-l`oi y+et-thai, y^u-t^eu Fap-li-soi-phai ke k^in-h+ok kau-s^u" kh^i-h'i-l`oi, khi`ong-li+et ch^en-lun k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu chh`im `m-t'o li'a-ke ng`in y^u m'a-ke `m-chh+ok! M`o yit-thin chu"n-k^in y^u k'ui-f`un ya-he thi^en-s'u" l^au k`i k'ong-fa ^o!"

Y^en-k^a y+et-l`oi y+et li-hoi, ch'u"-f^i-k^on ki^ang-pha P'o-l`o p^un k`i-t^eu chh'a-lan, chhiu min-lin p^in-'e h^a-hi, tui ng`in-khi`un ch^ung chi^ong P'o-l`o chhi'ong-chhut-l`oi, tai-ng+ip y`ang-f`ong hi.
Ke am-p^u, Ch'u kh^i chhai P'o-l`o s^u"n-pi^en, k'ong: "Ng`i oi h'o-t'am! Ng`i y'i-k^in chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang vi Ng`ai cho kien-chu"n, khiung-yong, ng`i ya yit-thin oi chhai L`o-m^a cho kien-chu"n."
Thi-ngi-ngit t'a-ch'o, Y`u-thai-ng`in khiung-ha kie-m`eu, fat-su" chhai chh`u"-thet P'o-l`o y^i-chhi`en, `m s+u"t ya `m l^im.
Th`ung-m`eu ke ng`in y^u si-s+u"p-l`ang s`a.
K`i-t^eu hi kien chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o, k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in fat chhin chh^ung ke su", `m s+u"t m'a-ke t^ung-s^i, chh+u"t-to chh`u"-s'i P'o-l`o!

Li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu l^au ngi-fi oi chhi'ang-khi`u ch'u"-f^i-k^on, tai P'o-l`o l`oi li'a-vi, cha-yi oi kien-k^a si`ong-se l`oi chh`a-mun k`i ke su"-chh`in; ng`ai-t^eu voi ch'un-phi h'o-se, chhai k`i l`oi-to li'a-vi y^i-chhi`en chh`u"-s'i k`i."
P'o-l`o ke ngoi-s^en th^ang-t'o li'a y^im-m`eu, chhiu ng+ip y`ang-f`ong hi l^au P'o-l`o k'ong.
P'o-l`o chhi'ang yit-ke ki^un-k^on l`oi, tui k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang tai li'a heu-s^ang-ng`in hi kien ch'u"-f^i-k^on; k`i y^u su"-chh`in oi po k`i t^i."

Ke ki^un-k^on chhiu tai li'a heu-s^ang-ng`in hi kien ch'u"-f^i-k^on, k'ong: "Si`u-fam P'o-l`o chhi'ang ng`ai ko-hi, y^eu-khi`u ng`ai tai li'a heu-s^ang-ng`in l`oi-kien ng`i, y^in-vi k`i y^u su"-chh`in oi l^au ng`i k'ong."
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on chhiu khi^en k`i ke s'u, tai k`i hi s`un-th`eu, mun k`i k'ong: "Ng`i y^u m'a-ke su"-chh`in oi po-ko?"
K`i en-k'ong: " Y`u-thai-ng`in y'i-k^in chh^am-si`ong h'o-se, ch'un-phi y^eu-khi`u ng`i thi^en-k^ong-ngit tai P'o-l`o hi ngi-fi, cha-yi oi si`ong-se chh`a-mun k`i ke su"-chh`in.

Khi`u ng`i `m-h'o tap-yin k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi y^u si-s+u"p-l`ang s`a voi m`ai-f+uk t'en-t'en k`i. K`i-t^eu fat-ko su", `m s+u"t ya `m l^im, chh+u"t-to k`i-t^eu chh`u"-s'i P'o-l`o. Li'a-ha, k`i-t^eu y'i-k^in ch'un-phi h'o-se, t'en ng`i ke ph^i-ch'un."
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on f^un-fu li'a heu-s^ang-ng`in k'ong: "M+ok p^un ph+et-ng`in t^i ng`i y'i-k^in chi^ong li'a-ke su"-chh`in po-ko ng`ai." Y`en-heu ham k`i l`i-kh^oi.

Chiap-t'en, ch'u"-f^i-k^on ham li'ong-ke ki^un-k^on l`oi, f^un-fu k'ong: "Ch'un-phi li'ong-pak-ke phu-p^in, chhit-s+u"p-ke kh`i-p^in, chh`ong-chhi^ong-s'u li'ong-pak-s`a, k^im-am-p^u ki'u-ti'am-ch^ung chhut-fat hi Kh'ai-sat-li-^a;
ya oi vi P'o-l`o ch'un-phi kh`i ke m^a, fu-sung k`i hi F^i-l+it-s^u" ch'ung-tuk ke-vi."
Ch'u"-f^i-k^on yu si'a-h'o k^ung-v`un, nui-y`ung k'ong:
" Khiet-l`o-thi-L^i-s^i-^a l^au ch'ung-tuk F^i-l+it-s^u" thai-ng`in chhi'ang-^on:
Y`u-thai-ng`in chok-t'o li'a-ke ng`in, chang oi chh`u"-s'i k`i, ng`ai th^ang-k'ong k`i he L`o-m^a k^ung-m`in, chhiu tai-p^in hi chhi'ong-kiu.
Ng`ai si'ong-oi chh`a-m`in k`i-t^eu ko k`i ke ngi`en-y^in, s'o-y^i tai k`i to k`i-t^eu ke ngi-fi hi.
Ng`ai fat-hien k`i pin m`o m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ya-he oi ko^an ke chhui-mi`ang; k`i-t^eu ko k`i, chhiu-he vi-t'o k`i-t^eu fap-l+it ke mun-th`i.
Heu-l`oi y^u-ng`in tui ng`ai po-ko, y^u-ng`in oi m`eu-sat k`i; ng`ai ngi`am-s`u" chhiu kiet-thin sung k`i to ng`i ke-vi hi, th`ung-s`u", f^un-fu ke-t^eu ngi`en-ko hi ng`i mien-chhi`en s^u"n-ko."
Ke-t^eu p^in-'e cheu s'o f^un-fu ke, chi^ong P'o-l`o tai-hi, theu-ya sung k`i hi ^On-th`i-pha-t'i.
Thi-ngi-ngit, kh`i-p^in ki-si+uk fu-sung P'o-l`o, kh`i-th^a ke ki^un-p^in chhiu f`i-y`ang hi.
Kh`i-p^in l`oi-to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, chi^ong k^ung-v`un chh`u"n-p^un ch'ung-tuk, yu chi^ong P'o-l`o k^au-p^un k`i.
Ch'ung-tuk th+uk-li'au k^ung-v`un, yu mun P'o-l`o he nai-s'en ke ng`in, t^i k`i he K^i-li-k^a ke ng`in,
chhiu k'ong: "T'en ngi`en-ko l`oi-to, ng`ai chhiu chh'u-l^i ng`i ke on-khien." Y`en-heu min-lin chi^ong P'o-l`o ko^an chhai H^i-l+it ke k^on-f'u t^i-poi.

Ko 'ng-ngit, thai-chi-s^u" ^A-n^a-n`i-^a l^au k'i-ke ch'ong-l'o, th`ung yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Thiap-th'u-l`o ke l+it-s^u", l`oi-to Kh'ai-sat-li-^a. K`i-t^eu chhai ch'ung-tuk F^i-l+it-s^u" ke mien-chhi`en ko P'o-l`o.

P'o-l`o p^un-ng`in h^em-to k^ung-th`ong; Thiap-th'u-l`o chhiu ko k`i k'ong: " F^i-l+it-s^u" thai-ng`in ^a! Y^in-vi ng`i hi`en-m`in ke chhu"-l^i, ng`ai-t^eu chang y^u chh`ong-kh`i ke thai-ph`in, koet-k^a ke h`ang-chu"n y^u chhin-thai ke k'oi-kiet.
Ng`i ke tet-chu"n, ng`ai-t^eu s`ui-s`u" s`ui-thi m^an-s^im k'am-chhia m`o th`in.
Ng`ai `m-k'am k^a-k'ong l`oi l`o-k'au ng`i, ch'u"-y^u khi`u ng`i s^u"-^en th^ang ng`ai-t^eu ki'en-t^an ke s^u"n-ko:
Ng`ai-t^eu fat-hien li'a-ke ng`in chhiong pot-v^un ke ng`in khiung-yong. K`i chhai chhi`on su"-kie Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ch^ung-ki^en chu"-chho fun-lon, he N^a-sat-l+et-t'ong ke yit-ke th`eu-muk,
li`en su"n-thien ya k'am siet-th+uk, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu chi^ong k`i chok-h'i-l`oi.
Ng`i s'u"m-mun k`i chhiu voi t^i ng`ai-t^eu ko k`i ke yit-chhiet l^i-y`u."
Chhai-chh`ong ke Y`u-thai-ng`in ya th`ung-s^ang ko k`i k'ong, su"-s+u"t chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong.

Li'a-s`u", ch'ung-tuk ch'u"-su" P'o-l`o k'ong-fa. P'o-l`o chhiu k'ong: "Ng`ai t^i ng`i chhai p'un-koet phan on-'e chhin-t^o ngi`en, s'o-y^i ng`ai l+ok-yi chhai ng`i mien-chhi`en vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu.
Ng`i chh`a chhiu t^i, ng`ai s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi l^i-pai, to li'a-ha chang s+u"p-ngi-ngit thin-thin.
K`i-t^eu pin m`o khon-t'o ng`ai chhai su"n-thien-t'u l^au m'a-ng`in phien-lun, ya m`o khon-t'o ng`ai chhai fi-th`ong ya-he s`ang-t'u san-thung thai-chung.
K`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu tui ng`i th`i-chhut ko ng`ai ke chu"n-k'i.

Ch'ung-he, y^u yit-khien su" ng`ai oi s`u"n-ngin: K`i-t^eu ham-cho yi-t^on ke Tho, chhiu-he ng`ai kin-pai ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke Song-ti ke k^in-k'i. Ng`ai ya si^ong-sin M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i-s^u s'o ki ke yit-chhiet.
Ng`ai l^au k`i-t^eu tui Song-ti y^u khiung-yong ke phan-mong, chhiu-he h^i-mong s'o-y^u ke ng`in, m`o-lun san-ok, l^ung-ch'ung voi tui s'i f+uk-f+at.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai mi^en-li chhu"-k^a, chhai Song-ti l^au ng`in ke mien-chhi`en, s`ong-s`ong p'o-chh`u" chh^in-ph+ak ke li`ong-s^im.
"Ng`ai l`i-kh^oi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang y'i-k^in y^u h'o-t^o ngi`en. Ng`ai li'a-p'ai hi, he chi^ong kiu-chi th`ung-p^au ke chhi`en tai-ch'on-hi, ya oi chhai ke-vi hien-chi.
K`i-t^eu chhai su"n-thien-t'u khon-t'o ng`ai ke s`u", ng`ai y'i-k^in h`ang kiet-chhiang-l^i, t'u-t'u hien-t'en chi; ng`ai pin m`o chhi-s+ip chung-ng`in, ya m`o chok-lon.
Na y^u, chhiu-he k'i-ke tui ^A-se-^a-s'en hi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in chhai ke-vi; ke-t^eu ng`in na-he oi ko ng`ai, yin-k^oi l`oi ng`i mien-chhi`en s^u"n-ko.
Na m`o, ham li'a-t^eu t^ong-s`u" chhai-chh`ong ke ng`in chhu"-k^a k'ong-khon-'e, ng`ai chhai ngi-fi s^u"n-su ke s`u", k`i-t^eu fat-hien ng`ai y^u m'a-ke chhui.
Ng`ai kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en ke s`u", ch'u"-y^u thai-s^ang k'ong-ko yit-ki fa, chhiu-he: 'Ng`ai k^im-p^u-ngit su ng`i-t^eu s'u"m-mun, he y^in-vi ng`ai si^ong-sin s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at.' "
F^i-l+it-s^u" tui li'a Tho p'un-l`oi y^u si^ong-t^ong ke ngin-su"t, chhiu si^en-pu thui-th`ong k'ong: "T'en ch'u"-f^i-k^on L^i-s^i-^a l`oi-to, ng`ai chang l`oi phan-ton ng`i-t^eu ke su"."
K`i min-lin ke ki^un-k^on khon-s'u P'o-l`o, p^un k`i kha chhu"-y`u t^eu-'e, ch'un chh^in-y^u l`oi ki^ung-kip k`i s'o s^i-yeu ke t^ung-s^i.
K'i-ngit heu, F^i-l+it-s^u" l^au k`i ke Y`u-thai f^u-ng`in Th'u-s^i-l^a khiung-ha l`oi. K`i ham P'o-l`o l`oi, th^ang k`i k'ong-lun y^u-ko^an K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke sin-ngi'ong.

P'o-l`o ya k'ong-to y^u-ko^an k^ung-ngi, chiet-chu", chi^ong-l`oi ke s'u"m-phan t'en kau-hiun; F^i-l+it-s^u" k'am-kok chhin ki^ang, chhiu tui P'o-l`o k'ong: "Ng`i chhiam-s`u" to-ch'on hi, y^u k^i-fi ng`ai chang ham ng`i l`oi."
Y^in-vi F^i-l+it-s^u" chhin h^i-mong P'o-l`o voi sung chhi`en p^un k`i, s'o-y^i s`ong-s`ong ham k`i l`oi, l^au k`i th`am-lun.

Ko li'ong-ngi`en, P^o-khi`u-F^i-s^u"-t^u chiap F^i-l+it-s^u" ke vi cho ch'ung-tuk. F^i-l+it-s^u" vi-t'o oi tet-t'o Y`u-thai-ng`in ke f^on-h'i, chhiu chi^ong P'o-l`o ki-si+uk li`u chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.
F^i-s^u"-t^u to-ngim s^am-ngit heu, tui Kh'ai-sat-li-^a s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang hi.
Chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu hiong k`i ko P'o-l`o. K`i-t^eu chhi'ang-khi`u F^i-s^u"-t^u,
^en-ch'un chi^ong P'o-l`o sung-hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang; su"-s+u"t-song, k`i-t^eu y^im-m`eu oi chhai lu-song m`ai-f+uk chh`u"-s'i k`i.
F^i-s^u"-t^u en k`i-t^eu k'ong: " P'o-l`o li'a-ha k^i-li`u chhai Kh'ai-sat-li-^a, ng`ai m`o k'i-ki'u oi ch'on-hi ke-vi.
Ng`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu cho-tet l^au ng`ai khiung-ha hi, na-he ke ng`in y^u cho m'a-ke fam-fap ke su", chhiu chhai ke-vi ko k`i."
F^i-s^u"-t^u chhai k`i-t^eu ke-vi h+et s+u"p-th`eu-pat-ngit chhiu ch'on Kh'ai-sat-li-^a hi. Thi-ngi-ngit k`i chhiu kh^oi-th`in, min-lin ng`in tai P'o-l`o l`oi.
P'o-l`o l`oi-to, ke-t^eu tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang l`oi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in v`i-v`i-chhi^u kh^i-t'en, yung chhin-t^o ngi`am-chhung ke chhui-mi`ang ko k`i, ch'ung-he chhi`on-phu n^a-`m-chhut chu"n-k'i l`oi.
P'o-l`o vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu k'ong: "M`o-lun he v`i-poi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fap-l+it, siet-th+uk su"n-thien, ya-he mo-fam L`o-m^a F`ong-ti, li'a-t^eu su" ng`ai yit-khien ya `m-su"t fam-ko."
Ch'ung-he F^i-s^u"-t^u oi p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in f^on-h'i, chhiu mun P'o-l`o: "Ng`i ngien-yi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, chhai ke-vi chiap-su ng`ai tui li'a-khien on-'e ke s'u"m-phan m`o?"

P'o-l`o k'ong: "Li'a-ha ng`ai chhiu-he kh^i chhai F`ong-ti ke fap-th`in, li'a-vi chhiu-he ng`ai yin-t^ong su s'u"m-phan ke s'o-chhai. Ng`ai tui Y`u-thai-ng`in pin `m-su"t cho-ko m'a-ke `m-chh+ok ke su", li'a ya he ng`i chhu"-k^a m`in-m`in t^i ke.

Na-he ng`ai fam-fap, y^u m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ke chhui, ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi th`o-phit h`in-f+at. Na-he k`i-t^eu ko ng`ai ke `m-he su"-s+u"t, m`o ng`in cho-tet chi^ong ng`ai k^au-p^un k`i-t^eu. Ng`ai oi tui F`ong-ti song-su!"
F^i-s^u"-t^u l^au k`i ke chh^am-m`eu s^ong-li`ong heu, chhiu k'ong: "Ki-y`en ng`i tui F`ong-ti song-su, ng`i chhiu hi F`ong-ti ke-vi!"
Ko yit-chham ngit-`e y^i-heu, ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong l^au Pak-n`i-k^i l`oi Kh'ai-sat-li-^a pai-f'ong F^i-s^u"-t^u, p'eu-su" f^on-ngi`ang.
Chhai ke-vi h+et k'i-ngit heu, F^i-s^u"-t^u chi^ong P'o-l`o ke su" tui ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong k'ong: "Li'a-vi y^u yit-ke ng`in, he F^i-l+it-s^u" li`u-h^a-l`oi ke si`u-fam.
Song-p'ai ng`ai hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, ke-phi'en Y`u-thai-ng`in ke chi-s^u"-ch'ong l^au ch'ong-l'o l`oi ko k`i, y^eu-khi`u ng`ai chi^ong k`i thin-chhui.
Ng`ai l^au k`i-t^eu k'ong, cheu L`o-m^a-ng`in ke k^ui-k'i, phi-ko m`ang th`ung ngi`en-ko tui-chu"t, h`an-m`ang y^u k^i-fi vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu y^i-chhi`en, cho-`m-tet thin-chhui.
T'en k`i-t^eu l`oi-to li'a-vi y^i-heu, ng`ai m`o y`en-chh`an s`u"-ki^en, thi-ngi-ngit chhiu kh^oi-th`in, min-lin chi^ong ke ng`in tai-l`oi.
Ngi`en-ko chhi`on-phu kh^i-h'i-l`oi ko k`i, ch'ung-he s'o ko ke pin `m-he ng`ai si'ong-siong ke chhui.
K`i-t^eu l^au k`i ch^en-lun ke he ko^an-he ch^ung-kau ke mun-th`i, h`an-y^u yit-ke mi`ang ^on-to Y^a-s^u ke ng`in; li'a ng`in y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ch'ung-he P'o-l`o k'ong k`i h`an s^ang-s^ang.
Li'a-ke on-'e ng`ai `m-t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an phan chang h'o. Ng`ai mun P'o-l`o he `m-he ngien-yi s^ong Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, chhai ke-vi su s'u"m-phan.
Ch'ung-he, P'o-l`o chhi'ang-khi`u chi^ong k`i li`u-h^a-l`oi, k`i oi song-su to F`ong-ti ke-vi hi. S'o-y^i ng`ai min-lin chi^ong k`i li`u chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u, t'en-heu ap-sung hi F`ong-ti ke-vi."
^A-k^i-pha-v`ong tui F^i-s^u"-t^u k'ong: "Ng`ai ya si'ong-oi chh^in-s^u"n th^ang li'a ng`in k'ong-khon-'e." F^i-s^u"-t^u k'ong: "Thi^en-k^ong-ngit ng`i chhiu cho-tet th^ang k`i k'ong."

Thi-ngi-ngit, ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong l^au Pak-n`i-k^i thai p'ai ph`ai-chh`ong, tai-t'en yit-khi`un ch'u"-f^i-k^on l^au s`ang-nui ke kui-chh+uk, khiung-ha ng+ip-hi thai-th^ang. F^i-s^u"-t^u yit min-lin, P'o-l`o chhiu p^un-ng`in tai-ng+ip-l`oi.

F^i-s^u"-t^u k'ong: " ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong, chhai-chho ke kok-vi! Chhi'ang khon li'a-ke ng`in; k`i chhiu-he chhai li'a-vi l^au Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang s'o-y^u ke Y`u-thai-ng`in tui ng`ai s^u"n-ko, kh+it-l+it y^eu-khi`u ng`ai oi p^un k`i s'i ke.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai chh`a-`m-chhut k`i fam-t'o m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ke chhui; th`ung-s`u", k`i ki-y`en oi tui F`ong-ti song-su, ng`ai chhiu kiet-thin ap-sung k`i hi.

Ko^an-he li'a-ke ng`in, ng`ai m`o m'a-ke khok-s+u"t ke ch^u"-liau kh'o-y^i cheu-m`in F`ong-ti; s'o-y^i, ng`ai tai k`i to kok-vi mien-chhi`en l`oi, th+it-ph+et he ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong ke mien-chhi`en, chh`a-m`in on-chh`in heu, ng`ai chang y^u h'o song-cheu.
Cheu ng`ai khon, ap-sung si`u-fam m`o ch'u"-chhut chhui-mi`ang he m`o h+ap-l^i ke."
^A-k^i-pha-v`ong tui P'o-l`o k'ong: "Ch'un ng`i vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu." P'o-l`o chhiu chh^un-s'u, vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu.
K`i k'ong: " ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong ^a, ng`ai k^im-p^u-ngit y^u h'o chhai ng`i mien-chhi`en, vi Y`u-thai-ng`in ko ng`ai ke yit-chhiet su" l`oi phien-fu, k'am-kok s+u"t-chhai van-hen!
Th+it-ph+et he ng`i chhin s+uk Y`u-thai-ng`in ke k^ui-k'i l^au s'o ch^en-lun ke mun-th`i. S'o-y^i, ng`ai khi`u ng`i nai-s^im th^ang ng`ai ke s^u"n-su.

"Ng`ai chhi`ung-se to li'a-ha ke cho-ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an, Y`u-thai-ng`in chhi`on-phu t^i, y^in-vi ng`ai yit-chh+u"t s^en-f+at chhai p'un-koet ng`in-m`in ke ch^ung-ki^en, heu-l`oi ya su"t h+et chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
Na-he k`i-t^eu h'en cho-chu"n, k`i-t^eu chui chh^in-chh'u, ng`ai yit kh^oi-s'u" chhiu-he s+uk ng`ai-t^eu ch^ung-kau-ch^ung chui ngi`am-kiet ke ch^ung-phai, cho yit-ke Fap-li-soi-ng`in.
Li'a-ha ng`ai kh^i chhai li'a-vi su s'u"m-phan, he y^in-vi phan-mong Song-ti tui ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en s'o yin-h'i ke.

Li'a yin-h'i he ng`ai-t^eu s+u"p-ngi k^i-chh+uk ke th`ung-p^au ngit-ya ngi+et-s^im kin-pai Song-ti, s'o phan-mong oi tet-t'o ke. V`ong ^a, chhiu-he y^in-vi li'a-ke phan-mong, Y`u-thai-ng`in chang ko ng`ai!
Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi si'ong Song-ti s'u" s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at he m`o kh'o-n`en ke su" n`e?
"Ng`ai th`eu-p'ai ya ngin-v`i yin-k^oi chhin-l+it f'an-tui N^a-sat-l+et-ng`in Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang.

Ng`ai chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong cho. Ng`ai tui chi-s^u"-ch'ong li^ang-su khi`en-piang, chi^ong t^o-t^o ke su"n-th`u chok-l`oi ko^an; `m t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai ya chan-s`u"n k`i-t^eu p^un-ng`in phan s'i-h`in.

Nang-ngoi, ng`ai chhai kok fi-th`ong ya t^o-t^o p'ai h`in-f+at k`i-t^eu, khi`ong-pet k`i-t^eu piong-thet sin-ngi'ong. Ng`ai f^i-s`ong n^au k`i-t^eu, su"m-chu" hi ngoi-koet ke s`ang-su" pet-hoi k`i-t^eu.
"Y^u yit-p'ai, ng`ai tai-t'en chi-s^u"-ch'ong p^un ng`ai ke khi`en-piang l^au min-lin hi Thai-m^a-su"-kiet.
V`ong ^a, t^ong-chu ke s`u", ng`ai chhai lu-song khon-t'o thai k^ong, p'i ngit-th`eu ke k^ong h`an-kha khi`ong, tui thi^en-t'ang cheu chhai ng`ai l^au khiung-ha hi ke ng`in ch^u-v`i.

Ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung vang-l+ok thi-song. Ng`ai th^ang-t'o yit-ke s^ang, yung H^i-pak-l`oi-fa tui ng`ai k'ong: ' S'o-l`o, S'o-l`o! Ng`i cho-m'a-ke pet-hoi ng`ai? Ng`i ch'u"-y^u s^ong-hoi chhu"-k^a, chhiong ngi`u yung kiok thet ch'u-ng`in y^u net-`e ke kun-'e yit-yong.'
Ng`ai mun-k'ong: 'Ch'u ^a, ng`i he m'a-ng`in?' Ch'u k'ong: 'Ng`ai chhiu-he ng`i s'o pet-hoi ke Y^a-s^u.

Hong-h'i-l`oi, kh^i-t'en! Ng`ai tui ng`i hi'en-hien he oi sat-l+ip ng`i cho ng`ai ke ph+uk-ng`in, phai ng`i hi vi-t'o k^im-p^u-ngit ng`i khon-t'o ng`ai ke su" l^au chi^ong-l`oi ng`ai oi ch'u"-su" ng`i ke su" cho kien-chu"n.
Ng`ai voi chi^ong ng`i tui Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in s'u-ch^ung kiu-chhut-l`oi. Ng`ai chh^ai-phai ng`i hi k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en,

l`oi kh^oi k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u, s'u" k`i-t^eu tui v^u-am ch^ung ch'on-hiong k^ong-m`in, tui Sat-tan ke khi`en-su" ch^u"-ha k^ui-hiong Song-ti; 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu chhiu voi y^in-vi sin ng`ai l`oi tet-t'o sa-chhui, ya voi chhai Song-ti ke si'en-m`in ch^ung tet-t'o thi-vi.'
"S'o-y^i, ^A-k^i-pha-v`ong ^a, ng`ai m`o v`i-poi tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke yi-siong.

Ng`ai si^en chhai Thai-m^a-su"-kiet l^au Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, y`en-heu chhai chhi`on Y`u-thai l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en khien k`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi, k^ui-hiong Song-ti, h`ang-su" v`i-ng`in oi h+ap k`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi ke s^im-chu".
Chhiu-he vi-t'o 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhai su"n-thien t^i-poi ke s`u", Y`u-thai-ng`in chhiu chok ng`ai, si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`ai.

Ch'ung-he, chh+u"t-to k^im-p^u-ngit, tet-t'o Song-ti ke p^ong-chhu, ng`ai h`an kh^i chhai li'a-vi, tui s'o-y^u ke ng`in cho kien-chu"n, m`o-lun k`i-t^eu he ch^un-kui ya-he p^i-m`i ke. Ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke chhiu-he si^en-t^i l^au M^o-s^i s'o-k'ong oi fat-s^en ke su",
chhiu-he K^i-tuk thin-chh+ok voi su-hoi, yu voi chui-si^en tui s'i f+uk-f+at, hiong Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in si^en-pu ch'u"n-kiu ke k^ong y'i-k^in l`oi-to."
Y^in-vi P'o-l`o ke s^u"n-su 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, F^i-s^u"-t^u chhiu thai-s^ang tui k`i k'ong: " P'o-l`o, ng`i pot-ti^en l'e! Ng`i ke h+ok-mun thet thai, sa hoi ng`i pot-ti^en l^e!"
P'o-l`o k'ong: " F^i-s^u"-t^u thai-ng`in! Ng`ai m`o pot-ti^en; ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke fa he ch^u"n-s+u"t yu h+ap-l^i ke.

^A-k^i-pha-v`ong ya chh^in-chh'u li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in, s'o-y^i ng`ai chang tui v`ong thai-t'am chh+u"t-k'ong. Ng`ai si^ong-sin li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in, m`o yit-khien he v`ong `m-t^i ke, y^in-vi `m-he chhai am-ch^ung fat-s^en ke.
^A-k^i-pha-v`ong ^a, ng`i si^ong-sin si^en-t^i m`o? Ng`ai t^i ng`i si^ong-sin!"
^A-k^i-pha-v`ong tui P'o-l`o k'ong: "Ng`i l'au-t'o khien ng`ai yit-ha-'e, ng`ai chhiu voi pien-cho K^i-tuk-th`u he-m`o?"

P'o-l`o k'ong: "M`o-lun khien t^o khien s'eu, ng`ai tui Song-ti s'o-khi`u ke, chhiu-he ng`i l^au s'o-y^u k^im-p^u-ngit chhai-chh`ong th^ang ng`ai k'ong-fa ke ng`in, chhi`on-phu voi pien-cho l^au ng`ai khiung-yong, ch'ung-he m+ok chhiong ng`ai y^u li'a-t^eu s'o-lien!"
V`ong, ch'ung-tuk, Pak-n`i-k^i, l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in chhiu kh^i-h'i-l`oi.
K`i-t^eu h`ang chhut-hi y^i-heu, p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in pin m`o fam m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ya-he oi ko^an ke chhui."
^A-k^i-pha tui F^i-s^u"-t^u k'ong: "Li'a-ke ng`in na-he m`o tui F`ong-ti song-su, chhiu cho-tet piong k`i ch'eu."
Ki-y`en kiet-thin oi ng`ai-t^eu h`ang s'ui-lu hi Yi-thai-li, k`i-t^eu chhiu chi^ong P'o-l`o l^au kh`i-th^a si`u-fam k^au-p^un L`o-m^a f`ong-ki^un ke ki^un-k^on Y`u-li`u.

Y^u yit-chak tui ^A-thai-m'i-thi`en l`oi ke s`on, oi sun ^A-se-^a-s'en ke k'i-ke k'ong-h'eu h`ang. Ng`ai-t^eu s^ong-li'au s`on, chhiu chhut-fat. Y^u yit-ke M^a-kh`i-tun ke Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a-ng`in, mi`ang ^on-to ^A-l^i-th+at-k'u, th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha hi.
Thi-ngi-ngit hi-to S^i-tun, Y`u-li`u kh^on-thai P'o-l`o, ch'un k`i hi chh`im ph`en-y^u, su ph`en-y^u ke ch^eu-thai.
Ng`ai-t^eu yu tui ke-vi kh^oi-h`ong, y^in-vi f^ung `m sun, s`on chhiu h`ang Sai-ph'u-lu-s^u" poi-f^ung ke-phi'en.
Ng`ai-t^eu thu-ko K^i-li-k^a, Ph`ong-f^i-li-^a yit-tai h'oi-mien, hi-to L^i-k^a ke M^i-l^a.
Chhai ke-vi, ki^un-k^on Y`u-li`u chh`im-t'o yit-chak tui ^A-l+it-s^an-thai l`oi ke s`on, oi hi Yi-thai-li, chhiu ham ng`ai-t^eu s^ong-s`on.

Yit-li`en h'o-t^o ngit, s`on h`ang chhin man, s'u"-to f^i-s`ong k^an-kh'u chang to Kiet-n`i-th'u-ch'u"n fu-khiun. Y^in-vi f^ung ke ch'u-t'ong, ng`ai-t^eu m`o phan-fap ki-si+uk cheu ngi`en-l`oi ke f^ong-hiong chhi`en-h`ang, chhiu h`ang Khiet-l^i-th+it-t'o poi-f^ung ke-phi'en, tui Sat-m^o-n`i-kok k^in-ko.
Ng`ai-t^eu sun h'oi-ngan chhi`en-chin, mi^en-ki'ong chang to l`i L^a-s^i-^a-s`ang m`o k'i-y'en ke "K^a-o-k'ong".
Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in y`en-chh`an h'o-t^o s`u"-ki^en, kim-s+u"t ke chiet-kh`i ya y'i-k^in ko-thet, h`ang-s`on k'in-l`oi k'in ng`ui-hi'am; s'o-y^i P'o-l`o chhiu khien thai-k^a,
k'ong: "Kok-vi, ng`ai khon tui li'a-vi ki-si+uk h`ang-s`on he chhin ng`ui-hi'am ke su"; `m t^an-chhiang fo-v+ut l^au s`on voi thai su s^ong-hoi, li`en ng`ai-t^eu ke s^ang-miang ya n`an p'o."
Ch'ung-he, ki^un-k^on chh`in-ngien sin s`on-ch'ong l^au s`on-ch'u ke fa, `m-oi sin P'o-l`o s'o k'ong ke.

Li'a k'ong-h'eu ya `m-he ko-t^ung l^i-si'ong ke s'o-chhai; s'o-y^i thai-phu-fun ke ng`in chan-s`u"n kh^oi-s`on, oi si'ong phan-fap s'u"-to F^i-n`i-k^i hi ko-t^ung. F^i-n`i-k^i he Khiet-l^i-th+it-t'o ke k'ong-h'eu, mien-hiong s^i-n`am l^au s^i-pet.

T^ong-s`u", y^u yit-chhu"n n`am-f^ung sun-sun-'e chh^oi-ko-l`oi, thai-k^a l'au-t'o cho-tet cheu ngi`en-l`oi ke kie-v+ak h`ang-s`on, chhiu chi^ong m`au l^ai h'i-l`oi kh^oi-s`on, v'a-khiun Khiet-l^i-th+it-t'o h`ang.
M`o k'i-ki'u, y^u yit-chhu"n ^on-to "T^ung-pet-f^ung" ke kh`ong-f^ung tui t'o-song chh^oi-h^a-l`oi.
S`on p^un f^ung chh^oi-to v`ang-l`oi v`ang-hi, ng`ai-t^eu m`o fap-thu, ch'u"-y^u y`u-chhai phau-f^ung chh^oi-t'en ch'eu.
S`on chh^oi-to yit-ke se t'o poi-f^ung ke-phi'en; ke t'o ^on-to K^o-thai. Ng`ai-t^eu si'ong-chhin phan-fap chang p'o-chhi`on ke-chak kiu-s^en-th`in.

S`on-y`en chi^ong ke-chak kiu-s^en-th`in th^o-s^ong thai-s`on, yu yung thai sok-`e t^in-to thai s`on-t'ai th`o-h'o. K`i-t^eu yu ki^ang s`on chhong-t'o Soi-ng'i-t'i ke s^a-ch^u, chhiu chi^ong thai f`am-pu piong-h^a-l`oi, p^un s`on sun f^ung ph^eu-li`u.
Phau-f^ung ki-si+uk chh^oi-t'en l`oi, thi-ngi-ngit, k`i-t^eu chhiu kh^oi-s'u" chi^ong fo-v+ut fit-l+ok h'oi-ch^ung hi,
yu ko yit-ngit, li`en s`on-t'ang yung ke k^ung-k'i ya chh^in-s'u fit-thet.
H'o-t^o ngit, ng`ai-t^eu m`o khon-t'o ngit-th`eu l^au s^en-'e; thai f^ung-long ki-si+uk chh^ui-pet, chui-heu, ng`ai-t^eu li`en tet-kiu ke h^i-mong ya l+ok-kh^ung l'e.

S`on-t'ang ke ng`in y'i-k^in chhin-t^o ngit m`o s+u"t t^ung-s^i, P'o-l`o kh^i chhai k`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en k'ong: "Kok-vi, ng`i-t^eu na-he ch'o-t^eu th^ang ng`ai ke fa, m+ok tui Khiet-l^i-th+it-t'o kh^oi-s`on, chhiu `m-voi chu"-t'o 'an chh'am ke s'un-su"t.
Li'a-ha, ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu oi y'ung-k'am, ng`i-t^eu `m-voi y^u-ng`in s'ong-su"t sin-miang, ch'u"-y^u li'a-chak s`on voi s'un-su"t.
Y^in-vi ng`ai s'o s+uk, s'o kin-pai ke Song-ti, chh^o-am-p^u chh^ai K`i ke thi^en-s'u" tui ng`ai k'ong:

' P'o-l`o, `m-s'u" ki^ang! Ng`i yit-thin voi kh^i chhai F`ong-ti ke mien-chhi`en. `M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, y^in-vi Song-ti ke chh`u"-oi, K`i y'i-k^in kiet-thin oi p'o-s'u s'o-y^u th`ung ng`i khiung-s`on ke ng`in ke sin-miang.'
S'o-y^i kok-vi, oi y'ung-k'am; ng`ai si^ong-sin Song-ti yit-thin voi s+u"t-hien K`i tui ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke fa.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu yit-thin voi ph^eu-to yit-ke t'o-song hi."
To thi-s+u"p-si ngit am-p^u, ng`ai-t^eu ke s`on h`an chhai ^A-tet-l^i-^a-h'oi ph^eu-l`oi ph^eu-hi. To pan-ya, s`on-y`en l'au-t'o ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in khi^un li+uk-thi,
chhiu piong-h^a sok-`e hi tham s'ui ke chh^u"m-chhi'en, kiet-k'o he si-s+u"p k^ung-chhak; yu hiong chhi`en, chai tham, he s^am-s+u"p k^ung-chhak.
K`i-t^eu ki^ang s`on chhong-t'o chi^au-s+ak, chhiu tui s`on-m^i piong si-chak m`au h^a-hi, mong thi^en-k^ong.
S`on-y`en si'ong-oi th^eu-ch'eu, chi^ong kiu-s^en-th`in chhui-l+ok h'oi-mien, cha-yi oi tui s`on-th`eu piong m`au l+ok h'oi.
P'o-l`o tui ki^un-k^on l^au p^in-'e k'ong: "Li'a-t^eu s`on-y`en na m`o li`u chhai s`on-t'ang, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi m`o kiu."
P^in-'e chhiu ch'am-th^on kiu-s^en-th`in ke sok-`e, y`u-chhai k`i ph^eu-ch'eu.
Thi^en-m`ung-k^ong ke s`u", P'o-l`o khien thai-k^a s+u"t t^eu t^ung-s^i. K`i k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu s`eu-chh`ong pak-t'u, `m s+u"t `m l^im, y'i-k^in s+u"p-si ngit l^o.
Li'a-ha ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu, vi-t'o p'o-miang, s+u"t t^eu t^ung-s^i, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tak-s`a li`en yit-thi`au th`eu-n`a-m^o ya `m-voi s'un-su"t."
K'ong-li'au li'a-ke fa, P'o-l`o n^a t^eu mien-p^au, chhai thai-k^a mien-chhi`en hiong Song-ti k'am-chhia, y`en-heu pak-kh^oi l`oi s+u"t.
Thai-k^a chhiu ^on-s^im, chhu"-k^a ya n^a t^eu l`oi s+u"t.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai s`on-t'ang ke ch'ung-khiung y^u li'ong-pak chhit-s+u"p-liuk s`a.
Thai-k^a s+u"t-p'au heu, vi-t'o k'am-khi^ang s`on ke fu-t^am, yu chi^ong s`on-t'ang ke m+ak-'e fit-l+ok h'oi-ch^ung hi.
Thi^en-k^ong ke s`u", s`on-y`en `m-su"t ke s'o-chhai, ch'ung-he fat-hien yit-ke h'oi-v^an, yu y^u s^a-th^an, chhiu kiet-thin si'ong phan-fap chi^ong s`on s'u" s^ong-hi.
K`i-t^eu si^en ch'am-th^on thai-sok, chi^ong m`au fit chhai h'oi-ch^ung, th`ung-s`u" ki'e-kh^oi s`on-th`o ke sok-`e, l^ai-h'i s`on-th`eu ke f`am-pu, p^un f^ung chi^ong s`on chh^oi-to ngan-pi^en hi.
Ch'ung-he, s`on sa chh^ung-t'o s^a-ch^u, s`on-th`eu kh`a-s'i, m`o fap-thu ch'on-th`eu, s`on-m^i sa p^un thai-long chh`ung-f'ai thet-hi.
P^in-'e si'ong-oi chi^ong si`u-fam chh`u"-thet, ki^ang-pha y^u-t^eu voi mi-s'ui th^eu-ch'eu.
Ch'ung-he, ki^un-k^on oi kiu P'o-l`o, put-ch'un k`i-t^eu lon-l`oi, chhiu ha-lin ham voi chhi`u-s'ui ke ng`in si^en thiau h^a-hi, chhi`u-s'ui s^ong-ngan;
kh`i-th^a ke ng`in chang li-yung pi^ong-'e l^au s`on-t'ang ke t^ung-s^i s^ong-ngan. 'An-ngi`ong, thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung ^on-chhi`on s^ong-ngan.
Ng`ai-t^eu ph`in-^on s^ong-ngan y^i-heu, chang t^i ke t'o ^on-to M^a-ng'i-th^a.
H+et chhai t'o-song ke ng`in tui ng`ai-t^eu chhin ngi+et-chh`in. Y^in-vi ke-s`u" l+ok-y'i, thi^en-hi yu l^ang, k`i-t^eu chhiu h'i-f'o l`oi chiap-thai ng`ai-t^eu.
P'o-l`o ngi^am yit-p'a chh`eu, piong chhai f'o t^i-poi. Y^u yit-m^i th+uk-s`a, y^in-vi chhin s^eu chhiu chon-chhut-l`oi, chh`an-t'en k`i ke s'u.

T'o-song ke ng`in khon-t'o ke-m^i s`a tiau chhai P'o-l`o ke s'u-hong, chhiu p'i-chh'u" k'ong: "Li'a ng`in yit-thin he hi^ung-s'u, s^ui-y`en tui h'oi t^i-poi tet-kiu s^ong-l`oi, thi^en-l^i h`an-he `m ch'un k`i s^ang."
Ch'ung-he P'o-l`o chi^ong ke-m^i s`a fin-l+ok f'o t^i-poi hi, pin m`o su s^ong-hoi.
Thai-k^a t'en-t'en k`i ke s'u ch'ung-h'i-l`oi, ya-he fut-y`en vang-l+ok-hi s'i-thet; ch'ung-he t'en chhin ki'u, khon k`i ph`in-^on m`o-su", chhiu k'oi-pien si'ong-fap, k'ong: "K`i he s`u"n-m`in!"
L`i ke thi-f^ong m`o k'i-y'en, y`u-ch'ong Phu-pak-li`u y^u t^eu thi`en-s'an. K`i f^on-ngi`ang ng`ai-t^eu, s`u"n-s^im kho'an-thai ng`ai-t^eu s^am-ngit.
Ke-s`u", Phu-pak-li`u ke ^a-p^a ngi+et-t'o yu ^o-li-t'u, soi chhai m`in-chh`ong. P'o-l`o hi k`i ke f`ong-ki^en, vi k`i kh`i-t'o, on-s'u, y^i-h'o k`i.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, t'o-song s'o-y^u ke phiang-ng`in chhiu l^ung-ch'ung l`oi, chhi`on-phu ya tet-t'o y^i-h'o.
K`i-t^eu sung ng`ai-t^eu chhin-t^o l^i-v+ut; to kh^oi-s`on ke s`u", yu chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu lu-song s'o s^i-yeu ke t^ung-s^i sung-to s`on-t'ang.
Ko s^am-ke ngi+et, ng`ai-t^eu chh^o-s^ong yit-chak tui ^A-l+it-s^an-thai l`oi ke s`on; li'a-chak s`on yung "Chhiu-s^u" ke S^ung-p^au-th^oi" cho ki-ho, he th`in chhai ke h'oi-t'o ko-t^ung ke.
S`on to Si-l^a-k'u, ng`ai-t^eu chhai ke-vi th`in-th`o s^am-ngit,
y`en-heu yu kh^oi-s`on, to Li-k^i-v^ung. Thi-ngi-ngit y^u n`am-f^ung, s'o-y^i li'ong-ngit nui chhiu to Phu-ti^u-li,
chhai ke-vi t`u-t'o yit-t^eu hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi; k`i-t^eu chhi'ang ng`ai-t^eu th`in-li`u yit l^i-pai. Y`en-heu, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu hi L`o-m^a.

L`o-m^a ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi th^ang-t'o ng`ai-t^eu to ke s^eu-sit, chhiu to ^A-p'i-v^u-su" l^au S^am-k'on l`oi ngi`ang-chiap ng`ai-t^eu. P'o-l`o yit khon-t'o k`i-t^eu chhiu k'am-chhia Song-ti, kien-k^a tet-t'o y'ung-hi.
Ng`ai-t^eu to L`o-m^a y^i-heu, P'o-l`o tet-t'o h'i-kh'o, l^au ke khon-s'u k`i ke p^in-'e h+et chhai nang-ngoi yit-ke s'o-chhai.

Ko s^am-ngit, P'o-l`o chhi'ang t^ong-thi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke li^ang-chhiu l`oi si^ong-kien. K`i-t^eu l`oi-to, P'o-l`o tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Kok-vi hi^ung-thi ^a, s^ui-y`en ng`ai m`o cho m'a-ke su" l`oi tet-chhui th`ung-p^au, ya-he v`i-poi ch'u-si^en ke k^ui-k'i, m`o si'ong-t'o ng`ai sa chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang p^un-ng`in chok l`oi ko^an, yu ap-sung hi k^au-p^un L`o-m^a t^ong-khi+uk.
K`i-t^eu s'u"m-mun ng`ai, ch'ung-he chh`im `m-t'o ng`ai y^u m'a-ke k^oi-s'i ke chhui, si'ong-oi piong ng`ai.
Ch'ung-he Y`u-thai-ng`in f'an-tui, pet-to m`o phan-fap, ng`ai ch'u"-y^u song-su F`ong-ti, pin `m-he ng`ai oi ko th`ung-p^au m'a-ke.
Vi-t'o li'a-ke y`en-ku, ng`ai y^eu-khi`u th`ung ng`i-t^eu kien-mien k'ong-fa. Ng`ai s'o-y^i tai-t'en li'a s'o-lien, ngi`en-l`oi he vi-t'o Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in s'o phan-mong ke ke-s`a."
K`i-t^eu tui P'o-l`o k'ong: "Ko^an-he ng`i ke su", ng`ai-t^eu m`o tui Y`u-thai chiap-t'o m'a-ke sin-'e, ya m`o hi^ung-thi tui ke-vi tai m'a-ke s^eu-sit l`oi, me m`o k'ong ng`i m'a-ke f'ai-fa.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu si'ong-oi th^ang ng`i chh^in-khi'eu k'ong ng`i ke khon-fap, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu t^i ng`i s'o s+uk ke kau-phai he chhai tak s'o-chhai su-ng`in k^ung-kit ke."

S'o-y^i, k`i-t^eu l^au P'o-l`o yok-thin ngit-`e l`oi chhi-fi. Ke-ngit y^u chhin-t^o ng`in l`oi P'o-l`o h+et ke s'o-chhai; chhi`ung ch'o to am, k`i tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-ki'e Song-ti koet ke tho-l^i, pin y'in-chu"n M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au si^en-t^i-s^u, khien k`i-t^eu sin Y^a-s^u.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in sin k`i s'o-k'ong ke, y^u-t^eu ng`in `m sin.

P'i-chh'u" yi-kien `m h+ap, k`i-t^eu chhiu san-fi. M`ang san-kh^oi y^i-chhi`en, P'o-l`o k'ong yit-ki fa, k'ong: "Su"n-L`in th^ung-ko si^en-t^i Y^i-soi-^a tui ng`i-t^eu ch'u-si^en s'o-k'ong ke m`o `m-chh+ok!
Ng`i hi l^au li'a-ke ch'u"-m`in k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-li'au yu th^ang, ch'ung-he `m-voi ng+ip-ng'i; khon-li'au yu khon, ch'ung-he `m-voi li'au-ki'e.

Y^in-vi li'a ch'u"-m`in ke s^im chhin-thun; k`i-t^eu yu ng'i-k^ung poi-poi, muk-ch^u sap-sap. Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u voi khon-tet-t'o, ng'i-k^ung voi th^ang-tet ng+ip-ng'i, s^im ya voi m`in-ph+ak, k`i-t^eu chhiu voi f`i-s^im ch'on-yi, Ng`ai chhiu voi y^i-h'o k`i-t^eu."
P'o-l`o kiet-lun k'ong: "S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong t^i, Song-ti ch'u"n-kiu ke tho-l^i y'i-k^in chh`on-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in; k`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on voi th^ang!"
P'o-l`o chhai chhu"-k^a s'o soi l`oi ke vuk h+et li'ong-ngi`en. S'o-y^u l`oi f'ong-mun ke ng`in, k`i l^ung-ch'ung chiap-thai.
K`i thai-t'am si^en-chh`on Song-ti koet ke tho-l^i, chi^ong ko^an-he Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke su"-chh`in kau-su" ng`in, m`o su-t'o m'a-ke ch'u-ngoi.
Ng`ai he K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ph+uk-ng`in P'o-l`o; Song-ti f^u-seu ng`ai cho s'u"-th`u, th+it-ph+et phai ng`ai chh`on K`i ke fuk-y^im.

Li'a fuk-y^im he Song-ti chhai chhin-ki'u y^i-chhi`en th^ung-ko K`i ke chung si^en-t^i chhai Su"n-k^in t^i-poi s'o yin-h'i ke, nui-y`ung he y^u-ko^an K`i ke Lai-'e --- ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk. Cheu hiet-th'ung l`oi k'ong, k`i he Thai-v'i ke heu-thoi; cheu su"n-kiet ke s`u"n-sin l`oi k'ong, y^in-vi Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, yung thai-n`en hi'en-m`in k`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e.
Th^ung-ko k`i, ng`ai tet-t'o th+it-ph+et ke ^en-ti'en, vi k`i ke mi`ang cho s'u"-th`u, tai-li^ang kok-koet ke ng`in l`oi sin-chhi`ung k`i.
Li'a t^ong-y`en p^au-h`am ng`i li'a-t^eu chhai L`o-m^a, tet-t'o Song-ti ki'en-si'en l`oi k^ui-s+uk Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ng`in.

S'o-y^u chhai L`o-m^a, Song-ti s'o siak, s'o ki'en-si'en cho su"n-th`u ke ng`in, ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Yit kh^oi-s'u", ng`ai oi th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, vi ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a k'am-chhia ng`ai ke Song-ti, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im y'i-k^in chh`on-phien thi^en-ha.

Song-ti t^i ng`ai s`ong-s`ong chhai kh`i-t'o ch^ung si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai chhi`on-s^im chhi`on-yi su"-fung Song-ti, chh`on y^u-ko^an K`i ke Lai-'e ke fuk-y^im; K`i cho-tet chu"n-m`in ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke fa he y^u-y'ang ke.
Ng`ai khi`u Song-ti, cheu K`i m^i-h'o ke ch'u"-yi vi ng`ai kh^oi-lu, p^un ng`ai chui-heu voi y^u k^i-fi hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai f^i-s`ong h^i-mong kien-t'o ng`i-t^eu, th`ung ng`i-t^eu f^un-hi'ong s+uk-l`in ke ^en-su, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu ke l`in-sin ki^en-khi`ong h'i-l`oi;
ya kh'o-y^i k'ong, ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke s`u", y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`ai p'i-chh'u" ke sin-s^im, ng`ai-t^eu voi fu-si^ong tet-t'o k'u-li.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai oi ng`i-t^eu t^i, y^u h'o-t^o p'ai ng`ai kie-v+ak oi hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he tak-p'ai t^u y^u su"-chh`in ch'u-t'ong, hoi ng`ai m`o fap-thu hi. Ng`ai ke muk-tit he oi chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en tai-li^ang ng`in k^ui Ch'u, chhiong chhai kh`i-th^a ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en yit-yong.
Y^in-vi m`o-lun tui m'a-ke ng`in, he v`un-m`in-ng`in ya-he m`ang kh^oi-fa ke, he chh^ung-m`in-ng`in ya-he ng`i-ngong ke, ng`ai l^ung-ch'ung khiam k`i-t^eu ke chai.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai pet-chhiet oi chi^ong li'a fuk-y^im ya chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai L`o-m^a ke ng`in.
Ng`ai m`o khon fuk-y^im cho kien-seu; li'a fuk-y^im he Song-ti ke thai-n`en, oi ch'u"n-kiu yit-chhiet sin ke ng`in, si^en he Y`u-thai-ng`in, y`en-heu he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.

Y^in-vi li'a fuk-y^im kh'i-su" ng`ai-t^eu, Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an p^un ng`in th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he: Chhi`ung-th`eu to-m^i he th^ung-ko sin. Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Th^ung-ko sin th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ko^an-he ke ng`in yit-thin voi tet-t'o ch^u"n ke s^ang-miang."
Ngi`en-l`oi, Song-ti ke fat-khi'en tui thi^en-t'ang hi'en-m`in chhai yit-chhiet m`o kin-khi`en l^au put-ngi ke ng`in s^u"n-song, chhiu-he ke-t^eu yung put-ngi ap-chu" ch^u"n-l^i ke ng`in.

Song-ti chit-f+at k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ko^an-he K`i ke su", y'i-k^in cheu ng`in s'o-n`en l^i-ki'e ke, chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u hi'en-m`in chhai k`i-t^eu ke mien-chhi`en; li'a he Song-ti chh^in-chhu" vi k`i-t^eu hi'en-m`in ke.

Y^u-ko^an Song-ti ke yit-chhiet, p'un-l`oi `m-he ng`in khon-tet-t'o ke, ch'ung-he th^ung-ko su"-kie ke chh'ong-chho, ng`in khon-t'o K`i s'o chho ke van-v+ut, chhiu ngin-chhut K`i y'un-y'en ke thai-n`en l^au s`u"n-sin. S'o-y^i, ng`in m`o m'a-ke chia-khi'eu h'o th^oi-chh`u".
K`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en ngin-su"t Song-ti, ch'ung-he `m chi^ong y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un K`i, ya `m k'am-chhia K`i; k`i-t^eu ke s^u"-si'ong h^i-kh^ung, f`u-th`u ke s^im pien-cho v^u-am.
K`i-t^eu chhu"-ngin chhin chh^ung-m`in, kh`i-s+u"t chhin ngong.
K`i-t^eu `m pai y'un-s^en ke Song-ti, f'an-ch'on hi pai ngi'eu-siong, chhiu-he ke-t^eu cheu voi s'i ke ng`in, f^i-kh`im, ch'eu-chhu, kh^un-chh`ung t'en h`in-siong chho-chhut-l`oi ke.
S'o-y^i, Song-ti y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu th`en-t'en s^im-ch^ung ke y+uk-ngiam hi-cho ha-li`u ke su", p'i-chh'u" ch^au-th+ap chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i.

K`i-t^eu hi-chhi+et Song-ti ke ch^u"n-l^i, k^am-ngien chiap-su h^i-k'a: K`i-t^eu kin-pai f+uk-su" su-chho ke t^ung-s^i, ch'ung-he `m kin-pai f+uk-su" chho-v+ut ch^u" Ch'u --- K`i chang he yin-k^oi y'un-y'en su chan-m^i ke. ^A-m'en!
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu fong-chi'ung chhu"-k^a ke chh`in-y+uk; `m t^an-chhiang fu-'ng t'a-lon chu"n-s`ong ke ko^an-he, h`ang v`i-f'an chhu"-y`en ke sin-h`ang-v`i,
li`en n`am-ng`in ya hi-chhi+et th`ung fu-ng`in-k^a ke chu"n-t^ong ko^an-he, th`ung-sin si^ong-lien, cho-chhut `m-t^i kien-seu ke su", kiet-k'o, su-t'o yin-tet ke chit-f+at.
Ki-y`en ng`in ku-yi `m s`u"n-ngin Song-ti, Song-ti chhiu y`u-chhai k`i-t^eu chh`un phai-fai ke s^im, cho ke-t^eu m`o yin-k^oi cho ke su".
K`i-t^eu h`ang-chhin kok-ch'ung ke put-ngi, si`a-ok, th^am-s^im l^au ok-th+uk; m^an-s^im he chhit-tu, hi^ung-sat, si^ong-ch^ang, k'ui-cha l^au y^im-m`eu. K`i-t^eu chu"-chho y`eu-ngi`en,
p'i-chh'u" f'i-pong. K`i-t^eu yen-hen Song-ti, fu-si^ong v'u-y+uk, ki^eu-ngau, chhu"-kho^a, hau ngi^a su"-f^i, `m hau-kin y`a-^oi,
chhi`on m`o thi^en-li`ong, k'ong-fa m`o sin-yung, m`o oi-s^im, ya m`o th`ung-chh`in-s^im.
K`i-t^eu t^i, cheu Song-ti ke min-lin, h`ang li'a-ch'ung su" ke ng`in he k^oi-s'i ke; ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang chhu"-k^a hi h`ang, ya chan-s`u"n ph+et-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong h`ang.

Ph`en-y^u ^a, lun-ton ng`in ke, m`o-lun ng`i he m'a-ng`in, `m-s'u" si'ong-oi th^oi-chh`u". Ng`i lun-ton ph+et-ng`in, ch'ung-he chhu"-k^a s'o-cho ke yu th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-yong, 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i chhiu-he thin chhu"-k^a ke chhui.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, h`ang li'a-ch'ung su"-chh`in ke ng`in, Song-ti voi cheu k^ung-tong s'u"m-phan k`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-he, ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`i s'o lun-ton ke, ph+et-ng`in s'o-h`ang ke ke-t^eu su"-chh`in, chhiu-he ng`i s'o-h`ang ke ^a! Ng`i si'ong, ng`i s'am tet-kh^oi Song-ti ke s'u"m-phan m^a?
Ya-he ng`i khon-khi^ang K`i f^ung-su"n ke chh`u"-oi, kh^on-y`ung l^au ngi^un-nai? Ng`i yin-k^oi t^i Song-ti ke chh`u"-oi, y^in-vi K`i oi ng`i f'i-k'oi!

Ch'ung-he ng`i ke ngang-s^im l^au `m-h'en f'i-k'oi, vi ng`i chhu"-k^a ch^eu-l`oi kien-t^o ke fun-nu, chu"-to Song-ti vi k^ung-ngi fat-khi'en l^au s'u"m-phan ke ngit-`e l`oi-to ke s`u", su h`an-kha chh^ung ke chit-f+at.
Y^in-vi Song-ti oi cheu tak-s`a ke h`ang-v`i po-yin k`i.

Y^u-t^eu ng`in ki^en-chh`u" h`ang-san, ch^ui-khi`u tui Song-ti l`oi ke ch^un-kui, y`ung-k^ong, l^au `m-voi phai-fai ke s^ang-miang; li'a-ch'ung ng`in, Song-ti voi yung y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang su p^un k`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-he, ke-t^eu chhu"-s^u" ke ng`in, k`i-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et ch^u"n-l^i hi th`en put-ngi, Song-ti ke fat-khi'en l^au chit-f+at yit-thin voi l`im-to k`i-t^eu.
S'o-y^u chok-ok ke ng`in voi t`u-t'o fam-nan l^au thung-kh'u, si^en he Y`u-thai-ng`in, y`en-heu he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.
Ch'ung-he, s'o-y^u h`ang-san ke ng`in, K`i voi su k`i-t^eu ch^un-kui, y`ung-k^ong l^au ph`in-^on, si^en he Y`u-thai-ng`in, y`en-heu he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in.
Y^in-vi, m`o-lun tui m'a-ng`in, Song-ti `m-voi phi^en-s^im.

Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in m`o M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, k`i-t^eu fam-chhui chhiu voi chhai li'a fap-l+it ch^u"-ngoi m+et-m`ong; Y`u-thai-ng`in y^u li'a fap-l+it, k`i-t^eu fam-chhui chhiu oi cheu li'a fap-l+it l`oi su s'u"m-phan.
Y^in-vi p^un Song-ti phan m`o-chhui ke, `m-he ke-t^eu th^ang-t'o fap-l+it ke ng`in, he ke-t^eu s+u"t-h`ang fap-l+it ke ng`in.
Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in s^ui-y`en m`o li'a-ke fap-l+it, ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu na-he cheu thi^en-sin hi h`ang h+ap li'a fap-l+it ke su", k`i-t^eu h`an-he y^u chhu"-k^a ke fap-l+it.

K`i-t^eu ke p'eu-hien hi'en-m`in li'a fap-l+it ke min-lin he si'a chhai k`i-t^eu ke s^im-t'u; k`i-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im chhiu-he chu"n-m`in li'a-ke su"-s+u"t; y^in-vi, k`i-t^eu ke s^im y^u-s`u" voi chit-phi chhu"-k^a, y^u-s`u" voi vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu.
Cheu ng`ai s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im, chhai m+at-ngit, Song-ti th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s'u"m-phan ke s`u", chhiu-he oi cheu 'an-ngi`ong l`oi s'u"m-phan ng`in s^im-ch^ung yit-chhiet ke pi-m+et.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i k'ong ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in, ng`i y'i-kho fap-l+it, yu kho^a-khi'eu th`ung Song-ti y^u th+it-ph+et ke ko^an-he.
Ng`i y'i-k^in chiap-su fap-l+it ke kau-hiun, t^i Song-ti oi ng`i cho m'a-ke, ya hi'au-tet f^un-ph+et su"-f^i.
Ng`i chh^u"m-sin chhu"-k^a he vi m^o-muk-ke tai-lu ke ng`in, he ke-t^eu chhai v^u-am-ch^ung ke ng`in ke k^ong,
he ngong-'e ke ch'u"-th^o-ch'a, he heu-s^ang-ng`in ke s^in-s^ang. Ng`i yu ngin-v`i, y^in-vi ng`i y^u M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, chhiu tui chu"-su"t l^au ch^u"n-l^i y^u p'a-ak.
Ng`i k^au ph+et-ng`in, ngi'ong-p^an `m k^au chhu"-k^a n`e? Ng`i kau-hiun ng`in cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a, chhu"-k^a sa th^eu-n^a m^a?
Ng`i k'ong cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im, chhu"-k^a sa hi fam m^a? Ng`i n^au ngi'eu-siong, chhu"-k^a sa th^eu-n^a ki^ung-meu-t'u ke t^ung-s^i m^a?
Ng`i kho^a-khi'eu ng`i y^u Song-ti ke fap-l+it, chhu"-k^a f'an-ch'on pho-fai Song-ti ke fap-l+it l`oi v'u-y+uk K`i m^a?
Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku, Song-ti ke mi`ang p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in v'u-y+uk."
Ng`i na-he ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it, ng`i ke kot-l^i chhiu y^u ka-chh+u"t; ng`i na v`i-fam fap-l+it, ng`i ke kot-l^i chhiu m`o pan-s+it lu-yung.
'An-ngi`ong khon-l`oi, yit-ke m`o su kot-l^i ke ng`in na ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it ke min-lin, Song-ti k'am `m-voi son k`i cho su kot-l^i ke ng`in m^a?

Ng`i-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in voi p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in thin-chhui! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu li^ang-su fap-l+it thi`au-v`un, yu chiap-su kot-l^i, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu v`i-fam fap-l+it; k`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i s^ui-y`en m`o su kot-l^i, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it.
Kh`i-s+u"t, m'a-ng`in chang son he ch^u"n ke Y`u-thai-ng`in, chu"n-k^in su kot-l^i ke ng`in n`e? `M-he ngoi-p'eu cho Y`u-thai-ng`in, s^u"n-th'i chiap-su kot-l^i ke.

Ch'ung-k'ong, nui-t'u cho Y`u-thai-ng`in ke, chang he ch^u"n ke Y`u-thai-ng`in; khiung-yong, `m-he y^in-vi fap-l+it thi`au-v`un, he th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in ke k^ung-chok, s^im-k^on chiap-su kot-l^i ke, chang he ch^u"n ke kot-l^i. Li'a-ch'ung ng`in s'o tet-t'o ke chh^u"n-chan, `m-he tui ng`in, he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.
Cheu 'an-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, Y`u-thai-ng`in y^u m'a-ke kha y`ang Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in n`e? Kot-l^i yu y^u m'a-ke ka-chh+u"t n`e?
Su"-s+u"t-song, tak f^ong-mien t^u y^u. Thi-yit, Song-ti chi^ong K`i ke ch^u"n-tho k^au p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in.
Chhiu-son k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u poi-sin ke, Song-ti k'am voi y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong chhiu m`o sin-s+u"t m^a?

T^ong-y`en `m-voi! Chhiu-son ng`in-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung pien-cho f^a-li^au, Song-ti h`an-he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke; chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Ng`i k'ong-fa ke s`u", m`o p^au h'o chok, p^un-ng`in ko ke s`u", thin-chh+ok voi y`ang.

Na-he ng`ai-t^eu ke put-ngi voi hi'en-m`in Song-ti ke k^ung-ngi, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Song-ti chit-f+at ng`ai-t^eu, he K`i ke put-ngi m^a? (Ng`ai he cheu ng`in ke si'ong-fap k'ong ke.)
T^ong-y`en `m-he! Song-ti na-he put-ngi, K`i ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet s'u"m-phan su"-ki^en n`e?
Na-he ng`ai k'ong f^a-li^au voi s'u" Song-ti ke ch^u"n-s+u"t h`an-kha hi'en-m`in, kien-k^a tet y`ung-k^ong, ng`ai oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Cho-m'a-ke ng`ai h`an p^un-ng`in thin-cho chhui-ng`in n`e?
Cho-m'a-ke `m k'ong: "Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet h`ang ok l`oi hi'en san" n`e? Y^u-t^eu ng`in f'i-pong ng`ai, k'ong ng`ai su"t k'ong li'a-ch'ung ke fa; k`i-t^eu su thin-chhui he yin-k^oi ke.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in p'i Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in kha-h'o he-m`o? T^ong-y`en `m-he 'an-ngi`ong! Ng`ai y'i-k^in ch'u"-chhut, Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in khiung-yong he chhai chhui-ok ke khi`en-su" ch^u"-ha.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: M`o ngi-ng`in, li`en yit-ke me m`o.
M`o chh^ung-m`in-ng`in, ya m`o chh`im Song-ti ke ng`in.
Ng`in-ng`in l`i-kh^oi Song-ti, chhi`on-phu h`ang `m-chh+ok lu; m`o h`ang-san ke, li`en yit-ke me m`o.
K`i-t^eu ke h`eu-li`en chhiong t'a-kh^oi ke f`un-mu; k`i-t^eu ke s+at-m`a chhin k'ong k'ui-cha ke fa; tui choi-s`un chhut ke chhiong he s`a ke th+uk-hi;
K`i-t^eu ke choi chh^ung-m^an ok-th+uk ke chu-ma.
Oi hi hoi-ng`in ya-he chh`u"-ng`in, k`i-t^eu ch'eu-to chhiong p^i 'an kiak;
m`o-lun k`i-t^eu hi-to nai-vi, chhiu voi y^u pho-fai l^au p^i-chh'am.
K`i-t^eu `m-t^i ph`in-^on ke lu;
ya m`o h+ok-t'o kin-vi Song-ti.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, fap-l+it ke min-lin he tui chhai fap-l+it t'ai-h^a ke ng`in k'ong ke, oi p^un chhi`on su"-kie ke ng`in ph+uk chhai Song-ti ke s'u"m-phan th`oi-chhi`en, m`o yit-s`a y^u fa h'o k'ong.
Y^in-vi m`o ng`in n`en kho h`ang fap-l+it l`oi p^un Song-ti thin-cho ngi; fap-l+it ke muk-tit he oi p^un ng`in t^i chhu"-k^a y^u chhui.

Ch'ung-he li'a-ha, Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an p^un ng`in th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he y'i-k^in kh'i-su" chhut-l`oi; th`ung fap-l+it chhi`on m`o ko^an-he. M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it l^au chung si^en-t^i chhiu-he chu"n-k'i.
Song-ti p^un ng`in th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu sin Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk. M`o-lun he m'a-ng`in, ch'u"-y^u sin K^i-tuk, Song-ti chang voi 'an-ngi`ong tui-thai k`i-t^eu:
Y^in-vi su"-ki^en-ng`in chhi`on-phu fam-li'au chhui, kh^ui-khiam Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong.
Li'a-ha, Song-ti ph+ak-ph+ak s^u"-^en, th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi kiu-s+uk k`i-t^eu, p^un k`i-t^eu th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he.
Song-ti h^i-s^en Y^a-s^u cho s+uk-chhui-chi, th^ung-ko k`i li`u-hiet l`oi s'i, p^un ng`in y^in-vi sin k`i l`oi tet-t'o sa-chhui. Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong cho he oi hi'en-m`in K`i ke k^ung-ngi.

Si^en-chhi`en, y^in-vi K`i ke ngi^un-nai, K`i kh^on-y`ung ng`in ke chhui; ch'ung-he li'a-ha, K`i chh'i-s^eu ng`in ke chhui l`oi hi'en-m`in K`i ke k^ung-ngi. 'An-ngi`ong, Song-ti hi'en-m`in K`i chhu"-k^a he k^ung-ngi ke, ya chh^u"n yit-chhiet sin Y^a-s^u ke ng`in he ngi-ng`in.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu y^u m'a-ke h'o kho^a-khi'eu n`e? Yit-s+it-'e me m`o! Ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? He tui ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it m^a? `M-he! He tui sin l`oi ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke kiet-lun he: Ng`in th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he ch'u"-y^u th^ung-ko sin, `m-he th^ung-ko ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it.
K'am k'ong Song-ti t^an-chhiang he Y`u-thai-ng`in ke Song-ti m^a? K`i ya k'am `m-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke Song-ti m^a? T^ong-y`en he!
Ki-y`en Song-ti ch'u"-y^u yit-vi, K`i chhiu oi p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in th^ung-ko sin th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, tui Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya he khiung-yong.
'An-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu ke sin hoi M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it su"t-h'au he-m`o? T^ong-y`en `m-he! Ti^en-to, ng`ai-t^eu s'u" fap-l+it h`an-kha y^u-h'au.
Lun-t'o ng`ai-t^eu hiet-th'ung ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, ko^an-he k`i ke k^in-ngiam, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e?
Na-he k`i p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in he y^in-vi k`i ke h`ang-v`i, k`i chhiu y^u-h'o kho^a-khi'eu; ch'ung-he, chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, k`i m`o m'a-ke h'o kho^a-khi'eu.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: " ^A-pak-l^a-h'on sin Song-ti, y^in-vi k`i ke sin, Song-ti chhiu son k`i cho ngi-ng`in."
Cho-se ke ng`in tet-t'o k^ung-chhi`en, `m son ^en-ti'en, he k`i yin-k^oi tet ke.
Ch'ung-he, y^u khi`en h'o phan chhui-ng`in cho m`o-chhui ke he Song-ti; sin K`i ke ng`in y^u-h'o th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, `m-he y^in-vi h`ang-v`i, he y^in-vi sin.
Thai-v'i s'o k'ong, ke `m-he kho h`ang-v`i p^un Song-ti son-cho ngi ke ng`in y^u fuk-hi, chhiu-he li'a-ke yi-su". K`i k'ong:
Ko-fam tet-t'o ngi`en-liong, chhui-ok tet-t'o sa-mi^en ke ng`in, k`i he ngi'ong-p^an y^u fuk-hi ^a!
M`o p^un Ch'u thin-chhui ke ng`in, li'a ng`in s+u"t-chhai y^u fuk-hi ^o!

Thai-v'i s'o-k'ong ke fuk-hi t^an-chhiang s+uk su kot-l^i ke ng`in m^a? `M-he! K`i ya he s+uk m`o su kot-l^i ke ng`in; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in y'in-yung Su"n-k^in ke fa, k'ong: " ^A-pak-l^a-h'on sin Song-ti, y^in-vi k`i ke sin, Song-ti chhiu son k`i cho ngi-ng`in."
Li'a he chhai m'a-ke chh`in-h`in ch^u"-ha fat-s^en ke n`e? He chhai ^A-pak-l^a-h'on su kot-l^i y^i-chhi`en, ya-he y^i-heu n`e? He chhai y^i-chhi`en, `m-he y^i-heu.

K`i heu-l`oi chang chiap-su kot-l^i; li'a he yit-ch'ung ki-ho, chu"n-m`in k`i chhai chiap-su kot-l^i y^i-chhi`en y'i-k^in y^in-vi sin p^un Song-ti son-cho ngi-ng`in l'e. S'o-y^i, tui s'o-y^u m`o su kot-l^i, ch'ung-he y^in-vi sin p^un Song-ti son-cho ngi ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he s+uk-l`in ke ^a-p^a.

K`i ya he y'i-k^in su kot-l^i ke ng`in ke ^a-p^a, `m t^an-chhiang he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu li^ang-su kot-l^i, chui chhung-yeu ke he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th`en-t'en ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, ko k`i chhai m`ang su kot-l^i y^i-chhi`en ke-ch'ung sin-s^im ke s^en-f+at.

Song-ti yin-h'i ^A-pak-l^a-h'on pin k`i ke ch'u"-s^un, k'ong k`i voi s`u"n-su li'a su"-kie. Li'a yin-h'i `m-he y^in-vi ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it, he y^in-vi k`i sin, chhiu p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in.
Na-he Song-ti ke yin-h'i he p^un ch^un-h`ang M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke ng`in, ng`in ke sin chhiu m`o yi-su", Song-ti ke yin-h'i ya m`o ka-chh+u"t.
Song-ti ke fat-khi'en he tui fap-l+it l`oi ke; m`o fap-l+it, chhiu m`o v`i-fam fap-l+it ke su".

S'o-y^i, yin-h'i he yung sin cho k^in-k'i ke; li'a he Song-ti yin-h'i ke p'o-chu"n: K`i voi ph+ak-ph+ak s^u"-^en p^un ^A-pak-l^a-h'on s'o-y^u ke ch'u"-s^un, `m t^an-chhiang he ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it ke, ya p^au-h`am ke-t^eu chhiong ^A-pak-l^a-h'on 'an-ngi`ong sin Song-ti ke ng`in. Y^in-vi ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he ng`ai-t^eu thai-k^a s+uk-l`in ke ^a-p^a.

Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Ng`ai l+ip ng`i cho chhin-t^o koet ke ^a-p^a." Chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en, li'a yin-h'i he y^u-h'au ke; ^A-pak-l^a-h'on s'o sin ke chhiu-he s'u" s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at, tui m`o chh'ong-chho van-y^u ke Song-ti.

Chhai m`o phan-mong ke s`u", ^A-pak-l^a-h'on h`an-he phan-mong, h`an-he sin, s'o-y^i chang s`ang-cho "chhin-t^o koet ke ^a-p^a". Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Ng`i thin-chh+ok voi y^u chhin-t^o ch'u"-s^un."

Ke-s`u", ^A-pak-l^a-h'on voi yit-pak se l'e. K`i chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i chhiong-he s'i-ng`in, S^a-l^a s^en-yuk ke k^i-n`en ya y'i-k^in s'ong-su"t, ch'ung-he, k`i ke sin-s^im pin m`o y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong chhiu k'am-s'eu.
K`i m`o s'ong-su"t sin-s^im, ya m`o f`ai-ng`i Song-ti ke yin-h'i; k`i ke sin-s^im f'an-ch'on h`an-kha ki^en-ku, chi^ong y`ung-k^ong k^ui p^un Song-ti.
K`i khok-sin Song-ti thin-chh+ok voi s`u"n-chhiu K`i s'o yin-h'i ke.
Li'a chhiu-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ngi'ong-p^an y^in-vi sin "p^un Song-ti son-cho ngi-ng`in" ke ngi`en-y^in.
Ch'ung-he, "son-cho ngi-ng`in" li'a-ki fa, `m t^an-chhiang he k'ong-lun k`i,
ya he vi ng`ai-t^eu l`oi k'ong ke. Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu sin s'u" ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke Song-ti, s'o-y^i K`i son ng`ai-t^eu cho ngi-ng`in.
Ch'u Y^a-s^u p^un-ng`in k^au chhai ng`in ke s'u-ch^ung, vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui l`oi s'i; Song-ti s'u" k`i f+uk-f+at, vi-t'o p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he.
Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu y^in-vi sin p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in, chhiu th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l^au Song-ti y^u f`o-h'o ke ko^an-he.
Ng`ai-t^eu yu th^ung-ko K^i-tuk, y^in-vi sin, chin-ng+ip li'a-ha s'o hi'ong-su Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en; y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu f^on-f^on h'i-h'i phan-mong f^un-hi'ong Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong!
Chhiu-he chhai fam-nan-ch^ung, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he f^on-h'i; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu t^i, fam-nan voi y^ong-s`u"n ngi^un-nai,
ngi^un-nai voi s^ang-chhut l'o-lien, l'o-lien voi tai-l`oi phan-mong.
Li'a phan-mong `m-voi p^un ng`ai-t^eu su"t-mong; y^in-vi Song-ti th^ung-ko K`i su p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke Su"n-L`in, chi^ong K`i ke thung-siak t'o chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im-ch^ung.
T^ong ng`ai-t^eu h`an ngi^on-ngi+ok ke s`u", K^i-tuk chhiu cheu Song-ti s'o-thin ke ngit-`e vi chhui-ng`in s'i.
Vi ngi-ng`in s'i chhiu chhin n`an-tet; vi h'o-ng`in s'i, f+et-ch'a y^u-ng`in k'am cho.
V`i-th+uk Song-ti tui ng`ai-t^eu p'eu-m`in K`i k'ong-`m-chhin ke thung-siak: Chhai ng`ai-t^eu h`an cho chhui-ng`in ke s`u", K^i-tuk chhiu y'i-k^in vi ng`ai-t^eu s'i!
Y^in-vi k`i li`u-hiet l`oi s'i, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha chhiu th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he; chi^ong-l`oi, k`i ko-kha oi kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i Song-ti ke fat-khi'en.

Ng`ai-t^eu ngi`en-l`oi he Song-ti ke s`u-th+it; ch'ung-he th^ung-ko Ki^a Lai-'e ke s'i, K`i p^un ng`ai-t^eu s`ang-cho K`i ke ph`en-y^u. Ki-y`en s`ang-cho K`i ke ph`en-y^u, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-kha oi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk ke s^ang-miang l`oi tet-kiu!
`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ki-y`en Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk p^un ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha chhiu cho Song-ti ke ph`en-y^u, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu th^ung-ko k`i f^on-f^on h'i-h'i l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.

Chhui th^ung-ko yit-ke ng`in l`oi ng+ip su"-kie, y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, s'i ya th^ung-ko chhui th`en-t'en l`oi; kiet-k'o, s'i chhiu l`im-to chhi`on ng`in-lui, y^in-vi m^i-yit-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung fam-li'au chhui.
Chhai fap-l+it p^an-pu y^i-chhi`en, su"-kie chhiu y^u chhui ke chh`un-chhai; ch'ung-he, m`o fap-l+it, ng`in chhiu m`o cheu fap-l+it ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi chiap-su h`in-f+at.

S^ui-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, tui ^A-t^ong to M^o-s^i, ng`in-lui h`an-he p^un s'i k'on-hot, chhiu-son m`o chhiong ^A-t^ong 'an-ngi`ong fam-t'o `m f+uk-chhi`ung Song-ti ke chhui, ng`in h`an-he m`o fap-thu s'am-kh^oi s'i ke khi`en-su". ^A-t^ong he y^i-heu chang oi l`oi ke-s`a ke yi-p'eu.

Ch'ung-he, li'ong-s`a pin `m-he v`an-chhi`on khiung-yong, y^in-vi Song-ti ph+ak-ph+ak ke ^en-su l^au ^A-t^ong ke chhui he thai-y^u f^un-ph+et ke. S^ui-y`en y^u chhin-t^o ng`in y^in-vi ^A-t^ong yit-s`a ke chhui l`oi s'i; ch'ung-he, Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en thai k^a chhin t^o. K`i th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk yit-s`a ph+ak-ph+ak su p^un chung-ng`in ke ^en-su ya he 'an-ngi`ong.

Song-ti ke ^en-su l^au yit-ke ng`in fam-chhui ke kiet-k'o y^u chhin-thai ke chh^a-ph+et. Y^in-vi yit-ke ng`in fam-chhui, chhiu tai-l`oi "Y^u-chhui" ke phan-kiet; ch'ung-he, t^o-t^o ng`in fam-chhui, sa tet-t'o "M`o-chhui" ke si^en-ko, li'a chhiu-he kh^am-`m-tet ke ^en-su!

S^ui-y`en y^in-vi yit-ke ng`in fam-chhui, s'i chhiu k'on-hot su"-ki^en-ng`in, ch'ung-he Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk yit-s`a s'o s`u"n-chhiu ke h`an-kha thai! S'o-y^u li^ang-su Song-ti f^ung-su"n ke ^en-ti'en, ph+ak-ph+ak tet-t'o chh^u"n-ngi ke ng`in, l^ung-ch'ung voi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk tet-t'o s^ang-miang l`oi ch'ong-khi`en.

Ch'ung-k'ong, y^in-vi yit-ke ng`in fam-chhui, chung-ng`in chhiu chhi`on-phu su thin-chhui; khiung-yong, y^in-vi yit-ke ng`in s'o-h`ang ke ngi, chung-ng`in chhiu l^ung-ch'ung tet-t'o si^en-ko m`o-chhui l`oi s`u"n-su s^ang-miang.
Y^in-vi yit-ke ng`in v`i-phoi min-lin, chung-ng`in chhiu s`ang-cho chhui-ng`in; chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, yit-ke ng`in sun-f+uk, chung-ng`in chhiu s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in.
Fap-l+it yit chu"-thin, ko-fam chhiu chen-k^a; ch'ung-he chhui y+et t^o, Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en ya y+et f^ung-su"n.
