Chhui he th^ung-ko s'i l`oi k'on-hot, chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en he th^ung-ko k^ung-ngi l`oi th'ung-chhu", oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l`oi tet-t'o y'un-s^en.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet ki-si+uk s^en-f+at chhai chhui ke t^i-poi, l`oi p^un Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en chen-k^a m^a?
T^ong-y`en cho-`m-tet! Tui chhui l`oi k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in s'i-thet. Ng`ai-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet ki-si+uk s^en-f+at chhai chhui ke t^i-poi n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m t^i, ng`ai-t^eu li^ang s'e-l^i l`oi th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en, chhiu-he li^ang s'e-l^i l`oi k^a-ng+ip k`i ke s'i m^a?

Th^ung-ko s'e-l^i, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in th`ung k`i khiung-ha s'i, khiung-ha m`ai-chong l'e! Li'a he vi-t'o oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu ko s^in ke s^en-f+at; chhiong thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a yung K`i y`ung-yeu ke thai-n`en, s'u" K^i-tuk tui s'i f+uk-f+at khiung-yong.
Na-he ng`ai-t^eu l^au K^i-tuk h+ap-y`i v`i-yit, k^in-l+it k`i ke s'i, ng`ai-t^eu thin-chh+ok ya voi l^au k`i h+ap-y`i v`i-yit, k^in-l+it k`i ke f+uk-f+at.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu ke khiu-ng`in y'i-k^in th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka, he oi f'i-m+et ng`ai-t^eu y^u chhui ke s^u"n-th'i, p^un ng`ai-t^eu `m-voi chai cho chhui ke n`u-li;
y^in-vi ng`in yit s'i, chhiu thot-l`i chhui ke khi`en-su".
Ng`ai-t^eu na-he th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha s'i, ng`ai-t^eu khok-sin, ng`ai-t^eu ya voi th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha s^ang.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu t^i, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in tui s'i f+uk-f+at, k`i `m-voi chai s'i l'e; s'i put-n`en chai kh'ung-chu" k`i l'e.
K`i ke s'i, he th`ung chhui chhiet-th^on ko^an-he, yit-p'ai chhiu y`en-m^an; k`i li'a-ha s^ang-t'en, he vi Song-ti l`oi s^ang.
Khiung-yong, tui chhui li'a f^ong-mien l`oi k'ong, ng`i-t^eu oi khon chhu"-k^a he s'i-thet ke, ch'ung-he chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s^ang-miang t^i-poi, ng`i-t^eu he vi Song-ti l`oi s^ang.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu voi s'i ke s^u"n-th'i `m-h'o chai p^un chhui k'on-hot, hi sun-chhi`ung s^u"n-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk.

Ng`i-t^eu s^u"n-th'i ke m^i-yit phu-fun ya `m-h'o hiong chhui th`eu-h`ong, hi cho si`a-ok ke hi-m'en. Ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu oi chi^ong chhu"-k^a hien-p^un Song-ti, chhiong tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke ng`in, chi^ong k^ui-ke ng`in fung-hien p^un K`i, cho k^ung-ngi ke hi-m'en.
Chhui thin-chh+ok `m-voi k'on-hot ng`i-t^eu; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in `m-he chhai fap-l+it t'ai-h^a, he chhai Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en ch^u"-ha.
'An-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu m`o chhai fap-l+it t'ai-h^a, he chhai Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en ch^u"-ha, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu cho-tet fam-chhui m^a? Chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet!

Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m t^i, ng`i-t^eu cho ng`in ke n`u-ph+uk chhiu oi f+uk-chhi`ung ch'u-ng`in; f+uk-chhi`ung m'a-ng`in, ng`i-t^eu chhiu he k`i ke n`u-ph+uk. Li'a chhiu he k'ong, ng`i-t^eu cho chhui ke n`u-ph+uk, kiet-k'o chhiu he s'i; ng`i-t^eu sun-chhi`ung Song-ti, chhiu s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in.
K'am-chhia Song-ti! S^ui-y`en ng`i-t^eu su"t cho chhui ke n`u-ph+uk, ch'ung-he li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu yit-s^im sun-chhi`ung s'o chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke kau-hiun.
Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in tui chhui-ch^ung su"t-fong chhut-l`oi, s`ang-cho ngi ke n`u-ph+uk.

Ng`ai ki^ang ng`i-t^eu `m li'au-ki'e ng`ai ke yi-su", chang yung ph^u-th^ung ke li-'e l`oi tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong. Th`eu-p'ai ng`i-t^eu fong-chi'ung chh`in-y+uk, v`i-phoi fap-l+it, cho chhui ke n`u-ph+uk; li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu oi chi^ong chhu"-k^a k^ui-ke ng`in hien-cho ngi ke n`u-ph+uk, p^un ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho su"n-kiet.
Ng`i-t^eu cho chhui ke n`u-ph+uk ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu `m chiap-su ngi ke yok-suk.
Ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha khon-cho kien-seu ke su", ke-s`u" cho-li'au, kiet-k'o tet-t'o m'a-ke h'o-chhu n`e? Put-ko he s'i thin-thin!

Li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in tui chhui-ch^ung su"t-fong chhut-l`oi, s`ang-cho Song-ti ke n`u-ph+uk; kiet-k'o ng`i-t^eu chi^ong s^ang-miang v`an-chhi`on hien p^un K`i, s'o s^u-s`u"n ke chhiu-he y'un-s^en.
Y^in-vi chhui ke thoi-ka chhiu-he s'i; ch'ung-he Song-ti s'o-su ke ^en-ti'en chhiu-he p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u h+ap-y`i v`i-yit, l`oi tet-t'o y'un-s^en.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu he li'au-ki'e fap-l+it ke ng`in, yit-thin voi m`in-ph+ak ng`ai s'o oi k'ong ke: Fap-l+it tui ng`in ke yok-suk, he chhai ng`in h`an s^ang ke s`u" chang y^u-h'au.

P'i-lun l`oi k'ong, yit-ke kiet-f^un ke fu-ng`in-k^a, ki^a l'o-k^ung h`an s^ang, k`i chhiu chhai fap-l+it ke yok-suk ch^u"-ha, cho-`m-tet l`i-kh^oi l'o-k^ung; l'o-k^ung na ko-s^u"n, k`i chhiu `m-s'u" chai su li'a fap-l+it ke han-chu".

S'o-y^i, l'o-k^ung h`an s^ang ke s`u", k`i na th`ung ph+et ke n`am-ng`in th`ung-k^i, chhiu oi khon k`i cho y`im-fu. Na-he ki^a l'o-k^ung ko-s^u"n thet-hi, chhai fap-l+it-song k`i chhiu-he yit-ke chhu"-y`u-ng`in, na-he th`ung ph+et ke n`am-ng`in kiet-f^un, ya `m son fam ki^en-y`im.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke chh`in-h`in ya he 'an-ngi`ong. Cheu fap-l+it l`oi k'ong, ng`i-t^eu he y'i-k^in s'i-thet ke ng`in, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he K^i-tuk s^u"n-th'i ke yit-phu-fun; ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha y'i-k^in k^ui-s+uk tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke Ch'u, p^un ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet h'o-h'o vi Song-ti k^ung-chok.
Ng`ai-t^eu h`an cheu ngiuk-th'i s^en-f+at ke s`u", M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it kit-h'i ng`ai-t^eu ke si`a-ngiam, chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke k^i-th'i ch^ung fat-chok, kiet-k'o chhiu-he s'i.

Ch'ung-he, tui k'on-hot ng`ai-t^eu ke fap-l+it l`oi k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu he y'i-k^in s'i-thet ke ng`in; li'a-ha, fap-l+it y'i-k^in m`o fap-thu yok-suk ng`ai-t^eu l'e. Ng`ai-t^eu su"-fung Song-ti he cheu Su"n-L`in ke s^in ch'u"-su", `m-he chai cheu fap-l+it thi`au-v`un ke khiu yong-su"t.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet k'ong fap-l+it p'un-s^u"n he chhui m`o? T^ong-y`en cho-`m-tet! Ti^en-to, th^ung-ko fap-l+it, ng`ai chang t^i chhui he m'a-ke. Na `m-he fap-l+it k'ong "Cho-`m-tet th^am-s^im", ng`ai chhiu `m t^i th^am-s^im he m'a-ke.
Chhui th^ung-ko fap-l+it ke min-lin chh`im-t'o k^i-fi, chhai ng`ai t^i-poi kit-h'i kok-ch'ung ke th^am-ngiam. M`o fap-l+it, chhui chhiu m`o h'au-l+it.
Ng`ai p'un-l`oi s^en-f+at chhai fap-l+it ch^u" ngoi; heu-l`oi fap-l+it ke min-lin l`oi-to, chhui chhiu fat-s^en h'au-l+it, kiet-k'o ng`ai chhiu chhai chhui-ch^ung s'i-thet.
Fap-l+it ke min-lin ngi`en-l`oi he oi p^un ng`in tet-t'o s^ang-miang ke; ch'ung-he, tui ng`ai l`oi k'ong, k`i f'an-ch'on sa tai-l`oi m+et-m`ong.
Y^in-vi chhui th^ung-ko fap-l+it ke min-lin chh`im-t'o k^i-fi y'u-f+et ng`ai, ya th^ung-ko fap-l+it ke min-lin hoi-s'i ng`ai.
M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it p'un-s^u"n he s`u"n-su"n ke; fap-l+it ke min-lin he s`u"n-su"n, k^ung-ph`in l^au li`ong-san ke.

'An-ngi`ong k'ong, he ke li`ong-san ke hoi-s'i ng`ai m^a? T^ong-y`en `m-he! He chhui! Ch'ung-he, chhui he th^ung-ko ke li`ong-san ke chang hi'en-chhut ngi`en-h`in, kiet-k'o chhiu tai-l`oi s'i. Th^ung-ko fap-l+it ke min-lin, chhui ke ok-chu"t chhiu y+et-l`oi y+et m`in-hi'en.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it he s+uk-l`in ke; ch'ung-he, ng`ai he s+uk ngiuk-th'i ke, y'i-k^in mai p^un chhui cho n`u-li.
Ng`ai s'o-cho ke, ng`ai chhu"-k^a m`o m`in-ph+ak: Y^in-vi ng`ai s'o ngien-yi ke, phi^en-phi^en `m hi h`ang; ng`ai s'o-n^au ke, f'an-ch'on hi cho.
Ng`ai na-he cho ng`ai `m ngien-yi cho ke su", ng`ai chhiu-he s`u"n-ngin fap-l+it he chh+ok ke.
Ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai s'o-cho ke, pin `m-he chu"n-k^in ng`ai cho ke, he chhai ng`ai t^i-poi ke chhui cho ke.
Ng`ai ya t^i, chhai ng`ai t^i-poi, chhiu-he chhai ng`ai ngiuk-th'i ke t^i-poi, m`o li`ong-san. Y^in-vi, ng`ai y^u h`ang-san ke s^im, ch'ung-he m`o h`ang-san ke n`en-l+it.
Ng`ai s'o ngien-yi ke san, ng`ai phi^en-phi^en `m h`ang; ng`ai s'o `m ngien-yi ke chhui-ok, ng`ai phi^en-phi^en hi cho.
Ki-y`en ng`ai cho ng`ai s'o `m ngien-yi ke, chhiu p'eu-su" li'a `m-he ng`ai cho ke, he chhai ng`ai t^i-poi ke chhui s'o-cho ke.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai fat-hien y^u yit-ke fap-chet chhai chok-koai: Chhai ng`ai oi h`ang-san ke s`u", si`a-ok ch'ung-he chh`an-t'en ng`ai.
Ng`ai ke nui-s^im he kak-yi Song-ti ke k^ui-chet;

ch'ung-he, ng`ai khon-chhut ng`ai ke k^i-th'i p^un nang-ngoi yit-ke fap-chet kh'ung-chu"-t'en; li'a fap-chet th`ung ng`ai nui-s^im s'o kak-yi ke k^ui-chet k^au-chan, hoi ng`ai m`o phan-fap thot-l`i chhai ng`ai t^i-poi chok-koai ke chhui ke fap-chet.
Ng`ai h`an k^an-kh'u ^o! M'a-ng`in n`en kiu ng`ai thot-l`i li'a hoi-s'i ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i n`e?

K'am-chhia Song-ti, th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, K`i chhiu n`en kiu ng`ai. Ng`ai ke chh`in-h`in he 'an-ngi`ong: Ng`ai chhu"-k^a ch'u" n`en yung s^im-l`in sun-chhi`ung Song-ti ke k^ui-chet; ch'ung-he, ng`ai ke ngiuk-th'i sa h`ong-f+uk chhui ke fap-chet.
Li'a-ha, ke-t^eu s^ang chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s^ang-miang t^i-poi ke ng`in chhiu `m-s'u" su thin-chhui l'e.
Y^in-vi Su"n-L`in ke k^ui-chet, chhiu-he p^un ng`in th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en tet-t'o s^ang-miang ke, y'i-k^in chi^ong ng`i tui chhui l^au s'i ke fap-chet ch^u"-ha su"t-fong chhut-l`oi.

Y^in-vi ngiuk-th'i ke ngi^on-ngi+ok, M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it m`o fap-thu s`u"n-chhiu ke, Song-ti y'i-k^in chh^in-chhu" s`u"n-chhiu l'e. Song-ti chh^ai-phai chhu"-k^a ke Lai-'e, s'u" k`i th`ung ng`ai-t^eu ng`in-lui khiung-yong y^u chhui ke ngiuk-th'i, vi-t'o oi thin ngiuk-th'i t^i-poi ke chhui, chi^ong chhui chh`u-thet.
Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, he oi p^un fap-l+it ke chu"n-t^ong y^eu-khi`u s+u"t-hien chhai ng`ai li'a-t^eu `m h`ong-f+uk ngiuk-th'i, ch'u"-y^u sun-chhi`ung Su"n-L`in ke ng`in s^u"n-song.
Y^in-vi, h`ong-f+uk ngiuk-th'i ke ng`in s^im-k^on s'o si'ong ke chhiu-he ngiuk-th'i ke su"; sun-chhi`ung Su"n-L`in ke ng`in s^im-k^on s'o si'ong ke chhiu-he Su"n-L`in s'o y^eu-khi`u ke su".
S^im hiong-t'en ngiuk-th'i, kiet-k'o chhiu-he s'i; s^im hiong-t'en Su"n-L`in, chang voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang l^au ph`in-^on.
S'o-y^i, s^im hiong-t'en ngiuk-th'i ke ng`in chhiu-he th`ung Song-ti chok-tui; y^in-vi k`i `m sun-chhi`ung Song-ti ke k^ui-chet, su"-s+u"t-song ya cho `m-t'o.
H`ong-f+uk ngiuk-th'i ke ng`in, tet `m-t'o Song-ti ke f^on-h'i.

Lun-t'o ng`i-t^eu, na-he Song-ti ke L`in chu"n-k^in h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi, ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at chhiu `m-voi su ngiuk-th'i ke ch^u"-phi, v`i-y^u su Su"n-L`in ke k'on-l^i. Ng`in m`o K^i-tuk ke L`in, chhiu `m-he s+uk k`i.

Ch'ung-he, K^i-tuk na h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi, chhiu-son ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i voi y^in-vi chhui l`oi s'i, Song-ti ke L`in ya voi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o s^ang-miang, y^in-vi Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in l'e.

Song-ti ke L`in s'u" Y^a-s^u tui s'i f+uk-f+at; li'a-ke L`in na h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi, 'an-ngi`ong, li'a-ke s'u" K^i-tuk tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke Song-ti, ya voi th^ung-ko h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi ke Su"n-L`in, chi^ong s^ang-miang su p^un ng`i-t^eu voi s'i ke s^u"n-th'i.
S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu ke s^en-f+at `m yin-k^oi chai p^un ngiuk-th'i ch^u"-phi l'e.
Ng`i-t^eu na h`ong-f+uk ngiuk-th'i, thin-chh+ok voi m+et-m`ong; ng`i-t^eu na kho Su"n-L`in chhu"-s'i chhui-ok ke h`ang-v`i, tit-khok voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
P^un Song-ti ke L`in tai-li^ang ke ng`in, k`i-t^eu chhiu-he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.

Y^in-vi, Song-ti s'o-su ke L`in `m-he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu cho n`u-li l`oi chh+ok-ki^ang; he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng. Th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in, ng`ai-t^eu ham Song-ti: "^A-p^a! Ng`ai ke Y`a!"
Song-ti ke L`in l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke l`in si^ong-khiung chu"n-m`in ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.

Ki-y`en he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu y^u-h'o hi'ong-su Song-ti vi K`i ke ch'u"-m`in s'o yi-phi ke fuk-hi, ya oi th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha hi'ong-su Song-ti vi k`i s'o p'o-li`u ke; y^in-vi, na-he ng`ai-t^eu f^un-t^am K^i-tuk ke kh'u-nan, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu y^u-h'o f^un-hi'ong k`i ke y`ung-k^ong.
Ng`ai si'ong, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha ke kh'u-nan, th`ung chi^ong-l`oi oi hi'en-m`in p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke y`ung-k^ong l`oi p'i, s+u"t-chhai `m son m'a-ke.
Yit-chhiet su-chho ke, l^ung-ch'ung ngi+et-s`u"n phan-mong Song-ti ke chung ch'u"-'ng hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.
Y^in-vi k^ui-ke su-chho ke pien-cho h^i-kh^ung, `m-he p'un-s^u"n ke yi-su", he Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi. Ch'ung-he, su-chho ke h`an-he chhai phan-mong,
y^u yit-ngit voi thot-l`i phai-fai ke hot-chu", tet-t'o th`ung Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng f^un-hi'ong k^ong-y`ung ke chhu"-y`u.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, chh+u"t-to li'a-ha, yit-chhiet su-chho ke chhi`on-phu chhai thung-kh'u-ch^ung k'in-chh^en, chhiong s^en-s'an-chhi`en ke chhu"n-thung.

`M t^an-chhiang su-chho ke 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai li'a-t^eu y^u Su"n-L`in cho chui-si^en siuk ke k'o-ch'u" ke ng`in, ya he s^im-k^on than-sit, t'en-heu Song-ti s^u-y^ong ng`ai-t^eu cho K`i ke ch'u"-'ng, h'o p^un chhu"-k^a k^ui-ke ng`in tet-t'o chhu"-y`u.
Ng`ai-t^eu tet-kiu he y^in-vi phan-mong. Ng`ai-t^eu s'o phan-mong ke, na-he y'i-k^in khon-t'o, h`an ^on-to m'a-ke phan-mong n`o! M'a-ng`in h`an phan-mong k`i s'o khon-t'o ke n`e?
Ng`ai-t^eu na-he phan-mong m`ang khon-t'o ke, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu voi ngi^un-nai l`oi t'en.

Khiung-yong, ng`ai-t^eu ke ngi^on-ngi+ok y^u Su"n-L`in p^ong-chhu. Ng`ai-t^eu p'un-l`oi `m t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an kh`i-t'o; ch'ung-he, Su"n-L`in chh^in-chhu" yung k'ong `m-chhut ke than-sit l`oi vi ng`ai-t^eu tui Song-ti kh`i-khi`u.
Kam-chhat ng`in-s^im ke Song-ti t^i Su"n-L`in ke yi-su", y^in-vi Su"n-L`in cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, thoi su"n-th`u kh`i-khi`u.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, Song-ti th`ung ke-t^eu kin-oi K`i ke ng`in, chhiu-he K`i cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi s'o f^u-seu ke, khiung-ha k^ung-chok, s'u" van-su" l^ung-ch'ung y^u li-yit.

Y^in-vi Song-ti yi-si^en ngin-su"t k`i-t^eu, yi-si^en chi^ong k`i-t^eu ki'en-si'en chhut-l`oi, oi p^un k`i-t^eu th`ung K`i ke Lai-'e y^u khiung-yong ke th+it-chu"t, h'o p^un K`i ke Lai-'e chhai t^o-t^o hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ch^ung cho ch'ong-ch'u".

Song-ti s'o yi-si^en ki'en-si'en ke ng`in, K`i chhiu f^u-seu k`i-t^eu; K`i s'o f^u-seu ke ng`in, K`i chhiu si^en-phan k`i-t^eu cho ngi-ng`in; K`i si^en-phan cho ngi-ng`in ke, K`i chhiu p^un k`i-t^eu f^un-hi'ong y`ung-k^ong.
Ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Song-ti na chhai ng`ai-t^eu li'a-phi'en, m'a-ng`in n`en th`ung ng`ai-t^eu chok-tui n`e?
Li`en chhu"-k^a ke Lai-'e, K`i ya phan-tet h^i-s^en, su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu chung-ng`in. K'am k'ong K`i `m-voi chi^ong van-v+ut ya ph+ak-ph+ak su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu m^a?
M'a-ng`in voi ko Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke ng`in n`e? Song-ti y'i-k^in si^en-pu k`i-t^eu m`o-chhui l'e!

'An-ngi`ong, h`an-y^u m'a-ng`in voi thin k`i-t^eu ke chhui n`e? K'am he ko-s^u"n ke K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u m^a? M`o kh'o-n`en! Su"-s+u"t-song, k`i ch'o chhiu f+uk-f+at, li'a-ha chh^o chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en, chhai ke-vi thoi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-khi`u!

Ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, y^u m'a-ng`in n`en s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk ke thung-siak kak-chhi+et n`e? He fam-nan m^a? He khun-kh'u m^a? He pet-hoi m^a? He t'u-k^i m^a? He khi`ung-kh'u m^a? He ng`ui-hi'am m^a? He t^o-kiam m^a?
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Vi-t'o Ng`i ke y`en-ku, ng`ai-t^eu k^ui-ngit t'en-s'i; ng`in khon ng`ai-t^eu chhiong-he oi chh`u" ke y`ong.
L^ung-ch'ung `m-he! Chhai li'a yit-chhiet su"-chh`in t'ang-k^o, ng`ai-t^eu kho thung-siak ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u y'i-k^in v'un-y`ang l'e!

Y^in-vi ng`ai khok-sin, m`o m'a-ke n`en s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Song-ti ke thung-siak kak-chhi+et: Put-k'on he s'i, ya-he s^ang; he thi^en-s'u", ya-he kh`i-th^a chhai thi^en-t'ang ch'ong-khi`en ke; he li'a-ha ke, ya-he chi^ong-l`oi ke;

he chhai k^o-thi^en ke, ya-he chhai chh^u"m-y^en ke; ya-he su-chho ke y'i-chhiu ch^ung yit-chhiet ke t^ung-s^i. M`o m'a-ke n`en s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Song-ti ke thung-siak kak-chhi+et; K`i ke thung-siak he th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke.
Ng`ai k'ong ch^u"n-s^im fa; ng`ai he s+uk K^i-tuk ke ng`in, `m-voi k'ong f^a-li^au. Ng`ai ke li`ong-s^im chhai Su"n-L`in ke k^ong-cheu ch^u"-ha ya chu"n-m`in ng`ai m`o k'ong f^a-li^au:
Ng`ai s+u"p-f^un y`u-s`eu, ng`ai ke s^im yit-chh+u"t thung-to k'ong-`m-tet!
Vi-t'o ng`ai ke th`ung-p^au, ng`ai ke kut-ngiuk ch^u" chh^in, chhiu-he ng`ai p'un-s^u"n p^un Song-ti chu-ch'u, th`ung K^i-tuk kak-chhi+et, ng`ai ya k^am-ngien.

K`i-t^eu he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, Song-ti ke si'en-m`in; Song-ti su k`i-t^eu ch'u"-'ng ke mi`ang-fun, y^u-h'o f^un-hi'ong K`i ke y`ung-yeu. Song-ti th`ung k`i-t^eu l+ip-yok, su k`i-t^eu fap-l+it; k`i-t^eu t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an kin-pai Song-ti, ya chiap-su-li'au K`i ke yin-h'i.
K`i-t^eu he chung chh+uk-ch'ong ke ch'u"-s^un; cheu hiet-th'ung l`oi k'ong, K^i-tuk th`ung k`i-t^eu he khiung-chh+uk. Ngien th'ung-chhu" van-y^u ke Song-ti y'un-y'en tet-t'o siung-chan! ^A-m'en.
Ng`ai `m-he k'ong Song-ti ke yin-h'i y'i-k^in l+ok-kh^ung. Y^in-vi, Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in m`o chhi`on-phu he Song-ti ke si'en-m`in;
^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un ya m`o chhi`on-phu he k`i ke ch^u"n ch'u"-'ng. Song-ti su"t tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on k'ong: "V`i-y^u tui Y^i-sat chhut ke, chang son he ng`i ke ch'u"-s^un."
Li'a chhiu-he k'ong, chhu"-y`en s^en-yuk s'o kiung ke, m`o yit-thin he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng; v`i-y^u tui Song-ti ke yin-h'i l`oi kiung ke, chang son he Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ke yin-h'i he 'an-ngi`ong k'ong ke: "S`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u", ng`ai oi to-ch'on-l`oi, S^a-l^a voi kiung yit-ke lai-'e."
`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, Li-pak-k^a ke li'ong-ke lai-'e, ya he tui khiung yit-ke ^a-p^a, chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ke si^en-ch'u Y^i-sat l`oi kiung ke.

Ch'ung-he, vi-t'o oi p'eu-su" K`i cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi y'i-k^in ki'en-si'en kh`i-ch^ung yit-ke lai-'e, Song-ti tui Li-pak-k^a k'ong: "Thai ke lai-'e oi f+uk-su" se ke lai-'e." K`i k'ong li'a-ki fa ke s`u", k`i-t^eu h`an-m`ang chhut-se, h`an-m`ang h`ang-san ya-he chok-ok; kh'o-kien, Song-ti ke ki'en-si'en he cheu K`i chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi, th`ung k`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i m`o ko^an-he.
Chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Ng`ai siak Ng^a-kok, n^au Y^i-so."
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet k'ong Song-ti m`o k^ung-ph`in he-m`o? T^ong-y`en cho-`m-tet!
Y^in-vi K`i su"t tui M^o-s^i k'ong: "Ng`ai oi l`in-m'en m'a-ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en m'a-ng`in, oi thung-siak m'a-ng`in, chhiu thung-siak m'a-ng`in!"
Kh'o-kien, Song-ti ke ki'en-si'en `m-he cheu ng`in ke s^im-ngien ya-he t'a-piang, he cheu K`i ke l`in-m'en l`oi ke.
Su"n-k^in t^i-poi, Song-ti tui ^Ai-kh+ip-v`ong k'ong: "Ng`ai l+ip ng`i cho v`ong, he oi yung ng`i l`oi ch^ong-hi'en Ng`ai ke khi`en-n`en, p^un Ng`ai ke mi`ang chh`on-phien thi^en-ha."
'An-ngi`ong k'ong-l`oi, Song-ti oi l`in-m'en m'a-ng`in, chhiu l`in-m'en m'a-ng`in; K`i oi p^un m'a-ng`in ngang-ki'ang, chhiu p^un m'a-ng`in ngang-ki'ang.
Kh'o-n`en ng`i voi tui ng`ai k'ong: "Ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an h`an cho-tet koai ng`in? M'a-ng`in n`en t'i-khong K`i ke ch'u"-yi ^a?"
Ch'ung-he ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`i he m'a-ng`in? Ngi'ong-p^an k'am chhang Song-ti ke fa n`e! F`i-`e ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet tui chho k`i ke ng`in k'ong: "Ng`i cho-m'a-ke chho ng`ai chhiong 'an-ngi`ong n`e?"

K'am k'ong s^eu-f`i s^u"-fu m`o-khi`en n^a n`ai l`oi chho k`i s'o-oi chho ke t^ung-s^i m^a? K`i k'am cho-`m-tet yung khiung-th`on n`ai l`oi chu"-chho li'ong-chak hi-m'en, yit-chak kui-chhung ke, yit-chak ph^u-th^ung ke m^a?

Song-ti s'o-cho ke ya he 'an-ngi`ong. K`i oi hi'en-su" K`i k^ung-ngi ke fat-khi'en, ch^ong-hi'en K`i ke khi`en-n`en; ch'ung-he, K`i yu oi yung nai-s^im kh^on-y`ung K`i fat-khi'en ke tui-siong, chhiu-he ke-t^eu p'un-l`oi yin-t^ong oi t'a-lan ke hi-m'en.
Th`ung-s`u", K`i h`an oi chi^ong K`i f^ung-su"n ke y`ung-yeu tui ng`ai-t^eu l`oi hi'en-m`in; ng`ai-t^eu he K`i l`in-m'en ke tui-siong, he K`i s'o yi-phi oi chiap-su K`i y`ung-yeu ke ng`in.
Ng`ai-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang he K`i tui Y`u-thai-ng`in t^i-poi, ya he tui Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, f^u-seu chhut-l`oi ke.

Li'a chhiu-he K`i chhai H`o-s^i-^a S^u t^i-poi s'o-k'ong ke: P'un-l`oi `m-he Ng`ai ch'u"-m`in ke, Ng`ai oi chh^u"n k`i-t^eu cho "Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in", p'un-l`oi Ng`ai m`o kak-yi ke p^ang-koet, Ng`ai oi chh^u"n k`i cho "Ng`ai s'o-siak ke".
Th`eu-p'ai Ng`ai su"t tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu `m-he Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in; ch'ung-he li'a-ha, k`i-t^eu oi chh^u"n-cho "Y'un-s^en Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng".
Ko^an-he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, Y^i-soi-^a su"t thai-s^ang h^em-k'ong: " Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in s^ui-y`en chhiong h'oi-s^a 'an t^o, ch'ung-he ch'u"-y^u chh^un-h^a ke s'eu-su ng`in voi tet-kiu,
y^in-vi Ch'u oi t^ong-kiak yu chh+at-t'ai l`oi s'u"m-phan chhi`on ng`in-lui."

Yu chhiong Y^i-soi-^a th`eu-p'ai s'o k'ong: "Na `m-he Ch'u --- Van-ki^un ke Ngi`en-soi vi ng`ai-t^eu li`u-h^a yit-t^eu heu-thoi, ng`ai-t^eu ch'o chhiu-chhiong S'o-t^o-m^a l^au Ng`o-m^o-l^a 'an-ngi`ong l^o!"
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in p'un-l`oi m`o chh`im Song-ti ke ngi, sa y^in-vi sin l`oi s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in;
ch'ung-he, Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ch^ui-khi`u th^ung-ko fap-l+it l`oi s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in, f'an-ch'on m`o th+at-s`u"n muk-tit.
Ngi'ong-p^an voi 'an-ngi`ong n`e? Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m kho sin-s^im, f'an-ch'on kho h`ang-v`i, kiet-k'o chhiu tiet chhai ke "Pan-kiok-s+ak" t'ang-k^o.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Khon ^a, Ng`ai chhai Siak-^on piong yit-te pan-kiok ke s+ak-th`eu, he voi s'u"-ng`in tiet-t'o ke thai s+ak-th`eu! Ch'ung-he, sin-kho K`i ke ng`in chhiu `m-voi su"t-mong.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an ngi+et-s`u"n phan-mong ng`ai ke th`ung-p^au voi tet-kiu; vi li'a-khien su", ng`ai ya yit-chh+u"t khi'en-khi`u Song-ti!
Ng`ai cho-tet cho-chu"n, k`i-t^eu tui Song-ti khok-s+u"t f^i-s`ong ngi+et-s^im, kh'o-sit k`i-t^eu ke ngi+et-s^im `m-he yung ch^u"n chu"-su"t cho k^i-chh'u.
K`i-t^eu m`o m`in-ph+ak Song-ti ke ngi, si'ong-oi l+ip chhu"-k^a ke ngi, `m h'en sun-chhi`ung Song-ti ke ngi.
Kh`i-s+u"t, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in s'u" fap-l+it ke k^ung-h'au th`in-ch'u", p^un yit-chhiet sin k`i ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung tet-t'o s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in.
Y^u-ko^an th^ung-ko ch^un-s'u fap-l+it l`oi s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in li'a-khien su", M^o-s^i su"t 'an-ngi`ong si'a: "Ch^un-s'u fap-l+it min-lin ke ng`in, voi y^in-vi fap-l+it tet-t'o s^ang-miang."

Ch'ung-he, y^in-vi sin l`oi s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in li'a-khien su", Su"n-k^in 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: "Ng`i `m-h'o s^im-k^on k'ong: M'a-ng`in oi s^ong-hi thi^en-t'ang ^a?" (Li'a chhiu-he k'ong, m'a-ng`in oi hi tai K^i-tuk h^a-l`oi n`e?)
"Ya `m-h'o k'ong: M'a-ng`in oi h^a-hi y^im-ki^en ^a?" (Li'a chhiu-he k'ong, m'a-ng`in oi hi chi^ong K^i-tuk tui s'i-ng`in-ch^ung tai s^ong-l`oi n`e?)

Li'a-t^eu fa ke yi-su" he k'ong: "Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho l`i ng`i m`o k'i-y'en, chhiu chhai ng`i khi'eu-ch^ung, chhai ng`i ke s^im-nui." Von ki-fa l`oi k'ong, chhiu-he chhai ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on "sin ke ch^u"n-tho" t^i-poi.
Ng`i na-he choi s`u"n-ngin Y^a-s^u cho Ch'u, s^im si^ong-sin Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, ng`i chhiu voi tet-kiu.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu s^im 'an-ngi`ong si^ong-sin, chhiu voi tet-t'o s`ang-cho ngi-ng`in; choi 'an-ngi`ong s`u"n-ngin, chhiu voi tet-kiu.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: "F`am sin-kho K`i ke ng`in chhiu `m-voi su"t-mong."

Li'a-ki fa he ch'u" s'o-y^u ke ng`in k'ong ke, y^in-vi m`o Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke f^un-ph+et; Song-ti he van-ng`in ke Ch'u, K`i oi f^ung-f^ung fu-fu su-fuk p^un s'o-y^u khi`u-ham K`i ke ng`in.
Chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "F`am khi`u-ham Ch'u mi`ang ke ng`in yit-thin tet-kiu."
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu m`o sin K`i, ngi'ong-p^an voi khi`u-ham K`i n`e? M`o th^ang-t'o, ngi'ong-p^an voi sin n`e? M`o ng`in chh`on, ngi'ong-p^an voi y^u-h'o th^ang n`e?
M`o ng`in fung chh^ai-phai, ngi'ong-p^an voi y^u ng`in chh`on n`e? Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Chh`on fuk-y^im ke ng`in, k`i-t^eu ke kiok-chiak h`an chi^ang ^o!"
Ch'ung-he, pin `m-he m^i-yit-ke ng`in chhi`on-phu chiap-su fuk-y^im, y^in-vi Y^i-soi-^a su"t k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on ke, y^u m'a-ng`in sin n`e?"
Kh'o-kien, sin he tui th^ang l`oi ke, th^ang he tui chh`on-y`ong K^i-tuk l`oi ke.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai oi chu"t-mun: K`i-t^eu chu"n-k^in m`o th^ang-ko m^a? T^ong-y`en th^ang-ko! Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: K`i-t^eu ke s^ang chh`on-to ng`in-ki^en; k`i-t^eu ke fa chh`on-phien thi^en-ha.

Ng`ai chai chu"t-mun: Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in chu"n-k^in `m-t^i m^a? Chui-si^en, M^o-s^i yung Song-ti ke fa y'i-k^in f`i-tap li'a-ke mun-th`i, k'ong: Ng`ai oi yung '`m son-he ch'u"-m`in' ke m`in-chh+uk l`oi kit ng`i-t^eu chhit-tu, Ng`ai oi yung ngong-tong ke koet ngi^a ng`i-t^eu su-hi.
Y^i-soi-^a h`an-kha thai-t'am chh`on Song-ti ke fa k'ong: M`ang-su"t chh`im Ng`ai ke ng`in, Ng`ai p^un k`i-t^eu fat-hien, m`ang-su"t khi`u Ng`ai ke ng`in, Ng`ai tui k`i-t^eu hi'en-hien.
Ch'ung-he, ko^an-he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, K`i k'ong: Tui li'a phoi-ngi+ak hau-au ke ch'u"-m`in, Ng`ai k^ui-ngit chh^un-chhut Ng`ai ke s^ung-s'u, h^em k`i-t^eu ch'on-l`oi th`ung Ng`ai k'ong-f`o.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai oi mun: Song-ti hi-chhi+et K`i ke ch'u"-m`in l'e, he-m`o? T^ong-y`en `m-he! Ng`ai chhu"-k^a chhiu-he yit-ke Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke heu-thoi, s+uk Phien-ng^a-m'en ke k^i-chh+uk.
Song-ti m`o hi-chhi+et K`i tui k'u-ch'o chhiu ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in. Ng`i-t^eu t^i, Su"n-k^in ki-chai k'ong, Y^i-li-^a tui Song-ti ko Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke s`u",
k`i k'ong: "Ch'u ^a, k`i-t^eu chh`u"-thet Ng`i s'o-y^u ke si^en-t^i, chhak-thet Ng`i ke chi-th`an; ch'u"-y^u chh^un ng`ai yit-ke ng`in, k`i-t^eu h`an-he oi chh`im ng`ai, s^u ng`ai ke miang."
Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an f`i-tap k`i n`e? K`i k'ong: "Ng`ai y^u vi chhu"-k^a li`u-h^a chhit-chhi^en ng`in, k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung m`o pai-ko k'a-s`u"n P^a-l+it."
Li'a-ha ke chh`in-h`in ya he khiung-yong: Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke ^en-ti'en s'o ki'en-si'en ke ng`in ch'u"-y^u chh^un s'eu-su.
Song-ti ke ki'en-si'en he chhut-y`i K`i ke ^en-ti'en, `m-he khon ng`in ke h`ang-v`i; na-he khon ng`in ke h`ang-v`i, s'o-vi ^en-ti'en chhiu `m son ^en-ti'en l'e.

Kiet-k'o ngi'ong-p^an n`e? Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in tet `m-t'o k`i-t^eu s'o chh`im-khi`u ke, ch'ung-he Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke s'eu-su ng`in chh`im-t'o l'e; kh`i-th^a ke chhiu ngang-ki'ang `m th^ang Song-ti ke f^u-seu.
Chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Song-ti s'u" k`i-t^eu ke s^im-l`in m`a-pi thet-hi; chh+u"t-to li'a-ha, k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u h`an khon-`m-t'o, ng'i-k^ung th^ang-`m-t'o."
Thai-v'i ya su"t k'ong: Ngien k`i-t^eu ke y`en-s+it s`ang-cho l`o-mi'ong, pien-cho ham-chi'ang; ngien k`i-t^eu pan-t'o, su-chhin h`in-f+at!
Ngien k`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u m`ung-m`ung, khon ya khon `m-t'o; ngien k`i-t^eu ke poi-n`ong k^u-k^u, yit-chh+u"t to y'un-y'en!

Ng`ai h`an-oi mun: Y`u-thai-ng`in yit su"t-chiuk, chhiu yit-chh+u"t hong-`m-h'i l'e, he-m`o? T^ong-y`en `m-he! Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke ko-fam, ch'u"n-kiu chhiu l`im-to Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, l`oi p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in chhit-tu, chh+u"t-to k`i-t^eu fun-fat h'i-l`oi.

Ki-y`en Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ko-fam tai p^un su"-ki^en f^ung-su"n ke fuk-hi, k`i-t^eu l`in-sin ke ph`in-khi`ung f'an-ch'on s'u" Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in fu-chiuk; 'an-ngi`ong, na-he Y`u-thai-ng`in chhi`on-th'i tet-kiu, k'am `m-he voi tai-l`oi h`an-kha thai ke fuk-hi m^a?
Li'a-ha, ng`ai oi l^au ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in k'ong: Ki-y`en ng`ai he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke s'u"-th`u, ng`ai t^ong-y`en khon ng`ai ke chu"t-fun cho y`ung-k^ong;
ng`ai h^i-mong y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong voi kit-h'i ng`ai th`ung-p^au ke chhit-tu l`oi fun-fat, p^un k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u-t^eu ng`in voi tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu.
Na-he k`i-t^eu su hi-chhi+et, f'an-ch'on s'u" su"-ki^en-ng`in s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ph`en-y^u; 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu su chiap-n+ap, k'am `m-he voi s'u" s'i-ng`in tet-t'o s^ang-miang m^a?
Mien-th`on ke thi-yit-te na hien-p^un Song-ti, k^ui-th`on chhiu-he s+uk K`i ke. Su-th`eu na hien-p^un Song-ti, 'an-ngi`ong, li`en su-k^i ya he s+uk K`i ke l'e.

K'am-l'am-su phu-fun ke k^i-'e p^un K`i 'au-h^a-l`oi, chiap-s^ong y^a-s^ang k'am-l'am-su ke k^i-'e; ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in chhiu-chhiong y^a-s^ang ke k'am-l'am-su, li'a-ha f^un-hi'ong Y`u-thai-ng`in f^ung-su"n ke s^ang-miang.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o khon-khi^ang ke-t^eu chhiong k^i-'e p^un K`i 'au-h^a-l`oi ke ng`in. Ng`i-t^eu he k^i-'e thin-thin, ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet chhu"-kho^a n`e? Oi t^i, `m-he ng`i-t^eu thok-t'en su-th`eu, he ng`i-t^eu p^un su-th`eu thok-t'en!
Kh'o-n`en ng`i voi k'ong: "Ke-t^eu k^i-'e p^un K`i 'au-h^a-l`oi, he y^in-vi oi chi^ong ng`ai chiap-s^ong-hi."
M`o `m-chh+ok. K`i-t^eu y^in-vi `m sin, chhiu p^un K`i 'au-h^a-l`oi; ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi sin, chhiu kh^i-tet-chhai. S'o-y^i ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o ki^eu-ngau, f'an-ch'on oi chh`un kin-vi ke s^im.
Ki-y`en Y`u-thai-ng`in he ngi`en-l`oi ke k^i-'e, Song-ti h`an `m-h'en ngi`eu k`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o Song-ti voi ngi`eu ng`i-t^eu m^a?

Tui 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu t^i, Song-ti he chh`u"-p^i yu ngi`am-li ke. Tui ke-t^eu su"t-chiuk tiet-t'o ke ng`in, K`i he ngi`am-li ke; tui ng`i-t^eu, K`i chhiu-he chh`u"-p^i ke, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu oi ki-si+uk s^en-f+at chhai K`i ke chh`u"-p^i ch^u" ch^ung; na m`o, ng`i-t^eu ya voi p^un K`i 'au-h^a-l`oi.
Lun-t'o Y`u-thai-ng`in, k`i-t^eu na `m-he ki^en-chh`u" `m-sin, chhiu voi tet-t'o f`i-f+uk ngi`en-l`oi ke thi-vi, y^in-vi Song-ti n`en chi^ong k`i-t^eu chiap-ch'on-hi.

Ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in chhiong-he tui y^a-s^ang ke k'am-l'am-su 'au-h^a-l`oi ke k^i-'e, h`an cho-tet khi`ong-khi`ong chiap-to h'o ke k'am-l'am-su t'ang-k^o hi; Y`u-thai-ng`in chhiong-he Song-ti s'o ch^ai-chung ke k'am-l'am-su, Song-ti oi chi^ong tui li'a-th`eu su-'e 'au-h^a-l`oi ke k^i-'e chiap to-ch'on hi, k'am `m-he h`an-kha y`ung-yi m^a?

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, y^u yit-ke o-pi ke ch^u"n-l^i, ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu oi t^i, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o chhu"-k^a chhin chh^ung-m`in. Li'a ch^u"n-l^i chhiu-he: Y^u-t^eu Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke ngang-ki'ang ngi`en-l`oi `m-he y'un-ki'u ke, he oi t'en Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in k^ui-hiong Song-ti ke su-muk m^an-ngiak l'e.
'An-ngi`ong, chhi`on-th'i Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in thin-chh+ok voi tet-kiu. Chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Ch'u"n-kiu-ch'a oi tui Siak-^on chhut-l`oi, chh`u-thet Ng^a-kok ch'u"-s^un ke chhui-ok.
Song-ti k'ong: Li'a chhiu-he Ng`ai s'o-oi th`ung k`i-t^eu l+ip ke yok; ke-s`u", Ng`ai oi sa-mi^en k`i-t^eu ke chhui.

Y`u-thai-ng`in kh^i-chhi+et fuk-y^im, s`ang-cho Song-ti ke th+it-ng`in, kiet-k'o s'u" ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in tet-t'o li-yit. Ch'ung-he, cheu Song-ti ke ki'en-si'en, y^in-vi Song-ti tui ke-t^eu chh+uk-ch'ong ke yin-h'i, Y`u-thai-ng`in y`in-y`en he Song-ti ke ph`en-y^u.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en l^au ki'en-si'en he `m-voi k'oi-pien ke.
Th`eu-p'ai, ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in `m sun-chhi`ung Song-ti; ch'ung-he li'a-ha, y^in-vi Y`u-thai-ng`in ke `m sun-chhi`ung, ng`i-t^eu chhiu tet-t'o Song-ti ke l`in-m'en.
Khiung-yong, Y`u-thai-ng`in li'a-ha `m sun-chhi`ung, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o l`in-m'en, li'a-ha ya tet-t'o Song-ti ke l`in-m'en.
Song-ti s'u" chhi`on ng`in-lui khun chhai `m sun-f+uk ke t^ong-ch^ung, vi-t'o oi l`in-m'en s'o-y^u ke ng`in.
Song-ti ke f^ung-su"n, chu"-fi l^au chu"-su"t s+u"t-chhai h`an chh^u"m ^o! M'a-ng`in n`en ki'e-su"t K`i ke kiet-chh`ai? M'a-ng`in n`en tham-chh`a K`i ke tho-lu?
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: M'a-ng`in t^i Ch'u ke s^im-yi n`e? M'a-ng`in cho-ko K`i ke chh^am-m`eu n`e?
M'a-ng`in su"t sung K`i m'a-ke, s'u" K`i cho-`m-tet m`o po-tap n`e?
Y^in-vi van-v+ut he tui K`i l`oi ke, th^ung-ko K`i, ya he vi-t'o K`i l`oi chh`un-chhai ke. Ngien y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un Song-ti, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'en! ^A-m'en.

S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ki-y`en Song-ti l`in-m'en ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu oi chi^ong chhu"-k^a ch'un-cho s^ang-s^ang ke chi-v+ut hien p^un Song-ti, ch^on-s^im f+uk-su" K`i, l`oi tet-t'o K`i ke f^on-h'i. Li'a he ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi hien ke, he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke kin-pai.

`M-h'o h+ok li'a-ke su"-ki^en, f'an-ch'on oi p^un Song-ti v`an-chhi`on k'oi-pien ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-s^u" yi-ngiam, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi chh`a-m`in Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, t^i m'a-ke he li`ong-san ke, he v`an-m^i ke, he K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke.

Kho Song-ti p^un ng`ai ke ^en-su, ng`ai oi tui ng`i-t^eu tak-ke ng`in k'ong: `M-h'o khon chhu"-k^a thet k^o, f'an-ch'on oi khi^am-p^i, tak-s`a cheu Song-ti s'o-su ke sin-s^im l`oi li`ong chhu"-k^a ke chh^ung-khi^ang.
Yit-ke s^u"n-th'i y^u h'o-t^o ke k^i-th'i, tak-ke k^i-th'i y^u m`o khiung-yong ke k^ung-n`en.
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, s^ui-y`en ng`ai-t^eu he chhin-t^o ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk ke t^i-poi he yit-th'i ke; s^u"n-v`i k`i s^u"n-th'i ke k^i-th'i, ng`ai-t^eu he fu-si^ong kiet-li`en ke.

Ki-y`en Song-ti su ng`ai-t^eu tak-s`a m`o khiung-yong ke ^en-su, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu oi h'o-h'o yun-yung, l`oi cho yin-k^oi cho ke su". Song-ti s'o-su ke ^en-su, na-he k'ong yi-ngi`en, chhiu oi cheu sin-s^im ke chh`ang-thu hi k'ong;
na-he f+uk-vu, chhiu oi hi f+uk-vu; na-he kau-th^o, chhiu oi hi k^au ng`in;
na-he khien-mi^en, chhiu oi hi khien-mi^en; na-he kiu-chi, chhiu oi thai-f^ong; na-he cho li^ang-chhiu, chhiu oi ngin-ch^u"n t'a-piang; na-he l`in-m'en ng`in, chhiu oi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i.
Siak ph+et-ng`in oi ch^u"n-s^im. Oi n^au si`a-ok, chh^in-khiun li`ong-san.
Oi si^ong-chh^in si^ong-oi, chhiong siak hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi yit-yong; oi s`u"n-s^im s`u"n-yi l`oi fu-si^ong ch^un-chhung.
`M-h'o l^an-s^u", oi ngin-ch^u"n t'a-piang, yung f'o-ngi+et ke s^im f+uk-su" Ch'u.
Chhai phan-mong ch^ung oi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i; chhai fam-nan ch^ung oi ngi^un-nai; kh`i-t'o oi pet-chhiet.
Oi th`ung khi`ung-kh'u ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi f^un-hi'ong ng`i s'o y^u ke; oi chiap-thai ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in.
Oi chuk-fuk pet-hoi ng`i ke ng`in; m`o `m-chh+ok, oi chuk-fuk, `m-h'o chu-ch'u.
Oi th`ung f^on-h'i ke ng`in khiung-ha f^on-h'i, th`ung kieu ke ng`in khiung-ha kieu.
M`o-lun tui m'a-ng`in, oi p'i-chh'u" th`ung-s^im. `M-h'o ki^eu-ngau, f'an-ch'on oi chhiu-khiun p^i-m`i; ya `m-h'o l'au-t'o chhu"-k^a chhin chh^ung-m`in.
F'ai kho'an-thai ng`i ke, ng`i `m-h'o f'ai kho'an-thai k`i; thai-k^a khon-cho h'o ke su", oi sat-m^ang hi cho.
Oi yung ng`i chhi`on-phu ke p'un-su" hi l^au thai-k^a f`o-h'o.

Ph`en-y^u ^a, `m-h'o vi chhu"-k^a po y^en-s`u, t'en-to Song-ti fat-khi'en ke s`u", K`i chang thoi ng`i s^u"n-y^en kha y`ang, y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Ch'u k'ong: S^u"n-y^en chhai Ng`ai; Ng`ai yit-thin voi po-yin."
Su"n-k^in yu k'ong: "Ng`i ke th+it-ng`in na-he t'u-k^i, oi n^a p^un k`i s+u"t, choi-ch^au, oi n^a p^un k`i l^im; ng`i 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, voi s'u" k`i kien-seu to m`o-kat m`o-sat."
Ch'ung-k'ong, `m-h'o p^un f'ai y`ang-ch'eu-hi; oi yung h'o l`oi y`ang-ko f'ai.
Ng`in-ng`in oi f+uk-chhi`ung koet-k^a ke khi`en-l+it k^i-ko^an, y^in-vi khi`en-l+it ke chh`un-chhai he Song-ti s'o ph^i-ch'un ke; ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a ke khi`en-l+it he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.
S'o-y^i, t'i-khong ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a ke chhiu-he t'i-t'ong Song-ti ke min-lin; li'a-ch'ung ng`in n`an-mi^en su s'u"m-phan.
Th'ung-chhu"-ch'a `m-he oi p^un h`ang-san ke ng`in ki^ang, he oi p^un chok-ok ke ng`in ki^ang. Ng`i si'ong-oi `m ki^ang ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a m`o? H`ang-san, k`i chhiu voi chh^u"n-chan ng`i;

y^in-vi k`i he Song-ti s'o-yung ke ng`in, k`i ke k^ung-chok he oi li-yit ng`i. Ng`i na-he cho f'ai-su", ng`i chhiu oi ki^ang k`i, y^in-vi k`i y^u h`in-f+at ke khi`en `m-he cho-k'au ke. K`i cho Song-ti s'o-yung ke ng`in, he oi chu"p-h`ang Song-ti tui ke-t^eu chok-ok ke ng`in ke chit-f+at.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi f+uk-chhi`ung ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, `m t^an-chhiang he y^in-vi ki^ang Song-ti ke chit-f+at, ya he vi-t'o chhu"-k^a li`ong-s^im ke ph`in-^on.
Ng`i-t^eu n+ap-soi, ya he vi-t'o khiung-yong ke l^i-y`u, y^in-vi ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a chu"p-h`ang ngim-vu ke s`u" he vi Song-ti k^ung-chok.

S'o-y^i, yin-t^ong oi n+ap m'a-ke soi, ng`i-t^eu chhiu oi th^ang k`i-t^eu ke fa hi n+ap, m`o-lun he ng`in-t^en-soi ya-he s'an-ngi+ap-soi; yin-t^ong kin-vi ke ng`in, chhiu oi tui k`i-t^eu kin-vi; yin-t^ong ch^un-chhung ke ng`in, chhiu oi tui k`i-t^eu ch^un-chhung.
Chhi^en-van `m-h'o khiam-chai! P'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak chang-he ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi khiam ke chai. S'o-y^u siak ph+et-ng`in ke, chhiu-he ch^un-s'u fap-l+it.

Fap-l+it ke min-lin k^ui-thin: "Cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im; cho-`m-tet chh`u"-ng`in; cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a; cho-`m-tet th^am-s^im." Li'a yit-chhiet l^au kh`i-th^a ke min-lin chhi`on-phu he p^au-h`am chhai "Siak ph+et-ng`in chhiong chhu"-k^a" li'a-thi`au min-lin t^i-poi.
Siak ph+et-ng`in ke, chhiu `m-voi cho s^ong-hoi ph+et-ng`in ke su"; s'o-y^i, y^u oi-s^im chang voi p^un fap-l+it tet-t'o y`en-m^an.
Ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu t^i yin-k^oi soi-si'ang ke s`u"-chiet to l'e. Ng`ai-t^eu tet-kiu, li'a-ha p'i chh^u-sin ke s`u" h`an-kha chiap-khiun.
Am-p^u-s`u" voi ko, thi^en voi k^ong l'e. Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chai cho v^u-am ke su"; oi tai-t'en k^ong-m`in ke v'u-hi l`oi chok-chan.

Ng`ai-t^eu ke h`ang-su" v`i-ng`in oi k^ong-m`in chu"n-thai, chhiong s^en-f+at chhai ngit-s`u"-th`eu ke ng`in khiung-yong. `M-h'o chhin-s+u"t chhin-l^im, `m-h'o hau-set fong-thong, `m-h'o y^en-k^a chhit-tu.
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu oi chok-s^ong Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk; `m-h'o si'ong-oi m^an-chiuk ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk!
Sin-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in, ng`i-t^eu oi chiap-n+ap k`i; yi-kien m`o khiung-yong, ya `m-h'o th`ung k`i phien-lun.
Y^u sin-s^im ke ng`in, m'a-ke t^u s+u"t; sin-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in t^an-chhiang s+u"t chhoi.
M'a-ke t^u s+u"t ke ng`in `m-h'o khon-khi^ang `m s+u"t ke ng`in; t^an-chhiang s+u"t-chhoi ke ng`in ya `m-h'o lun-ton m'a-ke t^u s+u"t ke ng`in; y^in-vi Song-ti y'i-k^in chiap-n+ap k`i.

Ng`i he m'a-ng`in, ngi'ong k'am lun-ton ph+et-ng`in ke ph+uk-ng`in? K`i he s`u"n-k^ung ya-he su"t-phai, y^u k`i ke ch'u-ng`in l`oi k'on. K`i voi s`u"n-k^ung, y^in-vi Ch'u voi p^ong-chhu k`i, p^un k`i kh^i-tet-chang.
Y^u-ng`in ngin-v`i li'a-ngit p'i ph+et-ngit kha chhung-yeu; ya y^u-ng`in ngin-v`i tak-ngit chhi`on-phu khiung-yong 'an chhung-yeu. M^i-yit-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung yin-k^oi y^u chhu"-k^a ke yi-kien.

Th+it-ph+et khon-chhung m^eu-ngit ke, he p'eu-su" k`i tui Ch'u ke ch^un-chh`ung. M'a-ke t^u s+u"t ke, ya he p'eu-su" k`i tui Ch'u ke ch^un-chh`ung, y^in-vi k`i vi-t'o s'o s+u"t ke k'am-chhia Song-ti; y^u-t^eu s+u"t-v+ut `m s+u"t ke, khiung-yong ya he p'eu-su" k`i tui Ch'u ke ch^un-chh`ung, k`i me k'am-chhia Song-ti.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, m`o-ng`in he t^an-chhiang vi-t'o chhu"-k^a l`oi s^ang, ya m`o-ng`in he t^an-chhiang vi-t'o chhu"-k^a l`oi s'i;
ng`ai-t^eu na-he s^ang, he vi-t'o Ch'u l`oi s^ang; na-he s'i, ya he vi-t'o Ch'u l`oi s'i. 'An-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, m`o-lun he s^ang ya-he s'i, ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung he s+uk Ch'u ke ng`in.
K^i-tuk s'o-y^i s'i yu f+uk-f+at, muk-tit chhiu-he oi cho s^ang-ng`in l^au s'i-ng`in ke Ch'u.

Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i cho-m'a-ke lun-ton ng`i ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a? Ng`i cho-m'a-ke khon-khi^ang ng`i ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a? Ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong-l`oi l^ung-ch'ung oi kh^i chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, chiap-su K`i ke s'u"m-phan;
y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: Ch'u k'ong: Ng`ai ch'u"-t'en Ng`ai ke s^ang-miang fat-su", tak-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung oi kh'ui l+ok-hi pai Ng`ai; ng`in-lui chhi`on-phu oi s`u"n-ngin Ng`ai he Song-ti.
'An-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in thin-chh+ok oi chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke su" chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en k^au-tai chh^in-chh'u.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o ki-si+uk p'i-chh'u" lun-ton h^a-hi; yin-k^oi ha kiet-s^im, `m cho voi hoi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi tiet-t'o fam-chhui ke su".

Ph`in ng`ai l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke chh^in-m+et ko^an-he, ng`ai khok-s+u"t t^i, s+u"t-v+ut p'un-s^u"n chhi`on-phu he chhiang-li ke; ch'ung-he, na-he y^u-ng`in si^ong-sin m^eu-ch'ung s+u"t-v+ut he m`o chhiang-li ke, tui k`i l`oi k'ong, ke-ch'ung s+u"t-v+ut chhiu-he m`o chhiang-li ke l'e.
Ng`i na-he y^in-vi s+u"t-v+ut s^ong-t'o hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke s^im, ng`i chhiu `m-he cheu oi-s^im h`ang-su". K^i-tuk y'i-k^in vi k`i s'i, ng`i `m-h'o y^in-vi ng`i ke s+u"t-v+ut l`oi phai-fai k`i!
`M-h'o y^in-vi ng`i khon-cho h'o ke su", hoi ng`i chhu"-k^a p^un-ng`in ph^i-ph`in.
Y^in-vi sun-chhi`ung Song-ti ke ch'u-khi`en `m-he kho s+u"t-v+ut, he kho Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke k^ung-chu"n, f`o-ph`in, l^au h'i-l+ok.
'An-ngi`ong f+uk-su" K^i-tuk ke ng`in, yit-thin voi tet-t'o Song-ti ke f^on-h'i l^au ng`in ke chh^u"n-chan.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu oi ch^ui-khi`u f`o-m+uk l^au p'i-chh'u" chho-chhiu ke su".
`M-h'o y^in-vi s+u"t-v+ut pho-fai Song-ti ke k^ung-chok. Yit-chhiet s+u"t-v+ut chhi`on-phu cho-tet s+u"t, ch'ung-he y^in-vi s+u"t l`oi hoi ph+et-ng`in tiet-t'o, chhiu chhin `m-h'o.
Na-he 'an-ngi`ong, chui-h'o m+ok s+u"t-ngiuk, m+ok l^im-chi'u; m+ok cho hoi ng`i hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi tiet-t'o ke su".

Ng`i tui li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in ngi'ong-p^an si^ong-sin, ng`i chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en chhiu ngi'ong-p^an hi h`ang! Ngin-thin he chh+ok ke, chhiu cheu 'an-ngi`ong hi h`ang, ya `m-voi chhu"-chit ke, he y^u fuk-hi ke ng`in!
Ch'ung-he, s^im-k^on h`an ng`i-f`u chhiu n^a-l`oi s+u"t, Song-ti voi thin k`i ke chhui, y^in-vi m`o cheu sin-s^im l`oi s+u"t. H`ang-su" m`o cheu sin-s^im cho ke, chhi`on-phu he chhui.
Ng`ai-t^eu y^u ki^en-khi`ong sin-s^im ke ng`in yin-k^oi p^ong-chhu sin-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in, f^un-t^am k`i-t^eu ke chh^ung-t^am, `m-h'o khi`u m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a.
Ng`ai-t^eu tak-s`a oi vi-t'o kh`i-th^a sin-th`u ke li-yit sat-si'ong, l`oi kien-l+ip khiung-th`ung ke sin-s^im s^en-f+at.
Y^in-vi K^i-tuk pin m`o khi`u m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a, f'an-ch'on chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Ke-t^eu y+uk-ma ng`i ke ng`in s'o fat-chhut ke y+uk-ma chhi`on-phu l+ok chhai ng`ai ke s^u"n-song."
Su"n-k^in ke fa l^ung-ch'ung he vi-t'o k^au ng`ai-t^eu l`oi si'a ke, muk-tit he oi ng`ai-t^eu tui Su"n-k^in s'o k^au ke ngi^un-nai l^au k'u-li l`oi tet-t'o h^i-mong.
Ngien su ngi^un-nai l^au k'u-li ke Song-ti p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu th^ung-ko h+ok K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke p'ong-yong, voi y^u khiung-yong ke s^im-yi,
p^un ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a voi th`ung-s^im chh`e-s^ang siung-chan ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^A-p^a Song-ti.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi p'i-chh'u" chiap-n+ap, chhiong K^i-tuk chiap-n+ap ng`i-t^eu yit-yong, l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.
Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, K^i-tuk vi-t'o oi hi'en-m`in Song-ti ke sin-s+u"t, su"t cho-ko Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ph+uk-ng`in, p^un Song-ti tui ke-t^eu chh+uk-ch'ong ke yin-h'i tet-t'o s+u"t-hien,

th`ung-s`u", p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya voi siung-chan Song-ti ke l`in-m'en. Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: S'o-y^i, ng`ai oi chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung siung-chan Ng`i; ng`ai oi chhong-k^o siung-chan Ng`i ke mi`ang.
Su"n-k^in yu k'ong: Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ^a, oi th`ung Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in khiung-ha f^on-h'i.
Yu k'ong: S'o-y^u ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ^a, oi siung-chan Ch'u; thi^en-ha van-m`in ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi siung-chan K`i!
Y^i-soi-^a ya k'ong: Voi y^u Y^a-s^i ke heu-thoi chhut-l`oi, k`i oi h^in-h'i l`oi th'ung-chhu" Ngoi-p^ang; Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung voi ngi'ong-mong k`i!

Ngien su h^i-mong ke Song-ti, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tui K`i ke sin-s^im, p^un ng`i-t^eu chh^ung-m^an kok-ch'ung ke f^on-h'i l^au ph`in-^on, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in ke n`en-l+it, p^un ng`i-t^eu ke h^i-mong yit-chh+u"t chen-k^a.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai p'un-s^u"n chh^u"m-sin ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a m^an-y^u h'o tet-hen, y^u f^ung-fu ke chu"-su"t, ya voi fu-si^ong khien-mi^en.

Ch'ung-he, chhai li'a-f^ung sin-'e t^i-poi, y^u-t^eu mun-th`i ng`ai h`an-he h'o-t'am th`i-si'ang ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong s+u"t-fa chh+u"t-k'ong, he y^in-vi Song-ti th+it-ph+et s^u"-^en p^un ng`ai,

s'u" ng`ai cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ph+uk-ng`in, chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke ch^ung-ki^en k^ung-chok. Ng`ai chhiong chi-s^u" yit-yong k'ong-lun Song-ti ke fuk-y^im, he oi p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in ke su"n-fa, s`ang-cho Song-ti f^on-h'i chiap-n+ap ke chi-v+ut.
Kiet-k'o, ng`ai y^in-vi chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang-h^a tui Song-ti ke su"-fung sa y^u h'o kho^a-khi'eu.
Ng`ai k'am thai-t'am k'ong ke ch'u"-y^u yit-yong: K^i-tuk s'u" Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in k^ui-sun Song-ti, he th^ung-ko ng`ai ke s'o-k'ong l^au s'o-cho,
yung s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su" l^au Song-ti ke L`in ke n`en-l+it l`oi v`an-s`u"n ke. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai tui Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang to Y^i-li-l^i-k'u yit-tai, ng`ai tak s'o-chhai hi chh`on K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im.
Ng`ai kiet-s^im hi h`an-m`ang th^ang-ko K^i-tuk ke thi-f^ong chh`on fuk-y^im, mi^en-tet ng`ai ke k^ung-chok kien-l+ip chhai ph+et-ng`in ke k^i-chh'u t'ang-k^o.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: M`ang ngin-su"t k`i ke ng`in voi khon-t'o; m`ang th^ang-ko k`i ke ng`in voi m`in-ph+ak.
Ng`ai h'o-t^o p'ai oi hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, ch'ung-he t`u-t'o ch'u-t'ong.
Li'a-ha, ki-y`en ng`ai y'i-k^in v`an-s`u"n li'a yit-tai ke k^ung-chok, f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu yu he ng`ai t^o-ngi`en l`oi ke s^im-ngien,

ng`ai h^i-mong chhai hi S^i-p^an-ng`a ke s`u", sun-lu hi khon ng`i-t^eu, th`ung ng`i-t^eu f^on-h'i chhi-s+ip yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, y`en-heu chang chhai ng`i-t^eu ke p^ong-chhu ch^u"-ha ki-si+uk hiong-chhi`en.
Ch'ung-he li'a-ha, vi-t'o ki^ung-kip su"n-th`u ke su", ng`ai yit-thin oi si^en hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
Y^in-vi M^a-kh`i-tun l^au ^A-k^ai-^a ke kau-fi y^u l+ok-ki^en yit-pit chhi`en, oi p^ong-chhu Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang su"n-th`u ch^ung ke khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in.

K`i-t^eu chhin f^on-h'i 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, kh`i-s+u"t ya he k`i-t^eu ke ngi-vu: Ki-y`en Y`u-thai-ng`in K^i-tuk-th`u p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in f^un-hi'ong s+uk-l`in ke ^en-su, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ya yin-k^oi yung v+ut-chu"t l`oi p^ong-chhu k`i-t^eu.
T'en ng`ai phan-h'o li'a-khien su", chi^ong k`i-t^eu s'o ki^en ke chhi`en k^au-tai chh^in-chh'u, ng`ai chhiu voi k^in-ko ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, hi S^i-p^an-ng`a.
Ng`ai t^i, ng`ai hi tham-f'ong ng`i-t^eu, yit-thin voi tai p^un ng`i-t^eu K^i-tuk f^ung-su"n ke chuk-fuk.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, kho ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke oi-s^im, ng`ai khi`u ng`i-t^eu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha pet-chhiet vi ng`ai khi'en-khi`u Song-ti:
S'u" ng`ai `m-voi p^un chhai Y`u-thai ke-t^eu `m sin ke ng`in hoi-t'o, ya s'u" ng`ai chhai Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke kiu-chi k^ung-chok voi tet-t'o su"n-th`u ke f^on-h'i chiap-n+ap.
Song-ti na h'en, ng`ai chhiu voi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i hi khon ng`i-t^eu, chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi hi^u-sit yit-chham s`u"-ki^en.
Ngien su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti th`ung ng`i thai-k^a khiung-ha! ^A-m'en.
Ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu kie-seu ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'i-moi F^i-p'i; k`i yit-t'an he chhai Ki^en-kiet-l^i kau-fi cho chu"p-su".

Ng`i-t^eu oi cheu Ch'u ke mi`ang l^au su"n-th`u ke p'un-fun h'o-h'o chiap-thai k`i; m`o-lun k`i y^u m'a-ke s^i-yeu, chhi'ang p^ong-chhu k`i. K`i su"t ngi+et-s`u"n p^ong-chhu chhin-t^o ng`in, ng`ai chhu"-k^a ya su"t tet-t'o k`i ke p^ong-chhu.
Chhi'ang mun-heu su"-fung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke th`ung-k^ung Pak-k^i-l^a l^au ^A-k^i-l^a li'ong k^ung-ph`o;
k`i-t^eu su"t vi ng`ai mo s^ang-miang ke ng`ui-hi'am; `m t^an-chhiang ng`ai chhin k'am-chhia k`i-t^eu, Ngoi-p^ang ke kok kau-fi ya f^i-s`ong k'am-kit.
Ya mun-heu chhai k`i-t^eu vuk-h^a chhi-fi ke kau-fi. Chhi'ang mun-heu ng`ai chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u Y^i-pai-n`i-th'u; k`i he ^A-se-^a-s'en thi-yit-ke k^ui-s+uk K^i-tuk ke ng`in.
Ya mun-heu vi ng`i-t^eu s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok ke M^a-li-^a.

Chhi'ang mun-heu su"t th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chh^o-k^am ke Y`u-thai th`ung-p^au ^On-t^o-n`i-k'u l^au Y`u-n`i-^a; k`i-t^eu chhai s'u"-th`u ch^ung he chhin chhut-mi`ang ke ng`in, ya p'i ng`ai si^en k^ui-s+uk K^i-tuk.
Chhi'ang mun-heu Ch'u-nui chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u Am-pak-li;
ya mun-heu su"-fung K^i-tuk ke th`ung-k^ung Ng'i-p^a-n'u l^au ng`ai chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u Su"-thai-k'u.
Chhi'ang mun-heu su-ko kh'au-ngiam, tui K^i-tuk ch^ung-s^im to-t'ai ke ^A-p'i-li; ya mun-heu ^A-li-t^o-pu yit-k^a ng`in.
Chhi'ang mun-heu Y`u-thai th`ung-p^au H^i-l`o-thi^en; ya mun-heu N^a-kh`i-su yit-k^a sin Ch'u ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi.
Chhi'ang mun-heu vi Ch'u s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok ke 'ng th`ung-k^ung Thu-f^i-n^a l^au Thu-fu-s^an; ya mun-heu vi Ch'u sat-m^ang k^ung-chok chh^in-oi ke 'ng sin-th`u P'i-sit.
Chhi'ang mun-heu L^u-f`u; k`i he Ch'u-nui yit-ke khiet-chhut ke k^ung-ng`in; ya mun-heu ki^a-m^e, k`i yit-t'an tui-thai ng`ai chhiong chhu"-k^a ke lai-'e.
Chhi'ang mun-heu ^A-s^un-kh`i-th'u, Fut-l+et-k^on, Het-m'i, Pat-l`o-p^a, Het-m^a, l^au kh`i-th^a th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi.
Chhi'ang mun-heu F^i-l`o-l`o-k'u l^au Y`u-li-^a, N`i-li-^a l^au ki^a l'o-moi, pin ^A-l`im-p^a, l^au th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke chung su"n-th`u.
Ng`i-t^eu oi su"n-kiet si^ong-ch^im p'i-chh'u" chhi'ang-^on. K^i-tuk ke kok kau-fi chhi`on-phu tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu, oi th`i-f`ong ke-t^eu chu"-chho f^un-li+et, thung-y`eu ph+et-ng`in sin-s^im, th`ung ng`i-t^eu s'o su ke kau-hiun tui-l+ip ke ng`in; oi l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu y'en-y'en.
Y^in-vi li'a-ch'ung ng`in `m-he su"-fung ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk, he chhai m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a ke t'u-s'u". K`i-t^eu choi-thi`am s+at-v+at he oi m`i-f+et l'o-s+u"t-ng`in ke s^im.
Thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung th^ang-k'ong ng`i-t^eu he ngi'ong-p^an sun-chhi`ung fuk-y^im; s'o-y^i ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu chhin f^on-h'i! Ngien ng`i-t^eu tui h'o-su" chh^ung-m`in, tui f'ai-su" t^an-s`un.
Su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti chhiu voi chien-th+ap Sat-tan, ham k`i h`ong-f+uk chhai ng`i-t^eu ke kiok-h^a. Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai ke th`ung-k^ung Th`i-m^o-thai, pin Y`u-thai th`ung-p^au Lu-khi`u, Y^a-s^un, S'o-s^i-p^a-tet, l^ung-ch'ung mun-heu ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai --- li'a thoi-pit si'a sin-'e ke Tet-th`i, ya chhai Ch'u-nui mun-heu ng`i-t^eu.

K^ai-y`u chiap-thai ng`ai --- P'o-l`o, yu p^un kau-fi chhai ki^a vuk-h^a chhi-fi, k`i ya mun-heu ng`i-t^eu. S`ang-nui k'on ngi`un-khu ke Y^i-l^a-t^u l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi Koat-th'u ya mun-heu ng`i-t^eu.

Ngien y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un Song-ti! K`i n`en cheu ng`ai s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im ki^en-thin ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im. Li'a fuk-y^im he y^u-ko^an Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ch^u"n-tho, kh'i-su" chhu"-k'u y^i-l`oi khong-t'en ke o-pi.
Li'a o-pi y'i-k^in th^ung-ko chung si^en-t^i ke s^u hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi, ya cheu y'un-s^en Song-ti ke min-lin ch'u"-su" van-koet, p^un van-m`in tui sin l`oi sun-chhi`ung.
Ngien y`ung-k^ong th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk k^ui-p^un th+uk-yit chhi`on-chu" ke Song-ti, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'en! ^A-m'en.
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; tui Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, ng`ai m`ung-seu cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai l^au S'o-th`i-n`i hi^ung-thi,

si'a sin-'e p^un chhai K^o-l`im-t^o-s`ang Song-ti ke kau-fi. Ng`i-t^eu l^au chhai tak s'o-chhai khi`u-ham ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang ke ng`in, khiung-yong he chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi s`u"n-su"n, m`ung-seu cho su"n-th`u l`oi k^ui-s+uk Song-ti ke. K^i-tuk he k`i-t^eu ke Ch'u, ya he ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu k'am-chhia ng`ai ke Song-ti, y^in-vi K`i th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu,
s'u" ng`i-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi tak f^ong-mien fu-chiuk, ya chhin-y^u chu"-su"t l^au khi'eu-chh`oi.
Y^u-ko^an ng`ai vi K^i-tuk s'o-cho ke kien-chu"n, y'i-k^in ki^en-l+ip chhai ng`i-t^eu ke t^ong-ch^ung,
s'o-y^i, chhai t'en ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk hi'en-hien ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu yit-yong ^en-su ya m`o s'eu.
Ch'u yit-thin voi ki^en-ku ng`i-t^eu to-t'ai, p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk kong-l`im ke-ngit m`o h'o hi`am.
Song-ti he sin-s+u"t kh'o-kho ke; K`i f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu, s'u" ng`i-t^eu th`ung K`i ke Lai-'e --- ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk khiung-ha hi'ong-su th`on-khe ke s^en-f+at.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai fung ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang khien ng`i-t^eu: Thai-k^a oi k'ong yit-yong ke fa, `m-h'o f^un-li+et; oi th`on-kiet, si'ong-fap l^au muk-ph^eu oi khiung-yong.
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, y^u 'ng sin-th`u Kiet-l`oi vuk-h^a ke-t^eu ng`in su"t l^au ng`ai k'ong, ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u si^ong-ch^ang.

Ng`ai ke yi-su" he, ng`i-t^eu yit-s`a k'ong yit-yong. Y^u-ng`in k'ong "Ng`ai s+uk P'o-l`o"; y^u-ng`in k'ong "Ng`ai s+uk ^A-p^o-l`o"; y^u-ng`in k'ong "Ng`ai s+uk P'i-tet"; y^u-ng`in k'ong "Ng`ai s+uk K^i-tuk".
K^i-tuk sa p^un ng`i-t^eu p^un-cho k'i-h^a sak! K'am-he P'o-l`o thoi ng`i-t^eu t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang m^a? Ng`i-t^eu k'am-he fung P'o-l`o ke mi`ang li^ang s'e-l^i m^a?
Ng`ai k'am-chhia Song-ti, chh`u-li'au K^i-li-s^u"-pu l^au K^ai-y`u, ng`ai pin m`o vi ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke yit-s`a h`ang s'e-l^i,
s'o-y^i, m`o-ng`in n`en k'ong, ng`i-t^eu he fung ng`ai ke mi`ang li^ang s'e-l^i ke.
(H`an-y^u, ng`ai ya vi S^u"-th`i-fap-n'a l^au ki^a vuk-h^a ke ng`in h`ang-ko s'e-l^i, kh`i-th^a h`an vi m'a-ng`in h`ang-ko s'e-l^i, ng`ai chhiu `m ki-tet l'e.)
K^i-tuk phai ng`ai, `m-he oi ng`ai h`ang s'e-l^i, he oi ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im, `m yung ng`in-lui chu"-fi ke ngi`en-lun, mi^en-tet K^i-tuk chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke s'i su"t-h'au.

Y^in-vi K^i-tuk s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke tho-l^i, tui ke-t^eu hiong m+et-m`ong h`ang-t'en hi ke ng`in l`oi-khon, he ngong-tong ke; ch'ung-he tui ng`ai-t^eu tet-kiu ke ng`in l`oi-k'ong, he Song-ti ke thai-n`en.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: Ng`ai oi chh`u-m+et chh^ung-m`in-ng`in ke chu"-fi; Ng`ai ya oi fi-thet h+ok-ch'a ke h+ok-mun.
Chh^ung-m`in-ng`in chhai nai-vi n`e? H+ok-ch'a chhai nai-vi n`e? Su"-ki^en ke phien-lun-k^a chhai nai-vi n`e? Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" li'a su"-ki^en ke chu"-fi s`ang-cho ngong-tong l'e!

Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke chu"-fi, p^un su"-ki^en-ng`in m`o fap-thu yung chhu"-k^a ke chu"-fi l`oi ngin-su"t K`i; ti^en-to, Song-ti kiet-thin oi th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on, ng`in khon-cho "ngong-tong" ke tho-l^i l`oi ch'u"n-kiu si^ong-sin ke ng`in.
Y`u-thai-ng`in khi`u s`u"n-chiak, H^i-li+ap-ng`in chh`im chu"-fi,
ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu chh`on t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke K^i-tuk. Li'a-ke tho-l^i, tui Y`u-thai-ng`in l`oi-khon he pan-kiok-s+ak, tui Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in l`oi-khon he ngong-tong;
ch'ung-he Song-ti si'en-seu ke ng`in, m`o-lun he Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, tui k`i-t^eu l`oi-k'ong, K^i-tuk he Song-ti ke thai-n`en, he Song-ti ke chu"-fi.
Y^in-vi, "Song-ti ke ngong-tong" y`ang-ko ng`in ke chu"-fi; "Song-ti ke ngi^on-ngi+ok" ya y`ang-ko ng`in ke ki^en-khi`ong.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, oi ki-tet Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu ke chh`in-h`in he ngi'ong-p^an. Cheu ng`in ke khon-fap, ng`i-t^eu y^u chu"-fi ke `m t^o, y^u n`en-l+it ke `m t^o, sa-fi thi-vi k^o ke ya `m t^o.

Ch'ung-he, Song-ti phi^en-phi^en ki'en-si'en su"-ki^en-ng`in khon-cho m`o chu"-fi ke, l`oi p^un y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in kien-seu; Song-ti ki'en-si'en su"-ki^en-ng`in khon-cho ngi^on-ngi+ok ke, l`oi p^un ki^en-khi`ong ke ng`in kien-seu.
Song-ti ya ki'en-si'en su"-ki^en-ng`in s'o khon-khi^ang, s'o n^au, khon-cho s'eu-kh'o ke, l`oi fi-thet ke-t^eu ng`in khon-cho chhung-yeu ke,
p^un s'o-y^u ke ng`in chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en kho^a-khi'eu `m-tet.

He Song-ti p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u-h'o th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en, yu s'u" k`i s`ang-cho ng`ai-t^eu ke chu"-fi; th^ung-ko k`i, ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, s`ang-cho Song-ti su"n-kiet ke ch'u"-m`in, ya tet-t'o chhu"-y`u.
Chhiu-chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Oi kho^a-khi'eu ke ng`in, chhiu oi kho^a-khi'eu Ch'u."
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai th`eu-p'ai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, pin m`o yung m'a-ke chi^ang ke fa ya-he k^o-chh^u"m ke h+ok-mun l`oi tui ng`i-t^eu chh`on-y`ong Song-ti ke o-meu.
Y^in-vi ng`ai kiet-yi, th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", chh`u-li'au Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l^au k`i s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke su"-chh`in y^i-ngoi, m'a-ke t^u `m th`i.
H`an-y^u, chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ng`ai k'am-kok chhin ngi^on-ngi+ok, s^im-nui chhin ki^ang, thai-thai chh+ok-kip.
Ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke tho-l^i, s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im, l^ung-ch'ung m`o yung h'o-th^ang y^u chu"-fi ke fa, ch'u"-y^u kho Su"n-L`in ke thai-n`en l`oi kien-chu"n ch^u"n-l^i,
s'u" ng`i-t^eu ke sin-ngi'ong m`o k^in-k'i ng`in ke chu"-fi, he k^in-k'i Song-ti ke thai-n`en.

Kh`i-s+u"t, tui ke-t^eu l`in-sin s`u"n-s+uk ke ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu ya k'ong chu"-fi. Ch'ung-he, `m-he k'ong li'a su"-ki^en ke chu"-fi, ya `m-he li'a su"-ki^en th'ung-chhu"-ch'a ke chu"-fi; k`i-t^eu ke khi`en-su" chhiam-chhiam voi s^eu-m+et thet-hi.

Ng`ai-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke chu"-fi he Song-ti o-meu ke chu"-fi, p'un-l`oi tui ng`in he khong-t'en ke, chhiu-he chhai su"-kie chh'ong-chho y^i-chhi`en Song-ti y'i-k^in yi-thin oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu tet y`ung-k^ong ke chu"-fi.
Su"-ki^en ke th'ung-chhu"-ch'a m`o yit-ke t^i li'a chu"-fi; na-he t^i, k`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi chi^ong y`ung-k^ong ke Ch'u t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang l'e.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Song-ti vi kin-oi K`i ke ng`in s'o yi-phi ke, he ng`in muk-ch^u m`ang-su"t khon-ko, ng'i-k^ung m`ang-su"t th^ang-ko, ng`in-s^im m`ang-su"t si'ong-ko ke!
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti th^ung-ko chhu"-k^a ke L`in chi^ong K`i ke o-meu kh'i-su" ng`ai-t^eu. Su"n-L`in n`en khon-theu s'o-y^u ke su", li`en Song-ti chh^u"m-chh^u"m khong-t'en ke s^im-yi, K`i ya t^i.
Ng`in ke s^im-s^u", ch'u"-y^u chhu"-k^a t^i-poi ke l`in chang t^i. Khiung-yong, Song-ti ke su", ya ch'u"-y^u Song-ti ke L`in chang chh^in-chh'u.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o li^ang-su ke L`in `m-he li'a su"-ki^en ke l`in, he Song-ti s'o phai-l`oi ke L`in, h'o-p^un ng`ai-t^eu t^i Song-ti s'o su ng`ai-t^eu ke yit-chhiet ^en-su.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu k'ong-tho `m-he yung ng`in ke chu"-fi s'o-k^au ke fa, he yung Su"n-L`in s'o-k^au ke fa, tui s+uk Su"n-L`in ke ng`in k'ong-lun s+uk-l`in ke ch^u"n-l^i.

Ch'ung-he, ke-t^eu m`o Song-ti ke L`in ke ng`in m`o fap-thu li^ang-su Song-ti ke L`in s'o p^un ke ^en-su. Li'a-ch'ung ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en m`in-ph+ak li'a-t^eu su", k`i-t^eu khon-cho he ngong-tong ke; y^in-vi li'a-t^eu su" ke ka-chh+u"t oi yung s+uk-l`in ke muk-ch^u chang khon tet-chhut.
S+uk Su"n-L`in ke ng`in n`en phan-ton van-su" ke ka-chh+u"t, ch'ung-he m`o-ng`in n`en phan-ton k`i.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: M'a-ng`in t^i Ch'u ke s^im n`e? M'a-ng`in voi kau-th^o K`i n`e? Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu s+uk Su"n-L`in ke ng`in y^u K^i-tuk ke s^im.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, l'o-s+u"t k'ong, ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, yit-t'an m`o khon ng`i-t^eu cho s+uk Su"n-L`in ke, he khon ng`i-t^eu cho s+uk ngiuk-th'i ke, he K^i-tuk sin-ngi'ong ke ^o-nga-'e.
Ng`ai yung nen vi ng`i-t^eu, m`o yung fan, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu h`an-m`ang voi s+u"t-fan. Chhiu-he li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu ya h`an `m-voi s+u"t-fan,
y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu h`an-he s+uk ngiuk-th'i ke. Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u chhit-tu, y^u si^ong-ch^ang; li'a k'am `m-he chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu he s+uk ngiuk-th'i ke, h`ang-v`i chhiong yit-p^an ng`in m^a?
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai s+uk P'o-l`o"; ya y^u-ng`in k'ong: "Ng`ai s+uk ^A-p^o-l`o". Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu th`ung yit-p^an ng`in y^u m'a-ke m`o khiung-yong n`e?

Ch'ung-k'ong, ^A-p^o-l`o son m'a-ke? P'o-l`o son m'a-ke? Ng`ai-t^eu put-ko he Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, tai-li^ang ng`i-t^eu si^ong-sin Song-ti. Ng`ai-t^eu tak-s`a he cheu Ch'u ke f^un-phai l`oi k^ung-chok:
Ng`ai ch^ai-chung, ^A-p^o-l`o l`im-s'ui, ch'ung-he p^un k`i thai ke he Song-ti.
Ch^ai-chung-ke l^au l`im-s'ui-ke `m-son m'a-ke; yit-chhiet chhi`on khon p^un k`i thai ke Song-ti.
Ch^ai-chung-ke l^au l`im-s'ui-ke y^u khiung yit-ke muk-ph^eu; Song-ti yu voi cheu tak-s`a ke k^ung-chok po-tap k`i.
Ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke th`ung-k^ung; ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti ke thi`en-y`en. Ng`i-t^eu ya he Song-ti s'o h'i ke vuk.

Ng`ai yung Song-ti p^un ng`ai ke ^en-su, chhiong yit-ke nui-h`ong ke k^ung-th`eu t'a-h'o thi-k^i, ph+et-ng`in chhai ke t'ang-k^o h'i-vuk. Ch'ung-he, m^i-yit-ke ng`in oi si'ong chh^in-chh'u chhu"-k^a ngi'ong-p^an l`oi h'i.
Y^in-vi Song-ti y'i-k^in l+ip Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk cho v`i-yit ke k^in-k^i, m`o-ng`in n`en l+ip kh`i-th^a ke k^in-k^i.
Chhai li'a k^in-k^i t'ang-k^o, y^u-ng`in kh'o-n`en voi yung k^im, ngi`un, ya-he p'o-s+ak l`oi h'i; ya y^u-ng`in voi yung su-'e, chh'o, ya-he v`o-k'on l`oi h'i.

To s'u"m-phan ke-ngit, tak-s`a ke k^ung-chh`ang h'o-f'ai chhi`on-phu voi hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi; y^in-vi tak-s`a ke k^ung-chh`ang l^ung-ch'ung oi k^in-l+it thai-f'o ke kh'au-ngiam, l`oi chu"n-m`in k^ung-chh`ang ke ph'in-chu"t.
K^in-l+it kh'au-ngiam y^i-heu, s'o h'i ke k^ung-chh`ang na h`an chh^oi, ke-ng`in chhiu voi tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong.
S'o h'i ke k^ung-chh`ang na p^un f'o s^eu-thet, ke-ng`in ke s'un-su"t chhiu chhin thai; k`i p'un-s^u"n voi tet-kiu, ch'ung-he chhiong tui thai-f'o t^i-poi ch'eu-chhut-l`oi yit-yong.
K'am `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti ke thien, Song-ti ke L`in h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi m^a?
Na y^u-ng`in f'i-fai Song-ti ke thien, Song-ti yit-thin voi f'i-m+et ke-ng`in; y^in-vi Song-ti ke thien he su"n ke. Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he Song-ti ke thien.
`M-h'o phien chhu"-k^a. Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung na y^u-ng`in cheu su"-ki^en ke ph^eu-ch'un khon chhu"-k^a cho y^u chu"-fi, ngien k`i pien-cho ngong-'e, h'o s`ang-cho chu"n-k^in y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in.
Y^in-vi li'a su"-ki^en s'o ngin-thin ke chu"-fi, cheu Song-ti l`oi-khon f'an-ch'on he ngong-tong. Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Song-ti p^un y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in chung-t'o chhu"-k^a ke k'ui-kie."
Nang yit-chiet Su"n-k^in ya k'ong: "Ch'u t^i chu"-fi ke ng`in s'o-si'ong ke he h^i-kh^ung."
S'o-y^i, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, `m-h'o y^in-vi s+uk m'a-ng`in l`oi kho^a-khi'eu. Su"-s+u"t-song, van-y^u chhi`on he s+uk ng`i-t^eu ke:
P'o-l`o, ^A-p^o-l`o, P'i-tet, li'a su"-kie, s^ang ya-he s'i, li'a-ha ke su" ya-he chi^ong-l`oi ke su", li'a yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu he s+uk ng`i-t^eu ke;
ng`i-t^eu he s+uk K^i-tuk ke, K^i-tuk he s+uk Song-ti ke.
Ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi khon ng`ai-t^eu cho K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in, he Song-ti ke o-meu ke k'on-k^a.
Ch'u-ng`in tui k'on-k^a s'o y^eu-khi`u ke, chhiu-he k`i ke ch^ung-s^im.
Ng`i-t^eu ya-he m'a-ng`in lun-ton ng`ai, ng`ai chhi`on-phu khon-cho s'eu su"-chh`in; su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai chhu"-k^a ya `m lun-ton chhu"-k^a.
Ng`ai chhu"-k^a k'am-kok li`ong-s^im chh^in-ph+ak, ch'ung-he cho-`m-tet y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong chu"n-m`in ng`ai m`o-chhui. Ch'u chang y^u khi`en lun-ton ng`ai.

S'o-y^i, s`u"-ki^en m`ang to, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o lun-ton; t'en-to Ch'u chai-l`oi, voi y^u chui-heu ke s'u"m-phan. Ke-s`u", k`i oi chi^ong khong chhai v^u-am ch^ung ke pi-m+et hi^en-kh^oi-l`oi, chi^ong ng`in s^im-ch^ung ke thung-k^i yet-chhut-l`oi. Ke-s`u", m^i-yit-ke ng`in voi tui Song-ti tet-t'o yin-tet ke chh^u"n-chan.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, vi ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku, ng`ai yung ^A-p^o-l`o l^au ng`ai chhu"-k^a cho li-'e l`oi k'ong-h'i li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in, he oi ng`i-t^eu tui ng`ai-t^eu l`oi h+ok "`M-h'o chh^eu-ko Su"n-k^in s'o ki ke" li'a-ki fa ke yi-su"; mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^o, khon-chhung li'a-ke, khon-khi^ang ke-ke.

M'a-ng`in s'u" ng`i y`ang-ko ph+et-ng`in n`e? Ng`i s'o y^u ke, k'am `m-he Song-ti su ke m^a? Ki-y`en he Song-ti su ke, ng`i cho-m'a-ke h`an kho^a-khi'eu, chhiong-he ng`i s'o y^u ke `m-he Song-ti su ke n`e?

Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in yong-yong y^u l'e! Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in fu-chiuk l'e! Ng`i-t^eu `m-tap ng`ai-t^eu, chhu"-l+ip cho v`ong! H'o ^a! Ng`ai ch^u"n h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chu"n-k^in cho v`ong, p^un ng`ai-t^eu ya th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha cho v`ong!

Y^in-vi, cheu ng`ai khon, Song-ti m`in-m`in chi^ong ng`ai li'a-t^eu cho s'u"-th`u ke li+et chhai poi-m^i, chhiong-he phan s'i-h`in ke fam-ng`in, chhai thi^en-thi-ki^en s`ang-cho yit-chhut hi, p^un thi^en-s'u" l^au su"-ki^en-ng`in khon.

Vi-t'o K^i-tuk ke y`en-ku, ng`ai-t^eu s`ang-cho ngong-'e, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk ke t^i-poi cho chh^ung-m`in-ng`in ^o! Ng`ai-t^eu ngi^on-ngi+ok, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu ki^en-khi`ong ^o! Ng`ai-t^eu p^un-ng`in khon-khi^ang, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu su ch^un-chhung ^o!
Chh+u"t-to li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu s`ong-s`ong t'u-k^i, choi-ch^au, m`o s^am h'o chok, yu p^un-ng`in t'a, si-chhu ph^eu-li`u,
h`an-oi s^in-s^in kh'u-kh'u chh^in-s'u cho-se l`oi set t'u-s'u". P^un-ng`in ma, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu chuk-fuk; p^un-ng`in ap-pet, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu ngi^un-nai;
p^un-ng`in v'u-y+uk, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu h'o-choi f`i-tap. To li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu h`an p^un-ng`in khon-cho thi-mien-song ke l'a-sap, su"-ki^en ke fi-v+ut.
Ng`ai si'a li'a-t^eu, `m-he oi ham ng`i-t^eu kien-seu, he oi khien-va ng`i-t^eu, chhiong khien ng`ai s'o-siak ke ch'u"-'ng yit-yong.

Chhai K^i-tuk-th`u ke ng`in-s^en ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu kh'o-n`en voi y^u k^ui-van ke th'o-s^u", ch'ung-he ch'u"-y^u ng`ai yit-s`a he ng`i-t^eu ke ^a-p^a; y^in-vi he ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im p^un ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke t^i-poi chhiu s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke ^a-p^a.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu oi h+ok ng`ai ke p'ong-yong.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai phai Th`i-m^o-thai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi; chhai Ch'u t^i-poi k`i he ng`ai chh^in-oi yu ch^ung-s^im ke lai-'e. K`i voi tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong-h'i ng`ai sin K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u y^i-heu ke s'o-h`ang s'o-cho, chhiu-he ng`ai chhai tak-vi kok kau-fi s'o-k^au ke.
Ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, y^u-t^eu ng`in si'ong ng`ai m`o kh'o-n`en hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi l'e, chhiu chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai.

Kh`i-s+u"t, Ch'u na-he h'en, `m-s'u" k'i-ki'u ng`ai chhiu voi hi khon ng`i-t^eu. Ke-s`u", ng`ai `m t^an-chhiang oi th^ang ke-t^eu ki^eu-ngau ke ng`in s'o k'ong ke, ya oi khon k`i-t^eu to-t'ai y^u m'a-ke khi`en-n`en.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ke koet `m-he chhai-f^u ngi`en-ng^i, he chhai-f^u khi`en-n`en.
Ng`i-t^eu oi m'a-ke? Oi ng`ai tai-t'en kun-'e hi, ya-he oi ng`ai tai chh`u"-oi v^un-y`u ke s^im hi ^a?
Ng`ai chu"n-k^in th^ang-k'ong ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u y`im-lon ke su"; li'a-ch'ung y`im-lon li`en yi-kau-th`u ch^ung-ki^en ya m`o. Ng`ai th^ang-k'ong y^u-ng`in th`ung-t'o ki^a heu-^oi!
Ng`i-t^eu h`an chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai! Ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi k'am-kok thung-s^im, chi^ong h`ang li'a-ch'ung su" ke ng`in tui ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung kiuk chhut-hi!

S^ui-y`en ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i l`i-kh^oi ng`i-t^eu chhin y'en, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke s^im th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha. Ng`ai y'i-k^in fung ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang thin h`ang li'a-ch'ung y`im-lon ke ng`in cho y^u-chhui, chhiong ng`ai he chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi khiung-yong. Ng`i-t^eu chhai chhi-fi-ch^ung, ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu th`ung-s^im. Kho ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke khi`en-n`en,
ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi chi^ong li'a ng`in k^au-p^un Sat-tan, p^un Sat-tan f'i-m+et k`i ke ngiuk-th'i, s'u" k`i ke l`in-f`un chhai Ch'u chai-l`oi ke-ngit voi tet-kiu.
Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-kho^a he chhin `m-chh+ok ke! Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-t^i, yit-s+it-'e fat-kau chhiu voi s'u" k^ui-th`on mien fat-h'i-l`oi?

Ng`i-t^eu ki-y`en he m`o fat-kau ke mien, oi chh`u-thet chhui, chhiong chh`u-thet khiu fat-kau yit-yong; ng`i-t^eu chang voi chhiong m`o fat-kau ke s^in mien-th`on yit-yong, v`an-chhi`on chhiang-li. Ng`ai-t^eu Ph`an-ko-chiet ke y`en-s+it y'i-k^in ch'un-phi h'o l'e, y^in-vi K^i-tuk --- Ph`an-ko-chiet ke K^au-y`ong y'i-k^in vi ng`ai-t^eu h^i-s^en.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu ko Ph`an-ko-chiet ke s`u", cho-`m-tet yung khiu fat-kau, chhiu-he y^u chhui l^au si`a-ok ke fat-kau; oi yung m`o fat-kau ke pi'ang-`e, chhiu-he y^u s`un-kiet l^au ch^u"n-l^i ke pi'ang-`e.
Y^i-chhi`en si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu ke sin-'e, ng`ai su"t k'in-kie ng`i-t^eu, `m-h'o th`ung y`im-lon ke ng`in l`oi-v^ong.

Ng`ai `m-he ch'u" li'a su"-ki^en yit-chhiet y`im-lon, th^am-s^im, cho-chh+et, ya-he pai ngi'eu-siong ke ng`in l`oi k'ong; chh`u-f^i l`i-kh^oi su"-ki^en, oi th`ung li'a-t^eu ng`in kak-kh^oi he m`o kh'o-n`en ke.

Li'a-ha, ng`ai si'a sin-'e l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: `M-h'o th`ung chhu"-chh^u"n sin-th`u yu fam y`im-lon, th^am-s^im, pai ngi'eu-siong, y+uk-ma ng`in, chi'u-chui, ya-he cho-chh+et ke ng`in l`oi-v^ong; chhiu-he th`ung li'a-ch'ung ng`in khiung-chok s+u"t-fan ya cho-`m-tet.

Ng`ai cho-m'a-ke oi-s'u" s'u"m-phan kau-fi ngoi ke ng`in n`e? Song-ti chhu"-y`en voi s'u"m-phan k`i-t^eu. Ch'ung-he, kau-fi nui ke ng`in ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-s'u" s'u"m-phan m^a? Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Oi chi^ong ke si`a-ok ke ng`in tui ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung kiuk chhut-hi!"
Chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en, su"n-th`u p'i-chh'u" ch^en-lun ke su", ngi'ong-k'am ko to m`o sin Ch'u ke fap-k^on mien-chhi`en hi n`e? Ngi'ong-p^an `m chhi'ang su"n-th`u thoi ng`i-t^eu ki'e-kiet?
K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i su"n-th`u oi s'u"m-phan su"-kie m^a? Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu oi s'u"m-phan su"-kie, k'am m`o fap-thu ki'e-kiet ke-t^eu s'eu su"-chh`in m^a?
Li`en thi^en-s'u" ya oi chiap-su ng`ai-t^eu ke s'u"m-phan, ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-t^i m^a? H`an oi-s'u" k'ong su"-ki^en ke su"-chh`in m^a?
Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, na-he y^u ch^en-lun ke su", ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet hi khi`u ke-t^eu kau-fi m`o khon-chhung ke ng`in l`oi chh'u-l^i n`e?
S+u"t-chhai h`an kien-seu ^o! K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung m`o yit-ke y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in h'o thoi sin-th`u ki'e-kiet f^un-ch^en m^a?
M`o si'ong-t'o, he hi^ung-thi ko hi^ung-thi, h`an k'am ko to m`o sin Ch'u ke ng`in mien-chhi`en hi!
Ng`i-t^eu ko-l`oi ko-hi, chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in v`an-chhi`on su"t-phai l'e. P^un-ng`in y^en-v'ong, cho-m'a-ke `m k^am-ngien? S+u"t-kh^ui y^u m'a-ke si^ong-k^on n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu f'an-ch'on y^en-v'ong ng`in, kh^ui-fu ng`in, li`en tui chhu"-k^a ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ya he 'an-ngi`ong.

K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i si`a-ok ke ng`in put-n`en cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in m^a? `M-h'o chhu"-k^a phien chhu"-k^a! Ke-t^eu fam y`im-lon, pai ngi'eu-siong, h`ang ki^en-y`im, cho l`an-th`ung, chh^in-n`am-set,
th^eu-n^a, th^am-s^im, chi'u-chui, f'i-pong ng`in, ya-he l+et-sok ng`in ke, chhi`on-phu put-n`en cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in.

Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en, y^u-t^eu ng`in y^i-chhi`en chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong. Ch'ung-he, th^ung-ko Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu Song-ti ke L`in, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in s'e-chhiang, y'i-k^in su"n-fa k^ui Song-ti, y'i-k^in th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he l'e.

Y^u ng`in voi k'ong: "M`o m'a-ke su" ng`ai cho-`m-tet ke!" M`o `m-chh+ok; ch'ung-he, `m-he tak-yong su" chhi`on-phu y^u li-yit. Ng`ai ya cho-tet k'ong: "M`o m'a-ke su" ng`ai cho-`m-tet ke", ch'ung-he, ng`ai `m p^un ngim-h`o yit-khien su" l`oi kh'ung-chu".

Y^u ng`in voi k'ong: "S+u"t-v+ut he vi-t'o t'u-s'u", t'u-s'u" he vi-t'o s+u"t-v+ut." M`o `m-chh+ok; ch'ung-he y^u yit-ngit, Song-ti voi s'u" li'a li'ong-yong l^ung-ch'ung f'i-fai thet-hi. Oi se-ngi ^o! S^u"n-th'i `m-he vi-t'o h`ang y`im-lon, he vi-t'o Ch'u l`oi chh`un-chhai ke; Ch'u voi ki^ung-kip s^u"n-th'i ke s^i-yeu.
Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" Ch'u tui s'i f+uk-f+at; K`i ya oi yung chhu"-k^a ke thai-n`en p^un ng`ai-t^eu f+uk-f+at.
Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-t^i, ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i he K^i-tuk ke k^i-th'i m^a? 'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet n^a K^i-tuk ke k^i-th'i l`oi cho k^i-'ng ke k^i-th'i m^a? Chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet!
Ng`i-t^eu ya yit-thin oi t^i, th`ung k^i-'ng kiet-li`en ke, chhiu-he th`ung k`i s`ang-cho yit-th'i. Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Li'ong-ke ng`in oi s`ang-cho yit-th'i."
Ch'ung-he, th`ung Ch'u kiet-li`en ke ng`in, chhiu-he chhai l`in-sin-song th`ung Ch'u h+ap-y`i v`i-yit.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi phit-mi^en y`im-lon. Ng`in m`o-lun fam m'a-ke chhui, chhi`on-phu chhai s^u"n-th'i y^i-ngoi; v`i-y^u fam y`im-lon ke ng`in he tet-chhui chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i.
K'am `m-t^i ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i he Su"n-L`in ke thien m^a? Su"n-L`in h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi, he Song-ti s'o-su ke. Ng`i-t^eu `m-he s+uk chhu"-k^a, he s+uk Song-ti,
y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he K`i chhin kui m^ai-l`oi ke. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi yung s^u"n-th'i l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.
Li'a-ha l`oi th'o-lun ng`i-t^eu sin-'e t^i-poi s'o th`i ke su"-chh`in. Ng`ai th`ung-yi, n`am-ng`in n`en m+ok kiet-f^un he h'o-su".
Ch'ung-he, ki-y`en y^u 'an-t^o y`im-lon ke su" fat-s^en, n`am-ng`in yin-k^oi y^u chhu"-k^a ke p^u-ngi`ong; 'ng-ng`in ya yin-k^oi y^u chhu"-k^a ke l'o-k^ung.
L'o-k^ung tui p^u-ngi`ong oi chhin f^u-chh^i ke chit-ngim; p^u-ngi`ong tui l'o-k^ung ya oi chhin f^u-chh^i ke chit-ngim.
P^u-ngi`ong tui chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i pin m`o ch'u-khi`en, ch'u-khi`en he chhai l'o-k^ung; khiung-yong, l'o-k^ung tui chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i ya m`o ch'u-khi`en, ch'u-khi`en he chhai p^u-ngi`ong.

F^u-chh^i cho-`m-tet fut-li+ok tui-f^ong ke s^i-yeu, chh`u-f^i he oi ch^on-s^im kh`i-t'o ke y`en-ku, p'i-chh'u" th`ung-yi chhiam-s`u" f^un-f`ong; ch'ung-he heu-l`oi h`an-he oi f^i-f+uk chu"n-s`ong ke ko^an-he, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi m`o fap-thu chiet-chu", su Sat-tan ke y'u-f+et.
Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, `m-he min-lin ng`i-t^eu, he mi^en-ki'ong th`ung-yi ng`i-t^eu ke khon-fap thin-thin.

Su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai ngien-yi thai-k^a chhiong ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong m+ok kiet-f^un; ch'ung-he, tak-s`a tui Song-ti s'o li^ang-su ke ^en-su m`o khiung-yong, y^u-ng`in ke ^en-su he li'a-yong, y^u-ng`in he ke-yong.
Li'a-ha, ng`ai oi tui m`o kiet-f^un ke ng`in l^au ko'a-fu k'ong: N`en chhiong ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong ko th+uk-s^u"n ke s^en-f+at ya h'o.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu na m`o fap-thu kh'ung-chu" chh`in-y+uk, chhiu kiet-f^un h'o l'e. Kiet-f^un p'i y+uk-f'o n`an-ngai kha h'o.
Y'i-k^in kiet-f^un ke ng`in, ng`ai ya oi f^un-fu ng`i-t^eu; kh`i-s+u"t li'a `m-he ng`ai ke yi-su", he Ch'u ke min-lin: Cho p^u-ngi`ong ke `m-h'o l`i-kh^oi l'o-k^ung;
na-he l`i-kh^oi, chhiu `m-h'o chai ka; na m`o, chhiu oi to-ch'on-l`oi th`ung l'o-k^ung f`o-h'o. Cho l'o-k^ung ke ya cho-`m-tet l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong.

Tui kh`i-th^a ke ng`in, ng`ai ya y^u fa oi k'ong (`m-he Ch'u k'ong ke): L'o-k^ung he K^i-tuk-th`u, ch'ung-he p^u-ngi`ong m`o sin Ch'u, ki^a p^u-ngi`ong na f^on-h'i ki-si+uk th`ung k`i khiung-ha s^en-f+at, k`i chhiu cho-`m-tet l`i-thet p^u-ngi`ong.
P^u-ngi`ong he K^i-tuk-th`u, ch'ung-he l'o-k^ung m`o sin Ch'u, ki^a l'o-k^ung na f^on-h'i ki-si+uk th`ung k`i khiung-ha s^en-f+at, k`i ya cho-`m-tet l`i-thet l'o-k^ung.

Y^in-vi, m`o sin Ch'u ke l'o-k^ung y^in-vi p^u-ngi`ong sin Ch'u, y'i-k^in tet-t'o Song-ti ke chiap-n+ap; khiung-yong, m`o sin Ch'u ke p^u-ngi`ong y^in-vi l'o-k^ung sin Ch'u, y'i-k^in tet-t'o Song-ti ke chiap-n+ap. Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng ngi'ong-p^an y^u kh'o-n`en tet-t'o chiap-n+ap n`e? Su"-s+u"t-song, k`i-t^eu he Song-ti s'o chiap-n+ap ke.

Van-yit, m`o sin Ch'u ke ki^en-chh`u" oi l`i-kh^oi, chhiu y`u-chhai k`i hi. Ch'u"-y^u chhai li'a-ch'ung chh`in-h`in ch^u"-ha, sin Ch'u ke, m`o-lun he cho l'o-k^ung ke ya-he cho p^u-ngi`ong ke, chang cho-tet chhu"-y`u. Y^in-vi Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu, he oi ng`i-t^eu y^u f`o-ph`in.

Sin Ch'u ke p^u-ngi`ong-ng`in ^a, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an k'am khok-thin m`o fap-thu kiu ngi^a l'o-k^ung ^a? Sin Ch'u ke n`am-'e-ng`in ^a, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an k'am khok-thin m`o fap-thu kiu ngi^a p^u-ngi`ong ^a?
M^i-yit-ke ng`in oi cheu Ch'u ke ^en-su l`oi s^en-f+at, ya oi phi-h+ap Song-ti f^u-seu k`i ke muk-tit. Li'a he ng`ai chhai kok kau-fi kau-th^o ng`in ke ngi`en-chet.
Y'i-k^in su kot-l^i ke, m`ung-seu y^i-heu `m-s'u" chh`u-thet kot-l^i ke ki-ho; m`ung-seu ke s`u" m`ang su kot-l^i ke, ya `m-s'u" su kot-l^i.
Y^in-vi y^u su kot-l^i ya-he m`o, `m son m'a-ke; chhung-yeu ke he f+uk-chhi`ung Song-ti ke min-lin.
M^i-yit-ke ng`in yin-k^oi p'o-chh`u" k`i m`ung-seu ke s`u" ke s^u"n-fun.
Ng`i m`ung-seu ke s`u" ke s^u"n-fun na-he n`u-li, ya m`o si^ong-k^on; ch'ung-he, yit y^u k^i-fi h'o tet-t'o chhu"-y`u, ng`i chhiu oi ch^en-chh'i.
Y^in-vi n`u-li m`ung Ch'u f^u-seu chhiu-he Ch'u s'o su"t-fong ke ng`in; khiung-yong, chhu"-y`u-ng`in m`ung-seu chhiu-he K^i-tuk ke n`u-li.
Ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti yung chhung-ka m^ai-l`oi ke, s'o-y^i `m-h'o cho ng`in ke n`u-li.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in, chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en, chhi`on-phu oi p'o-chh`u" m`ung-seu ke-s`u" ke s^u"n-fun.

Ko^an-he th+uk-s^u"n ke mun-th`i, ng`ai m`o tet-t'o Ch'u ke ch'u"-su". Ch'ung-he, ng`ai tet-t'o Song-ti ke l`in-m'en, s`ang-cho kh^am-tet sin-lai ke ng`in; ng`ai chhiu yung li'a-ch'ung s^u"n-fun l`oi tui kok-vi th`i-chhut ng`ai ke khon-fap.
Si'ong-t'o muk-chhi`en ke ki^en-n`an, ng`ai ngin-v`i ng`in chui-h'o h`an-he p'o-chh`u" ngi`en-chhong.
Ng`in na y^u p^u-ngi`ong, `m-h'o si'ong-oi thot-l`i; na m`o p^u-ngi`ong, ya m`o s^i-yeu hi chh`im yit-ke.

Ng`i na kiet-f^un, pin `m-he fam-chhui; m`ang-ka ke fu-'ng na kiet-f^un, me m`o m'a-ke `m-chh+ok. Ch'ung-he, kiet-f^un ke ng`in y^u ngiuk-s^u"n ke chh`an-pan; ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu `m-s'u" chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai s'o-oi k'ong ke chhiu-he: S`u"-ki^en `m t^o l'e. Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, y^u p^u-ngi`ong ke, oi chhiong m`o p^u-ngi`ong;
kieu-ch^u" ke, oi chhiong m`o kieu; f^on-h'i ke, oi chhiong `m f^on-h'i; chhin-hau m^ai ke, oi chhiong m`o pan-yong;
hau chhap su" su" ke, oi chhiong m`o chhap. Y^in-vi li'a su"-kie ke yong-siong voi ko-thet l'e.
Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chhi`on m`o koa-li. N`am-ng`in m`o kiet-f^un he ko^an-s^im Ch'u ke su", ch^on-s^im l`oi si'ong ngi'ong-p^an p^un Ch'u f^on-h'i;
ch'ung-he, kiet-f^un ke ng`in chhiu-he ko^an-s^im su"-ki^en ke su", si'ong phan-fap p^un p^u-ngi`ong f^on-h'i,

n`an-mi^en f^un-s^im. M`o l'o-k^ung l^au s'u th+uk-s^u"n ke fu-'ng s'o ko^an-s^im ke he Ch'u ke su"; y^in-vi k`i ngien-yi fung-hien chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-s^im-l`in; ch'ung-he, cho ng`in p^u-ngi`ong ke chhiu-he ko^an-s^im su"-ki^en ke su", si'ong phan-fap p^un l'o-k^ung f^on-h'i.

Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he oi p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu, `m-he oi han-chu" ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai ke muk-tit he oi ng`i-t^eu h`ang h+ap-su"t ke su", vi Ch'u ke k^ung-chok v`an-chhi`on fung-hien chhu"-k^a, chhi`on m`o p'o-li`u.

Lun-t'o ke y'i-k^in thin-chh^in, heu-l`oi sa kiet-thin `m kiet-f^un ke ng`in, n`am-ng`in na k'am-kok chhu"-k^a tui-put-h'i vi-f^un-chh^i, vi-t'o sin-y+uk ke s^i-yeu, chhu"-ngin kiet-f^un kha chh+ok, k`i-t^eu chhiu yin-t^ong kiet-f^un; 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, `m son fam-chhui.

Ch'ung-he, yit-ke n`am-ng`in na-he k`i ke s^im f^i-s`ong ki^en-thin `m kiet-f^un, (`m-he ng`in ap-pet k`i, he k`i chhu"-k^a kiet-s^im oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang), yu n`en chiet-chu" chhu"-k^a, chhai li'a-ch'ung chh`in-h`in ch^u"-ha, m`o th`ung vi-f^un-chh^i kiet-f^un chhiu-he h'o-su".
Ch'ung-k'ong, th`ung vi-f^un-chh^i kiet-f^un he h'o-su"; ki^en-chh`u" `m kiet-f^un h`an-kha h'o.
L'o-k^ung h`an chh^oi, cho p^u-ngi`ong ke he su yok-suk ke; l'o-k^ung na ko-s^u"n, k`i chhiu y^u chhu"-y`u h'o th`ung kak-yi ke n`am-ng`in kiet-f^un, ch'ung-he oi ka sin-th`u chang cho-tet.
Cheu ng`ai khon, k`i m+ok ka-ng`in kha y^u fuk-hi; ng`ai ya si'ong, li'a he Song-ti ke L`in ch'u"-su" ng`ai ke.

Ko^an-he pai-ko ngi'eu-siong ke s+u"t-v+ut, ng`ai-t^eu t^i, "Ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung y^u li'a f^ong-mien ke chu"-su"t". Ch'ung-he, li'a-ch'ung chu"-su"t voi hoi-ng`in chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai; v`i-y^u oi-s^im chang voi chho-chhiu ng`in.
Ng`in na chhu"-ngin k`i t^i m'a-ke, cheu s'o yin-k^oi t^i ke, k`i h`an-he y^u s'o `m-t^i.
Ch'ung-he, ng`in na kin-oi Song-ti, li'a ng`in chhiu-he Song-ti s'o ngin-su"t ke.

'An-ngi`ong, ko^an-he s+u"t pai-ko ngi'eu-siong ke s+u"t-v+ut li'a-ke mun-th`i, ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ngi'eu-siong s'o thoi-p'eu ke he m`o chh`un-chhai ke t^ung-s^i; ng`ai-t^eu ya t^i, Song-ti ch'u"-y^u yit-ke.
S^ui-y`en thi^en-song ng`in-ki^en ya y^u s'o-vi "s`u"n-m`in" ke, (y^u chhin-t^o ke "s`u"n-m`in" l^au "ch'u"),

ch'ung-he tui ng`ai-t^eu l`oi k'ong, ch'u"-y^u yit-ke Song-ti, chhiu-he thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a --- van-v+ut ke Chh'ong-chho-ch'a; ng`ai-t^eu he vi-t'o K`i l`oi s^en-chh`un ke. H`an-y^u, ch'u"-y^u yit-ke Ch'u, chhiu-he Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk; van-v+ut he th^ung-ko k`i l`oi chho ke, ng`ai-t^eu ya he th^ung-ko k`i l`oi s^en-chh`un ke.

Ch'ung-he, `m-he m^i-yit-ke ng`in chhi`on-phu y^u li'a-ch'ung ke chu"-su"t. Y^u-t^eu ng`in y^i-chhi`en s`ong-s`ong pai ngi'eu-siong, to k^im-p^u-ngit, tak-p'ai s+u"t li'a-ch'ung s+u"t-v+ut h`an voi k'am-kok he s+u"t ngi'eu-siong ke t^ung-s^i. K`i-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im p'un-l`oi chhiu ngi^on-ngi+ok, y^in-vi s+u"t li'a-ch'ung s+u"t-v+ut, chhiu pien-cho l'a-sap.
Kh`i-s+u"t, s+u"t-v+ut pin put-n`en k'oi-san ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Song-ti ke ko^an-he; `m s+u"t m`o m'a-ke s'un-su"t, s+u"t ya m`o m'a-ke li-yit.
Oi se-ngi ^o! `M-h'o y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke chhu"-y`u hoi sin-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in tiet-t'o.

Na y^u-ng`in chhai li'a-khien su"-chh`in-song li`ong-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok, khon-t'o ng`i li'a "chu"-su"t f^ung-fu" ke ng`in chhai ki^ung-meu-t'u chh^o-s+it, li'a k'am `m-he k'u-li k`i s+u"t pai-ko ngi'eu-siong ke s+u"t-v+ut m^a?
'An-ngi`ong, li'a ngi^on-ngi+ok ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, chhiu-he K^i-tuk vi k`i s'i ke ng`in, voi y^in-vi ng`i ke "chu"-su"t" l`oi m+et-m`ong l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, tet-chhui hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, s^ong-hoi k`i-t^eu ngi^on-ngi+ok ke li`ong-s^im, chhiu-he tet-chhui K^i-tuk.
S'o-y^i, na-he s+u"t-v+ut voi hoi ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi tiet-t'o, ng`ai chhiu y'un-y'en `m s+u"t ngiuk, mi^en-tet ng`ai s'u" k`i-t^eu tiet-t'o.
Ng`ai k'am `m-he chhu"-y`u ke ng`in? K'am `m-he s'u"-th`u m^a? Ng`ai m`o kien-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u m^a? Ng`i-t^eu `m-he ng`ai vi Ch'u cho-k^ung s'o kiet ke k'o-ch'u" m^a?

Chhiu-son ph+et-ng`in `m khon ng`ai cho s'u"-th`u, ng`i-t^eu ch'ung-oi khon ng`ai cho s'u"-th`u! Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho Ch'u ke sin-th`u, li'a-ke su"-s+u"t chhiu-he ng`ai cho s'u"-th`u ke chu"n-k'i.
Ph+et-ng`in ph^i-ph`in ng`ai ke s`u", ng`ai chhiu 'an-ngi`ong phien-fu k'ong:
K'am-k'ong ng`ai-t^eu m`o khi`en-li h'o kho fuk-y^im s+u"t-fan m^a?
K'am-k'ong ng`ai-t^eu cho-`m-tet chhiong kh`i-th^a ke s'u"-th`u, chhiong Ch'u ke l'o-th^ai, chhiong P'i-tet yit-yong, tai-t'en sin Ch'u ke p^u-ngi`ong khiung-ha l^i-h`ang m^a?
K'am-k'ong v`i-y^u P^a-n^a-p^a l^au ng`ai chhiu yit-thin oi kho cho-se l`oi v`i-chh`u" s^en-f+at m^a?
