M'a-ng`in cho-p^in chhu"-phi li`ong-s+u"t ^a? M'a-ng`in chung ph`u-th`o m`o s+u"t chhu"-k^a y`en-t'u chhut-s'an ke ph`u-th`o ^a? M'a-ng`in hiuk y`ong m`o s+u"t y`ong-khi`un ke nen ^a?
Ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke, k'am ch'u"-y^u cheu ng`in ke yi-kien; fap-l+it k'am `m-he ya 'an-ngi`ong k'ong m^a?
M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it k'ong: "Ngi`u th+ap kuk ke s`u", `m-h'o l^ung-t'en k`i ke choi." Song-ti s'o ko^an-s^im ke k'am-he ngi`u?

K`i k'am `m-he vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu l`oi k'ong m^a? Li'a t^ong-y`en he vi ng`ai-t^eu si'a ke! Y^in-vi k^ang-chung-ke l^au s^u-kot-ke chhut-hi cho-se, l^ung-ch'ung h^i-mong p^un-t'o k`i-t^eu s'o yin-tet ke 'ng-kuk.
Ng`ai-t^eu su"t chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ve s+uk-l`in ke ch'ung-ch'u". Chhiu-son ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong ng`i-t^eu ki^ung-kip ke v+ut-chu"t son-cho s^u-s`u"n, k'am voi thet ko-fun m^a?

Ph+et-ng`in na y^u khi`en-li hi'ong-su ng`i-t^eu ke t^ung-s^i, ng`ai-t^eu k'am `m-he h`an-kha y^u li'a-ke khi`en-li m^a? Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t yung-ko li'a-ke khi`en-li, f'an-ch'on f`am-su" ngi^un-su, mi^en-tet K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im su-t'o ch'u-ngoi.
Ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi t^i, chhai su"n-thien t^i-poi f+uk-su" ke ng`in chhiu hi'ong-su su"n-thien-nui s'o ki^ung-kip ke s+u"t-v+ut; chhai chi-th`an hien-chi ke ng`in ya y^u chi-v+ut h'o p^un.
Khiung-yong, Ch'u ya 'an-ngi`ong f^un-fu: Chh`on fuk-y^im ke ng`in yin-k^oi kho fuk-y^im l`oi v`i-chh`u" s^en-f+at.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai m`ang-su"t yung-ko li'a-t^eu khi`en-li; li'a-ha, ng`ai si'a li'a-t^eu fa ya `m-he oi ch^en-chh'i li'a-ch'ung ke khi`en-li. Ng`ai s'i me `m k^am-ngien p^un ng`ai s'o kho^a-khi'eu ke l+ok-kh^ung!
Ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im pin m`o m'a-ke h'o kho^a-khi'eu, y^in-vi ng`ai he fung-min hi chh`on ke. Ng`ai `m chh`on fuk-y^im chhiu chh'am l'e!
Ng`ai na-he k^am-s^im l+ok-yi chh`on fuk-y^im, chhiu voi y^u po-s'ong; ch'ung-he, ki-y`en Song-ti chi^ong li'a ngim-vu k^au-p^un ng`ai, ng`ai chhiu ngin-v`i li'a he yit-ch'ung chit-ngim.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai ke po-s'ong he m'a-ke n`e? Chh`on fuk-y^im p^un ng`in, p^un ng`in `m-s'u" yung chhi`en chhiu tet-t'o fuk-y^im, m`o yung ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im yin-tet ke khi`en-li, li'a chhiu-he ng`ai ke k^ong-y`ung.
Ng`ai he chhu"-y`u ke ng`in, `m-he m'a-ng`in ke n`u-li; ch'ung-he ng`ai k^am-ngien cho thai-chung ke ph+uk-ng`in, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o kien-t^o ke ng`in.

Th`ung Y`u-thai-ng`in khiung-ha, ng`ai chhiu chhiong Y`u-thai-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong s^en-f+at, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o Y`u-thai-ng`in; th`ung ke-t^eu chhai fap-l+it ch^u"-ha ke ng`in khiung-ha, s^ui-y`en ng`ai m`o su M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke hot-chu", ch'ung-he ng`ai h`an-he chhiong chhai fap-l+it ch^u"-ha ke ng`in 'an-ngi`ong s^en-f+at, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o fap-l+it ch^u"-ha ke ng`in.

Khiung-yong, th`ung fap-l+it ch^u" ngoi ke ng`in khiung-ha, ng`ai chhiu-chhiong fap-l+it ch^u" ngoi ke ng`in, m`o su Y`u-thai fap-l+it ke yok-suk, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o fap-l+it ch^u" ngoi ke ng`in. Ch'ung-he, li'a `m-he k'ong ng`ai `m f+uk-chhi`ung Song-ti ke fap-l+it; su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai he su K^i-tuk fap-l+it ke yok-suk.

Chhai sin-s^im ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`ai chhiu cho ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in. Ch'ung-k'ong, chhai m'a-ke yong ke ng`in ch^ung-ki^en, ng`ai chhiu cho m'a-ke yong ke ng`in; m`o-lun yung m'a-ke f^ong-fap, ng`ai ch'ung-oi kiu t^eu ng`in.
Ng`ai cho li'a yit-chhiet ke su", he vi fuk-y^im ke y`en-ku, muk-tit he oi th`ung ph+et-ng`in khiung-ha f^un-hi'ong fuk-y^im ke h'o-chhu.

Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-t^i, chhai yun-thung-chh`ong si^ong-ch'eu ke ng`in chhin-t^o, ch'ung-he tet-chi'ong ke ch'u"-y^u yit-s`a. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi yung kiet-s^im l`oi ch'eu, chang voi tet chi'ong-s'ong.

M^i-yit-ke chh^am-k^a p'i-soi ke, yit-thin oi chiap-su ngi`am-kiet ke hiun-lien, li'a he vi-t'o oi tet-t'o voi f'ai ke mi^en-li`u thin-thin; ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu s'o-cho ke he vi-t'o oi tet-t'o `m-voi f'ai ke mi^en-li`u.
S'o-y^i, chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai yit-chh+u"t hiong muk-ph^eu k'in-ch'eu; ng`ai yu chhiong t'a-khi`en ke ng`in, `m-oi t'a kh^ung-khi`en.
Ng`ai ngi`am-ngi`am chh^au-lien chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i, he oi v`an-chhi`on kh'ung-chu" k`i, mi^en-tet ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im p^un ph+et-ng`in heu, chhu"-k^a f'an-ch'on su th`o-thai l^e.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai `m-oi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i, ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en th`en M^o-s^i chhai kh'ong-y^a s'o k^in-l+it ke su". K`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu chhai y`un ke p'o-fu ch^u"-ha ph`in-^on k^in-ko F`ung-h'oi.
Chhai y`un-ch^ung, chhai h'oi-t'u, k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung li^ang s'e-l^i th`ung M^o-s^i kiet-li`en.
K`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu s+u"t khiung-yong ke l`in-li`ong,
l^im khiung-yong ke l`in-s'ui. Li'a l`in-s'ui he tui th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha h`ang ke s+uk-l`in ke ph`an-s+ak li`u chhut-l`oi ke; ke ph`an-s+ak chhiu-he K^i-tuk.
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, thai-phu-fun he Song-ti m`o f^on-h'i ke ng`in, s'o-y^i k`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-s^u" vang chhai kh'ong-y^a.
Li'a yit-chhiet su" he ng`ai-t^eu ke kam-kie, k'in-ko ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong m`i-lien si`a-ok ke su".

K`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in pai ngi'eu-siong; ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong pai ngi'eu-siong. Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Li'a-khi`un ng`in-m`in chh^o-h^a-l`oi thai-s+u"t thai-l^im, kh^i-h'i-l`oi kh`ong-f^on thiong-l+ok."

K`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in h`ang y`im-lon ke su", ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong y`im-lon; k`i-t^eu y^in-vi y`im-lon, yit-ngit ch^u"-nui, s'i-thet li'ong-van s^am-chhi^en s`a.
Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in 'an-ngi`ong su"-tham K^i-tuk; k`i-t^eu y^in-vi su"-tham K`i p^un s`a ng^au-s'i.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chhiong k`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-t^eu ng`in 'an-ngi`ong fat yen-ngi`en; k`i-t^eu y^in-vi fat yen-ngi`en p^un chu"p-h`ang f'i-m+et ke thi^en-s'u" chh`u"-s'i.
K`i-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o ke li'a-t^eu su" chhi`on-phu he yit-ch'ung ke kam-kie, ki h^a-l`oi he oi cho ng`ai-t^eu ke k'in-kie, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu he chhai m+at-su" ke s`u"-thoi.
S'o-y^i, chhu"-ngin kh^i tet-h+et ke ng`in chhiu oi se-ngi, chang `m-voi tiet-t'o.

Ng`i-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o ke su"-tham, m`o yit-yong he ng`in ngai-`m-h+et ke. Song-ti he sin-s+u"t ke; K`i yit-thin `m-voi p^un ng`i-t^eu t`u-t'o chh^eu-ko ng`i-t^eu s'o-n`en ngi^un-su ke su"-tham. Su"-tham l`oi ke s`u", K`i voi su ng`i-t^eu l+it-liong, p^un ng`i-t^eu ngai-tet-h+et, thoi ng`i-t^eu kh^oi yit-thi`au chhut-lu.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u, ng`i-t^eu oi y'en-l`i pai ngi'eu-siong ke su".
Ng`ai he khon ng`i-t^eu cho m`in-l^i ke ng`in l`oi k'ong-fa; ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ya cho-tet phan-ton, ng`ai k'ong ke chh+ok ya-he `m-chh+ok.
Ng`ai-t^eu l^im chuk-chhia ko ke p^i, k'am `m-he f^un-hi'ong K^i-tuk ke hiet m^a? Ng`ai-t^eu s+u"t pak-kh^oi ke pi'ang, k'am `m-he f^un-hi'ong K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-th'i m^a?
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ch'u"-y^u yit-chak pi'ang-`e, s'o f^un-hi'ong ke he khiung-chak pi'ang-`e; s'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu ng`in s^ui-y`en t^o, h`an-he yit-th'i.
Chhi'ang khon Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in; ke-t^eu s+u"t chi-v+ut ke, chhiu th`ung chi-th`an fat-s^en ko^an-he.
Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e? K'am chu"n-k^in ngin-v`i ngi'eu-siong l^au chi-v+ut p'un-s^u"n he 'an chhung-yeu m^a?
T^ong-y`en `m-he! Ng`ai s'o-oi k'ong ke chhiu-he: Chhai yi-kau ke chi-th`an-t'ang s'o-hien ke chi-v+ut he hien-p^un k'ui ke, `m-he hien p^un Song-ti ke. Ng`ai `m-oi ng`i-t^eu th`ung k'ui si^ong-k^au.
Ng`i-t^eu cho-`m-tet l^im Ch'u ke p^i yu l^im k'ui ke p^i, cho-`m-tet chh^am-k^a Ch'u ke chok-s+it yu chh^am-k^a k'ui ke chok-s+it.
Ng`ai-t^eu oi ngi^a Ch'u fat-khi'en he-m`o? Ng`ai-t^eu p'i K`i kha khi`ong he-m`o?

Y^u-t^eu ng`in k'ong: "M'a-ke su" me cho-tet." Li'a-ke fa m`o `m-chh+ok. Ch'ung-he, `m-he tak-yong su" chhi`on-phu y^u li-yit. "M'a-ke su" me cho-tet." Ch'ung-he, `m-he tak-yong su" l^ung-ch'ung voi chho-chhiu ng`in.
M`o-lun m'a-ng`in, `m-h'o khi`u chhu"-k^a ke li-yit, oi ko^an-s^im ph+et-ng`in ke li-yit.
Su"-chh`ong s'o mai ke ngiuk, ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung cho-tet s+u"t, `m-s'u" vi li`ong-s^im ke y`en-ku chh`a-chh`a mun-mun.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Thi-song l^au kh`i-ch^ung ke van-v+ut chhi`on-phu he Ch'u ke."

Na y^u `m-sin Ch'u ke ng`in chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu s+u"t-fan, ng`i-t^eu ya si'ong-oi hi, 'an-ngi`ong, chok-t'ang s'o p`ai ke s+u"t-v+ut, fong-s^im hi s+u"t, `m-s'u" vi li`ong-s^im ke y`en-ku chh`a-chh`a mun-mun.
Ch'ung-he, na y^u-ng`in tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong, "Ke-t^eu s+u"t-v+ut pai-ko ngi'eu-siong", vi-t'o tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa ke ng`in, ya vi li`ong-s^im ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m+ok s+u"t.
Ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke, `m-he ch'u" ng`i-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im, he ke-ng`in ke li`ong-s^im. Y^in-vi, ng`ai cho-m'a-ke oi vi-t'o chhu"-k^a ke chhu"-y`u p^un ph+et-ng`in ke li`ong-s^im l`oi lun-ton n`e?
Ki-y`en ng`ai he chh`un k'am-chhia ke s^im l`oi hi'ong-su s+u"t-v+ut, cho-m'a-ke oi p^un ph+et-ng`in y^in-vi ng`ai s'o k'am-chhia ke s+u"t-v+ut l`oi ph^i-ph`in ng`ai n`e?
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun cho m'a-ke, he s+u"t ya-he l^im, l^ung-ch'ung oi vi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti l`oi cho.
M`o-lun he Y`u-thai-ng`in, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, ya-he Song-ti ke kau-fi, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o hoi k`i-t^eu tiet-t'o.

Ng`i-t^eu oi chhiong ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, m`o-lun m'a-ke su"-chh`in, oi p^un thai-k^a f^on-h'i; ng`ai `m-he khi`u chhu"-k^a ke li-yit, ch'u"-y^u ko^an-s^im chung-ng`in ke li-yit, vi-t'o s'u" k`i-t^eu tet-kiu.
Ng`i-t^eu oi h+ok ng`ai, chhiong ng`ai h+ok K^i-tuk yit-yong.
Ng`ai chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s`ong-s`ong ki-tet ng`ai, ya ch^un-s'u ng`ai chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke kau-hiun.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu m`in-ph+ak, K^i-tuk he m^i-yit-ke ng`in ke th`eu; l'o-k^ung he p^u-ngi`ong ke th`eu; Song-ti he K^i-tuk ke th`eu.
N`am-ng`in kh`i-t'o ya-he si^en-chh`on Song-ti ke fa, na chi^ong th`eu-n`a mi^ang-t'en chhiu-he si^u-y+uk K^i-tuk.

Ch'ung-he, fu-ng`in-k^a kh`i-t'o ya-he si^en-chh`on Song-ti ke fa, na m`o mi^ang-t'en th`eu-n`a chhiu-he si^u-y+uk chhu"-k^a ke l'o-k^ung. Li'a-ch'ung fu-ng`in-k^a th`ung thi-thet th`eu-n`a-m^o ke fu-ng`in-k^a m`o m'a-ke f^un-ph+et.
Fu-ng`in-k^a na-he `m mi^ang-th`eu, k`i chhiu oi thi-thet th`eu-n`a-m^o; ki-y`en ngin-v`i thi-k^ong-th`eu ya-he chi'en-thet th`eu-n`a-m^o he kien-seu ke su", k`i chhiu yin-k^oi mi^ang-t'en th`eu.
N`am-ng`in `m-s'u" mi^ang-th`eu, y^in-vi k`i he Song-ti ke h`in-siong l^au y`ung-k^ong; ch'ung-he, 'ng-ng`in he n`am-ng`in ke y`ung-k^ong.
Y^in-vi n`am-ng`in `m-he tui 'ng-ng`in chho ke, ti^en-to, 'ng-ng`in he tui n`am-ng`in l`oi chho ke;
n`am-ng`in `m-he vi 'ng-ng`in chho ke, ch'ung-he, 'ng-ng`in he vi-t'o n`am-ng`in l`oi chho ke.
S'o-y^i, vi-t'o thi^en-s'u" ke y`en-ku, fu-ng`in-k^a yin-k^oi oi mi^ang th`eu-k^in, l`oi p'eu-su" k`i sun-f+uk l'o-k^ung ke khi`en-v^i.
Kh`i-s+u"t, chhai Ch'u ke t^i-poi, n`am-ng`in l^au 'ng-ng`in fu-si^ong y'i-kho, p'i-chh'u" s^i-yeu.
Y^in-vi 'ng-ng`in he tui n`am-ng`in l`oi chho ke, th`ung-s`u" n`am-ng`in he tui fu-ng`in-k^a l`oi chhut-se ke, ch'ung-he van-v+ut chhi`on-phu he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.
Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a phan-ton! 'Ng-ng`in hiong Song-ti kh`i-t'o, `m mi^ang-th`eu chh+ok m`o?
Ng`i-t^eu ke p'un-sin k'am `m-he ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu, n`am-ng`in li`u chh`ong th`eu-n`a-m^o he k`i ke kien-seu,
ch'ung-he 'ng-ng`in li`u chh`ong th`eu-n`a-m^o chhiu-he k`i ke y`ung-k^ong m^a? Y^in-vi chh`ong th`eu-n`a-m^o cho-tet ch^a-t'en k`i ke th`eu-n`a.
Na y^u-ng`in oi phien-pok, ng`ai ch'u"-y^u k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu l^au Song-ti ke chung kau-fi m`o ph+et ke k^ui-thin.
H^a-poi, ng`ai s'o-oi f^un-fu ke, `m-he oi chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke chhi-fi s+u"t-chhai y^u s'un-hoi m`o li-yit.
Thi-yit, ng`ai th^ang-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai kau-fi chhi-fi ke s`u" kiet-t'ong f^un-phai. Ng`ai si^ong-sin li'a-ke fa y^u yit-phu-fun he y^u-y'ang ke.
(Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u f^un-phai he n`an-mi^en ke; li'a f'an-ch'on voi hi'en-chhut m'a-ng`in ke ch'u-ch^ong kha chh+ok.)
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhi-fi ke s`u", chhiu `m-he s+u"t Ch'u ke V^an-chh^on.
Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu s+u"t ke s`u", tak-s`a si^en s+u"t chhu"-k^a tai-l`oi ke t^ung-s^i, kiet-k'o y^u-t^eu ng`in ngo-t'u-s'u", y^u-t^eu ng`in s+u"t chi'u-chui.

Ng`i-t^eu oi s+u"t oi l^im, cho-m'a-ke `m-oi chhai vuk-h^a? Ya-he ng`i-t^eu ku-yi oi m'eu-su" Song-ti ke kau-fi, th`ung-s`u" oi p^un khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in kien-seu he-m`o? Ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Oi chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu m^a? Ng`ai s+u"t-chhai m`o fap-thu chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai s'o chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke, he ng`ai tui Ch'u li^ang-su ke: Ch'u Y^a-s^u p^un-ng`in chhut-mai ke am-p^u, n^a-h'i pi'ang-`e,
k'am-chhia Song-ti heu, chhiu pak-kh^oi, k'ong: "Li'a he ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i, he vi ng`i-t^eu h^i-s^en ke; ng`i-t^eu oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, l`oi ki-ngiam ng`ai."
S+u"t-p'au heu, k`i cheu-yong n^a-h'i p^i-'e, k'ong: "Li'a p^i he Song-ti yung ng`ai ke hiet s'o-l+ip ke s^in-yok; ng`i-t^eu tak-p'ai l^im ke s`u", oi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, l`oi ki-ngiam ng`ai."
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu tak-p'ai s+u"t li'a-ke pi'ang, l^im li'a-ke p^i, he si^en-ko Ch'u ke s'i, chh+u"t-to Ch'u chai-l`oi.
S'o-y^i, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na m`o yung kin-khi`en ke s^im s+u"t Ch'u ke pi'ang, l^im Ch'u ke p^i, k`i chhiu-he tet-chhui Ch'u ke s^u"n-th'i l^au Ch'u ke hiet.
M^i-yit-ke ng`in yin-t^ong si^en s'en-chhat chhu"-k^a, y`en-heu chang s+u"t li'a-ke pi'ang, l^im li'a-ke p^i.
Na-he k`i s+u"t li'a pi'ang l^im li'a p^i ke s`u", m`o khok-ngin s'o-s+u"t s'o-l^im ke th`ung Ch'u s^u"n-th'i ke ko^an-he, k`i chhiu-he chhu" ngi^a s'u"m-phan.
Chhiu-he y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en chang voi y^u 'an-t^o ng`in s^u"n-th'i ngi^on-ngi+ok, pot-phiang, s'i-thet ke ya y^u.
Ng`ai-t^eu na si^en f'an-s'en chhu"-k^a, chhiu `m-voi su s'u"m-phan.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu su s'u"m-phan, he p^un Ch'u k'on-kau, oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu `m-s'u" th`ung su"-ki^en-ng`in khiung-ha su thin-chhui.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu chhi-s+ip l`oi s+u"t Ch'u ke V^an-chh^on ke s`u", yin-t^ong p'i-chh'u" t'en-heu.
Na y^u-ng`in t'u-k^i, yin-k^oi chhai vuk-h^a si^en s+u"t, mi^en-tet chhi-fi ke s`u", su Song-ti s'u"m-phan. Kh`i-th^a ke su", t'en ng`ai to, chang l`oi ki'e-kiet.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ko^an-he Su"n-L`in ke ^en-su, ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu voi m`in-ph+ak.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai sin yi-kau ke s`u", s`ong-s`ong su m`i-f+et h`ang-to chh^a-lu hi, su ke-t^eu m`o s^ang-miang ke ngi'eu-siong hot-chu".

Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, m^i-yit-ke p^un Song-ti ke L`in k'am-thung ke ng`in yit-thin `m-voi k'ong "Y^a-s^u yin-k^oi su chu-ch'u". Khiung-yong, na `m-he Su"n-L`in k'am-thung, ya m`o ng`in n`en s`u"n-ngin "Y^a-s^u he Ch'u".
^En-su y^u chhin-t^o ch'ung, ch'ung-he su ^en-su ke he khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in.
Su"-fung y^u chhin-t^o ch'ung, ch'ung-he s'o su"-fung ke he khiung yit-vi Ch'u.
K^ung-chok y^u chhin-t^o ch'ung, ch'ung-he chhai van-m`in ch^ung-ki^en p^un van-su" yun-h`ang ke he khiung yit-vi Song-ti.
Su"n-L`in hi'en-m`in chhai tak-s`a s^u"n-song ke f^ong-su"t s^ui-y`en m`o khiung-yong, ch'ung-he muk-tit he khiung-yong, he oi p^un thai-k^a tet-t'o li-yit.
Su"n-L`in su li'a ng`in chu"-fi ke sin-sit; ch'ung-he khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in su nang-ngoi yit-ke ng`in chu"-su"t ke sin-sit.
Khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in su li'a-ke ng`in sin-s^im, su nang-ngoi yit-ke ng`in y^i-phiang ke n`en-l+it;

khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in su-p^un li'a-ke ng`in h`ang s`u"n-chiak ke n`en-l+it, p^un nang-ngoi yit-ke ng`in chh`on Song-ti tho-l^i ke ^en-su; y^u-ng`in tet-t'o f^un-ph+et chung l`in ke n`en-l+it; y^u-ng`in voi k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en; ya y^u-ng`in voi ki'e-su"t s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en.
Ch'ung-he, li'a yit-chhiet he khiung yit-vi, th+uk-yit ke Su"n-L`in s'o yun-h`ang, cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi su-p^un tak-s`a ke.
Ng`in ch'u"-y^u yit-ke s^u"n-th'i, ch'ung-he y^u chhin-t^o k^i-th'i; k^i-th'i s^ui-y`en chhin-t^o, h`an-he yit-ke s^u"n-th'i. K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-th'i ya he chhiong 'an-ngi`ong.

`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu m`o-lun he Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, he cho n`u-li ke ya-he chhu"-y`u-ng`in, chhi`on-phu y'i-k^in th^ung-ko khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in l`oi li^ang s'e-l^i, s`ang-cho yit-ke s^u"n-th'i, khiung-ha hi'ong-su khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in.
S^u"n-th'i `m-he ch'u"-y^u yit-ke k^i-th'i, h`an-he y^u chhin-t^o k^i-th'i.
Na-he kiok k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he s'u, s'o-y^i ng`ai m`o s+uk s^u"n-th'i", k`i `m-voi y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong chhiu m`o s+uk s^u"n-th'i.
Na-he ng'i-k^ung k'ong: "Ng`ai `m-he muk-ch^u, s'o-y^i ng`ai m`o s+uk s^u"n-th'i", k`i ya `m-voi y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong chhiu m`o s+uk s^u"n-th'i.
Na-he k^ui-s^u"n th^ung-th'i he muk-ch^u, oi ngi'ong-p^an th^ang n`e? Na-he k^ui-s^u"n th^ung-th'i he ng'i-k^ung, oi ngi'ong-p^an phi n`e?
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi, chi^ong ke-t^eu m`o khiung-yong ke k^i-th'i chhi`on-phu ^on chhai ng`in ke s^u"n-song.
Na-he k^ui-s^u"n ke k^i-th'i chhi`on-phu khiung-yong, ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet son-cho s^u"n-th'i n`e?
Su"-s+u"t-song, k^i-th'i y^u chhin-t^o, s^u"n-th'i ch'u"-y^u yit-ke.
S'o-y^i, muk-ch^u cho-`m-tet tui s'u k'ong: "Ng`ai m`o s^i-yeu ng`i!" Th`eu-n`a ya cho-`m-tet tui kiok k'ong: "Ng`ai m`o s^i-yeu ng`i!"
Ti^en-to, s^u"n-song ke-t^eu chhiong-he kha ngi^on-ngi+ok ke k^i-th'i, h`an-kha he cho-`m-tet khiet-s'eu ke.

Ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i, ke-t^eu khon-l`oi m`o 'an chhung-yeu ke phu-fun, f'an-ch'on tet-t'o ng`ai-t^eu th+it-ph+et ke cheu-ku; ke-t^eu m`o th'i-mien ke phu-fun, f'an-ch'on tet-t'o ng`ai-t^eu ke ko^an-s^im;
ke-t^eu kha h'o-khon ke phu-fun, chhiu m`o s^i-yeu t'a-pan. Song-ti chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong ^on-ph`ai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i, p^un ke-t^eu kha ch'e ke k^i-th'i f'an-ch'on y^u kha thai ke k^ong-y`ung;
K`i ke muk-tit he oi p^un s^u"n-th'i `m-voi f^un-li+et, kok k^i-th'i f'an-ch'on voi fu-si^ong cheu-ku.
Yit-ke k^i-th'i su-kh'u, s'o-y^u ke k^i-th'i chhiu si^ong-khiung su-kh'u; yit-ke k^i-th'i tet k^ong-y`ung, s'o-y^u ke k^i-th'i chhiu si^ong-khiung khoai-l+ok.
Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-th'i, m^i-yit-ke ng`in he s^u"n-th'i ke k^i-th'i.

Chhai kau-fi t^i-poi, Song-ti s'o ^on-ph`ai ke, thi-yit he s'u"-th`u, thi-ngi he si^en-t^i, thi-s^am he kau-s^u"; chiap-h^a-hi he h`ang s`u"n-chiak ke, y^u y^i-phiang ^en-su ke; h`an-y^u p^ong-chhu ng`in ke, k'on-l^i su"-vu ke, pin k'ong s+uk-l`in ng^i-ngi`en ke.
`M-he thai-k^a chhi`on-phu cho s'u"-th`u, cho si^en-t^i, ya-he cho kau-s^u"; ya `m-he chhi`on-phu y^u n`en-l+it h`ang s`u"n-chiak,
y^i-phiang, k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, ya-he ki'e-su"t s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en.
S^ui-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu oi pet-chhiet ch^ui-khi`u ke-t^eu kha chhung-yeu ke ^en-su. Chiap-h^a-hi, ng`ai oi ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu chu"-san ke tho-lu.
Ng`ai chhiu-he voi k'ong su"-ki^en kok-ch'ung ke fa, su"m-chu" he thi^en-s'u" ke fa, na-he m`o oi-s^im, ng`ai ke fa chhiu-chhiong chh`au ng`in ke th`ung-l`o l^au hi'ong ke chh^e-'e khiung-yong.

Ng`ai chhiu-he y^u si^en-t^i k'ong-tho ke chh`oi-thiau, yu voi li'au-ki'e kok-ch'ung o-meu l^au chu"-su"t, su"m-chu" y^u ki^en-khi`ong ke sin-s^im voi y`i-s^an t'o-h'oi, na-he m`o oi-s^im, ng`ai chhiu `m-son m'a-ke.
Ng`ai chhiu-he chi^ong s'o-y^u ke chh`oi-s'an n^a-l`oi kiu-chi ng`in, su"m-chu" h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i p^un-ng`in s^eu, na-he m`o oi-s^im, ng`ai s'o-cho ke chhiu m`o m'a-ke li-yit.
Y^u oi-s^im chhiu voi y^u th^un-ngi^un l^au chh`u"-p^i; y^u oi-s^im chhiu `m-voi chhit-tu, `m-voi kho^a-khi'eu, `m-voi ki^eu-ngau,
`m-voi cho kien-seu ke su", `m-voi chhu"-s^u", `m-voi s`ui-phien fat-khi'en, m`o ki-t'en ph+et-ng`in ke ko-su"t,
`m f^on-h'i put-ngi, ch'u"-y^u f^on-h'i ch^u"n-l^i.
Y^u oi-s^im chhiu voi p^au-y`ung yit-chhiet, f`am-su" y^u sin-s^im, su"-su" chh`un h^i-mong, yong-yong n`en ngi^un-nai.
Oi-s^im y'un-y'en chh`un-chhai. K'ong-tho ke chh`oi-thiau he chhiam-s`u" ke; s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en y^u yit-ngit voi th`in-ch'u"; chu"-su"t ya voi m`o lu-yung.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ke chu"-su"t y^u-han, k'ong-tho ke ^en-su ya y^u-han;
ch'ung-he, v`an-chhi`on ke yit l`oi-to, y^u-han ke chhiu voi m`o-thet hi.

Ng`ai cho se-ng`in-`e ke s`u"-chiet, k'ong-fa chhiong se-ng`in-`e, s^im-s^u" chhiong se-ng`in-`e, yi-ngiam chhiong se-ng`in-`e; s`u"n-ng`in y^i-heu, ng`ai chhiu chi^ong se-ng`in-`e ke su" fit-thet-hi.

Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha s'o khon-t'o ke, chhiu chhiong cheu th`ung-kiang s'o khon-t'o ke y'ang-siong, m`ung-m`ung; chi^ong-l`oi chhiu voi mien tui mien khon-to chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u. Ng`ai li'a-ha tui Song-ti ke ngin-su"t m`o v`an-chhi`on; chi^ong-l`oi chhiu voi v`an-chhi`on, chhiu chhiong Song-ti v`an-chhi`on ngin-su"t ng`ai yit-yong.
Sin-s^im, h^i-mong, l^au oi-s^im, li'a s^am-yong he y'un-y'en chh`un-chhai ke; kh`i-ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke he oi-s^im.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ch^ui-khi`u oi-s^im. Ng`i-t^eu ya oi hot-mu Su"n-L`in ke ^en-su, th+it-ph+et he chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke ^en-su.
Ke yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en k'ong-fa ke, `m-he tui ng`in k'ong-fa, he tui Song-ti k'ong, y^in-vi m`o-ng`in th^ang-'e-su"t; k`i he th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in ke n`en-l+it k'ong o-meu ke su".
Ch'ung-he, chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke, he tui ng`in k'ong-fa, l`oi chho-chhiu, k'u-li, l^au ^on-v'i k`i-t^eu.
Yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en l`oi k'ong ke he chho-chhiu chhu"-k^a, ch'ung-he chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke he chho-chhiu kau-fi.

Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu voi k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, ch'ung-he ng`ai h`an-kha oi ng`i-t^eu y^u chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke ^en-su. Y^in-vi, yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en k'ong-fa, oi y^u-ng`in f^an-y+it, kau-fi chang voi tet-t'o chho-chhiu; na m`o f^an-y+it, chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke chhiu y`ang-ko k'ong s+uk-l`in ng^i-ngi`en ke.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", na ch'u"-y^u yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en k'ong-fa, m`o tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong Song-ti ke kh'i-su", chu"-su"t, yi-ngi`en, ya-he kau-su", tui ng`i-t^eu y^u m'a-ke li-yit n`e?

Li`en ke-t^eu m`o s^ang-miang ke ng+ok-hi, chhiong th+ak-'e ya-he hi`en-kh`im, s'o fat-chhut ke s^ang na m`o k^o-t^ai ke f^un-ph+et, s'o ph`un ke ya-he s'o th`an ke ngi'ong-voi th^ang-'e-su"t he m'a-ke n`e?
Ho-th`ung ph`un chhut-l`oi ke y^im na m`o ch'un, m'a-ng`in t^i oi ch'un-phi si^ong-chh`u" n`e?
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu yung s+at-m`a k'ong-fa, na m`o yung ng`in th^ang-'e-su"t ke fa k'ong, m'a-ng`in t^i ng`i-t^eu k'ong m'a-ke n`e? Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he tui kh^ung-hi k'ong-fa l'e!
Su"-ki^en y^u chhin-t^o m`o khiung-yong ke ng^i-ngi`en, ch'ung-he m`o yit-yong `m-he oi p'eu-th+at yi-su" ke.
Na-he ng`ai th^ang-`m-su"t ke-ch'ung ng^i-ngi`en, tui k'ong ke-ch'ung fa ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, ng`ai he ngoi-koet-ng`in, tui ng`ai l`oi k'ong, k`i ya he ngoi-koet-ng`in.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu hot-mu Su"n-L`in ke ^en-su, ng`i-t^eu chhiu yin-t^ong t^o ch^ui-khi`u ke-t^eu chho-chhiu kau-fi ke ^en-su.
S'o-y^i, k'ong s+uk-l`in ng^i-ngi`en ke, chhiu-oi khi`u Song-ti su k`i f^an-y+it ke n`en-l+it.
Na-he ng`ai yung s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en kh`i-t'o, ng`ai he yung ng`ai ke l`in kh`i-t'o, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke l^i-chu" pin m`o chok-yung.
Oi ngi'ong-p^an chang h'o n`e? Ng`ai oi yung l`in kh`i-t'o, ya oi yung l^i-chu" kh`i-t'o; ng`ai oi yung l`in chhong-k^o, ya oi yung l^i-chu" chhong-k^o.

Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i t^an-chhiang yung l`in k'am-chhia Song-ti ke s`u", chhai chhi-fi ch^ung th^ang-`m-su"t s+uk-l`in ng^i-ngi`en ke ng`in, k`i ki-y`en `m-t^i ng`i k'ong m'a-ke, oi ngi'ong-p^an l^au ng`i th`ung-s^im k'ong "^A-m'en" n`e?
'An-ngi`ong, chhiu-son ng`i tui Song-ti k'am-chhia ke kh`i-t'o he chhin h'o ke, ph+et-ng`in ya `m-voi tet-t'o chho-chhiu.
Ng`ai k'am-chhia Song-ti, ng`ai k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en p'i ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a kha-t^o.
Ch'ung-he, chhai kau-fi ke chhi-fi ch^ung, ng`ai kha oi k'ong ng`in th^ang-'e-su"t ke fa; yung l^i-chu" k'ong 'ng-ki kau-th^o ng`in ke fa kha y`ang k'ong chhi^en-van-ki s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"-si'ong `m-h'o chhiong se-ng`in-`e. Chhai f'ai-su" f^ong-mien oi chhiong se-ng`in-`e, ch'ung-he s^u"-si'ong oi chhiong thai-ng`in 'an s`u"n-s+uk.
Su"n-k^in y^u ki-chai: Ch'u k'ong: Ng`ai oi th^ung-ko ngoi-koet-ng`in ke choi-s`un, tui li'a ng`in-m`in k'ong ph+et-yong ke ng^i-ngi`en; ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu h`an-he `m th^ang-chhi`ung Ng`ai.

'An-ngi`ong khon-l`oi, k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en `m-he vi-t'o sin-th`u, he oi p^un `m sin ke ng`in cho chu"n-k'i. Ch'ung-he, chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho `m-he vi-t'o `m sin ke ng`in, he oi p^un sin-th`u cho chu"n-k'i.
K'a-s'u" chhi`on kau-fi chhi-fi ke s`u", thai-k^a l^ung-ch'ung k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, yit-p^an ng`in ya-he `m sin ke ng`in ng+ip-l`oi, k'am `m-he voi k'ong ng`i-t^eu pot-ti^en l'e he-m`o?

Na-he thai-k^a chhi`on-phu chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho, `m sin ke ng`in ya-he yit-p^an ng`in ng+ip-l`oi, k`i voi y^in-vi s'o th^ang-t'o ke fa l`oi f'an-s'en chhu"-k^a ke chhui, li`ong-s^im su chit-phi;
s^im-nui khong-t'en ke su" yit hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi, k`i chhiu voi ph+uk-t'en kin-pai Song-ti, s`u"n-ngin k'ong: "Song-ti chu"n-k^in chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en!"

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai ke yi-su" he m'a-ke n`e? Ng`i-t^eu chhi-fi ke s`u", y^u-ng`in hien-s^u", y^u-ng`in kau-hiun, y^u-ng`in tet-t'o Song-ti ke kh'i-su", y^u-ng`in k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, ya y^u-ng`in f^an-y+it. Yit-chhiet oi vi-t'o chho-chhiu kau-fi l`oi cho chang chh+ok.
Na y^u-ng`in oi k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en, chui-t^o li'ong-s^am-ke ng`in k'ong chhiu h'o l'e, oi l`un-li`u l`oi k'ong, ya oi y^u-ng`in f^an-y+it.
Na-he m`o-ng`in f^an-y+it, k'ong s+uk-l`in ng^i-ngi`en ke chhai fi-ch^ung chhiu oi ti^am-ti^am, chhu"-k^a l^au Song-ti k'ong chhiu h'o.
Chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke, ya he li'ong-s^am-s`a k'ong chhiu h'o, kh`i-th^a ke ng`in chhiu oi ngin-ch^u"n phan-ton k`i-t^eu s'o k'ong ke.
Chhai-chho ke, na nang-ngoi y^u-ng`in tet-t'o Song-ti ke kh'i-su", si^en k'ong ke chhiu oi ti^am-h^a-l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu oi yit-s`a yit-s`a l`un-t'en l`oi k'ong Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho, 'an-ngi`ong, thai-k^a chhiu fu-si^ong tet-t'o h+ok-s+ip, tet-t'o k'u-li.
Chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke ng`in, yin-t^ong yok-suk chhu"-k^a ke ^en-su;
y^in-vi Song-ti s'o-oi ke `m-he fun-lon, he f`o-ph`in. 'An-ngi`ong, chhiu l^au chung su"n-th`u ke kok kau-fi khiung-yong,
fu-ng`in-k^a chhai chhi-fi ch^ung oi ti^am-ti^am; y^in-vi cheu Y`u-thai-ng`in ke fap-l+it s'o k^ui-thin, k`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung, cho-`m-tet k'ong-fa.
K`i-t^eu na si'ong-oi m`in-ph+ak m'a-ke su"-chh`in, ch'on-hi chang mun l'o-k^ung chhiu h'o; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhai chhi-fi ch^ung k'ong-fa he chhin m`o l^i-mau ke su".
Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho k'am-he tui ng`i-t^eu l`oi ke? K'am-he t^an-t^an chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu?
Na y^u-ng`in chhu"-ngin he chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke, ya-he ngin-v`i k`i y^u s+uk-l`in ke ^en-su, k`i chhiu yin-k^oi s`u"n-ngin ng`ai si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu ke he Ch'u s'o min-lin ke.
Na-he k`i `m s`u"n-ngin, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" tap k`i.
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi ch^ui-khi`u chh`on-k'ong Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke ^en-su, ya `m-h'o f'an-tui ng`in k'ong s+uk-l`in ke ng^i-ngi`en.
F`am-su" oi cheu chu"t-si, k^ui-k^ui k'i-k'i l`oi cho.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai oi ng`i-t^eu ki-tet ng`ai y^i-chhi`en chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke fuk-y^im; li'a fuk-y^im ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in li^ang-su, ya yung k`i l`oi cho sin-s^im ke k^i-chh'u.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu chu"p-s'u li'a fuk-y^im, chhiu-he ng`ai s'o chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke tho-l^i, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin voi tet-kiu; chh`u-f^i ng`i-t^eu ke sin he chh'in-chh'in chh'ai-chh'ai ke.
Ng`ai s'o li^ang-su ke tho-l^i, ng`ai y'i-k^in chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu, chui chhung-yeu ke chhiu-he: Cheu Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in vi ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui s'i l'e,
pin p^un-ng`in m`ai-chong l'e; yu cheu Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong, thi-s^am-ngit f+uk-f+at l'e.
K`i su"t hi'en-hien p^un P'i-tet khon, yu hi'en-hien p^un s+u"p-ngi-ke s'u"-th`u khon.
Y^i-heu, k`i su"t yit-p'ai tui 'ng-pak-l`ang ke th`en k`i ke ng`in hi'en-hien; li'a-t^eu ng`in thai-phu-fun h`an chh^oi, s^ui-y`en y^u-t^eu y'i-k^in ko-s^u"n l'e.
Heu-l`oi, k`i hi'en-hien p^un Ng^a-kok khon, yu tui s'o-y^u ke s'u"-th`u hi'en-hien.
Chui-m^i, k`i ya hi'en-hien p^un ng`ai khon; ng`ai chhiong-he yit-ke m`ang chiuk-ngi+et chhiu chhut-se ke ng`in.
Chhai s'u"-th`u ch^ung-ki^en, ng`ai he chui se ke, kh^am-`m-tet chh^u"n-cho s'u"-th`u, y^in-vi ng`ai su"t pet-hoi Song-ti ke kau-fi.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai s`ang-cho k^im-p^u-ngit ke ng`ai, he cheu Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en. K`i su-p^un ng`ai ke ^en-ti'en m`o l+ok-kh^ung; f'an-ch'on, ng`ai p'i kh`i-th^a ke s'u"-th`u h`an-kha s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok; kh`i-s+u"t, `m-he ng`ai, he Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha k^ung-chok.
Kiet-k'o khiung-yong, m`o-lun he ng`ai ya-he ph+et ke s'u"-th`u, ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong chh`on, ng`i-t^eu ya 'an-ngi`ong sin.
Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu chh`on-k'ong K^i-tuk y'i-k^in tui s'i f+uk-f+at, ngi'ong-p^an ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in k'ong m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su" n`e?
Na-he m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su", K^i-tuk chhiu m`o f+uk-f+at l'e.
K^i-tuk na m`o f+uk-f+at, ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on ke chhiu-he kh^ung ke, ng`i-t^eu s'o sin ke ya he kh^ung ke.

K'a-s'u" m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su", Song-ti chhiu m`o s'u" K^i-tuk f+uk-f+at l'e, y^in-vi, na-he m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su", K^i-tuk chhiu m`o f+uk-f+at l'e. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu kien-chu"n Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" K^i-tuk f+uk-f+at, chhiu pien-cho ng`ai-t^eu he vi Song-ti cho k'a kien-chu"n l'e.
K^i-tuk na m`o f+uk-f+at, ng`i-t^eu ke sin-ngi'ong chhiu m`o ka-chh+u"t, ng`i-t^eu h`an m`i-su"t chhai chhui ke t^i-poi.
Li'a yi-su" chhiu-he, ke-t^eu ko-s^u"n ke K^i-tuk-th`u ya l^ung-ch'ung m+et-m`ong l'e.
Ng`ai-t^eu sin K^i-tuk ke ng`in na ch'u"-y^u chhai k^im-s^en y^u h^i-mong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu p'i su"-ki^en kh`i-th^a ke ng`in h`an-kha kh'o-li`en l'e.
Su"-s+u"t-song, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in tui s'i f+uk-f+at; li'a he oi p'o-chu"n ko-s^u"n-thet ke ng`in ya oi th`en k`i f+uk-f+at.
Ki-y`en s'i he tui yit-ke ng`in l`oi, s'i-ng`in ke f+uk-f+at ya he tui yit-ke ng`in l`oi.
Khiung-yong, chung-ng`in ke s'i he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th`ung ^A-t^ong kiet-li`en, chung-ng`in ke f+uk-f+at he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk kiet-li`en.
Ch'ung-he, tak-s`a oi cheu sun-si l`oi f+uk-f+at: Th`eu-yit-ke he K^i-tuk; y`en-heu, chhai k`i chai-l`oi ke s`u", chang he s+uk k`i ke ng`in.
Y`en-heu m+at-kh`i voi to; ke-s`u" K^i-tuk oi s^eu-m+et yit-chhiet l`in-kie ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a, ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, l^au y^u n`en-l+it ke, chi^ong v`ong-khi`en k^au-v`an ^A-p^a Song-ti.
Y^in-vi K^i-tuk tit-khok oi ch'ong-khi`en, chh+u"t-to Song-ti y`ang-ko yit-chhiet s`u-th+it, p^un k`i-t^eu h`ong-f+uk chhai k`i ke kiok-h^a.
Chui-m^i su f'i-m+et ke s`u-th+it chhiu-he s'i.

Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Song-ti s'u" van-v+ut chhi`on-phu h`ong-f+uk chhai k`i ke kiok-h^a." Chhin m`in-hi'en ke, li'a-vi s'o-k'ong ke "van-v+ut" m`o p^au-h`am Song-ti chhu"-k^a, y^in-vi s'u" van-v+ut h`ong-f+uk chhai K^i-tuk kiok-h^a ke chhiu-he K`i.
To van-v+ut h`ong-f+uk K^i-tuk ke s`u", Lai-'e p'un-s^u"n ya oi sun-f+uk s'u" van-v+ut h`ong-f+uk k`i ke Song-ti, h'o p^un Song-ti v`an-chhi`on th'ung-chhu" yit-chhiet.

Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, ke-t^eu thoi s'i-ng`in li^ang-su s'e-l^i ke y^u m'a-ke yi-su" n`e? K`i-t^eu s'o h^i-mong ke he m'a-ke n`e? Na-he m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su", k`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an h`an thoi s'i-ng`in li^ang-su s'e-l^i cho m'a-ke?
Ng`ai-t^eu yu ngi'ong-p^an oi s`u"-s`u" khiet-khiet mo-hi'am n`e?

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai tak-ngit t^u mien-tui s'i! Ng`ai k'am 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, y^in-vi ng`ai s'o kho^a-khi'eu ke he ng`i-t^eu th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chhai ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s^ang-miang t^i-poi.

Ng`ai chhai Y^i-fut-s'o th`ung ke-t^eu ham-cho "y^a-s^ang ke kh`im-chhu" piang-miang, na-he cheu ng`in ke thung-k^i, tui ng`ai y^u m'a-ke li-yit n`e? Na m`o s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at li'a-khien su", ng`ai-t^eu chhiong si+uk-ng^i s'o k'ong: "Hien s+u"t hien h'o, voi s'i s`eu-ch'o!" 'an-ngi`ong h`ang chhiu h'o l'e.
`M-h'o p^un-ng`in phien-hi; oi ki-tet: "F'ai ph`en-y^u voi phai-fai h'o tet-hen!"
H'o-si'ang l'e, oi h`ang chu"n-lu, `m-h'o chai fam-chhui; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u ng`in m`o ngin-su"t Song-ti. Ng`ai k'ong li'a-ke fa he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i kien-seu.
Y^u ng`in voi mun: "S'i-ng`in oi ngi'ong-p^an f+uk-f+at n`e? K`i-t^eu voi y^u ngi'ong-p^an ke h`in-th'i n`e?"
Ng`i ngi'ong 'an ngong! Ng`i ve chhai n`ai t^i-poi ke ch'ung-ch'u", na m`o si^en s'i-thet, chhiu m`o fap-thu s^ang chhut-l`oi.
Ng`i s'o ve ke he m+ak-'e, ya-he ph+et-yong ke ch'ung-ch'u", l^ung-ch'ung he yit-li+ap yit-li+ap ke, pin `m-he heu-l`oi s'o s^ang chhut-l`oi ke h`in-th'i.
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" p^un k`i h`in-th'i; K`i p^un kok-yong ch'ung-ch'u" y^u kok-yong ke h`in-th'i.
Kok-yong ke thung-v+ut ya y^u m`o khiung-yong ke ngiuk-th'i: Ng`in y^u ng`in-th'i, kh`im-chhu y^u kh`im-chhu ke h`in-th'i, f^i-ni^au y^u f^i-ni^au ke h`in-th'i, `ng y^u `ng ke h`in-th'i.
H`an-y^u thi^en-t'ang ke h`in-th'i, l^au thi-song ke h`in-th'i; ch'ung-he thi^en-t'ang ke h`in-th'i y^u yit-ch'ung ke y`ung-k^ong, thi-song ke h`in-th'i y^u nang-ngoi yit-ch'ung ke chi^ang.
Ngit-th`eu y^u ngit-th`eu ke k^ong, ngi+et-k^ong y^u ngi+et-k^ong ke k^ong, s^en-'e y^u s^en-'e ke k^ong; su"m-chu" li'a-chak s^en-'e l^au ke-chak s^en-'e ke k^ong ya m`o khiung-yong.
S'i-ng`in ke f+uk-f+at ya he 'an-ngi`ong. M`ai-chong ke s^u"n-th'i he voi f'u-lan ke; f+uk-f+at heu ke s^u"n-th'i he `m-voi hi'u-lan ke.
M`ai-l+ok-hi ke he chhin m`o th'i-mien ke, f+uk-f+at ke he chhin y`ung-k^ong ke; m`ai-l+ok-hi ke he ngi^on-ngi+ok ke, f+uk-f+at ke he khi`ong-chong ke;
m`ai-l+ok-hi ke he hiet-ngiuk ke s^u"n-th'i, f+uk-f+at ke he s+uk-l`in ke s^u"n-th'i. Ki-y`en y^u hiet-ngiuk ke s^u"n-th'i, ya chhiu y^u s+uk-l`in ke s^u"n-th'i.
Su"n-k^in 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: "Th`eu-yit-ke ng`in ^A-t^ong su-chho s`ang-cho y^u s^ang-miang ke ng`in"; ch'ung-he, m+at-heu ke ^A-t^ong he su s^ang-miang ke L`in.
`M-he si^en y^u s+uk-l`in ke; he si^en y^u hiet-ngiuk ke, y`en-heu chang y^u s+uk-l`in ke.
Th`eu-yit-ke ^A-t^ong he yung thi-song ke n`ai cho ke; thi-ngi-ke ^A-t^ong he tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke.
Ke yung n`ai cho ke ngi'ong-p^an, ke-t^eu s+uk n`ai ke ng`in ya ngi'ong-p^an; ke tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke ngi'ong-p^an, ke-t^eu s+uk thi^en ke ng`in ya ngi'ong-p^an.
Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in y^u s+uk n`ai ke ng`in ke h`in-siong, chi^ong-l`oi ya voi y^u ke tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke ng`in ke h`in-siong.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai s'o-oi k'ong ke he: Hiet l^au ngiuk ke s^u"n-th'i cho-`m-tet s`u"n-su Song-ti ke koet, voi f'u-lan ke cho-`m-tet s`u"n-su `m-voi hi'u-lan ke.

Ng`i-t^eu oi chu-yi th^ang li'a-khien o-meu ke su": Ng`ai-t^eu pin `m-he chhi`on-phu voi s'i; chhai yit-ha-'e, yit-ngiap-muk ch^u" ki^en, chui-heu yit-p'ai ho-th`ung hi'ong ke s`u"-chiet, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`on-phu voi k'oi-pien. Chui-heu yit-p'ai ho-th`ung yit hi'ong, s'i-ng`in voi f+uk-f+at s`ang-cho `m-voi hi'u-lan ke, ng`ai-t^eu h`an s^ang ke ng`in ya voi k'oi-pien.
Y^in-vi voi f'u-lan ke oi pien-cho `m-voi hi'u-lan ke, voi s'i ke oi pien-cho `m-voi s'i ke.
To voi f'u-lan ke yit pien-cho `m-voi hi'u-lan ke, ke voi s'i ke yit pien-cho `m-voi s'i ke, Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong li'a-ki fa chhiu s+u"t-hien l'e: "S'i-m`ong y'i-k^in p^un su"n-li th^un-m+et l'e!"
S'i ^a! Ng`i ke su"n-li chhai nai-vi? S'i ^a! Ng`i ke th+uk-net chhai nai-vi?
S'i ke th+uk-net he tui chhui l`oi ke, chhui ke khi`en-su" he tui fap-l+it l`oi ke.
Ch'ung-he, k'am-chhia Song-ti! K`i s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk tet-t'o su"n-li l'e!

S'o-y^i, chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi kh^i-chhai, `m-h'o y`eu-thung. Oi s`ong-s`ong ngin-ch^u"n cho Ch'u ke k^ung-chok; y^in-vi t^i, ng`i-t^eu vi Ch'u s'o-cho ke k^ung-chok yit-thin `m-voi kh^ung-kh^ung.
Ko^an-he mu-kho'an p^ong-chhu sin-th`u ke su"-chh`in, ng`ai th`eu-p'ai su"t f^un-fu K^a-l^a-thai ke kok kau-fi, ng`i-t^eu ya oi cheu 'an-ngi`ong hi cho.
Tak l^i-pai-ngit, ng`i-t^eu tak-s`a oi cheu chhu"-k^a ke s^u-ng+ip p'i-li pat-chhut yit-t^eu chhi`en, t'u-h'i-l`oi, `m-h'o t'en ng`ai hi-to ke s`u" l`im-s`u" chang chh`im chhi`en.
Ng`ai hi-to ke s`u", voi phai ng`i-t^eu s'o sin-ngim ke ng`in, p^un k`i-t^eu kie-seu-sin, ham k`i-t^eu chi^ong ng`i-t^eu ke ki^en-kho'an tai-hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang.
Na s^i-yeu ng`ai ya hi, k`i-t^eu cho-tet th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi.
Ng`ai si'ong-oi lu-ko M^a-kh`i-tun. Ng`ai f'ong-mun M^a-kh`i-tun y^i-heu, chhiu oi hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi.

Ng`ai kh'o-n`en voi chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en, f+et-ch'a voi chhai ke-vi ko-t^ung, y`en-heu chang ki-si+uk ng`ai ke l^i-chh`ang. 'An-ngi`ong, m`o-lun ng`ai oi hi nai-vi, ng`i-t^eu cho-tet vi ng`ai sung-h`ang.
Ng`ai li'a-ha m`o-oi t^an-t^an sun-lu hi khon ng`i-t^eu, chit-s`u" chhiu l`i-kh^oi; Ch'u na h'en, ng`ai h^i-mong li`u-h^a-l`oi th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha h+et yit-chham s`u"-ki^en.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai h`an oi li`u chhai Y^i-fut-s'o, chh+u"t-to 'Ng-s`un-chiet;
y^in-vi, s^ui-y`en y^u chhin-t^o ng`in f'an-tui, li'a-vi ke m`un kh^oi chhin thai, y^u chhin h'o ke k^i-fi h'o k^ung-chok.
Th`i-m^o-thai na hi-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu h'o-h'o chiap-thai k`i, p^un k`i m`o ki^ang m'a-ke, y^in-vi k`i th`ung ng`ai khiung-yong he vi Ch'u k^ung-chok ke.

Cho-`m-tet y^u-ng`in khon-khi^ang k`i; oi sung k`i ph`in-^on s^ong-lu ki-si+uk k`i ke l^i-chh`ang, p^un k`i ch'on-to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi, y^in-vi ng`ai li'a-ha t'en k`i th`ung chung hi^ung-thi khiung-ha l`oi.

K'ong-to ^A-p^o-l`o hi^ung-thi, ng`ai chai-s^am k'u-li k`i th`ung kh`i-th^a ke hi^ung-thi khiung-ha hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he k`i k'am-kok li'a-ha hi m`o chhin h'o, y^u k^i-fi k`i yit-thin voi hi.
Ng`i-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang, oi chhai sin-ngi'ong t'ang-k^o kh^i-chhai, oi y'ung-k'am, oi ki^en-khi`ong.
M`o-lun m'a-ke su"-chh`in, chhi`on-phu oi yung oi-s^im hi cho.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai oi khien-va ng`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu t^i S^u"-th`i-fap-n'a l^au k`i yit-k^a ng`in; k`i-t^eu he ^A-k^ai-^a thi-f^ong chui-si^en s`ang-cho K^i-tuk-th`u ke yit-k^a, f^i-s`ong ngi+et-s^im f+uk-su" chung su"n-th`u.
Ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang-chhi`ung li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in l^au yit-chhiet sat-m^ang k^ung-chok ke th`ung-k^ung.
S^u"-th`i-fap-n'a, Fuk-th`u-n^a-t^u, l^au ^A-k^ai-k'u to ng`ai li'a-vi l`oi, ng`ai chhin f^on-h'i. K`i-t^eu t'u-h'o p'u-m^an ng`i-t^eu m`o chhai li'a-vi ke khiam-khiet.
K`i-t^eu s'u" ng`ai s^im-l`in f^on-h'i, chhiu-chhiong s'u" ng`i-t^eu s^im-l`in f^on-h'i yit-yong. Ng`i-t^eu oi kin-chhung li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in.

^A-se-^a-s'en ke kok kau-fi l^ung-ch'ung tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on; ^A-k^i-l^a l^au Pak-k^i-l^a li'ong k^ung-ph`o, pin chhai k`i-t^eu vuk-h^a ke kau-fi, chhai Ch'u t^i-poi ngi+et-li+et tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Li'a-vi ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. Ng`i-t^eu oi su"n-kiet si^ong-ch^im p'i-chh'u" chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chh^in-pit tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Na y^u `m kin-oi Ch'u ke ng`in, k`i he yin-k^oi su chu-ch'u ke. Ch'u ^a, ngien ng`i l`oi!
Ngien Ch'u Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Ngien ng`ai ke thung-siak th`ung ng`i-t^eu s'o-y^u s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ng`in khiung-ha.

Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai fung Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi Th`i-m^o-thai si'a sin-'e p^un chhai K^o-l`im-t^o-s`ang Song-ti ke kau-fi l^au chhi`on ^A-k^ai-^a s'o-y^u ke su"n-th`u.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Siung-chan k^ui-p^un ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^A-p^a Song-ti! K`i he chh`u"-oi ke Thi^en-fu, ya he su yit-chhiet ^on-v'i ke Song-ti.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai kok-ch'ung ke fam-nan ch^ung, K`i ^on-v'i ng`ai-t^eu, p^un ng`ai-t^eu n`en yung K`i su p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke ^on-v'i hi ^on-v'i chhai kok-ch'ung fam-nan ch^ung ke ng`in.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu y^u-fun K^i-tuk ke kok-ch'ung kh'u-nan, chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu ya th^ung-ko K^i-tuk tet-t'o chhin-t^o ^on-v'i.

Ng`ai-t^eu na t`u-t'o kh'u-nan, he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ^on-v'i, tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu; ng`ai-t^eu na tet-t'o ^on-v'i, he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ^on-v'i, th`ung-s`u" tet-t'o l+it-liong l`oi ngi^un-su th`ung ng`ai-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o khiung-yong ke kh'u-nan.

Ng`ai-t^eu khok-sin ng`i-t^eu `m-voi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu su"t-mong; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu t^i, chhiu-chhiong ng`i-t^eu f^un-t^am ng`ai-t^eu ke kh'u-nan, ng`i-t^eu ya voi f^un-hi'ong ng`ai-t^eu s'o tet-t'o ke ^on-v'i.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu m`o-oi ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i, ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-p'ai chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en s'o t`u-t'o ke fam-nan. Chak chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^u"n-song ke chh^ung-t^am chh^eu-ko ng`in s'o-n`en fu-t^am ke, hoi ng`ai-t^eu li`en s^en-chh`un ke h^i-mong ya m`o-thet hi;
ng`ai-t^eu k'am-kok-t'o chhiong y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in phan s'i-h`in. Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu cho-`m-tet kho chhu"-k^a, yit-thin oi kho s'u" s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at ke Song-ti.

K`i su"t kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i s'i-m`ong ke ng`ui-hi'am, chi^ong-l`oi h`an-oi ch'u"n-kiu; ch'u" oi ng`i-t^eu yung kh`i-t'o p^ong-chhu ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu khok-sin, chi^ong-l`oi K`i ya voi ch'u"n-kiu ng`ai-t^eu. 'An-ngi`ong, y^u k'i-t^o ng`in vi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o, chhiu voi y^u k'i-t^o ng`in y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ke m`ung-^en l`oi k'am-chhia Song-ti.

Ng`ai-t^eu s'o kho^a-khi'eu ke, ng`ai-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im s'o chu"n-m`in ke chhiu-he: Chhai li'a su"-ki^en, th+it-ph+et he tui ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu he yung Song-ti s'o-su ke th'an-ph+ak l^au s`u"n-khi'en l`oi cho-ng`in; ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong h`ang he kho Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en, `m-he kho su"-ki^en-ng`in ke chu"-fi.

Ng`ai-t^eu si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu ke, he ng`i-t^eu s'o n`en th+uk, s'o n`en m`in-ph+ak ke. Ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha tui ng`ai-t^eu y^u `m li'au-ki'e ke s'o-chhai, ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chui-heu voi v`an-chhi`on li'au-ki'e. 'An-ngi`ong, chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u chai-l`oi ke-ngit, ng`i-t^eu voi y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu l`oi kho^a-khi'eu, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu kho^a-khi'eu yit-yong.
Ng`ai ki-y`en y^u li'a-ch'ung ke khok-sin, ch'o chhiu kie-v+ak oi si^en hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o k^a-phi ke chuk-fuk.

Ng`ai hi M^a-kh`i-tun ke s`u", ngi`en-l`oi kie-v+ak oi si^en tui ng`i-t^eu ke-vi k^in-ko, y`en-heu tui M^a-kh`i-tun ch'on-th`eu, chai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi yit-p'ai, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu p^ong-chhu ng`ai hi Y`u-thai.

Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong kie-v+ak, m'a-ng`in n`en ph^i-ph`in ng`ai m`o s'u"m-chhung n`e? K'am-k'ong ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong kie-v+ak he chhut-y`i chhu"-s^u", yit-ha k'ong oi, ngi`am-s`u" yu k'ong m`o-oi, su"-f^i put-f^un m^a?
Ng`ai ch'u" sin-s+u"t ke Song-ti k'ong, tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa, ng`ai `m-su"t yit-ha k'ong "He", ngi`am-s`u" yu k'ong "`M-he".
Y^in-vi ng`ai, S^i-l^a, l^au Th`i-m^o-thai chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke, chhiu-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, k`i pin `m-he "He" yu "`M-he" ke; ti^en-to, k`i chhiu-he Song-ti ke "He".
Song-ti yit-chhiet ke yin-h'i chhi`on-phu chhai K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-song s`ang-cho "He" l'e. S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko k`i k'ong "^A-m'en" l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.
Chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu l^au ng`i-t^eu si^ong-khiung tet-t'o ki^en-ku, yu s'u" ng`ai-t^eu su"n-ph+et chhut-l`oi ke, chhiu-he Song-ti.
He K`i chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^u"n-song ch'em-yin, yu su Su"n-L`in chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^im-nui, cho K`i vi ng`ai-t^eu s'o ch'un-phi yit-chhiet ke t^am-p'o.
Ng`ai khi`u Song-ti cho-chu"n; ng`ai na k'ong f^a-li^au, K`i voi chit-f+at ng`ai! Ng`ai m`o hi K^o-l`im-t^o he kh^on-y`ung ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he oi mi^en-ki'ong ng`i-t^eu sin m'a-ke; ti^en-to, he oi th`ung ng`i-t^eu h+ap-chok, p^un ng`i-t^eu f^on-h'i, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhai sin-ngi'ong-song y'i-k^in kh^i-v'un.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai kiet-s^im ha-yit-p'ai chang f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu, mi^en-tet hoi ng`i-t^eu chai y`u-s`eu.
Na-he ng`ai hoi ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu, y^u m'a-ng`in n`en s'u" ng`ai khoai-l+ok n`e? K'am `m-he ng`i li'a-t^eu y^in-vi ng`ai y`u-s`eu ke ng`in m^a?

S'o-y^i, ng`ai si'a ke-f^ung sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu, mi^en-tet ng`ai to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ke-t^eu yin-k^oi s'u" ng`ai khoai-l+ok ke ng`in f'an-ch'on hoi ng`ai y`u-s`eu. Ng`ai chh^u"m-sin, ng`ai ke f^on-h'i chhiu he ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a ke f^on-h'i.

Ng`ai y^i-chhi`en chhai y`u-s^ong thung-kh'u t^ong-ch^ung, k'in li`u muk-chu"p, si'a ke-f^ung sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu, `m-he oi hoi ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu, he oi ng`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai he ngi'ong-p^an thung-siak ng`i-t^eu!

'An-ngi`ong, na-he y^u-ng`in hoi ng`in y`u-s`eu, k`i `m-he hoi ng`ai y`u-s`eu, he hoi ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a y`u-s`eu, chui-s'eu he hoi ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u-t^eu ng`in y`u-s`eu. Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, he y^in-vi ng`ai m`o-oi tui li'a-ch'ung ng`in k'ong thet chh^ung ke fa.
Li'a-ch'ung ng`in p^un thai-phu-fun ng`in chit-phi y'i-k^in la l'e.
Ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu oi sa-mi^en k`i, ^on-v'i k`i, mi^en-tet k`i thet s^ong-s^im sa chhi+et-mong.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu, oi p^un k`i khok-s+u"t t^i ng`i-t^eu siak k`i.
Ng`ai y^i-chhi`en si'a ke-f^ung sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu, he oi t^i ng`i-t^eu he `m-he y^u phan-fap y`ang-ko kh'au-ngiam, he `m-he h'en f`am-su" sun-f+uk ng`ai.
Ng`i-t^eu sa-mi^en m'a-ng`in, ng`ai chhiu sa-mi^en m'a-ng`in. Na-he ng`ai sa-mi^en m'a-ng`in, he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku chhai K^i-tuk mien-chhi`en sa-mi^en k`i,
mi^en-tet ng`ai-t^eu p^un Sat-tan kha-y`ang, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu chhin chh^in-chh'u Sat-tan ke k'ui-kie.
Ng`ai to Th+it-l`o-^a chh`on K^i-tuk fuk-y^im ke s`u", Ch'u y'i-k^in vi ng`ai t'a-kh^oi k^ung-chok ke m`un.
Kh'o-sit, y^in-vi m`o t`u-t'o ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi Th`i-t^o, s'o-y^i ng`ai ke s^im f^i-s`ong chh+ok-kip; ng`ai chhiu chh`u"-ph+et ke-vi ke ng`in, hi M^a-kh`i-tun.

Ch'ung-he, k'am-chhia Song-ti! K`i s`u"-s`ong tai-li^ang ng`ai-t^eu, ham ng`ai li'a-t^eu p^un K^i-tuk chok-t'o ke ng`in y^u-h'o chh^am-k^a K^i-tuk su"n-li ke h`ong-li+et. K`i th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong ngin-su"t K^i-tuk chang y^u ke hi^ong-mi chh`on-to tak s'o-chhai hi.
Ng`ai-t^eu kh'o-p'i K^i-tuk hien-p^un Song-ti ke hi^ong-mi, chh`on-to ke-t^eu tet-kiu ke ng`in s^u"n-song l^au m+et-m`ong ke ng`in ch^ung-ki^en.

Tui ke-t^eu m+et-m`ong ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, li'a hi-mi s`ang-cho voi hoi-s'i ng`in ke chhu-mi; tui ke-t^eu tet-kiu ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, li'a hi-mi s`ang-cho s^ang-miang ke hi^ong-mi. M'a-ng`in cho-tet t^am-t^ong li'a chhung-thai ke ngim-vu n`e?

Chhin-t^o ng`in chi^ong Song-ti ke tho-l^i ch'un-cho t^ung-s^i l`oi mai; ng`ai-t^eu `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, y^in-vi Song-ti ch'u"-phai ng`ai-t^eu, p^un ng`ai-t^eu chhai K`i mien-chhi`en, yung K^i-tuk n`u-ph+uk ke s^u"n-fun, l'o-l'o s+u"t-s+u"t chh`on-k'ong.

Ng`ai-t^eu k'am he chai yit-p'ai chh^ui-chien chhu"-k^a m^a? K'am k'ong ng`ai-t^eu ya oi chhiong y^u-t^eu ng`in 'an-ngi`ong, s^i-yeu n^a chh^ui-chien-s^u p^un ng`i-t^eu, ya-he tui ng`i-t^eu th'o chh^ui-chien-s^u he-m`o?
Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ke chh^ui-chien-s^u, si'a chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im-nui, he thai-k^a s'o t^i, thai-k^a s'o th+uk ke.

F^i-s`ong m`in-hi'en, ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he K^i-tuk s'o si'a ke sin-'e, ng`ai-t^eu he chh`on-sung ke ng`in. Li'a-f^ung sin-'e `m-he yung m+et-chu"p si'a chhai s+ak-p'an-t'ang ke, he yung y'un-s^en Song-ti ke L`in si'a chhai ng`in s^im-t'u ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko K^i-tuk chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en y^u li'a-ch'ung sin-s^im.
Li'a `m-he k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhu"-k^a y^u m'a-ke chh`oi-thiau h'o cho li'a-ke k^ung-chok; ng`ai-t^eu ke chh`oi-n`en he tui Song-ti l`oi ke.

He K`i s'u" ng`ai-t^eu y^u chh`oi-n`en h'o cho s^in-yok ke ph+uk-ng`in; li'a yok `m-he su"-mien-song ke fap-l+it, he Su"n-L`in ke yok. Su"-mien-song ke fap-l+it s'o tai-l`oi ke he s'i, ch'ung-he Su"n-L`in s'o su ke he s^ang-miang.

Fap-l+it he yung v`un-su" khat chhai s+ak-p'an-t'ang ke, p^an-pu ke s`u", y^u Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong hi'en-hien chhut-l`oi. S^ui-y`en sa chhai M^o-s^i mien-t'ang ke y`ung-k^ong chhiam-chhiam s^eu-su"t, k`i mien-t'ang ke k^ong h`an-he 'an khi`ong, s'u" Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in m`o fap-thu chu-muk khon k`i. Li'a tai s'i l`oi ke su"-k^ung y^u 'an thai ke y`ung-k^ong,
'an-ngi`ong, Su"n-L`in ke su"-k^ung k'am `m-he h`an-kha y^u y`ung-k^ong m^a?
Li`en thin ng`in s'i-chhui ke su"-k^ung y^u y`ung-k^ong; ke si^en-pu ng`in m`o-chhui ke su"-k^ung t^ong-y`en h`an-kha y^u y`ung-k^ong!
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet k'ong, ki-y`en li'a-ha y^u ko-kha thai ke y`ung-k^ong, ke th`eu-p'ai y^u y`ung-k^ong ke, chhiu `m-son m'a-ke l'e.
Li`en chhiam-chhiam su"t-h'au ke ya y^u y`ung-k^ong, li'a chh`ong-chh`un ke chhiu t^ong-y`en y^u h`an-kha thai ke y`ung-k^ong.
Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu y^u li'a-ch'ung ke phan-mong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu h`an-kha thai-t'am.

Ng`ai-t^eu `m-s'u" chhiong M^o-s^i 'an-ngi`ong, k`i tit-khok oi yung mien-pha mi^ang-t'en chhu"-k^a ke mien, s'u" Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in m`o fap-thu chu-muk khon k`i ke mien, chh+u"t-to ke k^ong chhiam-chhiam s^eu-su"t.

Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ke s^im-s^u" sa ngang-fa thet-hi; to k^im-p^u-ngit, k`i-t^eu th+uk Khiu-yok ke s`u", k`i-t^eu ke s^im h`an-he mi^ang-t'en khiung-yong ke pha-'e. Y^in-vi ng`in ch'u"-y^u th`ung K^i-tuk kiet-li`en, k`i s^im-ch^ung ke pha-'e chang voi hi^en-kh^oi.
Chhiu-he chhai k^im-p^u-ngit, k`i-t^eu tak-p'ai th+uk M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it, k`i-t^eu ke s^im h`an-he mi^ang-t'en pha-'e.
Ch'ung-he, ng`in k'i-s`u" ch'on-hiong Ch'u, pha-'e k'i-s`u" chhiu hi^en-kh^oi.
Li'a-vi s'o-k'ong ke "Ch'u" chhiu-he Su"n-L`in. Ch'u ke L`in chhai nai-vi, nai-vi chhiu y^u chhu"-y`u.

Ng`ai-t^eu thai-k^a ke mien chhi`on-phu m`o mi^ang pha-'e, chhiu f'an-sa Ch'u ke y`ung-k^ong; Ch'u --- chhiu-he Su"n-L`in --- s'o fat-chhut ke y`ung-k^ong k'in k'oi-pien ng`ai-t^eu, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu s`ang-cho K`i ke yong-su"t, y+et-l`oi y+et y^u y`ung-k^ong.
Ki-y`en Song-ti l`in-m'en ng`ai-t^eu, chi^ong li'a chu"t-vu k^au-p^un ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu m`o su"t-chu".

Ng`ai-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et yit-chhiet `m-t^i kien-seu `m-k'am kien ng`in ke su"; ng`ai-t^eu m`o h`ang k'ui-cha ke su", ya m`o khiuk-ki'e Song-ti ke tho-l^i. F'an-ch'on, chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en, ng`ai-t^eu s'u" ch^u"n-l^i k^ung-kh^oi hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi, yung chhu"-k^a ke h`ang-v`i l`oi kh'i-fat tak-s`a ke li`ong-s^im.
Chhiu-son ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im y^u n`an li'au-ki'e ke s'o-chhai, ya ch'u"-y^u ke-t^eu hiong m+et-m`ong ch'eu-t'en hi ke ng`in chang `m li'au-ki'e.

Ke-t^eu ng`in `m sin, he y^in-vi li'a su"-ki^en ke s`u"n-m`in s'u" k`i-t^eu ke s^im-ngi'en chhi^ang-mi^ang, hoi k`i-t^eu khon-`m-t'o fuk-y^im ke k^ong; fuk-y^im s'o hi'en-chhut ke chhiu-he K^i-tuk ke y`ung-k^ong, K^i-tuk he Song-ti ke ch^u"n-siong.
Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he chh`on chhu"-k^a, ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on ke chhiu-he "Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk he Ch'u"; vi-t'o Y^a-s^u ke y`en-ku, ng`ai-t^eu s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke ph+uk-ng`in.

F^un-fu "Oi y^u k^ong tui v^u-am ch^ung cheu-chhut-l`oi" ke Song-ti, chhiu-he cheu-k^ong ng`ai-t^eu nui-s^im ke Song-ti; K`i s'u" ng`ai-t^eu ngin-su"t Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong, hi'en chhai Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mien-t'ang.
Ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu he n`ai cho ke f`i-`e, t^i-poi kin-y`en ch^ong-t'en li'a s+uk-l`in ke p'o-pi; li'a chhiu-he hi'en-m`in, li'a v`u-p'i ke thai-n`en he s+uk Song-ti ke, `m-he s+uk ng`ai-t^eu ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu t`u-t'o kok-ch'ung ke khun-n`an, ch'ung-he m`o p^un k`i chak-sui; s`ong-s`ong ng`i-f`u, ch'ung-he m`o chhi+et-mong;
y^u chhin-t^o tui-th+it, ch'ung-he m`o su hi-chhi+et; p^un-ng`in t'a-vang, ch'ung-he m`o s'i.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i s`ong-s`ong tai-t'en Y^a-s^u ke s'i, p^un Y^a-s^u ke s^ang-miang ya hi'en-m`in chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-song.

Y^in-vi, ng`ai-t^eu h`an s^ang ke s`u"-chiet, vi Y^a-s^u ke y`en-ku s`ong-s`ong y^u s'i-m`ong ke ng`ui-hi'am, vi-t'o s'u" Y^a-s^u ke s^ang-miang chhai ng`ai-t^eu voi hi'u-lan ke s^u"n-song hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.
Li'a chhiu-he k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu s`ong-s`ong mien-tui s'i-m`ong, ng`i-t^eu sa tet-t'o s^ang-miang.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Ng`ai sin, s'o-y^i ng`ai si^en-y`ong." Cheu li'a-ch'ung sin-ngi'ong ke ch^in-s`u"n, ng`ai-t^eu ya sin, s'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu ya si^en-y`ong.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, s'u" Ch'u Y^a-s^u f+uk-f+at ke Song-ti ya yit-thin voi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung Y^a-s^u khiung-ha f+uk-f+at, ya tai ng`ai-t^eu th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha to k`i ke mien-chhi`en.

Li'a yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu; 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en l`im-to y+et t^o ng`in, chhiu voi y^u y+et t^o ng`in hien-song k`i-t^eu ke k'am-chhia l`oi ch^ong-hi'en Song-ti ke y`ung-k^ong.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu m`o su"t-chu". S^ui-y`en ng`ai-t^eu ngoi-chhai ke s^u"n-th'i chhiam-chhiam phai-fai, ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu nui-chhai ke s^ang-miang ngit-ngit von-s^in.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o li'a chhiam-s`u" s'eu-kh'o ke thung-kh'u voi vi ng`ai-t^eu tai-l`oi kui-chhung, v`u-p'i, y'un-y'en ke y`ung-k^ong.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o chu-muk ke `m-he khon-tet-t'o ke, he khon-`m-t'o ke; y^in-vi khon-tet-t'o ke he chhiam-s`u" ke, khon-`m-t'o ke chang he y'un-y'en ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu s'o h+et, chhai li'a thi-song ke chong-ph`ung na-he chhak-thet, Song-ti voi su ng`ai-t^eu thi^en-t'ang ke vuk, he K`i s'o h'i, y'un-y'en chh`un-chhai ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha chhai li'a-vi th'eu thai-hi, chhin si'ong-oi h+et thi^en-t'ang ke vuk, chhiong oi chok-s^am yit-yong;
chok-h'o heu, chhiu `m-voi t'a-chhak-pok.

Ng`ai-t^eu h+et chhai li'a thi-song ke chong-ph`ung-t'u, chhiong-he p`a-t'en chh^ung-t^am, th'eu thai-hi; li'a `m-he k'ong oi thot-h^a thi-song ke s^u"n-th'i, he oi chok s+uk-thi^en ke s^u"n-th'i, s'u" voi hi'u-lan ke p^un s^ang-miang th^un-m+et.
Song-ti chh^in-chhu" chho-chhiu ng`ai-t^eu l`oi chiap-su li'a-ke pien-fa; K`i su Su"n-L`in p^un ng`ai-t^eu cho t^am-p'o.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu yit-chh+u"t 'an h'o-t'am. Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, h+et chhai li'a s^u"n-th'i t^i-poi, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he l`i-kh^oi Ch'u vi ng`ai-t^eu ch'un-phi ke chhu-s'o y'en-y'en.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu h`ang-su" cho-ng`in he ph`in sin-s^im, `m-he ph`in s'o khon ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhin h'o-t'am, l+ok-yi l`i-kh^oi li'a thi-song ke s^u"n-th'i, hi th`ung Ch'u khiung-ha h+et.
Chui chhung-yeu ke he, m`o-lun h+et chhai li'a thi-song ke s^u"n-th'i t^i-poi, ya-he chok s+uk-thi^en ke s^u"n-th'i, ng`ai-t^eu kiet-s^im oi p^un Ch'u f^on-h'i.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung oi kh^i chhai K^i-tuk ke mien-chhi`en, su k`i s'u"m-phan. Tak-ke ng`in oi cheu p'un-s^u"n chhai su"-ki^en ke h`ang-v`i, he san ya-he ok, chiap-su po-yin.
Ng`ai-t^eu ki-y`en t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an kin-vi Ch'u, chhiu khien-va ng`in. Song-ti v`an-chhi`on ngin-su"t ng`ai-t^eu; ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu ya tui s^im-nui ngin-su"t ng`ai.

Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he oi tui ng`i-t^eu chai chh^ui-chien chhu"-k^a, he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u kho^a-khi'eu ng`ai-t^eu ke l^i-y`u, p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u fa h'o en khon-chhung ngoi-p'eu, khon-khi^ang nui-s^im ke-t^eu ng`in.
Ng`ai-t^eu na pot-ti^en, he vi-t'o Song-ti ke y`en-ku; ng`ai-t^eu na chh^in-si'ang, he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke ko^an-he.
Y^in-vi K^i-tuk ke thung-siak chh^ui-pet ng`ai-t^eu; ng`ai-t^eu chh^in-chh'u t^i, yit-ke ng`in thoi chung-ng`in s'i, s'o-y^i chung-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung s'i l'e.
K`i thoi chung-ng`in s'i, oi p^un ke-t^eu s^ang-t'en ke ng`in m`o chai vi chhu"-k^a s^ang, oi vi ke thoi k`i-t^eu s'i yu f+uk-f+at ke K^i-tuk l`oi s^ang.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu `m yung ng`in ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi khon ng`in. S^ui-y`en ng`ai-t^eu su"t yung ng`in ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi khon K^i-tuk, ch'ung-he li'a-ha ng`ai-t^eu m`o chai 'an-ngi`ong cho l'e.
M`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na th`ung K^i-tuk kiet-li`en, chhiu-he s^in chh'ong-chho ke ng`in; khiu ke y'i-k^in ko-hi, chhi`on-phu pien-cho s^in ke l'e.
Li'a yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung he Song-ti cho ke; K`i th^ung-ko K^i-tuk s'u" ng`ai-t^eu l^au K`i f`o-h'o, yu chi^ong khien-ng`in l^au K`i f`o-h'o ke chu"t-vu su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu.

K`i ham ng`ai-t^eu chh`on ke chhiu-he: Song-ti th^ung-ko K^i-tuk th`ung ng`in-lui kien-l+ip f`o-h'o ke ko^an-he; K`i m`o-oi ch^ui-kiu k`i-t^eu ke ko-fam. K`i ya chi^ong li'a f`o-h'o ke tho-l^i k^au-thok ng`ai-t^eu.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu cho K^i-tuk ke thai-s'u", chhiu-chhiong Song-ti th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu l`oi khien ng`i-t^eu yit-yong. Ng`ai-t^eu thoi K^i-tuk khi`u ng`i-t^eu: Oi l^au Song-ti f`o-h'o!
K^i-tuk he m`o-chhui ke, ch'ung-he vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu, Song-ti ham k`i p`a ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko k`i th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he.
Ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke th`ung-k^ung; ng`ai-t^eu oi khien ng`i-t^eu: Ki-y`en chiap-su Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en, chhiu `m-h'o s'u" li'a ^en-ti'en l+ok-kh^ung.

Y^in-vi Song-ti k'ong: Chhai chiap-n+ap ke s`u"-chiet, Ng`ai y^u th^ang ng`i; chhai ch'u"n-kiu ke-ngit, Ng`ai y^u p^ong-chhu ng`i. Khon ^a! Li'a-ha chhiu-he chiap-n+ap ke s`u"-chiet, k^im-p^u-ngit chhiu-he ch'u"n-kiu ke ngit-`e!
Ng`ai-t^eu m`o-oi ph+et-ng`in f'i-pong ng`ai-t^eu ke chu"t-fun, s'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu ya yit-thin `m ngoi-t'o m'a-ng`in;
f'an-ch'on, vi-t'o chhai tak-yong su"-song p'eu-m`in ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu ngi^un-su kok-ch'ung ke fam-nan, ki^en-n`an, l^au khun-kh'u.
Ng`ai-t^eu su"t p^un-ng`in pi^en-t'a, chh^o-k^am, p^un phau-m`in y'eu-lon; ng`ai-t^eu s^in-kh'u, soi-`m-tet, yu t'u-k^i.
Ng`ai-t^eu yung s`un-kiet, chu"-su"t, ngi^un-nai l^au y`in-oi, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in, m`o k'a ke thung-siak,
ch^u"n-l^i ke fa, l^au Song-ti ke thai-n`en, l`oi p'eu-m`in ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in. Ng`ai-t^eu yung chu"n-ngi cho v'u-hi l`oi k^ung-kit th+it-ng`in, ya p'o-fu chhu"-k^a.
Ng`ai-t^eu su ch^un-kin, ya p^un-ng`in v'u-y+uk; p^un-ng`in ma, ya su chh^u"n-chan. Y^u-ng`in k'ong ng`ai-t^eu he lau-'e, kh`i-s+u"t ng`ai-t^eu he s`u"n-s+u"t ke;

chhiong he m`o m'a-ke mi`ang, kh`i-s+u"t ng`in-ng`in ngin-su"t ng`ai-t^eu; y^u-ng`in k'ong ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu khon ^a, ng`ai-t^eu h`an s^ang-s^ang ^o. Ng`ai-t^eu su"t su h`in-f+at, ch'ung-he m`o p^un-ng`in chh`u"-s'i;
su"t y`u-s^ong, ch'ung-he s`ong-s`ong khoai-l+ok; su"t khiam-khiet, ch'ung-he s'u" chhin-t^o ng`in fu-chiuk; chhiong he m`o pan-yong, ch'ung-he yong-yong y^u.
K^o-l`im-t^o ke ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu tui ng`i-t^eu chh+u"t-chh`ong chh+u"t-t'u thai-thu thai-liong.
`M-he ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im-k^on h+ap, he ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-k^on h+ap.
Ng`ai chhiong tui chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-'ng 'an-ngi`ong l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: Ng`ai-t^eu tui ng`i-t^eu t'u-liong 'an thai, khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu tui ng`ai-t^eu ya oi thai-liong t^eu-'e!

`M-h'o th`ung `m sin ke ng`in kiet-li`en khiung-ha; k`i-t^eu ke ak l^au ng`i-t^eu ke ak m`o khiung-yong. Chu"n-ngi l^au si`a-ok ngi'ong cho-tet h+ap-chok n`e? K^ong-m`in l^au v^u-am ngi'ong cho-tet khiung-chh`un n`e?
K^i-tuk l^au M^o-k'ui nai y^u hi+ap-thi`au ke kh'o-n`en n`e? Sin Ch'u ke l^au `m sin Ch'u ke y^u m'a-ke si^ong-k^on n`e?

Song-ti ke su"n-thien l^au ngi'eu-siong y^u m'a-ke si^ong-th`ung n`e? Y'un-s^en Song-ti ke su"n-thien chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu. Chhiong Song-ti s'o k'ong: Ng`ai oi h+et chhai Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in ch^ung-ki^en, chhai k`i-t^eu ke t^ong-ch^ung l`oi-l`oi hi-hi. Ng`ai oi cho k`i-t^eu ke Song-ti; k`i-t^eu oi cho Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in.
S'o-y^i, Ch'u k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu tit-khok oi l`i-kh^oi k`i-t^eu, tui k`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung f^un-ph+et chhut-l`oi; `m-h'o mi^a m`o chhiang-li ke t^ung-s^i, Ng`ai chhiu voi chiap-n+ap ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai oi cho ng`i-t^eu ke ^A-p^a; ng`i-t^eu oi cho Ng`ai ke ch'u"-'ng. Li'a he chhi`on-n`en ke Ch'u k'ong ke.

Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u, ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o li'a-t^eu yin-h'i, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi kiet-chhiang chhu"-k^a, chh`u-thet yit-chhiet t'a l'a-sap s^u"n-th'i l^au s^im-l`in ke su"-v+ut, yung kin-vi Song-ti ke s^en-f+at l`oi th+at-s`u"n v`an-chhi`on ke su"n-kiet.
Chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu oi thai-liong t^eu-'e chiap-n+ap ng`ai-t^eu. Ng`ai-t^eu m`o cho-ko tui-`m-h'i ng`in ke su"; `m-su"t pho-fai m'a-ng`in, ya `m-su"t ph^i m'a-ng`in.
Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, `m-he chit-phi ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai y'i-k^in k'ong-ko, ng`ai-t^eu he ngi'ong-p^an siak ng`i-t^eu; ng`ai-t^eu k^am-ngien th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung s^ang-s'i.
Ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu chhin y^u sin-s^im, chhin kho^a-chi'ong ng`i-t^eu, m^an-y^u ^on-v'i; chhai ng`ai-t^eu yit-chhiet fam-nan ch^ung, ng`ai thai-thai khoai-l+ok.
L`oi-to M^a-kh`i-tun heu, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he m`o h'o hi^u-sit. Tak s'o-chhai t^u y^u khun-n`an, ngoi y^u si^ong-ch^ang, nui y^u chh+ok-ki^ang.
Ch'ung-he, p^un f^oi-s^im su"t-chu" ke ng`in tet-t'o k'u-li ke Song-ti, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu y^in-vi Th`i-t^o l`oi-to chhiu tet-t'o k'u-li.

K`i `m t^an-chhiang ng`in l`oi, h`an l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, k`i ngi'ong-p^an tui ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o k'u-li, h`an-y^u, ng`i-t^eu he ngi'ong-p^an si'ong-ngiam ng`ai, ngi'ong-p^an s^ong-s^im, ngi'ong-p^an pet-chhiet vi ng`ai phien-pok; li'a yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung p^un ng`ai tet-t'o h`an-kha thai ke f^on-h'i.

Ko^an-he ng`ai y^i-chhi`en si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu ke sin-'e, s^ui-y`en hoi ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu, ng`ai ya m`o heu-f'i. Ng`ai t^i ke-f^ung sin-'e hoi ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu ke s`u", chhin `m ko-yi; ch'ung-he heu-l`oi chhiu m`o chai heu-f'i, y^in-vi ng`ai khon-chhut ng`i-t^eu he chhiam-s`u" y`u-s`eu thin-thin.

Ng`ai li'a-ha chhin f^on-h'i, `m-he y^in-vi hoi ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu, he y^in-vi y`u-s`eu chu"-to ng`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi. Song-ti san-yung ng`i-t^eu ke y`u-s`eu, s'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu s'o-cho ke m`o s^ong-hoi-t'o ng`i-t^eu.
Song-ti s'o san-yung ke y`u-s`eu voi k'oi-pien ng`in-s^im, s'u" ng`in tet-kiu; li'a he y'un-y'en `m-voi heu-f'i ke! Ch'ung-he, s+uk su"-kie ke y`u-s`eu voi hoi ng`in s'ong-su"t s^ang-miang.

Ng`i-t^eu khon, Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an san-yung ng`i-t^eu ke y`u-s`eu, s'u" ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an sat-m^ang, yu vi chhu"-k^a phien-pok, ya hi'en-chhut ngi ke fun-nu, ki^ang-s^im, chhiet-mong, ngi+et-s^im, yu h`in-f+at put-ngi! Chhai kok f^ong-mien ng`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in chhu"-k^a he chh^in-ph+ak ke.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai s^ui-y`en si'a ke-f^ung sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he ng`ai `m-he vi cho `m-chh+ok ke ng`in si'a ke, ya `m-he vi su y^en-v'ong ke ng`in si'a ke. Ng`ai ke muk-tit he oi chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu tui ng`ai-t^eu ke ngi+et-chh`in p'eu-m`in chhut-l`oi.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in tet-t'o k'u-li. `M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, Th`i-t^o ke f^on-h'i ya s'u" ng`ai-t^eu k^a-phi f^on-h'i; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a p^ong-chhu k`i, p^un k`i khoai-l+ok.

Ng`ai th`eu-p'ai su"t chhai k`i mien-chhi`en chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu pin m`o s'u" ng`ai kien-seu. Ng`ai-t^eu yit-t'an tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong s+u"t-fa; khiung-yong, ng`ai-t^eu tui Th`i-t^o kho^a-chi'ong ng`i-t^eu ke fa ya he s+u"t-chhai ke.
S'o-y^i, Th`i-t^o yit si'ong-h'i ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a he ngi'ong-p^an sun-f+uk, ngi'ong-p^an yung ki^ung-ki^ung kin-kin ke thai-thu chiap-thai k`i, k`i tui ng`i-t^eu ke oi-s^im chhiu kha chh^u"m l'e.
Ng`ai li'a-ha f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i, y^in-vi ng`ai cho-tet tui ng`i-t^eu v`an-chhi`on fong-s^im l'e!
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu t^i, Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an ^en-thai M^a-kh`i-tun ke kok kau-fi.
K`i-t^eu t`u-t'o fam-nan, su chhin ngi`am-chhung ke kh'au-ngiam; ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu m^an-s^im f^on-h'i, s^ui-y`en f^i-s`ong khi`ung-kh'u, h`an-he thai-f^ong l+ok-ki^en, chhiong-he y^u-chhi`en-ng`in.
Ng`ai cho-tet chu"n-m`in, k`i-t^eu ke l+ok-ki^en he chhin s'o-n`en ke, su"m-chu" chh^eu-ko k`i-t^eu ke l+it-liong. K`i-t^eu chhu"-thung chhu"-fat,
chai-s^am khi'en-khi`u ng`ai-t^eu, p^un k`i-t^eu y^u-fun chhai kiu-chi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang ke su"n-th`u li'a-khien san-su".
K`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke chh^eu-ko ng`ai-t^eu s'o h^i-mong ke. K`i-t^eu he si^en chi^ong chhu"-k^a hien p^un Ch'u, y`en-heu yu cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi l^au ng`ai-t^eu then-s'u.
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu k'u-li Th`i-t^o ki-si+uk hi+ap-chhu ng`i-t^eu, v`an-s`u"n k`i s'o kh^oi-s'u" ke li'a-khien san-su".

Ng`i-t^eu s'o-y^u ke, m`o-lun he sin-s^im, khi'eu-chh`oi, chu"-su"t, p^ong-chhu ng`in ke ngi+et-s`u"n, l^au tui ng`ai-t^eu ke oi-s^im, chhi`on-phu 'an f^ung-su"n; ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chhai li'a-khien san-su"-song ya oi th+it-ph+et chhut-set.
Ng`ai `m-he tui ng`i-t^eu ha min-lin, he oi ng`i-t^eu t^i ph+et-ng`in ngi'ong-p^an ngi+et-s^im p^ong-chhu ng`in, yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi kh'au-ngiam ng`i-t^eu ke oi-s^im y^u s+u"t-chhai m`o.

Ng`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en: K`i p'un-l`oi he fu-chiuk ke, ch'ung-he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku, k`i s'u" chhu"-k^a s`ang-cho khi`ung-kh'u, muk-tit he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi k`i ke khi`ung-kh'u s`ang-cho fu-chiuk.

Li'a-khien su"-chh`in, cheu ng`ai khon: Ng`i-t^eu khiu-ngi`en chhiu kh^oi-s'u" ke l+ok-ki^en, chui-h'o muk-chhi`en oi v`an-s`u"n. Ng`i-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang chui-si^en kh^oi-s'u" chin-h`ang, ya he chui-si^en hi'ong-yin.
Ng`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke, oi chit-s`u" cho p^un k`i v`an-s`u"n! Ng`i-t^eu oi yung yit kh^oi-s'u" fat-thung ke-y^ong-s`u" ke ngi+et-s^im, cheu ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha s'o y^u ke, l`oi v`an-s`u"n li'a-khien su".
Ng`i-t^eu na ch^u"n-s^im l+ok-ki^en, Song-ti yit-thin voi chiap-n+ap; K`i oi ng`i-t^eu hien ng`i-t^eu s'o y^u ke, `m-he ng`i-t^eu s'o m`o ke.

Ng`ai `m-he si'ong-oi k^a-chh^ung ng`i-t^eu ke fu-t^am, l`oi k'am-khi^ang ph+et-ng`in ke fu-t^am. Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha 'an fu-chiuk, chhiu yin-k^oi p^ong-chhu ke-t^eu khi`ung-kh'u ke. To k`i-t^eu fu-chiuk, ng`i-t^eu y^u khiam-khiet ke s`u", k`i-t^eu ya voi p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu. 'An-ngi`ong, s^ung-f^ong t^u y^u k^i-fi p^ong-chhu tui-f^ong.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Ngi^am kha-t^o ke m`o h'o-chh^un, ngi^am kha-s'eu ke ya m`o khiam.
K'am-chhia Song-ti, K`i s'u" Th`i-t^o th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-yong 'an ngi+et-s^im l`oi hi+ap-chhu ng`i-t^eu!
K`i `m-t^an he y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ke k'u-li, ya he y^in-vi k`i chhin ngi+et-s^im, chhu"-thung oi hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi.
Ng`ai-t^eu nang-ngoi phai yit-ke hi^ung-thi th`ung k`i khiung-ha hi; li'a-ke hi^ung-thi chhai chh`on fuk-y^im ke k^ung-chok-song chhin su kok kau-fi ke chh^u"n-chan.

`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, kok kau-fi ya si'en-phai k`i cho ng`ai-t^eu l^i-th`u ke th`ung-ph^an, khiung-th`ung chin-h`ang li'a-khien san-su"; 'an-ngi`ong cho ke muk-tit he oi y`ung-k^ong Ch'u ke mi`ang, ya p'eu-su" l+ok-ki^en he thai-k^a f^on-h'i k^am-ngien cho ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu p'o-k'on li'a-pit chhut-s'u thai-f^ong ke l+ok-ki^en, yit-chh+u"t f^i-s`ong se-ngi, mi^en-tet ngi^a ng`in k^a k'ong-fa;
y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu kiet-thin cho san-su", `m t^an-chhiang chhai Ch'u mien-chhi`en 'an-ngi`ong, chhai ng`in mien-chhi`en ya he 'an-ngi`ong.

Ng`ai-t^eu yu phai nang-ngoi yit-ke hi^ung-thi th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha hi. Li'a-ke hi^ung-thi, ng`ai-t^eu kh'au-ngiam k`i h'o-t^o p'ai, t^i k`i chhin ngi+et-s^im p^ong-chhu ph+et-ng`in. Li'a-ha, k`i y^in-vi tui ng`i-t^eu y^u sin-s^im, chhin si'ong-oi hi p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu.

Lun-t'o Th`i-t^o, k`i he ng`ai ke th`ung-ph^an, l^au ng`ai khiung-ha hi+ap-chhu ng`i-t^eu. Th`ung k`i khiung-ha hi ke nang-ngoi li'ong-ke hi^ung-thi he kok kau-fi ke thoi-p'eu, he K^i-tuk ke y`ung-k^ong.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi chhai kok kau-fi ke mien-chhi`en, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu tui k`i-t^eu ke thung-siak s+u"t-h`ang chhut-l`oi, p^un kok kau-fi t^i, ng`ai-t^eu tui ng`i-t^eu ke kho^a-chi'ong he khok-s+u"t ke.
Ko^an-he kiu-chi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang su"n-th`u ke su", ng`ai `m-s'u" si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu.

Ng`ai t^i ng`i-t^eu chhin ngi+et-s^im si'ong-oi chin-h`ang, chhiu tui M^a-kh`i-tun-ng`in kho^a-chi'ong ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai k'ong: " ^A-k^ai-^a ke sin-th`u khiu-ngi`en chhiu ch'un-phi l^o." Ng`i-t^eu ke ngi+et-s^im k'am-thung chhin-t^o ng`in.

Li'a-ha ng`ai phai k'i-ke hi^ung-thi hi, h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu chhiong ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke, ch'o-t^eu chi^ong ki^en-kho'an ch'un-phi h'o-se, p^un ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-khien su"-song tui ng`i-t^eu ke chh^u"n-chan `m-voi l+ok-kh^ung.

Van-yit y^u M^a-kh`i-tun-ng`in th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi, fat-hien ng`i-t^eu h`an-m`ang ch'un-phi h'o, ng`ai-t^eu voi chhin kien-seu, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu thet sin-yung ng`i-t^eu; `m-s'u" ng`ai-t^eu k'ong, ng`i-t^eu t^ong-y`en ya voi chhin kien-seu!

S'o-y^i, ng`ai ngin-v`i s^i-yeu k'u-li li'a k'i-ke hi^ung-thi si^en hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi. Ng`i-t^eu s'o tap-yin ke ki^en-kho'an oi si^en s^u-chh`e, chhai ng`ai hi-to y^i-chhi`en ch'un-phi h'o-se; 'an-ngi`ong, cho-tet p'eu-su" ng`i-t^eu he k^am-s^im l+ok-yi n^a-chhut-l`oi ke, `m-he chhut-y`i mi^en-ki'ong.
Oi ki-tet ^o! S'eu chung ke s'eu s^u; t^o chung ke t^o s^u.
Tak-s`a oi cheu chhu"-k^a ke s^im-yi l+ok-ki^en, `m-h'o `m phan-tet, ya `m-s'u" mi^en-ki'ong, y^in-vi Song-ti siak k^am-s^im l+ok-yi fung-hien ke ng`in.
Song-ti n`en chi^ong kok-yong ke ^en-fi f^ung-f^ung fu-fu su-p^un ng`i-t^eu, s'u" ng`i-t^eu `m t^an-chhiang f`am-su" chh^ung-chiuk, h`an y^u n`en-l+it hi h`ang kok-yong ke san-su".
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: K`i kh^ong-kh'oi kiu-chi khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in; k`i ke y`in-ngi y'un-y'en chh`ong-chh`un.

Su ch'ung-ch'u" p^un ve-ch'ung ke, yu su s+u"t-v+ut p^un ng`in s+u"t ke Song-ti, yit-thin voi chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke ch'ung-ch'u" su p^un ng`i-t^eu, yu s'u" k`i ch'ong-thai, s'u" ng`i-t^eu kiet h`an-kha t^o y`in-ngi ke k'o-ch'u".

K`i voi p^un ng`i-t^eu yong-yong fu-chiuk, s`ui-s`u" y^u n`en-l+it thai-f^ong p^ong-chhu ng`in, p^un t^o-t^o ng`in y^in-vi tui ng`ai-t^eu ke s'u chiap-su-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke l^i-v+ut l`oi k'am-chhia Song-ti.
Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke ki^ung-kip `m t^an-chhiang p'u-chiuk ke-t^eu sin-th`u ke s^i-yeu, ya s'u" t^o-t^o ng`in y+et-fat k'am-chhia Song-ti.

Li'a-khien chh`u"-san ke k^ung-chok chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu sun-f+uk K^i-tuk, tui s'o ko-ph+ak ke fuk-y^im ch^ung-s^im, ya tui k`i-t^eu l^au chung-ng`in thai-thai f^ong-f^ong l`oi f^un-hi'ong; y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, chhin-t^o ng`in voi k^ui y`ung-k^ong p^un Song-ti.
K`i-t^eu ya voi y^in-vi Song-ti chi^ong li'a kh+it-thai ke ^en-ti'en su-p^un ng`i-t^eu, kien-k^a si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu, s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o.
Ng`ai-t^eu oi k'am-chhia Song-ti, y^in-vi K`i ke ^en-ti'en k'ong-`m-chhin!

Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chh^in-chhu" khien-va ng`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu ngin-v`i ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u"-chiet chhin khi^am-f`o, m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke s`u"-chiet chhiu chhin ngi`am; li'a-ha, ng`ai yung K^i-tuk ke v^un-y`u l^au chh`u"-p^i khi`u ng`i-t^eu:
Ng`ai hi-to ke s`u"-chiet, pai-thok `m-h'o pet ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu m`o hak-hi; ke-t^eu ph^i-ph`in ng`ai-t^eu he ph`in hiet-hi h`ang-su" ke ng`in, ng`ai voi tui k`i-t^eu `m hak-hi.
Ng`ai-t^eu s^ui-y`en s^en-f+at chhai su"-ki^en, ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu `m-he ph`in hiet-hi chan-ch^en.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-chh`u" s'o yung ke `m-he li'a su"-ki^en ke v'u-hi, he Song-ti thai-n`en ke v'u-hi, n`en f'i-m+et ki^en-ku ke s`ang-p'o. Ng`ai-t^eu f'i-m+et yit-chhiet h^i-k'a ke phien-lun,
t'a-vang s'o-y^u h^in-h'i-l`oi ch'u-t'ong ng`in ngin-su"t Song-ti ke chhu"-k^o ke lun-sot; ng`ai-t^eu ya chok-ch'on tak-ke ng`in ke s^u"-si'ong l`oi k^ui-sun K^i-tuk.
T'en-to ng`i-t^eu v`an-chhi`on sun-f+uk ke s`u"-chiet, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu oi chit-f+at yit-chhiet `m sun-f+uk ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu he khon su"-chh`in ke ngoi-p'eu thin-thin. Na-he y^u ng`in chhu"-ngin he s+uk K^i-tuk ke, k`i yin-k^oi chai si'ong khon-'e, k`i s+uk K^i-tuk, ng`ai-t^eu me khiung-yong s+uk K^i-tuk.

Ch'u su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke chu"t-khi`en he oi chho-chhiu ng`i-t^eu, `m-he oi pho-fai ng`i-t^eu. S'o-y^i, chhiu-son ng`ai thet ko-fun kho^a-khi'eu li'a-ke chu"t-khi`en, ng`ai ya `m-voi k'am-kok kien-seu.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o ngin-v`i ng`ai si'a sin-'e he oi hak ng`i-t^eu.
Y^u ng`in k'ong: " P'o-l`o si'a sin-'e, fa k'ong-to 'an ngi`am-chhung 'an khi`ong; ch'ung-he, k`i p'un-ng`in khon h'i-l`oi yu 'an ngi^on-ngi+ok, k'ong-fa 'an chh^u-si+uk!"
K'ong li'a-ch'ung fa ke ng`in oi t^i, ng`ai-t^eu m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", chhai sin-'e t^i-poi ngi'ong-p^an k'ong-fa, hi-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ya voi 'an-ngi`ong h`ang-su".

Ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-y`en `m-k'am th`ung ke-t^eu chhu"-min put-f`am ke ng`in p`ai khiung-ha, ya-he th`ung k`i-t^eu p'i. K`i-t^eu s+u"t-chhai ch^u"n m`o chu"-su"t, kin-y`en yung chhu"-k^a ke ph^eu-ch'un li`ong chhu"-k^a, n^a chhu"-k^a th`ung chhu"-k^a p'i!
Na-he ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu `m-k'am kho^a-khi'eu ko-th`eu, ch'u"-y^u chhai Song-ti k^au-thok ng`ai-t^eu ke k^ung-chok fam-v`i t^i-poi kho^a-khi'eu; ng`i-t^eu ya he chhai li'a-ke fam-v`i t^i-poi.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ch'o chhiu chi^ong K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu, s'o-y^i ng`i-t^eu he chhai li'a-ke fam-v`i t^i-poi; ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu `m-son chh^eu-ko fam-v`i.

Chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke fam-v`i y^i-ngoi, ke-t^eu ph+et-ng`in s'o v`an-s`u"n ke k^ung-chok, ng`ai-t^eu `m-k'am kho^a-khi'eu. Ng`ai-t^eu ch'u"-y^u h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im k'in-l`oi k'in-thai, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu chhai chhu"-k^a ke fam-v`i-nui y+et-fat khok-ch'an chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke k^ung-chok;

'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet chi^ong fuk-y^im chh`on to ng`i-t^eu y^i-ngoi ke kh`i-th^a thi-kh^i hi; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu m`o-oi n^a ph+et-ng`in fam-v`i-nui s'o v`an-s`u"n ke k^ung-chok l`oi kho^a-khi'eu.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Oi kho^a-khi'eu ke ng`in, chhiu oi kho^a-khi'eu Ch'u!"
Y^in-vi su chiap-n+ap ke, `m-he chh^u"n-chan chhu"-k^a ke ng`in, he Ch'u s'o chh^u"n-chan ke ng`in.
Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu voi ngi^un ng`ai s'eu-kh'o ke ngong-chh+u"t; su"-s+u"t-song, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in 'an-ngi`ong cho.

Ng`ai siak ng`i-t^eu to chhit-tu ke chh`ang-thu, chhiong Song-ti siak ng`i-t^eu yit-yong; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhiong ch^u"n-chiet ke th`ung-ch^u"n-'ng, ng`ai chi^ong ng`i-t^eu ko-thin p^un yit-ke l'o-k^ung, chhiu-he K^i-tuk.
Ng`ai chhin-ki^ang ng`i-t^eu ke s^im su-t'o phai-fai, hiong K^i-tuk s`un-kiet ch^on-yit ke oi-s^im pien-chu"t thet-hi; chhiong Ha-v^a p^un s`a yung k'ui-kie y'u-f+et hi yit-yong.

Y^in-vi, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in hi-to, chhiu-son k`i s'o-chh`on ke Y^a-s^u th`ung ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on ke `m-he khiung-s`a; f+et-ch'a ng`i-t^eu li^ang-su-t'o ke l`in `m-he ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai s'o li^ang-su ke; f+et-ch'a ng`i-t^eu chiap-su-t'o ke fuk-y^im th`ung ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai s'o chiap-su ke m`o khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu kin-y`en 'an ngi^un-nai!
Ng`ai `m si^ong-sin ng`ai y^u nai-yit-ti'am p'i-`m-s^ong ke-t^eu s'o-vi ke "chh^eu-kh+ip s'u"-th`u"!
Ng`ai kh'o-n`en k'ong-fa kha `m hi'au-tet, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke chu"-su"t `m-voi p'i ph+et-ng`in kha chh^a; ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke kok-yong su"-chh`in, y'i-k^in chu"n-m`in li'a he su"-s+u"t ke.
Ng`ai chh`on Song-ti ke fuk-y^im p^un ng`i-t^eu, `m-su"t tui ng`i-t^eu th'o-ko m'a-ke; ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong khi^am-p^i chhu"-k^a l`oi th`i-k^o ng`i-t^eu, k'am-k'ong li'a he ng`ai ke ko-su"t m^a?
Chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en k^ung-chok ke s`u"-chiet, he ph+et ke kau-fi ki^ung-kip ng`ai; ng`ai chhiong-he th^eu k`i-t^eu ke k^ung-chhi`en l`oi f+uk-su" ng`i-t^eu yit-yong.

Th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", m`o-lun y^u m'a-ke s^i-yeu, ng`ai chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t khi`u ng`i-t^eu ke p^ong-chhu. Ng`ai s'o s^i-yeu ke yit-chhiet, chhi`on-phu he tui M^a-kh`i-tun l`oi ke chung hi^ung-thi ki^ung-kip ng`ai. Y^i-chhi`en he 'an-ngi`ong, chi^ong-l`oi ya khiung-yong; ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke chh^ung-t^am!
Ng`ai k'am ch'u"-t'en chhai ng`ai s^im-ch^ung K^i-tuk ke ch^u"n-l^i l`oi k'ong, chhai ^A-k^ai-^a thi-kh^i, ng`ai thin-chh+ok voi yit-chh+u"t 'an-ngi`ong kho^a-khi'eu.
Ng`ai cho-m'a-ke 'an-ngi`ong k'ong n`e? K'am he ng`ai `m siak ng`i-t^eu m^a? Song-ti t^i, ng`ai chhin siak ng`i-t^eu!

Ng`ai li'a-ha s'o-cho ke, h`an-oi ki-si+uk cho-h^a-hi, l`oi chhiet-th^on ke-t^eu s'o-vi "s'u"-th`u" ke k^i-fi, p^un k`i-t^eu m`o k^i-fi h'o chai kho^a-khi'eu, k'ong k`i-t^eu ke k^ung-chok th`ung ng`ai-t^eu ke v`an-chhi`on khiung-yong.
Ke-p^an ng`in he k'a s'u"-th`u; k`i-t^eu cha-yi k^ung-chok, fa-ch^ong cho K^i-tuk ke s'u"-th`u.
Kh`i-s+u"t, li'a ya m`o m'a-ke h'o kh`i-koai, li`en Sat-tan chhu"-k^a me voi fa-ch^ong cho k^ong-m`in ke thi^en-s'u"!
S'o-y^i, na-he Sat-tan ke phu-ha fa-ch^ong cho y`in-ngi ke ph+uk-ng`in, li'a ya `m-he m'a-ke thai s^in-v`un. K`i-t^eu ke kiet-khi+uk yit-thin voi cheu k`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke.

Ng`ai chai k'ong: M`o ng`in yin-k^oi khon ng`ai cho ngong-'e; ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu na oi khon ng`ai cho ngong-'e, chhiu oi tui-thai ng`ai chhiong tui-thai ngong-'e yit-yong, l`oi p^un ng`ai y^u t^o-s'eu-`e h'o kho^a-khi'eu!
Ng`ai li'a-ha oi k'ong ke, `m-he Ch'u ham ng`ai k'ong ke; he chhiong ngong-'e 'an-ngi`ong, chhu"-sin m^an-m^an k'ong thai-fa.
Ki-y`en y^u 'an-t^o ng`in n^a s+uk su"-kie ke su"-chh`in l`oi kho^a-khi'eu, ng`ai me oi kho^a-khi'eu yit-ha.
Ng`i-t^eu 'an chh^ung-m`in, h`an f^on-h'i ngi^un-su ke-t^eu ngong-'e!
Y^u-ng`in ap-chu" ng`i-t^eu cho n`u-li, pok-siok ng`i-t^eu, ham-hoi ng`i-t^eu, khon-`m-h'i ng`i-t^eu, ya-he t'a ng`i-t^eu ke choi-kok, ng`i-t^eu h`an th^un-s^ang ngi^un-hi!
Ng`ai chhin kien-seu k'ong, li'a-ch'ung su"-chh`in ng`ai-t^eu chhiu cho `m-t'o l^o! Ch'ung-he, na y^u-ng`in k'am kho^a-khi'eu m'a-ke, ng`ai ngong-chh+u"t tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong: Ng`ai me k'am!
K`i-t^eu he H^i-pak-l`oi-ng`in m^a? Ng`ai me he. K`i-t^eu he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in m^a? Ng`ai me he. K`i-t^eu he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un m^a? Ng`ai me he.

K`i-t^eu he K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in m^a? K'ong yit-ki kh`ong-fa, ng`ai h`an-kha he! Ng`ai h`an-kha s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok, chh^o-k^am h`an-kha t^o p'ai, h`an-kha s`ong p^un-ng`in pi^en-t'a, mo h`an-kha t^o s'i ke ng`ui-hi'am.
Ng`ai su"t p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in pi^en-t'a 'ng-p'ai, tak-p'ai t'a s^am-s+u"p-ki'u ha;
p^un L`o-m^a-ng`in yung kun-'e t'a-ko s^am-p'ai, p^un-ng`in yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep yit-p'ai, t`u-t'o s^am-p'ai h'oi-nan, y^u yit-p'ai chhai chh^u"m-h'oi yit-ngit yit-ya hi'am si^au-thet.

Chhai 'an-t^o p'ai l^i-h`ang ch^ung, ng`ai k^in-l+it-ko k^ong-h`o ke ng`ui-hi'am, khi`ong-tho ke ng`ui-hi'am, tui Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in l`oi ke ng`ui-hi'am, s`ang-su"-t'u ke ng`ui-hi'am, kh'ong-y^a ke ng`ui-hi'am, thai-h'oi ke ng`ui-hi'am, l^au k'a hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke ng`ui-hi'am.
Ng`ai ke k^ung-chok l`o-luk yu k^an-kh'u, s`ong-s`ong soi-`m-tet, yu k^i yu hot, m`o h'o s+u"t, m`o h'o h+et, m`o h'o chok.
`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai h`an oi vi kok kau-fi ke su" koa-li, chhiong chh^ung-t^am yit-yong tak-ngit chak-t'en ng`ai.
Y^u m'a-ng`in ngi^on-ngi+ok, ng`ai `m-voi k'am-kok ngi^on-ngi+ok n`e? Y^u m'a-ng`in tiet-t'o fam-chhui, ng`ai `m-voi kip to chh+ok-f'o n`e?
Na-he m`o kho^a-khi'eu cho-`m-tet, ng`ai chhiu oi kho^a-khi'eu ke-t^eu hi'en-m`in ng`ai chhu"-k^a ngi^on-ngi+ok ke su"-chh`in.
Yin-k^oi y'un-y'en su chh^u"n-siung ke, ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke ^A-p^a Song-ti, K`i t^i ng`ai m`o k'ong f^a-li^au.
Ng`ai chhai Thai-m^a-su"-kiet ke s`u", ^A-l^i-th+at-v`ong s'u-ha ke ch'ung-tuk phai k'in-v'i ch'ong-t'en s`ang-m`un, si'ong-oi chok ng`ai.
Ch'ung-he, y^u-ng`in yung thai l`am-`e chi^ong ng`ai tui s`ang-chhi`ong-t'ang ke chh^ung-m`un chhui-h^a-l`oi, p^un ng`ai thot-l`i k`i ke s'u.
S^ui-y`en chhu"-kho^a m`o m'a-ke li-yit, ch'ung-he ng`ai kho^a-khi'eu h`an-he m`o-nai-h`o ke; ng`ai tit-khok oi k'ong-h'i Ch'u su-p^un ng`ai ke yi-siong l^au kh'i-su".

Ng`ai t^i y^u yit-ke s+uk K^i-tuk ke ng`in, s+u"p-si-ngi`en chhi`en, k`i su-th`i to thi^en-t'ang ke chui-k^o yit-chh`en hi (ng`ai `m-t^i k`i he ngiuk-s^u"n s^ong-hi, ya-he chhai yi-siong ch^ung s^ong-hi, ch'u"-y^u Song-ti t^i).

Ng`ai chai k'ong yit-p'ai, ng`ai khok-s+u"t t^i li'a-ke ng`in su-th`i to l+ok-y`en (ng`ai `m-t^i k`i he ngiuk-s^u"n s^ong-hi, ya-he chhai yi-siong ch^ung s^ong-hi, ch'u"-y^u Song-ti t^i). Chhai ke-vi, k`i th^ang-t'o m`o fap-thu p'eu-th+at ke fa-ng^i, ng`in cho-`m-tet sot-m`in ke su"-chh`in.
Lun-t'o li'a-ke ng`in, ng`ai oi kho^a-khi'eu; ch'ung-he, ko^an-he ng`ai chhu"-k^a, chh`u-li'au ng`ai ke ngi^on-ngi+ok y^i-ngoi, ng`ai chhiu m`o m'a-ke h'o kho^a-khi'eu.

Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai chhiu-he kho^a-khi'eu, ya `m son he h^am-chh^e, y^in-vi ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke he su"-s+u"t. Ch'ung-he, ng`ai m`o-oi kho^a-khi'eu, mi^en-tet ng`in chi^ong ng`ai khon to thet k^o, chh^eu-ko k`i chhai ng`ai s^u"n-song s'o khon-t'o ya-he th^ang-t'o ke.

Vi-t'o `m-oi p^un ng`ai y^in-vi tet-t'o 'an t^o th+it-ph+et ke kh'i-su" chhiu s^a-phi, y^u yit-k^i net-`e chhiuk-t'en ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i, chhiong he p^un Sat-tan ke s'u"-ch'a chh`an-s^u"n yit-yong, s'u" ng`ai `m-k'am ki^eu-ngau.
Vi-t'o li'a-khien su", ng`ai su"t s^am-p'ai khi`u Ch'u chi^ong li'a net-`e p^ang-thet,

ch'ung-he Ch'u en ng`ai k'ong: "Ng`ai ke ^en-ti'en la ng`i yung; y^in-vi Ng`ai ke n`en-l+it he chhai ng`in ngi^on-ngi+ok ke s`u" v`an-chhi`on hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi." Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai th+it-ph+et f^on-h'i kho^a-khi'eu ng`ai ke ngi^on-ngi+ok, h'o p^un K^i-tuk ke n`en-l+it l`im-to ng`ai s^u"n-song.
Vi-t'o K^i-tuk ke y`en-ku, ng`ai f^on-h'i ngi^un-su ngi^on-ngi+ok, v'u-y+uk, khun-kh'u, ki^en-n`an l^au pet-hoi; y^in-vi ng`ai m'a-ke s`u"-chiet ngi^on-ngi+ok, m'a-ke s`u"-chiet chhiu ki^en-khi`ong.

Ng`ai p'un-l`oi yin-k^oi tet-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke chh^u"n-chan chang chh+ok, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu pet ng`ai cho ngong-'e. Chhiu-son ng`ai m`o m'a-ke li'au-put-h'i, ng`ai h`an-he m`o s^u p^un ke-t^eu s'o-vi ke "chh^eu-kh+ip s'u"-th`u".
Chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung, ng`ai y'i-k^in yung chui-thai ke ngi^un-nai, th^ung-ko s`u"n-chiak kh`i-su" l^au thai-n`en, chi^ong ng`ai s'u"-th`u ke s^u"n-fun chu"n-m`in chhut-l`oi.
