Chh`u-li'au ng`ai `m-su"t s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke chh^ung-t^am y^i-ngoi, chhi'ang-mun, ng`i-t^eu y^u nai-ti'am s^u p^un ph+et ke kau-fi n`e? Y^in-vi ng`ai tui ng`i-t^eu 'an m`o k^ung-ph`in, chhi'ang ngi`en-liong ng`ai ^o!

Li'a-ha ng`ai ch'un-phi oi thi-s^am-p'ai hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai `m-voi s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke chh^ung-t^am; y^in-vi ng`ai s'o-oi ke he ng`i-t^eu, `m-he ng`i-t^eu ke k^im-chhi`en. Se-ng`in-`e p'un-l`oi chhiu `m-s'u" fung-y^ong y`a-^oi, y`a-^oi chang oi y^ong-yuk se-ng`in-`e.

Vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke l`in-f`un, ng`ai k^am-ngien fu-chhut ng`ai s'o-y^u ke yit-chhiet, su"m-chu" ng`ai ke s^ang-miang. K'am-k'ong ng`ai y+et siak ng`i-t^eu, tet-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke oi-siak chhiu y+et s'eu he-m`o?
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu oi s`u"n-ngin, ng`ai m`o s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke chh^ung-t^am; ch'ung-he, h`an-he y^u-ng`in k'ong ng`ai he yung k'ui-cha ke s'u-thon l`oi ko'ai ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai phai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke ng`in, ng`ai k'am su"t li-yung k`i-t^eu l`oi ph^i ng`i-t^eu m'a-ke m`o?

Ng`ai k'u-li Th`i-t^o hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu, h`an phai yit-ke hi^ung-thi khiung-ha hi. Th`i-t^o su"t ph^i ng`i-t^eu m'a-ke m`o? K`i l^au ng`ai s'o-cho ke, thung-k^i k'am `m-he khiung-yong m^a? Ng`ai-t^eu ke h`ang-su" k'am m`o khiung-yong m^a?

Ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t l'au-t'o ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu m^a? Su"-s+u"t `m-he 'an-ngi`ong! Chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, ng`ai-t^eu he k'ong K^i-tuk oi ng`ai-t^eu k'ong ke. Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`ai-t^eu s'o-cho ke yit-chhiet m`o yit-yong `m-he vi-t'o oi chho-chhiu ng`i-t^eu!

Ng`ai ki^ang-pha ng`ai hi-to ke s`u", fat-hien ng`i-t^eu m`o f`u-h+ap ng`ai s'o h^i-mong ke, ng`i-t^eu khon-t'o ng`ai ya m`o f`u-h+ap ng`i-t^eu s'o h^i-mong ke. Ng`ai ya ki^ang khon-t'o si^ong-ch^ang, chhit-tu, thai fat-khi'en, chhu"-s^u", f'i-pong, k'ong ng`in ke su"-f^i, chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai, l^au fun-lon.

Ng`ai ya ki^ang, ha-yit-p'ai hi ke s`u", ng`ai ke Song-ti voi s'u" ng`ai chhai ng`i-t^eu mien-chhi`en li`en th`eu-n`a t^u khi`a-`m-h'i-l`oi; ng`ai voi s^ong-s^im li`u muk-chu"p, y^in-vi chhin-t^o y^i-chhi`en fam-chhui ke ng`in h`an-he m`o f'i-k'oi k`i-t^eu s'o-h`ang ke l'a-sap, y`im-lon l^au fong-thong.
Li'a he ng`ai thi-s^am-p'ai hi f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu. Su"n-k^in su"t k'ong: "Ngim-h`o ke kh'ung-ko yit-thin oi y^u li'ong-s^am-ke ng`in cho-chu"n, chang cho-tet s`u"n-l+ip."

Tui ke-t^eu th`eu-p'ai chhiu fam-li'au chhui ke, l^au kh`i-th^a ke ng`in, ng`ai chhai thi-ngi-p'ai f'ong-mun ke s`u" y'i-k^in k'in-ko ng`i-t^eu, li'a-ha m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, ng`ai oi chai yit-p'ai k'in-ko ng`i-t^eu, k'ong: "Ha-yit-p'ai ng`ai hi-to ke s`u"-chiet, chhi+et-tui `m ngi`eu k`i-t^eu."
Ng`i-t^eu yit-thin voi y^u K^i-tuk th^ung-ko ng`ai k'ong-fa ke chu"n-k'i. K^i-tuk tui-thai ng`i-t^eu `m-he ngi^on-ngi+ok ke; ti^en-to, k`i chhai ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung he thai-y^u n`en-l+it ke.

S^ui-y`en k`i chhai ngi^on-ngi+ok ch^ung p^un-ng`in t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, ch'ung-he, y^in-vi Song-ti ke thai-n`en, k`i li'a-ha h`an-he s^ang-t'en. Khiung-yong, ng`ai-t^eu th`ung k`i kiet-li`en ya he ngi^on-ngi+ok ke, ch'ung-he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke y`en-ku, ng`ai-t^eu oi kho Song-ti ke thai-n`en th`ung k`i khiung-ha s^ang-t'en.

Ng`i-t^eu oi kh'au-ngiam chhu"-k^a, khon ng`i-t^eu s'o ko ke he sin-s^im ke s^en-f+at m`o; ng`i-t^eu oi s'en-chhat chhu"-k^a! Ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-t^i chhai ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi ke he Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk m^a? Chh`u-f^i ng`i-t^eu he kh^i-`m-h+et ke ng`in.
Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu voi t^i, ng`ai-t^eu `m-he kh^i-`m-h+et ke ng`in.

Ng`ai-t^eu khi`u Song-ti m+ok p^un ng`i-t^eu cho m'a-ke f'ai-su". Muk-tit `m-he oi hi'en-m`in ng`ai-t^eu ke s`u"n-k^ung, he oi ng`i-t^eu h`ang-su" chu"n-chh+u"t; ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he p^un-ng`in khon-cho he su"t-phai ke ya m`o si^ong-k^on.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhi+et-tui put-n`en phoi-ngi+ak ch^u"n-l^i l`oi h`ang-su", ch'u"-y^u vi-t'o ch^u"n-l^i l`oi t'a-piang.
Ng`ai-t^eu ngi^on-ngi+ok, ng`i-t^eu k^ong-khi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu ya f^on-h'i. Ng`ai-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o chhiu-he oi ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on ke ng`in.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ng`ai chang si'a li'a-f^ung sin-'e, h^i-mong ng`ai hi-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", `m-s'u" yung Ch'u p^un ng`ai ke chu"t-khi`en l`oi ngi`am-ngi`am tui-thai ng`i-t^eu. Ch'u p^un ng`ai chu"t-khi`en he oi chho-chhiu ng`i-t^eu, `m-he oi pho-fai ng`i-t^eu.

Ch'ung-k'ong, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i. Oi cho v`an-chhi`on-ng`in. Ng`i-t^eu oi chiap-su ng`ai ke khien-va; thai-k^a oi th`ung-s^im, p'i-chh'u" f`o-m+uk. 'An-ngi`ong, chh`u"-oi l^au su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti yit-thin voi l^au ng`i-t^eu th`ung-chhai!
Ng`i-t^eu oi su"n-kiet si^ong-ch^im p'i-chh'u" chhi'ang-^on! S'o-y^u ke su"n-th`u chhi`on-phu tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on!
Ngien Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en, Song-ti ke chh`u"-oi, Su"n-L`in ke si^ong-th^ung, l^au ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a th`ung-chhai!

Ng`ai he s'u"-th`u P'o-l`o. Ng`ai cho s'u"-th`u `m-he tui ng`in ke ki'en-si'en, ya `m-he ng`in s'o ch'u"-phai ke, he Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l^au s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke ^A-p^a Song-ti s'o ch'u"-phai ke.
Ng`ai l^au th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi si'a sin-'e p^un K^a-l^a-thai ke kok kau-fi.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
K^i-tuk vi-t'o oi kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i li'a si`a-ok ke s`u"-thoi, ch^un-chhi`ung ng`ai-t^eu ^A-p^a Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, su"t vi ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a.
Ngien y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un Song-ti, chh+u"t-to su"-su" thoi-thoi! ^A-m'en.
Ng`ai chhin chh+ok-ki^ang! Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi 'an kiak chhiu l`i-kh^oi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti, hi th`en ph+et ke fuk-y^im!
Kh`i-s+u"t, ke pin `m-he fuk-y^im. Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, y^in-vi y^u ng`in l`oi k'au-lon ng`i-t^eu, si'ong-oi k'oi-pien K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im.

Kh`i-s+u"t, chhiu-son he ng`ai-t^eu, ya-he thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke thi^en-s'u", na-he tui ng`i-t^eu chh`on ph+et ke fuk-y^im, th`ung ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-p'ai s'o-chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke m`o khiung-yong, k`i chhiu yin-t^ong su chu-ch'u!

Ng`ai-t^eu su"t k'ong-ko, li'a-ha ng`ai chai k'ong: M`o-lun m'a-ng`in, na-he tui ng`i-t^eu chh`on ph+et ke fuk-y^im, th`ung ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai s'o li^ang-su ke m`o khiung-yong, k`i yin-t^ong su chu-ch'u!

Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, k'am he oi p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-chan m^a? `M-he! Ng`ai s'o-oi ke he Song-ti ke chh^u"n-chan! Ng`ai k'am he oi tet ng`in ke f^on-h'i m^a? Ng`ai na-he h`an si'ong-oi tet ng`in ke f^on-h'i, ng`ai chhiu `m-he K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in l'e.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai oi ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai s'o chh`on ke fuk-y^im `m-he ng`in si'ong-chhut-l`oi ke.
Li'a-ke fuk-y^im, ng`ai `m-he tui ng`in li^ang-su ke, ya `m-he y^u m'a-ng`in k^au ng`ai ke, he Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chh^in-chhu" kh'i-su" ng`ai ke.
Ng`ai th`eu-p'ai sin Y`u-thai-kau ke s`u" s'o cho ke, ng`i-t^eu su"t th^ang-ko. Ng`ai pet-hoi Song-ti ke kau-fi to chhin li-hoi, chhin s'o-n`en oi s^eu-m+et kau-fi.
Khiung-pi ke Y`u-thai-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`ai p'i thai-phu-fun ng`in kha ngin-ch^u"n ch^un-h`ang Y`u-thai-kau ke k^ui-k'i, kha ngi+et-s^im ch^un-s'u ng`ai ch'u-si^en ke chh`on-th'ung.
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti s^u"-^en p^un ng`ai, chhai ng`ai chhut-se y^i-chhi`en, K`i y'i-k^in ki'en-si'en ng`ai, f^u-seu ng`ai l`oi su"-fung K`i.
T^ong K`i l+ok-yi chi^ong K`i ke Lai-'e kh'i-su" p^un ng`ai, ham ng`ai chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en chh`on ko^an-he K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im, ke-y^ong-s`u", ng`ai pin m`o hi chhi'ang-kau m'a-ng`in,
ya m`o hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang kien ke-t^eu p'i ng`ai si^en cho s'u"-th`u ke ng`in, f'an-ch'on ngi`am-s`u" hi ^A-l^a-pak, y`en-heu chai ch'on-hi Thai-m^a-su"-kiet.
S^am-ngi`en heu, ng`ai chang hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang kien P'i-tet, th`ung k`i khiung-ha h+et s+u"p-'ng ngit.
Ng`ai m`o khon-t'o ph+et ke s'u"-th`u, ch'u"-y^u Ch'u ke l'o-th^ai Ng^a-kok.
Ng`ai s'o si'a ke he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke; chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en, ng`ai `m-k'am k'ong f^a-li^au.
Heu-l`oi, ng`ai hi-to Si-li-^a l^au K^i-li-k^a ke yit-tai.
Ke-s`u", Y`u-thai-s'en kok kau-fi ke K^i-tuk-th`u chhi`on-phu `m-su"t ng`ai.
K`i-t^eu t^an-chhiang th^ang-k'ong: "Ke th`eu-p'ai pet-hoi ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in, li'a-ha f'an-ch'on chh`on k`i ko-hi si'ong-oi s^eu-m+et ke sin-ngi'ong!"
'An-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu chhiu y^in-vi ng`ai ke y`en-ku siung-chan Song-ti!
S+u"p-si-ngi`en heu, ng`ai l^au P^a-n^a-p^a yu ch'on-hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, pin tai-t'en Th`i-t^o khiung-ha hi;

ng`ai to-ch'on hi Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, he cheu Ch'u ke kh'i-su". Ng`ai s^u"-ha hi kien ke-t^eu y^u mi`ang-mong ke li^ang-chhiu, tui k`i-t^eu sot-m`in ng`ai chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im; y^in-vi ng`ai m`o-oi ng`ai si^en-chhi`en ya-he li'a-ha sat-m^ang cho ke s`ang-cho kh^ung-kh^ung.
Th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha hi ke Th`i-t^o, s^ui-y`en he H^i-li+ap-ng`in, ya m`o-ng`in mi^en-ki'ong k`i chiap-su kot-l^i;

ham k`i chiap-su kot-l^i ke, he ke-t^eu k'a-cho hi^ung-thi, th^eu-th^eu k^a-ng+ip kau-fi ke ng`in. Ke-t^eu ng`in chhiong ch^u"n-tham yit-yong th^eu-ng+ip-l`oi, oi tham ng`ai-t^eu sin K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s'o tet-t'o ke chhu"-y`u; k`i-t^eu ke muk-tit he oi ham ng`ai-t^eu cho n`u-li.
Tui ke-p^an ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t ngiong-phu; ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, he oi vi ng`i-t^eu p'o-chh`un fuk-y^im ke ch^u"n-l^i.

Lun-t'o ke-t^eu p^un ng`in khon-cho y^u mi`ang-mong ke li^ang-chhiu (k`i-t^eu ke thi-vi k^o-t^ai tui ng`ai pin m`o ch^ang-chh^a, y^in-vi Song-ti `m-he ph`in ngoi-p'eu l`oi phan-ton ng`in), ng`ai he k'ong, ke-t^eu y^u mi`ang-mong ke ng`in pin m`o ham ng`ai chiap-su m'a-ke s^in ke ch'u"-su";

ti^en-to, k`i-t^eu khon-chhut-l`oi: Song-ti chi^ong chh`on fuk-y^im p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke ngim-vu k^au-p^un ng`ai, chhiu-chhiong K`i chi^ong chh`on fuk-y^im p^un Y`u-thai-ng`in ke ngim-vu k^au-p^un P'i-tet yit-yong.
Y^in-vi, Song-ti yung K`i ke khi`en-n`en s'u" ng`ai s`ang-cho Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke s'u"-th`u, chhiu-chhiong K`i s'u" P'i-tet s`ang-cho Y`u-thai-ng`in ke s'u"-th`u yit-yong.

Ng^a-kok, P'i-tet, Yok-hon, li'a s^am-ke y^u mi`ang-mong ke kau-fi s+ak-chh^u, ki-y`en t^i Song-ti chi^ong li'a th+it-ph+et ke s'u"-min k^au-p^un ng`ai, chhiu th`ung ng`ai l^au P^a-n^a-p^a ak-s'u, p'eu-su" h+ap-chok; thai-k^a th`ung-yi: P^a-n^a-p^a l^au ng`ai yin-k^oi hi Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en cho-k^ung, k`i-t^eu chhai Y`u-thai-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en k^ung-chok.

K`i-t^eu y^eu-khi`u ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u"-y^u yit-hong, chhiu-he ko^an-s^im Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang sin-th`u ch^ung ke-t^eu khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in; li'a p'un-l`oi chhiu-he ng`ai yit-t'an ngi+et-s^im s'o-cho ke su".
Heu-l`oi, P'i-tet l`oi-to ^On-th`i-^a; y^in-vi k`i y^u m`in-hi'en ke `m-chh+ok, ng`ai chhiu t^ong-chung chit-phi k`i.

Su"-chh`in he 'an-ngi`ong: Chhai Ng^a-kok s'o phai-l`oi ke ng`in m`ang to y^i-chhi`en, P'i-tet th`ung Ngoi-p^ang sin-th`u khiung-ha s+u"t-fan; ch'ung-he ke-t^eu ng`in yit to, k`i chhiu s'am-ch'eu, k'a-cho m`o th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha s+u"t-fan, y^in-vi k`i ki^ang ke-t^eu ch'u-ch^ong Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in oi chiap-su kot-l^i ke ng`in.
Kh`i-th^a ke Y`u-thai sin-th`u ya th`en-t'en P'i-tet cho yong-'e, chhiong m`o ngi`en-chet ke ng`in; su"m-chu" li`en P^a-n^a-p^a ya su k`i-t^eu ke y'ang-hi'ong cho k'a.

Ng`ai yit khon-t'o k`i-t^eu m`o cheu fuk-y^im ke ch^u"n-l^i h`ang chu"n-lu, chhiu t^ong-chung tui P'i-tet k'ong: "Ng`i he Y`u-thai-ng`in, ch'ung-he ng`i ke cho-ng`in chhiong Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, `m chhiong Y`u-thai-ng`in. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet mi^en-ki'ong Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in h+ok Y`u-thai-ng`in n`e?"
M`o `m-chh+ok, ng`ai li'a-t^eu ng`in chhut-se chhiu-he Y`u-thai-ng`in, `m-he chh^u"n-cho "Ngoi-p^ang ke chhui-ng`in".

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu t^i, Song-ti p^un ng`in th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in, he th^ung-ko sin Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, `m-he kho ch^un-h`ang M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it. Ng`ai-t^eu ya sin-li'au K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u, he oi th^ung-ko sin K^i-tuk p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in, `m-he kho ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it; y^in-vi m`o-ng`in cho-tet kho ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it l`oi p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai li'a-t^eu ch^ui-khi`u y^in-vi sin K^i-tuk l`oi p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi ke ng`in, kiet-k'o na th`ung Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in khiung-yong h`an-he chhui-ng`in, li'a k'am `m-he k'ong K^i-tuk hoi ng`ai-t^eu fam-chhui m^a? Chhi+et-tui `m-he!
Y^in-vi, ng`ai na chh`ung-kien chhu"-k^a s'o chhak-thet ke, chhiu chu"n-m`in ng`ai he v`i-fam fap-l+it ke ng`in.
Tui fap-l+it l`oi k'ong, ng`ai he p^un fap-l+it chh'u-s'i ke ng`in; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhiu cho-tet vi Song-ti l`oi s^ang. Ng`ai y'i-k^in th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang,

s'o-y^i, li'a-ha s^ang-t'en ke `m-he ng`ai chhu"-k^a, he K^i-tuk s^ang chhai ng`ai t^i-poi. Ng`ai li'a-ha chhai ngiuk-s^u"n ke s^ang-miang he th^ung-ko sin Song-ti ke Lai-'e l`oi s^ang ke; k`i siak ng`ai, vi ng`ai s'a-thet s^ang-miang.
Ng`ai `m kh^i-chhi+et Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en; na-he ng`in cho-tet th^ung-ko fap-l+it l`oi th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, K^i-tuk chhiu he ph+ak-s'i l'e!

Ngong K^a-l^a-thai-ng`in ^a! He m'a-ng`in m`i-f+et ng`i-t^eu ^a? Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk p^un-ng`in t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke su", k'am `m-he chhiong yit-puk th`u-fa, m`in-m`in chhai ng`i-t^eu ke muk-ch^u-chhi`en m^a?
Ng`ai ch'u"-oi mun ng`i-t^eu yit-khien su": Ng`i-t^eu chiap-su Song-ti ke L`in he y^in-vi ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it, ya-he th^ung-ko th^ang-sin fuk-y^im ^a?
Ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-voi 'an ngong ^a? Ng`i-t^eu ki-y`en th^ung-ko Song-ti ke L`in l`oi kh^oi-s'u", ngi'ong-p^an li'a-ha si'ong-oi kho chhu"-k^a ke n`en-l+it hi v`an-s`u"n n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu s'o k^in-l+it ke yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung m`o chh'ai-k^ung he-m`o? K'am he kh^ung-kh^ung!
Song-ti su ng`i-t^eu Su"n-L`in, yu chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en h`ang kok-ch'ung ke s`u"n-chiak, he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it, ya-he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu th^ang-sin fuk-y^im ^a?
Chhiong Su"n-k^in lun ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke s`u" k'ong: "K`i sin Song-ti, y^in-vi k`i ke sin, Song-ti chhiu son k`i cho ngi-ng`in."
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu oi t^i, y^u sin-s^im ke ng`in chang he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un.

Su"n-k^in yi-si^en khon-t'o, Song-ti oi p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in y^in-vi sin l`oi th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, s'o-y^i ch'o chhiu chh`on li'a fuk-y^im p^un ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, k'ong: "Van-m`in l^ung-ch'ung voi th^ung-ko ng`i tet-t'o Song-ti ke su-fuk!"
^A-pak-l^a-h'on y^in-vi sin chhiu tet-t'o fuk-hi; 'an-ngi`ong, yit-chhiet sin ke ng`in ya oi th`ung k`i khiung-ha tet-t'o fuk-hi!

Yung ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it cho y'i-kho ke ng`in chhi`on-phu he s^ang chhai chu-ch'u ch^u"-ha; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Fap-l+it-s^u s'o k^ui-thin ke m^i-yit-hong su", m`o yit-chh+u"t ch^un-h`ang ke ng`in, chhiu oi su Song-ti chu-ch'u."

Su"-s+u"t-song, m`o-ng`in n`en kho ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en p^un K`i chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Th^ung-ko sin p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi ke ng`in yit-thin voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang."
Ch'ung-he, fap-l+it ke k^in-k'i pin `m-he sin; ti^en-to, Su"n-k^in 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: "Ch^un-s'u fap-l+it min-lin ke ng`in, voi y^in-vi fap-l+it tet-t'o s^ang-miang."

K^i-tuk y'i-k^in vi ng`ai-t^eu t^am-t^ong chu-ch'u, yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi kiu-s+uk ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i fap-l+it ke chu-ch'u; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "S'o-y^u p^un-ng`in tiau-s'i chhai su-'e t'ang-k^o ke ng`in, chhi`on-phu su Song-ti ke chu-ch'u."

K^i-tuk 'an-ngi`ong cho ke muk-tit he oi s'u" Song-ti s'o yin-h'i su-p^un ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke fuk-hi, th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi su-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in; s'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu chang cho-tet th^ung-ko sin l`oi li^ang-su Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke Su"n-L`in.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai yung ngit-s`ong s^en-f+at ke su" k'i-li l`oi k'ong: Li'ong-ke ng`in th`ung-yi yit-khien su", yu t'a khie-yok, chhiu m`o ng`in cho-tet v`i-yok ya-he k^a-k'am m'a-ke.

Khiung-yong, Song-ti y'i-k^in tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on l^au k`i ke ch'u"-s^un l+ip-li'au yin-h'i. Su"n-k^in pin `m-he yung "tui ch'u"-ch'u" s^un-s^un" l`oi ch'u" t^ong-t^o ng`in; he k'ong "tui ng`i ke ch'u"-s^un", t^an-t^an ch'u" yit-ke ng`in, chhiu-he K^i-tuk.

Ng`ai ke yi-su" he k'ong: Song-ti l+ip-li'au khie-yok, yu tap-yin oi s'u li'a-ke khie-yok. Si-pak s^am-s+u"p ngi`en heu chang chhut-hien ke fap-l+it cho-`m-tet pho-fai li'a-ke khie-yok, l`oi fi-thet Song-ti ke yin-h'i.
Y^in-vi Song-ti s'o-su ke s'an-ngi+ap na-he yung fap-l+it cho k^in-k'i, chhiu `m-he cheu yin-h'i l'e; ch'ung-he, Song-ti s^u"-^en su s'an-ngi+ap p^un ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he cheu K`i ke yin-h'i.

'An-ngi`ong, fap-l+it ke muk-tit he m'a-ke n`e? Fap-l+it he vi-t'o ch'u"-chhut m'a-ke he ko-fam l`oi sat ke, chh+u"t-to ke yin-h'i p^un ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke "ch'u"-s^un" l`oi-to chhiu kiet-suk. Fap-l+it he th^ung-ko thi^en-s'u", theu-ko yit-ke ch^ung-ki^en-ng`in l`oi p^an-pu ke.
Ch'ung-he, t^an-f^ong-mien ke su" chhiu `m-s'u" ch^ung-ki^en-ng`in; Song-ti ke yin-h'i he t^an-f^ong-mien ke su".

'An-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, fap-l+it he f'an-tui Song-ti ke yin-h'i m^a? Chhi+et-tui `m-he! Na-he fap-l+it ke p^an-pu n`en vi ng`in-lui tai-l`oi s^ang-miang, ng`in chhiu cho-tet kho fap-l+it l`oi th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he l'e.

Ch'ung-he Su"n-k^in k'ong, chhi`on su"-kie l^ung-ch'ung chhai chhui ke khi`en-su" ch^u"-ha; y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti oi yung Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke sin-s+u"t cho li^ang-su yin-h'i ke k^i-chh'u; li'a yin-h'i he su-p^un s'o-y^u si^ong-sin ke ng`in.
Ch'ung-he, "sin" ke s`u"-thoi m`ang to y^i-chhi`en, fap-l+it he ch'ong-k'on ng`ai-t^eu ke, chhiong ch'ong fam-ng`in yit-yong, chh+u"t-to "sin" hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi ke-s`u".
S'o-y^i, fap-l+it he cho ng`ai-t^eu ke kam-fu-ng`in, chh+u"t-to K^i-tuk l`oi-to, 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu y^in-vi "sin" l`oi p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in.
Ki-y`en li'a-ha he "sin" ke s`u"-thoi, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu m`o chai su fap-l+it ke kam-fu l'e.
Ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a chhi`on-phu he th^ung-ko sin K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.
Ng`i-t^eu li^ang s'e-l^i k^ui-ng+ip K^i-tuk, chok-s^ong K^i-tuk chhiu-chhiong chok-s^am yit-yong.
M`o f^un Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, n`u-li ya-he chhu"-y`u-ng`in, n`am-ng`in ya-he 'ng-ng`in, chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s^ang-miang t^i-poi, ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu s`ang-cho yit-th'i l'e.
Ng`i-t^eu na-he s+uk K^i-tuk, ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke heu-thoi l'e, voi li^ang-su Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke s'an-ngi+ap.
H`an-y^u, oi ki-s`u"n ^a-p^a s'an-ngi+ap ke lai-'e, s^ui-y`en s'o-y^u ke s'an-ngi+ap chhi`on-phu he k`i ke, ch'ung-he h`an cho se-ng`in-`e ke s`u"-chiet, k`i l^au n`u-ph+uk m`o m'a-ke f^un-ph+et.
Chhai k`i h`an se ke s`u"-chiet, y^u ng`in cheu-ku k`i, thoi k`i k'on-l^i k^a-ngi+ap, yit-chh+u"t t'en-to ki^a-p^a vi k`i s'o thin ke ngit-`e l`oi-to.
Khiung-yong, ng`ai-t^eu ke l`in-sin h`an chhiong se-ng`in-`e ke s`u"-chiet, ya he p^un y'i-chhiu-ki^en s'o-vi s^en-siuk ke s`u"n-l`in ch^u"-phi cho n`u-chh`oi.
Ch'ung-he, s`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u", Song-ti chhiu chh^ai-phai chhu"-k^a ke Lai-'e, tui 'ng-ng`in l`oi chhut-se, yu s^en-f+at chhai fap-l+it ch^u"-ha,
muk-tit he oi kiu-s+uk s^en-f+at chhai fap-l+it ch^u"-ha ke ng`in, p^un ng`ai-t^eu y^u-h'o s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.
Vi-t'o oi chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu he K`i ke ch'u"-'ng, Song-ti chhiu chh^ai-phai K`i ke Lai-'e ke L`in ng+ip ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im, f^u-ham: "^A-p^a! Ng`ai ke Y`a!"
S'o-y^i, chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i chhiu `m-he n`u-ph+uk l'e, he lai-'e; ki-y`en he lai-'e, Song-ti chhiu p^un ng`i cho ki-s`u"n-ng`in.
Y^i-chhi`en ng`i-t^eu `m-su"t Song-ti ke s`u", he p^un ke-t^eu `m-he s`u"n ke s`u"n-m`in cho n`u-chh`oi.

Li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in ngin-su"t Song-ti (su"-s+u"t-song he p^un Song-ti ngin-su"t), ngi'ong yu to-ch'on-hi chh`im ke-t^eu m`o n`en-l+it l^au m`o lu-yung ke s^en-siuk ke s`u"n-l`in n`e? Ngi'ong oi chh`ung-s^in hi cho k`i-t^eu ke n`u-chh`oi n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu h`an chi^ong ke-t^eu ngit, ngi+et, chiet-kh`i, l^au ngi`en-fun ke k^ui-thin s'u to s'i-s'i!
Ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu s+u"t-chhai y`u-s`eu, chhin ki^ang ng`ai th`eu-p'ai chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s'o-cho ke chhi`on-phu l+ok-kh^ung l'e.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai khi`u ng`i-t^eu, oi chi^ong s^im p'i s^im, chhiong ng`ai ngin-th`ung ng`i-t^eu yit-yong. Y^i-chhi`en, ng`i-t^eu `m-su"t cho-ko tui-`m-h'i ng`ai ke su".
Ng`i-t^eu h`an ki-tet m^a? Ng`ai th`eu-yit-p'ai hi chh`on fuk-y^im p^un ng`i-t^eu, he y^in-vi ng`ai pot-phiang s'o chho-s`u"n ke k^i-fi.

S^ui-y`en ng`ai ke phiang s'u" ng`i-t^eu su chhin thai ke kh'au-ngiam, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu m`o khon-khi^ang ng`ai, ya m`o kh^i-chhi+et ng`ai. Ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu chiap-thai ng`ai, chhiong chiap-thai Song-ti ke thi^en-s'u", chhiong chiap-thai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u yit-yong.
Ke-s`u" ng`i-t^eu 'an f^on-h'i! Ch'ung-he li'a-ha n`e? Ng`ai k'am-k'ong, ke-s`u", na-he y^u fap-thu, chhiu-he chi^ong chhu"-k^a ke muk-ch^u yet p^un ng`ai, ng`i-t^eu me ngien-yi.
Li'a-ha ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong ch^u"n-l^i, f'an-ch'on sa s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu ke tui-th+it he-m`o?

Ke-t^eu ng`in tui ng`i-t^eu 'an ngi+et-s^im, `m-he m'a-ke h'o s^im-s+ut. K`i-t^eu ke muk-tit he oi chhiet-th^on ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`ai ke ko^an-he, s'u" ng`i-t^eu chang voi ngi+et-s^im tui-thai k`i-t^eu.
Chhai san-su"-song ngi+et-s^im p'un-l`oi he h'o ke, ch'ung-he `m t^an-chhiang ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u" chang 'an-ngi`ong.
Ng`ai chh^in-oi ke ch'u"-'ng ^a, ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu chai yit-p'ai chhiong ^a-m^e ngi^un-su s^en-s'an ke thung-kh'u, chh+u"t-to K^i-tuk chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang-ch^ung s`u"n-h`in.

Li'a-ha, ng`ai na-he th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha, `m-t^i voi y^u k'i h'o ^o! Ng`ai l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa ke khi'eu-hi chhiu `m-s'u" chhiong 'an-ngi`ong. Vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai ke s^im s+u"t-chhai m`o-kat m`o-sat!
Ke-t^eu si'ong-oi s^en-f+at chhai fap-l+it ch^u"-ha ke ng`in, ng`ai mun ng`i-t^eu yit-ke mun-th`i: Ng`i-t^eu m`o th^ang-ko M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it m^a?
Fap-l+it-s^u ki-chai k'ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on y^u li'ong-ke lai-'e, yit-ke he s'u"-'ng kiung ke, yit-ke he chhu"-y`u ke fu-ng`in-k^a kiung ke.
S'u"-'ng kiung ke he cheu ng`in ke yi-su" l`oi kiung ke; chhu"-y`u ke fu-ng`in-k^a kiung ke he tui Song-ti ke yin-h'i l`oi ke.

Li'a cho-tet khon-cho yit-ke p'i-yi: Ke li'ong-ke fu-ng`in-k^a he thoi-p'eu li'ong-ch'ung ke khie-yok. Kh`i-ch^ung yit-ke yok he tui S^i-nai-s^an l`oi ke, s'o kiung ke chhiu oi cho n`u-li; li'a chhiu-he Ha-kap.
Ha-kap he thoi-p'eu chhai ^A-l^a-pak ke S^i-nai-s^an, kh'o-p'i k^im-p^u-ngit ke Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang; k`i l^au k`i ke ch'u"-'ng s'o ko ke he n`u-li ke s^en-f+at.
Ch'ung-he, chhai thi^en-t'ang ke Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang he chhu"-y`u ke; k`i chang he ng`ai-t^eu ke ^a-m^e.

Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in ki-chai k'ong: M`o f`ai-th^oi, m`o kiung-ch'u" ke p^u-ngi`ong-ng`in ^a, ng`i oi f^on-h'i! M`ang-su"t k^in-l+it s^en-s'an ke thung-kh'u ke, ng`i oi thai-s^ang f^on-f^u! Y^in-vi su l^ang-l+ok ke p^u-ngi`ong-ng`in p'i ke th`ung l'o-k^ung khiung-ha s^en-f+at ke, voi y^u kha-t^o ke ch'u"-'ng!
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, chhiong Y^i-sat khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu he tui Song-ti ke yin-h'i l`oi s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng.
T^ong-s`u", ke cheu ng`in ke yi-su" kiung ke, pet-hoi Su"n-L`in s'o kiung ke; li'a-ha ya he 'an-ngi`ong.

Ch'ung-he Su"n-k^in ngi'ong-p^an k'ong n`e? Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Chi^ong s'u"-'ng l^au ki^a lai-'e kiuk chhut-hi, y^in-vi s'u"-'ng ke lai-'e cho-`m-tet th`ung chhu"-y`u ke fu-ng`in-k^a s'o kiung ke lai-'e khiung-ha ki-s`u"n s'an-ngi+ap."
Ch'ung-k'ong, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu `m-he s'u"-'ng ke ch'u"-'ng; ng`ai-t^eu he chhu"-y`u ke fu-ng`in-k^a s'o kiung ke.
Vi-t'o oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o chhu"-y`u, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in su"t-fong ng`ai-t^eu l'e. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi kh^i-chhai, `m-h'o p^un n`u-li ke ak chai kh'ung-chu" ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chu"n-k^in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, na-he ng`i-t^eu chiap-su kot-l^i, K^i-tuk tui ng`i-t^eu chhiu m`o m'a-ke p^ong-chhu.
Ng`ai chai yit-p'ai k'in-ko tak-ke chiap-su kot-l^i ke ng`in, k`i yit-thin oi ch^un-h`ang chhi`on-phu ke fap-l+it!
Ng`i-t^eu si'ong-oi kho ch^un-h`ang fap-l+it l`oi th`ung Song-ti y^u chu"n-khok ko^an-he ke ng`in, chhiu-he chhiet-th^on th`ung K^i-tuk ke ko^an-he, su"t-l+ok Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en.
Lun-t'o ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu kho Su"n-L`in ke l+it-liong, th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke sin-s^im, pet-chhiet phan-mong Song-ti voi p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he.

Y^in-vi, th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en ke s`u"-chiet, y^u su kot-l^i ya-he m`o su kot-l^i l^ung-ch'ung m`o m'a-ke ko^an-he; chhung-yeu ke ch'u"-y^u yit-hong, chhiu-he yung oi-s^im ke h`ang-thung p'eu-hien chhut-l`oi ke sin-s^im.
Ng`i-t^eu yit-t'an ch'eu-to chhin h'o! M'a-ng`in l`an-t'en ng`i-t^eu, hoi ng`i-t^eu `m sun-chhi`ung ch^u"n-l^i n`e?
Li'a-ch'ung khien-va t^ong-y`en `m-he tui ke f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti l`oi ke.
Si+uk-ng^i k'ong: "Yit-s+it-'e fat-kau chhiu p^un k^ui-th`on mien fat-h'i-l`oi."

Ng`ai h`an-he si^ong-sin ng`i-t^eu; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung he th`ung Ch'u kiet-li`en ke ng`in, ng`ai khok-sin ng`i-t^eu ke khon-fap yin-t^ong `m-voi th`ung ng`ai ke y^u m'a-ke ch^en-chh^a. Ch'ung-he, ke y'eu-lon ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in, m`o-lun k`i he m'a-ng`in, thin-chh+ok voi p^un Song-ti chit-f+at!

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai na-he ki-si+uk chh`on kot-l^i, cho-m'a-ke h`an p^un-ng`in pet-hoi n`e? Ng`ai na chu"n-k^in chh`on kot-l^i, ng`ai s'o si^en-y`ong K^i-tuk ke s+u"p-su"-ka chhiu `m-voi ngoi-t'o k`i-t^eu l'e!
Ng`ai ch^u"n h^i-mong ke-t^eu k'au-lon ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in chhu"-k^a hi y^am-thet!

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, Song-ti si'en-seu ng`i-t^eu, he oi ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho chhu"-y`u-ng`in. Ch'ung-he cho-`m-tet yung li'a chhu"-y`u cho fong-chi'ung chh`in-y+uk ke chia-khi'eu, f'an-ch'on oi yung oi-s^im fu-si^ong f+uk-su".
Y^in-vi chhi`on-phu fap-l+it l^ung-ch'ung p^au-h`am chhai "siak l`in-sa chhiong siak chhu"-k^a" li'a-thi`au min-lin t^i-poi.
Oi se-ngi ^o! Ng`i-t^eu na-he chhiong kh`im-chhu 'an-ngi`ong ng^au-l`oi ng^au-hi, ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a yit-thin voi fu-si^ong s^eu-m+et!
Ng`ai oi khi`ong-thiau: Ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung Su"n-L`in ke tai-li^ang, chhiu `m voi m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk.
Y^in-vi ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk th`ung Su"n-L`in p'i-chh'u" tui-l+ip, fu-si^ong k^ung-kit, s'u" ng`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu cho ng`i-t^eu si'ong-oi cho ke.
Ch'ung-he, na-he ng`i-t^eu p^un Su"n-L`in tai-li^ang, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" su fap-l+it ke yok-suk l'e.
Chh`in-y+uk ke su" he chhin m`in-hi'en ke, p'eu-hien chhai y`im-lon, l'a-sap, ha-li`u,
pai ngi'eu-siong, h`ang si`a-s+ut, kiet y^en-s`u, si^ong-ch^ang, yen-hen, fat-khi'en, chhu"-s^u", f^un-phai, kiet-t'ong,

chhit-tu, chi'u-chui, ti^en-kh`ong yen-l+ok, l^au kh`i-th^a li'a-lui ke su". Ng`ai y^i-chhi`en su"t k'in-ko ng`i-t^eu, li'a-ha chai k'in-ko ng`i-t^eu: Cho li'a-ch'ung su" ke ng`in, yit-thin `m-voi s`ang-cho Song-ti koet ke ch'u"-m`in!
Ch'ung-he Su"n-L`in s'o kiet ke k'o-ch'u" chhiu-he: Y`in-oi, h'i-l+ok, f`o-ph`in, ngi^un-nai, ^en-chh`u", li`ong-san, sin-s+u"t,
v^un-y`u, l^au chiet-chu". Li'a-t^eu su" fap-l+it `m-voi kim-ch'u".
S'o-y^u s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ng`in, y'i-k^in chi^ong k`i-t^eu ke ngiuk-th'i, li`en ngiuk-th'i ke yit-chhiet si`a-chh`in l^au s^u"-y+uk, l^ung-ch'ung t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang l'e.
Ki-y`en Su"n-L`in su ng`ai-t^eu s^in s^ang-miang, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi sun-chhi`ung K`i ke tai-li^ang l`oi h`ang-su".
Ng`ai-t^eu `m-h'o ki^eu-ngau, `m-h'o ngi^a tui-f^ong fat-khi'en, ya-he fu-si^ong chhit-tu.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, na-he y^u-ng`in yit s`u" cho `m-chh+ok su", ng`i-t^eu s+uk-l`in ke ng`in chhiu oi yung v^un-f`o ke f^ong-fap l`oi v'an-f`i k`i. Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ya oi se-ngi, ki^ang-pha ya su y'u-f+et.
Oi f^un-t^am chh^ung-t^am, 'an-ngi`ong chhiu-he ch^un-h`ang K^i-tuk ke min-lin.
Chhu"-ngin y^u chh`oi-thiau, su"-s+u"t-song m`o pan-phiet ke ng`in, k`i he phien chhu"-k^a thin-thin.
Tak-s`a yin-k^oi f'an-s'en p'un-s^u"n ke h`ang-v`i; na-he y^u h'o h`ang-v`i, k`i cho-tet vi chhu"-k^a l`oi k'am-kok k^ong-y`ung, ch'ung-he m`o s^i-yeu th`ung ph+et-ng`in ke s`u"n-chhiu p'i-k'au.
Y^in-vi tak-s`a oi kh^ai chhu"-k^a ke t^am-th`eu.
Chhai K^i-tuk ke ch^u"n-tho-song chiap-su kau-th^o ke ng`in, yin-k^oi oi ki^ung-kip k^au k`i ke s^in-s^ang, th`ung k`i f^un-hi'ong yit-chhiet ke h'o t^ung-s^i.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o phien chhu"-k^a; m`o ng`in n`en phien Song-ti. Ng`in chung m'a-ke, chhiu voi s^u m'a-ke.

Vi-t'o m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a ke chh`in-y+uk l`oi ve-ch'ung ke, k`i chhiu voi tui chh`in-y+uk s^u-s`u"n m+et-m`ong; vi-t'o oi tet-t'o Su"n-L`in ke f^on-h'i l`oi ve-ch'ung ke, k`i chhiu voi tui Su"n-L`in s^u-s`u"n y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.
Ng`ai-t^eu h`ang-san, `m-h'o su"t-chu"; na m`o f^oi-s^im, s`u"-ki^en yit to, chhiu voi y^u s^u-s`u"n.
S'o-y^i, m`o-lun m'a-ke s`u"-chiet, yit y^u k^i-fi chhiu oi vi chung-ng`in h`ang-san, tui ke-t^eu chhai sin-ngi'ong-song th`ung-s+uk yit-k^a ke ng`in h`an-kha oi 'an-ngi`ong.
Ng`i-t^eu khon, li'a-t^eu thai-chak ke su" he ng`ai chh^in-pit vi ng`i-t^eu si'a ke!

Ke-t^eu chhin-hau yung ngoi-p'eu ke su"-chh`in l`oi ti'en l^au kho^a-khi'eu, chhiu he pet ng`i-t^eu chiap-su kot-l^i ke ng`in. K`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, v`i-yit ke ngi`en-y^in chhiu-he ki^ang vi-t'o K^i-tuk ke s+u"p-su"-ka su pet-hoi.

Su"-s+u"t-song, ke-t^eu chiap-su kot-l^i ke ng`in, li`en k`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a me m`o ch^un-s'u fap-l+it; k`i-t^eu pet ng`i-t^eu su kot-l^i, mi^en-ki'ong ng`i-t^eu h`ong-f+uk ngoi-p'eu ke ng`i-su"t, muk-tit he oi yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi cho k`i-t^eu ke kho^a-khi'eu.

Na-he ng`ai, ng`ai yit-thin m`o kho^a-khi'eu ph+et ke, ng`ai ch'u"-y^u kho^a-khi'eu ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke s+u"p-su"-ka; y^in-vi th^ung-ko li'a s+u"p-su"-ka, tui ng`ai ke k^on-ti'am l`oi khon, su"-kie y'i-k^in t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang; tui li'a su"-kie l`oi k'ong, ng`ai ya y'i-k^in t^ang-s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang l'e.
Su kot-l^i ya-he m`o su kot-l^i l^ung-ch'ung m`o m'a-ke ko^an-he; chhung-yeu ke he ng`ai-t^eu oi s`ang-cho s^in chh'ong-chho ke ng`in.
Ngien yit-chhiet ch^un-cheu li'a ngi`en-chet ke ng`in, l^au s'o-y^u s+uk Song-ti ke ch^u"n Y^i-set-li+et-m`in, chhi`on-phu tet-t'o ph`in-^on l^au l`in-m'en!
Chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, `m-h'o chai k^a-thi^am ng`ai ke m`a-f`an; y^in-vi ng`ai s^u"n-song ke s^ong-chiak y'i-k^in chu"n-m`in ng`ai he Y^a-s^u ke n`u-ph+uk.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ngien ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en s`ong chhai ng`i-t^eu s^im-nui! ^A-m'en.
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai fung Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai si'a sin-'e p^un Y^i-fut-s'o thi-f^ong ke-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi ch^ung-s^im ke su"n-th`u:
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Siung-chan k^ui-p^un ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^A-p^a Song-ti! Y^in-vi K`i th^ung-ko K^i-tuk chi^ong thi^en-t'ang kok-yong s+uk-l`in ke fuk-hi su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu.
Chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-chhi`en, K`i y'i-k^in th^ung-ko K^i-tuk ki'en-si'en ng`ai-t^eu, p^un ng`ai-t^eu chhai K`i mien-chhi`en s`ang-cho su"n-kiet, m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in.
Y^in-vi Song-ti thung-siak ng`ai-t^eu, K`i yi-thin ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l`oi k^ui-s+uk K`i, cho K`i ke ch'u"-'ng; li'a he K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke, he K`i ke ch'u"-yi.
Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi siung-chan Song-ti li'a y`ung-yeu ke ^en-ti'en, y^in-vi K`i chi^ong K`i s'o-siak ke Lai-'e ph+ak-ph+ak su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu!
Y^in-vi K^i-tuk vi ng`ai-t^eu li`u-hiet l`oi s'i, ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o chhu"-y`u, chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en. Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en he ngi'ong-p^an f^ung-fu ^a!
K`i he chh^ung-chh^ung chiuk-chiuk chi^ong li'a ^en-ti'en su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu! Song-ti yung chh^ung-m`in chu"-fi
v`an-s`u"n K`i ke ch'u"-yi, yu p^un ng`ai-t^eu t^i K`i y'i-k^in kiet-thin oi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk l`oi v`an-s`u"n ke o-pi.

Song-ti chhai s`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u", s'o oi v`an-s`u"n li'a o-pi ke kie-v+ak chhiu-he: P^un thi^en-t'ang l^au thi-song yit-chhiet su-chho ke l^ung-ch'ung k^ui-s+uk K^i-tuk, K^i-tuk cho k`i-t^eu ke th`eu.

Y'i-chhiu van-v+ut chhi`on-phu he cheu Song-ti ke kie-v+ak l^au kiet-thin l`oi v`an-s`u"n. Song-ti cheu K`i ch'o chhiu kiet-thin ke ch'u"-yi, th^ung-ko K^i-tuk ki'en-si'en ng`ai-t^eu cho K`i ke ch'u"-m`in.
K`i ke ch'u"-yi he oi p^un ng`ai li'a-t^eu si^en ngi'ong-mong K^i-tuk ke ng`in siung-chan K`i ke y`ung-yeu!

Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu ya y^u s`ang-cho Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in. Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o ch^u"n-l^i ke tho, chhiu-he th^ang-t'o ke s'u" ng`i-t^eu tet-kiu ke fuk-y^im ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu si^ong-sin K^i-tuk, Song-ti chhiu chi^ong K`i s'o yin-h'i ke Su"n-L`in su-p^un ng`i-t^eu, cho ng`i-t^eu k^ui-s+uk K`i ke yin-ki.

Su"n-L`in p'o-chu"n ng`ai-t^eu voi s`u"n-su Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke s'an-ngi+ap, chh+u"t-to Song-ti chi^ong v`an-chhi`on ke chhu"-y`u su-p^un s+uk K`i ke ng`in. Ng`ai-t^eu yin-t^ong siung-chan K`i ke y`ung-yeu!
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, chhu"-chhi`ung ng`ai th^ang-t'o ng`i-t^eu tui Ch'u Y^a-s^u chhin y^u sin-s^im, tui chung su"n-th`u chhin y^u oi-s^im,
ng`ai chhiu yit-chh+u"t vi ng`i-t^eu k'am-chhia Song-ti. Ng`ai kh`i-t'o ke s`u" s`ong-s`ong s^u"-ngiam ng`i-t^eu,

khi`u ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke Song-ti, y`ung-yeu ke ^A-p^a, chi^ong Su"n-L`in su-p^un ng`i-t^eu. Su"n-L`in voi s'u" ng`i-t^eu y^u chu"-fi, pin kh'i-su" ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu ngin-su"t Song-ti.

Ng`ai ya khi`u Song-ti kh^oi ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-ngi'en, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i: K`i f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu l`oi tet ke phan-mong he m'a-ke; K`i s'o yin-h'i oi p^un chung su"n-th`u ke s'an-ngi+ap he ngi'ong-p^an f^ung-fu l^au y`ung-k^ong;

K`i chhai ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-sin ke ng`in t^ong-ch^ung s'o hi'en-chhut ke n`en-l+it he ngi'ong-p^an v'i-thai. Li'a n`en-l+it l^au K`i s'u" K^i-tuk tui s'i f+uk-f+at, p^un K^i-tuk chhai thi^en-t'ang chh^o chhai chhu"-k^a chu"n-phi'en ke n`en-l+it he khiung-yong ke.

Chhai ke-vi, K^i-tuk ke th'ung-chhu" chh^eu-ko yit-chhiet thi^en-kie ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a, ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, th'ung-chhu"-ch'a, l^au si`a-ok ke su"-l+it; k`i chh^eu-ko hien-su" l^au l`oi-su" yit-chhiet ke mi`ang.
Song-ti yu p^un y'i-chhiu van-v+ut h`ong-f+uk chhai K^i-tuk ke kiok-h^a, p^un k`i cho kau-fi ke th`eu, th'ung-chhu" yit-chhiet.
Kau-fi he K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-th'i, he chh^ung-m^an y'i-chhiu van-v+ut ke K^i-tuk s'o chh^ung-m^an ke.
Th`eu-p'ai, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu fam-chhui, phoi-ngi+ak Song-ti ke min-lin, ng`i-t^eu tui l`in-sin l`oi k'ong he s'i ke.
Ke-s`u", ng`i-t^eu th`en li'a su"-ki^en si`a-ok ke f^ung-si+uk, sun-chhi`ung thi^en-kie ke ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, chhiu-he li'a-ha hot-chu" ke-t^eu phoi-ngi+ak Song-ti min-lin ke ng`in ke si`a-l`in.

Kh`i-s+u"t, th`eu-p'ai ng`ai-t^eu ya th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-yong, fong-chi'ung ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk, th`en chhu"-k^a ke s^u"-y+uk l^au yi-ngiam hi h`ang. S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu th`ung ph+et-ng`in khiung-yong, chu-thin oi su Song-ti ke chit-f+at.
Ch'ung-he Song-ti y^u f^ung-su"n ke l`in-m'en; K`i tui ng`ai-t^eu ke thung-siak v`u-khi`ung v`u-chhin.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke l`in-sin chhai phoi-ngi+ak ke chhui-ok ch^ung s'i-thet ke s`u", K`i p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha s^ang-ko-l`oi; ng`i-t^eu ke tet-kiu he y'i-kho Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en.
Song-ti yu p^un ng`ai-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s^ang-miang ch^ung th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha f+uk-f+at, th`ung k`i khiung-ha chhai thi^en-t'ang ch'ong-khi`en.
Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong cho he oi tui su"-su" thoi-thoi p'eu-m`in K`i kh+it f^ung-fu ke ^en-ti'en, chhiu-he K`i chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi tui ng`ai-t^eu hi'en-hien chhut-l`oi ke chh`u"-oi.
Ng`i-t^eu ke tet-kiu he kho Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en, ph`in sin-s^im l`oi tet-t'o ke; `m-he y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i, he Song-ti su-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke.
Ki-y`en `m-he kho h`ang-v`i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu m`o m'a-ke h'o kho^a-khi'eu ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu he Song-ti ke chok-ph'in, chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi chho-s`u"n ke, muk-tit he oi ng`ai-t^eu h`ang-san; li'a he Song-ti ch'o chhiu kie-v+ak oi ng`ai-t^eu hi-cho ke.

Ng`i-t^eu chhut-se chhiu-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke, oi ki-tet y^i-chhi`en ke chh`in-h`in: Ng`i-t^eu p^un chhu"-chh^u"n su-ko kot-l^i ke ng`in --- chhiu-he ke-t^eu yung ng`in ke s'u chhai chhu"-k^a ngiuk-s^u"n h`ang kot-l^i ke Y`u-thai-ng`in --- chh^u"n-cho m`o su kot-l^i ke.

Ke-s`u", ng`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk m`o ko^an-he, he ngoi-ng`in, `m-he Song-ti ke si'en-m`in. Song-ti tui K`i ke ch'u"-m`in s'o yin-h'i ke khie-yok, ng`i-t^eu m`o fun; ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-ki^en m`o h^i-mong, ya m`o Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai he l`i-kh^oi Song-ti y'en-y'en ke ng`in, ch'ung-he li'a-ha th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en khiung-ha, yu y^in-vi K^i-tuk li`u-hiet l`oi s'i, y'i-k^in chh^in-khiun Song-ti l'e.

K^i-tuk chh^in-chhu" chi^ong f`o-ph`in su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu; k`i s'u" Y`u-thai-ng`in l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in h+ap-yit, yung chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i chhak-thet ke hoi k`i-t^eu y^en-k^a f^un-li+et ke chhi`ong.
K`i fi-chh`u Y`u-thai fap-l+it ke kie-min l^au kau-thi`au, muk-tit he oi p^un li'a li'ong-ch'ung ng`in th^ung-ko k`i ke s^ang-miang s`ang-cho yit-ch'ung s^in-ng`in, l`oi s`u"n-chhiu f`o-ph`in.
Th^ung-ko chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang ke s'i, K^i-tuk chh`u-thet y^en-s`u; th^ung-ko s+u"p-su"-ka, k`i p^un li'ong-phi'en ke ng`in s`ang-cho yit-th'i, l^au Song-ti f`o-h'o.

'An-ngi`ong, K^i-tuk l`oi chh`on f`o-ph`in ke fuk-y^im p^un s'o-y^u ke ng`in, p^au-h`am ng`i li'a-t^eu th`eu-p'ai l`i-kh^oi Song-ti y'en-y'en ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in l^au chh^in-khiun Song-ti ke Y`u-thai-ng`in.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu m`o-lun he Y`u-thai-ng`in ya-he Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, l^ung-ch'ung he th^ung-ko K^i-tuk, su khiung yit-vi Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung, l`oi-to ^A-p^a Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in m`o chai he ngoi-ng`in, ya `m-he s^ang-fun-ng`in; ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti ch'u"-m`in ke th`ung-p^au, he Song-ti yit-k^a ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu th`ung Y`u-thai-ng`in khiung-yong, ya he h'i chhai s'u"-th`u l^au si^en-t^i ke thi-k^i t'ang-k^o, K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u chhu"-k^a he vuk-tung li`en-kiet ke thai-li`ong.
Y'i-kho k`i, k^ui-chho kien-chuk chhiu fu-si^ong kiet-li`en, chhiam-chhiam kh'ong-thai, s`ang-cho Ch'u ke su"n-thien.
Y'i-kho k`i, ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a ya khiung-ha p^un k`i kien-chho, s`ang-cho Song-ti th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in h+et ke s'o-chhai.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai --- P'o-l`o vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke y`en-ku cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke si`u-fam, vi ng`i-t^eu khi`u Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu yit-thin y^u th^ang-ko, vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke h'o-chhu, Song-ti s^u"-^en chi^ong yit-hong chu"t-vu k^au-thok p^un ng`ai.
K`i kh'i-su" ng`ai, p^un ng`ai t^i K`i ke o-pi. (Ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong li'a o-pi ki'en-li+ok si'a h^a-l`oi;
ng`i-t^eu th+uk-li'au chhiu voi li'au-ki'e, ng`ai chh^u"m t^i K^i-tuk ke o-pi.)
Chhai y^i-chhi`en ke su"-thoi, Song-ti `m-su"t p^un m'a-ng`in t^i li'a-ke o-pi; ch'ung-he li'a-ha, K`i y'i-k^in th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in kh'i-su" K`i ke su"n s'u"-th`u l^au si^en-t^i l'e.

Li'a o-pi ke nui-y`ung he 'an-ngi`ong: Th^ung-ko fuk-y^im, Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in oi th`ung Y`u-thai-ng`in khiung-ha f^un-hi'ong Song-ti ke chuk-fuk, th`ung-s+uk yit-th'i, ya th`ung-hi'ong Song-ti chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi s'o s+u"t-hien ke yin-h'i.
Song-ti sat-l+ip ng`ai chu"p-h`ang li'a chh`on fuk-y^im ke chu"t-vu; li'a he cheu K`i s'o yun-h`ang ke khi`en-n`en su-p^un ng`ai ke th+it-ph+et ^en-su.
S^ui-y`en ng`ai he s'o-y^u su"n-th`u ch^ung chui m`i-se ke, Song-ti h`an-he su ng`ai th+it-khi`en, chi^ong fuk-y^im, chhiu-he K^i-tuk chhet `m-theu ke f^ung-su"n, chh`on-p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in,
p^un chhi`on ng`in-lui t^i Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an s+u"t-h`ang K`i o-pi ke kie-v+ak. Chhai si^en-chhi`en ke su"-thoi, chh'ong-chho van-v+ut ke Song-ti chi^ong li'a o-pi khong-t'en,
vi-t'o oi chhai li'a-ha ke su"-thoi, th^ung-ko kau-fi, p^un thi^en-kie ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a l^au ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a l^ung-ch'ung voi ngin-su"t Song-ti v`u-khi`ung ke chu"-fi.
Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong cho he cheu K`i van-su" put-pien ke ch'u"-yi; li'a ch'u"-yi y'i-k^in chhai ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s^u"n-song s+u"t-hien l'e.
Th^ung-ko sin K^i-tuk, ng`ai-t^eu th`ung k`i kiet-li`en, chhiu cho-tet h'o-t'am l`oi-to Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, chhi`on `m-s'u" ki^ang.
S'o-y^i, chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o y^in-vi ng`ai vi ng`i-t^eu su-kh'u chhiu f^oi-s^im, f'an-ch'on oi khon-cho he ng`i-t^eu ke k^ong-y`ung.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhai ^A-p^a mien-chhi`en kh'ui h^a-l`oi kh`i-t'o.
Thi^en-t'ang l^au thi-song s'o-y^u ke k^a-chh+uk chhi`on-phu he K`i ^on-mi`ang ke.
Ng`ai khi`u Song-ti, cheu K`i y`ung-yeu ke f^ung-su"n, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in su ng`i-t^eu l+it-liong, p^un ng`i-t^eu nui-chhai ke s^ang-miang y'ung-khien h'i-l`oi,
s'u" K^i-tuk th^ung-ko ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im, h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-ch^ung. Ng`ai ya kh`i-khi`u Song-ti, p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai k`i ke thung-siak ch^ung y^u k^in ya y^u k^i,
h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu th`ung chung su"n-th`u khiung-ha th'i-ngiam K^i-tuk ke thung-siak he ngi'ong-p^an ke chh`ong, fat, k^o, chh^u"m.
Ngien ng`i-t^eu chu"n-k^in th'i-ngiam-t'o K^i-tuk ke chh^eu-ko chu"-su"t s'o n`en li'au-ki'e ke thung-siak, h'o s'u" ng`i-t^eu chh^ung-m^an Song-ti yit-chhiet ke f^ung-su"n.
Song-ti n`en yung yun-h`ang chhai ng`ai-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ke n`en-l+it s`u"n-chhiu yit-chhiet, y'en-y'en chh^eu-ko ng`ai-t^eu s'o khi`u s'o si'ong ke.
Ngien K`i chhai kau-fi ch^ung pin chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi tet-t'o y`ung-yeu, chh+u"t-to su"-su" thoi-thoi, y'un-y'un y'en-y'en! ^A-m'en.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai li'a y^in-vi su"-fung Ch'u s`ang-cho si`u-fam ke, khien-va ng`i-t^eu: H`ang-su" v`i-ng`in yin-t^ong oi h+ap Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu l`oi tet-t'o ke s^u"n-fun.
Ng`i-t^eu oi khi^am-p^i, v^un-y`u, ngi^un-nai, yung oi-s^im fu-si^ong kh^on-y`ung,
yung f`o-ph`in p'i-chh'u" kiet-li`en, chhin-l+it p'o-chh`u" Su"n-L`in s'o-su h+ap-yit ke s^im.
Ch'u"-y^u yit-ke s^u"n-th'i, ch'u"-y^u yit-vi Su"n-L`in; chhiong Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu ch'u"-y^u yit-ke phan-mong.
Ch'u"-y^u yit-vi Ch'u, yit-ke sin-ngi'ong, yit-ke s'e-l^i.
Ch'u"-y^u yit-vi Song-ti, chhiu-he ng`in-lui ke ^A-p^a; K`i chh^eu-y+et van-y^u, chhai van-y^u ch^ung-ki^en, ya chhai van-y^u t^i-poi.
Ng`ai-t^eu tak-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung cheu K^i-tuk s'o f^un-phi ke, li^ang-su th+it-ph+et ke ^en-su.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: K`i s^u"n-s^ong-hi to k^o-k^o ke s'o-chhai, tai-t'en chhin-t^o chok-l`oi ke s`u-th+it; K`i chi^ong kok-yong ke ^en-su su-p^un ng`in.
("K`i s^u"n-s^ong-hi" li'a-ki fa he m'a-ke yi-su" n`e? Li'a chhiu-he k'ong: K`i su"t si^en kong h^a-l`oi, to thi chui chh^u"m ke s'o-chhai.
Ke "kong h^a-l`oi" yu "s^u"n-s^ong-hi" to ch^u-thi^en t'ang-k^o ke he khiung yit-s`a; k`i 'an-ngi`ong cho he oi chh^ung-m^an van-y^u.)

K`i ya he ke "chi^ong kok-yong ke ^en-su su-p^un ng`in" ke; k`i ch'u"-thin y^u-t^eu ng`in cho s'u"-th`u, y^u-t^eu ng`in cho si^en-t^i, y^u-t^eu ng`in cho chh`on fuk-y^im ke, y^u-t^eu ng`in cho m+uk-s^u" ya-he kau-s^u";
muk-tit he oi ch^ong-phi chung su"n-th`u cho su"-fung ke k^ung-chok, l`oi kien-l+ip kau-fi, chhiu-he K^i-tuk ke s^u"n-th'i,
chh+u"t-to ng`ai-t^eu chung-ng`in tui Song-ti ke Lai-'e y^u khiung-yong ke sin-ngi'ong l^au ngin-su"t, ch'ong-thai s`u"n-ng`in, m^an-y^u K^i-tuk s`u"n-s+uk ke yong-su"t.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chang `m-voi chai chhiong se-ng`in-`e, ham-l+ok ng`in s'o-sat kh`i-kh'au ke k'ui-kie, th`en-t'en kok-yong ke h+ok-sot ch'eu, chhiong p^un f^ung-long ph^eu-l`oi t'a-hi.
Ti^en-to, ng`ai-t^eu oi yung oi-s^im k'ong s+u"t-fa, chhai kok f^ong-mien yit-chh+u"t ch'ong-chin to chhiong K^i-tuk. K`i chhiu-he th`eu;

chhi`on-s^u"n l^ung-ch'ung y'i-kho k`i, th^ung-ko ko^an-chiet l^au k^in-kut l`oi fu-si^ong phi-h+ap, p'i-chh'u" li`en-kiet. 'An-ngi`ong, t^ong kok k^i-th'i ke k^ung-h'au fat-f^i ke s`u", s^u"n-th'i chhiu voi chhai si^ong-siak ke t^ong-ch^ung chhiam-chhiam ch'ong-thai, y+et l`oi y+et y'ung-khien.
Ng`ai li'a-ha fung Ch'u ke mi`ang khien ng`i-t^eu: `M-h'o chai chhiong Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ko ke-ch'ung ke s^en-f+at. K`i-t^eu s'o-si'ong ke he m`o li-yit ke su",
k`i-t^eu ke s^im-k^on v^u-am, k`i-t^eu y'i-k^in th`ung Song-ti s'o-su ke s^ang-miang kak-th^on l'e; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu m`o th`eu-n'o yu ngang-hok.
K`i-t^eu `m-t^i kien-seu, fong-chi'ung chh`in-y+uk, s`ui-s^im s'o-oi hi h`ang kok-ch'ung phai-tet ke su"-chh`in.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu h+ok-s+ip K^i-tuk chhiu `m-he 'an-ngi`ong!
Ng`i-t^eu na-he y^u-y'ang th^ang-to k`i ke su", cho k`i ke sin-th`u, yu h+ok-ko chhai Y^a-s^u t^i-poi chang y^u ke ch^u"n-l^i,
'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhiu oi thot-thet ke s'u" ng`i-t^eu s^en-f+at chhai f'u-phai ch^ung ke khiu-ng`in; khiu-ng`in he y^in-vi s^u"-y+uk ke y'u-f+et l`oi f'u-phai-thet ke.
Ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-s^u" yi-ngiam oi von-s^in,
oi chi^ong s^in-ng`in chok-h'i-l`oi; s^in-ng`in he cheu Song-ti ke h`in-siong chho ke, th^ung-ko ch^u"n-l^i ke s^en-f+at l`oi p'eu-m`in chu"n-ngi l^au su"n-kiet.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o chai k'ong f^a-li^au! Tak-s`a tui l`in-sa yin-t^ong k'ong s+u"t-fa, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung he K^i-tuk s^u"n-th'i ke k^i-th'i.
Ng`i-t^eu na fat-khi'en, `m-h'o y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong l`oi fam-chhui; ya `m-h'o at-to ngit-th`eu l+ok-s^an;
`m-h'o li`u k^i-fi p^un M^o-k'ui l`oi hoi ng`i.
Th`eu-p'ai cho-chh+et ke, `m-h'o chai th^eu-n^a; oi kho chhu"-k^a ke s^ung-s'u ngin-ch^u"n cho-se, chang voi y^u n`en-l+it p^ong-chhu khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in.
K'ong-fa `m-h'o s^ong ng`in, oi k'ong tui ng`in y^u p^ong-chhu, chho-chhiu ng`in ke fa, p^un th^ang-t'o ke ng`in tet-t'o li-yit.
`M-h'o p^un Song-ti ke Su"n-L`in y`u-s`eu; y^in-vi Su"n-L`in he ng`i-t^eu s+uk Song-ti ke yin-ki, p'o-chu"n Song-ti su"t-fong ng`i-t^eu ke ngit-`e voi to.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chh`u-thet yit-chhiet ke ok-th+uk, yen-hen, l^au fun-nu. `M-h'o chai y^en-k^a ya-he f'i-pong; cho-`m-tet chai y^u m'a-ke y^en-s`u.
Oi yung chh`u"-p^i l^au l`in-m'en ke s^im fu-si^ong h'o kho'an-thai, p'i-chh'u" sa-mi^en, chhiong Song-ti th^ung-ko K^i-tuk sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu yit-yong.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti s'o-siak ke ch'u"-'ng, ng`i-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi h'au-fap Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu ke h`ang-su" cho-ng`in oi ph`in oi-s^im, chhiong K^i-tuk siak ng`ai-t^eu, vi ng`ai-t^eu h^i-s^en s^ang-miang, cho hi^ong-hi^ong ke ki^ung-v+ut l^au chi-v+ut hien-p^un Song-ti yit-yong.
Ke-t^eu ki^en-y`im, ^o-ch^o, ya-he th^am-s^im ke su"-chh`in, chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en li`en th`i-h'i ya `m-h'o, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he Song-ti ke su"n-m`in.
Ng`i-t^eu ya `m-h'o k'ong y`im-lon, h^am-chh^e, ya-he ha-li`u ke fa; ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu oi k'ong k'am-chhia Song-ti ke fa.

Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t t^i, fam ki^en-y`im, ^o-ch^o, ya-he th^am-s^im ke ng`in (th^am-s^im l^au pai ngi'eu-siong khiung-yong) chhi+et-tui put-n`en li^ang-su K^i-tuk l^au Song-ti koet t^i-poi ke fuk-fun.
`M-h'o p^un m'a-ng`in yung h^i-k'a ke fa phien-ch'eu; y^in-vi li'a-t^eu su", Song-ti voi tui ke-t^eu phoi-ngi+ak ke ng`in thai fat-khi'en.
S'o-y^i, `m-h'o th`ung li'a-ch'ung ng`in kiet-k^au.

Th`eu-p'ai ng`i-t^eu chhai v^u-am ch^ung, ch'ung-he chhu"-chhi`ung s`ang-cho Ch'u ke sin-th`u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu chhai k^ong-m`in ch^ung; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at yin-t^ong oi chhiong k^ong-m`in ke ch'u"-'ng.
K^ong-m`in s'o kiet f^ung-su"n ke k'o-ch'u" chhiu-he yit-chhiet ke li`ong-san, k^ung-ngi, l^au ch^u"n-l^i.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chh`a-kh'au m'a-ke he Ch'u s'o f^on-h'i ke su".
`M-h'o cho ph+et-ng`in chhai am-ch^ung s'o cho ke-t^eu m`o li-yit ke su"-chh`in, f'an-ch'on oi chi^ong ke-t^eu su"-chh`in hi^en-chhut-l`oi.
(K`i-t^eu chhai am-ch^ung s'o-cho ke su", li`en k'ong-h'i ya he chhin kien-seu!)
Yit-chhiet su"-chh`in chhai k^ong-m`in ch^ung yit k^ung-kh^oi, ch^u"n-siong chhiu hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi;

y^in-vi s'u" yit-chhiet hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi ke chhiu-he k^ong. S'o-y^i, s^u"-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: Soi-muk ke ng`in ^a, h'o si'ang l'e! Tui s'i-ng`in ch^ung hong-h'i-l`oi! K^i-tuk chhiu oi k^ong-cheu ng`i.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i oi se-ngi. `M-h'o chhiong m`o chu"-su"t ke ng`in, oi chhiong y^u chu"-fi ke ng`in.
Oi p'a-ak k^i-fi, y^in-vi li'a-ha ke su"-thoi si`a-ok.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o ngok-ngok tok-tok ko ngit-`e; oi m`in-ph+ak Ch'u ke ch'u"-yi he m'a-ke.
`M-h'o s+u"t-to chi'u-chui, l^im thet-t^o chi'u voi hoi ng`i-t^eu fong-thong; ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu oi p^un Su"n-L`in chh^ung-m^an.
Ng`i-t^eu oi yung s^u"-phi^en, su"n-s^u", l^au l`in-k^o l`oi tui-chhong, khi'eu chhong s^im f`o l`oi chan-m^i Ch'u.
F`am-su" oi fung ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang, s`ong-s`ong k'am-chhia ^A-p^a Song-ti.
Oi y^in-vi kin-vi K^i-tuk l`oi p'i-chh'u" sun-f+uk.
Cho p^u-ngi`ong ke, ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung chhu"-k^a ke l'o-k^ung, chhiong sun-f+uk Ch'u yit-yong.
Y^in-vi l'o-k^ung he p^u-ngi`ong ke th`eu, chhiu-chhiong K^i-tuk he kau-fi ke th`eu, ya he kau-fi chhi`on-th'i ke Kiu-ch'u.
Chhiong kau-fi sun-f+uk K^i-tuk, cho p^u-ngi`ong ke ya yin-t^ong f`am-su" sun-chhi`ung l'o-k^ung.
Cho l'o-k^ung ke, ng`i-t^eu oi siak chhu"-k^a ke p^u-ngi`ong, chhiong K^i-tuk siak kau-fi, vi kau-fi h^i-s^en s^ang-miang yit-yong.
K`i 'an-ngi`ong cho he oi th^ung-ko ch^u"n-tho l^au s'ui l`oi kiet-chhiang kau-fi, p^un k`i s`ang-cho su"n-kiet,
h'o hien-p^un chhu"-k^a, cho y`ung-k^ong ke kau-fi, chhi`on m`o khiet-ti'am, m`o l'a-sap, m`o t'a-chap, chhiu-he s`un-kiet v`an-chhi`on ke kau-fi.
Khiung-yong, cho l'o-k^ung ke yin-t^ong siak chhu"-k^a ke p^u-ngi`ong, chhiong siak chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i yit-yong; siak p^u-ngi`ong chhiu-he siak chhu"-k^a.
M`o ng`in yen-hen chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i, ch'ung-he p'o-y^ong l^au cheu-ku, chhiong K^i-tuk tui-thai kau-fi yit-yong;
y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu he k`i s^u"n-song ke k^i-th'i.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`in oi l`i-kh^oi y`a-^oi, l^au p^u-ngi`ong kiet-h+ap, li'ong-s`a s`ang-cho yit-th'i."
Li'a-ke k^in-chiet kh'i-su" kh+it-thai ke o-pi. Ng`ai t^i k`i he ch'u" K^i-tuk l^au kau-fi ke ko^an-he l`oi k'ong ke,
ch'ung-he ya cho-tet yung chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en: Cho l'o-k^ung ke yin-t^ong siak p^u-ngi`ong, chhiong siak chhu"-k^a; cho p^u-ngi`ong ke ya yin-t^ong kin-chhung l'o-k^ung.
Cho ch'u"-'ng ke, ng`i-t^eu oi chhai Ch'u ke t^i-poi th^ang-chhi`ung y`a-^oi; li'a he l^i s'o t^ong-y`en ke.
"Oi hau-kin y`a-^oi, ng`i chhiu voi su"-su" sun-li, chhai su"-ki^en hi'ong-su chh`ong-su!" Li'a he thi-yit-thi`au tai yin-h'i ke kie-min.
Cho ^a-p^a ke, `m-h'o ngi^a ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng fat-khi'en; oi yung Ch'u ke kau-hiun l^au k'in-kie l`oi y^ong-yuk k`i-t^eu.
Cho n`u-ph+uk ke, ng`i-t^eu oi yung kin-vi ke s^im, ki^ang-ki^ang l+uk-l+uk, s`u"n-s`u"n s+u"t-s+u"t l`oi f+uk-chhi`ung su"-ki^en ke ch'u-ng`in, chhiong su"-fung K^i-tuk yit-yong;

`m-h'o t^an-chhiang chhai ng`in khon-t'en ng`i ke s`u" chang 'an-ngi`ong cho, chhiong he oi p^un ng`in f^on-h'i thin-thin; ng`i-t^eu oi chhiong he cho K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in, s`u"n-s^im ch^un-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi yit-yong.
Ng`i-t^eu oi k^am-s^im l+ok-yi chhin cho n`u-ph+uk ke p'un-fun, chhiong he f+uk-su" Ch'u, `m-he f+uk-su" ng`in.
Oi t^i, m`o-lun he n`u-ph+uk ya-he chhu"-y`u-ng`in, Ch'u oi cheu tak-s`a ke h'o h`ang-v`i l`oi po-tap k`i.

Cho ch'u-ng`in ke, ng`i-t^eu ya oi h'o-h'o tui-thai n`u-ph+uk, `m-h'o v^i-hi+ap k`i-t^eu. Oi t^i, ng`i-t^eu l^au ng`i-t^eu ke n`u-ph+uk th`ung-s+uk yit-vi chhai thi^en-t'ang ke Ch'u; K`i yung khiung-yong ke ph^eu-ch'un tui-thai m^i-yit-ke ng`in.
Chui-heu, ng`i-t^eu oi y'i-kho Ch'u l^au k`i ke thai-n`en thai-l+it cho ki^en-khi`ong ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chok Song-ti s'o su ke chhi`on-fu ki^un-ch^ong, p^un ng`i-t^eu kh^i tet-h+et, l`oi t'i-t'ong M^o-k'ui ke k'ui-kie.

Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu `m-he th`ung y^u-hiet y^u-ngiuk ke ng`in tui-khong; he th`ung thi^en-kie ke si`a-l`in, chhiu-he li'a v^u-am su"-thoi ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a, ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, l^au y'i-chhiu-ki^en si`a-ok ke su"-l+it chan-ch^en.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu oi yung Song-ti s'o su ke chhi`on-fu ki^un-ch^ong l`oi ch^ong-phi chhu"-k^a, h'o chhai si`a-ok ke ngit-`e t'i-t'ong th+it-ng`in ke k^ung-kit, piang to-t'ai, kh^i-chhai-chhai.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi kh^i-v'un. Oi yung ch^u"n-l^i cho y^eu-tai ki^e-y^eu, yung chu"n-ngi cho fu-s^im-kiang ch^a-hi^ung,
s`ui-s`u" ch'un-phi si^en-y`ong f`o-ph`in ke fuk-y^im, chhiong chok-t'en h`ai yit-yong.
Oi s`ong-s`ong khi`a-t'en sin-s^im ke t'un-ph`ai, l`oi t'i-t'ong ke si`a-ok-ch'a sa-ko-l`oi yit-chhiet ke f'o-chien.
Oi yung kiu-^en cho th`eu-kh^ui, yung Song-ti ke fa cho Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke p'o-kiam.
Ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung Su"n-L`in ke tai-li^ang s`ui-s`u" kh`i-t'o, khi`u Song-ti p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu; oi k'in-si'ang kh`i-t'o, `m-h'o th`in. Ng`i-t^eu oi s`ong-s`ong vi chung su"n-th`u kh`i-t'o;
ya oi vi ng`ai kh`i-t'o, khi`u Song-ti su ng`ai ch^u"n-tho, p^un ng`ai h'o-t'am kh^oi-choi k'ong-m`in fuk-y^im ke o-pi.
Vi-t'o cho fuk-y^im ke thai-s'u", ng`ai sa p^un-ng`in yung s'o-lien th`o-t'en. Ng`i-t^eu oi khi`u Ch'u su ng`ai y'ung-hi, thai-t'am k'ong yin-t^ong k'ong ke fa.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh^in-oi, ch^ung-s^im su"-fung Ch'u ke hi^ung-thi Th^ui-k^i-k'u, k`i voi chi^ong yit-chhiet ko^an-he ng`ai ke su"-chh`in l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, p^un ng`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai ke chh`in-h`in.
Ng`ai th+it-ph+et phai k`i hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, he oi po ng`i-t^eu t^i ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi ke chh`in-h`in, p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o k'u-li.
Ngien ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ph`in-^on, y`in-oi, l^au sin-s^im p^un ng`i-t^eu kok-vi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi!
Ngien Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en y'un-y'en l^au s'o-y^u kin-oi ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ng`in th`ung-chhai!

K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ph+uk-ng`in P'o-l`o l^au Th`i-m^o-thai si'a sin-'e p^un h+et chhai F^i-l+ip-p'i ke Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in, chhiu-he s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke chung su"n-th`u, pin ke-t^eu kam-tuk l^au chu"p-su".
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Tak-p'ai si'ong-t'o ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai chhiu k'am-chhia ng`ai ke Song-ti,
tak-p'ai vi ng`i thai-k^a kh`i-t'o, ng`ai chhiu m^an-s^im f^on-h'i;
y^in-vi tui th`eu-yit-ngit to li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t chhai chh`on fuk-y^im ke k^ung-chok-song p^ong-chhu ng`ai.

Ng`ai chh^u"m-sin, chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s'u" li'a 'an chi^ang ke k^ung-chok kh^oi-s'u" ke Song-ti, yit-thin voi s'u" li'a-ke k^ung-chok ki-si+uk h^a-hi, chh+u"t-to K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u chai-l`oi ke-ngit tet-t'o v`an-s`u"n.

Ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a s`ong-s`ong chhai ng`ai ke s^im-k^on t^i-poi! Ng`ai si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu he t^ong-y`en ke su"; y^in-vi, m`o-lun he li'a-ha ng`ai chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u, ya-he th`eu-p'ai ng`ai chhu"-chhu" y`u-y`u vi fuk-y^im phien-fu l^au cho-chu"n ke-s`u", ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung y^u-fun chhai Song-ti s'o su p^un ng`ai ke ^en-ti'en.
Song-ti cho-tet vi ng`ai cho-chu"n: Chhiong K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u thung-siak ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai chh^u"m-chh^u"m si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a ke s^im-chh`in ya he khiung-yong!
Ng`ai s'o kh`i-t'o ke chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu ke oi-s^im voi yit-chh+u"t th`ung ch^u"n ke chu"-su"t l^au phan-ton ke n`en-l+it khiung-ha ch'ong-chin,
p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u fap-thu si'en-t'o ke chui-h'o ke. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu voi cho s`un-kiet m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in, chh+u"t-to K^i-tuk chai-l`oi ke-ngit.
Ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at voi chh^ung-m^an th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chang kh'o-n`en kiet ke y`in-ngi ke k'o-ch'u", l`oi y`ung-k^ong chan-m^i Song-ti.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai oi ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai s'o t`u-t'o ke su" f'an-ch'on chhiuk-s`u"n fuk-y^im ke khok-ch'an.
Kiet-k'o, v`ong-ki^ung k'in-v'i-chhui chhi`on-th'i, l^au chhai li'a-vi s'o-y^u kh`i-th^a ke ng`in, l^ung-ch'ung t^i ng`ai he y^in-vi K^i-tuk ke y`en-ku chh^o-k^am ke.
Ng`ai chh^o-k^am, sa p^un thai-phu-fun ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi tui Ch'u kien-k^a y^u sin-s^im, y+et-fat y'ung-k'am chh`on-y`ong Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho, chhi`on m`o ki^ang m'a-ke.
T^ong-y`en, y^u-t^eu ng`in chh`on-y`ong K^i-tuk he chhut-y`i chhit-tu l^au hau-teu ke s^im-l^i, ch'ung-he ya y^u-t^eu he s`u"n-s^im s`u"n-yi ke.
Li'a-t^eu y^in-vi oi-s^im chh`on fuk-y^im ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung t^i, Song-ti k^au-p^un ng`ai ke s'u"-min chhiu-he vi fuk-y^im phien-fu.
Kh`i-th^a ke ng`in chh`on K^i-tuk, thung-k^i m`o s`un-chu"n, he chhut-y`i y^a-s^im; k`i-t^eu si'ong-oi chhai ng`ai chh^o-k^am ke s`u" chen-k^a ng`ai ke thung-kh'u.

Ch'ung-he, li'a y^u m'a-ke ko^an-he n`e? M`o-lun k`i-t^eu ke thung-k^i chh+ok ya-he `m-chh+ok, K^i-tuk h`an-he p^un-ng`in chh`on kh^oi-l`oi. Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhiu chhin f^on-h'i. Ng`ai h`an oi ki-si+uk f^on-h'i;
y^in-vi ng`ai t^i, th^ung-ko ng`i-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o l^au Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke L`in ke p^ong-chhu, ng`ai yit-thin voi tet-t'o su"t-fong.

Ng`ai pet-chhiet hot-mu l^au phan-mong ke chhiu-he: Ng`ai `m-voi kh^ui-fu ng`ai ke chit-ngim, f'an-ch'on s`u"-s`u" khiet-khiet, th+it-ph+et he li'a-ha, voi y^u la-ngiak ke y'ung-hi, m`o-lun s^ang-s'i, yung ng`ai k^ui-ke ng`in l`oi y`ung-k^ong K^i-tuk.
Y^in-vi tui ng`ai l`oi k'ong, ng`ai s^ang he vi-t'o K^i-tuk, s'i chhiu y^u thai fuk-hi!
Ch'ung-he, na-he ng`ai s^ang-h^a-hi n`en k^a cho t^eu y^u li-yit ke k^ung-chok, ng`ai chhiu `m-t^i oi ngi'ong-p^an kiet-thin.
Ng`ai chhai li'ong-n`an ke ch^ung-ki^en: Ng`ai chhin oi l`i-kh^oi li'a su"-ki^en, hi th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha, li'a he chui-h'o ke su";
ch'ung-he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu, ng`ai s^ang-h^a-hi kha yeu-k'in.
Li'a he ng`ai chh^u"m-sin ke, s'o-y^i ng`ai t^i ng`ai voi s^ang-h^a-hi. Ng`ai oi th`ung ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a khiung-ha, p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu chhai sin-ngi'ong-song yu ch'ong-chin yu khoai-l+ok,
'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu chai kien-mien ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi ke f^on-h'i chhiu voi y+et-fat chen-k^a.

Chui chhung-yeu ke, ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at oi h+ap K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im s'o y^eu-khi`u ke. 'An-ngi`ong, m`o-lun ng`ai he chh^in-s^u"n hi khon ng`i-t^eu, ya-he tui ph+et-ng`in th^ang-k'ong ng`i-t^eu ke chh`in-h`in, ng`ai voi t^i ng`i-t^eu y^u khiung-th`ung ke muk-ph^eu, kh^i-to chhai-chhai, th`ung-s^im hi+ap-l+it vi fuk-y^im ke sin-ngi'ong l`oi t'a-piang.

F`am-su" t^u `m-s'u" ki^ang th+it-ng`in ke khi'ung-hak; oi y'ung-k'am, yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi tui k`i-t^eu chu"n-m`in, k`i-t^eu yit-thin voi m+et-m`ong, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin voi tet-kiu, y^in-vi li'a he Song-ti s'o kiet-chh`ai ke.
Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in tet-t'o th+it-ph+et ke ^en-ti'en l`oi su"-fung K^i-tuk, `m t^an-chhiang oi sin k`i, ya oi vi k`i su-kh'u.
Li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu cho-tet th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chok-chan; li'a chan-ch^en ng`i-t^eu su"t khon ng`ai t'a-ko, ya th^ang-k'ong ng`ai h`an chhai li'a-vi ki-si+uk chok-chan.

S'o-y^i, ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi ke s^ang-miang s'u" ng`i-t^eu kha ki^en-khi`ong, k`i ke thung-siak k'u-li ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu l^au Su"n-L`in y^u k^au-th^ung, ng`i-t^eu ya y^u chh`u"-p^i l^au l`in-m'en ke s^im,
ng`i-t^eu chhiu oi y^u khiung-th`ung ke s^im-chu", khiung-yong ke oi-s^im, si^ong-th`ung ke chh`in-k'am, l^au yit-chu" ke si'ong-fap, h'o p^un ng`ai chh^ung-m^an f^on-h'i.
`M-h'o chhu"-s^u" chhu"-li ya-he chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai, f'an-ch'on oi p'i-chh'u" khi^am-p^i, khon ph+et-ng`in p'i chhu"-k^a kha k^o-m`in.
`M-h'o t^an-chhiang ku chhu"-k^a, ya oi ko^an-s^im ph+et-ng`in ke su".
Ng`i-t^eu oi yung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s^im cho h+ok-s+ip ke m`u-fam:
K`i p'un-l`oi chhiu y^u Song-ti ke p'un-chu"t, ch'ung-he `m-su"t lam-yung k`i th`ung Song-ti khiung-yong ke th+it-khi`en.
Ti^en-to, k`i chhu"-ngien piong-thet yit-chhiet, chh'i n`u-ph+uk ke p'un-chu"t. K`i s`ang-cho ng`in, yung ng`in ke h`in-th'i chhut-hien.
K`i chhu"-k^a k^am-ngien p^i-m`i, sun-f+uk to s'i, yu s'i chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang.
S'o-y^i, Song-ti s'u" k`i k^o-s^u"n to chu"-k^o, su-p^un k`i ke chh^eu-ko van-mi`ang ke mi`ang;
s'u" thi^en-t'ang, thi-song l^au thi-t'ai-h^a ke chung-s^en, yit th^ang-t'o Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang, chhi`on-phu chhiu kh'ui l+ok-hi,
chung khi'eu ko-ph+ak k'ong: "Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk he Ch'u!" k^ui y`ung-k^ong p^un ^A-p^a Song-ti.

S'o-y^i, chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u, ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu s`ong-s`ong th^ang-chhi`ung ng`ai; li'a-ha ng`ai m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, ng`i-t^eu h`an-kha oi th^ang ng`ai ke fa. Ng`i-t^eu oi ki^ang-ki^ang l+uk-l+uk, yit-chh+u"t t'a-piang l`oi v`an-s`u"n ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke tet-kiu;
y^in-vi he Song-ti s`ong-s`ong chhai ng`i-t^eu s^im-k^on-t'u yun-h`ang, s'u" ng`i-t^eu yu k^am-ngien yu n`en s+u"t-h`ang K`i m^i-san ke ch'u"-yi.
Ng`i-t^eu m`o-lun cho m'a-ke, `m-h'o m`ai-yen ya-he ch^en-lun,

h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho s`un-kiet s`u"n-s+u"t ke ng`in, chhai li'a f'u-phai, chhui-ok ke su"-thoi ch^ung, cho Song-ti m`o khiet-ti'am ke ch'u"-'ng. Ng`i-t^eu oi chhai su"-ki^en-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung fat-k^ong, chhiong s^en-'e cheu-k^ong thi^en-t'ang,

chi^ong s^ang-miang ke tho chh`on-p^un k`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu na-he 'an-ngi`ong cho, chhai K^i-tuk chai-l`oi ke-ngit, ng`ai chhiu y^u h'o kho^a-khi'eu l'e, y^in-vi li'a voi chu"n-m`in ng`ai m`o ch'eu ngong-lu, m`o cho ngong-se.

Kh'o-n`en ng`ai oi yung chhu"-k^a ke hiet cho chi-chi'u, l`oi l`im chhai ng`i-t^eu yung sin-s^im hien-p^un Song-ti ke chi-v+ut-t'ang. Na-he 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai ya chhin f^on-h'i, th`ung-s`u", ng`ai oi th`ung ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a f^un-hi'ong ng`ai ke f^on-h'i.
Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu ya oi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i, p^un ng`ai ya f^un-hi'ong ng`i-t^eu ke f^on-h'i.
Ng`ai kho Ch'u Y^a-s^u, h^i-mong m`o k'i-ki'u heu, ng`ai cho-tet phai Th`i-m^o-thai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu ke s^eu-sit tai-ch'on-l`oi p^un ng`ai, p^un ng`ai tet-t'o ^on-v'i.
K`i he v`i-yit l^au ng`ai th`ung-s^im, yu chu"n-k^in ko^an-s^im ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in.
Ph+et-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung vi chhu"-k^a ke su" t'a-son, m`o ko^an-s^im Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke su"-chh`in.
Ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu chh^in-chh'u t^i Th`i-m^o-thai ke cho-ng`in: K`i th`ung ng`ai chhiu-chhiong lai-'e l^au ^a-p^a, vi-t'o fuk-y^im, khiung-ha s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok.
T'en ng`ai yit t^i chhu"-k^a ke kiet-khi+uk voi ngi'ong-p^an ke s`u", ng`ai h^i-mong phai-hi khon ng`i-t^eu ke chhiu-he k`i.
Ng`ai kho Ch'u chhu"-sin chhai t'on s`u"-ki^en-nui ya voi chh^in-s^u"n hi khon ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai si'ong, ng`ai yin-k^oi sung ng`ai-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi Y^i-p^a-fut-th`i ch'on ng`i-t^eu ke-vi hi. Ng`i-t^eu si'en-phai k`i l`oi th`ung ng`ai then-s'u, khiung-ha k^ung-chok, khiung-ha chok-chan.
K`i t^ong si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a; s^im-k^on ya chhin `m-ko-yi, y^in-vi t^i ng`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o k`i pot-phiang l'e.
K`i y^u-y'ang su"t pot-phiang, hi'am-hi'am s'i-thet. Ch'ung-he Song-ti l`in-m'en k`i, `m t^an-chhiang l`in-m'en k`i, ya he l`in-m'en ng`ai, p^un ng`ai `m-s'u" t`u-t'o kien-t^o ke y`u-s^ong.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai h`an-kha si'ong-oi k'on-k'in sung k`i ch'on-hi, p^un ng`i-t^eu f^on-f^on h'i-h'i th`ung k`i chhi-s+ip; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai ke y`u-s^ong ya voi k'am-s'eu.
Ng`i-t^eu oi chhai Ch'u ke t^i-poi f^on-f^on h'i-h'i chiap-thai k`i. Ng`i-t^eu oi ch^un-chhung chhiong k`i 'an-ngi`ong ke ng`in;
y^in-vi k`i vi-t'o K^i-tuk ke k^ung-chok mo s^ang-miang ke ng`ui-hi'am, hi'am-hi'am s'i-thet, vi-t'o oi p'u-chiuk ng`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu f+uk-su" ng`ai ke s'o-chhai.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ch'ung-k'ong: Ng`i-t^eu oi y^in-vi th`ung Ch'u kiet-li`en l`oi f^on-h'i! Ng`ai chi^ong li'a-t^eu fa chai si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu, tui ng`ai he m`o m`a-f`an, tui ng`i-t^eu ya he th'o-tong.
Ng`i-t^eu oi th`i-f`ong ke-t^eu chok-ok ke ng`in, ke-t^eu f`u-khi`un ki'eu-t'ong, chhiu-he ke-t^eu ki^en-chh`u" oi kot chhu"-k^a s^u"n-th'i ke ng`in.

Kh`i-s+u"t, chiap-su ch^u"n kot-l^i ke, `m-he k`i-t^eu, he ng`ai-t^eu; y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu he th^ung-ko Song-ti ke L`in l`oi kin-pai, s'o kho^a-khi'eu ke he K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u, `m-he y'i-kho ngoi-p'eu ke l^i-ng`i.
Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai ya cho-tet kho ngoi-p'eu ke l^i-ng`i. Na-he y^u-ng`in l'au-t'o k`i cho-tet kho ngoi-p'eu ke l^i-ng`i, ng`ai h`an-kha cho-tet 'an-ngi`ong cho.

Ng`ai chhut-se thi-pat-ngit chhiu su kot-l^i. Ng`ai s^en-l`oi chhiu he Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, s+uk Phien-ng^a-m'en k^i-chh+uk, he hiet-th'ung s`un-chu"n ke H^i-pak-l`oi-ng`in. Tui ch^un-s'u Y`u-thai-kau kau-k^ui li'a-ti'am l`oi k'ong, ng`ai he s+uk Fap-li-soi-phai;
tui ngi+et-s^im l`oi k'ong, ng`ai su"t pet-hoi kau-fi; tui ch^un-s'u fap-l+it chhiu son he ngi l`oi k'ong, ng`ai m`o m'a-ke h'o p^un-ng`in chit-phi ke.
Ch'ung-he, th`eu-p'ai ng`ai ngin-v`i y^u li-yit ke yit-chhiet, li'a-ha vi-t'o K^i-tuk ke y`en-ku, ng`ai chhi`on-phu khon-cho he s'un-hoi.

`M t^an-chhiang 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai kien chi^ong van-su" l^ung-ch'ung khon-cho s'un-hoi, y^in-vi ng`ai khon ngin-su"t ng`ai ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u cho chui p'o-kui ke. S'o-y^i, ng`ai chi^ong yit-chhiet ch'un-cho l'a-sap fit-thet, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o K^i-tuk,

v`an-chhi`on th`ung k`i kiet-li`en. Ng`ai s'o-y^u ke `m-he chhu"-k^a tui s'u fap-l+it l`oi tet-t'o ke ngi, he th^ung-ko sin K^i-tuk s'o li^ang-su ke ngi; li'a-ke ngi he ph`in sin-s^im tui Song-ti l`oi li^ang-su ke.
Ng`ai yit-chhiet s'o phan-mong ke chhiu-he ngin-su"t K^i-tuk, th'i-ngiam k`i f+uk-f+at ke n`en-l+it, f^un-t^am k`i ke kh'u-nan, h'au-fap k`i ke s'i,
h^i-mong tui 'an-ngi`ong ng`ai chhu"-k^a ya voi tui s'i f+uk-f+at.

Li'a `m-he k'ong ng`ai y'i-k^in s`u"n-k^ung, ya-he y'i-k^in v`an-chhi`on l'e. Ng`ai ki-si+uk k'in ch'eu, oi tet-t'o ke chi'ong-s'ong; kh`i-s+u"t, vi-t'o oi p^un ng`ai th+at-s`u"n li'a-ke muk-ph^eu, K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in si^en s'u" ng`ai k^ui-s+uk k`i.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai `m-k'am k'ong ng`ai y'i-k^in tet-t'o ke chi'ong-s'ong; ng`ai ch'u"-y^u ch^on-s^im yit-khien su": Chhiu-he `m ki-tet heu-poi, chhi`on-l+it ch^ui-khi`u th`eu-chhi`en ke su".

Ng`ai hiong muk-ph^eu chh+u"t-chh+u"t k'in ch'eu, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong; li'a chi'ong-s'ong chhiu-he s+uk-thi^en ke s^in s^ang-miang, he Song-ti th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u f^u-seu ng`ai hi li^ang-su ke.

S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s'o-y^u l`in-sin s`u"n-s+uk ke ng`in, chhi`on-phu oi y^u li'a-ch'ung ke s^im-chu"; na-he ng`i-t^eu y^u ph+et-yong ke khon-fap, Song-ti ya voi chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u ch'u"-su" ng`i-t^eu.
M`o-lun ngi'ong-p^an, ng`ai-t^eu oi cheu ng`ai-t^eu yit-t'an s'o ch^un-s'u ke k^ui-k'i hiong-chhi`en h`ang.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi ki-si+uk h'au-fap ng`ai. Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in vi ng`i-t^eu cho p'ong-yong; ng`i-t^eu oi ngin-ch^u"n h+ok ke-t^eu h'au-fap ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in.
Ng`ai y'i-k^in khien ng`i-t^eu h'o-t^o p'ai, li'a-ha ng`ai li`u muk-chu"p chai yit-p'ai khien-va ng`i-t^eu: Y^u-t^eu ng`in ke h`ang-v`i s'u" k`i-t^eu s`ang-cho K^i-tuk s+u"p-su"-ka ke s`u-th+it.

K`i-t^eu ke kiet-khi+uk he m+et-m`ong, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke s`u"n chhiu-he chhu"-k^a ke t'u-s'u". K`i-t^eu n^a chhu"-k^a kien-seu ke su" l`oi kho^a-khi'eu, s'o si'ong ke m`o yit-hong `m-he su"-ki^en ke su".
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu he thi^en-t'ang ke k^ung-m`in; ng`ai-t^eu yit-s^im t'en-heu ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u, chhiu-he Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk tui thi^en-t'ang kong-l`im.
K`i oi yung s'u" van-y^u k^ui-f+uk k`i ke n`en-l+it, l`oi k'oi-pien ng`ai-t^eu ngi^on-ngi+ok voi s'i ke s^u"n-th'i, p^un ng`ai-t^eu th`ung k`i khiung-yong, y^u y`ung-k^ong ke s^u"n-th'i.
Ng`ai s'o chh^in-oi, s'o si'ong-ngiam ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu he ng`ai ke f^on-h'i, he ng`ai ke mi^en-li`u! Ng`ai s'o-siak ke ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi kho Ch'u kh^i-v'un.
Y^u-^a-thi+ap l^au S`un-t^u-k^i ^a, ng`ai khi'en-khi`u ng`i-t^eu oi th`ung-s^im, chhiu-chhiong sin Ch'u ke ch'i-moi.

Ng`ai ch^ung-s+u"t ke th`ung-ph^an ^a, ng`ai ya khi`u ng`i p^ong-chhu k`i li'ong-s`a; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chhai fuk-y^im ke k^ung-chok-song th`ung ng`ai, Kiet-li-mi^en, l^au kh`i-th^a ke th`ung-k^ung su"t khiung-ha l`o-kh'u; li'a-t^eu ng`in ke mi`ang chhi`on-phu y'i-k^in ki chhai Song-ti ke s^ang-miang-chhak.
Ng`i-t^eu oi y^in-vi th`ung Ch'u kiet-li`en l`oi s`ong-s`ong f^on-h'i. Ng`ai chai k'ong, ng`i-t^eu oi f^on-h'i!
Tui s'o-y^u ke ng`in, ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung oi hi'en-chhut khi^am-p^i. Ch'u oi l`oi l'e.
Yin-t^ong chhi`on m`o koa-li; f`am-su" oi kh`i-t'o, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke l^au Song-ti k'ong, yung k'am-chhia ke s^im l`oi kh`i-khi`u.
Song-ti s'o su, ke chh^eu-ko ng`in s'o si'ong-siong ke ph`in-^on, voi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u p'o-s'u ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-f`ai yi-ngiam.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu oi s`u"-s`ong li`u-yi ke-t^eu h'o tet-hen l^au kh^am-tet chh^u"n-chan ke su". Yit-chhiet ch^u"n-s+u"t, k^o-kui, k^ung-chu"n, s`un-kiet, tet-ng`in-siak l^au k^ong-y`ung ke su", ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu oi khon-chh^ung.

Ng`i-t^eu tui ng`ai s'o h+ok-s+ip, s'o li^ang-su, ya-he s'o th^ang-t'o, s'o khon-t'o ke ngi`en-h`ang k'i-ch'u", l^ung-ch'ung oi s+u"t-h`ang chhut-l`oi. Su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti chhiu voi l^au ng`i-t^eu th`ung-chhai.

Ng`ai chhai Ch'u ke s^ang-miang t^i-poi kh+it f^on-h'i! Y^in-vi ko 'an-ki'u y^i-heu, li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu yu ki^ung-kip ng`ai. Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t ko^an-s^im ng`ai, ch'ung-he m`o k^i-fi h'o p'eu-su" thin-thin.
Ng`ai 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, `m-he y^in-vi ng`ai khiet-s'eu m'a-ke; ng`ai y'i-k^in h+ok-voi m^an-chiuk hien-kh'ong.

Ng`ai t^i ngi'ong-p^an ko khi`ung-kh'u ke ngit-`e, ya t^i ngi'ong-p^an ko fu-chiuk ke s^en-f+at. Ng`ai y'i-k^in tet-t'o pi-kiet, s`ui-s`u" s`ui-thi, he p'au he k^i, f^ung-fu khiet-f+at, ng`ai l^ung-ch'ung chhin chhu"-chhai.
Ng`ai kho ke su-p^un ng`ai n`en-l+it ke, f`am-su" t^u n`en cho.
Ch'ung-he, ng`ai chhai khun-n`an ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu l`oi p^ong-chhu ng`ai, s+u"t-chhai he h'o su".

Ng`i-t^eu F^i-l+ip-p'i-ng`in t^i, chhai ng`ai chh`on fuk-y^im ke chh^u-kh`i, chhiu-he ng`ai l`i-kh^oi M^a-kh`i-tun ke s`u"-chiet, chhai s^u-ch^u" ke su"-song, chh`u-li'au ng`i-t^eu y^i-ngoi, pin m`o ph+et ke kau-fi l^au ng`ai f^un-t^am.
Li`en chhai Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu yit-chai phai-ng`in l`oi ki^ung-kip ng`ai ke s^i-yeu.
Ng`ai pin m`o th^am ng`i-t^eu ke l^i-v+ut; ng`ai s'o h^i-mong ke chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu chhon k^a t^eu-'e, h'o ki chhai ng`i-t^eu ke chong-hong.

Li'a chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu sung p^un ng`ai yit-chhiet l^i-v+ut ke s^u-k'i; ng`i-t^eu s'o sung ke chh^eu-ko ng`ai s'o s^i-yeu ke. Ng`ai y'i-k^in chh^ung-chiuk, y^in-vi ng`ai tui Y^i-p^a-fut-th`i chiap-su ng`i-t^eu s'o sung ke l^i-v+ut. K`i-t^eu chhiong chhin h'o phi ke hi^ong-mi, he Song-ti s'o chiap-n+ap, s'o f^on-h'i ke chi-v+ut.
Ng`ai ke Song-ti voi cheu K`i chhai K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u t^i-poi v'i-thai ke f^ung-su"n, chi^ong ng`i-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke yit-chhiet su-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ngien y`ung-yeu k^ui-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti, su"-su" v`u-khi`ung! ^A-m'en.
Chhi'ang thoi ng`ai tui kok-vi s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke su"n-th`u chhi'ang-^on. Th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
S'o-y^u ke su"n-th`u, th+it-ph+et he f`ong-ki^ung-t'u ke-t^eu ng`in, chhi`on-phu tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Ngien Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en s`ong chhai ng`i-t^eu s^im-nui!
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai fung Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai l^au Th`i-m^o-thai hi^ung-thi

si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai K^o-l`o-s^i ke su"n-th`u, chhiu-he chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi ch^ung-s^im ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi. Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Vi ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu s`ong-s`ong k'am-chhia Song-ti, chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^A-p^a;
y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu th^ang-k'ong ng`i-t^eu tui K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke sin-s^im, l^au tui s'o-y^u su"n-th`u ke oi-s^im.

Yit kh^oi-s'u", fuk-y^im ke ch^u"n-tho chh`on-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu th^ang-t'o li'a fuk-y^im s'o tai-l`oi ke phan-mong. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im l^au oi-s^im he yung vi ng`i-t^eu p'o-chh`un chhai thi^en-t'ang ke phan-mong cho k^in-k'i ke.

Li'a fuk-y^im `m t^an-chhiang chh`on-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, ya chh`on-phien chhi`on su"-kie, yit-chh+u"t ch'ong-thai pin kiet k'o-ch'u", chhiu-chhiong t^ong-ngit ng`i-t^eu th^ang-t'o ya chu"n-k^in t^i Song-ti ^en-ti'en ke s`u", ch'ong-thai pin kiet k'o-ch'u" yit-yong.
Ng`i-t^eu he tui ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh^in-oi ke th`ung-k^ung Y^i-p^a-fut h+ok-t'o li'a fuk-y^im; k`i thoi ng`ai-t^eu cho K^i-tuk ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in.
Y^u-ko^an Su"n-L`in su-p^un ng`i-t^eu oi-s^im ke s^eu-sit chhiu-he k`i l^au ng`ai-t^eu k'ong ke.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, chhu"-chhi`ung th^ang-t'o ko^an-he ng`i-t^eu ke s^eu-sit, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu vi ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o, `m-su"t th`in. Ng`ai-t^eu khi`u Song-ti su ng`i-t^eu kok-yong s+uk-l`in ke chu"-fi l^au chh^ung-m`in, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu chh^ung-f^un li'au-ki'e K`i ke ch'u"-yi.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at chhiu voi h+ap Ch'u ke y^eu-khi`u, f`am-su" p^un k`i f^on-h'i. Th`ung-s`u", ng`i-t^eu ke s^en-f+at voi kiet kok-ch'ung m^i-san ke k'o-ch'u", ng`i-t^eu tui Song-ti ke ngin-su"t ya voi chen-k^a.
Ngien ng`i-t^eu tui K`i y`ung-yeu ke khi`en-n`en tet-t'o l+it-liong, s`ang-cho ki^en-khi`ong ke ng`in, y^u nai-s^im h'o ngi^un-su van-hong su". Ng`i-t^eu ya oi yung f^on-h'i ke s^im
k'am-chhia thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a, y^in-vi K`i p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u ch^u"-kiet th`ung chung su"n-th`u khiung-ha hi'ong-su K`i chhai k^ong-m`in ke koet s'o p'o-li`u ke fuk-hi.
K`i kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i v^u-am ke khi`en-su", p^un ng`ai-t^eu s^en-f+at chhai K`i s'o-siak ke Lai-'e ke koet t^i-poi.
Th^ung-ko K`i s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o kiu-s+uk, chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
K^i-tuk he ke khon-`m-t'o ke Song-ti ke h`in-siong, he chh^eu-ko van-y^u ke ch'ong-ch'u".

Th^ung-ko k`i, Song-ti chh'ong-chho thi^en-thi van-v+ut, m`o-lun he khon-tet-t'o ke ya-he khon-`m-t'o ke, p^au-h`am l`in-kie ke-t^eu chhai-vi-ch'a, th'ung-chhu"-ch'a, chu"p-chu"n-ch'a, l^au ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a. Th^ung-ko k`i, ya vi-t'o k`i, Song-ti chh'ong-chho chhi`on y'i-chhiu.
K^i-tuk chhai van-y^u ch^u" si^en; van-y^u ya he kho k`i f`o-h`ai l`oi li`en-kiet.

K`i he kau-fi ke th`eu, chhiu-he ki^a s^u"n-th'i ke th`eu; k`i he s^in s^ang-miang ke ngi`en-th`eu. K`i he ch'ong-ch'u", chui-si^en tui s'i f+uk-f+at, h'o p^un k`i chhai van-y^u t'ang-k^o chh^o thai-vi.
Song-ti f^on-h'i s'u" K`i yit-chhiet ke f^ung-su"n h+et chhai K`i ke Lai-'e t^i-poi.

Th^ung-ko Lai-'e, Song-ti kiet-yi p^un chhi`on y'i-chhiu l^au K`i chhu"-k^a chai f`o-h'o. Song-ti th^ung-ko K`i ke Lai-'e chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang li`u-hiet to s'i l`oi s`u"n-chhiu f`o-ph`in, p^un thi^en-thi van-v+ut chh`ung-s^in k^ui-s+uk K`i.
Th`eu-p'ai, y^in-vi ngi`en-h`ang s^u"-si'ong ke si`a-ok, ng`i-t^eu y'en-l`i Song-ti, cho K`i ke s`u-th+it.
Li'a-ha, th^ung-ko K`i ke Lai-'e ngiuk-th'i ke s'i, Song-ti p^un ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho K`i ke ph`en-y^u, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai K`i mien-chhi`en cho su"n-kiet, m`o khiet-ti'am, m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in.

Ng`i-t^eu s'o-oi cho ke, chhiu-he ki^en-chh`u" sin-ngi'ong, kh^i chhai ki^en-ku ke k^i-chh'u t'ang-k^o; `m-h'o piong-thet t^ong-chh^u li^ang-su fuk-y^im ke s`u" s'o tet-t'o ke phan-mong. Li'a-ha, li'a fuk-y^im y'i-k^in chh`on-phien chhi`on su"-kie; ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chhiu-he li'a fuk-y^im ke ph+uk-ng`in.

Ng`ai li'a-ha k'am-kok vi ng`i-t^eu su-kh'u he chhin khoai-l+ok ke su"; y^in-vi ng`ai ngiuk-th'i su-kh'u, he oi p'u-m^an K^i-tuk vi chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i --- chhiu-he vi k`i ke kau-fi, s'o ngi^un-su ch'ung-he m`ang v`an-s`u"n ke kh'u-nan.

Vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke li-yit, Song-ti chi^ong li'a-ke chu"t-vu k^au-p^un ng`ai, ham ng`ai cho kau-fi ke ph+uk-ng`in. Li'a chu"t-vu he oi ng`ai chi^ong Song-ti ke tho-l^i chh`on-y`ong to chhin y`en-m^an;
li'a tho-l^i chhiu-he K`i su"-su" thoi-thoi tui ng`in-lui y'un-chh`ong ke o-pi; li'a o-pi li'a-ha y'i-k^in tui K`i ke chung su"n-th`u hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi.

Song-ti ke kie-v+ak he oi k`i-t^eu t^i, li'a f^ung-su"n yu y`ung-yeu ke o-pi he oi p^un chhi`on ng`in-lui ke. Li'a o-pi chhiu-he: K^i-tuk chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang t^i-poi, li'a chhiu-he k'ong, ng`i-t^eu voi hi'ong-su Song-ti ke y`ung-yeu.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu tui s'o-y^u ke ng`in chh`on-y`ong K^i-tuk, yung kok-yong ke chu"-fi khien thai-k^a, k^au thai-k^a, vi-t'o oi p^un tak-s`a s`ang-cho s`u"n-s+uk ke K^i-tuk-th`u, tai k`i-t^eu to Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en.
Vi-t'o th+at-s`u"n li'a-ke muk-tit, ng`ai yung K^i-tuk su-p^un ng`ai ke thai n`en-l+it, m`o hi`am l`o-kh'u, chhin-l+it k^ung-chok.
Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i-t^eu t^i, vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu l^au L'o-t'i-k^a-ng`in, pin chhin-t^o ng`ai h`an-m`ang kien-ko mien ke ng`in, ng`ai chhin-s^im chhin-l+it k^ung-chok.

Ng`ai ke muk-tit he oi thai-k^a tet-t'o k'u-li, yung oi-s^im l`oi th`on-kiet, m^an-y^u tui ch^u"n-s+u"t ke li'au-ki'e s'o tai-l`oi ke sin-s^im, h'o ngin-su"t Song-ti ke o-pi; li'a o-pi chhiu-he K^i-tuk p'un-s^u"n.
Yit-chhiet chu"-fi l^au chu"-su"t ke p'o-pi chhi`on-phu khong chhai k`i t^i-poi.
Ng`ai k'ong li'a-t^eu fa, mi^en-tet y^u-ng`in yung f^a-ngi`en kh'au-ng^i l`oi m`i-f+et ng`i-t^eu.

S^ui-y`en ng`ai ke s^u"n-th'i m`o chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, ch'ung-he ng`ai ke s^im th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha. Ng`ai f^i-s`ong f^on-h'i khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu f`am-su" cheu chu"t-si, tui K^i-tuk ke sin-ngi'ong ya chhin ki^en-thin.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu chiap-su K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u cho Ch'u, ng`i-t^eu oi th`ung k`i li`en-kiet l`oi h`ang su",
chhai k`i t^i-poi tang-k^in, kien-chho, ki^en-ku sin-s^im; li'a he ng`i-t^eu s'o li^ang-su ke kau-hiun. H`an-y^u, ng`i-t^eu ya oi m^an-s^im k'am-chhia!

Ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi, `m-h'o p^un m'a-ng`in yung h^i-kh^ung l^au kh^i-phien ke chat-h+ok s'o hot-chu". Y^in-vi ke-ch'ung h+ok-l^i he cheu ng`in ke chh`on-th'ung; k`i ke k^in-ngi`en he y'i-chhiu-ki^en s'o-vi s^en-siuk ke s`u"n-l`in, `m-he K^i-tuk.
Y^in-vi Song-ti s`u"n-sin ke f^ung-su"n s`ang-cho h`in-th'i h+et chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi,
'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk kiet-li`en chhiu tet-t'o f^ung-su"n ke s^ang-miang. K`i he th`eu, chh^eu-ko yit-chhiet l`in-kie ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a l^au ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a.
Ng`i-t^eu chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi y'i-k^in su kot-l^i; li'a kot-l^i `m-he ng`in ke s'u s'o-h`ang ke, he K^i-tuk chh`u-thet ng`i-t^eu ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk s'o v`an-s`u"n ke kot-l^i.

Y^in-vi, ng`i-t^eu li^ang s'e-l^i ke s`u", chhiu-he th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha m`ai-chong; th`ung-s`u", y^in-vi Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" K^i-tuk tui s'i f+uk-f+at, ng`i-t^eu th^ung-ko sin Song-ti ke thai-n`en ya th`ung k`i khiung-ha f+uk-f+at l'e.

Th`eu-p'ai, ng`i-t^eu s+uk-l`in ke s^ang-miang he s'i ke, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y^u chhui, yu y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he m`o M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in. Ch'ung-he, Song-ti p^un ng`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha chai s^ang-ko-l`oi. K`i sa-mi^en ng`ai-t^eu yit-chhiet ke ko-fam,
chh'i-s^eu ke oi kh'ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu, fap-l+it-song thak-t'en ng`ai-t^eu ke fam-chhui ki-li+uk, chi^ong k`i t^ang chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang fi-thet.

Chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang, K^i-tuk chh^in-s^u"n chh`u-thet ke-t^eu l`in-kie ke chu"p-chu"n-ch'a l^au ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a ke khi`en-su", chi^ong k`i-t^eu k^ung-kh^oi su"-chung, chhiong p^un-ng`in chok-l`oi ke th+it-ng`in chhai su"n-li ke y`u-h`ang ch^u"-ch^ung yit-yong.
S'o-y^i, `m-h'o p^un ng`in chhai y'im-s+u"t, chiet-kh`i, chh^u-yit, ya-he ^On-sit-ngit li'a-t^eu mun-th`i t'ang-k^o yung k^ui-chet l`oi thak-t'en ng`i-t^eu.
Li'a yit-chhiet put-ko he vi-l`oi su"-chh`in ke y'ang thin-thin; K^i-tuk chang he p'un-th'i.

`M-h'o p^un ke-t^eu ki^en-chh`u" p'eu-mien khi^am-p^i l^au pai thi^en-s'u" ke ng`in hoi-t'o, s'u" ng`i-t^eu su"t-thet tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong ke k^i-fi. K`i-t^eu chhu"-kho^a y^u th+it-ph+et ke yi-siong, chhiu cheu chhu"-k^a ke nong-si'ong, m`o-y`en m`o-ku l`oi chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai,

chhiet-th^on k`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk ke ko^an-he. K^i-tuk chhiu-he s^u"n-th'i ke th`eu; k`i s'u" chhi`on-s^u"n tet-t'o ch^u"-y^ong, ko^an-chiet l^au k^in-kut fu-si^ong li`en-l+ok, cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi l`oi ch'ong-thai.

Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha s'i, thot-l`i ke-t^eu s^en-siuk ke s`u"n-l`in, ng`i-t^eu cho-m'a-ke h`an th`ung su"-si+uk ke ng`in khiung-yong 'an-ngi`ong s^en-f+at, ki-si+uk s'u ke-t^eu "`M-h'o th^ung, `m-h'o s`ong, `m-h'o mi^a" ke kim-khi n`e?
Ke-t^eu kim-khi s'o k'ong-t'o ke t^ung-s^i yit s'u"-yung chhiu phai-fai l'e; y^in-vi kim-khi he tui ng`in ke k^ui-chet l^au kau-hiun l`oi ke.

'An-ngi`ong khon h'i-l`oi, cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" kin-pai, p'eu-mien khi^am-p^i, l^au ngiuk-s^u"n ke kh'u-si^u t'en-t'en, t^ong-chhiong chhin-y^u chu"-fi; kh`i-s+u"t, tui chu"-f+uk ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk he m`o m'a-ke h'au-k'o ke.
Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha f+uk-f+at, ng`i-t^eu chhiu thin-chh+ok oi ch^ui-khi`u thi^en-t'ang ke su"; chhai ke-vi, K^i-tuk chh^o chhai Song-ti chu"n-phi'en ke p'o-chho-song.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ch^on-s^im thi^en-t'ang ke su", `m-he thi-song ke su".
Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in th`ung K^i-tuk khiung-ha s'i, ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang th`ung k`i khiung-ha khong chhai Song-ti ke t^i-poi.
K^i-tuk he ng`i-t^eu ke ch^u"n s^ang-miang; k`i hi'en-hien ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu ya oi th`ung k`i khiung-ha hi'en-hien, f^un-hi'ong k`i ke y`ung-yeu.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi chhu"-s'i chhai ng`i-t^eu s^u"n-song chok-koai ke ke-t^eu s+uk-su" ke y+uk-mong, chhiong y`im-lon, v^u-ve, si`a-chh`in, set-y+uk, l^au th^am-s^im (th^am-s^im he yit-ch'ung ke pai ngi'eu-siong).
Y^in-vi li'a-t^eu su", Song-ti ke fat-khi'en voi l`im-to ke-t^eu phoi-ngi+ak K`i ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai ya su"t sun li'a-t^eu y+uk-mong hi s^en-f+at, p^un k`i-t^eu khi^en-t'en-ch'eu.
Ch'ung-he li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu oi hi-chhi+et li'a yit-chhiet ke su": `M-h'o chai y^u pot-at, fat-khi'en, l^au yen-hen; ya cho-`m-tet k'ong f'i-pong l^au l'a-sap ke fa.
