`M-h'o k'ong f^a-li^au phien-l`oi phien-hi, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in thot-thet khiu-ng`in l^au khiu-ng`in ke s+ip-koan,
chok-s^ong s^in-ng`in. Li'a s^in-ng`in he p^un chh'ong-chho k`i ke Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke h`in-siong k'in von-s^in, l`oi v`an-chhi`on ngin-su"t Song-ti.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, H^i-li+ap-ng`in l^au Y`u-thai-ng`in chhiu m`o f^un-ph+et; ya m`o f^un m'a-ke y^u su-kot-l^i ke, m`o su-kot-l^i ke, y^a-m`an ke, m`ang kh^oi-fa ke, cho n`u-li ke, ya-he chhu"-y`u-ng`in t'en-t'en. Ch'ung-k'ong, K^i-tuk chhiu-he yit-chhiet, K^i-tuk h+et chhai thai-k^a ke t^i-poi.
Song-ti siak ng`i-t^eu, ki'en-si'en ng`i-t^eu cho K`i su"n-kiet ke ch'u"-m`in. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi yung l`in-m'en, chh`u"-oi, khi^am-p^i, v^un-y`u, l^au ngi^un-nai cho-s^am l`oi chok.
Y^u f^un-ch^en ke s`u", oi p'i-chh'u" p^au-y`ung, fu-si^ong ngi`en-liong. Ch'u ngi'ong-p^an sa-mi^en ng`i-t^eu, ng`i-t^eu ya oi ngi'ong-p^an sa-mi^en ph+et-ng`in.
Li'a yit-chhiet tet-hen y^i-ngoi, h`an-oi chok-s^ong oi-s^im; y^in-vi s'u" chhi`on-phu li`en-kiet s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on ke chhiu-he oi-s^im.

K^i-tuk s'o-su ke f`o-ph`in oi chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-nui cho ch'u; vi-t'o s'u" ng`i-t^eu y^u li'a-ke f`o-ph`in, Song-ti ki'en-si'en ng`i-t^eu, s'u" ng`i-t^eu kap-cho yit-th'i. H`an-y^u, ng`i-t^eu oi s^im-chh`un k'am-chhia.

Ng`i-t^eu oi p^un K^i-tuk ke ch^u"n-tho f^ung-f^ung fu-fu h+et chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-nui. Oi yung kok-yong ke chu"-fi fu-si^ong kau-th^o l^au khien-va, yung s^u"-phi^en, su"n-s^u", l^au s+uk-l`in ke s^u"-k^o, tui s^im-t'ai fat-chhut k'am-chhia ke s^ang l`oi siung-chan Song-ti.
M`o-lun cho m'a-ke, k'ong m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung oi fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang, th^ung-ko k`i k'am-chhia ^A-p^a Song-ti.
Cho p^u-ngi`ong ke, ng`i-t^eu oi sun-f+uk l'o-k^ung; y^in-vi li'a he K^i-tuk-th`u ke p'un-fun.
Cho l'o-k^ung ke, ng`i-t^eu oi siak p^u-ngi`ong, `m-h'o kh'u-th+uk k`i-t^eu.
Cho ch'u"-'ng ke, ng`i-t^eu oi f`am-su" th^ang-chhi`ung y`a-^oi; y^in-vi li'a he Ch'u s'o f^on-h'i ke.
Cho ^a-p^a ke, `m-h'o chhiuk-s^ong ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-'ng, mi^en-tet k`i-t^eu f^oi-s^im su"t-chu".

Cho n`u-ph+uk ke, ng`i-t^eu oi f`am-su" th^ang-chhi`ung su"-ki^en ke ch'u-ng`in. `M-he oi cho p^un ch'u-ng`in khon, l`oi tet-t'o k`i-t^eu ke f^on-h'i; oi y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he kin-vi Ch'u ke ng`in, ch^u"n-s^im ch^u"n-yi l`oi cho.
M`o-lun cho m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu oi ch^on-s^im hi cho, chhiong he vi Ch'u cho, `m-he vi ng`in cho.
Oi t^i, ng`i-t^eu voi tet-t'o Ch'u ke chi'ong-s'ong, chhiu-he k`i vi k`i ke ch'u"-m`in s'o p'o-chh`un ke. Ng`i-t^eu f+uk-su" ke he Ch'u K^i-tuk.
Cho f'ai-su" ke, m`o-lun k`i he m'a-ng`in, yit-thin voi su po-yin, y^in-vi Song-ti he yung khiung-yong ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi tui-thai m^i-yit-ke ng`in.
Cho ch'u-ng`in ke, ng`i-t^eu oi k^ung-ph`in h+ap-l^i l`oi tui-thai n`u-ph+uk; oi t^i, ng`i-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ya y^u yit-vi Ch'u.
Ng`i-t^eu oi pet-chhiet kh`i-t'o, kh`i-t'o ke s`u" oi k'in-si'ang, ya oi chh`un k'am-chhia ke s^im.
Th`ung-s`u", ya chhi'ang vi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o, khi`u Song-ti vi ng`ai-t^eu kh^oi chh`on fuk-y^im ke m`un, l`oi k'ong-lun K^i-tuk ke o-pi. Li'a chhiu-he ng`ai chh^o-k^am ke ngi`en-y^in.
Chhi'ang vi ng`ai kh`i-t'o, p^un ng`ai chhin chit-ngim chi^ong li'a-ke o-pi k'ong-to chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u.
Th`ung `m-he K^i-tuk-th`u ke ng`in v^ong-l`oi ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu oi p'a-ak k^i-fi, h'o-h'o yung ng`i-t^eu ke chu"-fi.
K'ong-fa oi s`ong-s`ong f`o-hi, chhiong yung y`am thi`au-mi, oi t^i ngi'ong-p^an f`i-tap m^i-yit-ke ng`in s'o th`i-chhut ke mun-th`i.

Ng`ai chhai li'a-vi ke yit-chhiet chh`in-h`in, ng`ai-t^eu chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi Th^ui-k^i-k'u voi si`ong-se l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong. K`i he yit-ke ch^ung-s^im ke k^ung-ng`in, th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha cho Ch'u ke ph+uk-ng`in.
Ng`ai th+it-ph+et phai k`i hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, po-ko ng`ai-t^eu li'a-vi ke chh`in-h`in, h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o k'u-li.

Th`ung k`i khiung-ha hi ke y^u yit-ke ch^ung-s^im yu chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ^A-n`i-s^i-m`eu; k`i he ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke ng`in. K`i li'ong-s`a voi chi^ong li'a-vi yit-chhiet ke su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong.

Th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chh^o-k^am ke ^A-l^i-th+at-k'u tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. P^a-n^a-p^a ke p'eu-l'o-th^ai M^a-kh'o ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. (Ko^an-he M^a-kh'o, ng`ai su"t f^un-fu, k`i na-he hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi, oi chiap-thai k`i.)

Phi^en-mi`ang Y`u-su"-t^u ke Y^a-su ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. Y`u-thai-ng`in ke sin-th`u t^ong-ch^ung, ch'u"-y^u k`i s^am-s`a vi Song-ti ke koet l^au ng`ai th`ung-k^ung, tui ng`ai y^u chhin-thai ke ^on-v'i.

Tui ng`i-t^eu ke-vi l`oi ke Y^i-p^a-fut hiong ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on; k`i ya he K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ph+uk-ng`in. K`i s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu pet-chhiet kh`i-t'o, khi`u Song-ti p^un ng`i-t^eu sin-s^im ki^en-thin, cho s`u"n-s+uk ke K^i-tuk-th`u, v`an-chhi`on sun-f+uk K`i ke ch'u"-yi.
K`i vi ng`i-t^eu, ya vi-t'o L'o-t'i-k^a l^au H^i-l^a-p^o-l^i ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi s^in-kh'u cho-k^ung; li'a he ng`ai cho-tet chu"n-m`in ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh^in-oi ke Lu-k^a y^i-s^en l^au T'i-m^a li'ong-s`a ya hiong ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Chhi'ang thoi ng`ai-t^eu tui L'o-t'i-k^a ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, l^au N`en-fap, h`an-y^u chhai k`i vuk-h^a ke kau-fi chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`i-t^eu si^en-th+uk li'a-f^ung sin-'e heu, chhi'ang ch'on-k^au p^un L'o-t'i-k^a kau-fi si^en-th+uk; th`ung-s`u", ng`i-t^eu ya oi th+uk tui L'o-t'i-k^a kau-fi ch'on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke sin-'e.
Oi l^au ^A-k^i-pu k'ong: "Ng`i s'o li^ang-su ke f+uk-su" Ch'u ke chu"t-vu yit-thin oi chhin-l+it v`an-s`u"n."
Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chh^in-pit tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. Ng`i-t^eu oi ki-tet ng`ai he tai-t'en s'o-lien ke! Ngien Song-ti su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!

Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai th`ung S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai si'a sin-'e p^un Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a kau-fi, chhiu-he s+uk ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke chung sin-th`u. Ngien ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a tet-t'o ^en-ti'en l^au ph`in-^on!
Ng`ai-t^eu yit-chh+u"t vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a k'am-chhia Song-ti, chhai kh`i-t'o ch^ung s`ong-s`ong th`i-h'i ng`i-t^eu,

chhai ng`ai-t^eu ^A-p^a Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en, yit-chh+u"t ki-ngiam ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an chi^ong s'o sin ke s+u"t-h`ang chhut-l`oi, ngi'ong-p^an yung oi-s^im s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok, yu ngi'ong-p^an ki^en-chh`u" tui ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke phan-mong.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu t^i Song-ti thung-siak ng`i-t^eu, ki'en-si'en-li'au ng`i-t^eu.

Ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong li'a fuk-y^im chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu, `m-he t^an kho fa-ng^i, th`ung-s`u" ya he kho Su"n-L`in ke n`en-l+it l^au tui fuk-y^im ke khok-sin. Ng`i-t^eu t^i, chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu ke s^en-f+at he ngi'ong-p^an; yit-chhiet ke s'o-cho l^ung-ch'ung he vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke h'o-chhu.
Ng`i-t^eu y^u h'au-fap ng`ai-t^eu, ya h'au-fap Ch'u; s^ui-y`en ng`i-t^eu t`u-t'o thai kh'u-nan, h`an-he yung Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke f^on-h'i l`oi li^ang-su ch^u"n-tho.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho M^a-kh`i-tun l^au ^A-k^ai-^a s'o-y^u sin-th`u ke m`u-fam.

Ch'u ke ch^u"n-tho `m t^an-chhiang tui ng`i-t^eu ke-vi chh`on-to M^a-kh`i-tun l^au ^A-k^ai-^a, ng`i-t^eu tui Song-ti y^u sin-s^im ke s^eu-sit ya chh`on-to y'en-khi^un tak s'o-chhai; `m-s'u" ng`ai-t^eu k^a-k'ong m'a-ke.

Ke-t^eu ng`in l^ung-ch'ung 'an-ngi`ong chh`on-k'ong: Chhai ng`ai-t^eu f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu ke s`u", ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an chiap-thai ng`ai-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an hi-chhi+et ngi'eu-siong, k^ui-hiong Song-ti, l`oi su"-fung yu s^ang yu ch^u"n ke Song-ti,

th`ung-s`u", t'en-heu K`i ke Lai-'e tui thi^en-t'ang kong-l`im. Li'a-ke Lai-'e he Song-ti s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke Y^a-s^u; k`i kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i chi^ong-l`oi voi l`im-to ke Song-ti ke thai fat-khi'en.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a t^i, ng`ai-t^eu f'ong-mun ng`i-t^eu pin `m-he m`o-h'au ke.

Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi y^i-chhi`en, chhai F^i-l+ip-p'i y'i-k^in su pet-hoi, p^un-ng`in v'u-y+uk. Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti su ng`ai-t^eu y'ung-k'am, s^ui-y`en chhai t^ong-t^o ke ch'u-t'ong ch^ung, h`an-he chi^ong K`i ke fuk-y^im chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke khien-mi^en `m-he tui chho-ngu ya-he m`o s`un-chu"n ke thung-k^i l`oi, ya `m-he si'ong-oi cha-kh^i m'a-ng`in.

Ti^en-to, Song-ti kh'au-ngiam yu ki'en-si'en ng`ai-t^eu, chi^ong chh`on fuk-y^im ke ngim-vu thok p^un ng`ai-t^eu. S'o-y^i, Song-ti oi ng`ai-t^eu k'ong m'a-ke, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu k'ong m'a-ke. Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he oi p^un ng`in f^on-h'i, he oi p^un ke chhat-ngiam ng`ai-t^eu nui-s^im ke Song-ti f^on-h'i.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t k'ong fung-s`u"n ng`i-t^eu ke fa, s^im ya m`o chh`un th^am-ngiam; li'a he Song-ti cho-tet vi ng`ai-t^eu cho kien-chu"n ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu m`o khi`u ng`in ke chh^u"n-chan, m`o-lun he ng`i-t^eu ke, ya-he ph+et-ng`in ke.

S^u"n-v`i K^i-tuk ke s'u"-th`u, p'un-l`oi ng`ai-t^eu y^u khi`en h'o y^eu-khi`u ng`i-t^eu ke ch^un-chhung; ch'ung-he, chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu yung v^un-y`u kho'an-thai ng`i-t^eu, chhiong ^a-m^e y^ong-yuk ch'u"-'ng yit-yong.

Ng`ai-t^eu ki-y`en 'an-ngi`ong siak ng`i-t^eu, `m t^an-chhiang f^on-h'i th`ung ng`i-t^eu f^un-hi'ong Song-ti ke fuk-y^im, li`en ng`ai-t^eu ke s^ang-miang ya k^am-ngien p^un ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu he ng`ai-t^eu s'o thung-siak ke!

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong ki-tet, ng`ai-t^eu he ngi'ong-p^an sat-m^ang l`o-luk l`oi cho-se; ng`ai-t^eu ngit-ya k^ung-chok, y^in-vi chh`on Song-ti ke fuk-y^im p^un ng`i-t^eu ke s`u"-chiet, m`o-oi k^a-thi^am ng`i-t^eu ke fu-t^am.
Ng`i-t^eu he kien-chu"n-ng`in, Song-ti ya cho-tet cho-chu"n: Tui ng`i-t^eu sin ke ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu ke cho-ng`in he ngi'ong-p^an s`un-kiet, k^ung-chu"n, m`o h'o hi`am.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu tui ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in, chhiu-chhiong ^a-p^a tui chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-'ng yit-yong:

Ng`ai-t^eu k'u-li ng`i-t^eu, ^on-v'i ng`i-t^eu; ng`ai-t^eu ya yit-chh+u"t khien-va ng`i-t^eu, h`ang-su" oi p^un Song-ti f^on-h'i; K`i chhiu-he f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu l`oi f^un-hi'ong K`i ke ch'u-khi`en l^au y`ung-k^ong ke Song-ti.

Ng`ai-t^eu ya s`ong-s`ong vi li'a-ke su" k'am-chhia Song-ti: Th^ang-t'o ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho, ng`i-t^eu chhiu li^ang-su, pin ngin-v`i `m-he ng`in ke fa, he khok-khok s+u"t-s+u"t tui Song-ti l`oi ke ch^u"n-tho; li'a ch^u"n-tho ya chhai ng`i-t^eu sin ke ng`in ch^ung-ki^en cho k^ung.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o ke, th`ung ke-t^eu chhai Y`u-thai thi-kh^i, Song-ti ke chung kau-fi, chhiu-he s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke sin-th`u s'o t`u-t'o ke khiung-yong. Ng`i-t^eu p^un chhu"-k^a ke th`ung-p^au pet-hoi, chhiu-chhiong k`i-t^eu p^un Y`u-thai ke th`ung-p^au pet-hoi khiung-yong.
Ke-t^eu Y`u-thai-ng`in hoi-s'i Ch'u Y^a-s^u l^au chung si^en-t^i, yu chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu kiuk chhut-hi. K`i-t^eu ke s'o cho, Song-ti chhin m`o f^on-h'i. K`i-t^eu yu l^au chung-ng`in tui-th+it.

Li`en ng`ai-t^eu tui Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in chh`on tho-l^i l`oi p^un Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in tet-kiu, k`i-t^eu ya oi f'an-tui. Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu ke chhui yit-chh+u"t chen-k^a to m^an-m^an; Song-ti ke thai fat-khi'en chui-m^i l`im-to k`i-t^eu l'e!

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu su pet-hoi, th`ung ng`i-t^eu chhiam-s`u" f^un-kh^oi, he s^u"n-th'i f^un-kh^oi thin-thin, ng`ai-t^eu ke s^im pin m`o l`i-kh^oi ng`i-t^eu. Ng`ai-t^eu f^i-s`ong si'ong-ngiam ng`i-t^eu, si'ong-chhin phan-fap oi chai khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai-t^eu chhin si'ong-oi chai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi! Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o yit-p'ai yu yit-p'ai t'a-son oi ch'on-hi khon ng`i-t^eu, ch'ung-he Sat-tan ch'u-t'ong ng`ai-t^eu.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u chai-l`oi ke s`u", chhai k`i ke mien-chhi`en, ng`ai-t^eu ke h^i-mong l^au f^on-h'i, pin s'o kho^a-khi'eu ke mi^en-li`u he m'a-ke n`e? K'am `m-he ng`i-t^eu?
Ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t he ng`ai-t^eu ke k^ong-y`ung, ng`ai-t^eu ke f^on-h'i!
Ng`ai-t^eu ki-y`en ngi^un-`m-h+et l'e, chhiu kiet-thin chhu"-k^a li`u chhai Ng^a-ti'en,

phai ng`ai-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi Th`i-m^o-thai hi ng`i-t^eu ke-vi; k`i he ng`ai-t^eu ke th`ung-k^ung, vi Song-ti chh`on K^i-tuk ke fuk-y^im. Ng`ai-t^eu phai k`i hi ke muk-tit he oi ki^en-ku l^au p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im,
p^un ng`i-t^eu `m-voi y^u-ng`in y^in-vi su pet-hoi l`oi y`eu-thung. Ng`i-t^eu t^i, li'a pet-hoi ya he ng`ai-t^eu thin-chh+ok oi k^in-l+it ke.
Th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu chi+ap-chi+ap si^en l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu voi t`u-t'o pet-hoi. Li'a-ke su" chu"n-k^in chhiu fat-s^en; li'a he ng`i-t^eu s'o t^i ke.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chang phai Th`i-m^o-thai hi; ng`ai s+u"t-chhai ngi^un-`m-h+et l'e. Ng`ai phai k`i hi, he oi t^i ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im to-t'ai ngi'ong-p^an. Ng`ai ki^ang-pha ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in p^un M^o-k'ui m`i-f+et, ng`ai-t^eu ke l`o-luk pien m`o chh'ai-k^ung!

Li'a-ha, Th`i-m^o-thai y'i-k^in tui ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ch'on-l`oi l'e. K`i tai-ch'on ko^an-he ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im l^au oi-s^im ke h'o s^eu-sit. K`i k'ong, ng`i-t^eu s`ong-s`ong s^u"-ngiam ng`ai-t^eu, pet-chhiet h^i-mong kien-t'o ng`ai-t^eu, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu pet-chhiet h^i-mong khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu yit-yong.
S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu chhai yit-chhiet fam-nan l^au khun-kh'u ch^u" ch^ung, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im chhiu tet-t'o k'u-li.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu tui Ch'u y^u ki^en-thin ke sin-s^im, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu `m-s'u" s`eu-to voi s'i.
Li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet chhin-liong vi-t'o ng`i-t^eu k'am-chhia ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti. Ng`ai-t^eu k'am-chhia K`i, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu p^un ng`ai-t^eu chhai K`i mien-chhi`en tet-t'o f^on-h'i.
Ng`ai-t^eu ngit-ya tui K`i pet-chhiet kh`i-khi`u, p^un ng`ai-t^eu voi y^u-h'o chh^in-s^u"n hi khon ng`i-t^eu, l`oi p'u-m^an ng`i-t^eu sin-s^im ke s^i-yeu.
Ngien Song-ti --- ng`ai-t^eu chhai thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u chh^in-chhu" kh^oi-lu, p^un ng`ai-t^eu voi y^u-h'o hi-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi.
Ngien Ch'u p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak l^au siak chung-ng`in ke s^im, ngit-ngit chen-ch'ong, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu 'an siak ng`i-t^eu yit-yong.

'An-ngi`ong, K`i voi ki^en-thin ng`i-t^eu ke s^im, chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u l^au s'o-y^u s+uk k`i ke ng`in kong-l`im ke s`u", p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti mien-chhi`en s`ang-cho su"n-kiet, m`o h'o hi`am.

Chui-heu, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in tui ng`ai-t^eu h+ok-t'o oi ngi'ong-p^an chhai s^en-f+at-song p^un Song-ti f^on-h'i; su"-s+u"t-song, ng`i-t^eu ya yit-chh+u"t he 'an-ngi`ong h`ang. Li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang khien ng`i-t^eu, khi`u ng`i-t^eu, oi kien-k^a t'a-piang.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke khi`en-piang s'o k^au ng`i-t^eu ke he m'a-ke.
Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi he oi ng`i-t^eu su"n-kiet, y'en-l`i y`im-lon ke su";
m^i-yit-ke ng`in oi t^i ngi'ong-p^an yung su"n-kiet l^au ch^un-kui ke f^ong-su"t l`oi p'o-s'u chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i;
`m-h'o fong-chi'ung chh`in-y+uk, chhiong ke-t^eu `m su"t Song-ti ke yi-kau-th`u 'an-ngi`ong.

Chhai li'a-ch'ung su"-song, `m-h'o y^u tui-`m-h'i ya-he kh^i-fu hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke h`ang-v`i. Ng`ai-t^eu y'i-k^in tui ng`i-t^eu k'ong, ya su"t k'in-ko ng`i-t^eu: Ch'u thin-chh+ok voi chit-f+at ke-t^eu cho li'a-ch'ung su" ke ng`in.
Song-ti f^u-seu ng`ai-t^eu, `m-he oi ng`ai-t^eu s^en-f+at chhai y`im-lon ch^ung, he oi ng`ai-t^eu su"n-kiet.
S'o-y^i, kh^i-chhi+et li'a-ch'ung kau-hiun ke, `m-he kh^i-chhi+et ng`in, he kh^i-chhi+et su Su"n-L`in p^un ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti.
Ko^an-he siak hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, ng`ai `m-s'u" si'a sin-'e th`ung ng`i-t^eu th'o-lun; Song-ti y'i-k^in k^au ng`i-t^eu oi ngi'ong-p^an p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak,
ng`i-t^eu ya he cheu li'a kau-hiun tui-thai chhi`on M^a-kh`i-tun ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi. Ch'ung-he, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he oi khien ng`i-t^eu: Kien-k^a t'a-piang,
l+ip-chu" ^on-fun s'u-k'i, chh^in-s'u cho-se l`oi v`i-chh`u" chhu"-k^a ke s^en-f+at, chhiong ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-p'ai f^un-fu ng`i-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong,
p^un ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o ke-t^eu m`o-sin ke ng`in ke ch^un-kin, ya `m-s'u" kho ph+et-ng`in ke ki^ung-kip.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ko^an-he y'i-k^in soi-thet ke ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu m`o-oi ng`i-t^eu `m t^i, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu y`u-s`eu, chhiong ke-t^eu m`o phan-mong ke ng`in.
Ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-sin Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in s'i yu f+uk-f+at, s'o-y^i ng`ai-t^eu si^ong-sin, ke-t^eu sin Y^a-s^u ke ng`in s'i heu, Song-ti ya voi chi^ong k`i-t^eu th`ung k`i khiung-ha tai-ch'on-hi.

Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha cheu Ch'u ke kau-hiun l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong: Ng`ai li'a-t^eu s^ang-t'en, chh`un-li`u to Ch'u chai-l`oi ke ng`in, `m-voi p'i ke-t^eu y'i-k^in soi ke ng`in si^en th`ung Ch'u si^ong-fi.

Ke-s`u", voi y^u fat min-lin ke s^ang, thi^en-s'u"-ch'ong ke s^ang, l^au Song-ti ke ho-th`ung s^ang, y`en-heu, Ch'u p'un-s^u"n voi tui thi^en-t'ang kong h^a-l`oi. Si^ong-sin K^i-tuk, y'i-k^in s'i-thet ke ke-t^eu ng`in voi si^en f+uk-f+at;

chiap-t'en, ng`ai li'a-t^eu s^ang-t'en h`an chh`un-li`u ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung voi th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha su-chiap to y`un-t'ang hi, chhai kh^ung-ch^ung th`ung Ch'u si^ong-fi. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu y'un-y'en l^au Ch'u th`ung-chhai l'e.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi yung li'a-t^eu fa p'i-chh'u" ^on-v'i.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ko^an-he li'a-su" fat-s^en ke s`u"-ki^en l^au ngit-kh`i, `m-s'u" ng`in si'a sin-'e l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong;
y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a chh^in-chh'u t^i, Ch'u chai-l`oi ke ngit-`e chhiu-chhiong chh+et-'e chhai am-p^u-s`u" fut-y`en l`oi-to yit-yong.

Thai-k^a k'ong-t'en "Yit-chhiet ph`in-^on, m`o su"!" ke s`u", ch^ai-nan voi fut-y`en l`im-to k`i-t^eu, chhiong chhu"n-thung fut-y`en l`im-to chi^ong-oi kiung ke fu-'ng yit-yong; k`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui ch'eu-s'am `m-thet.
Ch'ung-he, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu `m-he s^en-f+at chhai v^u-am ch^ung, ke-ngit `m voi chhiong chh+et-'e yit-yong fut-y`en l`im-to ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`i-t^eu chhi`on-phu he k^ong-m`in ke ng`in, he s+uk ngit-s`u"-th`eu ke. Ng`ai-t^eu `m-he s+uk am-p^u-s`u", `m-he s^en-f+at chhai v^u-am ch^ung ke ng`in.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu m`o yin-k^oi chhiong ph+et-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong soi-to s'i-s'i; ng`ai-t^eu oi k'in-si'ang, ki'un-s'u"m.
Ng`in soi-muk, he chhai am-p^u-s`u" soi; chi'u-th`u ya he chhai am-p^u-s`u" chui-chi'u.
Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu he s+uk ngit-s`u"-th`eu ke, chhiu yin-k^oi ki'un-s'u"m. Ng`ai-t^eu oi yung sin-s^im l^au oi-s^im cho fu-s^im-kiang chok-t'en, yung tet-kiu ke phan-mong cho th`eu-kh^ui tai-t'en.
Song-ti `m-he ki'en-si'en ng`ai-t^eu l`oi p^un K`i chit-f+at, he oi ng`ai-t^eu th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l`oi tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu.
K^i-tuk vi ng`ai-t^eu s'i, he oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu, m`o-lun he y'i-k^in soi-thet ya-he h`an s^ang-t'en, l^ung-ch'ung voi chhai k`i chai-l`oi ke s`u" th`ung k`i khiung-ha s^ang-t'en.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi fu-si^ong k'u-li, p'i-chh'u" chho-chhiu, chhiong ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha s'o cho ke yit-yong.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu khi`u ng`i-t^eu, oi ch^un-chhung ke-t^eu chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en s^in-kh'u k^ung-chok ke, chhiu-he Ch'u s'o ki'en-si'en l`oi ch'u"-th^o khien-mi^en ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in.
Y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke k^ung-chok, ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi chhin s'o-n`en yung ch^un-kin l^au oi-s^im l`oi kho'an-thai k`i-t^eu. Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ya oi p'i-chh'u" f`o-m+uk.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu khien ng`i-t^eu, oi k'in-ko l^an-s^u" ke ng`in, k'u-li f^oi-s^im ke ng`in, f`u-chh`u" ngi^on-ngi+ok ke ng`in, ya oi yung nai-s^im tui-thai m^i-yit-ke ng`in.
Oi se-ngi, m`o-lun m'a-ng`in t^u cho-`m-tet yung-f'ai po-f'ai; oi s`ong-s`ong p'i-chh'u" ko^an-s^im, vi-t'o ph+et-ng`in ke h'o-chhu l`oi si'ong.
Oi s`ong-s`ong h'i-l+ok,
kh`i-t'o m`o-th`in,
f`am-su" k'am-chhia; y^in-vi li'a he Song-ti vi ng`i li'a-t^eu s+uk K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ng`in s'o thin ke ch'u"-yi.
`M-h'o s^eu-m+et Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung;
`m-h'o m'eu-su" si^en-t^i ke k'ong-lun.
Tak-yong su" oi si`ong-se chhat-ngiam: M^i-san ke su" oi chh`u"-s'u,
yit-chhiet si`a-ok ke su" oi hi-chhi+et.

Ngien su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti chh^in-chhu" s'u" ng`i-t^eu v`an-chhi`on su"n-kiet! Ngien ng`i-t^eu ke l`in, f`un, l^au s^u"n-th'i tet-t'o p'o-s'u, chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chai-l`oi ke s`u", v`an-chhi`on m`o h'o hi`am!
F^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti he sin-s+u"t kh'o-kho ke; K`i yit-thin voi s`u"n-chhiu li'a-ke su".
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, chhi'ang vi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o.
Ng`i-t^eu oi su"n-kiet si^ong-ch^im th`ung chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`ai fung Ch'u ke mi`ang f^un-fu ng`i-t^eu, li'a-f^ung sin-'e oi si^en-th+uk p^un s'o-y^u ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi th^ang.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai th`ung S^i-l^a l^au Th`i-m^o-thai si'a sin-'e p^un Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a kau-fi, chhiu-he s+uk ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke chung sin-th`u.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu k'am-chhia Song-ti. Li'a he t^ong-y`en ke; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im f^i-s`ong chin-phu, ng`i-t^eu tak-s`a p'i-chh'u" si^ong-siak ke s^im ya thai-y^u chen-ch'ong.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhai Song-ti ke kok kau-fi ch^ung n^a ng`i-t^eu l`oi kho^a-khi'eu. Ng`ai-t^eu chh^u"n-chan ng`i-t^eu, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu chhai s'o-su ke yit-chhiet pet-hoi l^au fam-nan ch^ung, h`an-he si^ong-sin, h`an-he ngi^un-nai.
Li'a chhiu-he Song-ti k^ung-ngi s'u"m-phan ke chu"n-k'i, chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu kh^am-tet hi'ong-su Song-ti koet ke fuk-hi. Ng`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t ngi^un-su kh'u-nan, chhiu-he vi-t'o li'a-ke koet.
Song-ti oi s^u"-h`ang k^ung-ngi: K`i oi p^un ke-t^eu pet-hoi ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in t`u-t'o ch^ai-nan;

K`i oi p^un ng`i li'a-t^eu su-kh'u ke ng`in th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha tet-t'o su"t-fong. Ch'u Y^a-s^u l^au k`i thai-n`en ke chung thi^en-s'u" tui thi^en-t'ang chhai f'o-yam-ch^ung hi'en-hien ke s`u", Song-ti chhiu oi chu"p-h`ang li'a-khien su".
K`i oi chit-f+at ke-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et K`i, l^au ke-t^eu `m th^ang-chhi`ung ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u fuk-y^im ke ng`in.
Ch'u chai-l`oi ke-ngit, ke-t^eu ng`in voi su h`in-f+at, y'un-y'en m+et-m`ong, tui Ch'u ke mien-chhi`en l^au k`i thai khi`en-n`en ke y`ung-k^ong su kak-chhi+et.

Chhai ke-ngit, k`i oi tui s+uk k`i ke chung su"n-th`u tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong, chiap-su s'o-y^u sin-th`u ke chh^u"n-siung. Ng`i-t^eu ya oi chhai k`i-t^eu ke t^ong-ch^ung, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in si^ong-sin ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im.

Vi-t'o li'a-ke muk-tit, ng`ai-t^eu s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o, khi`u ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti p^un ng`i-t^eu kh^am-tet K`i ke f^u-seu. Ngien K`i yung K`i ke khi`en-n`en, p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu s+u"t-hien yit-chhiet hiong-san ke s^im-ngien, s`u"n-chhiu ng`i-t^eu ph`in sin-s^im s'o cho ke k^ung-chok.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u ke mi`ang chhiu voi tui ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong, ng`i-t^eu ya voi tui k`i tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong; li'a he th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en l`oi ke.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ko^an-he ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke chai-l`oi, pin k`i oi chhi-s+ip ng`ai-t^eu th`ung k`i si^ong-fi ke su", ng`ai-t^eu khi`u ng`i-t^eu,

`m-h'o 'an kiak chhiu p^un "Ch'u chai-l`oi ke ngit-`e y'i-k^in to l'e" li'a-ch'ung k'ong-fap l`oi y`eu-thung, l`oi chh^au-f`an. Kh'o-n`en y^u ng`in k'ong, li'a k'ong-fap he ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on, s'o k'ong, ya-he si'a chhai sin-'e t^i-poi ke.

M`o-lun m'a-ng`in yung m'a-ke f^ong-fap, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o p^un k`i-t^eu phien-t'o. Y^in-vi, ke ngit-`e l`oi-to y^i-chhi`en, thin-chh+ok voi y^u thai phoi-ngi+ak; ke chu-thin oi m+et-m`ong ke Put-fap-ch'a voi chhut-hien.

Ke Put-fap-ch'a voi f'an-tui yit-chhiet p^un-ng`in chh^u"n-cho s`u"n-m`in ya-he kin-pai ke tui-siong, k^o-s^u"n chhu"-k^a to yit-chhiet ke t'ang-k^o; k`i su"m-chu" voi hi chh^o chhai Song-ti ke su"n-thien-t'u, chhu"-chh^u"n he Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu `m ki-tet he-m`o? Ng`ai th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", y'i-k^in chi^ong li'a-ke su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong-ko l'e.
Ch'u-t'ong li'a-khien su", `m p^un k`i li'a-ha chhiu fat-s^en ke he m'a-ke, ng`i-t^eu t^i. S`u"-k^i yit to, ke Put-fap-ch'a chhiu voi chhut-hien.
Ke s`u"n-pi put-fap ke l+it-liong y'i-k^in kh^oi-s'u" chin-h`ang; ch'ung-he, oi t'en-to ch'u-t'ong li'a-khien su" ke s'u s'ai-kh^oi y^i-heu, li'a-khien su" chang voi fat-s^en.
Ke-s`u", Put-fap-ch'a voi chhut-hien; ch'ung-he Ch'u Y^a-s^u chai-l`oi ke s`u" oi yung khi'eu-ch^ung ke hi l`oi chh`u-m+et k`i, yung chhu"-k^a kong-l`im ke y`ung-k^ong chi^ong k`i s^eu-m+et.
Ke Put-fap-ch'a voi kho Sat-tan ke khi`en-su" l`oi-to, h`ang kok-ch'ung ke kh`i-su" l^au s`u"n-chiak, hi'en-chhut k'a ke seu-th`eu,
k`i ya voi yung kok-ch'ung ke k'ui-kie l`oi tui-thai ke-t^eu m+et-m`ong ke ng`in; k`i-t^eu m+et-m`ong, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m chiap-su, ya `m oi-siak ke voi p^un k`i-t^eu tet-kiu ke ch^u"n-l^i.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, Song-ti chhiu s'u" k`i-t^eu m`i-m`i chh^u"-chh^u", p^un k`i-t^eu sin-chhi`ung f^a-li^au.
Kiet-m^i, yit-chhiet `m sin ch^u"n-l^i, f^on-h'i put-ngi ke ng`in, voi su thin-chhui.

Ch'u s'o-siak ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i-t^eu k'am-chhia Song-ti; y^in-vi Song-ti ki'en-si'en ng`i-t^eu, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in s`u"n-su"n ke k^ung-chok l^au ng`i-t^eu tui ch^u"n-l^i ke sin-ngi'ong, p^un ng`i-t^eu si^en tet-kiu.
Th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on p^un ng`i-t^eu ke fuk-y^im, Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu l`oi f^un-hi'ong ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke y`ung-k^ong.
S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi kh^i-chhai! Tui ng`ai-t^eu s'o k^au ke ch^u"n-l^i, m`o-lun he yung k'ong ke ya-he yung sin-'e si'a ke, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi h'o-h'o ch^un-s'u.
Song-ti siak ng`ai-t^eu, s^u"-^en chi^ong y'un-chh`un ke ^on-v'i l^au m^i-h'o ke phan-mong su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu. Ngien li'a-ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk,
kit-li ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu y^u y'ung-hi l`oi chh`on-k'ong pin s+u"t-h`ang yit-chhiet m^i-h'o ke su".

Chui-heu, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, chhi'ang vi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o, h'o-p^un Ch'u ke ch^u"n-tho kiak-kiak chh`on-kh^oi, ya tet-t'o ch^un-chhung, chhiong chh`on-to ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung ya su ch^un-chhung yit-yong.
Chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu ya oi kh`i-t'o Song-ti, kiu ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i ke-t^eu si`a-ok ke ng`in, y^in-vi `m-he m^i-yit-ke ng`in t^u si^ong-sin ch^u"n-tho.
Ch'ung-he, Ch'u he sin-s+u"t ke; K`i voi p^un ng`i-t^eu s`ang-cho ki^en-khi`ong, yu p'o-fu ng`i-t^eu thot-l`i ke si`a-ok-ch'a ke ham-hoi.
Ng`ai-t^eu kho Ch'u khok-sin, ng`i-t^eu t^ong chhai ke-vi s+u"t-h`ang ng`ai-t^eu s'o f^un-fu ke, ya voi yit-chh+u"t s+u"t-h`ang h^a-hi.
Ngien Ch'u tai-li^ang ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu kha chh^u"m th'i-ngiam Song-ti ke thung-siak, ya y^u K^i-tuk s'o-su ke nai-s^im.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai-t^eu fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang min-lin ng`i-t^eu: Oi y'en-y'en l`i-kh^oi s'o-y^u l^an-s^u" `m chhin p'un-fun, `m cheu ng`ai-t^eu kau-hiun hi-h`ang ke sin-th`u.
Ng`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a chh^in-chh'u t^i, yin-k^oi ngi'ong-p^an h'au-fap ng`ai-t^eu. Ng`ai-t^eu th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha ke s`u", chhin p'un-fun, `m-su"t l^an-s^u",
ya m`o ph+ak-s+u"t m'a-ng`in ke fan; f'an-ch'on s^in-kh'u l`o-luk, ngit-ya cho-se, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in su th^o-lui.
Ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong cho, `m-he ng`ai-t^eu m`o khi`en-li y^eu-khi`u s^en-f+at ke ki^ung-kip, he oi cho p'ong-yong p^un ng`i-t^eu h'au-fap.
Ng`ai-t^eu chhai ng`i-t^eu ke-vi ke s`u", su"t f^un-fu ng`i-t^eu k'ong: "`M cho-se ke ng`in cho-`m-tet s+u"t-fan."
Ng`ai-t^eu k'ong li'a-ke fa, he y^in-vi th^ang-k'ong ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u ng`in l^an-s^u" `m chhin p'un-fun, theu-ngit `m cho-se, f'an-ch'on hau k'on ph+et-ng`in ke h`an-su".
Li'a-ch'ung ng`in, ng`ai-t^eu fung Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke mi`ang k'in-ko k`i-t^eu, min-lin k`i-t^eu, oi ti^am-ti^am, chh^in-s'u cho-se l`oi v`i-chh`u" chhu"-k^a ke s^en-f+at.
Ch'ung-he, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi ki-si+uk h`ang-san, `m-h'o f^oi-s^im.
Na y^u-ng`in `m-h'en f+uk-chhi`ung ng`ai-t^eu chhai li'a-f^ung sin-'e t^i-poi s'o f^un-fu ke fa, ng`i-t^eu oi th`i-f`ong li'a-ch'ung ng`in, m+ok th`ung k`i khiung-ha, p^un k`i k'am-kok kien-seu.
Ch'ung-he, `m-h'o khon k`i cho th+it-ng`in; oi chhiong tui sin-th`u 'an-ngi`ong l`oi khien-va k`i.
Ngien su ph`in-^on ke Ch'u, s`ui-s`u" yung kok-ch'ung ke f^ong-fap, chh^in-chhu" chi^ong ph`in-^on su-p^un ng`i-t^eu! Ngien Ch'u l^au ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a th`ung-chhai!
Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o chh^in-pit tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on. Ng`ai tak-f^ung sin-'e l^ung-ch'ung 'an-ngi`ong chhi^am-mi`ang; ng`ai ke pit-chiak chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a!
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai fung ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke phan-mong K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke min-lin, cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u.

Ng`ai si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i --- Th`i-m^o-thai, chhiu-he ng`ai chhai sin-ngi'ong t^i-poi ch^u"n ke lai-'e: Ngien ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en, l`in-m'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i!

Ng`ai oi hi M^a-kh`i-tun ke s`u", su"t ham ng`i li`u chhai Y^i-fut-s'o; ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i ki-si+uk 'an-ngi`ong cho. Y^in-vi y^u-t^eu ng`in chhai ke-vi chh`on k'a ke kau-ngi, ng`i thin-chh+ok oi min-lin k`i-t^eu th`in h^a-l`oi.

Ng`i ya oi min-lin k`i-t^eu, oi piong-thet ke-t^eu m`o-y'ang m`o-chiak ke chh`on-sot l^au v`u-khi`ung v`u-chhin ke chh+uk-ph'u; y^in-vi li'a-t^eu t^ung-s^i voi ngi^a-h'i phien-lun thin-thin, tui li'au-ki'e Song-ti ke kie-v+ak chhi`on m`o p^ong-chhu. Song-ti ke kie-v+ak oi th^ung-ko sin-s^im chang voi li'au-ki'e.
Li'a min-lin ke muk-tit he oi kit-li oi-s^im; oi-s^im he tui s`un-kiet ke s^im, chh^in-ph+ak ke thi^en-li`ong, l^au ch^u"n-s+u"t ke sin-s^im s'o s'an-s^en chhut-l`oi ke.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in phi^en-l`i li'a-t^eu, m`i-su"t chhai h^i-kh^ung ke th`am-lun t^i-poi.
K`i-t^eu si'ong-oi cho Song-ti fap-l+it ke ch'u"-th^o-ch'a, ch'ung-he, li`en chhu"-k^a s'o k'ong ke ya m`o m`in-ph+ak, li`en chhu"-k^a 'an chhu"-sin s'o ch'u-ch^ong ke ya m`o chh^in-chh'u.
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i, ng`in na-he cheu k^ui-k'i l`oi s'u"-yung fap-l+it, fap-l+it p'un-l`oi he h'o ke.

T^ong-y`en, ng`ai-t^eu oi t^i: Fap-l+it `m-he vi h'o-ng`in l`oi chu"-thin ke, he vi ke-t^eu put-fap l^au `m su yok-suk ke, `m kin-khi`en l^au fam-chhui ke, m'eu-su" ch^ung-kau l^au th^am-oi su"-si+uk ke, chh`u" y`a sat ^oi l^au m`eu-sat ke,
y`im-lon, n`am th`ung-sin-lien, fan-mai ng`in-khi'eu, k'ong f^a-li^au, cho k'a kien-chu"n, v`i-phoi khien-chhi`on kau-hiun t'en lui ke ng`in.
Li'a khien-chhi`on ke kau-ngi he k^in-k'i fuk-y^im, chhiu-he y`ung-k^ong, kh^am-tet chh^u"n-siung ke Song-ti k^au-thok ng`ai si^en-pu ke.
Ng`ai k'am-chhia su ng`ai l+it-liong ke --- ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u! Y^in-vi k`i khon ng`ai cho ch^ung-s^im, ch'u"-phai ng`ai l`oi su"-fung k`i.
S^ui-y`en ng`ai th`eu-p'ai f'i-pong k`i, pet-hoi k`i, yu v'u-y+uk k`i, ch'ung-he ng`ai tet-t'o l`in-m'en; y^in-vi ke-s`u" ng`ai `m sin k`i, `m m`in-ph+ak chhu"-k^a s'o-cho ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u su ng`ai f^ung-su"n ke ^en-ti'en, p^un ng`ai tet-t'o th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en ke ng`in chang y^u ke sin-s^im l^au oi-s^im.
"K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kong-su" ke muk-tit he oi ch'u"n-kiu chhui-ng`in", li'a-ki fa he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke, kh^am-tet v`an-chhi`on chiap-su. Ng`ai he chhui-ng`in ch^ung thi-yit f'ai ke;

ch'ung-he, li'a chhiu-he Song-ti l`in-m'en ng`ai ke ngi`en-y^in, oi p^un K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u tui ng`ai li'a chhui-ng`in ch^ung chui f'ai ke, hi'en-chhut k`i v`an-chhi`on ke ngi^un-nai, l`oi p^un ke-t^eu heu-l`oi sin k`i, chiap-su y'un-s^en ke ng`in cho p'ong-yong.
Ngien ch^un-kui l^au y`ung-k^ong y'un-y'en k^ui-p^un ke van-su" ke ki^un-v`ong, chhiu-he `m-voi hi'u-lan, ng`in khon-`m-t'o, th+uk-yit v`u-ngi ke Song-ti! ^A-m'en.

Ng`ai ke lai-'e Th`i-m^o-thai ^a, cheu th`eu-p'ai s'o-chh`on ko^an-he ng`i ke yi-ngi`en, ng`ai chi^ong li'a-ke min-lin k^au-thok ng`i. Ng`i oi yung li'a-t^eu fa cho v'u-hi, l`oi t'a yit-chh`ong chhin-chi^ang ke chan-ch^en.
Oi ki^en-chh`u" sin-ngi'ong l^au chh^in-ph+ak ke thi^en-li`ong. Y^u-t^eu ng`in hi-chhi+et chhu"-k^a ke thi^en-li`ong, k`i-t^eu ke sin-ngi'ong chhiu-chhiong s`on-`e chh`u"m-thet.
Kh`i-ch^ung y^u H'i-m'i-n^ai l^au ^A-l+it-s^an-thai; ng`ai y'i-k^in chi^ong k`i-t^eu k^au chhai Sat-tan ke s'u-ch^ung, oi p^un k`i-t^eu h+ok-voi `m-k'am chai f'i-pong Song-ti.
Chui-si^en, ng`ai khien ng`i, oi vi van-m`in tui Song-ti l`oi khi'en-khi`u, kh`i-t'o, thoi-t'o, l^au k'am-^en;
ya oi vi ki^un-v`ong l^au yit-chhiet y^u khi`en-su" ke ng`in kh`i-t'o, p^un ng`ai-t^eu y^u ti^am-chhin l^au f`o-ph`in ke ngit-`e, l`oi ko kin-khi`en l^au t^on-chang ke s^en-f+at.
Li'a he h'o-su", he ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Song-ti s'o f^on-h'i ke.
Song-ti oi m^i-yit-ke ng`in tet-kiu, l^ung-ch'ung ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i.
Y^in-vi ch'u"-y^u yit-vi Song-ti, chhai Song-ti l^au ng`in ke ch^ung-ki^en ch'u"-y^u yit-vi ch^ung-p'o, chhiu-he s`ang-cho ng`in ke K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u;
k`i h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a l`oi p^un ng`in-lui tet-t'o chhu"-y`u; li'a-khien su" chhai s`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u" chhiu chu"n-m`in chhut-l`oi.

Vi-t'o 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai fung chh^ai-phai cho chh`on-tho-ng`in, s'u"-th`u, l^au Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in ke kau-s^u", l`oi p^un k`i-t^eu si^ong-sin pin ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i. Ng`ai m`o k'ong f^a-li^au; ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke chhi`on-phu he ch^u"n-s+u"t ke!
Chhai kok s'o-chhai ke chhi-fi, ng`ai h^i-mong n`am-ng`in khi`a-t'en su"n-kiet ke s'u l`oi kh`i-t'o, chhi`on m`o fat-khi'en, ya m`o phien-lun.

Ng`ai ya h^i-mong fu-'ng chok-s^am oi t^on-ch^ong, thai-f^ong l^au h+ap-su"t; m+ok pi^en kh`i-kh`i koai-koai ke th`eu-n`a-m^o; m+ok yung k^im-'e, ch^u"n-ch^u, ya-he chhin kui ke f+uk-ch^ong l`oi t'a-pan.
Oi yung h'o h`ang-v`i l`oi p'eu-m`in chhu"-k^a he kin-vi Song-ti ke fu-'ng.
Fu-'ng oi ti^am-ti^am l`oi h+ok-s+ip, f`am-su" sun-f+uk.
Ng`ai `m ch'un fu-'ng kau-hiun ng`in, ya-he k'on-hot n`am-ng`in; k`i-t^eu oi ^on-chhin chang h'o.
Y^in-vi Song-ti si^en chho ^A-t^ong, y`en-heu chang he Ha-v^a.
Su y'in-yu ke `m-he ^A-t^ong, he 'ng-ng`in; k`i su y'in-yu, v`i-phoi Song-ti ke kim-lin.
Ch'ung-he, fu-'ng na ^on-fun s'u-k'i, ki^en-chh`u" sin-s^im, oi-s^im, l^au su"n-kiet, chhiu voi th^ung-ko s^en-y^ong ch'u"-'ng l`oi tet-kiu.
Y^u ng`in k'ong: "M'a-ng`in si'ong-oi cho kam-tuk, k`i chhiu-he hi^un-mu yit-khien h'o ke su"-k^ung." Li'a-ki fa he kh'o-kho ke!

Kam-tuk thin-chh+ok oi he yit-ke m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in. K`i ch'u"-y^u cho-tet th'o yit-ke p^u-ngi`ong; cho-ng`in oi ngi`am-si+uk, voi yok-suk chhu"-k^a, s^en-f+at y^u k^ui-l+it, l+ok-yi kho'an-thai ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in. K`i yit-thin oi hi'au-tet kau-th^o ng`in;
`m-voi hi^ung-chi'u, `m-voi t'a-ng`in, sin-chh`in v^un-f`o, ya m`o th^am-chh`oi.
K`i yit-thin oi h'o-h'o chhu"-l^i chhu"-k^a ke k^a-th`in, k'on-kau ch'u"-'ng, ham k`i-t^eu yung su"t-t^ong ke ch^un-kin l`oi sun-f+uk k`i.
Yit-ke ng`in `m hi'au-tet chh'u-l^i chhu"-k^a ke k^a-th`in, ngi'ong-voi khon-ku Song-ti ke kau-fi n`e?
Kam-tuk ya `m yin-k^oi he chang ng+ip kau-fi ke ng`in, mi^en-tet k`i chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai, ham chhai M^o-k'ui s'o-su ke s'u"m-phan ch^ung.
K`i chhai kau-fi-ngoi ya oi y^u h'o mi`ang-s^ang, mi^en-tet k`i su f'i-pong, ham-l+ok M^o-k'ui ke l`o-mi'ong t^i-poi.
Chu"p-su" ya tit-khok oi y^u h'o tet-hen. K`i-t^eu k'ong-fa oi s`u"n-s+u"t, cho-`m-tet chi'u-chui l^au th^am-chh`oi;
oi yung chh^in-ph+ak ke thi^en-li`ong ki^en-chh`u" sin-ngi'ong ke o-pi.
K`i-t^eu yin-k^oi si^en su kh'au-ngiam, m`o m'a-ke h'o hi`am chang cho-tet p^un k`i t^am-ngim chu"t-vu.
'Ng chu"p-su" ya oi y^u h'o tet-hen, `m-voi k'ong h`an-fa, v'un-chhung, f`am-su" s`u"n-s+u"t kh'o-kho.
M^i-yit-ke chu"p-su" ch'u"-y^u cho-tet th'o yit-ke p^u-ngi`ong, k`i ya oi h'o-h'o k'on-kau ch'u"-'ng l^au chhu"-l^i k^a-th`in.
Ke-t^eu chhai su"-fung ke t'ang-k^o y^u h'o p'eu-hien ke chu"p-su" chhiu tet-t'o h'o mi`ang-s^ang, ya voi chhin h'o-t'am k'ong-lun k`i-t^eu tui K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke sin-ngi'ong.
Ng`ai yit-phi'en si'a li'a-f^ung sin-'e, yit-phi'en h^i-mong kiak-kiak l`oi-khon ng`i;

na-he th`in-th`o, li'a-f^ung sin-'e he l^au ng`i k'ong, ng`ai-t^eu chhai Song-ti ke k^a-th`in ch^ung yin-k^oi oi ngi'ong-p^an h`ang-su". Li'a-ke k^a-th`in chhiu-he y'un-s^en Song-ti ke kau-fi, he ch^u"n-l^i ke s+ak-chh^u l^au k^i-chh'u.

Thai-k^a k^ung-ngin, ng`ai-t^eu sin-ngi'ong ke o-pi he ngi'ong-p^an k^o-chh^u"m: K`i yung ng`in ke ngiuk-s^u"n hi'en-hien, p^un Su"n-L`in chu"n-m`in v`i ngi, p^un chung thi^en-s'u" khon-kien, p^un ng`in chh`on to van-p^ang, p^un su"-ki^en-ng`in si^ong-sin, su-chiap ng+ip y`ung-yeu.
Su"n-L`in m`in-m`in k'ong, chhai m+at-heu ke s`u"-kh`i, y^u-t^eu ng`in voi piong-thet sin-ngi'ong, hi th`en kh^i-phien ke l`in l^au si`a-l`in ke kau-hiun.
Li'a-ch'ung kau-hiun he tui k'a-mo v`i-san ke lau-'e l`oi ke; k`i-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im chhiong p^un s^eu-f`ung ke thiet nat-s'i thet-hi.

K`i-t^eu kim-ch'u" ka-chh'i; y^u-t^eu s+u"t-v+ut k`i-t^eu ya kim-s+u"t, chhiu-he Song-ti s'o chho, oi p^un ke-t^eu y^u sin-s^im yu m`in-ph+ak ch^u"n-l^i ke ng`in yung k'am-chhia ke s^im l`oi li^ang-su ke.
Song-ti s'o chho ke yit-chhiet chhi`on-phu he h'o ke, ng`in yin-t^ong yung k'am-chhia ke s^im l`oi li^ang-su, `m-h'o kh^i-chhi+et,
y^in-vi Song-ti ke fa l^au ng`in ke kh`i-t'o s'u" li'a-t^eu s+u"t-v+ut s`ang-cho su"n-kiet l'e.

Ng`i na-he chi^ong li'a-t^eu su" ch'u"-su" hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, ng`i chhiu-he K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke h'o ph+uk-ng`in; th`ung-s`u", sin-ngi'ong ke fa l^au ng`i yit-chh+u"t s'o sun-chhi`ung ke chu"n-khok tho-l^i, voi p^ong-chhu ng`i chhu"-k^a chhai l`in-sin-song ch'ong-chin.
Ng`i oi hi-chhi+et ke-t^eu m`o-tap m`o-toi ke ngi`en-ng^i l^au m`o-y'ang m`o-chiak ke chh`on-sot; oi vi-t'o kin-khi`en ke s^en-f+at chh^au-lien chhu"-k^a.
S^u"n-th'i ke chh^au-lien, li-yit y^u-han; l`in-sin ke chh^au-lien, f`am-su" t^u-y^u li-yit, y^in-vi voi tai-l`oi k^im-s^en l^au l`oi-s^en ke phan-mong.
Li'a-ki fa he kh'o-kho ke, kh^am-tet ng`in v`an-chhi`on chiap-su.
Ng`ai-t^eu s^in-kh'u t'a-piang, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu s'o phan-mong ke he y'un-s^en ke Song-ti; K`i he ng`in-lui ke Kiu-ch'u, th+it-ph+et he sin-th`u ke Kiu-ch'u.
Ng`i oi chi^ong li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in ch'u"-su" k`i-t^eu, kau-th^o k`i-t^eu.
M+ok p^un ng`in khon-khi^ang ng`i heu-s^ang; ti^en-to, m`o-lun k'ong-fa, h`ang-su", oi-s^im, sin-s^im, l^au s`un-kiet tak f^ong-mien, ng`i l^ung-ch'ung oi cho sin-th`u ke p'ong-yong.
Ng`i oi yung-s^im chhai si^en-th+uk Su"n-k^in, k'ong-tho, l^au kau-th^o t'en k^ung-chok-song, chh+u"t-to ng`ai l`oi.
`M-h'o fut-li+ok ng`i s+uk-l`in ke ^en-su; li'a ^en-su he th^ung-ko si^en-t^i ke yi-ngi`en l^au chung ch'ong-l'o ke on-s'u s'o su-p^un ng`i ke.
Li'a-t^eu su" ng`i oi ch^on-s^im ngin-ch^u"n hi cho, p^un thai-k^a khon-t'o ng`i ke chin-phu.
Ng`i oi ki'un-s'u"m chhu"-k^a l^au chhu"-k^a ke kau-hiun. Li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in oi ki^en-chh`u" hi h`ang; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i chhiu voi kiu ng`i p'un-s^u"n, yu voi kiu th^ang-chhi`ung ng`i ke ng`in.
`M-h'o chit-phi l'o-ng`in-k^a; oi khien k`i chhiong khien ngi^a p^a yit-yong. Tui-thai heu-s^ang-ng`in oi chhiong tui hi^ung-thi 'an-ngi`ong;
tui ngi`en-ch'ong fu-'ng oi chhiong tui ^a-m^e 'an-ngi`ong; tui heu-s^ang ke fu-'ng oi yung s`un-kiet ke s^im, chhiong tui ch'i-moi yit-yong.
Oi ch^un-chhung chu"n-k^in s'u-ko'a ke fu-'ng.

Ko'a-fu na-he y^u ch'u"-'ng ya-he s^un-'e s^un-'ng, k`i ke heu-pi chhiu-oi si^en h+ok-s+ip ngi'ong-p^an chhai vuk-h^a chhin hau-tho, l`oi po-tap y`a-^oi ya-he ^a-k^ung ^a-ph`o, y^in-vi li'a he Song-ti s'o f^on-h'i ke.
Chu"n-k^in s'u-ko'a yu m`o-ng`in h'o y'i-kho ke fu-'ng, s'o ngi'ong-mong ke ch'u"-y^u Song-ti, ngit-ya kh`i-t'o s'o-khi`u ke chhiu-he Song-ti ke p^ong-chhu.
T^an-t^an ch^ui-khi`u hi'ong-l+ok ke ko'a-fu, s^ui-y`en s^ang-t'en, kh`i-s+u"t he y'i-k^in s'i-thet.
Li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in, ng`i yit-thin oi k^au, mi^en-tet k`i-t^eu p^un-ng`in ph^i-ph`in.
Na-he y^u-ng`in `m cheu-ku chh^in-chhit, th+it-ph+et he chhu"-k^a vuk-h^a ke ng`in, k`i chhiu-he v`i-phoi sin-ngi'ong, p'i `m-sin ke ng`in h`an-kha f'ai.
Ko'a-fu t^en-ki ke thi`au-khien he 'an-ngi`ong: K`i-t^eu oi y^u liuk-s+u"p se y^i-song; ch'u"-y^u kiet-f^un yit-p'ai;
h`an oi y^u h'o mi`ang-s^ang, chhiu-chhiong: Chhin voi y^ong-yuk ch'u"-'ng, chiap-thai l^i-hak, s'e su"n-th`u ke kiok, kiu-chi kip-nan, chhin-l+it h`ang kok-yong san-su".
Ch'ung-he, heu-s^ang ke ko'a-fu `m-h'o t^en-ki; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chh`in-y+uk fat-thung, l`i-kh^oi K^i-tuk ke s`u", chhiu si'ong-oi chai ka-ng`in,
v`i-phoi t^ong-chh^u s'o-h'i ke ngien, y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong su thin-chhui.

Th`ung-s`u", k`i-t^eu h`an h+ok-t'o l^an-s^u", hau ko k^a; h`an-kha chh'am ke he, `m t^an-chhiang l^an-s^u", yu hau k'ong-chh`ong k'ong-t'on, chhap ph+et-ng`in ke h`an-su", k'ong m`o yin-k^oi k'ong ke fa.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai h^i-mong heu-s^ang ke ko'a-fu chai ka-ng`in, s^en-y^ong ch'u"-'ng, cheu-ku k^a-th`in, m+ok p^un tui-th+it y^u k^ung-kit ke p'a-piang.
Y^in-vi, y'i-k^in y^u-t^eu ko'a-fu k'oi-pien s^im-yi, hi th`en Sat-tan l'e.

Sin Ch'u ke fu-'ng na-he vuk-h^a y^u ko'a-fu, k`i chhiu oi cheu-ku k`i-t^eu, `m-h'o chi^ong t^am-'e th^oi p^un kau-fi; 'an-ngi`ong, kau-fi chang voi y^u n`en-l+it cheu-ku ke-t^eu m`o-ng`in h'o y'i-kho ke ko'a-fu.
Chhin voi chhu"-l^i kau-fi ke ch'ong-l'o, th+it-ph+et he ngin-ch^u"n k'ong-tho l^au kau-th^o ke, yin-k^oi oi tet-t'o k^a-phi ke kin-fung.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Ngi`u th+ap kuk ke s`u", `m-h'o l^ung-t'en k`i ke choi"; yu k'ong: "K^ung-ng`in tet k^ung-chhi`en he h+ap-l^i ke."
Na-he y^u-ng`in ko ch'ong-l'o, chh`u-f^i y^u li'ong-ke ya-he s^am-ke chu"n-ng`in, chhiu `m-s'u" tap k`i.
Oi k^ung-kh^oi chit-phi s'o-y^u fam-chhui ke ng`in, l`oi p^un kh`i-th^a ke ng`in tet-t'o k'in-kie.

Ng`ai chhai Song-ti, K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u, l^au su ki'en-si'en ke thi^en-s'u" ke mien-chhi`en s'u"m-chhung f^un-fu ng`i, oi ch^un-s'u li'a-t^eu kau-hiun, m`o-lun m'a-ke su"-chh`in `m-h'o y^u s`u"n-kien ya-he phi^en-s^im.
`M-h'o s`ui-phien vi ng`in h`ang on-s'u-l^i; `m-h'o l^au ph+et-ng`in ke chhui-ko y^u-fun; oi p'o-s'u chhu"-k^a s`un-kiet.
Y^in-vi ng`i ke s^u"n-th'i s`ong-s`ong y^u phiang, `m-h'o t^an-chhiang l^im s'ui, oi l^im yit-s+it-'e chi'u l`oi p^ong-chhu s^eu-fa.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in ke chhui he f^i-s`ong m`in-hi'en ke, chhin kiak chhiu su thin-chhui; ch'ung-he, y^u-t^eu ng`in ke chhui heu-l`oi chang p^un-ng`in khon-chhut-l`oi.
Khiung-yong, h'o ke h`ang-v`i ya he m`in-hi'en ke; chhiu-son `m-he 'an m`in, ya m`o fap-thu khong-h'i-l`oi.
F`am chhai ak-h^a cho n`u-ph+uk ke, yin-t^ong chhin ch^un-chhung chhu"-k^a ke ch'u-ng`in, mi^en-tet Song-ti ke mi`ang l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke kau-hiun p^un-ng`in f'i-pong.

N`u-ph+uk na y^u sin K^i-tuk ke ch'u-ng`in, `m-h'o y^in-vi k`i-t^eu he Ch'u nui ke hi^ung-thi chhiu khon-khi^ang k`i-t^eu; f'an-ch'on oi kien-k^a sat-m^ang f+uk-su", y^in-vi su f+uk-su" l`oi tet-t'o li-yit ke ng`in chhiu-he chh^in-oi ke sin-th`u. Ng`i yit-thin oi kau-th^o pin khien-va li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in.
Na y^u-ng`in chh`on ph+et-yong ke kau-hiun, `m th^ang-chhi`ung ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk khien-chhi`on ke tho-l^i l^au ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh`on kin-khi`en ke kau-hiun,
chhiu-he chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai, kh+it m`o chu"-su"t. Li'a-ch'ung ng`in hau phien-lun, yu hau khang su"-ngi'en; kiet-k'o chhiu s^ang-chhut chhit-tu, si^ong-ch^ang, f'i-pong, l^au ng`i-f`u,
hoi ke-t^eu f'ai s^im-s+ut, s'ong-su"t ch^u"n-l^i ke ng`in y^en-k^a m`o-th`in. Chhai k`i-t^eu ke s^im-ngi'en ch^ung, kin-khi`en put-ko he fat-chh`oi ke m`un-lu thin-thin!
M`o `m-chh+ok, ng`in na t^i-chiuk, kin-khi`en tit-khok voi p^un k`i tet-t'o thai li-yit.
Ng`ai-t^eu l`oi li'a su"-ki^en, s^ung-s'u kh^ung-kh^ung; ng`ai-t^eu ya tai-`m-ch'eu m'a-ke!
Ng`ai-t^eu na y^u h'o s+u"t, y^u h'o chok, chhiu oi t^i-chiuk.
Ke-t^eu si'ong-oi fat-chh`oi ke ng`in ham-ng+ip y'u-f+et ke t^i-poi, p^un t^o-t^o v`u-t^i l^au voi hoi-ng`in ke y+uk-mong chh`an-t'en, chui-heu chhiu chh`u"m-l`un m+et-m`ong thet-hi.
Th^am-chh`oi he van-ok ke k^in-ngi`en. Y^u-t^eu ng`in y^in-vi th^am-oi chhi`en-chh`oi chhiu l`i-kh^oi sin-ngi'ong ke tho-lu, chhu"-k^a su-chhin thung-kh'u, s^ong-hoi s^im-l`in.
Lun-t'o ng`i li'a s+uk Song-ti ke ng`in, ng`i oi s'am-phit li'a-t^eu su". Oi ch^ui-khi`u chu"n-ngi, kin-khi`en, sin-s^im, oi-s^im, ngi^un-nai, l^au v^un-y`u.

Chhai sin-ngi'ong ke p'i-soi t'ang-k^o, ng`i oi chhin-miang-'e ch'eu, vi chhu"-k^a y`ang-t'o y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang; vi-t'o li'a-ke y'un-s^en, ng`i p^un Song-ti f^u-seu, ya chhai t^o-t^o chu"n-ng`in ke mien-chhi`en, y'i-k^in k^ung-kh^oi si^en-ko li'a m^i-h'o ke sin-ngi'ong.

Kh`i-s+u"t, K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u chhai Ph`ang-si^u-P'i-l^a-t^o mien-chhi`en cho-chu"n ke s`u", su"t cho m^i-h'o ke si^en-ko. Chhai su s^ang-miang p^un van-v+ut ke Song-ti l^au li'a-vi Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, ng`ai f^un-fu ng`i:
Oi m`o khiet-ti'am, m`o h'o-hi`am ch^un-s'u ng`i s'o chiap-su ke min-lin, chh+u"t-to ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk hi'en-hien ke-ngit.
S`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u", Song-ti voi ham k`i hi'en-hien; Song-ti he kh^am-tet chh^u"n-siung, th+uk-yit v`u-ngi ke Ch'u-ch'ai, van-v`ong ke V`ong, van-ch'u ke Ch'u.

V`i-y^u K`i he `m-voi s'i ke. K`i h+et chhai ng`in m`o phan-fap chiap-khiun ke k^ong t^i-poi; m`o ng`in su"t kien-ko K`i, ya m`o ng`in khon-tet-t'o K`i. Ngien ch^un-kui l^au y'un-y'en ke khi`en-piang k^ui-p^un K`i! ^A-m'en.

Ke-t^eu chhai k^im-s^en fu-chiuk ke ng`in, ng`i oi k'in-kie k`i-t^eu: `M-h'o ki^eu-ngau; `m-h'o chi^ong h^i-mong piong chhai m`o thin-chh+ok ke chhi`en-chh`oi t'ang-k^o; f'an-ch'on oi y'i-kho chi^ong van-v+ut f^ung-f^ung fu-fu su p^un ng`ai-t^eu hi'ong-su ke Song-ti.
Oi f^un-fu k`i-t^eu h`ang-san, chhai h'o-su"-song fu-chiuk, k^am-s^im kiu-chi, l+ok-yi f^un-hi'ong.
'An-ngi`ong cho, chhiu-he vi chhu"-k^a chit-chh`un chh`oi-p'o, vi chi^ong-l`oi kien-l+ip ki^en-ku ke thi-k^i, l`oi p'a-ak ch^u"n ke s^ang-miang.
Th`i-m^o-thai ^a, ng`i oi h'o-h'o p'o-s'u s'o thok-fu ng`i ke. Oi phit-mi^en ke-t^eu m`o kin-khi`en ke kh^ung-th`am, l^au s'o-vi "chu"-su"t" ke ch^en-lun.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in l'au-t'o chhu"-k^a y'i-k^in y^u li'a chu"-su"t, kiet-k'o sa m`i-su"t sin-ngi'ong ke f^ong-hiong. Ngien Song-ti su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai fung Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cho K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke s'u"-th`u, l`oi si^en-pu Song-ti th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s'o yin-h'i ke s^in s^ang-miang.
Ng`ai si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i --- ng`ai s'o chh^in-oi ke lai-'e Th`i-m^o-thai: Ngien ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en, l`in-m'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i!

Ng`ai ngit-ya kh`i-t'o ke s`u", m`o yit-p'ai m`o si'ong-ngiam ng`i; si'ong-t'o ng`i, ng`ai chhiu k'am-chhia Song-ti, chhiu-he ng`ai th`ung ch'u-si^en khiung-yong yung chh^in-ph+ak ke li`ong-s^im s'o kin-pai ke Song-ti.
Yit si'ong-t'o l`i-ph+et ke s`u" ng`i s'o li`u ke muk-chu"p, ng`ai chhiu pet-chhiet si'ong-oi kien ng`i; khon-t'o ng`i, ng`ai chang voi m^an-s^im f^on-h'i.

Ng`ai ki-tet ng`i ke-ch'ung s`un-ch^u"n ke sin-s^im; li'a sin-s^im si^en-chhi`en chhai ngi^a chi'a-ph`o L`o-y'i l^au ngi^a-m^e Y^u-n`i-k^i ke s^im-t'u; ng`ai chh^u"m-sin, li'a sin-s^im ya chhai ng`i ke s^im-t'u.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai th`i-si'ang ng`i: Ng`ai vi ng`i on-s'u ke s`u", Song-ti su-p^un ng`i ke ^en-su, ng`i oi p^un k`i chhiong f'o 'an-ngi`ong chh+ok-h^a-hi.
Y^in-vi, Song-ti s'o su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ke L`in, `m-he oi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu pien m`o-t'am; ti^en-to, K`i ke L`in voi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu chh^ung-m^an l+it-liong, oi-s^im, l^au chiet-chu".

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, vi ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u cho-chu"n li'a-khien su", ng`i `m-h'o khon-cho kien-seu, ya `m-h'o y^in-vi ng`ai vi Ch'u ke y`en-ku s`ang-cho si`u-fam l`oi k'am-kok kien-seu. Ng`i oi cheu Song-ti s'o-su ke l+it-liong, vi fuk-y^im si^ong-khiung l`oi f^un-t^am kh'u-nan.

Song-ti ch'u"n-kiu ng`ai-t^eu, f^u-seu ng`ai-t^eu cho K`i su"n-kiet ke ch'u"-m`in, pin `m-he ng`ai-t^eu y^u m'a-ke h'o h`ang-v`i, he y^in-vi K`i ke ch'u"-yi l^au ^en-ti'en. Chhai van-su" y^i-chhi`en, K`i y'i-k^in th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u chi^ong li'a ^en-ti'en su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu l'e;

li'a-ha, th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke kong-l`im, li'a ^en-ti'en chhiu hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi. K^i-tuk y'i-k^in f'i-m+et s'i ke khi`en-su", th^ung-ko fuk-y^im chi^ong `m-voi m+et-m`ong ke s^ang-miang p'eu-m`in chhut-l`oi.
Vi-t'o li'a-ke fuk-y^im, Song-ti ch'u"-phai ng`ai cho chh`on-tho-ng`in, s'u"-th`u, l^au kau-s^u".

S'o-y^i, ng`ai chang voi su-t'o li'a-t^eu kh'u-nan. Ch'ung-he, ng`ai `m-voi k'am-kok kien-seu, y^in-vi ng`ai ngin-su"t ng`ai s'o sin-kho ke Song-ti, ya chh^u"m-sin K`i voi p'o-s'u K`i s'o k^au-thok ng`ai ke, chh+u"t-to Ch'u chai-l`oi ke-ngit.

Ng`i oi ki^en-chh`u" ch^un-s'u tui ng`ai s'o-h+ok ke khien-chhi`on ke ch^u"n-tho, khon-cho k^ui-fam, ya oi ki^en-chh`u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en s'o tet-t'o ke sin-s^im l^au oi-s^im.
Ng`i oi y'i-kho h+et chhai ng`ai-t^eu nui-s^im ke Su"n-L`in, h'o-h'o p'o-s'u s'o k^au-thok ng`i ke ch^u"n-tho.
Ng`i t^i, chhai ^A-se-^a-s'en ke ng`in chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi ng`ai, p^au-h`am F^i-kit-lu l^au Het-m^o-kh`i-n`i.
Ngien Ch'u l`in-m'en ^A-n`i-set-fut yit-k^a; y^in-vi k`i h'o-t^o p'ai k'u-li ng`ai, p^un ng`ai s^im-s`u"n s'ong-khoai. K`i m`o y^in-vi ng`ai s`ang-cho si`u-fam l`oi k'am-kok kien-seu,
f'an-ch'on, yit to L`o-m^a chhiu ngi+et-s^im chh`im ng`ai, chh+u"t-to chh`im-t'o.
Ngien Ch'u chhai chhu"-k^a chai-l`oi ke-ngit s^u"-^en, p^un k`i tet-t'o Song-ch'u ke l`in-m'en! K`i chhai Y^i-fut-s'o vi ng`ai cho chhin-t^o su"-chh`in, li'a he ng`i chh^in-chh'u t^i ke.
Ng`ai ke lai-'e ^a, ng`i oi th^ung-ko K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u s'o-su ke ^en-ti'en k^ong-khi`ong h'i-l`oi.
Ng`i chhai chhin-t^o chu"n-ng`in mien-chhi`en tui ng`ai li^ang-su ke kau-hiun, ng`i ya yin-k^oi k^au-thok p^un ke-t^eu ng`i s'o sin-yung yu n`en k^au ph+et-ng`in ke ng`in.
S^u"n-v`i K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke ch^in-p^in, ng`i oi si^ong-khiung l`oi f^un-t^am kh'u-nan.
Yit-ke t^ong-p^in ke ng`in oi ch^en-chh'i ch'ong-k^on ke chh^u"n-chan, chhiu `m-h'o p^un y`ang-ngoi ke su"-chh`in chh`an-s^u"n.
Yun-thung-y`en p'i-soi ke s`u" na m`o ch^un-s'u k^ui-chet, chhiu `m-s'u" si'ong-oi tet-t'o chi'ong-s'ong.
Sat-m^ang k^ang-chung ke n`ung-f^u yin-t^ong si^en hi'ong-su s'o s^u-s`u"n ke.
Ng`i oi h'o-h'o s^u"-si'ong ng`ai s'o-k'ong ke fa, y^in-vi Ch'u yit-thin voi p^un ng`i m`in-ph+ak yit-chhiet su"-chh`in.
Ng`i oi ki-tet Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk; k`i he Thai-v'i ke heu-thoi, k`i y'i-k^in tui s'i-ng`in ch^ung f+uk-f+at l'e; li'a chhiu-he ng`ai s'o-chh`on ke fuk-y^im.
Ng`ai y^in-vi li'a fuk-y^im su thung-kh'u, su"m-chu" p^un-ng`in chhiong si`u-fam 'an-ngi`ong thak-t'en; ch'ung-he, Song-ti ke fa `m-voi p^un-ng`in thak-t'en.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai vi Song-ti s'o ki'en-si'en ke ch'u"-m`in ngi^un-su li'a yit-chhiet, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu ya voi tet-t'o tui K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi ke ch'u"n-kiu l^au y'un-y'en ke y`ung-yeu.
H^a-poi li'a-chham fa he ch^u"n-s+u"t kh'o-sin ke: Ng`ai-t^eu na th`ung k`i khiung-ha s'i, chhiu voi th`ung k`i khiung-ha s^ang.
Ng`ai-t^eu na-he ngi^un-nai to-t'ai, chhiu voi th`ung k`i khiung-ha ch'ong-khi`en. Ng`ai-t^eu na-he `m ngin k`i, k`i ya voi `m ngin ng`ai-t^eu.
Ng`ai-t^eu na-he m`o sin-yung, k`i h`an-he ch^u"n-s+u"t kh'o-sin, y^in-vi k`i `m-voi v`i-poi chhu"-k^a.
Ng`i oi th`i-si'ang thai-k^a, chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en ngi`am-ngi`am k'in-kie k`i-t^eu: `M-h'o khang su"-ngi'en; li'a he m`o li-yit ke su", ch'u" voi phai-fai th^ang-t'o ke ng`in.
Oi chhin-l+it chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en cho yit-ke kh^am-tet kh'au-ngiam, `m-voi kien-seu ke k^ung-ng`in, chu"n-khok k'ong-ki'e Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho.
Oi s'am-kh^oi m`o-k^in-m`o-k'i ke kh^ung-th`am, y^in-vi li'a-lui ke th`am-lun voi hoi ng`in l`i-kh^oi Song-ti;
k`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke he chhiong th+uk-chh^ong, k'in chhe k'in thai-t+ap. Li'a-t^eu ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, y^u H'i-m'i-n^ai l^au F^i-l^i-th`u;
k`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi ch^u"n-l^i, ch'u-ch^ong f+uk-f+at ke su" y'i-k^in ko-thet l'e, hoi ph+et-ng`in sin-s^im y`eu-thung.

Ch'ung-he, Song-ti s'o-l+ip ki^en-ku ke k^in-k^i he `m-voi y`eu-thung ke; chhai li'a thi-k^i t'ang-k^o khat-t'en: "Ch'u ngin-su"t s+uk K`i ke ng`in", yu khat-t'en: "F`am chhu"-ngin s+uk Ch'u ke, yit-thin oi hi-chhi+et si`a-ok."

M^i-yit-ke thai k^a-th`in l^ung-ch'ung y^u chhin-t^o hi-m'en, `m t^an-chhiang y^u k^im-hi ngi`un-hi, ya y^u su-'e ke, f`i-`e ke; y^u-t^eu he vi-t'o kui-chhung ke yung-th`u, y^u-t^eu he vi-t'o p^i-chhien ke yung-th`u.
Ng`in na chhu"-kiet, thot-l`i yit-chhiet p^i-chhien ke su", chhiu voi cho kui-chhung ke hi-m'en, s`ang-cho su"n-kiet, p^un Ch'u s'o yung, l`oi h`ang kok-ch'ung ke san-su".

Ng`i `m-h'o chhiong heu-s^ang-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong ph`in chh`in-y+uk h`ang-su"; oi th`ung ke-t^eu s^im s`un-kiet, khi`u Ch'u p^ong-chhu ke ng`in si^ong-khiung ch^ui-khi`u chu"n-ngi, sin-s^im, oi-s^im, pin f`o-ph`in.
Oi hi-chhi+et ke-t^eu ngong-ngong v`u-t^i ke phien-lun; ng`i t^i, li'a-ch'ung phien-lun s`ong-s`ong voi ngi^a-h'i y^en-k^a.
Ch'u ke ph+uk-ng`in cho-`m-tet y^en-k^a; k`i yin-k^oi f`o-f`o hi-hi l`oi tui-thai chung-ng`in, ngin-ch^u"n kau-th^o ng`in, chh`un-s^im ngi^un-nai,
yung v^un-y`u khien-va f'an-tui ke ng`in. F+et-ch'a Song-ti voi p^un k`i-t^eu f'i-k'oi ke k^i-fi, p^un k`i-t^eu ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i.
'An-ngi`ong, s^ui-y`en M^o-k'ui chi^ong k`i-t^eu chok-hi, khi`ong-pet k`i-t^eu sun-f+uk, k`i-t^eu ya kh'o-n`en voi si'ang ko-l`oi, tui k`i ke l`o-mi'ong t^i-poi ch'eu-chhut-l`oi.
Ng`i oi t^i, chhai su"-kie ke m+at-kh`i voi y^u ch'ung-ch'ung ke kh'u-nan.
Ke-s`u", ng`in voi t^an-chhiang ku chhu"-k^a, th^am-chh`oi, chhu"-kho^a, ki^eu-ngau, f'i-pong, phoi-ngi+ak y`a-^oi, m`ong-^en poi-ngi, m`o su"n-kiet,
m`o chh^in-chh`in, `m-h'en ngi`eu ng`in, hau k'ong y`eu-ngi`en, y^a-m`an, chh^u-phau, yen-hen li`ong-san.
K`i-t^eu voi phoi-ngi+ak ch'u-ng`in, chhut-mai ph`en-y^u, s`ui-yi lon-h`ang, chhu"-k^o chhu"-thai, chhin-oi hi'ong-l+ok y`ang-ko kin-oi Song-ti.
K`i-t^eu y^u kin-khi`en ke ngoi-p'eu, ch'ung-he kh^i-chhi+et ch^u"n-s+u"t ke kin-khi`en. Li'a-ch'ung ng`in, ng`i oi s'am-kh^oi.

K`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u-t^eu ng`in t^ong voi chon, ng+ip-to ph+et-ng`in vuk-h^a, hi m`i-f+et ke-t^eu s^im-chu" ngi^on-ngi+ok, p^un chhui ap-chu", p^un kok-ch'ung y+uk-mong khi^en-t'en-ch'eu ke fu-'ng.
Ke-t^eu fu-'ng s^ui-y`en s`ong-s`ong h+ok-s+ip, ch'ung-he yit-chh+u"t m`o fap-thu ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i.

Chhiu-chhiong k'u-s`u"-thoi ke Ng^a-n`i l^au Y`ong-pu-l`ui f'an-tui M^o-s^i 'an-ngi`ong, li'a-ha li'a-t^eu ng`in ya cheu-yong f'an-tui ch^u"n-l^i. K`i-t^eu he s^im-s^u" phai-fai ke ng`in, chhai sin-ngi'ong-song kh^i-`m-h+et.
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu `m-voi y^u ph+et ke phu-su l'e; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke ngong-tong voi chhai chung-ng`in mien-chhi`en hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi, chhiong Ng^a-n`i l^au Y`ong-pu-l`ui yit-yong.
Lun-t'o ng`i, ng`i y'i-k^in sun-chhi`ung ng`ai ke kau-hiun, h+ok ng`ai ke cho-ng`in, ng`ai ke chu"-hiong, sin-s^im, thai-liong, oi-s^im, l^au ngi^un-nai,

yu f^un-t^am ng`ai s'o-su ke pet-hoi l^au kh'u-nan. Chhai ^On-th`i-^a, Y^i-k^o-ngiam, l^au Lu-s^u"-tet li'a-t^eu thi-f^ong, ng`ai s'o t`u-t'o ke l^au s'o ngi^un-su ke pet-hoi, ng`i chhi`on-phu t^i; ch'ung-he, Ch'u kiu ng`ai thot-l`i li'a yit-chhiet.
M`o `m-chh+ok, f`am l+ip-chu" th`en K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi ko kin-khi`en s^en-f+at ke ng`in, l^ung-ch'ung voi t`u-t'o pet-hoi.
Si`a-ok ke ng`in l^au ke-t^eu lau-'e, k`i-t^eu ke chh`in-kh'ong ya voi yit-ngit p'i yit-ngit kha f'ai; k`i-t^eu phien ph+et-ng`in, ya p^un-ng`in phien.
Lun-t'o ng`i, ng`i oi ki^en-chh`u" s'o h+ok-s+ip l^au khok-sin ke ch^u"n-l^i. Ng`i t^i m'a-ng`in he ng`i ke th'o-s^u";
ng`i ya ki-tet, ng`i chhi`ung-se chhiu m`in-ph+ak Su"n-k^in, chhiu-he n`en p^un ng`i tet-t'o chu"-fi, ch'u"-su" ng`i th^ung-ko sin K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u l`oi tet-kiu ke s^u.
Chhi`on-p'un Su"n-k^in he su Song-ti ke l`in-k'am l`oi si'a ke, tui kau-th^o ch^u"n-l^i, ch'u"-chit chho-ngu, kiu-chu"n ko-su"t, ch'u"-su" ng`in-s^en ke chu"n-lu, l^ung-ch'ung y^u li-yit,
oi p^un s+uk Song-ti ke ng`in tet-t'o chh^ung-chiuk ke ch'un-phi, n`en h`ang kok-ch'ung ke san-su".
Chhai Song-ti l^au oi s'u"m-phan s'o-y^u s^ang-ng`in l^au s'i-ng`in ke K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, ng`ai ph`in k`i ke hi'en-hien l^au k`i ke ch'u-khi`en, pet-chhiet khien-va ng`i:
Oi chh`on fuk-y^im, m`o-lun s`u"-k^i h'o-f'ai ch'ung-oi chh`on! Oi yung chui-thai ke nai-s^im l^au kok-yong ke kau-hiun l`oi chit-phi, k'in-kie, l^au khien-mi^en.
S`u"-chiet voi to, ke-s`u" ng`in voi kh^i-chhi+et khien-chhi`on ke kau-hiun, sun chhu"-k^a ke y+uk-mong, tak s'o-chhai hi pai-s^u", l`oi m^an-chiuk k`i-t^eu t^ong y^ong ke ng'i-k^ung.
K`i-t^eu voi ^em-t'en ng'i-k^ung `m-th^ang ch^u"n-l^i, f'an-ch'on phi^en-hiong m`o-y'ang m`o-chiak ke chh`on-sot.

Ch'ung-he ng`i, m`o-lun chh`in-kh'ong ngi'ong-p^an, ng`i yit-thin oi ki'un-s'u"m, ya oi ngi^un-su kh'u-nan, cho chh`on-tho-ng`in yin-t^ong cho ke k^ung-chok, l`oi chhin Song-ti ph+uk-ng`in ke chu"t-vu.
Ko^an-he ng`ai, ng`ai h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a ke s`u"-ki^en to l'e; li'a-ha chhiu-he ng`ai l`i-kh^oi ng`in-ki^en ke s`u"-chiet.
Kh^am-tet t'a-piang ke p'i-soi, ng`ai y'i-k^in piang-ko l'e; yin-t^ong ch'eu ke lu-chh`ang, ng`ai y'i-k^in ch'eu-theu l'e; yin-t^ong s'u ke sin-ngi'ong, ng`ai ya y'i-k^in ch^un-s'u l'e.

Li'a-ha, su"n-li ke chi'ong-s'ong t'en-t'en ng`ai; cheu k^ung-ngi s^u"-h`ang s'u"m-phan ke Ch'u, chhai Y^a-s^u chai-l`oi ke-ngit, oi chi^ong k^ung-ngi ke mi^en-li`u su-p^un ng`ai, `m t^an-chhiang su-p^un ng`ai, ya oi su-p^un s'o-y^u oi-mu t'en-heu k`i hi'en-hien ke ng`in.
Ng`i oi kiak-kiak l`oi ng`ai li'a-vi.
Y^in-vi T'i-m^a th^am-oi hien-su", chhiu l`i-kh^oi ng`ai hi Thiap-sat-l`o-n`i-k^a l'e. Kiet-l+et-su" hi K^a-l^a-thai, Th`i-t^o hi Th+at-m^a-thai;
ch'u"-y^u Lu-k^a th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha. Ng`i oi hi chh`im M^a-kh'o, tai k`i khiung-ha l`oi, y^in-vi k`i voi l^au ng`ai then-s'u.
Ng`ai y'i-k^in phai Th^ui-k^i-k'u hi Y^i-fut-s'o.

Ng`i l`oi ke s`u", oi chi^ong ng`ai chhai Th+it-l`o-^a ke s`u" li`u chhai K^a-pu vuk-h^a ke-li^ang thai-'o tai-l`oi; th`ung-s`u", oi chi^ong ke-t^eu s^u, th+it-ph+et he ke k'i-p'un y`ong-ph`i ke s^u-ki'en ya khiung-ha tai-l`oi.
T'a-th`ung s^u"-fu ^A-l+it-s^an-thai t^o f^ong-mien hoi ng`ai; Ch'u voi cheu k`i s'o-cho ke po-yin k`i.
Ng`i chhu"-k^a ya oi th`i-f`ong k`i, y^in-vi k`i chhin f'an-tui ng`ai-t^eu s'o-chh`on ke tho-l^i.
Ng`ai thi-yit-p'ai vi chhu"-k^a phien-fu ke s`u", m`o pan-s`a l`oi p^ong-chhu, thai-k^a chhi`on-phu l`i-kh^oi ng`ai. Ngien Song-ti m+ok chit-f+at k`i-t^eu!

V`i-y^u Ch'u chhai ng`ai s^u"n-pi^en ch^u"-chh`u" ng`ai, p^un ng`ai l+it-liong chi^ong ch^u"n-tho chh`on-p^un s'o-y^u ke Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in, chh`on-to chhin v`an-chhi`on; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai chhiu tui s^u"-'e ke choi-t'u tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu.
Ch'u yit-thin voi kiu ng`ai thot-l`i yit-chhiet si`a-ok, chiap ng`ai ^on-^on chhi`on-chhi`on to k`i ke thi^en-koet hi. Ngien y`ung-k^ong k^ui-p^un k`i, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'un y'en-y'en! ^A-m'en.
Chhi'ang thoi ng`ai tui Pak-k^i-l^a, ^A-k^i-l^a li'ong k^ung-ph`o, l^au ^A-n`i-set-fut yit-k^a ng`in chhi'ang-^on.
Y^i-l^a-t^u ki-si+uk h+et chhai K^o-l`im-t^o l'e. Th+it-l`o-f^i-m^o pot-phiang, ng`ai ham k`i li`u chhai M'i-li-t^u.

Ng`i oi chhin-liong chhai ng+ip-t^ung y^i-chhi`en k'on-l`oi. Y^u-pu-l`o, Pu-thi`en, Li-n'u, 'ng sin-th`u Khiet-l`o-th+it-ng^a, l^au kh`i-th^a s'o-y^u ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi chhi`on-phu tui ng`i chhi'ang-^on.
Ngien Ch'u s`ong chhai ng`i s^im-nui! Ngien Song-ti su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu!

Ng`ai he P'o-l`o, Song-ti ke ph+uk-ng`in, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai m`ung-seu l^au fung chh^ai-phai l`oi p^ong-chhu Song-ti ke si'en-m`in kien-l+ip sin-ngi'ong, tai-li^ang k`i-t^eu ngin-su"t ng`ai-t^eu ke sin-ngi'ong s'o k^au ke ch^u"n-l^i;

li'a ch^u"n-l^i he yung phan-mong y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang cho k^in-k'i. Song-ti he `m-voi k'ong f^a-li^au ke! K`i chhai van-su" y^i-chhi`en, y'i-k^in yin-h'i oi chi^ong li'a y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu,

s`u"-k^i s`u"n-s+uk ke s`u", K`i chhiu th^ung-ko chh`on fuk-y^im chi^ong K`i ke ch^u"n-tho hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi. Ng`ai su k^au-thok, fung ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Song-ti ke min-lin, p`a-h'i chh`on li'a ch^u"n-tho ke ngim-vu.

Th`i-t^o, ng`ai li'a-ha si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i; ng`i chhai ng`ai-t^eu khiung-th`ung ke sin-ngi'ong-song he ng`ai ch^u"n ke lai-'e. Ngien ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i!
Ng`ai li`u ng`i chhai Khiet-l^i-th+it, muk-tit he oi ng`i chh'u-l^i h`an-m`ang phan-h'o ke su"-vu, ya oi ng`i chhai tak-ke s`ang-su" sat-l+ip ch'ong-l'o. Ng`ai su"t f^un-fu:
Cho ch'ong-l'o ke yit-thin oi he m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in. K`i yin-t^ong ch'u"-y^u yit-ke p^u-ngi`ong; k`i ke ch'u"-'ng yin-k^oi he sin-th`u, m`o fong-thong ya m`o `m-su k'on-kau ke f'ai mi`ang-s^ang.

Ki-y`en cho kau-fi ke li^ang-chhiu t^am-fu Song-ti ke k^ung-chok, k`i chhiu yin-k^oi oi cho m`o h'o hi`am ke ng`in. K`i m+ok ku-chu"p, m+ok phau-chhau, m+ok chi'u-chui, m+ok si^ong-t'a, m+ok th^am-chh`oi;
oi l+ok-yi kho'an-thai ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in, f^on-h'i cho h'o-su", v'un-chhung, chu"n-chh+u"t, su"n-kiet, chiet-chu".

Oi ki^en-s'u ke kh'o-kho, f`u-h+ap ch^u"n-tho ke kau-hiun; 'an-ngi`ong, chang y^u phan-fap yung khien-chhi`on ke kau-hiun l`oi k'am-fa ph+et-ng`in, pin kiu-chu"n ke-t^eu f'an-tui ke ng`in, ch'u"-chhut k`i-t^eu ke `m-chh+ok.
Y^in-vi y^u chhin-t^o ng`in v`i-phoi ch^u"n-tho, yung m`o-k^in-m`o-k'i ke fa kh^i-phien ng`in, th+it-ph+et he ke-t^eu ch'u-ch^ong oi chiap-su kot-l^i ke Y`u-thai K^i-tuk-th`u.
Ng`i oi chi^ong ke-t^eu ng`in ke choi set-t'en; k`i-t^eu vi-t'o th^am-th`u chhi`en-chh`oi, y'i-k^in yung `m yin-k^oi chh`on-k'ong ke h+ok-sot pho-fai chhin-t^o ng`in ke k^a-th`in.

Chhai Khiet-l^i-th+it-ng`in ch^ung-ki^en, y^u p'un-thi yit-ke si^en-t^i su"t 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: " Khiet-l^i-th+it-ng`in s`ong-s`ong k'ong f^a-li^au, he hi^ung-ok ke kh`im-chhu, s`ai-s+u"t yu l^an-s^u"."
K`i li'a-ke fa m`o `m-chh+ok. S'o-y^i, ng`i yit-thin oi ngi`am-ngi`am chit-phi k`i-t^eu, h'o p^un k`i-t^eu y^u khien-chhi`on ke sin-ngi'ong,
`m-oi chai th^ang Y`u-thai-ng`in ke-t^eu m`o-y'ang m`o-chiak ke chh`on-sot, l^au ke-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et ch^u"n-l^i ke ng`in s'o ki^en-chh`u" ke k^ui-k'i.

Tui chhiang-li ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, yit-chhiet l^ung-ch'ung he chhiang-li ke; ch'ung-he tui ke-t^eu l'a-sap l^au `m-sin ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, m`o yit-yong t^ung-s^i he chhiang-li ke, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke s^im-k^on l^au thi^en-li`ong chhi`on-phu l'a-sap to k'ong-`m-tet.

K`i-t^eu ki^en-chh`u" k'ong k`i-t^eu ngin-su"t Song-ti; ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i f'eu-ngin K`i. K`i-t^eu he tet-ng`in-n^au ke ng`in, he phoi-ngi+ak ke ng`in, m`o kh'o-n`en cho-chhut m'a-ke h'o-su" l`oi!
Lun-t'o ng`i, ng`i ke kau-th^o thin-chh+ok oi h+ap khien-chhi`on ke kau-hiun.
Ng`i oi khien l'o-ng`in-k^a, ham k`i-t^eu cho-ng`in oi v'un-chhung, y^u h'o tet-hen, oi yok-suk chhu"-k^a, oi ch^ui-khi`u khien-chhi`on ke sin-s^im, oi-s^im, l^au nai-s^im.
Khiung-yong, ng`i ya oi khien ngi`en-ch'ong fu-'ng, ham k`i-t^eu cho-ng`in oi ki'un-s'u"m, m+ok lun ng`in su"-f^i, m+ok cho chi'u n`ung-chh`oi. K`i-t^eu oi cho h'o p'ong-yong,
l`oi kau-th^o heu-s^ang ke fu-'ng, k^au k`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an siak l'o-k^ung l^au ch'u"-'ng;
hiun-lien k`i-t^eu ngi'ong-p^an yok-suk chhu"-k^a, ko ch^u"n-kiet ke s^en-f+at, liau-l^i k^a-vu, y^u chh`u"-p^i s^im, sun-chhi`ung l'o-k^ung, mi^en-tet Song-ti ke tho su f'i-pong.
Khiung-yong, ng`i ya oi khien heu-s^ang-ng`in, ham k`i-t^eu oi yok-suk chhu"-k^a.
T^ong-y`en, ng`i chhu"-k^a m`o-lun chhai nai f^ong-mien t^u oi y^u h'o h`ang-v`i, cho ng`in ke m`u-fam. K^au ng`in ke s`u" oi s`u"n-khi'en, v'un-chhung,

s'o k'ong ke fa oi th'o-tong, `m-h'o p^un-ng`in ch'u"-chit. 'An-ngi`ong, ke-t^eu hau f'an-tui ke ng`in, y^in-vi chh`im `m-t'o ng`ai-t^eu ke `m-chh+ok, chhiu m`o fa h'o k'ong, f'an-ch'on chhu"-k^a k'am-kok kien-seu.
Ng`i oi khien cho n`u-ph+uk ke, ham k`i-t^eu oi f+uk-chhi`ung ch'u-ng`in, f`am-su" p^un ch'u-ng`in f^on-h'i, m+ok t`u-chhang k`i-t^eu,

ya cho-`m-tet th^eu-n^a k`i-t^eu ke t^ung-s^i; ti^en-to, oi chhai tak-yong su"-song hi'en-chhut ch^ung-s^im l^au y^u sin-yung. 'An-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke yit-chhiet chang voi s'u" ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Song-ti ke kau-hiun tet-t'o ch^un-chhung.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ch'u"n-kiu chhi`on ng`in-lui ke ^en-ti'en y'i-k^in hi'en-m`in chhut-l`oi l'e.
Li'a ^en-ti'en hiun-lien ng`ai-t^eu: Oi hi-chhi+et m`o kin-khi`en ke s^en-f+at l^au s+uk-su" ke s^u"-y+uk; chhai k^im-s^en oi yung chiet-chu", chu"n-chh+u"t, l^au kin-khi`en l`oi ko ngit-`e,
l`oi t'en-heu ng`ai-t^eu s'o phan-mong m`ung-^en ke ngit-`e l`oi-to. Ke-s`u", chu"-thai ke Song-ti --- ng`ai-t^eu Kiu-ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke y`ung-yeu oi hi'en-hien.

K^i-tuk vi ng`ai-t^eu h^i-s^en chhu"-k^a, he oi kiu-s+uk ng`ai-t^eu thot-l`i yit-chhiet ke si`a-ok, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu s`ang-cho k`i s`un-kiet ke ch'u"-m`in l`oi k^ui-s+uk k`i, ngi+et-s^im l`oi h`ang-san.
Ng`i oi k'ong-lun li'a-t^eu su", h'o-h'o yun-yung ng`i ke khi`en-piang l`oi khien-mi^en ng`in ya-he chit-phi ng`in; `m-h'o p^un ng`in khon-khi^ang ng`i.
Ng`i oi th`i-si'ang thai-k^a, ham k`i-t^eu oi f+uk-chhi`ung chu"p-chu"n-ch'a l^au ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, th^ang-chhi`ung min-lin, s`ui-s`u" s`ui-thi hi-h`ang kok-ch'ung ke h'o-su".
Khien k`i-t^eu m+ok k'ong ph+et-ng`in ke f'ai-fa, m+ok si^ong-ch^ang; cho-ng`in oi f`o-hi, yung v^un-y`u ke thai-thu l`oi tui-thai s'o-y^u ke ng`in.

Ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-p'ai ya he m`o chu"-su"t, phoi-ngi+ak, l^au su m`i-f+et; ng`ai-t^eu su"t cho kok-ch'ung chh`in-y+uk l^au hi'ong-l+ok ke n`u-ph+uk, s^en-f+at chhai ok-th+uk l^au chhit-tu ke t^ong-ch^ung, p'i-chh'u" yen-hen.

Ch'ung-he, ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Song-ti y'i-k^in hi'en-chhut K`i ke chh`u"-oi, th^ung-ko chh`ung-s^en ke s'e-l^i l^au Su"n-L`in s'o-su ke kien-s^in l`oi ch'u"n-kiu ng`ai-t^eu; li'a `m-he y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu chhu"-k^a y^u m'a-ke h'o h`ang-v`i, he y^in-vi K`i l`in-m'en ng`ai-t^eu.
Th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Kiu-ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, Song-ti chi^ong Su"n-L`in f^ung-f^ung fu-fu t'o chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke s^u"n-song;
tui K`i ke ^en-ti'en, Song-ti s'u" ng`ai-t^eu th`ung K`i y^u chu"n-khok ke ko^an-he, l`oi tet-t'o s'o phan-mong ke y'un-y'en ke s^ang-miang.

Li'a-ke fa he khok-s+u"t y^u-y'ang ke. Ng`ai h^i-mong ng`i th+it-ph+et khi`ong-thiau li'a-t^eu su"-chh`in, h'o p^un ke-t^eu sin Song-ti ke ng`in ngi+et-s^im h`ang-san; h`ang-san he chhin chi^ang yu tui ng`in y^u li-yit ke su".
Oi phit-mi^en ngong-tong ke phien-lun, m+ok vi chh+uk-ph'u ch^en-lun, m+ok y^en-k^a ya-he vi fap-l+it ke mun-th`i si^ong-ch^ang; y^in-vi li'a-t^eu chhi`on he m`o ka-chh+u"t, m`o li-yit ke.
Tui chu"-chho f^un-ch^en ke ng`in, k'in-ko k`i yit-li'ong-p'ai, k`i h`an-he `m th^ang, chhiu `m-h'o chai th`ung k`i l`oi-v^ong.
Y^in-vi ng`i t^i, li'a-ch'ung ng`in y'i-k^in f'ai-chhin l'e, k`i `m t^an-chhiang fam-chhui, yu thin chhu"-k^a ke chhui.
Ng`ai phai ^A-th`i-m^a ya-he Th^ui-k^i-k'u hi ng`i ke-vi ke s`u", ng`i oi si'ong-chhin phan-fap l`oi N`i-k^o-p^o-l^i kien ng`ai, y^in-vi ng`ai y'i-k^in kiet-thin oi chhai ke-vi ko-t^ung.
Oi chhin-liong p^ong-chhu S^i-n+ap l+it-s^u" l^au ^A-p^o-l`o chhut-fat hi l^i-h`ang, p^un k`i-t^eu m`o khiam m'a-ke.
S+uk ng`ai-t^eu ke ng`in oi h+ok-s+ip ngin-ch^u"n cho chu"n-t^ong ke k^ung-chok, l`oi ki^ung-kip s^en-f+at ke s^i-yeu, mi^en-tet cho h`an chhok-chhok m`o lu-yung ke ng`in.

Th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung tui ng`i chhi'ang-^on. Chhi'ang thoi ng`ai-t^eu tui ke-t^eu th`ung sin-ngi'ong ke h'o ph`en-y^u chhi'ang-^on. Ngien Song-ti su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a!
Ng`ai he P'o-l`o; ng`ai vi-t'o K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke y`en-ku s`ang-cho si`u-fam. Ng`ai l^au Th`i-m^o-thai hi^ung-thi si'a sin-'e p^un ng`i --- ng`ai-t^eu s'o chh^in-oi ke th`ung-k^ung F^i-li-m`un,
l^au chhai ngi^a vuk-h^a chhi-fi ke kau-fi, pin ^A-f^i-^a ch'i-moi, h`an-y^u th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha vi Ch'u cho-p^in ke ^A-k^i-pu.
Ngien ng`ai-t^eu ke ^A-p^a Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!
Chh^in-oi ke F^i-li-m`un ^a, ng`ai tak-p'ai kh`i-t'o ke s`u" chhiu th`i-t'o ng`i, s`ong-s`ong vi ng`i k'am-chhia ng`ai ke Song-ti;
y^in-vi ng`ai th^ang-k'ong ng`i tui chung su"n-th`u chhin y^u oi-s^im, tui Ch'u Y^a-s^u chhin y^u sin-s^im.
Ng`ai khi`u Song-ti th^ung-ko ng`i tui sin-ngi'ong s'o p'eu-hien ke th`on-khe, p^un ng`ai-t^eu chh^u"m t^i th`ung K^i-tuk kiet-li`en ke yit-chhiet h'o-chhu.
Chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ^a, ng`i ke oi-s^im p^un ng`ai kh+it-thai ke f^on-h'i l^au ^on-v'i; y^in-vi chung su"n-th`u ke s^im y'i-k^in tui ng`i tet-t'o s'ong-khoai.
Ki-y`en ng`ai he ng`i chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi ke hi^ung-thi, ng`ai p'un-l`oi cho-tet thai-t'am f^un-fu ng`i h`ang yin-k^oi h`ang ke su";

ch'ung-he, ng`ai k^am-ngien yung oi-s^im l`oi khi`u ng`i. S^ui-y`en ng`ai --- P'o-l`o he K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u ke thai-s'u", li'a-ha yu y^in-vi k`i ke y`en-ku s`ang-cho si`u-fam, ng`ai h`an-he k^am-ngien 'an-ngi`ong h`ang.
Ng`ai tui ng`i ke chhi'ang-khi`u he vi-t'o ^A-n`i-s^i-m`eu. K`i he ng`ai chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi ke lai-'e; ng`ai chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u ke s`u" s`ang-cho k`i l`in-sin ke ^a-p^a.
Th`eu-p'ai k`i tui ng`i m`o m'a-ke yung, li'a-ha k`i m`o-lun tui ng`i, tui ng`ai, l^ung-ch'ung chhin y^u-yung.
Ng`ai li'a-ha sung k`i to-ch'on ng`i ke-vi hi, chhiong he sung ng`ai ke s^im-k^on hi yit-yong.
Ng`ai p'un-l`oi si'ong-oi li`u k`i chhai ng`ai s^u"n-pi^en, ham k`i chhai ng`ai vi fuk-y^im chh^o-k^am ke s`u"-chiet thoi ng`i f+uk-su" ng`ai;
ch'ung-he, m`o ng`i ke th`ung-yi, ng`ai m+ok 'an-ngi`ong cho kha-h'o, p^un ng`i s'o-cho ke h'o-su" `m-he mi^en-ki'ong, he k^am-s^im l+ok-yi ke.
^A-n`i-s^i-m`eu chhiam-s`u" l`i-kh^oi ng`i, f+et-ch'a he oi p^un ng`i y'un-y'en tet-t'o k`i.

Li'a-ha, k`i m`o chai he yit-ke n`u-li, y'i-k^in chh^eu-ko n`u-li ke s^u"n-fun, he chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi. Tui ng`ai l`oi k'ong, k`i khok-s+u"t he 'an-ngi`ong, tui ng`i h`an-kha he! Y^in-vi k`i he ng`i ke ph+uk-ng`in, yu he Ch'u-nui ke hi^ung-thi!
S'o-y^i, ng`i na-he khon ng`ai cho chh^in-m+et ke ph`en-y^u, chhi'ang ng`i chiap-n+ap k`i ch'on-hi, chhiong he chiap-n+ap ng`ai.
Na-he k`i su"t cho tui-`m-h'i ng`i ke su", ya-he kh^ui-khiam ng`i m'a-ke, chhi`on-phu son ng`ai ke ngiak.
Ng`ai chhai li'a-vi chh^in-pit si'a h^a-l`oi: Ng`ai --- P'o-l`o fu-chit v`an. Ng`ai m`o k'ong, ng`i me t^i, ng`i khiam ng`ai ke he ng`i ke s^ang-miang!
S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ^a, vi-t'o Ch'u ke y`en-ku, khi`u ng`i p^un ng`ai li'a-ke ng`in-chh`in! Ng`ai chhai K^i-tuk t^i-poi ke hi^ung-thi ^a, khi`u ng`i p^un ng`ai ke s^im tet-t'o s'ong-khoai!
Ng`ai si'a li'a-f^ung sin-'e p^un ng`i, y^in-vi ng`ai chh^u"m-sin ng`i voi th^ang-chhi`ung ng`ai. Kh`i-s+u"t, ng`ai t^i ng`i s'o-h`ang ke voi chh^eu-ko ng`ai s'o y^eu-khi`u ke.
Th`ung-s`u", chhi'ang thoi ng`ai ch'un-phi yit-chak ki^en-f`ong; ng`ai h^i-mong Song-ti voi th^ang ng`i-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o, p^un ng`ai ch'on-to ng`i-t^eu ke-vi hi.
Vi-t'o K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u th`ung ng`ai khiung-ha chh^o-k^am ke Y^i-p^a-fut tui ng`i chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`ai ke th`ung-k^ung M^a-kh'o, ^A-l^i-th+at-k'u, T'i-m^a, l^au Lu-k^a ya tui ng`i chhi'ang-^on.
Ngien Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^en-ti'en s`ong chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^im-ch^ung!
Chhai k'u s`u"-thoi, Song-ti chhin t^o-p'ai yung kok-ch'ung f^ong-fap, th^ung-ko chung si^en-t^i tui ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en k'ong-fa;

ch'ung-he, chhai li'a m+at-heu ke ngit-`e, K`i th^ung-ko K`i ke Lai-'e tui ng`ai-t^eu k'ong-fa. Li'a-ke Lai-'e, Song-ti su"t th^ung-ko k`i chh'ong-chho y'i-chhiu, yu sat-l+ip k`i l`oi s`u"n-su van-y^u.

K`i he Song-ti ke y`ung-yeu s'o fat-chhut ke k^ong, he Song-ti p'un-chu"t ke ch^u"n-siong; k`i yung k`i thai-n`en ke fa thok-t'en van-y^u. K`i s'e-chhiang ng`in-lui ke chhui-ok y^i-heu, chhiu chh^o chhai thi^en-t'ang chu"-thai Khi`en-n`en-ch'a ke yu-phi'en.
Li'a Lai-'e ke thi-vi y'en-y'en chh^eu-ko chung thi^en-s'u", chhiong Song-ti s'o-su k`i ke mi`ang p'i thi^en-s'u" ke mi`ang kha ch^un-kui.

Song-ti chhi`ung-l`oi `m su"t tui ngim-h`o yit-ke thi^en-s'u" k'ong-ko: Ng`i he Ng`ai ke Lai-'e; k^im-p^u-ngit Ng`ai cho ng`i ke ^A-p^a. K`i ya `m su"t tui ngim-h`o yit-ke thi^en-s'u" k'ong: Ng`ai oi cho k`i ke ^A-p^a; k`i oi cho Ng`ai ke Lai-'e.
Song-ti oi chh^ai-phai K`i ke ch'ong-ch'u" l`oi su"-ki^en ke s`u"-chiet, K`i k'ong: Song-ti ke chung thi^en-s'u" l^ung-ch'ung oi pai k`i.
Ko^an-he thi^en-s'u", K`i k'ong: Song-ti p^un K`i ke s'u"-ch'a s`ang-cho f^ung, p^un K`i ke n`u-ph+uk s`ang-cho f'o-yam.
Ch'ung-he, k'ong-to Lai-'e, K`i chhiu k'ong: Song-ti ^a, Ng`i ke p'o-chho van-thoi chh`ong-chh`un! Ng`i yung k^ung-ph`in ch'ong-khi`en.
Ng`i f^on-h'i k^ung-ngi, yen-hen chhui-ok; s'o-y^i Song-ti --- ng`i ke Song-ti si'en-l+ip ng`i, p^un ng`i chh^ung-m^an h'i-l+ok, y`ang-ko th`ung-ph^an.
K`i yu k'ong: Ch'u ^a, h'i-th`eu ng`i thin thai-thi ke k^in-k^i; ch^u-thi^en ya he ng`i chh^in-s'u chh'ong-chho ke.
Thi^en-thi voi s^eu-m+et, ch'ung-he ng`i y'un-y'en chh`ong-chh`un; thi^en-thi voi chhiong s^am-fu lan-thet 'an-ngi`ong s^eu-su"t.

Ng`i oi chi^ong thi^en-thi ki'en-h'i-l`oi, chhiong ki'en ngoi-ph`au, k`i-t^eu voi chhiong s^am-fu chhiam-chhiam mut-thet; ch'ung-he ng`i y'un-y'en `m-voi k'oi-pien, ng`i ke su-ngi`en v`u-khi`ung v`u-chhin.
Song-ti chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t tui ngim-h`o yit-ke thi^en-s'u" k'ong-ko: Ng`i chh^o chhai Ng`ai ke yu-phi'en, t'en Ng`ai s'u" ng`i ke s`u-th+it ph+uk chhai ng`i ke kiok-h^a.
'An-ngi`ong, thi^en-s'u" he m'a-ke n`e? K`i-t^eu he su"-fung Song-ti ke l`in; Song-ti phai k`i-t^eu l`oi p^ong-chhu ke-t^eu oi s`u"n-su kiu-^en ke ng`in.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu yit-thin oi ki^en-s'u s'o th^ang ke ch^u"n-l^i, mi^en-tet p^un chh`eu-li`u t'a-ch'eu.

Thi^en-s'u" s'o chh`on-p^un ng`ai-t^eu ch'u-si^en ke tho-l^i y'i-k^in chu"n-m`in he khok-s+u"t ke; s'o-y^u `m sun-chhi`ung ya-he phoi-ngi+ak li'a tho-l^i ke ng`in y'i-k^in su-t'o yin-tet ke chit-f+at.

Ki-y`en he 'an-ngi`ong, na-he ng`ai-t^eu fut-li+ok 'an thai ke ch'u"n-kiu, ngi'ong-p^an s'am-tet-ch'eu chit-f+at n`e? Li'a ch'u"n-kiu chui-si^en he Ch'u p'un-s^u"n k'ong ke; ke-t^eu th^ang-t'o ke ng`in y'i-k^in tui ng`ai-t^eu chu"n-m`in ko he su"-s+u"t ke.

Song-ti chhu"-k^a ya yung s`u"n-chiak, kh`i-su", l^au kok-ch'ung ke thai-n`en l`oi k^a-khi`ong k`i-t^eu ke kien-chu"n; th`ung-s`u", K`i yu cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi, chi^ong Su"n-L`in ke ^en-su p^un-p^un ng`ai-t^eu.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o k'ong, ke chi^ong-l`oi ke su"-kie, Song-ti pin m`o k^au-p^un thi^en-s'u" k'on-l^i.
Ti^en-to, chhiong Su"n-k^in m^eu s'o-chhai k'ong ke: Song-ti ^a, ng`in son m'a-ke, Ng`i ku-ngiam k`i! Su"-ki^en-ng`in son m'a-ke, Ng`i khon-ku k`i!
Ng`i s'u" k`i chhiam-s`u" p'i thi^en-s'u" kha se; Ng`i yung y`ung-k^ong ch^un-kui cho k`i ke mi^en-li`u;

Ng`i p^un k`i k'on-l^i van-v+ut. Li'a-vi ki-y`en k'ong, Song-ti p^un ng`in "k'on-l^i van-v+ut", t^ong-y`en he p^au-h`am yit-chhiet; su"-s+u"t-song, ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha pin m`o khon-t'o ng`in k'on-l^i van-v+ut.

Ng`ai-t^eu ch'u"-y^u khon-t'o Y^a-s^u, k`i chhiam-s`u" s`ang-cho p'i thi^en-s'u" kha se, th^ung-ko Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en, thoi van-ng`in l`oi s'i; y^in-vi k`i k^in-l+it s'i ke thung-kh'u, chhiu tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong l^au ch^un-kui ke mi^en-li`u.

Ke chh'ong-chho l^au v`i-chh`u" van-v+ut ke Song-ti, s'u" Y^a-s^u k^in-l+it kh'u-nan, s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on, vi-t'o oi p^un chung ch'u"-'ng khiung-ha hi'ong-su k`i ke y`ung-yeu; Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong cho he t^ong-y`en ke. Y^in-vi Y^a-s^u cho si^en-f^ung, chh^in-s^u"n tai-li^ang k`i-t^eu chin-ng+ip ch'u"n-kiu.
K`i s'e-chhiang ng`in ke chhui; k`i l^au ke-t^eu tet-t'o chhiang-li ke ng`in chhiu s+uk khiung yit-ke ^A-p^a. S'o-y^i, Y^a-s^u ngin k`i-t^eu cho hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, ya m`o khon-cho kien-seu.
K`i k'ong: Song-ti ^a, ng`ai oi tui ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi chh`on-y`ong Ng`i ke mi`ang; ng`ai oi chhai chhi`on fi-chung ke mien-chhi`en k^o-siung Ng`i.
K`i ya k'ong: Ng`ai oi sin-kho Song-ti; yu k'ong: Khon ^a, ng`ai l^au Song-ti s'o su-p^un ng`ai ke ch'u"-'ng chhi`on-phu chhai li'a-vi.

Ki-y`en li'a-t^eu ch'u"-'ng he y^u ngiuk y^u hiet ke ng`in, Y^a-s^u p'un-s^u"n ya khiung-yong s`ang-cho ngiuk-th'i; 'an-ngi`ong, th^ung-ko k`i ke s'i, k`i n`en chi^ong kh+ak-t'en s'i ke khi`en-su" ke M^o-k'ui fi-thet,
yu su"t-fong ke-t^eu yit-s^en-ng`in p^un ki^ang-s'i ke s^im kh'un-p'ong ke ng`in.
Chhin m`in-hi'en, k`i `m-he p^ong-chhu thi^en-s'u"; k`i he p^ong-chhu ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un.

S'o-y^i, k`i yit-thin oi chhai kok f^ong-mien l^au k`i ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi khiung-yong, h'o chhai Song-ti mien-chhi`en cho k`i-t^eu chh`u"-p^i yu sin-s+u"t ke thai-chi-s^u", l`oi p^un ng`in ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en.
Y^in-vi k`i su"t chh^in-s^u"n k^in-l+it su"-tham l^au thung-kh'u, s'o-y^i k`i li'a-ha n`en p^ong-chhu ke-t^eu su su"-tham ke ng`in.

Song-ti s'o si'en-seu, s'o su"n-ph+et ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a! Ng`i-t^eu oi h'o-h'o m'en-si'ong Y^a-s^u; k`i he Song-ti s'o chh^ai-phai ke, he ng`ai-t^eu sin-ngi'ong s'o ko-ph+ak ke thai-chi-s^u".
K`i tui si'en-seu k`i l`oi k^ung-chok ke Song-ti chhin ch^ung-s^im, chhiong M^o-s^i chhai Song-ti ke chhi`on-k^a chhin-ch^ung k^ung-chok yit-yong.
Ch'ung-he, Y^a-s^u y^u ch^u"-kiet p'i M^o-s^i s`u"n-su kien-thai ke y`ung-k^ong; chhiu-chhiong h'i-vuk ke ng`in s'o tet ke y`ung-k^ong chh^eu-ko k`i s'o h'i ke vuk yit-yong.
Tak-ki^en vuk he ng`in h'i-chho ke, ch'ung-he chh'ong-chho van-y^u ke he Song-ti.
M^o-s^i chhai Song-ti ke chhi`on-k^a cho ch^ung-s^im ke ph+uk-ng`in, vi-t'o Song-ti heu-l`oi s'o-oi k'ong ke fa cho-chu"n;

ch'ung-he, K^i-tuk yung Lai-'e ke s^u"n-fun ch^ung-s^im chhu"-l^i Song-ti ke k^a. Ng`ai-t^eu na y^in-vi s'o phan-mong ke, y'ung-k'am to-t'ai, khok-sin to-t'ai, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he Song-ti ke yit-k^a ng`in l'e.
S'o-y^i, chhiong Su"n-L`in s'o-k'ong ke: K^im-p^u-ngit, ng`i-t^eu na th^ang-t'o Song-ti ke s^ang,
chhiu `m-h'o 'an ngang-ki'ang, chhiong th`eu-p'ai 'an-ngi`ong phoi-ngi+ak Song-ti, chhiong t^ong-s`u" chhai kh'ong-y^a su"-tham K`i.
Song-ti k'ong: Si-s+u"p ngi`en ke t^ong-ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s^ui-y`en khon-t'o Ng`ai s'o h`ang ke, k`i-t^eu h`an-he chhai ke-vi ngi^a Ng`ai, su"-tham Ng`ai.
S'o-y^i, Ng`ai tui ke s`u"-thoi ke ng`in fat-khi'en, k'ong: "K`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t 'an `m ch^ung-s^im, yu `m f+uk-chhi`ung Ng`ai ke min-lin."
Ng`ai chhai nu-hi ch^ung fat-su": "K`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet ng+ip-hi ke thi-f^ong hi'ong-su Ng`ai s'o-su ke ^on-sit!"
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi se-ngi ^o! Ki^ang-pha ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung y^u ng`in s^im-s^u" phai-fai, `m-h'en si^ong-sin, l`i-kh^oi y'un-s^en ke Song-ti.
Chui-h'o, k'on h`an-y^u s'o-vi "K^im-p^u-ngit" ke s`u"-chiet, ng`i-t^eu oi ngit-ngit p'i-chh'u" khien-mi^en, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u ng`in p^un chhui m`i-f+et, pien-cho ngang-ki'ang.
Y^in-vi, ng`ai-t^eu na ki^en-chh`u" t^ong-chh^u ke khok-sin, s'u"-ch^ung put-pien, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu-he K^i-tuk ke th`ung-k^ung.
Cheu Su"n-k^in s'o-k'ong ke: K^im-p^u-ngit, ng`i-t^eu na th^ang-t'o Song-ti ke s^ang, chhiu `m-h'o 'an ngang-ki'ang, chhiong th`eu-p'ai 'an-ngi`ong phoi-ngi+ak Song-ti.
He m'a-ng`in th^ang-t'o Song-ti ke s^ang yu phoi-ngi+ak K`i n`e? K'am `m-he M^o-s^i tui ^Ai-kh+ip tai-li^ang chhut-l`oi ke ng`in-m`in m^a?
Ke si-s+u"p ngi`en ke t^ong-ch^ung, Song-ti he tui m'a-ng`in fat-khi'en ^a? K'am `m-he ke-t^eu y^in-vi fam-chhui, s^u"n-s^u" vang chhai kh'ong-y^a ke ng`in m^a?

Song-ti fat-su" k'ong: "K`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet ng+ip-hi ke thi-f^ong hi'ong-su Ng`ai s'o-su ke ^on-sit!" Li'a-ki fa he tui m'a-ng`in k'ong ke ^a? K'am `m-he tui ke-t^eu phoi-ngi+ak ke ng`in m^a?
Tui 'an-ngi`ong l`oi khon, k`i-t^eu m`o fap-thu ng+ip-hi ke thi-f^ong hi'ong-su ^on-sit he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-sin.

Ki-y`en Song-ti yin-h'i oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu hi'ong-su K`i s'o-su ke ^on-sit, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi chh`un kin-vi ke s^im, mi^en-tet y^u ng`in p^un Song-ti khon-cho he su"t-phai ke, m`o fap-thu hi'ong-su ^on-sit.

Ng`ai-t^eu ya y^u th^ang-t'o fuk-y^im, chhiong k`i-t^eu yit-yong; ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu th^ang-li'au fuk-y^im, pin m`o tet-t'o li-yit, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu m`o yung sin-s^im l`oi li^ang-su s'o th^ang-t'o ke.

Ng`ai-t^eu y^u-h'o hi'ong-su Song-ti ke ^on-sit, y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu sin; chhiong Song-ti s'o k'ong: Ng`ai chhai nu-hi ch^ung fat-su": "K`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet ng+ip-hi ke thi-f^ong hi'ong-su Ng`ai s'o-su ke ^on-sit!" Su"-s+u"t-song, Song-ti chh'ong-chho ke k^ung-chok ch'o chhiu v`an-s`u"n l'e, K`i h`an 'an-ngi`ong k'ong.
Y^in-vi ko^an-he thi-chhit-ngit, Su"n-k^in y^u yit-chiet 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: "Chhai thi-chhit-ngit, Song-ti chhiu th`in K`i yit-chhiet ke k^ung-chok l`oi ^on-sit."
Ko^an-he li'a-khien su", Su"n-k^in yu k'ong: "K`i-t^eu chhi+et-tui cho-`m-tet ng+ip-hi ke thi-f^ong hi'ong-su Ng`ai s'o-su ke ^on-sit!"
Si^en-chhi`en ke-t^eu th^ang-t'o fuk-y^im ke ng`in m`o hi'ong-su-t'o ^on-sit, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m-sin; li'a chhiu-he k'ong, h`an-y^u kh`i-th^a ke ng`in voi y^u-h'o hi'ong-su K`i ke ^on-sit.

S'o-y^i, Song-ti nang-ngoi thin yit-ngit, chh^u"n-cho "K^im-p^u-ngit". T^o-t^o ngi`en heu, K`i th^ung-ko Thai-v'i ke fa, cheu Su"n-k^in s'o ki-chai, k'ong: K^im-p^u-ngit, ng`i-t^eu na th^ang-t'o Song-ti ke s^ang, chhiu `m-h'o 'an ngang-ki'ang.
Na-he Yok-s^u-^a y'i-k^in tai-li^ang ng`in-m`in chin-ng+ip Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke ^on-sit, Song-ti heu-l`oi chhiu `m-voi chai th`i li'a nang-ngoi ke yit-ngit.
