Tui 'an-ngi`ong l`oi khon, h`an-y^u nang-ngoi yit-ch'ung ke "^On-sit-ngit" vi Song-ti ch'u"-m`in ke ^on-sit p'o-li`u-t'en.
Y^in-vi, ng`in na-he li^ang-su Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke ^on-sit, chhiu voi tui th`in-h^a k`i ke k^ung-chok l`oi tet-t'o ^on-sit, chhiong Song-ti th`in K`i ke k^ung-chok l`oi ^on-sit yit-yong.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi chhin-l+it t'a-piang l`oi chin-ng+ip li'a-ch'ung ke ^on-sit, mi^en-tet y^u ng`in chhiong ke-t^eu `m f+uk-chhi`ung ke ng`in 'an-ngi`ong tiet-t'o.

Song-ti ke fa he y^u s^ang-miang, y^u h'au-l+it ke. K`i p'i li'ong-pi^en li ke kiam h`an-kha li; li`en l`in l^au f`un, ko^an-chiet l^au kut-s'ui, l^ung-ch'ung chhiuk-tet-ng+ip. K`i n`en phan-ton ng`in s^im-ch^ung ke s^u"-si'ong l^au ngiam-th`eu.

Su-chho ke van-v+ut m`o yit-yong y^u kh'o-n`en khong-t'en `m p^un Song-ti t^i; chhai K`i ngi'en-ch^ung, yit-chhiet su"-chh`in l^ung-ch'ung he chh^in-chh^in chh'u-chh'u ke. Y^u yit-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu oi tui K`i k^au-chong.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi ki^en-chh`u" ng`ai-t^eu s'o ko-ph+ak ke sin-ngi'ong. Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu y^u yit-ke v'i-thai ke thai-chi-s^u", chhiu-he Song-ti ke Lai-'e Y^a-s^u; k`i y'i-k^in s^u"n-to Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en.

Ng`ai-t^eu ke thai-chi-s^u" `m-he `m-voi th`ung-chh`in ng`ai-t^eu ke ngi^on-ngi+ok; ti^en-to, ng`ai-t^eu ke thai-chi-s^u" k^in-l+it-ko ng`ai-t^eu s'o t`u-t'o kok f^ong-mien ke su"-tham, ch'ung-he k`i m`o fam-chhui.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi thai-t'am l`oi-to Song-ti s^u"-^en ke p'o-chho chhi`en, h'o li^ang-su chh`u"-oi l^au ^en-ti'en, cho ng`ai-t^eu kh+ip-s`u" ke p^ong-chhu.
Thai-chi-s^u" chhi`on-phu he tui m`in-ki^en si'en-chhut-l`oi ke; k`i ke ngim-vu he thoi ng`in-m`in su"-fung Song-ti, vi k`i-t^eu ke chhui hien l^i-v+ut l^au chi-v+ut.
Thai-chi-s^u" chhu"-k^a ya y^u kok-ch'ung ke ngi^on-ngi+ok, s'o-y^i k`i voi f`o-f`o hi-hi tui-thai ke-t^eu v`u-t^i l`oi fam-chhui ke ng`in.
Th`ung-s`u", y^in-vi k`i chhu"-k^a ke ngi^on-ngi+ok, k`i `m t^an-chhiang oi vi ng`in-m`in ke chhui hien-chi, ya oi vi chhu"-k^a ke chhui hien-chi.
Thai-chi-s^u" ke ch^un-y`ung thi-vi, ng`in cho-`m-tet chhu"-k^a hi ch^en-chh'i; v`i-y^u Song-ti s'o si'en-seu ke ng`in chang cho-tet cho thai-chi-s^u", chhiong ^A-l`un yit-yong.

Khiung-yong, K^i-tuk cho thai-chi-s^u" ke ch^un-y`ung thi-vi ya `m-he chhu"-k^a ch^en-chh'i l`oi ke; ti^en-to, he Song-ti tui k`i k'ong: Ng`i he Ng`ai ke Lai-'e; k^im-p^u-ngit Ng`ai cho ng`i ke ^A-p^a.
K`i yu chhai nang-ngoi yit s'o-chhai k'ong: Ng`i oi cheu M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke th'i-chu", y'un-y'en cho chi-s^u".

Y^a-s^u chhai su"-ki^en ke s`u", su"t tui ke n`en kiu k`i thot-l`i s'i-m`ong ke Song-ti thai-s^ang kh`i-t'o, li`u muk-chu"p kh`i-khi`u. Y^in-vi k`i ke khi^am-p^i l^au khi`en-s`u"n, Song-ti th^ang k`i ke kh`i-khi`u.
S^ui-y`en k`i he Song-ti ke Lai-'e, h`an-he oi tui s'o-su ke kh'u-nan l`oi h+ok sun-f+uk.
Ki-y`en Song-ti s'u" k`i th+at-to v`an-chhi`on ke thi-phu, k`i chhiu s`ang-cho yit-chhiet sun-f+uk k`i ke ng`in y'un-y'en tet-kiu ke k^in-ngi`en;
Song-ti chhiu si^en-pu k`i cheu M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke th'i-chu" cho thai-chi-s^u".
Ko^an-he li'a-ke su", ng`ai-t^eu h`an-y^u h'o-t^o oi k'ong ke, ch'ung-he chhin-n`an tui ng`i-t^eu sot-m`in chh^in-chh'u, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu th^ang `m ng+ip-ng'i.

Ng`i-t^eu ch'o chhiu yin-k^oi cho ng`in ke s^in-s^ang l^o, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu h`an s^i-yeu ng`in yung Song-ti ch^u"n-tho ke chh^u-phu tho-l^i chai k^au ng`i-t^eu; ng`i-t^eu h`an-he s^i-yeu s+u"t-nen, m`o fap-thu s+u"t-fan.
Ch'u"-y^u s+u"t-nen ke h`an-he ^o-nga-'e, `m-voi f^un-ph+et su"-f^i.
Ch'ong-thai s`u"n-ng`in ke chang y^u fap-thu s+u"t-fan; k`i-t^eu y'i-k^in y^u f^ung-fu ke k^in-ngiam, voi f^un-ph+et h'o-f'ai.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi chi^ong ko^an-he K^i-tuk ke chh^u-phu tho-l^i piong chhai heu-poi, hiong kha s`u"n-s+uk ke sin-ngi'ong l`oi chin-chhi`en. Ng`ai-t^eu `m-s'u" chai l+ip k^in-k^i, chhiong-he tui f'u-phai ke h`ang-v`i f'i-k'oi, sin-kho Song-ti,
kok-yong ke s'e-l^i, on-s'u-l^i, s'i-ng`in f+uk-f+at, y'un-y'en ke s'u"m-phan t'en kau-hiun.
Ng`ai-t^eu oi hiong-chhi`en h`ang! Song-ti na ch'un, ng`ai-t^eu yit-thin oi 'an-ngi`ong cho.

Lun-t'o ke-t^eu l`i-kh^oi chu"n-tho ke ng`in, oi ngi'ong-p^an s'u" k`i-t^eu chh`ung-s^in f'i-k'oi n`e? K`i-t^eu su"t tet-t'o Song-ti ke k^ong-cheu, s`ong-ko s+uk-thi^en ^en-su ke ch^u"-mi, yu l^au Su"n-L`in y^u-fun,
ya su"t th'i-ngiam-t'o Song-ti ke fa he h`o-t'en ke m^i-h'o, yu k'am-su-t'o m+at-su" ke thai-n`en.

Ng`i t^i m`o, heu-l`oi k`i-t^eu h`an-he phoi-ngi+ak chu"n-tho! Li'a-ch'ung ke ng`in m`o kh'o-n`en ham k`i-t^eu f`i-th`eu, chh`ung-s^in f'i-k'oi; y^in-vi k`i-t^eu chh^in-s'u chi^ong Song-ti ke Lai-'e chai t^ang s+u"p-su"-ka, k^ung-y`en v'u-y+uk k`i.
Thi`en-thi s`ong-s`ong kh+ip-s^u y'i-s'ui, s^ang-chhut chhi^ang-chhoi, p^un k^ang-chung ke ng`in tet-t'o li-yit, chhiu s`u"n-su Song-ti ke su-fuk.
Ch'ung-he, li'a thi`en-thi na s^ang-chhut net-`e l^au chh+it-l`i, h`an-y^u m'a-ke yung n`e? K`i chhiu y^u su chu-ch'u ke ng`ui-hi'am, chui-m^i p^un f'o s^eu-thet.
Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u ^a, s^ui-y`en ng`ai-t^eu 'an-ngi`ong k'ong, ch'ung-he ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he si^ong-sin ng`i-t^eu y^u kha-h'o ke h`ang-v`i, chiap-khiun tet-kiu.
Song-ti `m-voi 'an m`o k^ung-tong; K`i `m-voi `m ki-tet ng`i-t^eu s'o-cho ke k^ung-chok l^au vi-t'o K`i ke mi`ang s'o p'eu-hien ke oi-s^im, chhiu-he yit-chh+u"t p^ong-chhu kh`i-th^a ke su"n-th`u.
Ng`ai-t^eu chui-thai ke s^im-ngien chhiu-he: Ng`i-t^eu m^i-yit-ke ng`in voi ngi+et-s^im to-t'ai, p^un ng`i-t^eu s'o phan-mong ke yit-chhiet tet-t'o s+u"t-hien.
`M-h'o l^an-s^u", oi h+ok ke-t^eu yung sin-s^im l^au nai-s^im l`oi li^ang-su Song-ti yin-h'i ke ng`in.
Song-ti yin-h'i ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke s`u", K`i y^u fat-ko su". Y^in-vi m`o p'i K`i kha thai ke, K`i chhiu ch'u" chhu"-k^a ke mi`ang l`oi fat-su".
K`i k'ong: "Ng`ai yit-thin oi thai-thai su-fuk p^un ng`i; Ng`ai yit-thin oi p^un ng`i t^o-ch'u" t^o-s^un."
^A-pak-l^a-h'on nai-s^im t'en-heu, to m^i chhiu tet-t'o Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke.

Ng`in fat-su" ke s`u"-chiet, k`i he ch'u"-t'en p'i chhu"-k^a kha thai ke l`oi fat-su"; s'o-y^i fat-su" s`ang-cho yit-ch'ung ke t^am-p'o, kiet-suk ng`in l^au ng`in ch^ung-ki^en ke yit-chhiet f^un-ch^en.
Song-ti vi-t'o oi tui ke-t^eu s`u"n-chiap K`i yin-h'i ke ng`in, khi`ong-thiau K`i ke kie-v+ak y'un-y'en `m-voi k'oi-pien, chhiu chhai yin-h'i t'ang-k^o k^a-song fat-su".

Song-ti ke yin-h'i l^au fat-su" l^ung-ch'ung he `m-voi k'oi-pien ke, y^in-vi Song-ti `m-voi k'ong f^a-li^au. S'o-y^i, ng`ai li'a-t^eu piang-t'en ng+ip-to Song-ti p'o-fu ch^u"-ha ke ng`in tet-t'o t^ong-thai ke k'u-li, oi khi'u-h+et piong chhai ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-chhi`en ke phan-mong.
Ng`ai-t^eu y^u li'a phan-mong, chhiu-chhiong s^ang-miang ke m`au, yu ^on-chhi`on yu v'un-tong. Li'a phan-mong th^ung-ko thi^en-t'ang su"n-thien ke pu-li`am, ng+ip-to t^i-poi ke su"n-s'o.
Vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu, Y^a-s^u cho si^en-f^ung, y'i-k^in hi ke-vi; k`i y'i-k^in cheu M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke th'i-chu" s`ang-cho y'un-y'en ke thai-chi-s^u".

Li'a M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet he Sat-l^ang-v`ong, ya he Chu"-k^o Song-ti ke chi-s^u". ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chh`u"-s'i chung v`ong, tui chan-chh`ong ch'on-l`oi ke s`u", M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet hi ngi`ang-chiap k`i, yu vi k`i chuk-fuk.

^A-pak-l^a-h'on chi^ong chhu"-k^a s'o tet-t'o ke n^a s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit p^un k`i. K^i-p'un-song, M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet cheu su" f^an-y+it yi-su" he "K^ung-ngi ke V`ong"; yu y^in-vi k`i he Sat-l^ang-v`ong, k`i ke mi`ang y^u "F`o-ph`in ke V`ong" ke yi-su".
Ko^an-he M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke y`a-^oi, chh+uk-ph'u, ya-he k`i ke chhut-se l^au ko-s^u"n, chhi`on-phu m`o ki-li+uk h'o chh`a; k`i he chhiong Song-ti ke Lai-'e, y'un-y'en cho chi-s^u".
Ng`i-t^eu si'ong khon-'e, li'a-ke ng`in y^u k'i v'i-thai! Li`en chh+uk-ch'ong ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ya chi^ong s'o-y^u chan-li-ph'in ke s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit sung p^un k`i.

Ke-t^eu Li-vi ke ch'u"-s^un cho chi-s^u", he cheu fap-l+it ke k^ui-thin tui Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in, chhiu-he k`i-t^eu chhu"-k^a ke th`ung-p^au, s^u s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit, s^ui-y`en li'a-t^eu ng`in ya he ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke ch'u"-s^un.
M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet `m-he Li-vi ke ch'u"-s^un, ch'ung-he k`i tui ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chiap-su s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit, h`an vi tet-t'o Song-ti yin-h'i ke ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chuk-fuk.
Chuk-fuk ng`in ke p'i li^ang-su chuk-fuk ke ng`in kha-thai, li'a he m`o m'a-ke h'o au ke.
Ke-t^eu s^u s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit ke chi-s^u", he voi s'i ke ng`in; ch'ung-he, ya s^u s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit ke M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet, cheu Su"n-k^in ke ki-chai, k`i he yit-chh+u"t s^ang-h^a-hi ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet k'ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on n+ap s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit ke s`u", Li-vi ya y^u n+ap s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit; s^ui-y`en Li-vi l^au k`i ke ch'u"-s^un he s^u s+u"p-f^un ch^u"-yit ke.
Y^in-vi, M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ngi`ang-chiap ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke s`u", Li-vi h`an-m`ang chhut-se; ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet k'ong, k`i h`an chhai k`i ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on ke s^u"n-th'i t^i-poi.

Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in s'o li^ang-su ke fap-l+it he yung Li-vi-ng`in ke chi-s^u" chu"-thu cho k^in-k^i ke. Cheu 'an-ngi`ong l`oi k'ong, li'a chu"-thu ke h'au-k'o na-he v`an-chhi`on, ngi'ong-p^an `m cheu ^A-l`un ke th'i-chu", f'an-ch'on oi cheu M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke th'i-chu" nang-ngoi h^in-h'i yit-ke chi-s^u" n`e?
Ki-y`en chi-s^u" chu"-thu y^u k'oi-pien, fap-l+it ya s^i-yeu k'oi-pien.
Ng`ai-t^eu li'a-ha s'o-k'ong ke, chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u; k`i he s+uk nang-ngoi yit k^i-chh+uk; li'a k^i-chh+uk chhi`ung-l`oi `m-su"t y^u ng`in cho-ko chi-s^u", chhai chi-th`an chhi`en su"-fung.
Ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u he s+uk Y`u-thai k^i-chh+uk, li'a he thai-k^a s'o t^i ke; M^o-s^i k'ong-t'o chi-s^u" ke s`u"-chiet, pin m`o th`i-h'i li'a-ke k^i-chh+uk.
Su"-chh`in y+et-l`oi y+et m`in-hi'en, y^in-vi nang-ngoi yit-ke chhiong M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke chi-s^u" y'i-k^in chhut-hien.
K`i s`ang-cho chi-s^u", pin `m-he cheu ng`in ke fap-l+it k^ui-thin, he y^in-vi k`i y^u `m-voi s^eu-m+et ke s^ang-miang ke thai-n`en.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Ng`i oi cheu M+ak-k^i-s'e-tet ke th'i-chu" y'un-y'en cho chi-s^u"."
'An-ngi`ong, y^in-vi khiu ke k^ui-thin m`o l+it yu m`o yung, chhiu fi-thet l'e.

M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it m`o fap-thu s'u" m'a-ke pien-cho v`an-chhi`on; ch'ung-he li'a-ha, ng`ai-t^eu y^u yit-ke kha-h'o ke phan-mong, th^ung-ko li'a-ke phan-mong, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu cho-tet chiap-khiun Song-ti.
Nang-ngoi, h`an-y^u Song-ti ke fat-su". Ph+et ke chi-s^u" f^ung-l+ip ke s`u", m`o li'a-ch'ung ke fat-su";
ch'ung-he, Y^a-s^u cho chi-s^u" chhiu y^u li'a-ch'ung ke fat-su"; Song-ti tui k`i k'ong: Ch'u y'i-k^in fat-su", chhi+et-tui m`o f'an-f'i: "Ng`i oi y'un-y'en cho chi-s^u"."
Y^in-vi y^u 'an thai ke f^un-ph+et, Y^a-s^u chhiu s`ang-cho kha-h'o ke yok ke p'o-chu"n.
H`an-y^u yit-ke f^un-ph+et: Si^en-chhi`en ke-t^eu cho chi-s^u" ke chhin t^o, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu voi s'i, m`o fap-thu yit-chh+u"t cho-h^a-hi;
ch'ung-he, y^in-vi Y^a-s^u he y'un-y'en s^ang ke, `m-s'u" von-ng`in cho chi-s^u".
S'o-y^i, k`i n`en y'un-y'en ch'u"n-kiu yit-chhiet th^ung-ko k`i l`oi chh^in-khiun Song-ti ke ng`in; y^in-vi k`i y'un-y'en s^ang-t'en, vi k`i-t^eu thoi-khi`u.

'An-ngi`ong, Y^a-s^u chhiu-he ng`ai-t^eu s'o s^i-yeu ke thai-chi-s^u". K`i he su"n-kiet, m`o ko-su"t, m`o-chhui ke; k`i he tui chhui-ng`in ch^ung f^un-ph+et chhut-l`oi ke; k`i ke thi-vi chh^eu-y+et ch^u-thi^en.

K`i l^au kh`i-th^a ke thai-chi-s^u" m`o khiung-yong, `m-s'u" tak-ngit si^en vi chhu"-k^a ke chhui hien-chi, y`en-heu chang vi ng`in-m`in ke chhui hien-chi. K`i ch'u"-y^u hien-ko yit-p'ai chi, chi^ong chhu"-k^a hien-song, yit-p'ai chhiu y`en-m^an.

M^o-s^i ke fap-l+it sat-l+ip ng`in cho thai-chi-s^u", k`i-t^eu cho thai-chi-s^u" h`an y^u khiet-ti'am; ch'ung-he, chhai y^u fap-l+it y^i-heu, Song-ti yung fat-su" l`oi yin-h'i, sat-l+ip K`i ke Lai-'e cho thai-chi-s^u", s'u" k`i v`an-chhi`on, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'en.
Ng`ai-t^eu s'o th'o-lun ke chhung-ti'am he: Ng`ai-t^eu y^u chhiong 'an-ngi`ong ke thai-chi-s^u"; k`i chh^o chhai thi^en-t'ang chu"-thai Khi`en-n`en-ch'a ke p'o-chho yu-phi'en.
K`i chhai chu"-su"n-s'o t^am-ngim thai-chi-s^u"; li'a su"n-s'o `m-he ng`in ke s'u h'i ke, he Ch'u s'o h'i ch^u"n ke su"n-chong-ph`ung.
M^i-yit-ke thai-chi-s^u" l^ung-ch'ung he vi-t'o hien l^i-v+ut l^au chi-v+ut l`oi sat-l+ip ke; s'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu ke thai-chi-s^u" ya yin-k^oi y^u-s'o fung-hien.
Na-he k`i chhai thi-song, k`i chhiu m`o cho chi-s^u", y^in-vi y'i-k^in y^u cheu Y`u-thai fap-l+it l`oi hien l^i-v+ut ke chi-s^u".

Li'a-t^eu chi-s^u" he cheu thi^en-t'ang su"n-s'o ke yong-su"t l^au y'ang-siong l`oi su"-fung. Chhiong M^o-s^i oi h'i su"n-chong-ph`ung ke s`u", Song-ti k'in-ko k`i, k'ong: "Oi ki'un-s'u"m, chhi`on-phu oi cheu Ng`ai chhai s^an-t'ang ch'u"-su" ng`i ke yong-su"t hi chho."

Ch'ung-he, Y^a-s^u li'a-ha s'o t^am-ngim ke chi-s^u" chu"t-vu chh^eu-y+et k`i-t^eu ke chhin t^o, chhiu-chhiong k`i chhai Song-ti l^au ng`in ke ch^ung-ki^en cho ch^ung-p'o ke yok he kha-h'o ke, y^in-vi li'a-ke yok he cheu ke kha-h'o ke yin-h'i l`oi l+ip ke.
Thi-yit-ke yok na m`o khiet-ti'am, chhiu `m-s'u" y^u thi-ngi-ke yok.
Ch'ung-he Song-ti chit-phi K`i ke ch'u"-m`in ke s`u", k'ong: Ch'u k'ong: Ngit-`e voi to, Ng`ai oi l^au Y^i-set-li+et ke ng`in-m`in pin Y`u-thai ke ng`in-m`in nang-ngoi l+ip s^in ke yok.

Li'a yok `m chhiong th`eu-p'ai Ng`ai l^au k`i-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en s'o-l+ip ke yok; chhai ke-t^eu ngit-`e Ng`ai khi^en-t'en k`i-t^eu ke s'u, tai-li^ang k`i-t^eu chhut ^Ai-kh+ip. Ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu m`o ch^un-s'u Ng`ai l^au k`i-t^eu s'o-l+ip ke yok. S'o-y^i Ch'u k'ong: Ng`ai ya m`o-oi tap k`i-t^eu.

Ch'u yu k'ong: Chhai chi^ong-l`oi ke-t^eu ngit-`e, Ng`ai oi l^au Y^i-set-li+et ng`in-m`in l+ip li'a-ch'ung ke yok: Ng`ai oi chi^ong Ng`ai ke fap-l+it piong-ng+ip k`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n'o, si'a chhai k`i-t^eu ke s^im-song. Ng`ai oi cho k`i-t^eu ke Song-ti, k`i-t^eu oi cho Ng`ai ke ch'u"-m`in.
K`i-t^eu `m-voi chai k^au th`ung-p^au, ya `m-s'u" l^au chhu"-k^a ke hi^ung-thi k'ong: "Oi ngin-su"t Ch'u"; y^in-vi tui chui-se ke to chui-thai ke, k`i-t^eu l^ung-ch'ung voi ngin-su"t Ng`ai.
Ng`ai oi sa-mi^en k`i-t^eu ke ko-fam, m`o-oi chai ki-tet k`i-t^eu ke chhui-ok.
Ki-y`en Song-ti th`i-t'o "s^in ke yok", kh'o-kien K`i y'i-k^in chi^ong th`eu-yit-ke yok khon-cho khiu ke. K'in khiu k'in l'o ke, chhiu voi chhin kiak s^eu-m+et-thet.
Th`eu-yit-ke yok, y^u l^i-pai ke li-k^ui l^au ng`in chho ke l^i-pai chh`ong-s'o.
S'o h'i ke su"n-chong-ph`ung, th`eu-yit-chh`en ^on-to su"n-s'o, t^i-poi y^u t^en-th`oi, chok-`e, l^au kin-s`u"n ke pi'ang.
Thi-ngi-li^ang pu-li`am heu, y^u yit-chh`en su"n-chong-ph`ung ^on-to chu"-su"n-s'o,

t^i-poi y^u s^eu-hi^ong yung ke k^im hi^ong-th`an l^au p^au-k^im ke yok-khui, khui-t'u piong-t'en ch^ong m^a-n^a ke k^im kon-'e, yu y^u ^A-l`un ke-k^i fat-ko ng`a ke ko'ai-kun-'e l^au si'a-t'en s+u"p-thi`au-kie ke li'ong-te s+ak-p'an.
Yok-khui t'ang-k^o y^u k^i-lu-pak, p'eu-su" Song-ti ke l`im-chhai; k^i-lu-pak ke y+it-kap ch^a-t'en sa-chhui ke chho-vi. Ko^an-he li'a-t^eu, li'a-ha m`o fap-thu si`ong-se sot-m`in.
Li'a-t^eu t^ung-s^i cheu 'an-ngi`ong ^on-ph`ai h'o-se. Ke-t^eu chi-s^u" chhiu tak-ngit ng+ip su"n-chong-ph`ung ke ngoi-chh`en hi k'i-h`ang l^i-pai ke ng`i-su"t;

ch'ung-he nui-chh`en ke-ki^en, thai-chi-s^u" chang cho-tet ng+ip-hi, yit-ngi`en ya ch'u"-y^u yit-p'ai; vi-t'o chhu"-k^a l^au ng`in-m`in v`u-yi s'o fam ke ko-su"t, k`i tak-p'ai oi tai-t'en hiet ng+ip-hi hien-p^un Song-ti.
Su"n-L`in th^ung-ko li'a-t^eu ^on-ph`ai l`oi ch'u"-m`in, ngoi-chh`en ke su"n-chong-ph`ung na h`an chh^oi, theu-ng+ip chu"-su"n-s'o ke lu chhiu m`ang kh^oi.

Ngoi-chh`en su"n-chong-ph`ung he to li'a-ha v`i-ch'u" ke yit-ch'ung yi-p'eu. Li'a chhiu-he k'ong, hien l^i-v+ut l^au chi-v+ut p^un Song-ti `m-voi s'u" kin-pai ke ng`in nui-s^im s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on;
li'a-t^eu he y^u-ko^an y'im-s+u"t l^au kok-yong ke kiet-chhiang ng`i-su"t thin-thin. Li'a-ch'ung ngoi-p'eu ke li-k^ui, to Song-ti k'oi-chu"n yit-chhiet ke s`u" chhiu su"t-h'au l'e.

Li'a-ha, K^i-tuk y'i-k^in l`oi-to; k`i cho thai-chi-s^u", y'i-k^in s+u"t-hien yit-chhiet ke h'o-su". K`i ng+ip-hi ke su"n-chong-ph`ung h`an-kha thai, h`an-kha v`an-chhi`on, `m-he ng`in ke s'u h'i ke; li'a chhiu-he k'ong, `m-he s+uk li'a su-chho ke su"-kie.

K^i-tuk chin-ng+ip chu"-su"n-s'o, yit-p'ai chhiu la; ke-s`u", k`i pin m`o yung s^an-y`ong l^au se-ngi`u ke hiet cho chi-v+ut, f'an-ch'on yung k`i chhu"-k^a ke hiet, l`oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o y'un-y'en ke kiu-s+uk.

Chhai l^i-ng`i ch^ung, yung s^an-y`ong ke hiet, ngi`u-k'u ke hiet, l^au ngi`u-m`a ke f^oi, fin chhai ke-t^eu m`o chhiang-li ke ng`in s^u"n-song, na-he n`en chh^in-thet k`i-t^eu ke l'a-sap, p^un k`i-t^eu tet-t'o chhiang-li,

'an-ngi`ong, K^i-tuk ke hiet s'o-n`en s`u"n-chhiu ke k'am `m-he h`an-kha t^o m^a? Th^ung-ko ke y'un-y'en ke L`in, K^i-tuk hien chhu"-k^a cho m`o khiet-ti'am ke chi-v+ut p^un Song-ti. K`i ke hiet voi kiet-chhiang ng`ai-t^eu ke li`ong-s^im, chh`u-thet ng`ai-t^eu f'u-phai ke h`ang-v`i, p^un ng`ai-t^eu su"-fung y'un-s^en ke Song-ti.

Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, K^i-tuk s`ang-cho li'a s^in-yok ke ch^ung-p'o, yung s'i l`oi s+uk ke-t^eu chhai th`eu-yit-ke yok ch^u"-ha s'o-fam ke chhui-ko, p^un Song-ti s'o f^u-seu ke ng`in y^u-h'o li^ang-su K`i s'o yin-h'i y'un-y'en ke fuk-hi.
V`ui-ngi`en, yit-thin oi chu"n-m`in l+ip v`ui-ngi`en ke ng`in y'i-k^in s'i-thet;
y^in-vi, l+ip v`ui-ngi`en ke ng`in h`an s^ang, v`ui-ngi`en chhiu m`o-h'au, k`i yit s'i, v`ui-ngi`en chhiu y^u h'au-l+it.
S'o-y^i, li`en th`eu-yit-ke yok ya he oi yung hiet l`oi sat-l+ip chang y^u-h'au.

T^ong-s`u", M^o-s^i cheu fap-l+it si^en chi^ong s'o-y^u ke kie-min chh`on-p^un ng`in-m`in, y`en-heu k`i n^a se-ngi`u l^au s^an-y`ong ke hiet, chh^am t^eu s'ui, yung chh^u"m-f`ung-set ke y`ung l^au ngi`u-chhit-chh'o l`oi chi'am, fin chhai Fap-l+it-s^u l^au s'o-y^u ng`in-m`in ke s^u"n-song.
K`i k'ong: "Li'a he l+ip-yok ke hiet, he Song-ti l^au ng`i-t^eu l+ip-yok ke ki-ho."
Khiung-yong, M^o-s^i ya yung hiet fin chhai su"n-chong-ph`ung, pin l^i-pai l^au l^i-ng`i s'o yung kok-yong ke hi-m'en t'ang-k^o.
Cheu fap-l+it ke k^ui-thin, chh^a-`m-t^o s'o-y^u ke hi-m'en chhi`on-phu he yung hiet l`oi kiet-chhiang ke; m`o li`u-hiet, chhiu m`o sa-chhui.

Ki-y`en li'a-t^eu cheu thi^en-t'ang ke yong-su"t s'o chho ke hi-m'en, yit-thin oi yung 'an-ngi`ong l`oi kiet-chhiang; thi^en-t'ang ke ngi`en-v+ut chhiu h`an-kha oi yung kien-h'o ke chi-v+ut hi kiet-chhiang.

K^i-tuk pin m`o ng+ip-hi ng`in-s'u s'o h'i ke su"n-s'o; ke put-ko he ch^u"n su"n-s'o ke y'ang-siong thin-thin. K`i he chin-to thi^en-t'ang, chhiu-he ch^u"n su"n-s'o, li'a-ha vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu ke y`en-ku kh^i chhai Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en.
Y`u-thai-ng`in ke thai-chi-s^u" oi tak-ngi`en tai-t'en th`eu-s^ang ke hiet ng+ip-hi chu"-su"n-s'o; ch'ung-he, K^i-tuk `m-s'u" hien chhu"-k^a t^o-t^o p'ai.

Na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, tui chh'ong-chho su"-kie y^i-l`oi, k`i chhiu oi ngi^un-su kh'u-nan t^o-t^o p'ai l^o. Ch'ung-he li'a-ha, K^i-tuk chhai m+at-su" hi'en-hien yit-p'ai, chi^ong chhu"-k^a hien-cho chi-v+ut, l`oi chh`u-thet chhui.
Cheu s'o chu-thin ke, su"-ki^en-ng`in l^ung-ch'ung y^u yit-p'ai ke s'i, s'i-heu h`an-oi su Song-ti s'u"m-phan.

Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, K^i-tuk ya h^i-s^en yit-p'ai, l`oi t^am-t^ong chung-ng`in ke chhui. Chi^ong-l`oi, k`i h`an-oi hi'en-hien yit-p'ai, `m-he vi-t'o tui-fu chhui, he oi ch'u"n-kiu ke-t^eu pet-chhiet t'en-heu k`i ke ng`in.

Fap-l+it pin `m-he chi^ong-l`oi ke-t^eu m^i-h'o su"-v+ut ke ch^u"n-siong, he ke-t^eu su"-v+ut ke y'ang-siong thin-thin. Khiung-yong ke chi-v+ut tak-ngi`en yit-chh+u"t hien-song, fap-l+it yu ngi'ong-p^an cho-tet th^ung-ko li'a-t^eu chi-v+ut s'u" l`oi-to Song-ti mien-chhi`en ke ng`in s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on n`e?

Na-he y^u kh'o-n`en, yit-chhiet ke hien-chi ch'o chhiu th`in-ch'u" l^o! Y^in-vi ke-t^eu kin-pai Song-ti ke ng`in, ki-y`en chhui y'i-k^in tet-t'o kiet-chhiang, chhiu `m-voi chai y^u chhui ke k'am-kok l'e.
Su"-s+u"t-song, tak-ngi`en ke hien-chi f'an-ch'on s'u" ng`in si'ong-h'i chhu"-k^a ke chhui,
y^in-vi ngi`u-k'u l^au s^an-y`ong ke hiet m`o fap-thu chh`u-thet ng`in ke chhui.
Y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, K^i-tuk l`oi-to su"-ki^en ke s`u", tui Song-ti k'ong: Ng`i m`o-oi chi-v+ut l^au ki^ung-v+ut; Ng`i y'i-k^in vi ng`ai ch'un-phi s^u"n-th'i.
Ng`i ya m`o kak-yi s^eu-fa-chi l^au s+uk-chhui-chi.
S'o-y^i ng`ai k'ong: Khon ^a, ng`ai l`oi l'e! Song-ti ^a, ng`ai l`oi he oi ch^un-h`ang Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi, chhiu-chhiong Fap-l+it-s^u s'o ki-chai ko^an-he ng`ai ke su".

Yit kh^oi-s'u", k`i k'ong: "Ng`i m`o-oi, ya m`o kak-yi chi-v+ut l^au ki^ung-v+ut, s^eu-fa-chi l^au s+uk-chhui-chi." S^ui-y`en li'a-t^eu chi-v+ut he cheu fap-l+it ke k^ui-thin s'o-hien ke, k`i h`an 'an-ngi`ong k'ong.
Chiap-t'en, k`i yu k'ong: "Khon ^a, ng`ai l`oi l'e, he oi ch^un-h`ang Ng`i ke ch'u"-yi." Kh'o-kien, Song-ti chh'i-s^eu si^en-chhi`en yit-chhiet ke hien-chi, oi yung K^i-tuk ke h^i-s^en l`oi thoi-von.
Cheu Song-ti li'a-ke ch'u"-yi, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk hien chhu"-k^a ke s^u"n-th'i, yit-p'ai chhiu y`en-m^an, p^un ng`ai-t^eu su"n-fa l`oi k^ui Ch'u.
M^i-yit-ke Y`u-thai ke chi-s^u" tak-ngit kh^i-t'en su"-fung Song-ti, s`ong-s`ong hien khiung-yong ke chi-v+ut; ch'ung-he li'a-t^eu chi-v+ut y'un-y'en m`o fap-thu chh`u-thet ng`in ke chhui.
Ch'ung-he, K^i-tuk hien s+uk-chhui-chi yit-p'ai, y'un-y'en chhiu y^u-h'au, y`en-heu chh^o chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en,
t'en-heu Song-ti p^un k`i ke th+it-ng`in h`ong-f+uk chhai k`i ke kiok-h^a.
Y^in-vi k`i hien-chi yit-p'ai, ke-t^eu su"n-fa k^ui Ch'u ke ng`in chhiu y'un-y'en v`an-chhi`on.
Su"n-L`in ya tui ng`ai-t^eu cho-chu"n; K`i si^en k'ong:

Ch'u 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: Chhai chi^ong-l`oi ke-t^eu ngit-`e, Ng`ai oi l^au k`i-t^eu l+ip li'a-ch'ung ke yok: Ng`ai oi chi^ong Ng`ai ke fap-l+it piong-ng+ip k`i-t^eu ke s^im, si'a chhai k`i-t^eu ke th`eu-n'o.
Y`en-heu, K`i k'ong: "Ng`ai m`o-oi chai ki-tet k`i-t^eu ke chhui-ok l^au ko-fam."
Ki-y`en li'a-t^eu chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en, chhiu m`o s^i-yeu chai y^u s+uk-chhui-chi l'e.
S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u li`u-hiet to s'i, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu cho-tet ^on-s^im ng+ip-hi chu"-su"n-s'o.
Y^a-s^u y'i-k^in vi ng`ai-t^eu kh^oi yit-thi`au yu s^in yu s^ang ke lu; li'a-thi`au lu theu-ko pu-li`am, chhiu-he th^ung-ko k`i ke s^u"n-th'i.
Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu y^u yit-ke thai-chi-s^u" ch'ong-k'on Song-ti ke k^a-th`in,

'an-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi yung s`u"n-s+u"t ke s^im, ki^en-thin ke sin-s^im, yung y'i-k^in kiet-chhiang, m`o si`a-ok ke li`ong-s^im, l^au chhiang-s'ui s'e-ko ke s^u"n-th'i, l`oi chh^in-khiun Song-ti.
Ng`ai-t^eu oi ki^en-thin chh`u"-s'u ng`ai-t^eu s'o ko-ph+ak ke phan-mong, y^in-vi yin-h'i ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti he sin-s+u"t ke.
Ng`ai-t^eu oi p'i-chh'u" ko^an-s^im, kit-fat oi-s^im, mi^en-li h`ang-san.
Y^u-t^eu ng`in piong-thet chh^am-k^a chhi-fi ke s+ip-koan; `m-h'o h+ok k`i-t^eu, f'an-ch'on oi fu-si^ong khien-mi^en. Ng`i-t^eu ki-y`en t^i Ch'u ke ngit-`e voi to l'e, h`an-kha oi 'an-ngi`ong.
Y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ngin-su"t ch^u"n-l^i y^i-heu, na-he h`an ku-yi fam-chhui, chhiu `m-voi chai y^u s+uk-chhui ke chi-v+ut l'e;
ch'u"-y^u ki^ang-ki^ang l+uk-l+uk t'en-heu s'u"m-phan l^au ke oi s^eu-m+et tui-th+it Song-ti ke ng`in ke li+et-f'o!
V`i-fam M^o-s^i fap-l+it ke, y^u li'ong-s^am-ke ng`in cho-chu"n, chhiu yit-thin oi chh'u s'i-h`in, tet `m-t'o l`in-m'en.

'An-ngi`ong, chien-th+ap Song-ti ke Lai-'e, khon-khi^ang Song-ti l+ip-yok ke hiet --- chhiu-he kiet-chhiang k`i ke chhui ke hiet, yu v'u-y+uk su ^en-ti'en ke L`in, li'a-ch'ung ng`in voi ngi'ong-p^an n`e? Si'ong khon-'e, k`i k'am `m-he voi su-t'o h`an-kha chh^ung ke h`in-f+at m^a?
Ng`ai-t^eu t^i he m'a-ng`in k'ong: "S^u"n-y^en chhai Ng`ai, Ng`ai yit-thin oi po-yin"; yu k'ong: "Ch'u oi s'u"m-phan K`i ke ch'u"-m`in."
L+ok chhai y'un-s^en Song-ti ke s'u-ch^ung he ngi'ong-p^an tet-ng`in-ki^ang ^a!
Oi ki-tet v^ong-s`u" ke ngit-`e. Song-ti k^ong-cheu ng`i-t^eu y^i-heu, s^ui-y`en t`u-t'o chhin-t^o thung-kh'u, ch'ung-he ng`i-t^eu chhai f'un-teu-ch^ung pin m`o su"t-phai.
Y^u-s`u", ng`i-t^eu su"t t^ong-chung p^un-ng`in v'u-y+uk l^au kh'u-th+uk; y^u-s`u", ya su"t th`ung ke-t^eu t`u-t'o li'a-t^eu kh'u-nan ke ng`in kh^i khiung-ha.

Ng`i-t^eu f^un-t^am chh^o-k^am ke ng`in ke kh'u-nan. Chh`oi-s'an p^un-ng`in chhi'ong-ch'eu, ng`i-t^eu ya f^on-h'i ngi^un-su; y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`i-t^eu y^u h`an-kha h'o yu chh`ong-chh`un ke s'an-ngi+ap.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu ke y'ung-hi `m-h'o m`o-thet-hi; li'a y'ung-hi voi tai p^un ng`i-t^eu kh+it-thai ke chi'ong-s'ong.
Vi-t'o s+u"t-h`ang Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi pin li^ang-su K`i ke yin-h'i, ng`i-t^eu thin-chh+ok oi ngi^un-nai.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: K^a yit-ha-'e, ke oi l`oi ke chhiu voi to, `m-voi y`en-chh`an.
S+uk Ng`ai ke ngi-ng`in voi y^in-vi sin tet-t'o s^ang-miang. Ch'ung-he, k`i na thui-heu, Ng`ai chhiu `m f^on-h'i k`i.
H'o-tet ng`ai-t^eu `m-he thui-heu chu"-to m+et-m`ong ke ng`in; ng`ai-t^eu he y^u sin-s^im l`oi tet-kiu ke ng`in.
Sin-s^im chhiu-he tui s'o phan-mong ke su" y^u p'a-ak, tui khon-`m-t'o ke su" n`en khok-thin.
K'u-s`u"-thoi ke ng`in tet-t'o Song-ti ke p^o-chi'ong, chhiu-he y^in-vi k`i-t^eu y^u sin-s^im.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, ng`ai-t^eu t^i y'i-chhiu he th^ung-ko Song-ti ke fa chho-s`u"n ke; 'an-ngi`ong, khon tet-t'o ke he tui khon-`m-t'o ke chho-chhut-l`oi ke.

Y^in-vi sin-s^im, ^A-pak hien p'i K^ai-y'un kha h'o ke chi-v+ut p^un Song-ti. Y^in-vi k`i ke sin-s^im, Song-ti p^o-chi'ong k`i, chh^u"n k`i cho ngi-ng`in, y^in-vi Song-ti f^on-h'i chiap-n+ap k`i ke l^i-v+ut. K`i s^ui-y`en s'i-thet, h`an-he th^ung-ko li'a-ke sin-s^im k'ong-fa.

Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Y^i-nok `m-s'u" k^in-l+it s'i. K`i su-chiap to Song-ti ke-vi hi; m`o ng`in chh`im tet-t'o k`i, y^in-vi Song-ti chi^ong k`i chiap-ch'eu. Su"n-k^in k'ong, k`i su-chiap y^i-chhi`en, y'i-k^in tet-t'o Song-ti ke f^on-h'i.
Ng`in m`o sin-s^im, chhiu `m-voi tet-t'o Song-ti ke f^on-h'i. To Song-ti mien-chhi`en l`oi ke ng`in, yit-thin oi sin Song-ti ke chh`un-chhai, h`an-oi sin K`i voi po-s'ong chh`im-khi`u K`i ke ng`in.

Y^in-vi sin-s^im, N`o-^a chhai h`an-m`ang khon-t'o ke su"-chh`in song, th^ang Song-ti ke k'in-ko, chh`un kin-vi ke s^im, chho yit-chak thai-s`on, l`oi kiu k`i l^au k`i chhi`on-k^a. Tui 'an-ngi`ong, k`i thin ke su"-thoi ke chhui, chhu"-k^a ya tui Song-ti li^ang-su y^in sin s'o tet ke ngi.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on sun-f+uk Song-ti ke f^u-seu, hi Song-ti yin-h'i oi su p^un k`i ke s'o-chhai. K`i l`i-kh^oi p'un-koet ke s`u", pin `m-t^i oi hi nai-vi.

Th^ung-ko sin-s^im, k`i h+et chhai Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke s'o-chhai, yi-hi^ong cho l^i-hak; k`i l^au li^ang-su Song-ti khiung-yong yin-h'i ke Y^i-sat l^au Ng^a-kok khiung-ha h+et chhai chong-ph`ung-t'u.
Y^in-vi ^A-pak-l^a-h'on phan-mong ke-chho k^in-k^i y'un-y'en kh^i-chhai ke s`ang, chhiu-he Song-ti s'o sat-kie, s'o kien-chho ke s`ang.

Y^in-vi sin-s^im, s^ui-y`en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on y'i-k^in l'o l'e, S^a-l^a s^en-yuk ke ngi`en-l`in ya y'i-k^in ko-thet, k`i h`an n`en cho ^a-p^a, y^in-vi k`i si^ong-sin Song-ti voi tui K`i ke yin-h'i s'u sin-yung.

S^ui-y`en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chh^in-chhiong y'i-k^in s'i-thet, ch'ung-he, tui k`i yit-ke ng`in h`an chh`on-h^a chhiong thi^en-t'ang ke s^en-'e 'an t^o, chhiong h'oi-s`un ke s^a-'e son `m-chhin ke ch'u"-s^un l`oi!

Li'a-t^eu ng`in he to s'i h`an-y^u sin-s^im ke ng`in. K`i-t^eu pin m`o li^ang-su-t'o Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke; ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu tui y'en-y'en khon-t'o, f^on-h'i t'en-heu. K`i-t^eu s`u"n-ngin chhu"-k^a chhai su"-ki^en he ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in l^au li`u-long ke l^i-hak.
K'ong li'a-ch'ung fa ke ng`in, m`in-m`in p'eu-su" k`i-t^eu he vi chhu"-k^a chh`im yit-ke k^a-hi^ong.
K`i-t^eu pin m`o f`ai-ngiam s'o l`i-kh^oi ke thi-f^ong, na `m-he 'an-ngi`ong, k`i-t^eu h`an-y^u to-ch'on-hi ke k^i-fi.

Ti^en-to, k`i-t^eu hi^un-mu yit-ke kha chi^ang ke k^a-hi^ong, chhiu-he chhai thi^en-t'ang ke; s'o-y^i, Song-ti m`o y^in-vi chh^u"n-cho k`i-t^eu ke Song-ti k'am-kok kien-seu, y^in-vi K`i y'i-k^in vi k`i-t^eu ch'un-phi yit-chho s`ang.

Y^in-vi sin-s^im, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on chhai Song-ti kh'au-ngiam k`i ke s`u", chi^ong Y^i-sat hien-cho chi-v+ut. ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he li^ang-su yin-h'i ke ng`in, ch'ung-he k`i h`an-he k^am-ngien chi^ong k`i ke t^an-t^en-ch'u" hien-cho chi-v+ut.
Song-ti su"t tui k`i k'ong: "Ng`i oi tui Y^i-sat tet-t'o Ng`ai s'o yin-h'i ke ch'u"-s^un."
K`i ngin-v`i Song-ti n`en s'u" ng`in tui s'i f+uk-f+at. Su"-s+u"t-song, ya cho-tet k'ong, ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he chi^ong Y^i-sat tui s'i chiap to-ch'on-l`oi.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Y^i-sat vi-t'o chi^ong-l`oi ke su"-chh`in chuk-fuk Ng^a-kok l^au Y^i-so.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Ng^a-kok l`im-ch^ung ke s`u", vi Yok-sit li'ong-ke lai-'e chuk-fuk; k`i kh'u-t'en ko'ai-kun-'e kin-pai Song-ti.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Yok-sit l`im-ch^ung ke s`u", th`i-h'i Y^i-set-li+et-chh+uk chi^ong-l`oi oi chhut ^Ai-kh+ip ke su", pin f^un-fu oi ngi'ong-p^an chh'u-l^i k`i ke v`i-th'i.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, M^o-s^i chhut-se heu, k`i ke y`a-^oi khon-t'o ^o-nga-'e chhin chi^ang, chhiu chi^ong k`i khong s^am-ke ngi+et, pin `m ki^ang v`ong ke min-lin.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, M^o-s^i s`u"n-ng`in y^i-heu, `m-h'en ng`in chh^u"n k`i cho ^Ai-kh+ip k^ung-ch'u ke lai-'e.
K`i k^am-ngien th`ung Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in khiung-ha su-kh'u, m`o-oi chhai chhui-ok ch^ung chhiam-s`u" hi'ong-l+ok.
Chhai k`i khon-l`oi, vi-t'o su-k^au-ch'a p^un-ng`in v'u-y+uk, p'i ^Ai-kh+ip s'o-y^u ke chh`oi-p'o h`an-kha p'o-kui, y^in-vi k`i khon-chhung chi^ong-l`oi ke chi'ong-s'ong.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, M^o-s^i l`i-kh^oi ^Ai-kh+ip, `m ki^ang ^Ai-kh+ip-v`ong fat-khi'en; k`i ki^en-chh`u" to-t'ai, yit-chh+u"t hiong-chhi`en, chhiu-chhiong khon-t'o muk-ch^u s'o khon-`m-t'o ke Song-ti.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, k`i sat-l+ip Ph`an-ko-chiet, pin f^un-fu chi^ong hiet fin chhai m`un t'ang-k^o, mi^en-tet chu"p-h`ang f'i-m+et ke thi^en-s'u" sat-hoi Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in ke ch'ong-ch'u".
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in h`ang-ko F`ung-h'oi, chhiong h`ang ch^au-thi; ^Ai-kh+ip-ng`in ya si'ong-oi th`en-t'en ko, chhiu p^un s'ui chim-s'i.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in t^in-t'en Y^a-li-k^o-s`ang h`ang chhit-ngit, y`en-heu s`ang-chhi`ong chhiu vang-thet.
Y^in-vi sin-s^im, k^i-'ng L^a-h+ap `m-s'u" th`ung ke-t^eu `m f+uk-chhi`ung Song-ti ke ng`in khiung-ha m+et-m`ong, y^in-vi k`i h'o kho'an-thai ke-t^eu tham-'e.
Ng`ai k'am h`an s^i-yeu k'ong-h^a-hi? Ng`ai m`o 'an-t^o s`u"-ki^en h'o k'ong-h'i K^i-thien, P^a-l^a, Chh^am-s^un, Y^a-fut-th^a, Thai-v'i, Sat-m^u-ng'i, l^au chung si^en-t^i ke su".
Th^ung-ko sin-s^im, k`i-t^eu chu"-f+uk li+et-koet, chu"p-h`ang chu"n-ngi, li^ang-su Song-ti ke yin-h'i; k`i-t^eu set-t'en s^u"-'e ke choi,
m+et-thet li+et-f'o ke v^i-l+it, s'am-kh^oi t^o-kiam ke sat-hoi; k`i-t^eu tui ngi^on-ngi+ok pien-cho k^ong-khi`ong, chhai chan-chh`ong-ch^ung chhin y'ung-k'am, t'a-thui th+it-ng`in ke ki^un-chhui.

Y^u-t^eu fu-'ng chi^ong ke-t^eu tui s'i f+uk-f+at ke chh^in-ng`in chiap to-ch'on-l`oi. Ch'ung-he, y^u-t^eu ng`in kh^i-chhi+et p^un-ng`in su"t-fong, k^am-ngien s'i chhai ok-th+uk ke h`in-f+at ch^u"-ha, vi-t'o oi tet-t'o kha chi^ang f+uk-f+at ke s^ang-miang.
Yu y^u-ng`in ngi^un-su met-sa l^au pi^en-t'a, su"m-chu" p^un-ng`in kh'un h'i-l`oi, ko^an chhai k^am-ngi+uk t'u.

H`an y^u-ng`in p^un s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i, p^un ki-'e ki-th^on, p^un t^o-kiam chh`u"-s'i. Ya y^u-ng`in ph^i-t'en mi`en-y`ong ya-he s^an-y`ong ke ph`i s'am-l`oi s'am-hi, ngi^un-su khi`ung-kh'u, pet-hoi, l^au kh'u-th+uk.
Li'a su"-ki^en kh^am-`m-tet y^u li'a-t^eu ng`in! K`i-t^eu chhiong nan-m`in 'an-ngi`ong, chhai kh'ong-y^a l^au s^an-li^ang-ki^en li`u-long, h+et chhai s^an-thung l^au thi-l`ung nui-t'u.
Li'a-t^eu ng`in, y^in-vi sin-s^im, l^ung-ch'ung y^u tet-t'o Song-ti ke p^o-chi'ong; ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu pin m`o li^ang-su-t'o Song-ti s'o yin-h'i ke.
Y^in-vi Song-ti vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu y^u h`an-kha h'o ke ^on-ph`ai; K`i ke ch'u"-yi chhiu-he: K`i-t^eu oi th`ung ng`ai-t^eu khiung-ha chang n`en th+at-to v`an-chhi`on.

Ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu y^u 'an-t^o kien-chu"n-ng`in, chhiong y`un v`i-t'en ng`ai-t^eu, chhiu yin-k^oi piong-thet kok-ch'ung ke chh^ung-t^am l^au chh`an-t'en ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui, ngi^un-nai to-t'ai l`oi ch'eu p`ai chhai ng`ai-t^eu th`eu-chhi`en ke lu-chh`ang.

Ng`ai-t^eu oi chu-muk khon Y^a-s^u, y^in-vi k`i he ng`ai-t^eu sin-s^im ke kh^oi-chh'ong-ch'a l^au v`an-s`u"n-ch'a. Vi-t'o p`ai chhai k`i th`eu-chhi`en ke h'i-l+ok, k`i khon-khi^ang v'u-y+uk, ngi^un-su s+u"p-su"-ka ke thung-kh'u; li'a-ha, k`i chh^o chhai Song-ti p'o-chho ke yu-phi'en.
Ng`i-t^eu oi h'o-h'o si'ong khon-'e, k`i he ngi'ong-p^an ngi^un-su chhui-ng`in ke yen-hen; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chang `m-voi l^ang-s^im su"t-chu".
Ng`i-t^eu th`ung chhui-ok chan-teu, h`an-m`ang piang-to s^ang-s'i ke ko^an-th`eu.

Song-ti ngi'ong-p^an khien-mi^en ng`i-t^eu, chhiong khien ch'u"-'ng yit-yong, k'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m ki-tet l'e he-m`o? K`i k'ong: Ng`ai ke lai-'e ^a, `m-h'o khon-khi^ang Ch'u ke k'on-kau, p^un K`i chit-phi ke s`u"-chiet, `m-h'o su"t-chu";
y^in-vi Ch'u k'on-kau K`i s'o-siak ke ng`in, pi^en-t'a m^i-yit-ke K`i s'o ngin ke ch'u"-'ng.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ngi^un-su kh'u-nan chhiong he ^a-p^a ke k'on-kau, y^in-vi li'a he p'eu-su" Song-ti tui-thai ng`i-t^eu chhiong ch'u"-'ng yit-yong. K'am y^u `m-s'u" su ki^a-p^a k'on-kau ke ch'u"-'ng m^a?
Ng`i-t^eu na m`o chhiong kh`i-th^a ke ch'u"-'ng 'an-ngi`ong su k'on-kau, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-he ch'u"-'ng, he s^u"-s^en-ch'u".

Ngiuk-s^u"n ke ^a-p^a su"t k'on-kau ng`ai-t^eu, ng`ai-t^eu h`an-he ch^un-kin k`i-t^eu. 'An-ngi`ong, tui l`in-sin ke ^A-p^a, ng`ai-t^eu k'am `m-he h`an-kha oi sun-f+uk K`i, chang voi tet-t'o s^ang-miang m^a?
Ngiuk-s^u"n ke ^a-p^a cheu chhu"-k^a khon-cho chh+ok ke, chhiam-s`u" k'on-kau ng`ai-t^eu; ch'ung-he, Song-ti ke k'on-kau he vi-t'o ng`ai-t^eu ke li-yit, oi p^un ng`ai-t^eu y^u-fun K`i ke su"n-kiet.

Ng`in su k'on-kau ke s`u", yit-thin voi s^ong-s^im, `m s'ong-khoai; ch'ung-he heu-l`oi, ke-t^eu tui k'on-kau l`oi su chh^au-lien ke ng`in chhiu voi kiet ph`in-^on ke k'o-ch'u", ko chu"n-chh+u"t ke s^en-f+at.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu s'u-ngi^on kiok-l`ai ke, oi chap-chen h'i-l`oi!
Oi yit-chh+u"t h`ang chhai pit-chh+u"t ke lu-song, s'u" khi`o-thet ke kiok chang `m-voi thot-v'on, f'an-ch'on voi tet-t'o y^i-chhu".
Ng`i-t^eu oi chhin-l+it l^au chung-ng`in f`o-h'o, ya oi ch^ui-khi`u su"n-kiet; m`o su"n-kiet, m`o yit-ke ng`in n`en kien-t'o Ch'u.
Oi ki'un-s'u"m! Mi^en-tet y^u-ng`in su"t-thet Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en; mi^en-tet y^u-ng`in chhiong y^u th+uk ke k^in thai h'i-l`oi, hoi-t'o chhin-t^o ng`in, s'u" k`i-t^eu pien-cho v^u-ve;
mi^en-tet y^u-ng`in fam y`im-lon, ya-he chhiong Y^i-so 'an khon-chhung su"-si+uk, vi-t'o yit-v'on s+u"t-v+ut li`en ch'ong-ch'u" ke mi`ang-fun ya n^a-l`oi mai-thet.
Ng`i-t^eu t^i, heu-l`oi k`i si'ong-oi tet-t'o ^a-p^a ke chuk-fuk, ch'ung-he su kh^i-chhi+et; k`i s^ui-y`en li`u muk-chu"p, pet-chhiet khi'en-khi`u, h`an-he chh`im `m-t'o v'an-f`i ke phan-fap.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-he chhiong ke-t^eu Y^i-set-li+et-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong, l`oi-to ke mi^a-tet-t'o ke S^i-nai-s^an; chhai ke-vi y^u f'o-yam, v^u-y`un, het-am, phau-f^ung,
ph`un y`ong-kok ke s^ang, l^au k'ong-fa ke s^ang. Ng`in-m`in th^ang-t'o li'a-ke fa, chhiu y^eu-khi`u `m-h'o chai tui k`i-t^eu k'ong-fa;
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu t^ong `m-h'i ke min-lin, k'ong: "Mi^a li'a s^an ke, chhiu-son he th`eu-s^ang ya oi yung s+ak-th`eu t+ep-s'i."
S'o khon-t'o ke f^i-s`ong tet-ng`in-ki^ang, li`en M^o-s^i ya k'ong: "Ng`ai ki^ang-to p+it-p+it-chhat!"
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu he l`oi-to Siak-^on-s^an; li'a he y'un-s^en Song-ti ke s`ang, he thi^en-t'ang ke Y^a-lu-sat-l^ang, y^u chhi^en-chhi^en van-van ke thi^en-s'u".

Ng`i-t^eu he l`oi-to Song-ti chung ch'ong-ch'u" f^on-h'i chhi-fi ke chh`ong-s'o; li'a-t^eu ch'ong-ch'u" ke mi`ang y'i-k^in ki chhai thi^en-t'ang. Ng`i-t^eu he l`oi-to s'u"m-phan van-m`in ke Song-ti mien-chhi`en, he l`oi-to s`ang-cho v`an-chhi`on ke ngi-ng`in ke l`in-f`un ke s'o-chhai.
Ng`i-t^eu he l`oi-to s^in-yok ke ch^ung-p'o Y^a-s^u mien-chhi`en, he l`oi-to fin-hiet ke s'o-chhai; li'a-ke hiet y`ang-ko ^A-pak ke hiet s'o p'eu-hien ke.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi ki'un-s'u"m, `m-h'o kh^i-chhi+et ke hiong ng`i-t^eu k'ong-fa ke. Ke-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et ke chhai thi-song chi^ong s`u"n-su"n ke ch^u"n-tho chh`on p^un k`i-t^eu ke yit-vi, t^u m`o fap-thu thot-chhui; na-he ng`ai-t^eu kh^i-chhi+et ke tui thi^en-t'ang hiong ng`ai-t^eu k'ong-fa ke, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu h`an-kha m`o kh'o-n`en thot-chhui ^o!
Ke-s`u", K`i ke s^ang y`eu-thung thi, ch'ung-he li'a-ha, K`i yin-h'i k'ong: "H`an-y^u yit-p'ai, Ng`ai `m t^an-chhiang oi y`eu-thung thi, li`en thi^en ya oi y`eu-thung."
"H`an-y^u yit-p'ai" li'a-ki fa m`in-hi'en p'eu-su" su-chho ch^u" v+ut voi su y`eu-thung to s'ai-ch'eu, p^un ke-t^eu `m-voi y`eu-thung ke li`u-h^a-l`oi.

'An-ngi`ong, ki-y`en ng`ai-t^eu s`u"n-su ke `m-voi y`eu-thung ke koet, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi k'am-^en. Ng`ai-t^eu oi cheu Song-ti s'o f^on-h'i ke, yung khi`en-s`u"n kin-vi ke s^im l`oi su"-fung K`i,
y^in-vi ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti he li+et-f'o.
Ng`i-t^eu oi yit-chh+u"t chhiong hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi 'an-ngi`ong si^ong-siak.
`M-h'o `m ki-tet chiap-thai ngoi-hi^ong-ng`in hi ng`i-t^eu vuk-h^a. Su"t y^u-ng`in 'an-ngi`ong h`ang, v`u-yi-ch^ung sa chiap-thai-t'o thi^en-s'u".

Oi ko^an-s^im ke-t^eu chh^o-k^am ke ng`in, chhiong-he ng`i-t^eu ya th`ung k`i-t^eu khiung-ha chh^o-k^am. Oi ko^an-s^im ke-t^eu chhai fam-nan ch^ung ke ng`in, chhiu-chhiong ng`i-t^eu ya chhai fam-nan ch^ung yit-yong.
M^i-yit-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung oi ch^un-chhung f^un-y^in; f^u-chh^i oi p'i-chh'u" ch^ung-s+u"t. Song-ti voi s'u"m-phan ke-t^eu fong-thong l^au y`im-lon ke ng`in.

Ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in-s^en `m-h'o ch'ung-he si'ong-oi chhon-chhi`en; oi m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a s'o y^u ke. Y^in-vi Song-ti su"t k'ong: "Ng`ai chhi+et-tui `m-voi l`i-kh^oi ng`i, y'un-y'en `m-voi fit-thet ng`i."
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu cho-tet thai-t'am k'ong: Ch'u he ng`ai ke p^ong-chhu, ng`ai `m-s'u" ki^ang; ng`in n`en tui ng`ai ngi'ong-p^an n`o?

Ng`i-t^eu oi ki-ngiam th`eu-p'ai tai-li^ang ng`i-t^eu, chh`on Song-ti ke ch^u"n-tho p^un ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in. H'o-h'o si'ong khon-'e, k`i-t^eu he ngi'ong-p^an s^en-f+at, ngi'ong-p^an s'i; ng`i-t^eu oi h'au-fap k`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im.
Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chh^o-p^u-ngit, k^im-p^u-ngit, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'en, ya `m-voi k'oi-pien.

`M-h'o p^un kok-yong kh`i-koai ke h+ok-sot chi^ong ng`i-t^eu tai ch'eu-ch'an-hi. Ng`i-t^eu ke s^im oi y'i-kho Song-ti ke ^en-ti'en l`oi tet-t'o ki^en-ku, `m-h'o y'i-kho s+u"t-v+ut ke li-k^ui; cheu ke-t^eu li-k^ui hi-h`ang ke ng`in pin m`o tet-t'o m'a-ke h'o-chhu.
Chhai su"n-chong-ph`ung t^i-poi su"-fung ke Y`u-thai chi-s^u", m`o khi`en h'o s+u"t ng`ai-t^eu chi-th`an-t'ang ke chi-v+ut.
Y`u-thai ke thai-chi-s^u" chi^ong th`eu-s^ang ke hiet tai-ng+ip chu"-su"n-s'o, hien-cho s+uk-chhui-chi; ch'ung-he ke-t^eu th`eu-s^ang ke s^u"n-th'i he chhai y`ang-ngoi s^eu.
S'o-y^i, vi-t'o oi yung chhu"-k^a ke hiet l`oi kiet-chhiang ng`in ke chhui, Y^a-s^u chhiu su-kh'u, s'i chhai s`ang-ngoi.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi y`ang-ngoi chhiu-khiun k`i, f^un-t^am k`i s'o-su ke v'u-y+uk.
Y^in-vi chhai su"-ki^en, ng`ai-t^eu m`o y'un-y'en chh`un-chhai ke s`ang; ng`ai-t^eu s'o ch^ui-khi`u ke he chi^ong-l`oi ke s`ang.
S'o-y^i, ng`ai-t^eu yin-k^oi th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u, s`ong-s`ong yung siung-chan cho chi-v+ut l`oi hien p^un Song-ti, chhiu-he yung ng`ai-t^eu ke choi ko-ph+ak K`i ke mi`ang.
Ch'ung-he, ya `m-h'o `m ki-tet h`ang-san l^au p'i-chh'u" f^un-hi'ong, y^in-vi li'a-ch'ung ke chi-v+ut he Song-ti s'o f^on-h'i ke.

Oi f+uk-chhi`ung ng`i-t^eu ke li^ang-chhiu, th^ang k`i-t^eu ke ch'u"-th^o. K`i-t^eu yit-chh+u"t khon-ku ng`i-t^eu ke l`in-f`un, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu oi tui Song-ti fu-chit, chhiong oi k^au-chong yit-yong. Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-chhi`ung k`i-t^eu, k`i-t^eu chhiu voi cho-to chhin f^on-h'i; na m`o, k`i-t^eu voi l^ang-s^im th'eu thai-hi, li'a tui ng`i-t^eu y^u m'a-ke li-yit n`e?
Chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu ki-si+uk thoi ng`ai-t^eu kh`i-t'o. Ng`ai-t^eu chhu"-sin li`ong-s^im chh^in-ph+ak, l+ok-yi s`ui-s`u" s`ui-thi h`ang chu"n-lu.
Ng`ai th+it-ph+et oi chhi'ang ng`i-t^eu thoi ng`ai kh`i-t'o, p^un ng`ai chhin-kiak to-ch'on ng`i-t^eu ke-vi hi.

Song-ti y'i-k^in s'u" ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u tui s'i f+uk-f+at. K`i th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u s'o li`u ke hiet yin-chu"n li'au y'un-y'en ke yok, s'u" k`i s`ang-cho chung y`ong-khi`un ke Thai-m+uk-ch'a. Ngien su ph`in-^on ke Song-ti s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i-t^eu, p^un ng`i-t^eu h`ang tak-yong ke h'o-su", l`oi ch^un-h`ang K`i ke ch'u"-yi! Ngien K`i th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk chhai ng`ai-t^eu s^u"n-song s`u"n-chhiu K`i s'o f^on-h'i ke su"! Ngien y`ung-yeu k^ui-p^un K^i-tuk, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'un y'en-y'en! ^A-m'en.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`ai khi`u ng`i-t^eu nai-s^im th^ang ng`ai ke khien-mi^en; y^in-vi ng`ai si'a p^un ng`i-t^eu ke sin-'e, pin `m-he chhin chh`ong.
Ng`ai po ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`ai-t^eu ke hi^ung-thi Th`i-m^o-thai y'i-k^in tet-t'o su"t-fong l'e. K`i na-he kha ch'o l`oi, ng`ai voi th`ung k`i khiung-ha hi khon ng`i-t^eu.
Chhi'ang thoi ng`ai-t^eu tui ng`i-t^eu s'o-y^u ke li^ang-chhiu l^au chung su"n-th`u chhi'ang-^on. Tui Yi-thai-li l`oi ke ng`in chhi`on-phu ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Ngien Song-ti su ^en-ti'en p^un ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a!
Ng`ai he Ng^a-kok, Song-ti l^au Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in; ng`ai hiong f^un-san chhai chhi`on su"-kie Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu t`u-t'o kok-ch'ung ke su"-lien, yin-k^oi khon-cho he f^on-h'i ke su",
y^in-vi t^i, ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im k^in-ko kh'au-ngiam chhiu voi s^ang-chhut ngi^un-nai.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ngi^un-nai to-t'ai, chang n`en th+at-to s+u"p-chhi`on s+u"p-m^i, m`o khiam-khiet ke thi-phu.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en na y^u-ng`in khiet-s'eu chu"-fi, k`i chhiu yin-t^ong khi`u Song-ti; K`i voi chi^ong chu"-fi su-p^un k`i, y^in-vi Song-ti l+ok-yi f^ung-f^ung fu-fu su-p^un m^i-yit-ke ng`in.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu oi ph`in sin-s^im khi`u, `m-h'o y^u yit-s+it ng`i-f`u; y^in-vi ng`i-f`u ke ng`in chhiong p^un f^ung chh^oi-l`oi chh^oi-hi ke h'oi-long yit-yong.
'An-ngi`ong ke ng`in s^am-s^im li'ong-yi, chhai k`i yit-chhiet s'o-h`ang ke su"-song m`o-thin m`o-chh+ok; li'a-ch'ung ng`in `m-s'u" si'ong-oi tui Ch'u ke-vi tet-t'o m'a-ke.
Khi`ung-kh'u ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi tet-t'o k^o-s^u"n, yin-k^oi f^on-h'i;
y^u-chhi`en-ng`in su kong-p^i ya oi f^on-h'i; y^in-vi k`i voi chhiong y^a-f^a yit-yong chhia-thet-hi.

Ngit-th`eu chhut-l`oi, ngi+et-f^ung yit chh^oi, chh'o chhiu kh^u-ch^au, f^a ya chhia-thet, s'o-y^u ke chi^ang chhiu m`o-thet hi. Y^u-chhi`en-ng`in chhai su"-ngi+ap-song m`o-h`an chh+u"t-chh+at, ya voi chhiong 'an-ngi`ong chhia-thet-hi.

T`u-t'o su"-lien ngi^un-nai to-t'ai ke ng`in he y^u fuk-hi ke; y^in-vi th^ung-ko kh'au-ngiam y^i-heu, k`i voi li^ang-su-t'o Song-ti s'o yin-h'i p^un ke-t^eu kin-oi K`i ke ng`in s^ang-miang ke mi^en-li`u.
Ng`in su su"-tham ke s`u"-chiet, cho-`m-tet k'ong: "Ng`ai he su Song-ti ke su"-tham!" Y^in-vi Song-ti `m p^un si`a-ok su"-tham, K`i ya `m-voi su"-tham ng`in.
M^i-yit-ke ng`in su su"-tham, he p^un k`i chhu"-k^a ke y+uk-mong khi^en-t'en-ch'eu, p^un k`i phien-ch'eu-hi.
Y+uk-mong f`ai-th^oi y^i-heu, chhiu kiung-chhut chhui-ok; chhui-ok yit ch'ong-s`u"n, chhiu s^ang-chhut s'i-m`ong.
Ng`ai chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, `m-h'o p^un-ng`in phien-ch'eu-hi!

Yit-chhiet m^i-san l^au v`an-chhi`on ke ^en-su chhi`on-phu he tui t'ang-k^o, tui thi^en-t'ang ke ^A-p^a l`oi ke; K`i he yit-chhiet k^ong ke Chh'ong-chho-ch'a, `m-voi k'oi-pien, ya m`o ch'on-thung ke y'ang.
K`i cheu chhu"-k^a ke ch'u"-yi, th^ung-ko ch^u"n-l^i ke fa su s^ang-miang p^un ng`ai-t^eu, s'u" ng`ai-t^eu chhai K`i s'o-chho ke van-v+ut ch^ung chh^in-chhiong chh^u-siuk ke k'o-ch'u".
Ng`ai chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi t^i ^o! M^i-yit-ke ng`in oi kiak-kiak th^ang, `m-h'o 'an kiak kh^oi-choi, ya `m-h'o 'an kiak fat-khi'en;
y^in-vi ng`in ke fat-khi'en put-n`en th+at-s`u"n Song-ti k^ung-ngi ke muk-tit.

S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi chh`u-thet yit-chhiet ke f'ai s+ip-koan l^au si`a-ok ke h`ang-v`i, yung v^un-y`u ke s^im l`oi chiap-su Song-ti chung chhai ng`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung ke ch^u"n-tho, chhiu-he n`en ch'u"n-kiu ng`i-t^eu ke ch^u"n-tho.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o phien chhu"-k^a, l'au-t'o th^ang-tho chhiu la; ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu yit-thin oi h`ang-tho.
Na y^u-ng`in th^ang-li'au tho-l^i m`o hi h`ang, chhiu-chhiong yit-ke ng`in cheu kiang-'e khon chhu"-k^a ke mien-mau,
khon-li'au chhiu h`ang-kh^oi, ngi`am-s`u" chhiu `m ki-tet chhu"-k^a ke yong-siong.

Ch'ung-he, si`ong-se chh`a-khon ke v`an-chhi`on yu p^un ng`in tet-t'o chhu"-y`u ke kau-su", pin ki'un-s'u ke ng`in, `m-he th^ang-li'au chhiu `m ki-tet, f'an-ch'on s+u"t-s+u"t chhai-chhai hi h`ang, li'a-ch'ung ng`in chhai k`i s'o-h`ang ke su"-song yit-thin voi m`ung-fuk.
Na y^u-ng`in chhu"-ngin he khi`en-s`u"n ke ng`in, ch'ung-he m`o yok-suk chhu"-k^a ke s+at-m`a, chhiu-he phien chhu"-k^a; k`i ke khi`en-s`u"n m`o pan-ti'am ka-chh+u"t.
Chhai ^A-p^a Song-ti khon-l`oi, s`un-kiet m`o l'a-sap ke khi`en-s`u"n chhiu-he: Cheu-ku chhai fam-nan ch^ung ke k^u-y`i l^au ko'a-fu; th`ung-s`u" p'o-s'u chhu"-k^a m+ok ngiam-t'o su"-kie ke v^u-ve.

Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu ki-y`en he ng`ai-t^eu y`ung-k^ong ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke sin-th`u, chhiu cho-`m-tet cheu ng`in ke ngoi-p'eu yung m`o khiung-yong ke thai-thu l`oi tui-thai ng`in.
K'a-s'u" y^u yit-ke y^u-chhi`en-ng`in, tai k^im kim-ch'u", chok chi^ang s^am, ng+ip-hi ng`i-t^eu ke fi-th`ong, th`ung-s`u" y^u yit-ke chok lan s^am ke khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in ya ng+ip-hi;

na-he ng`i-t^eu khon-chhung ke chok chi^ang s^am ke ng`in, tui k`i k'ong: "Chhi'ang ng`i chh^o song-vi", ch'ung-he tui ke khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in k'ong: "Kh^i to ke-phi'en hi", ya-he k'ong: "Chh^o chhai ng`ai ke kiok-h^a",
'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu k'am `m-he phi^en-s^im, yung f'ai-yi l`oi ph'in-siong ng`in m^a?

Ng`ai chh^in-oi ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi th^ang chh^in-chh'u ^o! Song-ti k'am `m-he ki'en-si'en su"-ki^en ke khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in, p^un k`i-t^eu chhai sin-ngi'ong-song fu-chiuk, l`oi s`u"n-su K`i s'o yin-h'i p^un ke-t^eu kin-oi K`i ke ng`in ke koet m^a?
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu kin-y`en v'u-y+uk khi`ung-kh'u-ng`in! Su"-s+u"t-song, kh^i-ap ng`i-t^eu, l^ai ng`i-t^eu s^ong k^on-th^ang ke, k'am `m-he ke-t^eu y^u-chhi`en-ng`in m^a?
F'i-pong ng`i-t^eu s'o li^ang-su ke ch^un-kui ke mi`ang, k'am `m-he k`i-t^eu m^a?
Ng`i-t^eu na khok-s+u"t ch^un-s'u Su"n-k^in s'o ki-chai, ke chu"-k^o v`u-song ke kau-su": "Siak ph+et-ng`in chhiong chhu"-k^a", chhiu chh+ok l'e!
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu na cheu ng`in ke ngoi-p'eu l`oi tui-thai ng`in, chhiu-he fam-chhui; fap-l+it oi thin ng`i-t^eu cho fam-fap ke ng`in.
M`o-lun m'a-ng`in v`i-poi fap-l+it ch^ung ke yit-thi`au kie-min, chhiu-he v`i-poi chhi`on-phu fap-l+it.
Y^in-vi ke min-lin k'ong "Cho-`m-tet fam ki^en-y`im" ke, ya k'ong "Cho-`m-tet chh`u" ng`in". Ng`i na-he chh`u" ng`in, s^ui-y`en m`o fam ki^en-y`im, ng`i h`an-he v`i-poi fap-l+it.
Ki-y`en ng`i-t^eu oi cheu ke p^un ng`in tet-t'o chhu"-y`u ke kau-su" su s'u"m-phan, ng`i-t^eu ke ngi`en-h`ang chhiu oi h+ap k`i ke ph^eu-ch'un.
Y^in-vi, Song-ti s'u"m-phan ke s`u", `m-voi l`in-m'en ke-t^eu `m l`in-m'en ng`in ke. L`in-m'en voi y`ang-ko s'u"m-phan.
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, k'a-s'u" y^u-ng`in k'ong k`i y^u sin-s^im, ch'ung-he m`o yung h`ang-v`i chu"n-m`in, y^u m'a-ke yung n`e? Ke-ch'ung sin-s^im voi kiu k`i m`o?
K'a-s'u" y^u hi^ung-thi ya-he ch'i-moi, m`o h'o chok yu m`o h'o s+u"t,

ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in tui k`i-t^eu k'ong: "Cho ng`i-t^eu ph`in-^on ch'on-hi! Ngien ng`i-t^eu chok-tet-s^eu, s+u"t-tet-p'au!" ch'ung-he m`o p^un k`i-t^eu s^u"n-th'i s'o s^i-yeu ke, y^u m'a-ke yung n`e?
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, sin-s^im na m`o h`ang-v`i chhiu-he s'i ke.

Ch'ung-he, y^u-ng`in voi k'ong: "Ng`i y^u sin-s^im; ng`ai y^u h`ang-v`i." Ch'ung-he, ng`ai oi k'ong: "P^un ng`ai khon ng`i m`o h`ang-v`i ke sin-s^im; ng`ai chhiu voi yung ng`ai ke h`ang-v`i p^un ng`i khon ng`ai ke sin-s^im."
Ng`i sin Song-ti ch'u"-y^u yit-ke, chhin h'o! Si`a-l`in me 'an-ngi`ong si^ong-sin, ch'ung-he k`i-t^eu ki^ang-to p+it-p+it-chhat.
Ngong-'e ^a! Ng`i si'ong-oi t^i m`o h`ang-v`i ke sin-s^im he ngi'ong-p^an m`o yung m^a?
Ng`ai-t^eu ke ch'u-si^en ^A-pak-l^a-h'on he ngi'ong-p^an p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in n`e? K'am `m-he y^in-vi k`i chi^ong ki^a lai-'e Y^i-sat hien chhai chi-th`an-t'ang li'a-ke h`ang-v`i m^a?
Kh'o-kien, k`i ke sin-s^im l^au h`ang-v`i he phi`ang-phi`ang chin-h`ang ke; th^ung-ko h`ang-v`i k`i ke sin-s^im chang th+at-to v`an-chhi`on.
Su"n-k^in k'ong: " ^A-pak-l^a-h'on sin Song-ti, y^in-vi k`i ke sin, Song-ti chhiu son k`i cho ngi-ng`in." Li'a-ke fa s+u"t-hien l'e; s'o-y^i, k`i chh^u"n-cho Song-ti ke ph`en-y^u.
Kh'o-kien, ng`in p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in he th^ung-ko h`ang-v`i, `m-he t^an-t^an kho sin-s^im.

K^i-'ng L^a-h+ap ke chh`in-h`in ya he 'an-ngi`ong. K`i p^un Song-ti chh^u"n-cho ngi-ng`in he y^in-vi h`ang-v`i; k`i chiap-thai Y`u-thai-ng`in ke s'u"-ch'a, yu p^ong-chhu k`i-t^eu tui nang-ngoi yit-thi`au lu th`o-ch'eu.
S'o-y^i, chhiong s^u"n-th'i m`o th'eu-hi he s'i ke, sin-s^im m`o h`ang-v`i ya he s'i ke.
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o 'an t^o ng`in cho kau-s^u", y^in-vi t^i ng`ai-t^eu cho kau-s^u" ke yit-thin voi p'i ph+et-ng`in su kha ngi`am ke s'u"m-phan.
Ng`ai-t^eu thai-k^a t^u s`ong-s`ong y^u ko-su"t; na y^u-ng`in chhai ngi`en-ng^i song m`o ko-su"t, k`i chhiu-he yit-ke v`an-chhi`on ke ng`in, y^u fap-thu kh'ung-chu" k`i ke chhi`on-s^u"n.
Ng`ai-t^eu chi^ong m^a-h`am-thiet piong chhai m^a-choi t^i-poi, ham m^a sun-f+uk, chhiu n`en kh'ung-chu" k`i chhi`on-s^u"n.
Ng`i khon, s`on s^ui-y`en 'an thai, yu p^un thai-f^ung chh^oi-t'en ch'eu, ch'ung-he yung yit-k^i se-se ke s`on-th`o chhiu n`en kh'ung-chu" k`i ke f^ong-hiong, cheu th`o-k^ung ke yi-su" h`ang.
Chhiong 'an-ngi`ong, s+at-m`a s^ui-y`en chhin se, ch'ung-he voi k'ong thai fa. Khon ^a, se-se ke f'o n`en s^eu-chhiang thai-thai ke s^em-l`im!

S+at-m`a chhiong f'o yit-yong, chhai ng`ai-t^eu ke pak-th'i-ch^ung, k`i he chhui-ok ke su"-kie, voi hoi ng`ai-t^eu k^ui-s^u"n t'a l'a-sap; k`i voi yung tui thi-ngi+uk l`oi ke f'o l`oi f`un-s^eu ng`ai-t^eu ng`in-s^en ke lu-chh`ang.
Ng`in y^u phan-fap chu"-f+uk kok-ch'ung ke ch'eu-chhu, f^i-kh`im, kh^un-chh`ung, l^au s'ui-chh+uk; su"-s+u"t-song, kok-ch'ung ke thung-v+ut ya y'i-k^in p^un-ng`in chu"-f+uk l'e.
Ch'ung-he, m`o ng`in n`en chu"-f+uk s+at-m`a; k`i he m`o-fap chu"-f+uk ke ok-v+ut, chh^ung-m^an hoi-s'i ng`in ke th+uk-hi.
Ng`ai-t^eu yung s+at-m`a k'am-chhia Ch'u --- ng`ai-t^eu ke Thi^en-fu, yu yung s+at-m`a chu-ch'u Song-ti cheu chhu"-k^a ke h`in-siong s'o chho-chhut-l`oi ke ng`in.
K'am-chhia l^au chu-ch'u chhi`on-phu tui khiung ch^ong choi chhut-l`oi! Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, li'a he chhin `m yin-k^oi ke!
Khiung-chak chhi`en-ngi`en n`en th`ung-s`u" y'ung-chhut thi`am-s'ui l^au f'u-s'ui m^a?
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, v`u-f^a-k'o-su voi t'a k'am-l'am m^a? Ph`u-th`o-su ya voi t'a v`u-f^a-k'o m^a? H`am ke chhi`en-s'ui `m-voi li`u-chhut thi`am-s'ui l`oi.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u chh^ung-m`in chu"-fi ke ng`in m`o? Na y^u, k`i chhiu yin-k^oi yung khi^am-p^i l^au chu"-fi ke h'o h`ang-v`i, l`oi p'eu-hien k`i t^ong-chi^ang ke s^en-f+at.
Ng`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung na y^u ok-th+uk ke chhit-tu l^au chhu"-s^u", ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-h'o chai chhu"-kho^a l^au k'ong f^a-li^au; li'a he phoi-ngi+ak ch^u"n-l^i ke su".
Li'a-ch'ung ke chu"-fi `m-he tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke, he s+uk thi ke, s+uk chh`in-y+uk ke, s+uk M^o-k'ui ke.
Nai-vi y^u chhit-tu l^au chhu"-s^u", nai-vi chhiu voi y^u fun-lon l^au kok-ch'ung si`a-ok ke h`ang-v`i.

Ti^en-to, tui t'ang-k^o l`oi ke chu"-fi y^u k'i-yong th+it-set: Thi-yit he s`un-kiet, y`en-heu he f`o-ph`in, v^un-f`o, h'o chh^am-si`ong, chh^ung-m^an chh`u"-p^i, n`en kiet-chhut f^ung-fu ke san-k'o, `m-voi phi^en-s^im, ya `m-voi h^i-k'a.
Chhiuk-chin f`o-ph`in ke ng`in he yung f`o-ph`in l`oi ve-ch'ung, chhiu s^u-kot k^ung-ngi ke k'o-ch'u".
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en ke chh^ung-th+ut l^au y^en-k^a he tui nai-vi l`oi ke n`e? He tui ng`i-t^eu t^i-poi si^ong-ch^ang ke y+uk-mong l`oi ke!
Ng`i-t^eu th^am-th`u, tet `m-t'o chhiu si'ong-oi chh`u" ng`in; ng`i-t^eu chhit-tu, tet `m-t'o chhiu chh^ung-th+ut l^au y^en-k^a. Ng`i-t^eu tet `m-t'o, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu m`o khi`u Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu khi`u ya tet `m-t'o, y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke thung-k^i `m-chh+ok; ng`i-t^eu s'o-khi`u ke he si'ong-oi long-fi chhai yen-l+ok ch^ung.

Ng`i li'a-t^eu m`o ch^ung-s^im ke ng`in ^a! K'am-k'ong ng`i-t^eu `m-t^i th`ung su"-kie cho ph`en-y^u chhiu-he th`ung Song-ti cho tui-th+it m^a? M'a-ng`in si'ong-oi th`ung su"-kie cho ph`en-y^u, chhiu-he cho Song-ti ke th+it-ng`in!
Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Song-ti piong chhai ng`ai-t^eu t^i-poi ke l`in y^u kh+it khi`ong ke y+uk-mong." Ng`i-t^eu l'au-t'o li'a-ki fa m`o m'a-ke yi-su" m^a?
Ch'ung-he, Song-ti s'o su ke ^en-ti'en h`an-kha khi`ong, chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Song-ti ch'u-t'ong ki^eu-ngau ke ng`in, su ^en-ti'en p^un khi^am-p^i ke ng`in.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung Song-ti. Oi t'i-khong M^o-k'ui, M^o-k'ui chhiu voi s'am-ch'eu.
Ng`i-t^eu chh^in-khiun Song-ti, Song-ti chhiu voi chh^in-khiun ng`i-t^eu. Y^u-chhui ke ng`in ^a, oi kiet-chhiang ng`i-t^eu ke s'u! S^am-s^im li'ong-yi ke ng`in ^a, oi kiet-chhiang ng`i-t^eu ke s^im!
Ng`i-t^eu oi s^ong-s^im, p^i-^oi, li`u muk-chu"p; oi chi^ong seu-s^ang pien-cho ^oi-kieu, chi^ong f^on-h'i pien-cho p^i-s^ong!
Oi chhai Ch'u ke mien-chhi`en khi^am-p^i, K`i chhiu voi k^o-s^u"n ng`i-t^eu.

Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, `m-h'o fu-si^ong ph^i-ph`in. Ph^i-ph`in ya-he lun-ton hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke, chhiu-he ph^i-ph`in, lun-ton fap-l+it. Ng`i na-he lun-ton fap-l+it, ng`i chhiu `m-he h`ang fap-l+it ke ng`in, he cho s'u"m-phan-ch'a.
Song-ti he v`i-yit ke l+ip-fap-ch'a l^au s'u"m-phan-ch'a; ch'u"-y^u K`i chang n`en ch'u"n-kiu, n`en f'i-m+et. Ng`i he m'a-ng`in, ngi'ong-k'am lun-ton ph+et-ng`in ^a!
Oi se-ngi ^o! Ng`i-t^eu y^u-ng`in k'ong: "K^im-p^u-ngit ya-he thi^en-k^ong-ngit, ng`ai-t^eu l`oi-hi m^eu-m^eu s`ang, chhai ke-vi h+et yit ngi`en, cho s^en-l^i chhon thai-chhi`en."
Su"-s+u"t-song, ng`i-t^eu li`en thi^en-k^ong-ngit voi ngi'ong-p^an t^u `m t^i! Ng`i-t^eu ke s^ang-miang chhiong m'a-ke n`e? He chhiong m`ung-y^en yit-yong, chhut-hien yit-ha-'e chhiu `m-kien-thet.
Ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong 'an-ngi`ong k'ong: "Ch'u na h'en, ng`ai-t^eu chhiu n`en s^ang h^a-hi, cho li'a-yong su", cho ke-yong su"."
Li'a-ha, ng`i-t^eu kin-y`en n^a phong-f^ung ke su" l`oi kho^a-khi'eu; li'a-ch'ung kho^a-khi'eu he si`a-ok ke.
S'o-y^i, ng`in na t^i san, `m hi h`ang, chhiu-he k`i ke chhui.
Ng`i-t^eu y^u-chhi`en-ng`in ^a, oi se-ngi ^o! Ng`i-t^eu oi li`u muk-chu"p thai-s^ang kieu, y^in-vi y^u thai ch^ai-nan voi l`im-to ng`i-t^eu l'e!
Ng`i-t^eu ke chh`oi-s'an piong-to mut-thet, ng`i-t^eu ke s^am-fu p^un chh`ung-`e chu-thet.

Ng`i-t^eu ke k^im-ngi`un y'i-k^in s^ang-l^u thet-hi; ke-t^eu l^u oi cho ko ng`i-t^eu ke chu"n-k'i, chhiong f'o yit-yong s^eu-m+et ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-th'i. Chhai su"-kie ke m+at-kh`i, ng`i-t^eu h`an chhai ke-vi chit-chh`un chh`oi-s'an!

Ng`i-t^eu pok-siok chhai thi`en-hong vi ng`i-t^eu kot-v`o ke k^ung-ng`in, khieu k`i-t^eu ke k^ung-chhi`en. Th^ang ^a, ke-t^eu chhi`en-ngi`un chhut yen-s^ang l^o; ke-t^eu s^u-kot ke k^ung-ng`in, k`i-t^eu yen-than ke s^ang ya ng+ip-to Ch'u --- Van-ki^un ke Ngi`en-soi ke ng'i-k^ung l^o!
Ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-ki^en chh^a-f`a yen-l+ok, chi^ong chhu"-k^a hiuk-to ph`i-ph`i, t'en p^un-ng`in chh`u" ke ngit-`e.
Ng`i-t^eu chi^ong ngi-ng`in thin-chhui, hoi-s'i k`i-t^eu; k`i-t^eu ya m`o t'i-khong ng`i-t^eu.

S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi ngi^un-nai, t'en-to Ch'u chai-l`oi. Khon ^a, k^ang-thi`en-ng`in 'an y^u nai-s^im t'en-heu thi`en-t'u p'o-kui ke chhut-s'an, ngi^un-nai t'en-heu chh^un-l`im chhi^u-y'i.
Ng`i-t^eu ya oi chhiong 'an-ngi`ong ngi^un-nai. Ng`i-t^eu ke s^im oi ki^en-thin, y^in-vi Ch'u chai-l`oi ke ngit-`e voi to l'e.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, `m-h'o p'i-chh'u" m`ai-yen, mi^en-tet ng`i-t^eu su s'u"m-phan; khon ^a, s'u"m-phan ke Ch'u chhai m`un-h'eu l'e.
Hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, v^ong-s`u" ke-t^eu fung Ch'u ke mi`ang k'ong-fa ke si^en-t^i, ng`i-t^eu oi n^a k`i-t^eu ke su-kh'u l^au ngi^un-nai l`oi cho p'ong-yong.

Oi t^i, chhai ng`ai-t^eu khon-l`oi, ke-t^eu ngi^un-nai to-t'ai ke ng`in he y^u fuk-hi ke. Ng`i-t^eu th^ang-ko Yok-pak ke ngi^un-nai, ya t^i heu-l`oi Ch'u ngi'ong-p^an khon-ku k`i. Ch'u he m^an-y^u chh`u"-p^i l^au l`in-m'en ke.

Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, chui chhung-yeu ke he `m-h'o fat-su"! `M-h'o ch'u" thi^en, ch'u" thi, ya-he ch'u" m'a-ke t^ung-s^i fat-su". He, chhiu k'ong "He"; `m-he, chhiu k'ong "`M-he". 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi ham-l+ok Song-ti ke s'u"m-phan.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in su-kh'u m`o? K`i yin-t^ong oi kh`i-t'o. Y^u-ng`in s^im-chh`in f^on-h'i m`o? K`i yin-t^ong oi k^o-siung Song-ti.
Ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en y^u-ng`in pot-phiang m`o? K`i yin-t^ong chhi'ang kau-fi ke ch'ong-l'o l`oi vi k`i kh`i-t'o, fung Ch'u ke mi`ang vi k`i mat-y`u.
Y^u sin-s^im ke kh`i-t'o voi kiu-t'o ke phiang-ng`in; Ch'u voi p^un phiang-ng`in h'o h'i-l`oi; na-he k`i fam-li'au chhui, Ch'u ya voi sa-mi^en k`i.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi fu-si^ong ngin-chhui, p'i-chh'u" thoi-t'o, s'u" ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o y^i-chhu". Ngi-ng`in ke kh`i-t'o he thai-y^u k^ung-h'au ke.
Y^i-li-^a l^au ng`ai-t^eu y^u khiung-yong ke ng`in-sin; k`i pet-chhiet kh`i-t'o, khi`u Song-ti m+ok l+ok-y'i, chu"n-k^in chhiu y^u s^am-ngi`en-pan m`o l+ok-y'i.
K`i chai kh`i-t'o, thi^en chhiu l+ok thai-y'i, thi chang chhut-s'an 'ng-kuk.
Ng`ai ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en na y^u-ng`in h`ang `m-chh+ok lu, l`i-kh^oi ch^u"n-l^i, y^u-ng`in chi^ong k`i tai-ch'on-l`oi,
ng`i-t^eu oi t^i: M'a-ng`in tai chhui-ng`in f`i-th`eu, l`i-kh^oi `m-chh+ok ke lu, voi chi^ong chhui-ng`in ke l`in-f`un tui s'i chhi'ong-kiu ch'on-l`oi, yu p^un t^o-t^o ke chhui tet-t'o sa-mi^en.

Ng`ai he P'i-tet, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai si'a sin-'e p^un Song-ti ke si'en-m`in, chhiu-he ke-t^eu f^un-san chhai P'un-t^u, K^a-l^a-thai, K^a-pha-t^o-k^a, ^A-se-^a, P'i-th^ui-n`i kok thi-f^ong phit-nan ke ng`in.

Ng`i-t^eu su ki'en-si'en he cheu ^A-p^a Song-ti s'o yi-thin ke ch'u"-yi, th^ung-ko Su"n-L`in s`ang-cho su"n-kiet, l`oi sun-f+uk Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk, p^un k`i ke hiet kiet-chhiang. Ngien Song-ti f^ung-f^ung fu-fu su ^en-ti'en, ph`in-^on p^un ng`i-t^eu!

Siung-chan k^ui-p^un ng`ai-t^eu Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ^A-p^a Song-ti! Cheu K`i ke thai chh`u"-p^i, th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk tui s'i f+uk-f+at, K`i chi^ong s^in ke s^ang-miang su-p^un ng`ai-t^eu, p^un ng`ai-t^eu y^u s^ang ke phan-mong,
l`oi s`u"n-su Song-ti vi K`i ke ch'u"-m`in s'o p'o-li`u ke f^ung-fu ke fuk-fun. K`i vi ng`i-t^eu p'o-li`u chhai thi^en-t'ang ke fuk-fun he `m-voi phai-fai, `m-voi t'a l'a-sap, ya `m-voi s^eu-su"t.

Li'a-ke fuk-fun oi su-p^un ng`i li'a-t^eu y^in-vi sin Song-ti m`ung K`i thai-n`en p'o-s'u ke ng`in, p^un ng`i-t^eu s`u"n-su ke y'i-k^in ch'un-phi-h'o, chhai l+it-s'u" ke kiet-m^i oi s+u"t-hien ke ch'u"n-kiu.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi thai f^on-h'i, s^ui-y`en y^in-vi ch'ung-ch'ung ke su"-lien, ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha kh'o-n`en chhiam-s`u" voi y^u y`u-s`eu.

Li'a he oi chu"n-m`in ng`i-t^eu khok-s+u"t y^u ki^en-thin ke sin-s^im. Voi s^eu-m+et ke k^im-'e, h`an yung f'o l`oi lien; ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im p'i k^im-'e ko kha kui-chhung, t^ong-y`en h`an-kha oi su kh'au-ngiam l`oi ki^en-thin, p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk hi'en-hien ke-ngit tet-t'o chh^u"n-chan, k^ong-y`ung, l^au ch^un-kui.

Ng`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en m`o kien-ko k`i, ch'ung-he kin-oi k`i; s^ui-y`en li'a-ha khon k`i `m-t'o, h`an-he sin-kho k`i. S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu chhiu y^u m`o fap-thu p'eu-th+at ke-ch'ung m^an-y^u y`ung-k^ong ke f^on-h'i,
y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu li'a-ha li^ang-su sin-s^im ke h'au-k'o, chhiu-he ng`i-t^eu l`in-f`un ke tet-kiu.
Lun-t'o li'a ch'u"n-kiu, chung si^en-t^i ch'o chhiu si`ong-se chh`a-kh'au ngi^en-kiu ko l'e, k`i-t^eu su"t yi-ngi`en Song-ti s'o-oi su p^un ng`i-t^eu ke ^en-ti'en.

K`i-t^eu chh`a-kh'au, oi t^i K^i-tuk ke L`in chhai k`i-t^eu t^i-poi s'o ch'u"-su" ke, chhiu-he "K^i-tuk thin-chh+ok oi su-kh'u, heu-l`oi yit-thin voi tet-t'o y`ung-k^ong" li'a-ke yi-ngi`en, voi chhai m'a-ke s`u"-chiet, nai-ch'ung chh`in-h`in ch^u"-ha l`oi s+u"t-hien.

Song-ti kh'i-su" chung si^en-t^i, p^un k`i-t^eu t^i, k`i-t^eu ke k^ung-chok pin `m-he vi chhu"-k^a, he vi ng`i-t^eu. K`i-t^eu s'o-k'ong ke li'a-t^eu su", li'a-ha y'i-k^in th^ung-ko fuk-y^im ke s'u"-ch'a, y'i-kho tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke Su"n-L`in, chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu l'e; li'a-t^eu su", li`en thi^en-s'u" me chhin si'ong-oi chh`a-khon!
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu ke s^im oi ch'un-phi h'o-se; oi k'in-si'ang, ch^on-s^im phan-mong Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk hi'en-hien ke-s`u" s'o-oi su-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke ^en-ti'en.
Oi cho th^ang-chhi`ung Song-ti ke ch'u"-'ng, `m-h'o p^un s^u"-y+uk hot-chu", chhiong ng`i-t^eu th`eu-p'ai ngong-tong m`o chu"-su"t ke s`u"-chiet 'an-ngi`ong.
F^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke Song-ti he su"n-kiet ke; ng`i-t^eu ya thin-chh+ok oi chhai yit-chhiet s'o cho ke su"-song su"n-kiet;
y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu oi su"n-kiet, y^in-vi Ng`ai he su"n-kiet ke."

Ng`i-t^eu kh`i-t'o ke s`u", ham ke cheu ng`in ke h`ang-v`i, yung khiung-yong ke ph^eu-ch'un l`oi s'u"m-phan ng`in ke Song-ti cho ^A-p^a; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-ki^en cho l^i-hak ke ngit-`e chhiu yin-k^oi oi kin-vi K`i.

Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu t^i, ng`i-t^eu tui ch'u-si^en s'o-chh`on ke, voi phai-fai ke s^ang-miang-ch^ung tet-t'o su"t-fong, s'o fu-song ke thoi-ka he m'a-ke. Pin `m-he chhiong k^im-ngi`un li'a-t^eu voi phai-fai ke t^ung-s^i,
he K^i-tuk p'o-kui ke hiet; K`i he chhiong hien-chi s'o yung, m`o khiet-ti'am m`o l'a-sap ke k^au-y`ong yit-yong.
Chhai su"-kie chh'ong-chho y^i-chhi`en, Song-ti y'i-k^in si^en ki'en-si'en K^i-tuk, oi k`i chhai li'a l+it-s'u" ke m+at-kh`i vi ng`i-t^eu l`oi hi'en-hien.
Th^ung-ko k`i, ng`i-t^eu si^ong-sin ke s'u" k`i tui s'i f+uk-f+at, yu su k`i y`ung-yeu ke Song-ti; y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke sin-s^im l^au phan-mong he tang-k^in chhai Song-ti ke t^i-poi.

Li'a-ha, y^in-vi th^ang-chhi`ung ch^u"n-l^i, ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in s'u" chhu"-k^a s`ang-cho kiet-chhiang ke ng`in, yu ch^u"n-s+u"t oi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi, chhiu yin-t^ong tui s^im-t'ai p'i-chh'u" ngi+et-s`u"n si^ong-siak.

Y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu tet-t'o chh`ung-s^en, `m-he tui ke voi phai-fai ke ch'ung-ch'u" s^ang chhut-l`oi ke, he tui ke `m-voi phai-fai ke ch'ung-ch'u", chhiu-he Song-ti y^u s^ang-miang, chh`ong-chh`un ke tho-l^i l`oi ke.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Tak-ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung chhiong y^a-chh'o khiung-yong, k`i-t^eu ke y`ung-f`a chhi`on-phu chhiong y^a-f^a; chh'o voi kh^u-ch^au, f^a voi chhia-thet,
ch'ung-he Ch'u ke tho y'un-y'en chh`ong-chh`un! Li'a tho chhiu-he ke chh`on-p^un ng`i-t^eu ke fuk-y^im.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi chh`u-thet yit-chhiet ke si`a-ok, k'ui-cha, k'a-mo v`i-san, chhit-tu, l^au yit-chhiet f'i-pong ng`in ke fa;
oi chhiong chang chhut-se ke ^o-nga-'e, hot-mu s`un-chhiang ke l`in-nen, p^un ng`i-t^eu th^ung-ko k`i l`oi ch'ong-thai chu"-to tet-kiu.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: "Ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in s`ong-ko Ch'u chh`u"-oi ke ch^u"-mi."
Oi chh^in-khiun Ch'u, k`i he s^ang ke s+ak-th`eu; s^ui-y`en k`i p^un-ng`in kh^i-chhi+et, ch'ung-he Song-ti ki'en-si'en k`i, khon k`i cho p'o-pi ke.

Ng`i-t^eu ya oi chhiong s^ang ke s+ak-th`eu, su kien-chho s`ang-cho s+uk-l`in ke su"n-thien, chhai ke-vi cho su"n-kiet ke chi-s^u", th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk l`oi hien Song-ti s'o f^on-h'i s+uk-l`in ke chi-v+ut.
Y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: Ng`ai th+ok yit-te kui-chhung ke s+ak-th`eu, l`oi cho Siak-^on f`ong-kok ke s+ak-th`eu; sin-kho k`i ke, chhi+et-tui `m-voi su"t-mong.

Tui ng`i-t^eu sin ke ng`in l`oi k'ong, li'a s+ak-th`eu he f^i-s`ong p'o-kui ke; ch'ung-he, tui ke-t^eu `m sin ke ng`in: N`ai-s'ui s^u"-fu s'o fit-thet ke li'a-te s+ak-th`eu, y'i-k^in s`ang-cho thi-k^i ch^ung chui chhung-yeu ke!

Su"n-k^in nang-ngoi yu k'ong: Li'a-te s+ak-th`eu voi pan ng`in ke kiok, he voi s'u"-ng`in tiet-t'o ke thai s+ak-th`eu! K`i-t^eu pan-t'o l'e, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu `m sin ch^u"n-tho; li'a ya he Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi.

Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu he su ki'en-si'en ke yit-chh+uk, he V`ong ke chi-s^u", su"n-kiet ke koet, Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in. Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu l`i-kh^oi v^u-am, chin-ng+ip K`i kh`i-meu ke k^ong-m`in, l`oi si^en-y`ong K`i o-meu ke chok-v`i.
Ng`i-t^eu y^i-chhi`en `m-he Song-ti ke ch'u"-m`in, ch'ung-he li'a-ha he K`i ke ch'u"-m`in; y^i-chhi`en m`o tet-t'o Song-ti ke l`in-m'en, li'a-ha y'i-k^in tet-t'o K`i ke l`in-m'en.

Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-ki^en he l^i-hak, he phit-nan ke ng`in! Ng`ai khien ng`i-t^eu, `m-h'o fong-chi'ung ngiuk-th'i ke chh`in-y+uk; chh`in-y+uk chhi`ung-l`oi chhiu-he k^ung-kit l`in-f`un ke.

Chhai Ngoi-p^ang-ng`in t^ong-ch^ung, ng`i-t^eu yin-t^ong y^u t^on-chang ke ph'in-hen, p^un ke-t^eu k'ong ng`i-t^eu f'ai-fa, chit-phi ng`i-t^eu cho f'ai-su" ke ng`in, y^in-vi khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu ke h'o h`ang-v`i, chhai Ch'u chai-l`oi ke-ngit, voi k^ui y`ung-k^ong p^un Song-ti.
Vi-t'o Ch'u ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung su"-ki^en s'o-y^u ke ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a, chhiu-he chhai-song ke ki^un-v`ong,
pin k`i s'o phai-l`oi chit-f+at chok-ok, chi'ong-li h`ang-san ke k^on-ch'ong.
Y^in-vi Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi he oi ng`i-t^eu yung h'o h`ang-v`i l`oi set-s'i ke-p^an f`u-th`u-ng`in v`u-t^i ke choi.
Ng`i-t^eu oi cho chhu"-y`u-ng`in! Ch'ung-he `m-h'o yung chhu"-y`u cho si`a-ok ke chia-khi'eu; ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu oi cho Song-ti ke n`u-ph+uk.
Ng`i-t^eu oi ch^un-chhung m^i-yit-ke ng`in; siak sin Ch'u ke hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi; kin-vi Song-ti; ch^un-chhung ki^un-v`ong.

Cho n`u-ph+uk ke, ng`i-t^eu oi sun-chhi`ung ch'u-ng`in, ya oi tui k`i-t^eu p'eu-hien s+u"p-f^un ke ki^ung-kin; `m t^an-chhiang tui h'o-s^im v^un-y`u ke ch'u-ng`in oi 'an-ngi`ong, tui chh^u-phau ke ch'u-ng`in ya oi 'an-ngi`ong.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu khon li'a he Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, k^am-ngien ngi^un-su `m yin-k^oi s+u"t ke kh'u, Song-ti yit-thin voi su-fuk p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Na-he ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi fam-chhui l`oi ngi^un-su chit-t'a, y^u m'a-ke k^ong-y`ung n`e? V`i-y^u y^in-vi h`ang-san l`oi ngi^un-su kh'u-nan ke ng`in chang voi tet-t'o Song-ti ke su-fuk.
Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke muk-tit chhiu-he chhai li'a-vi; y^in-vi K^i-tuk vi ng`i-t^eu su-kh'u, li`u-h^a p'ong-yong p^un ng`i-t^eu, oi p^un ng`i-t^eu th`en k`i ke kiok-phu h`ang.
K`i m`o fam-ko chhui; m`o ng`in th^ang-ko k`i k'ong f^a-li^au.
K`i p^un-ng`in y+uk-ma m`o en-choi, p^un-ng`in ngi+ok-thai ya m`o k'ong khi'ung-hak ke fa, ch'u"-y^u ngi'ong-mong ke cheu k^ung-ngi s'u"m-phan ng`in ke Ch'u.

K^i-tuk chhai s+u"p-su"-ka-t'ang chh^in-s^u"n t^am-t^ong ng`ai-t^eu ke chhui, p^un ng`ai-t^eu ki-y`en chhai chhui-ok-song s'i, chhiu vi-t'o k^ung-ngi l`oi s^ang. Y^in-vi k`i s'o-su ke pi^en-s^ong, ng`i-t^eu chhiu tet-t'o y^i-chhu".
Y^i-chhi`en ng`i-t^eu chhiong m`i-lu ke y`ong, ch'ung-he li'a-ha y'i-k^in f`i-th`eu, th`en-t'en ng`i-t^eu l`in-f`un ke m+uk-ch'a l^au kam-fu-ng`in l'e.

Khiung-yong, cho p^u-ngi`ong ke, ng`i-t^eu ya yin-k^oi sun-chhi`ung chhu"-k^a ke l'o-k^ung, p^un m`o sin-chhi`ung ch^u"n-tho ke l'o-k^ung y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu ke h'o ph'in-hen l`oi su k'am-fa. Ng`i-t^eu ke fa `m-s'u" k'ong 'an-t^o,
y^in-vi k`i-t^eu voi khon-t'o ng`i-t^eu s`un-kiet l^au t^on-ch^ong ke ph'in-hen.
Ng`i-t^eu `m-h'o k'ong-kiu ngoi-chhai ke t'a-pan, chhiong oi ngi'ong-p^an pi^en th`eu-n`a-m^o, tai k^im-lien, chok chi^ang s^am t'en.
Yin-t^ong y^u nui-chhai ke chi^ang, yung `m-voi thui-set ke v^un-y`u l^au ti^am-chhin l`oi t'a-pan; cheu Song-ti khon, li'a he chui y^u ka-chh+u"t ke.
Y^in-vi, th`eu-p'ai ke-t^eu su"n-kiet ke fu-'ng, k`i-t^eu ngi'ong-mong Song-ti, l^ung-ch'ung yung sun-chhi`ung l'o-k^ung l`oi t'a-pan chhu"-k^a.
S^a-l^a chhiu-he 'an-ngi`ong; k`i sun-chhi`ung ^A-pak-l^a-h'on, chh^u"n k`i cho "Th`eu-k^a". Ng`i-t^eu na h`ang-san, m`o ki^ang t^ung ki^ang s^i, chhiu-he S^a-l^a ke moi-'e l'e.

Khiung-yong, cho l'o-k^ung ke, ng`i-t^eu th`ung p^u-ngi`ong khiung-ha s^en-f+at, oi th'i-thiap k`i-t^eu he kha ngi^on-ngi+ok ke th`ung-ph^an. Oi ch^un-chhung k`i-t^eu, y^in-vi k`i-t^eu he th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha s`u"n-chiap Song-ti s'o su ke s^in s^ang-miang. 'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o chhiu `m-voi su ch'u-ngoi.
Ch'ung-k'ong, ng`i-t^eu thai-k^a oi y^u khiung-yong ke s^im-chu" l^au s^im-chh`in, chhiong hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi 'an-ngi`ong si^ong-siak, yung chh`u"-oi l^au khi^am-p^i fu-si^ong kho'an-thai.
`M-h'o yung f'ai po f'ai, yung y+uk-ma v`an y+uk-ma; ti^en-to, oi chuk-fuk, y^in-vi Song-ti f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu ke muk-tit he oi p^un ng`i-t^eu s`u"n-su chuk-fuk.
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: M'a-ng`in si'ong-oi hi'ong-su ng`in-s^en, h^i-mong ko ^on-l+ok ke ngit-`e, s+at-m`a chhiu `m-h'o k'ong f'ai-fa, choi-s`un ya `m-h'o k'ong f^a-li^au.
Oi hi-chhi+et si`a-ok, chhin-l+it h`ang-san; oi ch^ui-khi`u f`o-ph`in, sat-m^ang hi h`ang.
Y^in-vi Ch'u khon-ku ngi-ng`in, li`u-s^im th^ang k`i-t^eu ke kh`i-t'o; ch'ung-he ke-t^eu chok-ok ke ng`in, Ch'u chhiu tui k`i-t^eu pien-mien.
Ng`i-t^eu na-he ngi+et-s^im h`ang-san, m'a-ng`in voi hoi ng`i-t^eu n`e?
Ng`i-t^eu chhiu-he vi ngi su-kh'u, ya he chhin y^u fuk-hi ^a! `M-s'u" ki^ang ng`in ke v^i-hi+ap, ya `m-s'u" y`u-s`eu.
Ng`i-t^eu ke s^im oi kin-vi K^i-tuk, ch^un k`i cho Ch'u. Oi s`ong-s`ong ch'un-phi h'o-se, l`oi f`i-tap ph+et-ng`in ke mun-th`i, chhiu-he ko^an-he ng`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung ke phan-mong;

ch'ung-he oi yung v^un-y`u l^au ki'un-s'u"m ke thai-thu l`oi f`i-tap. Oi y^u chh^in-ph+ak ke li`ong-s^im; 'an-ngi`ong, chhai ng`i-t^eu su v'u-y+uk ke s`u"-chiet, ke-t^eu f'i-pong ng`i-t^eu ke ng`in, voi y^in-vi ng`i-t^eu cho K^i-tuk-th`u s'o p'eu-hien ke h'o h`ang-v`i, chhu"-k^a k'am-kok kien-seu.
Song-ti ke yi-su", na-he oi ng`i-t^eu y^in-vi h`ang-san l`oi su-kh'u, kha-y`ang y^in-vi chok-ok l`oi su-kh'u.

Y^in-vi K^i-tuk su"t vi chhui l`oi s'i, yit-p'ai chhiu v`an-s`u"n, he ngi ke thoi put-ngi ke, oi tai ng`i-t^eu to Song-ti ke mien-chhi`en hi. K`i ke ngiuk-th'i p^un-ng`in chh'u s'i-h`in, ch'ung-he k`i ke l`in h`an-he s^ang-s^ang.
K`i th^ung-ko li'a-ke l`in su"t hi tui k^am-ngi+uk t'u ke-t^eu l`in chh`on-tho.

Ke-t^eu l`in he ngang-ki'ang ke l`in, chhiu-he chhai N`o-^a chho thai-s`on ke s`u", Song-ti ngi^un-nai t'en-thai ke l`in. T^ong-s`u", ng+ip thai-s`on th^ung-ko s'ui tet-t'o ch'u"n-kiu ke ng`in `m t^o, ch'u"-y^u pat-s`a.

Li'a-ke s'ui s'o yi-p'eu ke s'e-l^i, li'a-ha y'i-k^in kiu-t'o ng`i-t^eu. S'e-l^i `m-he s'e-chhiang ng`i-t^eu s^u"n-th'i ke l'a-sap, he p'eu-su" ng`i-t^eu yung chhiang-li ke li`ong-s^im tui Song-ti h'i-ngien; li'a s'e-l^i th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke f+uk-f+at ch'u"n-kiu ng`i-t^eu.

Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk y'i-k^in s^ong thi^en-t'ang hi, li'a-ha chh^o chhai Song-ti ke yu-phi'en; s'o-y^u ke thi^en-s'u" pin thi^en-kie ke ch'ong-khi`en-ch'a l^au th'ung-chhu"-ch'a l^ung-ch'ung f+uk-chhi`ung k`i.

K^i-tuk ki-y`en chhai ngiuk-th'i su-kh'u, ng`i-t^eu chhiu yin-k^oi yung li'a-ch'ung ke s^im-chu" ch^ong-phi chhu"-k^a, y^in-vi chhai ngiuk-th'i-song su-ko kh'u ke ng`in, k`i th`ung chhui-ok ke ko^an-he y'i-k^in chhiet-th^on;
chhi`ung-k^im y^i-heu, ng`i-t^eu chhai su"-ki^en ke ngit-`e oi sun-chhi`ung Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi, `m-h'o chai p^un ng`in ke y+uk-mong hot-chu".

V^ong-s`u" ng`i-t^eu long-fi k^ong-y^im, h`ang m`o sin ke ng`in f^on-h'i cho ke kok-ch'ung su", chhiong y`im-lon, s^u"-y+uk, hau-chi'u, yen-l+ok, chi'u-chui, l^au Song-ti fap-l+it s'o kim-ch'u" ke pai ngi'eu-siong.
Li'a-ha ng`i-t^eu m`o chai l^au k`i-t^eu khiung-yong ko ke-ch'ung fong-thong, m`o chiet-chu" ke s^en-f+at, k`i-t^eu k'am-kok chhin kh`i-koai, chhiu v'u-y+uk ng`i-t^eu.
Ch'ung-he, k`i-t^eu yit-thin oi tui ke s'u"m-phan s^ang-ng`in l^au s'i-ng`in ke Song-ti k^au-chong.

Chhiu-he y^in-vi 'an-ngi`ong, fuk-y^im ya su"t chh`on p^un s'i-ng`in, p^un k`i-t^eu s^ui-y`en ngiuk-th'i th`ung kh`i-th^a ke ng`in khiung-yong su s'u"m-phan, ch'ung-he l`in-f`un y^u-h'o chhiong Song-ti 'an-ngi`ong s^ang-t'en.
Van-su" ke kiet-khi+uk khi^un l'e. Ng`i-t^eu oi ki'un-s'u"m chiet-chu", k'in-si'ang kh`i-t'o.
Chui chhung-yeu ke he oi p'i-chh'u" ngi+et-s`u"n si^ong-siak, y^in-vi oi-siak chang n`en ch^a-koi t^o-t^o ke chhui.
Thai-k^a oi p'i-chh'u" chiap-thai, `m-h'o m`ai-yen.
Ki-y`en tak-s`a he Song-ti kok-yong ^en-su ke h'o k'on-k^a, chhiu oi cheu s'o li^ang-su ke ch'ung-ch'ung ^en-su, p'i-chh'u" f+uk-vu.

K'ong-tho ke, oi cheu Song-ti ke fa l`oi k'ong; f+uk-vu ke, oi yung Song-ti s'o su ke l+it-liong l`oi f+uk-vu, p^un van-hong su" l^ung-ch'ung th^ung-ko Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk k^ui y`ung-k^ong p^un Song-ti. Ngien y`ung-k^ong l^au khi`en-n`en chhi`on-phu k^ui-p^un K`i, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'un y'en-y'en! ^A-m'en.
Chh^in-oi ke ph`en-y^u ^a, ng`i-t^eu t`u-t'o chhiong f'o 'an-ngi`ong ke kh'au-ngiam, `m-s'u" kh`i-koai, chhiong-he t`u-t'o m'a-ke h^i-kh`i ke su".
Ti^en-to, ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi chi^ong f^un-t^am K^i-tuk ke kh'u-nan khon-cho khoai-l+ok ke su", h'o p^un ng`i-t^eu chhai k`i ke y`ung-k^ong hi'en-hien ke s`u" l`oi f^on-h'i khoai-l+ok.
Ng`i-t^eu na y^in-vi th`en K^i-tuk su v'u-y+uk, chhiu y^u fuk-hi l'e! Li'a p'eu-su" y`ung-k^ong ke Su"n-L`in, chhiu-he Song-ti ke L`in, chhai ng`i-t^eu ke s^u"n-song.
Ch'ung-he, ng`i-t^eu t^ong-ch^ung na y^u-ng`in su-kh'u, `m-h'o he y^in-vi hi^ung-sat, cho chh+et, fam h`in-su" on-khien, ya-he hau chhap h`an-su".
Su-kh'u na-he y^in-vi cho K^i-tuk-th`u, `m-h'o khon-cho kien-seu, f'an-ch'on oi y^in-vi y^u li'a-ke mi`ang-chh^u"n l`oi y`ung-k^ong Song-ti.

S'u"m-phan ke s`u"-chiet to l'e, Song-ti k^a-nui ke ch'u"-'ng oi si^en su s'u"m-phan. Ki-y`en s'u"m-phan oi tui ng`ai-t^eu kh^oi-s'u", 'an-ngi`ong, `m sin-chhi`ung Song-ti fuk-y^im ke ng`in kiet-khi+uk voi ngi'ong-p^an n`e?
Chhiong Su"n-k^in s'o k'ong: Li`en ngi-ng`in tet-kiu ya 'an m`o ki'en-t^an, `m kin-khi`en ke chhui-ng`in voi ngi'ong-p^an n`e?
S'o-y^i, ke-t^eu y^in-vi Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi su-kh'u ke ng`in, oi yit-s^im h`ang-san, chi^ong chhu"-k^a k^au-thok ke sin-s+u"t ke Chh'ong-chho Ch'u.
Ng`ai li'a cho ch'ong-l'o, cho K^i-tuk su-kh'u ke kien-chu"n-ng`in, y^u-fun chi^ong-l`oi s'o oi hi'en-hien ke y`ung-k^ong, li'a-ha khien ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en khiung-ha cho ch'ong-l'o ke.

Ng`i-t^eu oi m+uk-y^ong Song-ti thok-fu ng`i-t^eu ke y`ong-khi`un, l+ok-yi cheu Song-ti ke ch'u"-yi cheu-ku k`i-t^eu, `m-he chhut-y`i mi^en-ki'ong; `m-he y^in-vi th^am-chh`oi, he chhut-y`i k^am-s^im l`oi su"-fung.
`M-h'o hot-chu" s'o thok-fu ng`i-t^eu ke y`ong-khi`un, f'an-ch'on oi cho k`i-t^eu ke p'ong-yong.
'An-ngi`ong, thai m+uk-ch'a chhut-hien ke s`u"-chiet, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi li^ang-su ke y'un-y'en `m-voi su"t-hi y`ung-k^ong ke mi^en-li`u.

Khiung-yong, ng`i-t^eu heu-s^ang ke ng`in yin-k^oi sun-chhi`ung ch'ong-pi. Thai-k^a oi yung khi^am-p^i cho v`i-s^u"n-khi`un ki^e-t'en l`oi fu-si^ong f+uk-su"; y^in-vi Su"n-k^in k'ong: Song-ti ch'u-t'ong ki^eu-ngau ke ng`in, su ^en-ti'en p^un khi^am-p^i ke ng`in.
S'o-y^i, ng`i-t^eu oi khi^am-p^i, h`ong-f+uk chhai Song-ti thai-n`en ke s'u-h^a, 'an-ngi`ong, K`i voi chhai su"t-t^ong ke s`u"-k^i k^o-s^u"n ng`i-t^eu.
Oi chi^ong yit-chhiet ke koa-li k^au-p^un K`i, y^in-vi K`i ko^an-s^im ng`i-t^eu.
Oi chiet-chu" k'in-si'ang! Ng`i-t^eu ke tui-th+it --- M^o-k'ui chhiong ho-ho-k'un ke s^u"-'e 'an-ngi`ong h`ang-l`oi h`ang-hi, chh`im k`i th^un-tet-l+ok-hi ke ng`in.
Ng`i-t^eu oi sin-s^im ki^en-thin l`oi t'i-khong k`i, y^in-vi t^i, ng`i-t^eu chhai chhi`on su"-kie ke chung hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ya k^in-l+it khiung-yong ke kh'u-nan.

Ch'ung-he, chhai ng`i-t^eu chhiam-s`u" su-kh'u y^i-heu, ke su yit-chhiet ^en-ti'en ke Song-ti, chhiu-he f^u-seu ng`i-t^eu th^ung-ko th`ung K^i-tuk Y^a-s^u kiet-li`en l`oi f^un-hi'ong K`i y'un-y'en ke y`ung-k^ong ke Song-ti, thin-chh+ok voi chh^in-chhu" s`u"n-chhi`on ng`i-t^eu, ki^en-thin ng`i-t^eu, su l+it-liong l^au ki^en-ku ke thi-k^i p^un ng`i-t^eu.
Ngien khi`en-n`en k^ui-p^un K`i, chh+u"t-to y'un-y'un y'en-y'en! ^A-m'en.

Chhai ch^ung-s^im ke hi^ung-thi S^i-l^a ke p^ong-chhu ch^u"-ha, ng`ai si'a li'a-f^ung t'on-t'on ke sin-'e p^un ng`i-t^eu, l`oi khien-mi^en ng`i-t^eu, tui ng`i-t^eu cho kien-chu"n: Li'a he Song-ti ch^u"n-s+u"t ke ^en-ti'en; ng`i-t^eu oi chhai li'a-ke ^en-ti'en t'ang-k^o kh^i-v'un.
Th`ung ng`i-t^eu khiung-ha tet-t'o ki'en-si'en ke P^a-p'i-l`un kau-fi tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on; ng^a lai-'e M^a-kh'o ya tui ng`i-t^eu chhi'ang-^on.
Ng`i-t^eu oi yung oi-s^im l`oi p'i-chh'u" ch^im-choi chhi'ang-^on. Ngien ng`i-t^eu s'o-y^u s+uk K^i-tuk ke ng`in l^ung-ch'ung tet-t'o ph`in-^on!

Ng`ai he S^i-m`un-P'i-tet, Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ph+uk-ng`in l^au s'u"-th`u. Ng`ai si'a sin-'e p^un ke-t^eu th^ung-ko ng`ai-t^eu ke Song-ti l^au Kiu-ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke ngi, th`ung ng`ai-t^eu tet-t'o khiung-yong p'o-kui sin-ngi'ong ke ng`in:
Ngien ng`i-t^eu th^ung-ko ngin-su"t Song-ti l^au ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u tet-t'o f^ung-f^ung fu-fu ke ^en-ti'en l^au ph`in-^on!

Song-ti y'i-k^in yung K`i s`u"n-su"n ke n`en-l+it, chi^ong ng`ai-t^eu ko kin-khi`en s^en-f+at s'o s^i-yeu ke yit-chhiet su p^un ng`ai-t^eu l'e; li'a-ke ^en-su he th^ung-ko ngin-su"t ke f^u-seu ng`ai-t^eu l`oi f^un-hi'ong K`i chhu"-k^a ke y`ung-k^ong l^au li`ong-san ke Ch'u l`oi ke.

'An-ngi`ong, K`i chi^ong K`i s'o yin-h'i chui thai l^au chui p'o-kui ke ^en-su su p^un ng`ai-t^eu; th^ung-ko li'a-t^eu ^en-su, ng`i-t^eu chhiu cho-tet thot-l`i su"-ki^en f'i-m+et-sin ke y+uk-mong, l`oi f^un-hi'ong Song-ti ke s`u"n-sin.
Vi-t'o li'a-ke y`en-ku, ng`i-t^eu oi chhin-l+it s'u" ng`i-t^eu chhai sin-s^im song k^a-song m^i-tet, m^i-tet k^a-song chu"-su"t,
chu"-su"t k^a-song chiet-chu", chiet-chu" k^a-song ngi^un-nai, ngi^un-nai k^a-song kin-khi`en,
kin-khi`en k^a-song oi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke chh`in, oi hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ke chh`in yu k^a-song siak chung-ng`in ke s^im.
Li'a-t^eu he ng`i-t^eu yin-k^oi ph`i-y^ong ke tet-hen, yu ngit-kien ngit-t^o; 'an-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu chhiu voi h`an-kha y^u-h'au, kien-k^a chh^u"m-khiet ngin-su"t ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk.
Ch'ung-he, m`o li'a-t^eu tet-hen ke ng`in chhiu-he khiun-su", su"m-chu" m^o-muk, `m ki-tet chhu"-k^a v^ong-ngit ke chhui y'i-k^in tet-t'o s'e-chhiang l'e.

S'o-y^i, hi^ung-thi ch'i-moi ^a, ng`i-t^eu oi kien-k^a n'u-l+it, s'u" Song-ti ke f^u-seu l^au ki'en-si'en s`ang-cho ng`i-t^eu y'un-ki'u ke k^in-ngiam; y^u li'a-t^eu k^in-ngiam, ng`i-t^eu chhiu `m-voi tiet-t'o.
'An-ngi`ong, ng`i-t^eu voi li^ang-su chh^ung-f^un ke khi`en-li, y^u-h'o chin-ng+ip ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u --- Kiu-ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk y'un-y'en ke koet.
S'o-y^i, s^ui-y`en ng`i-t^eu y'i-k^in t^i li'a-t^eu su", ya chhai s'o li^ang-su ke ch^u"n-l^i song kh^i-to chhai-chhai, ng`ai h`an-he oi yit-chh+u"t th`i-si'ang ng`i-t^eu.
Ng`ai si'ong, ng`ai h`an chhai su"-ki^en yit-ngit, ng`ai yin-t^ong s`ong-s`ong p^ong-chhu ng`i-t^eu ki-tet li'a-t^eu su".
Ng`ai t^i, ko m`o k'i-ki'u, ng`ai voi thot-l`i li'a voi f'u-lan ke s^u"n-th'i; li'a he ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ch'u"-su" ng`ai ke.
Ng`ai oi si'ong-chhin phan-fap s'u" ng`i-t^eu chhai ng`ai l`i-kh^oi su"-ki^en y^i-heu h`an voi s`ong-s`ong ki-tet li'a-t^eu su".

Ng`ai-t^eu y^i-chhi`en chi^ong y^u-ko^an ng`ai-t^eu ke Ch'u Y^a-s^u K^i-tuk ke thai-n`en l^au chai-l`im ke su" l^au ng`i-t^eu k'ong, pin `m-he k^in-k'i ke-t^eu ngiap-chho chhut-l`oi m`o-y'ang m`o-chiak ke chh`on-sot. Ng`ai-t^eu y^u chh^in-ngi'en khon-ko k`i ke v'i-thai.

K`i tui ^A-p^a Song-ti chiap-su ch^un-kui l^au y`ung-k^ong ke s`u", ng`ai-t^eu ya l^ung-ch'ung chhai-chh`ong. Ke-s`u", Chu"-k^o Y`ung-k^ong ke Song-ti tui k`i k'ong: "Li'a he Ng`ai s'o-siak ke Lai-'e, Ng`ai s'o f^on-h'i ke."
Ng`ai-t^eu th`ung k`i khiung-ha chhai su"n-s^an t'ang-k^o, chh^in-ng'i th^ang-t'o li'a tui thi^en-t'ang l`oi ke s^ang-y^im.

'An-ngi`ong, ng`ai-t^eu tui chung si^en-t^i s'o si^en-pu ke fa kien-k^a khok-sin. Ng`i-t^eu oi h'o-h'o li`u-yi li'a-ke fa; y^in-vi k`i he chhiong yit-ch'an m`in-t^en k^ong-cheu v^u-am ke s'o-chhai, chh+u"t-to thi^en-k^ong, to ch^eu-s`u"n-th`eu ke s^en-'e chhai ng`i-t^eu s^im-ch^ung fat-chhut k^ong ke-ngit.
Chui chhung-yeu ke yit-ti'am, ng`i-t^eu oi ki-tet: Su"n-k^in t^i-poi ke yi-ngi`en, m`o yit-ke he cheu chhu"-k^a ke yi-su" l`oi ki'e-su"t ke;
y^in-vi, chhi`ung-l`oi m`o yit-ke yi-ngi`en he tui ng`in ke yi-su" l`oi ke, kh`i-s+u"t he ng`in su Su"n-L`in ke k'am-thung chi^ong Song-ti ke fa chh`on chhut-l`oi ke.

Th`eu-p'ai y^u k'a si^en-t^i chhai Y^i-set-li+et m`in-ki^en chhut-hien; khiung-yong, ya voi y^u k'a kau-s^u" chhai ng`i-t^eu ch^ung-ki^en chhut-hien. K`i-t^eu voi am-ch^ung tai-ng+ip f'i-m+et-sin ke yi-t^on, su"m-chu" `m s`u"n-ngin kiu-s+uk k`i-t^eu ke Ch'u-ch'ai, chhin-kiak chhiu chhu"-chh'i m+et-m`ong.
S^ui-y`en 'an-ngi`ong, h`an-he y^u chhin-t^o ng`in voi th`en k`i-t^eu hi h`ang y`im-lon ke su", chu"-to ch^u"n-tho y^in-vi k`i-t^eu ke h`ang-v`i su-t'o f'i-pong.

Li'a-t^eu k'a kau-s^u" vi-t'o oi m^an-chiuk chhu"-k^a ke th^am-s^im, voi yung ngiap-chho ke ku-su" l`oi phien ng`i-t^eu ke chh`oi-v+ut. Chhu"-k'u y^i-l`oi, k`i-t^eu ke h`in-f+at yit-chh+u"t m`o y`en-chh`an; k`i-t^eu ke m+et-m`ong pit-thin kiak-kiak l`oi-to!
Song-ti pin m`o ngi`eu ke-t^eu fam-chhui ke thi^en-s'u", f'an-ch'on chi^ong k`i-t^eu fit-l+ok thi-ngi+uk, ko^an chhai v^u-am ch^ung, t'en-heu s'u"m-phan.
